igbo: Frank Edoho bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na TV, onye na-ese ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede foto
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado ihe ngosi TV Naijiria a ma ama, Onye chọrọ ịbụ onye nde mmadụ
Frank lụrụ Katherine Obiang ma nwee ụmụ atọ tupu ha kewaa na 2011
Ọ lụrụ nwunye ya nke abụọ, Sandra Onyenuchenuya
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, Frank na Sandra nabatara nwa mbụ ha (nke anọ nke Frank) ma mụọ nwa nke abụọ ha afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị na US
Frank gụrụ sayensị anụmanụ na Mahadum Calabar Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri rap nke aha ya bụ Mc Frank

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi na Cross River Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi steeti ma mekwara ihe ngosi telivishọn nri ụtụtụ maka Nigerian Television Authority, Channel 9, Calabar
Frank kwagara na Metro FM 976 na 1999 ebe ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi redio maka ụlọ ọrụ redio
Otú ọ dị, ihe ngosi a ma ama, Onye chọrọ ịbụ nde mmadụ mere ka ọ pụta ìhè
Ewezuga ịbụ onye na-elekọta TV, ọ bụkwa onye na-ese ihe, onye na-ede foto, onye na'emepụta ihe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Mgbe ọ jụrụ nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ iji gaa n'ihu dị ka onye na-elekọta Onye chọrọ ịbụ nde mmadụ, a kpughere ya na Emmanuel Essien, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Mannie, dị ka onye nwe ihe ngosi TV mba ụwa, Ọnụ ahịa ahụ ziri ezi A na-akwanyere Frank ùgwù maka olu ya na-ekwu okwu ma mee ọtụtụ olu maka mgbasa ozi redio na ọhịa redio maka Ihe ọṅụṅụ mkpụrụ osisi Vogue, First City Monument Bank, Unilever Nigeria Plc, International Bank Plc na Elizade Toyota
Frank Edoho kwadoro ihe ngosi egwuregwu TV a ma ama ruo afọ 13 site na 2004 ruo 2017 mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 2 Septemba 2017
Ọ mara ọkwa ọpụpụ ya site na ibe Twitter ya mgbe ọ na-ekwekọrịtaghị na usoro ya na Ultima Studios
Edoho gọnahụrụ na ndị na-ahazi ihe ngosi ahụ 'kwụsịrị', na-ekwusi ike na ọ 'jụjụ onyinye' e nyere ya
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2022, ọ laghachiri na ihe ngosi ahụ

Frank Ugochukwu Edwards (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu si Enugu Steeti Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye nwe labelụ Rocktown Records, nke bụ ebe obibi nke ndị na-edekọ egwu dịka Edwards n'onwe ya, Gil, Divine, King BAS, Nkay, David, Dudu na Micah Heavens, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ bi na Lagos, Nigeria
A mụrụ Frank Edwards n'ime ezinụlọ mmadụ asaa
Aha ọmụmụ ya bụ Frank Ugochukwu Edwards
A mụrụ ya na Enugu steeti nke Naịjirịa
O nwere ụmụnne ise
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Ọ mụtara ịkpọ piano site n'aka nna ya mgbe ọ dị obere
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ ghọrọ Onye Kraịst a mụrụ ọzọ
O nwere abọm isii na ọtụtụ egwu egwu n'aha ya
O meela onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị egwu ozioma kachasị mma na Naịjirịa
Maazị Edwards bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ma na-akpọ ọtụtụ ngwá egwu
Ọ bụ onye ama ama na keyboardist na onye otu Presidential band nke Pastor Chris Oyakhilome nke Christ Embassy Church
E wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ The Definition n'afọ 2008
Ọ bụ abọm nwere egwu iri na anọ ma Honesty Music kesara ya
E wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya bụ Angels on the Runway n'afọ 2010, ewepụtakwara abọm nke atọ ya bụ Unlimited n'afọ 2011
A tọhapụrụ Tagjam na Nọvemba 2011N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri nke Sinach 'Amaara m onye m bụ' vidiyo
A maara ya maka olu ya dị elu
E wezụga ịbụ onye na-ese ihe na ọtụtụ egwu na-ekpuchi ụdị egwu dị iche iche, ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta egwu na onye na-agwakọta egwu
N'ihi ya, Rocktown Records, nke o nwere, nwere ọgbọ nke talent na-abịanụ gụnyere Gil Joe, King BAS, Divine, Nkay, Soltune, David na ndị ọzọ

N'afọ 2016, ya na onye ama ama n'Amerịka, Don Moen rụkọrọ ọrụ na abọm 'Grace' His Album e mepụtara na 2016Frankincense N'afọ 2018, o wepụtara abọm maka Body of Christ nke akpọrọ 'Spiritual Music Season' nke gụnyere egwu dịka 'Miyeruwe' (I Praise your Name), 'You are Good', 'Who dey run things' & 'Praise Your Name'
Ka ọ dị na 2018, ya na Nathaniel Bassey (Thy Will Be Done) na Jeanine Zoe (I'm in Love with You) arụkọla ọrụ

Frank Edwards (nke a na-akpọ Frankrichboy) bụ onye otu Christ Embassy Church na Nigeria na LoveWorld Music Ministry ya na ndị egwu ozioma ndị ọzọ gụnyere Moses Bliss, Ada Ehi (onye egwu ozioma), Sinach, Eben, Joe Praize
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ese egwu Gospel nke afọ na nke isii kwa afọ Nigeria Entertainment Awards (NEA)
O ritere ihe nrite nke onye egwu Gospel Rock kacha mma na onyinye mbụ kwa afọ

O ritekwara ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka kacha mma nwoke na 2012 / egwu kachasị mma na love world awards 2012 / na onyinye atọ na Nigeria gospel music awards (nwoke na-eti egwu nke afọ, abụ nke afọ na nwoke kacha mma)

Abọm ya kachasị ọhụrụ, Frankincense nke mere Micah Stampley na Nathaniel Bassey mere ka onye ọ bụla nwee obi ụtọ mgbe ọ nọ n'elu abọm Beyonce na Adele n'ime awa ole na ole a tọhapụrụ ya na chaatị abọm iTunes

Frank Marshall (amụrụ n'ubochí irí atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1985) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa nke na-echegbu onwe ya banyere ihe osise na foto nke egwu ma mara banyere ọrụ ya na-egosi ọdịbendị metal dị egwu na Botswana
Rooke Gallery, Johannesburg, South Africa na-anọchite anya ya
A mụrụ Frank Marshall n'ubochí irí atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1985 na Nelspruit, Mpumalanga, South Africa dịka nwa nke nna Irish na nne South Africa
O tolitere na Kroonstad, Free State na Pretoria, Gauteng
Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma Marshall malitere igosi mmasị na egwu nkume siri ike na egwu ígwè dị arọ, nke ndị otu ndị America guzobere na-emetụtakarị
Ógè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Marshall bịdọrọ ọmụmụ foto ya na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Tshwane na Pretoria N'afọ 2007
N'afọ 2010 ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Technology na foto na Mahadum Tshwane
Site n'edemede afọ ikpeazụ ya, Marshall gosipụtara ndị mmadụ nke ọdịbendị metal dị egwu nke Botswana ma tinye ihe oyiyi ahụ n'ihe ngosi ya 'Renegades'
Maka ọrụ ya na 'Renegades' a họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ iri nke Sony World Photography Awards Student Focus Competition
Ọ bụ onye South Africa mbụ ruru na ngwụcha nke asọmpi foto a ma ama
Dị ka onye ikpeazụ, e nyere ya ohere isonye na World Photography Festival na Somerset House, London na ịga okwu, nkuzi na klas ndị isi nke ndị na-ese foto na ndị otu World Photographic Academy
A nabatara ya maka mmemme nzere masta na foto na Mahadum Tshwane mana ọ hapụrụ Mahadum iji malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto
Renegades bụ nke izizi na ruo ugbu a naanị ihe ngosi foto nke mere ka ọ mara mba na mba ụwa ozugbo
N'afọ 2008, e goro Marshall ka ọ soro ma gbaa otu ndị egwu egwu egwu nke South Africa n'otu egwu na isi obodo Botswana bụ Gaborone ebe ọ bịdọrọ ịbịakwute ndị na-egwu egwu egwu egwu
N'afọ 2009 o kpebiri ime ka ndị a bụrụ isiokwu nke akwụkwọ edemede afọ ikpeazụ ya na Mahadum Tshwane ma mechaa usoro ahụ n'afọ 2010
O nwere ihe osise gburugburu ebe obibi irí isii ma na-anọchite anya ma na-ebute echiche nke subculture metal dị arọ na Botswana
A na-eji igwefoto analog abụọ, Hasselblad 500 CM na Hasselblab 500 EL / M na ihe nkiri Fujichrome Provia 100F
E gosipụtara ndị nnupụisi n'ụlọ ngosi dị iche iche nke mba na nke mba ụwa
A nwetakwala ọrụ sitere na usoro Renegades maka nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Mahadum Stanford na mbipụta abụọ dị na nchịkọta nke J
Paul Getty Museum na Los Angeles, USA
A na-ahụ asọmpi ahụ dị ka ihe nrite foto ụmụ akwụkwọ kachasị elu
Ọ na-emeghe n'ihe banyere ụlọ ọrụ ọ bụla n'ụwa niile nke na-akụzi foto na ọkwa agụmakwụkwọ dị elu
N'afọ 2011, ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ narị abụọ sitere na kọntinent isii sonyere na asọmpi ahụ
Ndị ọka ikpe nke ndị na-ese foto a ma ama na ndị nta akụkọ foto gụnyere Deborah Willis, Eder Chiodetto ma ọ bụ Roger Tooth họọrọ ndepụta nke ndị ikpeazụ iri
Frank Marshall Davis (Ọnwa Desemba 31, afọ 1905 - ọnwa Julaị 26, afọ 1987) bụ onye nta akụkọ Amerịka, onye na-ede uri, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọrụ, na onye ọchụnta ego
Davis malitere ọrụ ya na-ede akwụkwọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị Africa America na Chicago
Ọ kwagara Atlanta, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ọ gbanwere na Atlanta Daily World
O mechara laghachi Chicago
N'oge a, ọ na-ekwu okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ banyere nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ebe ọ na-ekpuchi isiokwu ndị sitere na egwuregwu na egwu
Ọ bụ Works Progress Administration (WPA) kwadoro uri ya n'okpuru mmemme New Deal nke Onye isi ala Franklin D
Roosevelt
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na South Side Writers Group na Chicago, a na-ewerekwa ya dịka otu n'ime ndị edemede nke Black Chicago Renaissance
Na ngwụcha afọ ndị 1940, Davis kwagara Honolulu, Hawaii, ebe ọ na-arụ obere azụmahịa
Ọ malitere itinye aka na nsogbu ọrụ mpaghara
Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) nyochara ọrụ ya ka ha nyochara ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe kemgbe mmalite narị afọ nke 20
A mụrụ Davis na Arkansas City, Kansas, n'afọ 1905
Nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm, Davis tolitere na-ebi ya na nne ya na nna nna ya, yana nne na nna nna nna ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Arkansas City High School (Kansas)
N'afọ 1923, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ gara Mahadum Friends
Site na afọ 1924 ruo afọ 1927, na ọzọ n'afọ 1929, ọ gara Kansas State Agricultural College, ugbu a Kansas State University
Mgbe Davis banyere na Kansas State, ụmụ akwụkwọ iri abụọ na ise ndị ọzọ si Afrịka-Amerịka debanyere aha
E kewara Kansas site na omenala, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị site na iwu
Davis gụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ malitere ide uri n'ihi ọrụ klas, onye nkuzi akwụkwọ Bekee gbara ya ume ka ọ gaa n'ihu na-ede uri ya
Davis kwere nkwa Phi Beta Sigma fraternity n'afọ 1925
Ọ hapụrụ kọleji tupu ọ nweta akara ugo mmụta
N'afọ 1927, Davis kwagara Chicago, ebe ọtụtụ iri puku ndị Afrịka Amerịka na-aga n'oge nnukwu ngafe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụzọ dị iche iche maka Chicago Evening Bulletin, Chicago Whip, na Gary American, akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị Afrịka Amerịka niile
O dekwara akụkọ na akụkọ mkpirikpi maka magazin ndị Afrịka Amerịka
N'oge a, Davis malitere ide uri nke ọma, gụnyere uri ogologo mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ Chicago's Congo, Sonata for an Orchestra
N'afọ 1931, Davis kwagara Atlanta ka ọ bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ugboro abụọ n'izu
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
N'afọ 1932, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, nke a kpọrọ Atlanta Daily World ghọrọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ojii mbụ na-aga nke ọma na mba ahụ
Davis gara n'ihu na-ede ma na-ebipụta uri, nke dọtara uche onye Chicago Frances Norton Manning
Ọ kọwaara ya Norman Forgue, onye na-ebipụta Black Cat Press
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1935, Forgue bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ Davis, Black Man's Verse
N'afọ 1935, Davis laghachiri Chicago iji were ọnọdụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Associated Negro Press (ANP), ọrụ akụkọ e guzobere n'afọ 1919 maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị isi ojii
N'ikpeazụ, Davis ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke ANP
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 1947
Mgbe ọ nọ na Chicago, Davis malitekwara klọb foto, rụọ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma sonye na League of American Writers
Davis bụ onye na-ese foto nke ukwuu, ma kpalie onye edemede Richard Wright mmasị n'ọhịa ahụ
Davis dere na foto ya nwere akụkụ dị ukwuu nke ọtọ n'ihi na 'ahụ nwanyị na-adọrọ mmasị m, ma n'ụzọ mara mma ma n'echiche'
O kwuru na mgbe ọ na-ese foto, ọ lekwasịrị anya na 'njem' na 'ụdị ụda dị iche iche'

Frank Nneji (a mụrụ n'April 30, 1960) bụ onye guzobere na onye isi nchịkwa nke Associated Bus Company (ABC) Transport Plc, ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ njem mbụ ghọrọ (PLC) ma mekwa ka Coach (bus) na-ewu ewu na ụsọ oké osimiri West Africa
Nneji guzobere Rapido Ventures Limited na 1983 mgbe o mechara NYSC ya
Mgbe e nyere ya nkwekọrịta iji nye Mahadum Federal University of Technology (FUTO) ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke bọọdụ ọcha, ụlọ ọrụ ya nwere ike ịkwụ ụgwọ

N'afọ 1991, Nneji kwadebere atụmatụ azụmahịa zuru oke mabịakwute ụlọ akụ Diamond maka mgbazinye ego nke putara otu nde na narị puku ise Naira, nke o ji gbazite bọs HiAce ise iji malite azụmahịa ya, nke ọ kpọrọ The Associated Bus Company (ABC)
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ njem mbụ ịghọ ụlọ ọrụ Public Liability Company (PLC) ma meekwa ka ọrụ bọs dị oké ọnụ ahịa na-ewu ewu na ụsọ oké osimiri West Africa
Nneji malitekwara njem ọgbara ọhụrụ na Naịjirịa site na ntọala ABC Transport Plc na Febụwarị 13, 1993; nkewa nke Rapido Ventures Limited, afọ iri mgbe e guzobesịrị ABC Transport
Ọ malitere COACH WEST-AFRICA na July 16, 2004

Nneji bụ onyeisi oche, Rapido Foods Ltd (Ndị na-emepụta Fibi Sausage Rolls), Transit Support Services Ltd (Ndị Mgbakọ nke ụgbọala Baw, Ụgbọ ala Shacman na Forland na Naịjirịa), Mayfair Suites and Conference Centre, Egbu Road, Owerri, onye isi nchịkwa (MD), City Transit in, Abuja na Abuja City Sightseeing Tours, Naịjiria
Ewezuga gọọmentị steeti, ọ bụ onye ọrụ kachasị ukwuu nke n'enwe ọrụ na Imo Steeti
A kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị Top 100 Tourism Personalities na West Africa
Nneji bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa otu All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) na ntuli aka Gọvanọ steeti Imo maka afọ 2019
Nneji lụrụ Ngozi Nneji, bụkwa onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Zoology nke Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka ma nwee ụmụ anọ
Onye nnọchi anya Frank Nchita Ogbuewu bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye bụbu Minista nke Ọdịbendị na Njem maka mba ahụ
N'ọnwa asaa, afọ puku abụọ na atọ (Julaị afọ 2003), gọọmentị Obasanjo kwadoro nhọpụta ya dị ka minista
Frank Ogbuewu bụ onye a na-edekọ dịka onye minista kachasị ogologo oge nke ozi ọdịbendị na njem nleta na ọchịchị Obasanjo

Tupu a họpụta ya dị ka minista nke ọdịbendị na njem nleta, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị Ka onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na Gris ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche otu oge sit n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na anọ ruo na otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'isii (1994 - 1996) nke kansụl gọọmentị mpaghara ya, Ikwo
Nhọpụta ya dị ka onyeisi oche (onye isi obodo) nke Ikwo Local Gọọmentị mere ka ọ banye n'ìhè ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ nọgidere na-akwado mmepe ndị ntorobịa na steeti ya

Ogbuewu onye ruo n'ọnwa asatọ n'afọ puku abụọ n'iri (Ọgọstụ afọ 2010) bụ onye otu People's Democratic Party (PDP) na-achị chọrọ tiketi gọvanọ nke pati ya n'afọ puku abụọ na asaa (2007) megide gọvọnọ n-arụ ọrụ nke Ebonyi Steetị, Chief Martin Elechi mana ọ meriri
O mechara gbaa ọsọ maka ọkwa onye isi oche nke PDP mana o nweghị ike ịga nke ọma

N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa asatọ, afọ puku abụọ n'iri (28 Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2010), na - alụm di na nwunye ọdịnala nke nwa ya nwanyị nke okenye, Nnenna Ogbuewu, onye nnọchi anya ahụ kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịsọ mpi ọzọ, maka ọfịs gọvanọ na steeti ya nke Ebonyi mana n 'oge a', nʼokpuru otu dị iche
Otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ọ họọrọ, All Progressives Grand Alliance ka a mara ya na ọnwa iteolu, afọ puku abụọ na iri (Septemba 2010)

Na abalị iri na abụọ, n'ọnwa mbụ afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu (Jenụwarị 12, 2011), ndị All Progressives Grand Alliance họpụtara onye nnọchi anya Ogbuewu na ngụkọta nke otu puku, narị asatọ na iri ise n'abụọ (1852) iji nọchite anya pati ahụ na ntuli aka gọvanọ na abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa anọ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu (Eprel 16, 2011)

A mụrụ onye nnọchi anya Frank Ogbuewu na ọnwa iri na abụọ, n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri ise na atọ (Disemba 12, 1953), na Ikwo Local Government Area nke Ebonyi Steetị, Nigeria, ọ bụkwa nwa ikpeazụ nke nne ya Oginyi Nchita
Nna ya bụ onye na-agbaso ọdịnala nke na'ịgwọ ahịhịa n'ala yana ịbụ onye ịchụ nta a ma ama
Onye nwere otu mgbe, onye nnọchi anya, Ogbuewu nwere ụmụ asaa site na nwunye abụọ
Ụmụ nwoke anọ mbụ (ụmụ nwoke atọ na otu nwa nwanyị) sitere na nwunye mbụ ya, Mrs
Eunice Ebin Ogbuewu Eunice, onye obodo Etung Local Government Area na Cross River Steetị lụrụ Ogbuewu n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro ruo afọ iri abụọ na abụọ karịa (22+) tupu ha kewaa
A hapụrụ Ogbuewu nwunye nke abụọ, Mrs
Rebecca Ogbuewu, onye Ezza LGA onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ atọ
Mgbalị Ogbuewu banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bịara dị ka ihe ijuanya nye ma ezinụlọ ya ma ndị enyi ya
Onye bụbu onye ọrụ Mbata na Ọpụpụ na Naịjirịa, Ogbuewu lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ dịka Onye enyemaka Suprịtendentị nke mbata na ọpụpụ
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, o debara aha ya dị ka onye otu National Republican Convention (N
C) iji mee ka ọ gbaa ọsọ maka ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Mgbalị mbụ ya bụ ọkwa onye isi oche nke gọọmentị ime obodo na mpaghara gọọmenti ime ụlọ ya

Ogbuewu mere mkpọsa ya n'ebe ọ bụla nke LGA ya mana mbọ ya kwụsịrị n'oge na-adịghị anya dịka usoro ntuli aka nke ọchịchị ndị agha oge ahụ bụ General Sani Abacha gbaghaara na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'atọ (1993)
N'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'anọ (1994), a họpụtara Ogbuewu dị ka onyeisi oche, Kọmitii Nlekọta maka mpaghara Gọọmentị Obodo ya, Ikwo
Ọchịchị ahụ were afọ abụọ

Mgbe ọnwụ nke General Sani Abacha na nhọpụta nke Janal Abdulsalami Abubakar (rtd) dị ka onye isi ndị agha nke Naịjirịa, ndebanye aha nke òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọhụrụ malitere ma hazie ka e mee ntuli aka na Naijiria maka inyefe ndị nkịtị
Ogbuewu debanyere aha ya dị ka onye otu All People's Party( APP) iji sọọ mpi na ntuli aka gọvanọ mana Chief Ogbonnaya Onu, onye bụ onyeisi oche nke pati ahụ, meriri ya na primaries
Ogbuewu mechara sonye na People Democratic Party (PDP) ma nye aka na nhọpụta Dr
Sam Egwu dị ka gọvanọ mbụ nke steeti ahụ
N'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'iteolu (1999), A họpụtara Ogbuewu maka ọkwa nnọchite anya nke ndị sineti kwadoro
E nyere ya ọrụ imeghe ụlọ ọrụ nnọchite anya Naịjirịa na Gris nke mechiri kemgbe obere oge
Ogbuewu jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya Naijiria na Gris site na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na iteolu ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na atọ (1999 ruo 2003)
N'afọ puku abụọ na atọ (2003), gọọmentị Obasanjo kpọghachiri ya na Naijiria ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba ọdịbendị na njem nleta

N'afọ puku abụọ na isii (2006), onye nnọchi anya Ogbuewu gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya dị ka minista ọdịbendị na njem nleta nke Naijiria iji sọọ mpi ntuli aka gọvanọ nke afọ puku abụọ na asaa (2007) na Ebonyi Steeti n'okpuru nchebe nke People Democratic Party (PDP)
Ntuli aka gọvanọ nke nwere ihe dị ka mmadụ iri na atọ (13) PDP gụnyere gọvọnọ n'ọkwa, Chief Martin Elechi mechara bụrụ asọmpi n'etiti mmadụ abụọ
E dekọrọ na Ogbuewu bụ naanị onye na-azọ ọkwa onye jụrụ ịpụ n'ala ma nabata naanị Chief Elechi na primaries e mere n'ámá egwuregwu obodo, Abakaliki
Ogbuewu meriri na primaries ka o nwetara ihe karịrị vootu narị ise na iri asatọ (580) ma e jiri ya tụnyere vootu ndị nnọchiteanya Elechi karịrị puku abụọ (2000)

N'afọ puku abụọ na asatọ (2008), mgbe mgbalị na-enweghị isi maka gọvanọ, onye nnọchi anya Ogbuewu gosipụtara mmasị na ọnọdụ onye isi oche nke Peoples Democratic Party nke e kenyere na steeti ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Abia, Imo, Ebonyi, Anambra na Enugu
Ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama dị ka Emmanuel Iwuanyanwu, onye bụbu onye isi oche Sịnetị Pius Anyim na onye gọvanọ nke Ebonyi Steetị, Dr
Sam Egwu gosikwara mmasị n'ọkwa ahụ
Steeti Ebonyi yiri ka ọ bụ steeti kacha mma na steeti ise ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ niile, mana Gọvanọ steeti ahụ enweghị mmasị na onye ọ bụla n'ime ndị na-azọ ọkwa steeti ya
Frank Opperman (a mụrụ na 8 June 1960 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye egwu
Mgbe ọ gachara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ gafee South Africa na Worcester, Benoni, Hermanus na Middelburg
Opperman mechara banye akwụkwọ na Silverton High School na Pretoria n'afọ 1978

Ọ malitere ịmụ iwu n'afọ 11979 na Mahadum Pretoria mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ kwụsịrị inwe mmasị wee sonye na South African Defence Force n'afọ 1980, ebe ọ na-egwuri egwu n'òtù ndị agha na-agagharị agagharị
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ, ọ lụrụ nwa akwụkwọ ihe nkiri nwanyị wee nwee mmasị ime ihe nkiri dịka nhọrọ ọrụ
O mechara nweta diplọma mba afọ atọ na ime ihe nkiri na Pretoria Technikon ma nata Pretoria Trust Award maka nwa akwụkwọ kacha mma
N'afọ abụọ sochirinụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka PACT (Performing Arts Council Transvaal) ma rụọ ọrụ na mmepụta dịka Spring awakening na Caspar in my Tui

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'akụkụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa Arnold Vosloo na ihe nkiri zuru oke a na-akpọ Boetie gaan border toe, mana ọ nwetara iwu ewu na ihe nkiri Afrikaans a na-eme na Orkney Snork Nie, nke Willie Esterhuizen mepụtara, na-egwu onye a na- woowe Ouboet van Tonder
N'afọ ndị 1990, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn South Africa The Big Time dịka Chris Karedes, onye Cypriot na-akwaga mba ọzọ
Usoro ahụ nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye SABC Artes
N'afọ 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na SABC2 sitcom Die Uwe Pottie Potgieter
N'afọ 2014, ọ nwetara ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro ihe nkiri nke kykNET anthology Pandjieswinkelstories
N'afọ 2018, Frank sonyere na Dancing with the Stars South Africa ya na onye na-agba egwu, Jeanné Swart
N'afọ 1988, ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa Susan Coetzer, mana n'afọ 1992 ha gbara alụkwaghịm; ha nwere otu nwa nwoke toro eto, Frankie
Kemgbe afọ 2005, ya na Esmarie Meyer anọwo na mmekọrịta
A mụrụ nwa ha nwanyị n'afọ 2006
N'afọ 1993, ọ kwagara America maka afọ ole na ole mana o mechara laghachi South Africa ka ọ bụrụ onye nwe otu klọb jazz a na-akpọ Bassline na Johannesburg
O weputara abọm rock akpọrọ Serial Boyfriend
N'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ, o sonyere na ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere Gauteng-Aleng, ihe nkiri ebe ya na Willie Esterhuizen rụkọtara ọrụ ọzọ
Ọ pụtakwara na Dryfsand, ihe nkiri telivishọn Afrikaans nke PG
du Plessis dere
Mgbe afọ iri na abụọ gasịrị, ọ laghachiri n'ihe nkiri, na-eme ihe nkiri na Die Uwe Pottie Potgieter, ihe ngosi otu onye nke Dana Snyman dere maka ya
Frank Rajah Arase (onye amụrụ Frank Rajah Efosa Arase) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria
Arase bụ nwa afọ Edo State, Nigeria
A họpụtara ya maka onye nduzi kacha mma na 4th Africa Movie Academy Awards
A mụrụ Arase na Benin City, Edo, Nigeria
Ọ tolitere na Lagos ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya
Arase banyere n'ime ihe ngosi mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ malitere dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa; ọ bụ onye na-agba egwú maka ndị otu National Theatre ma na-emekwa ihe nkiri
Ọ zutere onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na onye nduzi Paul Obazele, onye zụrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
Na mbụ, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na-egosi na ihe nkiri dịka Scores To Settle, After School Hours
Ịhụnanya ya maka ịnọ n'azụ ihe nkiri dọtara ya n'ịduzi ihe nkiri nke ya
Mgbe ọ duziri ihe nkiri ole na ole na Naịjirịa, o kwetara iduzi ihe nkiri maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke Ghana, Venus Films, mgbe ọ jụrụ mgbalị ndị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mere n'oge gara aga
Ọ duziri ihe nkiri akpọrọ Official Prostitute in Ghana ma gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
N'ikpeazụ, Abdul Salam Mumuni nke Venus Films tụrụ aro nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na Arase
Nke a gụnyere iwebata ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Ghana n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood ma mee ka ha nwee ike kpakpando dịka ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri Naijiria
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Ghana bụ ndị a ma ama site na mmekorita nke gụnyere Jackie Appiah, Van Vicker, Majid Michel, Nadia Buari, John Dumelo, Kalsoume Sinare na Kofi Adjorolo na ndị ọzọ
A gbatịkwuru nkwekọrịta ahụ maka afọ abụọ ọzọ nke dugara na iwebata ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Yvonne Nelson, Juliet Ibrahim, Frank Artus na Martha Ankomah
Emepụtara ihe nkiri ndị ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta Arase, Raj na Heroes Films
Mgbe nkwekọrịta ya na Venus Film gwụsịrị, ọ gara n'ihu na mmepụta nke ya site na uwe ya, nke wepụtara ihe nkiri ama ama dịka Somewhere in Africa na ihe nkiri Iyore
Arase bụ nwa nke abụọ nke ezinụlọ
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị Sierra Leone na ezinụlọ ya bi na Naịjirịa
Arase dị ugbu a na Accra, Ghana na Lagos, Lagos State
Frank Sydney Spears (1906-1991) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Walsall, Staffordshire, England wee bịa South Africa dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe màkà Brimble na Briggs Ltd
O guzobere ọkwa dị elu dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe, ónyé mgbasa ozi na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a makwaara màkà ihe ịga nke ọma ya na ọrụ azụmahịa na dị ka ónyé mmepụta ụgbọ mmiri
Ụdị ihe osise izizi ya bụ nke na-adọrọ mmasị, a na-akpọkwa ọrụ ya, tinyere nke Sydney Carter (qv), dị ka 'staid, stuffy na mpaghara' (Lewis, 1946 25)
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé isi oche nke South African Society of Artists (SASA) n'afọ 1945 mgbè ọ sonyere na 1934
N'afọ 1949, ọ gara USA, ụdị ya gbanwere n'ihi mmeghachi omume na-eto eto nke abstraction n'ebe ahụ
N'afọ ndị 1950 ọ malitere ịnwale ihe ndị na-abụghị ihe oyiyi, mana ọ nweghị ike ịhapụ njikọ ya na ihe ndị dị n'ihe atụ
Ihe omimi onwe ónyé malitere ịkpụzi ọtụtụ n'ime echiche ya ma nwee mmasị na mmekọrịta nke eserese, uri na egwu
Ndị nkatọ nabatara nke a nke ọma n'ihi nchedo nke ihe ngosi SASA na 1940s
A jara ya mma pụrụ iche na ngosi SASA Members' Exhibition nke 1950 dị ka ndị a 'O doro anya na ihe kachasị mma na ihe ngosi ahụ bụ obere ihe osise 'Eileen Joyce na-eme Chopin', nke Frank Spears
Nke a bụ ezigbo mgbalị ịkọwa isiokwu egwu n'ihe gbasara ihe osise; mmadụ na-enwe mmụọ nke omume na kọntaktị na-agagharị agagharị nke a na-etinye na nhazi na-agafe agafe' (PHW The Cape Times 3181950)
Berman chere na njikwa Spears na-ese ihe yiri nke Jean Welz (1900X 1975) 'Echiche ya na-adịkarị jụụ ma ghara ịdị egwu; ndụ na-adịghị mma na ọmụmụ okooko osisi bụ akụkụ dị ukwuu nke ọrụ ya
A na-egbochi ihe osise ya, na-eji ochres na ụda na-acha pinki pinki na-ekpo ọkụ, nke a na-ejikarị ákàrà Cerulean blue ' (1983 434)
Roses, sitere na SANG Permanent Collection, bụ ihe atụ nke okooko osisi ya ndị a na-enwe mmasị dị ukwuu
Spears lara ezumike nká na 1968 ma laghachi England na 1969, mana ọ gàrà n'ihu na-egosi na SA mgbè nkè ahụ gasịrị
Enwere íke ịhụ ihe osise 'Descent from the Cross' n'aka ekpe nke High Altar na St
George's Cathedral, Cape Town
(Frank Sydney Spears ekwesịghị ịgbagwoju ányá na ónyé na-ese ihe n'Australia, 'Frank H
Spears', (n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Mee 1904 Sydney rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Septemba 1985 Western Australia)
A mụrụ Frank Hilton Spears na Mosman (Sydney) wee nwụọ na Attadale (n'akụkụ Perth)
A maara ya màkà ọmarịcha ala ya na ọdịdị oké osimiri
Ntinye Wikipedia nke ya na-echere)
E nwere akwụkwọ banyere Frank Spears
A na-akpọ ya 'Frank Spears - The Painter'
Rwandan franc (ihe ịrịba ama FRw, na ikekwe RF ma ọ bụ Rī; ISO 4217 RWF) bụ ego nje Rwanda
A na-ekewa ya na 100 cents
Franki ghọrọ ego nke Rwanda na 1916, mgbe Belgium weghaara ndị Germany na-achịbu na franc Belgian Congo dochie anya rupie German East Africa
Rwanda jiri ego nke Belgian Congo ruo 1960, mgbe ewepụtara Rwanda na Burundi franc
Rwanda malitere inye franc nke ya na 1964, afọ abụọ ka ha nwesịrị nnwere onwe

E nwere atụmatụ iwebata ego a na-ahụkarị, shilling ọhụrụ nke East Africa, maka mba ise so na East African CommunityEbe e mere atụmatụ na ọ ga-eme na njedebe nke afọ 2012, dịka nke Maachị 2023, a ka ewebatabeghị otu ego nkịti
N'afọ 1964, e webatara mkpụrụ ego maka 1, 5 na 10 francs, na 1 na 10 franks na cupronickel na 5 francs na ọla nchara
1969, ewebata mkpụrụ ego aluminom 1 franc, sochiri na 1970 site na 1⁄2 na franc 2 na aluminium
E wepụtara mkpụrụ ego franc 10 ọla kọpa-nickel belatara na 1974
E webatara franc 20 na franc 50 n'afọ 1977
E wepụtara usoro ọhụrụ nke mkpụrụ ego franc 1 ruo 50 na 2004 (nke akara ụbọchị 2003) wee webata mkpụrụ ego bimetallic ọhụrụ nke franc 100 na 2008 (ụbọchị 2007)
N'afọ 1964, e mepụtara ndetu nwa oge maka ojiji na Rwanda site na ịpị aka (20 ruo 100 franc) ma ọ bụ embossing (500 na franc 1,000) Rwanda-Burundi ndetu nwere ụbọchị na mbinye aka mbụ ha
Ndị a sochiri mbipụta ndị a na-eme kwa ụbọchị maka otu ego ahụ e dekọrọ na 1964 ruo 1976
E ji mkpụrụ ego dochie mkpụrụ ego franc 20 na 50 na 1977, na-eji mkpụrụ ego franc 5,000 ewebata na 1978
E webatara akwụkwọ ego 2,000 franc mbụ nke mba ahụ n'etiti ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007
N'afọ 2008, ụlọ akụ ahụ jiri mkpụrụ ego bimetallic dochie akwụkwọ ego 100 franc, wee kagbuo ọnọdụ iwu nke akwụkwọ ego na 31 Disemba 2009
Na Septemba 24, 2013, National Bank of Rwanda wepụtara akwụkwọ ego 500 franc nke gosipụtara ehi n'ihu na ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere kọmputa XO (site na One Laptop kwa Child) n'azụ
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, National Bank of Rwanda wepụtara akwụkwọ ego 2,000 na 5,000 franc nwere atụmatụ nchebe e dezigharịrị na iwepụ nkọwa French na akwụkwọ ozi
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, National Bank of Rwanda wepụtara akwụkwọ ego 1000 franc e degharịrị edegharị nke nwere atụmatụ nchebe ka mma na iwepụ nkọwa French na akwụkwọ ozi ahụ
Na 7 Febụwarị 2019, National Bank of Rwanda kwupụtara na a ga-ewebata akwụkwọ ego ọhụrụ 500 francs na 1,000 francs na 11 Febụwarụ 2019
Akwụkwọ ego ndị a ga-enwe atụmatụ nchebe ọhụrụ na ogo ka mma iji belata nkwarụ
Nhazi nke n'ihu ihe ndetu franc 500 bụ kpamkpam ọhụrụ, na agba agba n'ozuzu ya agbanweela ka ọ bụrụ aja aja iji nyere aka ịmata ọdịiche dị na ndenye franc 1,000
Rwandan francs kwa US dollar

Franklin Boukaka (Ọktoba 10, 1940 - ihe dị ka Febụwarị 23X24, na afọ 1972) bụ onye na-agụ egwú baritone nkeCongo, onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, na onye na-ede abụ nke a maara dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ nke egwu egwu Congolese

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'òtù ndị dabeere na nke ọ bụla n'ime 'Congo abụọ,' ya bụ, mba ndị a na-akpọ Republic of the Congo na Democratic Republic of the Kongo ugbu a; gara njem n'ụwa niile; nweta nnukwu ewu ewu; were nguzo ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; a kwenyere n'ọtụtụ ebe na ọ bụ onye e gburu n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi n'oge a nwara iwe ọchịchị na Republic of the Kong

A mụrụ ya dị ka François Boukaka na October 10, 1940, na Brazzaville[note 1] Obodo ahụ bụ isi obodo nke French Congo n'oge ahụ, mgbe nnwere onwe na afọ 1960 ọ ghọrọ Republic of the Congo, ma site na afọ 1969 ruo na afọ 1991 ọ bụ People's Republic of the Kongo
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị na-agụ egwú; nna ya, Aubin Boukaka, nọ n'òtù egwú nke China, ebe nne ya, Yvonne Ntsatouabaka, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-elekọta ememe olili ozu na ememe ndị a ma ama
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ asatọ, ụmụ nwoke ise na ụmụ nwanyị atọ, ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Brazzaville

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Boukaka sonyeere ọtụtụ ìgwè, na-agagharị n'etiti nke ọ bụla n'ime isi obodo abụọ gafere Osimiri Congo site na ibe ya Brazzaville, na Leopoldville (mgbe e mesịrị Kinshasa), isi obodo nke Belgian Congo n'oge ahụ ma mgbe nnwere onwe ghọrọ Republic of the Congo, mgbe ahụ Zaire, na ugbu a Democratic Republic of the Kongo
Ọganihu a malitere na AFỌ 1955, mgbe ọ dị afọ 14 ma ọ bụ 15 ọ sonyeere otu Sexy Jazz, nke Miguel Samba, Siscala Mouanga, na Aubert Nganga guzobere
Na afọ 1957, mgbe Miguel Samba na Siscala Mouanga hapụrụ iji sonye n'otu ìgwè a na-akpọ Cercul Jazz, Boukaka sonyeere otu Sympathic Jazz, nke Alphonse Marie Toukas, wee gaa Kabinda na Leopoldville

Na Nọvemba na AFỌ 1958, ya na ọtụtụ ndị egwu ndị ọzọ si Brazzaville, gụnyere enyi ya Michel Boyibanda onye ya na ya nọ na Sympathic Jazz, Boukaka guzobere Negro Band 163 Dị ka ụfọdụ isi mmalite si kwuo, e guzobere Negre Band ma na-adabere na Brazzaville 163 ebe ndị ọzọ si kwuo, ọ dị na Leopoldville n'oge Boukaka na ya nọ, na AFỌ 1960 wee kwaga gafee osimiri ahụ gaa Brazzaville

N'ihe omume ọ bụla, Boukaka na-arụ ọrụ na Leopoldville na 1960, mgbe ọ sonyeere ndị egwu si African Jazz, gụnyere Tabu Ley Rochereau, iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka 'Jazz African' mgbe onye ndú nke òtù ahụ Joseph Kabasele (Le Grand Kallé) nọ na Brussels maka Nzukọ Round Table na nnwere onwe Belgian Congo 163 N'ikpeazụ, ka nọ na Leopoldvila, ya na Jeannot Bombenga na Casino Mutshipule si African Jazz; ọ tọrọ ntọala otu Vox Africa; ndị otu mbụ ya gụnyere Papa Noel na Djeskain 163 Mass
Na afọ 1962, ebe ọrụ ya si Leopoldville laghachi Brazzaville ebe ọ sonyeere otu egwu Cercul Jazz, nke ndị ọrụ ibe abụọ si Sexy Jazz sonyeere afọ ise tupu mgbe ahụ
E hiwere Cercul Jazz na 1954 ma kpọọ ya aha otu nzukọ ndị ntorobịa ya na ya nwere njikọ, Cercule Culturel de Bacongo
Boukaka ghọrọ onye ndú nke otu ahụ, ma zụlite ọtụtụ ndị na-eso ụzọ

Cercul Jazz n'okpuru Boukaka mepụtara ụdị pụrụ iche nke, ọ bụ ezie na a na-ewere ya n'ihu oge ya, nọgidere na-ekwesị ntụkwasị obi nye ụdị nke ndị otu Congo ('restée fidèle au style de l'ozarchestre de Bacongo'); a kọwara egwu ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị mara mma na rumba ('l'ozarun des plus beaux de la Rumba')
Na mgbakwunye na njem nleta nke mba ha, na afọ 1963 Ruo na afọ 1964, Cercul Jazz malitere njem nleta Afrịka, na-egwu na Gabon, Chad, Cameroon na Nigeria
Na afọ 1965 Ruo afọ 66, ha nọrọ ọnwa asatọ na Cameroon
N'otu oge ahụ, Boukaka gbasaa isiokwu edemede egwu ya karịa 'ịhụnanya na okike' iji tinye nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma ọ bụ 'inyocha ma katọọ mkpụrụ obi mmadụ'
163z164 ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya bụ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọchịchị, ọ kwusiri ike na mgbochi ọchịchị na ịdị n'otu Afrịka
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ dị njikere ịkatọ gọọmentị Afrịka ndị nweere onwe ha maka nrụrụ aka na neoptism

N'afọ 1967, Cercul Jazz dekọrọ egwu ya 'Pont sur le Congo' (Bridge on the Congo), na-atụ aro na, mgbe ọchịchị ndị agha gwụchara, ndị Congo abụọ kwesịrị ịdị n'otu 164 Okwu ya gụnyere (sụgharị) [note 2]

'Pont Sur le Congo' ghọrọ otu n'ime egwu ndị a ma ama nke Cercul Jazz, mana ndị isi nke mba abụọ ahụ anabataghị aro ya, ma ghara ileghara ya anya, nke nwere njikọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ya, onye ndú ọ bụla na-achọ imebi nke ọzọ 162, 164
Ka e mesịrị na afọ 1967, Boukaka hapụrụ Cercul Jazz iji malite ịrụ ọrụ na idekọ n'aha nke ya
Ọ haziri otu ìgwè ndị na-akpọ sanza (piano mkpịsị aka) dị ka akụkụ nke otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ọdịnala nke Congo nke gara Paris n'okpuru nkwado gọọmentị France
Boukaka ga-abụ abụ ma kpọọ ụbọ akwara, ya na ndị na-akpọ ụbọ akhara abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ

Na Paris Boukaka dekọrọ maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke onye egwu French bụ Gilles Sala, ya na ndị na-egwu egwu abụọ na onye na-egwu saxophon nke Congo Jean Serge Essous nke Les Bantous de la Capital, ọtụtụ egwu gụnyere 'Les Brazzavilloises,' banyere ụmụ nwanyị nke Brazzaville 164 E wepụtara ihe ndekọ ndị a na afọ 1980s dị ka album Survivance

N'ikpeazụ, ya na ndị otu ọnwa ya na Brazzaville, Boukaka wepụtara abụ ọhụrụ, 'Les Immortels,' ebe ọ na-abụ abụ banyere otu agadi nwoke na-agwa ya (nke a sụgharịrị) 'nwoke na-eto eto, nwoke ọ bụla ga-anwụ otu ụbọchị, mana ọ bụghị ọnwụ niile nwere otu ihe ọ pụtara,' na nzaghachi na-akpọ ndị nwụrụ n'ihi okwukwe ha iri na isii, gụnyere Patrice Lumumba, Che Gue, Malcolm X, Simon Kangu, Albert Luthuli, na Andre Matswa[note 4] A na-akpọ abụ a amụma, ebe ọ bụ na o doro anya na e gburu Boukaka maka nkwenye nke ya afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị
A pụkwara ịhụ ya dị ka nkatọ doro anya nke ndị ndu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Congos abụọ n'oge ahụ, maka ịghara imezu ụkpụrụ ndị dike nke ndị bu ha ụzọ
Na afọ 1969, Boukaka so ndị otu ọnwa ya mee ihe na Pan-African Cultural Festival na Algiers
A na-ewere arụmọrụ ya nke 'Les Immortels' dị ka ihe dị mkpa nke ihe omume ahụ dị mkpa 165
Na afọ 1970, Boukaka dekọrọ ọtụtụ egwu na Paris, nke Manu Dibango haziri ma soro na saxophone na piano
A kọwawo nnọkọ ndị a dị ka 'ọkaibe nka' nke ọrụ Boukaka

N'okpuru nduzi nke onye nduzi Cameroon na ngwá egwu dị iche iche gụnyere violin na piano karịa ụbọ akwara, egwu sitere na nnọkọ ndị a dị nnọọ iche n'ụdị site na egwu egwu Congolese, Congolese rumba ma ọ bụ soukous, nke Boukaka mere na mbụ
Abọm abụ iri na abụọ sitere na nnọkọ ndị a, nke a na-etinye mgbe ọ nwụsịrị dị ka Franklin Boukaka à Paris, a na-akpọ ya 'ọrụ nke ike na ịma mma nke na ọ pụghị ịga n'enweghị ihe ọ bụla'
16516 Akụkụ dị ịrịba ama na abọm à Paris gụnyere nhazi dị iche iche, nke 'Pont sur la Congo' na 'Les Immortels,' yana rumba ọhụrụ a na-eme 'Likambo Oyo' (nsogbu a)

Mana abụ Boukaka nke nwere ihe ịga nke ọma kasịnụ, na nke a na-echeta ya ma gee ya ntị afọ iri ise ka e mesịrị, bụ 'Le Bucheron' (onye na-egbu osisi; nsụgharị Kenya nke egwu ahụ akpọrọ 'Le Bucheron (Africa)'), mkpesa banyere ọnọdụ Africa na ndị ogbenye ya, okwu na-akwa ákwá (nke a sụgharịrị) 'Oh, Africa, ebe nnwere onwe gị dị?
ebe nnwere ike gị dị?' 16566[note 5]
N'afọ 1970, ọ gara Guinea, nke otu ndị isi obodo, Keletigui Traoré's Keletigui et ses Tambourinis kwadoro
Ha rụkọtara ọrụ na afọ 1970 version nke Quinzaine Artistique et Culturelle Nationale, emume mba Guinea kwa afọ 1016X17 The Guinean record label Syliphone wepụtara ndekọ atọ nke ya na otu ahụ

N'otu, nke e dere 'Unité Africaine,' nke nwere ike ịbụ site na emume mba ahụ, Boukaka kpọrọ oku maka 'Africa dị n'otu ma sie ike' n'asụsụ Congolese ya, Lingala; kpọrọ aha steeti na ndị isi Afrịka na oku na nzaghachi; wee gwa ìgwè mmadụ okwu na Susu, asụsụ Guinea nke ọ mụtara maka oge ahụ 1017 ̆18
Na afọ 1971, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọdịbendị' na UNESCO na Paris, onye isi nchịkwa ya toro ya
Boukaka mekwara mba ụwa na Spain, Germany, USSR, China, Yugoslavia, Mongolia, na North Korea, dị ka Guy Menga na Clement Ossinonde si kwuo
Boukaka lụrụ Antoinette Mouanga, onye nwụrụ mgbe ha kewara
Abụọ n'ime abụ ya a ma ama sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ ya 'Luzolo' na otu a maara dị ka 'Antoinette Mouanga' ma ọ bụ 'Mwanga'

'Mwanga,' nke ka na-ewu ewu ma ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ kpuchiri ya, gụnyere okwu ndị a sụgharịrị dị ka 'Mwanga، ọ dịghị onye na-agbanahụ ọnwụ, anyị maara ya, mana ihe mgbu nke ọnwụ gị kpatara na-eme ka m na-eche ihe mere ị ji pụọ n'oge na-adịghị anya
Ndị enyi gị na obodo Brazzaville dum na-eru uju gị
Ebee ka Mwanga gara? Ọ bụrụ na ọnwụ nwere ihe na-efu, mụ, Boukaka, m ga-akwụ ya iji chebe gị
'[note 6]

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1972, otu ìgwè nwara ịpị ọchịchị megide ọchịchị Marxist-Leninist nke People's Republic of the Congo nke Marien Ngouabi duziri, onye weghaara ọchịchị n'onwe ya n'ọchịchị n'afọ 1968, ma mesịa gbuo ya n'ịgba ọchịchị n'afọ 1977
Boukaka tinyere aka, ma mesịa bụrụ otu n'ime mmadụ abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ edepụtara dị ka ndị nwụrụ anwụ na nnupụisi ahụ dara[note 7] A kọwaghị ọnọdụ ọnwụ ya
Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwu Congo bụ Gary Stewart na-akọ na 'ọtụtụ ndị Congo na-eche na e gburu ya - karịa n'ihi na aha ya pụtara na ndepụta nke ndị e jidere'
N'ihi enweghị ozi, a maghị kpọmkwem ụbọchị ọnwụ ya; ụfọdụ isi mmalite na-ekwu na ọ ga-abụ na February 22, ebe ndị ọzọ na-ekwu ete e gburu na abalị nke 2324 February

A na-eto Boukaka maka 'nkà egwu pụrụ iche,' na kpọmkwem 'ọnụnọ ya na-adọrọ mmasị, baritone dị nro, na ihe ndị na-adọkpụ na-arịwanye elu' 163 Gilles Sala, onye dekọrọ ya na Paris na 1967, kwuru 'Ọ masịrị m olu Franklin Boukaka nke ukwuu
O nwere ụda olu mara mma, olu na-atọ ụtọ
Mgbe ahụ dị ka onye na-ede egwu
dịka Joseph Kabasele, dị ka Nico, dị ka Franco, ha nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu nke egwu a ma ama
Boukaka bụ onye isi mmalite na mmepe nke egwu egwu Congolese, onye ọsụ ụzọ nke rumba na soukous nke chịrị Africa site na 1970s ruo na afọ 1990s

Ọ bụkwa, n'ụzọ ihe atụ, 'Pont sur le Congo', na-arụ ọrụ na nke ọ bụla n'ime mba abụọ na-emegide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke isi obodo ha dị n'ofe osimiri ahụ site na ibe ha, yana onye isi na-ekere òkè, n'akụkụ abụọ, na cross-pollenization ọdịbendị nke oge ahụ n'etiti Brazzaville na Kinshasa
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, a machibidoro egwu ya na redio na Brazzaville
Mana ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ise ka e mesịrị, a ka na-echeta Boukaka
E wepụtara ọtụtụ egwu ya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị karịa mgbe ọ dị ndụ

Akụkụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, blọọgụ na edemede ndị ọzọ sitere na, dịka ọmụmaatụ, India, Netherlands, United States, na Kenya na-echeta ndụ ya ma na-eme ka egwu ya pụta ìhè, ọkachasị abụ 'enweghị oge' 'Le Bucheron'

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịkarịa ala otu onye ọkachamara ọdịda anyanwụ na egwu Congolese na-eleda ya anya, 'ma eleghị anya n'ihi na a na-akpọ ya nke ukwuu, abụ ahụ abụwo isiokwu nke ọtụtụ mkpuchi na remakes, dịka ọmụmaatụ, site n'aka John Kazadi nke Zimbabwe na 1985, Nairobi City Ensemble na 2005, Manu Dibango, Aïcha Koné (fr), na Bisso Na Bisso na Passi

Na ndepụta a gụnyere ndị na-ese ihe si Southern, East, West, na Central Africa, na mba ndị na-asụ Bekee na ndị na-ekwu Bekee, na-egosi na ndị na'egwú gere ntị na ozi Pan-African nke Boukaka, ọbụlagodi na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị egeghị
N'afọ 1975, onye na-agụ egwu Cameroon bụ Dicky Ndoumbé wepụtara otu egwu akpọrọ 'Regrette Franklin Boukaka'

N'afọ 2016, onye France na-ebipụta La Doxa Éditions bipụtara n'ime ncheta ya Franklin, l'insoumis d'après une idée de Marien Fauney Ngombé (Franklin, the rebellious based on a idea by Marien Fauny Ngombés)
Ọ bụ akwụkwọ nke akụkọ iri na anọ dị mkpirikpi site n'aka ndị edemede iri na anọ gụnyere Ndèye Fatou Kane, nke ọ bụla sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke abụ Boukaka

N'afọ 2019, mgbe a na-eme atụmatụ maka àkwà mmiri n'ofe Osimiri Congo, nke ga-ejikọ isi obodo abụọ kewara ekewa nke Brazzaville na Kinshasa, otu onye nta akụkọ kọwara ya dị ka mmepụta na-egbu oge nke egwu Boukaka nke 1967 'Pont sur le Congo'
Na Brazzaville, a haziri ememe ncheta nke ihe gaara abụ afọ 80 ya n'October 10, 2020
A na-eji itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmegide Boukaka na nke Bob Marley na Fela Kuti 166 A na-akpọ ya onye nwụrụ n'ihi okwukwe ya, ọnwụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 32 kwara arịrị
E wepụtara ọtụtụ ndekọ nke Boukaka's 1955-67 performances na otu gụnyere Negro Band, Vox Africa, Cercul Jazz, na ikekwe ndị ọzọ n'okpuru aha nke otu ndị ahụ, ma etinyeghị ya ebe a
A chịkọtara ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ahụ na abọm ndị e wepụtara n'aha ya
1967 Oge ndekọ Paris na Gilles Sala
1970 Oge ndekọ Paris na Manu Dibango

Franklyn Seales (ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Julaị, 1952 rụo ụbọchị irí ànó n'ọnwa Mée, 1990) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri, telivishọn na ihe nkiri

A maara ya màkà ngosipụta ya nke ónyé njikwa azụmaahịa Dexter Stuffins na sitcom Silver Spoons nke afọ 1980, na ónyé omekome ndị uwe ojii a màrà ikpe Jimmy Lee (Youngblood) Smith na ihe nkiri 1979 The Onion Field

A mụrụ Franklyn Vincent Ellison Seales n'ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Julaị, 1952, nwá nké isé n'ime ụmụnne asatọ, na Calliaqua na Francis Seales, ónyé na-azụ ahịa ụgbọ mmiri na ónyé ọrụ gọọmentị, na Olive Seales (née Allen), ónyé na-elekọta ụlọ
Seales bụ ónyé Bekee, Scottish, African, Portuguese na Native Caribbean
Ya na ezinụlọ ya hapụrụ West Indies na 1960 wee biri na New York City
Ọ gàrà Lincoln High School na Brooklyn
Seales bu n'obi ịmụ ihe na Pratt Institute iji chụsoo ọrụ nka
Otú ọ dị, na mbido afọ 1970, Seales kwetara iso ényi ya na-achọ ime ihe nkiri gaa nyocha na Juilliard School

Ka Seales na-enyere ényi yá áká ịgafe ebe a ma ama na Romeo na Juliet, ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri / onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri John Houseman (ónyé nduzi na ónyé guzobere ngalaba ihe nkiri ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ) malitere ịhụ ya
Houseman nyere Seales agụmakwụkwọ Juilliard afọ anọ
Seales bụ ónyé mbụ na naanị ónyé gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Juilliard nke si St
Vincent
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Houseman's Acting Company
Seales mèrè ọganihu ya na 1978 na ihe nkiri PBS, Trial of the Moke, na-egosi Lt
Henry O
Flipper, ónyé Africa America mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na West Point
Ọ gàrà n'ihu na-apụta na The Onion Field (1979), ebe ọ gosipụtara ónyé omekome ndị uwe ojii a màrà ikpe Jimmy Lee (Youngblood) Smith
N'otu afọ ahụ, o nwekwara obéré ọrụ na Star Trek The Motion Picture Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri 1981, Southern Comfort, ébé ọ gosipụtara Rifleman Cleotis Simms

Ọ bịara mée telivishọn ndị ọzọ wee bụrụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na Silver Spoons (nke Houseman sokwa mee), ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke mmalite afọ 1980 nkè o gosipụtara Dexter Stuffins site na 1983 ruo 1987
Ọ pụtara na ihe omume nke Hill Street Blues na Amen
Na Los Angeles, Seales sonyeere LA

Theatre Works ma hụ ya na mmepụta ndị na-abụghị nke omenala dị ka Conversation at Night With a Despised Character, nke ónyé nkatọ Los Angeles Times Lawrence Christon hụrụ ya 'otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri America kachasị mma
Dị ka Walter Hill, ónyé nduzi nke Southern Comfort, si kwuo, Seales bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya n'ihu ọha
Franklyn Seales malitere ịchọpụta mgbaàmà nke ọrịa metụtara ọrịa AIDS (karịsịa ụkwara na-adịgide adịgide) na setịpụrụ Amen ma ghara ịrụ ọrụ mgbè niile màkà afọ abụọ ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya
Na Mee 14, 1990, Seales nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ irí àtó nà asaá site na nsogbu nke ọrịa AIDS n'ụlọ ezinụlọ ya na Brooklyn
A kpọrọ ozu ya ọkụ ma gbasaa ntụ ya n'Oké Osimiri Caribbean
