Frans Claerhout (ụbọchị irí na isé n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1919 rụọ úbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2006) bụ onye Belgium na-ese ihe nke nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya na South Africa
A mụrụ Claerhout na Pittem, West Flanders n'afọ 1919, wee kwaga South Africa dị ka onye ozi ala ọzọ màkà Chọọchị Katọlik na 1946, ógè ọ dị afọ irí abụọ na asaa
Ọ kwagara ógè ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya màkà ịbụ onye ụkọchukwu
Ọrụ izizi ya bụ na Transvaal mana n'afọ 1948 a kpọfere ya na Orange Free State
Ọ nọrọ n'ugbo dị nso na Bloemfontein na mpaghara Free State nke South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ụkọchukwu ma n'oge ezumike ya ọ lekwasịrị anya na nka ya
Claerhout bụ onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya nke mepụtara ihe osise na ihe oyiyi na ihe osise mmanụ

Ọ bịdọrọ ise ihe osise karịa mgbè ọ kwagara Thaba Nchu n'afọ 1960, wee bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ụdị ya pụrụ iche, nke na-eji ụcha dị iche iche ma tinye ihe dịka ịnyịnya ibu, sunflowers na ihe oyiyi nke ndị ọ zutere na ndụ ya kwa ụbọchị
Ọrụ ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Ndị Kraịst na Claerhout sere ihe nkiri Bible
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na pastel, ink, pensụl na icheku ọkụ
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2000, Claerhout sere nnụnụ ọla edo n'elu akwụkwọ o nyere ónyé édémédé Zakes Mda
Mda mechara nyefee akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke ise, The Madonna of Excelsior, maka nnụnụ ọla edo nke Nna Frans Claerhout sere
Claerhout nwụrụ n'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asaa n'afọ 2006
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụra ya mgbe a nabatara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Bloemfontein
Ọ biri ndụ nanị ya ma tupu ọnwụ ya, ọ biri na St
Francis Catholic Mission na Tweespruit, Free State, ụlọ maka ndị ụkọchukwu Katọlik lara ezumike nká
Claerhout enweghị ọzụzụ nka ọ bụla mana o si n'ezinụlọ na-ese ihe, ọ bụkwa onye otu nka mpaghara n'oge ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ

A kọwapụtara Claerhout dị ka onye na-ese ihe na-egosipụta ihe na ọrụ ya zoro áká na Flemish Expressionism karịsịa ọrụ Constant Permeke, onye ihe osise ya, dị ka nkè Claerhout, metụtara ndị ọrụ ụgbó na ala ha na-elekọta

Ihe atụ nke ọrụ ya, nke a na-ahụ site na agba ha na-ekpo ọkụ, ágbá impasto siri ike, ụdị ndị gabigara ókè, ọchị na ọmịiko gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ebe na South Africa, ya na Belgium, Canada, Germany, United States na United Kingdom
N'afọ 1958, ọ sonyeere otu ndị na-ese ihe, ndị édémédé na ndị na-akwado nka bụ ndị guzobere otu nka na Free State, nke a maara dị ka Bloemfontein Group
Ọ rịara ọrịa obi n'afọ 1979 ógè ọ na-eleta Belgium ma mesịa n'afọ ahụ, a wara ya ahụ na South Africa
Mgbè ọrụ ahụ gasịrị, nka Claerhout gbanwere agba site na Flemish mbụ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ gaa na otu nke na-egbuke egbuke
Ihe nketa nka ya gụnyere mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ dị ka ihe ọkpụkpụ, ihe osise mgbidi, monotype na linocut, ihe osiso enyo na crayon
Claerhout nyere ọtụtụ n'ime ego ọ na-enweta site na ọrụ nka ya iji kwado iwu ụlọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ma kwado ndị ọrụ ya na gburugburu Bloemfontein na Thaba Nchu
N'afọ 2002, Claerhout kpatara ọgba aghara mgbè ọ kpughere na ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya bụ ihe adịgboroja
Onye na-ere ihe osise Bloemfontein bipụtara ma ree ihe ndị ahụ n'ọtụtụ ebe nrụọrụ weebụ na-ere ahịa n'ịntanetị
Nna Claerhout bụkwa onye édémédé dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, gụnyere akwụkwọ uri anọ
Fransisco Aupa Indongo (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 15 1936), bụ onye ọchụnta ego Namibia a ma ama na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mbụ
O nwere Continental Enterprises, Indongo Toyota, Frans Indongo Gardens, Farm Gelukwater, Select Service na Gas Station na òkè dị iche iche na ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe na ịkụ azụ na Namibia
Ọ bụ nna di nke onye ọka iwu a ma ama bụ Sisa Namandje na onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ a ma ama bụ Wosman Hamukonda
Ọ bụ onye nke atọ na ndepụta nke mmadụ iri kachasị baa ọgaranya na Namibia, n'azụ ezinụlọ Pupkewitz na Olthaver & List
Indongo mepere azụmahịa mbụ ya, nke mere brik, na ngwụsị afọ 1950
Site na uru sitere na azụmahịa ahụ, ọ zụtara ngwá ọrụ akwa maka ịkpụ ákwà, nke ọ rere na Oranjemund
N'afọ 1961, o mepere obere ụlọ ahịa na Omusimboti, Oshana nke mechara nye ya ohere imeghe ọtụtụ ụlọ ahịa na mba ahụ
Indongo nwere ọtụtụ ihe onwunwe na Namibia, gụnyere ebe ndị a ma ama na Swakopmund, Tsumeb, Walvis Bay, Otjiwarongo na Windhoek yana ụlọ ọrụ shuga na azụmaahịa
Ọ bụ onye ọchụnta ego a ma ama nke ọma

Indongo banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ ndị 1970 dị ka onye isi otu National Democratic Party, nke ghọrọ akụkụ nke Democratic Turnhalle Alliance mgbe emechara Turnhalle Constitutional Conference n'afọ 1977
Na Nzukọ Turnhalle, Indongo bụ onye otu dị mkpa nke ndị nnọchi anya Ovamboland
Ọ bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ọgbakọ omebe iwu Owambo site na 1975 na site na 1980 Mịnịsta na Owambo Second Tier Representative Authority
N'afọ 1982, ọ bụ onye guzobere otu Christian Democratic Action for Social Justice, nke Peter Kalangula duziri
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ngwụsị afọ 1980 iji jikwaa azụmahịa ya
N'afọ 2001, Indongo nwetara nzere doctorate na nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Namibia
N'afọ 2003, a kpọrọ otu okporo ámá aha ya n'ime obodo Windhoek
Indongo nwere Etango Complex na Oshakati, otu n'ime ụlọ kachasị elu na ugwu Namibia

Frans David Oerder (ụbọchị asaa n'ọnwa Eprel 1867 Rotterdam rụọ úbọchị irí nà isé n'ọnwa Julaị 1944 Pretoria) bụ ónyé Dutch a mụrụ na South Africa, ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ede ihe, ónyé na onye na'ese ihe, na ónyé na na-ede akwụkwọ
Frans bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ asaa nke ónyé ọrụ ọbọdọ, Johannes Carolus Oerder mụrụ
Nnà ya chere na nkà dị ka ọrụ bụ ihe nzuzu, mana ọ kwetara ọzụzụ ya dị ka ónyé na-achọ mma

Site n'afọ 1880 ruo 1885, Oerder gụrụ nka na Rotterdam Academy, merie King William III Gold Medal na Bursary, mesịa gaa njem na Ịtali ma mụọ na Brussels n'okpuru Ernest Blanc-Garin (1843 Xi 1916) site n'enyemaka nke obere ihe nketa sitere n'aka nnà ya
Ọ na-eso nwanne ya nwoke, ọ kwagara South Africa na 1890, ma na-arụ ọrụ na mbụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe n'ụlọ na ónyé na-achọ ụlọ mma màkà ụlọ ọrụ De Wyn & Engelenburg
N'ịbụ onye ụkọ ọrụ kpaliri, ọ banyéré n'ọrụ nke Zuid-Afrikaansche Spoorweg Maatschappij ma na-ese osisi n'akụkụ ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Delagoa Bay
N'afọ 1890, Oerder bụ, ya na Anton van Wouw na James Smith Moreland na Cape Town, otu n'ime naanị ndị omenkà atọ na South Africa nwere ọzụzụ ọkachamara a ma ama
N'afọ 1894, ọ bịdọrọ ọrụ ónyé nkuzi nka na Staatsmeisjesskool, nke mechara bụrụ Pretoria High School for Girls ma n'otu ógè ahụ gbazite ụlọ ọrụ na Church Street East
Ọ na-ebi ndụ site na ise ihe osise akwụkwọ akụkọ na inyere Anton van Wouw aka na ọrụ
Ónyé na-eleta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ugboro ugboro n'oge a bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ nka ya, Pierneef
N'afọ 1896, Oerder gàrà ezumike na-ese ihe na Zululand, ma hazie ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na Cape Town
Mgbè Agha Anglo-Boer malitere na 1899, Ónyé isi ala Paul Kruger họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe agha
A na-edebe ihe osise ya na ihe osise sitere n'oge a dị ilu na War Museum na Bloemfontein, Africana Museum na Johannesburg na nchịkọta nka nke Mahadum Pretoria
N'afọ 1903, mgbè agha ahụ gasịrị, na obi abụọ adịghị ya na ọ ka na-echeta njem Zululand ya, Oerder mèrè njem ma na-ese ihe n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka, na-arịa ịba n'oge njem ahụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé otu South African Society of Artists na 1905, na mgbè ọ na-agbanwe n'ihu ya, ọ natara ọtụtụ ọrụ iji see ihe osise na foto, dịka nke General Louis Botha
Ọ hụrụ ọnọdụ siri ike na South Africa mgbè agha gasịrị ma na 1908 laghachi Netherlands site na Ịtali
Na mbụ ọ biri na Brabant, mànà o mechara kwaga Amsterdam ébé ọ lụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe ibe ya, Gerda Pitlo, na 1910
Mmasị ya n'ihe osise okooko osisi metụtara ya ma ọ malitere n'ihe ndị na-adịghị ndụ, ọkachasị ọmụmụ okooko osisi
E rere ihe osise ya Magnolias na New York Graphic Society, na-aghọ otu n'ime ihe oyiyi kachasị ewu ewu na mmepụta nke ndụ a na-enweghị ihe ndekọ màkà Society, Oerder na-enwetaghị ụgwọ ọ bụla
Oerder echefughị njikọ ya na South Africa, ma na-arụ ọrụ mgbé ụfọdụ dị ka imepụta mkpuchi màkà magazin kwa izu, Die Brandwag, na ịhazi ihe ngosi na Johannesburg
O mechara soro nwunye ya laghachi Pretoria na 1938
A na-eto ọrụ ya ugbu a n'ọtụtụ ebe, na nnukwu mmegharị ahụ, ụlọ elu nke Pretoria City Hall nyere ya maka iji ya mee ihe dị ka ụlọ ọrụ
N'ebe a, o sere ọtụtụ ihe osise dị mkpa, gụnyere nke Jan Smuts
Ugbu a, o nwèrè ógè na ọchịchọ ịga njem na ise ihe na Cape Province, Natal na Northern Transvaal
Nsogbu ndị na-esote ọrịa oyi bàrà ya n'ahụ méré ka ike gwụ ya, ọ nwụkwara na Pretoria na 1944
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ọ kewara mmepụta ya n'ụzọ ziri ezi n'etiti ala, foto na ndụ nwụrụ anwụ, na mmetụta Dutch na-apụta mgbè niile
Eriq Timmons, ónyé a maara nke ọma dị ka Freak Nasty, bụ ónyé America na-edekọ hip hop na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Atlanta
A zụlitere ya na New Orleans
A maara ya nke ọma màkà egwu Top 40 ya 'Da' Dip' nke e wepụtara na 1996 nke bụ ihe na-ehi ụra, ma mesịa bụrụ ihe a ma ama n'oge ọkọchị 1997; o mechara ruo n'ọkwa 15 na Hot 100
O mechara wepụta 'Do What U Feel' site na abọm Which Way Is Up, mana ọ rughị ihe ịga nke ọma nke abụ gárá aga, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ 87 na chaatị R&B Hot
Freak Nasty malitere ọrụ ya dị ka DJ na onye na-emepụta hip hop
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ abụọ, n'otu ìgwè a na-akpọ PMW
Mgbè ahụ ọ chọtara ihe ịga nke ọma na Atlanta, Georgia na abọm mbụ ya Freak Nasty, na-ere fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 300,000
[citation needed] Abọm ya na-esote Controversee
Nke ahụ bụ Ndụ
Nke ahụ bụkwa otú o si, bụ ihe kachasị ewu ewu ma ree karịrị nde ise, [ihe odide dị mkpa] karịsịa n'ihi egwu égwu ya 'Da' Dip', nké ruru n'ọkwa 15 na Hot 100
N'afọ 2007, egwú 'Do It Just Like a Rockstar' rutere n'ọkwa nke 45 na Billboard Hot 100
Fred Amata bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Theatre Arts na Mahadum Jos, Fred pụtara ìhè n'afọ1986 maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Legacy
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dịka onye isi oche nke Directors Guild of Nigeria, kemgbe Febụwarị 27, 2016

Fred Nii Amugi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1948) bụ onye a mụrụ na Ghana onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Holby City, Beasts of No Nation na The Cursed Ones Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya n'afọ 1985 usoro telivishọn 'Opinto'
A mụrụ Fred Amugi na Teshie, Accra, Ghana na 5 Nọvemba afọ 1948
Ọ gara Broaks basic na Junior high School
Ọ gara Takoradi Senior High School na Nungua Senior High school mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ debara aha na Mahadum nke Ghana, Legon ebe ọ rụrụ Asambodo na Ngwongwo na Nchịkwa Ihe
Ọ sonyeere ọrụ obodo ruo afọ iri atọ na atọ ma jee ozi dịka onye isi na-ahụ maka ihe nkesa na Mịnịstrị ego nke Ghana
Amugi malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1970 na Drama na Documentaries ruo afọ 1985 mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri mbụ ya 'Opinto'
Usoro telivishọn ahụ mere ka ọ pụta ìhè
Amugi apụtawo n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere ihe nkiri Ghana, Shoe Shine Boy (2013), Nyame Bekyere 1&2 (2015), Menua Paa Nie (2016), Housekeepers (2016) n'ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
O mechara pụta na ihe nkiri Netflix nke afọ 2015, Beasts of No Nation dịka 'Pastor'
Amugi mere ihe nkiri Pastor Uchebo na ihe nkiri British nke afọ 2015 'The Cursed Ones'
Fred Ekele Martins (amụrụ na 15 Septemba, 1988) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria, onye na-ese ihe, dọkịta, onye na-ese foto na onye nduzi nka

A mụrụ ya ma kpọọ ya Ekele Martins na Aggah-Egbema, Rivers steeti, Naịjirịa ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị tupu ọ kwaga Simferopol, Ukraine ịmụ ọgwụ na 2010 na Crimean State Medical University N'afọ 2014, mgbe ndị Russia weghaara mpaghara Crimea, ọ kwagara na Ukraine nke Lviv ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Danylo Halytsky Lviv National Medical University, Lviv dị ka dọkịta

Fred Martins na-eji Afro combs egosipụta nhụjuanya na nkụda mmụọ niile ndị na-akwado ndị na-eme ihe ike n'Afrịka chere ihu ma bụrụkwa ihe nnọchianya iji mee mmemmé ndị dike AfrịkaFred gosipụtara ndụ Martin Luther King Jr, Marcus Garvey, Nelson Mandela, Patrice Lumumba na Fela Kuti site na iji Afro combs

N'ihe oyiyi ya, Fred na-eji ndabere oroma nke na-egosi ndị mkpọrọ na ụlọ mkpọrọ, dị ka uwe ndị mkpọrọ na ọdịdị oyiyi ya bụ oroma na nke a na-egosi ahụmịhe siri ike nke ndị niile na-eme ihe ike n'oge gara aga na nhụjuanya ha n'ụlọ mkpọrọ

Ọrụ Fred martins a ma ama gụnyere; ' Oroma, Oji, na nnwere onwe Oji na nnwere onwe' nke bụ usoro nka nke e kere site na map nke mba Afrịka dị ka urukurubụba na-egosi ebe ndị mmadụ tara ahụhụ mgbukpọ agbụrụ n'ihi ọchịchị colonialism
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ nke Fred martins gụnyere 'Lee Nu Echi', nke na-egosi ụmụaka Afrịka na ọgụ ha na soja ụmụaka, ogbugbu ụmụaka, alụmdi na nwunye, ọrụ ike ụmụaka n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Fred Martins bụ onye Naijiria kuziere onwe ya ịse ihe
A mụrụ Fred Martins na 15 Septemba 1988, aha ya bụ Ekele Martins na Aggah-Egbema Rivers Steeti, Naijiria ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị

Ọ kwagara Simferopol, Ukraine ịmụ ọgwụ na 2010 na Crimean State Medical University N'afọ 2014, mgbe ndị Russia weghaara mpaghara Crimea, ọ kwagara na Ukraine nke Lviv ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Danylo Halytsky Lviv National Medical University, Lviv dị ka dọkịta
Site na ọrụ, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe, na onye nduzi nka

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka dọkịta, Fred Martins rụrụ ọrụ na Onyeka Nwelue's Blues & Hills consultancy dị ka onye nduzi nka iji kwado abalị hazi diplomatiki na ememme nka na ozi dị iche iche nke Diplomatiki na Naijiria iji kwalite ọdịbendị dị iche iche
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Fred Martins mepụtara ọtụtụ mpempe akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke nwere mmetụta uche ma na-enyocha ọgụ nke ndị mmadụ na-eleghara anya
O mepụtara 'Global warming' usoro nka nke gosipụtara anụ ọhịa nwere nsogbu iji mee ngagharị iwe maka mgbanwe ihu igwe, nke United Nations 2015 Global Goals For Sustainable Society bipụtara
Mgbe Fred malitere eserese ya, ihe osise ya na-ekpughe ihe ọ na-eche na-ebuli olu ya megide obi ọjọọ na enweghị nhata mgbe ọ gbanwere usoro nke ya site n'igosi nnukwu mgbalị ya na Afro combs
Fred Martins na-eji Afro combs egosipụta nhụjuanya na nkụda mmụọ niile ndị na-akwado ndị na-eme ihe ike n'Afrịka chere ihu ma bụrụkwa ihe nnọchianya iji mee ememe ndị dike Afrịka
Dị ka ọdịdị nke comb, obi ndị Afrịka adọwaala ma mebie n'ime iberibe ma dị ka comb, Africa chọrọ inwere onwe ya pụọ na ókè na ịkpọasị
Fred gosipụtara ndụ Martin Luther King Jr, Marcus Garvey, Nelson Mandela, Patrice Lumumba na Fela Kuti site na iji Afro combs
N'ihe oyiyi ya, Fred na-eji ndabere oroma nke na-egosi ndị mkpọrọ na ụlọ mkpọrọ, dị ka uwe ndị mkpọrọ
Ndabere ihe oyiyi ya bụ oroma na nke a na-egosi ahụmịhe siri ike nke ndị niile na-eme ihe ike n'oge gara aga na nhụjuanya ha n'ụlọ mkpọrọ

Fred Nuamah (onye amụrụ Frederick Kwaku Nuamah; November 5, 1975) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'ihe nkiri a kpọrọ The Game
Ọ bụ onye guzobere nakwa onye isi oche nke Ghana Movie Awards & Ghana TV series Awards, ihe ngosi onyinye kwa afọ nke na-amata ịdị mma na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana
A mụrụ Nuamah na Accra, ọ sikwa Ada na Obuasi, obodo dị na Ashanti Region Southern part of Ghana
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Matters of the Heart na 1993
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri gụnyere The Prince Bride, Heart of Men, Material Girl na 4 Play
N'afọ 2010, Nuamah pụtara na The Game, nke Abdul Salam Mumuni duziri
Nuamah rụrụ ọrụ na Amakye na Dede nke gosipụtara na Silverbird Cinemas na Accra na Machị 26, 2016
Na 1 Jenụwarị 2009, Nuamah guzobere Ghana Movie Awards ebe ọ na-ejide ọkwa onye isi oche

Fred Sledge Smith (May 18, 1933 na July 29, 2005), nke a na-akpọkarị Fred Smith, bụ ónyé America R&B na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé rụrụ ọrụ karịsịa na The Olympics, Bob & Earl, Bill Cosby, na Watts 103rd Street Rhythm Band
A mụrụ Smith na Los Angeles, ebe nne ya, Effie Smith, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwu na ónyé na-eme ihe ọchị
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ede egwu na 1950s na enyi ya Cliff Goldsmith
Ha dere egwu ọhụrụ 'Western Movies', nke otu olu The Olympics dere, nke nna nna Smith, John Criner, duziri
A tọhapụrụ egwu ahụ na akara ndekọ Demon, wee rịgoro na # 8 na Billboard Hot 100, na # 7 na chaatị R&B, na 1958
Smith na Goldsmith gàrà n'ihu na-ede ihe ọhụrụ na egwu egwu ọnụ ruo na mbido afọ 1960
Ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ mechara gụgharịa egwu 'Hully Gully', gụnyere Chubby Checker na The Beach Boys
Smith na Goldsmith jikọtara aka mepụta ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndekọ mbụ nke Olimpik, ébé Smith weghaara naanị ọrụ mmepụta n'ihe dị ka 1963
N'afọ 1963, Smith malitere ịrụ ọrụ màkà akara Mirwood, nke ónyé bụbu onye isi Vee-Jay bụ Randy Wood guzobere na Los Angeles
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na duo Bob na Earl ン Bob Relf na Earl Nelson ma, ya na Relf na Nelson, jikọrọ aka mepụta ndekọ ha 'Harlem Shuffle', nke Gene Page haziri na ntinye nke Barry White
Ihe ndekọ ahụ ghọrọ Top 10 na UK ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị, Smith sokwa dee ma soro mepụta ọtụtụ n'ime egwu abụọ ahụ
N'afọ 1965, Smith so dee ma mepụta 'The Duck', nké a na-ekwu na ọ bụ Jackie Lee, aha njirimara nke Earl Nelson ji mee ihe
Ihe ndekọ ahụ ruru # 14 na chaatị pop nke US, Smith gàrà n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Nelson na egwu ndị ọzọ a na-akpọ Jackie Lee

Ọtụtụ n'ime mmepụta Smith na Mirwood maka ihe ndị dị ka Jimmy Thomas na Mirettes, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ihe karịrị ihe ịga nke ọma na mpaghara n'oge ahụ, ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na klọb mkpụrụ obi nke British Northern
Ya na onye nhazi James Carmichael na-arụ ọrụ mgbè niile
O dekwara ma mepụta egwu na obere ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ Los Angeles ndị ọzọ gụnyere Arvee na Tri-Disc
Fred Swaniker (a mụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke Ghana na ọkachamara n'ịzụlite ndị ndu na ọrụ iji nyere ndị ọkachamara kachasị dị egwu n'ụwa aka imezu ikike ya

Swaniker ghọtara mkpa ndu na agụmakwụkwọ dị mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke nne ya hiwere mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ma kwenye na ihe na-efu dị mkpa iji gbanwee Africa bụ ezigbo ndu
Iji dozie nsogbu ahụ, ọ malitere African Leadership Group - usoro ihe omume nke òtù ndị na-akwalite oge ọhụrụ nke ndị isi Africa na-azụ ahịa

N'ime afọ iri na isii gara aga, ọ tọrọ ntọala ma duzie ụlọ akwụkwọ African Leadership Academy nke dị na South Africa, African Leadership University nke nwere ogige na Mauritius na Rwanda, African Leadership Network, ALX (ọgbọ mmepe ndị ndu na-esote) na The Room (obodo zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ndị nwere talent kachasị elu)
N'ozuzu, mbọ ndị a na-ezube ịgbanwe Afrịka site n'ịzụlite nde ndị isi Afrịka atọ site na 2035

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ kwuputakwara mmekorita ya na Amazon Web Services (AWS) iji mee ka The Room's Intelligence Platform ma gbasaa ALG ruo ọtụtụ nde ndị nwere nkà na Africa, Asia, Latin America, North America, na Europe ma jikọta ha na ohere ọrụ
N'afọ 2019, magazin Time ghọtara ya dị ka otu n'ime '100 Most Influential People in the World' na Fast Company gụnyere African Leadership Group n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ 50 kachasị ọhụrụ n'ụwa
Nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ọka ikpe; nne ya bụ onye nkuzi
Ha abụọ bụ ndị Ghana, mana mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, ezinụlọ ya gbapụrụ Ghana mgbe ndị agha kwusịrị ọchịchị ma mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ọ biri na mba anọ na Afrịka
Ọ gara Macalester College na Minnesota

McKinsey & Company na Johannesburg were ya n'ọrụ na mbụ, tupu ọ gaa Stanford Graduate School of Business na California, ebe ọ natara MBA ma kpọọ ya Arjay Miller Scholar, ihe dị iche nke e nyere ndị 10% kachasị elu nke klas ọ bụla na-agụsị akwụkwọ na Stanford

Mgbe ọ nọ na Stanford, Swaniker ya na onye ọrụ ibe ya na onye nchoputa Chris Bradford dere atụmatụ azụmahịa maka African Leadership Academy, ụlọ akwụkwọ pụrụ iche nke Afrịka nke ga-azụ ndị isi Afrịka n'ọdịnihu
Nke a dabere na nkwenye ya na otu ihe mgbochi kasịnụ maka ọganihu Afrịka bụ enweghị ezigbo onye ndu
O jiri njikọ ya na Silicon Valley chọta nkwado ego wee malite Academy ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2004
Ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi oge niile na-akụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ si n'ofe Afrịka ndu na nkà azụmaahịa mgbe ha na-akwadebe ha maka mahadum gburugburu ụwa
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2017, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu puku ndị isi n'ọdịnihu sonyeere ọkwa nke Academy
Maka ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ, a na-ahapụ akwụkwọ, ma ọ bụrụhaala na ha kwere nkwa ịlaghachi Afrịka mgbe ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji
N'afọ 2014 na nzukọ TED na Brazil, Swaniker kwupụtara mmụba nke ọhụụ ya netwọk ọhụrụ nke mahadum iri abụọ na ise nke Afrịka nke ga-emesị zụlite nde ndị isi atọ site na 2060
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị afọ 2016, ogige abụọ mepere otu na Mauritius na nke ọzọ na Rwanda
Ụlọ ọrụ Fast ghọtara netwọk nke mahadum a dị ka 'Ụlọ ọrụ kachasị ọhụrụ' nke atọ na Africa na CNN wepụtara atụmatụ na-akpọ mahadum 'Harvard nke Africa'

Graca Machel, nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke Nelson Mandela, na-eje ozi dị ka Chancelo nke mahadum, ebe Donald Kaberuka, onye bụbu onye isi oche nke African Development Bank, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Global Advisory Council nke mahadum ahụ
N'afọ 2021, o kwuputakwara atụmatụ ọhụrụ nwere obi ike maka African Leadership Group iji kụziere
Onye isi ala United States bụ Barack Obama na ndị ọzọ a ma ama n'ụwa niile toro ọrụ Swaniker dị ka onye ọchụnta ego agụmakwụkwọ
[onye?]
A ghọtara ya dị ka TED Fellow (2009) na World Economic Forum Young Global Leader (2012)
A kpọrọ ya otu n'ime Top Ten Young Power Men in Africa site na 2011 Forbes magazine online feature
Echoing Green ghọtara ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị ọchụnta ego iri na ise kachasị elu n'ụwa' n'afọ 2006
N'afọ 2017, Fred Swaniker nwetara akara ugo mmụta abụọ - otu site na Middlebury College na USA na nke abụọ site na Mahadum Nelson Mandela na South Africa
N'afọ 2018, ọ natara nzere doctorate nke atọ na Macalester College na USA
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, Paul Kagame họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke ndị isi oche na-enwe olileanya na ọ na-agbakwụnye uru ma na-enye aka ịkwalite atụmatụ mba ahụ nke ịmepụta ego site na njem nleta
N'afọ 2019, magazin Time ghọtara ya dị ka otu n'ime '100 Most Influential People in the World' na Fast Company gụnyere African Leadership Group n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ 50 kachasị ọhụrụ n'ụwa
Fred Welton Warmsley III (amụrụ na Septemba 22, 1987), bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ese ụda si Sacramento, California

A maara ya na mbụ màkà ọrụ ya na ndị otu hip hop nke dị na New York City bụ Pro Era, a mara ya màkà ịmepụta ọtụtụ ụdị gụnyere breakcore, ambient na egwu mkpọtụ, na-ewepụta egwuregwu asatọ gbatịrị agbatị na egwuregwu abụọ ogologo kemgbe 2013, gụnyere Alternate / Endings
E wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya n'okpuru aha Dedekind Cut, nke akpọrọ $uccessor, na Nọvemba 2016
Ihe na-esonụ bụ ndepụta nke abọm nke Warmsley mepụtara dị ka onye na-emepụta ma ọ bụ onye na-arụkọ ọrụ, na-egosi afọ a tọhapụrụ, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na aha abọm
Freda Linde (12 Disemba afo 1915 – 7 Maachị afo 2013 ) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ na onye ntụgharị asụsụ ụmụaka South Afrika
Ọ na-edekarị n'asụsụ Afrikaans
Ọ atụgharịwo ihe karịrị akwụkwọ ụmụaka 150 n'asụsụ Afrikaans, French na German
Ọ natara CP Hoogenhout Award na afo 1964
Amụrụ na Swellendam, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ ruo afo 1960
Site na afo 1960 ruo afo 1963 ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na HAUM Publishers, na site na afo 1964 ruo afo 1971 onye nchịkọta akụkọ na-ahụ maka akwụkwọ ụmụaka na ndị nkwusa John Malherbe
Ọ lara ezumike nká iji dee oge niile na afo 1972

Freddie Gorman (onye amụrụ Frederick Cortez Gorman, Eprel 11, 1939 ̊ June 13, 2006) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwú na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé ama ama dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu màkà akara Motown na ngwụcha afọ 1960 na etiti afọ 1970
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Detroit, Michigan
Ónyé otu Motown quartet The Originals, Freddie Gorman bụkwa akụkụ dị mkpa na-amaghị aha ya nke mmepe nke Motown label
O so dee egwu egwu egwu mbụ nke aha ahụ bụ 'Biko Maazị Postman', nke Marvelettes
N'afọ 1964, ndị otu na-ere ahịa kachasị n'oge niile, ndị Beatles wepụtara ụdị ha, na 1975 ndị Carpenters weghachiri ya na # 1 ọzọ
Nke a bụ oge nke abụọ n'akụkọ ihe méré eme (mgbè 'The Twist' nke Chubby Checker) na abụ ruru #1 na US ugboro abụọ
N'afọ 2006, a kpọbatara 'Biko Maazị Postman' n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ Ndị Na-ede Egwú

A mụrụ ya na Detroit na Eprel 11, 1939, Gorman mepụtara ụda bass ya na nkuku okporo ámá dị n'ógbè ahụ, ọ ka nọkwa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbè o mere ihe ndekọ mbụ ya na Qualitones ' 1955 Josie Records single 'Tears of Love'
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, Gorman na ezigbo ndị enyi ogologo ógè Brian Holland na Sonny Sanders guzobere Fideletones
Mgbè o weputara 'Pretty Girl' na Aladdin Records na 1959, otu ahụ kewara ma Gorman maliteghachiri ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ebu akwụkwọ ozi
Freddy Tsimba (amụrụ n'afọ 1967) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Democratic Republic of Congo
O meela ihe a tụrụ atụ site na okpokoro mgbọ égbè ndị a chịkọtara n'ọgbọ agha Congo
Otu n'ime ihe osise ya nke akpọrọ Au-delà de l'espoir (Beyond the hope) bụ nke obodo Ixelles dị na Brussels nyere iwu ma tinye ya na nkuku Chaussée de Wavre na Longue-Vie Street na mpaghara Matonge
A mụrụ Tsimba na Kinshasa n'afọ 1967
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Fine Art School na Kinshasa ebe o nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'ihe ọkpụkpụ na 1989
O nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha na Ottawa Jeux de la Francophonie n'afọ 2001
Frederic Costa bụ onye njikwa bọọlụ nke Nijeria
Ruo December 2008 ọ kụziri otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger U17
Kemgbe Disemba 2008 ruo 2009 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye njikwa otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger
Àtụ Niger national football team managers
Frederic Fokejou Tefot (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1979 na Bafoussam, Cameroon) bụ onye Cameroon na-ebuli ibu
Ọ sọrọ mpi na 2012 Summer Olympics na ihe omume +105 kg
Frederic Matys Thursz (1930–1992) bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe na onye nkụzi
Ọ nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mba United States na France
E gosipụtara eserese ya na Galerie Lelong, Jefferson Place Gallery, na ihe ngosi Documenta 9
A mụrụ Frederic Matys Thursz na Casablanca na July 7, 1930 ma ya na nne na nna ya kwagara United States na 1941
Thursz nwetara nzere BFA ya na Queens College na 1953, nzere MFA ya na Mahadum Columbia na 1955
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ doctoral na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Institut d'Art et d'Archéologie na Paris, France
N'afọ 1978, ya na Jerry Zeniuk, Joseph Marioni, Günther Umberg, na Marcia Hafif hiwere otu 'Radical Painting'
Thursz kụziri na Mahadum Kentucky site n'afọ 1958 ruo afọ 1968, na Aspen School of Contemporary Art site na 1967 ruo 1969
Ọ kụziri na Kingsborough Community College (CUNY) site na 1968 ruo 1991; ebe ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Ngalaba nka
Site na 1978 ruo 1988, ọ kụziri na New York Studio School of Drawing, Painting and Sculpture
Ọ lụrụ di ugboro atọ, Miryam Neulander, Teresea Bennett, Nina Lunenborg Thursz O nwere ụmụ anọ
Thursz biri na Paris, France ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1992
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu mgbe a wara ya ahụ obi na July 4, 1992 na Cologne, Germany
O nwere ụlọ ọrụ nka na Ossining, New York, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Frederick J
Brown (úbọchị isii n'ọnwa Febrụwarị, 1945 rụo ụbọchị ịse n'ọnwa Mée, 2012) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri na New York City nke sitere na Chicago
Ụdị ejiji ya sitere na ngosipụta na-enweghị atụ ruo n'ihe atụ
Ọrụ nka ya nwèrè mmetụta nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, okpukpe, akụkọ na ọbọdọ ukwu
A maara ya maka usoro ihe osise ya dị ukwuu nke ndị egwu jazz na blues
Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta nke Metropolitan Museum of Art, Smithsonian American Art Museum na National Portrait Gallery, yana Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art na Kansas City, Mo
N'afọ 1988, Brown nwere ihe ngosi mbụ nke ónyé na-ese ihe n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ na Museum of the Chinese Revolution (nke bụzi National Museum of China) na Tienanmen Square na Beijing, China
A mụrụ Frederick James Brown na Greensboro, Georgia n'ubochí isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1945
Nné ya bụ Geneva Brown na nnà ya bụ Andrew Bentley
A zụlitere ya n'akụkụ ụlọ ọrụ ígwè dị na Southside nke Chicago
Brown gosipụtara na blues site na ndị egwu nọ n'ógbè ahụ dị ka Muddy Waters, Howlin 'Wolf, na Memphis Slim
Brown gara Chicago Vocational High School
Ọ gàrà Southern Illinois University Carbondale, (SIU) na-agụsị akwụkwọ na 1968 na nzere na Art
N'afọ 1970, Brown si Chicago kwaga n'ógbè SoHo nke New York City nke n'oge ahụ bụ ebe óbíbí nke ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe, ndị na-eti egwu, ndị édémédé na ndị na-agba egwu

N'ebe ahụ, ya na ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ rụkọtara ọrụ na ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche gụnyere ndị egwu jazz Ornette Coleman na Anthony Braxton, onye na-ese foto vidio Anthony Ramos, na ndị ọzọ na-ese onyinyo dị ka Grégoire Müller, Frank Bowling na Daniel Johnson
Na mgbakwunye na ihe osise ndị jikọrọ aka, Brown nyèrè aka na mmepụta nka dịka Be Aware, Stolen Moments na Portrait of a Painter
Anthony Braxton dere ma mee egwu ahụ na Anthony Ramos mepụtara vidiyo maka ọrụ abụọ ikpeazụ
Loft Brown na otu narị na iri abụọ Wooster Street ghọrọ ebe nnọkọ na SoHo n'oge a
Brown lụrụ ónyé na-agba egwú nke oge a na onye na-ese ihe nkiri ibe ya bụ Megan Bowman na 1979
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, Sebastienne na Bentley
Brown kewara ógè ya n'etiti New York na Carefree, Arizona

Frederick Nnaemeka Leonard bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria nwetara ihe nrite maka onye na- akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri Golden Icons Academy Movie Awards na 2014 na 2016 ọ meriri City People Movie Award nke Onye na-akwado onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke afọ (Bekee) na City People Entertainment Awards
A mụrụ Leonard na steeti Anambra na Naijiria bụ mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria nke ndị igbo nke Naijiria na-achịkarị
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ nne na nna ya mụrụ n'ime ezinụlọ mmadụ anọ nwere ụmụ abụọ, nne na nna
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na St Peter's Anglican Primary School, Alausa, Ikeja na Lagos steeti wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na Oregun, Ikeja na Lagos Steeti maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị
N'ịchọ inweta nzere mahadum ọ kwagara Kaduna State na Ugwu Naijiria wee tinye akwụkwọ na Kaduna Polytechnic ebe a nabatara ya wee gụchaa nzere BSc na Biochemistry

Leonard rụpụtara ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria na 2001 ebe ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ wee kwụsị ime orụ ihe nkiri ma ọ rụchara ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ngwangwa iji mechaa agụmakwụkwọ mahadum wee nweta akara ugo mmụta
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ mahadum, Leonard laghachiri n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa nke a na-akpọkarị Nollywood na 2008 wee nweta ọrụ ndu ime ihe nkiri mbụ ya na fim akpọrọ Indian Doctor'
N'afọ 2009, ọ batara n'usoro ihe nkiri soap opera nke Naijiria wee gosi n'usoro ihe onyonyo a kpọrọ Disclosure nke ekesara na Africa Magic na DSTV
Leonard gosiputara izizi na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Grey, wee mechaa na 2019 mepụta ihe nkiri akpọrọ Void
Leonard kwadoro Bimbo Akintola, bụ nwanyị Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri dịka otu n'ime ndị na-emetụta ụdị omume ya
Leonard bụ nwa mgbei ma kwuo n'ihu ọha banyere mmetụta jọgburu onwe ya nke ọnwụ nne na nna karịsịa ọnwụ nne ya bụ nke ọ kọwara dị ka ihe na-adịghị mma nke mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe efu na ndụ ya

Leonard na ajụjụ ọnụ nkesa ozi nke Naịjịrịa ebipụtara na This Day, kọwara onwe ya dị ka onye na nọrọ onwe ya na ọ bụghị onye mmemme ma ọ kpughere na ọ dịghị aṅụ ma ọ bụ na-aṅụ sịga na-ejigide a nnọọ obere okirikiri nke ndị enyi na ezinụlọ ole na ole
Lord Frederick Lugard onye British, nke biara na ala Naigeria mee ka di Naigeria nwere ike ibi ma noo na udo

Frederick Timpson I'Ons (15 Nọvemba 1802 na Islington 18 Disemba 1887 na Grahamstown) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa, otu n'ime ụmụ asatọ nke John I'Ons, onye bụ onye nkuzi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ịgba ịnyịnya na Islington
I'Ons gosipụtara ikike mbụ ya n'ise ihe, ọ nwere mmetụta, wee bụrụ enyi nke onye na-ese ihe John Francis na nwa ya nwanyị Mary, onye lụrụ onye ọzọ na-ese Ihe, Thomas Thornycroft
O mechara zụọ ụlọ akwụkwọ nka na Marylebone ebe ọ kụziri ihe osise, eserese, na ihe gbasara azụmahịa
Na 31 Mee 1827 Frederick I'Ons lụrụ Ann Frazer, onye ọrịa ya mere ka di na nwunye ọhụụ ahụ kwaga na mpaghara Albany nke Grahamstown na 1834
Ha rutere na mbido Agha nke Isii, na-akpali Frederick inye ọrụ afọ ofufo ya
Ụbọchị a bụ nke mbụ n'ime 'Aquila Caricatures' ya, usoro ihe ọmụma ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-eme ihe ọchị na-akpasu iwe nke na-eduzi Andries Stockenström, onye na-esote gọvanọ nke British Kaffraria n'oge ahụ
Ndị na-akwado I'Ons bụ ndị agha na-enye ndị isi Xhosa, dị ka Sandile na Khama
I'Ons pụtara ìhè n'ịkọwa ndị Bantu na ndị Hottentot na-agafe agafe
A na-ewere ihe oyiyi nke 'ndị amaala' ndị a dị ka ọrụ ya kachasị mkpa, na-egosipụta mmetụta na nkà dị ukwuu na ngosipụta ha, ma jiri ya tụnyere nke Adriaen van Ostade
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị ndị na-ese ihe na-emepụta potboilers iji dịrị ndụ, a na-eleghara ọrụ ha kachasị mma anya maka ọdịmma nke ego
Ewezuga mkpakọrịta dị mkpirikpi nke ya na John Francis, I'Ons enweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla na nka
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọdịdị ala ya nke Eastern Cape nwere amara a na-ahụkarị na nka na-enweghị isi na ihe nkiri ọhịa nke na-echetara Watteau
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, a na-akatọ ala ya mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ihe na-adịghị mma na nke na-enweghị mkpali
Ọ na-enweta ego ya site na ise ihe ịchọ mma, foto nke ndị bi na Grahamstown ama ama na inye nkuzi nka
Njem ọ gara n'ebe a na-egwu diamond na Kimberley emeghị ka ọ dịkwuo mma

Ọrụ ya na-enye nghọta dị mkpa banyere ndụ ókèala n'afọ ndị 1800s, ma gosipụta ya na Tate Gallery na London (1948), South African National Gallery na Cape Town (1976), na King George VI Gallery na Port Elizabeth (1990)

Enwere ike ịchọta ihe osise ya na ndị na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, yana ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na gallery dị ka Africana Museum, Albany Museum, Fort Beaufort Historical Museum, King George VI Art Gallery, South African National Gallery, Mahadum Stellenbosch, William Fehr Collection, William Humphreys Art Gallery na 1820 Settlers Memorial Museum
Fredrik Stang Heffermehl (Amụrụ n'afọ 11 Nọvemba 1938) bụ onye ọka iwu Norwegian, onye edemede na onye na-ahụ maka udo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na onye ọrụ gọọmentị site n'afọ 1965 ruo afọ 1982 ma bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu mbụ nke Norwegian Humanist Association site n'afọ 1980 ruo afọ 1982
O mechara mee ka akara ya dị ka onye edemede na onye na-agba mbọ maka udo na megide ngwá agha nuklia

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nsọpụrụ, na onye bụbu onye isi oche, nke Norwegian Peace Council, onye bụbu osote onye isi oche nke International Peace Bureau, na onye isi oche mbụ nke International Association of Lawyers against Nuclear Arms
Amụrụ ya na Rena, Heffermehl debara aha ya na Mahadum nke Oslo, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere candjur
N'afọ 1964
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu site n'afọ 1965 ruo afọ 1973, mgbe ọ na-enwetakwa nzere masta n'afọ 1970 na Mahadum New York
N'afọ 1973, Heffermehl ghọrọ osote onye nduzi n'ọfịs nke Norwegian Consumer Ombudsman
Ọ hapụrụ ọkwa a n'afọ 1980 ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu mbụ nke Norwegian Humanist Association
Ọ hapụrụ Humanist Association n'afọ 1982 iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede onwe ya
Na mgbakwunye na ide akwụkwọ ndị na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, Heffermehl sụgharịrị ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na Norwegian
N'afọ 1988 ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke NGO Norwegian Peace Council, na onye otu bọọdụ nke International Peace Bureau
N'afọ 1994 ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi oche na International Peace Bureau, n'afọ 1997 ọ natara otu ọkwa ahụ na International Association of Lawyers Against Nuclear Arms
Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị dị ka onye isi oche nke Kansụl Udo nke Norway, a mara ya dị ka onye ndu nsọpụrụ
Heffermehl bụ onye na-akwado Mordechai Vanunu, onye na-ahụ maka teknụzụ nke kpughere mmemme nuklia nke Israel
Heffermehl kwuru na 2008 na ọ họpụtara Vanunu maka Nobel Peace Prize ugboro iri na asatọ

Ọ gbalịkwara ịmanye gọọmentị Norway ka ha nye Vanunu ebe mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ọtụtụ oge, na-ekwu na Norway nwere ọrụ pụrụ iche n'ihi nnyefe mmiri dị arọ ha nyere Israel na 1959 site na Great Britain
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008, a kpughere na Norwegian Directorate of Immigration nyere Vanunu ebe mgbaba n'afọ 2004, mana Minista Erna Solberg nke oge ahụ tụgharịrị mkpebi ahụ

Mgbe a kpughere ya, Heffermehl gosipụtara nchegbu na ọ bụ ezie na ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Norway gbanwere na 2005, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka o mee ihe zuru ezu n'ụzọ enyere Vanunu aka, n'ihi nchegbu nke iguzosi ike n'ihe na United States
Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi Jonas Gahr Støre, n'aka nke ọzọ, kwuru na Norway etinyelarị nrụgide zuru oke na Israel, site na ọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Na Mee 2008 Heffermehl, n'oge a ya na ndị ọka iwu a ma ama dị ka Ketil Lund na Jan Fridthjof Bernt, rịọrọ Praịm Minista Norway ọzọ ka o mee ihe

Kemgbe Ọgọstụ afọ 2007, Heffermehl emeela onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nkatọ siri ike nke Kọmitii Nobel nke Norway, nke, dị ka Heffermehle si kwuo, emeghị ka uche Alfred Nobel mezuo, si otú a na-eme ọtụtụ onyinye maka 45% nke onyinye ahụ mgbe 1945 gasịrị n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị

N'etiti ndị Heffermehl lere anya dị ka ndị iwu na-akwadoghị bụ ndị na-ese okwu, dị ka Henry Kissinger na Le Duc Tho (1973) na Arafat, Peres na Rabin (1994), kamakwa ndị na-adịghị arụmụka dịka Mother Teresa (1979) na Elie Wiesel (1986)
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị nwetara ihe nrite emeela 'ọrụ a na-atụ aro ya', Heffermehl na-ekwusi ike na nke a adịghị mma iji nweta ihe nrite nke ụkpụrụ ya doro anya metụtara nkwụsị agha na ọrụ udo
A kọwara echiche ya nke mbụ n'ụzọ miri emi n'akwụkwọ 2008 Nobels Moro (English 'Nobel's Will')
Kemgbe 1948, a na-enye ndị otu Kọmitii Nobel site na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Norway (megide ihe Nobel nyere iwu) na ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Dị ka Heffermehl si kwuo, òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Norwegian ejirila ndị otu kọmitii mee ihe dị ka ihe nrite nye ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nọ n'elu ugwu iji kwado ọrụ ha, kama ịhọrọ ndị na-abụghị ndị na-akwado ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere ezigbo nzụlite na ọrụ udo

Ọzọkwa, Heffermehl, ebe ọ bụ onye na-emegide ndị otu Norwegian na NATO, chọpụtara na nkwekọrịta zuru oke na-akwado NATO n'etiti òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Norwegian agbagọwo Nobel Peace Prize n'otu ụzọ ahụ
Nke a, ka Heffermehl na-ekwu, na-emegide ọchịchọ Alfred Nobel ịhapụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Ny Tid, ọ tụrụ aro ka e jiri ndị dị ka Jan Egeland, Ingrid Fiskaa, Jostein Gaarder na Sverre Lodgaard dochie ndị otu kọmitii dị ugbu a
Atụmatụ ndị ọzọ sitere na Heffermehl gụnyere Gunnar Garbo, Ingrid Eide, Erik Dammann, Torild Skard, Reiulf Steen, Johan Galtung na Berit Ås
N'akwụkwọ Nobels Whir, Heffermehl kwara ụta na e wereghị Eide n'ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ Kọmitii Nobel mgbe ọ tinyere akwụkwọ maka ọkwa ahụ na 1990
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 2010 Heffermehl bipụtara nyocha dị oke egwu, The Nobel Peace Prize
Ihe Nobel chọrọ n'ezie
Ebumnuche ya bụ ileba anya n'ime usoro ndị Norwegian guzobere iji gbochie nchọpụta ya banyere ihe nrite maka 'ndị mmeri nke udo' aha ya bụ na akwụkwọ testament nke Alfred Nobel na 1895
Nobel mere nhọrọ n'etiti ụzọ abụọ dị iche iche maka ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ, ma ọ bụ na-aga n'ihu na-achọ udo site n'ụzọ agha ma ọ bụ site na imekọ ihe ọnụ na iwu mba ụwa, ụlọ ọrụ, na iwepụ ngwá agha
Mgbe Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na Kọmitii Nobel leghaara echiche ya anya ma kwuo na ọ dịghị onye kwadoro nkọwa ya, Heffermehl malitere igosi na ha ezighi ezi
Ọ chọpụtara na ọtụtụ agụmakwụkwọ na ọrụ ndị ọzọ kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ egosila otu echiche ahụ banyere ọrụ Bertha von Suttner nakwa na Nobel bu n'obi ịkwado ndị na-emegide ndị agha
Nke a mere ka ọ dị mkpa iji ọdịnihu nke Peace Prize maka nyocha nke mgbagwoju anya nke testament Nobel na otu ndị omeiwu si jikwaa ihe nrite nke Nobel nyere ha
'Nobel Peace Prize' n'asụsụ Bekee emelitere ma gbasaa maka mbipụta na Chinese (FLP, Jan
2011), Swedish (Leopard, Oct
2011), Finnish (LIKE, Dec
2011), Russian (Aletheia, na 2012)

Na Disemba 10, 2011, onye ndú nke Nobel Family Association ruo afọ 15, Michael Nobel, kwadoro nkatọ Heffermehl kwuru, na-adọ aka ná ntị na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Norwegian nwere ike ịhapụ ikike onwe ha nke ihe nrite udo
Ọdịnaya efu, ọdịnaya liberia, ozi liberia, ma ọ bụ ozi efu, bụ ụdị ọrụ ọ bụla na-arụ ọrụ, ọrụ nka, ma ọ bụ ọdịnaya okike ndị ọzọ dabara nkọwa nke ọrụ omenala efu
Na sayensị ikuku, free convective layer (FCL) bụ layer nkè ọnọdụ ma ọ bụ nwèrè ike ọgba aghara na troposphere
Ọ bụ ihe dị n'ime nké ikuku na-arịgo elu nwéré ike ịnwe ọmarịcha ihe na-ese n'elu (PBE) ka o wee nwee ike ime ka mmiri dị omimi (DMC)
Na ụda ikuku, ọ bụ ọkwa dị n'etiti ọkwa nke convection n'efu (LFC) na ọkwa nguzozi (EL)
FCL dị mkpa màkà usoro dịgasị ichè iche na amụma nke oké égbè eluigwe
Ọ bụ ọkwa nkè ọgba aghara, 'ébé dị mmá' na eserese thermodynamic ebe ikuku na-arịgo na-ekpo ọkụ karịa gbụrụ-gbúrụ ya
Ijikọta ike na-aga n'ihu site na LFC gaa na EL na-enye ọnụọgụ nké ike nwéré ike ịnwe (CAPE), atụmatụ nke ike kachasị dị na convection
A na-egosipụta omimi nke FCL site na usoro a
N'ụzọ dị omimi, mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ bụ n'ezie égbè eluigwe ma ọ bụ égbè eluigwe, ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ convection dị otú ahụ anaghị emepụta égbè eluigwe na ya mèrè ọ bụghị égbè eluigwe
Ọ bụ igwe ojii cumulus congestus ma ọ bụ igwe ojii Cumulonimbus
Akụkụ ikuku na-arịgo site na elu dị nso (mgbakọta (ML) ma ọ bụ ókèala (PBL)) ga-arụ ọrụ site na nkwụsi ike nke convective inhibition (CIN) mgbè ọ dị
Ọrụ a na-abịa site na ịbawanye ọgba aghara na ọkwa dị ala site n'ibuli okpomọkụ ma ọ bụ ebe igirigi, ma ọ bụ site na ibuli elu

Na-enweghị enyemaka nke nrụgide igwe, ngwugwu ga-eru okpomọkụ ya (Tc) tupu mmiri convection (igwe ojii) amalite na nso ọkwa convective condensation (CCL), ébé site na ibuli elu, isi igwe ojii na-amalite na nso ọkwa condensation ebuli elu (LCL)

Mgbè ụdị ntụgharị dị otú ahụ dị, nke a ga-anọgide dị ka convection na-adịghị omimi, nke na-ekpo ọkụ (obere igwe ojii cumulus) ruo mgbè ọ gafere na convective inhibition layer, mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị DMC na-aga n'ihu ka ngwugwu na-akụ LFC ma banye na FCL, ma ọ bụrụ na okpomọkụ ma ọ bụ nrụgide igwe na-agagide (na mmiri zuru ezu dị na mpụta)

Na ọkwa nke na-anọpụ iche na-ese n'elu mmiri (EL), ngwugwu dị jụụ karịa gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi ma kwụsie ike na thermodynamically, na-aga n'ihu na-arị elu site na ume ma si otú a na-ebelata ruo mgbè ọ ga-akwụsị ịrịgo na ọkwa kachasị elu (MPL) - nke nwéré ike igosipụta onwé ya dị ka elu

Ileghara mmetụta ndị ọzọ anya, ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke CAPE zuru ezu na FCL, na karịsịa ọkpụrụkpụ nke ebe a dị mma, nke enwèrè ike ịlele dị ka ndepụta e welitere (LI) na ịdị elu dị iche iche, na-ebute mmụba siri ike na ịrị elu ikuku ngwá ngwá
Ogige nlereanya nke nwere onwe bụ ebe ncheta na ntụrụndaka ntụrụndị dị n'etiti obodo Lagos na Lagos Island, Naịjirịa nke bụbu Ụlọ Mkpọrọ Broad Street nke Eze Ukwu
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ bụ Theo Lawson chepụtara ya
E wuru ogige nlereanya ahụ iji chekwaa akụkọ ihe mere eme na ihe nketa ọdịbendị nke ndị Naijiria
Ihe ncheta dị n'ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ na-ekpughe ihe nketa nke Lagos na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ mkpọrọ Her Majesty's Broad Street
E wuru ya iji cheta emume ncheta afọ iri ise nke nnwere onwe n'ọnwa Ọktoba, afọ 2010
Ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ na-eje ozi dị ka ihe ncheta mba, ihe ịrịba ama akụkọ ihe mere eme, ebe ọdịnala, ebe nka na ntụrụndaka
Ogige nlereanya ahụ, mgbe ọ bụ ụlọ mkpọrọ nabatara ụfọdụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-alụ ọgụ maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa
Ogige nlereanya ahụ, nke bụzi ebe obibi dị jụụ maka ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, echiche na mmekọrịta ndị ọbịa na-emeghe maka ọha na eze kwa ụbọchị
Taa, ogige nnwere onwe aghọwo ebe maka ihe omume mmekọrịta dị iche iche na ntụrụndụ ntụrụndaka
E guzobere Ụlọ Mkpọrọ Broad Street mgbe Britain mere Lagos ka ọ bụrụ Colony na 1861 (lee Lagos Treaty of Cession)
E wuru ụlọ mkpọrọ mbụ ahụ na 1882 na mgbidi apịtị na ahịhịa ahịhịhịa ma ọ dịteghị aka n'ihi mmebi nke ndị na-emegide ọchịchị

Dị ka Theo Lawson, onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke Freedom Park, ndị na-emegide ọchịchị ndị Britain na Lagos ' nọgidere na-agba ya ọkụ ma na-agba ọ ọkụ, ya mere na 1885 gọọmentị na-achị mba ahụ si England bubata brik ma wughachi ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ'
Ego gọọmentị na-eme n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ na 1882 (£16,000) kpughere ihe gọọmentị kacha mkpa na iwu na iwu ma e jiri ya tụnyere atụmatụ ndị ọzọ dị ka agụmakwụkwọ nke gọọmentị mefuru £ 700 na ya
E wepụrụ ụlọ mkpọrọ Broad Street n'afọ 1979 ma belata ya ka ọ bụrụ ebe a na-atụfu ihe ruo n'afọ ndị 1990 mgbe e mere atụmatụ iji gbanwee saịtị ahụ ka ọ bụrụ oghere okike

Helen Sharpe na usoro usoro usoro ahụike NBC New Amsterdam (2018–ugbua)
N'afọ 2013, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na telivishọn US na ihe nkiri CW nke afọ iri na ụma The Carrie Diaries dị ka Larissa Loughlin, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na magazin Interview
Ngosipụta telivishọn ndị ọzọ gụnyere Old Jack's Boat, Silent Witness, na Survivors
Agyeman pụtakwara dịka Penny na ihe nkiri afọ 2015 North v South
A mụrụ Agyeman na London
Nne ya, Azar, bụ onye Iran, nna ya, Osei, bụ onye Ghana
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ dị obere
Agyeman nwere nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya, Leila, na nwanne nwoke nke nta, Dominic
Ọ bụ ezie na a zụlitere nne ya dịka onye Alakụba ma zụlite nna ya dịka onye Methodist, Agyeman tolitere bụrụ onye Roman Katọlik
Agyeman gara Our Lady's Convent RC High School, ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik dị na Stamford Hill
Mgbe e mesịrị, n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1996, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Anna Scher Theatre School na Islington ma mụọ ǹkà na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Middlesex, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2000
Mgbe Agyeman malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya, ọ họọrọ iji edemede dị iche nke aha ọmụmụ ya, Frema, dịka aha ọkachamara ya, iji zere nsogbu ịkpọ okwu
Tupu ọ nweta akụkụ nke Martha Jones, ọrụ telivishọn a ma ama nke Agyeman bụ igwu Lola Wise na usoro mmegharị nke ITV soap opera Crossroads
O nwekwara obere ọrụ ndị ọbịa na usoro TV ndị ọzọ dịka Casualty, Mile High na The Bill, nke ọ pụtara ugboro abụọ dịka mmadụ abụọ dị iche iche
N'afọ 2005, Agyeman mere Mary Ogden, onye ọrụ mpụ, na ihe omume nke Silent Witness
Agyeman pụtara dịka Nana na ihe nkiri onwe ya bụ Rulers and Dealers, nke Stephen Lloyd Jackson dere ma duzie
N'ọnwa June afọ 2007, a kpọrọ Agyeman 'Best Newcomer' n'afọ 2007 'Glamour Women of the Year Awards'
N'otu afọ ahụ, o meriri n'afọ 2007 People's Choice category maka 'Female TV Star' na 5th annual Screen Nation Film and TV Awards, nke emere na 15 Ọktoba 2007 na Hilton Metropole na London
The Observer gbara Agyeman ajụjụ ọnụ na Disemba afọ 2007 ma kpọọ ya 'ihu nke afọ 2007'
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara Agyeman na ngalaba abụọ na British Soap Awards maka ọrụ ya dịka Lola Wise na Crossroads, dịka 'Best Newcomer' na 'Sexiest Female'
Egbugbu Agyeman nwere n'elu ogwe aka ya bụ ihe nnọchianya nke nna nna ya, nke nwere okwu Peshia 'raha', nke pụtara 'n'efu', n'okpuru ihe oyiyi nke urukurubụba
Agyeman bụ onye Roman Katọlik na-adịghị aga ụka
O kwuru na ime ihe ọma bụ ụzọ o si kwere na Chineke na ịgosi pụta Iso Ụzọ Kraịst Katọlik
Freestyle Script bụ a font haziri site Martin Wait n'ime 1981
Version shírí íké nke Freestyle Script e kere n'ime 1986
Ndị nkwusa bụ Adobe, ITC ma Letraset
O nwere 4 vershion Regular, Bold, SH Reg Alt, ma SB Reg Alt
Ógè oyi bụ ọkwa nkè National Weather Service nyèrè nké na-ekwupụta na okpomọkụ nkè 32 °F (0 ) na n'okpuru ga-ekwe omume n'ime awa iri anọ na asatọ sochirinụ
A na-enye elekere a naanị n'oge ógè uto mgbè okpomọkụ oyi nwèrè ike imebi ma ọ bụ gbuo ihe ọkụkụ a na-ewepụtaghị, nke ga-eme ka ógè uto kwụsị
A na-adụ ndị ọrụ ugbo ọdụ ka ha kwadebe iji chebe ihe ọkụkụ ha fọdụrụnụ ma nyochaa amụma ahụ
Àtụ SevWea nav

Frejon (Site na Feijão, nke bụ okwu Portuguese maka agwa) bụ mmiri ara akị bekee na ofe akị bọọlụ nke a na-eri karịsịa n'oge izu ụka dị nsọ site na ndị Kraịst, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị Katọlik, gafee ụwa

Mba ebe Frejon na-ewu ewu gụnyere Brazil na Naịjirịa (karịsịa n'etiti ndị Yoruba si Brazil laghachi Naịjirị mgbe a kwụsịrị ahịa ohu, ma biri n'ihe a maara dị ka 'Brazilian Quarters' na Lagos Island), yana Sierra Leone na Good Friday, ma ọ bụ maka ọrụ dịka agbamakwụkwọ
N'ihi na a machibidoro nri mmiri ara ehi na anụ anụ (anụ ehi, anụ ezì, ewu) iwu na ubochi Friday ọma, nri a bụ ihe kwesịrị ekwesị maka nri ndị na-abụghị mmiri ara ehi dị ka azụ e siri esi na snail

Frejons ndị a na-eri na Naijiria na West Africa bụ pudding nke e ji agwa ojii mee nke e ji nwayọọ nwayọọ sie n'abalị n'elu ọkụ ma ọ bụ ọkụ ọkụ, wee gwakọta ya na mmiri ara akị bekee iji mepụta pudding siri ike, na-atọ ụtọ, nke dị nro
Na mba ụfọdụ, a na-eji koko eme nri ahụ
A na-ejikarị nri azụ̀, snail na Garri Ijebu na-enye Frejon
Àtụ African cuisine
French (français [fʁɑ̃sɛ] ma ọ bụ langue française [lɑ̃ɡ fʁɑ̃sɛːz]) bụ asụsụ Romance nke ezinụlọ Indo-European
O sitere na Latin Vulgar nke Alaeze Ukwu Rom, dị ka asụsụ Romance niile si abịa
French sitere na Gallo-Romance, Latin a na-asụ na Gaul, yana karịa na Northern Gaul
Ndị ikwu ya kacha nso bụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ d'oïl—asụsụ ndị a na-asụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme n'ebe ugwu France na n'ebe ndịda Belgium, bụ́ ndị French (Francien) nọchiri nke ukwuu
Asụsụ Celtic nke Northern Roman Gaul dị ka Gallia Belgica na asụsụ French (Germanic) nke ndị mwakpo ndị Frank na-achị Rom metụtakwara French
Taa, n'ihi mgbasawanye nke France gara aga na mba ofesi, enwere ọtụtụ asụsụ Creole dabere na French, ọkachasị Haitian Creole
Enwere ike ịkpọ onye ma ọ bụ mba na-asụ French ka Francophone na bekee na French
French bụ asụsụ gọọmentị na mba 29 gafee ọtụtụ kọntinent, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị otu International de la Francophonie (OIF), obodo nke mba 84 na-ekerịta ojiji ma ọ bụ nkuzi French
French bụkwa otu n'ime asụsụ isii ejiri mee ihe na United Nations

A na-asụ ya dị ka asụsụ mbụ (n'usoro nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ) na France; Canada (karịsịa na mpaghara Quebec, Ontario, na New Brunswick, yana mpaghara ndị ọzọ Francophone); Belgium (Wallonia na Brussels-Capital Region); ọdịda anyanwụ Switzerland (kpọmkwem canton na-eme mpaghara Romandy); akụkụ nke Luxembourg; akụkụ nke United States (steeti nke Louisiana, Maine, New Hampshire na Vermont); Monaco; mpaghara Aosta Valley nke Italy; na obodo dị iche iche n'ebe ndị ọzọ

Na 2015, ihe dịka 40% nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị francophone (gụnyere L2 na ndị na-ekwu okwu ihu ọha) bi na Europe, 36% na Sub-Saharan Africa na Indian Ocean, 15% na North Africa na Middle East, 8% na America, na 1% na Asia na Oceania
French bụ asụsụ obodo nke abụọ na-asụkarị na European Union
N'ime ndị Europe na-asụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ na ala ala, ihe dịka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ ise nwere ike ịsụ French dịka asụsụ nke abụọ
French bụ asụsụ mba ofesi nke abụọ kacha akụzi na EU
Ụlọ ọrụ niile nke EU na-eji French dị ka asụsụ ọrụ yana Bekee na German; n'ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ, French bụ naanị asụsụ na-arụ ọrụ (dịka n'Ụlọikpe Ikpe nke European Union)

French bụkwa asụsụ nke iri na asatọ a kacha asụ n'ụwa, asụsụ nke ise a kacha asụ site na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụ ya na asụsụ nke abụọ ma ọ bụ nke atọ kacha amụ n'ụwa niile (nke nwere ihe dị ka nde 120 ndị mmụta dị ka nke 2017)
N'ihi ọchịchị ndị France na ndị Belgium malite na narị afọ nke 16 gaa n'ihu, e webatara French na mpaghara ọhụrụ na America, Africa na Asia
Ọtụtụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ nke abụọ bi na Francophone Africa, ọkachasị Gabon, Algeria, Morocco, Tunisia, Mauritius, Senegal na Ivory Coast

A na-eche na French nwere ihe dị ka nde 76 ndị na-asụ obodo; ihe dị ka nde 235 kwa ụbọchị, ndị na-ekwu okwu nke ọma; na ndị ọzọ 77–110 nde ndị ọkà okwu sekọndịrị ndị na-asụ ya dị ka asụsụ nke abụọ n'ogo dị iche iche nke nka, ọkachasị n'Africa
Dị ka OIF si kwuo, ihe dị ka nde mmadụ 321 n'ụwa nile 'nwere ike ịsụ asụsụ ahụ', na-akọwapụtaghị usoro maka atụmatụ a ma ọ bụ onye ọ gụnyere

Dabere na ntule igwe mmadụ nke Université Laval na Réseau Démographie de l'Agence universitaire de la Francophonie na-eduzi, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụ French ga-eru ihe dị ka nde 500 na 2025 na nde 650 site na 2050
OIF na-eme atụmatụ 700 nde site na 2050, 80 % n'ime ha ga-anọ n'Africa

French nwere ogologo akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka asụsụ mba ụwa nke akwụkwọ na ụkpụrụ sayensị ma bụrụ asụsụ mbụ ma ọ bụ nke abụọ nke ọtụtụ òtù mba ụwa gụnyere United Nations, European Union, North Atlantic Treaty Organization, World Trade Organization, International Olympic Committee, na International Committee of the Red Cross
N'afọ 2011, Bloomberg Businessweek họọrọ French dị ka asụsụ nke atọ kachasị baa uru maka azụmahịa, na-esote Bekee na Standard Mandarin Chinese
French bụ asụsụ Romance (nke pụtara na ọ sitere na Vulgar Latin) nke sitere na asụsụ Gallo-Romance a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu France
Ụdị mbụ nke asụsụ ahụ gụnyere Old French na Middle French

N'ihi ọchichi ndi Rom, ndị bi na Gaul ji nwayọọ nwayọọ nabata Latin, dịka ndị nkịtị na-amụta asụsụ ahụ, ọ mepụtara ọdịdị dị iche iche nke mpaghara, yana ọdịiche ụtọ asụsụ site na Latin dị ka a na-asụ n'ebe ndị ọzọ, ụfọdụ n'ime ha na-agba akaebe na graffiti
Ụdị mpaghara a gbanwere n'asụsụ Gallo-Romance, nke gụnyere French na ndị ikwu ya kacha nso, dị ka Arpitan

Ọganihu nke Latin na Gaul sitere na ịdị n'otu ya ruo ihe karịrị ọkara puku afọ n'akụkụ asụsụ Celtic Gaulish, nke na-adịghị agwụ agwụ ruo na ngwụcha narị afọ nke isii, ogologo oge mgbe ọdịda nke Alaeze Ukwu Rom nke Ọdịda Anyanwụ
Ndị bi ebe ahụ nọgidere na-abụ ndị obodo 90 n'ebe ha si; ndị Romanizing bụ ndị isi obodo (ọ bụghị ndị Rom bi), ndị ụmụ ha mụtara Latin n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Rom

N'oge ọdịda nke Alaeze Ukwu ahụ, ndị isi obodo a ejirila nwayọọ nwayọọ hapụ Gaulish kpamkpam, mana ndị bi n'ime ime obodo na ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị ala nọgidere na-asụ ndị Gaulish bụ ndị nwere ike ịsụ Latin ma ọ bụ Grik mgbe ụfọdụ

Mgbanwe asụsụ ikpeazụ site na Gaulish gaa na Vulgar Latin n'etiti ndị bi n'ime ime obodo na ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị ala mere mgbe e mesịrị, mgbe ha na onye ọchịchị Frankish / ndị agha na-abata nabatara okwu Gallo-Roman Vulgar Latin nke ndị isi ọgụgụ isi obodo
French bụ otu n'ime asụsụ a na-asụ na Morocco
Ojiji nke French bụ ihe nketa colonial nke French Protectorate (1912-1956)

French enweghị ọkwa a ma ama na Morocco, mana a na-ewere ya dị ka asụsụ a ma ama, a na-ejikarị ya eme azụmahịa, diplomacy, na gọọmentị, na-eje ozi dị ka asụsụ asụsụ na ndị na-abụghị Moroccan na ndị na-abụghị ndị Arab

Aleya Rouchdy, onye edemede nke kọntaktị asụsụ na esemokwu asụsụ na Arabic, kwuru na 'Maka ihe niile bara uru, a na-eji French mee ihe dị ka asụsụ nke abụọ' N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya mmetụta nke French agbaghawo nke Bekee
Ka o sina dị, French na-aga n'ihu na-eje ozi dị ka ụzọ isi jikọta obodo ahụ 'ọ bụghị nanị na Europe kamakwa na Francophone Africa'
Rouchdy kwuru, 'Ọdịdị nke French na-egosi na ohere nke ime ka ọnọdụ nke Classical Arabic sie ike na-ebelata
Frene Noshir Ginwala (born 25 Eprel, na afọ 1932) is a South African journalist and politician who was the Speaker of the National Assembly of South Africa site na afo 1994 rue afọ 2004
Ginwala is an Indian South African from the Parsi-Indian community of western India
She studied for a DPhil at Linacre College, Oxford
A họpụtara Ginwala dị ka onye isi oche mbụ nke Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal n'ọnwa Eprel, afọ 2005
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị anọ bụ ndị isi mahadum na South Africa
Ginwala edeela ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na-ekwu maka akụkụ dị iche iche nke ọgụ megide ikpe na-ezighị ezi
Maka mgbalị ya, ụlọ ọrụ na gọọmentị mba ụwa na nke obodo sọpụrụ ya
N'iji amaghị aha ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu n'ịmepụta ụzọ mgbapụ n'okpuru ala maka ndị isi ANC na ndị isi n'oge na-esote ogbugbu Sharpeville na nkwupụta nke State of Emergency (SOE) na afọ 1960
Ndị a gụnyere osote onye isi oche nke ANC Oliver Tambo na Yusuf Dadoo, ndị isi abụọ nke nnwere onwe
Ọ hazikwara ụlọ nchekwa maka ndị ga-anọ na mba ahụ
Ginwala mekwara ka ndị isi NIC (Natal Indian Congress) Monty Naicker na J
Singh, ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru ala mgbe ha jisiri ike zere ndị uwe ojii

Ntuziaka ha bụ ịgagharị na mpaghara ahụ ma nweta ego site n'aka ndị na-enye onyinye nzuzo iji kwado ezinụlọ ndị dara ogbenye site na njide nke ndị na-akwado ha n'okpuru SOE nke kwụgidere na mba ahụ ruo ọnwa ise

N'ikpeazụ, ọ hapụrụ South Africa na ngwụcha afọ 1960 ma soro Tambo, na Dadoo, ha guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ANC na Dar es Salaam, Tanganyika nke ka nọ n'okpuru British Colonial Administration ruo 9 Disemba, na afọ 1961
Nkwatu nke ọchịchị na Zanzibar na afọ 1963 meghere ụzọ maka nguzobe nke United Republic of Tanzania na afọ 1964
Ewezuga ANC, ọ tụbara onwe ya n'ọtụtụ ọrụ
Frene Ginwala nyere aka nke ukwuu n'ịmepụta usoro nkwukọrịta na Republic of Tanzania na Zanzibar a mụrụ ọhụrụ
Na arịrịọ nke Onye isi ala Julius Nyerere, ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Bekee na-asụ Standard, na Sunday News
N'oge niile ọ chụgara mba ọzọ (ọ laghachiri South Africa na afọ 1991) ọ gafere ụwa na-ekwusa egwu nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ọgụ megide ya
Ginwala nwere utu aha agụmakwụkwọ site na ọtụtụ mahadum dị n'Africa na mba ofesi
Ọ bụ onye ọka iwu na iwu; ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme; onye sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma nwee nzere doctorate na nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum Oxford
Na ntuli aka mba mbụ nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na afọ 1994 na South Africa, a họpụtara Frene Ginwala ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu
Ọ bụ ndị otu ANC họpụtara ya ma ndị omeiwu họpụtara ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ n'ọkwa onye isi oche nke ụlọ
Ọkwá o nwere site na afo 1994 ruo na afọ 2004
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka ọkà okwu, ọ gara n'ihu na-eje ozi n'ọtụtụ òtù mba ụwa gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ UN, dị ka Trustee nke Nelson Mandela Foundation na dị ka Chancellor nke Mahadum KwaZulu Natal
Onye isi ala Thabo Mbeki họpụtara Ginwala na 30 Septemba, na afọ 2007 ka ọ mee nyocha banyere onye isi nchịkwa nke ndị ọkàiwu Vusi Pikoli nwere ike ijide ọrụ
O kpebiri n'ozuzu na-akwado Pikoli, mana ọ katọrọ nkwurịta okwu na-adịghị mma n'etiti ngalaba
Ọ katọro onye isi nchịkwa nke Ngalaba Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Mmepe Iwu, Advocate Menzi Simelane, onye akaebe ya na-emegiderịta onwe ya, na-enweghị ihe ndabere n'eziokwu ma ọ bụ Iwu
O nwekwara okwu ọjọọ maka Jacob Zuma na nhọpụta Simelane ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala nke ndị ọkàiwu ọha na eze
Fresh Air bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu na-ebu ibu nke dị na Ikeja, Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ na-ebu ibu karịsịa n'ime n'ime mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Africa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Murtala Mohammed International Airport, Lagos
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2007, ụgbọelu Fresh Air gụnyere
Fresh Air bụ aha ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ndị njem na ihe nkiri Wes Craven nke afọ 2005 Red Eye nke gosiputara Rachel McAdams

Freydís Eiríksdóttir (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 980) bụ nwanyị Norse nke e kwuru na ọ bụ nwa Erik the Red (dịka ọ dị na patronym ya), onye pụtara ìhè na nyocha Norse nke North Amerika dị ka onye mbụ na-achị Vinland, ebe nwanne ya nwoke, Leif Erikson, bụ onye e nyere otuto na akụkọ mmalite nke mpaghara ahụ na kọntaktị mbụ ndi Europe
Isi mmalite nke oge ochie na nke bụ isi nke kwuru banyere Freydís bụ Vinland sagas abụọ Saga of the Greenlanders na Saga of Erik onye Red
Oku abụọ ahụ na-enye akụkọ dị iche iche, ọ bụ ezie na a na-egosi Freydís na ha abụọ dị ka nwanyị nwere obi ike na ndi siri ike nke ga-emegide nsogbu nke ọha mmadụ ya
The Saga of the Greenlanders bụ nsụgharị na-adịghị mma nke akụkọ ndị mere na Finland
A na-ekwupụta ahụmahụ Freydís na Vinland na Isi nke 8 nke akụkọ a, nke na-akọwa ya dị ka nwanne nwanyị Leif Erikson
Nke a bụ akụkọ a ma ama anyị nwere gbasara Freydís
Fricasé bụ ofe ọdịnala na nri ndị Bolivia nke e ji anụ ezì, agịrịga ezì ma ọ bụ ọkụkọ, hominy, chuño (ngwa poteto etinyere na njuoyi) ma ọ bụ poteto, yabasị, galik, nnu, ose na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
A na-eri ya mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka nri na-egbu egbu, dị ka nke nwere ikike ịkọwapụta maka ibelata ma ọ bụ belata mgbaàmà ndị metụtara agụụ
Fricasé bụ ofe a na-ahụkarị na Bolivia, a na-erekarị ya ma na-eri ya na Oge'ụtụtụ
Ọ bụ ofe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke a na-ejikarị nnukwu anụ emejupụta, a na-ejikwa poteto chuno eme ihe na mpaghara Altiplano nke Bolivia
A na-eji ose aji eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ihe eji eme ya, a na-ejikwakwa iberibe achịcha eme ihe mgbe niile iji mee ka ofe tọrọ arọọ
A fricasse (Arabic), (Hebrew) bụ achịcha e siri esi nke a na-ejikarị tuna, àkwá siri ike, oliv, harissa, lemon echekwara, capers na poteto, akwọrọ akwọ na turmeric dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
A na-azụta ha n'aka ndị na-ere nri ọdịnala nke mba Tunisia
Enwere ike ime ha n'ụlọ ma ọ bụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nri ngwa ngwa
Sandwiches ndị a nyere ndị ezinụlọ ya ọṅụ, ndị agbata obi ya na ndị enyi ha kụrụ ihe dị otú ahụ, nke mere na a mụrụ nnweta ọhụrụ
Ọtụtụ ezinụlọ ndị Juu gbapụrụ mbaTunisia ma ọ bụ Mba Libya gaa Israel ma ọ bụ mba ndị ọzọ ka nwere nri a dị ka usoro nri ezinụlọ, ya mere ọ bụ nri a na-ahụkarị n'okporo ámá na mba Israel
Frida Blumenberg (ụbọchị irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa May, n'afọ 1935) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe na-arụ ọrụ na neon, acrylic, na ọla nchara

A mụrụ ya na Durban, South Africa na nne na nna Sweden, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-akpụ ihe, onye na-ese ihe, na onye na-akpụ ọla edo na London, ebe o nwere ụfọdụ ihe ngosi naanị ya na Institute of Contemporary Art
N'afọ 1960 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise, ọ rụchara ihe osise maka ihe banyere Durban Maritime Terminal nke, n'oge ahụ, bụ ihe osise mosaic kachasị ukwuu na mpaghara ndịda ụwa
N'afọ 1965, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe isii na-anọchite anya Great Britain na Bavarian Government Special Show na Munich, Germany na ihe ngosi akpọrọ 'Jewelry as Sculpture'

E gosipụtala ọrụ ya na ụlọ ngosi ihe ógè ochie na ụlọ ngosi ihe ngosi na England, Canada, Ireland, Germany, Netherlands, South Africa, na America na Institute of Contemporary Art (Boston), National Museum of Women in the Arts (Washington, DC), Denver Art Museum, Dallas Museum of Art, na Houston Museum of Art, tinyere ndị ọzọ
N'ihe ngosi otu, ya na Picasso, Alexander Calder, na Louise Nevelson gosipụtara
A na-egosipụtakwa ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta ụlọ ọrụ gụnyekwara nke Shell, Alcon / Nestlé, Canadian Pacific Railways, na Texas American Banks

A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na mba ụwa na neon na acrylic, ọ jikọtara mmetụta nke oge a maka ihe banyere ndị dị na nka ụlọ ọrụ, dị ka neon, na echiche zuru oke nke imewe na nka

Friday Chinedu Ahunanya (amụrụ ya na 19 Nọvemba 1971 na Port Harcourt, Naịjirịa ) bu onye na-akụ ọkpọ
Ọ bụ onye mgba amaara na-emeri ndị mgba ọzọ atụghị anya na o ga-emeri na kwa maka ọ bị bịa ọ bịara n'ọgụ ESPN
ESPN
Ọ na-alụ ọgụ na Las Vegas, Nevada
A maara ya dịka Fraịde '13th', Ahunanya malitere ọrụ ya na 1998 na nkwa dị mma, o meriri ọgụ iri na isii mbụ ya , gunyere mmeri o meriri Nate Jones onye anaghi emeri emeri (16-0-1)
N'afọ 2001, Serguei Lyakhovich onye anaghi emeri, meriri ya mbụ
Na 2002, onye French Olimpia Josue Blocus meriri ya
Na 2004 o nwere naanị mbibi mbụ ya mgbe Lance Whitaker kụrụ okpo na anyaMmeri Whitaker bụ mmalite ọdịda Ahunanya
Ọ gara n'ihu daa na aka Taurus Sykes na 'New Mexico', bụ onye a na-anaghị asọpụrụ n'agbanyeghị ndekọ 22-1-1 ya na 2005
Mgbe ahụ, ọ dọtara ya na onye na- esote ya Dominick Guinn, wee nwee ike ịsọ mpi megide atụmanya Sultan Ibragimov (onye nrite ọla ọcha nke Olimpik) na Alexander Povetkin nke 6-0 nke onye nrite ọlaedo

Na 2007, ọ laghachiri azụ were melie Shane Cameron onye New Zealand, mmeri mbụ ya site na ikutu ya ugboro abụọ na agba nke iri na abụọ na agba nke ikpeazụ, mgbe akutusịrị ya nke ikpeazụ, onye refirii gbatara kwusị mgba ahụ ma nyekwa ya mmeri TKO
Na 2008 o meriri onye anaghị emeri bụ Alonzo Butler
David Tua meriri Friday na Machị 2010 na New Zealand site na mkpebi
N'aka nke ọzọ, Friday na onye nlekọta ya kwuru na ọ bụ Friday meriri, na ọ karị ị ka mma ma ọ bụrụ na alụ ọgụ ahụ na USA
Mgbe elegbara anya ime nke ọma o doro anya na David Tua meriri ya bụ mgba
Fried Barry bụ ihe nkiri mkpali egwu South Africa nke afọ 2020 nke Ryan Kruger dere ma duzie
e gosikwara ya na South Africa RapidLion Film Festival nke ọ nwetara ihe nrite atọ
Na Machị 2021, ekwuputara na Shudder nwetara ikike nkesa ihe nkiri ahụ iji wepụta ihe nkiri ahụ na North America, United Kingdom na Ireland, yana Australia na New Zealand na Mee 6, 2021
Fried Fish, Chicken Soup and a Premiere Show bụ ihe nkiri akụkọ na afọ 2011, asụsụ abụọ (Bekee na Manipuri) nke Mamta Murthy duziri ma Madhusree Dutta mepụtara
Ọ bụ Majlis na-ewepụta ya
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa dị ka South Asian International Film Festival, New York; CPH DOX Copenhagen na Asiatica Film Mediale, Rome
E debere ya na Manipur, mpaghara esemokwu dị n'ókè India na Burma dịpụrụ adịpụ, ihe nkiri ahụ na-agafe otu narị afọ iji see ihe nkiri na ụmụ amaala ya

Nkwupụta maka National Award na-agụ, 'N'ihi ịkpọrọ anyị na njem nke na-akọwa ọgụ iji mepụta ihe nkiri na esemokwu Manipur dọwara adọka na n'ime usoro na-ese ihe osise doro anya, nke na-ejide ihe nkiri na steeti ahụ dị ka usoro nke ọdịbendị a ma ama'
O nwetakwara ihe nrite International Jury Award na Mumbai International Film Festival na afọ 2012
Azụ e siri esi bụ azụ̀ ọ bụla ma ọ bụ azụ shellfish nke a kwadebere site na isi ya
Ọtụtụ mgbe, a na-ekpuchi azụ ahụ na ntụ ọka, àkwá na achịcha, ntụ ọka, ma ọ bụ ahịhịa na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ tupu a sie ya ma nye ya, mgbe mgbe na iberibe lemon
A na-essi azụ̀ n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ụwa, azụ̀ a na-esi bụ nri dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ nri
Maka ọtụtụ ọdịbendị, azụ e siri esi sitere na pescado frito, na azụ ọdịnala na nri chips nke England nke ọ nwere ike ịbụ ihe kpaliri
Nke ikpeazụ a ka bụ nri a na-eri na UK na mpaghara ya ndị mbụ na nke ugbu a
Azụ azụ̀ e siri esi nke e ji cod mee (na azụ̀ ndị ọzọ na-acha ọcha, dị ka haddock, halibut ma ọ bụ whiting) bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na ngalaba nri ndị a na-etinye na friji nke ụlọ ahịa nri US
Long John Silver's, Skipper's, Captain D's, na Arthur Treacher's bụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ a ma ama na North America nke na-enye azụ̀ e siri esi dị ka isi nri ha
Catfish bụkwa ụdị azụ a na-azụ n'ugbo nke a na-ejikarị esi nri n'ụwa niile
Nchịkọta azụ e siri esi nke France bụ Sole meunière
Azụ azụ̀ fries bụ ihe a ma ama na mpaghara ndịda nke United States
Nzukọ mmekọrịta ndị a nwere ike isi na chọọchị, nzukọ obodo ma ọ bụ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-anakọta ego maka klọb, ngalaba ọkụ ọkụ afọ ofufo, ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ nzukọ ọzọ
Na US, ọkachasị Upper Midwest, Northeast, na steeti Mid-Atlantic, fries azụ obodo na-ewu ewu, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-eme ya n'okpuru ụlọ ụka ma ọ bụ ọtụtụ n'ime ememe Lent
Azụ a na-ere n'ozuzu ya bụ ihe a na-amaghị ama
'Nri ehihie n'ụsọ oké osimiri' bụ omenala n'ebe ugwu US na Canada, ebe ndị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi n'èzí na-esi nri ha na-egbute n'ikpere oké osimiri, ma ọ bụ ọdọ mmiri ebe e jidere azụ ahụ

Plantain fried bụ nri a na-esi n'ebe ọ bụla plantain na-eto, site na West Africa ruo East Africa yana Central America, mpaghara okpomọkụ nke ugwu South America na mba Caribbean dị ka Haiti ruo Cuba na ọtụtụ akụkụ nke Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia, ebe nri ndị e siri esi na-ewu ewu
N'Indonesia a na-akpọ ya gorengan
A na-akpọ ya alloco na Côte d'Ivoire na dodo na Western Nigeria, nke a makwaara dị ka plantain fried n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Nigeria
Kelewele bụ plantain siri esi ma ọ bụ enwere ike isi ya dị ka nri dị n'akụkụ maka Red Red (African stewed black-eyed peas) na stew azụ̀ na Ghana
A na-eri plantain e siri esi na mba ụfọdụ dị na South America ma ọ bụ Caribbean ebe mmetụta Africa dị
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na Dominican Republic, Cuba na Puerto Rico, ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị ịkpụ osisi plantain n'ime ibe, sie ha ruo mgbe ha na-acha odo odo, kụwaa ha n'etiti efere abụọ ma sie ha ọzọ

Nke a bụkwa nri a na-ahụkarị na Haiti, nke a na-akpọ bannann peze, na Central America dum, nke a-akpọ patacones na Costa Rica, Panama, Colombia na Ecuador, yana tostones na Guatemala, Nicaragua, na Puerto Rico
Na Honduras na Venezuela a na-akpọ ha tajadas
Enwere ike inye plantain e siri esi dị ka ihe oriri, ihe mbido ma ọ bụ dị ka nri dị n'akụkụ na isi nri, dị ka Jollof osikapa, anụ a na-esi ísì ụtọ, tomato stew ma ọ bụ agwa
A na-eme ya n'ụzọ dị iche iche nnu ma ọ bụ nnu, belata ya na 'ntị', 'mkpịsị aka', enwere ike ịkpụ ya, ma ọ bụ sie ya
Plantain na-acha Acha odo odo bụ unere na-atọ ụtọ sitere na Central America na Caribbean nke a na-esi na mmanụ ọkụ
A na-eri ha mgbe ụfọdụ na mmiri ara ehi, ketchup, ma ọ bụ ngwakọta mayonnaise-ketchup
Alloco, dị ka a na-akpọ ya na Côte d'Ivoire na Burkina Faso, a na- bingaka ya dodo na Naijiria, missolè na Cameroon na makemba na Democratic Republic of Congo
Aha alloco (nke a na-ahụ mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka aloko) sitere na Baoulé, otu agbụrụ dị na Eastern Ivory Coast
Ọ sitere n'okwu maka loko nke pụtara ma ọ bụrụ na plantain tozuru oke
Ọ bụ nri na-ewu ewu n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka nke e ji plantain e siri esi mee
A na-ejikarị ose chili na yabasị enye ya
Na Na Naijiria, ọ na-abụkarị akụkụ ma ọ bụ enwere ike iri ya n'onwe ya
Gizdodo bụ nri dị n'akụkụ na Naịjirịa nke nwere plantain e siri esi na gizzard e siri esi
A na-ewere Alloco dị ka nri ngwa ngwa ma na-ere ya n'okporo ámá nke Côte d'Ivoire
A na-akpọ mpaghara nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-ere anụ e siri esi na nri alloco na mpaghara Cocody Allocodrome, site na nri a
Tupu ịkwadebe alloco ọ dị mkpa inwe uto plantain ziri ezi maka ntụziaka
Alloco kpọmkwem chọrọ plantain nke na-eto eto, nke nwere ike ịmata site na agba nke akpụkpọ plantain
Maka alloco, plantain gị ga-aka mma ịbụ obere odo na ntụpọ ojii
A na-akwadebe Alloco n'ụzọ ọdịnala ma ọ bụ na-esi ya n'ime ahụekere ma ọ bụ mmanụ nkwụ
Mmanụ a na-eji eme ihe dabere na mpaghara dị n'ime Ivory Coast
Iji mee alloco, ị na-amalite site na ịkpụ plantain, nke mbụ n'ogologo, mgbe ahụ ọzọ iji nweta obere iberibe
Mgbe ahụ, mee ka mmanụ ahụ dị ọkụ n'ime efere ofe, ma tinye plantain n'ọkụ ozugbo, ma sie ya ruo mgbe ha na-acha odo odo / na-acha ọbara ọbara
Ozugbo ha ruru agba ha chọrọ, a na-ewepụ plantain ma tinye ya na akwa ákwà iji mee ka mmanụ ahụ dị n'ime mmiri
N'ime obere mmanụ fọdụrụnụ, tinye yabasị na ose, ma hapụ ha ka ha sie maka nkeji ole na ole
Ozugbo ọ dị njikere, tinye plantain azụ, na mmiri, ma kpuchie, na-enye ohere ka plantain na-esi
[citation needed]
N'ozuzu, a na-enye alloco dị ka akụkụ maka nri buru ibu ma ọ bụ nri dị iche
Ọtụtụ mgbe ị ga-ahụ alloco, na-enye ya azụ ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ ọbụna àkwá e siri esi
A na-ejikarị ofe na-esi ísì ụtọ na-enye alloco na nke na-agbakwunye akụkụ ọzọ na nri ahụ
Kelewele bụ nri Ghana a ma ama nke e ji osisi plantain e siri esi mee na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
N'asụsụ Bekee, a na-akpọ ya mgbe ụfọdụ hot plantain crisps
Na Accra, ndị na-ere ahịa n'okporo ámá na-erekarị kelewele n'abalị na mgbe ụfọdụ n'ehihie site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'akụkụ obodo
Kelewele bụkwa nhọrọ a ma ama maka nri abalị
N'ịbụ onye sitere na Ghana, ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ntụziaka emeela ka kelewele bụrụ ihe a ma ama na America (recipezaar, na afọ 2009)
A na-ewepụ plantain ma nwee ike ịkpụcha ya n'ime iberibe ma ọ bụ cubes
Ginger, cayenne pepper, na nnu bụ ihe ndị a na-ejikarị eme kelewele
Otú ọ dị, a pụkwara iji yabasị, anise, cloves, nutmeg, cinnamon, na chili powder mee ihe dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
Nkwadebe azụmahịa dị nke nwere ike ime ka nkwadebe dị mfe ma nye ụtọ dị mma
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, mmanụ kwesịrị ịdị ọkụ na plantain ekwesịghị ịdị nro ma ọ bụ ọ ga-amịkọrọ mmanụ dị ukwuu
A ga-esi plantain ahụ n'ọkụ ruo mgbe shuga dị na ya ga-abụ caramelizes, ma mepụta ọnụ na-acha nchara nchara na plantain
Enwere ike iji ya na nri, ahụekere, ma ọ bụ naanị ya dị ka nri na-atọ ụtọ
A na-esi osisi ndị a n'ọkụ
Efere e ji osisi plantain e siri esi

Frieda Lauth (afọ 1879 London rụọ úbọchị ànó n'ọnwa Mee 1949 Durban) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe ọkụkụ nà South Africa nkè yá nà nné na nnà yá kwagara Natal na 1882
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé enyemaka nà Natal Herbarium ma bụrụ ónyé ama ámá màkà ihe osise ya nkè Medley Wood's Natal Plants
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 1903 mgbè ọ lụrụ Thomas Floyd, ma mesịa kụzie na botany na Durban Technical College

Friedrich Siegmund-Schultze (N'ụbọchị 14 June 1885, na Görlitz ̆ 11 July 1969, na Soest) bụ onye Germany na-arụ ọrụ na nkà mmụta okpukpe, nkuzi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ụkpụrụ omume mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze, yana onye ọsụ ụzọ nke òtù udo
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ọtụtụ gymnasia, Siegmund-Schultze gụrụ nkà ihe ọmụma na nkà mmụta okpukpe na Breslau na Magdeburg

N'afọ 1908 ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nke Kọmitii Chọọchị maka mmekọrịta enyi na enyi n'etiti Great Britain na Germany (Kirchlichen Komitees zur Pflege freundschaftlicher Beziehungen zwischen Großbritán und Deutschland) ma mesịa bụrụ odeakwụkwọ na World Christian Student League maka ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ozi mba ọzọ (Christlichen Studentenweltbundes für Sozialarbeit und Ausmissionländer)
N'afọ 1911, ya na nwunye ya guzobere 'Soziale Arbeitergemeinschaft Berlin-Ost' (SAG) - e mechiri ọfịs ya mgbe ndị Nazi weghaara ọchịchị

Na World Churches Conference na Konstanz site n'ụbọchị 1 ruo ụbọchị 3 August 1914, obere oge tupu agha amalite, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ na onye guzobere 'Weltbundes für Freundschaftsarbeit der Kirchen' ma soro onye nnọchi anya ya bụ English Quaker Henry Hodgkin (na-ezukọ na ikpo okwu nke ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè na Cologne, ha kwere ibe ha nkwa na, 'Anyị bụ otu n'ime Kraịst ma ọ gaghị enwe ike ịnọ n'agha') nke dugara n'ịmepụta Fellowship of Reconciliation and the International Fellowsity
Frikkadel bụ nri ọdịnala Afrikaner nke na-ejikarị eme achịcha, ma mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-esi ya n'ọkụ, anụ e ji yabasị, achịcha, àkwá, vinegar na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
Enwere ike inye anụ anụ ndị a na-ekpo ọkụ ma ọ bụ na-ajụ oyi
Ọtụtụ ntụziaka emeela ka ihe dị egwu nke oge a dị ka ịgbanwe ọkụkọ na nwa atụrụ na anụ ehi ọdịnala
Frikkadel na-ewu ewu na nri Sri Lanka site n'aka ndị Burgher
Dị ka omenala si dị, a na-eri frikkadels naanị ya ma ọ bụ na ofe a na-enye ya na poteto, osikapa na pasta
Danish Frikadeller bụ ụdị anụ a na-esi esi, nke e ji anụ ezì mee
Frimpong bụzi aha nna Ashanti
Ndị ama nwere aha nna Ashanti gụnyere
Fryat Yemane (Tigrigna ፍርያት የማነ; amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1991) bụ onye Etiopia na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ahazi ihe ngosi telivishọn na onye na-ese onyinyo
A họpụtara Fryat dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma n'afọ na Leza Art Award maka arụmọrụ ya na Wefe Komech, ihe nkiri 2016

A họpụtara Fryat dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma n'afọ na Ethio Zodiac Award maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Maya (2017) ma nye ya onyinye maka onye na-ese ihe nkiri kachasị elu na Hollywood Africa Prestigious Award (2017) maka arụmọrụ ya n'ihe nkiri akpọrọ Begize Fryat mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Gudegna Nech (2014)
A mụrụ ya na Etiopia, Fryat bụ nwa nwanyị nke Yemane Gebremeskel
Nne ya bụ Sesen
Nne na nna ya bi na Gondar, ebe ha bi n'ihi ọrụ
A mụrụ Fryat, ọ ma nọrọkwa na Gondar ruo mgbe ha laghachiri n'obodo ha bụ Mekelle
Fryat nwere nzere Bachelor of Art na Business Management na Mahadum Hawassa
Ugbu a Fryat bi na Addis Ababa, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ ma na-elekọta ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nwere nri mba ọzọ na nke obodo
Ọrụ Fryat na Gudegna Nech dọtara uche mbụ ya
Site na 11 Septemba 2017, Fryat pụtara na ihe ngosi TV na EBS TV ebe ya na Asfaw Meshesha na-akwado
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ malitere azụmahịa nke ya na ngalaba ejiji ọdịnala a na-akpọ 'DirMug by Fryat'

Fufore bụ obodo na ọchịchị ime obodo nke Adamawa Steeti, Naijiria
Asụsụ ndị a na-asụ na Fufore LGA bụ,
N'afọ 2014, ndị mmadụ na-agbanarị ime ihe ike na Gwoza wuru obodo ọhụrụ na Fufore, na hamlet nke Daware (ma ọ bụ Damare), n'okporo ụzọ Yola-Mubi

'Ọnọdụ e nyere maka ọnụnọ ha na Daware bụ na a gaghị arụ ụlọ ntu nwa oge n'ihi na e kenyere ndị ọhụrụ bi ma ugbo ma ụlọ ka ha malite ndụ nkịtị' E hibere ụlọ akwụkwọ na Damare kampu maka ụmụaka, ndị nkuzi wepụtara onwe ha site na mahadum now Modibbo Adama University of Technology, Yola, na American University of Nigeria, Yola
