Fugueuse (Runaway na Bekee) bụ usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn French Canada nke malitere na Jenụwarị 8, 2018, na TVA Usoro ihe nkiri a gosịrị Ludivine Reding dị ka Fanny Couture, nwa agbọghọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma sitere na ezinụlọ dịtụ ala, onye e ji ụzọ aghụghọ kwanye n'ụwa ndi akwụna site na netwọk nke ndị na-azụ ahịa mmadụAtụmatụ ahụ na-aga n'ihu afọ anọ ka e mesịrị na Oge nke 2, nke malitere na Jenụwarị 6, 2020

Ful medames (Arabic فول مدمس, fūl mudammas IPA ; okwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere ful mudammas na foule mudammes), ma ọ bụ naanị fūl, bụ stew nke fava e siri esi nke e ji mmanụ oliv, cumin, na nhọrọ na parsley a pịrị apị, galik, yabasị, mmiri lemon, ose, na akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ, ahịhịa, na ihe ndị na-esi ísì ụtọ
A na-eme medames zuru ezu n'ụzọ ọdịnala ma na-enye ya site na nnukwu ite ígwè
Ọ bụ nri a ma ama n'Ijipt ma a na-ewere ya dị ka nri mba, ọkachasị n'obodo ndị dị n'ebe ugwu nke Cairo na Gizah
[citation needed] Ful medames bụkwa akụkụ a na-ahụkarị na nri nke ọtụtụ nri Arab, Middle East, na North Africa
Ụfọdụ ndị edemede atụwo aro na medames zuru ezu malitere laa azụ na Ijipt oge ochie
Ihe akaebe ụfọdụ nke ojiji nke ful bụ ihe zoro ezo nke 2,600 fava kpọrọ nkụ e gwupụtara na ebe Neolithic na mpụga Nazaret
A kpọtụrụ usoro isi nri a aha na Jerusalem Talmud, na-egosi na a na-eji usoro ahụ eme ihe na Horn of African na Middle East mba ndị dị na narị afọ nke anọ
Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ọtụtụ ụzọ isi chọọ fūl mma, usoro nri bụ isi ka bụ otu

Ozugbo esichara fūl, a na-etinye ya nnu ma rie ya n'ụzọ dị mfe ma ọ bụ na-esonyere mmanụ akwụkwọ nri, mmanụ ọka, bọta, mmiri ara ehi, bechamel sauce, anụ ehi a gwọrọ agwọ (basturma), àkwá e siri esi ma ọ bụ esi esi, tomato sauce, galik sauce, tahini, mmiri lemon ọhụrụ, ose, ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ

N'oge ụwa na-emepechabeghị anya, ndị bi gburugburu Princess Baths, ebe ịsa ahụ ọha na eze n'ime obere ogige dị nso na isi iyi ọha na eze nke Muhammad São Ali Pasha, otu ogige dị n'ebe ugwu nke minaret abụọ mara mma nke ụlọ alakụba Sultan al-Muyaday n'elu ọnụ ụzọ Bab Zuweila nke narị afọ nke 11
N'ehihie, ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ịsa ahụ na-eme ka ọkụ na-ekpo ọkụ na qidras, nke bụ nnukwu ite mmiri ịsa ahụ
Osisi dị ụkọ, n'ihi ya, a na-eji ihe mkpofu eme ihe dị ka mmanụ ma mesịa, a na'ebe a na-ekpofu ahịhịa gburugburu ebe ịsa ahụ
Mgbe ebe ịsa ahụ mechiri, ọkụ ọkụ ahụ na-acha ọbara ọbara nọgidere na-ere ọkụ

Iji nweta uru nke ọkụ ndị a dị oké ọnụ ahịa, a na-ejupụta nnukwu qidras na fava beans, a na'echekwa cauldrons ndị a na-esi nri abalị niile, na n'ikpeazụ kwa ụbọchị niile, iji nye ndị bi na Cairo nri ụtụtụ
Ụlọ ọrụ na-esi nri na Cairo ga-eziga ndị na-ejere ha ozi na Princess Baths iji zụta fūl ha buru ibu
A na-akwadebe Fūl site na obere, ahịhịa dị gburugburu nke a maara n'Ijipt dị ka fūl ḥammām ('ahịhịa ịsa')
A na-esi ọka ahụ ruo mgbe ọ dị nro
Ụdị agwa ndị ọzọ ndị na-esi nri Ijipt na-eji bụ fūl rūmī ('Roman', ya bụ
'European broad beans'), nnukwu beans fava yiri akụrụ, na fūl baladī ('beans mba', nke dị n'etiti)
Fūl nābit (ma ọ bụ nābid) bụ mkpụrụ ọka fava, fūl akhḍar ('fūl na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ') bụ ọka fava ọhụrụ, na fūl madshūsh ('fūle a kụrisịrị akụrisị') bụ ọka Fava a kụziri akụrisị

A na-ebute he nrite zuru ezu site na Ijipt gaa n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke ụwa ndị Arab, yana akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Africa na Eshia, mana ọkachasị na Iraq, Lebanon, Israel, Syria, Jordan, Palestine, Saudi Arabia, Yemen, Somalia, Ethiopia, Eritrea, Sudan, Morocco na Libya
Ful bụ nri ụtụtụ a ma ama na Siria, kachasị na Aleppo

A na-ahapụ ọka fava na-esi n'ime nnukwu ite ọla kọpa n'abalị niile, ka a na-enye ya site n'ụtụtụ echi ya gaa n'ihu; ọka na-egwu mmiri na tahini na mmanụ oliv, nke ejiri ihe na-egosi ose na-acha ọbara ọbara (nke e ji ose Aleppo mee) mee n'elu
Na Jọdan, a na-eme ful dịka hummus n'ụdị dip, nke a na-ejikarị tahini, galik, tomato, mmiri lemon, cumin, mmanụ oliv, ose na nnu eme
A na-eri medames zuru ezu dị ka akụkụ nke nri Lent site n'aka ndị Kraịst nọ na mba Arab
Na mbà Somalia, fuul bụ ihe dị mkpa na nri ụtụtụ
A na-ejikarị àkwá, achịcha khubz / ceesh ma ọ bụ achịcha ọdịnala Somalia a na-akpọ laxoox /canjeero

Ọ dị nnọọ ka ụdị nri ndị Ijipt, Sudanese, na Saudi, mana ọ na-adịkarị ụtọ n'ihi na ndị Somalia na-eji ngwakọta nke xawaash (cumin, coriander, sage, peppercorn, fenugreek, turmeric, ginger, cardamom, cloves, nutmeg, na saffron)
Na mba Morocco, a maara ful dị ka bissara ma nwee fava beans na ogwe ahịhịa ahịhịhịa (nke a maara n'ógbè ahụ dị ka jabbana) a na-esi ya na galik ma na-enye ya cumin na ihe na-atọ ụtọ
Ọ na-ewu ewu karịsịa n'ebe ugwu nke mba ahụ ma na-eri ya n'oge ọnwa oyi oyi
Na mba Etiopia (na Eritrea), ful bụ otu n'ime nri ole na ole a na-adịghị eri ya na achịcha dị ka pancake a na-akpọ injera mana a na-eri ya na achịchi ọka wit
Ebe ndị a na-enye nri zuru ezu na achịcha ntụ ọka na-eso ya na-enyekarị kichin ọha maka ndị ahịa na-achọ ime ụdị achịcha dị otú ahụ ebe ọ bụ na achịcha adịghị na nri ndị Etiopia ma ọ bụ Eritrea
A na-etinye ya n'elu, ma ọ bụ gwakọta ya na, ngwakọta mmanụ na berbere
Na obodo Malta, a na-ejikọkarị ful bit-tewm (beans na galik) na ibu ọnụ n'oge Lent na Good Friday
A na-etinye ya na mmiri n'otu abalị, sie ya na mmanụ na galik na mint ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ nke a mịrị amị, wee jiri mmanụ oliv ma ọ bụ vinegar tee ya tupu a na-enye ya
Nri ahụ agafeela Malaysia, ọkachasị steeti Johore, na Singapore ebe a na-etinye ya n'ime ọdọ mmiri nri dị n'ógbè ahụ, nke na-etinye ghee n'ọnọdụ mmanụ na anụ a pịrị apị
A na etinye ọka akụrụ na ọka e siri esi iji mee ka nri ahụ nwetu ahụ
Ful medames salad (Arabic ) bụ nri ụtụtụ ndị Arab kacha amasị ya, mana a na-eri ya dị ka salad dị nro
Ọ na-agụnyekarị fava beans, tomato apịrị apị, alibasa, parsley, mmiri lemon, mmanụ oliv, ose na nnu
Okpu Fulani bụ okpu eriri conical nwere ngwa akpụkpọ anụ nke sitere n'aka ndị Fulani nọ na West Africa
Ọ na-abụkarị ndị Wodaabe, otu ndị na-azụ ehi na-akwagharị akwagharị nke Fulani
A na-eyikarị okpu a n'elu okpu
N'ozuzu, okpu Fulani bụ okpu nkata nke e ji eriri osisi mee
A na-ekpuchi ya na akpụkpọ anụ ma n'elu ma mgbe ụfọdụ na ihe ịchọ mma akpụkpọ anụ n'etiti
N'elu okpu ahụ, e nwere bọtịnụ nke e ji akpụkpọ anụ kpuchie
N'ala nke okpu ahụ, a na-enwekarị chinstrap nwere tassel na njedebe
E gosipụtara okpu ndị ahụ na ndị na-agba egwu na vidiyo egwu 2018 All the Stars site n'aka onye na-ese ihe Kendrick Lamar

Fuliiru (Furiiru, Kifuliiru, Fulero) bụ asụsụ Great Lakes Bantu nkè ndị Fuliiru na-asụ (Bafuliiru), nkè á makwaara dị kà Fuliru mà ọ bụ Fulero, ndị bi n'ebe ùgwù ná ọdịda anyanwụ nkè ọbọdọ Uvira ná Uvira Territory, South Kivu province ná mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nkè Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri ányá ná Kinyindu
Tebụl dị n'okpuru na-enye usoro ụdaume nke Fuliiru
Ọtụtụ ụda na-agbanwe mgbè imi bu ụzọ ụda na-enweghị ólú na-aghọ ụda, ná /β/ na /h/ na-aghọta dị ka [b]
Foneme /n/ na-ejikota ná ọnọdụ nkè ụdaume ndị na-eso yá enwere ike ịghọta yá dị kà [m], [ɱ], [n], [ɲ], ma ọ bụ [ŋ]
Á na-aghọta ụdaume /l/ dị ka [d] mgbe /n/ gasịrị, dị kà [ɾ] mgbe ụdaume ihu /e/ na /i/ gasịrị, yana dị ka [l] n'ebe ọzọ
A na-aghọta ụdaume /ɾ/ dịka [d] mgbe /n/ gasịrị, mana dịka [ɾ] n'ebe ọzọ
Tebụl dị n'okpuru na-enye ụdaume nkè Fuliiru
Mkpụrụedemede ịse niile na-apụta n'ụdị ogologo ná nkè dị mkpirikpi, ọdịiche nkè dị ichè ná ụdaume
Ogologo yá anaghị emetụta ogo nkè ụdaume
Dị ka ọtụtụ asụsụ Bantu, Fuliiru bụ ụda, yana ọdịiche abụọ n'etiti ụda dị élú ná nkè dị ala
Morphemes nwere ike ịdị elu (H), àlà (L), ma ọ bụ enweghị ụda
Phonetically, élú, àlà, etiti, ná ụda na-ada ada nwere ike ímé; ụda dị n'etiti bụ mmezu nkè usoro LH dị n'okpuru, ná ụda ọdịda bụ mmezu màkà usoro HL dị n'ime mà ọ bụ ụda H ikpeazụ
Full Force bụ otu egwu America nkè ndị na-agụ egwú hip hop na R&B na ndị na-emepụta ihe si Brooklyn, New York

Ìgwè ahụ mepụtara ma dee égwu màkà ọtụtụ ndị na-ese egwu gụnyere UTFO, Doctor Ice, Samantha Fox, Patti LaBelle, The Force MDs, Britney Spears, James Brown, Lisa Lisa na Cult Jam, Backstreet Boys, 'N Sync, Cheryl Pepsii Riley, Selena na Lil' Kim
Ihe kachasị mmá nkè Full Force bụ UTFO's 'Roxanne Roxanne' (1984), ndekọ nke dugara na ọtụtụ ndekọ azịza, ọkachasị otu nke Roxanne Shanté
N'ime afọ 80s, otu ahụ mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe dị mkpa màkà Lisa Lisa na Cult Jam, gụnyere 'I Wonder If I Take You Home', 'All Cried Out' na 'Head to Toe'
Ha mekwara ihe màkà Samantha Fox, gụnyere 'Naughty Girls (Need Love Too) ' na 'I Wanna Have Some Fun' na onye na-agụ egwu R&B Cheryl Pepsii Riley gụnyere US R&B nọmba otu 'Thanks for My Child'
Otu egwu ha nke 1988 'I'm Real' màkà James Brown nyere ónyé na-agụ egwú a ma ama ihe kachasị egwu ya ruo afọ iri na anọ, na-arị elu na US R&B nke abụọ

Tụkwasị na nkè a, otu ahụ dere ma mepụta ọtụtụ n'ime egwu sitere na abọm studio nke ise nke La Toya Jackson La Toya, gụnyere 'You're Gonna Get Rocked!' na 'You Blew,' yana egwu Patti LaBelle 'I Got It Like That', nke ha nyekwara olu a ma ama site na abọmpi ya nke 1989 Be Yourself

Full Force nyekwara nkwado olu na egwu Bob Dylan abụọ edere n'oge nnọkọ màkà Infidels 'Death Is Not the End' (nke a tọhapụrụ na Down in the Groove (1988) na 'Tell Me' (nke e wepụtara na The Bootleg Series Volumes 1-3 (Rare & Unreleased) 1961-1991)
Full Force's biggest hit from the 1990s bụ Backstreet Boys' 1998 US top 5/UK number 2 hit single 'All I Have to Give'
Full Force sokwa ónyé bụbu nwunye Prince bụ Mayté rụkọọ ọrụ na album ya nke afọ 1995 bụ Child of the Sun, agbanyeghị na a ka na-ebipụtaghị egwu ahụ
Fulu Mugovhani (amụrụ 7 Septemba 1990 na Thohoyandou) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke South Africa

N'afọ 2015, o gosipụtara na Ayanda dị ka njirimara aha, ọrụ nke nwetara ọtụtụ nkwanye ùgwù na nhọpụta gụnyere Africa Movie Academy Awards, South African Film and Television Awards na Africa International Film Festival Awards
A mụrụ Mugovhani na Thohoyandou, obodo dị na mpaghara Limpopo nke South Africa
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri egwu na Tshwane University of Technology, ebe nna ya kuziri, na-agụcha akara mmụta ya na 2011
Ọ lụrụ di ịhụnanya ya bụ, Timi Modibedi, onye na-arụ ọrụ dị ka DJ na onye na- edekọ ihe, na June 2018
Na 2012, Mugovhani sonyeere na mmepụta mba ụwa nke egwu bụ The Lion King, nke Hong Kong Disneyland mepụtara, na-arụ ọrụ nke Nala
Maka mmepụta na ihe ngosi a ọ kwagara Hong Kong maka otu afọ na ọkara
Na 2013, ọ rutere ọrụ mbụ ya na orụ telivishọn, na-eme ihe na obere usoro Remix, yana ime ihe na soap opera bụ Scandal!
Na 2015, gosipụtara dị ka onye ndu ọrụ nke ihe nkiri Ayanda, nke Sara Blecher duziri

Ọrụ a nwetara ọtụtụ nkwanye ùgwù, gụnyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na onyinye onye ndu na 12th Africa Movie Academy Awards, onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri na 10th South African Film and Television Awards, na ihe nrite onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2015 Africa International Film Festival
Na 2016 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards, a họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri, ma o meriri
Na 2017, Mugovhani nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro na ihe omume soap opera bụ Isidingo na SABC 3
Ọzọkwa, n'otu afọ ahụ, ọ gbara na soap opera Ring of Lies na ọrụ dị ka Rendani, onye agha Musangwe nke na-agbaso nchọ ya ịghọ onye mmeri ọkpọ, n'agbanyeghị ọchịchọ nna ya na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe
Na 2020, ka ọ kwụsịtụrụ otu afọ, ọ gbara n'usoro ihe nkiri Still Breathing, ebe ọ gosipụtara dị ka nne na nwunye na nke mbụ, na na ihe nkiri nrọ ọchị nke South Africa bụ Seriously Single
Mugovhani ekwuola na N'ajụjụ ọnụ na e nwere ihe dị iche na-eme na ogbo ya na ihuenyo, mkpa ikwupụta olu ya dị iche iche
Nke a gbara ya aka mgbe ọ gbanwere site na ụlọ ihe nkiri gaa na telivishọn na ihe nkiri, tinyekwara nke mere ka o siere ya ike ịme ihe na ogbo mgbe ọ mechara ihe nkiri
Fumani N Shilubana (a mụrụ na 22 Machị 1980), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama Zama Zama, My Father's War na Kalushi The Story of Solomon Mahlangu
Ọ bụ onye guzobere FatherFigureZA, ntọala nke na-achọ iweghachi mmadụ n'ime ezinụlọ na Onye isi oche nke Midrand Heat Basketball Club
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 22 ọnwa Machị afọ 1980 na obere obodo Shiluvana, Tzaneen, Limpopo, South Africa
Nna ya Clifford Shilubana bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Mlungisi Primary School na nne ya Nsatimuni Mundhlovu onye Mozambican / South Africa bụ nọọsụ na Shiluvana Hospital
O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ Labani Mgimeti na Kumani Shilubana na nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya Tebogo Maake
Na 31 Ọktọba 2016 na Joppie Village ọ kwụrụ nwunye ya ugbu a ụgwọ lovola n'afọ 2017 Disemba 22 ya na Nomathemba Olivia Ngobeni nwere emume nzuzo na African Pride Mount Grace na Magaliesburg
Ọ bụ nna nke otu nwa nwoke, Vulani na otu nwa nwanyị Nganakati-Nsuku

Shilubana debanyere aha n'afọ 1998 na Mathews Phosa College na Mpumalanga, ọ debanyere akwụkwọ na Mahadum Venda n'afọ 1999 iji mụọ Bachelor of Science (BSc) na Agriculture nke ọ na-emechabeghị n'afọ 2000 ọ debanyesịrị aha maka Injinia Ụlọ Ọrụ na Mahaduma Nkà na Ụzụ Tshwane nke ọ hapụrụ mgbe ọ chọrọ ịchụso ime ihe ngosi na Ịtali, ọ gakwaghị mgbe ọ debanyerịrị aha maka Speech and Drama Program na South African State Theatre n'okpuru nduzi nke onye edemede na Onye nduzi nke Play Paul Mpumelelo Grootboom

Ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ mụtara banyere egwuregwu ahụ mgbe nne ya zụtara ya akwụkwọ iwu bọọlụ, mgbe ọ dị iri na itoolu, ọ gara asọmpi bọọlụ na Mahadum Limpopo ma họrọ ya ka ọ nọchite anya Limpopo Province maka ndị okenye otu ụmụ nwoke maka egwuregwu SASSU na asọmpi kwa afọ na Cape Town
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telenovela Giyani Land of Blood
N'usoro ihe omume ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Vukosi Moyo'
Mgbe emesịrị usoro ahụ, ọ pụtara na usoro Mafanato nke ọ mepụtara ma duzie
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na usoro telivishọn a ma ama Soul City, Generations na Isidingo
Ọ na-ekwukarị okwu na Xitsonga na telivishọn, nke bụ asụsụ nne ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ a ma ama 'Detective Dabula' na SABC3 soapie Isidingo
Shilubana mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye nduzi na Khomelela, ihe nkiri ọ mepụtara ma soro dee ya mepụta
Ọrụ a bụ akụkụ nke ọrụ ya iji nweta ihe nkiri Xitsonga na isi iyi
Ọ nwetara R40 000 maka ihe nkiri ahụ wee gbaa 95% nke ihe nkiri ahụ na Hlovani River Lodge na ndị ọzọ na Nkowankowa Township
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na Nkowankowa Community Hall
Shoka Mabasa, Fumani N
Shilubana, ya na Teleti Khosa nwere Xiculu Multimedia ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi 100% nke ndị isi ojii nke e guzobere na Disemba afọ 2019

Ọrụ bụ isi nke Xiculu bụ mmepụta na nkesa nke ọdịnaya Xitsonga ma mepụta usoro Mafanato na Showmax, BeingTsongaInSA doccie usoro podcast banyere ahụmịhe Vatsonga na Republic of South Africa, usoro Minkoka Mimbirhi, Otu ụbọchị na ihe ngosi okwu Tsonga Legend, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Nyambondzwani, usoro Sivara na COVID-19 Xitsonga dashboard na mmekorita ya na Xitsongaorg niile n'afọ 2020
A họpụtara Shilubana n'afọ 2005 maka Naledi Theatre Awards maka Ọrụ Nkwado Kasị Mma na Relativity 'Township Stories'
Emume a jupụtara na kpakpando na-egbuke egbuke mere na Mahadum nke Johannesburg Arts Centre na Sọnde 19 Febụwarị 2006
A họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite mbụ ya maka ihe nkiri maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka onye ọkachamara ịhụnanya na FAME Awards 2016
Funge ma ọ bụ fúngi (Angola) ma ọ bụ mfundi (Congo - DCR na Congo Republic) bụ nri ọdịnala nke Afrịka nke e ji ntụ ọka akpu, mee ka ọ banye na mmiri na-esi ísì
A pụkwara iji sorghum, ọka, ma ọ bụ ọka mee ya
Enwere ike iji akwụkwọ nri, azụ̀, ma ọ bụ anụ, yana akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ, anụ, na efere azụ̀
Funge bụ nri bụ isi na nri ndị Afrịka
Enwere ike iji anụmanụ mee ụdị ụfọdụ bara ọgaranya ma na-atọ ụtọ, dị ka anụ azụ, kama iji mmiri
A makwaara ya dị ka bidia (nke pụtara 'nri')
A na-eri Funge na mkpịsị aka, a pụkwara itinye obere bọọlụ ya n'ime ofe, efere ma ọ bụ ofe
Funge bụ ihe oriri ọdịnala na nri Angola
Na Brazil, a maara nri yiri nke a dị ka pirão
Na Lesser Antilles, a maara nri yiri nke ahụ dị ka fungi ma ọ bụ cou-cou
Na Ghana, e nwere ọdịiche abụọ, nke a na-ejikarị ọka a kụrụ akụ eme, ọ bụ ezie na ọdịiche a maara dị ka banku na-eme mgbe ụfọdụ site na ngwakọta nke cassava na ọka
A na-ahapụ ọka ka ọ gbasaa tupu esi ya
Iji mee banku, a na-esi ngwakọta ahụ na-agbanye n'ime ite, mana a na-esiri ụdị a na-akpọ kenkey naanị akụkụ ya tupu a na-ekpuchi ya na akwụkwọ unere ma ọ bụ mkpo ọka ma na-esi ya
Funkaso, ma ọ bụ Pinkaso, bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke ndị HausaA na-enye ya ma ọ bụ dị ka ihe na-eso nri ma ọ bụ dịka ihe oriri na stew
Funke Abimbola MBE bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye ọka iwu Naijiria
Ọ na-akwado maka iche n'ofe UK ọha na-elekwasị anya kpọmkwem na ọrụ iwu
Abimbola gara mahadum Newcastle ka ọ mụọ iwu
Ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke mgbe ya na Campbell Hooper na-arụ ọrụ
Abimbola sitere na ezinụlọ ndị dibia bekee
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Burgess Hill Girls
Ọ mụghi ọgwụ n'ihi egwu ya maka 'ihe mgbu na ọbara' ( algophobia na hemophobia )
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta iwu na Mahadum Newcastle
Ọ gara Naịjirịa n'etiti afọ 1990 ka ọ nọrọ n'ule ule ụlọ mmanya Naijiria
Abimbola ghọrọ nne mgbe ọ dị afọ ka ya na Campbell Hooper na-arụ ọrụ
2000, ọ ruru eru dị ka onye ọka iwu n'ime ụlọ
Nna ya nwụrụ na 2012 mgbe a chọpụtara na ọ nwere ọrịa kansa
Abimbola ghọrọ onye ọka iwu ojii kachasị elu maka ọrụ ọgwụ Roche na UK, Ireland, Gibraltar na Malta
Ọ ruru eru dị ka onye ọka iwu n'ime ụlọ na 2000
Ọ gara Naijiria maka nkwadebe maka ule Nigerian Bar
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na FO Akinrele & Co
Ka o si Naijiria lọta UK n'etiti 1990s, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Wembley Plc ebe ọ ruru eru dị ka onye ọka iwu ụlọ ọrụ / azụmahịa
O mechara kwaga Campbell Hooper ebe ọ ghọrọ onye ọka iwu
N'afọ 2012, ọ sonyeere Roche UK n'ọnọdụ nchịkwa nchịkwa (UK na Ireland)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye ọrụ nchekwa data UK
Na Disemba 2015, ọ ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ izugbe na odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ nke otu nzukọ ahụ wee kwalite ya ịbụ onye ndụmọdụ izugbe na onye isi nke nnabata ego na Jenụwarị 2017
Ọ zutere ihe ịma aka n'inweta ọrụ ntinye ọkwa na UK
Dị ka otu puku na afọ si kwuo, 'Ọ na-esiri m ike ịchọta ọkwa ntinye ọkwa mgbe m gụchara ule nnyefe QLTT (ugbu a QLTS) ma chọọ inweta ahụmahụ tupu iru eru
Iji nweta ụkwụ m n'ọnụ ụzọ, ewepụtara m ndepụta nke ụlọ ọrụ iwu 100 kachasị na-ahụ maka iwu ụlọ ọrụ ma mee otu ihe ahụ na ndị otu 50 kacha elu n'ime ụlọ
M wee gaa n'ihu ịkpọ ndị isi ngalaba na otu narị otu narị na iri ise
Nke a butere ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ, gụnyere nke nwere isi, PLC depụtara nke ọma
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ, onyeisi ndị ọkàiwu (onye bụ Bekee ma onye ya na ya si n'Eshia) jụrụ m ma echere m na agbụrụ m bụ ihe mere m na-agaghị agba ndị òtù ndị ọzọ ajụjụ ọnụ
Nke ahụ bụ, n’eziokwu, nke mbụ m nche uru bu agbụrụ dị ka ihe pụrụ igbochi m ọganihu
Obi dị m ụtọ na ọ nyere m ọrụ ma nwee ike iru eru dị ka onye ọka iwu n'ime ụlọ'
Abimbola bụ onye nkwado siri ike maka ụlọ ọrụ na ndịiche dị iche iche
Dị ka ọkà okwu ọha na onye na-ahụ maka iwu, a ghọtara ya wee nweta ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2013, e gosipụtara ya na mbipụta tebụl Diversity League dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọka iwu ojii
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite National Diversity Award, na n'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye onyinye nke Law Society Excellence
N'afọ 2015, ọ meriri ihe nrite ihe nlere anya nke ọma
Na 2010, a họpụtara ya gọvanọ Uxbridge College, London, n'ime afọ anọ
Ọ natara ihe nrite 'Point of Light' site n'aka onye isi ala UK n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2016, na-amata mmetụta nke ọrụ afọ ofufo ya dị iche iche na UK
Na Jun 2017, Queen Elizabeth nyere ya MBE (Member of Order of the British Empire) maka ọrụ dị iche iche na ọrụ iwu na ndị na-eto eto
Ọ nwetara dọkịta na-asọpụrụ iwu site na Mahadum Hertfordshire na Septemba 2019, na-amata ntinye aka ya na ndịiche na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Funke Adesiyan bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-enyere Aisha Buhari aka n'ihe omume ụlọ na nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe yaListen (help·info)
Adesiyan si Ibadan, Steeti Oyo
Ọ gara Ulo akwukwoTime and Tide International na Ibadan City academy, Saint Anne's School, na Oriwu College Ikorodu maka ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na post-elementary ya
O nwere nzere bachelọ na Performing Arts na Diploma na mmúta gbasara iwu na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo
Adesiyan gụrụ gbasara ihe nkiri na nduzi ihe nkiri na Ulo mmuta ihe nkiri bu New York Film Academy
Adesiyan malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 2003
N'afọ 2011, Funke Adesiyan sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nhazi ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ maka mkpọsa onye isi ala nke Ibrahim Shekarau
N'afọ 2014, ọ ghọrọ onye ntụrụndụ nke abụọ meriri ntuli aka, mgbe Desmond Elliot gasịrị
O sonyere ma merie na ntuli aka afo 2015 Oyo State House of Assembly n'okpuru Parti ndoro ndoro ochichi nke People's Democratik Party
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Adesiyan dị ka onye na-enyere Aisha Buhari aka n'ihe omume ụlọ na nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Akindele-Bello Olufunke Ayotunde ónyé amaara dị́ ka Funke Akindele /Jenifa) bụ ónyé n'eme ihe nkiri ma na-arụ́pụ̀tákwa ihe nkiri

Funke gosipụ̀tara na emume sitcom I Need to Know site áfọ̀ 1998 ruo 2002, n'áfọ̀ 2009 ọ̀ nwetara awọdụ na Africa Movie Academy Award màkà ngósìpụ̀tà ézígbò ákpárámàgwà nlégárá ányā n'éjìjé ọ́ nọ̀ dịka onye ánà-èlégárá ányá n'éjìjé Jenifa's Diary, nke akpọ́pụ̀tàrà ya dịka nwanyị kachasị n'éjìjé egwuregwu/ị́kpā ọ́chị̀ Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Á mụrụ Akindele n'ọ́nwá ọgọọs 24, 1977, na Ikorodu, Lagos State, Naijiria
Funke bụ nwa abụọ n'ime ụmụ atọ (ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na otu nwoke)
Nne Akindele bụ̀ onye dibị̀a bekee ebe nna ya bụ̀ onye isi ụ́lọ̀ akwụkwọ ndị sekọ́ndị̀rị̀ lagoro ezumike ńkā
Funke nwetara asambodo National Diploma (OND) na Mass Communication site na ụlọakwụkwọ bụbụrụ Ogun State Polytechnic,bụzi Moshood Abiola ugbu a
Akindele bụ̀ụ̀rụ̀ onye ámà ama mgbe ó gósìpụ̀tàra ònwé ya na United Nations Population Fund ( UNFPA ) nke na-akwado sitcom/Need to know, nke malitere site na 1998 ruo 2002
Funke zàrà Bisi, ma gosipụta ákpárámàgwà nwa akwụkwọ sekọndrị nwere ọgụgụ isi ma nwee ọ̀nụ̀nụ̀ ọ́kụ́ n'obiFunke Akindele chawapụtara na 2008 mgbe ọ pụtara n'ihe nkiri Jenifa

Na Jenụwarị 2018, enwere esemokwu mgbe a kọrọ na Akindele ga-enweta ya Hollywood izizi na Marvel's Avengers Infinity War dịka e depụtara ya dịka onye so na IMDbOnye Ọrụ nta akụkọ ndị mainstream nke Naịjirịa kwuru na ọ jikerela ichawapụta na infinity War dị ka onye nche Dora Milaje, na-akowa IMDb
Izu ole na ole ka nke ahụ gasịrị, e dochiri aha onye otu nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa bụ Genevieve Nnaji, na ntinye nke Akindele gosiri na ọ bụ mbanye anataghị ikike
Na February 2018, a kọrọ na Onye isi oche Senate na Onye isi oche nke National Assembly, Dr Bukola Saraki gwara ndị Marvel Studios ka ha gosipụta Akindele na Infinity War
N’ọnwa Julaị 2016, n’ajụjụ ọnụ o kwuru na ya anaghị eme ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n’ụlọ ọrụ ndị Yoruba n’oge ahụ n’ihi ịzonari ụfọdụ ihe
Akindele bụ ísí ahụrụ kwawa okpu n'ihe nkiri na-aga n'ihu bụ Jenifa Diary, gbakwunyere Fisayo Ajisola, Falz, Juliana Olayode, na Aderounmu Adejumoke
Ihe ngosi a na - emetụta ụfọdụ ngalaba ihe nkiri Jenifa
Ihe Nkiri egwu/ịkpa ọchị 2018 bụ moms at war gósìpûtàwanyere Akindele na Michelle Dede
N’ọnwa Julaị 2019, Akindele bidoro usoro intanetị ọhụrụ ọ kpọrọ Aiyetoro Town, nke na-esite na nsonye TV ya ama ama, Jenifa’s Diary
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Scene One Film Production
O mere ihe nler site ituziaka aka na ihe nkiri bụ your Excellency na 2019
Funke Akindele na-ahụ maka otu na-abụghị nke gọọmenti hiwere amaara dịka Jenifa Foundation, nke ebumnuche ya bụ iji nye ndị ntorobịa ọrụ
Funke Akindele nwere nkwado dị ka edebanyere aha ya n'akwụkwọ dị ka onye nnọchi anya nke Dettol
Funke Akindele nwere nkwado dị iche iche dịka itinyere ya aka n'akwụkwọ dị ka onye nnọchi anya nke Irokotv
edebanyere aha ya n'akwụkwọ dị ka onye nnọchianya nke Keystone Bank na afọ 2018 Na Nọvemba 2019, ọ binyere aka na nkwado Waw Nigeria, ụlọ ọrụ na-arụpụta ncha
Na May 26, 2012, Akindele lụrụ Adeola Kehinde Oloyede
Di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm na July 2013, na-ekwu maka esemokwu na-enweghị ntinye ọnụ Akindele lụrụ onye egwu Naịjirịa bụ JJC Skillz na London na Mee 2016
ọ̀tụ́tụ́ akụkọ kọrọ maka afọ ime ya so na nsonaazụ ọchụchọ kachasị na nchọgharị ọchụchọ Google na August 2017
Akindele mụrụ ụmụ nwoke ejima na Disemba 2018 ma nwee ọtụtụ ụmụ Dị ya mụtara na mbụ
N’ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, e jidere Akindele ma bo ya ebubo n’ụlọ ikpe mgbe ha mechara nnọkọ ncheta ọmụmụ iji kwanyere di ya ugwu n’oge mkpọchi igbochi ọrịa koronaviros
O mechara pụta na ihe nkiri video Nigeria center for Disease Control iji mee ka a mata banyere koronavirus
A mara onye omee ahụ na di ya ikpe ị́rụ́ ọrụ obodo mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na anọ mgbe ha kwuchara na ha dara iwu megidere mkpọchi

Funke Bucknor-Obruthe (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 27 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1976) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọka iwu Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye hiwere na onye isi oche nke Zapphaire Events ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị mdụ bidoro ọrụ ị hazi mmemme na Naịjirịa
Bucknor-Obruthe bu onye a muru nye Segun na Shola Bucknor na Legọs Steeti,na Saụtwestị Naijiria
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị na Fountain Nursery and Primary School,nke Legọs, na Nigeria Navy Secondary School,nke Legọs, tupu ọ gaa agụmagụ Iwu na Mahadum nke Legọs
N’afọ 2000, a kpọrọ ya n'ọkwa okaikpe ka ọ gachara Nigerian Law School n'Abuja
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ ọkaikpe nwa oge, Bucknor-Obruthe nwetere n'ọrụ na Tie Communications, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge
N'afọ 2003, ịhụnanya o nwere maka ịhazi ihe omume mere ka o bido Zapphaire Events, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahazi mmemme

Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu ịhazi ọtụtụ ihe omume dị elu n'ime na n'èzí Naijiria ma nweta mmeri na nkwanye ùgwù gụnyere ị bụ ndị egosipụtara na Inside Africa nke CNN maka ịhazi agbamakwụkwọ ndị eze nke Naijiria

Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị a gụnyere onyinye Future Award for 'Entrepreneur of the Year' (2006), Wedding Planner Magazine Award for 'Wedding Planner of the Year' (2007), Go2girl Life Achievement Awards (2011), Nigerian Events Awards for Outstanding Contribution to the Events Industry (2012)
N’afọ 2014, akwụkwọ nchịkọta ọnlaịnụ nke Naịjirịa a kpọrọ depụtara Bucknor-Obruthe na “10 Most Powerful Under-40s in Business”
Bucknor-Obruthe lụrụ Onome Obruthe, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke okenye nke onye mgbasa ozi Naijiria Tosyn Bucknor
Funke Egbemode bụ nwaada nwanyị nta akụkọ Naijiria, onye ntuzi aka nke akwụkwọ akụkọ New Telegraph
Ọ gara Baptist Practising Primary School, Iwo, Osun State
Agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bụ na Baptist Girls High School, Osogbo (Osun State) Ọ bụ onye ode akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Sun
Funke bụ Onye isi oche nke Guild of Editors nke Nigeria
Funke Oladoye (amụrụ na 5 Disemba 1993) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ na mita 400
O sonyere na 4 × 400 mita relay event na 2015 World Championships in Athletics na Beijing na-emecha nke ise
Ihe kacha mma ya na mita 400 bụ 5255 sekọnd (Warri 2014)
Funke Opeke bụ onye injinia nke ihe ọbụla gbasara eletriki, doro anya
Ọ bụ ya guzobere otu akpọrọ 'Main Street Technologies' ma nnukwu onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ Main One Cable Company, Ụlọ ọrụ a na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi nakwa nzikọrịta ozi
Ụlọ ọrụ a di na Lagos nke Nigeria
Ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ 'MainOne bu ụlọ ọrrụ kacha n;ihe gbasara igbo mkpa nzikọrita ozi nakwa mbasa ozi na West Africa
Funke Opeke gụrụ kọleji n' ụlọ akwụkwọ Queens, ọ bụ naani kọleji umu nwaanyị dị na Ibaban Oyo Steeti mgbe ahụ
O toro n'Ibadan isi obodo Oyo Steeti na agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye IIe-Oluji nke di n'Ondo Steeti
Nne na Nna ya mụrụ ha iteolu
Nna ya bụ ọnye Nigeria izizi rụrụ ọrụ dika Dairektọ n'ụlọ ọrụ Cocoa Research Institute nke Nigeria ebe Nne bụ onye Nkuzi
Opeke nwetara nzere digiri nke bachelọ nakwa nke Mastas na Obafemi Awolowo University na Columbia University

Ka ọ gụchara na Mahadum nke Columbia, ọ gara n'ihu ịrụ ọrụ na ngalaba na-ahụ maka nkanụzụ na America dika Dairektọ nke na-achịkọta ngalaba nke 'Verizon Communications di na Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Columbia, ọ gbasoro ọrụ na ICT na United States dị ka onye isi otu yana nnukwu ngalaba Verizon Communications na New York City
N'afọ 2005, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ndị ọrụ aka tụmadị ịhụ na nsogbu anaghị n'igwe nzikọrịta ozi nke a kpọrọ 'Chief Technical Office site na Portugal r' (CTO)
N' aka nke ọzọ ọ rụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Transcorp ma rụkwa na NITEL obere oge dika onye na-ahụ ọrụ na-aga nke ọma
Ka ọ lachitere azụ na Nigeria n'afọ 2008, Funke Opeke chọpụtara na ndi Nigeria, na enwe nsogbụ ịntanetị, ọbụ udi nsogbu a ọ hụrụ mere oji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ya nke ahụ ọ kpọrọ 'MainOne Cable'
Ụlọ ọrụ a gboro mkpa nsogbụ ịntanetị ndi Nigeria na enwe site iwepụta akọrọ ngwa di iche iji gbochie nsogbu a
'MainOne Cable bụ ụlọ ọrụ izizi otu onye na -eguzobe na mba West Africa niile bu nke achọrọ ka ọnye nwereike isonye ma nwetaba intanetị

Cable a gara Kilometa puku asaa n'okpuru oshimiri site na Portugal wee ruo West Africa site n'akụkụ Accara di na Ghana,Dakar di na Senegal n'afọ 2019, Abidjan di na Cote d'Ivoire n'afọ 2019 nakwa Lagos di na Nigeria
Funlola Aofiyebi-Raimi, amụrụ Abibat Oluwafunmilola Aofiyebi and known informally as FAR, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria
O nweela ihe ngosi redio na-eme ogologo oge
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri The Figurine, Tinsel na MTV Shuga
Funlola bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụaka asaa, nne ya bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na nna bụrụ onye mmepụta ihe
Aha FAR bịara mgbe ọ lụsịrị di wee bụrụ mbinye aka ya
FAR nwere mmalite n'oge na ogbo na telivishọn, ya na nwanne nne ya Teni Aofiyebi, onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ lụrụ onye mgbasa ozi ọkachamara Olayinka Raimi
FAR nwetara usoro ihe nkiri TV na Westminster College, yana na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na Bunkinghamshire
O nwekwara BSc na Sociology site na Mahadum Lagos na Naijiria
Mpụta ihe nkiri FAR bụ na ihe nkiri Amaka Igwe Violated eme ihe n'akụkụ Joke Silva, Richard Mofe-Damijo, Ego Boyo na Kunle Bamtefa
A họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na-abịa na THEMA na 1996
A tụbara FAR dị ka onye ndu n'ime Keeping Faith, site n'aka onye nduzi Steve Gukas
A họpụtara FAR maka ihe nrite AMMA onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị akwado The Figurine nduzi site na Kunle Afolayan
Tupu ọ pụta na M-net TV show Tinsel, na-egosiputa dị ka Brenda, FAR egosila na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ dị ka Dọctors Quarters, Solitaire, na Palace
FAR emela ihe n'ogbo na Sing That Old Song For Me and The Mansion nke Rasheed Badamusi dere, na The Vagina Monologues
FAR meriri ihe ngosi na-abughi akụkọ ifo ịgba egwu akpọrọ Celebrity Takes 2
Na 2014, FAR na onye omere Britain-Nigeria bụ Wale Ojo gosiputara
O nwere ihe ngosi redio akpọrọ Touch of Spice nọrọ afọ 14 (malitere na August 1999)
FAR nọ na MTV Shuga na 2019 na 2020 na ọrụ nkwado ya nke ' Oriakụ Olutu' gụnyere mgbe ọ banyere na obere usoro akpọrọ MTV Shuga Nanị ọnụ na- akọwapụta nsogbu nke Coronavirus na 20 Eprel 2020
Tunde Aladese dere usoro a ma gbasaa kwa izu n'abalị - ndị na-akwado ya gụnyere United Nations
Usoro a dabere na Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya na Côte d'Ivoire na akụkọ a na-aga n'ihu site na iji mkparịta ụka ịntanetị na ọnọdụ n'etiti ndị agwa
N'August 2009, O mere emume ncheta afọ iri nke mmemme redio ya Touch of Spice (TOS)
O kwere nkwa ime ya n'ụdị ọmarịcha site n'ime ka ndị na-akwado ya nwee njem ụgbọ oloko n'efu ka ha gaa lee ihe nkiri na sinima
Afọ ọmụmụ - Julai 5, 1954 na Ondo Steetị , Nigeria Protectorate
Nwaamala - Nigerian
Aha ọzọ - Veronica
Akaọrụ - Onye na-agụ egwu oziọma, onye na-ede egwu,Onye nkwusa oziọma
Afọ n'ọrụ - 1983- ugbu a
Funmi Aragbaye (a mụrụ n'abalị ise nke onwa Julaị n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu oziọma, onye na-ede egwu na onye mgbasa oziọma
A mụrụ Aragbaye na Julaị 5, n'afọ 1954 na Ondo town, n'ime ezinaụlọ ndị otu Kristi
A zụrụ ya na Ondo states civil service training schools tupu ọ sonyeere ndị ọrụ bekee Oyo Steetị ebe ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka onye isi ọrụ nchịkwa n'afọ 1997
N'agbanyeghị, ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya na Evangelical Church Winning All na Ilorin, isi obodo Kwara State, Nigeria n'obere oge ọ nwetachara Akwụkwọ Asambodo West Africa
Albọm nke mbụ ya bu Olorun Igbala tinyere Sioni Ilu ayo ka e weputara n'afọ 1983

O mere emume ncheta afọ ọmụmụ nke iri isii ya n'afọ iri atọ ya n’ime egwu ozioma na Julaị 5, 2014 na Legọs steeti na ndị bịara ya bụ ndị na-agụ egwu oziọma na ndị omenkà na Naijiria gụnyere onyeisi Ebenezer Obey, Joseph Adebayo Adelakun, Dunni Olanrewaju, , onye isi ugboro abụọ nke Gospel Musicians Association of Nigeria
Funmi Falana bụ onye ọrụ iwu gbasara Naijiria na onye na- alụ ọgụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ nwunye Femi Falana, onye ama ama na onye ọchụnta ego Naịjirịa ; nne bụ Falz, onye na- ese ihe na Naijiria na- eme ihe nkiri
Funmi Falana na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka National Director of Women Empowerment and Legal Aid (WELA), otu na-abụghị nke gọvụmentị na-agbachitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka

Olufunmilola Aduke Iyanda (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 27 n'ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 1971), onye a mara nke ọma dịka Funmi Iyanda , bụ onye Naịjirịa na-ahazi mkparịtaụka n'onyonyo, onye mgbasa ozi, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-ede blọọgụ
O weputara ma kwado ngosi mkparịtaụka a, New Dawn with Funmi, nke gosipụtara na netwọkụ Naijiria ihe karịrị afọ asatọ
Funmi bu onye isi ndi Ignite Media
N’afọ 2011 ka a kwanyere Funmi Iyanda ugwu maka usoro weebụ ya nke World Economic Forum were kpọọ aha ya n'otu n'ime Forbes “20 Youngest Power Women in Africa”
A mụrụ Funmi Iyanda na Legọs n'ezinụlọ Gabriel na Yetunde Iyanda
Nna ya si n'obodo Ogbomoso, ma nne ya si n'obodo Ijebu-Ode
O tolitere na mpaghara Legọs Menlandị; kosiladị, nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ African Church Princess Primary School, nke Akoka, yana Herbert Macaulay School na Legọs, nke Naijiria maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na International School Ibadan maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndịrị ya
O mechara gaa Mahadum nke Ibadan ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Jiogụrafi
Funmi i me ihe ngosi mkparịtaụka onyonyo bidoro mgbe ọ malitere ma na-ahazi Good Morning Nigeria, ihe ngosi ụtụtụ nke televishọn

Mpaghara 'Heroes', nke buliri mmeta nke ndị kwesiri ekwesi nye ọhaneze, na 'Street Life', nke na-a dịghị ka ọtụtụ ihe ngosi oge ahụ, gara n'okporo ámá ịchọ akụkọ ndị na-akpali mmasị ndị mmadụ na Naijiria
Ihe ngosi a lekwasịrị anya na ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke ndị Naijiria tara ahụhụ, ọkachasị ndị otu ndị na-adịghị ike dịka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi a na telivishọn Naijiria
Ihe ngosi izizi ọ haziri bụ MITV Live, nke Segun Odegbami na Tunde Kelani rụpụtara
Ọ sorokwara agụụ miri emi o nwere n'egwuregwu site na ị banye na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke egwuregwu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke 2006 Africa Cup of Nations ma kpuchie 1999 World Football World Cup, All Africa Games na Zimbabwe, yana Olympic Games na Sydney na Athens n'afọ 2000 na 2004
New Dawn with Funmi bidoro n’afọ 2000 ma na-aga kwa ụbọchị na NTA 10 Legọs
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe ngosi ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi kachasị ogologo oge arụpụtara n'onwe ya na NTA
Funmi dekwara kolum oge nile na Tempo Magazin
N'oge ụfọdụ, ọ ka na-eje ozi dị ka onye ode akwụkwọ nke
O dekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ nye PM NEWS, The Punch, Daily Trust, na akwụkwọ akụkọ Vanguard
N'afọ 2010, mgbe ezumike afọ abụọ ya gasịrị, ọ laghachiri na ihuenyo site na Talk with Funmi ( TWF ), ihe ngosi telivishọn nke Chris Dada duziri
Talk With Funmi na- ejegharị na Naịjirịa niile, site na steeti ruo na steeti, na-ejide ndị mmadụ ma na-akparịta ụka na mba dum
Lagos Stories, otu n'ime ngosipụta nke ihe nkiri ahụ ka a họpụtara na katigori maka 'Best News Documentary' na Monte Carlo Television Festival na Monaco n'afọ 2011
N’afọ 2012, Funmi Iyanda na onye otu ya Chris Dada rụpụtara Chopcassavacom, websaịtị nke na-ede akwụkwọ ngosiputa ngaharị iwe enyemaka mmanụ ọkụ nke Jenụwarị afọ 2012 e mere na Legọs, nke Naijiria

E nweghi ike i gosipụta ya n'ihe onyonyo Naijiria, usoro ịntanetị a na-enye echiche nke ime maka ngaharị iwe nke Legọs a, bụ nke ndị mmadụ niile gara n'okporo ámá na-achọ ka a gbanwee ntụgharị nke pasentị 117 na ọnụahịa mmanụ ụgbọ ala
A hoputara ya na akwukwo ndi ozo mere eme na 2012 BANFF World Media Festival, na Alberta,nke Kanada
Funmi bụ onye otu African Leadership Institute, Tutu Fellow, na onye sonyere na ASPEN Institute's Forum for Communications and Society

N’afọ 2012, onye Gọvanọ Legọs Steeti, Babatunde Raji Fashola kwanyeere ya ugwu maka mbọ ọ gbara maka ị kwado ihe gbasara nwoke na nwanyị ka ọ laghachitere ụbọchị ise nkwado UN advocacy trek n’ugwu Kilimanjaro

Ọ bụ UN haziri ọrịrị a iji bulite mmata ụwa niile na mgbasa ozi ya iji kwụsị ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka nwanyị, were mee ka ndị na-arị elu si mba karịrị 32 nke Afrịka gaa njem akụkọ ihe mere eme n'ugwu Kilimanjaro
Funmi na-eje ozi n'otu bọọdụ nke Farafina Trust nakwa Positive Impact Youth Network
O sonyere na usoro ngagharị iwe nke Occupy Nigeria na Jenụwarị afọ 2012
Ngagharị iwe ndị a bụ iji gbochie atumatu nke mwepu enyemaka mmanụ ọkụ nke gọọmentị

Funmi Olonisakin (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 8 n'ọnwa Febuwarị afọ 1965) bụ onye ọkammụta bụ onye Briten nakwa Naijiria, onye bụ Prọfesọ nke ọchịchị, udo na esemokwu na King's College London, na Prọfesọ nke dị egwu na Mahadum nke Pretoria

Ọ bụ onye guzobere ma rụbuo ọrụ Daịrektọ nke African Leadership Center (ALC) a tọrọ ntọala ya na ụkpụrụ nke Pan-Africanism iji wuo ndị ndu nke agbụrụ na-esote, na ndị ọkà mmụta na kọntinentị nke Afrịka nwere ụkpụrụ mgbanwe
Olonisakin bụ Daịrektọ ihe omume nke nzere masta nke ọchịchị, udo na nchekwa

Ọ bụ onye nyocha na-ahụ maka sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum nke Pretoria, ọ bụbukwa ọkà mmụta dị iche nke Andrew Mellon Foundation na onye otu a ma ama nke Geneva Center for Security Policy (GCSP)
Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara so na otu ndị ndụmọdụ ndị United Nations Security Council (UNSC)
nọ na nnyocha nke UN Peace-building Architecture
Olonisakin ugbua bụ osote onye isi oche/onye isi ụlọakwụkwọ (Na mba ụwa) nke King's College nke Lọndọn

Ọ bụbu onye osote diin na mba ụwa, Ngalaba nke Sosha Sayensị na Amụma Ọha,nke King's College Lọndọn, ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ ruru ogo prọfesọna nwanyị ojii izizi kuziri nkuzi n'ihu ọha na King's College nke Lọndọn

A mụrụ ya na Saụt Lọndọn n'ezinaụlọ ndị Naịjirịa, 'Funmi (Oluwafunmilayo) Olonisakin nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Mahadum nke Obafemi Awolowo, dị na Ile-Ife, na Naijiria, n'ihe gbasara ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ( BSc )
Ọ gara n'ihu i nweta nzere masta n'agụmagụ agha, yana nzere dọktọreti n'agụmagụ agha na King's College London

N'ime ọrụ nke gafegoro ọtụtụ iri afọ, Olonisakin gara n'ihu na-ewulite mkparịta ụka dị oke mkpa nke ndị isi na ndị mmụta Afrịka nwere ụkpụrụ dị iche iche nke na-akwalite pan-Africanism n'iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe, nkwanye ùgwù nye adimiche, ịchụso ịdị mma, na-etinye otu ndị ntorobịa nke Afrịka n'ihe a na-eme, na echiche onwe
Ọ na-akwado i mechi àkwà mmiri dị n'etiti agụmakwụkwọ, atumatu na omume

Site na African Leadership Centre (ALC), ị kekọrịta ihe ọmụma na ị nyefe karịsịa site na ọrụ nlekọta bụ otu n'ime ụzọ Olonisakin si arụ ọrụ na nsonye nke ọtụtụ ndị ọkachamara a ma ama na ngalaba iji soro ndị otu ALC
Olonisakin rituru nso nso a dị ka daịrektọ nke ALC mgbe ọ gara n'ihu ịkwado otu ahụ n'ụzọ dị iche iche
Ewezuga nkuzi, Olonisakin na-enye aka n'arụmarụ ụka udo na esemokwu nke n'Afrịka, bụ nke onwere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ o biputra na ya
Ọ bụ onye otu guzobere Network of Africa Security Sector Network (ASSN), were jee ozi dị ka onye nhazi mpaghara West Afrịka site n'afọ 2008 ruo afọ 2012

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na World Economic Forum's Global Agenda Council on Fragile States site n'afọ 2008 ruo afọ 2010 na-enyocha ma na-atule etu ọchịchị mgbanwe nwere ike isi nwee mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide na gọọmentị na nwughari ma a lụchaa agha
Olonisakin bụbu onye ọrụ nke United Nations, site n'aka United Nations Special Representative of the Secretary-General on Children and Armed Conflict, ebe ọ nọ na-elekọta ngalaba nke Afrịka
N'oge ọrụ ya n'ọkwa a, 'ọ gbara mbọ ka e guzobe National Commission for War Affected Children in Sierra Leone na Ngalaba Nchedo ụmụaka na Economic Community of West Africa States (ECOWAS)
O jeela ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na African Union na ECOWAS ọkachasị nke ụmụ nwanyị na-ewu udo, ọchịchị, ụmụaka nọ n'ebe ana-alụ agha
Ọ bụkwa daịrektọ nke Conflict, Security and Development Group na King's College Lọndọn site n'afọ 2003 ruo afọ 2013

N'ịgawanye n'ihu iji mee akara na-agaghị echefu echefu n'ụwa a, Olonisakin na-enye ihe ọmụma ya ugbu a na African Peace and Security Architecture dị ka onye so n'òtù ndụmọdụ ndị ọkachamara maka nnyocha nke UN Peacebuilding Architecture

Ọ nọ na Thabo Mbeki African Leadership Institute (TMALI) dịka onye otu ọgbakọ na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ; Geneva Centre for Democratic Control of Armed Forces (DCAF) board; the Tana High Level Forum on Security in Africa na Boards of Trustees of International Alert na Centre for Humanitarian Dialogue
Olonisakin bụ nwa nwanyị ojii mbụ rutere ogo prọfesọ na King's College,nke Lọndọn ma kpọọ ya aha na Powerlist nke ndị Briten kachasị nwee mmetụta sitere n'Afrịka, gụnyere Top 10 nke ogụgụ afọ 2019
Olonisakin na-akwado ụzọ ndụ na-aga n'ihu, na-akwado adịmiche ma na-agbanwe agbanwe
Ọ na-eme nke ọma na nnyocha dabere na ihe akaebe ma na-akwalite onye ndu mgbanwe
Adefunmilayo Tejuosho (née Smith) (onye amụrụ March 25, 1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria bụ onye omebe iwu ụlọ omebe iwu steeti Legọs nke anọ, na-anọchite anya Mushin Constituency I
Ọ bụ onye isi oche kọmitii ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti Lagos na Ego
A mụrụ Tejuosho na steeti Lagos n'ime ezinaụlọ Ademola Smith onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa na-efe efe na-arụrụ gọọmentị Naịjirịa ọrụ
Ọ gara Mahadum Lagos Staff School, Akoka, Queen's College, Lagos wee gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị na West Virginia
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Mahadum West Virginia ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara Biology
O mechara nweta akara ugo mmụta iwu na Mahadum Buckingham
Tejuosho nwere PhD
n'iwu na Mahadum Lagos
N'ime afọ ije ozi ntorobịa ya, ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ, Queens School, Yaba
Mgbe ọ mèchàrà ihe gbasara aguma akwụkwọ ya na ihe gbasara íwú nke a na akpọ Call to bar, ọ sonyere n'ọrụ Ademola Odunsi & Co
N'afọ 1996, ọ bụ onye otu Grassroot Democratic Movement n'okpuru ọchịchị Abacha dị mkpụmkpụ ma bụrụkwa onye ga-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala maka pati ahụ tupu akagbuo ọrụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Na mmalite nke mba nke anọ, ọ sonyeere Alliance for Democracy
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara ya n'ụlọ omeiwu Lagos State House of Assembly ka ọ nọchite anya Mushin Constituency I
Na nzuko ahụ, Tejuosho kwadoro ụgwọ ahụ nke emechara mara dị ka Lagos State Protection Against Domestic Violence Law of 2007
Iwu ahụ nyere ndị a na-eme ihe ike n'ụlọ nchebe site n'aka ndị mmegbu ha
Ọ kpaliri ya ide akwụkwọ iwu ahụ site n'akwụkwọ maka ime ihe ike n'ime ụlọ o dere maka mmemme LLM ya na Mahadum Lagos
Ọ gara n'ihu were ọkwa dị iche iche n'ụlọ ome Iwu ahụ gụnyere osote Chief Whip, osote onye isi okwu na onyeisi oche, kọmitii ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu Lagos steeti na-ahụ maka ego
A họpụtara ya dị ka osote ọkà okwu na afo 2007 mana a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ n'afo 2009
Ka a chụpụrụ ya, ọtụtụ nyocha, e mere nyocha iji mara ntozu agụmakwụkwọ nke onye nọchiri ya na ụfọdụ ndị ebubo ya mana e wepụtaghị nsonaazụ ebubo ahụ
Ọ lụrụ Omoba Kayode Tejuosho nke ezinụlọ eze Tejuosho nke Ogun State, Nigeria
Ha nwere ụmụ anọ ọnụ

Funmilayo Ransome Kuti, MON Ọmụmụ 25 October 1900 na Abeokuta - Ọnwụ 13 April 1978 na Lagos, bu onye nkuzi, onye nkwalite ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye na agbachitere ụmụ nwanyi ọtitọ ma bụrụkwa onye nke ana ekwu ekwu ana eme eme na obodo Naijiria
Funmilola Adebayo (amụrụ ya n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Naijiria judo nke zoro asọ mpi, na ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị
O ritere ọla kopa na egwuregwu nke 2007 Pan African Games, o rite kwara ọlaọcha na asọmpi nke akpọrọ 2005 African Judo Championships na kwa zi ọla edo na 2004 Mauritius International
Na 2004, International Tournament nke emere na Mauritius nke dị na St
Denis, Mauritius
Adebayo sonyere na asọmpi nke 52 kilogram ma merie ihe nrite ọla edo
Na asompi nke 2005 African Judo Championships na Port Elizabeth, Adebayo sonyere na egwuregwu 57kg wee merie ọlaọcha
N'afọ 2007, e mere egwuregwu Afrịka na Algiers, Algeria
Adebayo ritere ọla nchara n'ihi na o sonyere na ihe omume 63kg
Funmilola Ogundana (26 Disemba 1980 ̊ 8 Febụwarị 2013) bụ onye Naịjịria na-agba ọsọ nke maara nke ọma na 100 mita
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-amụ nwa na Abuja, Naịjịria
Fura nwere ike ibu
Fura ma ọ bụ doonu bụ ụdị nri sitere na mpaghara Sahel nke West Africa nke amaara n'etiti ndị Zarma-Songhai, Fulani na Hausa nke Sahel
Ọ bụ ọka akpụrụ akpụ nke nwere 'fura' nke pụtara bọọlụ millet
A na-eri ya na Niger na Ghana
N'ezie, ime nri ọdịnala, fura da nono (mkpụrụ, ọka a na-esi esi, nke a na-eji mmiri ara ehi na-esi ísì ụtọ eri), na-anọchite anya ngwakọta nke ihe oriri na ụdị nri
Nke a na-egosi na a na-enyefe nri nke fura na-esi ísì ụtọ
A na-agbanye ọka n'ime ụdị ntụ, tụgharịa ya ma kpụọ ya ka ọ dị ka bọọlụ wee gwakọta ya ma gwakọta yango na Nono - mmiri ara ehi
A maara ngwakọta nke fura na nono dị ka Fura Da Nono, ihe ọṅụṅụ a na-eme n'ógbè nke nwere Kaarbohidrate na Fibar
Nri fura na ihe ọṅụṅụ fura da nono na-ewu ewu na ugwu Naijiria
A na-enye ha n'oge pụrụ iche na dị ka nri n'ehihie
A na-ebu ụzọ saacha ọka ahụ, mgbe ahụ, a na-ewepụ akpụkpọ ahụ
A na-akpọƘha ya ma gwọọ ya
A na-agbanye JinJa, cloves, na ose chili a mịrị amị ma tinye ya na ọka ntụ
A na-agbakwunye nnu na ngwakọta ahụ tupu awụnye ya n'ime ụrọ ma kụzie ya ka a na-awụnye mmiri nke nta nke nta iji mepụta ntụ ọka
A na-akpụzi nke a n'ụdị achọrọ
A pụkwara ịwụsa ntụ ọka ahụ n'ime efere ma kpuchie ya akwụkwọ n'abalị ka ọ gbasaa
A na-esi ihe akpụ ahụ n'ime ite, wee kụọ ya, ma wụsa ya mmiri ọzọ
A na-egbutu ntụ ọka ahụ ruo mgbe ọ ga-adị nro
Enwere ike ịkpụzi ihe ahụ ka ọ bụrụ bọọlụ
A na-eji ntụ ọka ma ọ bụ ntụ ọka eme ya iji gbochie fura ịrapara ọnụ
Fura nke a maara nke ọma na Naijiria dị ka Fura de nunu nke a na-ahụbu dị ka nri mpaghara ejirila nwayọọ nwayọọ ghọọ ụlọ Ahia na-eto eto nke na-agụnye usoro nhazi na mmepụta nke oge a
Furu bụ asụsụ Central Sudan nke Democratic Republic of the Congo
Glottolog nwèrè yá dị kà ọtụ n'ime asụsụ Kara, n'ikwekọ ná akwụkwọ ndị na-adịbeghị ányá, ébé Blench (2012) na-agbaso ndị okenye na-edepụta yá dị kà asụsụ Kresh
Ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu bụ ndị a na-eche n'echiche a na-amụbeghị
A na-eme ka ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu dị iche na ọgbọ ndị dị ugbu a na ndị gara aga, ma kpalie ha iji gbaa ume iche echiche banyere ịkwụwa aka ọtọ n'etiti ọgbọ
A na-arụrịta ụka banyere ndidi omume nke ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu n'etiti ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma, a na-echekwa ya dị ka ihe dị mkpa, nke a na-eleghara anya site n'aka ndị obodo dị irè
A na-ejikarị okwu a akọwa nchekwa ma ọ bụ ndozi nke ihe nketa ọdịbendị ma ọ bụ ihe nketa okike
Ndị na-ahụ maka nkwado na mmegharị ihu igwe anabatala echiche ahụ dị ka ngwá ọrụ maka itinye ụkpụrụ nke echiche ogologo oge n'ime iwu
A na-ejikọkarị echiche ahụ na echiche ụmụ amaala dị ka ụkpụrụ maka omume gburugburu ebe obibi, dị ka echiche ọgbọ asaa nke ọdịnala obodo Iroquois
Okwu a na-ezo aka na mmetụta nke ọgbọ dị ndụ ugbu a nwere n'ụwa nke ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu ga-ebi na ya, ụwa ha ga-eketa n'aka ụmụ mmadụ dị ndụ taa

A na-ezo aka n'echiche a na nkọwa kachasị a hotara nke nkwụsi ike dị ka akụkụ nke echiche mmepe na-adịgide adịgide, bụ nke Brundtland Commission nke United Nations n'ọnwa Machị 20, afọ 1987 “mmepe na-adịgide adịgide bụ mmepe nke na-egbo mkpa nke ugbu a n'emebighị ikike nke ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu iji gboo mkpa nke ha”
Ojiji nke ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu na iwu mba ụwa bụ akụkụ nke Charter nke United Nations nke na-elekwasị anya n'igbochi 'ihe otiti nke agha' na ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu

Site na mbipụta nke onye odee nke otu UN a kpọrọ Secretary-General n'asụsụ Bekee bụ ihe nhumaama a kpọrọ Our Common Agenda n'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2021, enwere mmasị ọhụrụ na nghọta, ime ihe maka, na ịnọchite anya ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu na usoro dị iche iche
Ọtụtụ ụzọ ndị isi ala na-eche na ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu ga-enwekwu ọganihu
Otú ọ dị, echiche ndị a anaghị egosi - a na-eme ọtụtụ mkpebi akụ na ụba na uru dị mkpirisi n'uche
Ọtụtụ mmejuputa nke ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu na-elekwasị anya n'itinye ikike na mkpa nke ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu n'iwu, iji nọchite anya ndị na-enweghị ike ikwupụta mkpa ha
Ọtụtụ mba anwaala itinye ọrụ nye ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu n'iwu
Na Wales, a na-edepụta ọrụ omume a dị ka ọrụ iwu na Well-being of Future Generations (Wales) Act 2015 na ọrụ nke Future Generations Commissioner

Kọmishọna mbụ bụ Sophie Howe gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ, na-atụ aro ọtụtụ iwu ọhụrụ e mere maka iwu na-eche echiche n'ọdịnihu na Wales, gụnyere 2020 Manifesto for the Future N'otu aka ahụ na Hungary, e guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nke Kọmishọna ndị omeiwu nke Hungary maka ọgbọ n'ọdịnihu na 2008
A na-echebe ikike nke ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu na usoro iwu dịka akụkụ nke ọnọdụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na ikpe ihu igwe
Ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu bụ ndị a na-ebo ebubo na ndị a na-ebo ebubo dị egwu na ikpe afọ 2018 'Future Generations v
Ministry of the Environment and Others' na mba Colombia nke chebere oke ọhịa Amazon maka ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu
Ikike nke ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ihu bụ ihe mkpali maka atụmatụ ụkpụrụ na Kim Stanley Robinson's The Ministry for the Future
Aha nna Fuwape bụ aha Naijiria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Agbụrụ Fyer nwéré ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị ihe dị ka mmadụ puku iri ato na ise
Ọ bụ agbụrụ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ na ihe ọmụma na-ebelata banyere ọdịbendị na asụsụ ya
Fyodor Mikhaïlovitch Dostoevsky (Disemba 11, 1921 - Febụwarị 9, 1881) bụ onye edemede Russia nke a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ndị edemede kachasị ukwuu na ndị kasị nwee mmetụta n'ụwa
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Dostoevsky na akụkọ dị mkpirikpi emetụtala ọtụtụ ndị edemede, ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma na ndị na-eme fim, bụ ndị nọgidere na-amụ ha gburugburu ụwa
A na-enwe mmasị na akwụkwọ ya maka omimi uche, ọchị na ike ime mmụọ ha
Ndị nkatọ na-ewere 'Mpụ na ntaramahụhụ', 'Onye nzuzu', na 'Ụmụnna Karamazov' dịka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya kachasị ukwuu
Gélita Hoarau (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 15 Jenụwarị 1956) bụ onye otu Senate nke France, na-anọchite anya agwaetiti Réunion
Ọ bụ onye otu Communist, Republican, na Citizen Group
Di ya bụ Élie Hoarau
Gérard Darmon (a mụrụ na 29 Febụwarị 1948) bụ onye France-Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
Ọ bụ di nke abụọ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Mathilda May (nne nke ụmụ ya abụọ kachasị nta)
O nwere ụmụ atọ Virginie (a mụrụ n'afọ 1968) na, site na Mee, nwa nwanyị Sarah (a mụrụ n'abalị 17 ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 1994) na nwa nwoke Jules (a mụrụ ya na 4 Machị 1997)
Darmon mekwara mkpuchi nke 'Mambo Italiano'
Darmon bụ onye Sephardic Jewish (Algerian-Jewish)
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2012, Eze Mohamed nke Isii nyere ya iwu ka ọ bụrụ nwa amaala mba Morocco
Gérardine Mukeshimana bụ onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Rwanda bụ onye jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Ọrụ Ugbo na Ihe Ndị Anụmanụ kemgbe ọnwa Julaị 2014
A mụrụ Mukeshimana n'ụbọchị 10 Disemba 1970 na mpaghara Huye nke oge a

O nwere nzere injinia ọrụ ugbo na Mahadum Mba nke Rwanda na nzere masta (2001) na PhD (2013) na biotechnology na Mahaduma Michigan State Akwụkwọ edemede doctoral ya bụ 'Dissecting the Genetic Complexity of Drought Tolerance Mechanisms in Common Bean (Phaseolus Vulgaris L)' N'afọ 2012, e nyere ya onyinye 2012 Board for International Food and Agriculture Development (BIFAD) Student Award for Scientific Excellence maka onyinye ya na mmemme ịzụlite bean nke Rwanda
Göttingen bu ama mahadum ime Nléda Saxony, Jémanị
O bu etiti ishi ama nkeji Göttingen
Oshimírí Leine na gaferé amaá
Na 2006 madu rürü 129,686 na amaá
Asaá Göttingen (Jeman Asaá Göttingen) bu mgbe mbu ọtú asaá ndi nkuzi mahadum shí Göttingen
Na 1837 hé mẹrẹ iwesíke kábà nkábú ihe gbanwere na édéíwu nke Ochíchìéze Hanover onye mere ya bu Ernest Augustus na hé kwéghị I süo iyi maka Í sóró éze Hanover nke öhúrụ
Ishi ha bu Friedrich Christoph Dahlmann, onyeá ọnwé ya kwadọrọ édéíwu ha métughị áka

Nke ishi fọrọ bu nwanne ndi nwoke Germanist Wilhelm na Jacob Grimm(ndi ukwu maka ákukó agbara na ákukó omenálá; ha mara há ka Brothers Grimm), Nnukwu iwụ Wilhelm Eduard Albrecht, onye ákíkó mbu Georg Gottfried Gervinus, onye ómárí ahu madu Wilhelm Eduard Weber, na onye éféfé chineke na Heinrich Georg August Ewald
Günter Baum (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke n'ihu ọha, onye guzobere ozi abụọ nke Ndị Kraịst na Germany
Nzukọ mbụ nke Baum guzobere bụ Wüstenstrom, nke bụ akụkụ nke òtù ndị na-edina nwoke
Ihe omume nke nzukọ ahụ dabeere na mmemme US Desert Stream Ministries, ọ bụ ezie na otu ahụ agbanweela nkà ihe ọmụma ya
N'ikpeazụ, Baum hapụrụ 'Wüstenstrom'
Baum mechara guzobe otu nzukọ a na-akpọ Zwischenraum
Zwischenraum abụghị akụkụ nke ndị na-emebu nwoke idina nwoke, ndị mmekọ anaghị anwa ịgbanwe omume mmekọahụ nke onye ọ bụla
Kama nke ahụ, Zwischenraum na-anabata ndị LGBT dị ka ha dị, ma na-enyere ndị LGBT nwere nkwenkwe nkà mmụta okpukpe nke ozi ọma aka ime ka akụkụ abụọ a nwere ike ịlụ ọgụ nke njirimara ha
Taa, Baum na-ebi dị ka nwoke na-edina nwoke n'ihu ọha na nso Basel, Switzerland
Gọọmentị nke Lagos Steeti bụ gọọmentị steet Lagos, na-echegbu onwe ya banyere nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ steeti
Ndị mejupụtara gọọmentị ahụ bụ ndị isi, ndị omeiwu na ndị ikpe
Gọvanọ bụ onye na-eme iwu bú onye na-eduzi gọọmentị ma na-enyekarị ndị kọmishọna na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị ndị ọzọ nke steeti na-enyere aka
E guzobere Ọfịs nke Gọvanọ mgbe a tọrọ ntọala nke steeti na 1967
Ọ bụ Babajide Sanwo-Olu na-eduzi ya ugbu a, onye bụ Gọvanọ nke iri na ise nke steeti ahụ
Ọfịs a na-ahụ maka nhazi nke ọrụ gọọmentị niile maka ọdịmma nke ndị steeti
Ihe nlereanya steeti ahụ bụ 'Making Lagos Africa's Model Mega City And Global Economic and Financial Hub'
Iwu nkwalite steeti ahụ bụ 'Poverty Eradication and Sustainable Economic Growth through Infrastructure Renewal and Development
Ikpe bụ otu n'ime aka atọ nke gọọmentị steeti Lagos
Ọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyere nkọwa nke iwu gọọmentị Lagos Steeti
Onye isi ikpe nke Lagos Steeti na-eduzi ikpe ahụ, nke Gọvanọ Lagos Steeti họpụtara site na nkwado nke Ụlọ omeiwu nke Lagos Steet
Ndị otu ikpe a ma ama gụnyere Attorney-General na Lagos State Commissioner for Justice ya na Chief Registrar
Onye ji ọkwa Chief Registrar na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye na-ahụ maka ego na ndị ọka ikpe
Ụlọikpe nke steeti Lagos bụ ụlọ ikpe mbụ e guzobere na Naịjirịa, nke a maara mgbe ahụ dị ka Ụlọikpe nke Colony Province
E guzobere Ụlọikpe Magistrate na mbụ
Ntọala nke Ụlọikpe Magistrate mụrụ Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, Ụlọikpe Kasi Elu nke Lagos Steeti n'oge ahụ
Mgbe e guzobere Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa, Ụlọikpe Kasụ Elu nke Lagos gbanwere wee bụrụ Ụlọikpe Kasi Elu nke mpaghara Lagos
A họpụtakwara John Taylor dị ka Onye isi ikpe

Na Mee 27, 1967, n'otu afọ ahụ e guzobere Lagos State, e jikọtara Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na Ụlọikpe Magistrate nke Federal Territory iji guzobe Ụlọikpe Lagos State n'okpuru nduzi nke John Taylor, onye isi ikpe nke Lagos State
Ọchịchị Taylor gwụrụ na Nọvemba 7, 1973
Onye ọka ikpe Joseph Adefarasin nọchiri ya, nke a họpụtara na Nọvemba 1, 1974
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ahụ afọ itoolu ruo n'Eprel 24, 1985, mgbe ọrụ ya kwụsịrị
Onye Justice Candide Adeyemi Johnson nọchiri ya, onye a họpụtara na Eprel 25, 1985, otu ụbọchị mgbe Justice Joseph hapụrụ ọfịs ahụ
Ọ nọrọ afọ anọ n'ọchịchị ma Justice Ligali Ayorinde nọchiri ya na Julaị 10, 1989
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo afọ isii ya bụ n'etiti Julaị 1989 ruo Eprel 1995
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2014, a họpụtara Oluwafunmilayo Olajumoke Atilade dị ka Chief Judge, nke Ade Ipaye, Attorney General nke Lagos State ṅụrụ iyi
Ụlọ ikpe steeti Lagos nwere ọkwa atọ nke ụlọ ikpe
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu bụ ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị nke na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru nnyocha nke aka, nke pụtara na Ụlọikpe nwere ike ịhọrọ ikpe ndị ọ ga-ege ntị site n'inye akwụkwọ nke certiorari
Ọ bụ ụlọ ikpe ikpeazụ
Ọkwa abụọ ndị ọzọ bụ ndị majie na ụlọ ikpe omenala
Na mgbakwunye nke ụlọ ikpe, ndị ikpe nwekwara Kọmitii Ọrụ Ikpe, yana ọrụ iwu nke gụnyere nkwalite na nhọpụta nke ndị ọrụ ikpe yana ọrụ ịdọ aka ná ntị ndị ọzọ
Onye isi ikpe na-eje ozi dị ka onyeisi oche nke kọmitii ahụ
Ndị omeiwu ma ọ bụ ụlọ nzukọ steeti bụ otu n'ime akụkụ atọ nke Gọọmentị Steeti na-emetụta ime iwu
Ndị omeiwu ahụ nwere ndị otu a họpụtara ahọpụta site na mpaghara ọ bụla nke steeti ahụ
Onye isi nke ndị omeiwu bụ Onye isi oche, onye ụlọ ahụ na-ahọpụta
Ụlọ omebe iwu dị n'ime ụlọ gọọmentị Lagos State na Alausa na mpaghara azụmahịa Ikeja, Lagos State
Ọrụ iwu nke ndị omeiwu bụ ime iwu site na ịnye iwu, nke ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ụlọ ahụ ga-akwado
Mgbe nkwado nke ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ, a na-enye Gọvanọ iwu ahụ, onye ga-abịanye aka na n'akwụkwọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ iwu
Nzukọ ahụ na-enyocha ma kwado mmefu ego kwa afọ nke gọọmentị steeti na ngosi nke gọvanọ
Nzukọ ahụ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị mkpa na nhọpụta nke ndị kọmishọna steeti, ndị isi ikpe na ndị isi ndị ọzọ site n'aka Gọvanọ
Ngalaba na-ahụ maka ọrụ bụ otu n'ime aka atọ nke gọọmentị steeti, na-ahụ anya na ime iwu na mmejuputa iwu
Onye isi na-ahụ maka nchịkwa kwa ụbọchị nke steeti
Ndị otu ndị isi gụnyere Gọvanọ, osote gọvanọ, na ndị kọmishọna
E nwekwara ndị isi ndị ọzọ nke steeti, dị ka onye isi ọrụ
Ndị isi na mba ofesi na-ahụ maka ozi
Onye isi na-eduzi ma na-ahazi ozi ọ bụla site n'aka onye kọmishọna, nke odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na-enyere aka
Simon Harak SJ (1948-2019) bụ onye America na-ahụ maka udo na prọfesọ nke nkà mmụta okpukpe na onye nduzi nke Center for Peacemaking na Mahadum Marquette
Site n'afọ 2003 ruo n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2007, Harak jere ozi dị ka onye nhazi Anti-Militarism nke National Office of the War Resisters League
O nyekwara aka chọta Voices in the Wilderness, nke a họpụtara maka Nobel Peace Prize n'afọ 2001, 2002, ruo afọ 2003
[citation needed] A kpọrọ Harak 'Metro New York Peacemaker of the Year' na 'National Peacemaker nke Year' site na Pax Christi Metro New York na Paxristi Long Island na 2005

Amụrụ ya na Derby, Connecticut, Harak nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum Fairfield, nzere Master of Divinity na Jesuit School of Theology na Berkeley, na Master of Arts na Doctor of Philosophy na ụkpụrụ omume na Mahadim Notre Dame
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 3, 2019, n'ihi ụdị ọrịa uche a na-adịghị ahụkebe
Winston James bụ onye America na-ede Abụ, onye edemede, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, na onye na-eme ihe ike
Nchịkọta uri ya gụnyere ide egwu Poems Along a Broken Road na The Damaged Good
A mụrụ James Glenroy Winston James na Kingston, Jamaica Mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara United States n'afọ 1971
Ọ nọrọ afọ uto ya na Paterson, New Jersey, ma gaa Paterson Catholic Regional High School
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike, James nọrọ akụkụ nke 1980s n'afọ mgbe nke 1990s na-arụ ọrụ na New York State Black Gay Network, dị ka Craig G
Harris ibe, aha ya bụ maka onye na-ede uri na onye na-eme ihe ike nke nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu AIDS na 1993
Na Mba Ndị Ọzọ Black Gay Expression, otu ndị edemede nke onye edemede Daniel Garrett hiwere n'afọ 1986, James jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche na onye isi oche
N'afọ 2002, James bụ onye nhazi nke Fire & Ink Ememme ndị ode akwụkwọ maka ndị ode akwụkwọ ojii GLBT
Nchịkọta uri James gụnyere Lyric Poems Along a Broken Road (Grapevine Press, 1999) na The Damaged Good (Vintage Entity Press, 2007)
Nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirikpi nke James, Shaming the Devil bụ nke akara ya, Top Pen Press bipụtara n'afọ 2009
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya na Lisa C

Moore nke Spirited Affirming the Soul and Black Gay / Lesbian Identity (RedBone Press, 2006), ma dezie, ya na mba ndị ọzọ, Voices Rising Celebrating 20 Years of Black Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Writing (RedBone Press, 2007)
Kenyatta Dorey Graves na-ede na James na-etinye SGL n'ụzọ siri ike n'okwu nnwere onwe ojii n'ozuzu ya

E bipụtala edemede na edemede James n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ gụnyere Brooklyn Review, Callaloo A Journal of African American and African Arts and Letters, Fighting Words Personal Essays by Black Gay Men, For Colored Boys Who Have Considered Suicide When The Rainbow Is Still Not Enough, His 2 Brilliant New Fiction by Gay Writers, Think Again, na Waves An Anthology of New Gay Fiction

A maara ya dịka onye na-ede uri, enwere ike ịchọta uri James n'ọtụtụ anthologies gụnyere Black Ivy A Literary and Visual Arts Magazine, Bloom Queer Fiction, Art, Poetry and More, Freedom in this Village Twenty-Five Years of Black Gay Men's Writing, Milking Black Bull 11 Gay Black Poets, na Role Call A Generational Anthology of Social & Political Black Art & Literature na abụọ Lambda Literary Award-winning anthologies Sojourner Black Gay Voices in the Age of AIDS na The Road Before Us 100 Gay Black Poets
[citation needed] James dere mmeghe nke akwụkwọ foto nke Thomas Roma nke afọ 2015 In the Vale of Cashmere

Onye malitere 'G' bụ onye nweere onwe ya bụ Spurius Carvilius Ruga, onye gbakwunyere leta G na nkuzi mkpụrụedemede Rome n'ime narị afọ nke atọ BC ọ bụ onye Rome mbụ mepere ụlọ akwụkwọ na-akwụ ụgwọ, gburugburu 230 TOA
N'oge a, 'K' adapụwo na ihu ọma, na 'C' nke na-anọchibu anya ma /ɡ/ na /k/ tupu ụdaume emeghe, bịara igosipụta /k/ na gburugburu niile

Ọ bụ ugbu a ka Excellence In Broadcasting (EIB) Networks, nke nwere onye mgbasa ozi Bola Ray, dị ka onye isi ya
Ọ bụ Charter House Productions nwebu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

GME (Globales Modell) bụ ihe na-arụ ọrụ n'ụwa niile nke na-arụ n'ọrụ site na Deutscher Wetterdienst, ọrụ ihu igwe nke mba Germany
A na-agba ihe nlereanya ahụ site na iji ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu grid icosahedral-hexagonal
Usoro GME grid point zere ọghọm nke usoro spectral yana nsogbụ pole na latitude longituditude grids ma na-enye usoro data dabara nke ọma màkà ịrụ ọrụ dị elu na kọmputa ndị na-ekesa ebe nchekwa
GME nọchiri ụdị abụọ gara-aga (GM na EM), ma bụrụ nké izizi n'ubochi mbu n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1999
A ga-eji usoro GME na grid zuru ụwa ọnụ mee ihe site nà Flow-following, finite-volume Icosahedral Model (FIM), ihe nlereanya nnwale na-eme ugbua na United States
E ji ụdị ICON (Icosahedral Nonhydrostatic) dochie GME n'ubochi irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2015
ICON na-eji otu usoro icosahedral, mànà o nwèrè mkpebi dị elu na kilomita iri na atọ
Ébé nrụọrụ weebụ dị íchè íchè na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-ekesa data nlereanya ICON, gụnyere Tropical Tidbits na Windy
The GNU Free Documentation License (GNU FDL or simply GFDL) is a copyleft license for free documentation, designed by the Free Software Foundation (FSF) for the GNU project
It is the counterpart to the GNU GPL that gives readers the same rights to copy, redistribute and modify a work and requires all copies and derivatives to be available under the same license
Copies may also be sold commercially, but if produced in larger quantities (greater than 100) then the original document or source code must be made available to the work's recipient
The license was designed for manuals, textbooks, other reference and instructional materials, and documentation which often accompanies GPL software
However, it can be used for any text-based work, regardless of subject matter
The license explicitly separates any kind of 'Document' from 'Secondary Sections', which may not be integrated with the Document, but exist as front-matter materials or appendices
Secondary sections can contain information regarding the author's or publisher's relationship to the subject matter, but not any subject matter itself

While the Document itself is wholly editable, and is essentially covered by a license equivalent to (but both-ways incompatible with) the GNU General Public License, some of the secondary sections have various restrictions designed primarily to deal with proper attribution to previous authors

Specifically, the authors of prior versions have to be acknowledged and certain 'invariant sections' specified by the original author and dealing with his or her relationship to the subject matter may not be changed
If the material is modified, its title has to be changed (unless the prior authors give permission to retain the title)
The license also has provisions for the handling of front-cover and back-cover texts of books, as well as for 'History', 'Acknowledgements', 'Dedications' and 'Endorsements' sections
The GFDL requires the ability to 'copy and distribute the Document in any medium, either commercially or noncommercially' and therefore is incompatible with material that excludes commercial re-use
Material that restricts commercial re-use is incompatible with the license and cannot be incorporated into the work

However, incorporating such restricted material may be fair use under United States copyright law and does not need to be licensed to fall within the GFDL if such fair use is covered by all potential subsequent uses
One example of such liberal and commercial fair use is parody
The Debian project and Nathanael Nerode have raised objection
Debian developers eventually voted to consider works licensed under the GFDL to comply with their Debian Free Software Guidelines provided the invariant section clauses are not used
These critics recommend the use of alternate licenses such as the share-alike Creative Commons licenses, the BSD Documentation License, or even the GNU GPL
They consider the GFDL a non-free license

The reasons for this are that the GFDL allows 'invariant' text which cannot be modified or removed, and that its prohibition against digital rights management (DRM) systems applies to valid usages, like for 'private copies made and not distributed'
The GNU FDL contains the statement
You may not use technical measures to obstruct or control the reading or further copying of the copies you make or distribute
A criticism of this language is that it is too broad, because it applies to private copies made but not distributed
This means that a licensee is not allowed to save document copies 'made' in a proprietary file format or using encryption
In 2003, Richard Stallman said about the above sentence on the debian-legal mailing list
This means that you cannot publish them under DRM systems to restrict the possessors of the copies
It isn't supposed to refer to use of encryption or file access control on your own copy
I will talk with our lawyer and see if that sentence needs to be clarified
A GNU FDL work can quickly be encumbered because a new, different, title must be given and a list of previous titles must be kept
Richard Stallman said about invariant sections on the debian-legal mailing list
The goal of invariant sections, ever since the 80s when we first made the GNU Manifesto an invariant section in the Emacs Manual, was to make sure they could not be removed

Specifically, to make sure that distributors of Emacs that also distribute non-free software could not remove the statements of our philosophy, which they might think of doing because those statements criticize their actions
The GNU FDL is incompatible in both directions with the GPL that is GNU FDL material cannot be put into GPL code and GPL code cannot be put into a GNU FDL manual
Because of this, code samples are often dual-licensed so that they may appear in documentation and can be incorporated into a free software program
At the Juun 22nd and 23rd international GPLv3 conference in Barcelona, Moglen hinted that a future version of the GPL could be made suitable for documentation
By expressing LGPL as just an additional permission on top of GPL we simplify our licensing landscape drastically

It's like for physics getting rid of a force, right? We just unified electro-weak, ok? The grand unified field theory still escapes us until the document licences too are just additional permissions on top of GPL
I don't know how we'll ever get there, that's gravity, it's really hard

The GNU FDL requires that licensees, when printing a document covered by the license, must also include 'this License, the copyright notices, and the license notice saying this License applies to the Document'

This means that if a licensee prints out a copy of an article whose text is covered under the GNU FDL, he or she must also include a copyright notice and a physical printout of the GNU FDL, which is a significantly large document in itself
The definition of a 'transparent' format is complicated, and may be difficult to apply

For example, drawings are required to be in a format that allows them to be revised straightforwardly with 'some widely available drawing editor' The definition of 'widely available' may be difficult to interpret, and may change over time, since, eg, the open-source Inkscape editor is rapidly maturing, but has not yet reached version 10
This section, which was rewritten somewhat between versions 11 and 12 of the license, uses the terms 'widely available' and 'proprietary' inconsistently and without defining them

According to a strict interpretation of the license, the references to 'generic text editors' could be interpreted as ruling out a format used by an open-source word-processor such as Abiword; according to a loose interpretation, however, Microsoft Worddoc format could qualify as transparent, since a subset ofdoc files can be edited perfectly using OpenOfficeorg, and the format therefore is not one 'that can be read and edited only by proprietary word processors'
The FDL was released in draft form for feedback in late 1999
After revisions, version 11 was issued in Maachị 2000, and version 12 in Novemba 2002
The current state of the license is version 12
The first discussion draft of the GNU Free Documentation License version 2 was released on 26 Septemba 2006, along with a draft of the new GNU Simpler Free Documentation License

The new draft of the GNU FDL includes a number of improvements, such as new terms crafted during the GPLv3 process to improve internationalization, clarifications to help people applying the license to audio and video, and relaxed requirements for using an excerpt from a work
The new proposed GNU Simpler Free Documentation License has no requirements to maintain Cover Texts and Invariant Sections
This will provide a simpler licensing option for authors who do not wish to use these features in the GNU FDL
GTBank Food and Drink bụ emume nri nke a na-eme kwa afọ na Lagos nke Guaranty Trust Bank na-akwado
E mere mbipụta mbụ ahụ ụbọchị abụọ na 2016 ebe ihe omume kwa afọ na-esote buzi nke a na-eme ụbọchị anọ
N'ihe omume ahụ, ndị na-azụ ahịa na ndị na-ere nri na ụlọ ọrụ ihe ọṅụṅụ si n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Naịjirịa na mba ndị ọzọ na-ejikọta
Ndị na-egosi nri na-egosi ma na-ere ngwaahịa nri dịgasị iche iche site na nri ndị dị ọhụrụ na nri kpọrọ nkụ, ihe oriri, achịcha, ihe oriri na-eri, mmanya na champagne
E wezụga ihe ngosi ahụ, akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke ihe omume ahụ gụnyere ahụmịhe nri dị ka nri na mmanya, isi nri na ndị isi nri mba ụwa na Naijiria a ma ama, na ntụrụndụ egwu
E meela ebe ahụ na Ligali Ayorinde, mpaghara ụlọ ọrụ mmiri nke Oniru-Lekki, Victoria Island kemgbe e bidoro ya

Dị ka ihe ngosi nri kachasị ukwuu n'Africa, ihe omume ahụ egosipụtala ndị ama ama na-esi nri na ndị hụrụ nri n'anya si Naijiria na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke ụwa nke gụnyere Alex Oke, Gbubemi Fregene, Tiyan Alile, Ozoz Sokoh, Marcus Samuelsson na Phil Howard na ndị ọzọ

Gaëlle Deborah Enganamouit (amụrụ na abalị iteolu, na onwa nke isii, na afọ 1992) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere klọb Spanish Málaga CF na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon
Enganamouit gbara bọọlụ na Serbian First League maka Spartak Subotica, onye ọ pụtara na UEFA Champions League
Mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Spartak Enganamouit, a kọrọ na ọ gbara goolu kachasị ọsọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwanyị, mgbe sekọnd abụọ gasịrị
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2013, Enganamouit kwupụtara na ọ gafere na bọọlụ Sweden, ya na ndị otu Damallsvenskan Eskilstuna United
Ndị mmeri League FC Rosengård bịanyere aka na Enganamouit na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na Nọvemba na afọ 2015, dịka onye nọchiri Anja Mittag
Enganamouit bụ onye kachasị gbaa goolu na Damallsvenskan na 2015 na goolu iri na asatọ ka Eskilstuna mechara nke abụọ mgbe ọ gbasịrị ihe ịma aka na-agaghị ekwe omume
N'ụbọchị mmeghe nke oge ahụ, Enganamouit nwere mmerụ ahụ n'ihu nke a tụrụ anya na ọ ga-ewepụ ya maka mkpọsa afọ 2016 dum
Na 11 Febụwarị na afọ 2017, Dalian Quanjian FC
bịanyere aka na Enganamouit
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu mba Cameroon ma gbaa bọọlụ na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics
Ọ pụtara n'egwuregwu ọ bụla dị ka onye nnọchi anya; Cameroon meriri egwuregwu ọ bụla
Na afọ 2015 Women's World Cup na Canada, o nyere hat-trick na mmeri Cameroon meriri Ecuador
N'oge egwuregwu iko mba ụwa nke afọ 2015 megide ndị na-agbachitere ndị mmeri Japan, ọgba aghara ya na ụdị dị ike mere ka ndị na-akwado Canada mara ya dị ka 'Freight Train'
Na abalị iteolu na onwa nke isii, na afọ 2020, Gaëlle Enganamouit kwupụtara njedebe nke ọrụ ya
Ọbá Gabaro (aha Bini mbụ bụ Guobaro) onye chịrị site n'afọ 1669 na afọ 1704 bụ Oba nke atọ nke Lagos, nwa na onye nketa nke Oba Ado, na nwa nwa nke Ashipa
Ụmụnne ya bụ Akinsemoyin, na Erelu Kuti
Site na mmekorita ya na ụmụ Olofin, Gabaro kwagara oche gọọmentị site na Iddo Island gaa Lagos Island ma guzobe Iga Idunganran dị ka ebe obibi Oba
Dị ka nna ya, Ado, ọ na-anakọta ụtụ kwa afọ site n'aka ndị ọ na-achị nke e zigara Oba nke Benin
Oba Gabaro guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ndị isi ma nye ụmụ Olofin utu aha ndị isi, na-eme ka ha bụrụ ndị isi na-acha ọcha ka ha na-eji okpu silk eme ka ndị isi Benin dị iche
Gabeba Baderoon (amụrụ 21 February nke afọ 1969) bụ onye South Africa na-ede uri na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ n'afọ 2005 nnata nke Daimler Chrysler Award maka uri South Africa
Ọ na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town, South Africa, na Pennsylvania, US, ma na-eje ozi dị ka osote prọfesọ nke Women's Studies na African and African American Studies na Penn State
Gabeba Baderoon mụrụ na Port Elizabeth, South Africa na 21 February 1969
Na 1989 ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Mahadum Cape Town na Bekee na Psychology
N'afọ 1991, e nyere ya nzere klaasị mbụ n'asụsụ bekee site na mmemme nsọpụrụ Mahadum Cape Town BA

O nwetara Master of Arts na English na Distinction na Mahadum Cape Town na Postmodernist Television (Media Studies) na 2004 gụchara akwụkwọ doctoral na Media Studies na Mahadum Cape Town, n'otu afọ ahụ na-etinye oge na Mahadum Sheffield, UK, dị ka ọkà mmụta nleta
Ọ dechara akwụkwọ edemede ya nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Oblique Figures Representations of Islam in South African Media and Culture' Ọ na-eke ndụ ya n'etiti Port Elizabeth na Pennsylvania
Gabi Ngcobo bụ onye nlekọta South Africa, onye na-ese ihe nà onye nkuzi
Ugbú a ọ bụ Curatorial Director nà Javett Art Centre na Mahadum Pretoria (Javett-UP)
A mụrụ Gabi Ngcobo na Umlazi, mpaghara nkè Durban nké dị na mpaghara KwaZulu-Natal nkè taa
Ngcobo gụrụ akụkọ nka na Mahadum Durban-Westville
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị BA ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Iziko South African National Gallery na Cape Africa Platform na Cape Town, ebe ya na Jonathan Garnham jikọrọ aka hazie Cape 07 Biennale n'afọ 2007
N'afọ 2010, ọ gụsịrị Master na Curatorial Studies na Center for Curatorial studies na Bard College na New York
Kemgbe mmalite afọ 2000, Gabi Ngcobo etinyela áká na mmekorita, nka na ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ
Ya na Dineo Seshee Bopape na Sinethemba Twalo bụ ónyé guzobere NGO - Nothing Gets Organised
NGO na-elekwasị ányà na usoro na nhazi onwé ónyé nke na-ewere ọnọdụ na mpụga usoro na ọnọdụ akọwapụtara
N'afọ 2010, ya na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe, ndị nlekọta, na ndị edemede, guzobere Center for Historical Reenactments (CHR)
CHR na-azaghachi ma na-ajụ otú ihe nketa akụkọ ihe méré eme si emetụta ma na-emetụta n'ime nka nke oge a
CHR na Kemang Wa-Lehulere na Donna Kukama, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, duziri, ma bụrụ akụkụ nke Biennale de Lyon nọmba nké irí nà otu
Ngcobo bụ ónyé na-ahụ màkà 32nd São Paulo Biennial na 2016, nke e gosipụtara na Ciccillo Matarazzo Pavilion na São Paulo
N'afọ 2018 ya na Nomaduma Rosa Masilela, Serubiri Moses, Thiago de Paula Souza na Yvette Mutumba haziri 10th Berlin Biennale for Contemporary Art na Berlin
Ya na Dr
Yvette Mutumba jikọtara ihe ngosi A Labour of Love na 2015 dị ka akụkụ nkè ebe obibi ya na Weltkulturen Museum na Frankfurt am Main
N'etiti afọ 2011 na 2020 ọ bụ ónyé nkuzi na Wits University School of Arts, na Johannesburg
Kemgbe afọ 2021 ọ bụ ónyé nduzi Curatorial na Javett Art Centre na Mahadum Pretoria (Javett-UP)
Gabisile Hlumbane bụ nwa nwanyí South Africa na-agba bọọlụ ma na-agba egwuregwu bọọlụ dị ka onye ọnọ n'etiti
Ọ na-agbara Kovsies Ladies bọọlụ
Ọ nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị South Africa na 2012 London Olympics
A mụrụ Hlumbane na KwaThema, Gauteng
Ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu nyere KwaThema Ladies
Nna ya zụtara akpụkpọ ụkwụ bọọlụ ma na-ele ya ka ọ na-eme ọmụmụ egwuregwu bọọlụ mgbe niile ebe nne ya enweghị mmasị Mgbe ọ bụla ọ n'ahụ na ọ na-eme ọmụmụ egwuregwu bọọlụ
Ọ sonyeere Kovsies Ladies n'afọ 2005 mgbe ahọtachara ya di ka Nwa Gauteng Schools Sports Girl of the Year n'afọ 2004 maka inye goolu asatọ na asọmpi
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị, Nomsa Mahlangu weere ya
Na Mahadum nke Free State ọ gụrụ maka njikwa ego obodo, ọ bụkwa onye isi na onye otu Eudy Simelane nwụrụ anwụ bụ onye gụrụ ya aha otutu China maka obere anya ya
N'afọ 2011, a họtara ya ma kpọọ ya University of Free State Sportswoman of the Year, onye isi ojii mbụ rụzuru ọrụ ahụ ma họpụta ya maka Free State Sportswoman of the Year
Àtụ South Africa squad 2010 African Women's ChampionshipÀtụ South Africa women's football squad 2012 Summer Olympics

Gabon Telecom SA bụ ụlọ ọrụ telecom kacha na Gabon
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-elekọta koodu obodo nke elu-larịị ngalaba,ga
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ihe dị ka akara ala 35,000, na enyemaka ekwentị ya, Libertis, nwere ndị ahịa 200,000
N'afọ 2007, Maroc Telecom nwetara 51% nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'aka gọọmentị Gabon
Na June 2018, Gabon Telecom malitere ihe ngwọta APS iji chebe adreesị IP 400,000
