Gabriel Ellison (1930 ruo 18 Julaị 2017) bụ Omenkà Zambia, nke a maara nke ọma maka inye aka n'ịmepụta ọkọlọtọ mba Zambia, na maka imepụta ọtụtụ stampụ Zambia site na 1960s ruo 1980s mgbe ọ bụ onye isi nke ngalaba Graphic Arts na Ministry of Information
A mụrụ Gabriel Ellison na Lusaka, Zambia (nke bụbu Northern Rhodesia)
Ọrụ mmepụta ya gụnyere mmanụ, acrylics, mmiri, tempera na ụdị atọ
Mgbe ọ na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọ na-eji ọla nchara resin na terracotta
Ellison bụ onye otu Royal Society of Arts, British Display Society na Chartered Society of designers
Gọọmentị Britain na Zambia kwanyeere ya ugwu maka ọrụ ya na nka
Gọọmentị Britain nyere ya MBE na Gọọmentụ Zambia nyere ya Grand Officer of Distinguished Service
Ellison nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ Iri asatọ na asaa, na 18 Julaị 2017
Gabriel Temudzani (amụrụ na 10 Febụwarị 1980) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-egosi TV na South Africa
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dị ka Chief Vhafuwi Azwindini kemgbe afọ 2000, na ihe nkiri TV Muvhango nke a na-egosikari na SABC 2, nke ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kemgbe afọ 2000
A mụrụ Temudzani na 1980 ma zụlite ya na Tshivhilidulu na mpaghara Nzhelele, na Venda
N'afọ 1995, ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya ma mee ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2000
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri A Diamond na Destiny n'afo 2003, banyere nchọpụta ọlaedo na diamond na Kimberly
N'afọ 2009, ọ nwetara ọrụ dị mkpa na nkiri Night Drive
N'ụlọ nkiri, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi The Dog na The Night nke Horror, nke o ritere ihe nrite Vita
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Muvhango ma na-egosi ihe ngosi magazin La Famila, nke na-agbasa na SABC2Ọ bụ onye na-egosi La Familia site na Shandukani Nesengani, malite na Oge ato na 2010
Gabriel lụrụ Refilwe Temudzani n'afọ 2013
Gabriel Cornelis de Jongh (ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Eprel 1913 Amsterdam rụọ úbọchị irí nà otu n'ọnwa Machị 2004), bụ naanị nwa nwoke nke ónyé na-ese ihe, Tinus de Jongh
Mgbè ya na nna ya nwesịrị mmekọrịta chiri anya, Gabriel kpebiri ịchụso otu ọrụ ahụ, nna ya bụ ma ónyé nkuzi ma onye nkatọ
Na-arụ ọrụ na mmanụ, mmiri, ink na pensụl, ọ na-ese ihe osise ala, ndụ, mmiri, anụ ọhịa, ma gosipụta isiokwu okpukpe
Tinus de Jongh gàrà South Africa nà 1921, nwunye ya sooro ezinụlọ ahụ ọnwa isii ka e mesịrị, wee biri n'ụlọ dị na Fish Hoek
Gabriel so nna ya na-agagharị na Cape Peninsula, na-achọ ihe osise
O mechara gụọ akwụkwọ na Michaelis School of Fine Art na Slade School of Art na London
O mèrè ọmụmụ ihe na ịkpụ osisi n'okpuru H V Meyerowitz na Cape Town, na ọmụmụ ihe na foto-lithography na Cape Times
Tinus zụrụ ụgbọ ala n'afọ 1923, na-aga ebe ọzọ, ma na-esonyere ezinụlọ ya mgbé niile
N'afọ 1924, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Rondebosch, Gabriel gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Rondebosh na Wynberg Boy, ma banye n'akwụkwọ n'afọ 1930
Tupu ọ malite ọzụzụ ya na The Cape Times, nna ya kụziiri Gabriel otu afọ na usoro mmiri
Gabriel jiri oge ezumike ya niile na-emepụta obere mmiri nke Malay Quarter, Cape Town Docks na Table Mountain
N'ime ngwụsị izu ọ na-agbaso egwuregwu dị iche iche ma bụrụ ónyé na-egwu golf
Tennis ya dị elu nke ukwuu iji nọchite anya The Cape Times na asọmpi
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé otu S A Turf Club ma nwee ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ, 'Glorious'
Ka ọ na-emecha mmụta ya, ọ bịdọrọ inwe mmasị na mmepụta agba nke nka dị mma, na-abịa n'okpuru nduzi nke Charles Hardy
N'oge a, ọ malitere ịnwale ihe osise
Tinus gosipụtara na Hermanus n'afọ 1937 ma tụọ aro ka Gabriel gosipụta ụfọdụ ọrụ ya
E rere ihe osise mmiri iri abụọ nke Gabriel n'ụbọchị mbụ
Mgbè egosiri ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya na Port Elizabeth ma nabata ya nke ọma, akụkọ ahụ mèrè ka nna ya nwee obi ụtọ
Mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-egosipụta ọrụ ya mgbè niile na ụlọ ọrụ nka dị iche iche na Eastern Cape, Orange Free State na Johannesburg
Gabriel lụrụ Mercia Maria Kotze n'afọ 1938, na-akwaga n'ụlọ dị n'akụkụ nne na nna ya
Site na esemokwu nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ Gabriel wepụtara onwe ya màkà ọrụ, mànà The Cape Times chọrọ ya n'ihi nkà ya na foto-lithography
Ya na nna ya sonyeere Civil Defence Corps rụọ 1942 mgbè gọọmentị Dutch kpọrọ ụmụ amaala Dutch niile
A chọpụtara na ahụike Tinus na-ádà àdà dị ka ọrịa kansa akpa ume ma nye Gabriel ezumike ọmịiko ka ya na nna ya nọrọ, onye nwụrụ n'ubochí irí na asaa n'ọnwa Julaị 1942
E nyere Gabriel iwu ka ọ sonye na Eighth Contingent nke Koninklijke Nederlandsche Brigade, wee banye na 'Sabajak' rutere na Britain n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Disemba 1942
N'etiti nkwadebe màkà agha, Gabriel jiri oge ezumike ya na-ese ihe n'ime ime obodo England, wee gaa Slade School of Art, nke a kpọfere Windermere n'oge agha ahụ, dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ nwa oge
N'abalị ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1944, ọ gawara Normandy
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe agha, o gosipụtara ihe nkiri na France, England, Belgium na Netherlands

N'ịbụ onye bọmbụ ndị na-egbochi ndị ọrụ merụrụ ahụ, a kwupụtara na ọ gaghị eru ọgwụ, ọ laghachiri South Africa n'ubochí irí na abụọ n'ọnwa June 1945, wee laghachi ọrụ na The Cape Times, nke ahụmahụ agha ya na-echegbu onwe ya
N'afọ 1946, ọ nwetara ụgbọala ndị agha gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ ụgbọala na-adọkpụ, wee soro nwunye ya na nwa ya nwoke Tinus, gaa njem nlegharị anya nke Eastern Cape, Basutoland na Natal
Mgbè ọ nọ na Cathedral Peak Hotel na Drakensberg, ónyé nwe ya, Albert van der Riet, mèrè ka o gosipụta ọrụ ya n'ebe ahụ
Nké a gosipụtara nnukwu ihe na mgbanwe ya site na mmiri na mmanụ
Gabriel mèrè njem ogologo ógè na Britain, Europe, South America na East Africa, mànà ọ nọgidere na-etinye onwé ya n'ọmarịcha ọdịdị nke Western Cape, nke ụmụ ya kpọrọ 'boompie-bergie-huisie-thing'
Ọ zụrụ ụgbọ mmiri, Pocketa, nke ọ nyochara mmiri Cape
A na-egosipụta ihe osise nke Cape Point na ụlọ klọb nke Marlin na Tuna Club nke ọ bụ ónyé otu ya
E nyere ya ọrụ ise Villa Dubochet na Clarens, ebe Ónyé ísì ala Paul Kruger nwụrụ n'ebe a chụgara ya, na Boekenhoutfontein, ebe obibi akụkọ ihe mere eme ya dị nso na Rustenburg
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere ọdịda Jan van Riebeek na Table Bay, mgbawa ugwu nkè 1963 na Tristan da Cunha, na ihe osise 18 x 24 mita nke enyí Ndlulamithi
A ga-ahụ ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na eze na nke onwé n'ụwa niile
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ mechiri afọ iri ka e mesịrị mgbè Lanzerac Hotel gbanwere aka

María Gabriela Pazmiño Pino, nke a na-akpọ Gaby (amụrụ ya na 30 Julaị 1975), bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn nke obodo Ecuador, onye na-akwado ndị na-eme obi ụtọ, onye na'agba egwu, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ lụrụ Abdalá Bucaram Jr, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ anọ
A mụrụ Gabriela Pazmiño na 30 Julaị 1975 na Guayaquil, Ecuador
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ banyere na telivishọn n'afọ 1990 dị ka onye na-eme obi ụtọ na ihe ngosi mmemme ntụrụndụ Nubeluz Ọ bụ onye asọmpi na Miss Ecuador 1994 ma bụrụ onye nke anọ
N'otu afọ ahụ, Pazmiño pụtara na Aquí nos vemos, Miércoles Millonarios, Domingos Millonarios na Guayaquil Caliente
Pazmiño nwetara aha dị ukwuu dị ka onye na-elekọta A todo dar [es]
Ọ bụkwa onye na-egosi Fama o Drama na La guerra de los sexos
N'afọ 2014, ọ sonyeere ihe ngosi nke Soy el mejor, nke gbara oge anọ, na-agwụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015 site na ịchụpụ ya na TC Televisión
Mgbe a chụpụrụ ya, Pazmiño malitere usoro weebụ na YouTube na ezinụlọ ya
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara Pazmiño na di ya ka ha bụrụ ndị National Congress of Ecuador maka Guayas Province, na-anọchite anya ndị Roldosist Party nke Ecuador
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ minista mgbakọ maka mpaghara ahụ
N'ime ndị minista ise a họpụtara, Pazmiño nwere ọdịiche nke inwe ọtụtụ ndị na-anọghị n'ụlọ ọrụ ya
Gabriela Trzebinski (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye Africa na-ese ihe nke ihe nketa Europe nke bi na Houston, Texas, United States
A mụrụ Gabriela Trzebinski na Nairobi, Kenya, otu n'ime ụmụ atọ, aha ụmụnne ya bụ Bruce na Tonio
Nne ya bụ onye Britain, odee Errol Trzebinski, a mụrụ Eryl Jones, ma gbanwee aha mbụ ya, mgbe ọ lụrụ onye Poland na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, Sbish (Zbigniew, Waclaw) Trzebński (nwụrụ na 15 Maachị 2005)
Site n'oge ọ bụ nwata, nsogbu gbasara ọdịbendị, agbụrụ na okike na-emetụta Trzebinski
Gabriela gara Byam Shaw School of Art, London, (1988) na Southampton College of Art, Hampshire, England, (1987)
N'afọ 1995, Gabriela Trzebinski rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-emepụta ihe
N'afọ 2000, Trzebinski nwere ihe ngosi onwe ya na Rebecca Hossack Gallery
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ụlọ ngosi Rebecca Hossack nọchitere anya Trzebinski na art London na Duke of York's Headquarters
Ihe ngosi onwe onye, Gabriela Trzebinski New Paintings and the 'Matatu' Project, mere na 2006 na George Adams Gallery, New York
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2006, ọ nọ na ihe ngosi otu, Run for Your Lives! na DiverseWorks, Houston, na ihe osise ndị e gosipụtara n'ụzọ dị mfe, dịka ihe atụ nke ọdachi na agha na telivishọn
Otu ihe osise a na-akpọ Clijsters a chụpụrụ na US Open na-egosi ederede na ala (n'ụzọ nke ịpịgharị akụkọ) n'elu onyinyo nke mgbidi ọbara si na akụkọ CNN banyere bọmbụ Beirut
A na-etinye isi akụkọ na akara ngosi n'otu aka ahụ na isiokwu ndị ọzọ, n'etiti ha bụ tankị UN na Rwanda na mpaghara ọdachi mgbe ajọ ifufe Katrina gasịrị
Ihe osise ahụ e mere na 2006 gosiri ụmụaka nwoke furu efu nke Sudan ka ha na-ele anya na windo ụgbọelu ka ndị na-eto eto gbara ọsọ ndụ si Sudan rutere na United States na 2000

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007, Trzebinski bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà ise nke onye nlekọta na onye omenkà Michael Guidry kpọrọ ka ha gosipụta ihe ha ji kpọrọ ihe na ihe ngosi ahụ, Little Known Facts, na Lawndale Art Center site n'ịmezigharị mpaghara nke ụlọ ọrụ ha

O jupụtara na oghere mgbidi ahụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha metụtara Africa, ma gosipụta ụfọdụ ihe osise, na-akpata 'ihe na-adọrọ mmasị na nke na-emetụ n'ahụ' na ọzụzụ Africa nke Trzebinski na ndụ na United States dị ka onye ọcha Africa
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008, o sonyere na Contemporary Arts Museum Houston na 'Slide Jam', ihe ngosi kwa ọnwa site na mmemme agụmakwụkwọ nke Museum
Ihe ngosi mpaghara Houston nke ndị na-ese ihe Houston kachasị mma, nke a na-eme kwa afọ anọ ọ bụla na Blaffer Gallery na campus na Mahadum Houston
Ihe oyiyi obi ọjọọ ya, nke sitere na ahụmịhe ya siri ike nke ọdịbendị dị iche iche n'Africa, gosipụtara mmegbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, mmekọahụ, igbu ọchụ na ọnwụ

My Daddy Is a Tranny, na-atụle omenala Swahili ochie na-ezo aka na mmemme kwa afọ na usoro ejiji na-edoghị anya nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'okporo ámá n'ụsọ oké osimiri Kenya nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka, ya bụ n'àgwàetiti Lamu
N'afọ 2008, Trzebinski bụ otu n'ime ndị a na-asọpụrụ na ncheta afọ nke iri nke Aurora Picture Show, Houston, maka nkwado na mmetụta ha

Na Disturbance of Distance, ihe ngosi nke Eleanor Williams haziri na oghere nka Box 13, Houston, na Febụwarị 2009, Trzebinski gosipụtara The Burning of Hides, ihe nkiri Super-8 ọhụrụ nke a na-emegharị nke ọkụ ọkụ nke akpụkpọ anụ na ihe nrite egwuregwu
Ihe omume a na-ese okwu mere na Nairobi National Park, na mpụga etiti obodo Nairobi, Kenya
N'afọ 1989 dị ka mkpesa gọọmentị megide ịchụ nta zuru oke nke anụ ọhịa, ndị nchịkwa haziri mbibi nke ihe nrite egwuregwu niile e debere na nchekwa
Tupu nke a, gọọmentị Kenya gbara ọdụ́ nke ihe karịrị mpi atụ pụkụ abụọ ọkụ n'otu ebe ahụ na maka otu ihe ahụ
Gabrielle Civil bụ ónyé America na-eme ihe nkírí, onye na-ede uri, na ónyé nkuzi
Civil sitere na Detroit, Michigan
Site na 1991 ruo 1995 ọ gàrà Mahadum nke Michigan, ébé ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ dị elu na ma édémédé okike na Comparative Literature
Mgbe e mesịrị, Civil gara Mahadum New York maka nzere masta ya na nzèrè doctorate ya
Ọ natara MA
ya na akwụkwọ ntụnyere n'afọ 2000
Akwụkwọ edemede ya, From Body to Nation Reading Black Women's Poetry in the United States, Haiti & Canada, lekwasịrị anya na uri nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na United States, Canada na Haiti
Ihe ndị Civil lekwasịrị anya gụnyere Black Feminist Theory; African-American Literature; Experimental World Poetry
Civil malitere ọrụ nkụzi ya na-akụzi ógè okpomọkụ na Bard College, Annandale-on-Hudson, na New York
Ọ kụziri 'atụmatụ maka ihe ọmụma a na-etinye n'ime' site na Language & Thinking 2002, 2004, 2005, 2006
Mgbè ógè okpomọkụ ya na Bard College gasịrị, Civil kụziri 'Women and Voice Black Women and Performance' na Macalester College site na 2005 ruo n'oge oyi nke afọ 2006
Ọ laghachiri na Bard College, wee kụzie màkà Bard College Prison Initiative, 'Language & Thinking, Eastern Maximum Security Correctional Facility,' n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2011
Ọ kụziri na Mahadum St
Catherine na St
Paul, Minnesota, site na 2000 ruo 2013 dị ka prọfesọ na-arụ ọrụ na Bekee, ọmụmụ ụmụ nwanyị, na Critical Studies of Race and Ethnicity
Site na 2013 ruo 2016, ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nke arụmọrụ na Antioch College na Yellow Springs, Ohio
Ọ na-akụzi ugbu a dị ka ónyé ọbịa na Jack Kerouac School of Disembodied Poetics na Mahadum Naropa na Boulder, Colorado
Civil na-akọwa onwé ya dị ka ónyé ojii, onye na-ese ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị nke ebumnuche ya bụ 'ịmeghe oghere'
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na mmekorita ma gosipụta ihe karịrị 40 performances na North America na mba ofesi

Gabrielle Aboudi Onguéné (onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri abụọ na ise nke onwa Febụwarị afọ 1989) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara otu CSKA Moscow bọọlụ ugbu a na Russian Championship na otu mba Cameroon
Ọ na agba boolụ nye Rossiyanka n'oge gara aga
A mụrụ ya na Douala, Aboudi Onguéné ọ malitere iso ụmụ nwoke nọ n'ógbè ya na-agba bọọlụ mgbe ọ bụ nwata
A hụrụ ya ma tibanye ya ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ nye klọb ụmụ nwanyị, bu Ngondi Nkam Yabassi
Mgbe ọ na-agba boolụ na asọmpi maka klọb ahụ, Canon Yaoundé hụrụ ya wee malite isonye otu ahụ agba egwuregwu nye otu ahụ n'afọ 2005
Aboudi Onguéné gbara bọọlụ nye Louves Minproff na Cameroonian league nke ogo kachasị elu ma nyere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri asọmpi mba na afo 2009, 2010, na 2011
Aboudi Onguéné bịanyere aka na Rossiyanka na asọmpi kachasị elu nke Russia maka oge afọ 2015
Goolu isii ọ gbara n'egwuregwu iri bụ nke atọ na league ma nyere ndị otu ahụ aka írute n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ
N'oge afọ 2016, ọ nyere goolu isii n'egwuregwu iri na atọ nke nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka ịmecha nke mbụ na league na ndekọ iri na otu
Aboudi Onguéné bịanyere aka na CSKA Moscow tupu agbata nke afọ 2017
Goolu iteghete ya n'egwuregwu iteghete ya bụ nke abụọ kachasị elu na league
Ndị otu ahụ mechiri n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na ndekọ iteghete-ano-otu
N'oge afọ 2018, ọ gbara goolu atọ n'egwuregwu ngosi iri na atọ
Aboudi Onguéné nyere goolu mbụ ya n'afọ 2019 megide otu egwuregwu Zvezda Perm n'abali iteghete nke ọnwa Mee nyere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri inweta mmeri atọ na asataghị̀ otu
Aboudi Onguéné nọchitere anya Cameroon na otu egwuregwu mba Cameroon kemgbe afọ 2008 mgbe enyochara ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
N'afọ 2011, o nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka inweta ọla edo na All-Africa Games na Mozambique
N'oge ọkara ikpeazụ megide South Africa, ọ nyere goolu mmeri egwuregwu
Aboudi Onguéné sonyere na 2012 London Olympics ma nye naanị otu goolu otu ahụ asọmpi ahụ
Na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup na Canada, ọ nyere goolu na nweta mmeri nke otu ahụ meriri Switzerland ma akpọrọ ya Player of the Match
A họpụtara ya dịka onye egwuregwu kachasị mma na 2016 Africa Women Cup of Nations
As of 2018[update] N'afọ 2018,emere nhoputa nke Aboudi Onguéné dikaAfrican Women's Footballer of the Yearnke ugboro anọ ya
Na 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup na France, Aboudi Onguéné nyere goolu ngafe megide Netherlands n'oge egwuregwu nke abụọ nke otu ahụ
Princess Gabrielle Jeanne Anne Marie Radziwill (1877-1968) bụ onye nọọsụ Lithuania, onye na-ahụ maka udo na onye na-agbachitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ sonyeere Njikọ Mba ebe ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike site n'afọ 1920 ruo afọ 1934
Tupu ọ banye na Secretariat nke League of Nations n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1920, Radziwill nọrọ afọ abụọ na-arụ ọrụ maka Russian Red Cross n'ihu Russia-Persian ebe ọ na-elekọta ụlọ ọgwụ
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị, na Njikọ ọ bụ onye na-akwado ọdịmma ụmụ nwanyị, ọ na-akpọ maka imekọ ihe ọnụ na òtù ụmụ nwanyị

N'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Njikọ na òtù ụmụ nwanyị, o kwusiri ike, sị 'M ga-adị njikere mgbe niile ime ihe m nwere ike ime iji nyere aka ma kwalite ebumnuche nke òtù ụmụ nwanyị ọbụna mgbe anaghị m ahụ anya na ha!'
Na Njikọ Mba, e were ya n'ọrụ na mbụ dị ka Onye Nnọchiteanya Ukwu na Ngalaba Ozi mana e buliri ya n'ọkwa onye otu ngalaba na 1927

N'afọ 1931, a kpọfere ya na ngalaba Social Questions and Opium Traffic na, n'afọ 1934, na ngalaba Intellectual Cooperation and International Bureaux ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ n'ọnwa Disemba 1938
Ama egwuregwu Gabros bụ ámá egwuregwu nwere ike ịnabata puku mmadụ atọ
Ọ dị na Nnewi, Nigeria, n'akụkụ ụlọ nkwari akụ Beverly Hills
Ọ bụ ebe egwuregwu nke Gabros International ma bụrụ ụlọ nwa oge mke Anambra United FC
Ka e mesịrị Chief Gabriel Chukwuma resịrị Dr
Patrick Ifeanyi Ubah ụlọ egwuregwu bọọlụ Gabros na ámá egwuregwu ya
Na ama egwuregwu a ka emere egwuregwu bọọlụ NFPL Izu nke irii
Agbanyeghị nke a, Chief Gabriel Chukwuma siri ọnwụ na ọ nweghị mgbe oji ree ama egwuregwu ahụ
Ọ kwukwara na Dr
Patrick Ifeanyi Ubah kwụrụ ụgwọ naanị maka klọb bọọlụ ọ bụghị maka ámá egwuregwu dịka ihe dị iche
N'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2015, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Federal Capital Territory (FCT) gbochiri Chief Gabriel Chukwuma itinye aka na ikike Dr
Patrick Ifeanyi Ubah na FC Ifeanyi Ubah mgbe Chief Gabriel Chukwuma kwuru na ọ ga ewere kwa klọb bọọlụ ahụ iji rụọ ọrụ ma wee sonye na Njikọ Ọkachamara bọọlụ nke Nigeria (NPFL)
Gabuza bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere

Gad Elmaleh (Arabic جاد المالح, Gād el-Māleḥ; a mụrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1971) bụ onye Moroccan-Canada na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-emeeme ihe nkiri nke nwetara aha ọma na France, Morocco nakwa United States
A maara ya nke ọma n'ụwa na-asụ French na nso nso a [mgbe?] na mba United States
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere Coco, Priceless, La Doublure na Midnight in Paris
A họpụtara ya dịka onye na-atọ ọchị na France, Minista nke Ọdịbendị kpọrọ ya knight nke Order of Arts and Letters; a kpọkwara ya knight of the National Order of Quebec
N'afọ 2015 na 2018, Elmaleh mere njem na-atọ ọchị na mba United States
N'afọ 2019, ọ pụtara na usoro Netflix Huge na France
A mụrụ Elmaleh ma zụlite ya na Casablanca n'ezinụlọ ndị Juu Berber nke Morocco
A zụlitere Elmaleh n'ebe dị iche iche nwere ọdịbendị, na-asụ Moroccan Arabic na French
Dịka nwatakịrị ọ ga-eji bọọdụ mara nna ya, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nna ya
Nwanne ya nwoke, Arié, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu, nwanne ya nwanyị, Judith, bụ onye Na-eme ihe ngosi na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na École Maïmonide, na Lycée Lyautey na Casablanca
Ezinụlọ ya si Morocco kwaga obodo Canada mgbe Elmaleh dị afọ iri na asaa

O mechara mụọ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mahadum dị na Montreal (ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ma ọ bụ na Mahadum Montreal ma ọ bụ Mahadum McGill, ebe ihe ndekọ ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ na-egosipụta ọ gara) ruo afọ anọ mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1992, Elmaleh kwagara mba Paris iji mụọ ihe nkiri na Cours Florent n'okpuru nkuzi nke Isabelle Nanty
Ihe ngosi mbụ nke Elmaleh nke otu onye Décalages, nke emere na 'Palais des glaces' n'afọ 1997, bụ akụkọ ndụ onwe onye

N'ime ihe ngosi ahụ, ọ na-akọwa njem ya malite na ọpụpụ ya n'obodo Morocco mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na-aga n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Montreal ma mechie na mba France ebe ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na Cours Florent
Aha ya gara n'ihu site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe ngosi nke abụọ ya, La Vie Normale nke bụ oge mbụ ya na-eme na Olympia yana ihe ngosi mbụ ya nke ihe karịrị awa abụọ
E wepụtara ihe ngosi ahụ na DVD na 23 Jenụwarị 2001
N'adịghị ka ihe ngosi abụọ mbụ ya, L'autre c'est moi (2005) ya nwere ihe ndị ọzọ na mmekọrịta ya na ọha na eze
A na-eto ya maka iwebata ụdị American stand-up na France ma jiri ya mee ihe na ihe ngosi otu onye ya
Ọ laghachiri n'ọkwa na L'autre, c'est moi n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2006 na Canada (Montreal) na US (na Broadway, na Beacon Theater n'ihu ndị nkiri 3000); emere ya na Casablanca, Morocco
N'agbata ọnwa Eprel na Ọgọstụ afọ 2007 ọ gbara ihe ngosi ya na France, Belgium, na Switzerland
Ihe ngosi ahụ dọtara ihe karịrị mmadụ 300,000
E mechara wepụta ihe ngosi ahụ na DVD ma ree 1,500,000
Mmekọrịta mbụ Elmaleh na ihe nkiri bụ ihe nkiri zuru oke, Salut cousin ! nke Merzak Allouache
O mechara pụta na L'homme est une femme comme les autres na Train de Vie
N'afọ 2000 ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke 'Dov', onye na-eduhie eduhie na La Vérité si je mens ! 2
A rụgharịrị àgwà nke 'Chouchou' na La Vie Normale na ihe ọchị Chouchou (2002), nke Merzak Allouache duziri ma bụrụkwa nke Alain Chabat; nkiri ahụ dọtara ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị
Mgbe ahụ, o mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye na-agụ egwu na 'ọ bụ kiz ndụ m', abụ a ma ama n'asụsụ na-adịghị adị
JG Biggs duziri vidiyo egwu ahụ ma gbaa ya na Paris Hôtel Costes a ma ama
Ọ laghachiri na ihe nkiri n'afọ 2004 mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri afọ 2004 Olé! ya na Gérard Depardieu
N'afọ 2005, ọ pụtara dịka François Pignon na La Doublure (aha Bekee 'The Valet'), nke Francis Veber
N'afọ 2006, ọ pụtara n'ihu Audrey Tautou na Priceless (aha French 'Hors de prix'), nke Pierre Salvadori
Elmaleh na onye France na-eme ihe nkiri Anne Brochet biri site n'afọ 1998 ruo 2002
Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke, Noé, ọnụ
Site n'afọ 2009 ruo 2010, onye mmekọ ya bụ onye nta akụkọ French Marie Drucker
Ya na Charlotte Casiraghi nwere mmekọrịta site n'ọnwa Disemba 2011 ruo June 2015
A mụrụ nwa ha nwoke, Raphaël, n'abalị 17 ọnwa Disemba afọ 2013
N'afọ 2004, Elmaleh natara onyinye maka ihe ngosi otu nwoke kachasị mma site na SACEM na France
N'afọ 2006, ọ natara Crystal Globes Award
site na French Press Association, maka ihe ngosi otu nwoke kachasị mma maka La Vie Normale
N'afọ 2006, Minista nke Ọdịbendị nke France bụ Renaud Donnedieu de Vabres nyere Elmaleh Ordre des Arts et des Lettres
Onye isi ala Quebec bụ Philippe Couillard mere ya onye otu National Order of Quebec n'afọ 2017
Gadaa (Oromo Gadaa; n'ụzọ nkịtị oge) bụ usoro ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke ụmụ amaala na-eji na Etiopia na ugwu Kenya
Ndị Konso na Gedeo nke ndịda Etiopia na-emekwa ya
Usoro a na-achịkwa ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akụ na ụba, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na okpukpe nke obodo ahụ
N'okpuru Gadaa, afọ asatọ ọ bụla, ndị Oromo ga-ahọrọ site na nkwekọrịta ndị isi itoolu a maara dị ka Salgan ya'ii Borana (mgbakọ Borana itoolu)
Onye ndu ahọpụtara site na usoro gadaa na-anọgide na-achị naanị afọ 8, na ntuli aka na-ewere ọnọdụ na njedebe nke afọ 8 ndị ahụ
Mgbe ọ bụla Abbaa Gadaa nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ ya, bokkuu (ihe nnọchianya nke ike) na-agafe nwunye ya ma ọ na-edebe bokkuu ma kwupụta iwu
UNESCO edeela usoro Gada dị ka ihe nketa ọdịbendị a na-apụghị ịhụ anya kemgbe afọ 2016
Ọ bụ echiche nke Oromo si na Madda Walabu district nke Oromia
Ndị Oromo weere usoro ahụ dị ka ihe nketa ha na dịka akụkụ dị mkpa nke ọdịbendị ha
Ọ bụ usoro nke ndị Oromo na-achị onwe ha n'ụzọ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ

Ndị Oromo chịrị onwe ha dịka usoro Gadaa si dị ogologo oge tupu narị afọ nke iri na isii, mgbe nnukwu agha atọ malitere n'etiti ha na Alaeze Ukwu Etiopia n'ebe ugwu ha na Adal Sultanate n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda ha
Ihe si na ya pụta bụ na ndị Oromo na-etinye aka na okpukpe Ndị Kraịst na Islam
Ndị otu Borana na Guji dị nso n'ókè Etiopia na Kenya nwere ike ịme Gadaa n'enweghị nkwụsịtụ
Na steeti Oromia n'okpuru usoro gọọmentị etiti nke Etiopia, usoro Gadaa malitere ịmaliteghachi n'ofe Oromia
N'afọ 2015, e meghere Gadaa Center na Odaa Bultum na n'afọ 2018, e weghachiri Gadaa Center dị na Odaa Hullee mgbe narị afọ abụọ nke nkwụsịtụ gasịrị
N'afọ 2019, Mahadum Bule Hora malitere mmemme nzere masta na ọmụmụ Gadaa
A haziri ndị Gadaa n'ime ndị ọgbọ dabere na afọ ma ọ bụ ọgbọ usoro ọmụmụ a na-akpọ Luba
Luba ọ bụla nwere ụmụ nwoke niile nọ na klas ọzọ
Klas ahụ dum na-aga n'ihu site na ogo iri na otu dị iche iche, nke ọ bụla dabere na usoro afọ asatọ, na nke ọ bụla nwere ikike na ibu ọrụ nke ya
Ọkwa ahụ na-agafe site n'otu ọkwa nke mmepe gaa na nke ọzọ n'afọ asatọ ọ bụla
Baallii is a process of transferring power from one Gadaa party to the next
E nwere òtù Gadaa ise a maara dị ka shanan Gadaa Oromoo
Ndị otu a na-agbaso echiche ụwa ise nke ndị Oromo
Ndị otu Gadaa ise na-abịa n'ọchịchị n'usoro
Otu pati na-abịa n'ọchịchị otu ugboro n'ime afọ iri anọ ọ bụla
N'ihi ya, a gaghị enwe asọmpi kpọmkwem n'etiti òtù Gadaa ise, kama asọmpi ahụ ga-abụ n'etiti ndị mmadụ n'ime otu
Ndị otu Gadaa ise nwere aha dị iche iche n'etiti Boorana, Maccaa-Tuulama, Arsii, Gujii na Ituu-Humbannaa
Ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta amụọla Gadaa
Legesse dere na Gadaa bụ 'otu n'ime mgbanwe ndị dị ịtụnanya na ndị na-akụzi ihe na mmepe nke ọha mmadụ'
Na mgbakwunye na edemede PhD ya na Harvard, Legesse ebipụtala akwụkwọ na-etinye Gadaa dị ka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke Afrịka nke nwere ike ịgwa ndị na-eche echiche iwu
Onye nwụrụ anwụ Donald Levine kwuru na Gadaa bụ 'otu n'ime usoro kachasị mgbagwoju anya nke nhazi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke echiche mmadụ chepụtara'
Maka Jalata, Gadaa na-anọchite anya 'ngụkọta nke mmepeanya Oromo'

Nke mbụ, usoro Gadaa bụ nkà ihe ọmụma oge ochie nke usoro mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-ahụ maka ịchịkwa nkwụsi ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, uto akụ na ụba, ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nkwekọrịta ọdịnala nke usoro okpukpe nke ọha mmadụ Oromo na omume Gadaa Democracy nke chọrọ ntinye aka hà nhata nke nwoke na nwanyị

A ka na-arụrịta ụka n'ihe gbasara agụmakwụkwọ dịka ụmụ nwanyị Oromo enweghị mmetụta ọ bụla n'oge niile nke iwu Gadaa ma ọ bụ usoro idu ndú agbụrụ mana a na-emeso nwunye nke onye a họpụtara Abbaa Gadaa dịka Abbaa Gadaa n'onwe ya
Onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị Siinqee na-anọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị na usoro gadaa
N'ịtụle ihe nnọchianya nke Gadaa maka ndị Oromo, yana ihe ọhụrụ ya, ndị na-eme nchọpụta na iwu, ọmụmụ ụmụ amaala, na pan-Africanism na-enyocha otu esi eji usoro ahụ mee ihe na narị afọ nke 21
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, edemede nke Z

Sirna nke akpọrọ 'Ethiopia Mgbe Gadaa Democracy Rules in a Federal State' na-enyocha otu esi ejikọta usoro ahụ na usoro gọọmentị etiti nke oge a nke Ethiopia, na-eje ozi dị ka usoro ọchịchị maka Oromia Regional National State
Sirna enyochaala usoro Gadaa n'ihe gbasara ụdị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a na-eji eme ihe na Western

Ọ kwubiri na usoro Gadaa nke 'nkwekọrịta site na mkparịta ụka' bụ ihe pụrụ iche mana gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na ụkpụrụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke ọdịda anyanwụ, ya mere ọ dabara adaba maka nnabata n'ime ọchịchị onye kwuo ike nke gọọmentị etiti nke Ethiopia
Otu òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a maara dị ka GSAP (Gadaa System Advancement Party) na-adabere n'echiche ya na ụkpụrụ Gadaa
Ọrụ ọdịnihu, ọchịchị 20 a na-akpọ BitGadaa na-enweta mkpali site na ụkpụrụ na nhazi nke Gadaa
Gael Jean Campbell-Young (amụrụ n'afọ 1973, Carletonville ) bụ onye mba South Africa na-ahụ maka nhazi mkpara akwukwo na ime ihe nkiri
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nyocha ihe gbasara mkpara akwukwo na South Africa ruo n'afọ 2007,ruo mgbe ọ kwagara mba Australia
Campbell-Young jikọtara aka chọpụta ụdị ọhụrụ nke Pearsonia (Fabaceae) ma bipụta nchọpụta ahụ na 2008

Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ya na nyocha mpara akwukwo ma na-achụso ngalaba omumu di elu bu PhD na Mahadum Curtin na mgbe oge nke njikwa nyocha na nkuzi agụmakwụkwọ tinyere ezumike nke ọ zụrụ na nka dị egwu, ọ tụgharịrị ọrụ ya n'ime njikwa Project nke ihe dị iche iche na ọrụ iji ala eme ihe
Kemgbe ọnwa Machị afọ 2020, e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka Project Officer - Short-Term Modular Housing Program for Bushfire Recovery Victoria, ngalaba nke gọọmentị steeti Victoria
site afo 2013 Campbell-Young nwetara ozuzu n' ime ejije, iguputa ihe n' onyonyo,nakwa ide ejije
N' iganihu, o gbaputara ihe n' ime ejije, ejije di nkenke, nakwa ihe onyonyo akwuru ugwo ya tinyegasi ihe ndi ozo

Campbell-Young gụsịrị BSc (Biological sciences) na Mahadum Johannesburg, South Africa n'afọ 1994, sochiri BSc(Honours) na Botany n'afọ 1995 na MSc (Plant Taxonomy) n'afọ 1998, nke o degharịrị ụdị legumes nke dị na mpaghara fynbos nke South Africa nke a na-akpọ Rafnia

N'afọ 1995, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ n'onwe ya n'oge ahụ ọ na-edezi akwukwo akaebe siri ike na ịgụ ihe akaebe nke akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, edemede PhD, akụkọ nkà na ụzụ na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ yiri ya
A họpụtara Campbell-Young ka ọ bụrụ Botanical Research Officer / Biodiversity Consultant na Mahadum Johannesburg site na Ọktoba 1998 ruo Nọvemba 2003
N'oge a, ọ na-etinye aka na choputa banyere mkpara akwukwo na ọrụ nyocha yana nyocha nke ihe dị iche iche maka ọrụ mmepe ụlọ ọrụ

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị dere edemede atọ nke atụmatụ e nyere International Association for Plant Taxonomy iji chekwaa aha Spartium capense (Leguminosae), aha nke eji eme ihe site na ọ dịkarịa ala mmalite afọ 1800
Mana oru ha agaghi nke ọma

Site na Jenụwarị 2005 ruo Ọktọba 2007 Campbell-Young rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Biodiversity Project Manager maka atụmatụ nchekwa nke metụtara obodo Drakenstein nke Cape Town, South African National Biodiversity Institute (SANBI) na nzukọ 'Friends of Paarl Mountain'

N'afọ 2008,Campbell-Young na onye ọrụ ibe ya, Kevin Balkwill, bipụtara nchọpụta nke ụdị ọhụrụ nke Faboideae subfamily, Pearsonia callistoma na Nordic Journal of Botany nke nchọpụta ahụ jikọtara ha ọnụ na aha botanical
(The standard author abbreviation CampbA na-eji Young egosi onye a dị ka onye edemede mgbe ọ na-ezo aka na aha botanical
Campbell-Young kwagara Australia n'afọ 2007 ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka Biodiversity Consultant for Ecological Associates (Pty) Ltd na Adelaide na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Australian Systematic Botany Newsletter
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2010, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Vegetation Science Research Associate na Mahadum Curtin
Ọ gara n'ihu na-achụso PhD ya na Taxonomy na Curtin
Akụkụ nke nyocha ya ebe a gụnyere ọrụ maka ọrụ Australian Research Council Linkage
Ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa a ruo n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013, oge ọ hapụrụ mahadum iji gụọ akwụkwọ na nka ihe nkiri
Site n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015 ruo ọnwa Juun afọ 2018 Campbell-Young laghachiri Mahadum Curtin na Mahadum Monash, ebe ọ nwere ọrụ nkuzi agụmakwụkwọ
Na ngwụcha ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, Campbell-Young laghachiri South Africa n' obere oge maka ịga Fynbos Forum na Rawsonville, Western Cape

E weere ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye isi oru nlekota oru gbara opkurukpu site na Sep 2018 maka usoro na ikikere nchekwa ebe obibi na Victoria, Australia na site na February 2019 maka Vicamp Supply Review maka Ngalaba Gburugburu, Ala, Mmiri na Atụmatụ

N'afọ 2019, Campbell-Young debanyere aha na ya Australian Business Register dị ka onye na-azụ ahịa naanị ya na kemgbe Machị 2020 ọ bụ onye isi ọrụ maka Short-Term Modular Housing Program for Bushfire Recovery Victoria
N'afọ 2013 na 2014 Campbell-Young gara ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe na ọmụmụ ihe gbasara ime ihe, ngosi TV na edemede ihe nkiri, na ọmụmụ ndị ọzọ ruo 2016
Kemgbe afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri iri abụọ na atọ, mgbasa ozi telivishọn anọ, na ihe nkiri asaa (3 dị ka onye ndu)
Ngosipụta ihe nkiri ndi o sonyere na ya gụnyere
Gail Cartmail (amụrụ n'afọ 1955) bụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu (AGS) na otu ọrụ Unite ma bụrụkwa onye otu Trades Union Congress ' (TUC) Executive Committee na General Council
Cartmail gara Heronswood Secondary Modern School na Welwyn Garden City, ebe ọ dara ule ya iri na otu
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'enweghị nzere, Cartmail malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-amụ ọrụ ntutu isi

Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta, ma mesịa ghọọ Nne nke Chapel maka ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ, National Graphical Association, ebe ọ nwetara aha ọma maka mkpọsa maka ịkwụ ụgwọ nhata maka ụmụ nwanyị, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na London College of Printing
N'afọ 1977, Cartmail malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka njikọ aka maka London Borough of Greenwich, afọ iri ka e mesịrị ọ ghọrọ onye ọrụ ọrụ oge niile maka Health Visitors' Association

Ọ hapụrụ na 1990 ka ọ bụrụ onye ọrụ mpaghara maka Manufacturing, Science and Finance union, a na-ebuli ya elu ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi mba tupu ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke Amicus, ebe ọ bụ onye ọrụ mba maka ngalaba ahụike
N'afọ 2007, Amicus ghọrọ akụkụ nke Unite, a họpụtakwara Cartmail dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu ya na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze
O sonyere na ntuli aka nke afọ 2010 ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu ahụ, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke anọ na votu 39,000 n'azụ Len McCluskey onye a họpụtara
N'afọ 2016, mgbe McCluskey kwụsịrị ịzọ ọkwa ọhụrụ, a họpụtara Cartmail dị ka onye na-anọchite anya odeakwụkwọ ukwu
Cartmail bụ Kọmishọna na UK Commission for Employment and Skills
N'oge ezumike ya, ọ na-enwe mmasị igwu mmiri oyi
N'afọ 2020, Cartmail ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Trades Union Congress

Gail Hansberry (amụrụ n'afọ 1939) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi
A mụrụ Hansberry na Washington, DC
na Septemba 4, 1939 na Myrtle na William Hansberry
Ọ bụ nwá nwanne nne nke ónyé na-ede egwuregwu Lorraine Hansberry
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Howard na-anata BA
ya na 1960, na Smith College na-aneta nzèrè masta ya na 1962
Hansberry malitere ọrụ nkụzi nka na Washington, DC
na Taft Junior High School
Ọ gàrà n'ihu na-akụzi akụkọ nka na North Carolina College
Ka ọ na-erule 1966, Hansberry kwagara New York ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha na Time-Life Books na dị ka ónyé na-ese foto n'efu
N'afọ 1980 ọ laghachiri Washington, DC
ébé ọ rụrụ ọrụ màkà Ngalaba Mba United States dị ka onye ọrụ asụsụ Bekee
Site na 1990 ruo 1992 Hansberry jere ozi dị ka ónyé nduzi nke Association for the Study of African American Life and History
N'afọ 2017, a gụnyere ọrụ Hansberry na ihe ngosi Legacy, The 2017 African American Art Exhibit na Friendship Gallery na Chevy Chase, Maryland

A na-edebe ihe osise ya na akwụkwọ ndị e ji áká mee na nchịkọta nke onwé na nke ọha na eze, gụnyere na North Carolina Museum of Art, Smith College, Library of Congress, na Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture
Gail Mabalane (née Nkoane; a mụrụ na 27 Disemba 1984) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, ihe nlereanya, onye mgbasa ozi, onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-agụ egwu
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn South Africa 'The Wild', ma na nso nso a, ọ pụtara na usoro telikọba 'The Road', nke na-egosi na Mzansi Magic kwa izu
Ọ na-eme Thandeka Khumalo na Blood and Water nke dị naanị na Netflix
A mụrụ Mabalane dịka Gail Nkoane ma zụlite ya n'obodo Kimberley, Northern Cape na South Africa
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ atọ
Nne ya tinyere ya na asọmpi mbụ ya, 'Miss Tinkerbell' mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka ezinụlọ ya chọpụtara ikike ya
N'afọ 2005, ọ bụ onye Top 5 Miss SA Teen Finalist
N'afọ 2010, Mabalane nyochara ma ghọọ onye ikpeazụ Top 10 na oge nke isii na Idols South Africa
Ọ bụ onye mbụ e wepụrụ na Final Top 10 mgbe ọ rụchara 'Please Don't Leave Me', nke P!nk
N'afọ 2011, Mabalane nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka Lelo Sedibe na MNet TV Series 'The Wild', n'akụkụ onye isi South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri Connie Ferguson
MNet mechara kagbuo ihe ngosi ahụ n'afọ 2013
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya na telivishọn soapie nke South Africa, Generations The Legacy, ọzọ n'akụkụ Connie Ferguson
(Ihe Omume 1 ruo 60)
(Oge nke 2)
A mụrụ Gail Mabalane n'abalị 27 ọnwa Disemba afọ 1984 na Kimberly, South Africa
Nne ya tinyere ya n'ihe ngosi tupu ya anwụọ site na ọrịa ogologo oge mgbe nwanne ya nwoke nwụsịrị na mberede na Christmas Eve
N'afọ 2013, nna ya nwụkwara obere oge ka ọ lụsịrị Kabelo Mabalane
Nna ya nwụrụ ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ
Gail na Kabelo nwere ụmụ abụọ

A galactagogue, ma ọ bụ galactogogue (site na Grik γάλα [γαλακτ-], mmiri ara ehi, + ἀγωγός, na-eduga), nke a makwaara dị ka onye na-eme ka ara ma ọ bụ onye na-akwalite mmiri ara n'ime ụmụ mmadụ na anụmanụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ nwere ike ịbụ nke aka mere, nke sitere na osisi, ma ọ bụ nke sitere na ya
Enwere ike iji ha mee ka ara na-enye nwa ara na iji gwọọ obere mmiri ara
Galactagogues ndị aka mere dị ka domperidone na metoclopramide na-emekọrịta ihe na usoro dopamine n'ụzọ ga-eme ka mmepụta nke prolactin dịkwuo elu; ọkachasị, site na igbochi onye na-anabata D2
E nwere ihe akaebe ụfọdụ na-atụ aro na ndị nne na-enweghị ike igbo mkpa inye nwa ara nke ụmụ ha nwere ike irite uru site na galactogogues
Enwere ike ịtụle galactagogues mgbe a chọpụtara na ntinye aka na-abụghị nke ọgwụ ezughi oke

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, domperidone nwere ike ịbụ nhọrọ maka ndị nne nke ụmụ a mụrụ n'oge na-adịghị anya bụ ndị na-enwe ihe karịrị ụbọchị 14 site na ịmụ nwa na mgbe nkwado zuru oke ka na-enwe nsogbu igosipụta mmiri ara n'ụzọ zuru ezu maka mkpa nwa ha
Domperidone (dị ka metoclopramide, onye na-anabata D2) anaghị akwado maka ime ka ara dịkwuo mma na USA
N'ụzọ dị iche, ntuziaka Australia na-ewere domperidone dị ka galactagogue kachasị mma mgbe usoro ọgwụ na-abụghị nke ọgwụ gosipụtara na ezughi oke
N'adịghị ka metoclopramide, domperidone anaghị agafe ihe mgbochi ọbara na ụbụrụ ma ọ naghị enwe mmetụta ọjọọ dịka ụra ma ọ bụ ịda mbà n'obi

A chọpụtala na progestogens dị ka progesterone, medroxyprogesterone acetate, na cyproterone acetate na-emepụta mmepe lobuloalveolar nke ara, nke dị mkpa maka inye ara ka a na-emepụta mmiri ara na lobule ara
Mkpuruogwu na nri eji eme galactagogues na enwe obere maobu enweghi ihe eji agba ama Maka oru ya, tinyekwa na njirimara na nyocha mkpuruogwu ha gbasara Maka ngwooru a joro na-adighi
Mkpuruogwu a na ahu dika galactagogues gunyere
Galal Ibrahim ( nwụrụ na Nọvemba 25 2021 []) bụ onye isi ala ugboro abụọ nke ụlọ egwuregwu bọọlụ Zamalek SC nke Cairo
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ndị ọkàikpe dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ma bụrụ onye isi nke Ụlọikpe Mpụ

Ọ duru Zamalek SC site na 1992 ruo 1996, wee weghara onye isi oche nke klọb ahụ nke ugboro abụọ na 2010 ka mmebi nke ntuli aka May 2009, nke Mamdouh Abbas meriri[][] Agbanyeghị, Ibrahim gbara arụkwaghịm na Ọgọst 2011 n'ihi nrụgide ego[][]
Galala bụ ụdị egwu na ụdị ịgba egwu na-ewu ewu na Lagos, Naịjirịa nke ndị na-agụ egwu reggae mepụtara
Galaxy Television bụ ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn mbụ edebanyere aha na Naịjirịa
Galaxy malitere mgbasa ozi zuru oke na Mee 1994 site na ugwu Oke-Are, Ibadan na 10 kilowatts Areodyne transmitter
Ruo ihe dị ka afọ itoolu, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ anọgidewo na-ekiri n'etiti pasent ịrị isii na pasent ịrị asaa na ise na Oyo Steeti na Osun na Ogun Steeti ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Na Jenụwarị 2002, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ guzobere ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Galaxy nke abụọ (Channel 27) na Lagos iji hụ na ọ na-ekpuchi steeti niile dị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjịrịa
Gale Fulton Ross bụ onye Africa-America na-ese ihe nkírí nke bi na Sarasota, Florida
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe, ọ na-emekwa ihe osise, ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ
A mụrụ Gale Fulton Ross na Medford, Massachusetts, na 1947, ọ bụ nwá mbụ n'ime ụmụ itoolu
She studied at the Massachusetts College of Art in Boston, where she explored a wide variety of styles and media including sculpture
She continued her art education at the California College of Arts and Crafts in San Francisco, concentrating in the study of Fine Arts and art history

In addition to formal academic training she has studied under the guidance of established artists, including Melvin Johnson, at the Vesper George School of Art, Boston; Cleveland Bellow, of the DeYoung Museum, Oakland California; and Pierre Parsus, of France, while a resident at the La Napoule Art Foundation
N'ịbụ onye a zụrụ na mbụ dị ka onye na-ahụ màkà nka, Fulton Ross gàrà ọtụtụ ébé n'Africa, Europe, na n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ dị ka China, iji mụọ ma see ihe
N'afọ 1984, ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Bellagio, Ịtali ma mepụta ihe ngosi màkà Rockefeller Foundation na Bellagio
N'afọ 1993, ọ natara onyinye màkà ịrụ ọrụ na ịmụ ihe na People's Republic of China
Ọ zụlitere aha ọma na mbido ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese foto, ma mepụta ihe oyiyi nke Achịbishọp Desmond Tutu, Justice Thurgood Marshall, A
Philip Randolph, Arthur Ashe, na Gọvanọ Michael Dukakis, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya ka ọ see onyinyo nke Lord Andrew Lloyd Webber

Fulton Ross kwuru na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe ógè ochie nwere mmetụta n'ọrụ ya, gụnyere Michelangelo, Da Vinci, na Rembrandt, yana ndị isi Africa America nke ógè a dịka Charles Wilbert White, Elizabeth Catlett, Beauford Delaney, na Samella Lewis
Ụdị ya na-agụnye ma ihe atụ ma ihe na-enweghị atụ, dịka egosiri na ihe okike ya
O kwenyere na ndị na-ese ihe bụ akọ na uche mmadụ nke ọha mmadụ na-ahụ ihe onwunwe n'anya

Ngosipụta anya ya na-egosikarị ihe oyiyi na-emetụ n'ahụ nke ndị mmadụ, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị Africa America, na-egosipụta nkà ihe ọmụma ya na ọ bụ omimi na ụdị mmetụta mmadụ dị iche iche na-akpali nka, na n'ezie, na ọ ga-aghọ mmadụ nwèrè mmetụta iji bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe ka mma

N'ihe banyéré nke ahụ, o wepụtara oge dị ukwuu màkà iduzi na ịmepụta ohere maka ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe dịka ónyé guzobere Fulton-Ross Fund for Visual Artists of Sarasota County, nke na-enye gburugburu ebe obibi nkwado ma na-enye ndị na-amalite ọrụ ha onyinye asọmpi
Galefele Moroko (amụrụ n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1997) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Botswana
O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 400 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2017 World Championships in Athletics O ruru eru ịnọchite anya Botswana na 2020 Summer Olympics
INNO, nke a na-akpọbu Galeria Inno, bụ ụlọ ahịa dị na Beljọm nke na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa iri na isii
Ọ bụ enyemaka nke German Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof
E hiwere ya na 1897 na Brussels dị ka A l'Innovation
INNO bụ onye guzobere ma nọgide na-abụ onye otu International Association of Department Stores site na 1928 ruo 2001
Emile Bernheim abụwo onye isi oche nke Association ugboro anọ na 1931, 1935, 1950, 1960
Kemgbe afọ 2001, ọ bụ otu Galeria Kaufhof nwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, nke Hudson's Bay Company mechara nweta n'afọ 2015
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2023, onye nwe INNO ugbu a, Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof, na-eme atụmatụ ịpụ ma ree alaka INNO nke Belgium dị ka akụkụ nke usoro mmefu ego nke ya
INNO na-arụ ọrụ n'ozuzu ụlọ ahịa ngalaba 16 na Belgium dum, nke atọ n'ime ha dị na Brussels
Galina Yahorova Anakhrieva (amụrụ na 12 Machị 1967) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na 1988 c na 1992 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Galina Kamenova (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 16 Septemba 1970) bụ onye Bulgaria na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na 1992 Olimpik oge okpomọkụna 1996 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Galicia bụ kwurula community nke Spain na-eme mba Europe
Ọ bụ otu ihe dị mkpa ndị njem nleta mma ke Europe, ọtụtụ nde ndị na-eme njem nleta gaa na ya kwa afọ
Ọ nwere oge ochie mere ke edem edere Portugal, ekele na-akọrọ asụsụ
Galician na Portuguese bụ hà 85% nke asụsụ
Illas Cies
Katidral nke Santiago de Compostela
Gamal Abdel Nasser Hussein (15 Jenụwarị 1918 28 Septemba 1970) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ijipt nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi ala nke abụọ nke Ijipt site na 1954 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1970
Nasser duziri mgbanwe ọchịchị Ijipt nke 1952 ma webata mgbanwe ala dị ukwuu nafọ sochirinụ
Mgbe onye otu Muslim Brotherhood nwara igbu ya n'afọ 1954, ọ meriri nzukọ ahụ, tinye Onye isi ala Mohamed Naguib n'ụlọ ma were ọrụ nchịkwa
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala na June 1956
Ịbụ onye a ma ama n'Ijipt na ụwa ndị Arab rịrị elu mgbe ọ weghachitere ụlọ ọrụ Suez Canal na mmeri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na Suez Crisis, nke a maara n'Ijipta dị ka Agha Tripartite
Arịrịọ maka ịdị n'otu pan-Arab n'okpuru idu ndú ya mụbara, na-ejedebe na nguzobe nke United Arab Republic na Syria site na 1958 ruo 1961
N'afọ 1962, Nasser malitere usoro usoro usoro ndị isi na mgbanwe ọgbara ọhụrụ na Egypt

N'agbanyeghị ihe ndọghachi azụ na ebumnuche pan-Arabist ya, site na 1963 ndị na-akwado Nasser nwetara ike n'ọtụtụ mba Arab, mana ọ banyere na Agha Obodo North Yemen, na n'ikpeazụ Agha Nzuzo Arab ka ukwuu
Ọ malitere oge nke abụọ ya dị ka onye isi ala na Machị 1965 mgbe a machibidoro ndị na-emegide ya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ịgba ọsọ
Mgbe Israel meriri Ijipt na Agha Ụbọchị Isii nke 1967, Nasser gbara arụkwaghịm, mana ọ laghachiri n'ọkwa mgbe ngagharị iwe a ma ama kpọrọ ka e weghachite ya

Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1968, Nasser họpụtara onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ praịm minista, malite Agha nke Attrition iji weghachite ala Sinai nke Israel weghaara, malite usoro nke ime ka ndị agha ghara itinye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma wepụta usoro mgbanwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Mgbe ngwụcha nke nzukọ Arab League nke afọ 1970, Nasser nwere nkụchi obi wee nwụọ
Ememe olili ozu ya na Cairo dọtara nde mmadụ ise ruo nde isii na-eru uju, ma mee ka iru uju jupụta n'ụwa ndị Arab
Nasser ka bụ onye ama ama n'ụwa ndị Arab, ọkachasị maka ọganihu ya maka ikpe ziri ezi na ịdị n'otu ndị Arab, iwu ọgbara ọhụrụ ya, na mbọ ọ na-agba megide ọchịchị
Ọchịchị ya gbakwara ume ma dakọta na ọganihu ọdịbendị Ijipt, na mmalite nke nnukwu ọrụ mmepụta ihe, gụnyere Aswan Dam, na obodo Helwan

Ndị na-akatọ Nasser na-akatọrọ ọchịchị aka ike ya, mmebi ikike mmadụ ya, na nchịkwa nke ndị agha n'elu ụlọ ọrụ obodo nke gosipụtara oge ya, na-eguzobe usoro ọchịchị aka ike na ọchịchị aka ike n'Ijipt nke nọgidere, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ kwụsịghị, ruo taa
A mụrụ Gamal Abdel Nasser Hussein na Bakos, Alexandria, Egypt na 15 Jenụwarị 1918, otu afọ tupu ọgba aghara nke Mgbanwe Ijipt nke 1919
Nna Nasser bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ na post ọfịs nke amụrụ na Beni Mur na Upper Egypt, ma zụlite ya na Alexandria, ezinụlọ nne ya si Mallawi, el-Minya
Nne na nna ya lụrụ na 1917
Nasser nwere ụmụnne abụọ, Izz al-Arab na al-Leithi

Ndị na-ede akụkọ ndụ Nasser Robert Stephens na Said Aburish dere na ezinụlọ Nasser kwenyere na uzọ siri ike na 'echiche ndị Arab nke ebube', ebe ọ bụ na aha nwanne Nasser, Izz al-Arab, sụgharịrị 'Glory of the Arabs'
Ezinụlọ Nasser na-eme njem ugboro ugboro n'ihi ọrụ nna ya
Na afọ 1921, ha kwagara Asyut na, na afọ 1923, gaa Khatatba, ebe nna Nasser na-elekọta post ọfịs
Nasser gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị maka ụmụ ndị ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ruo 1924, mgbe e zigara ya ka ya na nwanne nna nna ya biri na Cairo, na ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị Nahhasin
Nasser na nne ya na-ederịta akwụkwọ ozi ma na-eleta ya n'oge ezumike
Ọ kwụsịrị ịnata ozi na ngwụcha Eprel 1926
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Khatatba, ọ chọpụtara na nne ya anwụọla mgbe ọ mụsịrị nwanne ya nwoke nke atọ, Shawki, nakwa na ezinụlọ ya ezoro ya akụkọ ahụ
Nasser mechara kwuo na 'ịghọgbu ya na uzọ a bụ ihe ijuanya nke ukwuu nke na oge enweghị ike idozi ya'
Ọ hụrụ nne ya na anya ma mmerụ ahụ nke ọnwụ ya ka njọ mgbe nna ya lụrụ di ọzọ tupu ngwụcha afọ
Na afọ 1928, Nasser gara Alexandria ka ya na nna nna ya biri ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị Attarin nke obodo ahụ
Ọ hapụrụ na 1929 maka ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi onwe onye na Helwan, ma mesịa laghachi Alexandria iji banye ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Ras el-Tin ma sonyere nna ya, onye na-arụ ọrụ maka ọrụ nzipu ozi obodo ahụ
Ọ bụ n'Aleksandria ka Nasser malitere itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Mgbe ọ hụchara esemokwu n'etiti ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na ndị uwe ojii na Manshia Square, ọ sonyeere ngagharị iwe ahụ n'amaghị ebumnuche ya

Ngagharị iwe ahụ, nke ndị na-ahụ maka mba na anya bụ Young Egypt Society haziri, kpọrọ oku ka a kwụsị ọchịchị ndị na-achị ala ọzọ n'Ijipt n'ihi mwepụ nke iwu Ijipt nke 1923 site n'aka Praịm Minista Isma'il Sidqi
E jidere Nasser ma jide ya otu abalị tupu nna ya agbapụta ya
Nasser sonyeere ngalaba ndị agha nke otu ahụ, nke a maara dị ka Green Shirts, maka oge dị mkpirikpi na 1934
Mmekọrịta ya na otu ahụ na ọrụ siri ike na ngagharị iwe ụmụ akwụkwọ na oge a 'mere ka ọ nwee obi ike ịhụ mba n'anya nke Ijipt', dị ka ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme James Jankowski si kwuo
Gamal El-Sagini ( Arabic ) (January 7, 1917 – November 19, 1977) bụ onye Ijipt na-akpụ ihe, na-ese ihe na onye nrite

A mụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 7, 1917 na Bab El Shaaria, obodo dara ogbenye nke Cairo, Egypt, El-Sagini chọpụtara mmasị ya maka nka mgbe ọ dị obere ebe ọ malitere inwe mmasị na ọdịdị ụlọ nke Cairo ochie dị ka ụlọ, ụlọ alakụba na ụlọ ndị Alakụba nke dugara ya na 1934 isonyere ngalaba ihe ọkpụkpụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ nke Fine Arts nke nwa eze Youssef Kamal hiwere
N'ịbụ onye nnukwu ndị na-ese ihe na-akụzi ihe ọkpụkpụ na Cairo n'oge ahụ duziri ma na-eduzi ya, El-Sagini nwetara diplọma ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ na 1938

El Sagini gara Paris na ego ya iji gụọ akwụkwọ dị elu ebe onye na-ese ihe n'asụsụ Bekee bụ Henry Moore metụtara ya nke ukwuu bụ onye a maara nke ọma maka usoro ya na-enweghị atụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-anọdụ ala
El Sagini sochiri nke a na 1947 site na ịga Rome iji maliteghachi ọmụmụ ya gụsịrị akwụkwọ ebe ọ natara diplọma na Sculpture na Medal Arts na 1950

El-Sagini gosipụtara echiche ya banyere ọdịnihu ka mma maka mba ya bụ Ijipt site na ọrụ ya ma chịkọta ihe kpatara ya na ndụ site na 'The Will' (Hammered copper relief-33x28cm-1954) ebe o sere onwe ya - dịka n'oge ndị Fero - n'ili ya gburugburu ihe niile ọ na-anọchite anya ma jiri ya kpọrọ ihe n'oge ndụ ya dị ka ịhụnanya, olileanya, nka na egwu
N'elu nkume isi, o dere okwu ndị na-esonụ na-akọwa ndụ ya na ihe ọ na-anọchite anya ya
N'ịbụ onye na-echegbu onwe ya mgbe niile banyere nsogbu obodo ya, El-Sagini gosipụtara Ijipt n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na-egosipụta olileanya, agbamume, ndakpọ olileanya ma ọ bụ naanị ịhụnanya na-enweghị atụ
N'iwebata ihe nnọchianya na ihe ọkpụkpụ ndị Ijipt, El-Sagini jiri akara dị iche iche nke Ijipt n'oge ọṅụ, obi nkoropụ, mmeri na mmeri
N'oge 1952-1967, na-esote mgbanwe ndị Ijipt nke 1952, Ijipt rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na mba ndị Arab n'okpuru nduzi nke onye isi ala Ijipt na onye na-eme mgbanwe Gamal Abdel Nasser
Mgbanwe ndị Ijipt bụ ọkụ nke kpalitere ihe mechara bụrụ usoro mgbanwe nnwere onwe na mba ndị Arab

N'ihe oyiyi ya 'Egypt My Mother Land' (Bronze- 40x30x 10 cm-1957) El-Sagini gosipụtara Ijipt dị ka nne na-enye onyinye nke ụwa Arab dum nke gosipụtara nne na-enye ụmụ ya ara mgbe ọ na-ejide n'ubu ya ihe nnọchianya nke Ọganihu Wheat Stem)', Development '(Bricks Built)' na Culture '(Book)'

N'ihi Agha Ụbọchị Isii nke 1967 na mmetụta mba niile nke nkụda mmụọ na obi nkoropụ, El-Sagini na-egosipụtakarị Ijipt na eserese ya nke oge ahụ dị ka nwa bebi swiiti - ihe nnọchianya a ma ama na carnivals ndị Ijipt - nke nwere nkwarụ, ịta ahụhụ ma ọ bụ ọbụna kwụgbuo

N'ịgbaso Yom Kippur War 1973 na ọbara na-agbanye ọzọ n'ime akwara nke Ijipt na ụwa Arab dum, El-Sagini gosipụtara Ijipt dị ka nwanyị mara mma nke nwere ọdịdị ihu siri ike na ihe oyiyi ya abụọ kachasị pụta ìhè n'oge ahụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke oge a nke Ijipt, N'ihe oyiyi ya 'The Great Crossing of The Suez Canal' (Bronze- 33x127x 38 cm-1973) El-Sagini na-ese onyinyo ndị agha Ijipt n'ụgbọ mmiri -Egypt - na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri n'esepụghị aka iji gafee Suez Canal

Ihe oyiyi nke abụọ nke El Sagini 'Egypt, The Future' (Bronze- 90x80x 30 cm-1975) gosipụtara nwanyị -Egypt- na-eguzo n'ụzọ dị mpako n'ọnọdụ ngosipụta nke na-egosi ike, olileanya na mkpebi siri ike maka ọdịnihu ka mma

El Sagini na-ahụ Osimiri Naịl mgbe niile dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke ọganihu na ọdịmma na-ese onyinyo Naịl dị ka agadi nwoke nwere afụ ọnụ na Statue ya 'The Nile' (Bronze- 100x50x8 cm-1958), mana ọ na-ewerekwa ya dị ka isi iyi nkasi obi na enyemaka

E gosipụtara mmekọrịta pụrụ iche El Sagini na osimiri Naịl n'ụzọ doro anya na 1969 mgbe o kpebiri dị ka omume nnupụisi ịtụba ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na Naịl n'ihi enweghị nkwanye ùgwù na nkwado steeti ahụ ka ihe oyiyi ya na-akwakọba n'ime ụlọ atelier ya
kama iguzo ogologo n'amá na amá nke Ijipt
Omume nnupụisi a na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya wepụrụ ihe ngosi nka Egypt nke ukwuu wee mee ka ọha mmadụ Ijipt chee echiche banyere ezi mmasị onye ọ bụla na-ese ihe na ebumnuche nke ọrụ ọ na-eke
Nzube a bụ naanị ka ndị ọzọ hụ ọrụ onye na-ese ihe, na-azụ uche na mkpụrụ obi ndị na-ekiri ya, na-eme ka ha chee echiche, rọrọ nrọ, nụ ụtọ na mgbe ụfọdụ mgbanwe
N'afọ 1977, El Sagini gara Spen maka ihe ngosi zuru oke nke ọrụ ya nke ndị Egypt General Organization for Information haziri na Madrid na Barcelona, ebe ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba 17 mgbe ọ dị afọ 60
Nwunye ya - Hoda - so ozu ya laghachi Ijipt ebe e liri ya n'ili ozu ezinụlọ ya na Cairo
El Sagini natara ọtụtụ ihe nrite na nsọpụrụ dịka
Gambei ('mgbidi mebiri emebi') bụ emume olili ozu Dagbamba nke ịkụ oghere na zoŋ nke yidana na-emepụta ụzọ nke abụọ ịbanye na ịpụ n'ụlọ ha
Ọ na-anọchi anya nnupụisi na mmetụta nke nnwere onwe maka ezinụlọ nwụrụ anwụ, ọkachasị maka ụmụ ha ndị na-adịghịzi eche na ha ga-aza ajụjụ maka mkparị nke onye isi ezinụlọ n'ihi enweghị ha
N'oge emume olili ozu ebe a na-eme Kambon-waa n'ime ogige yidana, a na-ahapụ ndị na-egwu egwu ka ha na-abanye n'ụlọ ma pụọ ​​na otu faịlụ site na gambei na-egwu chakowili
Mgbe ha ka nọ n'èzí, ma ọ bụ mgbe ha gbakọtara na gburugburu n'ime ogige ahụ, ha na-amalitekwa ịkụ egwu ndị ọzọ
Gambia Bird Airlines Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu na-ebu ọkọlọtọ nke Gambia nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Kanifing na isi ụlọ ya na Banjul International Airport
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ na Disemba ()
Gambia Bird bụ nke ụgbọ mmiri Germany bụ Germania guzobere n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2012
Emebere ụgbọ elu ahụ na mmekorita ya na Gọọmenti Gambia iji dochie ọrụ Air Afrique, nke ewepụrụ na 2002
Germania nọgidere na-enwe pasent 90 nke Gambia Bird
Ụgbọelu ahụ malitere ọrụ na 22 October 2012 (2012-10-22) () na Airbus A319-100 nke e goro site na Germania nke na-efe n'etiti Banjul na Dakar
A gbakwunyere Accra, Conakry, Freetown na Monrovia na netwọk ụzọ n'oge na-adịghị anya; na 24 October 2012 (2012-10-24) (), Gambia Bird rụrụ ọrụ mbụ ya na London Gatwick
E webatara ụgbọ elu na Barcelona na 28 Ọktoba
A319 nke abụọ sonyeere ụgbọ mmiri ahụ na November 2012 (2012-11) ()
Na Disemba (), Gambia Bird kwụsịrị ọrụ ruo mgbe a mara ọkwa ọzọ
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, enweghi ọrụ ọ bụla
E weghachiri ụgbọelu mbụ nke Gambia Bird n'ọrụ na nne ya, Germania
Na March 2015, Germania's CEO kwuru na ịmaliteghachi ọrụ site na Gambia Bird agaghị ekwe omume, n'ihi enweghị echiche zuru oke maka mmepe n'ọdịnihuu
Gambia Bird gbara n'ebe ndị a, dị As of June 2014[update] nke June
Dịka nke Disemba 2014, ụgbọ mmiri Gambia Bird nwere ụgbọ elu ndị a

Gambia Telecommunications Company Ltd, nke Gamtel makwaara maka mkpirikpi, bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta nke Gambia
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ steeti, nke a na-ahụ maka ọrụ nke ilekọta inye nkwukọrịta na ọrụ ịntanetị na mba ahụ
Na njikọ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ịntanetị Gamtel, Gamnet, ọ wuru ihe owuwu ịntanetị nke Gambia
E guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1984 site n'omume nke ndị omeiwu dị ka otu onye na-enye ọrụ nkwukọrịta na mba ahụ, na ngwaahịa ya 99% nke gọọmentị Gambia, na 1% fọdụrụnụ nke Gambia Port Authority
N'afọ 1993, ọ malitere ọrụ nke ịmepụta Gambia Radio & Television Service, ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ redio na telivishọn nke mba ahụ
Gamtel na-ewe ihe karịrị mmadụ otú puku ugbu a yana isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Gamtel House na Banjul
N'afọ 2007, ewerere 50% nke nha nha nha ya rere ya nye Spectrum Group, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta nke Lebanon, n'ihi nsogbu ego na Gamtel n'afọ 2007
Njikọ a bịara na njedebe ka otu afọ gachara, mgbe Gamtel jụrụ imeghari nkwekọrịta njikwa Spectrum
Ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ma ọ bụrụ na Spectrum ka nwere akụkụ dị mkpa nke Gamtel

Hajia Gambo Sawaba (15 February 1933 - October 2001) bu onye na agba mbo ihu na enyere umu nwanyi ikike n'ala Naijiria, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye n'enyere ndi obodo aka Ọ jere ozi dị ka osoto onye isi oche nke Great Nigeria People Party
Ahọpụtakwara ya dika onye ndú nke umu nwanyi na Northern Element Progressive Union (NEPU)
Haji Sawaba bu nwa Isa Amartey Amarteifio (Onye ana akpo Theophilus Wilcox) bụ onye si Ghana na Fatima Amarteifio bụ nwanyị Nupe nke ochici ime obodo Avun, Niger State
Amarteifo bu onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ghana School of Survey, tupu okwaga Naijiria na 1910 ma chọta oru na ulo ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Nigeria
Nna nna ukwu nke Fatima bu onye okpu uzu na onye agha nke muru Mamman Dazu, nna ukwu ha
E kwuru Mamman Dazu na ọ bụ ezigbo onye agha ana aju ese ya
Isa Amartey Amarteifio kpewara uka Islam dika o banyere Zaria ma zute Fatima dika ufodu aro gara ma lukwa ya
Fatima bu nwanyi di ya nwuru, nwere umu ato omuuru Mohammedu Alao tupu onwu o
Alum di na nwuye Fatima na Isa Amartey Amarteifio muputara umu isii nke Sawaba bu nwa nke ise
A na-akpọ ya Hajaratu, kpokwa ya Gambo nke bu aha ana akpo nwa ọ bụla a mụrụ mgbe a mụsịrị ụmụ ejima
O guru akwụkwọ na Native Primary School na Tudun, Wada
Otú ọ dị, ọ ghaghị ịkwụsị ịga akwụkwọ mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị na 1943, bụ onye nwụrụ ka omechara mkpesa nke isi ọwụwa
Nne ya nwukwara ka afo ato gasiri
Ọ lụrụ di bu onye agha Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ bụ Abubakar Garba Bello mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ na, bụ onye hapụrụ ma ghara ịlaghachi mgbe ọ mụsịrị ime
Ihe a maara nke ọma banyere ya mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, ọ bụ mmasị o nwere na ndị na-agba ara

Ya na ha na-ekwurịta okwu, na-abanye ụfọdụ ma nye ndị ọ nwere ike ịnweta ego, uwe na nri Mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, a na-ekwukarị okwu ya dịka onye isi ike na ọnye o fọrọ nke nta ka ọ banye ogu n'okporo ámá
Dị ka ya si kwuo 'Enweghị m ike iguzo iji lelee ebe ana emegide enyi ma obu nwanne na-adịghị ike' O kwuru na aluchitere ndi di otu a agha
Mgbe obula o rutere n 'agha a, o ga - ekwu ozugbo 'Ngwa, azurula m, gi agha' nye onye na - adighi ike na agha
Sawaba tinyere aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kemgbe ọ dị afọ 17
N'oge ahụ, ndị Northern People's Congress bụ ndi nwere nkwado nke ndi Emir na British Colonial Authority nọ na-achị Northern Nigeria, ma Sawaba sonyere òtù Northern Element Progressive Union (NEPU)
Ọ bụ onye na agbaso alụm di na nwunye nke ndị nʻetozughi etozu, ndị ọrụ mmanye na onye kwadoro maka agụmakwụkwọ bekee n'ebe ugwu
Gambo meere onwe ya aha mgbe ọ na-ekwu okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ nʻugwu, bu mgbe ọ rịgoro ma kwuo okwu n'ime ụlọ jupụtara na ụmụ nwoke

Weiss

Martin si usoro nke fantasy akwụkwọ akụkọ, nke mbụ nke nke a na-akpọ A Game of Thrones

Gamil Ratib (Arabic, 18 August 1926 - 19 September 2018) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara na telivishọn na ihe nkiri na obere oge na ihe nkiri karịa ọrụ afọ 65
A maara ya maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ọjọọ na mpụta ya na ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme nke asụsụ Bekee Lawrence of Arabia
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1926 na Cairo n'ezinụlọ ndị Egypt nke a maara maka ịhụnanya ha nwere maka nka, e zigara Ratib ịmụ nka na Paris
Ịhụnanya ya maka ime ihe nkiri sitere na ihe nkiri French, nke ọ gụrụ na Mahadum nke France, tupu o mee ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 1945
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a na-enye onyinye dị ukwuu na mba ya bụ Egypt na France, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mba abụọ ahụ, gụnyere inye ya Legion of Honour
Na France, Ratib lụrụ nwanyị French ma nye ya nwa amaala France
γ-Hydroxyvaleric acid (GHV), nke a makwaara dị ka 4-methyl-GHB, bụ ọgwụ mmepụta metụtara γ-hydroxybutyric acid (GHB)

A na-ahụ ya mgbe ụfọdụ n'ahịa na-acha ntụ ntụ ụlọ na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ka ndị ọzọ na ụdị nke dị ka ihe ọzọ iwu kwadoro na GHB, mana na-enwe ike dị ala na nsị dị elu, ihe onwunwe ndị na-egbochi ojiji ntụrụndụ ya
γ-Valerolactone (GVL) na-arụ ọrụ dị ka prodrug na GHV, n'ụzọ yiri otú γ-butyrolactone (GBL) si bụrụ prodrug na ГHB
γ-Valerolactone (GVL) bụ ihe na-emepụta ihe na usoro C5H8O2
Mmiri a na-enweghị ụcha bụ otu n'ime lactones a na-ahụkarị
GVL bụ chiral mana a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe dị ka racemate
A na-enweta ya n'ụzọ dị mfe site na cellulosic biomass ndị na ma bụrụ ihe nwere ike ịgba ọkụ na ihe na-agbanye mmiri
GVL na-akpa àgwà dị ka ọgwụ na-emepụta γ-hydroxyvaleric acid (GHV), ọgwụ nwere mmetụta yiri nke γ-hydrexybutyric acid (GHB), ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwere ike dị ala ma e jiri ya tụnyere
N'ihi na a na-achịkwa GHB n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke abụọ ahụ na ihe niile nke obodo ụwa, ebe GVL abụghị, GVL enwetala ewu ewu dị ka onye na-anọchi GHB
A na-emepụta GVL site na levulinic acid, nke a na-enweta site na hexoses

N'ime usoro a na-ahụkarị ndị mmadụ na nke ukwu nke ụwa họrọ site na ndi isi, cellulosic biomasses, dị ka ọka stover, sawgrass, ma ọ bụ osisi, na-agbanye na glucose na shuga ndị ọzọ site na iji acid catalysts

Enwere ike imebi glucose a na-enweta site na hydroxymethylfurfural iji mepụta formic acid na levulinic acid, nke na-agbagharị na mgbanaka mgbanaka mgbagwoju anya, nke enwere ike hydrogenated na gamma-valerolactone, nke nwere ike itinye ya dịka mmanụ mmiri
A chọpụtala GVL dị ka ihe nwere ike ịgbaze ndị na eme ka anyị si e akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
N'ihi ísì ahịhịa ya, a na-eji ya eme ihe na ụlọ ọrụ na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ọ bụ isomer nke δ-valerolactone
Ebe ọ bụ na a na-enweta ya n'ụzọ dị mfe site na glucose, a chọpụtala GVL dị ka 'ihe na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ'
GVL na-ejigide 97% nke ike nke glucose ma nwee ike ịgwakọta ya n'onwe ya na gasoline ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka ethanol / gasoline mixtures
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi oke ngwakọta maka iji ya na injin ọkụ, ọ nwere ike ịdị irè karị iji gbanwee GVL ka ọ bụrụ alkenes mmiri na eme ka ndị mmadụ na ímé ihe ọ bụla (ma ọ bụ alkanes)
Nzọụkwụ mbụ na usoro a bụ mmeghe mgbanaka nke GVL iji mepụta ngwakọta nke pentenoic acid
Enwere ike decarboxylated acid ndị a iji mepụta butene na CO2
Enwere ike iji zeolite catalysts mee mgbanwe ndị a

Mgbe mmiri gwụsịrị iyi a, enwere ike oligomerized ngwaahịa ndị ahụ na nrụgide dị elu na ọnụnọ nkè ikike asụsụ obodo acid-catalyst iji mepụta alkenes nwere ịdị arọ dị elu, maka gasoline na ngwa mmanụ ndị ọzọ
Otu n'ime uru ndị bụ isi na-enye ohere ka GVL bụrụ ihe na-eme ka ihe dị ndụ bụrụ ihe bara uru bụ na ọ dị ọnụ ala iji mepụta
N'iji ihe oriri dị ọnụ ala, enwere ike ịmepụta mmanụ a na ọnụahịa ọnọdụ na akụkọ ụra akpa nwa dị n'etiti 2-3 US $ / galọn
Mgbanwe nke GVL na alkenes nwere ike ibugharị mmanụ chọrọ naanị usoro nwere reactors abụọ, ndị na-ekewa akụkụ abụọ, na ndokwa mgbapụta dị mfe maka nnyefe nri GVL mmiri
Ebe ọ bụ na a chọghị iji ihe ndị na-akpali akpali dị oké ọnụ ahịa, nke a na-ebelata ọnụahịa niile nke mmepụta mmanụ
Ewezuga uru ya dị ka ihe nwere ike ịba ụba n'onwe ya, gamma-valerolactone egosila nkwa na mmepụta thermocatalytic nke ụlọ nyocha nke carbohydrates soluble site na stover ọka na osisi na nnukwu ihe
Biomass na-emeghachi omume na ngwakọta mmiri, sulfuric acid, na gamma-valerolactone, n'onwe ya sitere na biomass
Gamma-valerolactone na-akwalite thermocatalytic hydrolysis n'ime monosaccharides site na solubilization zuru oke nke ihe a na-emepụta, gụnyere lignins
Enwere ike iweghachite ngwaahịa saccharide site na lactone n'ime mmiri site na mgbakwunye anti-solvent nke nnu ma ọ bụ mmiri carbon dioxide
Enwere ike iji ngwaahịa ahụ mee ihe dị ka ihe oriri maka ịmepụta furans ma ọ bụ ethanol na nnukwu mmepụta, ebe a na-eweghachi gamma-valerolactone na okirikiri catalytic
A mụọla Gamma-Valerolactone ma gosipụta ikike ịkwadebe ngwọta ọgwụ maka imepụta polymer membranes
N'ihi nsị nke solvents ọdịnala, a nyochara solvents akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya na ọ ga eme
N'ihi ọdịdị ya na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, Gamma-Valerolactone gosipụtara ikike ịmepụta polysulfone membranes dị ka co-solvent

Gamo-Gofa-Dawro bụ asụsụ Omotic nke ezinụlọ Afroasiatic nke a na-asụ na Dawro, Gamo Gofa na Wolayita Zones nke Southern Nations, Nationalities, na Peoples' Region na Ethiopia
Gamo, Gofa, Dawro na-asụ ụdị dị iche iche; Blench (2006) na Ethnologue na-emeso ndị a dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche

N'afọ 1992, Alemayehu Abebe chịkọtara ndepụta okwu nke ntinye 322 maka asụsụ atọ ahụ metụtara ya
Gana El Maghnaoui (Arabic Kanا گرناوي), amụrụ na 2 Febụwarị 1958, bụ onye Algeria na-agu egwu raï, na onye na-ede egwu
Site na Maghnia (Tlemcen Province), a mụrụ Mourad Gana, nke a maara nke ọma n'okpuru aha Gana El Maghnaoui, na 2 Febụwarị 1958 na Maghnie, Algeria
Dị ka onye na-agụ egwú, ọ na-akpọ violin nakwa opi
Oge izizi ya na egwu rai malitere na 1973
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị egwú nke ngalaba Oran nke RTA (1974 Xi 1980), mgbe ahụ na Algiers
N'afọ 1978, o wepụtara EP abụọ ma mgbe otu afọ gasịrị, o dekọrọ kaseeti nwere egwu asatọ
N'ekwu na ọ rụghị ọrụ, ọ pụrụ apụ ma maliteghachi na 1986 na egwu Ala ezzergha rani nsel na mkpuchi nke Bouteldja Belkacem Milouda fine Kunti, egwu nke afọ

Chief Abdul-Ganiyu 'Gani' Oyesola Fawehinmi , GCON, SAN (22 Eprel 1938 ruo 5 Septemba 2009) bụ onye edemede Naijiria, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, onye ọrụ ebere, onye nkatọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, onye ọka iwu na ikike mmadụ na nke obodo, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
O nwere utu aha onye isi nke Lamofin nke Ondo
Saheed na Munirat Fawehinmi nke Ondo, na Ondo Steeti
Nna ya, Chief Saheed Tugbobo Fawehinmi, Seriki Musulumi nke Ondo, bụ onye na-ere ahịa osisi na-aga nke ọma, onye ọrụ ebere, onye na-eme ihe omume obodo na onye isi ndị Alakụba nke ndị Yoruba
A kọrọ na ọ bụ onye na-eso ụzọ Ajao, onye wetara Islam na Ondo City, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Chief Saheed Tugbobo Fawehinmi nwụrụ na 5 Febrụwarị 1963 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na itoolu
Nna nna Gani bụ Chief Lisa Alujanu Fawehinmi nke Ondo, onye lụrụ ọtụtụ agha na-aga nke ọma maka na nnọchite anya ndị Ondo na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu
N'ihi ya, aha ahụ bụ 'Alujanun', nke pụtara mmụọ
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na abụọ

Gani gụrụ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Ansar-Ud-Deen Primary School, Iyemaja Ondo site na 1947 ruo 1953 na agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Victory College Ikare, ụlọ akwụkwọ Ndị Kraịst site na 1954 ruo 1958, n'okpuru nduzi nke Late Rev
Akinrele ebe ọ nọdụrụ ma gafee ule West African School Certificate n'afọ 1958
Mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji, a maara ya nke ọma dị ka 'Nation' n'ihi mmasị ya na mba, iwu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye na-agụ akwụkwọ nke Daily Times na West African Pilot, akwụkwọ akụkọ kachasị ewu ewu na Naịjirịa n'oge ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge dị ka odeakwụkwọ iwu n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Lagos ruo 1961
Gani debanyere aha na Holborn College of Law- Mahadum nke London ịgụ iwu na 1961
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum, nna ya nwụrụ
Ọ gụsịrị akara ugo mmụta ya na London na ihe isi ike n'ihi enweghị ego

Nke a gụnyere ịrụ ọrụ dị iche iche na London, mgbe ọ nọ na London, ọ maara akwụkwọ nke ndị na-eme mgbanwe ma ọ bụ ndị na-emegide onwe ha dị ka Fidel Castro, Winston Churchill, David Ben-Gurion, Ghandhi, Mao Tse Tsung na Karl Marx
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 1964 ma kpọọ ya n'ụlọikpe n'afọ sochirinụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu nke nwanne ya nwoke, onye nwụrụ anwụ Hon
Justice Rasheed Olabamidele Fawehinmi tupu ọ gbasaa n'onwe ya
Fawehinmi ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ banyere ikpe nke onye ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ, Bala Abashe onye kwuru na odeakwụkwọ nke gọọmentị Benue-Plateau State, Andrew Obeya na nwunye ya nwere mmekọahụ
Abashe wee gbaa Obeya akwụkwọ maka mwakpo na mmebi maka ịkwa iko
Fawehinmi weere ikpe ahụ dị ka onye ọka iwu pro bono maka Abashe mgbe gọọmentị steeti guzo n'azụ onye ọrụ ha
E mere mgbalị maka Fawehinmi ka ọ kwụsị ikpe ahụ, mgbe nke ahụ dara, a manyere Obeya ịgba arụkwaghịm
Agbanyeghị, e jidere Fawehinmi ọnwa itoolu
Mgbasa ozi nke ikpe ahụ mere ka ikpughe ọrụ iwu ya dịkwuo mma
Site na 1971 ruo 1973, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ mgbasa ozi mba nke Nigerian Bar Association

Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 1981, kọmitii na-ahụ maka ịdọ aka ná ntị jụrụ Fawehinmi ajụjụ ma gwa ya ka ọ kọwaa onwe ya n'ime ụbọchị iri na anọ ihe mere o ji na-akpọ onwe ya site na mgbasa ozi na mbipụta kwa izu nke megidere ụkpụrụ omume nke ụlọ mmanya
N'okwu a, Kọmitii Ịdọ Aka ná Ntị nke Ndị Ọrụ Iwu (LPDC)

Chief Gani Fawehinmi (1985) Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kwadoro ikpe ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe nke mere ka ikpe LPDC megide Chief Fawehinami ghara ịrụ ọrụ na ndabere na usoro iwu nke LPDC na Attorney-General dị ka Onye isi oche mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ebo ebubo, onye ọkàiwu na onye ọka ikpe n'otu oge ahụ nke mebiri ụkpụrụ nke ikpe ziri ezi ma ya mere ikike Chief Fawehanmi nwere ịnụ ihe ziri ezi
Ikpe ahụ dugara na mmezigharị nke Iwu Ndị Ọrụ Iwu nke afọ 1975
Fawehinmi mechara mebie ntụziaka NBA

N'afọ 1984, mgbe ọchịchị ọhụrụ nke Buhari wepụtara iwu Recovery of Public Property, NBA n'okpuru onye isi oche nke Bola Ajibola nyere ndị otu ya ntụziaka ka ha ghara ịnọchite anya onye ahịa ọ bụla n'ụlọ ikpe ndị agha
Fawehinmi leghaara ntụziaka ahụ anya n'ihi na o kwenyere na a ga-eme ka onye a na-ebo ebubo wepụ ego ọ bụla e zuru n'ihi ya, a na-etinye aha ya na mpempe akwụkwọ NBA

N'afọ 1994, ya na ụfọdụ ndị Naijiria ndị ọzọ a ma ama guzobere National Conscience Party of Nigeria nke dị ruo taa ma ọ guzoro maka ntuli aka onye isi ala n'afọ 2003 n'okpuru nchebe nke National Conscience party
E buliri Gani Fawehinmi ka ọ bụrụ Senior Advocate of Nigeria (SAN), aha iwu kachasị elu na Naịjirịa, na Septemba afọ 2001
N'afọ 1986, mgbe Chief Gani Fawehinmi bụ onye ọka iwu Dele Giwa, e gburu onye nke ikpeazụ na mgbawa bọmbụ n'ọnọdụ a na-enyo enyo
N'ihi ọrụ ya, e jidere onye isi ọrụ Gani Fawehinmi, jide ya ma boo ya ebubo n'ụlọ ikpe ọtụtụ ugboro
E jidere paspọtụ mba ụwa ya n'ọtụtụ oge ma nyochaa ebe obibi ya na Chambers ọtụtụ ugboro
A na-eti ya ihe site n'oge ruo n'oge ma chụpụ ya site n'otu akụkụ nke mba ahụ gaa n'akụkụ ọzọ iji gbochie ya inwe ike iru ndị mmadụ ọ na-ewu ewu
Gọọmentị Ndị Agha Federal weghaara akwụkwọ ya ma gbaa ọbá akwụkwọ ya na Surulere, nke dịpụrụ adịpụ na Lagos ọkụ
Iwu ya Chambers na Anthony Village, Lagos Steeti, bụ nke ndị a na-enyo enyo na ha bụ ndị ọrụ gọọmentị wakporo
A gbagburu ndị nche ahụ, abụọ n'ime ha merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu

N'ime usoro nke agha ntụli aka ya maka ọchịchị iwu, olileanya na ọchịchọ nke ndị ogbenye na ndị a na-emegbu emegbu, ọ lụrụ ọtụtụ agha megide ọchịchị aka ike nke ndị agha n'ihi nke a, gọọmentị ndị agha na ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ nchekwa ha jidere ya ọtụtụ ugboro
A tụbara ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ mkpọrọ ndị uwe ojii ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ n'ọtụtụ n'etiti afọ 1969 na 1996
Ndị na-akwado ya akpọwo ya 'ihe otiti nke sphygmomanometer nke a na-atụle ọbara mgbali elu nke ndị ọchịchị aka ike, ezi akọ na uche nke mba ahụ na onye na-akwado ọdịmma na ihe kpatara ndị mmadụ'
Ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria malitekwara ịkpọ ya onye isi ala ndị mmadụ
E guzobere ọbá akwụkwọ Gani Fawehinmi na 1965 na No116, Denton Street, Ebute Meta, Lagos mgbe onye guzobere ya guzobere ụlọ ya
A kwagara ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ na No
28 Sabiu Ajose Crescent, Surulere, Lagos

N'afọ 1978, ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ si Surulere kwaga na 35 Adeniran Ajao Road, Ajao Estate, Anthony Village, Lagos na n'etiti afọ 2009 na 2012, ọbá akwụkwọ a kwagara na ebe ọ dị ugbu a na nke na-adịgide adịgide na Gani Fawehinmi Library and Gallery na Otunba Jobi-Fele Way Central Business District, Alausa, Ikeja, Lagos-Nigeria
E dekọrọ ọbá akwụkwọ Gani Fawehinmi ka ọ bụrụ ọbá akwụkwọ kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa

O nwere ihe karịrị otu nde nchịkọta na akwụkwọ na ihe ndị na-abụghị akwụkwọ na isiokwu dị iche iche sitere na iwu, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akụkọ ndụ, okpukpe, na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na almanacs na encyclopedias
O nwekwara ebe nchekwa ihe ochie nwere nchịkọta akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin site na mmalite afọ 1970 ruo taa
ndị a bụ ụfọdụ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị a na-apụghị ịchọta n'ọbá akwụkwọ ọ bụla ọzọ na Naịjirịa
Ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị narị anọ bibliographic ihe banyere onye guzobere ya ma nwee gallery nke onye isi Gani Fawehinmi
Na 11 Jụn afọ 1993 e nyere Fawehinmi ihe nrite Bruno Kreisky Prize
Ihe nrite a, nke akpọrọ aha iji sọpụrụ Bruno Kreisky, a na-enye ndị mba ụwa na-akwalite ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
N'afọ 1998, ọ natara 'Bernard Simmons Award' nke International Bar Association iji kwado ikike mmadụ ya na ọrụ ya na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
N'afọ 2018, e nyere Chief Fawehinmi Order of the Niger, nke abụọ kachasị elu na Naịjirịa
Fawehinmi nwụrụ n'isi ụtụtụ nke 5 Septemba afọ 2009 mgbe ọ lụchara ọgụ ogologo oge na ọrịa kansa akpa ume
Ọ dị afọ iri asaa na otu
E liri ya na 15 afọ Septemba 2009 n'obodo ya bụ Ondo City Naijiria
Fawehinmi nwụrụ dị ka nwoke nwere nkụda mmụọ, n'ihi ọnọdụ nke mba ya n'oge ọnwụ ya, ọ jụrụ nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke mba ya nyere ya n'elu àkwà ọnwụ ya
N'afọ 2008, Fawehinmi jụrụ otu n'ime nsọpụrụ mba kachasị elu nke gọọmentị Naijiria nwere ike inye nwa amaala n'ihi na ọ na-eme mkpesa maka ọtụtụ afọ nke ọchịchị ọjọọ kemgbe nnwere onwe Naijiria
A cross view of Gani Fawehinmi Park, Ojota, Lagos-Nigeria
A road view of Gani Fawehinmi Park, Lagos-Nigeria
N'afọ 2010, gọọmentị steeti Lagos nyere ogige ntụrụndụ dị na Ojota, Lagos-Nigeria aha ya

Gani Fawehinmi Park, nke a maa buuru dị ka Liberty Park, bụ ebe ngosi ahịhịa ndụ ọha na eze dị na Ojota, Lagos, Nigeria naanị n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ awara awara Lagos-Ibadan na ụzọ gbanweharị Ikorodu , Lagos
E wuru ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ iji sọpụrụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na onye ọka iwu Gani Fawehinmi nke e debere nnukwu ihe oyiyi ya n'etiti ogige ahụ
Ihe oyiyi a dị mita iri anọ na anọ n'ogologo bụ nke Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti nyere iwu n'abalị iri abụọ na Otu nke ọnwa April , afọ 2018
Ogige ahụ nwekwara obere ihe ịrịba ama na-akọ akụkọ dị mkpirikpi banyere nhiwe ya
E tinyere ihe ndị ọzọ a tụrụ atụ, ala dị nro na bench iji mee ka oghere ahụ maa mma ma dabara adaba maka ntụrụndụ na obere ihe omume
Ọ bụ ebe a na-eme Yoruba Nation Rally nke emere n'abalị atọ nke onwaJuly afọ 2021

Gani Odutokun (August 9, 1946 - February 16, 1995) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'oge ọgbara ọhụrụ a na Naijiria nke a maara maka onyinye ya na ịzụlite ndị na-ese ihe na Zaria art society
Ọrụ ya gụnyere mgbidi murals, eserese na eserese mkpuchi akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Odutokun na Nsawan, Ghana site na nne na nna Naijiria nke agbụrụ Yoruba bụ ndị sitere na Offa, Kwara Steeti na ndị na-azụ ahịa koko
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na-etolite na mpaghara Ashanti mana nna ya mechara kwaga Naịjirịa mgbe ọ dara mbà n'ahịa koko

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ na Nigerian Breweries mana site n'aka ndị enyi ya hụrụ talent ya, o tinyere akwụkwọ ma nweta nnabata na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria na 1972
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ na nzere masta na Fine Arts na 1975 na 1979
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere bachelọ ya, ọ sonyeere ngalaba Fine Arts nke ABU dị ka onye enyemaka gụsịrị akwụkwọ
A maara ihe osise Odutokun maka inyocha ọdịdị ndụ
Ihe osise ya na-enyocha echiche nkà ihe ọmụma banyere 'ihe mberede na imewe,' iberibe na 'ịdị n'otu na-adabaghị adaba', ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-agbalịkwa ịma atụmanya ọdịda anyanwụ nke nka Afrịka aka
Mgbe ụfọdụ, Odutokun gụnyere nkọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1988, eserese ya, The King Shares a Joke with his Generals, na-earutu aka n'echiche efu nke nnwere onwe Babangida
Odutokun nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-alọta n'ihe ngosi nke sochiri nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe emere na Goethe Institute na Lagos
O so na ndị omenkà anọ nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọala

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1995, Time No Boundaries, ihe ngosi e mere nke nwere ihe osise sitere n'aka ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe site na mpaghara ugwu Naịjirịa na Maison de France, Alfred Rewane road na nsọpụrụ Odutokun
N'afọ 2008, e mere ihe ngosi nka ncheta nke Nigerian Gallery of Art iji kwanyere ihe osise Odutokun ùgwù na Aina Onabolu complex nke National Arts Theatre, Iganmu, Lagos
