Ganye bụ obodo na ọchịchị ime obodo nke Adamawa Steeti, Naijiria
Ọchịchị ime obodo Jada na Toungo bụ ndị e si na Gọọmenti Ganye dị na steeti Adamawa kpụrụ akpụ
Ganye dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Jada na North na East, okpuru ochichi Toungo n'ebe ndịda na Taraba Steeti n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ
Gọọmenti Ganye bụ otu n'ime nnukwu ọchịchị ime obodo Adamawa steeti nwere Mubi na Numan
Ndị isi na ndị na-achị Ganye bụ asụsụ Sama (Chamba) na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ dịka Fulani na Mummuye
Onye na-achị Ganye bụ onye ọchịchị ọdịnala mbụ Alh
Umaru Adamu Sanda OON (Gangwari Ganye II)
Mpaghara Gọọmenti Ganye bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị Sama(Chamba) n'ụwa niile
Isi obodo dị na Ganye gụnyere Sugu, Gurum na Jaggu
Ala Ganye bụ ụdị loamy nke mere ka ọ bụrụ ebe a na-akọ ugbo wee nye ya aha ' nkata nri steeti'
Ọchịchị ime obodo na-enweta oge mmiri ozuzo na ọkọchị abụọ
Oge mmiri ozuzo na-amalite na Ganye ka ọ dị ka Maachị wee kwụsị n'October
Osimiri Dadonu na-asọba n'okpuru ọchịchị Ganye nke na-ebuga ya na ugwu Jangani

Ganza (nke a na-akpọkwa Ganzo, Koma) (Arabic غانزا) bụ asụsụ Omotic a na-asụ na mpaghara Al Kurumik nke Blue Nile (mba) na Sudan na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Benishangul-Gumuz nke Etiopia, ọkachasị na mpaghara obodo Penishuba ya na Yabeldigis
Ọ na-agakwa aha Ganzo, Gwami, Koma, na Koma-Ganza
Ọ bụ ezie na ogologo ụdaume na-adịkarị iche n'asụsụ Omotic, Ganza enweghị ọdịiche doro anya n'etiti ụdaume ogologo na mkpirikpi
Kama nke ahụ, Ganza nwere ogologo ụdaume ikpeazụ a na-ahụ anya na usoro okwu monosyllabic nwere ụdaume abụọ 109

Gaositwe Keagakwa Tibe Chiepe (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1922) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Botswana na onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ na Botswana Democratic Party Ọ bụ onye isi kọmishọna mba ya na United Kingdom na Nigeria na onye nnọchi anya na West Germany, France, Denmark, Norway, Sweden na European Economic Community
Ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na Botswana n'afọ 1977 ma n'afọ 1984 ọ ghọrọ Minista na'ahụ maka mba ofesi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ site na afọ 1994 ruo na afọ 1999
A mụrụ Chiepe na Bechuanaland Protectorate (nke bụ Botswana ugbu a) na 20 Ọktoba 1922, nye Moruti Tibe Chiepe Na S
Chiepe (née Sebina)
Nna ya nwụrụ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na ezinụlọ ya chọrọ ka ọ hapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ma lụọ di, nne ya siri ọnwụ na ọ nọgidere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya
Chiepe mechara kwuo na ọrụ ya na-aga nke ọma bụ n'ihi na nne ya siri ọnwụ na ọ ga-agụ akwụkwọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Serowe ma mesịa gaa Tiger Kloof Educational Institute, South Africa maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị, ebe ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma na mba ahụ
Ọ gara Mahadum Fort Hare, kwa na South Africa, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị yana diplọma postgraduate na agụmakwụkwọ
N'afọ 1958, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Bristol na UK na nzere masta

Akwụkwọ edemede ya bụ 'Nnyocha nke Nsogbu nke Mmụta A Ma Ama na Bechuanaland Protectorate na Light of a Comparative Study of Similar Problems in the Early Stages of English Education and in the Development of Education in Yugoslavia and Uganda
E nyere ya nzere nsọpụrụ site na Mahadum Depaul, United States
Chiepe malitere ọrụ ya na Gọọmentị Bechuanaland Protectorate na Ngalaba Mmụta ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị Afrịka abụọ mbụ a họpụtara n'ọkwa nchịkwa (Onye Ọrụ Mmụta) na gọọmentị na-achị ala
Chiepe bụ nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ na Botswana
Chiepe bụ nwanyị mbụ so na kọmitii na Botswana (1974) ebe ọ ghọrọ onye omeiwu a họpụtara n'ụzọ pụrụ iche
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu site na mpaghara Serowe South na Central District nke Botswana na ntuli aka na afọ 1977

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi kọmishọna na United Kingdom na Nigeria na onye nnọchi anya na West Germany, France, Denmark, Norway, Sweden na European Economic Community site na afo 1970 ruo na afọ 1974
N'oge ya dị ka Kọmishọna Ukwu na UK, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ise Caroline Haslett Memorial Lecture na Royal Society of Arts
N'okpuru Women's Engineering Society, Dr Letitia Obeng, onye bụ onye nduzi nke Freshwater Research Institute of Aquatic Biology na Ghana kwuru na 'Nation Building & the African Woman'
Site na afo 1974 ruo afọ 1977, Chiepe bụ Minista nke Azụmaahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ
Site na afọ 1977 ruo afọ 1984, ọ bụ Minista nke Mines & Natural Resources
N'afọ 1982, Chiepe jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Kalahari Conservation Society (KCS)
N'afọ 1984, Chiepe ghọrọ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Na-eme ná Mba Ọzọ (Minister of External Affairs), ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 1994
Site na afọ 1994 ruo na afọ 1999, ọ bụ Minista nke Mmụta
Chiepe lara ezumike nká na ndụ gọọmentị na afọ 1999 mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 30 nke ọkwa dị elu

N'afọ 2013, ọ bụ onye isi okwu na Botswana's International Day of Elder Persons nke emere na Mokolodi Nature Reserve, na-ekwu na anyị chọrọ ịbụ ndị agadi na ndụmọdụ na ndị na-eto eto na-arụ ọrụKa anyị, dị ka ndị agadi ghara ịbụ dinosaur kama jiri ihe ọmụma anyị na amamihe anyị siri ike nweta mee ihe ọ bụghị naanị iji mee ka mmekọrịta anyị na ogologo ndụ anyị dị na ọha mmadụ, kama mee ka mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ọgbọ dị iche iche dịkwuo elu, na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'agbata ndị na-eto eto na ndị okenye

E nyela Chiepe ma Presidential Order of Merit na Presidential Order nke Meritorious Service (Botswana), ma mee ya onye isi nke Royal Order of the Polar Star site n'aka Eze Sweden na onye otu Order of the British Empire (MBE)
Ọ natara nzere doctorate na Mahadum Bristol na Britain, Mahadum De Paul na United States na Fort Hare na South Africa
N'afọ 2009, Mahadum Botswana nyere ya nzere Doctorate of Laws maka ọrụ ya dị ịrịba ama na mmepe nke mba ahụ

Alhaji Garba Shuńaibu Gashua, onye a maara ama nke ọma dị ka 'Garba Gashuwa', bụ onye na-ede uri nke oge a nke Obodo Naijiria, ezigbo onye ọchụnta ego, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọrụ gọọmentị lara ezumike nká, amụrụ ya na Gasamu, na ochịchị ime obodo Jakusko nke dị na Yobe State, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria, na afọ 1957, nna ya bụ Sālisu na nne ya bụ Salāmatu
Nna ya bụ onye obodo nke Badawa (Bade) ma nwee ụmụ nwoke anọ, aha ha bụ Saʹidu, Isa, Garba (nke atọ), na Musa
Taata, Garba Gashuwa na ezinụlọ ya bi na Kano ma nwee ọtụtụ ụmụ; n'etiti ha bụ Musa Garba Gashua, onye nwere nkà na onye a mara ama na-ide egwu
N'ikwekọ n'omume n'ozuzu n'etiti obodo ndị Alakụba dị na ala Hausa, agụmakwụkwọ Gashuwa malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ, mgbe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ kor'an ọdịnala na Gasamu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya, ọ kwagara jee Gashuwa, ebe ọ gụrụ hadith, fiqh na isiokwu ndị ọzọ metụtara ihe ọmụma Alakụba
Gashuwa edebanyeghị aha ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ bụla dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ, mana ọ mụtara site n'aka ndị enyi ya otu esi ahụ ma dee na edemede Rom
Gashuwa bụkwa onye na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya, nwa okorobịa a bụ Gashuwa, malitere azụmahịa n'obodo nke Bade, na-ere akwụkwọ ndị Alakụba dị ka Qawaoidi, Yasin Arashada, Iza-waqa, Ahalari na Dalaoilul Khairati
Ewezuga ịbụ onye na-ere akwụkwọ, ọ bụkwa onye na-ese akpụkpọ ụkwụ na mai dinkin hula (onye na-esi akwa omenala Hausa)
Ọ biri na Lagos ruo ọtụtụ afọ na-achụso ọrụ ọchụnta ego ndị a
Ọrụrụ ọrụ gọọmentị malitere na mgbe o mechara kwaga, ma biri na Kano na arịrịọ nke onye nwụgoro anwụ bụ Malam Aminu Kano
Nhọpụta mbụ ya site na Gọọmentị Steeti Kano bụ na 'CTV-67's Archived Wayback Machine Cultural Section', n'oge ọchịchị Alhaji Aliyu Sabo Bakin Zuwo

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo afọ 1989, mgbe onye nchịkwa ndị agha nke steeti ahụ bụ onye agha Idris Garba, rịọrọ ka a kpọga ya na 'Kano State History and Culture Bureau Archived Wayback Machine', ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nye ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Bureau ruo mgbe ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa onye otu ndị isi oche ya, ọkwá o nwere site na afọ 1989 ruo na afọ 1995
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ na 1995 ma tinye ndụ ya n'ide uri Hausa na edemede Ajami

Gashuwa sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke onye aha ya bụ Abdu Nguru, onye nke na-ede uri nke onye ọ maara, ma mesịa malite na isiokwu ndị Alakụba dị ka; Israʹi & Miʹiraj, na ọrụ ebube na ọnwụ (wafaat) nke onye amụma Muhammad
A na-edekarị ọrụ ya na edemede Hausa Ajami
Ọ malitere ide uri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge njem mkpọsa nke afọ 1978, nke Onye isi ala nke People's Redemption Party, Malam Aminu Kano, nke emere na Gashua nke dị na gburugburu ya
N'ihi nke a, Aminu Kano kpọrọ Garba Gashuwa ka ọ biri na Kano, ka ọ gaa n'ihu na-enye aka na mmepe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke oge ahụ
Mgbe ọ bụla Gashuwa na-abụ abụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, ndị na-ege ya ntị na-ekwe ukwe, na-akụ aka
E wezụga okpukpe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Gashuwa dere na isiokwu ndị ọzọ ma, ruo ugbu a, o nwere ihe karịrị otu puku uri Hausa Ajami n'aha ya
Na mbido, ndị na-ede uri Hausa jiri (ma ka na-eji ùgbúà) mita iri na isii Arabic nke sitere na prosody Arabic n'ihe ha dere
Taata, ụfọdụ ndị na-ede uri na-ahọrọ ụdị na isiokwu ndị bụ nke oge a, ọ bụ ezie na mmetụta nke uri Arabic ka na-ahụ anya
Gashuwa na-adabere n'ọtụtụ uri ya na rhythms nke onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu nke Hausa, Dr

Mamman Shata nke Katsina, na isiokwu gụnyere okpukpe, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na mmadụ ibe ya, agụmakwụkwọ, na ọdịbendị ọdịnalaIn the use of language and poetic devices, 'the language of his poems is simple and apt to be understood by the average Hausa'
He also make use of Arabic and English loanwords, dialect, proverbs and innuendo to express his points
Above all, Gashuwa always opens and closes his poem with a doxology, no matter the motif
Sometimes his poems are to be accompanied by hand clapping

For Gashuwa 'an effective political poem should be chanted in a pleasant voice, accompanied by hand clapping, and should contain proverbs'; he holds that this will surely attract an audience’s attention
Below is an example of proverb in his poem named Ɗan Hakin da ka Raina, 'The Little Grass That You Despise'
This poem is in ƙwar biyar, pentastich form, with “bᾱ” as the external rhyme
Àtụ Verse translation
'Verse No
7' (Hausa Text)
Ko shī mᾱ rᾱƙumin dawᾱ yai wani zancē, Cikin maganᾱtai ta bᾱya mu munka karancē, Yanᾱ Allah wadai da naka in yᾱ lᾱlᾱcē, Ganin na gidᾱ nᾱ ta turƙusō yᾱ gīgīcē, Allah wadaran abin da bᾱ hairī nᾱ bᾱ
The bush camel (giraffe) made a certain statement,
in a past speech, which we read,
in which he said, 'God curse your brother for demeaning himself',
When in perplexity, he saw the domestic kneeling down and being loaded,
May God curse a bad thing such as this
N'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka, gari bụ ntụ ọka na-acha creme nke a na-enweta site na nhazi mgbọrọgwụ nke cassava a na-ewepụta ọhụrụ
N'asụsụ Hausa, okwu a pụkwara izo aka na ntụ ntụ a na-enweta site na nhazi ihe ọkụkụ ndị ọzọ dị ka ọka Guinea, ọka, osikapa, yam, plantain na millet
Dịka ọmụmaatụ a na-enweta garin dawa site na nhazi ọka guinea, n'otu aka ahụ, garin masara na garin alkama sitere na nhazi ọka na ọka wit
Garin magani bụ ọgwụ ntụ
Ihe oriri ntụ ọka a gwakọtara ya na mmiri oyi ma ọ bụ mmiri esi bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke nri n'etiti agbụrụ dị iche iche nke Nigeria, Benin Republic, Togo, Ghana, Guinea, Cameroon na Liberia
Iji mee ntụ ọka gari, a na-ewepụ tubers cassava, sachaa ma sie ya ma ọ bụ kụrisịa ya iji mepụta mash
Enwere ike ịgwakọta mash na mmanụ nkwụ ma tinye ya n'ime akpa nwere oghere, nke a na-etinye n'ime igwe na-agbanwe agbanwe maka awa 1 iji wepụ mmiri karịrị akarị
Ozugbo a mịrị ya, a na-asa ya ma sie ya n'ime nnukwu ite ite e ji ma ọ bụ na-enweghị mmanụ nkwụ
Enwere ike ịchekwa garri granular kpọrọ nkụ ruo ogologo oge
Enwere ike ịpịa ya ma ọ bụ gwọọ ya iji mee ntụ ọka dị mma
Eba bụ ntụ ọka siri ike nke a na-eme site na itinye gari na mmiri ọkụ ma jiri osisi kụchie ya ruo mgbe ọ ghọrọ ntụ ọka dị nro
A na-enye ya dị ka akụkụ nke nri na ofe na ofe dị iche iche
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị a gụnyere okra soup, egusi soup, akwụkwọ nri soup, afang soup, banga soup na bitter leaf soup
Y bụ nri na-atọ ụtọ nke Naịjirịa ọkachasị na ndịda na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjiria
A na-eme ya site na ntụ ọka ọka, gwakọta ya na garri na shuga ma sie ya
Gari na-abịa n'ụdị dị iche iche, nke a pụrụ ịhazi n'ụzọ siri ike, nke dị n'etiti na nke dị nro
A na-eji ụdị ọ bụla maka otu nri

Dị ka ihe oriri, ọka, ma ọ bụ nri dị mfe, a na-etinye garri na mmiri oyi (nke ọ na-adaba na ala), gwakọta ya na shuga ma ọ bụ mmanụ aṅụ, na mgbe ụfọdụ a na-agbakwunye ahụekere ma ọ bụ groundnut na ma ọ bụ mmiri ara ehi
Mmiri dị mkpa maka garri a na-etinye mmiri bụ 3 1
A pụkwara iri Garri kpọrọ nkụ na-enweghị mmiri, mana na shuga na ahụekere e siri esi agbakwunyere
N'ụdị ya kpọrọ nkụ, a na-eji gari eme ihe dị ka ihe na-esote agwa a na-esi n'ụzọ dị nro na mmanụ nkwụ
A na-akpọ ngwakọta nri a yoo ke garri ma ọ bụ Foto gari n'asụsụ Ga, na Ghana
Foto garri bụ ngwakọta nke garri na stew, ebe yoo ke gari bụ garri na agwa, ngwakọta nke a na-eri dị ka nri ehihie
A na-eri ya na achịcha bean na Naịjirịa
Maka nri zuru ezu, a na-esikarị gari site na itinye ya na mmiri ọkụ, wee gbanyụọ ya n'ime ntụ ọka
A na-eri nke a na ụdị dị iche iche nke nri akwụkwọ nri, nri mkpụrụ melon, nri ahụekere, ma ọ bụ agwa
Enwere ike ịgwakọta gari dị nro (nke a maara dị ka lebu na Yoruba) na ose na ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ
A na-agbakwunye obere mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ na mmanụ nkwụ ma gwakọta ya na aka iji mee ka ọ dị nro
A na-enye ụdị garri a na azụ e siri esi
A na-ejere ya ozi na frejon na Good Friday
Na West Africa, ụdị abụọ ahụ na-acha ọcha na odo odo
A na-akwadebe gari na-acha odo odo site na itinye mmanụ nkwụ obere oge tupu oge ịgbaze nke cassava mash
N'aka nke ọzọ, enwere ike ime ya site na iji ụdị cassava na-acha odo odo
A na-esi garri ọcha n'aka nke ọzọ n'enweghị mgbakwunye mmanụ nkwụ
Mgbanwe nke gari na-acha odo odo na nke na-acha ọcha bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na Naịjirịa na Cameroon
Otu ụdị gari ọcha bụ nke a maara nke ọma dị ka gari-Ijebu
Ọ bụ ndị Yoruba sitere na Ijebu (Nigeria) mepụtara nke a
Na Ghana, a na-ekpe gari ikpe site na ụtọ ya na nha ọka ya
Ụdị ndị na-atọ ụtọ na mkpụrụ ọka dị mma na-aba uru karịa ụdị ọka dị ilu, nnukwu
Ndị na-ere nri na-ahọrọ ọka siri ike nke nwere nnukwu starch, ebe nke a na-amịkwu ihe mgbe a na-etinye ya na mmiri
Ndị na-azụ ahịa na-elegharakarị anya maka ọka siri ike mgbe ha na-agbalị ịchọpụta ịdị ọhụrụ
Enwere ike iri gari n'ebughị nri ọzọ, dị ka ihe oriri, site na itinye ya n'ime efere ma tinye mmiri oyi, shuga, groundnut na mmiri ara ehi
A na-akpọkarị nke a gari soakings
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-eji mkpụrụ ọka dị mma eme ijebu-garri, ma nwee ụtọ dị ụtọ, na-eme ka ọ dị mma ka a rie ya n'ụzọ a
N'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke West Africa, a na-agbakwunye shuga ma ọ bụ mmanụ aṅụ yana akị bekee, groundnuts, mmiri ara tiger nuts, na cashew nuts
N'ọtụtụ usoro nri gari, a na-esi ya site na itinye mmiri na-esi ísì ma na-agbanye ya iji mee ihe siri ike ma ọ bụ porridge

N'ụdị ya kpọrọ nkụ, a na-eji gari eme ihe dị ka ihe na-esote agwa a na-esi n'ụzọ dị nro na mmanụ nkwụ
A na-akpọ ngwakọta nri a yoo ke garri ma ọ bụ Foto gari n'asụsụ Ga, na Ghana
Foto garri bụ ngwakọta nke garri na stew, ebe yoo ke gari bụ garri na agwa, ngwakọta nke a na-eri dị ka nri ehihie
A na-eri ya na achịcha bean na Naịjirịa
Maka nri zuru ezu, a na-esikarị gari site na itinye ya na mmiri ọkụ, wee gbanyụọ ya n'ime ntụ ọka
A na-eri nke a na ụdị dị iche iche nke nri akwụkwọ nri, nri mkpụrụ melon, nri ahụekere, ma ọ bụ agwa
Enwere ike ịgwakọta gari dị nro (nke a maara dị ka lebu na Yoruba) na ose na ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ
A na-agbakwunye obere mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ na mmanụ nkwụ ma gwakọta ya na aka iji mee ka ọ dị nro
A na-enye ụdị garri a na azụ e siri esi
A na-ejere ya ozi na frejon na Good Friday
Na West Africa, ụdị abụọ ahụ na-acha ọcha na odo odo
A na-akwadebe gari na-acha odo odo site na itinye mmanụ nkwụ obere oge tupu oge ịgbaze nke cassava mash
N'aka nke ọzọ, enwere ike ime ya site na iji ụdị cassava na-acha odo odo
A na-esi garri ọcha n'aka nke ọzọ n'enweghị mgbakwunye mmanụ nkwụ
Mgbanwe nke gari na-acha odo odo na nke na-acha ọcha bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na Naịjirịa na Cameroon
Otu ụdị gari ọcha bụ nke a maara nke ọma dị ka gari-Ijebu
Ọ bụ ndị Yoruba sitere na Ijebu (Nigeria) mepụtara nke a
Na Ghana, a na-ekpe gari ikpe site na ụtọ ya na nha ọka ya
Ụdị ndị na-atọ ụtọ na mkpụrụ ọka dị mma na-aba uru karịa ụdị ọka dị ilu, nnukwu
Ndị na-ere nri na-ahọrọ ọka siri ike nke nwere nnukwu starch, ebe nke a na-amịkwu ihe mgbe a na-etinye ya na mmiri
Ndị na-azụ ahịa na-elegharakarị anya maka ọka siri ike mgbe ha na-agbalị ịchọpụta ịdị ọhụrụ
Enwere ike iri gari n'ebughị nri ọzọ, dị ka ihe oriri, site na itinye ya n'ime efere ma tinye mmiri oyi, shuga, groundnut na mmiri ara ehi
A na-akpọkarị nke a gari soakings
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-eji mkpụrụ ọka dị mma eme ijebu-garri, ma nwee ụtọ dị ụtọ, na-eme ka ọ dị mma ka a rie ya n'ụzọ a
N'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke West Africa, a na-agbakwunye shuga ma ọ bụ mmanụ aṅụ yana akị bekee, groundnuts, mmiri ara tiger nuts, na cashew nuts
N'ọtụtụ usoro nri gari, a na-esi ya site na itinye mmiri na-esi ísì ma na-agbanye ya iji mee ihe siri ike ma ọ bụ porridge
A na-eri Eba na ofe ma ọ bụ stew
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'akụkụ Afrịka nwere nri cassava yiri ya
Na Liberia, a na-eji gari eme ihe n'ụzọ na-atọ ụtọ a na-akpọ 'n'ụzọ na na-atọ ọchị' nke a na-ejikọta ya na ahụekere na mmanụ aṅụ
Cassava, mgbọrọgwụ nke a na-emepụta gari, bara ọgaranya na fiber, ọla kọpa na magnesium
Garrison Machinjili (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1963) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Chapungu Sculpture Park kemgbe afọ 1989, ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na Zimbabwe, dịka Charles Backford na Benard Nkanjo
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụ anya, mana a na-esite na ihe okike
A mụrụ arrison Machinjili Garrison n'afọ 1963 na Mazoe, Zimbabwe
O nwere njikọ na ọgbọ nke abụọ nke onye Zimbabwe, Tapfuma Gutsa, ọ bụkwa n'oge nleta na Tapfuma ka e mere ka ọ mara ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume
Garrison na Tapfuma rụkọrọ ọrụ n'afọ 1986
Na mbụ, ọ na-asa ma na-acha ihe ọkpụkpụ n'oge Mmecha nke Ikpeazụ ha
Mgbe e mesịrị, o mere ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ya, ma chọpụta ụdị onwe onye siri ike na-apụta n'oge mmalite a na-akpali akpali

Ná ngwụsị afọ 1987, o guzobere aha ya dị ka talent ọhụrụ dị mkpa na nka Zimbabwe, a kpọkwara ya ka ọ sonye na Chapungu Sculpture Village dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ebe ọ nọgidere ruo afọ 1991 ma laghachi ọzọ n'afọ 1999–2000

Ihe ngosi otu gụnyere - 'African Odyssey 50 Years of Zimbabwean Stone Sculpture', OXO Gallery, London, UK (2006) - 'Custom and Legend A Culture In Stone', Kew Gardens, London, UK (2000) - Ngosipụta mmalite na Chapungu Gallery, Melbourne, Australia (1998) - Zuva Gallery, Scottsdale, Arizona, USA (1998
Garrya fadyenii bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko osisi nke a na-akpọkarị Fadyen's silktassel
A mụrụ ya na West Indies, ọkachasị Jamaica, Hispaniola, na mpaghara Cuban mbụ nke Oriente na Santa Clara (Las Villas)
Ọ na-eto n'ebe nkume nke ugwu ugwu mmiri ozuzo
Tinyere Vaccinium cubense, ọ bụ osisi nwere akwụkwọ sara mbara na mpaghara ọhịa pine nke Hispaniolan

Na-etolite ruo mita asatọ (dịrị ịrị abụọ na isii ) n'ogologo, akwụkwọ ya nwere akwụkwọ elliptical, nke ọ bụla dị gburugburu sentimita atọ ruo asaa(12 ruo 28 in) n'ogo, nke na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ma na-egbuke egbuke n'elu
Osisi ahụ bụ dioecious, na osisi nwoke na nke nwanyị na-emepụta inflorescences a haziri n'ụzọ yiri nke ahụ gbara gburugburu lanceolate bracts
Mkpụrụ osisi ahụ dị n'agbata milimita ise na asaa (020 028 in) n'ogologo, ọ na-aghọkwa oji mgbe ọ kpọrọ nkụ 179
Garth Erasmus (nke a mụrụ na Eprel 12, 1956, na Uitenhage, Eastern Cape, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, nke gụnyere eserese
Ọ gara Paterson High School na Port Elizabeth ma mesịa gaa mmemme ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi na Hewat Training College na Cape Town
O mechara gaa Mahadum Rhodes, wee guzobe otu ndị na-ese ihe na obodo Vakalisa Arts Associates na Cape
Ọ bụ onye sonyere na mmemme Thupelo Workshop n'afọ 1980
A na-anọchite anya ọrụ Erasmus n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta nka, nke gụnyere National Museum of African Art na Smithsonian Institution
N'etiti usoro ndị ọzọ, a maara Erasmus maka Resistance Art ya na-eme mkpesa megide ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa
Malite dị ka ihe osise na-gosiputa ngagharị iwe ya na usoro ọnọdụ mberede ya na-egosi ihe oyiyi nke ọnyà

N'ide akwụkwọ na nnyocha nke Smithsonian's National Museum of African Arts 2002 ngosi 'Encounters With the Contemporary,' onye nkatọ Mark D'Amato kpọrọ ihe osise Erasmus The Muse 3 (1995) 'ihe dị mkpa
Ọrụ Erasmus na-eji nchọpụta ncheta ya iji bịaruo agbụrụ Khosian ya nso, ma na-adabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ sitere na Cosmology Khosian
Erasmus ejirila ederede Afrikaans kwuo maka akụkọ ihe mere eme obi ọjọọ nke Khosian na mmetụta ya na ụmụ ya ugbu a, na-emeghe windo n'ụzọ e si gbochie akụkọ ihe mere anya a
O nyekwara ihe osise maka ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, nke gụnyere akwụkwọ ilu nke Nape 'a Motana, nke e bipụtara na 2004, yana mkparịta ụka ya na ndị si na District 6 nke Cape Town
Gary Brabin (amụrụ na 9 Disemba n'afọ 1970) bụ onye bọọlụ bọọlụ nke England, onye nkuzi na onye njikwa bụ onye isi egwuregwu na otu Cymru Premier The New Saints
Onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti nke nwere ọrụ afọ iri na abụọ na English Football League, ọ nọchitere anya Stockport County, Doncaster Rovers, Bury, Blackpool, Lincoln City, Hull City na Torquay United

Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ na-abụghị nke league maka Gateshead, Runcorn, Boston United, Chester City, Halifax Town, Southport na Burscough, ma gbakwara bọl na Welsh Premier League maka Total Network Solutions / The New Saints
A kpọrọ ya onye egwuregwu nke afọ nke Chester City n'afọ 2001 na 2002, ma merie ugboro atọ maka ndị otu C nke England
O mechara banye n'ọrụ nkuzi, nke mbụ ya na Burscough na The New Saints, tupu a họpụta ya dịka onye njikwa na Southport n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008

Mgbe ọnwa abụọ gachara, a kpọrọ ya aha dịka onye njikwa Cambridge United, n'agbanyeghị na a kpọrọ ya dịka onye njirimara Conference Premier Manager of the Year maka afọ 2008 na 2009, a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ na July 2009
O mechara nyochaa ma zụọ na Luton Town, tupu e bulie ya n'ọkwa onye njikwa otu mbụ na Machị 2011
O duuru klọb ahụ gaa na asọmupi ikpeazụ nke Conference mgbe ọnwa abụọ gachara, nke mechara merie, a chụpụrụ ya na Machị 2012
Ọ laghachiri Southport dị ka onye njikwa n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014, tupu ọ hapụ klọb ahụ ọzọ ọnwa atọ ka e mesịrị iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Everton
A họpụtara ya dịka onye njikwa na Tranmere Rovers na Mee 2015, tupu achụpụ ya na Septemba 2016
Ọ sonyeere Port Vale dị ka onye nkuzi n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2017, a họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye njikwa na Blackpool ọnwa iri na otu ka e mesịrị
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, ọ laghachiri Luton Town dị ka onye na-enyere onye njikwa klọb ahụ aka maka oge 2019-2020
Brabin malitere ọrụ ya dị elu na Fourth Division n'akụkụ Stockport County, na-apụta ugboro atọ n'okpuru Danny Bergara n'oge oge 1989-90

Ọ gbara naanị otu egwuregwu ọzọ na Edgeley Park na mkpọsa 1990-91, tupu ọ hapụ 'Hatters' wee banye na Northern Premier League na Tony Lee's Gateshead mgbe oge mgbazinye ego gara nke ọma na Gateshead International Stadium
Ọ hapụrụ 'Tynesiders' wee sonye na klọb Conference Runcorn, bụ ndị lụrụ ọgụ n'afọ 1991 na 1992 tupu o nyere 'Linnets' aka iru n'ọkwa nke ise n'afọ 1993 na 1994
Ọ pụtakwara ugboro abụọ na Wembley Stadium na 1993 na 1994 FA Trophy finals ka Runcorn meriri Wycombe Wanderers na 4 -1 wee merie Woking 2-1
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eche nche n'oge ọ nọ na Runcorn
Brabin hapụrụ Canal Street wee laghachi na Football League mgbe onye njikwa Doncaster Rovers bụ Sammy Chung bịanyere aka na ya maka ego £ 45,000 na July 1994
Ọ gbakwara egwuregwu atọ maka ndị otu England C megide Wales, Finland na Norway
Ọ gara n'ihu gbaa goolu asatọ site na 33 pụtara maka 'Donny' n'oge niile nke afọ 1994
Ọ gbakwunyere goolu atọ site na egwuregwu 34 na mkpọsa 1995 na 1996, tupu ọ hapụ Belle Vue ma kwaga Stan Ternent's Bury maka ego £ 125,000 na Machị 1996
Ọ gosipụtara naanị ugboro ise maka 'Shakers' n'oge ọ nọ na Gigg Lane

Brabin sonyeere Blackpool maka oge 1996 wee ruo 1997 maka ego £ 200,000, wee gbaa goolu abụọ site na egwuregwu 38 dịka onye njikwa Gary Megson duuru 'Tangerines' gaa n'ọkwa nke asaa na Division nke Abụọ
Ọ nwetakwara oge dị mkpirikpi na Lincoln City, na-apụta na egwuregwu ise maka 'Imps' nke John Reames na obere oge na Sincil Bank
Otú ọ dị, e jidere ya na Septemba 1997 mgbe e boro ya ebubo mwakpo a wakporo onyeisi ụgbọ mmiri Brentford bụ Jamie Bates

Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ịdọ aka ná ntị nke FA mechara chọpụta na ikpe mara ya maka 'omume na-adịghị mma na omume na-ekwesịghị ekwesị' ma kwụọ ya £ 500 ma machibido ya iwu maka egwuregwu abụọ ka ọ gbaa ọsọ n'usoro na mmachi egwuregwu atọ ọ natara maka ịnakọta ihe 21 nke ịdọ aka na ntị
Ọ gbara goolu atọ ọzọ site na egwuregwu iri abụọ na itoolu n'oge afọ 1997, dịka onye njikwa egwuregwu Nigel Worthington duuru 'Seasiders' gaa n'ọkwa nke iri na abụọ
Ọ gbara egwuregwu iri na mbido oge 1998 na 1999, tupu ọ hapụ Bloomfield Road iji sonye na Hull City na ala nke Division nke Atọ na Jenụwarị 1999

Onye njikwa egwuregwu Warren Joyce haziri mgbanwe n'ụdị 'Tigers', ka klọb ahụ zọpụtara ọnọdụ Football League ha site na njedebe nke 21st na ngwụcha oge 1998 na 1999, na Brabin nyere goolu anọ site na 23 ya
Hull wee tinye akara nke iri na anọ na mkpọsa 1999-2000, ebe Brabin gbara goolu atọ n'egwuregwu 45 ya n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-alụ ọgụ na mmerụ ahụ n'olu
Brian Little wee bụrụ onye nchịkwa ma duru Hull gaa na play-offs na ngwụcha oge 2000 na 01, ebe Brabin ọzọ bụ onye isi egwuregwu mbụ nke gosipụtara 43 ma nye goolu abụọ
Otú ọ dị, Leyton Orient meriri ha na ọkara ikpeazụ nke play-off na Brabin hapụrụ Boothferry Park mgbe ọ natara ụgwọ maka afọ fọdụrụ na nkwekọrịta ya n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ na afọ 2001
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Hull, Brabin zụrụ St
Johnstone ma nwee ule na Plymouth Argyle, Torquay United, Dundee na Dundee United

Ọ gara n'ihu laghachi na Nzukọ maka oge 2001-2002, ọ bụ ezie na ọ gbara naanị otu ugboro maka Boston United nke Steve Evans mgbe ọ sonyere na nkwekọrịta na-abụghị nkwekọrịta, na-egwu awa mbụ nke mmeri 4 -1 na Hayes na York Street
Ọ hapụrụ 'Pilgrims' iji laghachi na Division nke Atọ na Torquay United

Ọ gbara egwuregwu asaa maka Roy McFarland's 'Gulls', tupu a kagbuo nkwekọrịta ya na Plainmoor mgbe ọ na-enwetaghị ike n'ụsọ oké osimiri; a chụpụrụ ya megide Hull City n'ọkwa nke abụọ ya wee chụpụ ya ọzọ na mmeri 2-0 na ndị na-asọmpi Exeter City mgbe ọ gbasịrị Martin Barlow n'ihu
Ọ laghachiri na Nzukọ ahụ iji gbaa goolu atọ na egwuregwu 17 maka Chester City
N'agbanyeghị na ọ sonyeere 'Seals' n'oge na-adịghị anya na mkpọsa ahụ, a kpọrọ ya aha dị ka onye egwuregwu nke oge Chester City ka ọ na-enyere 'Blues' aka izere relegation
Brabin hapụrụ Deva Stadium wee bịanye aka na Total Network Solutions, wee gbaa goolu isii na egwuregwu 30 nke Welsh Premier League na mkpọsa 2002-2003, ka TNS mechara dị ka onye na-esote Barry Town
Ken McKenna's Saints mechiri nke abụọ ọzọ na 2003 na 04, n'oge a n'azụ Rhyl, ebe Brabin gbara naanị otu ugboro n'ime egwuregwu nke iri na asatọ ya
Ọ lara ezumike nká na ndụmọdụ ahụike na Febụwarị 2004 mgbe ọ na-arịa ọrịa iku ume
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eje ozi Witton Albion dị ka osote onye njikwa
Ọ laghachiri na Conference National iji gosipụta na egwuregwu anọ maka Chris Wilder's Halifax Town n'oge mkpọsa 2005-06, na-agba otu goolu maka 'Shaymen'
Ka oge na-aga, ọ hapụrụ The Shay wee banye na Southport, wee gbaa egwuregwu 14 nke Conference
N'ọnwa Nọvemba na afọ 2006, ọ bịanyere aka na Northern Premier League Burscough, ebe ọ nyere aka na nkuzi na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ịgba bọọlụ ya
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2007, a họpụtara Brabin ka ọ bụrụ osote onye njikwa nke The New Saints, ma gbaa egwuregwu abụọ na Park Hall n'afọ 2007
Brabin bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti, mana ọ pụkwara ịgba bọọlụ na etiti azụ n'ihi ikike isi ya
O nwere akụkọ na-adịghị mma nke ịdọ aka ná ntị
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008, a họpụtara Brabin ka ọ bụrụ onye njikwa Southport na nkwekọrịta na-aga n'ihu ruo na ngwụcha oge 2007 na 2008, na-anọchi Peter Davenport
Ọ duziri 'Sandgrounders' n'ime egwuregwu egwuregwu nke Conference North, ebe Stalybridge Celtic meriri ha na penalty shoot-out mgbe ha gbakọrọ 2-2 n'elu ụkwụ abụọ nke ọkara ikpeazụ
Na 23 June na afo 2008, a kpọrọ Brabin dịka onye njikwa Cambridge United na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ, na-anọchi Jimmy Quinn
O duuru 'U's' gaa n'ọkwa nke abụọ na Nzukọ ahụ na ngwụcha oge 2008 na 2009, na-agwụcha naanị akara abụọ n'azụ Burton Albion
United meriri Stevenage Borough na play-off semi-final, mana Torquay United meriri ha na play- off ikpeazụ na Wembley Stadium
N'ọnwa sochirinụ, a kpọrọ ya aha dị ka onye isi njikwa nke afọ
Otú ọ dị, a chụpụrụ ya n'ọkwa ya na Abbey Stadium na 13 Julaị na afo 2009 na-esote ọtụtụ esemokwu ya na ndị otu klọb ahụ
A họpụtara Brabin dị ka onye isi scout na Luton Town n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2010, a kpọrọ ya aha dịka osote onye njikwa Luton, na-anọchi Alan Neilson
A kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye njikwa na Kenilworth Road ruo na ngwụcha oge 2010 na 11 mgbe Richard Money hapụrụ klọb ahụ na 28 Machị n'afọ 2011
Brabin nwetara ọnọdụ Luton na Conference Premier play-offs, na-eduga ha na mmeri zuru ezu 5-1na Wrexham na ọkara ikpeazụ

Na ngwụcha na City of Manchester Stadium, Luton dọtara 0-0 mgbe oge mgbakwunye na AFC Wimbledon, ma mesịa merie 4-3 na penalty shoot-out nke mere ka klọb ahụ chee ihu n'afọ nke atọ na ọkwa na-abụghị league
Brabin nwetara nkwado zuru oke site na bọọdụ Luton n'agbanyeghị mmechuihu nke mmeri ahụ, otu izu ka e mesịrị, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ ọhụrụ iji nọrọ dị ka onye njikwa na-adịgide adịgide
A chụpụrụ Brabin na 31 Machị 2012 mgbe otu ahụ dara n'ọnọdụ egwuregwu na egwuregwu asaa fọdụrụ na oge 2011 Xia12
Onye nọchiri ya, Paul Buckle, duuru 'Hatters' gaa na asọmpi asọmpi asọmupị nke 2012 Conference Premier na 20 Mee, ebe York City meriri ha

N'ụzọ na-emegide onwe ya, naanị ụbọchị ise ka e mesịrị, a mara Brabin ikpe maka iji iyi egwu na omume, mana e wepụrụ ya na mwakpo, mgbe ya na ndị isi abụọ sere okwu mgbe e zigara ya n'ebe a na-anọ n'egwuregwu n'oge egwuregwu na York City na 19 Eprel n'afọ 2011
Brabin laghachiri Southport maka oge nke atọ na 6 Ọktoba n'afọ 2014, na-anọchi Martin Foyle
O duuru klọb ahụ gaa na agba nke atọ nke FA Cup na Derby County na ruo nke 20 na Nzukọ ahụ

Na 20 Jenụwarị 2015, Brabin hapụrụ Southport iji were ọkwa na Everton ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke nkuzi e guzobere na ọkwa 21 Onye nọchiri ya na Haig Avenue, Paul Carden, duuru Southport gaa n'ọkwa nke iri na itoolu na ngwụcha oge 2014 rụo na afọ 15
Na 5 Mee 2015, a họpụtara Brabin dị ka onye njikwa nke Tranmere Rovers mgbe ha laghachiri na National League
O duziri Rovers ruo n'ọkwa nke isii na ngwụcha oge 2015 na 16, na-efu na play-offs site na naanị akara abụọ
Abụọ n'ime ndị ọ bịanyere aka, Andy Cook na James Norwood, ga-aga n'ihu na-emepụta mmekọrịta dị irè maka klọb ahụ n'ime oge abụọ sochirinụ
A kpọrọ ya aha dị ka onye njikwa ọnwa nke ọnwa nke National League maka Ọgọst 2016
Otú ọ dị, a kwụsịrị nkwekọrịta ya na Prenton Park na 18 Septemba n'afọ 2016, na klọb ahụ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke ise mana n'ọnọdụ dị njọ na mmekọrịta ya na ndị na-akwado klọb na-anọgide na-enwe obi ọjọọ
Micky Mellon nọchiri ya, onye duuru Tranmere gaa na 2017 National League play-off Final, ebe Forest Green Rovers meriri ha
A họpụtara Brabin dị ka onye nkuzi na EFL League Two n'akụkụ Port Vale site n'aka onye njikwa ọhụrụ Neil Aspin họpụtara n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2017
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya aha dị ka onye nke abụọ kachasị amasị ya iji were ọnọdụ njikwa na Wrexham
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2018 ọ hapụrụ Vale Park iji were ọnọdụ dị ka onye na-enyere Terry McPhillips aka na EFL League One nke Blackpool
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ahụ n'ihi 'ihe gbasara onwe ya' na Machị 2019
Na June 2019, ọ ghachiri Luton dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-enyere Graeme Jones aka
Brabin hapụrụ Luton na Machị 2020 mgbe a chụpụrụ Jones
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, a họrọ ya dị ka onye nduzi egwuregwu na otu Cymru Premier The New Saints
Ralfe gụrụ akwụkwọ na Michaelhouse School, South Africa na Mahadum Cambridge
Na 1966, ọ sonyeere Anglo American
Kemgbe 1974, ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma maka De Beers
A họpụtara ya onye isi nke De Beers na 1990 wee bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke De Beers n'ụwa niile na 1998
Gary Schneider (amụrụ na Nọvemba 25, 1954) bụ onye America na-ese foto nke a mụrụ na South Africa nke a maara maka ihe odide foto ya na foto onwe ya
Dị ka John Simon Guggenheim Memorial Foundation si kwuo, nke nyere ya onyinye Guggenhe Fellowship na 2013, 'ọrụ mbụ ya na eserese, arụmọrụ, na ihe nkiri ka dị mkpa na nyocha ya nke ihe osise
Ọ na-agba mbọ ịlụ nka na sayensị, njirimara na amaghị ihe, ihe oyiyi na ihe omimi, anụ ahụ na nke ime mmụọ
A mụrụ Gary Schneider na East London, South Africa ma zụlite ya na Cape Town
Nzere BFA ya sitere na Michaelis School of Fine Art, Mahadum Cape Town ebe MFA ya sitere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Pratt, Brooklyn

Ka ọ na-erule oge Schneider debanyere aha na Mahadum Cape Town na 1975, 'ụwa nke nka na echiche karịsịa, ụdị nka echiche nke e jiri ahụ mee ihe dị ka ihe na-enyocha phenomenology na omume malitere inye ezumike dị mkpa, na-enye ya ohere iwulite ma chịkwaa oghere nke ya
Na ngwụcha afọ ndị 1970, Schneider hapụrụ South Africa gaa New York City ịrụ ọrụ maka Richard Foreman's Ontological-Hysteric Theater
N'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere onye mmekọ ya John Erdman, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, vidiyo, na mmepụta ihe nkiri
Ha abụọ guzobere Schneider / Erdman Inc
na 1981 'nke Schneider ji mee ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ nke foto ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe'
N'afọ 1977, Schneider nwere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Artists Space ebe o mere ihe ntinye na arụmọrụ
Mgbe ihe ngosi ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri; ọkachasị Salters Cottages rụchara na 1981
Dashwood Books bipụtara akwụkwọ nke ihe nkiri Salters Cottages na 2019
N'afọ 1998, o dechara 'Genetic Self-Portrait,' nke bụ foto iri ise na ise nke mejupụtara foto iri na anọ nke ahụ ya
E gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ na Musée de l'Élysée na Lausanne, Switzerland yana International Center of Photography na New York City na Massachusetts Museum of Contemporary Art
Light Work, Syracuse bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ na 1999
'Portraits', nyocha nke ọrụ ya, ka etinyere na Harvard Art Museums na 2004
Ọ gara na Contemporary Museum na Honolulu
Yale Press bipụtara akwụkwọ zuru ezu nke nwere ihe osise
Aperture bipụtara ya n'afọ 2005 ma gosipụta foto ndị dị ndụ na New York
Ihe ngosi ahụ gara na Reykjavik Art Museum na 2010
Ihe ngosi nyocha, 'Flesh', bụ nke Museum of Photographic Arts na San Diego guzobere na 2008
'HandBook' bụ akwụkwọ Schneider nke 2010 nke Aperture bipụtara ma Schneider bipụtara na mbipụta-nke-a-na-achọ
'Handbook, South African Artists', Schneider's Guggenheim Fellowship project, nke Fourthwall Books bipụtara na Johannesburg, South Africa na 2015
A na-anọchite anya ọrụ Schneider n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie gụnyere
Gary Simmons (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa Eprel, 1964) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe si New York City
N'iji ihe oyiyi na stereotypes nke ọdịbendị America na-ewu ewu, ọ na-emepụta ọrụ ndị na-ekwu màkà ahụmịhe onwe ónyé na nke otu agbụrụ na klas
A maara ya nke ọma màkà 'ihe osise ya,' nke ọ na-ese na chalk na-acha ọcha na mpempe akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ mgbidi, wee jiri aka ya na-eme ka ihe oyiyi ha bụrụ ihe efu
Simmons nwetara BFA ya na School of Visual Arts na 1988
Ọ natara MFA ya site na CalArts na 1990 ma nata ma National Endowment for the Arts Interarts Grant na Penny McCall Foundation Grant n'oge na-adịghị anya
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Simmons chọtara ụlọ ọrụ n'ụlọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọrụ aka ochie na Manhattan, New York

Oghere ya tọgbọ chakoo mana màkà ọtụtụ ihe ochie, osisi, chaatị klas na-agbagharị agbagharị, nke ọ malitere iji dị ka ihe osise n'usoro ọrụ mbụ gbasara agụmakwụkwọ na-ezighi ezi na echiche nke agbụrụ na njirimara klas
N'inwe mmasị na ọdịdị na-edoghị anya na nke na-adịghị adịgide adịgide, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na chalk na bọọdụ ma ọ bụ na mgbidi ndị e ji chalkboard paint mee ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị na 1990s
N'ọrụ ndị a, ọ na-ebikarị ihe oyiyi site na ihe osise oge ochie nke gosipụtara ihe osise ojii
N'ihe osise mgbidi a na-akpọ Wall of Eyes, nke e nyere iwu màkà 1993 Whitney Biennial, a na-eji anya eserese na-enweghị ahụ nke nha dị iche iche kpuchie elu ojii nke bọọdụ ahụ
Ọrụ Simmons a ma ama bụ usoro Erasures ya
Ọ malitere nke a n'afọ ndị 1990 ma na-aga n'ihu na-ese ihe osise na mgbidi n'ụdị yiri nke ahụ
Chalkboards na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe dị mma n'ihi na ọ na-ezo aka na nkuzi na mmụta
Ọ tụgharịrị ebe a na-akụzi akụkọ ihe méré eme ma jiri ehichapụ ihe iji degharịa usoro ike
Ọ na-emegharị ihe osise ndị na-egosi ihe osise ojii, ụfọdụ doro anya na ụfọdụ ehichapụrụ n'ime nrọ
Ihe osise ndị a na-ezo aka na mgbe ụdị ojii na mgbasa ozi bụ ónyé obi ụtọ, ónyé na-enweghị nchegbu, onye na'egwú
Mgbalị ndị a na-eme ka ihe oyiyi ahụ bụrụ ihe na-adịghị mma na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mmụọ
Ihichapụ bụ ụdị akara na-eme n'onwe ya
Enwere mmegharị dị ukwuu na ya nke dị iche na ahịrị siri ike nke ihe nkiri na-enweghị akara
Ọ na-eweta ihe ọjọọ gara aga nke America iji mebie ya, mana ọ ka chọrọ ka a mata ya
O nwere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke gosipụtara ụdị a

E gosipụtara otu n'ime nnukwu ihe osise mgbidi ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na Metro Pictures Gallery na Midnight Matinee, ihe ngosi nke ihe osise na eserese nke, dị ka ntinye Split Personality, na-egosi ihe osise ojii na-acha oji nke ntọala site na ihe nkiri egwu nke afọ 1970
N'ile onwé ya anya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe, ọrụ atọ mbụ Simmons tinyere akara mmegbu siri ike gụnyere akara Ku Klux Klan, okpu na eriri
Otu ọrụ, nke akpọrọ Duck, Duck Noose (1992) nwèrè oche na okirikiri nwere okpu KKK na nke ọ bụla
N'etiti oche ndị ahụ, eriri na-anọdụ n'uko ụlọ
Na Klan Gate (1992), ogidi brik abụọ gbara nnukwu ọnụ ụzọ ámá ígwè a kpụrụ akpụ gburugburu
N'elu ogidi ọ bụla, e nwere onye otu Klan a tụrụ na nkume
N'ọrụ ọzọ, Big Still (2001), Simmons kwuru màkà ọnọdụ ndị ọcha dara ogbenye na Appalachia na South
O mepụtara ihe eji eme ihe n'oge mmachibido iwu nke ndị ọcha Appalachian dara ogbenye ji mee ihe
Ọ na-ekwu màkà echiche nke 'ihe mkpofu ọcha,' nakwa na ndụ ha na-enweghị ikike yiri nke ọbọdọ ndị isi ojii dị n'obodo ukwu
Otú ọ dị, ihe a tụrụ atụ ahụ buru ibu ma na-emenye egwu, na-anọchite anya ajọ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke ógè ahụ

Ihe osise, ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ Simmons egosila na US na mba ụwa na Museum of Contemporary Art, Chicago; SITE Santa Fe; The Studio Museum na Harlem; San Francisco Museum of Modern Art; Museum Villa Stuck, Munich, na nchịkọta onwé gụnyere Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden, Washington, DC; Portland Art Museum, OR; Saint Louis Art Museum, MO; San Francisco Museo of Modern Art, Walker, Minneapolis; Whitney Museum of American Art, Museum of American; Museum of American, New York; Pérez, Miami
Hauser & Wirth anọwo na-anọchite anya Simmons n'ụwa niile kemgbe 2021
Metro Pictures Gallery, New York; Simon Lee Gallery, London; Margo Leavin Gallery, Los Angeles; Regen Projects, Los Angeles, na Anthony Meier Fine Arts, San Francisco nọchitere anya ya
Gary Taylor, amụrụ na Los Angeles, California, bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, ónyé nwéré ọtụtụ ngwá egwu, na ónyé na-emepụta ihe
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ese egwu edekọla egwu ya, gụnyere Grover Washington, Jr

('Keep in Touch'), Anita Baker ('Good Love'), Walter Beasley, Lonnie Liston Smith, George Clinton & P-Funk Allstars, Vanessa Rubin ('Living Without a Heart'), na The Whispers ('Just Gets Better with Time, 'My Heart Your Heart')
Dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwú, Taylor pụtara na The Whispers' R&B #1 'Rock Steady,' na 'My Flame' màkà Vanessa Williams, yana Nancy Wilson

Dị ka onye na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe, Maazị Taylor arụwo ọrụ na ndị ọrụ ochie abụọ ahụ, dị ka Anita Baker ('Good Love') na The Whispers ('Just Gets Better With Time,' 'My Heart, Your Heart'), na ndị na-ese ihe ọhụrụ dị ka Lalah Hathaway ('I'm Coming Back') n'etiti ha
Taylor bụkwa nwá nwanne nné nkè ónyé na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta Skip Scarborough
Taylor kpuchiri egwu Scarborough dere màkà The Emotions, 'Don't Ask My Neighbors' na album ya nke afọ 1988, Compassion

Gasana Mutesi bụ a Rwandan-ede akwụkwọ na entrepreneur
Ọ bụ nchoputa nke Ubuntu Publishers Ltd na Bilie Education Rwanda Ltd
Mutesi rụrụ ọrụ na ihe karịrị 50 ụmụ akwụkwọ na ka authored karịa iri; asatọ n'ime ha nọ na mma site Rwanda Basic Education Board na-eji na ụlọ akwụkwọ
Gassol bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Taraba Steeti, Naijeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Mutum Biyu (ma ọ bụ Mutumbiyu ma ọ bụ Mutum Mbiyu) n'okporo ụzọ awara awara A4 dị 38
Ọ nwere mpaghara 5,548 km 2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị puku narị abụọ na iri anọ na anọ narị asaa na iri anọ na iteghete na ngụkọ nke afọ 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị isii na iri asaá na abụọ
Oke ugwu nke Gassol bụ osimiri Benue nke osimiri Taraba na -esi n'ebe ugwu erufega na mpaghara ahụ wee banye na Benue

Gassol bụ otu n'ime ọchịchị ime Obodo iri na isii nke steeti Taraba, nke Imerime ọnụọgụgụ ndị bi na ya bụ ndị Jukun, Wurkun, Fulani na ndị Tiv, a na-ahụta ya dị ka ebe a na-arụ ọrụ ugbo na taraba, ndị fulani na-azụ nnukwu anụ ụlọ, ebe ndị Jukun na Tiv na-akọkwa ọtụtụ ji wee mee Obodo Kwararafa inwe nnukwu ahịa ji na taraba, ahịa ji Kwararafa
Ndị Jukun Wanu na-arụ ọrụ ịkụ azụ nke ukwuu na Tella, otu n'ime nnukwu obodo di na ọchịchị ime obodo a
Gaston Kaboré (a mụrụ n'afọ 1951) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Burkinabé na onye dị mkpa na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Burkina Faso
O ritere ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri ya bụ Wend Kuuni na Buud Yam
A mụrụ Kaboré n'afọ 1951 na Bobo-Dioulasso na Upper Volta
Ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na Sorbonne na Paris, France, na-enweta ikikere ya na Maîtrise (Master's) degrees

Mgbe ọ na-eme nchọpụta banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ajọ mbunobi agbụrụ megide Africa site n'aka ndị na-achị ya maka Maîtrise ya, a dọtara Kaboré na ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere n'oge a nke, o chere, nọgidere na-agbasa ụdị echiche dị otú ahụ
Iji ghọtakwuo 'asụsụ nke ihe nkiri', o kpebiri ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri ESEC
Na mbụ, ọ na-ezube iji ihe nkiri mee ihe dị ka ihe na-agbasa ihe ọmụma akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ ji nwayọọ nwayọọ nwee mmasị na ihe nkiri maka onwe ya
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na Film Production n'afọ 1976
Ọ laghachiri n'obodo ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke Centre National du Cinéma
Ọrụ ya maka ihuenyo, na-elekwasị anya na ihe nketa ime obodo nke mba ya, enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa, gụnyere onyinye César nke France
N'afọ 1997, o ritere ihe nrite mbụ na 15th Panafrican Film and Television Festival of Ouagadougou (FESPACO) na ihe nkiri Buud Yam
Site n'afọ 1985 ruo afọ 1997 ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Pan African Federation of Filmmakers (FEPACI)
Kemgbe afọ 2005, o nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ, Imagine, na Ouagadougou nke na-azụ ndị ọkachamara na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn na ihe nkiri
Gatsby nwere ike irutu aka na
Gatsby bụ achicha mmiri n'okpuru mmiri nke mba South Afrika nke nwere achịcha zuru ezu na ihe eyere eye (French fries) na nhọrọ nke ihe na ofe
Ọ malitere na obodoCape Town ma bụrụ nke a ma ama na mpaghara Western Cape
Sandwich na-adịkarị ukwuu ma ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na ekerịta ya
Enweghị usoro nri maka Gatsby, mana a na enyekarị ya n'ogologo (otu ụkwụ ma ọ bụ karịa) ụdị achịcha French nke a na-ebipụ n'oghere
Achịcha ndị ọzọ a na-eji eme ihe nwere ike ịgụnye achịcha nkịta ọkụ ma ọ bụ achịcha roti dị larịị, ọ bụ ezie na a na-akpọkarị roti jupụtara dị ka salomie
A na-eme bred ahụ ka ọ buru ibu ka a kesaa ya, ọ na-abụkarị ụzọ anọ
Ihe jupụtara na Gatsby na-agụnye chips na ọnụ ọgụgụ ọ bụla nke ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka anụ, azụ na àkwá
Ihe ndị a na-etinye n'anụ nwere ike ịgụnye anụ a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ anụ, anụ masala, anụ ọkụkọ, polony sausage, Vienna sausage na Russian sausage
A na-enyekwa azụ̀ e siri esi ma ọ bụ nke a na-etinye n'ime ya, calamari, curry na àkwá ugboro ugboro
A na-ejikarị achar pickles ma ọ bụ piri piri sauce na-eyi ihe ndị a
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ejikarị anụ eme Gatsby, a pụrụ ịchọta nsụgharị vegan nke a na-emekarị site na iji anụ na anụ soy steak
A pụrụ ịchọta nsụgharị ndị dị mma, na-eji ihe ndị dị ka agwa nke a na-ekwu na ọ na-ebelata cholesterol na abụba
Sandwich Gatsby malitere na afọ 1976 na Athlone, na mpaghara Cape Flats nke Cape Town
Onye nwe ụlọ ahịa nri bụ Rashaad Pandy chọrọ inye ndị ọrụ nri ngwa ngwa ma jupụta na-enyere ya aka imezigharị ụlọ ahịa ya
O jupụtara na nnukwu achịcha gburugburu na 'slap chips' (ụkpụrụ South-African-style chips na vinegar), polony sausage na achaar ma belata nke a n'ime wedges
'Froggy', otu n'ime ndị ọrụ ahụ, kwupụtara na bred ahụ bụ 'Gatsby smash', na-ezo aka na ihe nkiri The Great Gatsby nke e gosipụtara na ụlọ ihe nkiri Athlone
Aha ahụ kwụsiri ike ma Pandy mechara nye bred ahụ na ụlọ ahịa ya
Sandwich ahụ toro na ewu ewu ma gbanwee ya iji jiri ogologo mmekota na French
Gatsby sandwich bụ ọgwụgwọ na-ewu ewu maka ndị Capetonians
Alt=A Gatsby sandwich n'ihi na ọ bụ n'ihi ya ka a ga-asị na ọ bụ
Gaunab bụ Ọnwụ n'ụdị mmadụ na akụkọ ifo Khoekhoen
N'akụkọ ifo ụfọdụ, a makwaara ya dịka onye na-anọchite anya ihe ọjọọ
A na-ejikọkarị ya na Tsuiʹgoab, na nsụgharị ụfọdụ, a maara ya dịka onye iro ya
N'akụkọ ifo ndị Khoekhoe, a na-ekwu na Gaunab bụ Mmụọ nke Ọnwụ
N'otu akụkọ ifo, Gaunab gara n'obere obodo nta nke nwere ụkọ mmiri ozuzo n'ebumnuche nke ịkpọrọ ndị obodo na-anwụ anwụ gaa n'ala mmụọ
Ọ gbaworo onwe ya, ma gaa ieleta otu n'ime ndị okenye obodo ahụ nọ na àkwà ọnwụ ya
Otu n'ime ndị obodo ahụ, Tsuiʹgoab, matara ya ma maa Gaunab aka na egwuregwu ịgba mgba
Ọ bụrụ na Tsuińgoab merie, Gaunab ga-akwụsị ụkọ mmiri ozuzo
Ma ọ bụrụ na Gaunab merie, ọ nwere ike igbu ndụ obodo niile, ma ndị dị ndụ ma na-anwụ anwụ, gụnyere Tsuizgoab n'onwe ya
Gaunab mechara kweta na ihe ịma aka ahụ, ha abụọ lụkwara ọgụ ruo ọtụtụ ụbọchị
N'ikpeazụ, Tsuiñoab meriri ihe ịma aka ahụ na nkụda mmụọ nke Gaunab
Ọ were iwe na mpụtara ahụ ma mechaa gbajie ikpere Tsuiágoabī na ngwụcha ọgụ ahụ
Ka o sina dị, Gaunab mejupụtara nkwekọrịta ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nweghị ike ịkwụsị ụkọ mmiri ozuzo ozugbo ebe ọ na-anọghị n'okpuru ọchịchị ya
Kama nke ahụ, ọ rịọrọ chi ndị ọzọ ka ha mee Tsuiʹgoab chi mmiri ozuzo
Mgbe Tsuińgoab gbakere site na mmerụ ahụ o nwetara n'aka Gaunab, ọ chọpụtara ike ọhụrụ ya wee nwee ike ịkpọ oku ka mmiri zoo n'obodo ya
Gauz bụ aha edemede nke Patrick Armand-Gbaka Brede
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1971 na Abidjan, Ivory Coast
Gauz bụ onye na-ese foto, odee, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ akụ na ụba nke mba Ivory Coast, na onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ Debout-Payé, nke 'Le Nouvel Attila' bipụtara na 2014, Paris
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ onye mbụ natara onyinye ọhụrụ 'le prix des libraires' Gibert Joseph
Jantjes gara Michaelis School of Fine Art na Mahadum Cape Town site n'afọ 1966 ruo afọ 1969
Ọ hapụrụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ South Africa n'afọ 1970 na agụmakwụkwọ DAAD iji mụọ na Hochschule für bildende Künste Hamburg n'etiti afọ 1970 na 1972
Ọ bụ onye guzobere otu ndị Germany na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
E nyere ya ébé mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Germany n'afọ 1973
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na-ahụ ányá màkà ónyé nduzi mkpọsa màkà United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees site n'afọ 1978 ruo afọ 1982
N'afọ 1979, o bipụtara akwụkwọ South African Colouring Book, nke nwere serigraphs iri na otu na-enyocha ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'ụdị akwụkwọ ụmụaka
Ọ kwagara ụlọ ọrụ ya na Wiltshire, England n'afọ 1982
N'afọ 1986, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé nkuzi dị elu na Fine Art na Chelsea College of Arts, The London Institute
Site n'afọ 1986 ruo afọ 1990 ọ nọ na kansụl nke Arts Council of Great Britain ma bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ ya maka ịmepụta Institute of New International Visual Art (InIVA)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke Tate Liverpool site n'afọ 1992 ruo afọ 1995, ọ bụkwa onye nlekọta nke Serpentine Gallery nke London site na 1995 ruo 1998

Ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi nka nke Henie Onstad Kunstsenter, Hovikodden, nso Oslo n'afọ 1998 mà hazie ihe ngosi otu ónyé nkè Gordon Bennett, Yinka Shonibare, Susan Hiller, Marie-Jo Lafontaine, Shirin Neshat, Marlene Dumas na Carlos Capelan

N'afọ 2004, ọ sonyere National Museum of Art, Architecture and Design, Oslo, dị ka onye isi ndụmọdụ ya màkà International Contemporary Exhibitions ọ haziri ihe ngosi n'ebe ahụ na Amar Kanwar, Harun Farocki na Nicholas Hlobo
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi ọrụ nkè Visual Century Project na narị afọ nke iri abuo na South Africa nke oge a nke mere ka e bipụta ya, Visual Century South African Art in Context (2011)
Ọ hapụrụ National Museum n'afọ 2014 wee meghee ụlọ ọrụ ya na Oslo n'afọ 2015
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ese ihe, na-agagharị n'etiti Cape Town, England na Oslo
Otu nwoke na-egosi ọrụ nkè Gavin Jantjes gụnyere

Ọrụ Jantjes na bụ nchịkọta nke Tate Britain, London; Victoria na Albert Museum, London; Arts Council Collection; Wolverhampton Art Gallery; Coventry City Museum; National Museum of African Art, Smithsonian Institution, Washington, DC
A Fruitful Incoherence Dialogues with Artists on Internationalism / [nke Gavin Jantjes dezigharịrị na Rohini Malik, Steve Bury na Gilane Tawadros] London INIVA, 1998
Black Artists & Modernism http //wwwblackartistsnodernismcouk/dossier/gavin-jantjes/

Gavin Relly (A mụrụ n'afọ 1926 na Cape Town, Cape Province, Union of South Africa - nwụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1999 na Hermanus, Western Cape, South Africa) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Anglo American

Nna nna ya bụ Sir Walter Stanford, onye rụrụ ụka siri ike mana o nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka nnwere onwe maka ndị obodo n'agbanyeghị agbụrụ ha ma ọ bụ ụcha ha na Mgbakọ Mba nke 1909, nke dugara na ịmepụta Union of South Africa n'okpuru usoro nke South Africa Act 1909
Relly gụrụ akwụkwọ na Diocesan College na Trinity College, Oxford tupu ọ jee ozi na Italy n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ rụziri ọrụ maka Sir de Villiers Graaff, onye isi nke United Party

Ọ sonyeere Anglo American na 1949 wee bụrụ odeakwụkwọ onwe onye nke Harry Oppenheimer na mgbe e mesịrị nke Ernest Oppenheimer Ọ ga-emesị mepụta ebe a na-egwupụta ọla edo nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Free State ma lekọta ịmepụta Highveld Steel na Vanadium
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Anglo American na 1983

O duuru otu ndị ọchụnta ego South Africa bụ ndị zutere onye nnọchi anya African National Congress a machibidoro iwu bụ Oliver Tambo na Lusaka, Zambia n'afọ 1985, na-eguzogide nrụgide sitere n'aka gọọmentị South Africa n'oge ahụ n'okpuru Onye isi ala South Africa PW Botha Julian Ogilvie Thompson nọchiri ya na 1990
Relly nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu site na ịwa ahụ obi ma nwunye ya Jane, na ụmụ ya Janis, Georgina na Giles lanarịrị ya

Gay-friendly ma ọ bụ LGBT-friendly bụ ebe, iwu, ndị mmadụ, ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-emegideghi ma na-anabata ndị na-eme enyi nwoke na nwoke (ịgụnyere ndị niile nọ n'obodo LGBT) iji mepụta gburugburu ebe obibi nke na-akwado ndị na-edina eme mmekọ nwoke na nwoke na mmekọrịta ha, na-akwanyere ndị mmadụ niile ùgwù, na-emeso ndị mmadụ niile n'otu aka, ma na-enweghị ikpe

Nke a na-abụkarị okwu North America nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ nke bụ nsonaazụ nke mmejuputa nke ikike nwoke idina nwoke na nnabata nke iwu na-akwado ndị LGBT n'ebe ọrụ na n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, yana ịnakwere ndị nwoke na enwe mmekọ na ndị nwanyị n'enwe mmekọ nwanyị dị ka otu ndị ahịa pụrụ iche nke azụmaahịa wdg
Ọtụtụ azụmaahịa ugbu a na-akọwa onwe ha dị ka ndị enyi nwoke na enyi, na-enye ohere maka ndị ọrụ na ndị ahịa dịgasị iche iche

Mgbasa ozi Human Rights na-arụ ọrụ iji nweta nha nhata maka ndị na-eme enyi mmekọ nwoke na nwoke, ndị na-edina nwanyị na nwanyị, na ndị ọzọ a na-akpa ókè, ma bipụta ndepụta nke ụlọ ọrụ na-emetụta nsogbu gbasara ndị LGBT
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị a maara maka gburugburu ọrụ enyi nwoke na nwoke gụnyere Dell na Coca-Cola
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka R Family Vacations, Manspray, Volkswagen, Ginch Gonch, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-enye ngwaahịa na ọrụ maka ndị ahịa nwoke na nwoke
Ndị ọzọ, dị ka LOT Polish Airlines na-eziga ozi nke enyi nwoke na enyi site n'inye ikike njem gaa n'ebe obodo na-akwado enyi nwoke na nwoke site n'ihi ọkọlọtọ nwere ọtụtụ agwa
Nnyocha egosiwo na obodo LGBT na-enwekarị mmasị na azụmaahịa mmekọ nwoke na nwoke, ọbụlagodi na ọnụahịa nke otu ngwaahịa ma ọ bụ ọrụ dị elu
Spartacus International Gay Guide na-ebipụta Gay Travel Index, ọkwa nke mba ndị enyi nwoke
A na-agbakwunye ihe na mba maka iwu mgbochi ịkpa ókè, alụmdi na nwunye nhata, mmekọrịta na iwu nkuchi, na erem ahịa LGBT
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, a na-ewepụ ihe maka iwu ndị na-emegide LGBT, mgbochi njem HIV, mmetụta okpukpe, na ikpe, igbu ọchụ, na ikpe ọnwụ

N'afọ 2021, Spartacus Gay Travel Index gosipụtara ọtụtụ mba Western Europe n'elu ogo nke iri (Malta, Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Portugal, United Kingdom, na Spain), nke Australia, Canada na Uruguay gbakwunyere Mba anọ dị n'okpuru bụ Yemen, Iran, Somalia na Saudi Arabia ebe Chechnya bụ mpaghara kachasị njọ maka ndị LGBT
Spartacus na-ebipụtakwa Gay Travel Index maka steeti US, na-edepụta steeti iritinyere District of Columbia na otu ụkpụrụ ahụ dị ka ọkwa mba
N'afọ 2021, California na Illinois nwetara ebe kachasị elu, ebe steeti itoolu dị n'ala sitere na steeti ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na steeti ugwu
Ihe edeturu
Àtụ LGBT portal
Gayuk bụ ọchịchị ime obodo nke Adamawa Steeti, Nijiria
Gael Kapia Mawete (amụrụ na Septemba 30, na afọ 1991), nke a maara dịka Gaz Mawete bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwu na onye na'agba egwú nke si na Democratic Republic of the Congo
A makwaara ya maka egwu ya nke gbasara na YouTube na ihe karịrị nde mmadụ ise
A mụrụ Gas Mawete n'ezinụlọ mmadụ asaa nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na ụmụ nwoke ise
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ezinụlọ ahụ
Gaz Mawete bụ onye na-achọ maka Vodacom Congo super-hook-up TV oge nke abụọ na afọ 2011
Ọ bụ na nke mbụ a chọpụtara ya maka obi ike, nkà na olu ya

N'afọ 2013, o wepụtara egwu mbụ ya 'Tupendana' nke 'Chérie à dit' & 'Lisolo' sochiri nke na-enweghị nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma, ọ bụ n'afọ 2014 ka o wepụtara aha 'etali nga te' & 'mukolo Ya Zoba' nke nyere ya ohere inweta obi ike ma malite ọrụ n'onwe ya
O sonyekwara na nyocha mbụ nke The Voice Afrique Francophone na 2016
Mana ọ rụghị ọrụ maka Gaz n'ihi na a na-ewepụ ya mgbe niile na ndị na-ege ntị
Mgbe ọdịda nke olu ahụ gasịrị, onye na-ese ihe nwere otu tube a na-akpọ 'Pika' nke nwere nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na nke nyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri ohere imeri asọmpi ahụ

Na Septemba, na afọ 2017 Vodacom na Pygma nwere echiche ka ha yie ndị na-achọ ịbata ole na ole gafere na mbipụta ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Vodacom Best of the Best All Star site na ebe onye mmeri ga-etinye aka na aha a ma ama Bomaye Musik mana ọ dịghị mfe maka Gaz na njedebe nke asọmpi ahụ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, na afọ 2017, Gaz mawete meriri ma bụrụ onye Vodacom kacha mma nke Best of the Best All Star n'ihu Yousoupha, na ndị ọzọ superstars
Mgbe njem gara nke ọma gasịrị, Gaz mawete bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na akara Bomaye Musik
ma bipụta egwu mbụ ya na ihe nkiri 'Paulina' mgbe mmeri ya na asọmpi na Vodacom Best of the Best All star n'okpuru akara BomayeMus

mgbe ahụ Gaz Mawete gara n'ihu na-eto ma mechaa bipụta egwu nke abụọ ya 'Olingi Nini' na Ọgọstụ 10, na afọ 2018 nke bụ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma maka ọrụ ya, ya, ya nwere ihe karịrị 10,000 YouTube hits n'ime ụbọchị 3 nke na-enweta ihe karịrị nde mmadụ 5 na YouTube maka ugbu a, na Maachị 8, na afọ 2019 Malite Malite ma bipụtara egwu ọhụrụ ya nke aha ya 'La loi dudote nwere ihe karịrị' nke ọnwa Julai 30 'Million' nke ọ ga-ebipụta ihe karịrị 1,000
Gaz sonyere na abọm nke onye France na-ese ihe Dadju nke a tọhapụrụ na Nọvemba, na afọ 2019 na abụ aha ya bụ 'Mwasi Ya Congo' Gaz sokwa na reissue nke onye Cameroon na-ese egwu Locko
Gaz ọ mekwara egwu na zenith nke Paris na Oktoba 30 na onye na-ese ihe Naza
Ndị Gaza bụ ndị Nguni hapụrụ ihe bụ South Africa ugbu a na mmalite narị afọ nke 19 wee biri na Gazaland n'ihe bụ Ndịda Mozambique ugbu a
Otu onye ndú mbụ bụ Soshangane (ihe dị ka 1828), n'okpuru onye ha kwagara n'ebe ugwu gaa n'ógbè Save River
Gazbia Sirry ( Arabic ) (11 Ọktoba 1925 - 10 Nọvemba 2021) bụ onye Ijipt na-ese ihe

A mụrụ ya na Cairo, Gazbia Sirry gụrụ ezigbo nka na Higher Institute of Art Education for Women Teachers na 1950 (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka ngalaba nke Art Education na Mahadum Helwan), ebe edemede ya gosipụtara akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ijipt
O mechara bụrụ prọfesọ n'ebe ahụ, ma bụrụkwa na Mahadum America dị na Cairo
O nweela ihe karịrị ihe ngosi onwe onye iri ise, nzụta gọọmentị site na ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie mba ụwa, onyinye mba ụwa, agụmakwụkwọ na oche mahadum
Ihe osise nke Sirry na-egosi mmekọrịta dị n'etiti mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nghọta ụmụ nwanyị na nkwado nke ụmụ nwanyị
N'ihi eclecticism ha na heterogeneity nke Ijipt nke oge a, a na-eme ihe osise Sirry n'ọtụtụ ebe
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ ihe oyiyi nke ụmụ nwanyị n'ọnọdụ ike doro anya, na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara ọha na nke onwe, ma na-eme ememe ịdị n'otu ụmụ nwanyị
N'ọgwụgwụ afọ ndị 1950, Sirry mere mgbanwe ejiji na isiokwu iji gosipụta ọnọdụ ọjọọ nke enweghị afọ ojuju na mmegide na-emegide onwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mba ahụ
Ọ ghọkwara ihe a na-adịghị ahụ anya ka ọ na-erule afọ 1960 mgbanwe a pụtara ìhè

Mgbe ọ nọ na mkpakọrịta na Huntington Hartford Foundation na Pacific Palisades, California, 1965, e mere ka ọ mata ụdị American nke ngosipụta na-enweghị atụ; n'ajụjụ ọnụ Sirry kwuru na oge a na ndụ ya nwere mmetụta miri emi na omume nka ya
' A na-ejikọkwa mgbanwe ya n'ebe abstraction dị na ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta na ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọkachasị Agha Ụbọchị Isii nke afọ 1967
A gbanwere abstraction zuru ezu na mmalite afọ 1970 site na nlọghachi nke ụdị mmadụ, mana eserese gbara ọchịchịrị na-anọchite anya egwu Sirry banyere akụnụba nke nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị

Ha bụ kuki dị ka nke a na-eme site na ntụ ọka nke jupụtara na almond paste nke e ji mmiri oroma na-esi ísì ụtọ mee

Okwu nwere usoro ụda isii, anọ ndị ahụ tinyere dipping (falling) na peaking (rising)
N'etiti ụdaume, naanị ọdịiche dị n'etiti ụdaolu nke a na-echekwa bụ /s, z/; ma ọ bụghị ya, ọ bụ naanị nkwụsị okwu na fricatives na-enweghị ụdaume na-eme n'etiti vowel
Mkpụrụ okwu imi na-eme ka ụdaume ndị gbara ya gburugburu, na ụdaume imi, gụnyere ndị sitere na ụdaume dị n'imi, na-emebi ụdaume glottalized
Ihe ndị na-eru nso //j w// anaghị apụta na ụdaume imi, yabụ na ọ nwere ike ọ gaghị abụ phonemic; /j~ɲ/, /w~mŋ/ nwere ike ịbụ phonemes dị n'okpuru

Nfefe mmanụ dị ala nwere ike ịkpalite ọnọdụ Limp na ọtụtụ koodu njehie ma ọ bụrụ na akọwaghị ya n'oge
Enwere ike ịgụ ụfọdụ ozi ịdọ aka na ntị na njehie na ọkụ dashboard gị ma ọ bụ jiri nyocha OBD-II chọpụta mmejọ dị n'ụgbọ gị
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụrụ na a mara gị ọkwa ka ị gbanwee mmanụ engine gị n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ahụ ozi ahụ doro anya - igbapu mmanụ engine ma jupụta mmanụ ọhụrụ

Ọ dịkwa mma ịme mgbanwe mmanụ kwa kilomita 3,000 ruo 10,000 dabere n'ụdị mmanụ injin a na-eji (Conventional, Synthetic Blend or Synthetic oil)

Gbanziri (Gbanzili) bụ asụsụ Ubangian nkè Central African Republic ná Democratic Republic of the Congo

Asụsụ Gbaya, nke a makwaara dị ka GbayaʹManzańNgbaka, bụ ezinụlọ nke ma eleghị anya asụsụ iri na abụọ a na-asụkarị na ọdịda anyanwụ mba Central African na gafee ókèala Cameroon, yana otu asụsụ (Ngbaka) na Democratic Republic of the Congo, yana obere asụsụ ole na ole na mba of the Kongo
Ọtụtụ n'ime asụsụ ndị a na-eji aha agbụrụ Gbaya, ọ bụ ezie na nke kachasị ukwuu, nke nwere ihe karịrị otu nde ndị na-asụ ya, a na-akpọ Ngbaka, aha ya na asụsụ Ngbaka nke ezinụlọ Ubangian
Moñino (1995 22) na-atụ aro na ala nna Proto-Gbaya dị n'ógbè dị gburugburu Carnot, mba Central Afrika
Moñino (afo 2010) wughachiri proto-Gbaya ma na-atụ aro osisi ezinụlọ na-esonụ
E nwere otu ma ọ bụ abụọ obere asụsụ Gbaya gbasasịrị na mba Congo na n'akụkụ ókèala mba Cameroon, dị ka Bonjo
