Geneviève Joyce Waïte (13 Febụwarị 1948 - 18 Mee 2019) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu na onye nlereanya
Ọrụ ya a kacha mara amara bụ onye isi na ihe nkiri 1968 Dị ka onye na-ese onyinyo, Richard Avedon sere ya foto maka Vogue na 1971
N'afọ 1974, o dekọrọ abọm ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu
Waïte lụrụ Matthew Reich na 10 Disemba 1968; Ha mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm
Waïte lụrụ onye egwu John Phillips nke Mamas & the Papas na 31 Jenụwarị 1972
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Tamerlane Phillips (b
1971) na Bijou Phillips (b'
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 1985
Ọ lụrụ Norman Buntaine; ha mechara kewaa
Ọ bụ di ya nke abụọ, John Phillips, onye bụbu onye otu egwu Mamas & the Papas mepụtara abọm Waïte nke afọ 1974
N'afọ 2011, e wepụtara abọm ahụ na CD nke gụnyere mkpuchi egwu Velvet Underground 'Femme Fatale'
Na 18 Mee 2019, Waïte nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-ehi ura na Los Angeles, California
Nwa ya nwanyị, Bijou, mara ọkwa ọnwụ nne ya ọtụtụ ụbọchị ka e mesịrị

Genevieve Fiore (19122) bụ onye America na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na udo, onye guzobere, ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, nke ngalaba Colorado nke United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
E hiwere Klọb UNESCO ya n'afọ e bu ụzọ bido klọb ahụ ma bụrụ nzukọ nke atọ e guzobere n'ụwa
N'afọ 1967, a kwanyere ya ugwu dị ka otu n'ime ndị a nabatara maka onyinye Colorado Women of Achievement Award
Italy mere ya knight na 1975 na-anata ọkwa nke Cavaliere dell'Ordine della Stella d'Italia
N'afọ 1991, a nabatara ya n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ Ndị Inyom nke Colorado maka ọtụtụ afọ ọ na-arụ ọrụ udo ma na-arụkwa ọrụ na nsogbu ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ Genevieve Natalina Dī Amato na Jenụwarị 20, 1912, na Sunrise, Wyoming, na-ezinụlọ ndị mbịarambịa Itali, Lorenzo na Anna D'Amato
Nne na nna ya si Petina, Italy
kwaga United States na 1908
Nna ya bụ onye na-egwupụta ihe n'ime ala, onye kụziri onwe ya ịkpụ ihe ma na 1919, ya na ezinụlọ ya gara Welby, Colorado

Na mbụ, D'Amato gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Katọlik, mana mgbe ọ matara na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ enweghị ikike, ọ mere mkpọsa maka Adams County School Board ka ya na nwanne ya nwoke gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ na-abụghị mpaghara ha
Board mechara kwụọ ọkara nke agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka ahụ ma kwe ka ha gaa Union High School # 1, ebe a chụpụrụ ha dị ka ndị Italy mbụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
D'Amato rụrụ ọrụ iji merie stereotyping nke ụmụ klas ya wee ghọọ onye isi oche klas na onye salutatorian nke klas ya
Ọ gụchara akwụkwọ ya na nsọpụrụ nke mere ka D'Amato nweta agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Colorado, mana ebe ezinụlọ ya enweghị ike ịzụta ụlọ na nri ya, ọ nabata agụmakwụkwọ ahụ
Na June 25, 1933, D'Amato lụrụ onye na-ebi akwụkwọ John R
Fiore ma ha mechara mụọ ụmụ atọ David, Phillip Dominic na Roxanna
Na ịbụ onye nwere ịkpa ókè onwe onye, na ọnwụ nke ndị òtù ezinụlọ na Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ na Agha ụwa nke Abụọ, Fiore nwere mmasị na ị mepụta ụwa lekwasịrị anya na udo na nnagide
Site na nguzobe nke Steele Community Center na ugwu Denver na 1937, Fiore rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo
Mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Steele Center na 1947, Fiore mụtara na Denver ga-anabata nzukọ United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
Koichi Ueda na Japan guzobere otu akwụkwọ mbụ UNESCO iji malite nzukọ ahụ
O guzobere otu UNESCO na Steele Center, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwere nsogbu na mbụ iji mee ka ndị ọzọ kwado echiche udo ya
Mgbe ọ dịghị onye ọzọ ga-anabata onye isi oche, Fiore weere ọrụ ahụ, na-eme atụmatụ iwe onye isi nchịkwa n'ọrụ
Ntọala nke nzukọ ahụ na 1947, gosiri naanị klọb UNESCO nke atọ n'ụwa, nke otu Ueda na Sendai na otu nke e guzobere na Kyoto bu ụzọ
Ndị ezinụlọ gbara ya ume ka ọ nọrọ ma kwado ya Fiore ghọrọ onye isi nchịkwu ma rụọ ọrụ nkezi awa 70 kwa izu dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo

Site na mmemme nkuchi ụlọ akwụkwọ, Fiore na ndị otu klọb ya nyere uwe na ihe ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Siculiana, Sicily dị ka ọrụ mbụ ha na ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, nabatara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke na anọghị nso Athens
Fiore gosiri mmemme na redio na telivishọn, n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na òtù, na-atụle ọrụ UNESCO na mmemme enyemaka
Ihe ngosi ya, nke karịrị 4,000, gụnyere ya na ndị gọvanọ, ndị ome iwu, ndị ọrụ gọọmentị, na ndị ọchụnta ego, na-agba ume na mba ụwa niile
Ọ gara na steeti ahụ dum, wee gaa nzukọ na New York City, yana mba ụwa, gụnyere British Columbia, Canada; Italy; Japan; na Mexico
N'afọ 1953, Fiore nyere aka mepụta Il Circolo Italiano (The Italian Circle) iji kwalite ọbụbụ enyi na nghọta maka ndị obodo Italian-American nke Denver
Nzukọ ahụ nyere nkuzi Italian na efu
N'afọ 1955, ọ ghọrọ onye na-akwado Japan's Peace Pole Project na 1984 ọ gara World Federation of UNESCO Clubs, Centres and Associations (WFUCA) World Congress, nke emere na Sendai
Ruo 1959, a na-arụ ọrụ nzukọ Denver UNESCO site na ala ala ezinụlọ Fiore
N'afọ ahụ, ọ gara ọfịs na International Hospitality Center na Denver International House wee gaa n'ihu dị ka onye isi nchịkwa ruo afọ iri na anọ ọzọ
Fiore lara ezumike nká na 1974, mana ọ gara n'ihu na-etinye aka na International H hospitality Center, na-anabata ndị ọbịa si mba ọzọ ma na-agba ndị ọzọ ume isonye
Ọ gakwara International Women's Conference and Tribunal nke e mere na Mexico City na 1975
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ bụ nzukọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị, ebe nzukọ ahụ bụ nzukọ gọọmentị

E mere nnọkọ abụọ ahụ n'otu nzukọ ahụ ka ndị nnọchiteanya wee sonye na mkparịta ụka gbasara iwu gọọmentị na mmejuputa mmemme iji melite ohere agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị, nha nhata, ọnọdụ akụ na ụba na mmekorita

Nzukọ Mba Nile nke UN na 1975, nke bụ akụkụ nke International Women's Year focus, bụ onye bu ụzọ na mmepe nke ndokwa nke Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women (CEDAW)
Fiore chere na ahụmịhe ahụ ka ọ dị ya ma kwe nkwa ịga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ maka inye ụmụ nwanyị ike
N'afọ 1977, Fiore bụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii atụmatụ ọrụ nke Colorado Women's Conference ma nata vootu kachasị elu iji gaa dị ka onye nnọchi anya steeti na National Women's Conference na Houston
N'afọ 1979, o guzobere Genevieve Fiore Educational Trust Fund nke na-enye onyinye kwa afọ nye ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-ede edemede banyere United Nations

N'afọ 1983, United States wepụrụ ndị otu UNESCO, na-ekwu maka njikwa ego ya na-ezighị ezi, mana Fiore rụrụ ụka maka otu Denver, nke na ọ na ọ na-ejitụbeghị ego gọọmentị, iji gaa n'ihu na ọnọdụ onwe ya
Mgbasa ozi ya na-aga nke UNESCO
N'afọ 1994, Fiore malitere i mepụta ma kwado mmemme redio kwa izu a na-akpọ 'Focus International', nke nyochara ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ mba ụwa na atụmatụ UNESCO
Fiore nwụrụ na Machị 10, 2002, na Denver ma lie ya na Mount Olivet Cemetery
N'afọ 1967, a kwanyere Fiore ugwu dị ka otu n'ime ndị a nabatara maka onyinye Colorado Women of Achievement Award nke 1966 ya na Elizabeth McAulliffe Calabrese na Sabina OńMalley
A nabatara ya na mba niile mgbe ọ natara ihe nrite George Washington nke Freedoms Foundation ma nata ihe nrite Michelangelo nke mba ụwa site na UNESCO
Na 15 Ọktoba 1975, Italy mere ya knighting Order of the Star of Italian Solidarity
A nabatara Ya na Colorado Women's Hall of Fame na 1991
Genevieve Edith Ngo Mbeleck (onye amụrụ n'abalí iri nke onwa Machị n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye ọ̀nọ̀ n'etiti
Ọ gbara bọọlụ nye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ bụ FC Minsk nke (ụmụ nwanyị) n'afọ 2015 na 2016 wee soro ha gbaa bọọlụ Champions League
Mgbe ahụ ọ gbara egwuregwu bọọlụ nye Louves Minproff na Cameroon
N'afọ 2017 ọ bịanyere aka na Sporting Huelva nke mba Spain
Genevieve Nnaji// (na-ege ntị) (/ˈnɑːdʒi/; A mụrụ ya na ụbọchị atọ nke ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1979) Ọ bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye nduzi
O natara Africa Movie Academy Award maka Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Ọrụ ndu n'afọ 2005, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri mbụ meriri ihe nrite ahụ
N'afọ 2011, gọọmentị Naịjirịa kwanyeere ya ugwu dị ka onye otu usoro nke Federal Republic maka onyinye ya na Nollywood
E wepụrụ ihe nkiri ahụ n'ihi na ọtụtụ mkparịta ụka ya na Bekee

Mgbe ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ iri afọ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, e gosipụtara ya na ụfọdụ ndị ama ama na ndị isi azụmaahịa n'afọ 2020 na akwụkwọ ọhụrụ abụọ site n'aka onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Chief of Yes International! magazin, Azuh Arinze

(Amharic ገንፎ, gänəfo), Gaʹat (Tigrinya, ga'atə), ma ọ bụ Marca (Oromiffa Marqaa) bụ ihe siri ike yiri ntụ ọka nke a na-emekarị ka ọ bụrụ dị gburugburu nke nwere oghere n'etiti maka ofe, ngwakọta bọta na ose na-acha ọbara ọbara, ma ọ bụ ihie ndị ozo dị ka ụdịrị flawa, mkpụrụ, nut () na flax (Linum usissimum)
Genfo nwere ọtụtụ ihe yiri ya na Arab Asida
A na-eji ọka bali ma ọ bụ ntụ ọka ọka wit eme Genfo ma iji sie ya, a na-ejikọta ntụ ọka na mmiri ma jiri spoon osisi na-agbanye ya mgbe niile
A na-egosi Genfo n'ime nnukwu ugwu nwere oghere n'etiti, jupụtara na ngwakọta nke niter kibbeh na berbere
Enwere ike iji aka ma ọ bụ arịa rie nri ahụ
Aha nna Gennaro, DiGennaro, Di Gennaro, DeGennaro ma ọ bụ De Gennaro si na obodo Itali sitere na aha Gennaro
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na ndị ama ama na-esonụ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ gara - Enugu State University, Nigeria
Akaọrụ - Onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Afọ n'ọrụ - 2005-ugbu a
Genny Uzoma bụ nwaafọ Naijiria amụrụ ma zulite na steeti Enugu mana o si na Imo steeti
Uzoma bụ onye Imo State, nke bụ ala ebe ndị igbo bi na mba Naijiria na West Afrika
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Enugu State University of Science and Technology(ESUT), ebe o nwetara akara mmụta ya na Political science
Uzoma bidoro ọrụ ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
ma e debara aha ya n'okpuru Actors Guild of Nigeria, isi nke Enugu mana ọ hapụrụ ime ihe nkiri nwa oge dika o nwetara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ nkwụkọrịta
Ọ mechara hapụ ọrụ ahụ wee laghachi n'ime ihe nkiri
O kwuru banyere mmalite ndụ ya, na-ekwu na ya gbaziri ego iji wee debanye aha ya dịka ezi onye na-eme ihe nkiri ebe ọ bụ na nne na nna ya anaghi akwado mkpebi ya ịbụ onye na-eme egwuregwu
Ọ maara na ọ gaghi enwe isi ijụ ha ego iji kwado ebumnuche ya
Uzoma kwuru n'ihe omumu ntụrụndụ ya na mmasị ya metụtara nkà na akwụkwọ
Gentle Jack (amụrụ 1970) bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri Nigeria nke gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, na-enye aka na uto na mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria
Ọ gosiputara di ka Vuga na ihe nkiri Vuga, nke edepụtara na August 2018 dị ka otu n'ime ihe nkiri iri nke a ga-echefu echefu nke Naijiria nke 90s na 2000 site na magazin Pulse
Gentle Jack ebiela na Lagos ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya
Na Septemba 2018, ọ kwagara Port Harcourt
Geo BILONGO bụ onye Congolese guitarist ọkachamara na Rumba Soukous rhythm
Ọ malitere ịkpọ ụbọ akwara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu na Kinshasa
Ihe odide ya bụ Django Reinhardt, Jimi Hendrix, Wes Montgomery

Ọ na-egwuri egwu n'ọtụtụ otu Kinshasa dịka 'Mokako', 'Bisengo' nke Gérard MADIATA, 'Orchestre KARA' na 'Kossa-Kossa' nke Master Torro, (otu Kinshasa a ma ama nke afọ 1970s na afọ 1980s bụ ndị na-eme ihe niile nke Congolese na mba ụwa)

Mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ n'onwe ya, ọ sonyeere ndị na-ese ihe Congo dịka Tshala Muana, Evoloko Jocker, Papa Wemba, Aurlus Mabele, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Cameroon dịka Guy Lobé na Papillon, yana ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri West India
Ọ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi na onye na-ekwekọghị, na-achọ mgbe niile mmetụta ọhụrụ, ọ nwere mmasị na Jazz, Blues, Flamenco, Folk, Waltz, Tango, Salsa na Funk
N'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri, n'oge ọ na-anọghị na ogbo, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụzọ isi jikọta mmetụ nke ụdị oge ochie na rumba
Site n'itinye aka na nsogbu mmekọrịta ọha na eze na egwu ahụ, ọ na-alaghachi na agba ndị ọzọ na n'oge na-adịghị anya, ma eleghị anya na CD ọhụrụ
A sụgharịrị ya na wwwDeepLcom/Onye ntụgharị
Geo Christ Danny Ekra (amụrụ na 10 Jenụwarị na afọ1999) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke Ivorian
O mere nke mbụ ya na Russian Football National League maka FC Akron Tolyatti na 25 Septemba 2021 na egwuregwu megide FC Torpedo Moscow
Geocorona bụ akụkụ na-egbuke egbuke nkè mpaghara kachasị elu nké ikuku ụwa, exosphere
A na-ahụ ya karịsịa site na ìhè ultraviolet (Lyman-alpha) sitere na Anyanwụ nké na-agbasasị site na hydrogen na-anọpụ iche
Ọ na-agbasa ruo na 155 radii nke ụwa na ikekwe ruo ihe dị ka otu narị radii nke Ụwa
A mụọla geocorona site na mbara igwe site na Satellite Astrid na ụgbọ mbara igwe Galileo (n'etiti ndị ọzọ), na-eji ultraviolet spectrometer (UVS) ya n'oge ụwa na-efe efe
Geoffrey Edgar Solomon Gorer (26 Machị 1905 - 24 Mee 1985) bụ onye Bekee na-amụ banyere ụmụ mmadụ na onye edemede, nke a maara maka itinye usoro psychoanalytic na anthropology
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Ndi juju na-adịghị eme ihe, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Charterhouse na Jesus College, Cambridge
N'ime afọ ndị 1930 o dere akụkọ ifo na ihe nkiri a na-ebipụtaghị ebipụta
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ The Revolutionary Ideas of the Marquis de Sade (1934, dezigharịrị na 1953 na ọzọ na 1964 dị ka The Life and Ideas of la Marquis de sade)
Mgbe ahụ, o bipụtara akụkọ banyere njem o mere na-esote Féral Benga na Africa, Africa Dances (1935, ọhụrụ edns
1945 penguin1949, 1962; eland
Mmasị o nwere maka akwụkwọ akụkọ George Orwell bụ Burmese Days mere ka ọ kpọtụrụ Orwell na 1935
Ha nọgidere bụrụ ezigbo ndị enyi ruo mgbe Orwell nwụrụ na 1950
Site na 1939, ọ biri ma rụọ ọrụ na United States
O dere The Americans (1948) na The People of Great Russia (1949)
Site na 1957, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọzọ na England
Exploring English Character, dabere na nnukwu nyocha o mere, pụtara na 1955
Ọnwụ, iru uju, na iru uju na Briten nke oge a pụtara na 1965
The Danger of Equality and other essays (1966) chịkọtara ụfọdụ akwụkwọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya
Mmekọahụ na Alụmdi na Nwunye n'England Taa pụtara na 1971

Geoffrey Jideofor Kwusike Onyeama (amụrụ n'abalị abụọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1956) bụ Minista Naịjirịa na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ metụtara Naijiria Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara Onyeama ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi nke Naijiria n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015
A mụrụ Onyeama n'ezinụlọ onye ọka iwu Naijiria bụ Charles Onyeama
O nwere nzere Bachelọ nke Art (BA) na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Columbia, New York n'afọ 1977 na nzere Bachelọ nke art (BB) na mmụta iwu na koleg St John , Cambridge n'afọ 1980
O nwere nzere Masta nke iwu (LLM) site na ulo akwukwo sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ekọnọmiks dị na London na 1982 na nzere Masta nke Art (MA) na mmụta site koleg St John na Cambridge n'afọ 1984
A nabatara Onyeama dị ka onye ọka iwu nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naijiria n'afọ 1983 ma kpọọkwa ya na English Bar nke Grey's Inn na 1981
Onyeama malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nyocha na Naịjirịa Law Reform Commission Lagos site na afọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na Mogboh na Associates na Enugu, Naịjirịa site na 1984 ruo 1985
N'afọ 1985, ọ sonyeere World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) dị ka onye enyemaka mmemme maka mmekọrịta mmepe na mmekọrịta mba ọzọ, Bureau for Africa and Western Asia
Ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa na WIPO ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi nchịkwa maka ngalaba mmepe n'afọ 2009
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015, Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na Naịjirịa
Onyeama lụrụ nwanyị; ma nwee ụmụ atọ
Nwunye ya ugbu a bụ Sulola; onye ya na Onyeama nwere ụmụ abụọ
Na mbụ, Onyeama lụrụ nwa nwanyị Christian Onoh Nuzo Onoh ma ha nwere nwa mbụ Onyeama na nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Candice Onyeama; onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2020, Onyeama banyere n'ụlọ ọgwụ nkewa mgbe o kwupụtara na ọ nwalee ahụike pụtara na ọ nwetara nje COVID-19
Na ngwụcha ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, Onyeama gbakere site na ọrịa COVID-19 coronavirus; wee laghachi n'ọrụ idu ndú ya dị ka HMFA Minista maka Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ na Ministri Naịjirịa
Àtụ Foreign Ministers of Nigeria

Geoffrey Nielsen Ostergaard (25 Julaị 1926 na 22 Machị 1990) bụ onye sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Britain nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na njikọ dị n'etiti Gandhism na anarchism, na British co-operative movement, na syndicalism na njikwa ndị ọrụ

Akwụkwọ ya gụnyere The Gentle Anarchists A Study of the Sarvodaya Movement for Non-Violent Revolution in India (1971), nke ya na Melville Currell dere, na Nonviolent Revolution na India (1985), ha abụọ na-ekwu maka Sarvodaya movement
Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Birmingham
Amụrụ Geoffrey Nielsen Ostergaard n'ụbọchị 25 Julaị 1926 nso Huntingdon, nwa nwoke nke onye Danish kwagara mba ọzọ
Ọ gara Huntingdon Grammar School na Peterhouse, Cambridge, ebe ọ gụrụ nkà ihe ọmụma, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1950
Ostergaard ghọrọ onye anarchist mgbe ọ na-eje ozi na Royal Air Force n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị Herbert Read's Poetry and Anarchism
Ostergaard kụziri ma mee nnyocha na Mahadum Birmingham site n'afọ 1953 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ọ bụkwa onye Rockefeller Foundation fellow na Mahadum California, Berkeley, na prọfesọ nleta na Mahadim Osmania, Hyderabad
Colin Ward dere na 'n'ụzọ dị jụụ, nke na-atọ ọchị [Ostergaard] na-enwe obi ụtọ mgbe niile na enweghị isi nke ọrụ ọ rụrụ' na Birmingham

Ward kọwara Ostergaard dị ka 'onye na-agbachitere nnwere onwe agụmakwụkwọ dị ka nkume', ma kwuo na 'omume siri ike' ya na nkwado ya maka nnupụisi ụmụ akwụkwọ nke afọ 1960 na David Selbourne na esemokwu ya na Ruskin College
Ostergaard na-enye aka mgbe niile na akwụkwọ akụkọ anarchist na pacifist, mgbe ụfọdụ na-ebipụta n'okpuru aha Gaston Gerard (anagram nke G
Ostergaards), ọ bụkwa onye nlekọta nke Peace News na Friends of Freedom Press

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị edemede nyere aka na mmepe nke echiche na omume anarcho-pacifist n'oge na obere oge mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị; ndị ọzọ gụnyere Read, Alex Comfort, Nicolas Walter, David Thoreau Wieck, Dorothy Day, na Paul Goodman
N'ịdabere na Gandhism, o kwuru na enweghị ime ihe ike nyere ụzọ iji mee ka ụkpụrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na usoro dị n'otu na ọhụụ nke ọha mmadụ na-enweghị nrụgide a haziri ahazi
Geoffrey Rothschild (amụrụ n'afọ 1947) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke JSE Limited
A mụrụ Geoffrey Rothschild na March 20, 1947 na Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, ruo eruo dị ka CA
Rothschild malitere ọrụ ya na JSE Limited na 1960s
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị isi oche ya site na 2000 ruo 2008
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Corporate Marketing & Communications
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche ya
O jere ozi dị ka onye isi gọọmentị na ihe gbasara mba ụwa na JSE
O mepere ahịa ahụ na 23 Machị 2015, mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Board of Directors nke Sasfin Frankel Pollak Securities Ọ bụ onye otu National Advisory Council for Innovation na South African Institute of Stockbrokers Ọ na-eje ozi na Board of Directors nke NEPAD Business Foundation
Ọ bi na Gauteng, South Africa
Usoro nhazi ala (GCS) bụ usoro nhazi okirikiri ma ọ bụ ellipsoidal maka ịlele na ikwukọrịta ọnọdụ ozugbo na ụwa dị ka latitude na lonjituudu
Ọ bụ nke kachasị mfe, nke kacha ochie na nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe n'ụdị dị iche iche nke usoro ntụaka oghere ndị a na-eji, ma bụrụkwa ntọala maka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ ezie na latitude na longitude na-etolite nchikota tuple dị ka usoro nhazi nke cartesian, usoro nhazi mpaghara abụghị katesian n'ihi na nha bụ akụkụ ma ọ bụghị n'elu ala

Ọmúmú-àlà (nkè ndi bekee na kpó Geography) bù ómúmú Àlà na ágwa yá, na ńdí nor ya na élú, na ihe na-méní n'élú ya

N'ásụsụ bekee, áhà ihe ómúmú nke á sị asụsụ Greek, sí mkpurụ okwu gê ('Àlà') na graphein ('Í dé'), ihe ó pùtàrà bụ 'Í dé màkà àlà'; onyé bídóró ijí áhà nke ȧ bụ onye obiạ há kpòrò Eratosthenes (276-194 BC)
Ȯ dị nạ ómúmú àlà ukwu, ògbu miri, òrìmili na úgwú
Ihe na-eménu bu ihe dí kà àlà mmarùbe, mmiri na laazú na ufèlè
Ọdịdị ala nke Guinea-Bissau bụ nke ala dị larịị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri Atlantic
Mba ahụ gbara Senegal n'ebe ugwu na Guinea n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ
Ala Guinea-Bissau bụ ala dị larịị dị ala n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke nwere ala mmiri nke mangroves nke Guinea na-arịgo na Guinea forest-savanna mosaic n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ
Nnyocha nchọpụta zuru ụwa ọnụ na-adịbeghị anya na-atụ aro na e nwere 1,203km2 nke ala mmiri na Guinea-Bissau, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ mba nke iri abụọ na asatọ n'ihe gbasara ebe dị larịị
Ebe kachasị ala na Guinea-Bissau dị n'elu oké osimiri n'Oké Osimiri Atlantic
Ebe kachasị elu na Guinea-Bissau bụ Monte Torin nke nwere ịdị elu nke 262 m (860 )
Ihe onwunwe sitere n'okike a chọtara na Guinea-Bissau gụnyere azụ, osisi, phosphates, bauxite, ụrọ, granite, limestone na mmanụ ala a na-ejighị eme ihe
1067% nke ala ahụ bụ nke a na-akọ ugbo na 2356 square kilomita na-agba mmiri
Ihe ize ndụ sitere n'okike gụnyere ọkụ, kpọrọ nkụ, uzuzu harmattan nke nwere ike belata anya n'oge ọkọchị na ọkụ ọkụ
Nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi siri ike gụnyere mgbukpọ ọhịa; mbuze ala; ịtabiga nri ókè na igbubiga azụ ókè
N'akụkụ ókèala Senegal, e nweela akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nkịta ịchụ nta, Lycaon pictus, mana enwere ike iwepụ canid ahụ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ ugbu a n'ebe ahụ
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe Guinea-Bissau bụ nke okpomọkụ
Nke a pụtara na ọ na-ekpo ọkụ ma na-ekpuchi
Ọ nwere oge mmiri ozuzo (June ruo November) na ifufe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ na oge ọkọchị (December ruo May) na ifufe ụgụrụ nke ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ
Guinea-Bissau na-ekpo ọkụ n'afọ niile ma enwere obere mgbanwe okpomọkụ; ọ bụ nkezi 263 °C (793 )
Nkezi mmiri ozuzo maka isi obodo Bissau bụ 2,024 milimita (797 in) ọ bụ ezie na nke a fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ kpamkpam n'oge mmiri ozuzo nke -ada n'etiti June na September / October
Site n'ọnwa Disemba ruo n'ọnwa Eprel, mba ahụ na-enweta obere mmiri ozuzo
Nke a bụ ndepụta nke ebe ndị dị oke egwu nke Guinea-Bissau, ebe ndị dị n'ebe ugwu, ndịda, ọwụwa anyanwụ ma ọ bụ ọdịda anyanwụ karịa ebe ọ bụla ọzọ
Naịjirịa bụ mba dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka, ya na Republic of Benin n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, Chad na Cameroon n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ, na Niger n'ebe ugwu
Ụsọ oké osimiri ya dị na Gulf of Guinea n'ebe ndịda ma na-ejikọta Lake Chad n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ
Ihe ndị ama ama na Naịjirịa gụnyere Adamwa Plateau, Mambilla Plateau, Jos Plateau, Obudu Plateau, Osimiri Niger, Osimiri Benue, na Niger Delta
A na-ahụ Naijiria n'ebe okpomọkụ, ebe ihu igwe na-adị mmiri n'oge na-adịghị anya ma na-adị ezigbo mmiri
Naịjirịa nwere ụdị ihu igwe anọ; a na-ejikarị ụdị ihu igwe ndị a eme ihe site na ndịda ruo n'ebe ugwu
N'inwe mpaghara nke 923,768 km2, isi iyi Naịjirịa bụ Niger, ebe ọ nwetara aha ya site na, na Benue, isi iyi nke Niger
Ebe kachasị elu na mba ahụ bụ Chappal Waddi (ma ọ bụ Gangirwal) na 2,419 m (7,936 ft), nke dị n'ugwu Adamawa na Gashaka-Gumti ogige ọha, Taraba Stati, na ókèala ya na Cameroon
Isi obodo ya bụ Abuja, nke dị na ebe a na-elekwasị anya na mba ahụ, ebe Lagosụ bụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị mkpa nke mba ahụ, etiti ego na obodo kachasị ukwuu
A na-ekwurịta okwu n'asụsụ ndị dị iche iche bụ Bekee (nke gọọmentị), Hausa, Igbo, a na-enyocha na Naịjirịa nwere ihe dị ka 250 dị iche iche agbụrụ-etymological
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe na-ekpo ọkụ, nke Köppen climate nghazi okwa kpọrọ 'Am', dị n'akụkụ ndịda nke mba ahụ
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe a na-emetụta mmiri ozuzo sitere na South Atlantic Ocean, nke ikuku MT (maritime tropical) na-eweta na mba ahụ, ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ nke mmiri na-ekpuchi mmiri site n'oké osimiri gaa n'ala
Okpomọkụ ya na oke iru mmiri ya na-enye ya ọchịchọ siri ike ịrịgo ma mepụta nnukwu mmiri ozuzo, nke bụ n'ihi mkpokọta mmiri na ikuku na-arị elu ngwa ngwa
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe nke okpomọkụ nwere obere okpomọkụ

Mgbe ahụ, ọnọdụ okpomọkụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-adịgide adịgide n'afọ niile; dịka ọmụmaatụ, Warri na mpaghara ndịda Naịjirịa na-edekọ ihe kachasị elu nke 28 (824 °F) maka ọnwa ya kachasị ọkụ ebe okpomọkụ ya kachasị ala bụ 26 °C (788 ) n'ọnwa ya kachasị jụụ
Akụkụ ndịda Naịjirịa na-enwe nnukwu mmiri ozuzo
Oké ifufe ndị a na-abụkarị convectional n'okike n'ihi ịdị nso nke mpaghara ahụ na belt equatorial
Mmiri ozuzo a na-enweta kwa afọ na mpaghara a dị elu nke ukwuu
Niger Delta na-enweta ihe karịrị 4,000 mm (1575 in) nke mmiri ozuzo kwa afọ
Ndị ọzọ dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ -enweta n'etiti 2,000 na 3,000 mm (1181 in) nke mmiri ozuzo kwa afọ
Mpaghara ndịda Naịjirịa na-enwe mmiri ozuzo okpukpu abụọ nke mmiri ozuzo abụọ dị elu, na oge ọkọchị dị mkpirikpi na oge ọkọchukwu dị ogologo na-ada n'etiti na mgbe ọ bụla

Oge mmiri ozuzo mbụ na-amalite na Machị ma na-agwụ na ngwụcha Julaị na ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu na June, oge mmiri ozuzo a na-esote obere ezumike mmiri n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ nke a maara dị ka ezumike Ọgọustụ nke bụ obere oge ọkọchị na-adịru izu abụọ ruo atọ n'ọngọst
Oge mmiri ozuzo dị mkpirikpi na-amalite na mbido Septemba ma na-adịgide ruo n'etiti Ọktọba na oge kachasị elu na njedebe Septemba
Ọgwụgwụ nke oge mmiri ozuzo dị mkpirikpi n'ọnwa Ọktoba na-esochi oge ọkọchị dị ogologo
Oge a na-amalite site na ngwụcha Ọktọba ma na-adịgide ruo mmalite Machị na ọnọdụ ọkọchị kachasị elu n'etiti mmalite Disemba na ngwụchi Febụwarị
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe savanna na-ekpo ọkụ (Aw) ma ọ bụ ihu igwe mmiri na-ekpuchi na mpaghara ma kpuchie ọtụtụ n'ime ọdịda anyanwụ ruo etiti Naịjirịa, ebe ọ na-enwe mmetụta dị ukwuu na mpaghara ahụ
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe a mejupụtara ihe ka ukwuu na mba ahụ ma nwee oge mmiri ozuzo na oge ọkọchị dị iche iche na otu ọnụ ọgụgụ a maara dị ka oge okpomọkụ kachasị elu
Okpomọkụ dị n'elu 18 °C (64 ) n'afọ niile
Abuja, isi obodo Naịjirịa nke dị n'etiti Naịjirị, nwere okpomọkụ dị 1845 (6521 °F) ruo 369 °C (984 ) mmiri ozuzo kwa afọ nke ihe dị ka 1,500 mm (591 in) na otu mmiri ozuzo kachasị na Septemba
Oge ọkọchị na-ewere ọnọdụ site na Disemba ruo Machị ma na-ekpo ọkụ ma kpọọ nkụ na ifufe Harmattan, ikuku na-ekpuchi okpomọkụ (CT) nke jupụtara na uzuzu sitere na Sahara, na-adị n'oge a niile

N'oge ikuku ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ, ụtụtụ na-egbuke egbuke ma na-acha anwụ, okpomọkụ anyanwụ nke ala n'ụtụtụ na n'ehihie na-eme ka e nwee ebili mmiri, ebili mmiri ndị a na-arịgo n'ụzọ kwụ ọtọ, a na-emepụta igwe ojii cumulonimbus, mmiri ozuzo nwere ike ime n'ehuhie
Ebili mmiri nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka bụ ihe ọzọ na-eme ka mmiri ozuzo na-ezo n'oge oge okpomọkụ nke ọnwa Mee ruo Septemba
Ọdịdị nke ebili mmiri a na-agbanwe na ihe dị ka 15 degrees north latitude
Ebili mmiri ndị na-agafe n'ebe ndịda nke latitudu a na-ebu mmiri ma na-emepụta convection nke na-eduga na igwe ojii mmiri ozuzo
Ebe Naịjirịa dị n'akụkụ mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ nke ebili mmiri ndịda nke 15 degrees north latitude na-emepụta ọnọdụ ihu igwe mmiri na-adịghị na Naịjirị, ọkachasị n'oge mmiri ozuzo
Mmiri ikuku nke mpaghara okpomọkụ, nke a maara dị ka Harmattan, bụ ifufe sitere na North Afrika nke gafere Sahara gaa West Africa
Mmiri a na-achịkwa ihu igwe Naịjirịa n'oge ọkọchị site na Disemba ruo Machị
Mmiri ikuku nke kọntinent na-ekpo ọkụ bụ uzuzu ma na-emepụta anwụrụ ọkụ n'ime ikuku mgbe ọ na-achịkwa
Anwụrụ ọkụ ahụ bụ n'ihi ájá dị n'ime ikuku na-egbochi ịhụ anya ma na-egide ọtụtụ n'ime ụzarị anyanwụ ka ọ ghara iru n'ụwa
Ọ bụkwa ikuku kpọrọ nkụ nke e guzobere n'elu ala n'ebe dị nso na equator
Mmiri ahụ n'ozuzu ya enweghị mmiri ozuzo ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-emepụta na Sahara, na-emepụta uzuzu karịa mmiri
Mmiri ahụ na-eme ka a ghara ịhụ ihe nke na-egbochi njem, mana ọnụnọ ya na-ewetara ndị ọrụ ugbo ahụ enyemaka ebe ọ bụ na obere iru mmiri dị n'ime ikuku na-eme ngwa ngwa ịcha ihe ọkụkụ ha
A na-ekpebi oge na ọdịiche okpomọkụ nke Naijiria site na mmiri ozuzo na oge mmiri ozuzo bụ oge ọkọchị bụ oge ndị dị mkpa na Naijiria

Oge mmiri ozuzo nke Naịjirịa na-eweta ihu igwe dị jụụ na mba ahụ n'ihi oke igwe ojii nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ihe mgbochi nke oke anwụ nke okpomọkụ site na igbochi ọtụtụ n'ime ụzarị anyanwụ n'oge mmiri ozuzo; nke a na-eme ka ala dị jụụ, ikuku dị n'elu ala na-anọgide na-ajụ oyi n'oge oge mmiri ozuzo
Mana n'ehihie n'oge mmiri ozuzo nwere ike ịdị ọkụ ma na-ekpo ọkụ
N'oge mmiri ozuzo ọ na-ede mmiri, mmiri ozuzo na-enwekarị ọtụtụ
Oge ọkọchị nke Naịjirịa bụ oge obere igwe ojii kpuchiri n'akụkụ ndịda Naịjirị ka ọ ghara inwe igwe ojii kpuchie n'akụkụ ugwu Naịjiria
Anyanwụ na-enwu site na ikuku na obere ihe mgbochi site na ihu igwe doro anya na-eme ka oge ọkọchị na Naịjirịa bụrụ oge ihu igwe na-ekpo ọkụ
N'etiti oge ọkọchị gburugburu Disemba, uzuzu nke Harmattan wetara na-egbochi ụzarị anyanwụ, nke na-ebelata okpomọkụ
Mana site na iwepụ ifufe a n'ihe dị ka Machị ruo Eprel mgbe mmalite nke oge mmiri ozuzo gasịrị, okpomọkụ nwere ike iru 44 °C (1112 ) n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Naịjirịa
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe dị nro na-adị n'elu ugwu dị n'etiti Naịjirịa n'elu mita 1,200 (3,937 ) n'elu oke osimiri, ya bụ Jos Plateau
Okpomọkụ dị na mbara ala Jos dị n'agbata 16 °C na 25 °C nke na-ajụ oyi n'afọ niile
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe dị jụụ na-eme n'ugwu ndị dị n'akụkụ ókèala Cameroon nke Nigeria, n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nigeria
Ugwu dị na mpaghara ndị a na-eru ihe karịrị 1,524 m (5,000 ft) ruo ụfọdụ na-eguzo n'elu 2,000 mita (6,562 ) n'elu oke osimiri

Mpaghara kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa bụ nke ndagwurugwu Niger na Benue River, nke na-agbakọta n'etiti onwe ha ma mepụta njikọ 'y' na Lokoja
Ala dị larịị na-arịgo n'ebe ugwu nke ndagwurugwu
N'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Niger, e nwere ugwu 'dị elu', na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ugwu na ugwu Benue ka a na-ahụ ruo n'ókè ya na Cameroon
A na-ahụ ala dị larịị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ
Niger Delta dị n'akụkụ ndịda Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ otu n'ime osimiri osimiri kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa
Mpaghara osimiri nke Niger Delta bụ mpaghara mmiri dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke dị n'ókè Atlantic
Ogige mangrove bụ ala ahịhịa na-eto eto nke e mepụtara site na usoro reticulate nke iyi ndị jikọtara ọnụ na ndị na-akwado Osimiri Niger
Ihe dị ka 70% nke mmanụ na gas na-emepụta na Naịjirịa sitere n'ógbè ahụ
Nnyocha nchọpụta zuru ụwa ọnụ na-adịbeghị anya na-atụ aro na e nwere 1,244 km2 nke ala mmiri na Naịjirịa, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ mba nke iri abụọ na asaa n'ihe gbasara ebe dị larịị

Naijiria nwere ụdị ahịhịa atọ oké ọhịa (ebe e nwere nnukwu osisi), savannahs (obere osisi, nwere ahịhịhịa na okooko osisi dị n'etiti osisi), na ala ugwu (nke a na-ahụkarị na nke a na-achọta n'ugwu ndị dị nso n'ókè Cameroon
A na-ekewa ma mpaghara ọhịa na mpaghara savannah n'akụkụ atọ
Ụfọdụ n'ime mpaghara ndịda nke ọhịa ahụ, ọkachasị gburugburu Osimiri Niger na Cross River deltas, bụ mangrove marsh
N'ebe ugwu nke a bụ mmiri dị ọcha, nke nwere ahịhịa dị iche iche site na mmiri nnu mangrove, na n'ebe ugwu ya bụ ọhịa mmiri ozuzo

A na-ekewa ụdị atọ nke mpaghara savannah n'ime mosaic ọhịa-savanna nke Guinea, nke nwere ala ahịhịa dị elu nke osisi na-akpaghasị, nke kachasị n'ofe mba ahụ; savannah Sudan, nke nwere ahịhị dị mkpirikpi na osisi dị mkpirimpi; na Sahel savannah patches nke ahịhịrị na ájá, nke a na-ahụ n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ
Naịjirịa nwere ọtụtụ ụdị osisi, nke ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ụmụ amaala ebe ole na ole bụ ndị pụrụ iche
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke oké ọhịa ndị mmadụ mere na mba ahụ bụ nke ụdị dị iche iche na-achịkwa
Nke a sitere n'echiche na osisi ndị dị iche iche na-eto ngwa ngwa
Otú ọ dị, nnyocha enyochala uto nke osisi ndị a mụrụ n'ala na nke ụdị dị iche iche

N'ihi oke mmebi, usoro okike fọdụrụ na oké ọhịa ndị bụ isi na Naịjirịa na-ejedebe na mpaghara echedoro nke gụnyere otu ebe nchekwa biosphere, ogige ntụrụndụ mba asaa, otu ebe nketa ụwa, 12 Strict Nature Reserves (SNRs), 32 ebe nchekwa egwuregwu / ebe nchekwa anụ ọhịa, na ọtụtụ narị ebe nchekwa ọhịa
Ndị a na-agbakwunye na ọtụtụ ebe nchekwa dị ka arboreta, ogige botanical, ogige zoological, na ụlọ akụ mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ato na nyocha na-elekọta
Ọtụtụ mba dị n'Afrika na-emetụta Invasive Alien Species (IAS)
N'afọ 2004, IUCN World Conservation Union chọpụtara 81 IAS na South Africa, 49 na Mauritius, 37 na Algeria na Madagascar, 35 na Kenya, 28 na Egypt, 26 na Ghana na Zimbabwe, na 22 na Ethiopia
Otú ọ dị, a maghị ihe dị ukwuu banyere IAS na Naịjirịa, ebe ọtụtụ akụkọ teknụzụ na akwụkwọ na-akọ ihe na-erughị osisi 10 na-awakpo na mba ahụ
Ewezuga ndị na-awakpo osisi, a na-ewere Rattus rattus na nje influenza Avian dị ka IAS na Naịjirịa
Ntinye mbụ nke IAS n'ime Naịjirịa bụ site na mmeghe osisi dị iche iche site n'aka ndị ọchịchị na-achị ala ma ọ bụ maka osisi osisi ọhịa ma ọ bụ iji chọọ ya mma

A na-agba ume ịbanye osisi ndị dị iche iche na Naịjirịa n'oge nnwere onwe site na mmụba nke ọrụ akụ na ụba, mmalite nke nchọpụta mmanụ azụmahịa, mmeghe site na ụgbọ mmiri, na iwebata osisi ịchọ mma site n'aka ndị na-azụ ahịa

N'ime ala kpọrọ nkụ na ala kpọrọ nká nke West Afrika, gụnyere Naịjirịa, a maara ọtụtụ ụdị ahịhịa ahịhịhịa ọkachasị site na ụdị Crotalaria, Alysicarpus, Cassia na Ipomea ka a na-eji ya eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe na mmepụta anụ ụlọ
Ọtụtụ mgbe, a na-ewepụ ma ọ bụ bepụ ha ma nye ha nri ma ọ bụ dị ka nri ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ nke echekwara
Ojiji nke ahịhịa ndị a na ọtụtụ ahịhịhịa ọzọ na-eto n'ụzọ okike n'ime ebe ugbo bụ ohere
Ọtụtụ ụdị ndị ọzọ a mụrụ na Naijiria, gụnyere soybean na ụdị ya, na-eje ozi dị ka isi iyi dị mkpa nke mmanụ na protein na mpaghara a
[citation needed] E nwekwara ọtụtụ osisi nwere ebumnuche ọgwụgwọ nke a na-eji enyere ọgwụgwọ aka n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ahụ
Ụfọdụ n'ime ahịhịa ndị a gụnyere Euphorbiaceae, nke na-arụ ọrụ iji nyere aka na ịba, nsogbụ eriri afo na ọtụtụ ọrịa ndị ọzọ
Ihe dị iche iche na-akpata nrụgide dị ka ụkọ mmiri ozuzo, ala na-edozi ahụ dị ala na ihe na-emetụta ụmụ ahụhụ emeela ka ubi ọka bụrụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ọrụ ugbo na mpaghara a

Ka mmepụta ihe na-abawanye, ọ na-etinye ụdị osisi dị n'oké ọhịa n'ihe ize ndụ nke mmetọ ikuku na nyocha egosiwo na n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Naịjirịa, osisi egosila nnagide ma na-eto n'ebe nwere mmetọ ifufe dị ukwuu
Ihe onwunwe sitere n'okike nke Naịjirịa gụnyere ma ọ bụghị nanị mmanụ ala, tin, columbite, iron ore, coal, limestone, lead, zinc, natural gas, hydropower, na ala a na-akọ ugbo
Nke a bụ ndepụta nke ebe ndị dị oke egwu nke Naịjirịa, ebe ndị dị n'ebe ugwu, ndịda, ọwụwa anyanwụ ma ọ bụ ọdịda anyanwụ karịa ebe ọ bụla ọzọ
Njikọ Afrịka na-ekpuchi ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ kọntinent Afrịka niile na ọtụtụ agwaetiti ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri
N'ihi ya, ọ dị nnọọ iche, gụnyere ọzara kasị ukwuu na-ekpo ọkụ n'ụwa (Sahara), nnukwu ọhịa na savannas, na osimiri kasị ogologo n'ụwa (Naịl)
AU nwere mpaghara 29,922,059 km² (18,592,705 mi²), yana 24,165 km² (15,015 mi²) nke oke osimiri

Ihe ka ukwuu n'ógbè a dị na kọntinent Afrịka, ebe naanị mpaghara dị mkpa na-abụghị ala ahụ bụ agwaetiti Madagascar (nke anọ kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa), nke na-erughị 2% nke ngụkọta

AU nwere oke ala abụọ Morocco nwere oke akụkụ mpaghara Spain nke Ceuta, Melilla, na Peñón de Vélez de la Gomera yana Peninsula Sinai nke Egypt nwere oke akụkụ Gaza Strip maka 11 km (68 mi) yana Israel maka 400 km (248 mi) n'ókè ọdịda anyanwụ ya
Ebe ọ bụ nke Eshia, Saịnaị bụ naanị mpaghara mpaghara AU na kọntinent geopolitical ọzọ

Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC) bụ mba kachasị ukwuu na mpaghara Sahara Africa, na-ewe ihe dị ka square kilota 2,344,858 (905,355 sq mi)
Ihe ka ukwuu n'ime mba ahụ dị n'ime nnukwu oghere nke ọdọ mmiri Osimiri Congo
Nnukwu, ebe dị ala n'etiti bụ ọdọ mmiri dị larịị nke na-agbadata n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, nke oké ọhịa mmiri ozuzo na-ekpuchi na osimiri ndị na-agafe
Ugwu ndị gbara etiti ọhịa ahụ gburugburu n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, ala dị larịị na-agbakọta na savanna na ndịda na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ
Ala ahịhịa jupụtara na ya gafere Osimiri mba Congo n'ebe ugwu
A na-ahụ ugwu dị elu nke Ruwenzori Range (ụfọdụ n'elu 5,000m ma ọ bụ 16,000 ) n'ókè ọwụwa anyanwụ na mba Rwanda na mba Uganda (lee oké ọhịa ugwu Albertine Rift maka nkọwa nke mpaghara a)
Enwere ike ịkọwa ọtụtụ mpaghara ala dị iche iche n'ihe gbasara ala na usoro ahịhịa okike, ya bụ etiti Congo Basin, ugwu ugwu ugwu na ndịda nke ọdọ mmiri ahụ, na ugwu nke mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ
Mpaghara isi nke mba ahụ bụ etiti Congo Basin
N'inwe nkezi elu nke ihe dị ka ta 44 (144 ), ọ na-atụle ihe dịka square kilomita 800,000 (310,000 sq mi), nke mejupụtara ihe dị ka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ókèala DRC
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọhịa dị n'ime ọdọ mmiri ahụ bụ ala pịtọrọ apịtọ, ma ọtụtụ n'ime ya nwere ngwakọta nke ala pịtọrọ apịtọ na ala siri ike
Ebe ugwu na ndịda nke ọdọ mmiri ahụ dị ala dị larịị dị elu na, mgbe ụfọdụ, ugwu ndị nwere ngwakọta dịgasị iche iche nke ahịhịa savanna na ọhịa
Mpaghara ugwu ndịda, dị ka ọdọ mmiri ahụ, mejupụtara ihe dịka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ókèala DRC
Mpaghara ahụ na-agbadata site n'ebe ndịda gaa n'ebe ugwu, na-amalite na ihe dị ka mita 1,000 (3,300 ft) n'akụkụ ókè Angola ma na-ada ruo ihe dị ka kilomita 500 (1,600 ) n'akụkụ ọdọ mmiri ahụ
Ahịhịa na mpaghara ugwu ndịda dị iche iche karịa nke ugwu ugwu
N'ebe ụfọdụ, ọhịa na-achịkwa; na ndị ọzọ, ahịhịa savanna na-achịkarị
N'ebe ndịda nke ọdọ mmiri ahụ, n'akụkụ iyi ndị na-asọba n'Osimiri Kasai bụ nnukwu ngosi ọhịa
N'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime mpaghara mba Katanga mbụ nwere ugwu dị elu na ugwu dị ala

Akụkụ kachasị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke DRC, akụkụ ọhịa panhandle nke na-eru n'Oké Osiri Atlantic, bụ ndọtị nke ugwu ndịda nke na-adaba n'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi n'akụkụ dị warara nke dị ihe dị ka kilomita 40 (25 mi) n'ogologo
N'ime ugwu ndị dị warara nke dị n'ebe ugwu, mkpuchi ahụ bụ ala ahịhịa, na ọhịa dị obere
Nkezi ịdị elu nke mpaghara a bụ ihe dị ka mita 600 (2,000 ft), mana ọ na-arị elu ruo mita 900 (3,000 ) ebe ọ na-ezute nsọtụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke ugwu dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ
Mpaghara ugwu dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ bụ akụkụ kachasị elu na nke kachasị elu na mba ahụ
Ọ na-agbasa ihe karịrị kilomita 1,500 (930 ) site n'elu Lake Albert ruo n'akụkụ ndịda nke mba ahụ ma dịgasị iche n'obosara site na kilomita 80 ruo 560 (50 ruo 348 mi)
Ugwu na ugwu ya dị n'ịdị elu site na ihe dị ka 1,000 mita (3,300 ft) ruo ihe karịrị 5,000 mita (16,000 )
Aka ọdịda anyanwụ nke Great Rift Valley na-emepụta ókè ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mpaghara a
Ókèala ọwụwa anyanwụ nke DRC gafere na ndagwurugwu na usoro ọdọ mmiri ya, nke ala dị larịị dị n'etiti ugwu dị elu kewara site na ibe ya
N'ógbè a, mgbanwe dị elu na-eweta mgbanwe dị ịrịba ama na ahịhịa, nke sitere na savanna montane ruo n'oké ọhịa montane
Ugwu Rwenzori n'etiti ọdọ mmiri Albert na Edward bụ ugwu kachasị elu n'Africa
Elu na ọnọdụ nke ugwu ndị a na equator na-eme ka e nwee osisi dịgasị iche iche na nke dị egwu
Osimiri Congo na ndị na-eso ya na-agbanye mmiri na ọdọ mmiri a ma na-enye mba ahụ netwọk kachasị ukwuu nke ụzọ mmiri na-agafe agafe n'Africa
Kilomita iri (6 kilomita) n'obosara n'etiti etiti nke ogologo ya, osimiri ahụ na-ebu mmiri nke bụ nke abụọ naanị Amazon

Ọ na-asọ mgbe niile n'ihi na osimiri na iyi na-esi n'akụkụ abụọ nke equator na-enye ya mmiri; mgbanwe nke oge mmiri ozuzo na oge ọkọchị n'akụkụ nke ọ bụla nke equator mere ka mmiri na-enye mgbe niile maka isi ọwa
N'ebe mmiri na nsụda mmiri na-egbochi ụgbọ mmiri, ọdịda mberede nke osimiri ahụ na-emepụta ikike hydroelectric karịa nke a na-ahụ na usoro osimiri ọ bụla ọzọ n'ụwa
Ihe ka ukwuu n'ime DRC na-eje ozi site na usoro Osimiri Congo, eziokwu nke mere ka ọ dịrị ma azụmaahịa ma ịbanye n'èzí mfe

Usoro mmiri ya jupụtara ma gbasaa n'ụzọ ziri ezi na mba ahụ, ma e wezụga atọ n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Mayombe na Kongo Central n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, nke obere osimiri dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri a na-akpọ Shilango na-agbanye; ala dị n'ókè ọwụwa mmiri Edward na Albert, nke bụ akụkụ nke ọdọ mmiri Naịl; na obere akụkụ nke oke ndịda ọwụwa Anyanwụ DRC, nke dị na ọdọ mmiri mba Zambezi ma na-abanye n'Oké Osimiri India
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọdọ mmiri ndị DRC bụkwa akụkụ nke ọdọ mmiri Osimiri Congo
N'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ bụ Lac Mai-Ndombe na Lac Tumba, nke bụ ihe fọdụrụ na nnukwu ọdọ mmiri dị n'ime nke bi n'ime ọdọ mmiri ahụ dum tupu Osimiri Congo emebie ọnụ ọdọ mmiri ahụ na mmiri na-esote n'ime
N'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, Ọdọ Mmiri Mweru dị n'ókè ya na mba Zambia
N'ókè ọwụwa anyanwụ, Lac Kivu, ọdọ mmiri kachasị elu na Central Africa na ebe ndị njem nleta, na Lake Tanganyika, n'ebe ndịda Lac Kivu
Ha abụọ na-abanye n'osimiri Lualaba, aha a na-enyekarị n'elu Osimiri Congo
Naanị mmiri nke nnukwu ọdọ mmiri ndị dị n'ebe ugwu nke ókèala ọwụwa anyanwụ, Edward na Albert, na-agbanye n'ebeebe ugwu, n'ime Naịl Basin

Ọnọdụ ihu igwe sitere n'oké ọhịa mmiri ozuzo na-ekpo ọkụ na ndagwurugwu Osimiri Congo ruo n'oké mmiri ozuzo nke na-ekpofu akọrọ na ugwu ndịda ruo n'ebe ugwu na-ekwo ekpo ọkụ na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ n'elu mita 2,000 (6,600 ) n'ịdị elu
N'ozuzu, okpomọkụ na iru mmiri dị elu
A ga-ahụ okpomọkụ kachasị elu na nke kachasị nta na-agbanwe agbanwe n'oké ọhịa equatorial, ebe oke okpomọkụ n'ehihie dị n'etiti 30 na 35 (86 na 95 °F), na ala n'abalị anaghị aga n'okpuru 20 °C (68 )
Nkezi okpomọkụ kwa afọ bụ ihe dịka 25 °C (77 )
N'ugwu ndịda, ọkachasị n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, oge oyi na-ajụ oyi ma kpọọ nkụ, ebe oge okpomọkụ na-ekpo ọkụ ma na-ekwo ekpo
Mpaghara na-anabata usoro ọdọ mmiri site na Lake Albert ruo Lake Tanganyika n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ugwu nwere ihu igwe na-ekpo ọkụ na oghere dị warara ma ọ bụghị oke okpomọkụ
Akụkụ ugwu dị jụụ karị, mana iru mmiri na-abawanye na ịdị elu ruo mgbe a ga-eru ebe saturation; ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ anwụrụ ọkụ na-ada mgbe niile na ndagwurugwu ụfọdụ, ọkachasị na Ugwu Rwenzori
Usoro oge mmiri ozuzo na-emetụta site na DRC nke equator
Na nke atọ nke mba ahụ nke dị n'ebe ugwu nke equator, oge ọkọchị (ihe dị ka mmalite Nọvemba ruo ngwụcha Machị) kwekọrọ na oge mmiri ozuzo na ndịda abụọ n'ụzọ atọ
Otú ọ dị, enwere nnukwu ọdịiche, ọtụtụ ebe n'akụkụ ọ bụla nke equator nwere oge mmiri abụọ na oge ọkọchị abụọ

Injinia Geomedical bụ ọzụzụ nke na-etinye mmuta injinia n'ihe gbasara mmụta ahụike nke geology maka ebumnuche igbochi ihe ize ndụ nke ahụike geology nye ahụike mmadụ na anụmanụ
Injinia geomedical na-eso ndị injinia arụkọ ọrụ na usoro iji gbochie ma ọ bụ ibelata mmetụta nke ihe gbasara ala, geochemical na geoenvironmental na ahụike mmadụ na anụmanụ
Okwu 'geomedical engineering' bụ onye Pakistani geologist Dr
Atteeq-Ur-Rehman chepụtara na 2009 n'akwụkwọ ya akpọrọ 'Geomedical Engineering A new and captivating prospect'
Ụfọdụ ihe ndị na-esite n'okike dị oke ike maka ahụike mmadụ ma ọ bụrụ na erimeri ya nke ukwuu
Ebumnuche nke ọmụmụ ihe na injinia geomedical bụ ịkọwapụta ihe ndị na-egbu egbu dị na gburugburu ebe obibi iji nagide ihe egwu na ọgbaghara ahụike na-abịa
Na mgbakwunye, injinia geomedical ga-enye usoro nkwado iji nagide ihe iyi egwu ala iji gbochie ma ọ bụ belata mmetụta ha na ahụike mmadụ na anụmanụ
Mkpa ya dị mkpa enwetala nke ukwuu n'ihi mmụba ngwa ngwa nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na ọbịbịa nke nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi

N'April 2019, George gosipụtara ihe dị ka oche ndị isi iri na abụọ na ngalaba nke Marketing na Entreiat na Mahadum Ghana Business School

George Abdel Masih Al Bahgoury ma ọ bụ George Bahgoury bụ onye Egypt-French na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpu ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọ bụ onye a ma ama dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ Bahgoury na 1932 n'ezinụlọ Ndị Kraịst Coptic na Bahgora, obere obodo dị na Nag Hammadi, Upper Egypt nke wetara aha ezinụlọ ya, ŌBahgoury (nke sitere na Bahgora)
N'afọ 1953, ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọrụ nke ga-ahụ ya na Sabah Al Khair na Rose El Youssef
N'afọ 1955, ọ gụrụ gbasara ihe osise na Faculty of Fine Arts na Zamalek, Cairo, n'okpuru nduzi nke onye Egypt na-ese ihe Hussein Bikar
N'afọ 1970, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Academy of Fine Arts na Paris
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, na 1975, ọ kwụsịrị ibipụta akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-ese ihe nkiri

Onye nwetara onyinye ọlaọcha maka ihe osise ya 'A Face from Egypt', e gosipụtala ihe osise Bahgoury n'ọtụtụ ebe na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, nke gụnyere Louvre Museum, Museum of Modern Art na Amman, Museum of modern Art na Cairo, na Al Masar Gallery for Contemporary Art na Zamalek, Cairo
Àtụ ACArt
George Calil (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 29 n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1973) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Bekee nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na obere usoro TV Band of Brothers, ebe ọ gosipụtara Sergeant James H
'Mo' Alley, Jr
A mụrụ Calil na England n'afọ 1973
Ọ bụ nwa onye ọchụnta ego Lebanon bụ Ely Calil

N'afọ 2004, Calil pụtara na ihe nkiri pụrụ iche September Tapes, dị ka Don Larson, onye nta akụkọ America nke na-aga Afghanistan otu afọ mgbe 9/11 gasịrị, na mgbalị ịmụta eziokwu banyere ịchọ Osama Bin Laden
Nakwa na 2004 ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke Pompey the Great na mmegharị nke ihe nkiri 1960 Spartacus
N'afọ 2005, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri anọ, Rollin 'na Nines, Pterodactyl, na The Film Maker, na 2006 ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke Detective Alex Taylor na ihe nkiri Lycanthropy
Laura Sadler, onye bụ enyi nwanyị Calil na ndụ n'ezie, mere Sandy
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2003, Sadler dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ nwụrụ mgbe o si na veranda nke ụlọ Calil dị na London daa mgbe ha abụọ kwuru na ha ṅụrụ cocaine
E jidere Calil mgbe Sadler nwụsịrị mana e mechara tọhapụ ya n'ebughị ebubo mgbe ndị uwe ojii kwadoro na ha na-emeso ọnwụ Sadler dị ka ihe mberede

George S
Da Costa (1853–1929) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ngwụcha senchiri nke iri na itoolu na mmalite senchiri nke iri abụọ
O dere ọrụ gọọmentị gụnyere iwu ụgbọ okporo ígwè na mpaghara ahụ
A mụrụ George S
Da Costa, onye Amaro, na Lagos na 1853
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na CMS Grammar School, Lagos
Site na 1877 ruo 1895 ọ na-elekọta Church Mission Society Bookshop na Lagos
Na 1895 o tinyere £3000 na ọzụzụ pụrụ iche wee mepee azụmahịa foto na Lagos
O nwere azụmahịa na-aga nke ọma n'afọ ndi 1890 nke gara n'ihu na senchiri na-esote
Da Costa rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto maka ndị ọchịchị nke Naịjirịa, ma were ọtụtụ foto nke dekọrọ ọrụ gọọmentị na mba ahụ niile, gụnyere mpaghara ugwu
Ndị a gụnyere foto nke iwu ụgbọ okporo ígwè site na Lagos site na Jebba ruo Kaduna
Ụlọ ọrụ ya na 1920 dị na 18 Ricca Street, Lagos
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Allister Macmillan n'afọ ahụ, na-ese foto maka Red Book of West Africa

Macmillan kpọrọ ya 'onye ọkachamara na-ese foto kachasị mma na nke a maara nke ọma na Naịjirịa' Eserese ịrị ịse na abụọ n'ime foto ya pụtara na Red Book, asaa ka e sere na Kano ebe e sere ndị ọzọ na Lagos
George Da Costa nwụrụ na 1929
Ọrụ Da Costa na-egosi West Africa nke dị anya site na onyinyo nke 'kọntinent gbara ọchịchịrị' nke ndị Europe na ndị America na-achikwa n'oge ahụ
Ọ na-egosi ọha mmadụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ, ndị ahịa mba ụwa, ndị ọka iwu, ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị isi akwụkwọ akụkọ na ndị na-elekọta mmadụ
Foto Da Costa pụtara na The Red Book of West Africa Historical and Descriptive, Commercial and Industrial Facts, Figures, & Resources (1920, nke Allister Macmillan deziri)
Akwụkwọ ahụ kwuru na ọ bụ 'nke mbụ n'ụdị ya nke e wepụtara na West Africa, bụkwa nke kachasị egosipụtara nke ọma
'Ọtụtụ n'ime foto ya na-emegharị na Christaud M
Geary's In and Out of Focus Images from Central Africa, 1885-1960 (2003)
George Edozie bụ Onye Ose ihe sitere mba Naịjirịa
Amụrụ George Edozie na uboch iri na otu onwa Mee 1972
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementri nke mahadum, Nsukka, si ya banye ulo akwukwo nke ncheta Washington na Ọnisha
Edozie gụrụ Nkà na Mahadum nke Obodo Benin ebe ọ gụrụ oke nmuta na Esem Ihe na arọ 1996
Obi ma na arụkwa orụ na Lagos, Naịjirịa , dika onye na emepụta ihe onyonyo oge nile
George Edozie esonyego na otutu ihe ngosi di iche iche n'ime Naịjirịa nakwa mba ofesi

Ufọdụ n'ime ha bụ ' Ndị omenkà isii Egbeda ' Oba Ngosi Nkà, Onikan, Lagos, 2002, 'Achomacho ' French Cultural center, Ikoyi, Lagos, 2004, 'inwe ihu madu ' Mahadum Pan-African, Lagos, 2006, ' A kaleidoskop nke ejiji omenala Nigeria 'Abuja, 2009,
George Perry Floyd Jr
(1973 - 2020) bu Afrikan Amerikan nwoke onye uwe ojii ocha gburu
Derek Chauvin gbuo ikpere n'ala n'olu Floyd ihe foro nke nta ka o buru nkeji asato
Ndi mmadu were iwe n' ihi onwu ya
Onwu ya butere ngaghara iwe megide ime ihe ike nye ndi isi ojii
Na 9 June 2020, Isaiah Ogedegbe katoro ogbugbu George Floyd, na-akowa ya 'mkpughe nke ikpa oke agbaro na nso nso a'
George Gadson (amụrụ n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1953) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ, ónyé na'ese ihe, na ónyé na-ewere foto nke bi na South Florida

A na-egosipụta ihe ọkpụkpụ ya dị ka ọrụ nka ọha na eze n'ọtụtụ ebe na Florida, gụnyere African-American Research Library and Cultural Center na Fort Lauderdale, Florida Memorial University na Miami, na ụlọ Broward County School Board
N'afọ ndị 1990, e nyere ya ọrụ ịmepụta ihe osise abụọ (The Kicker na The Quarterback) màkà Super Bowls abụọ dị na Florida
E nyekwara ya ọrụ imepụta ihe ịchọ mma maka osisi Krismas White House na 2008 na ihe ọkpụkpụ màkà ónyé na-agba ọsọ NFL Ray Lewis na 2018
Ọ bụ onye nwe George Gadson Studios nke ọ na-enyekwa ndụmọdụ nka ọha na eze
A zụlitere George Gadson na Fort Meade, Florida
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ahụ maka ego n'ụlọ akụ ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na chọọchị Baptist
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Duke, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1975 na BA na nkà mmụta okpukpe
Ọ nọrọ ógè na-agụ akwụkwọ na Valencia, Spain, ma mesịa nweta nzere masta na agụmakwụkwọ na Brewer Christian College
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Duke, Gadson banyéré na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ
N'afọ 1989, ọ meghere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na North Miami
Na mbido afọ 1980, ọ malitere ịga klas nka ébé ọ zụlitere mmasị na eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na foto

Ihe osise ya, nke na-egosipụtakarị ihe osise na ihe nnọchianya nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị màkà ndị Africa America na ụmụ amaala America, malitere ịpụta na gallery na ngosi na Tampa na Miami na ngwụcha afọ 1980 na mmalite afọ 1990

Ọzọkwa na mbido afọ 1990, Gadson ghọrọ ónyé ndụmọdụ onwé ya, na-enyere ndị otu na-enweghị uru aka inweta ego mgbazinye ego ma mesịa bụrụ onye Greater Hollywood Chamber of Commerce were n'ọrụ dị ka ónyé njikwa mmepe azụmaahịa na-elekwasị anya na azụmaahịa ndị pere mpe

N'afọ 2019, a kpọrọ Gadson ka o mee ihe ngosi onwe ya (About Faces) na Sunrise Civic Center Art Gallery, na 2020, o sonyere na ihe ngosi mmekorita, Roots of the Spirit Soulful Expressions of the African Diaspora, nkè ndị na-enweghị uru, ArtServe, mèrè
N'afọ 2021, e nyere Gadson ọrụ ịmepụta ihe oyiyi màkà ụlọ YMCA ọhụrụ na Fort Lauderdale
George Henry Ford aka G
Ford (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Mee 1808 London rụọ July 1876 na London), bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise akụkọ ihe mere eme nke South Africa nke sonyeere British Museum na 1837
O gosipụtara ụmụ anụmanụ ma mepụta efere na Sir Andrew Smith's Illustrations of the Zoology of South Africa
Ford bụ nwa nwoke nke ónyé ọrụ ugbo England na Cape, James Edward Ford, ónyé n'onwe ya bụ ónyé na-ese obere ihe
Ónyé isi ụgbọ mmiri A mụrụ James Edward Ford, otu n'ime ndị 1820 Settlers, na England na 1770, wee kwaga South Africa, daa na Port Elizabeth n'ọnwa Eprel 1820
Ebe e kenyere ndị otu ahụ dị n'etiti Bathurst na ọnụ Osimiri Great Fish ma kpọọ ya Cuylerville mgbè Col
Jacob Cuyler Ford, nwunye ya Frances Stransham, na ụmụ ha asaa so na 256 Settlers na ụgbọ mmiri Chapman

Ụmụ ya bụ Frances Jane Ford irí na anọ, James Samuel Ford irí na àtó, George Henry Ford irí na otu, Edward Stransham Ford itoolu, Adelaide Elizabeth Ford asatọ, Jane Murray Ford isii, na John Henry Ford àtó
Andrew Smith matara ezinụlọ Ford na 1821 mgbè ọ na-eleta ndị ọrụ ugbo, na-agba ha ume ka ha nye ya ihe ndị na-adọrọ mmasị
George Ford na-eto eto na-arịa ọrịa site na úkwù gbajiri agbaji nke ehi kpatara, mmerụ ahụ nke mere ka ọ bụrụ ónyé nwere nkwarụ kpamkpam, na-akpali Smith ịkpọrọ ya laghachi Cape Town
Mgbè ọ na-agbake n'ebe ahụ, a gbara ya ume ise ihe na ise ihe osise Smith

O gosipụtara na ọ maara nkè ọma nké na n'afọ 1825, Smith tụụrụ ya aro ka ọ gaa na South African Museum nke e guzobere ọhụrụ na Cape Town, ma mesịa nyere ya aka na 1834 'Njem màkà Ịchọpụta Central Africa'
Mgbè Smith laghachiri England na 1837, Ford sonyeere ya ma n'oge na-adịghị anya chọta nkwanye ùgwù maka ịdị mma nke ọrụ ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na British Museum ma soro Smith rụọ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ bụ ónyé nsogbu nke Bloomsbury semi-basement mechara chụpụ
Ford gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru John Edward Gray, onye na-enyere ónyé na-elekọta anụmanụ aka
N'ihi ọrịa backache na-adịghị ala ala, Ford mechara rụọ ọrụ site n'ụlọ Surbiton nke Albert Günther ónyé ga-anọchi Gray na 1875
George Viner Ellis (afọ 1812 rụọ afọ 1900) nọchiri oche nke Anatomy na Mahadum College London n'afọ 1850, wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara ahụike nke oge ya
Ụlọ ọrụ a, n'ime afọ iri atọ na ise mbụ nke ịdị adị ya, bipụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke atlas anatomical
Ellis na Ford jiri usoro ọhụrụ nke chromolithography màkà atlas nke alaeze ha nke iri ise na asatọ, Illustrations of Dissections in a Series of Original Coloured Plates the Size of Life
A na-eme efere ndị ahụ n'etiti afọ 1863 na 1867, site na anọ ruo asaa a na-emecha kwa afọ
A na-ewere efere ndị a dị ka ihe doro anya na nke ziri ezi, na ihe ngosi mara mma nke ozu, nke Mintern Bros, bipụtara, nke James Walton bipụtara
Ford lụrụ Emma Ethel Ford
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ asatọ
A na-echeta Ford na áhà sayensị nkè ụdị agwọ Hispaniolan, Chilabothrus fordii (Ford's boa)
George J
Kanuck (amụrụ n'April 26, 1943) bụ onye bụbu onye otu Republican nke Pennsylvania House of Representatives
A mụrụ ya na Marion, Indiana

George Lilanga (1934 - 27 June 2005) bụ onye Tanzania na-ese ihe na onye na-ese ihe ọkpụkpụ, na-arụsi ọrụ ike site na ngwụcha afọ 1970 ruo mmalite narị afọ nke 21
Ọ bụ onye Makonde ma biri ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya na Dar es Salaam, obodo kachasị ukwuu na Tanzania
Ya na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe n'Afrịka n'oge a, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi nka mba ụwa, gụnyere Africa Remix 2004 ma ọ bụ African Art Now n'afọ 2005
Site na ihe ngosi ndị a na mmasị nke ndị na-akatọ nka na ndị na-anakọta nka Africa nke oge a, Lilanga ghọrọ onye omenkà a ma ama na mba ụwa nke Tanzania
Na mbido, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na omenala nka Makonde nke ịkpụ ihe a tụrụ atụ site na osisi
Mgbe ọ kpughere ndị na-ese ihe nke oge a ndị ọzọ na ebe ọdịnala Nyumba ya Sanaa (Ụlọ nka), ọ gbanwere ụdị ihe ọkpụkpụ n'ime ọrụ nka abụọ dịka ihe osise, etchings ma ọ bụ panel
Site na ihe ọhụrụ a, ọ mepụtara ụdị nke ya site na ihe ndị a na-akpọ ihe oyiyi Makonde nke oge a
Ihe osise ya bụ ihe e ji mara ya maka ụdị ya mara mma na nke na-emegide onwe ya, na-egosipụta ndụ kwa ụbọchị na Tanzania dịka ọ hụrụ ya
Ezigbo ebe na ụbọchị a mụrụ Lilanga ejighị n'aka, ọ bụ ezie na o kwuru na a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1934 n'obodo Kikwetu, mpaghara Masasi, na mpaghara Mtwara nke ndịda Tanzania
Nne na nna Lilanga bụ ndị Makonde (otu agbụrụ bi na Mozambique nakwa Tanzania)
Nna ya bụ onye ọrụ ugbo, onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ubi sisal, o nwekwara ụmụnne nwoke abụọ, ndị nwụrụ tupu ya
Lilanga gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị naanị afọ atọ
N'ọrụ nke afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, nke a raara nye ndụ obodo, ọ laghachiri ọtụtụ ugboro na nnọchite anya ncheta ya nke oge obi ụtọ, mgbe ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ natara diplọma ha
[dị ka on]
N'afọ 1970, Lilanga kpebiri ịkwaga Dar es Salaam, ebe enwere ohere ka ukwuu maka ire ihe ọkpụkpụ na ime nka nke oge a
N'afọ 1971, ọ chọtara ọrụ mbụ ya, site n'enyemaka nke nwanne nna ya, Augustino Malaba, onye a ma ama na-ese ihe, onye ga-abụ onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ n'ọdịnihu
Ọ malitere dịka onye nche abalị na House of Art (Nyumba ya Sanaa), ebe ọdịnala maka mmepe nke nka na nka Africa na Dar es Salaam
N'afọ 1982, o mepụtara ọnụ ụzọ osisi na ihe oyiyi shetani maka ebe ọdịnala a
Mgbe e bibiri Ntumba ya Sanaa, onye Germany na-anakọta ọnụ ụzọ ndị a zụrụ ma weghachite ha ma dee ha n'akwụkwọ George Lilanga The Doors of Ntumba ya Ganaa
N'afọ 1974, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa shuga
' Ike gwụrụ m mgbe niile, enweghị m ike ịgbaso usoro m na-eme kwa ụbọchị
Ya mere, ekpebiri m ịbanye maka nyocha zuru oke n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị n'ógbè ahụ
N'oge ahụ, ndị dọkịta kpebiri na enwere m ọrịa shuga'
Lilanga nwụrụ na Mọnde abalị 27 ọnwa June afọ 2005, na Dar es Salaam, n'ụlọ ọrụ ya na Mbagala
