Ìgwè
George Moses Horton (1798–mgbe 1867), 'onye Black bard nke North Carolina', bụ onye Afrịka na-Amerịka na-ede uri si North Carolina bụ onye ohu
Nchịkọta mbụ ya, Olileanya nke nnwere onwe (1829), bu n'obi inweta ego zuru ezu iji zụta nnwere onwe ya, mana o meghị nke ahụ
O nweghi onwe ya ruo n'afọ 1865, mgbe ndị agha Union na Emancipation Proclamation ruru North Carolina
Horton bụ onye edemede nke akwụkwọ mbụ e bipụtara na North Carolina
Phillis Wheatley bipụtara na London n'oge ọchịchị mgbe ndị nkwusa Boston jụrụ ya
Mana Horton bụ onye edemede Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ e bipụtara mgbe United States nwetachara nnwere onwe
A mụrụ Horton n'ohu n'ugbo William Horton n'afọ 1798 na Northampton County, North Carolina
Ọ bụ nwa nke isii n'ime ụmụ iri; aha nne na nna ya furu efu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Onye nwe ya kwagara mgbe Horton bụ nwata; n'afọ 1800, a kpọọrọ nwata nwoke ahụ na ọtụtụ ndị ezinụlọ ya ka ha soro nna ya ukwu gaa n'ugbo ụtaba ọhụrụ na ime obodo Chatham County
N'afọ1814 William Horton nyere onye ntorobịa ahụ dị ka ihe onwunwe nye onye ikwu ya bụ James Horton
N'afọ 1819, e mebiri ala ahụ, ezinụlọ George Horton kewara
Abụ ya 'Division of an Estate', nke e dere ọtụtụ afọ mgbe e mesịrị, gosipụtara ahụmahụ a
N'ịbụ onye a maara dị ka onye na-ede uri, Horton gbalịrị inweta ego zuru ezu site na uri ya iji zụta nnwere onwe ya

N'otu oge n'afọ ndị afọ 1830, ọ 'lụrụ' (a naghị ekwe ka alụmdi na nwunye iwu kwadoro) Martha Snipes, nwanyị ohu nke Franklin Snipes nwere na Chatham County 146 Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ abụọ, Free na Rhody A maara obere ihe ọzọ banyere ezinụlọ ahụ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii, nke pụtara ihe dị ka afọ 1858, ọ kọwara onwe ya dị ka 'Onye Hal Horton bi ugbu a na Chatham County' 1248
Edemede 'Nkọwapụta' nke meghere Olileanya nke nnwere onwe na-ekwu maka ọchịchọ Horton ịkwaga na mpaghara ọhụrụ nke Liberia; e bipụtara nchịkọta ahụ iji gbaa onyinye ume
Akwụkwọ ole na ole n'ime akwụkwọ ndị na-ekpochapụ [nke?] tụrụ aro ka ọ nweta ego iji zụta nnwere onwe ya ma kwụọ ụgwọ njem ya na mpaghara ahụ
Mgbalị ndị a enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma ma a tọhapụghị Horton ruo n'afọ 1865, mgbe ndị agha Union rutere n'ógbè ya
N'okpuru Emancipation Proclamation nke Afọ 1863, ha tọhapụrụ ndị ohu niile nọ na steeti ndị kewapụrụ onwe ha
Horton mere enyi onye ọrụ Union na-eto eto na otu ahụ, William H
Banks
Ọ hapụrụ Chapel Hill na Banks, na-aga Philadelphia na steeti Pennsylvania
Banks nyeere Horton aka inweta nchịkọta ya Naked Genius bipụtara n'otu afọ ahụ
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nweere onwe ya, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na asatọ Horton bi na Philadelphia, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-ede uri maka akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo
Abụ ya bụ 'A machibidoro ịnya ụgbọ ala n'okporo ámá' gosipụtara mmechuihu ya na mmeso na-ezighị ezi nke ndị ojii mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị
Mgbe ọ bịarutere Ọbọdọ Philadelphia tupu oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1866, o dere akụkọ ụlọ akwụkwọ Sọnde n'aha ndị enyi ya bi n'obodo ahụ

N'ịbụ onye nwere nkụda mmụọ na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ọ zutere na Philadelphia, Horton nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịkwaga Bexley, Liberia, otu puku na narị abụọ na iri abụọ na anọ rutere Jenụwarị 7, 1867 151–152 Nke a bụ nke ikpeazụ a maara banyere ya
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ahụ ụbọchị ọnwụ ya na ụfọdụ akwụkwọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, a maghị ebe ọnwụ ya, ụbọchị, na olili ya
O nwere ike ịbụ na ọ laghachiri Philadelphia otu puku na narị abụọ na iri abụọ na anọ Enweghị foto ma ọ bụ eserese Horton a maara
George Nene (1959–2005) bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà ama ama na Zimbabwe
N'afọ 1988, e mere ncheta onyinye ya nye mba ahụ na stampụ Zimbabwe
Ọzụzụ mbụ ya na nka karịrị nke dị ala, ebe ọ malitere ise ihe n'okpuru nkuzi nke onye na-ese ihe na South Africa 'Thami'; Thamsanga Mnyele, mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ maka izu ohi na Gaborone, Botswana
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụkwa onye agha okpuru nke Zimbabwe African People's Union (ZAPU)
Ka o sina dị, nka ya ghọrọ ihe a ma ama nke ọma nke na o gosipụtara na National Museum dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi mmadụ abụọ, mgbe ọ na-emecha afọ asatọ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Nene mepụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na acrylics na watercolor
Ọtụtụ n'ime nka George Nene sitere na mkpali 'ndụ ọdịnala kwa ụbọchị', dịka nke gosipụtara na mkpuchi akwụkwọ maka 'Art from the Frontline Contemporary Art from Southern Africa' na isiokwu okpukpe

Otu ihe atụ bụ mural e sere na obere ụka dị nso na Bulawayo, nke akpọrọ 'Birth of Christ the King of Peace' E gosipụtara ma ree ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya na Mzilikazi Arts and Crafts Centre na mpụga Bulawayo
Chọọchị Katọlik dị na Zimbabwe nabatakwara onyinye nka Nene
Na Disemba 2005, Nene nwụrụ na Gokwe
George Nick S, na-akpọ Georgii Nikitin, (onye a mụrụ April 10) bụ a Katọlik dere, Vatican akụkọ
Ebe ọ bụ na 2015 - nnyemaaka nke Pope maka Communications
George Ogbeide (amụrụ 4 Ọgọst 1968 na Lagos ) bụ onye na-awụ ogologo mwụli elu na Naijiria lara ezumike nka
Ọ meriri nrite ọla ọcha na 1991 Summer Universiade na ọla edo na 1991 All-Africa Games
Ogbeide gbara nke anọ na 4 x 100 mita relay n'asọmpi mba ụwa nke afọ 1991 ya na ndị otu ya bụ Olapade Adeniken, Victor Omagbemi na Davidson Ezinwa
Mwụli elu ya kacha mma nkeonwe bụ 824 mita, ọ nwetara na Julaị 1991 na Cottbus
Nke a nyere ya ọkwa nke anọ n'etiti ndị na-agba ogologo ima elu Naijiria, n'azụ Yusuf Alli (827 m), Charlton Ehizuelen (ime ụlọ 826 m) na Paul Emordi (825 m)
Ogbeide merikwara 1991 American collegiate (NCAA) aha ogologo mwụli elu na itu ukwu nke 813 mita
Àtụ Footer All-Africa Champions Long Jump Men
George Osodi bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto si Ogwashi Ukwu, Delta Steeti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nchịkwa azụmahịa na Yaba College of Technology na Lagos n'agbata afọ 1996 na 1999
Ọ bụ onye na-ese foto na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Comet site na 1999 ruo 2002
Ọ gara n'ihu na Associated Press site na 2002 ruo 2008
O nwetara diplọma ọkachamara na ịme ihe nkiri site na London Academy of Media, Film and TV n'afọ 2009
Ọ bụ onye otu Panos Pictures UK
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museumslandschaft Hessen Kassel na Germany; Neue Galerie na New York City, US, na Newark Museum of Art
Osodi nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ na-edekọ mmetụta nke mmịpụta mmanụ na Niger Delta
Osodi ritere ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi Fuji African Photojournalist of the Year n'afọ 2004 na ngalaba Features and Portfolio

George Paul Kornegay (úbọchị irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Novemba, 1913 rụo ụbọchị atọ n'ọnwa Juun, 2014) bụ ónyé America na onye na-ese ihe, na ónyé ụkọchukwu na African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church, onye mepụtara nnukwu ebe ọhụụ nke Ndị Kraịst na ihe ndị a chọtara na nso Brent, Alabama
A mụrụ Kornegay na úbọchị irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Novemba 1913 na Bibb County, Alabama, nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ iri nke Will na Sue Kornegay
Nná ya rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ugbo, onye na-egwupụta ihe n'ime ala, na ónyé na-eme barel, nne ya lekọtara ụmụ ha
Kornegay gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Alabama Mission School na Brent ruo na klas nke iri, mana ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ma nyéré nna ya aka n'ịkụkọta ihe
Nnà ya mechara zụta ala dị hekta 28 dị nso na Brent, Alabama na ụlọ nwere okpukpu abụọ site n'aka onye Cherokee, Charles Hogan, màkà otu narị dolla
Ihe onwunwe ahụ dị n'ebe a na-eli ozu ndị American Indian ma Kornegay kọrọ na nwa ya nwanyị nwere ike 'nụrụ olu ebe a na-ekwu okwu mana ọ pụghị ịgwa anyị ihe ha na-ekwu maka ya
Nke a bụ otu n'ime ebe ị nwere ike ịbịa mgbè ị na-enwe obi ọjọọ ma pụọ elu
Ha niile na-ekwu na nke a bụ ebe dị nsọ'

Kornegay rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ igwe, Century Foundry, na Tuscaloosa ma mesịa kọwaa ndụ ọrụ ya dị ka 'Site n'ọrụ ugbo gaa na ónyé nkwusa, site n'onye nkwusa gaa n'ụlọ ọrụ igwe, site n'ụlọ ọrụ igwe ruo n'ụlọ igwe
Ọrụ abụọ m rụrụ
Otu akpa ogho, na ogwu, na ihe igwe ihe, na ihe owuwu akwụkwọ, na ihe ndị ahụ niile ga-eri ndị m

Kornegay lụrụ Minnie Sue Tubbs na úbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1932, ha nwèrè ụmụ iri na abụọ; ụmụ nwoke asatọ (Arthur Paul, George Jr, Earvin, Arthur Lee, Joel, Benjamin, Donald, na Ronnie) na ụmụ nwanyị anọ (Gloria Jean, Dorothy, Donna, na Annie)
Ọ chere na ọ bụ 'ọkpụkpọ Chineke' ka ọ bụrụ onye ozi ma kwuo na na mbụ ọ '
na-atụ egwu ya, mana Chineke, ọ nọrọ n'ebe m nọ
Ana m arịọ ya ka o nye m ihe ịrịba ama ndị a ma ọ bụrụ na nke a bụ ihe ọ na-ekwu maka m
O wee zipụ ha
Ọgwụgwụ ya sitere n'aka ndị mmụọ ozi na-abịa ileta ụlọ m
Bịa site n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ banye n'ụlọ, gbadaa n'ụlọ nzukọ, gbaa ụlọ ihi ụra m gburugburu
Ma hapụ ya gaa n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ'
Kornegay nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye ụkọchukwu na African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church (AME
Zion), ebe a maara ya nke ọma dị ka 'Big Daddy'
Kornegay kwusara ozi ọma na ụka AME
Zion na Grove Hill, Cottage Hill na Marietta ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri ise

Isiokwu dị na ihe osise Kornegay gụnyere ndị nna nna ya bụ ndị American Indian, ọdịnala ndị Africa, na ọhụụ apocalyptic nke Ndị Kraịst na akụkụ ndị sitere na Bible, gụnyere nri abalị ikpeazụ na ọtụtụ obe
Ihe nketa Afrịka nke Kornegay gosipụtara n'ịmepụta osisi karama na ihe ndị na-echetara Nkisi ime mmụọ
William Arnett gbàrà ya ajụjụ ọnụ màkà Arnett's Souls Grown Deep Foundation na 1997 na 1998
Arnett mere nkwekọrịta nwoke na Kornegay ka o debe ihe osise ya n'ọnọdụ, ọ bụghị ire ndị na-anakọta ihe
Arnett sere foto nke nchịkọta ahụ tupu ọ gbasaa
Kornegay nwụrụ dị otu narị afọ na úbọchị atọ n'ọnwa Juun 2014; nwunye ya, na nwa ya nwanyị Donna Lee, nwụrụ tupu ya, ụmụ ya ịrị na otu, ụmụ ụmụ irí ato, na ụmụ ụmụ ụmụ irí anọ na isé
George Milwa Mnyaluza Pemba (1912 na Korsten, Port Elizabeth - 2001) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye edemede South Africa
E nyere ya Order of Ikhamanga mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
A mụrụ Pemba na 1912 na Hill's Kraal, Korsten, Port Elizabeth
Ọ bụ nwa nke ise nke Rebecca na Titus Pemba
Ọ gara Van der Kemp Mission Primary School ruo 1924 mgbe o nwetara ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu nke Grey iji gaa Paterson Secondary School
Dị ka nwatakịrị, nna ya gbara ya ume ise ihe na ite ihe, ya mere ọ malitere ise ihe osise n'ụlọ ezinụlọ ya ma mepụta foto site na foto nke ndị were nna ya n'ọrụ
Nna ya nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ọgba tum tum na 1926
Ọ nwetara ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu nke Grey, nke nyeere ya aka inweta agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị, na 1931 ọ nwetara Diploma onye nkuzi na Lovedale Training College na Eastern Cape
Na Lovedale, Pemba mepụtara ihe osise maka akwụkwọ ndị Lovedale Press bipụtara ma bụrụ onye Reverend R
Shepherd, onye isi ikpeazụ a họpụtara na Lovedale, duziri
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo 1936 ruo mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi na Wesleyan Mission School na King William's Town
Ọ hapụrụ nkuzi mgbe afọ asaa gasịrị iji nweta ọrụ a na-akwụ ụgwọ ka mma dị ka onye ozi nke Native Commissioner's Court, wee bụrụ onye na-anakọta ego maka ndị nchịkwa obodo
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Prọfesọ Austin Winter Moore ruo ọnwa ise na Mahadum Rhodes, nke mere ka o kwe omume site na onyinye e nyere site na Bantu Welfare Trust
E nyere Pemba onyinye nke abụọ n'afọ 1941
N'oge a, ọ nọrọ izu abụọ na ụlọ ọrụ Maurice van Essche na Cape Town na-aga klas nka
Ọ bụ na ụlọ ọrụ Maurice van Essche bụ ebe ọ zutere Gerard Sekoto na John Mohl
Sekoto gbara ya ume ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe oge niile ma gbanwee ihe ọ na-ese site na mmiri gaa na mmanụ
Ọ gara Johannesburg, Durban, KwaZulu-Natal, Umtata na Basutoland na-ese foto nke ụmụ amaala ọ zutere na mpaghara dị iche iche
Site na 1952 ruo 1978 ọ gbakwunyere ego ọ na-enweta site na ire ihe oriri na ụlọ ahịa spaza a na-akpọ Gabby's Store
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Pemba kụziiri ụmụaka nka na SA Institute of Race Relations na 1979 ka enyere ya nzere Master of Arts Degree site na Mahadum Fort Hare
George Pemba nwalere ihe osise wee ghọọ onye a ma ama na-eji mmanụ ese ihe
E mere ihe ngosi nke ihe osise na-aga nke ọma site na 1940s gaa n'ihu na The Everard Read Gallery na 1991
N'afọ 1992, ihe ngosi nke abụọ mere iji cheta afọ irí asatọ ya, nke a na-emekwa ememe ya na onye na-ese ihe na King George VI Art Gallery na Port Elizabeth
E gosipụtara ọrụ mbụ Pemba na Feather Market Hall na Port Elizabeth n'afọ 1928, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
N'afọ 1934, a gwọrọ Pemba maka appendix gbawara agbawa ma ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ na-ese foto nke ndị nọọsụ na ndị dọkịta
Ihe osise ụlọ ọgwụ ya dọtara uche onye na-ese ihe n'ala Ethel Smythe onye nwere mmasị na Pemba ma nye ya nkuzi
Smythe nwere nnukwu nchịkọta akwụkwọ nke mere ka ọ mara ọrụ Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn, Diego Velázquez na impressionism
N'afọ 1937, Pemba nwetara ihe nrite mbụ na May Esther Bedford Competition ebe onye egwu na onye na-ese ihe Gerard Sekoto nwetara ihe nrite nke abụọ
Ọrụ mbụ ya bịara na 1950, n'ụdị onyinyo nke onye nkuzi na onye na-eme ihe ike, Prọfesọ Davidson Don Tengo Jabavu maka Mahadum Fort Hare
Pemba mepụtara ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị maka mbipụta mbụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ African National Congress nke a kpọrọ Isizwe ma wepụta na June 1959
Ọrụ ihe nketa South Africa
A maara ihe osise Pemba maka ihe ha dere na iji agba eme ihe
A maara ya dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na South Africa
N'afọ 1995, Barry Feinberg mepụtara ihe ngosi banyere George nke akpọrọ George Pemba A Painter of the People na mmekorita ya na Mayibuye Centre for History and Culture
George Pilkington (ụbọchị irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba 1879 rụọ úbọchị irí nà asaa n'ọnwa Eprel 1958) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke ihe osise na asọmpi nka na 1948 Summer Olympics
George Sidhom (Arabic; 28 Mee 1938 -27 Machị 2020), bụ onye na-eme ihe ọchị n'Egypt
A mụrụ George Sidhom na Sohag, Egypt na 28th nke May afọ 1938 o wee lụọ Linda Makram, onye bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ nke ya na ya nọrọ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2020
Site n'oge ọ bụ nwata, Sidhom hụrụ ihe nkiri n'anya ma mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Faculty of Agriculture, Ain Shams University n'afọ 1961

Mgbe Sidhom nọ na kọleji, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmemme TV a na-akpọ 'Dosh bared' (Cold Shower) nke onye nlekọta mmekọrịta ya gwara ya ka ọ sonye na mmemme ahụ ọ zutere ndị ọrụ ibe ya Samir Ghanem, na El Deif Ahmed na atọ ahụ mechara bụrụ Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah
Ụdị ihe ọchị George Sidhom bụ ngwakọta nke ihe ọchị slapstick, mkparị na ịrụ ọrụ nke onye dị nkọ
O jikwa ahụike ya mee ihe n'oge ụfọdụ, na-ekwusi ike na iribiga nri ókè
Site n'ọrụ ya, o sonyere na ihe nkiri dị iche iche 'Karamat Zawgaty' na Salah Zulfikar na Shadia, 'El-Bahth 'an Fediha' yana ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ndị Kraịst dịka St Abanoub, na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ

N'oge ndụ ya, George ekwenyeghị na mgbasa ozi ọdịnala site na ọkọlọtọ na mgbasa ozi zuru ezu ma kama ọ na-akwọ ụgbọala ya na Samir Ghanem, na El Deif Ahmed iji kwupụta egwuregwu ọzọ ha na-ekere òkè na ya

Ezigbo nzute mbụ Sidhom na aha ọma, bụ mgbe o guzobere 'Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah' nke Samir Ghanem, El Deif Ahmed na ya mere ihe osise egwu dị iche iche, ihe ngosi na-atọ ọchị, ihe nkiri na-atọ ụtọ, na ihe nkiri
Mbido mbụ ha bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke Egypt 'Doctour Elhaa'ny' (Dọkịta Zọpụta M), ihe ngosi dị mkpirikpi nke mere ka ha mara ụwa nke ama
Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah gosipụtara ihe ngosi Ramadan Riddles nke mbụ na TV ma gaa n'ihu ruo afọ iri, nke Hussain El-Said dere
Mgbe El Deif Ahmed nwụsịrị na 6th nke Eprel afọ 1970, Ghanem na Sidhom gara n'ihu n'okpuru otu aha (Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah) ruo 1982

N'afọ 1967, George dara mbà n'obi n'ihi Agha Ụbọchị Isii nke Egypt tinyere aka na ya wee gaa Alexandria ebe ọ zutere Mohamed Hamdy Ashour, Gọvanọ Alexandria n'oge ahụ, onye gwara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na egwuregwu ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1986, Egypt gabigara ọgba aghara nchekwa nke ọgba agha ndị agha Egypt nke afọ 1986 mgbe a gbara Alhosabir Theater, ebe George tinyere ọtụtụ ego ya ọkụ
Ihe omume a hapụrụ George na nkụchi obi, n'ihi ya ọ ghaghị ịga London iji nweta ọgwụgwọ
Mgbe ihe omume ahụ gasịrị, Sidhom laghachiri Cairo ebe ọ mepere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ n'afọ 1987 na Egypt ebe a na-akpọ efere ahụ aha egwuregwu ya
George sonyere n'ihe karịrị 22 TV show, 59 film, 32 theater plays, 6 talk show, na 5 radio plays
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya gụnyere;
N'etiti afọ iri itoolu, ndị na-ahụ maka ụtụ isi weghaara ọkwa Sidhom n'otu ihe omume ebe ọ chọpụtara na nwanne ya nwoke Amir Sidhom gbazitere ọkwa ahụ n'amaghị ama wee gaa United States
N'ihi ihe omume a, George nwere ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ nke hapụrụ ya na ahụ mkpọnwụ n'akụkụ aka nri ya ma metụta mmegharị na okwu ya nke mere ka ọ laa ezumike nká
Sidhom nwụrụ na 27 Machị 2020 n'ime ụlọ ọgwụ onwe onye na Heliopolis, Egypt mgbe ogologo oge ya na ahụike ya lụchara ọgụ
George Washington Foster (1866 ruo 1923) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ewu ụlọ nke steeti New Jersey nyere ikike na 1908, na mgbe e mesịrị New York (1916)
Foster sonyeere Vertner Woodson Tandy (1885X1949), onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ewu ụlọ nke steeti New York nyere ikike, na ụlọ ọrụ Tandy na Foster, nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike site na 1908 ruo 1914
A mụrụ George Washington Foster, Jr
na Disemba 18, 1866, na Virginia
Nna ya bụ onye na-agba ịnyịnya na nne ya bụ nwa Jefferson Davis
Ọ kwagara Newark, New Jersey mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ
Foster gara ụlọ akwụkwọ abalị na Cooper Union ma mụọ ihe owuwu

A na-ekwu na Foster rụrụ ọrụ n'ọfịs Henry Hardenbergh site na 1888 ruo 1889, onye chepụtara ihe ịrịba ama nke New York City Dakota Apartment Building, Plaza Hotel, na Waldorf-Astoria mbụ, na ebe dị ugbu a nke Empire State Building
N'oge ya na Hardenbergh, ọ gaara arụ ọrụ na Waldorf Hotel na 1892
O nwekwara ike ịbụ na ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Flatiron Building, nke ụlọ ọrụ D
Burnham nke dị na Chicago rụrụ
N'ihe dị ka 1908, Foster zutere Vertner Woodson Tandy, onye mbụ debanyere aha na New York Afrịka-Amerịka architect ma guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ Tandy & Foster ọnụ
Tandy & Foster chepụtara St
Philip's Episcopal Church (Harlem, New York) na 1910
Mgbe 1915, e nyere Foster ikike ịrụ ọrụ na New York ma nọgide n'ọfịs nke ya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ha rụkwara ọrụ na Mother AME Zion Church na Harlem
Ya na nwunye ya, Carrie, kwagara Park Ridge, New Jersey n'ụlọ o chepụtara ma wuo
Ya na nwunye ya nwere ụmụ isii, gụnyere Henry Hardenburg Foster, onye akpọrọ aha onye were ya n'ọrụ
Ọ nwụrụ na Disemba 20, 1923, n'ụlọ o mepụtara na Colony Avenue, na Bergen County, Park Ridge, New Jersey
E liri ya na Westwood Cemetery na Westwood, New Jersey
Prọfesọ George William Kyeyune (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye na-ese ihe na prọfesọ na Mahadum Makerere, Kampala, Uganda
Ọ na-akụzi ihe osise na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nka Africa na Mahadum Injinia, Design, na Teknụzụ nke Mahadum Makerere, yana mmasị nyocha na nka nke oge a na teknụzụ igwe
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya Katidral Namirembe nke Chọọchị Uganda
Onyeokachamara George Kyeyune bu onye amụrụ na afọ 1962 n'ezinụlọ ọdịnala Ugandan na Masaka, Kyanamukaka Subcounty na etiti Uganda
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ malitere igosi ihe ịrịba ama nke onye na-ese ihe site na ise foto site na iji ala dị ka ákwà ya
Nke a mechara tụgharịa n'ọrụ nka (ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ)

Onye ọkachamara George Kyeyune bụ ngwa ahịa nke 'Margaret Trowell School of Fine Arts' (nke bụzi Margaret Trowall School of Industrial and Fine Arts), ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Fine Art na afọ 1985
O mechara nweta diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ n'afọ sochirinụ
Onyeokachamara George Kyeyune nwetara nzere Master of Fine Arts Degree na Mahadum Maharaja Sayajirao nke Baroda, India na nka na ihe ọkpụkpụ
N'afọ 1999, Prọfesọ
George Kyeyune natara agụmakwụkwọ site na Commonwealth Scholarship Commission iji mụọ maka PhD ya na Art History na School of Oriental and African Studies (SOAS), Mahadum London
Prọfesọ George Kyeyune si India lọta wee were ọnọdụ nkuzi na ihe ọkpụkpụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ ya
Ọ bụ osote prọfesọ ugbu a na College of Engineering, Design, and Technology nke Mahadum Makerere
Ọ na-emekwa ihe ọkpụkpụ na ihe osise maka ihe ngosi

Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya gụnyere The Kampala I Will Always Come Back To (2011); At the Salon (2011); Gossip I & II (2011); Telephone Call (2011); Roadside Vendor (2011); Boodaboda I, II & III (2011); En Route from Mbale (1983) na Jesus Writing in the Sand (1983) n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Prọfesọ George Kyeyune bụ nna onye egwu Ugandan Ragga Dee (onye amụrụ Daniel Kazibwe)

Jean Léopold Nicolas Frédéric, Baron Cuvier (French [kyvje]; 23 Ọgọst 1769 – 13 Mee 1832), nke a maara dị ka Georges Cuvier, bụ onye France na-ahụ maka okike na ọkà mmụta anụmanụ, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya 'nna ntọala nke paleontology'

Cuvier bụ onye isi na nyocha sayensị sitere n'okike na mmalite narị afọ nke 19 ma bụrụkwa onye nyere aka n'ịkwalite ngalaba nke anatomy comparative na paleontology site n'ọrụ ya n'ịtụle anụmanụ dị ndụ na ihe fossils
A na-ele ọrụ Cuvier anya dị ka ntọala nke paleontology vertebrate, ma gbasaa taxonomy Linnaean site n'ịchịkọta klaasị n'ime phyla na itinye ma fossils na ụdị ndụ na nhazi ọkwa
A makwaara Cuvier maka iguzobe mkpochapụ dị ka eziokwu-n'oge ahụ, ọtụtụ ndị Cuvier dịkọrọ ndụ na-ewere mbibi dị ka naanị ịkọ nkọ na-arụ ụka
N'ime Essay on the Theory of the Earth (1813) Cuvier tụrụ aro na e kpochapụrụ ụdị anụmanụ ndị na-ekpochapụ ugbu a site na ihe omume idei mmiri na-eme n'oge
N'ụzọ dị otu a, Cuvier ghọrọ onye kacha akwado oke mbibi na geology na mmalite narị afọ nke 19
Ọmụmụ ihe banyere strata nke basin Paris na Alexandre Brongniart guzobere ụkpụrụ ndị bụ isi nke biostratigraphy

N'ime ihe ndị ọzọ ọ rụzuru, Cuvier mere ka o doo anya na ọkpụkpụ dị ka elephant a chọtara na North America bụ nke anụ ọhịa na-ekpochapụ nke ọ ga-akpọ aha mastodon, nakwa na nnukwu ọkpụkpụ e gwupụtara na Argentina nke oge a bụ nke Megatherium, nnukwu ala nke oge ochie
sloth
Ọ kpọrọ pterosaur Pterodactylus, nke a kọwara (ma ọ chọpụtaghị ma ọ bụ aha) anụ mmiri mmiri Mosasaurus, ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-atụ aro na anụ ufe na-achị ụwa, kama anụ mammals, n'oge oge ochie
A na-echetakwa Cuvier maka echiche evolushọn na-emegidesi ike, bụ nke Jean-Baptiste de Lamarck na Geoffroy Saint-Hilaire tụpụtara n'oge ahụ (tupu echiche Darwin)
Cuvier kwenyere na ọ nweghị ihe akaebe maka evolushọn, kama ọ bụ ihe akaebe maka okike cyclical na mbibi nke ụdị ndụ site na ihe omume mkpochapụ zuru ụwa ọnụ dị ka iju mmiri

N'afọ 1830, Cuvier na Geoffroy tinyere aka na arụmụka a ma ama, nke ekwuru na ọ bụ ihe atụ ngbanwe abụọ dị mkpa na echiche ndu n'oge ahụ - ma usoro anụmanụ ọ bụ n'ihi ọrụ ma ọ bụ (evolushọn) morphology
Cuvier kwadoro ọrụ ma jụ echiche Lamarck
Cuvier mekwara ọmụmụ ihe gbasara agbụrụ nke nyere akụkụ nke ntọala maka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ sayensị, wee bipụta ọrụ na-eche na ọdịiche dị n'etiti ụdị anụ ahụ dị iche iche na ikike iche echiche
Cuvier tinyere Sarah Baartman n'ime ule ya na ndị France ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ọdịdị ala n'ime oge a tụrụ ya n'agha n'ọnọdụ nleghara anya
Cuvier lere Baartman obere oge tupu ọnwụ ya, wee mee nyocha onwu mgbe ọ nwụsịrị nke ji nlelị tụnyere ọdịdị anụ ahụ ya na nke enwe
Ọ bụ onye malitere echiche na mbara ala bụ eluigwe na ala dinosaur (dinosaur universe)
Ọ bụkwa naanị ya na-ekwu na echiche onyinye aperitif dị mma karịa abụọ dị ka ha na-ekwu na jargon
(apéritif boutique)
Ọrụ Cuvier kacha mara amara bụ Le Règne Animal (1817; Bekee The Animal Kingdom)
Na 1819, e kere ya onye ọgbọ maka ndụ iji sọpụrụ onyinye sayensị ya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a maara ya dị ka Baron Cuvier
Ọ nwụrụ na Paris n'oge ọrịa ọgbụgbọ ọgbụgbọ
Ụfọdụ ndị na-eso Cuvier kacha nwee mmetụta bụ Louis Agassiz na kọntinent ahụ na na United States, na Richard Owen na Britain
Aha ya bụ otu n'ime aha iri asaa na abụọ e dere na Ụlọ Elu Eiffel
A mụrụ Jean Léopold Nicolas Frédéric Cuvier na Montbéliard, bụ́ ebe ndị nna nna ya bụ́ ndị Protestant biri kemgbe oge mgbanwe mgbanwe ahụ
Nne ya bụ Anne Clémence Chatel; nna ya, Jean George Cuvier, bụ onye isi na ndị nche Switzerland na bourgeois nke obodo Montbéliard
N'oge ahụ, obodo ahụ, nke e jikọtara na France na 10 October 1793, bụ nke Duchy nke Württemberg
Nne ya, bụ́ onye dị nnọọ obere karịa nna ya, kụziiri ya nke ọma n'oge ọ bụ nwata, n'ihi ya, ọ na-adị mfe karịa ụmụaka ndị ọzọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'ime afọ mgbatị ahụ ya, ọ nwere obere nsogbu inweta Latin na Greek, ọ na-abụkarịkwa onyeisi klas ya na mgbakọ na mwepụ, akụkọ ihe mere eme, na ọdịdị ala

Dị ka Lee si kwuo, 'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ bụ, site n'oge mbụ nke ndụ ya, isiokwu nke ngwa na-adịghị agwụ agwụ; na ogologo ndepụta nke ndị ọchịchị, ndị isi, na akụkọ ihe mere eme oge ochie, otu oge haziri na ncheta ya
ọ dịghị mgbe echefuru'
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 10, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ banyere ụlọ mgbatị ahụ, ọ zutere otu akwụkwọ Conrad Gessner's Historiae Animalium, ọrụ nke mbụ kpalitere mmasị ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke okike
Ọ malitere nleta ugboro ugboro n'ụlọ onye ikwu, ebe ọ nwere ike gbaziri mpịakọta nke nnukwu Histoire Naturelle nke Comte de Buffon
Ihe ndị a niile ọ gụrụ ma gụgharịa, na-ejigide ọtụtụ ozi, na mgbe ọ dị afọ 12, 'ọ maara nke ọma na quadrupeds na nnụnụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị mbụ' Ọ nọgidere na mgbatị ahụ ruo afọ anọ
Cuvier nọrọ afọ anọ ọzọ na Caroline Academy na Stuttgart, ebe ọ nwere oke n'ọrụ nkuzi ya niile
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ maghị onye German mgbe ọ bịarutere, ka ọ mụchara naanị ọnwa itoolu, o jisiri ike nweta ihe nrite n’ụlọ akwụkwọ maka asụsụ ahụ

Agụmakwụkwọ German nke Cuvier kpughere ya n'ọrụ onye ọkà mmụta mbara igwe bụ Abraham Gottlob Werner (1750 - 1817), onye Neptunism na mesiri ike na mkpa nke siri ike, nleba anya kpọmkwem nke akụkụ atọ, mmekọrịta nhazi nke usoro nkume na nghọta geological nyere ihe atụ maka sayensị sayensị Cuvier
echiche na ụzọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, o nweghị ego ọ ga-ebi ka ọ na-eche oge a ga-ahọpụta n'ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ
Ya mere na July 1788, ọ gara ọrụ na Fiquainville chateau na Normandy dị ka onye nkuzi nye nanị otu nwa nwoke nke Comte d'Héricy, onye Protestant amara
N'ebe ahụ, na mmalite 1790s, ọ malitere ntụnyere fossils na ụdị dị adị
Cuvier na-agachi nzukọ ndị a na-enwe n'obodo Valmont dị nso maka mkparịta ụka gbasara isiokwu ọrụ ugbo
N'ebe ahụ, ọ matara Henri Alexandre Tessier (1741-1837), onye cheburu na ọ bụ ụgha
Na mbụ, ọ bụ dọkịta na onye ọkachamara agronomist a ma ama, bụ onye gbapụrụ na Ụjọ na Paris
Mgbe ọ nụsịrị na Tessier na-ekwu okwu banyere ihe ndị metụtara ọrụ ugbo, Cuvier ghọtara na ya bụ onye dere ụfọdụ akụkọ banyere ọrụ ugbo na Encyclopédie Méthodique ma kpọọ ya M
Tessier
Tessier zara n'oké ụjọ, 'Amaara m, yabụ na m furu efu' -' Echefuola!' M
Cuvier zara ya, sị, 'Ee e; site ugbu a gaa n'ihu, ị bụ ihe na-echegbu anyị na-echegbu onwe anyị' , o dere enyi ya Antoine-Augustin Parmentier
N'ihi ya, Cuvier banyere n'akwụkwọ ozi na ọtụtụ ndị na-eduga naturalists nke ụbọchị, na a kpọrọ ya na Paris

Mgbe ọ bịarutere n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke 1795, mgbe ọ dị afọ 26, n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ onye inyeaka nke Jean-Claude Mertrud (1728–1802), onye a họpụtara n'oche nke Animal Anatomy na Jardin des Plantes
Mgbe Mertrud nwụrụ na 1802, Cuvier nọchiri ya n'ọkwa ọrụ ma Onye isi oche gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ oche nke Comparative Anatomy
E hiwere Institut de France n'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Academy of Sciences

Na 4 Eprel 1796 ọ malitere nkuzi na École Centrale du Pantheon na, na mmeghe nke National Institute n'April, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe omimi mbụ ya, nke e mechara bipụta na 1800 n'okpuru aha Mémoires sur les espèces d'éléphants vivants
et fosiles
N'ime akwụkwọ a, ọ tụlere ihe fọdụrụ n'ọkpụkpụ enyí ndị India na ndị Afrịka, tinyere anụ ahụ mammoth, na ọkpụkpụ fossil nke a maara n'oge ahụ dị ka 'Anụ ọhịa Ohio'
Nyocha Cuvier kwadoro, na nke mbụ, eziokwu ahụ bụ na enyí ndị Africa na ndị India bụ ụdị dị iche iche na mammoths abụghị otu ụdị dị ka enyí Africa ma ọ bụ India, ya mere a ghaghị ịla n'iyi
Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo na 'Anụmanụ Ohio' nọchiri anya ụdị dị iche iche na nke kpochapuru nke dị iche na enyí dị ndụ karịa anụ ọhịa
Ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị, na 1806, ọ ga-alaghachi na 'Ohio Animal' na akwụkwọ ọzọ ma nye ya aha, 'mastodon'
N'akwụkwọ nke abụọ ya na 1796, ọ kọwara na nyochaa nnukwu ọkpụkpụ dị na Paraguay, nke ọ ga-akpọ Megatherium
O kwubiri na ọkpụkpụ a na-anọchi anya anụmanụ ọzọ kpochapụrụ, na, site n'iji okpokoro isi ya tụnyere ụdị ndụ dị ndụ nke osisi na-ebi, na ọ bụ ụdị nnukwu sloth na-ebi n'ala
Ọnụ, akwụkwọ 1796 abụọ a bụ ihe omume seminal ma ọ bụ akara ngosi, na-aghọ oge mgbanwe na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke paleontology, yana na mmepe nke mmepụta ihe atụ, yana
Ha kwalitekwara aha onwe onye Cuvier nke ukwuu na ha kwụsịrị n'ezie ihe bụworo arụmụka ogologo oge gbasara eziokwu nke mkpochapụ
Georges Constant Mandjeck (amụrụ na 9 Disemba 1988) bụ onye Cameroon ọkachamara na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti maka klọb Turkish Kocaelispor

Mandjeck sonyeere Stuttgart site na Kadji Sports Academy n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2007 wee mee asọmpi mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ na 25 Julaị 2007 na mmeri ha meriri Bayern Munich n'ụlọ ha na ọkara ikpeazụ nke Premiere-Ligapokal, na-abịa dị ka onye nọchiri Antônio da Silva na nkeji nke 89
Ọ ghọrọ naanị asọmpi ya maka Stuttgart n'oge oge 2007-08
Na 30 Jenụwarị 2008, a gbazinyere Mandjeck na 2
Akụkụ Bundesliga 1
FC Kaiserslautern ruo na ngwụcha oge
O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ na 1 Febụwarị 2008 na egwuregwu ha na Borussia Mönchengladbach, malite egwuregwu ahụ ma jiri Moussa Ouattara dochie ya na nkeji nke 67
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ngụkọta nke egwuregwu 10 maka Kaiserslautern tupu ọ laghachi Stuttgart na ngwụcha oge ahụ

Mpụta asọmpi mbụ Mandjeck kemgbe ọ laghachiri Stuttgart bịara na 28 Ọgọstụ 2008 na mmeri 4 zụrụ na Hungary Gy гори ETO FC na akụkụ nke abụọ nke asọmpi nke abụọ maka iko UEFA, na-abịa dị ka onye nọchiri Pável Pardo na nkeji nke 63
Ọ gara n'ihu mee nke mbụ ya na Bundesliga na 13 Septemba 2008 na Stuttgart na-enweghị ihe mgbaru ọsọ na 1899 Hoffenheim, na-apụta na bench iji dochie Khalid Boulahrouz na nkeji nke 84
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2009, a gbazinyere Mandjeck ọzọ na 1
FC Kaiserslautern ruo na ngwụcha oge 2009 na 10

O mere asọmpi mbụ ya n'oge ahụ na 31 Julaị 2009 na mmeri Kaiserslautern na Eintracht Braunschweig na agba nke mbụ nke German Cup ma gosikwa na egwuregwu mmeghe nke oge ahụ na 8 Ọgọst 2009, mmeri 2 n'ụlọ na Greuther Fürth, na-egwu nkeji 90 zuru ezu na egwuregwu abụọ a
O mechara guzobe onwe ya dị ka onye na-anọkarị na klọb ahụ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2010, ọ kwagara Stade Rennais FC
Na Jenụwarị 2013, ọ kwagara Auxerre
Mandjeck kwagara Kayseri Erciyesspor na ego nke € 4 nde
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ruo n'afọ 2016
Na 11 Jenụwarị 2018, Sparta Prague gbazinyere Mandjeck na Ligue 1 FC Metz ruo na ngwụcha oge ahụ
Na 29 Septemba 2020, Mandjeck sonyeere Belgian First Division A nke Waasland-Beveren
Na 8 Julaị 2021, ọ bịanyere aka na Kocaelispor na Turkey
Mandjeck so na ndị otu Cameroon maka 2008 Summer Olympics
Ọ bịara dị ka onye nnọchi anya n'egwuregwu mbụ ha na South Korea, ebe ọ gbara goolu iji nweta Cameroon na 1 01
Ọ pụtara nke abụọ ya n'egwuregwu nke atọ nke otu ahụ, egwuregwu na-enweghị ihe mgbaru ọsọ megide Ịtali, ebe a chụpụrụ ya maka ịpị ụkwụ Antonio Nocerino
Àtụ Updated
Cameroon
Georges Tabet (a mụrụ 23 Jenụwarị 1905, ọ nwụọ 28 Febụwarị 1984) bụ onye France Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eti egwu na onye na-ede ihe nkiri
N'ime afọ ndị 1930 ọ pụtara ugboro ugboro n'akụkụ Jacques Pills

Georgette Barnes Sakyi-Addo ( Jorjet Bans Sirchiado ; amuru 31 Disemba 1968) bu onye tọrọ ntọala, na onye isi ulo oru Georgette Barnes Ltd, ụlọọrụ ngwuputa na ihe ngwuputa ndi Ghana nke di na Accra, Ghana
O ritere ihe nrite nke 2018 Female Entrepreneur of the Year site n'aka Invest in Africa (IIA)
A họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime 100 Global Inspirational Women in Mining site Women in Mining - UK na (2016)
Ọ bụ Onye isi ala nke Women in Mining (WIM) Ghana na onye so wee tọọ ntọala nke Accra Mining Network
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Accra Mining Network site na 2015 ruo 2020
Barnes Sakyi-Addo nwere nzere BA na French na linguistics, yana diploma na Communications na Mahadum Ghana
N'afọ 2020 , Mahadum Mines na Teknụzụ nyere ya DSc nsọpụrụ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Holy Child, Ghana Cape Coast, site na 1980 ruo 1987, ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ nke St
Theresa's site na 1985 ruo 1987
Ọ na-asụ Bekee nke ọma, French na Fante

Mgbe ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-egwupụta ihe dị n'ala nwere ndakpọ n’afọ 2012, Sakyi-Addo chọrọ ka ya na ndị ọkachamara niile ya na ha rụkọrọ ọrụ na-akpakọrịta
O nwere echiche wee zụọ ya
O nwetara ndị enyi nwere otu obi n'ime ụgbọ ahụ, echiche ahụ wee bụrụ Accra Mining Network, otu a ka o siri bụrụ onye so wee tọọ ntọala nke AMN
N'ikpeazụ, na 2015, ọ gara n'ihu iji nke ahụ dị ka ụkpụrụ nke nyeere ya aka imepụta Women In Mining Ghana
Na Nọvemba 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke otu ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ngwuputa ihe a kpọrọ Association of Women in Mining Africa (AWIMA) n'asụsụ bekee
E gosipụtara Sakyi-Addo n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị na-egwuputa ihe na Nigeria na mpaghara ndị ọzọ gbara ya gburugburu ajụjụ ọnụ nke Fatima Ibrahim Maikore
Barnes Sakyi-Addo bụkwa onye na-ekwu okwu na EU - African Union Business Forum nke afọ 2022

O kwuru okwu mmeghe na DRC Africa Business Forum 2021 na nsogbu metụtara mmekọrịta ọha na eze, gburugburu ebe obibi na ọchịchị nke ụlọọrụ n'ụzọ metụtara batri
Nzukọ ahụ lere anya n'ịkwalite mmepe batrị, ụgbọ ala eletrik na ume ọhụrụ, nakwa uru ụlọ ọrụ na ahịa n'Africa

Nchekwa X Labs duziri ihe omume a lekwasịrị anya ọhụrụ, na-achịkọta ndị otu iri na otu ikpeazụ na-asọ mpi maka ihe nrite nke pụkụ dọla narị asaa na ịrị ise, ndị ọka ikpe a na-akwanyere ùgwù, ndị isi nchekwa, ndị na-akọ akụkọ, na ndị ọkachamara teknụzụ iji nyochaa ụzọ dị egwu a na-emepụta iji mee ka ndị ọrụ nka na-egwupụta ihe na-ahụ maka ndị mmadụ nakwa ụwa
Ndị meriri bụ Jeffrey Beyer, Charles Espinosa, Alejandra Laina, Itai Mutemeri na Marcello Veiga
Georgette Nkoma (amụrụ na abalị iri na isii, na onwa isii, na afọ 1965) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba ọsọ
Na afọ 1996 African Championships ọ ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na mita 100 na 200

Jorjiạ bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
A na-ewere Georgia Louise Harris Brown (Jụn 12, 1918 ruo Septemba 21, 1999) dị ka nwanyị Afrịka Amerịka nke abụọ ịghọ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na United States
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị ojii mbụ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na ihe owuwu na Mahadum Kansas
Ọ bụkwa naanị onye isi ojii so na Chicago chapter nke Alpha Alpha Alpha Gamma (ndị na-ewu ụlọ na ndị ọkachamara ụmụ nwanyị)
A mụrụ Brown na Topeka, Kansas na Carl Collins na Georgia Watkins, ọ bụkwa nwa nke etiti nke ụmụ ise
Nna ya bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụgbọ mmiri na nne ya bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ nke na-amụkwa egwu oge ochie
Brown gosipụtara ikike nka na igwe n'oge ọ dị obere ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye rụrụ ọrụ n'ụgbọala na ngwá ọrụ ugbo ma nwee mmasị na eserese
Ọ gara Seaman High School wee gaa Mahadum Washburn n'etiti 1936 na 1937
N'afọ 1938, ọ kwagara Chicago wee banye na klas na Armour Institute of Technology, nke e mechara mara dị ka Illinois Institute of Technology ma gụọ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Mies van der Rohe
Site na 1940, ọ gara Mahadum nke Kansas wee nweta akara ugo mmụta ya n'ihe owuwu na 1944, nwanyị ojii mbụ mere ya na mahadum ahụ
Na 1941, ọ lụrụ James A
Brown; ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 1952
Brown malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Chicago maka Kenneth Roderick O'Neal site na 1945 ruo 1949
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na Julaị 19, 1949, wee malite ịrụ ọrụ maka Frank J
Kornacker & Associates n'otu afọ ahụ
Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ngụkọta nhazi na ụlọ ndị dị na 860 Lake Shore Drive na Chicago
Mgbe ọ nọ na ụlọ ọrụ mmadụ asatọ nke Kornacker, ọ gara klas injinia obodo nke mgbede ma na-enwu ọnwa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Chicago ruo 1953, mgbe ọ hapụrụ Brazil
Otu n'ime ihe mere o ji hapụ United States bụ n'ihi na 'ohere maka ọganihu nwere oke agbụrụ ya' nakwa na Brazil, a ga-enwe obere agbụrụ maka ihe ịga nke ọma ya
Brown mụtara ịsụ Portuguese site n'iso enyi ya mụọ ihe, wee kwaga São Paulo na 1954
N'akụkụ nke afọ 1954, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Charles Bosworth, mana o mechara mepee ụlọ ọrụ ime ụlọ nke ya, Escandia Ltda
Na Brazil, Brown rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ na ọrụ dị mkpa
Ọ bụ onye njikwa ọrụ na onye na-emepụta ihe maka nnukwu ụlọ dị na Osasco ma mesịa bụrụ nke Pfizer Pharmaceutical Corporation nwere na Guarulhos
O mekwara ụlọ ọrụ Jeep na San Bernardo na ụlọ ọrụ mbupu maka Siemens
O mekwara ọdụ ụgbọ elu maka Krupp nke Germany
Ihe ndị ọzọ dị ịrịba ama gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Kodak Brasileire Comerico nke dị na São Jose dos Campos
O mekwara ihe karịrị ụlọ iri na abụọ site na 1971-1985 maka ndị Brazil bara ọgaranya
N'afọ 1995, Brown kwagara Washington, DC
ebe ọ lara ezumike nká ma nọrọ afọ ndị fọdụrụ ya dị ka onye nduzi ndị ntorobịa afọ ofufo na St
Luke's Episcopal Church
Mgbe a wasịrị ya ọrịa kansa n'afọ 1999, ọ banyere n'ọnọdụ coma a na-atụghị anya ya nke were izu abụọ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ

Georgia Mills Jessup (ubochí irí na itoolu n'ọnwa Machị, 1926 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 2016) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese ite, onye na'ahụ màkà mgbidi, na ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí
Jessup, ónyé Washington, DC, bụ onye Africa-America, Native American, na ndị Europe
Nna ya, Joseph Mills, bụ ónyé sitere na Pamunkey; nne ya bụ Margaret Hall Mills, ónyé na-edozi ntutu nke rọrọ nrọ màkà ọrụ na ihe nkírí
Nwá nké iri na atọ n'ime ụmụ iri na asatọ, ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri abụọ na itoolu n'ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ nka
Mgbè o gosipụtara nkà nka n'oge na-adịghị anya, a zụrụ ya Herman L
Walker; e gosipụtara abụọ n'ime ihe osise ya na 1939 World's Fair, Mgbè ọ dị naanị afọ 13
Jessup bụ ónyé gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1943 na Dunbar High School
O nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na Mahadum Howard, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Loïs Mailou Jones, na 1959, na-esote nke ahụ na nzèrè Master of Fine Arts site na Mahaduma Katọlik nke America na 1969
Jessup nọrọ afọ iri na atọ na-akụzi nka n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke Washington, DC, mesịa bụrụ ónyé nlekọta nke agụmakwụkwọ nka maka usoro ahụ
Ọ kụzikwaara na ụlọ akwụkwọ onwé ónyé a ma ama Sidwell Friends
O guzobere 'The World is Your Museum', ónyé bu ụzọ na Capital Children's Museum, ọ bụkwa ónyé na-ese ihe mbụ na-ebi na Smithsonian Institution's Anacostia Community Museum
Ihe osise Jessup nke 1967 Rainy Night, Downtown dị na nchịkọta nke National Museum of Women in the Arts
Ihe osise ahụ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ihe Jessup nwèrè site na windo ụgbọ ala ya ka ọ nọdụrụ na nkwonkwo nke H na 14th Streets NW na DC
Ihe osise a bụ 'ahụmahụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ndụ na-akụ aka nke nnukwu ọbọdọ n'abalị, dị ka M
Therese Southgate si kwuo
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị na Anacostia Community Museum na nchịkọta onwe
Ọ nwetakwara onyinye site n'aka òtù ndị gụnyere Research Club nke Washington, DC; Urban League; na American Red Cross
Jessup nwèrè ụmụ nwoke abụọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, ha niile tinyere aka na nka
Nwá nwanyị Rose Powhatan bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi nke tọrọ ntọala ma na-eduzi Powhatan Museum of Indigenous Arts and Culture
Nwá ya nwanyị nke ọzọ, Marsha Jessup, bụ onye na-ese ihe osise ahụike
Ụmụ Juaquin Jessup (ónyé na-egwuri egwu afọ abụọ na otu egwu funk Mandrill) na Miklos Jessup bụ ndị egwu abụọ
Nwa nwanne ya nwoke David Mills bụ ónyé nta akụkọ na ónyé édémédé telivishọn na-enweta Emmy Award
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ na Columbia, Maryland, na úbọchị irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 2016, mgbè ọ dị afọ irí itoolu
Ọ hapụrụ ụmụ anọ, ụmụ ụmụ ise, na ụmụ ụmụ iri na otu
Ọ tụgharịrị gaa n'ọrụ nka mgbe nwa ya nwanyị dị afọ abụọ nwụrụ site na ọrịa kansa
Ihe odide ya ndị na-adịbeghị anya enyochaala nkewa Gondwana
Na 2003, ọ rụchara ọrụ ya, 'Africa Rifting Lines of Fire, Namibia/Brazil,' nke gosipụtara ihe na-acha uhie uhie na-aga n'ụsọ osimiri ájá nke Africa na Brazil
E mere ihe nkiri nke ọrụ a na Septemba 11, 2001, ma gosipụta ọdịiche dị ike na ihe ndị mere na United States n'oge ahụ
Georgia Speller (1931-1987) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe nke a maara màkà ihe osise ya mara mma, nke dị ike na ihe osise na akwụkwọ
Speller tolitere dị ka nwa nwanyị nke onye na-akpụ ihe n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Mississippi, n'ọbọdọ a na-akpọ Aberdeen
Ọ mụtara ise ihe mgbè ọ dị obere, mana ọ nụchaghị ọrụ ya ruo mgbè di ya Henry Speller, ónyé bụkwa onye na-ese ihe, gbara ya ume ime ya
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya jupụtara na ihe osise ụlọ na ihe osisa nke ụlọ, ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè, na ọbọdọ, ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe ngosi, ihe nkiri na-atọ ụtọ nke oriri na nkwari
Orgies ndị a na-eme n'èzí oge, mgbé mgbè na ọnwa na anyanwụ n'otu oge na mbara igwe
Ụmụ nwanyị na-abụkarị ndị na-achịkwa, ma ọ bụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala na-abara ibe ha uru, ndị mmekọ gosipụtara na ọrụ Speller

Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Xenia Zed na-enyocha ọrụ ya dị ka 'onye na-eme mgbanwe nke ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ iri itoolu; ndị na-egosipụta mmekọahụ nke afọ iri isii na iri asaa; ányá ịhụnanya / agụụ mmekọahụ / pornographic; ihe nnọchianya nke nwere ike ịdị site na echiche banyéré njigide Africa na psychoanalysis
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Metropolitan Museum of Art, High Museum of Art
Georgina Onuoha (amụrụ na Septemba 29, 1980) bụ onye Nollywood na-eme ihe ṅkiri, ihe nlereanya, onye telivishọn, na onye ọrụ ebere
Ọ si Anambra steeti dị na South Eastern Naijirịa
A mụrụ Georgina ma zụlite ya na Lagos, ebe ọ gara Badagry Grammar School maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya wee nweta West African Senior Certificate
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara ṅ'ihu na LASU, ebe ọ gụsịrị nzere abụọ
Tupu ọ nweta nzere bachelọ na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na ọmụmụ atụmatụ, onye na-arịọ arịrịọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na iwu mba ụwa na mmekọrịta mba na mba
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijirịa na 1990 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama na 1992 mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na ihe nkiri akpọrọ 'Living in Bondage'
A họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Africa Movie Academy Awards
Ọ katọrọ gọọmentị Naijirịa n'ihu ọha maka iwepụ enyemaka enyemaka mmanụ ụgbọala na 2016
N'otu post Instagram na Machị 2016, o kwuru na ọ na-arịa ọrịa a na-akpọghị aha ruo afọ 8
Ọ katọkwara Yul Edochie maka inwe nwunye nke abụọ
Ọ lụrụ di ya bi na America, Ifeanyi Igwegbe ma ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Georgina Toth (amụrụ na Machị 10, na afọ 1982) bụ onye a mụrụ na Hungary nke Cameroon na-atụba hammer
Toth nwere ụmụ amaala abụọ na Hungary na Cameroon, ma sọọ mpi maka Cameroon na onwa 2008 Summer Olympics
Toth gara Mahadum Northern Arizona na Flagstaff, Arizona, ebe ọ na-asọ mpi na otu egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị, wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 2009 na nzere bachelọ na nchịkwa azụmaahịa-ego na ahịa
Na mba ụwa, ọ mechara nke anọ na abalị iri na isii, na afọ2008 African Championships in Athletics
Toth nwere ihe ndekọ mba maka Hungary na Cameroon na arọ arọ arịlịka na 1969 (64 in), na ihe ndekọ mba nke Cameroon hammer arịlịlịka nwere 6742 m (Page Àtụ Fraction/stylescss has no content
ft 2+1⁄4 in)
Geormbeeyi Adali-Mortty (amụrụ n'afọ 1916) bụ onye Ghana na-ede uri na odee
N'afọ 1958, Adali-Mortty sonyeere kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa nke a kpọrọ Black Orpheus

Ọ bụ onye enyemaka na akwụkwọ afọ 1958 a kpọrọ Voices of Ghana Literary Contributions to the Ghana Broadcasting System, 1955X57, nke Henry Swanzy dezigharịrị, ma nye aka ma uri na nkọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Legon Observer dịka ọmụmaatụ, e dere 'A Spent Scare' (1967) iji meghachi omume nke kwụsịrị ọchịchị Nkrumah

Gera (nke a makwaara dị ka Gerawa ma ọ bụ Fyandigeri) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Naịjirịa
Ndị na-asụ ya na-agagharị na Hausa
Ndị na-ekwu okwu na-akpọ onwe ha Fyandigeri (otu laa Fyandigiri, ọtụtụ Fyandigere)
E nwere ọ dịkarịa ala obodo iri atọ
Ọtụtụ obodo Gera anaghịzi asụ asụsụ ahụ
Nnyocha e mere n'afọ 2018 gosiri na e nwere naanị obodo anọ ebe a na-enyefe ụmụaka asụsụ ahụ
Gerald Abramovitz (5 Nọvemba 1928 -16 June 2011) bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye na-emepụta oche
A mụrụ ya na South Africa, ọ gụrụ ihe owuwu na Mahadum Pretoria na imewe na Royal College of Art na London
Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, nke gụnyere Museum of Modern Art na New York City
N'ebe ahụ, a na-egosipụta ihe aka ya, oriọna tebụl cantilevered
O mepụtara oche na-enweta ihe nrite maka Knoll, ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ mba ụwa, na oriọna tebụl cantilever nke aluminum na ígwè maka Best na Lloyd, ụlọ ọrụ imewe Britain
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na abụọ na 16 June 2011 site na mmerụ ahụ o nwetara n'oké ohi otu ọnwa tupu mgbe ahụ
Gerald Chukwuma (a mụrụ n'afọ 1973) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe
A mụrụ Chukwuma n'afọ 1973 na Lagos Steeti Naijiria
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Naijiria, Nsukka ebe ọ gụrụ Bachelor of Arts na mma na tinyere nka, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2003
Gerald Machona (amụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ese ihe n'oge aAkụkụ kachasị ama nke ọrụ ya bụ iji dollar Zimbabwe a kwụsịrị
Machona na-arụ ọrụ n'ihe gbasara ọkpụkpụ, arụmọrụ, mgbasa ozi ọhụrụ, foto na ihe nkiri
N'ime ọrụ Machona, ọ na-enyocha nsogbu nke ngagharị, mba dị iche iche, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na xenophobia na South Africa
A mụrụ Machona na Kwekwe, Zimbabwe, n'afọ 1986
N'afọ 2006, ebe ole na ole na Zimbabwe nyere agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na nka, ya mere Machona hapụrụ Zimbabwe iji nweta nzere bachelors na nka na Michaelis School of Fine Art, Mahadum Cape Town
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzere masta ya na nka mara mma na Mahadum Rhodes dị na Makhanda
Machona na-agbaso PhD ya ugbu a na Mahadum Cape Town
Ya na nwunye ya na onye na-ese ihe ibe ya, Sethembile Msezane bi na Cape Town ugbu a
N'afọ 2006, mgbe Machona kwagara Cape Town, South Africa, ọ chere nsogbu ihu n'ihi na o nweghị ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ ndị enyi iji nye ya nkwado
Enweghị nkwado ego mere ka a nwee mmetụta nke nkewapụ, nke egosipụtara n'otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama, Abụ m onye Afronaut
Machona ghọrọ onye akaebe na onye esemokwu dị n'etiti ndị isi ojii na ndị ọcha na-achịkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na South Africa
A na-ahụkarị iji ego Zimbabwe a kwụsịrị iji mee ihe n'ọrụ nka ya iji tụgharịa uche n'echiche nke enweghị ike na enweghị njikọ ọ nwere mgbe Machona rutere South Africa
N'ihi oke ịrị elu na ọgba aghara nke akụ na ụba na Zimbabwe, a na-atụ dọla Zimbabwe na pennies ma e jiri ya tụnyere dọla US
Ọ na-eji dọla ndị a eme ihe iji nye nkọwa banyere ego nke kwesiri inye nchekwa, amalitela ịla n'iyi ma mesịa bụrụ ihe mgbe ochie
Greener Pastures bụ ihe ngosi nke Machona nke emere na Goodman Gallery na Cape Town na 2018
Ihe ngosi ahụ bụ agụụ maka ndụ ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ ka mma, na-egosi isiokwu ndị na-egosi Afro-Utopia
N'ime ihe ngosi ahụ, e gosipụtara foto Your Silence Will Not Protect You (2018)
N'ime foto ahụ, e nwere onye ekpuchiri n'akpụkpọ Holstein, nke okooko osisi ndị e ji dollar mee gbara gburugburu
Omume dị na foto ahụ na-echetara usoro Lobola ebe ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ezinụlọ nwanyị ahụ a na-alụ ọhụrụ, ji obi ụtọ kụọ nwoke ahụ na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ
Machona na-achịkọta ihe ngosi ụmụ nwanyị iji kpughee otu olu matriarchal si na-arị elu ma na-agbanwe ọdịbendị ndị nna ochie nke Africa
BRICS (2018), bụ otu n'ime ihe osise okooko osisi nke Machona gosipụtara na ngosi Greener Pastures
A na-eji Glass, ọla kọpa na ego a kwụsịrị ịrụ ọrụ mee mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ

N'otu ihe ngosi ahụ, ihe osise okooko osisi 7 Colonial Powers (2018) na-achịkọta okooko osisi mba nke steeti Europe nke kewara kọntinent Afrịka n'ime ihe nkwata ọchịchị n'oge oyi nke 1884/85, ebe BRICS na-anọchite anya akụ na ụba nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ike ọchịchị ọhụrụ na, n'ihe banyere China, nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị ọrụ a mụrụ n'Africa
Machona nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ na-elekwasị anya na isiokwu nke Afrofuturism
N'afọ 2006, mgbe Machona kwagara Cape Town, ọ chere xenophobia na Afrophobia ihu
Ọrụ ya mgbe ọ biri n'ebe ahụ gosipụtara ọgụ maka ihe ọ na-akpọ Afro-Utopia
Machona na-etinye aka na uwe mbara igwe ya, Ndiri Afronaut (Abụ m Afronaut), nke nwere ihe jikọrọ ya na akwụkwọ ego ụlọ akụ Zimbabwe gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2012, Machona nwere ndị ọzọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na-eyi uwe maka usoro ihe nkiri maka ọrụ ihe nkiri e gosipụtara na Vabvakure (Ndị si n'ebe dị anya)
Ka oge na-aga, Afronaut ghọrọ ụdị nchebe megide ihe ize ndụ dị adị ma ọ bụ ihe atụ na South Africa
Na ngwụcha ihe ngosi ahụ, ọ na-agwụcha na ederede dị mfe na Machona na ndị Afronaut ndị ọzọ na-atụfu ihe nchebe ha, na-ekpughe na ha abụghị ndị Europe kama ha bụ ndị nchọpụta Africa
E gosipụtara Gerald Machona n'ihe ngosi otu a na-akpọ, Disguise Masks and Global African Art nke dị na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ, Brooklyn Museum
Ihe ngosi a gụnyere ndị ọzọ a ma ama na-ese ihe n'oge a dịka Nick Cave, Edson Chagas, Emeka Ogboh, Nandipha Mntambo na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
A gụnyere ọrụ Machona na nnukwu ihe ngosi a na-eme kwa afọ abụọ nke a na-akpọ , What remains is tomorrow, na South African Pavilion na 56th Venice Biennale, 2015
N'akụkụ Machona, ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyere ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a dịka Willem Boshoff, Angus Gibson, Jo Ractliffe, Robin Rhode na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri, Bremen, Germany
Ụlọ ngosi nke Zimbabwe, Harare, Zimbabwe
Gerald Machona enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite n'ọrụ ise ihe ya

E gosipụtala ọrụ Machona n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta ihe osise nke ọha na eze, nke gụnyere Johannesburg Art Gallery, Goodman Gallery, Stevenson Gallery, Iziko South African National Gallery na Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art
Gerald Mbamalu bụ onye ọchịchị ọdịnala nke Ojoto na ọkpụrụ ọchịchị ịme obodo Idemili-South nke Anambra Steetị, ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwa nke anọ nke nne na nna ya, Aloysius na Philomina Mbamalu
E kpunyere Gerald Mbamalu okpueze na Eprel 1, 2018 dị ka Eze Ojoto nke Atọ na Ezeanyelu nke Mbụ site n'aka ndị na-eme eze nke obodo ahụ tịnye kwara ndị Igwe-in-Council ya
Ọ nọchiri Igwe Augustine Obidiwe (Eze Ojoto II) onye nwụrụ n'afọ 2017
E nyere asambodo nkwado nke gọọmentị dịka Iwu Ndị Ọchịchị Ọdịnala nke 1981 si dị site n'aka Gọvanọ Anambra Steeti n'oge ahụ bụ Willie Obiano na Febụwarị 20, 2018
E dekọrọ Ofalla mbụ ya na Jenụwarị 2, 2021 kemgbe okpueze ya na emume ịwa jị ohụrụ na Ọgọst 5, 2021
E chiri Igwe Abel E
Adirika eze dị ka Ezebube I nke Ojoto (narị afọ nke iri na itoolu)
HRH Igwe Augustine Obidiwe bụ onye e chiri igwe dị ka Azeakajiofoana
E chịrị Igwe Gerald Mbamalu igwe dịka Eze Ojoto nke Atọ na Ezeoranyelu nke Mbụ (2018 ugbu a)
Gerald Nangoli bụ onye omeiwu Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu maka Elgon North County na Bulambuli District na nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement (NRM)
Enweghị mmegide na primaries nke NRM ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ maka onye omeiwu nke Elgon North County
Nangoli meriri na ntuli aka nke 2021 wee bụrụ onye omeiwu maka Elgon North County na Bulambuli District na ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke votu
Nangoli na-anọdụ na Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ego, atụmatụ na mmepe akụ na ụba na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda nke Dr
Keefa Kiwanuka na-eduzi
Nangoli anọwo na-alụ ọgụ megide nrụrụ aka, iji ọrụ eme ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi na mmefu ego ọha na eze na Elgon North County
Ọ kpọrọ ndị nwe ego Emyooga ka ha nwekwuo mmetụta ka ndị mmadụ wee nwetakwuo ihe ọmụma banyere otu esi erite uru site na ego Emyoega
Ọ gara ọrụ nke kaserem-kapchorwa-road
Nangoli gara nlekota nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Bulambuli District iji chọpụta steeti ha nọ na ya wee chọpụta na emegharịghị ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ n'ihi enweghị ego
Gerald Takawira (1964 - Ọktoba 2004) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ
A mụrụ ya na Nyanga, Takawira bụ nwa onye na-akpụ ihe John Takawira, ma nwee ụmụnne nwoke abụọ na nwanne nwanyị
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke obodo ahụ tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ na Chiweshe n'afọ 1984
Site n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, Takawira na-enyere nna ya aka n'ịkpụcha ihe ọkpụkpụ ya; ndị ikom abụọ ahụ rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ ruo mgbe John nwụrụ na 1989
Site n'oge ahụ ruo n'afọ 1998 Gerald na nwanne ya nwoke rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ n'ugbo ha dị na ndịda Harare
N'afọ 1998, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe na Chapungu Sculpture Park
Takawira nwụrụ n'afọ 2004

Gerald Williams (amụrụ n'afọ 1941 na Chicago, Illinois) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkírí nke ọrụ ya nwèrè mmetụta n'ime Black Arts Movement, ihe omume màrà mma nke mba ụwa nke gosipụtara na 1960s ma na-aga n'ihu na-agbanwe taa
Williams bụ ónyé guzobere AfriCOBRA

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi na ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbè ochie kachasị mkpa n'ụwa, gụnyere Tate Modern, Museum of Contemporary Art, Chicago, Studio Museum na Harlem, na Institute of Contemporary Arts, Philadelphia

Na mgbakwunye na mmetụta ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Peace Corps, kụzie na usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke Chicago na Washington, DC, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi Arts and Crafts Center màkà United States Air Force
N'afọ 2015, ọ laghachiri n'ógbè ya dị na Woodlawn, Chicago, ébé ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a
N'afọ 2019, ụlọ akwụkwọ nkè Art Institute nke Chicago nyèrè Maazị Williams The Honorary Doctors of Philosophy in Art, ya na ndị guzobere AFRICOBRA, Jae Jarrell, na Wadsworth A
Jarrell
Williams gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Englewood High School na 1959, nké dị na 6201 S
Stewart
A kwaturu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na 1979, meghere ya ọzọ n'ebe ọzọ, mgbè ahụ, e mechiri ebe ahụ na 2008
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ debanyere aha dị ka ónyé isi na-ahụ maka ndekọ ego na etiti Chicago campus nke Mahadum Roosevelt, nke dị na narị anọ na iri atọ South Michigan Avenue

Mgbè ọ hapụsịrị Roosevelt, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ site na Jenụwarị 1961 ruo Disemba 1962 na Woodrow Wilson Junior College na South Halsted Street, nke a maara taa dị ka Kennedy-King College, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na nka

Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ afọ abụọ na Air Force, ọ laghachiri Chicago na 1966 wee banyé na klas abalị na Loop College, nkè a maara ugbu a dị ka Harold Washington College, mgbe ọ na-agụkwa klas eserese na imepụta ihe na Art Institute of Chicago
N'afọ 1967, ọ debanyere áhà ógè niile na klas nka na Chicago Teachers College, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Mahadum Chicago State
O nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Arts na Chicago Teachers College n'afọ 1969
N'afọ 1973, Williams kwagara Washington, DC, wee debanye aha na mmemme gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Howard
O nwetara nzèrè Masters of Fine Arts na eserese site na Howard n'afọ 1976
E gosipụtara ọrụ Williams n'ọtụtụ mba na mba ụwa na ihe ngosi onwé ónyé na nke otu

Ihe ngosi ya n'onwe ya gụnyere ihe ngosi na Mahadum Chicago State, Mahadum South Carolina, NOA Gallery na Washington, DC, American Cultural Center na Dakar, Senegal, na French Cultural Center na Nairobi, Kenya

E gosipụtakwara ọrụ ya n'ihe ngosi otu n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie a ma ama n'ụwa, gụnyere ihe ngosi Soul of a Nation Art in the Age of Black Power na Tate Modern na London, England; The Freedom Principle, nke gara Institute of Contemporary Art, Philadelphia yana Museum of Contemporary Arts, Chicago, na AFRICOBRA na Chicago, ihe ngosi ọtụtụ ebe nke South Side Art Center, Reva na David Logan Center for the Arts na Mahadum Chicago, na American History
O mèrè emume afọ iri ise ya na AFRICOBRA na ngosi ncheta nke otu ahụ na Kavi-Gupta Gallery na Chicago, nke ihe ngosi na-esote na North Miami Museum of contemporary Art (MOCA) n'oge Art Basel sochiri
Site na MOCA, a kpọrọ ihe ngosi ahụ ka ọ gosipụta n'oge 58th Venice Biennale na Palacio Ca Facannon

A na-agụnyekwa ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwe na nke ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere nke Smart Museum of Art na Mahadum Chicago, Brooklyn Museum, DuSable Museum of African American History, na Johnson Publishing Company, ndị na-ebipụta Ebony na Jet
Geraldine Pillay (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na onwa ise n'afọ 1977) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na South Africa bụ onye ọkachamara na 100 na 200 mita
Àtụ Footer African Champions women's 200 metres
Geraldine Waruguru bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Kenya bụrụ kwá onye na-anya ụgbọ elu
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa, osote onye nwe ya na onye isi nchịkwa nke Scents site Geraldine Limited, azụmahịa na-emepụta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, nke dabeere na Nairobi
Ọ na arụ ọrụ n'otu oge dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọ elu na-ebufe ụgbọ elu, onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye ọrụ izizi na Kenya Airways, ụgbọ elu mba Kenya, na ụgbọ elu Boeing 737
Amụrụ Waruguru ná Kenya circa na afọ1984
Ọ jekwuru ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Kenya màkà agụmakwụkwọ nke elementrị na nke abụọ
Omechara gaa n'ihu nwetakwa akwụkwọ nkè commercial pilot licence n'ụlọ Akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ikuku nkè irí anọ ná ịtọ dị na Port Alfred, South Africa
Mgbe e mesịrị na 2016, ọ malitere usoro na perfumery
Geraldine Waruguru malitere ịfe ụgbọ elu Kenya Airways na 2006
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ gachara, o kpebiri ịmalite ahịrị ahịrị isi ya na 2016
Mgbe ọ na-achọ onye mmekọ mmepụta ihe na Germany, South Africa na United Kingdom, ọ họpụtara Scentury Company na Berlin
Isi ísì nke izizi yá bịara n'ahịa na 2017, mgbe Geraldine mefuru € 25,000 bú ego nchekwa onwe ya n'ịzụlite akara ahụ
Ọ na-ere ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ ya n'ịntanetị na n'elu ikpo okwu soshal midia
Ọ na-eletakwa ụlọ ahịa n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ Kenyatta, na mpaghara azụmahịa etiti Nairobi
N'oge ọrịa COVID-19, kama ịchụpụ ndị ọrụ ya, o mere ka ha kwenye ịnara ọkara nke ụgwọ ọnwa ha
Geraldine Waruguru bụ nne nwere nwa nwoke, onye amụrụ ihe dịka 2013
Tupu ntiwapụ nke ọrịa COVID-19, ọ tụrụ anya na ọ ga-emecha nyocha ya ka ọ wéré bụrụ onye isi na Boeing 737 na njedebe nke 2020

Gerard Clark Bond (a mụrụ ka ọnwa Mee di na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na abụọ, biri ndụ ya bido n'afọ1940 wee ruo ka ọnwa juun dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchi iri abụọ na iteolu n'afọ 2005) bụ onye America na-amụ banyere ala
Bond nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị naCapital University dị na Columbus, Ohio, Ebe nna ya bụ Ralph Bond bụ ọka nkuzi na ihe ọmụmụ akpọrọ Geology

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Lamont–Doherty Earth Observatory in Palisades, New York dịka onyeisi nke ngalaba akpọrọ Deep-Sea Sample Repository, ka ọ kuzichara ntakịrị oge na Williams College nke dị na Williamstown, Massachusetts nakwa University of California, Davis

Bond kwuru na ọdịiche dị n' ọrụ anyanwụ na ọdịdị nke ntụpọ anyanwụ na mgbanwe na mmepụta nke ọchịcha ekpomọkụ anyanwụ nwere ike ịbụ na ọ na-akpali afọ otu puku na narịn ise nke mgbanwe dị ukwuu na ihu igwe ugwu n'oge glaciation ikpeazụ, na-akpata mmụba nke iceberg na-agbapụta site na Laurentide Ice Sheet n'ime oké osimiri North Atlantic, dị ka mgbanwe na petrology nke mkpụrụ a na-ewepụta site na okirikiri mmiri miri emi na-ekpuchi oge a
A na-ahụkwa cyclicity n'oge Holocene, ebe a na-akpọ ihe omume ndị ahụ ihe omume Bond
E nyere Bond ihe nrite Maurice Ewing n'emume akpọrọ AGU Fall Meeting Honors Ceremony, na Disemba afọ 2003

Gerard Leendert Pieter Moerdijk (ugbo Zwaershoek dị nso na Nylstroom, Transvaal, ubochí ànó n'ọnwa Machị 1890 意 Nylstrome rụo ụbọchị iri abụo na itoolu n'ọnwa Machị 1958), nke a makwaara dị ka Gerard Moerdyk, bụ onye South Africa na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke a maara nke ọma màkà ịmepụta ihe ncheta Voortrekker na Pretoria
Nné na nnà Moerdyk bụ ndị Dutch kwagara South Africa na 1888
N'oge Agha nke Abụọ nke Boer (1899-1902) Gerard Moerdyk (ónyé dị afọ irí n'oge ahụ) nọ n'ogige ịta ahụhụ Standerton ya na nné ya, ụmụnne nwoke abụọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ
Mgbè agha ahụ gasịrị, ezinụlọ ahụ biri na Pretoria ebe Gerard gara ónyé bu ụzọ na Pretoria Boys High School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ na 1909 wee rụọ eru dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Architectural Association na England
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na France rụọ oge ụfọdụ ma hụ ụlọ Roman na Renaissance na Ịtali
Moerdyk bụ ónyé South Africa mbụ ịbụ ónyé mmekọ nke Royal Institute of British Architects
A na-ewere ihe ncheta Voortrekker na Proclamation Hill na mpụga ndịda Pretoria dị ka ọrụ nka Moerdyk
Ọ bụ ónyé Freemason nke South Africa
E mere ma wuo Dutch Reformed Church na Piet Retief na 1921
A na-akpọ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ a ma ama nke ndị Africa na mpaghara Pretoria Arcadia Gerard Moerdyk Restaurant, n'aha ya
Gerard Rissik (21 February 1903 – 4 October 1979) bụ Gọvanọ nke anọ nke South African Reserve Bank
Oge ọrụ ya bụ site na abalị mbu na onwa asaa, na afọ1962 ruo na abalị iri atọ, na onwa isii, na afọ 1967
Theunis Willem de Jongh nọchiri ya
Gerard Sekoto (ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Disemba 1913 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Machị 1993), bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eti egwu na South Africa
A maara ya dị ka ónyé ọsụ ụzọ nke nka ojii na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Paris, Stockholm, Venice, Washington, na Senegal, yana na South Africa
A mụrụ Sekoto n'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Disemba 1913 na Lutheran Mission Station na Botshabelo, nso Middelburg, Eastern Transvaal (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Mpumalanga)
Ọ bụ nwa Andreas Sekoto, ónyé isi nkè ndị Kraịst ọhụrụ a tọghatara
Sekoto gụrụ akwụkwọ na Wonderhoek, nke nnà ya, ónyé ụkọchukwu na ónyé nkuzi guzobere
Dị ka nwa nke ónyé ozi ala ọzọ, ọ hụrụ egwu dị ka akụkụ nke ndụ ya ma kọwaara ya harmonium ezinụlọ mgbè ọ dị obere
Dị ka nwatakịrị, Sekoto na-eji chalk, akwụkwọ, na pensụl na-acha odo odo na-ese ihe
Nkà nka ya pụtara n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, mgbè ọ gara Diocesan Teachers Training College na Pietersburg
Ụlọ akwụkwọ a, n'adịghị ka ọtụtụ, gosipụtara klas eserese na ọrụ aka ndị ọzọ
Grace Dieu nwèrè ọtụtụ ndị na-ese osisi nwéré nkà na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ na ọrụ yana màkà asọmpi dịka ihe ngosi South African Academy kwa afọ
Ónyé na-ese ihe Ernest Mancoba bụ ezigbo enyi Sekoto na Grace Dieu, ha abụọ rọrọ nrọ ịga Europe ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ nka
Ernest Mancoba bụkwa ónyé nkuzi ya nke gbara Sekoto ume ịchụso ọrụ nka
Otú ọ dị, Sekoto adabaghị n'ime ụdị ihe osise nke nna, nke a tụrụ aro na Grace Dieu, na-ahọrọ ise ihe na ise ihe n'onwe ya
N'ịgụsị akwụkwọ dị ka ónyé nkụzi na Diocesan Teachers Training College na Pietersburg ọ kụziri na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ, Khaiso Secondary, ruo afọ anọ
N'oge a, ọ banyéré asọmpi nka (May Esther Bedford) nkè Mahadum Fort Hare haziri, nke e nyéré ya ihe nrite nke abụọ
E nyèrè George Pemba ihe nrite mbụ
Sekoto nwere mmasị nzuzo màkà ime nka, mana ọ kewara n'etiti ịhụnanya ya màkà nkuzi na nka
Ọ ga-ezo ọrụ ya mgbè ọ bụla ónyé ọ bụla bịarutere ya nso, ọ ga-egosikwa naanị ndị enyi ya ọrụ ya
Naanị ihe o mere ka Louis Makenna, Nimrod Ndebele, na Ernest Mancoba lee ihe osise ya
N'afọ 1947, ọ hapụrụ South Africa gaa biri na Paris n'okpuru nchụpụ onwé ya
A na-ekwu na mgbè Sekoto hapụrụ South Africa, ndị maara ọrụ ya nke ọma nwéré nnukwu mfu site na ọpụpụ ya

Afọ ndị mbụ ya na Paris siri ike, Sekoto wéré ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpọ piano na mberede na l'Echelle de Jacob ('Nzọụkwụ Jacob'), ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ abalị nke meghere màkà azụmahịa mgbè Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị
N'ebe a, ọ na-akpọ jazz ma na-abụ abụ 'Negro spirituals', abụ ndị France a ma ama n'oge ahụ na ụfọdụ Harry Belafonte
Egwú ghọrọ ụzọ o si nwee ike ịkwụ ụgwọ ndụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ nka
E kwuwo na Sekoto bụ ónyé ọsụ ụzọ màkà ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa
Otu ụzọ Sekoto si metụta South Africa bụ site na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke enyere site na ọrụ nka ya

Otu ónyé edemede na-ekwu, 'Ọ dị mkpa iburu n'uche na ndị na-ese ihe ndị a na-ebute ụzọ nyere ọnọdụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke ndị isi ojii bi n'obodo ukwu, nakwa na ha bụ n'ezie ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mbụ webatara ọnọdụ mmadụ na nka South Africa site n'echiche a'
Greater China bụ mpaghara ala na -ezighi ezi nke na -ekerịta mmekọrịta azụmahịa na ọdịnala na Han Chinese , yana na enweghị mmasị
Echiche nke 'Greater China' na -ezo aka na mpaghara nke gụnyere Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau na Taiwan na East Asia
Ụfọdụ ndị nyocha nwekwara ike ịgụnye obodo ndị China ndị ọzọ gburugburu ụwa dịka Singapore
Enwere ike ijikọ okwu a ka ọ bụrụ 'njikọ n'etiti mpaghara mpaghara China'
na-ejikarị ọkpụokwu a egbochi mkpalite uche ndi mmadụ gbanyere ọnọdụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke Taiwan
E jila ọkpụokwu a kwuo okwu ọtụtụ oge gara aga, mana nghọta na ebumnobi ndi ji ya kwuo a bụghị otu
Ọkpụokwu a si n'asụsụ Bekee pụtakwara ọzọ n'agbata afọ 1980 ruo 1989 iji gosi mmekọrịta n'okwu akụnaụba nakwa ịdịnotu nke ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nwere ike inweta mpaghara ya dị iche iche
Ọ bụghị otu kwụụrụ onwe ya dịka EU, ASEAN, maọbụ AU
Ọkpụokwu a bụ aha e ji chịkọta òtù ahịa dị iche iche a hụrụ dịka ndị nwere njikọta n'okwụ akụnụba
N'ihi ya, ọ pụtaghị nkwụrụonwe
Ọ bụghị mgbe ọ bụla ka ọkpụokwu a na-agụnye Taiwan
Ọmụmaatụ, Cisco na-eji 'Greater China na Taiwan' egosipụta ahịa
Gergana Slavcheva (Bulgarian Гергана Славчева), lụrụ Simeonov (Bulganian Симеонов) (amụrụ n'October 20, 1979) bụ onye bụbu onye Bulgaria na agba bọọlụ basketball
Gergina Skerlatova (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 25 Machị 1954) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ basketball nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Gerhard Marx (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1976, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nweta nzere masta ya na Fine Arts cum laude na Mahadum Cape Town n'afọ 2004
Ya na ndị omenkà a ma ama dịka William Kentridge na Handspring Puppet Company arụwo ọrụ
Ọ na-akụzi ugbu a na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, na Johannesburg

Dị ka Art News South Africa nke Eprel 2006 si kwuo, Marx tụlere imalite ikpe megide BMW n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe mkpọsa mgbasa ozi nke ụlọ ọrụ Ireland-Davenport mepụtara na-ekwu na ọ mebiri ikike nwebisiinka ya
Art News South Africa mepụtara ihe mgbasa ozi na-ese okwu nke e wepụrụ na mgbasa ozi mgbe obere oge gasịrị, na nso nso nke ọrụ Marx
Onye nnọchi anya ya, Warren Siebrits ekwuputala na Machị 2006 na onye ọka iwu ikike nwebisiinka bụ Owen Dean ga-anọchite anya Marx, nke a maara nke ọma maka ikpe Lion Sleeps Tonight
Germaine Nwere ike izo aka na
Germaine Acogny (amụrụ n'afọ 1944), bụ onye Senegal na-agba egwu na onye na-ede egwu
Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ịzụlite 'African Dance', yana ịmepụta ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ịgba egwú na France na Senegal
Mba abụọ ahụ achọtala ya mma, gụnyere ịbụ onye ọrụ nke Ordre des Arts et des Lettres na France, na Knight nke National Order of the Lion
A mụrụ ya na Benin n'afọ 1944 nye onye ọrụ gọọmentị Senegal, Germaine Acogny bụkwa nwa ndị Yoruba site na nne nne ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Dakar, Senegal, ebe ọ nọrọ oge nwata fọdụrụ
Mgbe o gosipụtara ikike ebumpụta ụwa na ịgba egwú, o kpebiri ịchụso nke a dị ka ọrụ, kwaga France n'afọ ndi 1960s iji mụọ ịgba egwú na ballet nke oge a
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Senegal, ọ malitere ịkụzi ịgba egwú n'ógbè ahụ, ma na nzuzo ma dị ka akụkụ nke usoro agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị mpaghara ahụ
N'oge a, ọ mepụtara ụdị ọhụrụ, nke ọ ga-emecha kpọọ 'igba egwu Afrịka'
Mgbe ọ na-agba egwu na uri Femme Noir, Femme Nu, ọ bịarutere n'uche onye edemede - Onye isi ala Léopold Sédar Senghor nke Senegal
Mgbe ọ ghọtara na ha nwere ọchịchọ yiri nke ahụ maka njirimara na ọdịbendị Afrịka, o zigara ya ka ya na onye na-ede ihe nkiri Maurice Béjart rụọ ọrụ na Brussels, Belgium
Site n'enyemaka nke Senghor na Béjart, o guzobere Mudra Afrique, ụlọ akwụkwọ ịgba egwú na 1977
Ọ bụ ezie na Béjart malitere usoro mmụta, nke gụnyere usoro ịgba egwu nke oge a nke Acogny
O mechara were ndị nkuzi na-akuzi ịgba egwú ndị ọzọ site na United States ma gbalịa iweghara akụkụ Acogny nke usoro mmụta ahụ; o zutere ya ma chọọ ka e mee ya naanị onye nduzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ kama
O kwetara, ọ jikọtakwara ọrụ nke ndị nkuzi mba ọzọ na nke ya n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-azụlite ịgba egwu Africa dị ka ngwakọta na-aga n'ihu n'etiti ụdị ọdịda anyanwụ nke oge a na usoro ọdịnala Africa
N'afọ 1980, o dere ma bipụta Danse Africaine (African Dance), nke setịpụrụ ụkpụrụ maka ịgba egwu Senegalese
Ọ hapụrụ Mudra Afrique n'afọ 1982
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, o guzobere Studio Ecole Ballet Theatre na Toulouse, France, ya na di ya Helmut Vogt
Ọ laghachiri Senegal n'afọ 1995, wee mepee ụlọ akwụkwọ ịgba egwú l'Ecole des Sables n'ebe ahụ afọ atọ ka e mesịrị
O tinyere ndị obodo ahụ n'ime ihe ngosi ahụ, ebe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị n'èzí na-ele anya n'oké osimiri

N'otu oge ahụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ahụ meghere, ọ malitere iso ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mba ofesi dị ka Susanne Linke na Kota Yamasaki na ụlọ ọrụ ya Jant-Bi rụkọọ ọrụ iji mepụta egwu awa atọ maka ihe ngosi mgbede
N'etiti afọ 1997 na 2000, ọ bụ onye nduzi nka nke ngalaba Dance nke Afrique en Creation nke dị na Paris
Na Febụwarị 17, 2021, ọ natara ọdụm ọla edo maka ịgba egwu site na Venice Biennale
Germaine Beaulieu (amụrụ na 1949 na Laval, Quebec) bụ onye Canada na-ede uri na onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye bi na Montreal kemgbe afọ 1966
Ọ bụ n'afọ 1977 ka ọ malitere ide akwụkwọ
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ Sortie d'elle (s) mutante na akwụkwọ iri na anọ dịka, Repères du silence (2013) na Miroir du levant (2011)
O bipụtakwala usoro postcard nke na-egosi uri sitere na nchịkọta ya, De l'Absence à volonté (1996)
Ọtụtụ n'ime ederede ya apụtala na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche dị ka Exit, Arcade, L'Estuaire, na La Nouvelle Barre du jour
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya bụ n'asụsụ French, a sụgharịrị ụfọdụ n'ime ihe odide ya n'asụsụ Bekee
E bipụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ihe odide ndị a na akwụkwọ akụkọ Dandelion
Germaine Beaulieu bụkwa onye ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ
Germaine Kouméalo Anaté (amụrụ na ọnwa June 15, 1968 na Kazaboua, na Sotouboua Prefecture) bụ minista gọọmentị ọnwa Togo, ọkà mmụta na onye edemede
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta, ọdịbendị, nka na agụmakwụkwọ obodo na gọọmentị Kwesi Ahoomey-Zunu1
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa Chief of Staff nke Ministry of Higher Education and Research of Togo tupu e bulie ya n'ọkwá minista
Onye nwere nzere doctorate na sayensị ozi na nkwukọrịta na Mahadum nke Bordeaux III na France, ọ bụ onye nkuzi na prọfesọ nyocha na mpaghara a na mahadum nke Lomé na Kara
Anaté' bụ onye isi oche nke Writers' Association of Togo (AET) ma bụrụkwa onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
German School Lagos (German ; DSL) bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mba Germany dị na Apapa, Steeti Lagos, Naijiria maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'afọ 13
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke usoro Deutsche Schulen Nigeria (DS-Nigeria ma ọ bụ DSN), nke gụnyere Deutsche Schule Abuja
E jikọtara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Abuja na afọ 2009, ma mechie ya na 2013
Julius Berger Nigeria PLC na-achịkwa netwọk ahụ

Isi ya bụ Berlin
