Gerrie & Louise bụ ihe nkiri Canada nke 1997 nke Sturla Gunnarsson duziri
Àtụ Sturla GunnarssonÀtụ Donald Brittain Award
Gerson Gu-Konu, nke a na-akpọkwa Gerson Konu, ezigbo aha ya bụ Kwadzo Gaglo Gù-Konu (1932−2006), bụ onye na-ahụ maka udo na ikike mmadụ na onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Togo
Amụrụ Gerson Gu-Konu n'afọ 1932 na Kuma-Adame, na Southwest nke Togo
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Kpalime
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya ruo afọ 1949 na Collège moderne de Lomé (nke a maara dị ka Petit Dakar n'oge ahụ)
Ọ malitere ndụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi maka Evangelical Mission, nke mbụ na Kpalime, mgbe ahụ na Lomé ruo afọ 1954 tupu ọ laghachi Kpalime ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-akụzi na Collège Espoir ruo afọ 1956
N'afọ 1955, o guzobere otu a na-akpọ na French Les Volontaires au travail (LVT) - Ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo na-arụ ọrụ
N'afọ 1957, ọ chọpụtara ogige ọrụ afọ ofufu mba ụwa na Ghana, ma nụ oge mbụ banyere Service Civil International (SCI)
N'afọ 1960, Togo nwere onwe ya ma họpụta Gerson Gu-Konu ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Kpalimé
Ọ kwadoro onye isi ala mbụ Sylvanus Olympio
Mgbe nnupụisi nke afọ 1963 gasịrị, na ogbugbu nke Onye isi ala Olympio, e jidere Gerson Gu-Konu ma mekpọọ ya ọnụ
A tọhapụrụ ya afọ anọ ka e mesịrị n'ihi arịrịọ nke Amnesty International (AI) na International Voluntary Service (IVS), alaka Britain nke SCI
Ọ gbagara France ebe ọ chọtara ọrụ n'ọfịs SCI Paris, wee bụrụ onye otu ndị ọrụ
Site n'afọ 1970 ruo afọ 1978 ọ bụ SCI International Secretary maka West Africa
N'afọ 1978, ọ gara rụọ ọrụ na International Secretariat nke Amnesty International na London
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka mmepe na nkwado nke alaka AI na Africa
N'oge niile ọ chụgara ya, ndị ọchịchị na Togo yiri ya egwu, ọ pụghị ọbụna ileta ala nna ya
Ọ dara ezigbo ọrịa, mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ na-eke oge ya n'etiti London na Ho, obere obodo dị na Ghana na-adịghị anya site na ókèala Togo
Gert-Johan Coetzee (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ nke onwa Nọvemba afọ 1987), bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na South Africa
Ụlọ ọrụ ejiji ya dị na Linden, Johannesburg na mpaghara Gauteng
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na uwe elu na-acha uhie uhie, ọ na-emepụta ụdị ejiji njikere dị iche iche
A maara Coetzee maka iyi dị ka ndị South Africa na ndị ama ama na mba ụwa na ihe omume red-carpet
A mụrụ Coetzee na Koster, North West Province
Ịhụnanya ya maka ejiji malitere mgbe ọ dị obere, mgbe ọ nọ na Grade nke Abụọ ọ gwara nne ya na otu ụbọchị ọ ga-abụ onye na-emepụta ejiji a ma ama
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Koster ruo na Grade Four wee gụọ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ
Dị ka nwata nwoke n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ na-eyi pensụl ya na akwụkwọ anụ ahụ ma mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii ọ malitere ịmụ ihe na North West School of Design
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na NWSD n'afọ 2005
N'oge afọ nke abụọ nke Coetzee na kọleji (2004) ọ meriri awọd High Fashion na Vukani Awards kwa afọ
Nke a bụ ebe onye telivishọn Sandy Ngema hụrụ ya

O yiiri ụdị njikere ya maka mmemme mmepe na Durban July Handicap premier horseracing n'afọ ahụ ma gaa n'ihu yiri ụdị njikere ya nke oge abụọ dị ka onye na-egosi usoro ihe nkiri TV nke SABC3 Strictly Come Dancing
N'afọ 2006, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, a kpọrọ Coetzee onye na-emepụta ihe kacha mma na South Africa na mmemme ejiji nke Cape Town
Ọrụ azụmahịa mbụ ya bụ dịka onye mmekọ na akara Diamond Face Couture na nwanyị ọchụnta ego Uyanda Mbuli nke malitere na 2006
Ọ gara n'onwe ya na 2010 wee malite Gert-Johan Coetzee Pty Ltd mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gosipụtara nchịkọta ya na South Africa Fashion week yana igosi ọrụ ya na ngosi Fashion Week nke mba ụwa na Canada na Vancouver Fashion Week, Angola na Nigeria
A na-eyi ihe ejiji ya na ihe omume ejiji niile dị mkpa gụnyere Durban July Handicap, J&B Met, SA Music Awards, Huisgenoot Skouspel, You Spectacular na Miss World
Ndị na-egosi ihe ngosi TV a ma ama dị ka Strictly Come Dancing na Top Billing na-eyi uwe ya
Naanị otu afọ n'ịmepụta akara nke ya Coetzee nwetara ọgba aghara mgbe ndị na-eme ihe nkiri TV mba ụwa bụ Kourteney Kardashian (Keeping Up with the Kardashians)
na Kristin Cavallari (The Hills) yi uwe GJC na mmemme mmepe Hollywood

O mechara yiri ejiji onye na-eme ihe nkiri ncha Arianna Zucker (Days of Our Lives) na 2012, na Kelly Rowland, (na 2013, na ncheta afọ iri anọ nke Ms Foundation for Women na Beverly Hills, iji sọpụrụ onye guzobere ya Gloria Steinem

Coetzee nwere ndepụta dị ogologo nke ndị ahịa na ndị ama ama gụnyere ndị ama ama dị ka Revlon Ambassador Bonang Matheba, Pabi Moloi, Tamara Dey, Lira, Liezel van der Westhuizen, Cindy Nell, Terry Pheto, Tatum Keshwar, Kerry McGregor, Louise Carver, Doreen Morris yana ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị nwere mmetụta na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị eze Africa
Coetzee bụkwa onye nnọchi anya Swarovski nke South Africa
Coetzee nwere mmasị na ọganihu teknụzụ na ejiji ma na-agbanye envelopu na nchịkọta ya mgbe niile
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013 ọ bụ onye mbụ na-emepụta ejiji na South Africa iji teknụzụ 3D-printing na SA Fashion Week Spring 2013 'sea urchin' collection
Ya na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Vaal rụkọtara ọrụ n'akụkụ teknụzụ, iji sụgharịa ma bipụta ihe ịchọ mma atọ iji tinye ya n'ime uwe

Mgbe ahụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2013, na SA Fashion Week na-esote, ọ lere anya na teknụzụ ọhụrụ ọzọ ma soro onye na-ese foto Nicole Phillips rụkọọ ọrụ iji weghara nchịkọta ya niile na-acha pinki Autumn Winter 2014 na-ahụtụbeghị na South Africa oge-slice fashion photography na usoro dị mgbagwoju anya na-eji igwefoto iri anọ na-arụ ọrụ n'otu oge

Coetzee kwenyere na 'ụdị ejiji nwere akọ na uche' ma amara ya maka iji ikpo okwu ya na olu ya dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe na mgbasa ozi iji mee ka a mara okwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị

Coetzee malitere echiche a na ọnwa Septemba 2012 mgbe ọ zutere Thando Hopa, onye ọkàiwu na National Prosecuting Authority, onye nwere albinism na onye o mere ka o kwenye ịghọ ihu nke nchịkọta ọhụrụ ya
Hopa emebeghị ihe ngosi tupu mgbe ahụ mana ọ pụtara n'okporo ámá na SA Fashion Week na GJC ma ọkpatara izu wuru wuru na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji
N'ime usoro a, GJC na Hopa mere ka a mara banyere nsogbu nke ndị nwere albinism bụ ndị ka na-eche nkwenkwe ụgha na ịkpa ókè ihu n'Africa
Njikọ dị n'etiti GJC na Thando Hopa na-adịgide ma kemgbe ahụ ọ ghọrọ ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị nwere albinism

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013 Coetzee sonyeere Shout, otu ndị na-emegide mpụ na South Africa ma nyefee nchịkọta 'sea urchin' ya n'oge opupu ihe ubi / oge okpomọkụ afọ 2013 maka ụmụ nwanyị ndị a na-eme ihe ike, iji mee mkpesa megide oke ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị na SA
N'ịbụ onye ogwu na-echebe, nke dị ize ndụ nke urchin mmiri na-emebi emebi kpaliri, o mepụtara ogwu 3D nke chọro uwe ya mma na-egosi uwe oyiyi nke a na-eyi maka ụmụ nwanyị
Mgbe ahụ na'njikere uwe nwere agba pinki'nke Auntumn/Winter nke izu mmemme izu nchịkọta ejiji nke SA na afo 2014 ọ raara ya nye mmata banyere ọrịa kansa ara

Maka nchịkọta a, Gert-Johan Coetzee sonyeere nzukọ The Pink Drive, nke bụ nzukọ na-agagharị agagharị nke na-ewetara ọha na eze mmata banyere ọrịa kansa ara na ụlọ nyocha site na gwongworo nwere ngwá ọrụ
Ozi ọ chọrọ izipu site na ụdị ejiji a bụ 'lekọta onwe gị'
Gert Joubert (amụrụ 1948 na Mowbray, Cape Town) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Namibia
A mụrụ Joubert na South Africa mana ọ kwagara Namibia n'afọ 1960

Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, ndị uwe ojii nzuzo nke ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ sochiri Joubert dị ka onye a na-enyo enyo na ọ bụ onye ọchịchị Kọmunist ruo mgbe ọ gakwuuru ndị uwe ojii ma kọwaara ya nkwado ya maka ikeketa ọchịchị
Joubert malitere ọrụ azụmahịa ya dị ka onye ọchụnta ego ehi na nso Otjiwarongo
N'afọ 2000, ọ batara na njem nlegharị anya ebe obibi wee nwee ebe nchekwa egwuregwu Erindi dị nso Omaruru na mpaghara Erongo[]
Gertrud Baer (1890-1981) bụ onye Germany na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na udo

Otu n'ime ndị guzobere Women's International League for Peace and Freedom, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke alaka Germany nke WILPF malite na 1921 na onye isi oche nke nzukọ mba ụwa site na 1929 ruo 1947
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ bụ ezie na e kewara ndị isi, Baer bụ onye isi nke nzukọ ahụ
Na ngwụcha agha ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ WILPF mbụ na United Nations ma nọrọ na ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 1972
A mụrụ Gertrud Baer na 25 Nọvemba 1890 na Halberstadt, na mpaghara Saxony nke alaeze Prussia na di na nwunye ndị Juu, Sara (née Stern) na Gustav Baer
Nna ya, nke sitere na ezinụlọ e guzobere ogologo oge site na Halberstadt nke ndị dọkịta na ndị nkuzi
Ọ bụ onye na-ere ígwè
Nne ya bụ nwa nwanyị nke Chief Rabbi nke Hamburg, Anschel Stern [de], na nwunye ya Jeanette (née Adler)
Nna nna nna Baer bụ Nathan Marcus Adler onye jere ozi dị ka Chief Rabbi nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain na nna ya Mordechai Baer Adler, onye bụ Chief Rabbi nke Hanover
Baer bụ nwanne ya nwoke kasị okenye na ezinụlọ ahụ, nke gara Hamburg mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ abụọ
A mụrụ ụmụnne Erna (1892 Xi-1967), Walter (amụrụ 1894), Harriet (1896 Xi-1956), na Jeanette (1903 Xi-1944) na Hamburg
E gburu Jeanette na Auschwitz n'oge Oké Mgbukpọ ahụ
Ntinye aka nne ya na òtù ụmụ nwanyị German bourgeois metụtara ya ma soro ya gaa nzukọ
N'otu n'ime nzukọ ndị ahụ, ọ zutere Lida Gustava Heymann ma soro ya rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ dị na Hamburg
Baer gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata ma bụrụkwa onye nkuzi na-agụ akwụkwọ na Hamburg, Leipzig, Munich na Neuchâtel, Switzerland
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya, Baer malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Hamburg
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, Baer gara Munich wee sonye na Heymann, Anita Augspurg na Helene Stöcker na Pacifist Movement

N'afọ 1915, ọ gara International Congress of Women nke e mere na The Hague, ebe a malitere echiche mbụ maka ụmụ nwanyị mepụtara Kọmitii Mba Nile nke Ụmụ nwanyị maka Udo Na-adịgide Adịgide Adịgide adịgide

Nzukọ ahụ so na 1919 site na nzuko nke umunwanyi Ebe etiti maka ogo mahadum ụwa International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF), nke Baer sonyeere ozugbo, jere ozi na ọkwá dị iche iche na alaka Germany nke WILPF site n'afọ ntọala ya
N'etiti 1918 na 1919, Baer guzobere kansụl ụmụ nwanyị na Munich Ministry of Social Affairs, maka Bavarian Soviet Republic nke e mepụtara ọhụrụ
Ọ sonyekwara na ọmụmụ oge okpomọkụ na Internationalism, nke WIL PF kwadoro na mmalite afọ 1920
N'etiti 1919 na 1933, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Die Fried (The Fried (The Girl imers)
N'afọ 1922, Baer, onye bụ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke German WILPF ruo otu afọ, mere njem mbụ ya na United States
Ọ hapụrụ nzukọ ya na Onye isi ala Harding, mgbe ndị mba na-ejide ya n'ihi ịbụ onye otu Communist Party nke Germany ma na-atụ egwu na o nweghị ego zuru ezu iji kwado onwe ya mgbe ọ nọ na mba ahụ
A tọpụrụ ya mgbe Jane Addams, Baer, mgbe ọ na-ekwu okwu na nzukọ ọzọ, gbara ụmụ nwanyị Baler ume ka ha sonye na ndị agha France, ka ha kwado
Otu n'ime atụmatụ ndị dị otú ahụ bụ ịkụ osisi e mere na 1926 n'ebe ugwu France
Baer jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke German Peace Cartel ma gaa ọtụtụ ebe na Europe
Mgbe ọ lotara na United States na 1924 iji gaa WILPF International Conference, Baer gbara ume ka e were Hitler dị ka nnukwu egwu
N'afọ 1929, ọ nọchiri Jane Addams dị ka Onye isi oche mba ụwa nke WILPF, mana n'ihi oke ọrụ a ga-arụ, e kpebiri na ọrụ Addams buuru bụ ka ya na Emily Greene Balch na Clara Ragaz
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ mba ahụ, Baer Germany na 1933, Bagaz, ọ pụrụ mba ahụ wee nweta ụmụ amaala na Czechoslovakia
Na Na-mgbe ahụ, mgbe ahụ ka ọ ga-Nkwado,
N'afọ 1939, e zigara Baer, onye nyocha maka WILPF nke Economic Council of the League of Nations, na United States
E nupụrụ Kansụl ahụ na Princeton, New Jersey ma were ya dị ka ihe dị mkpa ka Baer kwaga ebe ọzọ maka nchegbu nchekwa
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke WILPF, n'oge agha ahụ, na-akwado gburugburu nke a na-ezi na alaka mba ụwa kwa nkeji iri na ise

Baer na Ragaz ka na-ekerịta oche ahụ, mana onye na-ahụ maka udo nke Britain Kathleen Innes, nọchiri Ramondt-Hirschmann na 1937 dị ka onye otu atọ ahụ zigara Onye isi ala Roosevelt akwụkwọ ozi na-agba ya ume ikwe ka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ banye na mba ahụ
Na 1940, Baer ghọrọ nwa amaala America, ọ lotara Geneva kpamkpam na 1950

Ebe ọ nọrọ na-ahụ n'ihi na-ahụ, mgbe ọ nọrọ mgbe ọ na-ahụ anya, mgbe ụfọdụ ndị otu ahụ, mgbe ọ ga-eme nyocha nke United Nations, mgbe ọ malitere, mgbe ọ bụ na-eme nyocha, mgbe ọ chọrọ ka ndị mmadụ na-eme nwale nke United Nations gasịrị, ọ ga-ahụ maka nkwurịta okwu na-eme, mee nyocha, na-eme na-eme ihe kpọmkwem, Malite na 1955, o kwusiri ike mkpa ọ dị iji ike anyanwụ mee ihe, kama ịchụpuike nuklia, na mkpọsa 1960 gbara ume ka agụmakwụkwọ ime obodo site na mgbasa ozi redio

N'afọ 1965, na ncheta afọ iri ise maka ịmepụta WILPF, Baer kwupụtara nkụda mmụọ ya na nzukọ ahụ ahapụla mgbọrọgwụ ụmụ nwanyị ya, na-echetara ndị otu na ruo mgbe e nwetara nha nhata zuru oke n'akụkụ niile nke ndụ, ụmụ nwanyị ga na-anọ n'ihe ize ndụ
N'afọ nke ọzọ, dị ka onye na-ekiri UN NGO Forum nke e mere na Rome, Baer kwuru ọzọ banyere njikọ dị n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị na pacifism, mgbe ọ na-agba ume ka ndị ahụ kpebie onwe ya maka Viet Nam
Na njedebe nke afọ 1960, Baer na-eme ka ndị otu (Gertrud Baer Ndụ maka Ikike Ịha nhata nke Nwaanyị, maka Udo na Nnwere Onwe) ka a tọhapụrụ iji sọpụrụ ọrụ Baer
Baer nwụrụ na 15 Disemba 1981 na Geneva
A gbanwere aha nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe WILPF na-eme na afọ iji zụọ ndị otu ọhụrụ na 1981 dị ka Gertrude Baer Young Women's Summer Seminars, iji sọpụrụ ya
Gertrude Ibengwe Mongella, née Makanza (born September 13, 1945) is a Tanzanian politician who is the first president of the Pan-African Parliament
A mụrụ Mongella n'afọ 1945, na Ukerewe Island
N'afọ 1970, Onye isi ala Mongella gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke East Africa na Dar es Salaam
Ruo afọ anọ ọ bụ onye nkuzi na Dar es Salaam Teachers Training College
N'afọ 1974, ọ ghọrọ onye mmepe usoro agụmakwụkwọ maka Dar es Salaam Institutes of Education, nke o mere ruo n'afọ 1978
Site n'afọ 1977 ruo afọ 1992 Onye isi ala Mongella bụ onye otu Central Committee na National Executive Committee nke CCM party
Site n'afọ 1975 ruo afọ 1982 ọ bụ onye otu Council nke Mahadum Dar es Salaam, N'oge a kwa, ọ nọ na Board of Directors maka Tanzania Rural Development Bank
Site n'afọ 1978 ruo afọ 1982 ọ bụ onye nyocha ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'etiti afọ iri asaa, Onye isi ala Mongella bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke East Africa
N'ime afọ ndị 1980 na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke afọ ndị 1990 Mrs
Mongella bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Tanzania
Site n'afọ 1982 ruo afọ 1988 Mongella bụ Minista nke Steeti n'ime ọfịs Praịm Minista, site n'ebe ahụ ọ ghọrọ Minista nke Ala, Njem na Akụ na Ala ọ bụ ọkwa ọ rụrụ site n'afọ 1985 ruo afọ 1987
N'ikpeazụ, site n'afọ 1987 ruo afọ 1990 ọ bụ Minista na-enweghị Portfolio n'ime Ọfịs Onye isi ala
N'afọ 1985, Mongella ghọrọ osote onye isi oche na Nzukọ Ụwa iji nyochaa ma nyochaa ihe ndị UN Achievements of the UN Decade for Women
N'afọ 1989, Mongella bụ onye nnọchi anya Tanzania na Commission on the Status of Women
Site n'afọ 1990 ruo afọ 1993 ọ bụ onye otu Trustee na United Nations International Research and Training Institute for the Advancement of Women (INSTRAW)

From 1991 to 1992 President Mongella was Tanzanian High Commissioner to India, in 1995 she was UN Assistant Secretary General and Secretary General, Fourth World Conference on Women on Women in Beijing, China, from 1996 to 1997 Mrs
Mongella was UN Under-Secretary and Special Envoy to the Secretary General of the United Nations on Women's Issues and Development
Gertrude Ntiti Shope (amụrụ n'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1925) bụ onye South Africa bụbu onye otu ọrụ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ Shope na Johannesburg na 15 Ọgọst, na afọ 1925, a zụlitere ya ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Southern Rhodesia (nke bụzi Zimbabwe)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi tupu ọ bụrụ onye otu African National Congress na afọ 1954
N'ịbanye na mkpọsa megide agụmakwụkwọ Bantu, ọ tụgharịrị gaa na nkuzi ọrụ aka kama
Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Federation of South African Women, ma ruo oge ụfọdụ duzie Central Western Jabavu Branch nke ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke ANC
Ọ biri na mba ọzọ site na afọ 1966 ruo 1990, na-eduga ndị nnọchi anya pati ahụ na Nzukọ Ụmụ nwanyị nke Nairobi ma na-arụ ọrụ maka World Federation of Trade Unions
Site na afo 1970 ruo afọ 1971 ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ Florence Moposho, na-enyere aka ịmepụta mbipụta nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Voice of Women
Ya na di ya, Mark, biri n'ebe dị iche iche n'oge ọ na-agba ọsọ, gụnyere Prague, Botswana, Tanzania, Czechoslovakia, Zambia, na Nigeria
Na Lusaka, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nnọchi anya African National Congress
Site na afo 1991 ruo afọ 1993 Shope bụ onye isi nke African National Congress Women's League
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 1994, a laghachiri ya na ndị omeiwu

Gertrude Sizakele Khumalo (amụrụ na 2 Machị 1940), nke a makwaara dị ka Sizakele MaKhumalo Zuma, bụ nwanyị mbụ nke South Africa, ọ bụkwa nwunye mbụ na alụmdi na nwunye karịa otu nwanyị na Jacob Zuma, onye bụbu onye isi ala nke South Africa
Khumalo zutere Zuma na 1959 ma ha abụọ malitere mmekọrịta, mana ha kewara mgbe e jidere Zuma n'afọ 1963 ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri
Zuma na Khumalo lụrụ di na nwunye mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya na 1973, na 1975 Zuma gara mba ọzọ wee hapụ Khumalo n'azụ

Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe a chụgara ya, ya na onye ọzọ a chụpụrụ na ANC bụ Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma malitere mmekọrịta ma ha abụọ mechara lụọ, na-eme ka Khumalo Zuma bụrụ nwunye mbụ n'alụmdi na nwunye karịa otu nwanyị dịka omenala Zulu si dị
Di na nwunye ahụ enweghị ụmụ
Site n'ihe odide dị nso n'ezinụlọ Zuma, a na-ebo ebubo na Khumalo emeela ka ọ bụrụ 'nne' atọ n'ime ụmụ Zuma nke o nwere n'alụghị di dịka omenala na omenala Zulu si dị
A na-akpọ ụmụaka ahụ Nombuso, Nonhlanhla na nwoke dị afọ 39 a na-akpọghị aha

Zuma ghọrọ onye isi ala nke anọ nke South Africa mgbe ntuli aka n'ozuzu ya na 2009, wee họrọ Khumalo ka ọ bụrụ nwunye mbụ ya site na 2009 ruo 2014, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ họọrọ otu n'ime ndị nwunye ya ndị ọzọ, Nompumelelo Ntuli Zuma, iji nọchie ya
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Sizakhele MaKhumalo Zuma Foundation
Àtụ Jacob Zuma
Gertrude Mary Tuckwell CH (1861–1951) bụ onye ọrụ otu ndị ọrụ bekee, onye ọrụ na-elekọta mmadụ, onye ode akwụkwọ na onye ọka iwu￼
A mụrụ Gertrude Mary Tuckwell na Oxford na 25 Eprel 1861, ada nke abụọ nke Rosa née Strong (b
1829/30) na William Tuckwell, nna ukwu nke New College School na ụkọchukwu na New College, Oxford na onye na-akpọ onwe ya 'radical parson'

Nne ya bụ ada nke Captain Henry Strong, onye isi ndị agha India, onye nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere, onye na-ahụ maka nwanyị na onye na-azụ ahịa bụ Emilia Dilke, ga-enwe mmetụta dị ukwuu na ndụ TuckwellTuckwell nwere otu nwanne nwoke na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ

Mgbe Iwu Sex Disqualification (Removal) Act 1919 ghọrọ iwu na 23 Disemba 1919, Tuckwell bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị asaa mbụ a họpụtara dị ka onye ọka ikpe nke udo, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ bụ onye ọka iwu na London
A na-etinye akwụkwọ ya na TUC Library Collections na Mahadum nke North London

Ihe ndị a nwere ihe dịka folda 700 nke akụkọ, akwụkwọ mpịakọta, akwụkwọ mpempe akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Tuckwell chịkọtara, gbasara ọgụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba ụmụ nwanyị site na 1890 ruo 1920
Gertrude Webster Kamkwatira (c
1966), bụ onye Malawi na-ede egwuregwu, onye nduzi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Kamkwatira n'ihe dịka afọ 1966
Ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Wakhumbata Ensemble Theatre n'afọ 1999 mgbe onye guzobere ya, Du Chisiza nwụsịrị
O mechara 'gbapụ' n'òtù ahụ wee guzobe otu ihe nkiri Wanna-Do
Ọnọdụ ndị o nwere gụnyere Onye isi oche nke National Theatre Association of Malawi na Onye isi oche of the Copyright Society of Malawi

Kamkwatira dere ihe dịka egwuregwu iri na atọ n'asụsụ Bekee, gụnyere It's My Fault, nke na-ekwu maka ime ihe ike n'ụlọ na mmegbu mmekọahụ, Jesus' Retrial na Breaking the News, egwuregwu gbasara ịlụso ọrịa AIDS ọgụ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'afọ 2003, o kwuru na ọ ga-anọkarị otu ụbọchị ma ọ bụ abụọ na-ede egwuregwu, wee gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ya ruo izu atọ ọzọ
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ya na onye nchịkọta akụkọ ga-ekwurịta ya tupu ọ gosi ya ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Onye ọ bụla na-eme ihe nkiri ga-agụ ma ghọta egwuregwu ahụ dịka nzọụkwụ mbụ na usoro mmega ahụ
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya malitere mgbe e nwere ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri na Malawi
N'afọ 1987, ọ ga-arụ ọrụ n'egwuregwu atọ n'otu oge n'ihi na W makhata nwere ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ
E liri ya n'ụlọ ya na Lisungwi, mpaghara Neno
Geruma (nke a makwaara dị ka Gerema, Germa) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Naịjirịa
Olumba a gụnyere Duurum na Sum
Ndị na-asụ ya na-agagharị na Hausa

Gesina Maria Magdalena 'Gesie' van Deventer (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 24 Septemba 1958) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, onye ọrụ ugbo na onye nkwado nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi obodo Stellenbosch Local Municipality kemgbe afọ 2016
Onye otu Democratic Alliance, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi obodo nke Drakenstein Local Municipality site n'afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2016
A mụrụ Van Deventer n'ụbọchị 24 Septemba 1958 na Vanrhynsdorp na mpaghara Cape Province (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Western Cape)
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ mgbe ọ dị obere iji kwado ezinụlọ ya
Ọ gara n'ihu gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch wee nweta nzere abụọ
N'afọ 1981, ọ ruru eru dị ka onye ọka iwu ma nabata ya n'Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke South Africa
Van Deventer wee kpebie ịchụso mmanya dị ka ọrụ
Ọ debanyere aha dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị mbụ na Elsenburg College of Agriculture n'afọ 1990
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ nwetara diplọma ya na viticulture na botany (cum laude), nke ọ sochiri na diplọma dị ka onye nwe ụlọ na onye na-eme mmanya n'afọ 1992
N'ime afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, ọ bụ onye na-eme mmanya oge niile
Getaneh Kebede Gebeto (Amharic ጌታነህ ከበደ; amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1992) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka otu egwuregwu Premier League nke Ethiopia bụ Wolkite City
Getenesh 'Gete' Wami Degife (Amharic ጌጤነሽ 'ጌጤ' ዋሚ 2013
A mụrụ na Disemba 11, na afo 1974 na Debre Berhan) bụ onye Etiopia bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi na ihe omume mba, track, na okporo ụzọ
Nwanne ya nwoke, Mulugeta Wami, bụkwa onye na-agba ọsọ marathon
Gete ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 1999 World Championships na Seville, oge 30 2456, nke bụ ndekọ ọhụrụ nke Afrịka na ndekọ nke Championships
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo 10,000m na afọ 1999 All-Africa Games n'afọ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro abụọ nke IAAF World Cross Country Championships, ebe ọ natara aha ogologo oge na afọ 1996 na obere aha na afọ 2001
Gete meriri na afọ 2006 Berlin Marathon, na-agwụ n'ihu Salina Kosgei na Monika Drybulska na Septemba 24
A tụrụ anya na ọ ga-emeri ihe ndekọ ụwa karịa kilomita 15 n'oge Zevenheuvelenloop na gburugburu Nijmegen na 19 Nọvemba, na afọ 2006, mana ọ dara
Gete mechiri n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'oge ọsọ ahụ, sekọnd itoolu n'azụ Mestewat Tufa, onye mechiri na 47 22
N'afọ 2007, Gete meriri na Berlin Marathon ọzọ
O sonyere na New York Marathon ụbọchị iri atọ na ise ka e mesịrị ma mechaa 23 sekọnd n'azụ Paula Radcliffe
Ọkwa nke abụọ ya nyere ya World Marathon Majors Series Title, na-enweta onwe ya $ 500,000 jackpot
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2008, Gete Wami hapụrụ na afo 2008 Beijing Olympic Marathon, mgbe ọ gbasịrị ọsọ n'ihu maka ọtụtụ n'ime asọmpi ahụ, dịka onye otu ya Berhane Adere
Oge ikpeazụ ọ pụtara n'ọrụ ya bịara na afo 2009 London Marathon, ebe ọsọ ya nke 2 26 54 awa wetara ya ọnọdụ nke itoolu
Getmore Sithole (a mụrụ na 4 June 1964), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri a ma ama A Small Town Called Descent, Le lion na Blood & Water
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 3 ọnwa June afọ 1964 na Zimbabwe
Ọ lụrụ Dorriane, onye na-emepụta ejiji kemgbe afọ 2002
Ha na-arụkọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa 'Sandton Elite Apartments'
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2000 site na ọrụ ugboro ugboro na usoro telivishọn Generations Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2002, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na soapie ọzọ Backstage dịka onye nchọpụta siri ike 'Dikobo'
N'afọ 2004, o mere ọrụ nkwado nke 'Detective Ditini' na usoro telivishọn ndị uwe ojii Jozi Streets
N'oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Advocate Maponya' na ihe nkiri ncha a ma ama Rhythm City
N'afọ 2003, o mere nkiri mbụ ya na French Le Lion
N'afọ 2005, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri etv soapie, Scandal!
N'ime usoro ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Cain Gumede', ihe ngosi ahụ wee bụrụ ihe a ma ama
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri ọzọ na-eme The Wild ma rụọ ọrụ na-enweghị ntụpọ 'Joseph Sithole'
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya na Moneygramńs Zimbabwe Achievers Awards na ngalaba nke Personality Of The Year Award
N'afọ 2015, ọ laghachiri dịka 'Bab' Shezi' maka oge abụọ na soapie Ashes to Ashes ebe ọ gbara ruo na ngwụcha afọ 2016

Mgbe usoro Ashes to Ashes gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado maka ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn South Africa dịka, Intersexions, Wild at Heart, 4Play Sex Tips for Girls, Jozi-H, Diamond City, Sokhulu & Partners, 90 Plein Street na The Docket
Na ngwụcha afọ 2019, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke Netflix nke Blood & Water, nke mere ka ọ pụta na mba ụwa nke mbụ ya
Usoro ahụ malitere na mba 190 na 20 Mee afọ 2020 ma mesịa nweta otuto dị egwu
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye na-ese olu karịsịa na olu MTN maka 2010 FIFA World Cup Finals na South Africa na olu MTn na Africa na akụkụ nke Middle East site n'afọ 2009-2015
Ewezuga telivishọn, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri gụnyere Mrs Mandela, Free Willy Escape from Pirate's Cove, Clarissa's Secret, An Act of Defiance, The Last Victims, Blood & Oil na A Covert Affair
Ghada Mohammed Abdel Razek (amụrụ na 6 Julaị 1970) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na 1997
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro TV na ihe nkiri, ma merie ọtụtụ onyinye
A mụrụ Abdel Razek na Kafr Saqr, Sharqia Governorate na 1970
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụnne ya abụọ
Ọ biri afọ isii na Yemen
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nlereanya maka mgbasa ozi
Ọrụ mbụ ya n'ime ihe nkiri bụ na usoro ihe nkiri TV The thief I love na 1997

Ọrụ TV ya a ma ama bụ na ezinụlọ Hajj Metwali na 2001, Mahmood Almasri na 2003, Sons of the night na 2007, Albateneya na 2009, Zahra na di ya ise na 2010, Samara na 2011, With premeditation na 2012, Life story na 2013, The First Lady na 2014, The Nightmare na 2015, Alkhanka na 2016, Land air na 2017, na Against unknown na 2018

O mekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri; ọrụ nkiri ya a ma ama bụ na Gamal Abdel Nasser na 1999, About love and desire na 2006, 90 minutes na 2006, Zay alhawa na 2006, 45 days na 2007, Hena maysara na 2007, Master Omar Harb na 2008, Adrenaline na 2009, Fawzia's secret recipe na 2009, Honor crisis na 2009, Shehata's Shop na 2009, Bon suare na 2010, Talk with me, Thank you na 2010, Reklam na 2012, Garconira na 2013, Ndị ihere nwụrụ na 2016, na Karmooz war na 2017
O ritere ihe nrite onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Alexandria International Film Festival maka ọrụ ngosiputa ya n'ihe nkiri Hena maysara
O meriri ihe nrite Murex d'Or dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'Ijipt n'afọ 2013
O nwetakwara ihe nrite Dear Guest site n'aka magazin Dear Guest dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2018
Ọ ghọkwara onye ọka ikpe maka asọmpi telivishọn Arab Casting na Kosai Khauli na Carmen Lebbos
Ghada Abdel Razek lụrụ di ma gbaa alụkwaghịm ọtụtụ ugboro
Alụmdi nke mbụ ya na onye ọchụnta ego Saudi Adel Gazzaz mere mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ iri na asaa; ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 1994
Alụmdi na nwunye nke abụọ ya bụ onye ọchụnta ego si Port Said; ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'oge na-adịghị anya n'ihi ọdịiche dị na afọ ha
Alụmdi ya nke atọ bụ Helmy Sarhan na 2001; ha gbara alụkwaghịm otu afọ ka e mesịrị
Alụmdi na nwunye ya nke anọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe Walid Al Tabaeyi; ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 2009
Alụmdi na nwunye ya nke ise bụ onye nta akụkọ Mohamed Foda na 2011; ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 2015
O nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Rotana Gazzaz, site n'aka di mbụ ya, o nwekwara ụmụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
A maara Ghada Abdel Razek dị ka otu n'ime ndị ama ama na-akwado onye isi ala Ijipt Abdel Fattah el-Sisi
Na 7 Mee 2020, Abdel Razek kwupụtara na ya lụrụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri bụ Haitham Zenita
Ghada Adel Ibrahim (amụrụ na 25 Disemba 1974 na Benghazi) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ngosi na telivishọn
A mụrụ ya na Benghazi, Libya, n'ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ n'Ijipt
Nne ya bụ onye Ijipt bụkwa nwanne nne nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri lara ezumike nká Shams el-baroudi site n'aka nne ha
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ abụọ, ya mere ya na ụmụnne ya nọrọ n'ụlọ nna ha ha na nwunye nna nke abụọ na Libya ebe nna ya na-arụ ọrụ, ọ bụ ezie na ha na-anọ ezumike ha kwa afọ n'ụlọ na Cairo
O nwere nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya na ụmụnne nwanyị atọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Benghazi mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ gbasara nchịkwa azụmahịa na azụmahịa
Ọ malitere ime ihe ngosi na mgbasa ozi, ya na Hany Shaker pụtara na Tekhsary nke afọ 1997, wee kwado ihe ngosi telivishọn Fawazir abyad wa aswad
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na usoro TV Zizinya na 1997, ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ ihe ọchị Saʽidi na Mahadum America na 1998 ya na Mohamed Henedi

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, nke gụnyere Belyah na High Mind ya na 2000, El basha telmeez na 2004 na Karim Abd El-Aziz, Lover Boys na 2005 na Hamada Helal, She Made Me Criminal na 2006 na Ahmed Helmy na Hassan Hosny, na Ahwak na 2015 na Tamer Hosny
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro TV, nke gụnyere Mabrouk Galak Ala'a na 2005 na Hany Ramzy, Dead Heart na 2008 na Sherif Mounir na Saraya Abden na 2015 na Qusai Khouli
N'afọ 2019, ọ malitere na ọtụtụ usoro mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta maka anya ya dị egwu ya na El Gouna Film Festival
Nwanne nne ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri lara ezumike nká Shams El Baroudi
Ọ lụrụ onye nduzi Egypt na onye na-emepụta ihe Magdy El Hawari ruo afọ iri abụọ, onye nyekwara aka mee ka ọ mata ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
Ha nwere ụmụ ise, ụmụ nwoke anọ na otu nwa nwanyị
Ọ mara ọkwa ịgba ya alụkwaghịm mgbe otu afọ nkewa gasịrị
Ghada Jamal bụ onye mbụ na-ahụ maka telivishọn na Libya pụtara na ọwa TV na-abụghị nke Libya
Ihe ngosi ya, Hadraza, bụ nke mbụ e gosipụtara na Jaras TV, ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Lebanon
Allibya TV nke dị na Libya zụtara Hadraza n'afọ 2008
Ghada ebila ọtụtụ ndụ ya na Libya
Mgbe ọ gara ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ Al-Jazeera na Qatar, ọ gara Lebanon isonyere Jaras TV, ebe ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-ahụ maka telivishọn
Ọ lara n'iyi ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa wee pụta n'oge Ramadan nke afọ 2006 na nnukwu egwu ya, Hadraza, nke pụtara 'ịkparịta ụka' na Libyan Arabic
Ndị ọbịa ya gụnyere ndị ama ama si mba Arab, dịka ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, ndị na-ede uri, ndị nta akụkọ, na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
A na-egosi Hadraza kwa Monday, Wednesday, na Friday na Ramadan na Jaras TV na 9 30 pm Tripoli Time (7 30 UTC)
Allibiya TV zụtara ihe ngosi ya na mbido afọ 2008, ma kitaa, a na-egosi ya na Tọzdee ọ bụla na 21 00 UTC, ma na-emegharị ya na Satọdee na 9 00 UTC
Ghada Jamal (amụrụ n'afọ 1955) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Beirut, Lebanon
Jamal gụrụ Fine Arts na LAU Lebanese American University tupu ọ kwaga California iji nweta Masters na California Steeti mahadum na Long Beach
Ghada Jamal bi ugbu a, na-ese ihe, ma na-akụzi na Mahadum Notre Dame na Mahaduma America nke Beirut na Lebanọn
E gosipụtara ihe osise Jamal, dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi Solo na Group, gburugburu ụwa
A na-egosi ihe osise ya ugbu a na mba United States, England, France, Jordan, na Lebanon

Ghada Fathi Waly (amụrụ n'afọ 1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ijipt nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa / onye isi nchịwa nke United Nations Office na Vienna (UNOV) / United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC) kemgbe afọ 2020, mgbe odeakwụkwọ ukwu António Guterres họpụtara ya
O nwere ọkwa nke Under-Secretary-General nke United Nations

Ghada Waly nwere MA na BA site na Mahadum Colorado State (US) na Ụmụ mmadụHumanities; o nwekwara diplọma na mmepe mba ụwa na diplọma na njikwa ọrụ ma nwee asambodo na Micro Finance site na Machịkwa Colorado Boulder
Ọ na-asụ Arabic, Bekee na French nke ọma ma nwee ihe ọmụma na-arụ ọrụ nke Spanish
Waly jere ozi dị ka Minista nke ịdị n'otu nke Ijipt site na ọnwa Machị afọ 2014 ruo Disemba afọ 2019

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi nke Kọmitii Inter-Ministerial maka Ikpe Ziri Ezi ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Executive Council of Arab Ministers of Social Affairs na League of Arab States site na afọ 2014 ruo afọ 2019
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Nasser Social Bank, ụlọ ọrụ ego na-akwado mmepe ogbenye

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke National center maka nyocha gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na mpụ, National Fund for Drug and Addiction Control na National Authority of Social Insurance, nke na-ejere nde ndị Ijipt 25 ozi
Ọ nọdụrụ na bọọdụ nke Social Housing Fund na Ministry of Housing and Urban Development, Unplanned Settlement Fund, Youth Fund na Ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa mba
Waly na-anọdụ na bọọdụ nke ọtụtụ òtù ọha na eze ma bụrụ onye na-akwado nkwado maka ike akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na SMEs
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Njikọ Red Crescent Egypt

A họpụtara ya dị ka nwanyị kachasị nwee mmetụta na Egypt na 2016, dị ka Baseera Public Opinion Research Center si kwuo, Forbes Middle East họpụtara ya dịka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Arab iri kachasị ike na gọọmentị maka 2015, 2016, 2017 na 2018

Ghana DJ Awards bụ emume mmeri kwa afọ maka ndị DJ na Ghana

E kere ha na ebumnuche ịmara na ịsọpụrụ ndị DJ, na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu nwere mmetụta na egwu egwu eletrọniki na Ghana, yana ịkwalite mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ egwu Ghana site n'ịkwụ ụgwọ na ime emume redio, ndị DJ na klọb ndị mere nke ọma n'ọhịa ha
Tọrọ ntọala na 2011, ihe omume ahụ na-ezube ime ka onyinye ndị Ghana DJ nyere na nkesa egwu na nkwalite site na igwu egwu na redio, ịkwado ma wepụta egwu ka ndị mmadụ nwee obi ụtọ
N'afọ 2012, Merqury Quaye chepụtara mbipụta mbụ nke Ghana DJ Awards ma mee ya na National Theatre na 15 Febụwarị 2012

Ndị egwu ama ama na-achịkwa isi ihe nkiri na Ghana DJ Awards gụnyere Medikal, DJ Mic Smith, DJ Que, Kuami Eugene, KiDi, Darkovibes, Stonebwoy, DJ Vyrusky, MzVee, Kwaw Kese, DJ Kofi, DJ Black na DJ Jimmy Jatt
Ka ọ na-erule 2015 Ghana DJ Awards, na 2015, enwere ngụkọta nke iri atọ na anọ
Na Septemba 2020, ndị na-ahazi ya wepụtara ụdị ọhụrụ 'Lockdown DJ of the Year' iji nye ndị DJ na-eme ka ndị na-akwado egwu nwee obi ụtọ n'oge mkpọchi COVID-19

A na-enye onyinye ndị kachasị elu n'ụdị asatọ nke gụnyere, Best DJ of the Year, Best International Non-Ghanaian DJ, Best International Ghanaian DJ, Discovery of the year, Best Event DJ of the year (DJ nke Afọ), Artiste DJ nke Afọ, Best Mobile DJ nke Afụ na Best Mixtape DJ nke Afọọ

Ụdị ndị ọzọ gụnyere, DJ / Artist Collaboration of the Year, DJ's Song of The Year, Scratch DJ of The Year، Best Video Jockey of The Year (Best Club MC of The Year), Best Night Club DJ of The year, Best Female Radio DJ of The Years (Best Female Radio) na Best Female DJ of The Age (Best Male Radio DJ of the Year)
N'oge 2018, e nyere Mark Okraku-Mantey Ghana DJ Awards Lifetime Achievement Award na 2018 Ghana DJ Awards maka ọrụ ya na onyinye ya na ọrụ DJ na Ghana
Dị ka ntuziaka kọmitii si kwuo, ụdị ndị ọzọ niile bụ site na nhọpụta nke ndị ọka ikpe nke ndị ọkachamara ụlọ ọrụ

A na-etinye akwụkwọ n'ịntanetị, ozugbo e tinyere ọrụ, a na-eme nnọkọ nyocha, na-emetụta bọọdụ ndụmọdụ, iji chọpụta ma a na-etinye ọrụ ahụ n'ụdị ziri ezi, site na iji ihe ọmụma ọkachamara ha na nkwenye na ihe ndị omenkà gara aga ka e wee nwee ike ikpe ha ikpebi ha na uru
Na Septemba 2020, Ghana DJ Awards kpughere ndị nduzi ọhụrụ ya dị mmadụ iri na abụọ
Kọmitii ọhụrụ ahụ kwupụtara na a gaghịzi ahọpụta ndị DJ na-erubeghị afọ iri na asatọ na ngalaba DJ kacha mma nke afọ mana kama nke ahụ, ha ga-asọ mpi maka onyinye Young DJ of the Year
DJ Switch dị afọ iri na atọ nke meriri Best DJ of the Year na 2019, bụ onye mbụ natara onyinye ọhụrụ ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, ndị na-ahazi ihe omume ahụ kwupụtara ebe ọhụrụ maka ihe omume ahụ
ihe omume ahụ sitere na ebe a mara ọkwa na mbụ National Theatre ruo Accra International Conference Centre
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2012, enwere esemokwu na-arịwanye elu banyere Ghana DJ Awards, izu ole na ole mgbe a mara ọkwa ihe omume ahụ
Emume mmeri ahụ kpaliri ịkọ nkọ nke asọmpi na arụmụka n'etiti ụfọdụ ndị DJ a ma ama na Accra
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2012, ndị DJ Ghana bi na mba ọzọ akwaara arịrị maka ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke ndị na-ahazi maka ịnye naanị otu ụdị maka ndị DJ mba Ghana na mmemme nsọpụrụ mbụ maka ndị DJ Ghana
Ndị na-ahazi onyinye ahụ mechara kwupụta ekele ha maka ezigbo nchegbu nke ndị DJ mba ụwa welitere ma kọwaa na a ga-enyocha aro na nchegbu ma dozie ya na mbipụta ndị sochirinụ
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, DJ Asumadu kwupụtara nnukwu mmechuihu ya na 2019 Ghana DJ Awards, mgbe ndị na-ahazi onyinye ahụ na-eleda ya anya n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-egwu ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na klọb na ihe omume
Ụlọ ọrụ Ghana National Gas bụ ụlọ ọrụ steeti nwere ikike ịrụ ọrụ akụrụngwa achọrọ maka mkpokọta, nhazi, ibufe na ịzụ ahịa akụrụngwa gas na Ghana
Gọọmentị Ghana guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na July 2011
Àtụ Petroleum industry in Ghana
Ghanaian Pidgin English (GhaPE), bụ a Ghanaian English-lexifier pidgin nke a makwaara dị ka Pidgin, Broken English, na Kru English (kroo brofo na Akan)
GhaPE bụ ụdị mpaghara dị iche iche nke West African Pidgin English nke a na-asụ na Ghana, karịsịa na isi obodo ndịda, Accra, na obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Ọ dị na obere akụkụ nke ọha mmadụ karịa ndị Creole ndị ọzọ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka, a na-emekwa ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe ihere, ikekwe n'ihi mkpa Twi, asụsụ Akan, nke a na-asụkarị dị ka lingua franca
Asụsụ ndị ọzọ a na-asụ dị ka lingua franca na Ghana bụ Standard Ghanaian English (SGE) na Akan
A pụghị iwere GhaPE dị ka onye Creole n'ihi na ọ nweghị ndị na-ekwu okwu L1
Enwere ike kewaa GhaPE n'ụdị abụọ, nke a na-akpọ 'onye na-enweghị agụmakwụkwọ' ma ọ bụ 'onye na'enweghị agụmakọta' pidgin na 'onye gụrụ akwụkwọ' ma ọ bụrụ 'onye a na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ'

A na-ejikọta okwu ndị mbụ na ndị na-amaghị akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na ndị nke ikpeazụ a na-enweta ma jiri ya mee ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka mahadum ma nwee mmetụta nke Standard Ghanaian English
GhaPE, dị ka ụdị ndị ọzọ nke West African Pidgin English, na-emetụtakwa n'ógbè site na okwu nke asụsụ ụmụ amaala a na-asụ gburugburu ebe ọ mepụtara
Asụsụ GhaPE dị ka Akan nwere mmetụta n'iji pidgin a na-asụ na Ghana
Ndị ọzọ nwere mmetụta nke GhaPE gụnyere Ga, Ewe, na Nzema
Ọ bụ ezie na ụmụ nwanyị na-aghọta GhaPE, o yighị ka ha ga-eji ya mee ihe n'ihu ọha ma ọ bụ n'ọnọdụ ọkachamara
Ìgwè ndị na-agwakọta nwoke na nwanyị na-ekwukarị okwu na SGE ma ọ bụ asụsụ ọzọ
Ndị okenye na ụmụaka anaghị asụ GhaPE
N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, ndị nkụzi agbalịala ịmachibido iji pidgin
Ọ bụ ezie na ha nwere asụsụ ndị ọzọ nke Ghana, ụmụ akwụkwọ, ọkachasị ụmụ nwoke, na-eji GhaPE dị ka ụzọ isi gosipụta ịdị n'otu, ọbụbụenyi na nnupụisi ndị ntorobịa
Taa, a pụrụ ịnụ ụdị Pidgin a n'ọnọdụ dịgasị iche iche, ọ bụ ezie na ọ ka na-ebu ihe ihere ụfọdụ
N'ụzọ doro anya, GhaPE ka na-ebu ihere na agụmakwụkwọ nke nwere ike ịkọwa ihe mere e ji bipụta 'nkọwa ole na ole nke nhazi ma ọ bụ nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya'
20% nke ndị bi na ya na nde mmadụ ise na-asụ GhaPE nke oge a

N'ozuzu, a na-asụ pidgins n'ọnọdụ na oge dịgasị iche iche gụnyere 'ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, ebe ọrụ, ọdụ ụgbọ elu, ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri, ebe ịṅụ mmanya, ahịa, na redio, abụ ndị a ma ama, na nyiwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị'
Ndị Naijiria bi na Ghana na vice versa abụwo isi na mmepe na ojiji nke asụsụ ahụ

[citation needed] GhPE, dị ka ụdị ndị ọzọ nke West African Pidgin English na-emetụta mpaghara site na okwu nke asụsụ ụmụ amaala a na-asụ gburugburu ebe ọ mepụtara, n'ọnọdụ a, dị ka gburugburu Greater Accra Region, n'ụzọ dị ukwuu Ga

Mgbe a na-ekwu ya, ọ nwere ike isi ike maka ndị na-asụrụ asụsụ Naijiria pidgin chọrọ ịghọta ndị na-ekwu Ghana - dịka ọmụmaatụ, okwu 'biz' (nke pụtara 'nkwurịta' (nke' na mgbede), 'n'abalị') 'n'asụsụ Ghana', 'n'otu) 'n'ime' (nke) 'nkwukọta')
Ọzọkwa, ụmụ okorobịa gụrụ akwụkwọ ndị a zụlitere na mpụga Accra na Tema anaghị ama ya ruo mgbe ha zutere ndị ọzọ na-eme ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma ọ bụ na mahadum

[citation needed] Mana nke ahụ nwere ike ịgbanwe, dịka ụmụ akwụkwọ a mụrụ na Accra na-aga obodo ndị dị ka obodo nke abụọ nke Ghana bụ Kumasi ịmụ na mahadum ma nwee ike inyere aka inweta asụsụ ọhụrụ dị iche iche
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ụfọdụ ndị edemede Ghana na-eto eto amalitela ide akwụkwọ dịka akụkọ mkpirikpi na GhPE dị ka omume mkpesa
GhPE ahụwokwa ngosipụta na abụ na ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi
Mmekọrịta mbụ nke ndị Europe na Gold Coast na West Africa bụ site n'aka ndị Portuguese bi na 1471 (narị afọ nke iri na ise)
A na-eji pidgin Portuguese mee ihe n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Africa n'ime narị afọ nke 16 na 17
A malitere pidgin a mgbe a kpọgara ndị na-asụ asụsụ West Africa na Portugal iji mụta Portuguese maka ebumnuche ntụgharị n'oge njem
A na-eche na ebe obibi Portuguese na Gold Coast nwere ike ịbụ ihe kpatara pidgin na-aga n'ihu na West Africa
A na-eji pidgin Portuguese a mee ihe ruo afọ 300 n'akụkụ Gold Coast 'ma eleghị anya ọ dịghị mgbe (mepụtara) karịa ọkwa okwu'

Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ narị afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị na-esote nnwere onwe ha, ndị Dutch ' weghaara ihe niile Portugal nwere na West Africa site na 1642' na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, agbanyeghị, 'ihe ole na ole fọdụrụnụ' fọdụrụ na Asụsụ, olumba, ma ọ bụ ụdị dị iche iche nke West Africa
Nke a nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi na ndị Dutch akwụsịghị n'etiti ndị West Africa ha na ha na-azụ ahịa
Ndị Britain chịrị Gold Coast nke West Africa (nke bụ Ghana ugbu a) na narị afọ nke 19 na nke 20 site na 1844 ruo 1957
Ndị Britain nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'asụsụ na West Africa ka ha na ụmụ amaala na-emekọrịta ihe
GhaPE mepụtara dị ka ndị nna ukwu chọrọ nkwurịta okwu na ndị ọrụ ha ma bụrụ nke ndị uwe ojii, ndị nche, ndị ọrụ, na ndị ọrụ ụlọ na-anwa iso ndị na-asụ Bekee ngwa ngwa na-asọpụta
GhaPE is a variety of West African Pidgin English, signifying relationship with other regional pidgin varieties such as Nigerian Pidgin English
Though some word formations are regional in GhaPE, words are also sometimes borrowed from other regional varieties

GhaPE most commonly borrows 'abi', 'dey', and 'ein' from Nigerian but uses its own word, 'commot' frequently as well[Tinye edensibịa] Because of Nollywood influence, it is fairly common for Ghanaians to understand Nigerian Pidgin
Furthermore, unlike Nigerian pidgin, the use of Ghanaian pidgin is gendered[Tinye edensibịa]
Pidgin ụmụ akwụkwọ malitere na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị nwoke niile dị na Ghana n'afọ ndị 1960 ruo 1970, ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị na-arịwanye elu ugbu a na-ejikwa SP
Aha Ghana (ma ọ bụ aha onwe onye na Ghana) nwere ọtụtụ aha na aha nna dabere na asụsụ nke agbụrụ dị na Ghana gụnyere Akan, Mole-Dagombas, Ga, Ewe na Nzema
Ugboro ugboro, a na-enye ụmụaka 'aha ụbọchị' nke kwekọrọ n'ụbọchị n'izu mgbe a mụrụ ha
Aha ụbọchị ndị a nwere ihe ndị ọzọ gbasara mkpụrụ obi na àgwà onye ahụ
Aha ndị dị n'etiti nwere ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche ma nwee ike izo aka na usoro ọmụmụ ha, ọnọdụ ejima, ma ọ bụ aha nna nna
A na-ejikwa aha ndị a mee ihe n'etiti ndị Ghana bi na mba ọzọ na n'etiti Ndị Afrịka bi na diaspora na-achọ ịmata ala nna nna ha
N'ime narị afọ nke 18 na nke 19, a na-akpọ ndị ohu si Ghana nke oge a na Caribbean Coromantees
A na-enyekarị ụmụ agbọghọ ọtụtụ aha ụbọchị n'etiti Mole-Dagombas, ọ bụkwa ole na ole ka a na-enye ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị
Ọtụtụ ndị Ghana nwere opekata mpe otu aha sitere na sistemụ a, ọbụlagodi na ha nwekwara aha Arabik ma ọ bụ ọdịda anyanwụ
Ndị ama ama nwere aha ụbọchị gụnyere onye isi ala Ghana mbụ Kwame Nkrumah na onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu mba United Nations bụ Kofi Annan
Uwe Ghana bụ uwe elu dị larịị nke yiri dashiki, nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke na-eyi na Ghana
Ọ bụ ejiji ọdịnala kachasị ewu ewu na Ghana
A na-akpọ uwe ahụ Bingmaa n'asụsụ Dagbani, Bun-nwá ma ọ bụ Bana site na Mamprusis, fugu na Mosi, batakari na mpaghara ndịda, dansika na Frafra, na Banaa na Kusaal ma na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ
Ndị eze na ndị nkịtị na-eyi ya gafee Dagbon na mpaghara ndị ọzọ dị n'ebe ugwu, mana ọ na-ewu ewu na Ghana
Uwe ahụ malitere na mpaghara ugwu nke Ghana mana a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe na West Africa na ndị diasporans gafee ụwa
Uwe ahụ adịghị iche na uwe mba nke Burkina Faso nke a maara dị ka faso dan fadi
Uwe uwe na akwa Kente bụ uwe mba Ghana
Kente akwa malitere na mpaghara ndịda Ghana
Emere smock ahụ bụ ibe ndị nwere aka na-ewu ewu nke a na-akpọ Strip Cloths
A na-eji ngwakọta owu na-esiji na nke a na-esijighị eteji mee ha, ha sikwa n'ebe ugwu Ghana na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke West Africa
A na-eji aka ma ọ bụ igwe dụkọta ibe ndị ahụ ọnụ na-eme ka smock ahụ dị ka plaid
Ọtụtụ smocks nwere akwa akwa n'olu
A na-eji okpu kufi na-eyi smock
Agbanyeghị, ndị isi na Ghana na-eji okpu fez na-acha uhie uhie na-eyi smock
Ghanem Zrelly (a mụrụ n'abalị 6, ọnwa Disemba, afọ 1984), bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Thala My Love, Day of the Falcon, Beauty and the Dogs na In Paradox
N'afọ 2007, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri Thirty
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado nke 'Habib Bourguiba'
N'afọ sochirinụ, o mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya na usoro Njoum Ellil ma rụọ ọrụ 'Qais'
N'afọ 2009, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institut Superieur d' Art Dramatique na Tunisia

N'afọ 2016, o ritere ihe nrite maka ọrụ nwoke kacha mma maka ọrụ ya 'Mehdi' na ihe nkiri Narcisse nke Sonia Chamkhi duziri n'oge mbipụta nke ise nke Maghrebian Film Festival nke a haziri na Oujda, Morocco
N'afọ 2017, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri a ma ama Beauty and the Dogs ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Youssef'

Ayotunde Ganiyu Anifowoshe (amụrụ ya na 3 Febụwarị 1985 na Niamey) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ndị otu Kwara United FC
Anifowoshe gbara bọọlụ na Göyazan Qazax n'oge afọ 2004 na 2005 na Azerbaijan na Olimpik Baku n'oge afọ 2006 na 2007
Ghawazi (nke a na-akpọkwa ghawazee) (Egyptian Arabic الغوازي) bụ ụmụ nwanyị na-agba egwú maka ego; nwoke ya bụ khawal

Ọ bụ ezie na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ọdịnala raqs sharqi n'ime obodo ukwu Ijipt bụ ndị oge ochie ma nwee mmetụta nke ụdị ọdịda anyanwụ ndị ọzọ dịka ballet oge a maọbụ ịgba egwú Latin America, okwu ghawazi na Ijipti na-akọwa maka Ndị ndị na-gba egwu n'ime ime obodo Ijipta bụ bụ Ndị chebere ụdị omenala nke narị afọ nke 18 ruo 19
Omume a malitere mgbe Domari ndị Ijipt ole na ole jụrụ ịgba egwú n'efu, n'ụzọ dị iche na omenala nʼetiti Ijipti niile
Ndị Ijipt nọ n'ime ime obodo maọbụ Fellahin nabatara omume ahụ, na-emepe ụdị ime ime obodo na ọdịnala nke abụ ndị Ijipti dị na uwe ndị mara mma nke Felhig, bụrụ isiokwu nke ime ala Ijip
N'afọ 1834, Muhammad Ali chụpụrụ ndị ghawazi na Cairo gaa Upper Egypt
Na mbido, ndị Ghawazi bụ obere ìgwè a chụpụrụ n'ihi ịgba egwú ha dị ala

Ka ọ na-erule oge a chụpụrụ ha, okwu ahụ aghọwo okwu n'ozuzu maka ndị na-gba egwú ọ bụla ebe ọ gụnyere egwu ọdịnala na ọdịbendị niile nke ndị ime obodo na ndị dị n'elu Ijipt, nke na-egosịpụta karịa mizmars na bass dị arọ na egwu ọdịdị ndị ọzọ nke Ijipti n-adabere

Malite na ọkara mbụ nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, nkọwa na ngosipụta nke ndị na-agba egwú ghawazi ghọrọ ndị a ma ama na European Orientalism, a kọwakwara ụdị ahụ dịka danse de ventre maọbụ belly-dance site na'afọ ndị 1860s
Ndị Ghawazis mbụ mere n'okporo ámá
Ịgagharị ngwa ngwa na iji mkpịsị aka ọla / aka castanets gosipụtara ịgba egwu ha
Ndị na-eti egwu nke agbụrụ ha na'-esonyekarị ha n'ịgba egwú ha
Ha na-eyikarị kohl gburugburu anya ha na henna na mkpịsị aka ha, ọbụ aka, mkpado ụkwụ na ụkwụ
Ghawazi na-eme ihe n'ụlọ, maọbụ n'okporo ámá, nʼihu ọnụ ụzọ, na oge ụfọdụ nke ememe n'ụlọ ezinaụlọ
A nabataghị ha n'ime ndị inyom a na-akwanyere ùgwù, mana a nabatara ha ugboro ugboro iji mee ka otu ndị ikom nwee obi ụtọ n'ụlọ ụfọdụ
Ma ụmụ nwanyị ma ụmụ nwoke nwere ntụrụndụ ha
Otú ọ dị, ọtụtụ ndị na-ekpe okpukpere chi nke ukwuu, maọbụ ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị elu, anabataghị ha
Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ nwere mmasị na ịgba egwú nke Ghawazi, mana ha chere na ọ bụghị ihe kwesịrị ekwesị n'ihi na ụmụ nwanyị na-ekwesịghị ikpughe onwe ha n'ụzọ dị otu a n'egwú
N'ihi nke a, e nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ụmụ nwoke na-eme ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Khawals
Ndị Khawals bụ ndị na-agba egwú ọdịnala ndị Ijipt bụ ụmụ nwanyị Ghawazi na ịgba egwu ha
A maara ha ka ha na-eme akụkụ ọ bụla nke ụmụ nwanyị gụnyere ịgba egwú ha ma jiri castanets

A na-akpọ ngwaọrụ yiri nke ahụ sitere na South India jhula ma ọ bụ parnu

Asụsụ Ghomara bụ asụsụ Northern Berber a na-asụ na Morocco
Ọ bụ asụsụ ala nna nke Ghomara Berbers, nke mkpokọta ihe ruru mmadụ 10,000
A na-asụ Ghomara Berber na nsọtụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Rif, n'etiti ebo Beni Bu Zra na Beni Mansur nke Ghomara confederacy
N'agbanyeghị na edepụtara ya dị ka ndị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ, a ka na-ebufe ya ụmụaka nọ n'akụkụ ndị a

Ghyslaine Salomé Nke Noah (onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ asatọ nke ọnwa June n'afọ 1989), nke a maara dị ka Salomé Nke, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu Malabo Kings, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onyeisi nke otu egwuregwu boolụ ahụ
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Cameroon, ọ bụ nwa amaala Equatorial Guinea ma na-agba egwuregwu bọọlụ nye otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ahụ
Nke sonyeere n'òtù ahụ na 2012 African Women's Championship
Akara nweta edepụtara nke mmepụta ya nke Equatorial Guinea bịara dị ka nke mbụ
Giants, Monsters & Dragons An Encyclopedia of Folklore, Legend and Myth bụ encyclopedia nke ndị dike, akụkọ ọdịnala, myths, na akụkọ mgbe ochie nke Carol Rose chịkọtara
Akwụkwọ a nwere obere ndenye gbasara nnukwu anụ mmiri, akụkọ ọdịnala, akụkọ ifo na akụkọ ifo sitere na gburugburu ụwa, ma gụnye ọtụtụ ihe atụ
Jipson Butukondolo bụ onye na-ede egwu, onye na-agụ egwú, na onye na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ n'òtù Quartier Latin International
Ìgwè ahụ sitere na Democratic Republic of the Congo ma onye egwu Congo bụ Koffi Olomide guzobere ya ma duzie ya
site na AFỌ 1998 ruo na AFỌ 2008
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị Butukondolo sonyere na ya, n'ọrụ dị mkpa, gụnyere Ba Lobiens na Biblia
Gidan Makama Museum Kano ma ọ bụ Kano Museum bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie dị na steeti Kano, Nigeria

Ụlọ a rụrụ ọrụ dị ka obí eze nwa oge nke Kano tupu e wuo obí eze ugbu a bụ Gidan Rumfa na narị afọ nke iri na ise Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere nnukwu nchịkọta nka, ọrụ aka na ihe ndị nwere mmasị akụkọ ihe mere eme metụtara mpaghara Kano
Ọ dị na ụlọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke narị afọ nke iri na ise, nke Gọọmentị Naịjirịa ghọtara dị ka ihe ncheta mba
E kewara ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ n'ime ụlọ ngosi iri na otu, nke ọ bụla nwere ebe ha na-elekwasị anya

Ihe ngosi nka gụnyere Zaure ma ọ bụ nnukwu ụlọ mbata nke nwere ngosipụta nke ihe ọdịnala, mgbidi obodo na map nke Kano, akụkọ ihe mere eme nke steeti, Kano na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, Agha Obodo, akụ na ụba, ụlọ ọrụ na egwu
Ebe mepere emepe n'ime ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ebe a na-eme ihe nkiri maka otu egwu na ihe nkiri Koroso
E wuru ụlọ ahụ na narị afọ nke iri na ise maka Muhammad Rumfa mgbe ahụ nwa nwa nke eze nke a họpụtara Makama Kano, aha ọdịnala
Rumfa mechara bụrụ Eze ma kwaga n'obí ọhụrụ mana Makamas sochirinụ biri n'ụlọ ahụ
Mgbe ndị mba Britain weghaara Kano n'afọ 1903, ebe ahụ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ maka ndị isi ọchịchị na steeti Kano
E mechara kewaa ihe owuwu ahụ n'akụkụ atọ
Otu ngalaba ghọrọ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke Ngalaba Antiquities na-elekọta, nke ọzọ ghọrọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke atọ nọgidere na-enwe ebumnuche mbụ dị ka ụlọ obibi
Gidan Makama bụzi akụkụ nke ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie n'okpuru njikwa nke National Commission of Museums and Monuments na otu n'ime ụlọ ochie na-egosi ụlọ ọdịnala Hausa
Ọdịdị ahụ nwere mgbidi aja nke oge ahụ mana n'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ụfọdụ ọrụ nrụzigharị nke oge a emeela
Ihe ngosi nka a dị n'okporo ụzọ Emir Palace ma kewaa ya n'ime ụlọ ngosi iri na otu na nke ọ bụla nwere akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ihe ọdịnala Kanawa, foto, ngwá egwu, ọrụ aka na ihe
Ụlọ ihe nkiri ndị ahụ bụ ọnụ ụlọ na ogige nke Makamas ochie ma gosipụta ụdị ebe obibi ọdịnala nke onye isi steeti Kano
Ọnụ ụzọ ámá ndị ahụ gosipụtara ụfọdụ ite akụkọ ihe mere eme mgbe ochie nke a kwenyere na e gwupụtara na Kofar Kabuga, ọnụ ụzọ ámá dị n'ime mgbidi obodo Kano na egbe abụọ nke ndị ọchịchị
Ụlọ ahụ nwere ụlọ ngosi iri na otu (11)
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere ụlọ ngosi iri na otu nke ọ bụla nwere ihe, ihe ochie na foto ndị na-anọchite anya ihe nketa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị mmadụ
Gidar (Gidder), ma ọ bụ Kaɗa, bu asụsụ BiuńMandara (Chadic) nke Cameroon na Chad
A na-asụ Gedar site na Guider ruo n'ókè Chad na Far North Region nke Cameroon, na Ngalaba Mayo-Kani (akụkụ nke Kaélé na Moutourwa), na na North Region, Mayo-Louti Department
Baynawa pụtara 'enyi m' n'asụsụ Gedar, na aha a bụ ihe ụfọdụ ndị na-eji maka Gedar (ALCAM 1983)
Àtụ Languages of CameroonÀtụ Languages of ChadÀtụ Biu–Mandara languages
Gideon Mendel (amụrụ n'ubochí irí atọ n'otu n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1959) bụ onye na-ese foto
Ọrụ ya na-etinye aka na nsogbu mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke oge a nke nchegbu ụwa
Ụdị ya nke ime ihe oyiyi, na ntinye aka ogologo oge na ọrụ emeela ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama
Mendel nwere ọrụ karịrị afọ iri anọ
O sitere na South Africa, ọ na-ebi ugbu a na London
Ọ bụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto n'ime afọ ndị ikpeazụ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke izizi dọtara uche n'ọrụ ya
A mụrụ ya na Johannesburg n'afọ 1959, Mendel gụrụ nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa na Mahadum Cape Town
Ọ bịdọrọ ise foto n'ihe dika afọ 1980s n'ime afọ ndị ikpeazụ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma mepụta ọtụtụ ọrụ na-edekọ ọnọdụ ọha na eze na ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na South Africa
Na mmalite afọ 1990 ọ kwagara London, ebe ọ nọgidere na-azaghachi nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ụwa niile
Ọ na-eme njem nke ukwuu iji mee nke a, nke a na-egosipụta site na foto ya na-elekwasị anya na ndị mmadụ na ọha mmadụ si mba dị iche iche n'ụwa niile
A na-emepụta ụfọdụ ọrụ ya n'ime ogologo oge
Vidio aghọwo akụkụ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ọ na-ejikwa foto jikọrọ aka dị ka ụzọ isi soro ndị ọ na-ese okwu
Mendel arụwo ọrụ banyere National Geographic, Fortune, Geo, The Independent magazine, The Guardian Weekend magazine, The Sunday Times magazine, Condé Nast Traveler, L'Express, Stern na Rolling Stone
E bipụtara akwụkwọ izizi ya, A Broken Landscape HIV & AIDS in Africa, n'afọ 2001

Kemgbe ahụ, o mepụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ nkwado foto, na-arụ ọrụ na ọrụ ebere na òtù mgbasa ozi gụnyere The Global Fund, Médecins Sans Frontières, Treatment Action Campaign, International HIV / AIDS Alliance, ActionAid, Terrence Higgins Trust, Shelter, Leonard Cheshire Disability, UNICEF na Concern Worldwide
Kemgbe afọ 2007, Mendel anọwo na-arụ ọrụ na Drowning World, ọrụ nka na nkwado banyere idei mmiri
Ka ọ dị ugbu a [mgbe?] edepụtara ihe banyere ihe nrite Prix Pictet, ọ bụ nzaghachi onwe ya maka mgbanwe ihu igwe
Mendel bịdọrọ ọrụ ahụ ógè ọ gachara UK, wee gaa India iji dekọọ mmebi nke idei mmiri kpatara izu ole na ole site na ibe ya
'Mmetụta dị iche iche nke idei mmiri ahụ, na oke nke ndị ha metụtara' kpaliri ya
Ọ kọwara ọrụ ahụ dị ka 'mgbalị m na-eme ịchọpụta mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe n'ụzọ dị nso, na-eduga anyị karịa ọnụ ọgụgụ na-enweghị ihu na n'ime ahụmịhe nke ndị ọ na-emegbu
' Kemgbe ọ bịdọrọ ọrụ ahụ, o dekọrọ mmebi nke idei mmiri na mmetụta nke ndị bi n'ógbè ndị idei mmiri metụtara na mba ndị gụnyere Haiti, Pakistan, Australia, Thailand, Nigeria, Germany na Philippines
Ihe dị oké mkpa n'akụkọ nke ọrụ ahụ bụ ihe osise ndị dị n'ime mmiri
A na-ejikarị ụlọ ndị idei mmiri na-eme ihe dị ka ebe, na-emepụta gburugburu ebe obibi gbanwere nke ukwuu
Ọrụ zuru ezu nwere ihe osise ndị a, yana usoro abụọ ọzọ
Flood Lines na-edekọ mmetụta nke mmiri ozuzo nke oghere dị n'ime, na Water Marks na-edekọta mgbanwe nke mmiri ozu hapụrụ na foto onwe onye nke ndị ahụ nwụrụ, nke Mendel na-ese foto ma na-anakọta
A maara ọrụ a n'ihi na ojiji a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke ihe osise, yana njikọta ya nke foto na vidiyo
N'iji ihe nkiri sitere na njem ya, Mendel esorowo ndị na-eme vidio rụkọọ ọrụ iji mepụta usoro ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi
Vidio na-eso foto na usoro ahụ
Otu n'ime isi ihe ndị ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya bụ nsogbu HIV / AIDS
Mendel bịdọrọ ide akwụkwọ HIV / AIDS na mpaghara Sahara Africa na mmalite afọ 1990
Ọ bụ ezie na mmata banyere ọrịa ahụ na-eto ngwa ngwa n'oge ahụ, ọgwụgwọ antiretroviral (ART) ka siri ike ịnweta ọtụtụ ndị kasị daa ogbenye na kọntinent ahụ
N'ihi ya, ọrịa ahụ na-enwe mmetụta na-ebibi ihe na obodo dị iche iche gafee mpaghara kọntinent ahụ
Ógè ọ kọchara ọrịa AIDS n'ógbè ndị a, Mendel bịdọrọ ịzụlite ihe bụ ihe a na-elekwasị anya na ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1993 foto Mendel dekọrọ ndụ ndị ọrịa anọ nwere nje HIV na Middlesex Hospital na London, UK
O bu n'uche igosi ha dị ka ndị nwere ndụ na mmekọrịta
Tinyere akwụkwọ (The Ward, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 2017) e nwere ihe ngosi nke ụfọdụ foto na Fitzrovia Chapel n'ime ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ
N'oge ọrụ a, ọ zutere onye nọọsụ, Sarah, onye ghọrọ onye mmekọ ya ogologo oge
Isi nke na-aga n'ihu nke ọrụ ya na ọrịa AIDS, Through Positive Eyes, bụ ọrụ mmekorita ya na UCLA Art and Global Health Center
Ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ na ndị dị n'obodo asaa gburugburu ụwa, ha niile nwere nje HIV
Nzukọ ahụ kọwara ọrụ ahụ dị ka ịkọ 'akụkọ banyere HIV / AIDS na afọ iri nke anọ nke ọrịa ahụ' ógè ịnweta ọgwụgwọ 'dị anya site na ụwa niile'
N'ịbụ nke Davide Gere mepụtara na UCLA, onye na-ese foto ibe ya bụ Crispin Hughes na-eduzi ụlọ ọrụ ndị bụ akụkụ nke ọrụ ahụ
N'ime ọrụ a, ọrụ Mendel agbanweela site na onye na-ese foto gaa na onye na'ime ka ọ rụọ ọrụ, na-enyefe igwefoto ahụ na ndị nwere nje HIV, ndị ya na ha na-arụkọ ọrụ iji dekọọ akụkọ ha
Mendel so n'otu ọgbọ nke 'ndị na-ese foto na-alụ ọgụ', na-etinye aka n'idepụta esemokwu na ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke afọ 1980 na mbà South Africa
N'ịbụ onye e were n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto akụkọ, ọ bụ site na ikpuchi ọnọdụ ndị a ka ọ bịdọrọ ọrụ ya
Ọ na-ekwu na n'ileghachi anya azụ, ọ 'na-anwa ịghọta oge ọgba aghara a n'amaghị na mgbanwe dị nso'
nakwa na 'ahụmahụ ahụ emetụtala ụzọ m si ese foto kemgbe ahụ'

Mendel emepụtala ọtụtụ ọrụ, nke ọ na-anwa ịghọta echiche nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na mmetụta ya na-aga n'ihu na South Africa na ndị ya, ọkachasị Living in Yeoville, ihe nkiri nke Okwui Enwezor nyere iwu banyere ngosi Rise and Fall of Apartheid

Gideon Okeke bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya na onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV
Ọ bịara n'anya ọha na eze na 2006 mgbe ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-asọ mpi na mbipụta mbụ nke Big Brother Nigeria
N'afọ 2008, Gideon sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke MNET TV Tinsel nke ọ bụ onye na-eme mgbe niile
Dịka otu nwa, Gideon tolitere na Ajegunle, otu n'ime ogige ndị ogbenye nke Lagos, ebe ọ na-ekwu okwu n'ụzọ dị mma
Ọ gara Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe ebe ọ gụrụ applied bio-chemistry
O mechara banye na Lee Strasberg institute na New York ebe ọ nwetara ọzụzụ ọkachamara na ime ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ pụtara na ngosiputa mbụ nke Big Brother Nigeria, Gideon sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke M-NET a kpọrọ Tinsel, dị ka Phillip Ade Williams, nwa dị mpako nke onye mgbasa ozi
Ọ ka bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-arụ ọrụ ogologo oge na ihe ngosi ahụ
Gideon apụtawokwa na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke South Africa Jacobs cross N'afọ 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Bernard na usoro irokotv Poisoned Bait, nke onye nduzi BAFTA LA Leila Djansi duziri
Na mgbakwunye, Gideon bụ onye na-elekọta ihe ngosi egwuregwu DSTV Money Drop
Gideon nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Naijiria a kpọrọ Relentless n'afọ 2010, ya na Jimmy Jean-Louis na Nneka Egbuna
Ọrụ nke abụọ ọ rụrụ bụ n'ihe nkiri afọ 2014 a kpọrọ A Place in the Stars
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Tobena, mmasị ịhụnanya nke onye isi na-eme ihe ọchị ịhụnanya mgbe ịhụnanya na-eme
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya na ihe nkiri 93 Days
N'ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'akụkụ Danny Glover, Gideon nwetara nhọpụta AMVCA maka ngosipụta ya nke Dr Morris Ibeawuchi, otu n'ime ndị dọkịta na-adị ndụ na nsogbu Ebola nke Naijiria
Gideon apụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nke gụnyere Fractures, nke Arthur Miller dere site na A View From The Bridge

Ememme Omenala Gidi (nke a na-akpọkarị Coachella na Lagos) bụ mmemme egwu na nka otu ụbọchị nke na-eme na Lagos, Naijiria
Chinedu Okeke na Oriteme Banigo mebere ya, ka emebere ya n'ihi ọchịchọ sitere n'omenala ndị ntorobịa obodo maka ndụ, ọnụ ahịa na ihe ntụrụndụ dị n'Africa
