Gift Monday (amuru 9 Disemba 2001) bu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria nke na-egwu egwu dika onye ọkpọ n'ụlọ ọgbakọ NWFL Premiership FC Robo, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dịka onye isi, yana otu egwuregwu mba ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria
Na ọnwa Jenụwarị 2021, Mọnde ka akpọrọ onye ọkpụkpọ nke ọnwa nke otu egwuregwu maka ọnwa nke abụọ n'usoro
Na Onwa Maachị 2021, Mọnde meriri ihe nkwado iji bulie FC Robo na mmeri 2–1 meriri Rivers Angels enweghị mmeri
Monday gbara asọmpi na asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị 2018 FIFA U-20 na France
N'afọ 2019, ọ chịgoro otu egwuregwu ahụ n'ọlaedo mbụ ya n'ime afọ iri na abụọ n'egwuregwu Africa mgbe o meriri Cameroon na penariti 3-1
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2021, akpọrọ Mọnde ka ọ bụrụ ndị otu otu egwuregwu mba tupu asọmpi iko ụmụ nwanyị Turkey 2021
Ọ so na ndị otu meriri n'asọmpi a ma bụrụkwa ndị otu Afrịka mbụ mere nke a
Ọ nyere goolu nke asatọ na mmeri otu ahụ meriri Equatorial Guinea 9–0
Onyinye Ele Otuwe (amụrụ na 15 Julaị afọ 1984) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dika onye etiti
Ọ gbara maka 1207 Antalya Spor na ụmụ nwanyi Turkish n'agba bọọlụ nke mbụ
Obu onye otu ndi Naijiria, na-ekere òkè na 2004 Summer Olimpik na 2007 World Cup
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka FC Minsk na Belarus na-etinye oge iri itoolụ na asas ma na-atụle ihe mgbaru ọsọ iri atọ na anọ tupu ọ kwaga Turkey na Machị afọ 2017
Onyinye Showemimo (amụrụ ya na 24 Mee afọ 1974) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dika onye n'agaa n'ihu maka otu mba umu nwanyi na naijiria
O so na otu ndi FIFA World Cup 1991
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Kakanfo Babes na Naijiria
Gifty Addy (amụrụ na 19 Jenụwarị na afọ 1984 na Accra) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ nke maara nke ọma na mita 200
Gifty Klenam bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana ma bụrụkwa onye omeiwu nke Lower West Akim na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Ghana na nzuko omeiwu nke ise nke mba 4th nke Ghana
A mụrụ Klenam na July 12, 1970
Ọ si Asamankese na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana
Ọ nwetara asambodo na nchịkwa nchịkwa na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration na 2008
N'ịbụ onye a họpụtara ma bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu, Gifty Klenam bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ọrụ ugbo, Ọ bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Sunharvest Company Limited nke dị na Pokuase
Ugbu a, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onyeisi oche na Ghana Export Promotion Authority
Klenam bụ onye otu New Patriotic Party
A họpụtara ya na mbụ dị ka onye omeiwu iji nọchite anya Lower West Akim Constituency na 2008 Ghanaian General Elections ma ọ malitere ọrụ na 7 Jenụwarị 2009
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na ntuli aka izugbe nke 2012 mana o meriri primaries ya na Eyiah Kyei-Baffour na 2015 ma enweghị ike ịzọ ọkwa na ntuli aka mba Ghana nke afọ 2016
A họpụtara Klenam na ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 2008 dị ka onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Lower West Akim na omeiwu nke ise nke mba Ghana nke anọ
A họpụtara ya na tiketi nke New Patriotic party mgbe ọ nwetasịrị votu 21,912 n'ime vootu 36,337 ziri ezi, nke kwekọrọ na 603% nke ngụkọta vootu

A họpụtara ya ka Juda Mohammed Awale nke People's National Convention, Seth Otchere nke National Democratic Congress, Nyadua Kofi Evans nke Democratic People's Party, Patrick Kwabena Adjei nke Convention People's Party na Martin Bruce Opare onye nọọrọ onwe ya
Ndị a nwetara 169%, 3545%, 032% na 223% n'otu n'otu nke ngụkọta vootu niile ziri ezi
Klenam lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst na-efe ofufe na International Central Gospel Church
Ọ na-efe ofufe na Salvation Gate Chapel

TGil Semedo Moreira (amụrụ n'Oktoba 25, na afọ 1974), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Gil Semedo, bụ onye na-edekọ egwu na Cape Verde, onye na-ede egwu, onye ọchụnta ego, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na afọ 1991 mgbe a tọhapụrụ 'Menina', egwu mbụ sitere na abọm izizi ya nke nwere otu aha ahụ

Gil bụ otu n'ime ndị ama ama kachasị ike n'Afrịka na-asụ Portuguese, ebe ọ rere ihe karịrị otu nde ndekọ ma mepụta ụdị egwu nke ya (ngwakọta nke ụdị egwu ọdịnala Cape Verdean dị ka Coladeira, Funana na Batuko agwakọta ya na zouk, pop na R&B)
A mụrụ Semedo na Santiago, Cape Verde, mgbe ọ dị afọ isii ọ kwagara Netherlands, ebe ọ ka bi
O nwetara ọganihu ya na afo 1990 mgbe ọ ruru na ngwụcha na ihe ngosi Dutch talent TV Sound Mix Show mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
Ọ ga-aga n'ihu wepụta egwu mbụ ya n'afọ sochirinụ, n'afọ 1991
Carlos Gilberto Mendes (a mụrụ na 3 Mee 1966) bụ onye Mozambican na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ Mendes na Maputo n'afọ 1966
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1977, ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ mbụ ya nke igwu mmiri ma bụrụ onye otu egwuregwu mba Mozambik ruo ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 1985, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi na ihe nkiri mbụ Mozambican, nke akpọrọ O Vento Sopra do Norte, nke José Cardoso duziri ma National Film Institute mepụtara
N'afọ 1988, ọ sonyeere otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Mutumbela Gogo
Mendes sonyere n'egwuregwu Nove Horas mgbe onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwere ọnyá ma tụbọọ, ahụmahụ nke mere ka ọ na-echegbu onwe ya
Mendes pụtara na ihe nkiri afọ 1991 A Child from the South, nke Sergio Resende duziri
N'afọ 1992, ọ hapụrụ Mutumbela Gogo wee nweta ụlọ ihe nkiri Matchedje (1000 oche) na Estúdio 222 (222 oche), yana ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke ya, Gungu
A gbahapụrụ ụlọ ihe nkiri Matchedje n'oge gara aga ma rụọ ọrụ dịka ụlọ nkwakọba ihe maka ihe ndị e zuru ohi site na Port Maputo
N'afọ 1995, ọ natara Lusophone Merit Award site na Portuguese-Brazilian Foundation for the Development of the Portuguese Language
N'afọ 1996, Mendes malitere ọrụ afọ iri ya dịka onye na-akwado mmemme telivishọn egwu Fantasia
Site n'afọ 2010 ruo 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi oche nke Mozambique Swimming Federation
Na Jenụwarị 2020, a họpụtara Mendes ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke State maka egwuregwu
Gilda Snowden (ubochí irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị, 1954 rụo ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba, 2014) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe, ónyé nkuzi na ónyé nduzi si Detroit, Michigan
A mụrụ Snowden na Detroit, Michigan n'ubochí irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị, 1954, ma too na ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Detroit
Nna Snowden bụ dọkịta ezé
Nné na nnà ya na nne na nna nna ya si Alabama na Texas kwaga Detroit na mbido narị afọ nke iri abụọ, akụkụ nke nnukwu njem nke ndị Africa America site na ime ọbọdọ South gaa n'ọbọdọ ukwu North
Ọ gara Cass Technical High School na-elekwasị anya na imewe ejiji
Snowden nwetara nzere BFA ya na Advertising Design and Painting na 1977 na nzere MFA ya na Painting na 1979 na Mahadum Wayne State
O kpebiri na afọ nke abụọ ya na kọleji ka ọ lekwasị anya na nka màrà mmá
Na Mahadum Wayne State, ọ nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu site na Cass Corridor art movement ma soro onye na-ese ihe John Egner mụọ ihe
Ọ lụrụ William 'Bill' Boswell, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ónyé nduzi nke Detroit Repertory Theatre
N'afọ 1985, Gilda Snowden ghọrọ prọfesọ na Ngalaba Fine Arts na College for Creative Studies (CCS) na Detroit
Ọ kụziri na CCS ruo afọ iri atọ na otu, na-eje ozi dị ka onyeisi óche màkà ngalaba nka màrà mmá na ngalaba eserese n'oge dị iche iche n'oge ọ nọ ebe ahụ
Na kọleji ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ónyé nlekọta na onye ọka ikpe màkà ihe ngosi nka
Ọrụ Gilda Snowden na-abụkarị ihe omimi nke na-eji ụcha dị mma
Ọbọdọ Detroit kpaliri ọtụtụ ọrụ
Usoro Flora Urbana ya gosipụtara ụdị okooko osisi ndị a na-adịghị ahụ anya, na encaustic, nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ogige ndị Detroit na-elekọta ugbu a na ala ebe ụlọ dịbu
City Album Department of Railways 1929 bụ ihe atụ sitere na usoro mkpofu icheku ọkụ o mere na mkpuchi olulu Detroit ọ chọpụtara na ọ na-agba ịnyịnya n'obodo ahụ na ịnyịnya ígwè ya
Otu n'ime nsọpụrụ ndị Gilda Snowden nwetara bụ
E gosipụtara ọrụ Gilda Snowden na gallery na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, nke a bụ ndepụta ahọpụtara nke ihe ngosi ya gụnyere
Snowden nwụrụ na Septemba úbọchị itoolu, 2014, mgbe ọ dị afọ irí isii
A na-arụ ọrụ Snowden na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka na-adịgide adịgide gụnyere Detroit Institute of Arts, David C
Driskell Center na Mahadum Maryland, Oakland University Art Gallery, na Wayne State University Art Collection
The Gilda Snowden Emerging Artist Awards, nke The Kresge Foundation kwadoro kemgbe 2015, na-asọpụrụ ndụ Gilda Snowder nke ọrụ na-eduzi ndị na-ese ihe na mpaghara Detroit
Gillian Condy, amụrụ n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Disemba 1952 Nairobi, bụ onye na-ese ihe ọkụkụ na South Africa

O gosipụtara ihe karịrị efere narị abụọ màkà Flants Flowering Plants of Africa, nyere aka na mbipụta ndị ọzọ dị iche iche nke South African National Botanical Institute na efere asatọ màkà Curtisz Botanical Magazine
O sere ihe osise abụọ nke Charles Craib, Geophytic Pelargoniums (2001) na Grass Aloes in the South African Veld (2005)
O nyekwara aka na ngalaba akụkọ ndụ n'akwụkwọ South African Botanical Art Peeling back the Petals (2001)
A mụrụ Condy na Kenya, nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ nke Thomas Roy Condy na Phyllis Mary Poulton, ma nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Uganda ebe ịhụnanya ya maka Africa na osisi ya bịdọrọ
Ọ natara ọzụzụ ya na Middlesex Polytechnic na London dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise akụkọ ihe mere eme ma nweta nzere Master of Arts na Royal College of Art màkà ọrụ akpọrọ 'British Poisonous Plants'
Condy laghachiri Africa site na Phuthadikobo Museum na Mochudi na Botswana na International Volunteer Service ma nọrọ afọ abụọ na-eme ya ihe ike tupu ọ kwaga Lobatse
N'afọ 1983 ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe ọkụkụ na South African National Botanical Institute na Pretoria, ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2018
Ọ nọgidere na-enwe mmekọrịta ya na Botswana site na imepụta stampụ irí na atọ màkà mba ahụ kemgbe afọ 1982
Royal Horticultural Society enyewo Condy ihe nrite ọla edo ma n'afọ 1990 e nyere ya Jill Smythies Award site na Linnean Society nke London
N'afọ 1992, ọ natara onyinye Beeld Stamp Design of the Year màkà Edible Wild Fruits of Bophuthatswana na nke abụọ na 1993 màkà Acacia Trees
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mba ụwa n'ihe karịrị ihe ngosi irí isii
O gosikwara na 7th International Exhibit of Botanical Art and Illustration, Hunt Institute for Botanical Documentation na Pittsburgh, USA
N'afọ 2000, e nyere ya ihe nrite ọla edo na Kirstenbosch Exhibition of Botanical Art, Silver sochiri ya n'afọ 2002 na Gold n'afọ 2004
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2001, e nyere ya Cythna Letty Medal site na Botanical Society of South Africa
N'afọ 2006, o mepụtara stampụ isii màkà South Africa na-egosi ụdị Clivia
Gillian Condy bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ndị otu Botanical Artists Association of Southern Africa (BAASA)
Ọ na-eduzi ọmụmụ nka oge niile màkà SANBI na BAASA
A na-ahụ ihe osise ya na Blue Train na nchịkọta gburugburu ụwa
Gillian Joanna Merron, Baroness Merron ( (amụrụ 12 Eprel 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain na onye ọgbọ ndụ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Board of Deputies of British Jew kemgbe 2014
Onye otu Labour Party, ọ bụ onye na-ekwuchitere onyinyo nke ahụike na ahụike Nlekọta mmekọrịta kemgbe 2021
Ọ bụbu onye otu nzuko omeiwu (MP) maka Lincoln site na 1997 ruo 2010 wee nwee ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ minista na gọọmentị Blair na Brown

A mụrụ Merron na Ilford, Essex site na ezinụlọ ndị Juu, wee gụ akwụkwọ na Wanstead High School na Wanstead na ọwụwa anyanwụ London Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nchịkwa Mahadum Lancaster, na-enweta BSc (Hons) na Science Management Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọchịchị ime obodo na dịka onye ọrụ otu NUPE (nke mechara UNISON)
Merron sonyeere Labour Party na 1984

Tupu aghọọ onye omeiwu, Merron bụ osote onye isi oche nke ngalaba Labour Party na mpaghara Ọ chịkọtara mkpọsa nke etiti mpaghara onyinyo onyinyo na ntuli aka izugbe 1992 na ntuli aka nzuko omeiwu Europe 1994

Emere Merron ka ọ bụrụ onye ndoro-ndoro omeiwu (PPC) site na ndepụta ụmụ nwanyị niile, wee họpụta ya na House of Commons na Mee 1997 yana ọtụtụ 11,130 Site na Julaị 1998 ruo Julaị 1999, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye ode akwụkwọ omeiwu nkeonwe (PPS) nye Doug Henderson dị ka onye minista steeti maka ndị agha na, site na Julaị 1999 ruo June 2001, ọ bụ PPS ruo Baroness Symons dị ka Minister of State for Defence Procurement

Site na June 2001 ruo Ọktoba 2002, Merron jere ozi dị ka PPS nye John Reid dịka odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka Northern Ireland Site na Ọktoba 2002 ruo Mee 2006, ọ bụ ụtarị gọọmentị ma bụrụkwa Lord Commissioner of Treasury site na Disemba 2004
Na ntuli aka izugbe nke 2005, ọnụ ọgụgụ ya bụ 4,613
A họpụtara Merron na Ngalaba Ụgbọ njem na Mee 2006, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo mgbe mgbanwe ahụ na 29 June 2007, mgbe ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ ndị omeiwu maka ụlọ ọrụ Cabinet na onye ozi mbụ nke East Midlands

N'ịgbaso arụkwaghịm nke Peter Hain na 24 Jenụwarị 2008, a gbanwegharịrị Merron ọzọ, bụrụ onye omeiwu n'okpuru odeakwụkwọ steeti na ngalaba maka mmepe mba ụwa, hapụrụ ọrụ abụọ ya gara aga N'ịgbaso ngbanwe Gordon Brown na-esote na 5 October 2008, a kpọgara Merron na Ụlọọrụ Ofesi na Ọfịs Commonwealth Nkwalite nye Minista steeti maka ahụike ọha na-esote n'oge na-adịghị anya

Merron soro pati ahụ pịa na votu na nha anya ikike nwoke nwere mmasị nwoke, mmachibido ịchụ nta, ụlọ ọgwụ ntọala, mmachibido iwu ise siga n'ebe ọha, agha Iraq, iwu mgbochi iji kwụsị mgbanwe ihu igwe, na The Digital Economy Bill Onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Conservative Karl McCartney tụfuru oche ya na ntuli aka izugbe 2010 Site na 1997 ruo 2007, mgbe Quentin Davies gbahapụrụ na Labour Party, ọ bụbu onye naanị Lincolnshire MP Labour - na nke mbụ kemgbe Margaret Beckett nwere oche site na 1974 ruo 1979
Emefu Merron dị ka MP dị elu karịa nkezi Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu 98 ndị tozuru oke ịkwado iwu Conservative MP David Maclean iji dobe mmefu ha na akwụkwọ ozi nzuzo

Na 19 June 2009, ekpughere mmefu ndị omeiwu (nke edeziri nke ukwuu) na ịntanetị Merron nwetara nkatọ maka ịzụrụ ihe onyonyo, igwe onyonyo, ngwa ihe nkiri ụlọ na ọtụtụ ngwa ahịa ndị ọzọ O dere na webụsaịtị ya, sị 'Ọtụtụ n'ime ebubo m na-akwụ ozugbo maka ndị ọrụ ọkachamara, ụgwọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ, nkwurịta okwu na ndị mejupụtara, na njem
Enweghị m ọrụ nke abụọ, anaghị m ewe ndị ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ ndị enyi ọ bụla n'ọrụ, ma ọ bụ were m mmụba nke ụgwọ ọnwa ndị minista kwa afọ'
N'ime mkpesa mmefu ndị omeiwu United Kingdom gasịrị, Sir Thomas Legg tụrụ aro ka Gillian Merron kwụọ £6,30517↵ Ọ kwụghachi ego a n'uju
Kemgbe mmeri emeriri ya na ntuli aka izugbe nke 2010, Merron abụrụla onye isi oche ndị ọrụ ụgbọ ala UK (nke a na-akpọbu National Federation of Bus Users)[
Na Mee 2014, a mara ọkwa na Merron ga-abụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Board of Deputies nke ndị Juu Britain na Julaị na-esote
Kemgbe February 2013, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Kansụl ndu ndị JuuỌ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ na-ahụ maka mpụga na bọọdụ Liberal Judaism site na Julaị 2012 ruo Mee 2014

Na Disemba 2020, ekwuputara na a ga-enye Merron ndụ ndụ mgbe onye isi otu Labour Party Keir Starmer họpụtara Ọ nọrọ oche ya na 8 February 2021 wee kwuo okwu nwa agbọghọ ya na Mee 13 n'oge arụmụka okwu Queen nke afọ ahụ
Na ngbanwe kabinet nke onyinyo May, a họpụtara ya na Otu Ahụike Shadow Na ngbanwe ụlọ ọrụ onyunyo nke November, ọ ghọrọ Minista Omenala Shadow
Gillian Slovo (amuru 15 Maachị 1952, na Johannesburg ) bu onye ode akwukwo South Africa, onye ode akwukwo na onye ntuta
Ọ bi na London kemgbe afọ 1964, mgbe ezinụlọ ya si South Africa gaa biri n'ebe ahụ
Ọ bụ onye nnata ihe nrite PEN Golden
Slovo gara Mahadum Manchester, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1974 na nzere bachelọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na nkà ihe ọmụma sayensị, tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye odeakụkọ na onye na-emepụta ihe onyonyo
Ezinụlọ Slovo bụ onye Juu
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Slovo bụ nke mbụ bụ mpụ na ụdị egwu egwu, gụnyere usoro na-egosipụta onye nchọpụta Kate Baeier, mana ọ dela akụkọ ifo karịa

Ọrụ ya na 2000 Red Dust, ihe nkiri ụlọ ikpe nke na-enyocha ihe pụtara na mmetụta nke South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission, mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri nke otu aha ahụ ewepụtara na 2004, nke Tom Hooper na-eduzi na kpakpando Hilary Swank, Chiwetel Ejiofor na Jamie
Bartlett
Slovo's 2004 ọrụ Ice Road ka edepụtara aha maka ihe nrite Orange maka akụkọ ifo
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na-agụnye ezigbo ihe omume (ọnwụ Sergey Kirov ) na nsụgharị akụkọ ifo nke ndụ n'oge nnọchibido nke Leningrad

Ihe ncheta Slovo nke afọ 1997, Ihe Nzuzo ọ bụla Ezinụlọ M, Mba M, bụ akụkọ banyere nwata ya na South Africa na mmekọrịta ya na nne na nna ya Joe Slovo na Ruth First - ma ndị isi South Africa Communist Party a ma ama na ndị isi na mgbochi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
mgba nke biri ndụ dị ize ndụ nke ndọrọ n’agha, nguzogide ngwa ọgụ, na ịtụ mkpọrọ oge ụfọdụ, bụ nke mezuru na ndị agha South Africa gburu nne ya na 1982
Ihe ncheta ezinụlọ n'ụdị ihe nkiri ngosi, A World Apart (1988), nke nwanne ya nwanyị Shawn Slovo dere ma mee Barbara Hershey
Na Victoria Brittain, Slovo chịkọtara egwuregwu Guantanamo Honor Bound to Defend Freedom, nke etinyere na ihe nkiri na mba ụwa
Slovo bụ onye isi ịrị abụọ na ise nke English Center of International PEN, mkpakọrịta ndị ode akwụkwọ zuru ụwa ọnụ

N'afọ 2012, o sonyere na ndị nnọchi anya PEN International na Mexico iji mee mkpesa megide ogbugbu nke ndị nta akụkọ na mba ahụ, yana ndị isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ PEN ndị ọzọ na ndị ode akwụkwọ ama ama n'ụwa niile
Na Disemba 2019, ya na ndị isi ọdịnala iri anọ na abụọ ndị ọzọ, Slovo bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ ozi kwadoro Labour Party n'okpuru ọchịchị Jeremy Corbyn na ntuli aka izugbe 2019
Akwụkwọ ozi ahụ kwuru na 'Mkpesa ntuli aka nke Labour n'okpuru nduzi Jeremy Corbyn na-enye atụmatụ mgbanwe nke na-ebute mkpa ndị mmadụ na ụwa karịa uru onwe onye na mmasị nke mmadụ ole na ole'

Ikike Gillick bụ okwu sitere na mba England na Wales ma jiri ya mee ihe na iwu ahụike iji kpebie ma nwatakịrị (n'okpuru afọ iri na isii) nwere ike ikwenye na ọgwụgwọ ahụike nke ha, n'enweghị mkpa maka ikike nne na nna ma ọ bụ ihe ọmụma
Ụkpụrụ a dabere na mkpebi ikpe nke afọ 1985 nke House of Lords gbasara ikpe nke ndụmọdụ mgbochi afọ ime nke dọkịta NHS nyere na Gillick v West Norfolk na Wisbech Area Health Authority
Ikpe a na-ejide onwe ya na England na Wales, a nakweere ya n'ụzọ dịgasị iche iche na mba Australia, Canada, na New Zealand
A na-eme ndokwa yiri nke ahụ na Scotland site na Age of Legal Capacity (Scotland) Act 1991

Na mba Northern Ireland, ọ bụ ezie na iwu dị iche iche na-emetụta, Ngalaba Ahụike na Ọrụ Ọha n'oge ahụ kwuru na ọ dịghị ihe mere ị ga-eji chee na mkpebi Ụlọ Ndị Eze agaghị eso ụlọ ikpe Northern Ireland
Ikpe Gillick metụtara ngalaba ahụike na-enye ndị dọkịta ndụmọdụ banyere mgbochi afọ ime nke ụmụaka (maka nke a, n'okpuru afọ iri na isii)
Okirikiri ahụ kwuru na ọgwụ mgbochi afọ ime bụ okwu maka uche dọkịta nakwa na enwere ike ịnye ha ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na isii n'enweghị nkwenye ndị nne na nna
A gbara okwu a n'ihi na onye na-eme ihe ike, Victoria Gillick, mere mkpọsa megide iwu ahụ

Gillick chọrọ nkwupụta na ịnye ọgwụ mgbochi bụ iwu na-akwadoghị n'ihi na dọkịta ga-eme mpụ nke ịgba ume inwe mmekọahụ na nwata nakwa na ọ ga-abụ ọgwụgwọ n'enweghị nkwenye dị ka nkwenye nke nne ma ọ bụ nna; o nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'ihu Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Ikpe Ziri Ezi, mana o nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị
Ihe iseokwu dị n'ihu Ụlọ Ndị Eze bụ naanị ma nwata ahụ nwere ike inye nkwenye

A na-atụle 'Nkwenye' ebe a n'echiche sara mbara nke nkwenye maka batrị ma ọ bụ mwakpo na enweghị nkwenye onye ọrịa maka ọgwụgwọ, dọkịta, ọ bụrụgodị na ọ nwere ezi ebumnuche, enwere ike ịgba ya akwụkwọ / ebubo
Ụlọ ndị isi lekwasịrị anya n'okwu nke nkwenye kama echiche nke 'ikike nne na nna' ma ọ bụ ike nne na nna
N'ezie, ụlọ ikpe ahụ kwuru na 'ikike nne na nna' adịghị, ma e wezụga ichebe ọdịmma kachasị mma nke nwatakịrị
Ihe ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ kwuru na n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, nwatakịrị nwere ike ikwenye ọgwụgwọ, nakwa na n'ọnọdụ ndị a, nne ma ọ bụ nna enweghị ikike igbochi ọgwụgwọ
Lord Scarman na Lord Fraser tụrụ aro nyocha dịtụ iche (Lord Bridge kwenyere na ha abụọ)
A na-ewere ule Lord Scarman dị ka ule nke 'Gillick competency'
Ọ chọrọ ka nwatakịrị kwenye ma ọ bụrụ na ha aghọta ọgwụgwọ ahụike a tụrụ aro
Mkpebi ahụ nwere mmetụta dị ịrịba ama maka ikike iwu nke obere ụmụaka na England n'ihi na ọ sara mbara karịa naanị nkwenye ahụike
Ọ na-ekwu na ikike nke ndị nne na nna ime mkpebi maka obere ụmụ ha abụghị ihe zuru oke, kama ọ na-ebelata na ntozu okè nke nwa ahụ

Ihe si na Gillick pụta bụ na n'England na Wales taa, ma e wezụga n'ọnọdụ ndị iwu na-achịkwa, ikike iwu kwadoro ime mkpebi n'okwu ọ bụla gbasara nwatakịrị ahụ na-agbanwe site n'aka nne ma ọ bụ nna gaa n'aka nwa ahụ mgbe nwa ahụ tozuru oke iji nwee ike ikpebi uche ha n'okwu ahụ chọrọ mkpebi
Nwatakịrị a na-ewere dị ka 'Gillick ruru eru' nwere ike igbochi ndị mụrụ ha ile ndekọ ahụike ha
Dị ka ndị dị otú ahụ, ndị ọrụ ahụike agaghị ekpughe ihe ndekọ ahụike nke nwatakịrị a na-ewere dị ka 'Gillick ruru eru' ọ gwụla ma nkwenye pụtara ìhè
N'ọtụtụ mpaghara, nne ma ọ bụ nna nke nwatakịrị nwere onwe ya enweghị ikike ikwenye na ọgwụgwọ, n'agbanyeghị ule Gillick
Ọnọdụ nnwere onwe na-ebili mgbe nwata ahụ lụrụ di (R v D AC 778, 791) ma ọ bụ na ndị agha
Ọdịdị nke ọkọlọtọ ahụ ka ejighị n'aka

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ụlọ ikpe ajụla akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù iji kọwaa 'ikike Gillick' na dọkịta n'otu n'otu nweere onwe ya ime mkpebi, na-ajụ ndị ọgbọ ya ma ọ bụrụ na nke a nwere ike inye aka, banyere ma nwatakịrị ahụ ọ bụ 'Gillick ruru eru'

Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2016, ọ pụtara Funston na Howard na ụfọdụ iwu na-adịbeghị anya rụrụ ọrụ n'ụzọ doro anya iji gbochie ikike nke ụmụaka Gillick ruru eru ikwenye ọgwụgwọ ahụike n'èzí ọnọdụ ahụike
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a chọrọ nkwenye ndị nne na nna maka ịgwọ ụmụaka nwere ụkwara ume ọkụ site na iji salbutamol inhalers n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
A ka na-anwale mgbochi ndị a n'ụlọ ikpe
Mkpebi nke In re R (1991) na Re W (1992) (ọkachasị Lord Donaldson) megidere mkpebi nke Gillick decision
Site na ndị a, na ndị na-esote, a na-atụ aro na n'agbanyeghị ikike nne na nna nke veto ọgwụgwọ akwụsị, ikike nne na nna adịghị 'akwụsị' dị ka Lord Scarman tụrụ aro na Gillick
Otú ọ dị, ndị a bụ nanị okwu obita ma ọ bụ n'ụlọikpe nta kwuru; ya mere, ha anọghị n'iwu
Mana parens patriae ikike nke ụlọ ikpe ka dị na-enye ohere ka ụlọ ikpe manye mmeso megide ọchịchọ nwa (na nne na nna)
Na nyocha ikpe nke afọ 2006, R (na ngwa nke Axon) v Secretary of State for Health, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kwadoro Gillick na ikwe ka nzuzo ahụike maka ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-achọ ite ime
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ jụrụ ebubo na enyeghị ndị nne na nna 'ikike ịmara' ma nwa ha chọrọ ite ime, njikwa ọmụmụ ma ọ bụ mgbochi ime megidere Nkebi nke 8 nke European Convention on Human Rights

Ikpe Axon depụtara ndepụta nke ụkpụrụ nke dọkịta ga-ezute mgbe ọ na-ekpebi ma ọ ga-enye nwatakịrị na-erubeghị afọ iri na isii ọgwụgwọ n'agwaghị ndị mụrụ ha ha ga-ekwenye na ha nwere ike ịghọta akụkụ niile nke ndụmọdụ ahụ, na ahụike anụ ahụ ma ọ bụ nke uche nke onye ọrịa ahụ nwere ike ịta ahụhụ n'enweghị ndụmọdụ ahụike, na ọ bụ maka ọdịmma nke onye ọrịa inye ndụmọdụ ahụike, na (n'inye mgbochi ime) o yikarịrị ka ha ga-enwe mmekọahụ ma a na-enye ọgwụ mgbochi ime ma ọ bụ na ha agbaala mbọ ime ka onye na-eto eto kweta ikpughe ozi ahụ nye ndị mụrụ ha
Ná ngwụsị afọ 2020, Bell v Tavistock tụlere ma ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na isii nwere dysphoria nwoke na nwanyị nwere ike ịbụ Gillick ruru eru ikwenye ịnata ndị na-egbochi oge uto
N'ihi nkọwa pụrụ iche nke ọgwụgwọ ahụ, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kwubiri na n'ọnọdụ ndị dị otú ahụ, azịza ya ga-abụ 'ee', a priori
Ná ngwụsị afọ 2021, Ụlọikpe mkpegharị kagburu Bell v Tavistock, ebe ọ bụ na achọtabeghị iwu na omume ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ megidere iwu

Ná mmalite Septemba 2021, nduzi a na-ekesa na NHS trust kwuru na a ga-ewere ọtụtụ ndị dị afọ iri na abụọ ruo afọ iri na ise dị ka 'Gillick ruru eru inye nkwenye nke ha' ka a gbaa ha ọgwụ mgbochi COVID-19, n'agbanyeghị na JCVI 'adaghị] ịtụ aro ọgwụ mgbochi Covid-19 maka ndị dị afọ iri na abụọ ruo afọ iri na ise dị mma

' Onye na-eme mkpọsa Molly Kingsley, onye guzobere otu mgbasa ozi UsForThem n'ihe gbasara okwu ahụ [nkọwa dị mkpa], dọrọ aka ná ntị na 'Ọ bụrụ na ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi ụmụaka ga-eme n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ebughị mkpa maka nkwenye ndị nne na nna ùgwù, ọ ga-emebi ntụkwasị obi ndị nne na nna n'ụlọ akwụkwọ' [nkọwa dị mkpa] Epidemiologist na onye otu SAGE bụ John Edmunds kwuru na 'ọ bụrụ na anyị ekwe ka ọrịa na-ebute ọrịa na-agafe ndị mmadụ, nke ahụ bụ ọtụtụ ụmụaka ga-ebute ọrịa na nke ahụ ga-abụ ọtụtụ ọgba aghara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ime ọnwa ndị na-abịanụ
Ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Australia nyere nkwenye siri ike maka mkpebi Gillick na 'Marion's Case', odeakwụkwọ nke Ngalaba Ahụike na Ọrụ Obodo v JWB na SMB (1992) 175 CLR 189
Ozizi ikike Gillick bụ akụkụ nke iwu ikpe Australia (lee, dịka, DoCS v Y NSWSC 644)
There is no express authority in Australia on In re R and Re W, so whether a parent's right terminates is unclear

This lack of authority reflects that the reported cases have all involved minors who have been found to be incompetent, and that Australian courts will make decisions in the parens patriae jurisdiction regardless of Gillick competence
Na South Australia na New South Wales iwu na-akọwapụta iwu nkịtị, na-eguzobe ụkpụrụ Gillick-esque nke ikike ma na-echekwa nkwenye n'etiti nne ma ọ bụ nna na nwa maka afọ 14-16

Na 21 Mee 2009, mgbagwoju anya [onye?] bilitere n'etiti ikike Gillick, nke na-achọpụta ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na isii nwere ikike ikwenye na ọgwụgwọ nke ha, na ntuziaka Fraser, nke metụtara naanị mgbochi afọ ime ma lekwasị anya na ọchịchọ nke itinye aka na nne na nna na ihe ize ndụ nke mmekọahụ na-enweghị nchebe na mpaghara ahụ

Asịrị na-aga n'ihu bilitere na Victoria Gillick enweghị mmasị ka aha ya jikọta ya na nyocha nke ikike ụmụaka, mana nchịkọta akụkọ na BMJ site n'afọ 2006 kwuru na Gillick kwuru na 'ọ dịtụbeghị mgbe ọ tụrụ aro nye onye ọ bụla, n'ihu ọha ma ọ bụ na nzuzo, na [ọ] enweghị mmasị na e jikọtara ya na okwu 'Gillick competent'
Iwu kwadoro ka ndị dọkịta nye ndụmọdụ na ọgwụgwọ mgbochi afọ ime n'enweghị nkwenye ndị nne na nna na-enye ụfọdụ ụkpụrụ
Ụkpụrụ ndị a, nke a maara dị ka ụkpụrụ nduzi Fraser, bụ nke Lord Fraser setịpụrụ na mkpebi Gillick ma chọọ ka ọkachamara nwee afọ ojuju na
Ọ bụ ezie na ụkpụrụ ndị a na-ezo aka kpọmkwem na mgbochi afọ ime, a na-ewere ụkpụrụ ndị ahụ na-emetụta ọgwụgwọ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere ite ime

Ọ bụ ezie na ikpe ahụ n'ụlọ ndị nwe ụlọ na-ezo aka kpọmkwem na ndị dọkịta, Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists (RCOG) na-atụle ya iji tinye aka na ndị ọkachamara ahụike ndị ọzọ, 'gụnyere ndị ọkachamara n'ozuzu, ndị dọkịta na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị, ndị nọọsụ, na ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọgwụ mgbochi obodo, ụlọ ọgwụ ahụike mmekọahụ na ọrụ ụlọ ọgwụ

' A pụkwara ịkọwa ya dị ka ikpuchi ndị ọrụ ntorobịa na ndị ọrụ nkwalite ahụike ndị nwere ike inye ndị na-eto eto na-erubeghị afọ iri na isii ndụmọdụ gbasara mgbochi na condom, mana a nwalebeghị nke a n'ụlọ ikpe
Ọ bụrụ na onye na-erubeghị afọ iri na asatọ jụrụ ịnakwere ọgwụgwọ, ọ ga-ekwe omume n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ ka nne na nna ha ma ọ bụ ụlọ ikpe kagbuo mkpebi ha
Otú ọ dị, enwere ike iji ikike a mee ihe naanị na ndabere na ọdịmma nke onye na-eto eto bụ ihe kachasị mkpa
N'okwu a, ọdịmma apụtaghị naanị ahụike anụ ahụ ha

A ghaghị iburu n'uche mmetụta uche nke ime ka mkpebi ahụ ghara ịdị irè ma bụrụ nhọrọ naanị mgbe e chere na onye na-eto eto ahụ nwere ike ịta ahụhụ 'mmerụ uche ma ọ bụ anụ ahụ a na-apụghị ịgbanwe agbanwe'
Na-emekarị, mgbe nne ma ọ bụ nna chọrọ ịkagbu mkpebi onye na-eto eto ịjụ ọgwụgwọ, ndị ọkachamara ahụike ga-etinye akwụkwọ n'ụlọ ikpe maka mkpebi ikpeazụ

Otu ihe na-adọrọ mmasị na ụkpụrụ nduzi Fraser bụ na ọtụtụ [okwu na-ewere ikpe Lord Scarman dị ka ikpe na-eduga na ikpe ahụ, mana n'ihi na ikpe Lord Fraser dị mkpụmkpụ ma wepụta ya n'okwu ndị ọzọ - na n'echiche ahụ ka ndị ọkachamara ahụike na ọdịmma nwere ike ịnweta ya - ọ bụ mkpebi ya ka nke nwere ụkpụrụ ndị nwere ụkpụrụ ndị bụ isi, [nkọwa dị mkpa] dị ka ihe atụ e hotara na RCOG circular
Gilmário Pinto Vemba (a mụrụ na 19 June 1985), nke a ma ama dịka Gilmário Vemba, bụ onye Angola na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn O Bar do Gilmário, After Party na Fora de Série
Ọ bụbu onye otu egwuregwu 'os Tuneza'
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 19 ọnwa Julaị afọ 1985 na Luanda, Angola
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na International Relations and Political Analysis
Ọ lụrụ di ma bụrụ nna ụmụ nwanyị atọ na otu nwa nwoke
N'afọ 2003, Vemba na Daniel Vilola, Orlando Rodrigues, Cesalty Paulo na José Chieta guzobere otu ihe ọchị os Tuneza
Ọ gara n'ihu n'òtù ahụ ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri na ise, ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ otu ahụ n'afọ 2020
N'afọ 2019, o gosipụtara ihe ngosi na-atọ ọchị na Portugal n'aha 'Imortal'
N'afọ 2021, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na A Dívida (The Debt) nke Anacleto de Abreu duziri
Emere ihe nkiri ahụ na 26th February 2021 na Cinemax, na Luanda
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2021, ọ bịanyere aka na ihe ngosi ọhụrụ nke TVI bụ O Amor Acontece
Kemgbe afọ 2022, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-asọmpi na-adịgide adịgide nke mbipụta Portuguese nke 'Taskmaster' (RTP1)

Gandhi Bilel Djuna (French pronunciation ; amụrụ na 6 Mee, na afọ 1986), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Maître Gims na nso nso a naanị Gims (/ɡɪms/, GHIMSS; French ) (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya GIMS), bụ onye na-eti egwu, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na Congolese-French
Ọ tolitere na France ma bi na France na Morocco ugbu a
Ọ bụbu onye otu hip hop Sexion d'Assaut ma wepụta nnukwu abọm mbụ ya, Subliminal na afọ 2013
Abọm ahụ rere ihe karịrị otu nde na France ma ruo n'ọkwa nke abụọ na Syndicat National de l'Édition Phonographique

Abọm abụọ ọzọ ya sochiri Mon cœur avait raison na afọ 2015 na Ceinture noire na afọ 2018 ruru nọmba otu na France na Belgium (Wallonia) wee ruo n'elu 40 na mba Europe dị iche iche, gụnyere Denmark, Italy na Switzerland
Ọ nọ n'elu chaatị ndị France ugboro anọ, gụnyere otu ugboro dị ka onye na-ese ihe, na nso nso a na afọ 2018 na egwu ya 'La même'
Abụ ahụ bụ nke a na-emekarị na France na afọ 2018 ma o nyeere Gims aka ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn na redio French n'otu afọ ahụ
N'afọ 2018, ọ bụ onye nke asaa na-eme ihe nkiri n'ụwa na Deezer
N'oge ọrụ ya, ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe mba ụwa dịka Sia, Pitbull, Lil Wayne, Stromae, Maluma, Sting na ndị ọzọ rụkọrọ ọrụ
O rere ihe karịrị nde ise, gụnyere nde atọ kemgbe mmalite ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2020, ọ meriri International Artist of the Year na Distinctive International Arab Festivals Awards mgbe ọ gosipụtara na egwu Mohamed Ramadan 'Ya habibi'
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Septemba, na afọ 2020, Netflix wepụtara ihe ngosi banyere afọ iri ikpeazụ nke ọrụ ya nke akpọrọ Gims On the Record
A mụrụ Gandhi Djuna na 6 Mee, na afọ 1986 na Kinshasa, Zaire (Ugbu a Democratic Republic of the Congo kemgbe afọ 1997)
O sitere n'ezinụlọ ndị na-agụ egwú nna ya Djanana Djuna bụ onye na-agụ egwu nke Papa Wemba's Viva La Musica troupe
Ọ bịarutere France na afọ 1988 mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ, ya na ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị mba ọzọ nọ n'ọnọdụ na-adịghị mma
N'ihi na nne na nna ya zoro, ọ kọwara na o nwere oge nwata siri ike
E debere ya na ezinụlọ ndị nkuchi, tupu ya ebi na squats ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
A kpọtụrụ akụkụ a sitere na ndụ ya aha n'akwụkwọ ya Vise le soleil
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ iri na anọ
Ọ bụ nwanne Dadju, onye otu The Shin Sekaï, nke Bedjik, Afi (nke bụbu Xgangs) na Djelass niile rappers atọ
Na abọm mbụ ya Subliminal (2013), ha sonyere na egwu 'Outsider'
Gims tolitere na 3rd arrondissement nke Paris
Ezinụlọ ya wee kwaga na 9th arrondissement ma mesịa gaa na 19th arrondissements
Gims mụrụ ihe osise na nkwurịta okwu
Ọ na-ewere aha njirimara 'Gims' na-ezo aka na ihe nkiri sinima Eshia na ụwa nke martial arts
N'afọ 2002, Gims na ndị na-eti egwu JR O Crom na Makan guzobere atọ Prototype 3015
A họọrọ aha otu ahụ na-ezo aka na ihe nkiri, ọkachasị maka ihe ọ pụtara 'agha'
Aha Sexion d'Assaut gụnyekwara ihe na-ezo aka na Sturmabteilung (SA), na French 'Section d'Asmaut', otu ndị agha Nazi a ma ama, nke otu ahụ mụtara na mberede n'oge egwu maka obodo Paris
N'afọ 2005, mmadụ atọ ahụ jikọtara ya na Assonance, otu ọzọ sitere na Sexion d'Assaut
A na-akpọ ìgwè ahụ ugbu a 3rd Prototype
Mgbe e mepụtara ihe ole na ole n'onwe ya, Sexion d'Assault zutere onye nnọchi anya ha, Dawala, na ime ala nke Châtelet-Les Halles na Paris
Na Dawala, 3rd Prototype wepụtara mixtape mbụ ya, La Terre du Milieu, na 13 Mee 2006
Gims mepụtara mkpuchi CD
N'afọ 2007, ha wepụtara abọm Le Renouveau, nke nwere ihe a ma ama 'Anti Tectonick'
Site na Prototype 3015 mbụ, mgbe ahụ Prototype 3, Gims bụ akụkụ nke Sexion d'Assaut supergroup
Sexion d'Assaut wepụtara egwu mbụ ya n'etiti afọ 2002 na 2003
N'etiti ha, anyị na-ahụ Gang yaba Gang, Coup 2 pression na Frères de rue
Na Sexion d'Assault, Gims sonyere ugboro abụọ na 12 Inch'All Star, asọmpi rap a ma ama na Paris n'okpuru ala nke na-ewere ọnọdụ na Batofar
Ọ bịara n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ wee bụrụ onye a ma ama, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka otu n'ime ndị kickers (freestylers) kacha mma na France
N'afọ 2008, otu ahụ gosipụtara freestyles kwa ọnwa a na-akpọ Les Chroniques du mois kwa ọnwa, a tọhapụrụ ọ dịkarịa ala egwu abụọ na-enweghị onwe ha site na ọdịyo ma ọ bụ vidiyo
Na Jenụwarị 2009, Sexion d'Assaut bipụtara net-tape a kpọrọ Les Chroniques du 75, nchịkọta nke nwekwara egwu ndị a na-ebipụtabeghị na mbụ, gụnyere egwu solo 'À 30%' nke Gims
E wepụtara abọm nke abụọ nke Sexion d'Assaut, L'Écrasement de tête, na Mee, na afọ 2009 na Because Music Akụkụ ikpeazụ nke supergroup, 3rd Prototype, na-apụ kpamkpam
LÉcrasement de tête nwetara aha ọjọọ n'etiti ọha na eze n'ihi utu aha na vidiyo egwu, gụnyere 'T'es bête ou quoi?' na 'Wati Bon Son' (na mmekorita ya na Dry)
Sexion d'Assaut na-aga njem, karịsịa imeghe maka Orelsan na Medina
The Head Crush na-ere ihe karịrị 50,000
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ LÉcrasement de tête, otu ahụ hapụrụ Because Music n'ihi nghọtahie wee bịanye aka na Sony Music Entertainment
N'afọ 2010, Sexion d'Assaut wepụtara abọm studio L'École des points vitaux A na-ekwu na Gims bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwú
O dere egwu egwu nke ọtụtụ egwu, gụnyere 'Ils appellent ça 'Casquette à l'envers'
Ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri na-esokwa na abọm ahụ, dị ka SoulChildren na 'La drogue te donne des ailes'
Abọm ahụ nwere nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma n'etiti ọha na eze, na-ere ihe karịrị 400,000
Ìgwè ahụ meghere maka Suprême NTM na Parc des Princes ma rụọ ọrụ na Zénith de Paris
N'ọnwa Eprel, n'afọ 2011, esemokwu dara n'ihi nkwupụta homophobic nke otu ahụ

N'ịzaghachi nkatọ, Sexion d'Assaut kpebiri iwepụta mixtape akpọrọ En attendant L'Apogée les Chroniques du 75, nke n'agbanyeghị ihe niile nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na utu aha dịka 'Paris va bien' na 'Qui t'a dit'
Ọrụ ahụ nwere DVD gụnyere otu n'ime ihe nkiri nke egwu ndị dị, yana ihe ngosi na-agbaso njem otu ahụ
Na Machị, na afọ 2012, ha wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ha, L'Apogée, nke gara nke ọma karịa nke mbụ
Abọm ahụ rere ihe karịrị 700,000
N'otu afọ ahụ, Gims bipụtara ihe ọchị n'ịntanetị nke akpọrọ Au cœur du vortex
N'otu oge ya na Sexion d'Assaut na-arụ ọrụ, Gims gbalịrị aka ya n'ịde egwu
Na ngwụcha afọ 2006, ọ wepụtara ọrụ mbụ ya n'onwe ya, egwuregwu gbasaa nke akpọrọ Pour ceux qui dorment les yeux ouverts
Ọ bụ Fredy K na Noko nke ATK mepụtara EP ahụ
N'ịbụ nke e bipụtara na mbipụta ole na ole, diski ahụ bu n'uche ime ka ọha na eze mara Gims
Ihe ndekọ ahụ gosipụtara egwu ya na Sexion d'Assaut, onye na-eti egwu Scred Connexion Koma na onye na-agụ egwu aha ya bụ Carole
Na 29 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2013, na vidiyo Welcome to the Wa Part
4 La Consecration, Gims kwupụtara ntọhapụ nke abọm studio mbụ ya, Subliminal, maka 20 Mee 2013
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Machị, Gims bipụtara 'Meurtre par strangulation'
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Machị, ọ kpughere 'J'me tire', nke abụọ ya nke nọgidere na-anọ n'ọnọdụ nke mbụ na chaatị French maka izu anọ n'usoro, a tọhapụrụ vidiyo ahụ n'ụbọchị iri n'ọnwarị afọ 2013
N'ajụjụ ọnụ na saịtị Rapelitecom, Gims kwupụtara ọnụnọ nke onye na-eti egwu Pitbull na egwu akpọrọ 'Pas touché'
Ụmụnne ya atọ, Bedjik, Dadju na X-Gang, sitere n'òtù MM Solja, jikọtara ọnụ na egwu 'Outsider'
Na 4 Mee o bipụtara 'Bella'
Na 13 Mee ọ na-agbasa 'VQ2PQ' naanị na Skyrock
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Mee, ọ na-agbasa ozi, ka ọ bụ naanị, Ọ na-arụ ọrụ, na mmekorita ya na The Shin Sekaï
A tọhapụrụ Subliminal na 20 Mee
Iji kwalite ya, Gims na-ekpughe egwu ndị a na-ewepụtaghị na mbụ, nke na-agaghị abụ akụkụ nke abọm ahụ, n'ụdị usoro vidiyo akpọrọ Nke a abụghị ihe nkiri
N'akụkụ azụmahịa, a kwadoro abọm ahụ na diski diamond abụọ na ihe karịrị 1 nde ahịa
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2013, ọ gbara egwu mbụ ya n'onwe ya na Olympia
Ọ na-ekere òkè na album Racine carrée nke Stromae na egwu 'AVF' nke gosipụtara na Orelsan

Gims kwupụtara na ọ chọrọ ịpụ ezumike mgbe ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke njem Sexion d'Assaut gasịrị, 28 Septemba 2013 na Stade de France maka Urban Peace, nke na-ejikọkwa IAM, Orelsan, Youssoupha, La Fouine, Psy 4 de la Rime, Rohff na Stromae
Ọ na-ezube ilekọta di na nwunye ya na ụmụ ya anọ, ndị ọ na-ekwu na ọ hụla obere ihe n'ihi ọrụ ya (a mụrụ nke okenye n'ime ụmụ ya anọ n'ihe dị ka afọ 2008 na nke nta na 2013)
A na-eme atụmatụ album ọhụrụ nke Sexion d'Assaut maka Nọvemba 2015
Na mgbakwunye na ide okwu nke ya, ọ na-edekwa maka ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2013, Gims sonyere dị ka 'onye ọbịa' na mmemme Popstars, ebe o nyere ndị na-eto eto ndụmọdụ maka ọrụ ha
Mgbe ntinye aka a gasịrị, o dere egwu mbụ nke otu mmeri ahụ, The Mess, nke akpọrọ Au Top
Otu a ruru nke 8 na chaatị iTunes
Gina Bass (amụrụ na 3 Mee 1995) bụ onye Gambia na-eme egwuregwu na-asọmpi na sprinting
O meriri ọla nchara na mita 200 na 2016 African Championships
Bass ruru eru maka 2016 Summer Olympics ma bụrụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ Gambia
Na 2016 Summer Olympics, ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke 52 na 200 mita okpomọkụ ma ghara iru eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ
Ọ bụ onye mbụ Gambia ruru eru maka asọmpi ikpeazụ na World Athletics Championships
Ọ na-ejide ihe ndekọ mba ugbu a na mita 100 na 200
O ruru eru ịnọchite anya Gambia na 2020 Summer Olympics na 100 mita na 200 mita ụmụ nwanyị
Na ọsọ 100 mita, o setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ mba ọhụrụ nke 1112 sekọnd
N'èzí
Gina Ama Blay (amụrụ na 29 Ọktoba 1956) bụ onye odeakụkọ na onye nnọchi anya mba Ghana na onye nkwado nke New Patriotic Party of Ghana Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Ghana na Germany
Gina Blay bụ nwa akwụkwọ gara aga nke OLA Girls School na Ho
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum Ghana na diplọma post-graduate na Journalism na Mass Communication

Blay malitere ọrụ ya na 1981 dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke ọnụ ahịa na Board Income O mechara kwaga na Achimota Brewery Company Limited dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze, ebe o deziri ma bipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ebe a na-eme biya, ABC News Ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Western Publication Limited, ụlọ mgbasa ozi na-ebipụta akwụkwọ (ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Daily Guide na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ)
O nyere aka na uto nke azụmahịa ahụ site na ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ ruo n'otu n'ime ụlọ mgbasa ozi kachasị ukwuu na Ghana

Ọ jere ozi na bọọdụ nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na otu dị na Ghana, gụnyere Social Security and National Insurance Trust (SSNIT), Ghana Telecom, Ghana News Agency, National Media Commission, na World Association of Akwụkwọ akụkọ Ọ chịkwara Board nke Mokola Marketing Company Limited na Onye isi oche nke Private Newspapers Publishers Association of Ghana (PRINPAG) afọ iri
A chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa ara n'afọ 2008 ma nwee usoro ọgwụgwọ ọgwụgwọ

Na June 2017, Onye isi ala Nana Akuffo-Addo kpọrọ Blay dịka onye nnọchi anya Ghana na Germany Ọ so na ndị Ghana asatọ ndị ọzọ a ma ama bụ ndị ahọpụtara ka ha bụrụ onyeisi ndị ọrụ nnọchi anya mba Ghana dị iche iche n'ụwa
Blay lụrụ Freddie Blay, onye bụ onye ọka iwu Ghana, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye isi oche mba nke New Patriotic Party
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ
N'oge ezumike ya, ọ na-enwe mmasị igwu mmiri na ịgụ akwụkwọ
Gina Din-Kariuki (a mụrụ Gina Din, na Ọktoba 23, 1961) bụ nwanyị Kenya na-azụ ahịa ọkachamara na nkwukọrịta atụmatụ na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Kenya
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Gina Din Corporate Communications, nke ọ malitere mgbe ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye njikwa nkwukọrịta na Barclays Bank of Kenya na 1997
A mụrụ Gina Din na October 23, 1961 na Nanyuki, Kenya, ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke atọ nke ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ nkwari akụ Shamsu na Malek Din
Gina Din kwuru na ọ mụtara mkpa mmekọrịta dị mgbe ọ dị obere nye nne na nna ya, bụ ndị nwere Sportsman Arms Hotel na Nanyuki
'Ndị mụrụ m kụziiri m na ndị ahịa, n'agbanyeghị onye, ha niile chọrọ inwe mmetụta nke ịbụ ndị a kpọrọ ihe
Ana m agbalị ime nke ahụ na Gina Din Corporate Communications
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, na-elekọta abalị disko na họtel ahụ ugboro abụọ n'izu nke ọ na-akwụ ụgwọ mbata
Ọ ga-eji nke a dị ka ego akpa ya
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
N'afọ 1985, Gina Din gụsịrị akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ na London School of Journalism
Nke a sochiri ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa nkwukọrịta na Barclays Bank Kenya n'otu afọ ahụ, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na anọ
Na Ọktoba 1, 1997, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ ya na Barclays Bank of Kenya, Ọ tọrọ ntọala Gina Din Corporate Communications, ya na Barclays Bank dị ka onye ahịa mbụ ya
'M malitere azụmahịa m site n'okwukwe na ekpere
Ọ dị m ka ọganihu ebumpụta ụwa
Barclays Bank bụ akaụntụ mbụ m ma ana m ekele Chineke n'ihi na ha nyeere m aka ịkwụ ụgwọ mbụ m
'ka Gina Din kwuru
Ndị ahịa ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Old Mutual, Association of Kenyan Insurers, CIC Insurance, Kenya Commercial Bank, Safaricom, Kenya Red Cross & Kenya Airways
N'afọ 2007, Gina Din Corporate Communications lekọtara ọrụ nsogbu mmekọrịta ọha na eze na 2007 Kenya Airways ụgbọelu mberede ụgbọelu na Duala, Cameroon
Gina Din kwuru, sị, sị, 'Anyị lekọtara ihe mberede ụgbọelu Kenya Airways nke afọ 2007 na Duala, Cameroon na o yikarịrị ka ọ bụ ọrụ kachasị mma anyị rụtụrụla n'ihe gbasara ijikwa nsogbu
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2009, n'ịghọta inyere nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ elektrọnik Korea LG aka imezu ebumnuche ahịa ya nke afọ 2008 na mkpọsa ụlọ ọrụ na mpaghara East Africa
Gina Din Corporate Communications meriri ndị asọmpi iri na anọ ndị ọzọ iji merie onyinye ọla edo nke Marketing and Public Relations (MPR) na ihe omume emere na Amman, Jordan
Na Machị 16, 2012, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta Safaricom kwụsịrị mmekọrịta afọ iri na atọ ya na Gina Din Corporate Communications
Nkwekọrịta ahụ kwụsịrị na Eprel 30, 2012
Na Disemba 7, 2012, Gina Din Corporate Communications meriri PR Event of the Year award n'oge emume onyinye Public Relation Society of Kenya nke emere na Safari Park Hotel, na Nairobi, Kenya

N'ụbọchị nke isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2013, a mara ọkwa na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Weber Shandwick, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze zuru ụwa ọnụ, na nkwekọrịta nke ga-ahụ ka ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ na-eto ụkwụ ha na Africa
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2013, Gina Din Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ PR kachasị mma na Kenya n'oge onyinye 2013 Public Relation Society of Kenya kwa afọ nke emere na Nairobi
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2008, a kpọrọ Gina Din-Kariuki onye nnọchi anya ọma na Kenya Red Cross
N'afọ 2011, dịka akụkụ nke Red Cross, malitere atụmatụ 'Kenyans for Kenya' iji lụso ọkọchị kachasị njọ na-emetụta Kenya n'ime afọ iri isii

Na Machị 22, 2016, United Nations Population Fund, họpụtara Gina Din-Kariuki dị ka onye nnọchi anya nsọpụrụ, na-akwado mbọ ego ahụ iji nye ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma ike, na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite ahụike na ikike ha
Gina Din-Kariuki lụrụ Chris Kariuki onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ nwa nwanyị Natalya na nwa nwoke Naythan
Nwa ya nwanyị, Dr
Natalya Din-Kariuki, bụ osote prọfesọ na Ngalaba Bekee na Comparative Literary Studies na Mahadum Warwick na-elekwasị anya na akwụkwọ ọgbara ọhụrụ
N'afọ 2011, dị ka akụkụ nke otu Gina Din, ọ natara otuto maka ịkwado mkpọsa 'Kenyans for Kenya' na nzaghachi maka ụnwụ nri na ọnwụ na Turkana
Mgbasa ozi ahụ nwetara ihe karịrị nde 700 Kenya Shillings
na afọ 2013, a kpọrọ Gina Din-Kariuki New Africa Magazine's 100 most influential Africans
N'afọ 2015, a kpọrọ Gina Din-Kariuki East Africa Business Woman of the Year nke o nwetara CNBC Africa All Africa Business Leaders Awards (AABLA)
Gina Loren Lewandowski (amuru Eprel 13, 1985) bu onye a ama na NJ/NY Gotham FC na National Women's Soccer League

Lewandowski gbara bọọlụ kọleji ya na Mahadum Lehigh, ebe akpọrọ ya aha Patriot League Offensive Player of the Year (2004, 2005) na Patriot League Rookie of the Year (2003), a na-edu ya ndị mmeri niile na Njikọ 2004 afọ nwere ihe mgbaru ọsọ asatọ na 16
isi
O ji golu iri atọ na isi gụchaa akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
Ọ nyekwara aka ugboro asatọ na ihie egwuregwu iri asaa Okukwara ndị Northampton Laurels bolu na afọ 2006
Na-esote mahadum Lewandowski nwara ịpụ maka otu abụọ na Germany, na-aga mba ofesi na Mee 22, 2007
Ọchịchọ ya igwu egwu na-eduga ya '
gafeta wee hụ ebe ọ na-ewe m,' Lewandowski kwuru, 'Ọ bụ naanị mmụba nke okwukwe'
N'ịgbaso nnwale na-aga nke ọma, Njikọ All Patriot oge anọ kwagara na 1
FFC Frankfurt ya na onye America ibe ya Alexandra Krieger na Julaị 30, 2007
Mgbe ọ nọ na Frankfurt Lewandowski meriri treble na 2007–08 (Bundesliga-Pokal-Champions League)
O nyeere Frankfurt aka imeri Pokal ọzọ na 2011
Lewandowski gara n'ihu na njedebe ikpeazụ nke otu onye mmeri ọzọ na 2011–12, meriri Olympique Lyon
Lewandowski hapụrụ Frankfurt ka ọ kpọọ otu oge na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ọkachamara ụmụ nwanyị (WPS) n'oge ọkọchị nke 2011
Ọ pụtara ugboro 8 maka Western New York Flash wee nyere ọgbakọ ahụ aka imeri ma otu egwuregwu na asọmpi
WPS apịaji n'ime oge ezumike na-esote
Lewandowski laghachiri na Germany na-eso WPS, oge a na Bayern Munich
Site na 2012 ruo 2019, ọ pụtara na oge 119 maka klọb n'egwuregwu oge niile, na-enye akara ugboro iri na asatọ
Yana Bayern o meriri Frauen- Bundesliga ugboro abụọ ọzọ na 2015 na 2016
Lewandowski bịanyere aka na NJ/NY Gotham FC, otu National Women's Soccer League (NWSL) nke dabere na New Jersey, nkeji 90 site na ebe o tolitere, na Mee 7, 2019
Na Jenụwarị 2020, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ ọhụrụ
May 9, 2012, Lewandowski kpọrọ oku maka egwuregwu United States megide China

N'October 25, 2015, mgbe ọ dị afọ 30, Lewandowski nwetara okpu mbụ ya maka United States na egwuregwu enyi na enyi mba ụwa (Victory Tour) megide Brazil, na-esi na bench na nkeji 74 na-egwu azụ azụ aka ekpe
Na Betlehem, PA, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na bayoloji na Mahadum Lehigh
Gina nwere nna ochie Polish ma kesaa aha nna ya na Robert Lewandowski, kpakpando maka ndị otu Bayern Munich n'otu oge ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na a maghị na ha abụọ nwere njikọ
Gini coefficient bu ihe adi-kpo formula na mathematics adi ji mata agugu ego no n'etiti ndi gbara ogaranya ma ndi dara obenye
Ginka Gyurova (Bulgarian Гинка Гюрова, amụrụ n'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Bulgaria na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
N'afọ 1976, ọ bụ onye otu ụgbọ mmiri nke Bulgaria nke meriri ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ihe omume coxed fours
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha nke abụọ ya na ụgbọ mmiri Bulgarian na asọmpi coxed anọ nke 1980

Gino Strada (21 Eprel 1948 n'ụbọchị 13 Ọgọst 2021) bụ onye dọkịta na-awa ahụ n'agha n'Ịtali, onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, onye na'ahụ maka udo, na onye guzobere Emergency, otu mba ụwa na-abụghị nke gọọmentị

A mụrụ Gino Strada n'ụbọchị 21 Eprel 1948 na mpaghara Milan nke Sesto San Giovanni Mgbe ọ gachara Giosuè Carducci lyceum, ọ gụrụ ọgwụ na ịwa ahụ trauma na Mahadum Milan ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1978, na-ahụ maka ịwa ahụ mberede

Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ma zụọ dị ka onye dọkịta na-awa ahụ n'obi n'ọtụtụ nnukwu ụlọ ọgwụ na mba ofesi, gụnyere Mahadum Stanford na Mahadum Pittsburgh na United States na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Groote Schuur na Cape Town, South Africa
Giorgos Catsadorakis bụ onye Greece na-ahụ maka sayensị ihe ndị dị ndụ
E nyere ya ihe nrite Goldman maka ebe obibi n'afọ 2001, maka onyinye ya na nchekwa nke ala mmiri nke Préspa, ya na onye ọkà mmụta ihe ndị dị ndụ Myrsini Malakou
Mgbalị ha dugara na nkwekọrịta n'etiti Gris, Republic of Macedonia na Albania maka iguzobe ogige Préspa dị ka ebe echedoro nke mpaghara ahụ
Girei bụ obodo na ọchịchị ime obodo nke Adamawa Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ dabere na osimiri Benue
Ndị na-achị ebe ahụ bụ ndị Fulbe ma ọ bụ Fulani ; Otu o sila dị, ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke Bwatiye bikwa n'obodo nta dịka Greng, Ntabo, na Labondo n'ime mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Girei
Ihe bụ́ isi ndị mmadụ na-arụ n’ógbè ahụ bụ ọrụ ugbo na ịzụ ehi
Girei bụkwa ebe obibi nke Rediyo Gotel
Girirra nke a na-akpọkwa Gariire bụ asụsụ Cushitic nke Etiopia
Ọ na-agbaziri ego buru ibu site na Somalia
Ọ bụ ezie na ha na ndị Somalia aghọtachaghị nke ọma,, a na-eme atụmatụ na ihe dị ka 70% nke asụsụ Garirra mejupụtara okwu mgbazinye Somali

Enweghi ọtụtụ ọmụmụ banyere asụsụ ahụ n'onwe ya ma na-ejikọkarị ya n'ime obere nche anwụ nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Macro-Somali gụnyere ndị ikwu dị ka Rendille, Boni, Bayso, na asụsụ abụọ nke Somali, ịbụ Af-Maay, na Af-Maxaa (Standard Somali)
Ndị na-esonụ bụ phonemes a hụrụ na Girirra

Ụlọ ikpe ụmụ agbọghọ bụ ụzọ nnabata nwoke na nwanyị maka ụmụ agbọghọ na usoro ikpe ziri ezi nke na-ejikọta ụmụ nwanyị na-eto eto 'n'ihe ize ndụ' na ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na-enye nnọkọ na-enweghị usoro n'ihe niile site na ọdịdị ahụ, agụmakwụkwọ na ndụmọdụ na otu ndị okenye iji nye ntụkwasị obi na nkwado
Ihe dị ka ụlọ ikpe isii ndị dị otú ahụ apụtawo na gburugburu United States, nke ọ bụla na-akọwa onwe ya n'etiti nsogbu ndị dị na mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Otu isiokwu a na-ahụkarị bụ imeso ndị na-eto eto na-arụ ọrụ mmekọahụ dị ka ndị na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ na-ata ahụhụ ma na-emegbu
Ịchọpụta ihe kpatara ịbanye n'omume ndị a dị ka mmetọ ụmụaka na ụlọ na-adịghị arụ ọrụ dị mkpa iji ghọta ọdịdị nke mpụ na ọnọdụ pụrụ iche nye ụmụ agbọghọ
Ụlọ ikpe ụmụ agbọghọ Orange County malitere n'afọ 2009
Ọ na-elekwasị anya na nlekọta ogologo oge nke ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, na ọmụmụ mbụ na-atụ aro akara ka mma na ntinye ole na ole
Ụlọ ikpe ụmụ agbọghọ nke Alameda County na-elekọta ụmụ agbọghọ ndị a kpọbatara dị ka ụmụaka akwụna ma ọ bụ ndị a na-ewere dị ka ndị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ maka itinye aka
E hiwere ya n'afọ 2011 ma wepụta ya site n'ụlọ ikpe maka ụmụaka dị afọ ole na ole

Nnyocha e mere n'afọ 2013 nke ndị ntorobịa otu narị na iri na atọ a na-emegbu n'ụzọ mmekọahụ site na WestCoast Children's Clinic chọpụtara na pasent iri asaa na ise nke ndị na-eto eto dị otú ahụ ebe a na mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu enweela mmetọ na ileghara anya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a hụrụ otu nwa agbọghọ ka ọ gafechara n'okporo ámá, ebe ọ na-agbanye ọgwụ ọjọọ ọ na-enweghị ike ịkọwa
Onye ọzọ, onye nne ya bu onye methamphetamine riri ahụ, 'rere' nwa ya nwanyị nye nwanne nna ya nke na-erigbu ya n'ụzọ mmekọahụ iji nweta ọgwụ ọjọọ
Ngalaba HEAT
Watch nke obodo ahụ, nke onye ọka iwu mpaghara malitere n'afọ 2006, na-elekwasị anya na-azụ ahia ụ

Na Los Angeles County, ụlọ ikpe na-azụ ahịa mmekọahụ na-enyefe ụmụ agbọghọ n'aka ụlọ ọrụ nlekọta obodo na ndị na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ebe ngalaba nyocha nweziri ngalaba raara onwe ya nye iji kwado ndị na-eto eto a na-emegbu

Na Florida, Circuit 4 Girls Court bụ ụdị ụlọ ikpe pụrụ iche maka ụmụaka nke na-enyere aka n'ijikọta ụmụ nwanyị na-eto eto nọ 'n'ihe ize ndụ' na akụ na ụba obodo, ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndị ndụmọdụ ma na-enye usoro otu zuru oke
A na-enye ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ ngwá ọrụ iji mee ka ha nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'obodo

Ụlọ ikpe ụmụ agbọghọ bụ mmekorita n'etiti Ngalaba Development of Juvenile Justice, Family Support Services, The Fourth Judicial Circuit, The Delores Barr Weaver Policy Center na ọtụtụ ndị na-ahụ maka inweta obodo bara uru
Florida nwere ụlọ ikpe abụọ; otu dị na Jacksonville ebe nke ọzọ dị na Pinellas County
Michigan nwere ụlọ ikpe ụmụ agbọghọ na Genesee, nke onye ọka ikpe David Newblatt nke Genesee County 7th Circuit Court malitere
Ọ metụtara ụmụ agbọghọ niile na-erubeghị afọ iri na asatọ
Ọ na-enye ụmụ agbọghọ ihe onwunwe na ndụmọdụ
Ụlọ ikpe dị na Hawaii bụ ememe ebe ndị nne na nna na ụmụ agbọghọ na-aga ndụmọdụ maka otu afọ
O meela ka e nwee mbelata dị ịrịba ama gbasara njide, dị ka nyocha nke afọ 2011 si dị
N'afọ 2015, a kpọgara ụmụaka a na-emegbu n'ụzọ mmekọahụ na Minnesota n'otu n'ime ndị isi ikpe mpaghara isii ga-eduzi ha na njikọ nke ebe nchekwa mberede
Steeti New York nwere njikọ ọhụrụ nke ụlọ ikpe iri na otu na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmadụ maka ndị dị afọ iri na isii ahụ wee gbagobe
Iwu Safe Harbor nke New York State, nke mbụ nke mba ahụ, gụnyere ụmụ aka ruo n'afọ iri na asaa a na-ere ere dị ka ndị chọrọ nlekọta kama nyocha
Oregon degharịrị omume ọdịmma ụmụaka ya ka e wee were nwata a na-azụ ahịa dị ka onye a na-emegbu na mpaghara nke usoro ọdịmma ụmụaka kama ụlọ ikpe
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Texas kpebiri na 2010 na a ga-ewere ụmụaka na-erubeghị afọ iri na anọ ndị a na-etinye n'ebubo ịgba akwụna dị ka ndị e megburu
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ kpebiri na ha ga-enye ọrụ na-enweghị mpụ
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ mepụtara ụlọ ọkara ụzọ a na-akpọ Freedom House iji nye ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ ebe dị nchebe ịnata ọrụ dịka ụlọ akwụkwọ na ndụmọdụ
Freedom House nwere ike inwe ụmụ agbọghọ iri atọ, malite na afọ iri ruo afọ iri na asatọ, ma nweta nlekọta agụmakwụkwọ, ahụike na nke uche
Na Wisconsin, otu kọmitii Milwaukee County na-atụle ụlọ ikpe ụmụ agbọghọ nke ga-elekwasị anya na ụmụ agbọghọ a na-ebo ebubo ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ
Nke a ga-agụnyekwa ụmụ agbọghọ na-enwe mmerụ ahụ ma na-etinye aka na mpụ ọnọdụ
Ọ bụrụ na ha aga n'iweputa ụlọ ikpe dika ha na-atu atụmatụ inwe, ha ga-enwe otu ọka ikpe ma ọ bụ karịa nke a zụrụ azụ n'ịchịkwa ụdị mmejọ ndị a
N'Australia, ụlọ ikpe ụmụaka na-eto eto na-enye ọrụ maka ụmụ agbọghọ a na-ebo ebubo mpụ
Ọrụ ndị a kpọmkwem dị anya n'ebe ndị omekome nwoke nọ
Ọrụ ndị a na-enye dịgasị iche site na ebe site na ahụike na ọdịmma, mmekọrịta, agụmakwụkwọ na ọzụzụ na mmemme ndị ọzọ dị ka isi nri na ịgbaso iwu
Mba Australia ghọtara mkpa ọ dị ịgwọ ụmụ agbọghọ na ọrụ gbasara nwoke na nwanyị
Ụlọ ikpe na-emepụta usoro mmeghachi omume nwoke na nwanyị maka ụmụ agbọghọ na usoro ikpe ziri ezi nke ụmụaka
Ụlọ ikpe ndị a na-ele anya iji dozie nsogbu gbasara nwoke na nwanyị maka ụmụ agbọghọ mana ha enwebeghị ụlọ ikpe ụmụ agbọghọ nke ha
Ha na-eme ememe dị iche iche iji dozie nsogbu gbasara nwoke na nwanyị maka ụmụ agbọghọ n'ụlọ ikpe ụmụaka
Girl in a Band A Memoir bụ akụkọ ndụ 2015 nke onye bụbu Sonic Youth bass guitar dere,onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede abụ bụ Kim Gordon
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta a peeji 288 n'ọnwa Febuwarị 24, nke afọ 2015 site na Dey Street Books, nke HarperCollins
Aha akwụkwọ ahụ sitere na ederede egwu 'Sacred Trickster' na ọba ikpeazụ nke Sonic Youth,The Eternal (2009) 'Ihe ọ dika ya ịbụ nwanyi na otu egwu?/ A wotaghi'm'
'Ihe ederede egwu ahụ puta kwara na ihe ngosi nka afọ 2013 nke Gordon's - igosiputa ọrụ ya kemgbe afọ 1980 - na galari New York Columns

Girl in a Band na-akọwa ndụ Gordon site na nwata na Rochester, New York, nke a na akpọ Los Angeles mgbe ahụ - site n'ịtọ ntọala na usoro nke Sonic Youth, alụmdi na nwunye ya nke ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri atọ banyere ya na onye otu egwu Thurston Moore, na mmebi ikpeazụ nke alụkwaghịm ha ya na òtù ahụ
Akwụkwọ ncheta ahụ nwetara nyocha dị mma nke ukwuu

Na The New York Times, Questlove toro akwụkwọ ahụ maka 'nlezianya bara ime, nkọwa na ezigbo mmetụta ya,' na-ekwu na ọbụlagodi mgbe ọtụtụ ndị ama ama na ndụ Gordon pụtara na akụkọ ahụ, 'ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na'ahụ ka a manyere ya ma ọ bụ na ọ dị egwu
O doro anya otú ndị gbara ya gburugburu si jeere ya ozi dị ka ihe na-akpali akpali, na'ịkpali echiche ya ma na ya nwere obi ike ikwupụta onwe ya
Na NME, Leonie Cooper kwuru, 'asiri banyere ndakpọ nke alụmdi na nwunye ya na Sonic Youth ga-adọta ọtụtụ ndị na akwụkwọ Gordon
Mana ọ na-emegide ya n'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya, na'iji ịdị mfe na ịchọta nwere onwe site na nka ọ hụrụ n'anya na arụmọrụ ya na ụmụ nwanyị niile ga á ba na Nirvana's 2014 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
Ihe karịrị ihe dị ndụ nke rock, Girl In A Band bụ ihe ndekọ pụrụ iche nke afọ iri ise gara aga nke ọdịbendị ọzọ

Nnyocha dị mma nke The Guardian kwubiri na 'ihe ncheta a bụ ụdị ọkụ nke ọrụ ndụ nke Gordon nwere ike ugbu a site na mgbawa obi', mana o kwuru n'ọgwụgwọ Gordon banyere ndakpọ alụmdi na nwunye ya, 'Ihe a ga-akọwa dị ka akụkọ nke mmadụ abụọ hụrụ onwe ha n'anya ma kwụsị kwa ịhụ onwe ha n'anya na nsogbu mmetụta uche niile
gosipụtara n 'n'ihe gbasara nsogbu nke ndụ, akụkọ a na-agụ dị mkpa dị dị iche iche na ntaramahụhụ'
Gisèle Wulfsohn (ụbọchị irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1957 na irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2011) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa
Wulfsohn bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, magazin, na onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya na-ahụ màkà foto, agụmakwụkwọ, ahụike na nsogbụ okike
A maara ya màkà idepụta mkpọsa mmata dị iche iche nke HIV / AIDS
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2011 site na ọrịa kansa akpa ume
A mụrụ Wulfsohn n'ubochí irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Machị na Rustenburg, North West, South Africa
Ọ gara Rustenburg Primary na Kingsmead College na Johannesburg, mànà ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Selly Park Convent
Ọ gárá Johannesburg College of Art, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe osise mara mma site n'afọ 1995 ruo 1997
Wulfsohn bịdọrọ ọrụ ọkachamara ya dị ka onye na-enyere ọchịchịrị aka n'afọ 1979 ma na-arịọ màkà ọnọdụ onye na-ese foto mgbè ohere ahụ dị
Na mbụ, kpakpando ahụ zaghachiri n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ha akwụghị ndị na-ese foto ụmụ nwanyị
Wulfsohn zaghachiri 'Oruola Ógè ịga eme' ma mesịa nweta ọrụ ahụ
Mgbè ọ rụchara ọrụ afọ anọ na The Star, ọ kwagara na magazin STYLE na 1983 ma na 1986 a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi na-ese foto maka Leadership Magazine
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1987, ọ gara ọrụ onwe ya wee sonye na Afrapix dị ka onye otu zuru oke na Guy Tillim, Santu Mofokeng na Cedric Nunn
OXFAM UK na Frances Lincoln Publishers were ya n'ọrụ n'afọ 2000 iji were foto màkà akwụkwọ ụmụaka, nke a na-akpọ One Child, One Seed, nke e debere n'ime imé ọbọdọ KwaZulu Natal
Mgbè o gosipụtara One Child, One Seed, otu onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ gwara ya ka o dee ma gosipụta Ụbọchị Bongani na Ndụ nke Nwa South Africa
Gisele rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ NGO nkè mba na nke mba ụwa, gụnyere Nelson Mandela Foundation, Mindset, NBI (National Business Initiative), na ActionAid UK
O mepụtara foto nkè ndị ọka ikpe asaá nke ụlọ ikpe iwu South Africa, nke na-ese n'ebe nka ọha na eze nke ụlọ ikpe usoro iwu
A chọpụtara na Wulfsohn nwèrè ọrịa kansa akpà ume a na-apụghị ịwa ahụ n'afọ 2005, ọ dịrị ndụ ruo úbọchị irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2011
Ọ hapụrụ di, Mark Turpin, na ụmụ ejima Joseph na Samuel
Centre for The Study of AIDS na Mahadum Pretoria mepụtara kalenda nwèrè ihe osise nke ọrụ ya obere ógè tụpụ ya anwụọ

Mgbè ọ nwụsịrị, ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya guzobere bursary n'aha ya na Market Photo Workshop na Johannesburg iji kwado ndị na-ese foto na-eto eto na-etinye aka na iji foto iji dekọọ nsogbụ mmekọrịta dị mkpa
Onye izizi natara bursary bụ Sydelle Willow Smith, na ngosi onwe ya 'Soft Walls' gosipụtara na Market Photo Workshop na Cape Town
Ónyé natara bursary n'afọ 2014/15 bụ Siphosihle Mkhwanazi na ihe ngosi ya 'Usual Suspect' meghere na June 2015
A họpụtara Phumzile Khanyile dị ka onye nke atọ natara bursary maka afọ 2015/16
Ihe ngosi ya 'Plastic Crowns', na-elekwasị anya n'ihe gbasara okike na njirimara, meghere na Market Photo Workshop na Febụwarị 2017 ma bụrụ ihe mmeri maka 2018 Contemporary African Photography Prize
Onye nke anọ natara Mentorship bụ Thembinkosi Hlatshwayo, ihe ngosi ya 'Slaghuis II' meghere na Market Photo Workshop na Febụwarị 2020
A họpụtara Gopinath ka ọ bụrụ onye isi akụ na ụba nke IMF na Ọktoba 2018 site n'aka onye isi njikwa ya Christine Lagarde
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Trevor Noah na Daily Show, ọ kpọrọ nlaazu mba ụwa nke 2020 dị ka 'Mkpọchi Ukwu ahụ'
Na Disemba 2021, Onye isi njikwa IMF Kristalina Georgieva họpụtara ya onye osote onye isi njikwa mbụ nke IMF, nke bụ ọkwa nke nzukọ-abụọ

Ihe mgbagwoju anya nke Giza pyramid (مجمع أهرامات الجيزة), nke a na-akpọkwa necropolis nke Giza ma ọ bụ Ijipt, bụ ebe dị na Giza Plateau na Giza, nke gụnyere Great Pyramid nke Giza, Pyramid nke Khafre, na Pyramid nke Menkaure, tinyere pyramid ha na Great Sphinx nke Giza
E wuru ha niile n'oge Ọchịchị nke Anọ nke Alaeze Ochie nke Ijipt oge ochie, n'etiti 2600 na 2500 BC
Ebe ahụ gụnyekwara ọtụtụ ebe ili ozu na ihe fọdụrụ n'obodo ndị ọrụ
Giza nke oge a na-esi n'okporo ụzọ abụọ abanye

Okporo ụzọ si n'ebe ugwu na-eduga na pyramid Khufu; Nke ọzọ ga-ezute n'ihu ụlọ ikpe Sphinx, si n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụHa gafere osimiri Naịl n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ wee soro ụzọ ahụ gaa n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụNa-achị ala dị larịị ma na-agba ọsọ na diagonal ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ site na saịtị ahụ bụ pyramid atọ nke pharaoh Khufu, Khafre na Menkaure
Mark Lehner na ndị otu ya wepụtara map ziri ezi nke ọdịdị okike na omenala nke ugwu Giza dum
Nnyocha data tụụrụ Lehner aro ebe ndị na-ewu pyramid nwere ike ịnọ n'obodo ahụ, ya mere na 1988 a gbatịkwuru ọrụ GPMP iji gwuo ma nyochaa mpaghara ndị ahụ
Gizdodo bụ nri dị ụtọ nke e ji anụ ọkụkọ na Dodo (plantain) mee, nke a bụ nri a na-eri n'ụlọ ma ọ bụ n'oge
A na-eji plantain, gizzard nke ọkụkọ, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, Onion, bell pepper na rodo (habenero pepper) n'etiti ndị ọzọ eme ngwakọta ahụ
A pụkwara itinye carrot

A na-esi plantain na gizzard n'otu n'otu na frypan, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-agbakwunye ha abụọ na ofe e ji ihe ndị fọdụrụ (yabasị a pịrị apị, ose a pịrị, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, Maggi cubes, nnu wdgỌ dị iche iche Enwere ike inye Gizdodo naanị ya, rie ya na osikapa ma ọ bụ spaghetti
Gizenga bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Gizo, nke a makwaara dịka Gizzo, bụ onye aghụghọ ududo nke dị n'okpukpe ọdịnala nke ndị Hausa, ndị dị na mpaghara Sahelian ma nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu na Naijiria, Niger, Ivory Coast, na Benin
Dị ka ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ọdịbendị nke ududo n'akụkọ ifo Afrịka, Gizo bụ dike n'akụkọ ifo
Ụkọ nri malitere otu ugboro, Gizo, yana ezinụlọ ya, nọkwa n'agụụ nke ukwuu
Ya mere, Gizo gara n'ebe enyí nọ, onye a na-ewere dịka onye nwe ala niile
Gizo gwara enyí ahụ, na-ekwu na onye nwe mmiri, enju mmiri ahụ chọrọ ka enyinyo ahụ zitere ya otu narị nkata ọka
Na mgbanwere, enyí mmiri ga-ezigara enyi ahụ nnukwu ịnyịnya
Enyí ahụ amaghị na Gizo na-agha ụgha, ya mere o nyere ya ọka ahụ
Mgbe o nwesịrị ihe ịga nke ọma na mgbalị mbụ ya, Gizo gakwuuru enyí mmiri n'oge a
Ọ rịọrọ otu narị nkata azụ maka enyí ahụ
Na nzaghachi, enyí ga-enweta nnukwu ịnyịnya site n'aka enjyi mmiri
N'ezie, Gizo na-agha ụgha nye enyí mmiri - mana ọ bụghị onye maara ihe
N'ikpeazụ, ma enyí Ḿmírí ma enyi ahụ rịọrọ Gizo maka ịnyịnya ha
Ya mere, Gizo chepụtara aghụghọ Ọ gwara ndị isi obodo abụọ na ọ dị mkpa ijide ịnyịnya ọhịa
Nanị ihe ha ga-eme bụ ịdọrọ eriri nke Gizo tinyere n'aka ha
N'amaghị ama ha, Gizo kwukwara otu ihe ahụ maka enyí na enyi mmiri ahụ; ya mere, ndị otu atọ ahụ mechara na-adọkpụ eriri ahụ n'akụkụ nke ha gasị, n'amagyeghị ihe merenụ
N'ezie, n'ikpeazụ, ma enyí mmiri ma enyi ahụ chọpụtara aghụghọ ahụ
Gizo gbapụrụ ma zoo n'iwe ha
Otú ọ dị, ọzọ, agụụ mere ya ihe o wee gbapụta ebe o zoro
Iji jide n'aka na a gaghị amata ya, Gizo weere akpụkpọ anụ mgbada ma mee ka ọ bụ otu
O nwekwara ihe ịga nke ọma Ọ bụ ezie na enyí na anyị mmiri zutere ya, ọ dịghị onye nwere ike ịmata ya
Glória Maria Cláudia Pires de Morais (23 Ọgọọst 1963) bu onye Brazilian bu ọmẹka
Gladys akpa (amụrụ ya na 1 Jenụwari afọ 1986) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dika onye na-agbachitere maka otu mba umu nwanyi na naijiria
O so na ndi otu egwuregwu n'afọ 2010 African Women's Championship na 2012 African Championship
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Sunshine Queens na Naijiria
Gladys Amoah bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Unilever Ghana
Nhọpụta ya malitere site na 1st nke Nọvemba 2018 ruo 20 Disemba 2019
Gladys bụkwa onye isi mmepe ndị ahịa nke Unilever Ghana ma mesịa nweta ọkwa onye isi nchịkwa n'otu nzukọ ahụ mgbe Maazị Ziobeieton Yeo gbara arụkwaghịm na 2018
N'oge ọ dị ka onye isi ahịa ahịa ndị ahịa, ọ nwere ahụmịhe karịa afọ 20 na ngwa ahịa ndị ahịa na-aga ngwa ngwa n'okpuru eriri ya

Ọ na-ejidekwa ọnọdụ na Marketing n'ime afọ ndị si n'ụlọ, nlekọta onwe onye na nri nlekọta ụlọ Oriakụ Amoah sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2012 wee bụrụ onye isi ahịa ahịa maka ịdị ọcha na South Africa maka nlekọta onwe ya
Ntombezanele Gladys Bakubaku-Vos (amụrụ na 6 June 1966) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Western Cape Provincial Parliament kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Ọ bụ onye kansụl obodo nke Stellenbosch Local Municipality
Bakubaku-Vos bụ onye otu African National Congress (ANC)
Na 5 Mee na afọ 2020, Bakubaku-Vos kwupụtara na ọ nwalere COVID-19
Na nzaghachi, Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Western Cape Provincial mara ọkwa na ọ ga-agafe usoro decontamination na sanitisation
Gladys May Casely-Hayford onye a na-akpọ Aquah Laluah (11 Mee afọ 1904 Ọktoba afọ 1950) bụ ụsọ oké osimiri ọla edo mụrụ Sierra Leone onye ode akwụkwọ Gold Coast
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye edemede mbụ dere n'asụsụ Krio
A mụrụ Gladys n'ezinụlọ Casely-Hayford nke Axim, Gold Coast na 11 Mee afọ 1904
Dị ka nwatakịrị, nke a maara mgbe ahụ dị ka Aquah LaLuah, ọ bụ onye na-agụ akwụkwọ nke ukwuu, na-eri ndị dike Charles Kingsley mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa
Ọ nwere ike ịbụ abụ, ịgba egwu, ma dee uri mgbe ọ dị obere
N'ihi ọzụzụ ya, ọ nwere ike ịsụ Bekee, Creole, na Fante (asụsụ nna ya)

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Gold Coast mana n'ihi ihe gbasara ahụike, a kpọgara ya Obodo England, wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Europe, gụnyere na Penrhos College, Colwyn Bay, na Wales, wee soro otu egwu jazz nke Berlin mee njem dị ka onye na-agba egwu
Ọ gara mba US kwa
Mgbe ọ malitere inwe nkụda mmụọ na afọ 1932 ọ ghaghị ịlaghachi n'ụlọ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ n'Afrika, ọ kụziri na Girls' Vocational School na Freetown, Sierra Leone, nke nne ya, Adelaide Casely-Hayford, na-elekọta
Gladys May Casely-Hayford biri na Freetown, Sierra Leone, maka ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya
Ọ kwagara Accra, ebe ezinụlọ nna ya bi, na ebe ọ nwụrụ na afọ 1950 n'ihi oyi ojii
Gladys Cherono Kiprono (amụrụ na 12 onwa Mee, na afo 1983) bụ onye Kenya ọkachamara na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi na track na road running events
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ meriri ma mita 5000 na mita 10,000 na African Championships na afọ 2012
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro atọ nke Berlin Marathon na nke asatọ kachasị ọsọ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ n'oge niile (dị ka nke 2020)
Ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ na asọmpi okporo ụzọ Spanish n'afọ 2004
O setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma nke 71 19 nkeji iji merie na afọ 2005 Media Maratón Santa Pola ma merie na Granollers Half Marathon
Ọ gara n'ihu na-asọmpi na agbụrụ dị ala ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na 2007 Reims Half Marathon
Ọ meriri n'ọsọ ahụ n'afọ sochirinụ wee melite ihe kachasị mma ya na Porto Half Marathon, na-agba ọsọ 70 43 nkeji maka nke atọ
Ọ ka mma n'oge ahụ na 2009 Valladolid Half Marathon, na-ewere aha ahụ na ọsọ nke 69 26 nkeji, ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na ọsọ Porto
O mere asọmpi ole na ole n'ime ọnwa 18 sochirinụ, mana ọ meriri Zhuhai Half Marathon na mbido mbụ ya n'Eshia na ọnwa Disemba na afọ 2011
Cherono banyere n'ọkwa ndị a ma ama n'afọ 2012
Ọ bụ onye nke atọ na RAK Half Marathon na Prague Half Marathon, na-edekọ nkeji 68 18 kacha mma na asọmpi ikpeazụ
Ọ gakwara n'ihu n'okporo ụzọ ahụ, na-ewere 5000 mita na 10,000 mita utu aha na Kenya Defence Forces Championships
A họpụtara ya ka ọ gbaa ọsọ ihe omume ndị a na afọ 2012 African Championships in Athletics na, na enweghị ndị na-eme egwuregwu dị elu, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ meriri agbụrụ abụọ dị anya na asọmpi ahụ
Ọ gbara nkeji 15 4004 maka nrite ọla edo nke 5000m bụ ihe ndekọ mmeri
A họrọghị ya ka ọ sọọ mpi na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics kama ọ gara n'ihu merie na Bogotá Half Marathon na Tilburg 10K

O meriri Kenya Defence Forces Cross Country title na mbido afọ 2013, wee gbaa ọsọ kachasị mma nke 1 06 48 iji merie Prague Half Marathon oge nke mere ka ọ banye n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 10 kachasị ọsọ na-agba ọsọ n'oge niile
O meriri ihe omume ikpe nke mba maka 10,000 m wee gaa n'ihu were ọlaọcha n'azụ Tirunesh Dibaba
Ọ mechiri afọ ahụ site na onye nke abụọ na BOclassic na Delhi Half Marathon

Na ọnwa Septemba, na afọ 2015, n'oge nke abụọ ya na-asọmpi na marathon distance, ọ meriri Berlin Marathon na 2 19 25 (nke kacha mma site na sekọnd 38), nke n'oge ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke asaa kachasị ọsọ n'oge niile
Ka e mesịrị na Febụwarị 2016, Cherono mechara RAK Half Marathon na 1 06 07 (nke kachasị mma site na sekọnd 31), nke n'oge ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke anọ kachasị ọsọ na ọkara marathon n'oge niile
N'afọ 2017, Cherono meriri Berlin Marathon nke abụọ ya na oge nke 2 20 23
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ meriri Berlin Marathon nke ugboro atọ na oge nke 2 18 11 ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ
As of 2020[ref] Gladys Cherono gbara onye asatọ na na abalị iri abụo na anọ bu onye gbakachara na ọsọ na igba ọsọ dị anya
Mmasị na ụmụ anụmanụ kemgbe afọ 12 ka ọ na-etolite na Kampala, Kalema-Zikusoka malitere otu anụ ọhịa na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya ma hazie njem na Queen Elizabeth National Park
Ọmụmụ ọkachamara ya malitere mgbe ọ meriri akwụkwọ mmụta iji mụọ na Mahadum London Royal Veterinary College, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Veterinary Medicine
Mgbe e mesịrị, na 2003, ọ nwetara Master of Veterinary Medicine na North Carolina State University
Ọ na-ejidekwa asambodo na njikwa nke ụlọ ọrụ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ, nke enwetara na Mahadum Duke
Mmezu agụmakwụkwọ kacha nso nso a bụ Master of Business Administration, nwetara na 2016
Kalema-Zikusoka lụrụ Lawrence Zikusoka, onye na-azụ ahịa nkà na ụzụ na otu n'ime ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ nke Nchekwa Site na Ahụike Ọha
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Gladys Lanza (1942 - 17 Septemba 2016) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-agbachitere ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ si Honduras
A mụrụ Lanza na Tegucigalpa, Honduras, na 1942
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Lanza malitere dị ka akụkụ nke òtù ndị ọrụ na Honduras
N'afọ ndị 1990 Lanza bụ onye isi oche nke Workers Union nke National Electric Power Company (STENEE), n'oge ahụ ọ duziri nguzogide nke otu ahụ na nkeonwe
N'oge gara aga, Lanza bụ osote onye isi oche nke Central Federation of Free Trade Unions of Honduras na odeakwụkwọ nke United Federation of Workers of Honduras
Ọ nọkwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na pati ndị Kọmunist
Gọọmentị Honduras jidere ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ ndị 1980 dabere na ihe akaebe adịgboroja
E depụtara aha ya dị ka ihe ndị agha na-emegide ya lekwasịrị anya na 1991 ụlọ ya mebiri

Lanza sonyeere Movimiento de Mujeres por la Paz (Honduran Women's Committee for Peace 'Visitación Padilla'), nke bụ otu ụmụ nwanyị si Honduras na-akwado ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị, na-arụ ọrụ megide ime ihe ike nwoke na nwanyị ma na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị itinye aka na ndụ ọha
O tinyere aka site na mmalite ya na 1984, o mechara bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ya
E guzobere ya iji sọpụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na Honduras bụ Visitación Padilla
Òtù ahụ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ òtù ụmụ nwanyị nke Honduras nke megidere nnupụisi ọchịchị nke afọ 2009
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Platform for Women against Femicides, nke gọọmentị Britain kwadoro
N'afọ 2010, Ụlọikpe Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ nke America nyere gọọmentị Honduras iwu ka ha chebe Lanza, n'ihi mkpagbu na-aga n'ihu
N'afọ 2009, Lanza na Visitación Padilla weere ikpe Lesbia Pacheco, onye a chụpụrụ n'ọrụ ya na gọọmentị mgbe ọ jụrụ iyi egwu mmekọahụ nke onye isi ọrụ, Juan Carlos Reyes
Nnyocha banyere ebubo Reyes 'efu na usoro' ma na mkpesa Visitación Padilla haziri ngagharị iwe ebe a katọrọ Reyes
Lanza sonyere na ngagharị iwe ahụ, e boro ya ebubo nkwutọ ma chọpụta na ikpe mara ya
A mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ ọnwa iri na asatọ n'afọ 2015
Ikpe ahụ pụtara na ọ nweghịzi ike ịrụ ọrụ maka Visitación Padilla
Mgbe a kpụchara ya ikpe, ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị si n'ime Honduras rịọrọ ka a gbaghara ya, na-eji okwu mkpọsa 'Anyị niile bụ ndị Gladys'
Lanza nwụrụ na Septemba 2016, mgbe ụbọchị 10 gasịrị n'ụlọ ọgwụ na Tegucigalpa; Otú ọ dị, ahụike ya emebiwo nke ukwuu kemgbe a mara ya ikpe n'afọ 2015

Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, Mesoamerican Initiative of Women Human Rights Defenders (IM-Defensoras) bipụtara nkwupụta na-ebo gọọmentị Honduras ebubo na ọ kpatara ọnwụ Lanza site n'ịga n'ihu na 'mmeso obi ọjọọ na obi ọjọọ ruo n'ókè nke ime ka ọnwụ ya dị mma, site n'ịnọgide na-enweghị isi ma na-agbatị ikpe ikpe ikpe na-enweghị ihe kpatara ya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị Honduras niile iji chebe ikike ha'
Nke a jikọtara ya na arịrịọ maka mgbaghara nke ebubo ndị ụlọ ọrụ mba na nke mba ụwa tụrụ ya mkpọrọ
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2017, ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu na Honduras kwụsịtụrụ ikpe megide Lanza
Gladys Lundwe (amụrụ na 24 Disemba na afo 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia bụ Minista nke Ala site na afo 2010 ruo na afo 2013
A mụrụ Lundwe na 24 Disemba na afo 1964
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị Lamba
O nwere diplọma na Human Resources Development
Lundwe rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ tupu a họpụta ya na National Assembly dị ka onye nnọchi anya Movement for Multi-Party Democracy maka mpaghara Masaiti na ntuli aka 2006
N'ọnwa Ọktoba na afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista nke ọfịs osote onye isi ala na-ahụ maka nhọpụta ọha na eze
Site na afo 2007 ruo na afo 2010 ọ bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ike na mmepe mmiri
N'afọ 2010, Onye isi ala Rupiah Banda họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Ala
Gladys Nomfanekiso Mgudlandlu (1917 Febụwarị 1979) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkuzi South Africa
A maara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Africa mbụ na South Africa iji mee ihe ngosi onwé ya, ọ bụ ónyé ọsụ ụzọ na nka ányá na mbà ya, nke e nyere ya Order of Ikhamanga na Silver
O nwetara mmetụta site na ọdịbendị ya na ala gbara ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ
A mụrụ Gladys Mgudlandlu na mpaghara Peddie dị nso na Grahamstown na 1917 (ihe ụfọdụ na-enye 1923 ma ọ bụ 1925)
Ọ bụ nne nne ya zụlitere ya, ónyé kụziiri ya ụdị eserese ọdịnala site na ihe nketa Xhosa na Fingo ha, na banyere nnụnụ ndị ọbọdọ ha
Ọ rụrụ eru dị ka ónyé nkuzi na 1941, na Lovedale College
E debanyere aha ya dị ka onye nọọsụ na-enye ọzụzụ na Cape Town n'afọ ndị 1940
Mgudlandlu rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkuzi nka na Langa, Cape Town na Athlone Bantu Community School ruo afọ iri na ise
Otú ọ dị, mgbè a manyere Iwu Mmụta Bantu nke 1953, ekweghị ka Mgudlandlu kụzie n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ n'okpuru ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Tupu ọ raara onwé ya nyé ǹkà ógè niile, ọ gàrà nkuzi nwa oge na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Nyanga na Gugulethu
Mgudlandlu kụziri na Athlone Bantu Community School ruo 1953, na Nyanga West Primary School site na 1953
Ọ na-ese ihe n'abalị mgbè ọ rụchara ọrụ
Ụdị Mgudlandluʹs sitere na usoro eserese nke nné ya
Dị ka nwatakịrị, nné nnè ya, onye na-ese ihe n'ahụ, kụziiri ya banyéré nka ányá
Ọnwụ nné nnè ya, nke ụfọdụ ndị lere anya dị ka ọ bụghị naanị nnukwu mfu kamakwa nnwere onwé màkà Mugudlandlu, kpalitere mmeghachi omume nka
Mgudlandlu sitere n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ime ime ọbọdọ ma gosipụta ihe ncheta ya banyéré ntorobịa n'ọnọdụ nrọ
Ọrụ ya gosipụtara nnụnụ ụmụ amaala, ọdịdị ime obodo, na ngosipụta nke ọbọdọ nta ndị dị egwu n'Africa
Ọ hụrụ nnụnụ n'anya ma na-akpọkarị ya 'nwaanyị nnụnụ'
N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke Sunday Chronicle, o kwuru 'Birds abụwo ndị enyi m mgbè niile
Abụ m ónyé owu na-ama
Ha bụ naanị ezigbo ndị enyi m nwere
Mgbè ụfọdụ echere m na m kwesịrị ịbụ nnụnụ
Ọbụna m na-ese ihe dị ka nnụnụ
Ị ga-achọpụta na a na-eme ihe nkiri m niile site n'ile anya n'ebe dị elu na n'ebe di anya
' Ọ kọwara ụdị ihe osise ya dị ka ngwakọta dị n'etiti Impressionism na Expressionism, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị ka a kpọọ ya
Site na naanị oriọna paraffin, onye na-ese ihe ga-emepụta nka
O jighị ọkụ eletrik mee ihe ma ga-aga n'ihu na omenala a n'oge ọrụ ya niile
Ọrụ ya nwere isi ihe abụọ ala na anya nnụnụ
Mgbe ọ na-ese ihe site n'ebe dị n'ala, ọ ga-ese ụmụ anụmanụ ebe ebe ebe dị elu ya na-ese foto bụ ala
Ihe osise ndị a sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ọrụ nwata ya, na-arịgo ugwu na nkume
Ọ na-egosi na mbido afọ 1960

Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị na-asọpụrụ ya ma hụ na ọrụ ya bụ ihe nnọchianya mara mma nke South Africa, Bessie Head, otu n'ime ndị edemede kachasị emetụta na Botswana, kwuru site na ịgba ọsọ ndụ na Botswana na 1963 na ọrụ Mgudlandlu bụ 'escapist,' 'nwatakịrị,' ma lekwasị anya na ndị ọcha
Ihe ngosi mmeghe ya bụ na Cape Town na 1961 na ụlọ ọrụ Liberal Party na Parliament Street
Tupu ihe ngosi mbụ a nke ọrụ Mgudlandlu, ọ dịghị nwanyị ojii na-ese ihe a ma ama na-egosi na ọdịnala nka ọdịda anyanwụ, ha niile ka na-amaghị aha ha
Ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ndị egosiri bụ gouache
Mgbe o merụrụ ahụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala na 1971, Mgudlandlu kwụsịrị ise ihe ma gosipụta ọrụ ya
