Glynis Barber (a mụrụ Glynis van der Riet; 25 Ọktoba 1955) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya maka ihe ngosi ya nke Sgt
Harriet Makepeace na ihe nkiri ndị uwe ojii Britain Dempsey na Makepeace, Glenda Mitchell na EastEnders, DCI Grace Barraclough na Emmerdale, Fiona Brake na Night and Day, na Soolin na Blake's 7
N'afọ 2022, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Hollyoaks dịka Norma Crow
A mụrụ Barber na Durban, South Africa, nwa Heather Maureen (Robb) na Frederick Werndly Barry van der Riet
Barber gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mountview Academy of Theatre Arts
N'afọ 1982, ọ rụrụ ọrụ aha na usoro telivishọn Jane na-egwu dike Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
E mere usoro ihe nkiri a na ihuenyo na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na-enye ohere maka mgbakwunye nke eserese eserese, usoro nnwale n'oge ya
Otú ọ dị, a maara Barber nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'etiti afọ 1980 nke Sgt
Harriet Makepeace na ihe nkiri ndị uwe ojii Dempsey na Makepeace, ebe ọ zutere di ya n'ọdịnihu, Michael Brandon
Kemgbe afọ 1987, Barber apụtawo ugboro ugboro na egwuregwu, ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn
O sonyekwara na usoro ihe nkiri LWT Night and Day dị ka Fiona Brake
N'afọ 2006, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ITV soap, Emmerdale, na-eme ihe nkiri DCI Grace Barraclough, na-enyocha ọnwụ Tom King n'ụbọchị Krismas
Ọ hapụrụ ncha na Septemba 2007, mgbe e gburu àgwà ya
N'afọ 2009, ọ pụtara dịka onye nlekọta ụlọ ọgwụ Jean McAteer na The Royal, usoro ihe nkiri ITV ọzọ nke e mere na Yorkshire
N'abalị 23 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009, a mara ọkwa na ọ ga-egwu Glenda Mitchell nne Ronnie Mitchell, Roxy Mitchell na Danny Mitchell na EastEnders mgbe Jill Gascoine hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ n'ụbọchị mbụ ya na set
Na 27 Febụwarị afọ 2011, a mara ọkwa na Barber ga-ahapụ EastEnders na Machị 2011
Na Febụwarị 2015, Barber kwetara na ọ ga-atụle nlọghachi EastEnders
Kpakpando ahụ kwuru, sị 'Enwere m mmetụta mgbe niile na Glenda hapụrụ nsogbu ole na ole a na-edozighị edozi
Ọ ga-abụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ ịlaghachi azụ ma mepụta obere mbibi!
Glenda laghachiri maka ihe omume abụọ n'abalị 1 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2016
Barber laghachiri EastEnders oge niile na Jenụwarị 2017 tupu ọ pụọ ọzọ na Febụwarị
Na Septemba afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi ịgba egwu nke ITV Stepping Out ya na di ya bụ Michael Brandon
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2019, Barber kọrọ When Luxury Holidays Go Wrong na C5 ma mesịa pụta na usoro telivishọn The Outpost
Kemgbe afọ 2019, ọ na-akọ usoro Channel 5 The Wonderful World of Chocolate
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2022, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks dịka Norma Crow
Ọrụ ya gụnyere Macbeth, Killing Time na Dennis Waterman, High Flyers na Hugh Grant, Make Me a Match na The Graduate
N'afọ 2011, Barber sonyeere Christopher Timothy na Denis Lill na Alan Ayckbourn's Seasons Greetings, na-egwu Belinda
N'afọ 2013, ọ gbara Melissa Gardner na Love Letters na Dundee Repertory Theatre ya na Michael Brandon
Barber mere nne Carole King, Genie Klein, na mmepụta West End nke Beautiful - The Carole King Musical site na mmeghe ya na Aldwych Theatre n'abalị 24 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015 ruo 28 Nọvemba 2015
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya gụnyere ihe nkiri egwu Terror, na ihe nkiri bọọlụ Yesterday's Hero nke Ian McShane gosipụtara
Ọ pụtara dị ka Lady Caroline na Michael Winner's afọ 1983 remake nke The Wicked Lady, nke Faye Dunaway gosipụtara
N'afọ1989, ọ pụtara dịka Elisabeth Jekyll na Edge of Sanity, na ihe nkiri 1997 Déjà Vu n'akụkụ Vanessa Redgrave
Ọ pụtara dị ka Anthea Davis na On the Nose n'afọ 2001 ya na Dan Aykroyd na Robbie Coltrane
Barber lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Paul Antony-Barber, onye ọ zutere na ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri, n'afọ1976; di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1979
N'ime ihe nkiri 7 nke Blake, ya na onye otu ya bụ Steven Pacey nwere mmekọrịta
Barber lụrụ Dempsey na Makepeace co-star Michael Brandon na 18 Nọvemba 1989; di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwoke, Alex
Glynis Johns (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1923) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agba egwu, onye egwú na onye na-agụ egwú

A mụrụ ya na Pretoria, South Africa, mgbe nne na nna ya nọ na njem, a maara ya nke ọma maka ịmepụta ọrụ Desiree Armfeldt na A Little Night Music on Broadway, nke o ritere Tony Award, na maka igwu Winifred Banks na ihe nkiri egwu Walt Disney Mary Poppins
N'afọ 2020, mgbe Olivia de Havilland nwụrụ, Johns ghọrọ onye kacha okenye dị ndụ na Academy Award-nominee na ụdị ọ bụla na-eme ihe nkiri
N'ọrụ abụọ ahụ, Johns bụrụ abụ ndị e dere maka ya kpọmkwem, gụnyere 'Send In the Clowns', nke Stephen Sondheim dere, na 'Sister Suffragette', nke Sherman Brothers dere
A họpụtara Johns maka onyinye Academy maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri afọ 1960 The Sundowners
Ọ bụ otu n'ime kpakpando ikpeazụ dị ndụ site na Golden Age nke Hollywood na afọ klas nke ihe nkiri Britain
A maara ya maka àgwà iku ume nke olu ya na àgwà ya dị mma
A mụrụ Johns na Pretoria, Union of South Africa, na 5 Ọktoba 1923, dịka nwa nwanyị nke Alice Maude Steele (née Wareham), onye na-akpọ piano, na Mervyn Johns, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Welsh
Mgbọrọgwụ ya dị na West Wales, a mụrụ ya na Pretoria mgbe ndị mụrụ ya na-eme njem nleta n'ebe ahụ
Johns pụtara n'ihu ọha nke mbụ ya na Buckie's Bears dịka nwatakịrị na-agba egwú na Garrick Theatre n'afọ1935
(O mechara bụrụ onye nkuzi ballet ruru eruA hụrụ ya ka ọ na-agba egwú n'egwuregwu ụmụaka n'oge ezumike Krismas ma tinye ya na mmepụta ihe nkiri mbụ ya, St Helena, na Old Vic n'afọ 1936
N'afọ ahụ, ọ nọkwa na mmepụta nke The Children's Hour na The Melody That Got Lost
Ọ sochiri nke a na Judgment Day (1937) na A Kiss for Cinderella (1937)
Johns mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ 1938 na ihe nkiri nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Winifred Holtby South Riding
O nwere obere ọrụ na Murder in the Family (1938), Prison Without Bars (1939), On the Night of the Fire (1940), Under Your Hat (1940), na The Briggs Family (1940)
N'elu nkwago, ọ nọ na Quiet Wedding (1938)
Ọ nọ na Quiet Weekend (1941 Xiji43) n'elu ikpo okwu, nke gbara afọ abụọ
Johns nwere ọrụ na The Adventures of Tartu (1943) na The Halfway House (1944)
N'elu ikpo okwu, ọ pụtara na Peter Pan (1943), I'll See You Again (1944), na Fools Rush In (1946)
Johns nwetara ezigbo nyocha maka arụmọrụ ya dịka ezigbo enyi Deborah Kerr na Perfect Strangers (1945) (nke a na-akpọkwa Vacation from Marriage)
Johns gara n'ihu na nkwado ọrụ This Man Is Mine (1946), Frieda (1947), na An Ideal Husband (1947)

Ọrụ ihe nkiri ya mechara mee gụnyere The Vault of Horror (1973) na The Happy Prince (1974), mana o lekwasịrị anya n'ọkwa Ring Round the Moon (1975), 13 Rue de l'Amour (1976), Cause Célèbre (1978), Hay Fever (1980), na The Circle (1989)
Johns gosipụtara dị ka Myrtle Bledsoe na mmalite nke Horton Foote's A Coffin na Egypt n'afọ 1998 na Bay Street Theatre

N'oge oge mbụ nke ihe nkiri NBC na-ewu ewu Cheers, Johns bụ onye ọbịa dịka nne Diane Chambers, Helen Chambers, onye bara ọgaranya na-enweghị isi nke, n'ihi nkwekọrịta na testament nke nna Diane nwụrụ anwụ, ga-efunahụ ego ya niile ọ gwụla ma Diane lụrụ di n'echi ya
N'afọ 1988 na 1989, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Trudie Pepper, onye agadi bi n'obodo ezumike nká nke Arizona, na ihe nkiri telivishọn Coming of Age na CBS
Johns mere nne nne na-ejide igwefoto na 1995 Sandra Bullock hit While You Were Sleeping
Johns lụrụ di ugboro anọ
Di mbụ ya bụ Anthony Forwood (nwụrụ n'afọ 1942), onye ya na ya mụrụ naanị nwa ya, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Gareth Forwood, n'afọ 1945
Site n'afọ 1952 ruo 1956, ọ lụrụ David Foster, onye ọrụ Royal Navy na onye isi oche nke Colgate-Palmolive
Ọ lụrụ Cecil Henderson, onye ọchụnta ego, na 1960
Ọ lụrụ Elliott Arnold, onye edemede, n'afọ1964
Nwa Johns Gareth nwụrụ tupu ya, ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2007
Johns bi na Belmont Village Hollywood Heights, obodo ndị agadi bi, nke dị na Los Angeles, California nso Hollywood Bowl

Glynnis Breytenbach (amụrụ n'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1960, bụ onye bụbu onye ọkàiwu maka National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) nke South Africa na onye omeiwu maka Democratic Alliance (DA)
Ọ bụ Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi nke mba South Africa
N'ọnọdụ a, ọ rịọrọ ka a kwụsị itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-aga n'ihu nke mebiri iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe nke NPA
Esemokwu ya na NPA ogologo oge banyere nkwụsịtụ ya na afọ 2012 site na Specialised Commercial Crime Unit ka a kọrọ nke ọma na mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 2017, o bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta, Rule of Law, na n'afọ 2018 ka edepụtara maka ọkwa onye isi nchịkwa nke ndị ọkàiwu ọha na eze na NPA, mana o mechara wepụ ọkwa ya

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012, Nomgcobo Jiba, onye na-arụ ọrụ National Director of Public Prosecutions, kwụsịri Breytenbach n'ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi mpaghara na NPA's Specialised Commercial Crime Unit (SCCU), na ndabere nke mkpesa nke ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọ Imperial Crown Trading
Breytenbach ekwuola na a kwụsịri ya n'ihi na ọ gbara akwụkwọ maka Richard Mdluli, onye bụbu onye isi nke ngalaba nzuzo nke ndị uwe ojii, maka ebubo wayo na nrụrụ aka
Lawrence Mrwebi, onye isi SCCU, wepụrụ ebubo ndị a na-ebo Mdluli, mkpebi nke e mechara chọpụta na ọ megidere iwu
Usoro ịdọ aka ná ntị, nke na arịrịọ Breytenbach meghere maka mgbasa ozi, wepụrụ Breyten Bach na mmejọ ọ bụla na Mee na afọ 2013, otu afọ mgbe a kwụsịrị ya
N'oge ahụ, ọ gbaghara nkwụsịtụ ahụ na Council na ụlọ ikpe
A tọhapụrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebubo mpụ metụtara akwụkwọ ndị o hichapụrụ na kọmputa ọrụ ya na mberede

Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na-ama ya aka site na SCCU, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na NPA na Jenụwarị na afọ 2014, sonyeere DA n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a ṅụrụ iyi dị ka onye omebe iwu na ọnwa Mee ahụ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2014, ya na NPA kwekọrịtara na esemokwu ọrụ niile

Eastman, mebere maka Netflix site n'aka Adam Peltzman

Go Man Go (1953-1983) bụ American Quarter Horse stallion na ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ
A kpọrọ ya World Champion Quarter Running Horse ugboro atọ n'usoro, otu n'ime naanị ịnyịnya abụọ iji nweta ọdịiche ahụ
A na-ewere Go Man Go dị ka onye nwere obi ike
Ka ọ na-echere n'ọnụ ụzọ mbido maka asọmpi mbụ ya, ọ tụbara onye na-agba ịnyịnya ya, kụwaa ọnụ ụzọ, wee gbaa ọsọ naanị ya gburugburu ụzọ; e mechara jide ya wee gaa n'ihu merie asọmpi ahụ
N'ime afọ ise nke asọmpi ya ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1960 o nwere mmeri 27, na-enweta ihe karịrị $ 86,000 (nke ya na $ 831,000 )
Ọ nweghị nne na nna Go Man Go gbara ọsọ
Nna ya (nna), Thoroughbred stallion Top Deck, bụ Eze Ranch zụrụ
Dam ya (nne) sitere na Louisiana; A na-eche na Go Man Go nwetara ọsọ ọsọ ya na egwu ahụ n'aka ya
N'ime afọ mbụ nke ọrụ ịgba ọsọ Go Man Go, onye nwe ya chere ihe isi ike ihu n'ịdebanye aha ya na American Quarter Horse Association (AQHA), okwu nke edozibeghị ruo 1958
Ewu ma ọ bụ ewu anụ ụlọ ( Capra hircus ) bụ anụ ụlọ ewu-antelope nke a na-edebekarị dị ka anụ ụlọ E sitere na ewu ọhịa (C

aegagrus) nke ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Eshia na Eastern Europe zụlitere ya Ewu bụ onye sitere na ezinụlọ anụmanụ Bovidae na ebo Caprini, nke pụtara na ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na atụrụ Enwere ihe karịrị ụdị ewu 300 dị iche iche Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụdị anụmanụ ndị kacha ochie n'ụlọ, dị ka ihe ndị mgbe ochie na-egosi na n'ime ụlọ mbụ ya mere na Iran na kalenda afọ 10,000 gara aga
Chiiz ewu, ma ọ bụ chèvre (/ ˈʃɛvrə/ ma ọ bụ /ˈʃɛv/; sitere na French fromage de chèvre 'cheese ewu'), bụ chiiz sitere na mmiri ara ewu
Ewu bụ otu n'ime anụmanụ ndị mbụ e ji azụ anụ
A na-eji nri dị iche iche eme cheese ewu gburugburu ụwa, na-enye ọtụtụ ụdị chiiz dị iche iche, site na nke ọhụrụ na dị nro ruo na agadi na ndị siri ike
Gobodo bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Okpukpe ụfọdụ na-akọwa Chineke na ekwughị banyere okike, ebe ndị ọzọ na-eji okwu nke na-emetụta okike na nke na-ele mmadụ anya n'ihu
A tụụrụ Chineke anya dị ka onye ọ bụla ma ọ bụ onye na-abụghị onye ọ bụla
Na theism, Chineke bụ onye okike na onye na-akwado eluigwe na ala, ebe na deism, Chineke dị ka onye okike, mana ọ bụghị onye na-elekọta, nke eluigwe na ala
Na pantheism, Chineke bụ eluigwe na ala na onwe ya, ebe na panentheism, eluigwe na ala bụ akụkụ (ma ọ bụghị ihe niile) nke Chineke
Atheism bụ enweghị ikwere na Chineke ma ọ bụ chi ọ bụla, ebe agnosticism bụ nkwenye na ịdị adị nke Chineke amaghị ma ọ bụ amaghị
A tụkwara Chineke anya dị ka isi iyi nke ọrụ omume niile, na 'ihe kachasị ukwuu a na-eche n'echiche dị'
Ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta okpukpe na ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma a ma ama emeela arụmụka maka na megide ịdị adị nke Chineke
A na-akpọ Chineke aha dị iche iche dabere na asụsụ na ọdịnala ọdịnala na utu aha a na-eji eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ na-ezo aka na àgwà Chineke
Godadi bụ okwu Gujarati okwu maka a akwa akwa
Ọ bụ ụdị akwa akwa pụrụ iche, nke a na-achọ mma ma na-eme site na ịpị akwa dị iche iche
Ndị inyom na-arụkarị Godadi bụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ aka site na Gujarat, ọkachasị site na mpaghara ndị fọdụrụ n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi ozi esighi zuru ihe nọr na mkpóró ndị ogbi Kutch
Taa na Gujarat, a na-ewere okwu 'Godadi' dị ka okwu n'ozuzu maka akwa akwa nke dị na nnukwu ụlọ ahịa na ụlọ ahịa
Otú ọ dị, ndị maara okwu 'Godadi' ga-ese onyinyo nke ụwa na ụdị ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mgbe niile ákwà a chọrọ mma nke a na-eji dị ka blanket
N'afọ 19, [ịkọwapụta dị mkpa] enweghị ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ma ọ bụ ebe mmepụta maka akwa akwa ajị anụ ma ọ bụ ogho n'obodo nta Punjab na Gujarat

Na mbido, a na-anakọta ákwà ndị a na-ejighị mee ihe dị ka uwe elu, sari na uwe ndị ọzọ ka oge na-aga ma na-eburu n'uche ime ezigbo akwa akwa, ụmụ agbọghọ si Bhuj, Gujarat na-akpa ákwà a ọnụ, mgbe ha gbasịrị ha n'ụdị dị iche iche
Ka oge na-aga, iberibe ogho bịara dị n'ahịa nke nyeere ụmụ agbọghọ na ndị inyom ụlọ aka ime blanket a haziri nke ọma site na itinye ha na atụmatụ dị iche iche
Omenala nke ime akwa akwa aka gara n'ihu na narị afọ nke 21
Ọtụtụ ndị obodo si Kutch, Gujarat na-ebupụ akwa akwa ha na steeti dị iche iche nke India
N'ihi ịtụle atụmatụ ihe nketa, ụdị akwa akwa a ka na-ewu ewu ma na-eji ya eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na India
Ruo ugbu a, e nwere ọtụtụ ebe na ụlọ ahịa na Kutch ebe a na-ere Godadis e ji aka mee
E nwere ụdị Godadis dị iche iche, dị ka Godadi e ji otu akwa ogho mee, Godadi na Godadi e si ejiji
Goddy Leye (24 Nọvemba 1965 na Mbouda, Cameroon - 19 Febụwarị 2011 na Bonendale, Cameroon) bụ onye Cameroon na-ese ihe na ọgụgụ isi
Ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya na vidiyo, ntinye, nka echiche na onyinye echiche
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nka ArtBakery na Bonendale, Cameroon ma ọ bụ onye nlekọta na onye na-akwalite nka na ọrụ mba ụwa
Ọrụ ya bụ isi na ọdịbendị na nka na Cameroon na ọkwa mba ụwa

A mụrụ Goddy Leye (ezigbo aha ya bụ Godfried Kadjo) na 24 Nọvemba 1965 na Mbouda, Cameroon O nwetara diplọma ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-asụ asụsụ abụọ n'afọ 1989 ma gụọ akwụkwọ Afrịka na philology na Mahadum Yaoundé n'agbata afọ 1986 na 1991
N'afọ 1990, ọ nwetara nzere masta ya na akwụkwọ Afrịka
Ọzụzụ nka ya malitere na 1987 na onye na-ese ihe na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Pascal Kenfack na Yaoundé ruo 1992

Ọ gara n'ihu na ọzụzụ ya na 1994 na National Art Institute na Bamako, na 1997 na ZKM Karlsruhe Centre for Art and Media na Germany, na 1999 na 18th Street Arts Complex na Santa Monica, California na n'etiti 2002 na 2002 na Rijksakademie van Beeldende Kunsten na Amsterdam
Na Netherlands, ọ na-akwado ego ma bụrụ onye otu Rijksakademie International Network (RAIN), netwọk nke ndị na-ese ihe na-akwado omenala ọgbara ọhụrụ na mba ha

Kpọmkwem maka mmasị ya n'ịkwado omume nka, Leye laghachiri Douala n'afọ 2002 iji mepụta ụlọ ọrụ nka ArtBakery na Bonendale, raara onwe ya nye kpọmkwem iji kwado ọzụzụ nka na mgbanwe n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe na ịkwado multimedia, ntinye, vidiyo na nka dijitalụ
N'afọ 2002, ọ bụ onye nlekọta nke ọrụ Bessengue City, ụlọ ọrụ na usoro ọrụ nka na mpaghara Bessengue na Douala; ọrụ ahụ gụnyere Goddy Leye, James Beckett, Hartanto, Jesus Palomino na obodo
N'afọ 2006, ọ kwalitere ma sonye na Exit Tour
N'afọ 2007, o nyere aka na Ars&Urbis Workshop nke doual'art haziri na Douala maka nkwadebe nke SUD Salon Urbain de Douala ma ọ nọ na ebe obibi na Blachère Foundation na Apt, France
N'afọ 2008, ọ nọ na ebe obibi na Gasworks cultural space na London; n'afọ 2009, o sonyere na ọrụ Image Art After na mkparịta ụka ya na Florence Ayisi ma nye aka na Cairo Residency Symposium
Ọrụ Leye nwetara onyinye site na UNESCO, Rockefeller Foundation na Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs

Dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye nwere ọgụgụ isi, o tinyere aka n'ọtụtụ kọmitii ndị ọkachamara; ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ na-eche echiche nke Africa Centre na Cape Town ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya CAN (Creative Africa Network)
Leye malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na 1992
Ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya na ncheta, postcolonialism nke Afrịka na iwu akụkọ ihe mere eme
Karịsịa, o gosipụtara onwe ya na ọrụ multimedia, vidiyo na ntinye vidiyo
Ka oge na-aga, ọ malitere itinyekwu aka na mmepụta ọrụ ma na Cameroon ma na ọkwa mba ụwa
O nyere aka na mbipụta, mepụta ma hazie ihe osise ndị a kapịrị ọnụ ma guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ArtBakery
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enye ngwá ọrụ na akụrụngwa nye ndị na-ese ihe nwere mmasị na mmepụta multimedia ma ọ na-egosipụta ọrụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọzụzụ
Ndị Cameroon na-ese ihe nke ọgbọ ya na ndị na-eto eto weere Leye dị ka onye isi na-ese ihe na ọgụgụ isi
Leye gosipụtara uche ya n'ụzọ e si agwa akụkọ ihe mere eme na ihe ọmụma ma chefuo ya site na ọrụ nka ya, edemede ya na itinye aka na nzukọ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-eche echiche
Onyinye echiche ya lekwasịrị anya na nhazi nke ụlọ ọrụ ọdịbendị, na usoro netwọk, na omume nka na omenala na mgbanwe obodo
A na-egosipụta ọrụ Goddy Leye n'ọtụtụ ememme na ihe ngosi mba ụwa
Goddy Leye nyere aka na mbipụta na magazin dịka magazin Chimurenga
Ọ kwadoro ịmepụta magazin DiARTgonale nke onye na-ese ihe Achilleka hiwere
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ ArtBakery, malitere na 2002
Ọ bụ onye nlekọta nke ọrụ Bessengue City haziri na agbata obi Bessengue na Douala n'afọ 2002 ma ọ bụ onye nkwado na 2006 nke Exit Tour
Godfrey Kennedy (a mụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Kennedy malitere ọrụ ịkpụ ihe na 1992, ya na onye agbata obi ya, John Type na-arụ ọrụ
Ọrụ ya nwekwara mmetụta site na nke Moses Masaya na Brighton Sango
Kennedy na-ewere isiokwu ya site na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị Afrịka
Godfrey Mtenga (b
1965) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwafọ Chitaunhike na mpaghara Guruve, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ wee malite ịkpụ ihe n'afọ 1987, ya na Brighton Sango na-arụ ọrụ
Mgbe ọnwa isii gasịrị, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya
E gosipụtara ya na Ngosipụta Kwa Afọ na National Gallery of Zimbabwe n'afọ 1989
Godfrey Mary Paul Okoye, CSSp
(Ubochi nke iri na iteghete nke onwa Disemba na afo 1913 ruo17ubochi nke iri na asaa n'onwa Machị nke afo1977)O bụ bishọp nke Chọọchị Roman Katọlik na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ Bishọp mbụ nke obodo Port Harcourt, na-eje ozi site na ubochi nke ato n'onwa Septemba nke afo1961 ruo ubochi nke asaa n'onwa Machị nke afo 1970
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị diocese nke Port Harcourt, ọ ghọrọ Bishọp nke abụọ nke Enugu, nọchiri Bishọb John Cross Anyogu
A mụrụ Okoye na ubọchi nke iri na iteghete nke onwa Disemba na afo1913 nye Okoye Nwazulu na Ada Oji na Ifitedunu na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nigeria, ugbu a bu Anambra Stati
Most Rev
Charles Heerey, Achịbishọp nke Onitsha, na ubochi nke iri abuọ na asaa nke onwa Julaị na afo1947
N'afọ 1950, ọ ghọrọ naanị onye ụkọchukwu Igbo nke abụọ a nabatara n'ime ọgbakọ nke Mmụọ Nsọ
Okoye tinyere aka nke ukwuu n'ihe omume gbasara Agha Obodo Naịjirịa, nkwado ya doro anya maka Biafra mere ka ndị ụkọchukwu ibe ya nwee nchegbu na a ga-elekwasị ha anya na Naịjirị
Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ Adrian Hastings kọwara Okoye dị ka 'onye Biafra na-anụ ọkụ n'obi'
N'afọ 1977, obere oge tupu ya enwee Iwa ahu hainia, Okoye bibiri faịlụ nke onwe ya na-akọwapụta itinye aka ya n'agha ahụ
Ọ nwụrụ obere oge ka ịwa ahụ gasịrị
Àtụ Roman Catholic Diocese of Port Harcourt
Godfried Donkor (a mụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe, biri ma na-arụ ọrụ na London, onye gosipụtara na Kuba, Mexiko, US, Yuropu na Afrịka
A maara ya karịsịa maka ọrụ ya na collage, a kọwakwara ya dị ka Keith Piper na Isaac Julien na mmepụta ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ọrụ ya na-egosi ndị ọkpọ, dị ka Jack Johnson na Mohammad Ali
Donkor abụrụla isiokwu nke ọtụtụ ihe ngosi naanị ya, ma na United States ma na Yuropu, ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Ghana na 2001 Venice Biennale
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke National Museum of African Art na Smithsonian Institution
A mụrụ Godfried Donkor na Ghana na afo 1964, wee kwaga London, England, na afọ 1973 mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara ya maka eserese ya na ọrụ collage, ebumnuche mbụ Donkor dị ka onye na-ese ihe, site na afọ iri na anọ, bụ ịbụ onye na-emepụta ejiji
Ọ bụ naanị site na agbamume nke ndị nkụzi ya ka ha nwalee usoro dị iche ka ọ zụtara ụfọdụ agba na brushes wee malite eserese

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gbanwere uche ya niile na eserese ma site na ya bụrụ onye na-ese ihe, mana ọ ka nwere mmasị maka imewe ejiji, ma chọọ ụzọ iji dozie ha abụọ n'oge ọrụ ya niile
Mgbe ọ chọtara usoro ọhụrụ ya, Donkor malitere ịmụ nka na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Saint Martin's College of Art

Mgbe ọ natara BA ya na Fine Art, ọ gara n'ihu ịga ọmụmụ Postgraduate na Fine Arts na Escola Massana na Barcelona, Spain, tupu ọ gụchaa MA na African Art History na School of Oriental and African Studies na Mahadum London, na 1995
N'iji ụzọ dịgasị iche iche, Donkor na-arụ ọrụ na ngwakọta mgbasa ozi na-emepụta eserese, collage, na mbipụta yana vidiyo, foto na ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ
Ọrụ Donkor sitere na akụkọ ihe mere eme na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Africa na ndị Europe
Emume Aflao Godigbeza bụ emume a na-eme na Ghana n'etiti ndị Aflao
A na-eme ya kwa afọ, n'ọnwa Ọktoba, iji cheta ọpụpụ mmeri nke ndị Aflao site na ọchịchị obi ọjọọ nke Eze Agorkoli nke Notsie
Emume a na-echekwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị mmadụ si Notsie, na Togo nke oge a
A na-eme emume a site na nnọkọ nke ndị isi na nnukwu durbar na ndị Aflao
Ejikọtara mmemme a na ofufe nke chi na ọ na-adọta ndị mmadụ site na mba niile na mba ụfọdụ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Africa
Godspower Oboido (amụrụ na ọnwa iri Nọvemba n'afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri asatọ na asatọ) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Kansụl Naịjirịa maka Mmekọrịta Ọdịbendị na Nnyocha
E jirila olu uri ya tụnyere nke Christopher Okigbo na Leopold Senghor, ndị isi abụọ na-ede uri n'Afrịka na mmetụta ndị na-egosi n'ụzọ doro anya ụdị uri Oboido
A mụrụ nwa ikpeazụ nke nne na nna ya, Godspower Oboido na Benin City, Edo Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Benin City wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na obodo Benin City na Iyede, obere obodo dị na Delta Steeti
Godspower Oboido malitere ide ihe na Lagos mgbe ọ nwara ịchụso ọrụ na ihe nkiri na-enweghị isi
Na mbido, o dere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, gụnyere 'Shut up and sit down' nke o bipụtara n'onwe ya
Ọ laghachiri Benin City ebe ọ malitere ide uri
O kwuru na ọ na-achọsi ike iji okwu na-ese ihe ma jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ pụọ na nka anya
N'afọ 2014, e wepụtara akwụkwọ uri mbụ nke Oboido, Songs of a Chicken Bone na Canada
E bipụtara onye na-ede uri ahụ na The Istanbul Review, Saraba Magazine, onye edemede Africa, Nathaniel Turner, The Star, na ebe ndị ọzọ
N'otu edemede na National Mirror Newspaper, a kpọrọ onye na-ede uri ahụ aha ya na ndị edemede asaa ndị ọzọ, dị ka ọdịnihu nke edemede Naijiria
Songs of a Chicken Bone, nchịkọta nke uri Oboido, bụ akwụkwọ uri mbụ zuru oke nke onye na-ede uri na akwụkwọ mbụ nke ya ka e bipụtara n'ụzọ ọdịnala
A nabatara ya nke ọma n'etiti ndị edemede
Onye Britain na-ede uri na onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, Chris Emery, onye dere The Departure na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ, kọwara akwụkwọ Oboido dị ka 'mmụọ ma na-etinye aka na ụwa'
Onye na-ede uri, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye nduzi ihe nkiri, Peter Harvey dekwara na Oboido 'a gọziri ya na ahụmịhe dị ukwuu na amara iji bụrụ eziokwu na mgbọrọgwụ ya'
Ụkwụ Na-agagharị n'Oké Osimiri Pebbled
Nchịkọta uri nke abụọ nke Oboido, Wandering Feet on Pebbled Shores, ka Lamar Literary Press (Beaumont, Texas) wepụtara n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na asaa

Na Wandering Feet on Pebbled Shores, Oboido na-abụ abụ ma na-ekwu okwu n'ụzọ siri ike banyere Afrịka nke dị ndụ ma sie ike n'akụkụ ụwa ọhụrụ ebe onye njem na-asa ụkwụ ya / na mmiri nke ụtụtụ na ebe ụzọ ahụ nwere ọnụ dị ka boa
Onye na-ede uri ahụ ekwuola okwu, gụọ uri ya na akwụkwọ ya na mmemme edemede dị iche iche na ihe omume na mahadum na ụlọ ọrụ mmụta gburugburu ụwa
Godspower Samson Oboido bụ onye nke abụọ a na-aja mma n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii, na Queens Young Leaders Award site na Ebube ya Ezenwanyị Elizabeth II
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-eto eto ahọpụtara site na Commonwealth nke ga-enweta ọzụzụ a haziri ahazi nke Mahadum Cambridge nyere maka afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii
Ọzọkwa, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri, ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ na Future Nigeria Awards, na-eme ndepụta nke 100 n'ime ndị Naijiria kacha nwee ọgụgụ isi na ndị kacha mma n'okpuru afọ 30

Godwin Emefiele CFR (bụ onye amụrụ ka ọnwa Ọgọstụ dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị anọ n'afọ 1961) bụ onye Naijiria na adọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị , onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na onye na-arụ n'ụlọ akụ Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka gọvanọ nke Central Bank of Nigeria site n'ụbọchị anọ n'afọ 2014 ruo mgbe Onye isi ala Bola Tinubu chụrụ n'ọrụ n'ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2023
A mụrụ Godwin Emefiele na Lagos State, Naijiria ka ọnwa Ọgọstụ dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị anọ n'afọ 1961
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Agbor, Delta State, Naijiria
Ọ gara akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nta nke a nakpọ Ansarudin Primary School na Maryland Comprehensive Secondary ndị dị na Legọsụ, tupu ọ gaa na Mahadum Naịjirịa dị na Nsukka (UNN) maka agụmakwụkwọ ya
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Banking na Finance, ma gụchaa dịka otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ kachasị elu na klas ya, n'afọ 1984 Ozugbo Ọ jisiri otu afọ dechara ala
Nna ya na National Youth Service, Ọ laghachiri na UNN maka nzere masta na Finance, nke ọ nwetara na 1986
Ọ bụkwa onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stanford, Mahadum Harvard (2004) na Wharton School of Business (2005)
E nyere ya nzere Doctorate Honorary na Business Administration site na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka (UNN)

Godwin Chukwunaenye Ezeemo // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ n'afọ Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri ise na anọ ) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onyeisi oche nke The Orient Group nke ụlọ ọrụ na onye otu Progressive Peoples Alliance
A mụrụ Ezeemo na Umuchu, n'ime agbụrụ Igbo, n'afọ Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri ise na anọ
Ọ gara St Peter's Secondary School na Achina, bu kilomita iri na ise site n'ụlọ ya ma ojiri ukwu aga ya kwa ụbọchị
O nwetara OND na HND na Marketing na Federal Polytechnic, Ilaro

Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị mahadum, Ezeemo debanyere aha ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, nke toro n'ime Orient Group, nke gụnyere Orient Export Ltd; Sokka International; Orient Feeds Mill and Farms Ltd; Orient Magazines, Newspaper and Communication Ltd; Orient Global Waterwell Limited; Union Haulage Ltd; Orient Mega FM; na Multipurpose Computer Centre
Ọbu onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, Ezeemo haziri mmemme n'ógbè ya iji kwalite Iso Ụzọ Kraịst ma ịjụ okpukpe ndị obodo
O guzobekwara Charity (Ezeemo) Trust maka ndị onwero ka ọ ghaha
Godwin Maduka // (egee ntị) (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1959), bụ onye dọkịta Naijiria-Amerịka, onye ọchụnta ego ma bụrụ kwa onye ọrụ ebere
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Las Vegas Pain Institute na Medical Center
N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'inyere aka n'ịgbanwe aha obodo ya, site na Nkerehi ka ọ bụrụ Umuchukwu
A mụrụ Maduka na Nkerehi, Orumba South LGA Anambra State, Nigeria

Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Nawfia Comprehensive Secondary School na All Saints Grammar school, Umunze, tupu ọ banye ịmụ Ọgwụ na Mahadum Port Harcourt, mana ọ pụghị isonyere ndị ọgbọ ya n'ihi enweghị nkwado ego
O nwetara ohere site n'aka nwa nwanne nna ya Prọfesọ
Dr Richard Igwike (onye kụziri na Russ College n'oge ahụ) ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Rust College na agụmakwụkwọ nke kpuchiri ọkara nke agụmakwụkwọ ya
O mechara nweta nkwado ego site n'aka nwanne ya nwoke nke obere na nwanne nna ya wee kwaga United States n'afọ 1982
N'afọ 1984, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ summa cum laude na chemistry na Rust College wee nweta agụmakwụkwọ ọzọ iji mụọ ọgwụ na Mahadum Mercer, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1988
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ, tupu ọ nweta agụmakwụkwọ zuru oke iji mụọ ọgwụ na Mahadum Tennessee, ebe ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1993
Ọ gara n'ihu na Harvard Medical School na Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center maka ọzụzụ na obibi ya na anesthesiology, nlekọta dị egwu, na njikwa ihe mgbu, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1997
N'afọ 1997, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Maduka kwagara Las Vegas wee nweta ọrụ ebe a kwụrụ ya dollar puku asatọ dị ka ịkwụ ụgwọ n'ọdịnihu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye anesthesiologist na Desert Spring United Methodist Church, Nevada na ụlọ ọgwụ ndị ọzọ, tupu ọ malite ọrụ nke ya na Red Rock Medical Group, Nevada
N'afọ 1999, o guzobere Las Vegas Pain Institute na Medical Center, tupu ọ gbasaa na ebe isii ndị ọzọ na Southern Nevada
Ọ bụ onye nlekọta ngalaba na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọgwụ na osote prọfesọ nke njikwa ihe mgbu na anesthesiology na Mahadum Touro Nevada
Ọ bụkwa osote prọfesọ na-ahụ maka ịwa ahụ na UNLV School of Medicine
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, nne Maduka bụ onye n'arụ ọrụ ugbo na onye n'azụ ahịa
Nna ya bụ kwa onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ mkpá akwụkwọ
Godwin Mawuru (15 Julaị 1961 - 24 Mee 2013) bụ onye nduzi na onye mmepụta Zimbabwe
A mụrụ ya na Shamva, Mawuru malitere ọrụ ya na ọgbọ na mmalite afọ iri asatọ, na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara dị iche iche gụnyere ime ihe nkiri, iduzi na ịrụ ọrụ n'azụ
O mere ihe mpụta nke mbụ ya dị ka onye nduzi na ihe nkiri 1987 The Tree Is Mine A maara ya nke ọma na mba ụwa maka ihe nkiri Neria nke afọ 1993
Dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe, a maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri mbụ na nke kachasị ogologo nke Zimbabwe Studio 263
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa sepsis mgbe ọ dị afọ 51
Godwin Obaje (amuru n'ubochi 12 n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1997) bu onye na-agba bọọlu na Naijiria dika onye mgba maka Abia Warriors
N'afọ 2015, Obaje bịanyere aka na mpaghara Slovak Trenčín
N'afọ 2016, ọ nwara maka Spartak (Moscow) na elu elu Russia
N'afọ 2019, Obaje bịanyere aka na JSK (Kairouan) na Tunisia
N'afọ 2020, ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ maka ndị otu Naijiria Abia Warriors
Godwin Richard Olofua (amuru 18 Eprel 1999) bu onye egwu badminton nke Naijiria nke sonyere na asọmpi badminton nke ime obodo na nke mba uwa na-anọchite anya Naijiria ma nwetagoro otutu iko
Olofua nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme otu agwakọtara ya na ọla ọcha na ọla nchara na egwuregwu n'ọkwa otu na n'ọkwa abụọ na asọmpi Afrịka 2019 na Port Harcourt, Nigeria
O nwetakwara ọla edo n'ime asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2019 n'otu egwuregwu agwakọta, ọlaọcha n'ọkwa abụọ nke ụmụ nwoke na ọla nchara n'ọkwa otu ụmụ nwoke
Olofua meriri n'ọkwa abụọ nke ụmụ nwoke na 2018 Côte d'Ivoire, 2019 Benin na Cameroon asọmpi mba ụwa ya na Anuoluwapo Juwon Opeyori
Ọ gbara n'asọmpi na Summer Olympik 2020

Goge Africa (GA) bụ mmemme njem nleta na ọdịbendị pan-African, nke e guzobere n'afọ 1999
Ọ bụ di na nwunye Naijiria, Isaac na Nneka Moses chepụtara ya ma kwado ya
Ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri anọ na-ekiri telivishọn (TV) na-ekiri mmemme ahụ n'ụwa niile

N'abalị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1999, GA malitere na Nigerian TV ;African Independent Television (AIT), Nigerian Television Authority (NTA) Channel 10, na Degue Broadcasting Network (DBN)E mechara gosipụta ya na MNET AFRICA MAGIC
Nchịkọta nke GA malitere na Naijiria wee kwaga Benin Republic, South Afrịka na Egypt na atụmatụ ikpuchi mba niile dị n'Afrịka
E guzobere ihe ngosi ahụ iji gosipụta ọgaranya nke ọdịbendị Afrịka, ịgba egwu, nri, uwe na njem nleta
N'afọ 2016, onyinye Nigerian Broadcasters Merit (NBMA) webatara ndị ngosi abụọ nke mmemme ahụ n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ nke Ndị Naịjirịa Broadcasters
N'afọ 2005, nzukọ ahụ malitere ntọala GA na ebumnuche nke iduzi ndị ntorobịa Naijiria
Goge Africa bụ nke Isaac na Nneka Moses guzobere dị ka ọrụ ọdịbendị pan African
E chepụtara usoro ihe omume ahụ na ebumnuche nke ịkwalite ọdịbendị Afrịka, egwu, nri na ụzọ ndụ ya site na telivishọn, redio na magazin
Aha Goge Africa, sitere na ngwá egwu a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị egwu si n'akụkụ ugwu nke Naịjirịa a na-akpọ Goge
Dị ka AIT si kwuo, 'ebo ọ bụla, omenala na omenala Africa ọ bụla na-eme ka ìhè pụta ìhè n'ụzọ ememe na ọṅụ
Afrịka adịtụbeghị ka ọ mara mma karịa ka ọ na-eme na ihe ngosi a magburu onwe ya
Ụdị TV nke mmemme ahụ malitere n'afọ 1999 mgbe mmemme Afrịka na-adịghị ewu ewu na TV Naịjirịa
Ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri anọ na-ekiri telivishọn na-ekiri ihe ngosi ahụ n'ụwa niile
N'afọ 2016, ndị na-egosi ihe ngosi ahụ abụọ batara n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ nke Aha site na NBMA
Gogo bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ndị Gogo nke a na-asụ na mpaghara Dodoma na Tanzania
A na-asụ asụsụ ahụ na mpaghara Dodoma niile na mpaghara Manyoni dị ya nso
A na-ewere na asụsụ ahụ nwere olumba

ụsụ atọ Nyambwa (Cinyambwa ma West ọdịda anyanwụ)Gogo), nke a na-asụ n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Dodoma na Manyoni, Nyaugogo (Cinyaugogo ma Etitintral Gogo),anna-asu na kụkụ Dodoma na Tna kwa ndị agbata obi ha umba (Citumba ma East ọwụwa anyanwụ Gogo), nke ha na-asọpan'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ
A na-ejikọta otu Gogo na Kagulu, nke nwere 56% okwu yiri Gogo n'onwe ya
Gogo nwere ihe dị ka 50% yiri nke Hehe na Sangu (asụsụ BenaʹKinga (G60), 48% na Kimbu na 45% na Nilamba
Abụọ ikpeazụ a dị na mpaghara Guthrie F
Ndị otu Kraịst na ndị Alakụba bu asusu Gogo ka ha na asụ ọ ma bụrụkwa asụsụ bụ isi nke Chọọchị Anglican nke Tanzania
Gokada bụ mmalite teknụzụ nke dị na Lagos, Naijirịa
Mmalite ahụ malitere dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-adọta ndị njem n'afọ 2017, tupu ọ gbasaa na Logistics na Food Delivery na 2020 mgbe Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti machibidoro ọgba tum tum azụmahịa
Gokada bụ nke onye nwụrụ anwụ Fahim Saleh na Deji Oduntan guzobere n'afọ 2017, dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-adọta ịnyịnya ígwè
Tupu ịmalite Gokada na Naijiria, Late Fahim Saleh, hiwere Pathao na 2013, ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ewu na Bangladesh
Ọ kwagara Lagos na 2017, na-arụ ọrụ site n'enyemaka nke onye guzobere ya, Deji Oduntan, iji malite Gokada
N'ọnwa Maachị 2019, onye nwụrụ anwụ Fahim Saleh weghaara dịka onye isi oche nke Gokada, mgbe onye guzobere ya Deji si n'ọrụ ahụ pụọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetakwara ego Series A nke $ 53 nde na 2019, ebe ọ nwetara ihe dịka otu puku ọgba tum tum ma mechaa ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu nde njem
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2020, Gọọmentị Steeti Lagos kwupụtara mmachibido iwu maka ọgba tum tum azụmahịa, nke metụtakwara Gokada na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-adọkpụ ọgba tum na-arụ ọrụ na Lagos Steeti
N'ihi mmachibido iwu ahụ, Gokada chụpụrụ ihe dị ka pasenti iri asatọ ndị ọrụ ya
Onye nwụrụ anwụ Fahim Saleh kwuru na nkwupụta kwuru na Gokada na-achọ ịbanye na uru tupu a mara ọkwa mmachibido iwu nke Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti
Mmachibido iwu nke Gọọmentị Steeti Lagos machibidoro ọgba tum tum nwere nnwere onwe maka ndị na-agba ịnyịnya
Febụwarị 2020, Gokada jiri ohere a mee ihe ma kwupụta na ọ na-agbasawanye na nnyefe ngwugwu site na iji ọgba tum tum na ndị na-agba ya dị ugbu a
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, a kọrọ na Gokada na Jumia Food jikọrọ aka na nnyefe nri, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ịmalite ikpo okwu nke ya
Ka e mesịrị na 2020, Gokada ga-amalite Gshop, ọrụ nnyefe nri nke ya site na imekọ ihe ọnụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iji nye ndị ọrụ ya nri na ikpo okwu ha

Na June 2021, Gokada kwupụtara na ọ gafere dollar otu narị nde (100 nde USD) na ọnụ ahịa azụmahịa kwa afọ ma mezue ihe karịrị 1 nde nri na iwu ecommerce maka ihe karịrị ndị ahịa puku iri atọ n'ime ọnwa iri na abuo
N'ụbọchị iri na ise nke ọnwa Julaị, 2020, a mara ọkwa ọnwụ onye isi oche nke Gokada, onye nwụrụ anwụ Fahim Saleh
Ndị uwe ojii hụrụ ya nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya dị na New York n'ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Julaị, 2020, ọtụtụ ọnyá mara ya
N'ụbọchị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Julaị, e jidere onye enyemaka Fahim, Tyrese Haspil, ma boo ya ebubo igbu onye isi oche ahụ nwụrụ anwụ
E boro ya ebubo na ọ ji Fahim ọtụtụ iri puku dollar
Mgbe ọnwụ Fahim Saleh gasịrị, Gokada họpụtara Nikhil Goel dị ka onye isi oche ọhụrụ na Maachị 2021
Ọ nọ na-eduga ndị otu Gokada kemgbe ọnwụ Fahim
Tupu ọ banye Gokada, Goel bụ General Manager nke Zomato, mmalite nnyefe nri n'ịntanetị nke dị na India na onye bụbu onye isi nke Head of Verticals na SafeBoda na Kenya
N'afọ 2021, Gokada malitere Super App ya, nke na-enye ndị ahịa ya ohere ịnweta nnyefe nri ya, Ecommerce, njem njem na ọrụ nhazi n'otu ikpo okwu App
Tupu Super App, Gokada nwere ngwa dị iche maka nhazi ya (GSend) na ọrụ nnyefe nri ya (GShop)
Mmalite teknụzụ ahụ mere mkpebi ijikọta ọrụ ya n'otu Super App mgbe o kwuru na ndị ọrụ ya rịọrọ ka ha tinye ọrụ niile n'otu ikpo okwu
Site na mwepụta nke Super App bịakwara ịmaliteghachi ọrụ ya mgbe ọ gbasaa na steeti abụọ na Naịjirịa; Oyo Steeti na Ogun Steeti
Steeti abụọ ahụ enweghị mmachibido iwu megide ọgba tum tum azụmahịa
Mkpụrụedemede Gold Coast bụkwa asụsụ Gold Coast bụ mkpụrụedemede Latin eji dee asụsụ Akan n'oge Gold Coast, ugbu a Ghana
Ọ dị iche na mkpụrụedemede Akan dị ugbu a n'ụzọ dị iche iche, nke kachasị n'ime ya bụ n'ịdepụta ụdaume
/a/kan nwere ụdaume itoolu, ụzọ anọ dị iche ma ha nwere mgbọrọgwụ ire dị elu (ATR), na /a/, nke bụ ATR-na-anọpụ iche
Na ederede Gold Coast, a na-ede ụdaume ndị na-abụghị ATR na ụdaume ise nke ederede Latin, e i o u, na ụdaume ATR site na ịgbakwunye ntụpọ ndenye aha na ndị a
(Mkpịsị ụda ATR nwere ụda dị n'ime ha, ebe ụdaume ndị na-abụghị ATR na-ada ka ụdaume dị nro nke Bekee) N'asụsụ Akan nke oge a, a na-eji mkpụrụedemede ụdaume asaa, abụọ n'ime ha bụ ihe na-edoghị anya
Na mgbakwunye, ederede Gold Coast jiri tilde mee akara ụdaume imi, nke a na-adịghị akara na Akan nke oge a
Golden Sounds, nke a makwaara dị ka Zangalewa, bụ otu egwu makossa si Cameroon
Ha bụ nke ndị nche onye isi ala Cameroon, Jean Paul Zé Bella, Dooh Belley, Luc Eyebe na Emile Kojidie mepụtara ya na 1984

Ndị ikom nọ n'ìgwè ahụ nyere egwu ntụrụndụ na-atọ ọchị, na-eyi uwe agha, na-eyikarị okpu agha ma na-etinye uwe ha na ohiri isi iji yie ka ha nwere ọzịza n'ala site na ịgba ụgbọ okporo ígwè na afọ abụba site na iribiga nri ókè
A maara òtù ahụ nke ọma maka abụ ya, 'Zangaléwa', nke bụ nnukwu egwu n'Africa mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya na 1986
Abụ ahụ na-ewu ewu na Colombia ebe a maara ya dị ka 'The Military', ma ndị DJ West Africa wetara ya na mba ahụ
Abụ ahụ mere ka òtù ya bụrụ ihe a ma ama nke na òtù ahụ n'onwe ya mechara gbanwee aha otu ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Zangalewa, nke pụtara na Ewondo, asụsụ Cameroon, 'Ònye kpọrọ gị?' (Za'nga'lowa)
Ndị amaala abụọ, Robert Kero na nwanyị na-agụ egwu Annie Anzouer ma mesịa sonye n'òtù ahụ
N'afọ 1993, Viviane Etienne nọchiri Annie Anzouer
Etienne hapụrụ otu ahụ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị iji chụsoo ọrụ n'onwe ya
Otu ahụ nwekwara ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-akwado ya
N'afọ 2010, njikọ aka Shakira na Freshlyground maka 2010 World Cup, mepụtara egwu 'Waka Waka (Nke Oge Maka Africa) ' dị ka egwu Africa
Egwú Ze Bella na ndị enyi ya kpaliri ya
Jean Paul ze Bella lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ n'afọ 2002 mgbe afọ iri atọ nke ije ozi gasịrị, mana abụ ya dị ka ihe ngosi nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị agha Cameroon
Golden Tulip Festac bụ ụlọ nkwari akụ a na-eji eme ihe na-agwakọta ọnụ nke dị n'akụkụ Amuwo - Mile 2 nke Lagos-Badagry Expressway na Naịjirịa
Ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ nwekwara ụlọ ọrụ United Property Development Company (UPDC) na-arụ ọrụ mmepe ngwakọta, The Residences nakwa Festival Mall
Ụlọ Golden Tulip Hotel agbanweela site na nhazi mbụ ya dị ka ụlọ obibi e wuru maka ndị omeiwu nke abụọ na Arewa Hotels na-elekọta Durbar Hotel n'ime ọnọdụ ngwakọta ya ugbu a
Gọọmentị Naijiria wuru ụlọ mbụ ahụ iji mee ka ndị otu National Assembly nwee ụlọ ruo mgbe ha kwagara n'ebe obibi ha na 1004 estate

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a gbanwere ụlọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Durbar Hotel, Lagos, ụlọ nkwari akụ kachasị elu nwere ọnụ ụlọ narị ise na ịrị abụọ nke bụ otu n'ime ụlọ nkwari akụ kachasị ukwuu na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Africa n'oge e mepere ya n'afọ 1982
Ọ bụ ndị Arewa Hotels na-elekọta ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ bụ ndị na-elekọta ma ụlọ nkwari ahịa Hamdala na Durbar na Kaduna
Ndị ntinye ego rụgharịrị Durbar Hotel dị ka Golden Tulip Festac
Ọ bụ họtel mbụ nke Golden Tulip Group na-elekọta na Naịjirịa
E guzobere họtel ahụ iji mee ka ọ dị iche na ndị na-asọmpi site na ịmepụta ogige okpomọkụ
Mana a makwaara họtel ahụ maka ụlọ nzukọ ya
O nwere ụlọ nzukọ na nzukọ iri na anọ
N'afọ 2016, United Property Development Company meghere The Residences, mmepe obibi na okpukpu asatọ ma nwee nkeji otu narị na iri itoolu na abụọ
Ebumnuche nke ndị mmepe bụ iwu ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik kwụụrụ onwe ya nke ga-ahụ maka inye ndị bi na ya ọkụ eletrik
N'ịbụ nke UPDC mepụtara, ụlọ ahịa mmemme bụ ụlọ ahịa na Shoprite dị ka arịlịka
E chepụtara ọrụ mmepe ahụ dị ka ntụrụndụ na ụlọ ahịa maka ndị bi na Amuwo-Odofin na Satellite Town, mpaghara Lagos nke Lagos
Ụlọ ahịa ahụ nwere ụlọ ahịa iri anọ na isii na-ewe ohere nke square mita 10,071
Ọ dị nso na ala diamond, nke dị n'akụkụ mgbatị Festac
Akụkụ nke gọọmentị ime obodo Amuwo-Odofin

Àtụ Infobox musical artist

Susan Oluwabimpe 'Goldie' Filani Harvey (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'onwa oktoba n'afọ 1981 ma nwuọ n'abalị iri na anọ nke onwa febụwarị n'afọ 2013) bụ onye na-agụ egwu nke oma na onye ama ama maka egwuregwu Big Brother Africa
Susan Oluwabimpe 'Goldie' Filani lụrụ Andrew Harvey, onye injinia bi na Malaysia, n'afọ 2005, mana amaghi eziokwu a ebe niile tupu Ọ nwụọ
Harvey ritere ọtụtụ onyinye egwu Afrika, tinyere Onyinye egwu naijiria di elu Ọ pụtara na Big Brother Africa n'afọ 2012 nke bụ mpụta mbụ ya na TV
Ya na onye egwu nke Kenya bụ Prezzo, onye mekwara egwuregwu nke BBA, dị ka ha nwere ezigbo mmekọrịta n'ihe egwuregwu ahụ
Mgbe ọ si 2013 Grammy Awards na Los Angeles, California laghachi n'ala Naijiria, ọ kwuru n'isi na awa ya, e wee kpọga ya n'ụlọ ọgwu ebe e mechara kwuo na ọ nwụọla
Ọ bụ ezie na-anụrụ asịrị na ọ dika ọ ṅuru ọgwụ ike nke kpatara ọnwụ ya, mana di ya gọnahụrụ nke ahụ

Site na nyocha nke ngalaba Pathology and Forensic Medicine nke Lagos State University Teaching Hospital, mere, onye ọgụ egwu nke Naijiria nwuru site na 'oria obi obara mgbalị elu,' nke butere ' intracerebral hemorrhage' Goldie, onye di afọ iri atọ na otu n'oge o nwụrụ, ka e liri na Vaults and Gardens, Ikoyi, Lagos
E liri ya n'abalị iri abụọ na ise nke onwa febụwarị n'afo 2013 na Vaults and Gardens Cemetery, Ikoyi, Lagos
N'abalị iri na atọ n'onwa Epurel n'afọ 2013, mpipụta ndị nchụ nta akụkọ kwuru na ihe onwunwe nke Goldie Harvey ka e nyere ndị ọrụ ebere
Mmemme Gologo, nke a makwaara dị ka mmemme Golib, na-eme ememe n'ọnwa Mach na njedebe nke oge ọkọchị tupu akwa akwa millet mbụ (Ansah, 1997; Allman & Parker, 2005)
Mmemme Gologo so na emume ndị isi na Ghana na ndị isi na ndị obodo Talensi, Tong-Zuf, na mpaghara Upper East nke mba ahụ na-eme ya, na-eje ozi 'iji mee ka nkwenye obodo na Nnoo sikwuo ike
ụlọ arụsị ma ọ bụ chi Golib', nke chi na-achịkwa ndụ ọrụ ugbo Talensi
Ọ bụ mmemme tupu owuwe ihe ubi a na-eme n’ọnwa Machna Eprel, bụ́ nke a na-achụ n’àjà iji chọọ nchebe ma hụ na mmiri ozuzo na-ezuru ya na owuwe ihe ubi n’oge na-abịa site n’aka chi ụwa
Mmemme a nwere mmemme ụbọchị atọ na obodo atọ dị iche iche
Akụkụ nke mbụ na-eme na Gorogo, nke abụọ na Yinduri, na nke ikpeazụ na nnukwu na Teng-Zug (Tong-Zuf)
A na-awụsa Libation n'ụlọ arụsị Teng-Zug iji kelee chi maka mmemme na-aga nke ọma
A na-akpọ nke dị na March Gol-diema, nke pụtara nkuzi
A na-eme mmemme Gologo bụ isi n'izu nke abụọ n'Aprel
Ọ bụ ndị okenye obodo ọ bụla na-edepụta abụ ọdịnala maka emume a, ndị mmadụ na-agbakwa egwu egwu e dere
N'ime oge a, a machibidoro ime mkpọtụ, ọ dịghịkwa onye na-eru uju ndị nwụrụ anwụ
Mmemme Gologo nke a makwaara dị ka mmemme Golib bụ nke a na-eme n'ọnwa Maachị na ngwụcha oge ọkọchị tupu akwa akwa millet mbụ (Ansah, 1997; Allman & Parker, 2005)
Tengzug, Santeng, Wakii, Gbeogo, Yinduri/Zandoya, Shia, Gorogo na Spart bụ obodo na-eme mmemme ahụ
Enwere uwe akwa pụrụ iche nke ụmụ nwoke na-eyi obere knicker na akwa nhicha n'obi
A na-atụkwa anya ka ụmụ nwanyị kee ogologo towel site n'obi ha ruo n'ụkwụ ma jiri akwa pụrụ iche emere n'ime obodo kpuchie isi ha
Ndị Talensi nke Tenzug na mpaghara Upper East na-eme otu n'ime mmemme na-adịghị ahụkebe na mba Ghana
Ma eleghị anya, ọ bụ naanị ememme ebe ndị na-eso ụzọ na-edebe nrubeisi siri ike na iyi uwe ụfọdụ
N'ihi ọdịdị nke omenala a, ndị nchọpụta na-ahazi iji chọpụta ụdị nka nke mebere ejiji na mkpa okpukperechi ma ọ bụ ọrụ ha
Ọmụmụ ihe ahụ jiri nleba anya na ajụjụ ọnụ ndị sonyere na-edekọ mmemme tupu, n'oge na mgbe ememme ahụ gasịrị
Ihe ndị a ma ama nke ejiji na-agụnye akwa nhicha nke nha na agba dị iche iche, mma dị iche iche na iyi akwa mkpuchi nke triangular
Ọmụmụ ihe ahụ kwubiri na ọ dị mkpa ịkpọsa mmemme ahụ na mba Ghana dum nakwa ná mba ọzọ iji meghee mpaghara Tengzug nye ọtụtụ ndị njem nlegharị anya na ndị na-etinye ego
N'ọnwa Febụwarị nke na eso mmemme ahụ, ndị obodo na-amụta abụ ọhụrụ maka emume a na-azụta ma ọ bụ kwadoo uwe ọhụrụ na ihe eji eme ya
Ụbọchị maka mmeme ahụ na-adabere na ọdịdị nke ọnwa nke atọ n'afọ ọ bụla
Ma nke a nwere ike ịpụta na Maachi ma ọ bụ mmalite Aprel
Na 2016, ọnwa ọhụrụ pụtara na 9 Maachị
N'ụbọchị mbụ ọnwa pụtara, onye isi na ndị Tindaana na-ewepụ uwe ha (karịsịa uwe elu na uwe ogologo ọkpa, ma yikwasị uwe ọdịnala ndị a chọrọ maka ememe ahụ)
Ndị obodo ahụ na-ewepụkwa nke ha otu ụbọchị ka onye isi na ndị Tindaana mechaa

Maka ndị obodo, iwepụ ya gụnyere uwe niile na-ekpuchi akụkụ elu nke ahụ, wepụ uwe ogologo ọkpa niile na iyi naanị uwe mwụda ọkpọ, uwe ogologo ọkpa ma ọ bụ uwe mkpirisi nke na-enweghị akpa na ha, ma ọ bụ iyi kpalang ma ọ bụ kpalang peto
Mwepụ a bụ otu ọnwa
N'ime oge a, a gaghị eme mkpọtụ n'ime obodo
Dị ka ndị dị otú ahụ ịkwa ákwá maka ndị nwụrụ anwụ, ịwụ elu ụlọ, egwu egwu egwu na ihe omume ndị ọzọ ka amachibidoro n'oge a
Ndị obodo na-amalite usoro mmemme obere mmemme n'ime obodo ndị gbara gburugburu ugwu Tongo nke gụnyere ịgba egwu na ime ọñụ
N'ụbọchị nke 16 mgbe ewepụsịrị uwe (na 2016, ụbọchị ahụ bụ na 24 March), obodo niile ga-ezukọ na Tengzug maka ememe ememme ikpeazụ
Ememme Golibe nke pụtara nanị 'Ịṅụrịa ọṅụ' bụ emume n'obodo Onitsha, nke chọrọ igosi ụwa akụkọ ọdịbendị bara ụba nke obodo ahụ
Ọ bụ mmemme nka, egwu, omenala, ezinaụlọ na obodo site na abalị ekeresimesi ruo afọ ọhụrụ, Golibe na-achịkọta ndị bi na Anambra na mba ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na ileta ụmụ amaala si mba ọzọ

Ememme a bụ otu n'ime ihe si n'aka Nnaemeki Achebe, CFR, mni, Agbogidi na Onitsha 'Onitsha in the 21st Century' n'afọ 2016 iji dọta ndị Onitsha, ndị Onitsha, Eastern Nigeria na ndị Naijiria ndị ọzọ, ma n'ụlọ ma n'ime obodo
ndị si mba ọzọ, ka ha were ohere omenaala Onitscha bara ụba na ọnọdụ ya dị ka ebe azụmaahịa na ndị si mba ọzọ
Ememme Golibe nke mbụ bidoro n’ụbọchị Mọnde 25 Disemba afọ 2018 wee were emume mmeghe na Obí Ime Obi Ezechima dị n’Ọnịcha, dị n’ogige ụlọ eze
Ihe omume ahụ nyere ọgbakọ maka ndị enyi na ndị ikwu ka ha gbakọta ọnụ na nka, egwu na ọwa ndị ọzọ iji mee ememe ọmụmụ, njirimara, na mgbọrọgwụ ha

Ọ na-enye ebe nchekwa maka ngosipụta nke omenala ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ site na 'omenala, nri na agba' Obi nke Onitsha, Igwe Alfred Acehebe, kpọrọ mmemme ahụ 'atụmatụ omenala nke ezubere iji kwalite na itughari omenala na akụ na ụba Ọnịcha'

Ememme a bu n'obi wepụta ohere iji zụlite akụ na ụba obodo na South East, ebe ọ bụ na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, otu, obere ụlọ ọrụ ahịa na ụlọ ọrụ nwere ike iji ya mee ihe maka ịzụlite azụmahịa na ụdị ha ma nyekwa ndị obodo ohere ịnweta
kere òkè n'ụzọ ga-abara ha uru n'ụzọ akụ̀ na ụba
Ememme a nwere ihe nkiri vidio, akụkọ ihe mere eme, omenala na ọdịnala, egwu ọdịnala, ngosi nka na nka, nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe ndị ọzọ did iche iche
Ememe a juputara na ihe omume na-esochi;
Gomaa Frahat, onye a maara dị ka Gomaa, (April 24, 1941 September 24, 2021) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-eme ihe ọchị n'Ijipt
A mụrụ Gomaa na Eprel 24, 1941 na Cairo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Rose Alyoussef na Sabah El Kher ruo July 1999
O sere ihe osise maka 'Maged' akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka nke Emiraty site na 1972 ruo 1979
Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị mmegide Ijipt ebipụtala ya, dị ka Al Shaab, Al Ahrar, Al Ahaly, Al Wafd, na Al Araby
O bipụtara na

O nwere onye nnọchi anya na New York, Cartoonists and Writers Syndicate (CWS) bụ ndị bipụtara ọrụ ya n'ihe karịrị akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin America otu narị na iri abụọ na ihe dị ka magazin na akwụkwọ akụkọ iri abụọ na ise na Europe na Eshia
Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa, dị ka International Herald Tribune, English Times, El Luvracion, Canadian Gazette, na ndị ọzọ, ebipụtala ọrụ ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya dị na ngosi dị iche iche na German museum na Bonn na International Museum for Caricatures na Florida

O nwere ihe ngosi nke ya na ọwa akụkọ Naịl nke akpọrọ 'With Gomaa Every Friday', nke ọ gosipụtara, na-egosi ihe nkiri sitere n'akụkụ ụwa niile na mmeghachi omume ya maka ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a, ma ọ bụ mba ụwa, Arab ma ọ bụ nke mba
O nwere ihe ngosi nke ya na Damaskọs, nke dị na Siria, na 1998
E gosipụtakwara ọrụ ya na ngosi Europe na Bulgaria, Yugoslavia na Czechoslovakia
E kwuru na ọ na-eme ihe ngosi n'ìgwè na mba Arab dị ka Tunisia, Libya, Yemen na Dubai
A kọwakwara ya na ihe ngosi otu n'Ijipt niile
Onye otu bọọdụ nke Egyptian Caricature Union kemgbe afọ 1984
Gomba bụ asụsụ a na amaghị aha ya nke Etiopia
Gombe bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria
Gombe bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Gombe (Gombe State), nwéré madu ha sị rùrù, 445,000 (2015; e mere atụmatụ ịbụ)
GOBU Sports (abbreviated GOBU) is a professional eSports organization from Germany that is best known for their Counter-Strike Global Offensive team
GOBU's Counter-Strike enjoyed its greatest success from their initiation in 2015 until their dissolution in 2016
One of the star players on the team was Tony 'GerrY_V' Falcon, who later became the organization's mvp
In 2017, the team reformed with a Counter Strike Global Offensive lineup upon the release of the game
The GOBU Sports CS GO team is anchored by the former professional minecraft players Henri 'henriobu' Schnobu and Melle 'Melle0011' Bay
GOBU has a League of Legends team that compete in the League of Legends Championship Series Europe Summer 2017 split GOBU Sports also had a team in Overwatch and Dota 2
GOBU Sports was formed in June 2015, but solidified as a team in July after several lineup and name changes
Their biggest success was winning the 2016 Cyberathlete Professional League World Championships after an extremely close final with X3 (a forerunner to Team 3D)
The Gobus struggled to find a sponsor, and as a result, joined the prominent e-sports organization SK Gaming and were known by the names SK GOBU and later GOBSK
At SK, they continued their success
The prize money from their tournament victories in 2016 totalled approximately US$170,000, and every CPL event that year
Feeling they could secure a larger share of sponsorship money, the team left SK in early 2017 Later in the year, some members returned to SK Gaming, forcing GOBU to replace them
Finance Director Killer Kettner and Managing Directors Christoph Smaul and Spouwn reformed GOBU Sports as a German stock company[clarification needed] in 2017, due to problems with SK
GOBU continued to participate in international tournaments, placing high in many events
They signed some of the biggest sponsorship deals in the scene at that time
The team received about 100,000 members on their website in Europe during their first two years and was thanks to their Asian top player the first team outside of Asia to enter the Asian market
Within six months, they had about 90,000 members on their Asian website
The team was among the most outspoken opponents to the change from the original version of Counter-Strike Source to Counter-Strike Global Offensive

On October 4, 2017 Manfred Eaglehorst wrote an article on Breitbartcom claiming that Gobu Sports allegedly owes its Counter-Strike Global Offensive division a significant amount of prize money from previous tournaments Since this was released, the organisation has received a massive backlash from the community who are trying to support the players, and put pressure on the organisation to both tell the truth and give the players their earned winnings

GOBU Sports quickly released a statement which states that the claims made by Eaglehorst are false, simply dismissing them and saying that their players are being paid properly Shortly after this statement was released the team pulled out of the next tournament they were set to attend IEM Season IX - San Jose, however the player's claim that the reason for this has nothing to do with the recent controversy

On November 13, 2015 GOBU Sports parted ways with its Heroes of the Storm team, consisting of Elias 'pitti0572' Merta, Jonas 'John 'O Hara' Lindholm, Patrick 'Paj0' Kryeziu, Simon 'Adlerhorst' Haag and Linus 'Behindi' Blomdin The cited reason was disappointment over recent performances, as the team had failed to qualify for both The International 2015 and Frankfurt Major 2015 However, as of January 2017, the Gobus have once again entered the Dota 2 scene, this time with a new roster
Gombi bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ime obodo Gombi ochichi ime obodo nke Adamawa Steeti, Naijiria
'Ndị Boko Haram wakporo mpaghara ahụ n'oge gara aga na mpaghara ahụ nọ n'okpuru ọnọdụ mberede ndị agha kemgbe May 2013'
A gomesi ma ọ bụ busuuti bụ ejiji mara mma nke dị ogologo
Ọ bụ ejiji a na-ejikarị eme ihe maka ụmụ nwanyị na Buganda na Busoga
Uwe ụmụ nwoke ọdịnala bụ kanzu
Akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ kachasị mma na-achọpụta mmalite nke Gomesi na 1905
Ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na Goan, Caetano Gomes, onye bi na Uganda n'oge ahụ, nke bụ British Protectorate n'oge a, webatara uwe ahụ
Uwe ahụ enwetaghị ihe ọ bụla ruo mgbe nwunye Daudi Cwa nke Abụọ nke Buganda, Kabaka ma ọ bụ eze nke Buganda, yi ya mgbe di ya dị afọ iri na asatọ (ọ bụ kabaka kemgbe ọ dị afọ 1) na 1914
Gomesi bụ uwe ákwà dị ogologo, nke na-acha anụnụ anụnụ nke nwere olu dị larịị na aka dị mkpirikpi
A na-eke uwe ahụ na eriri a na-etinye n'okpuru úkwù n'elu úkwù
Gomesi nwere bọtịnụ abụọ n'akụkụ aka ekpe nke olu
A na-eji silk, ogho, ma ọ bụ ákwà linin eme ọtụtụ gomesi, ebe silk bụ nke kachasị ọnụ
A na-eke kikooyi ma ọ bụ kanga n'okpuru gomesi linin iji hụ na ákwà ahụ anaghịarapara n'ahụ
Gomesi a rụrụ nke ọma nwere ike ịchọ ihe ruru mita isii nke ákwà
Enwere ike eyi gomesi maka oge ọ bụla, na ime obodo ọ bụ ụdị ejiji kwa ụbọchị
Ndị bi n'obodo ukwu na obodo mepere emepe na-eyi ya n'oge pụrụ iche dị ka olili ozu, na agbamakwụkwọ
A na-eyi gomesi n'ememe agbamakwụkwọ n'oge mmeghe, nke a makwaara dị ka Kwanjula
N'oge Kwanjula, a ga-achọrọ ndị nwanyị niile nọ n'ezinụlọ nwoke na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ ka ha yie uwe Gomesi
Onye na-agụ egwu Alicia Keys yi gomesi mgbe ọ gara Uganda na 2007
A mụrụ Gonçalo Mabunda na Jenụwarị 1, 1975 na Maputo, Mozambique
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-emegide agha

Mabunda egosila ihe ngosi n'ebe ngosi nka dị mkpa dị ka Center Pompidou na Paris, Venice Biennale, Museum of Art and Design na New York, Gangwon International Biennale na South Korea, Museum Kunst Palast na Düsseldorf, Hayward Gallery na London, Mori Art Museum na Tokyo, Johannesburg Art Gallery, Tropen Museum, Amsterdam, Norway Army Museum, Netherlands Army Museum, Sweden Army Museum na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Mabunda malitere ọrụ ya n'ihe gbasara ọrụ nke Christian Council of Mozambique (CCM) mere n'afọ 1995, nke na-enyocha mba ahụ ma na-anakọta ngwá agha site n'aka ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na obodo mgbe agha obodo nke were ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ
N'ime ọrụ a, a na-ebibi ụfọdụ ngwá agha ebe a na-eme ka ndị ọzọ ghara ịrụ ọrụ ma nye ha ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị dị ka Mabunda, iji kpụọ ha n'ime nka
A chịkọtara ihe dị ka ngwá agha pụkụ narị asatọ kemgbe CCM malitere ọrụ a, nke a na-akpọ Transforming Guns into Hopes
Aha a sitere na mkpali nke amaokwu Bible sitere n'akwụkwọ Mekka 'Ha ga-etinye mma agha ha n'ime ala na ube ha n'ụdị nko'
Mabunda bụ onye na-ese ihe nke African Artists for Development, otu na-akwado ọrụ mmepe obodo metụtara ọrụ ndị na-ese egwu nke oge a
Gonçalo Mabunda na-eji Kalashnikovs, rọket, pistols, na shell casing iji mee ihe oyiyi anthropomorphic site na ngwá agha ndị a mebiri emebi
Site n'ịgbanwe ngwá agha ka ọ bụrụ ihe dị ndụ, Mabunda na-agbanwe ọnwụ n'ụzọ nkịtị ka ọ bụrụ ndụ
Ihe oyiyi ahụ na-anọchite anya ihe karịrị otu nde mmadụ nwụrụ n'oge agha obodo nke mba ya
Mabunda enwekwaghị ndị ikwu ya n'oge agha ahụ, nke na-eme ka ịrụ ọrụ na imebi ngwá agha eji eme ihe n'oge afọ iri na isii dị mkpa nye ya
Ọ na-eme ocheeze na ihe nkpuchi site na ngwá agha ndị a na-adịghị arụ ọrụ nke e ji mee ihe n'oge Agha Obodo Mozambique
Ihe mkpuchi ahụ dabere na ihe mkpuchi ọdịnala nke Sub-Saharan Africa, Otú ọ dị, ntụgharị mbụ na ụdị nka site na ịmepụta ha site na ngwá agha bụ ihe pụrụ iche nye Mabunda
N'ịbụ ndị na-anọchite anya ike, ocheeze Mabunda na-akwa emo otú ike ọdịnala si dabere na ngwá agha
Site n'iji ngwá agha, ọrụ Mabunda na-ezi ozi nke otu esi egbochi ime ihe ike ọzọ, nakwa na ibibi ngwá agha agha nwere ike ime n'ụzọ mara mma na nke nka
Ihe osise Mabunda na-ama nzuzu nke agha aka
Ọrụ ya nwere ụdị ọgbara ọhụrụ na ya ma e jiri ya tụnyere ọrụ Braque na Picasso
Ọrụ nka Gonçalo Mabunda agbasoro site na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa, French Newspaper Le Monde, huffingtonPost si UK so na mgbasa ozi ndị gbasoro mmetụta ọrụ Mabunda na obodo ya
N'afọ 2014, Mabunda bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà Afrịka iri abụọ na-ese ihe na nchịkọta ihe osise French nke André Magning na-ebipụta African Stories
N'afọ 2015, ọrụ Mabunda bụ isi isiokwu nke ihe ngosi CNN Inside Africa, usoro TV na-egosipụta ndị dị iche iche na akụ na ụba, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọdịbendị n'Africa
Onye bụbu onye isi ala US Bill Clinton, onye na-akwado ọrụ Mabunda, nyere onye na-ese ihe ọrụ ịmepụta nrite maka òtù ọrụ ebere ya bụ Clinton Global Initiative

N'ọnwa Julaị 2017, egosiri ihe ya na European Parliament n'oge ngosi nke European Centre for Electoral Support haziri n'oge a na-ewepụta akwụkwọ ntuziaka e mepụtara n'ihe gbasara ọrụ nke European Union kwadoro na 'Igbochi esemokwu ntuli aka na ime ihe ike na mba ndị dị na Southern African Development Communities' nke gụnyere Mozambique

Onye isi oche nke European Parliament, Judith Sargentini, onye bụbu Chief Observer na ọrụ EU Observation, onye isi oche nke EU Observation na Tanzania bụ onye isi oche, onye isi na European Parliament
Asụsụ Gonga, ma ọ bụ asụsụ Kefoid, sitere n'ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic ma na-asụ na Etiopia

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Kafacho (n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Ethiopia), Shekkacho (n'ebe ndịda anyanwụ Ethiopia', Boro Shinasha (n'akụkụ ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia), Anfillo (n'Ethiopia) bụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ Gonga

Goodness Nwachukwu (onye amụrụ n'abalị isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu nke na-ahụ maka discus
O meriri nrite ọla edo naDiscus umunwanyi F42 na 2022 Commonwealth Games, na-etinye ihe ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ maka ọzụzụ nke 3656m
