{{Infobox company|name=Google LLC|founders={{UnbulleÀtụ Infobox company
Gogulu LLC bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkà na ụzụ mba Amerika nke na-ahụ maka ọrụ na ngwaahịa metụtara ịntanetị, nke gụnyere “search engine” , teknụzụ mgbasa ozi n'ịntanetị, igwe ojii, ngwanrọ na ngwaike
A na-ewere ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna Gogulu Alphabet Inc
dị ka otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ ozi gbasara Big Five Amerika, n'akụkụ Amazon, Apulu, Meta na Maikrosoftu
E hiwere Gogulu na Septemba 4, 1998, site na Larry Page na Sergey Brin mgbe ha bụ PhD
ụmụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stanford dị na mba Kalifonia
Ha niile nwere ihe dịka 14% nke oha oke ahia depụtara n'ihu ọha ma na-achịkwa 56% nke ikike ịtụ vootu site na ngwaahịa ịtụ vootu
Ulo ọrụ ahụ gara ọha site na onyinye ọha mbụ (IPO) na 2004
N'afọ 2015, a haziri Gogulu ka ọ bụrụ ihe enyemaka nke Alphabet Inc
Gogulu bụ enyemaka Alphabet kachasị na ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ihe onwunwe na mmasị ịntanetị nke Alphabet
A họpụtara Sundar Pichai onye isi ala Gogulu na Ọktoba 24, 2015, nọchiri Larry Page, onye ghọrọ onye isi nke Alphabet
Na Disemba 3, 2019, Pichai ghọkwara onye isi ala Alphabet
Na 2021, e hiwere Alphabet Workers Union, nke ndị ọrụ Gogulu mejupụtara
Mmụba ngwa ngwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ebe ọ bụ na ntinye aha gụnyere ngwaahịa, nnweta, na mmekọrịta karịrị Gogulu isi search engine, (Gogulu Saachi)

Ọ na-enye ọrụ emebere maka ọrụ na nrụpụta (Gogulu Doks ,Gogulu Shiits , na Gogulu Slaidis) , email ( Gmail ), nhazi oge na njikwa oge ( Gogulu kalenda ), nchekwa igwe ojii ( Gogulu draivu), ozi ngwa ngwa na nkata vidiyo ( Gogulu Duo, Chat Gogulu, na Nzukọ Gogulu ), nsụgharị asụsụ ( Gogulu transleti), maapụ na igodo ( Gogulu Maps, Waze, Gogulu Earth, na View Street ), Bochum pọdkastị ( Pọdkastị Google ), nkesa vidiyo ( YouTube ), mbipụta blọgụ ( Blogger ), ihe ndetu ( Gogulu kiipu na jamboodu, na nhazi foto na edezi ( Foto Gogulu)
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-eduga mmepe nke sistemụ mkpanaka mkpanaka Android, ihe nchọgharị weebụ “Gogulu Kromu na Kromu OS (dị arọ, sistemụ arụmọrụ nke dabere na isi mmalite “Chromium OS”nke na-emepe emepe)

Gogulu abanyela na-arịwanye elu n'ime ngwaike; site na 2010 ruo 2015, ya na ndị isi na-emepụta ngwá elektronik na mmepụta nke Gogulu Nexus ngwaọrụ, na ọ wepụtara otutu ngwaike ngwaahịa na 2016, gụnyere Gogulu pikzelakara nke ekwenti ulo Gogulu smart ọkà okwu, Gogulu Wifi ntupu wireless rawụta
Gogulu anwalelakwa ịghọ onye na-ebu ịntanetị (Google Fiber na Google Fi)
Gogulucom bụ webụsaịtị a kacha eleta n'ụwa niile
Ọtụtụ webụsaịtị Gogulu nwere nokwana nandepụta weebụsaịtị kachasị ewu ewu gụnyere “YouTube na Blogger”
Nandepụta nke ụdị kachasị ọnụ ahịa, Gogulu na-ahọrọ nke abụọ site na Forbes na nke anọ site na Interbrand
O natala nnukwu nkatọ metụtara okwu ndị dị kanchegbu nzuzo,izere ụtụ isi, nnyocha,nnọpụiche ọchụchọ, mgbochi ntụkwasị obi na iji ọnọdụ naanị ya eme ihe
Gogulu malitere na Jenụwarị 1996 dịka ọrụ nyocha nke Larry Page na Sergey Brin mere mgbe ha abụọ bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ PhD na Mahadum Stanford dị na mba Kalifonia

Na mbu, oru a metụtara onye na-akwadoghị 'onye nchoputa nke atọ', Scott Hassan, onye mmemme mbu onye dere ọtụtụ gbasara koduu maka mbụ “Google Search engine” , ma ọ hapụrụ tupu Gogulu enwe ntọala dị ka ụlọ ọrụ; Hassan gara n'ihu ịchụso ọrụ na “robotics” wee hiwe ụlọ ọrụ “Willow Garage” na 2006
Ọ bụ ezie na engines ọchụchọ ndị a na-ahụkarị na-ahọrọ nsonaazụ site n'ịgụ ugboro ole okwu ọchụchọ pụtara na ibe, ha chepụtara maka usoro ka mma nke nyochara mmekọrịta dị n'etiti weebụsaịtị
Ha na-akpọ nke a algọridim “PageRank” ; o kpebiri mkpaweebụsaịtịna ọnụọgụ ibe, yana mkpa nke ibe ndị ahụ jikọtara azụ na saịtị mbụ
Page gwara Hassan echiche ya, onye malitere ide koduu iji mejuputa echiche Page
Page na Brin kpọburu aha ihe nchọta ọhụrụ ahụ “BackRub”n'ihi na sistemụ ahụ lere “backlinks” iji chọpụta mkpa saịtị dị
Page na Brin kpọrọ Hassan na Alan Steremberg dị ka ndị dị mkpa maka mmepe Gogulu
Rajeev Motwani na Terry Winograd mechara dekọọ Page na Brin akwụkwọ mbụ gbasara ọrụ ahụ, na-akọwa PageRank na ụdị mbụ nke igwe nchọta Gogulu, nke e bipụtara na 1998
A kpọtụrụ Héctor García-Molina na Jeff Ullman ka ndị nyere aka na ọrụ ahụ

PageRank na-emetụta otu ibe-nhazi na saịtị-akara algọridim na mbụ ejiri mee ihe maka RankDex, nke Robin Li mepụtara na 1996, na Larry Page's PageRank patenti gụnyere ntinye aka na patenti RankDex mbụ nke Li; Li mechara mepụta igwe nchọta ndị China Baidu

Ka ana aga, ha gbanwere aha Gogulu ; aha nke search engine bụ egwuregwu na okwu googol , ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke edere 10 100 (1 sochiri 100 zeros), họrọ iji gosi na e bu n'obi na search engine iji nye nnukwu
ọnụọgụgụ ozi
Edebanyere aha ngalaba aha wwwgooglecom na Septemba 15, 1997, na ewebata ụlọ ọrụ na Septemba 4, 1998
Ọ dabere na ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala nke Susan Wojcicki na Menlo Park, Kalifonia Craig Silverstein, nwa akwụkwọ ibe PhD na Stanford, goro dị ka onye ọrụ mbụ

Gogulu nwetara ego mbụ site na ntinye ego nke August 1998 nke $100,000 sitere n'aka Andy Bechtolsheim, ngalaba-nchoputa nke Sun Microsystems, izu ole na ole tupu Septemba 7, 1998, ụbọchị ewebatara Gogulu
Gogulu nwetara ego n'aka ndị mmụọ ozi atọ ndị ọzọ na-etinye ego na 1998 Amazoncom nchoputa Jeff Bezos, Stanford University kọmputa sayensị prọfesọ David Cheriton, na entapirenua Ram Shriram
N'etiti ndị mbụ tinyere ego, ndị enyi, na ezinụlọ Google welitere gburugburu $1,000,000, nke mere ka ha mepee ụlọ ahịa mbụ ha na Menlo Park, California

Mgbe ụfọdụ agbakwunyere, obere ntinye ego site na njedebe nke 1998 ruo mmalite 1999, a mara ọkwa ọhụrụ $ 25 nde nke ego na June 7, 1999, na nnukwu ndị na-etinye ego gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ isi obodo Kleiner Perkins na Sequoia Capital
Na Machị 1999, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwagara ụlọ ọrụ ya na Palo Alto, California, nke bụ ebe ọtụtụ mmalite teknụzụ Silicon Valley a ma ama
N'afọ sochirinụ, Gogulu malitere ire mgbasa ozi metụtara isiokwu ọchụchọ megide Page na Brin na mbụ megidere igwe nchọta ego mgbasa ozi kwadoro
Iji jikwaa imewe ibe na-enweghị mgbagwoju anya, mgbasa ozi sitere naanị ederede
Na June 2000, a mara ọkwa na Gogulu ga-abụ onye na-eweta ihe nchọta nchọta maka Yahoo!, otu n'ime weebụsaịtị kachasị ewu ewu n'oge ahụ, nochiri Inktomi
Na 2003, mgbe ha toro ebe abụọ ọzọ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbazitere ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ site na Silicon Graphics, na 1600 Amphitheater Parkway na Mountain View, California
A bịara mara mgbagwoju anya dị ka Googleplex, egwuregwu na okwu googolplex, ọnụọgụgụ nke googol zeroes sochiri ya
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, Google zụtara ụlọ ahụ n'aka SGI maka $319 nde

N'oge ahụ, aha 'Google' abanyela n'asụsụ kwa ụbọchị, na-eme ka ngwaa ' google ' tinye na Merriam-Webster Collegiate Dictionary na Oxford English Dictionary, nke a kọwara dị ka 'iji Google search engine mee ihe
nweta ozi na ịntanetị' Ojiji mbụ nke ngwaa na telivishọn pụtara na ihe omume October 2002 nke Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Na mgbakwunye, na 2001 ndi tinyere ego na gogulu chere na ọ dị mkpa inwe njikwa ime ụlọ siri ike, ha kwekọrịtara iwere Eric Schmidt dị ka onye isi oche na onye isi Gogulu
Na Ọgọst 19, 2004, Gogulu ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ọha site na onyinye mbụ ọha
N'oge ahụ Larry Page, Sergey Brin, na Eric Schmidt kwetara ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na Google maka afọ iri abuo , ruo n'afọ 2024
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nyere oke ahia 19,605,052 na ọnụ ahịa $85 kwa òkè
A na-ere òkè na ntanetị n'ịntanetị site na iji usoro nke Morgan Stanley na Credit Suisse wuru, ndị na-ede akwụkwọ maka nkwekọrịta ahụ
Ire nke ijeri $167 nyere Gogulu isi ahịa ahịa karịrị ijeri $23

Na Nọvemba 13, 2006, Gogulu nwetara YouTube maka ijeri $165 na ngwaahịa Gogulu, Na Maachị 11, 2008, Gogulu nwetara DoubleClick maka $31 ijeri, na-ebufe na Gogulu mmekọrịta bara uru nke “DoubleClick”nwere na ndị mbipụta Weebụ na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2011, Gogulu na-eji ihe dị ka ijeri 3 na-achọ ihe kwa ụbọchị
Iji jikwaa ọrụ a, Gogulu wuru ebe data 11 gburugburu ụwa nwere ọtụtụ puku sava na nke ọ bụla
Ebe data ndị a nyere Google aka ijikwa ọrụ na-agbanwe mgbe niile nke ọma
Na Mee 2011, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọbịa pụrụ iche kwa ọnwa na Gogulu karịrị otu ijeri na nke mbụ ya
Na Mee 2012, Gogulu nwetara Motorola Mobility maka $125 ijeri, n'inweta ya kachasị ruo taa

Emere ịzụrụ ihe a n'otu akụkụ iji nyere Google aka inweta nnukwu patenti pọtụfoliyo nke Motorola na ekwentị mkpanaaka na teknụzụ ikuku, iji nyere aka chebe Gogulu na esemokwu patenti ya na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-aga n'ihu, tumadi Apple na Microsoft, na ikwe ka ọ nweta ya
na-aga n'ihu na-enye gam akporo
Na June 2013, Gogulu nwetara Waze, nkwekọrịta $ 966 nde
Ọ bụ ezie na Waze ga-anọgide na-enwere onwe ya, njirimara mmekọrịta ya, dị ka ikpo okwu ebe a na-enweta ya, bụ ọnụ ahịa bara uru n'etiti Waze na Google Maps, ọrụ nkewa nke Gogulu
Gogulu kwuputara mwepụta nke ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ, nke a na-akpọ Calico, na Septemba 19, 2013, onye isi oche Apple Inc
Arthur Levinson ga-edu
Na nkwupụta ọha na eze, Page kọwara na ụlọ ọrụ 'ahụike na ọdịmma' ga-elekwasị anya na 'ihe ịma aka nke ịka nká na ọrịa ndị metụtara ya'
Na Jenụwarị 26, 2014, Gogulu kwuputara na ya ekwenyela inweta DeepMind Teknụzụ, ụlọ ọrụ ọgụgụ isi na-ejide onwe ya na London
Webụsaịtị akụkọ teknụzụ Recode kọrọ na a zụtara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nde $400, mana ekpughere isi mmalite nke ozi ahụ
Onye nkwuchite ọnụ Gogulu jụrụ ikwu maka ọnụahịa ahụ
Ịzụta ihe enyemaka DeepMind na uto Gogulu na-adịbeghị anya na ọgụgụ isi na obodo robotics
Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ Interbrand's Best Global Brands si kwuo, Gogulu abụrụla akara nke abụọ kasị baa uru n'ụwa (n'azụ Apple Inc
ijeri
Na August 10, 2015, Gogulu kwupụtara atụmatụ ịhazigharị mmasị ya dị iche iche dị ka conglomerate aha ya bụ Alphabet Inc
Gogulu ghọrọ onye enyemaka Alphabet kacha na ụlọ ọrụ nche anwụ maka ọdịmma ịntanetị Alphabet
Mgbe emechara nhazigharị ahụ, Sundar Pichai ghọrọ CEO nke Gogulu, dochie Larry Page, onye ghọrọ CEO nke Alphabet

Na Ogost 8, 2017, Gogulu chụrụ onye ọrụ James Damore mgbe ọ kesasịrị akwụkwọ ozi n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ niile na-arụrịta ụka na-ezighị ezi na ' Google's Ideological Echo Chamber ' gbachiri echiche ha banyere ọdịiche dị iche iche na nsonye, nakwa na ọ bụkwa ihe ndị dị ndụ, ọ bụghị ịkpa ókè naanị, na
na-eme ka nkezi nwanyị ghara inwe mmasị karịa ndị nwoke na ọnọdụ teknụzụ
Onye isi ala Gogulu Sundar Pichai boro Damore ebubo imebi iwu ụlọ ọrụ site na 'ịkwalite echiche nwoke na nwanyị na-emerụ ahụ n'ebe ọrụ anyị', a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ n'otu ụbọchị ahụ

N'etiti 2018 na 2019, esemokwu dị n'etiti ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ na ndị ọrụ ya na-arịwanye elu ka ndị ọrụ na-eme mkpesa na mkpebi ụlọ ọrụ na mmekpa ahụ n'ime ime mmekọahụ, Dragonfly, onye nyocha China na-enyocha, na Project Maven, onye “military drone artificial intelligence” isi, bụ nke a na-ahụ anya dị ka akụkụ nke ego ha nwetara
uto maka ụlọ ọrụ
Na Ọktoba 25, 2018, akwụkwọ akụkọ New York Times bipụtara ikpughe, 'Otu Gogulu si chebe Andy Rubin, 'Nna nke Android
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechara kwupụta na 'a chụrụ ndị ọrụ 48 n'ọrụ n'ime afọ abụọ gara aga' maka mmekọahụ rụrụ arụ
Na Nọvemba 1, 2018, ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ Gogulu 20,000 na ndị ọrụ nkwekọrịta mere ngagharịiwe zuru ụwa ọnụ iji mee mkpesa maka njikwa ụlọ ọrụ na-eme mkpesa iyi egwu mmekọahụ
Onye isi ala Sundar Pichai kwuru na ọ na-akwado ngagharị iwe a
Mgbe e mesịrị na 2019, ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ boro ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ebubo imegwara ndị na-eme ihe n'ime
Na Machị 19, 2019, Gogulu kwupụtara na ọ ga-abanye n'ahịa egwuregwu vidiyo, na-ebupụta ikpo okwu egwuregwu igwe ojii akpọrọ Google Stadia
Na June 3, 2019, Ngalaba Ikpe Ziri Ezi nke United States kọrọ na ọ ga-enyocha Gogulu maka mmebi iwu mgbochi
Nke a butere itinye akwụkwọ n'ụlọ ikpe na-emegide ntụkwasị obi na Ọktoba 2020, n'ihi na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ejirila ọnọdụ naanị ya mee ihe n'ahịa mgbasa ozi na ọchụchọ
Na Disemba 2019, onye bụbu onye isi ọrụ PayPal Bill Ready ghọrọ onye isi azụmaahịa ọhụrụ nke Gogulu
Ọrụ njikere agaghị etinye aka na Google Pay
Na onwa Eprelu 2020, n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19, Gogulu kwuputara ọtụtụ usoro mbelata ọnụ ahịa

Usoro ndị dị otú ahụ gụnyere ibelata ndị ọrụ n'ọrụ maka ihe fọdụrụ na 2020, ewezuga ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke mpaghara atụmatụ, na-emegharị elekwasị anya na usoro ntinye ego na mpaghara dị ka ebe data na igwe, na ahịa na njem na-abụghị azụmahịa dị mkpa
Mwepụ ọrụ Gogulu 2020 kwụsịrị ọrụ Gogulu otu n'August nke metụtara Gogulu draivu n'etiti ndị ọzọ, ọzọ na Nọvemba na-emetụta YouTube, na nke atọ na Disemba na-emetụta ngwa Gogulu dum
Emechara nkwụsị atọ ahụ n'ime awa ole na ole
Na Jenụwarị 2021, Gọọmenti Australia tụpụtara iwu ga-achọ ka Gogulu na Fesibuuk kwụọ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ụgwọ maka ikike iji ọdịnaya ha
Na nzaghachi, Gogulu yiri egwu imechi ohere nchọta ya na mba Australia
Na Maachị 2021, Gogulu kwuru na ọ kwụrụ $20 nde maka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Ubisoft na Google Stadia
Gogulu mefuru 'iriri nde dollar' iji nweta ndị mgbasa ozi dịka Ubisoft na Take-Two ka ha weta ụfọdụ nnukwu egwuregwu ha na Stadia

Na onwa Eprel 2021, akwụkwọ akụkọ Wall Street Journal kọrọ na Gogulu mere mmemme ogologo afọ a na-akpọ 'Project Bernanke' nke jiri data sitere na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi gara aga iji nweta uru karịa ịsọ mpi maka ọrụ mgbasa ozi
Ekpughere nke a n'akwụkwọ gbasara akwụkwọ nkwụghachi ụgwọ nke steeti US iri gbara megide Gogulu na Disemba
Na Septemba 2021, gọọmentị Australia kwupụtara atụmatụ igbochi ikike Gogulu ịre mgbasa ozi ezubere iche, na-ekwu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ikike n'ahịa na-emerụ ndị mbipụta, ndị mgbasa ozi na ndị ahịa
Gogulu na- edepụta ọtụtụ ijeri ibe weebụ iji nye ndị ọrụ ohere ịchọ ozi ha chọrọ site na iji mkpụrụokwu na ndị na -arụ ọrụ
Dabere na nyocha ahịa comScore sitere na Nọvemba 2009, Google Search bụ igwe nchọta kachasị na ahịa United States, yana oke ahịa nke 656%

Na Mee 2017, Gogulu mere ka taabụ 'onwe' ọhụrụ na Google Search, na-ahapụ ndị ọrụ ịchọ ọdịnaya na ọrụ dị iche iche nke akaụntụ Gogulu ha, gụnyere ozi email sitere na Gmail na foto sitere na Google Photos
Gogulu malitere ọrụ Google News ya na 2002, ọrụ akpaaka nke na-achịkọta akụkọ akụkọ sitere na webụsaịtị dị iche iche
Gogulu na-akwado akwụkwọ Gogulu, ọrụ nke na-enyocha ederede dị n'akwụkwọ dị na nchekwa data ya ma na-egosi nleba anya nwere oke ma ọ bụ na akwụkwọ zuru ezu ebe a na-anabata ya
Gogulu na-enweta ọtụtụ ego ya na mgbasa ozi
Nke a gụnyere ire ngwa, ịzụrụ ihe n'ime ngwa, ngwaahịa ọdịnaya dijitalụ na Gogulu na YouTube, gam akporo na ikikere yana ụgwọ ọrụ, gụnyere ụgwọ anatara maka onyinye Google Cloud
Pasent iri anọ na isii nke uru a sitere na clicks (ọnụahịa kwa clicks), ruru US $ 109,652 nde na 2017
Nke a gụnyere ụzọ atọ bụ isi, ya bụ AdMob, AdSense (dị ka AdSense maka Ọdịnaya, AdSense maka Ọchụchọ, wdg) na DoubleClick AdExchange
Na mgbakwunye na algọridim nke ya maka ịghọta arịrịọ ọchụchọ, Gogulu na-eji teknụzụ nweta DoubleClick, iji mepụta mmasị onye ọrụ na mgbasa ozi lekwasịrị anya na ọnọdụ ọchụchọ yana akụkọ onye ọrụ
N'afọ 2007, Gogulu malitere ' AdSense for Mobile ', na-eji uru ahịa mgbasa ozi ekwentị na-apụta
Nchịkọta Gogulu na-enye ndị nwe weebụsaịtị ohere soro ebe na otu ndị mmadụ si eji webụsaịtị ha, dịka ọmụmaatụ site na nyochaa ọnụego pịa maka njikọ niile dị na ibe
Enwere ike itinye mgbasa ozi Gogulu na webụsaịtị ndị ọzọ na mmemme akụkụ abụọ
Mgbasa ozi Gogulu na-enye ndị mgbasa ozi ohere igosipụta mgbasa ozi ha na netwọk ọdịnaya Gogulu, site na atụmatụ ọnụ-otu-pịa
Ọrụ nwanne nwanyị, GoguluAdSense, na-enye ndị nwe webụsaịtị ohere igosipụta mgbasa ozi ndị a na webụsaịtị ha wee nweta ego mgbe ọ bụla pịnyere mgbasa ozi

Otu n'ime nkatọ nke mmemme a bụ ohere nke ịpị wayo, nke na-eme mgbe mmadụ ma ọ bụ edemede na-akpaghị aka na-agbanye na mgbasa ozi na-enweghị mmasị na ngwaahịa ahụ, na-eme ka onye mgbasa ozi kwụọ Gogulu ego na-ekwesịghị ekwesị

Nchọgharị Ọchụchọ Gogulu (nke ewegharịrị site na Gogulu Webmaster Tools na Mee 2015) na-enye ndị na-ahụ maka webusaiti aka ịlele saịtị saịtị, ọnụego crawl, yana maka ihe nchekwa nke webụsaịtị ha, yana kwalite visibiliti webụsaịtị ha

Gogulu na-enye Gmail maka email, Gogulu kalinda maka nhazi oge na nhazi oge, Gogulu Maps maka eserese, igodo na ihe onyonyo satịlaịtị, Gogulu Draivu maka nchekwa igwe ojii nke faịlụ, Gogulu Docs, Ibé akwụkwọ na Ihe mmịfe maka nrụpụta, Foto Gogulumaka nchekwa foto na nkekọrịta, Gogulu Nọgidenụ maka ndetu, Gogulu Transleti maka ntụgharị asụsụ, YouTube maka ikiri vidiyo na ikesa, Gogulu My Business maka ijikwa ozi azụmahịa ọha, na Duo maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Na Machị 2019, Gogulu weputara ọrụ egwuregwu igwe ojii akpọrọ Stadia
Ngwaahịa ọchụchọ ọrụ dịkwa adị kemgbe tupu 2017, Gogulu maka Ọrụ bụ njirimara ọchụchọ emelitere nke na-achịkọta ndepụta sitere na bọọdụ ọrụ na saịtị ọrụ
Ụfọdụ ọrụ Gogulu adabereghị na webụ
Google Earth, nke ewepụtara na 2005, kwere ka ndị ọrụ hụ foto satịlaịtị dị elu sitere na ụwa niile n'efu site na ngwanrọ ndị ahịa ebudatara na kọmputa ha
Gogulu na-emepụta sistemụ mkpanaka mkpanaka gam akporo, yana smartwatch ya, telivishọn, ụgbọ ala , na ịntanetị nke ihe -enyere ụdị ngwaọrụ dị iche iche aka
Ọ na-etolitekwa ihe nchọgharị weebụ Gogulu kromu, na Kromu OS, sistemụ arụmọrụ dabere na Kromu
Na onwa Jenụwarị 2010, Gogulu wepụtara Nexus One, ekwentị gam akporo mbụ n'okpuru akara nke ya
Ọ zụlitere ọtụtụ ekwentị na mbadamba n'okpuru akara ' Nexus ' ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị na 2016, jiri akara ọhụrụ akpọrọ Pixel dochie ya
Na 2011, ewebata Akwukwo kromu nke na-agba na Kromu OS
Na Julaị 2013, Gogulu webatara Kromukastidongle, nke na-enye ndị ọrụ ohere ịkwanye ọdịnaya site na ekwentị ha na igwe onyonyo
Na June 2014, Gogulu kwuputara Gogulu kaadiboodu , ihe nlele kaadiboodu dị mfe nke na-eme ka onye ọrụ tinye ekwenti ha na oghere ihu opụrụ iche iji lelee mgbasa ozi eziokwu (VR)

Google Workspace (nke bụbu G Suite ruo Ọktoba 2020 ) bụ onyinye ịdenye aha kwa ọnwa maka ndị otu na azụmaahịa iji nweta mkpokọta ọrụ Google, gụnyere Gmail, Google Drive na Google Docs, Google Sheets na Google Slides, yana njikwa nhazi ndị ọzọ
ngwaọrụ, aha ngalaba pụrụ iche, yana nkwado 24/7
Google Maps bu akwúkwó orúnotù dotụrụ na Internet he gi e tú uzọr na ya
O bu orürü Google kẹrẹ ya
O ne zí uzọr
David Jamahl Listenbee, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ GoonRock, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-agụ egwu, onye na'ede egwu na ónyé na-eti egwu
A zụlitere ya na Los Angeles, California, na mbido ọrụ ya, o lekwasịrị anya na hip hop ma resị ndị na-ese ihe dịka Dr
Dre, Ne-Yo, Kanye West, na Juvenile
O mechara malite itinye egwu klọb
GoonRock so dee ma mepụta ọtụtụ egwu na LMFAO's 2011 album Sorry for Party Rocking, gụnyere egwu egwu 'Party Rock Anthem' na 'Sexy and I Know It'
N'afọ 2013 'Goonrock' so dee ma mepụta 'A Little Party Never Killed Nobody (All We Got) ' màkà ihe nkírí mba ụwa The Great Gatsby màkà Fergie nke gosipụtara Q-Tip
N'afọ 2012, o so dee ma mepụta egwu abụọ maka Jennifer Lopez, gụnyere 'Clothes Off' na 'Goin' In'
'Goin' In' rutere n'ọkwa # 1 na US Billboard Hot Dance Club Songs maka afọ 2012
N'afọ 2015 na 2016 ọ wepụtara ọtụtụ egwu n'okpuru aha nna ya 'Listenbee'
Ndị a emeghị na US ma ọ bụ UK, mana ha nwèrè ọganihu dị mmá n'ebe ndị ọzọ na Europe
A mụrụ David Jamahl Listenbee na Princeton, New Jersey ma zụlite ya na Trenton dị nso
Ọ bìrì na Chicago ruo afọ ole na ole tupu ọ kwaga Los Angeles, California mgbè ọ dị obere
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Redfoo, mgbe e mesịrị na LMFAO, na william
Na mbido ọrụ ya, GoonRock lekwasịrị anya na hip hop ma ree ụfọdụ ndị na-ese ihe dịka Dr
Dre
Ọ nọ n'oge dị íchè íchè mepụtara màkà Ne-Yo, Music Soulchild, Dr
Dre, Kanye West, na Juvenile
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Watch the Throne album (Kanye na Jay-Z) kpọmkwem egwu 'Lift Off' nke Beyoncé gosipụtara
Ya na Ryan Tedder arụwokwa ọrụ
LMFAO nwèrè egwu mbụ ha 'I'm in Miami Bitch' na akara william na 2008, GoonRock malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na duo na 2009
GoonRock na LMFAO malitere dị ka ndị na-agụ egwú hip hop mana ónyé DJ AM nwụrụ anwụ nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu, ónyé méré ka ha mara ụlọ na egwu electro nke ha hụrụ n'anya dịka Justice na Crookers
Aha nna Goosen nke dị Afrikaans, pụtara 'nwa Goos' ('Goswin')
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Gopala Davies (a mụrụ na 14 Mee 1988) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Gopala mere Adam na obere Film Lilith Genesis One nke meriri ụdị ihe nkiri na 2015 PPC Imaginarium Awards
n'afọ 2016 'Best International Experimental' na ICARO Festival Internacional de Cine
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ Robert na SABC 1 soap opera Generations The Legacy
Gopala gakwara South Africa na Pieter Toerien Tians The History Boys, nke ritere ihe nrite Naledi maka The Best Production of a Play n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2013, Gopala rụrụ ọrụ Mohammed na Tom Coashīs Cry Havoc, nke Grace Meadows na Ashraf Johaardien mepụtara, ebe ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri David Dennis na Brenda Radloff
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ Alphonse Lebel na Jade Bowers Corch, nke Wajdi Mouawad dere
Gordon Froud (amụrụ na 1963 na Johannesburg) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye nlekọta South Africa
E gosipụtara ọrụ Froud na ọtụtụ narị ihe ngosi na South Africa na ụwa gbaa gburugburu
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ọka ikpe maka ọtụtụ asọmpi nka mba
Ọ bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye nke gụnyere Merit Award for Sculpture na 1988 New Signatures Competition na ABSA Gold Medal maka onyinye maka nka na 2005
Froud ejirila ọtụtụ afọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nka na ọkwa sekọndrị na nke mahadum na London na South Africa

Ikekwe a maara ya nke ọma maka ojiji ọ na-eji ihe ndị a chọtara na ndị na-abụghị omenala n'ihe ọkpụkpụ ya, Froud na-anwa ịchọpụta ọnọdụ mmadụ n'ọrụ ya, ọkachasị gbasara DNA, ụmụ ọhụrụ, mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa, nje bacteria, nje na foto onwe onye
Ugbu a, ọ na-eme ka ọrụ nka ya na nlekọta ya dị mma site n'ichikwa Gordart Gallery nke ya, nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịzụlite ndị omenkà a na-amaghị nke ọma
Froud gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand na 1987 ebe o nwetara BA (FA) Honours na Diploma agụmakwụkwọ dị elu
N'afọ 2007, ọ gụsịrị ma nweta nzere Master of Technology na Mahadum Johannesburg

Gordon Keith (aka William Henry Adams Jr) (August 12, 1939 – November 17, 2020) was an American record producer who was the first person to sign a recording contract with the Jackson 5 and release their records

In 1966, he and four friends founded Steeltown Records in Gary, Indiana, with each able to manage, record, and sign local talent themselves in and around Gary[lower-alpha 1] The quality of the music and dance scene was high in and near Gary
Vivian Carter, founder of VeeJay Records, and the Spaniels, a prominent doo-wop group, are examples of Gary's musical culture

Keith states that each Steeltown partner individually discovered, signed, and took the responsibility and any profit for each signed individual or group, using Steeltown Records (Steeltown label) as an umbrella to promote name recognition[lower-alpha 2] Keith also points out that he had himself went solo as a vocalist in the 1960s because he wearied of the lack of discipline and commitment of so many of the young singers he sang doo-wop songs with
Therefore, he was looking not only for talent, but talent with a disciplined professional attitude and commitment
Keith dekọrọ ma mepụta egwu anọ nke Jackson 5 na akara Steeltown na 1967
Ihe a ma ama, bụ egwu mbụ nke Jackson 5 bụ 'Big Boy', nke Michael Jackson bụrụ
Keith bịanyere aka na Jackson Five na nkwekọrịta njikwa na ndekọ ọnwa isii na ya na Nọvemba 21 n'afọ ahụ, n'oge, n'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya, ọ dịghị otu n'ime ọtụtụ ákàrà na mpaghara ahụ ga-eburu ha
Mgbè ọ wepụtara 'Big Boy' na Jenụwarị 31, 1968, ọ na-egwuri egwu na redio ma ree ya na mpaghara Chicago-Gary

Jackson 5 dekọrọ 'Big Boy' na ụlọ ndekọ Sunny Sawyer na West 69th Street, na South Side nke Chicago, nke bụ ébé óbíbí nke ụda Chicago Soul nke oge áhụ, ma nwee ọtụtụ ndị egwu, ndị na-ede egwu, na ụlọ mmepụta

Àgwà na ikike a nụrụ na ndekọ 'Big Boy' dị otú ahụ na Jerry Wexler nke Atlantic Records chọtara Keith wee soro ya mee nkwekọrịta na Machị 5, iji mee ka ATCO, nkewa nke Atlantic Records, kesaa 'Big Boy ' na mba
Atlantic Records / Atco na New York City na-agbanye ma kesaa ọtụtụ puku 'Big Boy' na ákàrà Steeltown na aka ndekọ Atco
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a ka dị, dị ka nsụgharị ndị bu ụzọ kesara na Gary
The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum nwèrè otu n'ime ihe ndekọ 'Big Boy' / 'You Changed' (Steeltown # 681), nke a gosipụtara n'ebe ahụ na 2010
Kpọpụta njehie tag was found
George Esslemont Gordon Leith (1885-1965) bụ ónyé South Africa na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-arụ ọrụ màkà Herbert Baker
Leith jere ozi dị ka ónyé isi na Royal Field Artillery (ma mesịa na-agbake site na mwakpo gas nke Western Front)
Leith bụ osote ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Imperial War Graves Commission na England site na 1918 ruo 1920, tupu ọ laghachi South Africa, ebe o guzobere ọrụ nkè ya

Ọrụ Leith gụnyere Calais Southern War Cemetery, France (191820), Johannesburg Park Station (1927), Town Hall, Bloemfontein (1920), South African Reserve Bank, Johannesburg (1938), na Queen Victoria Hospital, Johannesburg (1943)
Ọ lụrụ Ethel Mary Leith, nkè a mụrụ Cox (1888 Xing 1974)
Nwá ha nwanyị Sarah Greenaway Leith (1918-2010), bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọala na ónyé édémédé Britain, na ónyé na-eme ihe gbásárá Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na Bletchley Park

Gordon Roger Alexander Buchanan Parks (Ọnwa Nọvemba 30, afọ 1912 - rụọ ọnwa Maachị 7, afọ 2006) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto, onye na-eti egwu, onye edemede na onye nduzi ihe nkiri, onye ghọrọ onye a ma ama na akụkọ foto nke US n'afọ 1940 ruo n'afọ 1970 karịsịa n'ihe gbasara ikike obodo, ịda ogbenye na ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na foto mara mma
Parks bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ mepụtara ma duzie ihe nkiri ndị na-emepe emepe na-akọ ahụmahụ nke ndị ohu na ndị isi ojii Amerịka na-alụ ọgụ, ma na-emepụta ụdị 'blaxploitation'

A na-echeta ya nke ọma maka foto ya nke ndị Amerịka dara ogbenye n'oge 1940s (nke e weere maka ọrụ gọọmentị etiti), maka edemede foto ya maka magazin Life, yana dịka onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri afọ 1971 Shaft
Parks bụkwa onye edemede, onye na-ede uri na onye na-agụ egwú
A mụrụ Parks na Fort Scott, Kansas, nwa Andrew Jackson Parks na Sarah Ross, n'ọnwa Nọvemba 30, afọ 1912
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ iri na ise
Nna ya bụ onye ọrụ ugbo na-akụ ọka, beets, turnips, poteto, collard greens, na tomato
Ha nwekwara ọbọgwụ ole na ole, ọkụkọ, na ezì
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị nke kewara ekewa

Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya nwere ma ndị isi ojii na ndị ọcha, n'ihi na obodo ahụ pere mpe maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọstụ dị iche iche, mana anaghị ekwe ka ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii na-egwu egwuregwu ma ọ bụ gaa ihe omume mmekọrịta ọha na eze n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, a kụdara ha ume ịzụlite ọchịchọ maka agụmakwụkwọ dị elu
Parks kọrọ na ihe ngosi banyere ndụ ya na onye nkuzi ya gwara ya na ọchịchọ ya ịga kọleji ga-abụ mmebi ego
Mgbe Parks dị afọ iri na otu, ụmụ nwoke ọcha atọ tụbara ya n'ime Osimiri Marmaton, na-ekwere na ọ pụghị igwu mmiri
O nwere uche ịnya ụgbọ mmiri n'okpuru mmiri ka ha wee ghara ịhụ ka ọ ga-ada
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Ọ nọrọ abalị ikpeazụ ya n'ụlọ ezinụlọ ahụ na-ehi ụra n'akụkụ igbe ozu nne ya, na-achọ ọ bụghị naanị nkasi obi, kamakwa ụzọ isi chee egwu ọnwụ ya ihu
N'oge na-adịghị anya, e zigara ya St
Paul, Minnesota, ka ya na nwanne ya nwanyị na di ya biri
Ya na ọgọ ya nwoke na-arụrịta ụka ugboro ugboro ma mesịa tụgharịa Parks n'okporo ámá iji lekọta onwe ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
N'ịgbalịsi ike ịlanarị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ndị akwụna, yana dịka onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-akpọ piano, nwa bọs, onye na'ere nri na-eme njem, na onye na-egwu basketball
N'afọ 1929, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge na klọb ụmụ nwoke, Minnesota Club
N'ebe ahụ, ọ hụrụ ihe ịga nke ọma ma nwee ike ịgụ ọtụtụ akwụkwọ site na ọbá akwụkwọ klọb
Mgbe Wall Street Crash nke 1929 wetara njedebe na klọb ahụ, ọ gbagoro ụgbọ okporo ígwè gaa Chicago, ebe o jisiri ike nweta ọrụ na flophouse

E gosipụtara ihe osise mmanụ na-enweghị atụ nke Parks na foto na ngosi afọ 1981 na Alex Rosenberg Gallery na New York nke akpọrọ 'Gordon Parks Expansions The Aesthetic Blend of Painting and Photography'
N'afọ 1970, Parks nyere aka chọta magazin Essence, ma jee ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya n'ime afọ atọ mbụ nke mgbasa ya
Gored gored (Amharic ጎረድ ጎረድ; Amharic pronunciation [ɡorəd ɡorəd]) bụ nri ehi a na-eri na mba Ethiopia na Eritrea
Ọ bụ ezie na kitfo bụ anụ ehi egburu egbụ nke a na-etinye n'ime ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na bọta a na-eme ka ọ dị ọcha, a na-agbanye gored gored ma hapụ ya n'enweghị mmiri
Dị ka kitfo, ọ na-ewu ewu n'ọtụtụ ebe ma were ya dị ka nri mba
A na-ejikarị mitmita (mgwakọta ntụ ntụ) na awazi (ụdị mustard na chilli sauce)
Gorreth Namugga bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị omeiwu maka Mawogola county, Southern district
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na-eduga, National Unity Platform
Namugga bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mmegide mbụ meriri ọkwa a họpụtara na Sembabule kemgbe 1986
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke kọmitii ọrụ distrikti ma nwee ụlọ akwụkwọ na Sembabule
Ọ bụbu onye isi na-azụ ahịa maka obodo Masaka
Namugga na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka minista onyinyo nke sayensị, ihe ọhụrụ na teknụzụ
Namugga gosipụtara akụkọ ndị ka nta na mmefu ego 2022/2023
Gotytom Gebreslase (amụrụ n'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1995) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
O meriri n'ọsọ ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ 2021 Berlin Marathon na Berlin, Germany
Nke a bụkwa oge izizi ya na marathon ma bụrụ oge nke asatọ kachasị ọsọ nke ụmụ nwanyị n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọsọ ahụ
Gebreslase gbara ọsọ n'afo 2022 Tokyo Marathon ma mechie nke atọ n'ime oge nke 2 18 18
O meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe omume puku mita atọ ụmụ nwanyị na 2011 World Youth Championships in Athletics nke emere na Lille Métropole, France
O nwetakwara ọla nchara n'asọmpi puku mita ise nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2012 African Championships in Athletics nke emere na Porto Novo, Benin
N'afọ 2013, ọ sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na IAAF World Cross Country Championships nke emere na Bydgoszcz, Poland
N'afọ 2015, ọ mechara n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na ihe omume puku mita ise nke ụmụ nwanyị na African Games nke emere na Brazzaville, Republic of the Congo
Government College Ikorodu (GCI) bụ kọleji e hiwere na 21st Septemba, 1974, na Ikorodu Local Government Area, Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
E guzobere Gọọmentị College Ikorodu na Septemba 1974 dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-agụkọ akwụkwọ ọnụ nke nwere ihe dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ ọsụ ụzọ narị abụọ
A na-ebufe ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị a site na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị ọzọ dị na steeti Lagos site n'ebe a kwadoro ha dabere na ngwa nyocha nke afọ ahụ
N'afọ mbụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ nọrọ n'ebe nwa oge na Obafemi Awolowo Way, Ikorodu (nke a na-akpọ Agbowa Road n'oge ahụ)
Onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ Olatunde Balogun onye omume ịdọ aka ná ntị ya nyere aka n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ịkpụzi ndụ ndị nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Gọvanọ nke steeti Lagos n'oge ahụ, Brigadier Mobolaji Johnson meghere kọleji ahụ na Septemba 23, 1974
GCI nwetara ọtụtụ ihe n'ime afọ ise mbụ ya ma bụrụ otu n'ime kọleji ise Chief Adeniran Ogunsanya nyere agụmakwụkwọ mgbe ọ bụ kọmishọna maka agụmakwụkwọ n'afọ 1975
Ndị otu na Government College Ikorodu ochie ụmụ akwụkwọ na-emeghe maka ndị niile gara ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu afọ agụmakwụkwọ
Gazette gọọmentị bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ gọọmentị maka ndị Britain na-achị Lagos
E bipụtara ya n'agbata afọ 1887 na Eprel 1906
Ọ gara n'ihu site na Government Gazette nke Protectorate of Southern Naijiria mgbe e webatara Lagos n'ime Southern Nigeria Protectorate dị na Februwari 1906
Grid Analysis and Display System (GrADS) bụ ngwá ọrụ desktọọpụ na-emekọrịta ihe nke a na-eji màkà ịnweta, njikwa, na ịhụ ihe ọmụma nkè data sayensị ụwa
Usoro nkè data nwèrè ike ịbụ ma ọ bụ binary, GRIB, NetCDF, ma ọ bụ HDF-SDS (Scientific Data Sets)
E mejuputala GrADS n'ụwa niile na sistemụ arụmọrụ dị íchè ichè a na-ejikarị eme ihe ma na-ekesa ya n'efu na Ịntanetị
GrADS na-eji gbụrụ-gbúrụ data 4-Dimensional longitude, latitude, ọkwa kwụ ọtọ, na ógè
A na-etinye data n'ime oghere 4-D site na iji faịlụ nkọwa data
GrADS na-akọwa data ọdụ ya na data gridded, na grid nwèrè ike ịbụ ógè niile, nke na-abụghị nke dị n'usoro, Gaussian, ma ọ bụ nke mkpebi dị iche iche
Enwèrè ike ikpuchi data sitere na data dị íchè íchè, na ndebanye aha oghere na ógè ziri ezi
Ọ na-eji usoro ctl sonye na usoro data dị íchè íchè
A na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ mmekọrịta site na itinye okwu yiri FORTRAN na akara iwu
A na-enye ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị e wuru n'ime, mànà ndị ọrụ nwekwara ike ịgbakwunye ọrụ nke ha dị ka usoro mpụga edere na asụsụ mmemme ọ bụla

Enwèrè ike igosi data site na iji usoro eserese dịgasị iché ichè akara na mmanya eserese, eserese na-agbasa, contours dị nro, contours shaded, streamlines, wind vectors, grid boxes, grid bocks, shaded grid boxes
Graphics nwere ike ịpụta na PostScript ma ọ bụ usoro ihe oyiyi
GrADS na-enye ọdịdị ọdịdị ọdịiche nke ọdịdị ala, mànà ónyé ọrụ nwèrè nhọrọ ịchịkwa akụkụ niile nke mmepụta eserese
GrADS nwèrè interface a na-eme atụmatụ (asụsụ edemede) nké na-enye ohere màkà nyocha dị mgbagwoju anya na ngwa ngosi
Ihe odide nwéré ike igosi bọtịnụ ma wepụ menus yana ndị na-ese onyinyo, wee mee ihe dabere na akara na ịpị onye ọrụ
Enwèrè ike ịgba ọsọ GrADS n'ọnọdụ batch, na asụsụ édémédé na-eme ka ọ dị mfe iji GrADS rụọ ọrụ batch ogologo ógè
Ka ọ na-erule mbipute 220, a na-ejikwa ngosipụta na mbipụta ugbu a dị ka plug-ins onwé ha
E webatara mgbatị C-asụsụ Python màkà GrADS a na-akpọ GradsPy na mbipute 221
Dame Graça Machel DBE HonFBA (pronunciation Portuguese [ˈɡɾasɐ mɐˈʃɛɫ]; née Simbine; akpọ [sĩˈbĩni], amụrụ 17 Ọktoba 1945) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Mozambique
Ọ bụ nwunye onye bụbu onye isi ala Mozambique Samora Machel (1975–1986) na onye bụbu onye isi ala South Africa Nelson Mandela (1998–2013)
Machel bụ onye na-akwado mba ụwa maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ma bụrụkwa Queen Elizabeth II mere nsọpụrụ British Dame na 1997 maka ọrụ enyemaka ya
Ọ bụ naanị ya bụ nwanyị na akụkọ ntolite ọgbara ọhụrụ jerela ozi dị ka nwanyị mbụ nke mba abụọ, South Africa na Mozambique
Grace A

Oliver (née, Little; mgbe alụmdi na nwunye mbụ gasịrị, Ellis; mgbe alụkwaghịm nke abụọ gasịrị, Oliver; September 24, 1844 - May 21, 1899) bụ onye edemede America nke narị afọ nke 19, na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
A kọwara ya dị ka nwanyị nwere ikike nchịkwa pụrụ iche, ezigbo ọkà okwu, a makwaara ya maka ọrụ ebere ya
O nyere aka na Old and New, dere edemede nchịkọta akụkọ maka Boston Daily Advertiser, na ọkwa akwụkwọ maka akwụkwọ dị iche iche
O nyere aka, n'okpuru mbinye aka nke di ya nwụrụ anwụ, John Harvard Ellis, na The Galaxy, Atlantic Monthly, na Scribner's Monthly
A nabatara akụkọ ndụ Dora d'Istria na ndị ọzọ nke ọma
N'afọ 1879, ọ lụrụ nke abụọ, Dr
Joseph Pearson Oliver

O bipụtara n'ụdị akwụkwọ Life and Works of Anna Laetitia Barbauld (Boston, 1873); Life of Maria Edgeworth (1882), nke e dere site n'enyemaka nke akwụkwọ ezinụlọ na ihe ncheta onwe onye nke ndị ezinụlọ Miss Edgeworth nyere ya mgbe Oliver gara England na 1874; Memoirs of Ann and Jane Taylor, with Selections from their Works (1883); na Arthur Penrhyn Stanley ya Life, Work, and Teachings (1885)
A mụrụ Grace Atkinson Little na Boston, Massachusetts, na Septemba 24, 1844
Nna ya bụ onye ahịa a ma ama na Boston, ma bụrụkwa onye nnọchi anya na onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke Pacific Mills na Lawrence, Massachusetts
Ọ bụ nwa Peregrine White nke Mayflower
Oliver nwere ụmụnne ise, James, John, Arthur, William, na Philip, na enweghị ụmụnne nwanyị
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye nke Boston
N'afọ 1869, ọ lụrụ John Harvard Ellis (1841-1870), onye ọka iwu, nwa Rev
George Edward Ellis, nke Boston
John nwụrụ na 1870, na 1871, iji wepụ uche ya, ọ malitere ide maka ndị nta akụkọ n'aha ya
Rev
Edward Everett Hale dụrụ ya ọdụ ka o dee maka magazin ya, Old and New (nke a maara dị ka Christian Examiner), nke bụ akwụkwọ edemede mbụ ya
Site n'oge ruo n'oge, o nyere aka na Atlantic Monthly, The Galaxy, na Scribner's Magazine
Ọ bụ onye na-enye onyinye mgbe niile na Boston Transcript na ọkwa akwụkwọ, ọ dekwara maka Boston Daiily Advertiser
In1873 she wrote the life of mrs Barbados which was well received by the public in 1874 ,Mrs Ellis spent a season in ĺondon ,England where she enjoyed the best literary society of that metropolis
While in England she met some members of the family of Maria edgeworth
They suggested to her the writing of the life of edgeworth the book was published in the older corner book store in Boston in 1882
N'afọ 1879, ọ lụrụ Dr
Joseph Pearson Oliver (1845-1903), onye dọkịta nke Boston
N'ikpeazụ, o dere akwụkwọ ncheta nke Rev
Arthur Penrhyn Stanley, nke e wepụtara na Boston na London
N'oge oyi nke 1883-84, o dezigharịrị mpịakọta atọ nke nhọrọ sitere na Ann na Jane Taylor, Mrs
Barbauld na Miss Edgeworth
Oliver tinyere aka na nyocha banyere ndụ na ncheta nke ụfọdụ ụmụ nwanyị America, nakwa na Browning Concordance, nke Dr
Rolfe dezigharịrị

Ọ bụ onye nlekọta steeti nke Danvers Lunatic Asylum (ugbu a, Danvers State Hospital); onye isi oche nke Salem Society for the Higher Education of Women; onye isi oche of the Visiting Nurse Association of Marblehead; onye guzobere, osote onye isi oche, na onye isi oche de la Thought and Work club of Salem; onye otu New England Women's Club; nke North Shore club of Lynn, Massachusetts, nke Essex Institute, na onye otu New Inglaterra Woman's Press Association
Oliver na ụmụnne ya abụọ, Capt

Philip na Alderman David Little, bụ ndị otu ụlọ akwụkwọ Salem, na-anọchite anya Ward 3; ọ bụ oge mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke obodo ahụ na ndị nnọchiteanya niile sitere na ngalaba ọ bụla bụ ndị otu ezinụlọ
Ọ nọ na bọọdụ ụlọ akwụkwọ maka afọ atọ ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya
Oliver biri na Boston ruo 1890
N'afọ gara aga, mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, Oliver zụrụ ma wụnye ụlọ na Salem, Massachusetts ebe ọ kwagara n'ọnwa ikpeazụ nke afọ ahụ
N'ebe ahụ ka nna nna ya, Col
David Mason, onye pụtara na 'Leslie's Retreat,' na North Bridge, na Febụwarị, 1775
Colonel Mason bụ, ka a na-ekwu, onye na-ede akwụkwọ nke Dr
Benjamin Franklin, ma nye na Salem, n'oge 1774, okwu ihu ọha mbụ a kpọsara banyere ọkụ eletrik
N'afọ 1890, Oliver zụrụ obere ala na Doliver's Cove, akụkụ mbụ nke obodo akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Marblehead, Massachusetts
Ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ochie, nke a maara dị ka nke Valpey, ọ welitere ma mee ya ka ọ bụrụ ala nwere mgbidi nkume
Ebe a ghọrọ ebe obibi ya n'oge ọkọchị
Oliver nwụrụ na Marblehead, May 21, 1899
Mahadum Notre Dame nwere akwụkwọ ya

Grace Adams (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1995) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti maka klọb National Women's League Berry Ladies na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana
Adams malitere ọrụ ya na Ghana na Prison Ladies, tupu ọ kwaga United States iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na ọrụ ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-eme egwuregwu
Ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum nke South Florida site na 2015 ruo 2018, na-egwuri egwu maka klọb ha South Florida Bulls na American Athletic Conference Ọ meriri n'afọ 2017
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2019, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Rivers Angels nke Nigeria Women Premier League na nkwekọrịta otu afọ
Na 24 Jenụwarị 2020 Adams kwagara Lebanọn, na-etinye aka na SAS n'etiti oge 2019 na 20
Ọ gbara bọọlụ asaa maka klọb ọhụrụ ya, nyere goolu ise aka; o nyeere ndị otu ya aka imeri league
Adams laghachiri Ghana, na-egwuri egwu maka Berry Ladies na National Women's League
Adams bụ onyeisi ndị na-erubeghị afọ 20 na 2014 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, Adams nọchitere anya ndị otu okenye na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Morocco, na-abịa na nkeji nke iri asatọ na mmeri 2
South Florida Bulls
SAS
Grace Akallo (amụrụ n'afọ 1981) bụ nwanyị Uganda nke a tọọrọ na 1996 ka e jiri ya mee ihe dị ka nwatakịrị onye agha na Lord's Resistance Army (LRA), otu ndị agha nnupụisi nke Joseph Kony duziri
N'oge a tọọrọ ya, Akallo dị afọ iri na ise ma na-aga St
Mary's College, ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi ndị Katọlik na Aboke, Uganda
Ọ nọgidere na LRA ọnwa asaa tupu ọ gbapụ
Mgbe ọ gbapụrụ n'usuu ndị agha, Akallo laghachiri na St
Mary's College iji gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ kọleji ya na Mahadum Ndị Kraịst nke Uganda, mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Gordon College mgbe ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ
Akallo wee gaa n'ihu nweta nzere masta ya na Mahadum Clark / Mgbe ọ gbapụrụ na LRA, Akallo malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado udo na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka Afrịka

Ọ na-eji ma ahụmịhe ya dị ka nwatakịrị onye agha na ozi ọ nwetara na agụmakwụkwọ ya dị elu iji kwado megide ime ihe ike na iji ụmụaka ndị agha, yana iji nyere aka nye ndụmọdụ ụmụaka ndị agha ndị ọzọ gbapụrụ agbapụ dịka ya
Akallo arụwo ọrụ maka òtù dị iche iche, dị ka Sister Rachelle Rehabilitation Centre na World Vision, yana ịrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ nkwado dị iche iche dị iche iche
gụnyere inye aka n'ịgafe mgbanwe na 2008 Child Soldiers Accountability Act

na ikwu okwu banyere ahụmịhe ya dị ka onye bụbu onye agha Akallo amalitewokwa otu na-enweghị uru na America nke a na-akpọ United Africans for Women and Children's Rights (UAWCR), na-achọ ichebe ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ndị Afrịka; ma soro guzobe Network of Young People Affected War

E dere ma mepụta ọtụtụ akụkọ ndụ na ihe ndekọ na-edekọ ahụmahụ Akallo na ụmụaka ndị agha ibe ya, ọkachasị akụkọ ndụ onwe onye nke afọ 2007; Girl Soldier A Story of Hope for Northern Uganda's Children, nke ya na Faith J
McDonnell dere, akụkọ ndụ 2015 Grace Akallo na Pursuit of Justice for Child Soldiers nke Kem Knapp Sawyer dere, na ihe ngosi 2010 Grace, Milly, Lucy
Ụmụaka Ndị Agha nke Raymonde Provencher mepụtara
A tọọrọ Akallo n'ime Lord's Resistance Army (LRA) n'October 9, 1996, mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ iri na ise
Ọktọba 9 bụ Ụbọchị Nnwere Onwe nke Uganda, nke na-abụkarị ụbọchị ememe; Otú ọ dị, n'ụbọchị a, otu ìgwè ndị agha nnupụisi LRA tọọrọ Akallo na ụmụ agbọghọ 138 ndị ọzọ n'ọnụ ụlọ obibi ha na St
Mary's College
N'abalị a tọọrọ Akallo, ndị agha LRA si na windo banye n'ime ụlọ ihi ụra ebe ụmụ agbọghọ na onye nlekọta ụlọ ihi ụra ha, Alupu Jemma Obace, gbalịrị ịgba ọsọ ma zoo
Ndị agha LRA kegidere ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ na eriri ma manye ha ịga ije otu abalị dum, na-eyi egwu igbu ha ma ọ bụrụ na ha erubeghị isi

N'ụtụtụ echi ya, ndị agha LRA tọhapụrụ 109 n'ime ụmụaka ahụ n'aka onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, Sister Rachelle, mgbe ọ rịọrọ LRA Commander Laguira arịrịọ, mana Akallo bụ otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ 30 a hapụrụ
A manyere Akallo na ndị ọzọ a tọọrọ ịga ije na Sudan nke were ha izu abụọ iji buo ibu dị arọ
Ndị agha LRA tọọrọ ụmụaka ndị ọzọ n'ụzọ, na-agafe obodo nta nke Gulu na Kitgum, ọkachasị, n'ụzọ ha na-aga Sudan
Mgbe otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ nwara ịgbapụ, a manyere Akallo na ndị ọzọ iti ya ihe ruo mgbe otu n' cikin ndị nnupụisi ji anyụike gbuo nwa agbọghọ ahụ
Na ihe ngosi Grace, Milly, Lucy
Ụmụaka Ndị Agha, Akallo na-akọwa otú Commander Laguira si gwa ha, 'Chefuo banyere Uganda
Ọ bụrụ na ị gbapụ, nke ahụ bụ ihe ga-eme gị
' A manyere ụmụaka ndị agha irubere ha isi ma ọ bụ a ga-eti ha ihe na / ma ọ bụ gbuo ha
Ndị agha LRA kpọọrọ Akallo na ụmụaka ndị ọzọ a tọọrọ gaa Sudan, ebe a zụrụ ha ka ha bụrụ ụmụaka ndị agha
A kụrụ ha ihe ma mekpọọ ha ọnụ ma manye ha igbu ụmụaka ndị ọzọ nọ n'ìgwè ahụ ndị nupụụrụ iwu isi
N'oge ọ nọ na LRA, a zụrụ Akallo ịga ije na ihicha, ikpochapụ, ma jikọta égbè AK-47, mana ọ ghaghị ịmụta otu esi eji égbè ahụ n'onwe ya
A manyere Akallo na ụmụaka ndị agha ibe ya ịlụ ọgụ megide ndị Sudan People's Liberation Army (SPLA), na-adabere n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na ikike ebumpụta ụwa ha maka ndụ
Ọ mụtara ịgba égbè n'oge mwakpo mbụ ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu ìgwè ụmụaka 700 ahọpụtara na mberede
A haziri ụmụaka ahụ n'ahịrị ma gwa ha ka ha wakpo obodo nta maka nri ma gbaa ndị obodo ahụ égbè
Ụmụaka ndị agha nwetakwara ime ihe ike n'ụzọ ọzọ
N'agbanyeghị na ha dị obere, ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ, gụnyere Akallo, ndị agha LRA wakporo ha, bụ ndị dinara ha n'ike ma tie ha ihe
E nyere nwa agbọghọ ọ bụla onye ndú nke LRA ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime 'ndị nwunye' ha
Akallo na-ekwu na 'ịghọ nwunye mmadụ n'ike, ọ na-emetụta mmụọ gị ruo mgbe ebighị ebi,' na Grace, Milly, Lucy
Ụmụaka Ndị Agha
Ọ bụ ezie na Akallo n'onwe ya atụghị ime, ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ mere ya, mgbe e mesịrị, ha na-alaghachi n'ụlọ na ụmụ ma nwee ọrịa ndị a na-ebute site na mmekọahụ dịka HIV / AIDS
A ka na-amanye ndị nne ụmụaka ịlụ ọgụ n'agha, ma mgbe ha dị ime ma mgbe ha na-ebu ụmụaka n'azụ ha
N'otu oge n'oge agha ahụ, ike ọgwụgwụ na mmiri ịta n'ahụ mere ka Akallo daa mbà
Ndị agha LRA chere na ọ nwụọla ma mee ka ụmụaka ndị agha ndị ọzọ gwupụta ili maka ozu ya
Ọ nwetakwara ịgba onwe ya égbè n'oge abụọ dị iche iche
Na Grace, Milly, Lucy
Ụmụaka Ndị Agha, Akallo na-ekwu, sị 'M gbanahụrụ ọnwụ ọtụtụ ugboro'
Otu ìgwè wakporo LRA n'ebe ndịda Sudan n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1997
Akallo weere nke a dị ka ohere ya iji mechaa gbapụ n'aka ndị agha
Ọ gbapụrụ ma zoo ụbọchị atọ n'ime ọhịa, chọta otu ìgwè ụmụaka ndị agha ndị ọzọ gbapụrụ agbapụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ ya na nzuzo
Ndị agha Uganda chọtara ha ma nyere ha aka ịlaghachi n'ụlọ ha
A chụpụrụ ụmụaka ndị agha ahụ gbapụrụ agbapụ na Uganda ebe nne na nna ha na otu n'ime ụmụnne nwanyị si St
Mary's College, Sister Akali, zutere ha
Ndị LRA jidere Akallo, na-emegbu ya ma manye ya ịlụ ọgụ na igbu ọchụ, ọnwa asaa tupu ọ gbapụ
Agụmakwụkwọ Akallo dị ya ezigbo mkpa mgbe niile
Ọ gara St
Mary's College, ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi Katọlik na Aboke, Uganda, maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ebe ahụ kwụsịrị, Otú ọ dị, mgbe ndị LRA tọọrọ ya ma manye ya ịlụ ọgụ dị ka nwatakịrị onye agha
Mgbe ọ gbapụrụ n'aka ndị agha ọnwa asaa ka e mesịrị, Akallo laghachiri na St
Mary's College iji mezue agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ kọleji ya na Mahadum Ndị Kraịst nke Uganda (UCU) na Mukono, Uganda
Na UCU, ọ zutere ụmụ akwụkwọ na-aga Gordon College na Wenham, Massachusetts bụ ndị nọ ebe ahụ na mmemme mgbanwe ụmụ akwụkwọ
O tinyere akwụkwọ ma nata agụmakwụkwọ iji mechaa akara ugo mmụta ya na Gordon College
N'ebe ahụ, Akallo gụrụ akwụkwọ na nkwukọrịta na ọchịchọ ịga n'ihu na-amụ mmekọrịta mba ụwa na ngwọta esemokwu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Gordon College na 2007 tupu ọ malite ụlọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Clark dị na Worcester, Massachusetts na 2008
Akallo nwetara nzere masta ya na International Development and Social Change na Mahadum Clark
Mgbe ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ site n'agha, Akallo laghachiri ụlọ akwụkwọ
Otú ọ dị, obodo ya eleghị anya n'ụzọ dị mma n'ebe ụmụaka ndị agha laghachiri
A chụpụrụ ha maka omume ha n'ime ndị agha; ụmụ agbọghọ na-enwekwa mkparị ọzọ n'ihi na e dinara ha n'ike
Ndị obodo na-atụkarị egwu na ndị bụbu ụmụaka ndị agha na ọtụtụ ndị nne na nna anabataghị ụmụ ha n'ezinụlọ ha, ọkachasị ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ji ụmụ ha lọta
Ụfọdụ kwenyere na ụmụaka ndị agha ahụ 'bụ ndị mmụọ ọjọọ'

Ọ bụ ezie na ezinụlọ Akallo nabatara ya, enweghị nkwado a mere ka ịlaghachi n'ụlọ maka ọtụtụ ụmụaka ndị agha sie ike; ọtụtụ ụmụaka echekwara ịlaghachi na ndị nnupụisi ma ọ bụ sonye na ndị agha iji zere nke a
Akallo ghọtara na ya nwere ike inye aka mee ka ụmụaka ndị ọzọ bụbu ndị agha dịghachi mma, dị ka ya onwe ya
O kpebiri ịmalite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado udo na maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka Afrịka
N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2013 ya na UNICEF, Akallo kwuru, sị 'Ọbụna ụmụaka ndị nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ 10 n'agbụ nwere ike ịka mma site na nkwado ziri ezi, agụmakwụkwọ, ọzụzụ, site na ịnabata ha na ọha mmadụ'
Mgbalị Akallo malitere mgbe ọ laghachiri na St
Mary's College iji gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ, Sister Rachelle, na Sister Rachelle Rehabilitation Centre iji nyere aka nye ndị agha ụmụaka ndị ọzọ gbapụrụ agbapụ ndụmọdụ
Ka e mesịrị, mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji na Mahadum Ndị Kraịst nke Uganda (UCU), Akallo malitere ikwu okwu banyere ahụmịhe ya dị ka nwatakịrị onye agha
Mgbe ọ nọ na UCU, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa New York City, New York iji kwuo okwu maka Amnesty International
Akallo n'oge na-adịghị anya ka ọ gafere na Gordon College ma kpọọ ya ka ọ bụrụ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere World Vision, yana ịkọ akụkọ ya na CNN na The Oprah Winfrey Show
Na mgbakwunye, a gwara Akallo ka ọ kwuo ọtụtụ okwu n'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ, na-eme ka a mara site n'ịkekọrịta akụkọ ya na akụkọ ụmụaka ndị ọzọ bụbu ndị agha
Ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a gụnyere Mahadum Rutgers na 2004 na Mahadum Brandeis na 2009

O kwukwara okwu na World Bank na Washington, DC na 2009 n'oge nnọkọ na-atụle mgbochi ime ihe ike; na okwu na Kọmitii Nchebe UN n'oge arụmụka ihu ọha nke 2009 gbasara ụmụaka na esemokwu agha na njikọ ya na Ọfịs onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu maka ụmụaka na esemọkụ agha
Akallo chọrọ ịkekọrịta akụkọ ya na mgbalị iji mee ka a mara mmetụta nke ime ihe ike na ụmụaka na-etinye aka n'agha na ihe a ga-eme iji kwụsị ime ihe ike ma mee ka ndị bụbu ụmụaka

N'ịkwado ya, Akallo na-elebara akụkọ ụmụ agbọghọ anya n'ụzọ pụrụ iche ebe ọ bụ na a naghị egosikarị akụkọ ha eme ihe ma ha na-ata ahụhụ karịa ụmụ nwoke site n'ịbụ ụmụaka ndị agha ka a na-emetụta ha n'ụzọ mmekọahụ na ndina n'ike
Na ihe ngosi Grace, Milly, Lucy

Ụmụaka Ndị Agha, Akallo na-ekwu na inye aka n'inye ndụmọdụ na imezigharị ndị bụbu ụmụaka ndị agha dị mkpa karịsịa n'ihi na 'ọ bụrụ na anyị ekwe ka ha bụrụ ọgbọ furu efu, ọ bụghị naanị ọgbọ a ka a ga-efu'
Akallo emeela ka ọrụ dị na Washington DC
iji nyere aka kwụsị ime ihe ike na Uganda site n'ịgba mbọ na US Congress ma nye akaebe
O nyere akaebe n'oge a na-ege ntị maka mmezigharị na 2008 Child Soldiers Accountability Act, nke nyeere aka inye aka n'ịgafe mmezigharị ndị ahụ
Iwu a machibidoro iji ụmụaka ndị agha ma na-enye ntaramahụhụ maka ndị na-eme ya
Akallo anọwokwa na-emekọrịta ihe na otu òtù na-enweghị uru na Uganda nke a na-akpọ Empowering Hands
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị otu n'ime ndị guzobere ya, ma ọ bụ na-arụ ọrụ maka nzukọ ahụ, ọ bụ otu ìgwè ndị bụbu ụmụaka ndị agha LRA guzobere Empowering Hands, ụfọdụ n'ime ha nọ n'otu ogige ahụ Akallo nọ
Ndị guzobere Milly Auma, Lucy Lanyero, Jennifer Achora, na Sara Ayero pụtara na Grace, Milly, Lucy
Ụmụaka Ndị Agha ya na Akallo, tinyere ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-etinye aka na mmemme ahụ
Ebumnuche ha bụ inye ndụmọdụ na ime ka ndị agha nwanyị bụbu ụmụaka dịghachi mma ma nyere ha aka ịbịakọta na obodo ha ma nwee ohere n'ọdịnihu ka mma
Karịsịa, na 2009, Akallo malitere otu òtù na-enweghị uru na America nke a na-akpọ United Africans for Women and Children's Rights (UAWCR) nke na-achọ ichebe ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka Africa
Na mgbakwunye, o guzobere Network of Young People Affected by War (NYPAW) site na UNICEF na 2008 yana ndị ọzọ ihe ike metụtara, gụnyere Ishmael Beah, Kon Kelei, Emmanuel Jal, Shena A
Gacu, na Zlata Filipović
Ebumnuche nke NYPAW bụ ịmepụta njikọ n'etiti mba dị iche iche ebe ihe ike metụtara ụmụaka dị ka ụmụaka ndị agha ma gbakọọ iji chọta enyemaka ndị ntorobịa ahụ chọrọ ma chọọ inyere ha aka nke ọma
Dinah Grace Akello bụ Iteso, a mụrụ ya na nso Soroti, na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Uganda Protectorate
Ọ gụrụ Social Administration na Social Work na Mahadum Makerere dị na Kampala
N'afọ 1979, ọ biri na Tanzania mgbe ọ gbapụrụ n'aka ọchịchị Idi Amin dị ka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ magazin na Kenya na Tanzania tupu ọ gaa England n'afọ 1980 iji bụrụ osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka Secretariat Commonwealth
Akello nọ n'ọkwa ahụ site na afo 1983 ruo na afo 1990
N'afọ 1990, Grace Akello laghachiri Uganda wee mepụta kọmitii iji nyere aka dozie nsogbu nke ịkwaga na igbu ndị Teso n'oge ọchịchị Amin
Ọrụ a dịgidere ruo na afo 1996
N'afọ 1996, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Uganda, na afo 1999 a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka Mmekọahụ, Ọrụ na Mmepe Ọha
Site na afo 1999 ruo afo 2006, ọ bụ onye otu Cabinet nke Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Microfinance Initiatives site na afo 1999 ruo na afo 2003, na Minista nke Northern Uganda site na afo 2003 ruo mgbe ọ tụfuru oche ya na afo 2006
Grace Akello gara n'ihu bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Uganda na Ịtali, nke dị na Rom ma bụrụ onye nnọchiteanya Uganda na New Delhi, India, na-enye nkwado ndị nnọchi anya gafee mpaghara India dum
N'afọ 1992, e tinyere uri ya 'Encounter' site na nchịkọta ya My Barren Song na Margaret Busby's Daughters of Africa, nhọrọ nke ọrụ sitere n'aka ndị edemede nwanyị n'Africa
Grace Akello lụrụ di ya, Hugh Mason, na afo 1983
Ha nwere ụmụ nwoke anọ ma nwee ụlọ ezinụlọ na Uganda dị nso na Kampala
Grace Alache Jerry bụ onye Naijiria nwere nkwarụ, onye na-akwado ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, onye na 'egwú na eze nwanyị mara mma nke e nyere Miss Wheelchair Nigeria
Ọ bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ihe karịrị mmadu nde ndị Naijiria 35 na-ebi na nkwarụ
Grace Jerry, onye isi nchịkwa nke Inclusive Friends Association emeela na kọntaktị n'ime na n'èzí Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye 2015 Mandela Washington Fellows bụ onye Onye isi ala Barack Obama sọpụrụ
Grace Alele-Williams (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 16 n’ime onwa Disemba nke afọ 1932 - Maachị 25, 2022) bu onye nkuzi nke aha ya dị n'akụkọ dika onye nwanyi Naijiria mbụ bụ onye isi mahadum nke Benin
Ọ bụkwa nwanyi mbu na Naijiria nwetara nzere dọktọreti
Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke mmụta mgbakọ na mwepụ
A mụrụ Grace Alele-Williams na Warri,dị na Delta steeti
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị,dị na Warri, na Queen's College,nke Legọs
Ọ gara Koleeji Mahadum nke Ibadan (nke bụ Mahadum nke Ibadan ugbu a)
O nwetara nzere masta na mgbakọ na mwepụ mgbe ọ na-akụzi na Queen's School, Ede na Osun Steeti n'afọ 1957, nakwa nzere dọktọreti na agụmagụ mgbakọ na mwepu na Mahadum nke Chicago ( US ) n'afọ 1963
Aha ya banyere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme dịka nwanyị mbụ bụ onye Naijiria nke nwetara nzere mmụta dọktọreti
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa nọọ ụfọdụ afọ maka ọrụ postudọktọra na Mahadum nke Ibadan tupu ọ banye na Mahadum nke Legọs n'afọ 1965
Ọrụ nkuzi ya bidoro na Queen's School, Ede dị na Osun Steeti, ebe ọ bụ onye nkuzi mgbakọ na mwepụ site n'afọ 1954 ruo afọ 1957
Ọ hapụrụ gaa Mahadum nke Vermont ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka gụsịrị akwụkwọ na onye osote prọfesọ

N'agbata afọ 1963 na '65, Alele-Williams bụ onye ọrụ nnyocha postudọktọra, ngalaba (na ụlọ akwụkwọ) nke mmụta, Mahadum nke Ibadan ebe o hapụrụ ga nweta ọkwa prọfesọ nke mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum nke Lagos n'afọ 1976
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi mahadum na Naịjirịa
O nweela ọrụ dị iche iche
Site na ije ozi na kọmitii na otu bọọdụ dị iche iche, Alele-Williams e nyela aka bara uru na mmepe agụmakwụkwọ na Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii nnyocha usoro mmụta,na steeti nke bụbu Bendel Steeti site n'afọ1973 ruo afọ 1979
Site n'afọ 1979 ruo afọ 1985, o jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Lagos State Curriculum Review Committee na Lagos State Examination Boards
Alele-Williams bụ onye otu kansụl na-achị achị,nke UNESCO Institute of Education
Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ nke United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) na Institute of International Education Planning
Ruo afọ iri (1963–73) ọ bụ onye otu African Mathematics Programme, nke dị na Newton,na Massachusetts,nke mba Amerịka
Ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke World Organization for Early Childhood Education,ma mechara bụrụ onye isi oche nke ngalaba nke Naijiria
N’afọ 1974, Alele-Williams weputara akwukwo a kpọrọ Modern Mathematics Handbook for Teachers
Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ dịka onye isi oche nke Mahadum nke Benin, ọ sonyeere ndị isi oche nke Chevron-Texaco nke Naijiria
Ọ nọkwa na otu bọọdụ nke HIP Asset Management Company Ltd, ndi ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa akụnụba dị na Legọs,nke Naijiria
Prọfesọ Grace Awani Alele-Williams bụ onye ike gbasara itinye aka n'ọchịchịrị oge maka agụmakwụkwọ ka elu na Naịjirịa
Mgbe ahụ, ọrụ nke òtù nzuzo, òtù nkwenye na ndị ọzọ agbasawo n'ime Mahadum Naijiria,ọ kachasị na Mahadum nke Benin
O mere ihe bara uru, tinyere ịka obi, amamịhe na atumatu nke belatara uto nke òtù nzuzo na mahadum ahụ
Ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ụmụ nwoke dara, ọ gbalịrị na-inye nnukwu ntuziaka
O nwere mmasi puru iche n’ebe umu nwanyi nọ
Mgbe ọ nọrọ afọ iri na-eduzi Institute of Education, ọ webatara mmemme ọhụụ na-enweghị nzere, na-enye ụmụ nwanyị meworo okenye ọrụ nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ị nata asambodo
Alele-Williams e gosipụtakarị nchegbu maka nnweta ụmụ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka ka ha nweta nkuzi sayensị na teknụzụ
Àtụ Tinyegharịa
Grace Amey-Obeng bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye guzobere ngwaahịa ịma mma Forever Clair
Grace Amey-Obeng bụ onye guzobere na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Forever Clear Group

N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2017, ọ guzoro ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi ma nwee ọkwa nke National Treasurer nke Association of Ghana Industries, otu Ghana na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke nwere njikọ azụmaahịa afọ ofufo nke ihe karịrị ndị otu 1200 sitere na obere, ọkara na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ
Dị ka onye ọchụnta ego, Amey-Obeng na-ekwusi ike na ọ dị mkpa maka 'ọrụ enyemaka ụlọ ọrụ

dị ka ụzọ dị irè, atụmatụ na nke na-adịgide adịgide nke inye enyemaka dị mkpa na mpaghara mkpa dị mkpa' Na 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche oche nke Universal Merchant Bank Foundation nke emepụtara dị ka ụzọ isi nyeghachi mba Ghana
Na May 2017, a kwanyere ya ugwu na mmemme nke abụọ nke Ghana Women of the Year Honors na udi nke 'Excellence in Business'

Amey-Obeng bụ onye isi oche nke Ghana Cosmetology and Wellness Federation, otu nke e hibere na mmekorita sitere na Ghana Ministry of Trade and Industry and Ministry of Tourism, Culture and Creative Arts, iji nyere ndị otu nọ na cosmetology na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike aka ' chebe ahụike nke ndị ahịa'
Grace Chinonyelum Anigbata (amụrụ na ọnwa 16 Septemba na afọ 1998) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu egwu na ama ama Naịjirịa bụ ọkachamara n'ịwụli elu atọ
Ọ gbara asọmpi n'egwuregwu Afrịka nke afọ 2019 n'ịwụli elu atọ wee nweta ihe nrite ọla edo
N'afọ 2016, Grace Anigbata ghọrọ onye mmeri n'ọsọ elu Naịjirịa mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, jiri mwụli elu 170m
N'afọ 2018, o meriri ihe omume ịma-elu nke okpukpu atọ nke asọmpi Africa na Asaba
Grace Ebere Anozie (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 16 n'ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 1977) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa nke na-eme egwuregwu i bu igwe dị arọ nke ndị akụkụ ahụ ha ezughi oke
Ihe nrite mbụ Anonzie nwetara n'asọmpi ndị akụkụ ahụ ha ezughi oke bụ ọla nchara na 2004 Summer Paralympics n'ihe omume 825 kg
N'asọmpi ndị sochirinụ, Anozie nwetara nrite ọla ọcha n'afọ 2008 na ọlaedo n'afọ 2012
N'oge ọrụ ya, Anonzie setịpụrụ ọtụtụ ihe ndekọ na-emetụta nke gụnyere ihe ndekọ asọmpi ndị akụkụ ahụ ha ezughi n'ihe omume karịrị 86 kg nke 2008 Summer Paralympics
Anozie nwere mkpọnwụ ahụ n’ihi polio mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum n'afọ 1998 ma gbanwee ọrụ ya gaa egwuregwu mgbe ọ na-enweghị ike ịchọta ọrụ
Anozie bidoro bulitewa igwe n'afọ 1998 were banye ọtụtụ asọmpi Paralimpik
N'ibu igwe dị arọ, ọ gbatara onye nke anọ n'ihe omume 825 kg na 2000 Summer Paralympics
N'igbanwe banye n'ihe omume karịrị 825 kg, Anozie nwetara ọla nchara na 2004 Summer Paralympics
O mechara rite ọla ọcha na 2008 Summer Paralympics na ọla edo na 2012 Summer Paralympics
Na mpụga nke Paralimpik, Anozie nwetara ọla edo na 2013 Powerlifting Asia Open Championship
N'oge ọrụ ya, Anozie ejiriwo ndekọ ụwa n'ibu igwe dị arọ
Na Beijing Paralympics n'afọ 2008, o mebiri ndekọ Paralimpik n'ihe omume karịrị 86 kg
Emechaa, Anozie setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ụwa na katigori karịrị 825 n'oge Fazza International Powerlifting Championships nke afọ 2012
Ka otu afọ gachara, o jidere ihe ndekọ ụwa n'ihe omume karịrị 86 kg na 2013 Asia Open Championship, nke Precious Orji mechara mebie
A hoputara Anozie maka ndi n’egwuregwu nke Paralympic International Committee nke ọnwa n’ọnwa Maachị n’afọ 2012
Anozie biri na Benin,dị n'Edo Steeti, na Naijiria tupu ọ kwaga Amerịka n'afọ 2014
O bu ụzọ gaa Chicago maka ọzụzụ njegharị maka 2014 Commonwealth Games, mana o biriziri na Shreveport,nke Louisiana mgbe ya na onye na-azụ ya nwere esemokwu
Grace Apiafi (onye amụrụ na 27 Nọvemba afọ 1958) bụ onye na - emebu egwuregwu si na Naịjirịa, onye soo na asọmpi shot put and discus
Ọ nọchitere anya ala nna ya ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka n'afọ 1988 Summer Olimpik na Seoul, South Korea, ebe o ruteghị ngwụcha na asọmpi ọ bụla
Grace Armah (amụrụ na 22 Septemba na afo 1958) bụ nwanyị Ghana lara ezumike nká na-eme egwuregwu track and field nke bụ ọkachamara na 100 mita na ihe omume ogologo
O ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ọla nchara na afọ 1984 na 1985 nke African Championships
Ihe kacha mma ya na 100 mita bụ 1198

O mekwara asọmpi maka Ghana na 1984 Summer Olympics na Los Angeles dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana 4 × 100 mita, nke mechara nke ise na okpomọkụ nke ọkara ikpeazụ ma ghara ịga n'ihu na agba ikpeazụ
Grace Asare (amụrụ n'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na afo 2014 African Women's Championship
Na klọb, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Reformers Ladies na Ghana
Grace Bakari (amụrụ na 27 Eprel na afọ 1954) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ
O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 400 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na afo 1984 Summer Olympics
Mmatlala Grace Boroto bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress
Grace Chanda (amụrụ na 11 na ọnwa isii, na afo 1997) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti ZESCO United FC na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Zambia
Chanda nọchitere anya Zambia na 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations
Ntinye na nsonaazụ depụtara ihe mgbaru ọsọ Zambia nke mbụ
Grace Kubi Daniel (onye amuru na abali iri abuo na anọ n’onwa abụọ n'afo 1984) bu onye n’egwu Naijiria badminton
O meriri Michelle Claire Edwards nke South Africa maka ihe nrite ọla edo n’egwuregwu ụmụnwaanyị, ma soro Susan Ideh jikọọ ọlaọcha na asọmpi abụọ na 2007 All-Afrika Games na Algiers, Algeria
Daniel ruru eru maka ụmụ nwanyị otu n'afọ 2008 Summer Olimpik na Beijing, mgbe a họpụtara ya iri asatọ na itoolu na ụwa, ma nye Badminton World Federation ohere inye mpaghara Afrika maka kọntinent
O merighi egwuregwu asọmpi mbụ nke mbụ nke Czech Republic Kristina Ludíková, ya naa kara 13-18 na 8-21

Grace Ebor (amụrụ 8 Ọgọst 1977) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Naịjirịa lara ezumike nka bụ onye ọkachamara na mmemme ntoanya etiti
O nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na 800 mita na 2003 All-Africa Games
O nwere ihe kacha mma nkeonwe 2 0204 na 800 mita (2003) na 4 2817 na 1500 mita (2005)
Grace Ebun Delano (amụrụ na 13 Nọvemba 1935, na Kaduna) bụ onye nọọsụ na onye na-amụ nwa nke keere òkè dị mkpa na atụmatụ ezinụlọ na ọrụ ahụike ọmụmụ na Naịjirịa

O guzobere Association for Reproductive and Family Health nke ọ bụ onye ndụzị ya ruo ọtụtụ afọ, rụọla ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka ọtụtụ òtù dị iche ichégafee Africa, ma dee ma soro dee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na isiokwu gbasara ahụike ụmụ nwanyị na isiokwụ ndị metụtara ya
N'afọ 1993, e nyere ya onyinye Sasakawa nke World Health Organization maka ọrụ ya na mmepe ahụike
A mụrụ Grace Ebun-Oluwa Samuel na Kaduna na 13 Nọvemba 1935 na nne na nna Yoruba
Aha ya Ebun-Oluwa pụtara 'onyinye sitere n'aka Chineke' na Yoruba a mụrụ ya na mberede nye nne dị afọ iri anọ na anọ na otu nwa ọzọ, nwa nwoke dị afọ iri
Ọ tolitere na-ama na nne ya nwere ọtụtụ ihe isi ike na ime ime ime na ọnwụ ụmụaka
Nne ya, onye na-agụ akwụkwọ nke nta n'onwe ya, kwadoro ịnụ ọkụ n'obi nwa ya nwanyị maka agụmakwụkwọ ma hapụ ya ka ọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ na Lagos mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Otú ọ dị, tupu Grace akwagala Lagos, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarì mbụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ngwakọta a na-akpọ United Native African School, na Kaduna, na steeti Northern nke Nigeria site na 1940 ruo 1944

N'afọ 1945, ọ kwagara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwoke niile a na-akpọ Gọvement School na Kaduna nke onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ siri ike a na-ahụ maka ya bụ Maazị Salako bụ onye a manyere ịnabata ụmụ agbọghọ abụọ mbụ n'ụlọ Akwụkwọ ahụ
Delano nwetara agụmakwụkwọ nke nyere ya ohere ịkwaga ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ dị elu, na-agwụ na Abeokuta Grammar School
Site n'enyemaka nke nne ya na nwanne ya nwoke Delano gara England na 1956 maka afọ atọ nke ọzụzụ nọọsụ
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụrụ ọrụ ịmụ nwa wee zụọ dị ka onye nọọsụ distrikti
Nke a bụ mgbe ọ zutere ụmụ nwanyị chọrọ enyemaka iji wepụ afọ ime ha, o jikwa ohere ahụ gaa nkuzi na atụmatụ ezinụlọ na iji diaphragm
Delano laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 1961 ma n'afọ sochirinụ nweta ọrụ na ngalaba ịmụ nwa na University College Hospital, Ibadan
Ka ọ na-erule mgbe ahụ, ọ lụrụ onye ọka ikpe n'ọdịnihu bụ Tunde Delano

Ọrụ ya dị ka onye nọọsụ na-ahụ maka ịmụ nwa mere ka ọ sonye na ọrụ nke prọfesọ nke Mahadum Ibadan malitere, ọ ghọkwara onye nọọlụ na-ahụkwa maka mmemme nhazi ezinụlọ nke mahadum mbụ na-akụzi ụlọ ọgwụ na Naịjịrịa
[citation needed] Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, mmemme ahụ gbasara site na obodo ukwu gaa n'ime ime obodo, yana site na ndokwa ụlọ ọgwụ gaa na atụmatụ obodo, gụnyere ikesa site na ahịa ọdịnala
Ọrụ a bịara na-agụnye nleta mba ofesi na njem mbụ na US maka ọzụzụ, ma mesịa Delano gara dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na ọtụtụ mba Afrịka ndị ọzọ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa dị ka USAID, Pathfinder International na Ford Foundation kwadoro ma ọ bụ kwadoro
Mgbe o dere akwụkwọ ozi doro anya banyere atụmatụ ezinụlọ, United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) kwụrụ ụgwọ ka e bipụta ya ma kesaa ya n'asụsụ ise
Ọ gara n'ihu dee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ ma dee ma ọ bụ soro dee ọtụtụ isiokwu metụtara ahụike agụmakwụkwọ
UNFPA kwadokwara akwụkwọ ntuziaka ahụike ya na IUCD
N'afọ ndị 1980 ọ jikọtara ya na Center for Development and Population Activities (CEDPA) nke na-ahazi ọzụzụ mmepe ndu maka ụmụ nwanyị, ọkachasị ịkwado ahụike na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụzi akụkụ nke Plan USA
Delano malitere inwe obì ike banyere ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha, wee gaa nzukọ, izute ndị isi nwanyị ndị ọzọ, na ịhazi atụmatụ iji nyere ụmụ nwanyị aka, ọkachasị na nsogbu ọmụmụ
Mgbe ọ ka na-arụ ọrụ na Mahadum Ibadan (ọ hapụrụ na 1992) Delano malitere iso ndị otu obodo na-arụkọ ọrụ iji mepụta otu NGO ọhụrụ nke ghọrọ Association for Reproductive and Family Health (ARFH)
Ọ gbasaa, gbakwunye ahụike mmekọahụ nke ndị na-eto eto na mpaghara ndị ọzọ na nchegbu ya ma soro gọọmentị rụọ ọrụ na ọrụ HIV / AIDS
A na-eji ihe mmụta na ndụmọdụ ARFH eme ihe n'ọtụtụ mba Afrịka
Onye ọrụ ibe ya dị mkpa n'ọrụ a bụ Prọfesọ OA
Ladipo, onye isi oche nke ARFH
Delano bụ osote onye isi oche na onye nduzi ihe karịrị afọ 25
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015, n'ihe dị ka afọ iri asatọ ọ gbara, e nwere ihe omume na-eme ka ọ laa ezumike nká na okwu ihu ọma iji sọpụrụ ya
Grace dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ e bipụtara
O bipụtara ọrụ nyocha 9 nwere 130 citations na 1126 na-agụ nke enwere ike ịnweta n'ịntanetị

A na-akọwa ya mgbe niile na ahịrịokwu ndị dị ka onye isi ahụike ọmụmụ na Naịjirịa, na 'onye nọọsụ / onye na-elekọta ya nke nwere ọrụ pụrụ iche na nlekọta ahụike ọmụmụ nke na atụmatụ ezinụlọ nke karịrị afọ 50
Amuru Grace Folashade Bent na afo 1960 ka onwa October di na mkpuru ubochi iri abuo na ise
Obu onye Nigerian
O so na ndi o mebe iwu ahuputara di ka sinito na afo 2007 na onwa April site na otu People's Democratic Party nkem ndi Adamawa South constituency na Adamawa State
Amuru Grace Folashade Bent na afo 1960
Na mahadum Calabar ebe obu onye isi na ahu maka odi ma umuakwukwo
O nwetara nzere BA na ihe gbasara omumu na odide asusu beeke na afo 1998, nakwa nzere nke Masters na ihe gbasara Ndoro doro sayensi na mekorita obodo na afo 2003
O nwekwara nzere Phd na ihe gbasara nchiko ora nke ana akpo Public Administration na mahadum di na obodo Indiana nke di na mba America
Tupu oba na ulo ndi obebu iwu, Grace Folashade Bent bu onye ne nye onye isi ndi PDP bu Audu Ogbeh, ndumodu gbasara ndoro doro
Obukwa onye ne sota onye isi na fu maka ihe ne me na NTA nke ndi Kaduna
Obukwa onye isi na Jack Ventures Nigeria
O bitere akwukwo isi okpo ya bu Women in Inter Ethnic Marriages in Nigeria
Site na ufodi akuko, ekuru na otutu asambodo Grace Folashade Bent abughi nke ezigbo
Ka emechara olu nroputa na 2007 Grace Folashade Bent mecha buru onye isi ndi senate komiti gbasara gburugburu anyi

Mgbe ono na okwa a, ewetere akiko na aka ya di na ihe gbasara e mefu mmanu gas na eji ghi ikike sita naka onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua na kwa ndi Senate Na onwa March 2009, Sinito Bent ekweghi ka emepe komision nke na ahu maka Desert Control nihi na na komision a ga na ru ofu udi olu dika ndi komiti Ecology
Mazi Mahmud Kanti Bello bu onye bu senate whip, duru ya odu ka oghara i tona njo ha nilo ka ghara iwe esemoku na komision ha

onwa April nafo 2009, ka o gachara obodo South Africa, Senator Bent kwadoro ihe gbasara ndumodu iji kuzirie ndi mmadu maka ime njem gaa obodo South Africa ka ha kwachara anya maka ekworo, esemokwu na ogu
