Grace Hartman (née Fulcher; July 14, 1918 - December 18, 1993) bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ na Canada, onye nhọpụta ya na 1975 ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Canadian Union of Public Employees mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na North America iduzi nnukwu òtù ndị ọrụ
Tupu 1963, Hartman bụ onye otu CUPE, National Union of Public Employees
Dị ka odeakwụkwọ maka Township nke North York, Ontario, ọ bụ onye otu NUPE Local 373
Hartman nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa ndị isi obodo ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi oche nke mpaghara ahụ na 1959, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo 1967
Hartman bụ onye a ma ama na-ekere òkè n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị, na onye na-akwado ike maka ịkwụ ụgwọ nwoke na nwanyị
N'afọ 1965, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ụmụ nwanyị nke Ontario Federation of Labour

Ọ sonyeere kọmitii na-eduzi Kọmitii maka Ịha nhata nke ụmụ nwanyị na Canada na 1966, nke nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgba gọọmentị Canada ume ka ha guzobe Royal Commission on the Status of Women in Canada
N'afọ 1968, a họpụtara Hartman na Kansụl ndụmọdụ nke Royal Commission on the Status of Women
N'afọ 1974-75, ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala nke abụọ nke National Action Committee on the Status of Women
E nyere Hartman onyinye Gọvanọ General na Ncheta nke Ikpe Ndị Mmadụ na 1985
E nyekwara Hartman nzere Doctor of Laws na Mahadum York na Mahaduma Queen
Grace Kesande Bataringaya (amụrụ na 4 Septemba, na afọ 1970) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya na nzuko omeiwu maka mpaghara Rubirizi
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na afọ 1983 na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịm Kyanamira, N'afọ 1987 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị dị ala na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndndrị ụmụ nwanyị Hornyby na Kabale
Ọ gụsịrị ọkwa sekọndrị ya dị elu nke a maara dị ka Uganda Advanced Certification of Education (UACE) na 1990 na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndndrị ụmụ nwanyị Seseme na Kisoro
N'afọ 1993, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere na nzere bachelọ nke Arts na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
na Kampala
Ọ bụ onye nduzi na-ahụ maka Livelihood Community Volunteer Initiative for Development (COVOID), otu NGO na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara Rubirizi
Grace Salome Kwami (1923), bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi
A mụrụ Kwami na 1923 na Worawora, obodo dị na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana (Gold Coast n'oge ahụ)
Ọ debara aha ya na Basel Mission's Women Teachers' Training College na Agogo
Ọ gara n'ihu na Kumasi College of Arts (nke bụzi Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology) n'afọ 1951, ebe ọ gụrụ nka
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah, National Museum were ya n'ọrụ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe site na 1954 ruo 1957
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Mawuli School na Tamale Teachers' Training College site n'afọ 1957 ruo afọ 1978
Nkà Kwami bụ n'ihe ọkpụkpụ, eserese na ọla
A na-edozi ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ma gosipụta ya na National Museum of Ghana, Volta Regional Museum, na Ghana Museums and Monument Board
Kwami lụrụ Robert Kwami na 1954
Ọ bụ nne onye na-ese ihe Atta Kwami
Ọ nwụrụ na 2006
Grace Freedom Kwiyucwiny, nke a na-akpọkwa Grace Kwiyucwaniny, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda nke na-eje ozi dị ka Minista Steeti maka Northern Uganda na Cabinet Ugandan
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka nwanyị onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Zombo District
A mụrụ ya na Zombo District, West Nile sub-region, na Northern Region nke Uganda
Ọ gara Lower Zombo Primary School na Warr Girls School maka Uganda Certificate of Education(UCE), tupu ọ gaa Tororo Girls School maka ya Uganda Advanced Certificate of education(UACE)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na Social Science, Postgraduate Diploma na Management na Master of Business Administration
Ọ bụ onye isi obodo na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mpaghara ya, ọkachasị n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke obodo ụmụ nwanyị Nebbi
Ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche ụmụ nwanyị Nebbi na ndị omeiwu tupu ya adaa
Ọ gbara ọsọ ọzọ na Zombo District, mgbe mpaghara abụọ ahụ kewara ma merie na 2011
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii
Ọ meriri na ntuli aka 2020 maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda maka Zombo District
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ so na ndị omeiwu nke Zombo District họpụtara, ebe ọ bụ na e wepụrụ ya na Nebbi District na 2009
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Juun afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na isii a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Northern Uganda
Otu n'ime ọrụ e nyere ya dị ka Minista Steeti maka Northern Uganda, bụ nhọpụta ya na kọmitii iji nyochaa ihe a na-ekwu na ọ bụ ihe nkwata nke Zoka Forest na Adjumani District
Ọ bụ Praịm Minista Ruhakana Rugunda họpụtara ndị otu mmadụ anọ ahụ, Mary Karooro Okurut, Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ndị isi n'ọfịs Praịm Mịnịsta, bụ onye isi oche ya
Ndị ọzọ so na ya bụ Betty Amongi, Minista na-ahụ maka ala, ụlọ na mmepe obodo na Sam Cheptoris, Minista maka Mmiri na Gburugburu Ebe Obibi
Grace Lolim bụ onye Kenya na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ na udo, onye isi oche nke Isiolo Peace Committee, na onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Isiolo Gender Watch
Lolim si Isiolo, a zụlitere ya na obodo Turkana
Lolim bidoro ịkwado udo n'afọ 2000 ógè ndị Somalia na Boranas na-alụ ọgụ na Nakuru
Ọ bụ ezie na ya na di ya na ụmụ ya agbapụla esemokwu ahụ, ọ laghachiri ebe ahụ iji nyere ndị mụrụ ya na ụmụnne ya ọ hapụrụ aka
Ọ chọpụtara na ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị obodo ndị ọzọ zoro n'akụkụ osimiri, ndị agụ iyi wakporo
N'agbanyeghị nkwenye di ya, Lolim jụrụ ịhapụ ndị ikwu ya n'ahụhụ
Ọ bidoro njem mkparịta ụka iji kwụsị esemokwu ahụ site na isonyere kọmitii udo obodo
Ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ họpụtara ya ka ọ kwuo okwu n'oge nzukọ ibelata esemokwu na ọkwa mpaghara, ọkwá nke mere ka ya na ndị otu kọmitii si n'ebo ndị ọzọ na-emekọrịta ihe
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị a họpụtara ikwu okwu n'ihe gbasara obodo ahụ
N'afọ 2002, United Nations Development Programme họpụtara Lolim ka ya na ụmụ nwanyị Rwanda sonye na mmemme mgbanwe iji mụta màkà mmetụta nke agha
Dị ka otu akụkọ si kwuo, ọ kwusara udo site n'iji ozizi ọ hụrụ na Bible na Koran, nke nyere aka n'ịgakwute ndị na-ege ya ntị dị iche iche ma bụrụ nnukwu ihe dị ịrịba ama banyere kọmitii udo
N'afọ 2013, Lolim hiwere Isiolo Gender Watch, otu nzukọ na-akwado ikike mmadụ na ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị, ebe (ka ọ dị n'afọ 2022) ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa
Lolim bụ onye isi oche nke Isiolo Kọmitii udo
N'oge ọrịa COVID-19, Lolim na-eduzi mgbalị iji kesaa ozi ahụike na obodo ya
N'afọ 2020, ọ kwadoro ka e tinyekwuo ụmụ nwanyị na mbọ udo
N'afọ 2022, o kwuru maka njupụta nke ime ihe ike banyere mmekọahụ na nwoke na nwanyị, na mkpa ọ dị ikpe ziri ezi na nzaghachi maka ogbugbu nke onye na-akwado udo Elizabeth Ibrahim
Grace Beatrice Minor (amụrụ na Mee 31, na afọ 1942) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Americo-Liberian bụ onye ya na onye isi ala Charles Taylor jikọrọ aka
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Senator maka Montserrado County ma bụrụ onye isi oche Pro Tempore nke Senate site na afo 2002 ruo afọ 2003
N'afọ 1976, Minor bụ onye isi nke Congotown kacha ochie
N'afọ 1980, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Congotown na ntuli aka na-abịanụ tupu nnupụisi ahụ
Minor bụ onye enyemaka kachasị elu na onye na-akọrọ Taylor obi mgbe ọ bụ onye isi nke General Services Agency, nke Samuel Doe boro ya ebubo na ọ na-emefu ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nde dollar US
Mgbe ọ gbapụrụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na United States na afọ 1985, ọ laghachiri Liberia iji kwado ya n'ịtọ ntọala National Patriotic Front of Liberia na n'inye ego maka agha obodo
Ọ meghere akaụntụ ụlọ akụ Switzerland maka ya na afọ 1993
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye nke abụọ na usoro Taylor, dịka onye mmekọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na azụmaahịa ya, a na-ewere ọ dị ka 'ike n'azụ ocheeze'
Minor bụ onye na-akwado 'iwepụ' ndị isi Liberian na NPFL, omume nke jupụtara na afọ 1992 Economic Community of West African States boro NPFL ebubo mpụ agha
Mgbe e guzobesịrị National Patriotic Party na ihe ịga nke ọma Taylor na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 1997, a họpụtara Minor na Senate, naanị nwanyị nọ na gọọmentị
Mgbe ọnwụ nke onye nọ n'ọkwa Keikura B
Kpoto gasịrị, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Senate n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2002, nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa ahụ
Ọ zụrụ ụlọ na ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ na Osu, Accra nke nwanne ya nwanyị na-elekọta
A họpụtara ọgọ ya nwoke, Monie Captan, ka ọ bụrụ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ
N'afọ 2001, e debere ya na ndepụta nke ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị 120 nke United Nations Security Council nke a machibidoro ịga njem na mpụga Liberia
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2004, Kansụl Nchebe Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu gbakwunyere aha Minor na 'Achịkọta Nchebe' ya n'okpuru Mkpebi 1521 n'ihi mmekọrịta ya na Taylor
Minor na-ahụ maka itinye ego Taylor ma ọ dịkarịa ala ruo n'afọ 2005, mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe a chụgara ya, na-enyere ya aka 'ịkpọbata ndị ozi, hazie njem ha, ma na-ahụkwa ego na-abịa ma na-apụ na Calabar'
Otú ọ dị, Leymah Gbowee na-ekwu na Minor 'n'ụzọ dị jụụ' nyere ego dị ukwuu site na akụ na ụba nke onwe ya iji kwado Women of Liberia Mass Action for Peace
E wepụrụ aha Minor na ndepụta UN abụọ ahụ na Nọvemba 28,na afọ a 2007
N'afọ 2009, Truth and Reconciliation Commission tụrụ aro ka a machibido Minor, tinyere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ, ikike ịnwe ọfịs ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mba ọhụrụ ahụ ruo afọ iri atọ
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kagburu mmachibido iwu ahụ na afọ 2011
N'afọ 2014, Ụlọikpe Iwu Obodo nke Liberia kwupụtara na Minor 'achọ' ya maka mbibi nke ihe onwunwe nke mere ka ezinụlọ 250 chụpụ na Congo Town
E kwuru na ọ resịrị ụlọ ọrụ National Oil Company ala ahụ, nke ọ gọnahụrụ
Grace Moloney (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1993) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-eche goolu maka otu mba Republic of Ireland na otu FA WSL Reading

N'afọ 2010 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Republic of Ireland n'okpuru afọ iri na ụma, mgbe e mesịrị, ọ na-agba egwuregwu nke ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa na ndị na-erubeghi afọ iri na itoolu
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, ọ sonyeere Aston Villa na nsonye mgbazinye
A mụrụ Moloney n'abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Machị afọ 1993 na Slough, Berkshire na Bill Moloney
Nna nna ya si County Tipperary na nne nne ya si County Cavan

Ọ bụ onye na-akwado Queens Park Rangers (ndị otu ezinụlọ ya), otu ọ kwagara na Reading n'oge ọrụ ntorobịa ya, mgbe e mesịrị laghachi azụ n'ihi ihe ndị dịnụ iji nye ya ohere ịchụso egwuregwu ya na mba ụwa
Nna ya Bill, onye kwupụtara onwe ya dị ka onye na-akwado ya, na-aga maka egwuregwu mba ụwa ya niile
Moloney gbara bọọlụ maka Reading na nke abụọ FA WSL abụọ n'oge FA WSL nke afọ 2015
O nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri league ma bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ọkachamara na ndị otu ahụ tupu oge 2016 na FAWSL 1
Mgbe Reading bịanyere aka na Mary Earps, a machibidoro Moloney n'ụzọ dị ukwuu igwu egwu na FA Women's League Cup
Ọ bụ ezie na ya na Earps nwere mmekọrịta dị mma, Moloney enweghị obi ụtọ na a hapụrụ ya wee sonye na Aston Villa na mgbazinye na ọnwa June afọ 2016
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019 Moloney bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na Reading
O guzobeghachiri onwe ya dị ka onye na-edebe goolu mbụ ma nyere klọb ahụ aka iru ọkara ikpeazụ nke ịkọ ụmụ nwanyị FA , nke ha meriri West Ham United na mgbapụ penari ti
Reading kwetara na mpụtara nke otu narị na iri ise nke Moloney maka klọb ahụ site na ngosi tupu West Ham emerie ya n'ọnwa Novemba afọ 2019 na FA Women's League Cup na Nọvemba 2019
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọrụ afọ abụọ ọzọ na Reading na Febụwarị 2021
N'abalị isii nke ọnwa Machị afọ 2022, Moloney mere mpụtara nke narị abụọ ya nke Reading
N'afọ 2010, Moloney bụ onye isi otu Republic of Ireland U-17 squad bụ ndị na-esote na 2010 UEFA Women's Under-17 Championship na ndị rụrụ agbata nke ikpeazụ na 2010 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
Na FAI International Football Awards a kpọrọ ya onye egwuregwu n'erubeghi afọ iri na itoolu nke afọ 2011 nke ụmụ nwanyị mba ụwa

A gụnyere Moloney na ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Republic of Ireland na nke mbụ ya n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010, maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Netherlands, nke 2011 FIFA World Cup nke ndi họpụtara tozuru jmegide Russia na Israel sochiri
Ọ laghachiri na ndị otu okenye dị ka onye na-edebe goolu nke atọ nke iko Cyprus afọ 2014 , mana ọ pụrụ n'ikpeazụ mgbe ọ merụrụ ahụ na azụ ya mgbe ọ na-akuzi gbasara egwuregwu na Reading

Na abali ise nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2014, onye njikwa otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Republic of Ireland Susan Ronan kpọrọ Moloney na ndị otu nnwale maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Basque Country
Moloney nọchiri Eve Badana na ọkara oge iji kpọọ ọkara nke abụọ nke mmeri Ireland na Azpeitia, nke a na-akpọghị dị ka egwuregwu zuru oke nke mba ụwa
Moloney meriri onye isi mbụ ya na iko Cyprus nke afọ 2016 , na-agba egwuregwu na Ozuzu oge na mmeri mbụ nke Ireland na Austria

N'agbanyeghị nsonaazụ ahụ, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Football Association of Ireland toro 'arụ ọrụ doro anya' nke Moloney, ebe ọ gosipụtara mpako na obi ụtọ n'inweta ọchịchọ ogologo oge nke igba egwuregwu nye Ireland na ọkwa dị elu
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2016, Ronan kpọrọ Moloney ka ọ gaa n'otu ndị na-eto eto na ndị isi ụlọ maka ogige ọzụzụ na Wales
Ọ gbara bọọlụ nke mbụ n'ime egwuregwu abụọ ya na ndị Welsh na-elekọta ya, na nke n'enweghị goolu asatara na Rodney Parade na Newport
Colin Bell nọchiri Sue Ronan dị ka onye nkuzi Ireland na ọnwa Febụwarị 2017 ma n'oge na-adịghị anya, o tinyere Marie Hourihan dị ka onye nọchiri Emma Byrne, na-ekwere na Moloney dị obere
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, Moloney gbara bọọlụ na mmeri enyi na enyi nke Poland meriri Ireland na Ostróda, na-abịa maka Hourihan na ọkara oge
E nyere Moloney asọmpi mbụ ya na asọmpi dị mkpa nke UEFA Women's Euro 2022 qualifier megide Germany na Tallaght Stadium na abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2020
O nwetara obi ike nke onye nkuzi Vera Pauw n'ihi ọdịdị ya ka mma na klọb na Reading
N'agbanyeghị mmeri ọkpụ goolu atọ asatara otu Ireland meriri , Pauw toro arụmọrụ Moloney dị ka 'ihe magburu onwe ya'
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na RTÉ Sport n'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Moloney kwupụtara mmasị ya na Emma Byrne
Grace Ntombizodwa Mugabe (née Marufu; amụrụ na 23 Julaị 1965) bụ onye na ọchụnta ego Zimbabwe, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke onye isi ala Robert Mugabe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka First Lady nke Zimbabwe site na afó 1996 ruo mgbe di ya gbara arụkwaghịm na onwa Nọvemba 2017, otu izu mgbe a chụpụrụ ya n'ọchịchị
Malite dị ka odeakwụkwọ Mugabe, ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ZANUPF na-achị iji bụrụ onye isi nke Njikọ Ụmụ nwanyị ya na onye dị mkpa na otu Generation 40
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ nwetara aha ọma maka ihe ùgwù na mmefu ego n'oge ọgba aghara akụ na ụba na mba ahụ
E nyere ya aha njirimara Gucci Grace n'ihi oke ya
A chụpụrụ ya na ndị otu G40 ndị ọzọ n'òtù ahụ, n'oge nnupụisi ọchịchị nke Zimbabwe na 2017
Magazin New African kwuru na Mugabe bụ otu n'ime ndị Afrịka 100 kachasị nwee mmetụta n'afọ 2014
A mụrụ Grace Ntombizodwa na Benoni, South Africa n'aka ndị nne na nna kwagara mba ọzọ dị ka nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ ise n'ezinụlọ ahụ
N'afọ 1970, ọ kwagara Rhodesia, ka ya na nne ya, Idah Marufu, biri na Chivhu ebe nna ya nọrọ ma rụọ ọrụ na South Africa iji kwado ezinụlọ ya
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Chivhu wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Kriste Mambo na Manicaland
Ọ lụrụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu Stanley Goreraza ma ha nwere nwa nwoke, Russell Goreraza, amụrụ na afó 1984 mgbe Grace dị afọ 19 (Iri abuo na itoolu)
Ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke onye isi ala, Robert Mugabe, ọ ghọrọ onye isi ya n'oge ọ ka lụrụ Stanley Goreraza ma nwee ụmụ abụọ, Bona amụrụ n'afó 1988, aha nne Mugabe, na Robert Peter Jr
Mgbe nwunye mbụ Mugabe, Sally Hayfron, nwụsịrị, di na nwunye ahụ lụrụ n'ememe Katọlik (Robert Mugabe bụ onye Katọlik na-anụ ọkụ n'obi) nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Zimbabwe kpọrọ 'Mmekọrịta nke narị afọ'
N'oge ha lụrụ, Grace Marufu dị afọ 31 na Robert Mugabe dị afọ 72
N'afọ 1997, ọ mụrụ nwa nke atọ nke di na nwunye ahụ, Chatunga Berlamine Mugabe
Grace Mugabe debanyere aha dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na School of Liberal Arts, Mahadum Renmin na China na 2007, na-amụ asụsụ Chinese
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afó 2011
Otú ọ dị, o kwetara na ya amaghị nke ọma na Chinese mgbe ọ gụsịrị nzere
Nne ya Idah Marufu nwụrụ na 31 Ọgọst 2018, mgbe ọ gbara afọ 84
Na ngwụcha na afọ 2014, Grace Mugabe katọrọ osote onye isi ala Joice Mujuru, onye e kwuru na ọ gbara izu megide di ya, onye isi ala Mugabe
N'ikpeazụ, ebubo ndị a na-ebo Mujuru mere ka e wepụ ya dị ka onye na-azọ ihe ga-anọchi Mugabe ma mee ka ọ bụrụ onye a chụpụrụ n'ime ZANU-PF n'oge ọ nwere nnọkọ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na Disemba 2014
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Grace Mugabe mụbara
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi nke ZANUPF Women's League, ndị nnọchiteanya na nnọkọ nnọkọ ahụ kwadoro nhọpụta ya site na mmeri na 6 Disemba 2014
Mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke otu ụmụ nwanyị, ọ ghọkwara onye otu ZANU-PF Politburo
Kemgbe afọ 2016, itinye aka nke nwanyị mbụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ZANU-PF n'ime ụlọ ahụ ahụla asịrị na-ekwu na ọ na-ebute otu n'ime òtù nzuzo nke pati ahụ, G40 (Ọgbọ 40)
Akụkụ nke ọzọ, Lacoste, na-eche na ọ bụ osote onye isi ala Emmerson Mnangagwa duziri ya
Nkewa na ZANU-PF n'oge ahụ hiwere isi na ajụjụ nke onye ga-anọchi Mugabe
Esemokwu dị n'etiti Grace Mugabe na Mnangagwa ruru n'ókè ọgba aghara na ngwụcha Septemba 2017, ebe ndị otu abụọ ahụ na-atụ ibe ha mkpịsị aka na nzukọ ọha na eze ZANU PF
Mgbe ọ na-agwa ndị na-ege ntị okwu na ozi ncheta Mahofa, Mnangagwa kwuru na e nyere ya nsí na ZANU PF Youth Interface rally na Gwanda
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe okwu Mnangagwa gasịrị, Onye isi ala Robert Mugabe kpọrọ mgbanwe nke ụlọ ọrụ na ihe ọtụtụ ndị kwenyere na ọ bụ ọrụ na-agbanwe ike
Mnangagwa, dị ka ndị enyi ya a na-enyo enyo, tụfuru ozi ikpe
Ọktoba 2017 gosipụtara mmetụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kachasị elu nke Grace Mugabe na ZANU PF
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2017, Grace nyere aka n'ịchụpụ osote onye isi ala n'oge ahụ, Emmerson Mnangagwa, mgbe ọ baara ya mba maka ịkpata nkewa na Zanu PF
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Grace kwupụtara ebumnuche ya nke iweghara ọkwa osote onye isi ala

Mba ahụ nọ n'ọgba aghara dị elu ma n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị mgbe Emmerson Mnangagwa choro ebe mgbaba na mpụga Zimbabwe, ndị agha weghaara ọchịchị na-enweghị ọbara n'okpuru General Constantino Chiwenga
Grace Mugabe bụ onye a na-adịghị ahụ anya n'oge a na akụkọ dị iche iche banyere ebe ọ nọ
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba, a chụpụrụ Grace Mugabe na ndị enyi ya iri abụọ na ZANU-PF
Mgbe Robert Mugabe nwụrụ na 6 Septemba 2019, ndị Mugabe abụọ ahụ nọ na Singapore

Mgbe a machibidoro ndị na-ekiri ihe na-emenụ site na European Union inyocha ntuli aka Zimbabwe nke afọ 2002, EU tinyere ntaramahụhụ na ndị isi Zimbabwe 20 wee, na July, gbasaa ha ka ha tinye Grace Mugabe na ndị ọzọ 51, machibido ha ịga mba ndị sonyere ma mee ka akụ ọ bụla e nwere n'ebe ahụ kwụsị
N'afọ 2003, United States guzobere ihe mgbochi yiri nke ahụ
N'oge ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ, Grace Mugabe lekọtara iwu obí eze abụọ
Nke mbụ, nke a na-akpọkarị 'Gracelands', ka a katọrọ maka oke ya
Grace Mugabe mechara kọwaa na o jiri ego nke ya kwụọ ụgwọ ya
E mechara resị ya Muammar Gaddafi nke Libya
E wuchara nke abụọ na 2007, na-efu ihe dị ka $ 50 nde
Ọ bụ ndị otu ZANU-PF kwadoro ọrụ ahụ iji kelee Robert Mugabe maka ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
N'afọ 2002, Grace Mugabe gara n'ụlọ ọrụ ugbo na Zimbabwe, na-achọ ebe ọhụrụ maka onwe ya na ezinụlọ ya
Ọ họọrọ Iron Mask Estate, nke ndị ọrụ ugbo John na Eva Matthews nwere n'oge gara aga
Ezinụlọ ahụ nwere ihe onwunwe na Malaysia, na mbido afọ 2008, a kọrọ na Grace Mugabe nwere olileanya ịkwaga ebe ahụ na ụmụ ya
Ebumnuche nke ịkwaga bụ ịgbanahụ nrụgide nke ndị ndu na iji dozie egwu na ezinụlọ mbụ na-eche ogbugbu ihu
O nwetakwara ihe onwunwe na Hong Kong, gụnyere azụmahịa na-egbutu diamond na ihe onwunwa na Tai Po, New Territories

Ndị omeiwu nke òtù na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya gbara gọọmentị Hong Kong ume ka ha mụọ ma ha ga-agbaso omume mba ụwa iji gbochie ụfọdụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba ọzọ dịka ọtụtụ ndị nwere ike ịchọ ịzụta ihe onwunwe, itinye ego, ma ọ bụ agụmakwụkwọ na Hong Kong
Lee Wing-tat kwuru na Beijing kwesịrị ime mkpebi ebe ọ bụ na nke a bụ ihe gbasara mba ọzọ
Ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Jiang Yu site na Ministry of Foreign Affairs nke People's Republic of China kwuru na ọ maghị banyere ụlọ ndị Mugabes na-azọrọ na ha zụrụ na Hong Kong ma ọ gaghị ekwu okwu ọzọ
Otu prọfesọ na Mahadum Hong Kong kwuru na Beijing na-anwa ịpụ na esemokwu ahụ
Gọọmentị etiti Beijing jụrụ nchegbu ahụ, na-agbakwụnye na a hapụrụ ndị Falun Gong ịzụta ihe onwunwe na Hong Kong
A kọrọ na 2015 na Zimbabwe tinyere aka na esemokwu iwu banyere onye nwe ihe onwunwe na Tai Po nke Bona Mugabe nọrọ na ya mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Hong Kong
E nwetara ihe onwunwe ahụ na June 2008 site na ụlọ ọrụ nke onye ọchụnta ego South Africa a mụrụ na Taiwan bụ Hsieh Ping-sung na-achịkwa maka HK $ 40 nde ($ 514 nde) wee nyefee ya n'aha nke ya na 2010
Ndị Mugabe na-ekwu na obodo ahụ bụ nke gọọmentị Zimbabwe, ebe Hsieh, onye bụbu onye nzuzo Mugabe, na-ekwu n'enweghị obi abụọ na ụlọ ahụ bụ nke ya

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2010, ozi ndị nnọchi anya mba Amerịka nke WikiLeaks wepụtara wetara ebubo ndị ọzọ na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị Zimbabwe dị elu na ndị nwere njikọ dị mma, gụnyere nwunye Mugabe Grace, na-enweta ọtụtụ nde dollar na ego onwe onye site n'ịkwụ ụgwọ ìgwè ndị na-egwu ala iji jiri aka wepụta diamond site na ebe a na-egwupụta ihe n'ebe Chi Cha Cha Cha n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Zimbabwe
Grace Mugabe na-agba akwụkwọ ugbu a na akwụkwọ akụkọ Zimbabwe maka akụkọ ya banyere nkwupụta nke WikiLeaks wepụtara na o nwetara 'nnukwu uru' site na ebe a na-egwupụta diamond na mba ahụ
Nwunye onye isi ala na-achọ $ 15m (£ 96m) site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Standard
A maara Grace Mugabe maka ndụ ya dị oké ọnụ ahịa, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ọdịda anyanwụ akpọwokwa ya 'Gucci Grace'

The Daily Telegraph kpọrọ ya 'onye a ma ama n'ụlọ maka mmebi iwu ya' na mkpuchi nke njem 2003 na Paris, n'oge a kọrọ na ọ na-emefu £ 75,000 (ihe dị ka US $ 120,000) n'oge dị mkpirikpi ịzụ ahịa; na n'ime afọ ndị na-eduga na 2004 wepụrụ ihe karịrị £ 5 nde na Central Bank of Zimbabwe
Mgbe a gụnyere Grace Mugabe na mmachibido iwu nke afọ 2002, otu onye omeiwu EU kwuru na mmachibidoro ahụ ga-akwụsị Grace Mugabe ịga njem ịzụ ahịa ya n'ihu oke ịda ogbenye na-emebi ndị Zimbabwe
Ọ na-eche ntaramahụhụ yiri nke ahụ ihu na United States
Arụmụka malitere mgbe e nyere Grace Mugabe nzere doctoral na sociology na Septemba 2014 site na Mahadum nke Zimbabwe ọnwa abụọ mgbe ọ banyere na mmemme ahụ
Di ya na onye isi mahadum Robert Mugabe nyere ya nzere ahụ
E bipụtaghị akwụkwọ edemede doctoral ya na ndị ọzọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum ma ọ na-eche oku ihu iji weghachite PhD ya
Inye nzere ahụ kpatara mmeghachi omume n'etiti ndị agụmakwụkwọ Zimbabwe, ụfọdụ na-ekwu na nke a nwere ike imerụ aha mahadum ahụ
Na 22 Jenụwarị 2018, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Mahadum bipụtara thesis PhD nke Grace Mugabe (na-enweghị peeji mbinye aka nke kọmitii doctoral)
Levi Nyagura, osote chancellor nke Mahadum nke Zimbabwe, ka ụlọ ọrụ Zimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission jidere n'afọ 2018 ka a boo ya ebubo iji ọrụ na-ezighị ezi mgbe nyocha banyere PhD gasịrị
Aha Mugabe maka ime ihe ike na iwe ọkụ mere ka a kpọọ ya 'Dis-Grace' n'ụlọ

Enwekwara ihe omume na mba ofesi The Times kọrọ na 18 Jenụwarị 2009 na, mgbe ọ na-aga ịzụ ahịa na Hong Kong ebe nwa ya nwanyị Bona Mugabe bụ nwa akwụkwọ mahadum, Mugabe nyere onye na-eche ya nche iwu ka ọ wakpo onye na-ese foto Sunday Times Richard Jones n'èzí họtel ya
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere mwakpo ahụ, na-akụ Jones ugboro ugboro n'ihu mgbe ọ na-eyi mgbaaka diamond, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye a na-ebibi ma na-emebi
E mechara nye ya nnwere onwe pụọ n'ikpe 'n'okpuru iwu ndị nnọchi anya China' n'ihi ọnọdụ ya dị ka nwunye Mugabe

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2017, mgbe ọ na-eleta South Africa iji gwọọ mmerụ ahụ n'ikiri ụkwụ, a na-ekwu na Grace wakporo onye nlereanya dị afọ 20, Gabriella Engels, na ndị enyi abụọ, ndị ya na ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ, Robert Jr
na Chatunga, nọ na họtel dị na Sandton, Johannesburg
A na-ebo ebubo na Grace kụrụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ ya nwoke, na eriri mgbatị, na-akpata mmerụ ahụ dị iche iche gụnyere oghere miri emi n'egedege ihu Engels
Nke a bụ mgbe ha boro ụmụ nwanyị ebubo na ha na ụmụ ya bi
Mgbe Engels boro ebubo maka ' mwakpo na ebumnuche ịkpata mmerụ ahụ siri ike', Grace ga-apụta n'ụlọ ikpe Johannesburg na 15 Ọgọst 2017, mana o meghị ya; e mechara nye ya nnwere onwe
Mgbe Emmerson Mnangagwa chụpụrụ onye isi ala Robert Mugabe, Gabriella Engels biputere tweet na-aṅụ iyi ịbọ ọbọ na Grace Mugabe
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2018, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke South Africa wepụrụ Grace ikike ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma kwe ka ikpe metụtara mwakpo ya megide Engels gaa n'ihu
Onye na-ekwuchitere ndị uwe ojii kwuru na 26 Machị 2018 na ha na-enyocha ikpe nke ebubo mbubata ọdụ́ metụtara Grace

Onye na-ekwuchitere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ogige ntụrụndụ na anụ ọhịa nke Zimbabwe kwuru na Mugabe na ndị isi ọrụ ya manyere ndị ọrụ ogige ntorobịa ịbịanye aka na ikike mbupụ maka ihe ndị dị n'akụkụ ọdụ́ n'oge di ya bụ onye isi ala
N'afọ 2017, Grace's Mazowe Citrus Estate weghaara pasent 60 nke Mazowe Dam
Na 24 Ọgọst 2018
Onye isi ala Zimbabwe Emmerson Mnangagwa nyere iwu ka ezinụlọ Mugabe hapụ Dam ahụ ma weghachite òkè ha na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi, Mmiri, na Ọnọdụ Ihu igwe
Àtụ First Ladies of Zimbabwe
Grace Mukomberanwa (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1944) bụ onye mba Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Mukomberanwa bụ ọgbọ mbụ na-akpụ ihe ncha nke Shona art
Ọ bụ nwunye onye ama ama na ọgbọ mbụ bụ Nicholas Mukomberanwa
Ha abụọ nwetara ọzụzụ n'ịkpụ nkume ncha ma zụọ ụmụ ha n'otu ọrụ ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-akpụ ihe na Zimbabwe
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ngosi gburugburu ụwa
Ọ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa, bụ ndị a ma ama na-akpụ ihe
Mukomberanwa bụ nwunye Nicholas Mukomberanwa
Ọ bụ nne ụmụ nwoke Anderson, Lawrence Mukomberanwa, Tendai, Taguma, ụmụ nwanyị Netsai, na Ennica Mukomberanwa, na nwanne nne Nesbert Mukomberanwa, ha niile bụ ndị na-akpụ ihe
Grace Nortey (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1937) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri nke rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ na telivishọn Ghana
Ọ nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri ruo ihe karịrị iri afọ ise ma a na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị mbụ nke ihe nkiri na ihe ejije na Ghana
O meela ihe nkiri na ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri kachasị echefu echefu nke National Film and Television Institute (NAFTI) wepụtara
N'ime ogologo ọrụ ya na telivishọn, ọ nwetara ọmụma na nkwanye ùgwù dị ukwuu dịka onye na-ebute ụzọ nke meghere ụzọ maka itinye aka ụmụ nwanyị na nka
A maara Grace dịka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Ghana a ma ama na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dị iche iche iji weta ihe ọchị na ihe nkiri nye ndị mmadụ, ọkachasị na mmemme TV dịka Akan Drama na TV Theatre

N'ime nke a, ọ kwadoro ihe kpatara ụmụ nwanyị n'ime ọha mmadụ nke ụmụ nwoke na-achị, na-agbagha mmekọrịta ike dị n'etiti ndị ọgaranya na ndị ogbenye, ma na-enye ndị na-enweghị ike na ndị a na-emegbu emegbu olu site na iguzogide na ịjụ ọdịnala ịkpa ókè na omume na-adịghị mma

A na-edekarị ya dịka onye ọ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, onye na-ekwu okwu ike, onye na-ekwusi ike, onye na-ekwu okwu nke abụghị iberibe na onye nwere ọchịchọ siri ike nke na-eche ọdịnala na omume ndị na-akpa ókè ihu, gụnyere echiche dị omimi nke ndị nna, ịchịisi ụmụ nwoke, omume mmekọrịta mmadụ na-adịghị mma megide ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ, ịkpa ókè na klas, nrụrụ aka nke ụlọ ọrụ, ikpe na-ezighị ezi na eze, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Otu njirimara dị ịrịba ama nke ọtụtụ arụmọrụ Grace nke meriri ọtụtụ nde ndị na-akwado ya bụ otú o si emekarị ndị mmegide nwoke dị egwu na mkpebi siri ike na mkpebi siri ike
Grace bụ onye otu Ghana Actors Guild nke na-achọ ịkwalite ọdịmma nke ndị otu n'oge gara aga na ugbu a

N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, Grace akwadola ihe kpatara ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na telivishọn, na-elekwasị anya n'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ nke owu ọmụma, ịda ogbenye na ileghara ha anya mgbe ha mere agadi

Karịsịa, o meela ka ọnọdụ nke ndị agadi, ndị na-arịa ọrịa na ndị na-enweghị ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri bụ ndị nọ n'akụkụ maka ọrụ ma ọ bụ na-ebi n'ụkọ n'ihi enweghị ngwugwu ezumike nká kwesịrị ekwesị iji lekọta ha
O kwusiri ike mkpa ọ dịka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, mkpakọrịta na obodo Ghana mara nnukwu onyinye na àjà nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na telivishọn
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, Grace kwusiri ike mkpa ọ dịka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nweta agụmakwụkwọ na ọzụzụ agụmakwụkwọ na ime ihe nkiri tupu ha achụso ọrụ oge niile na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
O nwere echiche na ime ihe nkiri dị mfe ma na-akwụ ụgwọ, mana ọ bụghị ihe mmadụ nwere ike ime maka ndụ ya niile
A na-eme ihe nkiri oge, maka ihe dịka afọ iri ruo afọ iri na ise, otu onye ka agaghị abụ onye siri ike dịka ọ dịbu
O gosikwara mkpa ọ dị ka ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri na-echebara ihe nkiri igba ọtọ echiche maọbụ ikpughe onwe ha na ihuenyo naanị maka iji nweta iwu ewu
N'echiche ya, ọ dị mkpa na ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri na-atụle ọrụ ọ bụla dị nro na di ha na ndị mmekọ ha tupu ha ekweta iwere ha
Grace nwere ụmụ ise
Grace bụ nne Sheila Nortey onye bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Best Cameo Actress (Movie 'Adams Apple') - Ghana Movie Awards (2011)
Ọkachasị na nka - Glitz Women of the Year Honours (2016)
Lifetime Achievement Award - Black Star International Film Festival (BSIFF) Awards (2018)

Onyinye pụtara ìhè maka Ọkachasị Ụmụ nwanyị na The Performing Arts - 3Music Awards Women's Brunch (2021)
Grace Obour (amụrụ na 13 Mee na afo 2001) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ ọsọ
O ritere ọla nchara na afọ 2019 African Games
Grace Obour nwetara ahụmịhe mba ụwa mbụ ya na afọ 2019 African Youth Championships na Abidjan
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, ọ ruru ọkara ikpeazụ na African Games na Rabat na mita 200, ebe e wepụrụ ya
O meriri ọla nchara n'azụ Galefele Moroko na Favor Ofili karịa mita 400 na 5186 s
Ọ na-asọ mpi maka Mahadum nke Ghana
Grace Ofure Ibhakhomu (amuru 1978) bu onye okachamara n'itinye ego n'ala, onye Naijiria, onye nkuzi ndu, na onye na-enyere ndi mmadu aka
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye ịsị óche nke Lifecard International Investment Limited na onye nwe ụlọ akwụkwọ a na-agu n'ịntanetị, Mahadum Lifecard
Ọ na-achikwa ọgbakọ ọdịmma, Grace Ofure Foundation
A mụrụ Ofure na Eprel 28, 1978, na Ekpoma, Edo State, Nigeria

Maka agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ gara ụlọakwụkwọ University Primary School, University Secondary School dị na Ekpoma, Holy Trinity Grammar School dị na Sabogida – Ora, wee gaa mahadum Ambrose Alli dị na Ekpoma maka agụmakwụkwọ ya dị elu, ha niile na Edo steeti
Ọ gụchara Mmemme Onye njikwa (OMP) na ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa Lagos
Ka ọ gụchara akwụkwọ, Ofure malitere ọrụ azụmaahịa ya n'afọ 2003 site n'ire mmanụ nri na uwe ' Okrika ' na Lagos
Mgbe ahụ, na ndụmọdụ otu nwa akwụkwọ ya na ya gụkọrọ akwụkwọ, ọ banyere n'ụwa nke itinye ego na ụlọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ

Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ọkachamara na ụlọ ọrụ ego, o mechara malite Lifecard Company na 2018, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụlọ nke na-ezube ịnye ebe obibi, ohere itinye ego na ikike nke ala site na netwọk nke ndị mmekọ gburugburu obodo ahụ
Ofure bụkwa onye nwe ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum Life Card, ụlọ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ a na-agu n'ịntanetị
Ọ na-eji ọtụtụ nyiwe mgbasa ozi ọha na eze kụziere nkuzi itinye ego n'ụlọ ahịa n'ịntanetị
Na Disemba 2020, Ofure, dị ka MD of Lifecard International Investment, malitere ihe nrite 'Nigerian for Nigeria Initiative Awards' maka ụmụ amaala na-achọsi ike
Iji hazie ọrụ enyemaka ya, o guzobela Grace Ofure Foundation
Grace Oladunni Taylor (nke a makwaara dị ka Grace Oladunni Lucia Olaniyan-Taylor; amụrụ 24 Eprel n'afọ 1937) bụ ọkà mmụta biochemist, na mbụ na Mahadum Ibadan, Niijiria
Ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ a kpọbatara n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị nke Naijiria na onye Afrika mbụ nyere onyinye L'Oréal-UNESCO maka ụmụ nwanyị na sayensị
A mụrụ Grace Oladunni Lucia Olaniyan na Efon-Alaiye, Ekiti State, Nigeria, nye Elizabeth (née Olatoun) na RAW Olaniyan
N'agbata n'afọ 1952 na 1956, ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke Queen's School dị na Ede na steeti Osun
Ọ debara aha ya n'akwụkwọ n'afọ 1957 na Nigerian College of Arts and Sayensị dị n'Enugwu wee banye n'afọ 1959 na mahadum mahadum nke Ibadan (nke bụzi mahadum Ibadan)
Olaniyan gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ n'afọ 1962 site na nzere kemistri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akara ugo mmụta ya, ọ gara ọrụ ozugbo n'ọdụ ọrụ nyocha mpaghara mpaghara (nke bụzi National Root Crops Research Institute ) na Moor Plantation nke no na obodo Ibadan
N'afọ 1963, e goro ya dị ka onye enyemaka nyocha na ngalaba nke Chemical Pathology na Mahadum Ibadan wee nweta akara mmụta doctorate na Chemical Pathology N'afọ 1969
N'afọ 1970, mahadum goro ya dị ka onye nkuzi wee n'afọ 1975, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye nyocha nleta nleta na Northwest Lipid Research Laboratory na Seattle, Washington
Ọ laghachiri na mahadum Ibadan wee kwalite ya na Senior Lecturer N'afọ 1975 ma N'afọ 1979 kwalitere ịbụ Reader
N'afọ 1979, mgbe ọ malitere ibipụta, ọ lụrụ Prọfesọ Ajibola Taylor

N'afọ 1980, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye ọkà mmụta sayensị bịara na ngalaba nyocha Metabolic nke Mahadum West Indies dị na Kingston, Jamaica n'afọ 1984, e kwalitere Taylor ka ọ bụrụ onye prọfesọ zuru oke nke Chemical Pathology na Mahadum Ibadan

N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ laghachiri maka mkpakọrịta nyocha nke abụọ na Northwest Lipid Research Laboratory na Seattle ma mechaa biputere dị ka onye ọkà mmụta sayensị nleta na Port of Spain, Trinidad na Department of Chemical Pathology
N'afọ 1990, e goro Taylor n'ọrụ ka ọ bụrụ onye osote prọfesọ na Mahadum Zimbabwe School of Medicine na Harare wee kuziere ya na Ngalaba Pathology
N'afọ 1991, ọ laghachiri na mahadum Ibadan ebe site N'afọ 1991 ruo 1994 ọ bụ onye isi ngalaba nke Chemical Pathology wee jee ozi dịka onye ndụmọdụ nsọpụrụ n'ụlọọgwụ mahadum mahadum, Ibadan
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2004 mana ọ gara n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ na Ibadan na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ọgwụ Kemịkalụ
Ọpụrụiche ya bụ nyocha nke lipids na ọrịa obi yana ntụnyere metabolism mmiri ya gosipụtara na ọkwa abụba abụghị ihe sitere na agbụrụ, kama ọ bụ nri na mmega ahụ

Enyere ya ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ maka nyocha ya, gụnyere Shell-BP Scholarship na Chemistry, Òtù Ahụ Ike Ụwa, Mmekọrịta Fulbright-Hays, Mmekọrịta Ciba-Geigy, na Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ụlọ Akwụkwọ University nke Africa
A kpọbatara Taylor n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị nke Naijiria N'afọ 1997, dị ka nwanyị nke abụọ a na-asọpụrụ dị ka onye inductee

N'afọ 1998, ewepụtara ihe nrite L'Oréal-UNESCO iji nye otu nwanyị sitere na mpaghara ise ọ bụla—Afrika na steeti Arab, Asia-Pacific, Europe, Latin America, North America—maka mmezu sayensị ha na ntinye aka n'ịkwalite mmadụ
Taylor bụ onye nnata Afrịka na nkwanye ugwu mmalite nke onyinye L'Oréal-UNESCO maka ụmụ nwanyị na sayensị, ghọrọ onye Africa mbụ nwetara ihe nrite ahụ
N'afọ 2012, na Gọọmenti Ekiti steeti kwanyere ya ugwu maka ntinye aka ya n'ịnye ndụmọdụ na ịkụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụike
Grace Omaboe (amuru 10 June 1946) nke amara aha ya dika Maame Dokono bu onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ghana, onye ọbụ abụ, agwa igwe onyonyo, onye ode akwụkwọ na onye bụbu onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ nwere ụlọ ebere Peace and Love Orphanage nke bụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ Graceful Grace na Accra
Ndị na-ahazi 3Music Awards nwetara ya nsọpụrụ maka mmezu ya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ na Ghana
A mụrụ Grace Omaboe na 10 June 1946 na Birim North na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị Abetifi
Nne ye bu onye na-eme ihe nkiri ochie, Madam Rebecca Afia Daadom onye sitere na Abirim na mpaghara ndida anyanwu wee nwụọ mgbe ọ dị afọ 105
Grace ghọrọ aha ezinụlọ site n'ọrụ ọ rụrụ na usoro ihe nkiri Akan Drama Series ama ama ' OBRA ' nke a na-agbasa na GBC TV
A mụrụ Grace Omaboe dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu na mmetụta ya na ikike ya na-enwe mmetụta na ngalaba ọ bụla nke azụmahịa ngosi - na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihu ahịa ihe ngosi Ghana ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ
N'iru ya, ọ dighi onye di n'aru-ya na mb͕e ọ nwusiri; anyi ka na-acho nke ọzọ
Ọ mere ide edemede, ime ihe nkiri, ihe ngosi redio na TV, ejiji, egwu, na ọchụnta ego wee kpọgidere onye ọ bụla n'ime ha n'izu okè
Site na mmalite dị umeala n'obi dị ka onye na-ede edemede maka otu n'ime usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn a ma ama n'oge niile, Osofo Dadzie - Grace Omaboe kwubiri nke ahụ n'ime nnukwu ọganihu na ihuenyo

O meziri nka dị ka onye ama ama n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị Abetifi wee nakwere ịbụ onye na-ede edemede maka otu Osofo Dadzie ma ka ebisasịa otu ahụ, onye na-emeputa ihe nkiri bụ Nana Bosompra gbara ya ume ka o mee n'usoro ọ rụpụtara akpọrọ Keteke
na Ghana Broadcasting Corporation na nke ahụ malitere ọrụ mbụ ya
Ka oge na-aga, ọ degharịrị aha ihe nkiri TV wee gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Obra - usoro ihe onyonyo kacha ogologo oge na Ghana
Grace Omaboe na mbụ bu onye odee na Osofo Dadzi na 70s mgbe Nana Bosompra gbara ya ume ime ihe n'usoro ọ rụpụtara akpọrọ Keteke
Grace Omaboe buru ụzọ malite ime ihe nkiri Keteke TV na TV nke steeti Ghana nwere, GTV

O si n'ebe ahụ gaa ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a na-achọsi ike n'oge ya, mgbe ọ mere ihe nkiri wee mepụta usoro ihe nkiri Akan nke 1980/1990 Obra na GTV ma kwadokwara ihe omume nkuzi na-enye ihe omume TV maka ụmụaka bu The The Akụkụ Ọkụ
A maara nke ọma dị ka Maame Dokono (mgbe ọ gwuchara agwa dị ka onye na-ere kenkey), ọ gara n'ihu n'ime ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ghana ma Akan na Bekee
Ọ gosiri na 2013 mkpụmkpụ Kwaku Ananse na Children of the Mountain (2016)
A họpụtara Omaboe ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ndị jury 2017 Golden Movie Awards Africa (GMAA)
Grace Atinuke (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 16 nke onwa Nọvemba n’afọ 1931) ka a maara bụ Miss Nigeria nke izizi n’afọ 1957
Oyelude bu onye a mụrụ na Kano nye James Adeleye Olude na Marthan Dantu nke Isanlu dị na Kogi Steeti, ma zụlite na mpaghara ugwu nke Naijiria
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị n'etiti afọ 1940 na 1952 na Kano

E mechara kpọọ ndị ruru agba nke ikpeazu i soro asọmpi na-egosi ka ọ na-eme na Lagos Island Club
N'oge ahụ, asọmpi Miss Nigeria agụnyeghị asọmpi i gwu mmiri
Oyelude na-arụbu ọrụ na UAC mgbe ọ nọchitere mpaghara ugwu ahụ
Mgbe o meriri n'asọmpi ahụ, ọ gara Ịngland ebe ọ gụrụ Nọọsụ

Oyelude ghọọrọ onye State Registered Nurse n'afọ 1961 were bụrụ onye ruru ọkwa midwaịfụ SCM (NRM) n'afọ 1962 mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ na St
Thomas' Hospital,dị na Lọndọn
Ọ gara Royal College of Nursing,nke Ịngland n'afọ 1971 were nweta diplọma nke Nọsịn na nchịkwa ụlọ ọgwụ (DNHA)
N’ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ahụ maka njikwa na nchịkwa ndị mmadụ na Gana, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ maka diplọma ọzọ
Na United Kingdom, Oyelude rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọgwụ gụnyere Paddington General Hospital, otu n'ime ụlọ ọgwụ ndị dịbu na St Mary's Hospital, London
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nnukwu ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Kaduna n’agbata afọ 1964 na 1965
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka siniọ nọsịn sista-in-chaj ụlọ nọsịn mbụ ndị Kaduna (nke bụzi ụlọ ọgwụ ọkachamara nke Barau Dike,na Kaduna) site n'afọ 1965 ruo 1977
Mgbe agha obodo Naịjirịa bidoro n’afọ 1967, ọ kwagara n’ụlọ ọgwụ izugbe dị na Markurdi
Oyelude duuru otu ndi si na mpaghara ugwu; otu nke nyeere ụlọ ọgwụ aka ị dị njikere ị gwọ ndị merụrụ ahụ n'agha
Na mbido afọ 1970, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi na-elekọta ma na-atụzi ọrụ nọọsụ na ụlọọgwụ nkuzi nke Mahadum nke Ahmadu Bello, mgbe ọ batara na Institute of Health,nke Mahadum nke Ahmadu Bello
O ji aka ya laa ezumike nká na ọkwa ahụ n'afọ 1985
Ọ bụkwa onye nnyocha ule nke ezi nke Nursing and Midwifery Council of Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kwara State Health Management Board site n'afọ 1980 ruo 1983
Oyelude ji ọkwa ọchịchị ya bụ Iyaolu of Isaluland na Iyalode of Okunland

Grace Schools bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ e guzobere na Gbagada, Lagos, Naijirịa n'afọ 1968
E kewara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ụzọ anọ Nursery, Primary, Secondary School na Pre-University
Ọ bụ Deaconess Grace Bisola Oshinowo guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'afọ 1994
Ihe owuwu dị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ gụnyere
Grace Kekulu Tseke bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress kemgbe afọ 2009
Tseke nwetara diplọma mahadum na agụmakwụkwọ n'afọ 1997, diplọma na Business Computing n'afọ 2004 na asambodo na Managing the Employment Process n'afọ 2006

Tseke bụ onye kansụl ngalaba nke African National Congress site na 2000 ruo 2005, onye isi oche alaka nke African National Congreso Women's League site na 2001 ruo 2002, odeakwụkwọ nke alaka Greenmara nke ANC site na 2001 gaa 2004, osote odeakwụkwọ site na 2006 ruo 2008 na Maretele PCO Administrator site na 2004 ruo 2009
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara Tseke ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ANC na National Assembly of South Africa
N'oge mbụ ya dị ka onye omeiwu, ọ bụ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Sport and Recreation na Portfolio Committee for Women, Youth and People with Disabilities
A họpụtara Tseke ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu n'afọ 2014
A kpọrọ ya aha na Kọmitii Portfolio on Women in The Presidency
N'afọ 2018, Tseke kwuru na ya 'enweghị ike ide ezigbo akụkọ' banyere Ngalaba Ụmụ nwanyị na Onye isi ala
A họpụtara Tseke ọzọ n'ụlọ omebe iwu n'afọ 2019
A kpọrọ ya aha na Kọmitii Portfolio na Ahụike na Kọmiti Portfolio na Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, a tọhapụrụ Tseke na Kọmitii Portfolio na Health na Kọmiti Portfolio na Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation
A họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Kọmitii maka Nnyocha nke 194 na Kọmiti Portfolio nke e guzobere ọhụrụ na Mmiri na Mmiri
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
A mụrụ Grace Tubwita na Nakasongola District ma ọ na-asụ asụsụ obodo

Ọ nọchitere anya distrikti ahụ na ndị omeiwu Uganda ugboro abụọ n'usoro; n'oge ndị omeiwu nke asaa (2001 ruo 2006) na ndị omebe iwu nke asatọ (2006 ruo 2011), na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement (NRM)
A tụfuru oche ya n'oge ntuli aka nke NRM nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri
Ọ meriri Margaret Komuhangi, onye nọ n'ọkwa, onye ọ meriri ugboro abụọ, na 2003 na 2015
Tubwita na-anọdụ na bọọdụ ndị nduzi nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Uganda National Oil Company, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ mba
Ọ bụkwa onye otu National Forestry Authority (NFA), ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ gọọmentị nwere, dịka Minista nke Ozi na National Guidance, Rose Namayanja, mara ọkwa na 17 Julaị 2014
Na Septemba 2016, e nyere Tubwita Grace Bagaya Bukenya 'Medaal of Honor nke ndị omeiwu' iji kwado ọrụ ndị omeiwu ya na Uganda
Grace Umelo (amụrụ 10 Jụli afọ 1978) bụ onye lara ezumike nká Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu bụ ndị pụrụ iche na ndị ogologo na-awụlikwa elu
O ritere ọtụtụ akara na ọkwa mpaghara
nke kachasịrị ya mma bụ ihe omume 660 setịpụrụ na Lagos n'afọ 1999
A mụrụ Grace Antonia Almeida Benoite Adamon na 21 Machị, na afọ 1951 na Dakar, Senegal
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Sisters of Porto-Novo wee kwaga Dahomey (nke bụ Benin ugbu a) ya na ezinụlọ ya ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ debara aha ya na College of Our Lady of the Apostles na Cotonou ma na afọ 1972 were usoro baccalaureate A na Guebwiller, France
O nwetara diplọma ya na nzere masta na Mahadum Panthéon-Assas na Paris
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum Pantheon-Sorbonne, na-ahụ maka iwu ụgbọ mmiri na ikike obodo na azụmahịa nke ndị ọrụ
Mgbe ọ natasịrị DEA, ọ laghachiri Pantheon-Assas, ebe ọ nwetara nzere iwu CAPA
D'Almeida Adamon malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na Paris na afọ 1977
Ọ laghachiri Cotonou n'afọ sochirinụ
Ọ bụ Onye Ọkachamara nke iwu na Mahadum Mba nke Benin ma bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ịgbachitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1990, a họpụtara D'Almeida Adamon dịka otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya iwu iri na atọ iji guzobe iwu ọhụrụ, nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke Benin dị ka akụkụ nke Nzukọ Mba
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị so na ya
N'afọ ahụ, o guzobekwara Association of Jurists of Benin (AFJB)
Òtù na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ kwalitere ohere ụmụ nwanyị nwere inweta ọrụ iwu ma gbachitere ikike ụmụaka na ụmụ nwanyị
O sokwa guzobe African Institute of Human Rights and the Promotion of Democracy
D'Almeida Adamon rụrụ ọrụ maka mmemme United Nations (UN) na òtù ndị na-abụghị gọọmentị
O nyere aka na mmemme UN nke na-elekọta Ụlọ Ọrụ Democratic Center for Domestic Governance nke Burkina Faso na 1990s
O sonyere na Independent International Commission on Kosovo
D'Almeida Adamon bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Association des Femmes Juristes du Bénin (Association of Women Lawyers of Benin)
N'okpuru atụmatụ ya, nzukọ ahụ mepụtara akwụkwọ nta dị peeji 114 Guide juridique de la femme béninoise
A sụgharịrị akwụkwọ nduzi French maka ikike iwu ụmụ nwanyị na Fon na Batonou

Ọ kọrọ na, 'n'ịga n'ihu ime ka nduzi ikpe dị maka ụmụ nwanyị, ebumnuche nke Association of Women Lawyers bụ inye ụmụ nwanyị Benin usoro iwu ole na ole dabere na ederede iwu na-achịkwa mba ahụ iji nyere ha aka ime ka ndụ ha dịkwuo mma site na usoro iwu
' D'Almeida Adamon gara Nzukọ nke Anọ nke Ụwa na Ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 1995
Site na 22 Nọvemba, na afọ 1995 ruo 9 Eprel, na afọ 1996 ọ bụ onye na-edebe akara na Minista nke Iwu Ikpe Ziri Ezi maka gọọmentị Benin
Mgbalị ya nyere aka na mmeghe nke Women in Law and Development na mpaghara Benin nke Africa na Junn, na afọ 1999
Ọ bụ Chief Technical Advisor nke United Nations Development Programme ma duzie UN's Justice Project na Haiti site na afo 2000 ruo na afọ 2003
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ kọmitii na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ n'ụwa niile n'oge ndụ ya
Ọ bụ onye otu International Planned Parenthood Federation ma nyere aka n'ịchịkwa Institute for the League of Human Rights na Benin
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ mba ụwa na mpaghara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, enyemaka ntuli aka, ikike mmadụ, ezi ọchịchị, na ikpe ziri ezi, ikike mmadụ
Site n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2004, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Network of Women Ministers and Parliamentarians of Benin
D'Almeida Adamon nwụrụ na 12 Mee na afọ 2005 na Paris
Ọ gbara alụkwaghịm ma nwee ụmụ atọ

Graceanna Lewis (úbọchị atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1821 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1912) bụ onye America na-ahụ maka ihe okike, ónyé na-ese ihe osise, na onye na-eme mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ónyé ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara nnụnụ, a na-echeta Lewis dị ka nwanyị ọsụ ụzọ American sayensị yana ónyé na-eme ihe na-emegide ịgba ohu, temperance, na ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ Graceanna Lewis na úbọchị atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1821, n'ugbo dị nso na West Vincent Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania
Ọ bụ nwá nkè abụọ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị anọ nke ónyé ọrụ ugbo Quaker aha ya bụ John Lewis na nwunye ya, onye bụbu Esther Fussell
Ndị nna nna Graceanna gụnyere enyi William Penn ónyé si South Wales kwaga na mpaghara ọhụrụ nke Pennsylvania na 1682
Nná Lewis nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị naanị afọ atọ, na-ahapụ nne ya ịzụlite ya naanị ya
Nné ya bụ ónyé nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ tupu alụmdi na nwunye ma nyere aka n'ịzụlite mmetụta dị egwu maka mmụta sayensị na Graceanna
Esther Fussell Lewis mere nyocha mbara igwe na ihu igwe yana oge okooko osisi
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka ihe nlereanya na-arụ ọrụ ọha na eze site n'inye ndị ohu na-agba ọsọ ụlọ dị ka akụkụ nke Underground Railroad maka nnwere onwe na Canada
Mgbè ọnwụ nne ya gasịrị, Lewis mere ka ụlọ nke ya dị maka ebumnuche a, na nzuzo na-enye ebe obibi abalị màkà ihe ruru ndị ohu 11 na-agba ọsọ n'otu ógè
Nwanyị ọzọ nwèrè mmetụta ma kpalie Lewis bụ enyi ya Mary Townsend, nwanne nwanyị John Kirk Townsend
Mary dere akwụkwọ banyéré ụmụ ahụhụ na Lewis kwupụtara ọchịchọ iṅomi ya
N'ime afọ 1850, Lewis kwagara Philadelphia, ebe ya na obéré ndị Quakers na-arụkọ ọrụ na sayensị okike
Ndị a gụnyere Ezra Michener na Vincent Bernard

Ọ zutere otu n'ime ndị isi na-amụ banyere ụmụ nnụnụ na America, John Cassin nke Philadelphia Academy of Natural Sciences, na 1862 wee mụọ ornithology na ọkwa dị elu n'okpuru nkụzi ya màkà ọkara afọ iri sochirinụ
N'afọ 1867, Cassin sọpụrụ ónyé ọ na-echebe site n'ịkpọ aha Icterus graceannae, Oriole nwere ọnụ ọcha iji sọpụrụ Lewis
N'afọ 1893, Lewis natara ọrụ site n'aka Pennsylvania Forestry Commission iji see ihe osise mmiri irí isé nke akwụkwọ osisi na-anọchite anya màkà ngosi na World's Columbian Exposition na Chicago

A na-ewere ọrụ Lewis dị ka ihe ịga nke ọma, ebe o nwetara ihe nríte na diplọma, a na-egosikwa ihe osise ahụ ọzọ n'ihu ọha na 1901 Pan-American Exposition na Buffalo, New York, yana 1904 Louisiana Purchase Exposition na St
Louis
Ọ bụ ónyé otu Academy of Natural Sciences na Philadelphia na Delaware County Institute of Science

Ná mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya megide ịgba ohu dị ka akụkụ nke netwọk nzuzo nke nyeere ndị ohu Africa-America gbapụrụ agbapụ aka na nnwere onwé ha n'afọ ndị bu Agha Obodo America ụzọ, Lewis na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọtụtụ òtù mmekọrịta ọha na eze ndị ọzọ n'oge ya
Dabere na nkwenkwe okpukpe Quaker ya, Lewis nọgidere bụrụ onye na-ahụ màkà udo n'oge ndụ ya niile

Ọ bụkwa ónyé na-eme ihe ike na mmegide màkà mmachibido iwu nke mmanya na United States na-eje ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Women's Christian Temperance Union of Media, Pennsylvania na dị ka ónyé nlekọta nke nzukọ ahụ nke ntụziaka sayensị màkà Delaware County
Graceanna Lewis nọrọ iri afọ ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya n'ọbọdọ ya nke Media, PA na nwa nwanne ya nwoke, onye na-ese ihe Charles Lewis Fussell
Ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ na úbọchị irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1912, mgbè ọ dị afọ irí itoolu, mgbè ọ rịara ọrịa strok, e lie ya na Providence Friends Meetinghouse Burying Grounds
Akwụkwọ Lewis bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta Lewis-Fussell Family Papers na Swarthmore College na Swarithmore, Pennsylvania
N'ime ihe ncheta a bụ akwụkwọ Lewis na ihe osise metụtara sayensị okike, yana ihe odide a na-ebipụtaghị ebipụta nke akwụkwọ ncheta nke Underground Railroad
Gracefield Island, nke a na-akpọkwa The Phoenix, bụ obodo ọhụrụ dị hekta otu narị nke e kere site na iweghachite ala site na Lagos Lagoon
Ọ bụ njikọ aka n'etiti Gravitas Investments Limited (ndị mmepe obodo) na Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti
Gracefield Island bụ obodo mepụtara site na mkpocha nke otu narị hekta site na Lagos Lagoon ma na-atụ anya na ọ ga-anabata mmadụ puku iri na puku iri abụọ na ise
Ọrụ ahụ, njikọ aka n'etiti Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti na Gravitas Investments Limited, dị na njedebe nke Chevron Drive, Lagos, ma jikọọ ya na Lekki site n'okporo ụzọ awara awara nke ya
Gọọmentị steeti Lagos kwadoro mmepe nke Gracefield Island na 2016
Ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ ama ama nwere ọnụnọ na Gracefield Island bụ Lafarge, Aspin, 9Mobile, Chevron Staff Coop, Zutari nke South Africa, Samsson Group nke Dubai, HealthCare Outpost
Onye guzobere na Chief Executive nke Gracefield Island bụ Maazị Olufemi Babalola na Onye isi oche bụ Dr
Nu'uman Barau Danbatta, OFR, na Architect Ferdinand Agu, OFR
Peter Stephenson OBE, Leke Ojulari na Adetokunbo Adeyemo dị ka ndị nduzi
N'afọ 2016, a kọrọ na Van_Oord, ụlọ ọrụ injinia ụgbọ mmiri na-arụ ọrụ n'akụkụ mkpocha ala nke ọrụ ahụ weghachitere ihe dị ka hekta iri atọ nke ala na ịdị elu nke mita 18
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2017, ndị mmepe obodo ahụ kpughere ụlọ ọrụ ọfịs ya fọrọ nke nta ka ọ rụchaa

A na-eme atụmatụ ka ọ bụrụ obodo na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nke nwere ebe a na-akwụ ụgwọ ọha na eze maka ụgbọala eletrik, ụzọ ịnyịnya ígwè a raara nye na okporo ụzọ ndị na-agafe agafe iji gbaa ịnyịnya ígwè na ịga ije ume dị ka ụzọ dị mma maka ịgagharị
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị nọ na Gracefield Island gụnyere Lafarge, 9Mobile, na HealthCare Outpost
9Mobile bụ onye na-enye ọrụ nkwukọrịta Fibre na agwaetiti ahụ
Graciela Amaya de García (11 Jenụwarị 1895 - 11 Ọktoba 1995) bụ onye na-ahazi nwanyị na Central America
Amụrụ na El Salvador ma zụọ ya dịka onye nkuzi, ọ kwagara Honduras mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ
N'ịbanye n'òtù ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ ghọrọ onye na-arụ ọrụ na pati, na-eguzobe òtù ndị ọrụ iji guzogide omume ọrụ nke ndị na-emepụta ihe na-arụkọ ọrụ na mba ahụ
O guzobere òtù ụmụ nwanyị mbụ nke Honduras, Society of Feminist Culturena 1923 ma hazie ụlọ akwụkwọ abalị maka ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ iji kụziere ha banyere ikike ha
A chụpụrụ ya na Honduras maka iduzi ngagharị iwe megide gọọmentị na 1944, ọ gbagara n'ụlọ ya na El Salvador mana ọ nọrọ naanị ọnwa ole na ole n'ihi na nnupụisi ọchịchị wetara ọchịchị aka ike
Mgbe ọ kwagara Guatemala, García gara n'ihu na ọrụ ya na-ahazi ọrụ na ịkụziri ndị ọrụ, ruo mgbe onye isi ala chụpụrụ ya na 1946
Mgbe ọ kwagara Mexico, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Secretariate of Education ma dee edemede iji kwado ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ụmụ nwanyị
,Ka ọ na-erule 1921, García, nwanne ya nwoke Armando, Víctor M
Angulo, Manuel Cálix Herrera, na Carlos Gómez bụ ndị Juan Pablo Wainwright wetara dị ka ndị nhazi ọrụ Marxist
O duuru ha n'ịhazi ọgụ na Northern Honduras megide ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta banana na okporo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè maka ụgwọ ọrụ dị elu na uru
N'okpuru nche anwụ nzukọ, Honduran Workers' Federation (Spanish Federación Obrera Hondureña (FOH)), dị iche iche òtù kere otu òtù ọrụ
García bu isi otu Redención, nke bu onye otu FOH
Na 1923, ọ tọrọ ntọala Society of Feminist Culture ( nke bụ otu ụmụ nwanyị na-ahụ maka ịhazi ụmụ nwanyị na'ọrụ
Ọ bụ otu ụmụ nwoke mbụ e guzobere na Honduras ma rụọ ọrụ iji guzogide gọọmentị
Ìgwè ahụ guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ abalị maka ụmụ nwanyị nke nyere forums iji kụziere ụmụ nwanyị banyere ikike na nha nhata ha
Nzukọ ahụ bipụtakwara akwụkwọ akụkọ iji kwurịta isiokwu gbasara nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị na nnwere onwe
García nwụrụ na 11 Ọktoba 1995 na Mexico City, ọnwa atọ tupu afọ 101 ya
A na-echeta ya na Honduras dị ka onye guzobere òtù ụmụ nwanyị na Central America niile maka ọgụ ya maka ndị ọrụ

Graeme Williams (amụrụ n'afọ 1961) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa nke a maara maka ọrụ foto ya n'oge mgbanwe gaa n'ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na South Africa na ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ya mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị
A mụrụ Williams na Cape Town na 1961, ebe ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Geology na Statistics na Mahadum Cape Town
Ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto bụ maka Cape Times dị ka onye-ese foto ihe onwunwe
Mgbe ọ kwagara Johannesburg na 1988, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Reuters na 1989 na-ese foto megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na mgbanwe site na ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị gaa na African National Congress
N'afọ 1991, ọ malitere inye aka na Afrapix, otu nchịkọta ndị na-ese foto na-egosi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ iji mee ihe na akwụkwọ akụkọ gburugburu ụwa
Williams rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ foto ruo n'afọ 1994

Na vidiyo maka Victoria na Albert Museum, Williams kwuru, sị 'Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ iri itoolu na anọ, enwere m mmetụta siri ike na achọghị m ịbụ onye na-ese foto ma ọ bụ see foto maka agha na ime ihe ike
Emere m nguzo siri ike na-ekwu, 'M ga-akwụsị nke ahụ kpamkpam,' emeghịkwa m ụdị akụkọ foto siri ike ọzọ
Mgbe mgbanwe South Africa na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya gasịrị, Williams lekwasịrị anya na atụmatụ magazin na ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ọtụtụ n'ime foto ya na-elekwasị anya na ndị South Africa na-edekọ ndụ onwe onye nke ndị mmadụ

Williams ebipụtala ọrụ na akwụkwọ South Africa na nke mba ụwa, gụnyere National Geographic, Time, Newsweek, Stern, Sunday Telegraph Magazine, New York Times Magazine, Photography (UK), Marie Claire (UK), The Guardian Weekend Magazine, Leadership (South Africa), Los Angeles Times, Sunday Times (UK), La Evening Standard Magazine (UK), Die Woche (Germany), Die Zeit, Greenpeace, Optima (SA), The Scotsman, The Financial Times (UK, The Baltimore Sun, The Independent, The Australian, and Colors
A na-eme ọrụ Williams na nchịkọta ọha na eze na-adịgide adịgide
Grafton Tyler Brown (úbọchị irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Februari, 1841 rụo ụbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Machị March, 1918) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, onye na-ede akwụkwọ na onye na-ese map
Brown bụ ónyé Africa America mbụ na-ese ihe iji mepụta ọrụ na-egosi Pacific Northwest na California
A mụrụ ya n'ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị,1841, na Harrisburg, Pennsylvania
Nne na nna ya bụ Wilhelmina na Thomas Brown, ndị amụrụ n'efu na Maryland wee kwaga Pennsylvania na 1837
Nna ya bụ onye nweere onwe ya ma tinye aka na abolitionist movement
Brown rụrụ ọrụ maka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na Philadelphia mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ mụtara nkà nke lithography
Brown kwagara San Francisco na 1858 wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-elekọta ụlọ nkwari akụ na onye na-ebugharị ụgbọ mmiri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ tupu a mara ya dị ka onye-ese ihe na 1880s
Na San Francisco, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kuchel & Dressel site na 1861 na 1867
N'afọ 1867 ọ meghere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya
Ọrụ akụ na ụba na California nke ọrụ igwu ala kwadoro mere ka Brown mepụta mgbasa ozi, map, na édémédé maka ọtụtụ ndị ahịa n'ime afọ 1870
N'afọ 1878 o mepụtara The Illustrated History of San Francisco, nke nwere ihe oyiyi iri asaá na abụọ nke obodo ahụ
Ọrụ Brown na Bay Area na Nevada Territory gụnyere akwụkwọ nke ebe obibi, ire ihe onwunwe, nkwupụta na ókèala obodo
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ rere ụlọ ọrụ ya
Ọ hapụrụ Bay Area na 1882 wee kwaga Victoria, British Columbia
Mgbè ọ nọ ebe ahụ, o sonyere na Amos Bowman Geological Survey
Mgbe ọ na-ekere òkè na nyocha ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe ma dekọọ ugwu Cascade
N'afọ 1884 ọ laghachiri na United States wee gaa n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ na ọdịda anyanwụ, na-ese ebe ndị dị ka Ugwu Rainier
Ọ biri na Portland, Oregon, na-ese ihe osise ala ma na-aga Yosemite na Yellowstone National Park iji see ihe
Grafton Tyler Brown bụ onye na-ese ihe nke njirimara ya gbanwere site na Black gaa na ọcha ka ọ na-agafe Pacific Northwest
N'afọ 1893, Brown kwagara Saint Paul, Minnesota
Na St
Paul, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọzọ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe, n'oge a maka United States Army Corps of Engineers na màkà obodo St
Paul's engineering department
Ọ nwụrụ na St
Peter, Minnesota, n'ubochí abụọ n'ọnwa Machị, 1918

A na-enwe ọrụ Brown na nchịkọta nke Royal British Columbia Museum, Oakland Museum of California, Crocker Art Museum na Sacramento, California Smithsonian American Art Museum, na Los Angeles County Museum of Art

Frank Graham Bell (ụbọchị irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1910 rụọ úbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọst 1943) bụ onye na-ese foto, ọdịdị ala na ndụ nwụrụ anwụ, yana ónyé guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ Euston Road School
Ọ bụkwa onye nta akụkọ na onye edemede na nka na ónyé na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na South Africa, ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na Britain (afọ 1931 rụọ afọ 1943), ebe ọ nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọ elu n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
A mụrụ Frank Graham Bell n'ubochí irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1910 nà South Africa nkè ógè a, na Durban ma ọ bụ Transvaal Province
O nwere nwanne nwoke nke obere, Geoffrey Graham Bell, onye ghọkwara onye na-ese ihe
O buru ụzọ rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ akụ na ugbo tupu ọ tụgharịa na nka
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Durban Art School, ma mee ihe ngosi izizi ya na City Hall na Durban n'afọ 1931
N'afọ 1931, ya na Anne Bilbrough kwagara Britain, nwa agbọghọ na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọ mechara lụọ ma bụrụ nne nke naanị nwa ha nwanyị bụ Harriet
Na mbụ, ọrụ Duncan Grant kpaliri ya; mgbé ahụ ọ zutere William Coldstream
N'afọ 1934 n'okpuru mmetụta nke Geoffrey Tibble, o gosipụtara ọrụ ndị na-abụghị ndị nnọchiteanya na ngosi nkè Objective Abstractions na Zwemmer Gallery
N'agbata afọ 1934 na afọ 1937 Bell hapụrụ ise ihe ma bídó ọrụ odeakụkọ
O nyere aka na New Statesman wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ onye nchịkọta nka ya
Bell bịdọrọ ise ihe ọzọ, n'afọ 1937 ya na William Coldstream, Lawrence Gowing, Rodrigo Moynihan, Victor Pasmore na Claude Rogers, ghọrọ onye guzobere Euston Road School
Ìgwè ndị na-ese ihe a na-akụzi ma ọ bụ na-amụ ihe na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke eserese na eserese nke ha guzobere na ọnụọgụgụ narị atọ na iri na isii Euston Road na London
Ha nwere mmasị n'omenala nke eserese sitere na ọrụ Cézanne, na-emeghachi omume megide ụdị avant-garde ma na-ekwusi ike na mkpa ọ dị ise ihe ọdịnala n'ụzọ dị adị
Ihe omume ha dabeere n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke ịmepụta nka a na-aghọta nke ọma na nke metụtara mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze
Ọtụtụ ndị otu ahụ bụ ndị Socialist na ụfọdụ bụ ndị otu Communist Party
Ọtụtụ na-edekọkwa oge ha maka ndị ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu dị ka akụkụ nke Mass Observation movement, mana ọrụ ha abụghị mgbasa ozi n'ụzọ nke Socialist Realism
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere njikọ na Artists' International Association, ma nyere ndị na-ese ihe na-agbapụ na Nazi Germany aka ịkwaga ma chọta ọrụ
N'afọ 1960, Harriet Graham Bell, naanị nwa nwanyị Frank, lụrụ ónyé na-anakọta ihe osise John Cullis

Mgbè agha ahụ gasịrị, Lund Humphries bipụtara The Paintings of Graham Bell na mmeghe nke Sir Kenneth Clark (afọ 1947), na Arts Council of Great Britain gụnyere ụfọdụ ọrụ Bell na ngosi ha, The Euston Road School (afọ 1948)
Okwu otuto nye John na Harriet Cullis', The Journal of Wyndham Lewis Studies, Mpịakọta nke 7 (2016), peeji nke 3410147
Grange School bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ụbọchị nke onwe na Ikeja, obodo, gọọmentị ime obodo na isi obodo Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
Otu ìgwè ndị mba Briten guzobere Grange School na 1958, iji nye agụmakwụkwọ nke ya na nke a na-enweta na UK
Onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ osote onye isi British High Commissioner na Naịjirịa
Dị ka akụkụ nke ncheta afọ iri anọ na Septemba afọ 1998, Board chere na oge eruola ịgbakwunye ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka ịga n'ihu na nkwụsi ike na agụmakwụkwọ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ
Nzọụkwụ Primary na-akwadebe ụmụ akwụkwọ maka ule CheckPoint nke abụọ
Ya mere, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ahụ na-aga n'ihu na Key Stage 3 na-agwụ na Checkpoint Exams na Key Staje 4 nke na-agbadata na IGCSE (International General Certificate of Secondary Education)
Ule abụọ ahụ nọ n'okpuru nkwado nke Mahadum Cambridge Local Examination Syndicate (UCLES)
A na-atụ anya na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na Grange School dị ka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke narị anọ na iri atọ na ngalaba praịmarị nke sitere na klas nnabata ruo Afọ isii, n'etiti afọ anọ na iri na otu
E nwere ụmụ akwụkwọ narị atọ na iri abụọ na isii na sekọndrị, Afọ 7Asaa ruo Afọ 11iri na otu, n'etiti afọ iri na otu iri na isii
Iwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-ejigide ọnụ ọgụgụ klas nke iri na otu ruo iri na itoolu
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-agba ụmụ akwụkwọ ume isonye na mmemme ọrụ ebere yana ihe omume ndị ọzọ dị ka chess, nka na ọrụ aka, igwu mmiri, tennis, bọọlụ, na basketball

Grania Eve Kaiman Davis (July 17, 1943 , April 28, 2017) bụ onye edemede America na onye nchịkọta akụkọ akụkọ sayensị na akụkọ ifo na akụkọ mkpirikpi
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ nke ọrụ di mbụ ya, Avram Davidson, bipụtara mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
A họpụtara The Boss in the Wall (1998, Tachyon Publications na Avram Davidson) maka onyinye Nebula na ngalaba Best Novella
Amụrụ Davis Grania Eve Kaiman na Milwaukee, Wisconsin, ma too na Hollywood, California
Ọ lụrụ Avram Davidson na mbido afọ 1960 n'ụlọ ndị edemede ibe ya Damon Knight na Kate Wilhelm na Milford, Pennsylvania, ha wee mụọ nwa nwoke, Ethan, n'afọ 1962
Ha biri na New York City na Amecameca, Mexico, tupu ha agbasaa alụmdi na nwunye ha ma ha abụọ kwaga San Francisco
Ọ biri na San Rafael, California, ruo ọtụtụ afọ ya na di ya nke abụọ, Stephen L
Davis
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel 28, 2017

Granola bụ nri ụtụtụ na nri na-atọ ụtọ nke nwere oats, mkpụrụ osisi, mmanụ aṅụ ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ na-atọ ọchị dị ka shuga na-acha nchara nchara, na mgbe ụfọdụ osikapa, nke a na-esikarị ya ruo mgbe ọ dị mma, a na-akpọ ya na ọla edo
A na-akpali ngwakọta ahụ mgbe a na-eme achịcha iji zere ire ọkụ na iji mee ka nri ụtụtụ na-agbanwe agbanwe
A na-agbakwunye mkpụrụ osisi a mịrị amị, dị ka mkpụrụ vaịn na mkpụrụ osisi, na ihe ndị dị ka chocolate mgbe ụfọdụ
A na-eri Granola na yogọt, mmanụ aṅụ, mkpụrụ osisi ọhụrụ (dị ka unere, strawberries ma ọ bụ blueberries), mmiri ara ehi ma ọ bụ ụdị ọka ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka ihe dị n'elu maka achịcha dị iche iche, nri oriri ma ọ bụ ice cream
Muesli yiri granola, ma e wezụga na ọ bụghị omenala ka a na-eme ya ka ọ dị ụtọ ma ọ bụ na-eme achịcha
A na-ewere Granola mgbe ụfọdụ mgbe ị na-aga ije, ogige, ma ọ bụ backpacking n'ihi na ọ na-edozi ahụ, dị mfe, calorie dị elu, ma dị mfe ichekwa (ihe ndị na-eme ka ọ dị ka ngwakọta ụzọ na muesli)

Ndị na-emepụta ihe na-agbakwunye mmanụ aṅụ, ọka syrup, ma ọ bụ maple syrup na ya ma tinye ya n'ime ụlọ mmanya granola, nke na-eme ka ọ dị mfe iburu maka nri ehihie, ịga ije, ma ọ bụrụ ihe omume ndị ọzọ n'èzí
Aha Granula na Granola bụ akara ahịa edebara aha na ngwụcha narị afọ nke 19 na mba United States maka nri ndị nwere ihe na-atọ ụtọ na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ ma sie ya ruo mgbe ọ ga-esi
Aha ahụ bụ ugbu a akara ahịa naanị na Australia na New Zealand, mana a ka na-akpọkarị muesli n'ebe ahụ
James Caleb Jackson mepụtara Granula na Dansville, New York na Jackson Sanitarium na afo 1863
Jackson Sanitarium bụ ụlọ ọgwụ a ma ama nke na-arụ ọrụ na mmalite narị afọ nke 20 n'akụkụ ugwu na-ele Dansville anya
A makwaara ya dị ka Our Home on the Hillside; ya mere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ guzobere iji ree ọka Jackson bụ nke a maara dị ka Our home Granula Company
Granula bụ ntụ ọka Graham ma yie ụdị mkpụrụ vaịn buru ibu
Ọ bụ John Harvey Kellogg mepụtara ọka yiri nke ahụ
A makwara ya na mbụ dị ka Granula, mana a gbanwere aha ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Granola iji zere nsogbu iwu na Jackson
A maliteghachiri nri na aha ahụ n'afọ ndị afọ 1960, a gbakwunyere mkpụrụ osisi na mkpụrụ osisi na ya iji mee ka ọ bụrụ nri ahụike nke na-ewu ewu na ahụike na okike hippie
N'oge ahụ, ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-azọrọ na ha emeela ka ma ọ bụ mepụta granola ọzọ
Onye ọzọ na-akwalite ya bụ Layton Gentry, nke a kọwara na Time dị ka 'Johnny Granola-Seed'
N'afọ 1964, Gentry rere ikike nke usoro nri granola site na iji oats, nke o kwuru na ọ bụ ya chepụtara onwe ya, na Sovex Natural Foods maka $ 3,000
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na afọ 1953 na Holly, Michigan site n'aka ezinụlọ Hurlinger na ebumnuche bụ isi nke imepụta ihe na-eme ka ihe iko achịcha na soy sauce nke a maara dị ka 'Sovex'
Na mbido afọ 1964, John Goodbrad zụrụ ya wee kwaga Collegedale, Tennessee
N'afọ 1967, Gentry zụrụ ikike maka ọdịda anyanwụ nke Rockies maka $ 1,500 wee ree ikike nke ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ na Wayne Schlotthauer nke Lassen Foods na Chico, California, maka $ 18,000
E guzobere Lassen site na ụlọ ọrụ na-eme achịcha nri dị mma nke nna nna Schlotthauer na-elekọta
E nyere ikike Canada na afo 1972 na Congregation Shalom Ba-olam, otu ọrụ ebere nke mepụtara 'Layton Gentry's Original Crunchy Granola' dị ka onye na-anakọta ego

N'afọ 1969, n'oge Woodstock, Lisa Law rịọrọ ndị na-ahazi emume maka $ 3,000 iji zụta, na New York City, oats, bulgar wheat, wheat germ, apricots a mịrị amị, currants, almonds, soy sauce, na mmanụ aṅụ iji mee muesli, ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo nyere ihe dị ka mmadụ 130,000 iko Dixie
N'afọ 1972, onye isi na Pet Milk, St
Louis, Missouri, wepụtara Heartland Natural Cereal, nnukwu granola azụmahịa mbụ
N'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ n'otu oge ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ Quaker Oats wepụtara Quaker 100% Natural Granola
Gentry yiri Quaker egwu na ọ ga-eme ihe n'ụlọ ikpe, ha wee gbanwee aha ngwaahịa ha ka ọ bụrụ Harvest Crunch
N'ime otu afọ, Kellogg ewebatala ọka granola ya 'Country Morning' na General Mills ewebatala 'Nature Valley' ya
N'afọ 1974, McKee Baking (mgbe e mesịrị McKee Foods), ndị na-eme achịcha Little Debbie, zụrụ Sovex
N'afọ 1998, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara akara Heartland wee bufee mmepụta ya na Collegedale
N'afọ 2004, a gbanwere aha Sovex ka ọ bụrụ 'Blue Planet Foods'
Ụlọ mmanya Granola (ma ọ bụ ụlọ mmanya muesli) aghọwo ihe a ma ama dị ka ihe oriri, yiri flapjack ọdịnala a maara na British Isles na Newfoundland
Ogwe Granola nwere granola agwakọ ya na mmanụ aṅụ ma ọ bụ syrup ndị ọzọ na-atọ ụtọ, a na-agbanye ya ma na-eme ya ka ọ bụrụ ụdị ogwe, na-akpata mmepụta nke nri dị mfe
A na-etinye ogwe Granola n'otu n'otu na akpa a kara akara, ọbụlagodi mgbe a zụrụ igbe nke ọtụtụ ogwe
Nke a na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka itinye mmanya a na-etinye n'ime akpa, akpa azụ ma ọ bụ akpa ọzọ maka oriri n'oge ọzọ
Ngwaahịa ahụ kachasị ewu ewu na mbà United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, United Kingdom, akụkụ ndịda Europe, Brazil, Israel, Ndịda Afrịka, na Japan

Jayne Hurley, onye isi na-ahụ maka nri na-edozi ahụ nke na-arụ ọrụ maka Center for Science in the Public Interest, na-ekwu na ụlọ mmanya granola abụghị 'ihe oriri ahụike' na '[t]hey're n'ụzọ bụ isi kuki na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nri ahụike'
E jiri ya tụnyere mmanya chocolate Kit Kat, n'otu ịdị arọ, mmanya ahụekere Nature Valley granola nwere calorie na abụba yiri nke ahụ, yana sodium karịa ma ọ bụ ọkara shuga
Matzo granola bụ nri ụtụtụ ndị Juu na-eri n'oge ezumike Ista
Ọ na-agụnye iberibe matzo gbawara agbawa n'ọnọdụ oats
Enwere ike ịme ọtụtụ ọdịiche site na itinye ihe ndị ọzọ
Grasshopper bụ ọrụ nkè United States Air Force na United States Navy iji mepụta ụlọ ọrụ ihu igwe robot a na-ebugharị ebugharị nke parachute si n'ụgbọ elu dị ányá na mmalite afọ 1950
E mèrè Grasshopper ka e jiri parachute tinye ya n'ókèala ndị iro na redio weghachite ozi ihu igwe màkà mwakpo ikuku
Site na USAF Grasshopper mgbè a tụpụrụ ya site na ụgbọ elu dị ányá, obere bọmbụ na-agbawa agbawa na-agbanyụ parachute mgbè ọ kụrụ n'ala
Mgbè ógè a họọrọ, bọmbụ nke abụọ ga-agbasa ụkwụ nke otu ahụ mgbè ọ na-edozi ya n'ala

N'ikpeazụ, ụgwọ nke atọ na-agbawa agbawa ga-agbatị antenna ma mee ka otu ahụ dị njikere ịmalite ịtụle ihu igwe, na-agbasa ha ugboro atọ n'ụbọchị na ógè ahọpụtara (ka ụgbọelu ndị ọzọ wee nwee ike iburu mgbaàmà dị mkpirikpi)
Great Women Masters of Art bụ akwụkwọ ntụaka afọ 2003 nke onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nka bụ Jordi Vigué gbakọtara ma dezie ya, nke gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe n'oge ochie
Okwu mmalite nke akwụkwọ ahụ na-ekwupụta mkpali ya iji mejuputa 'mgbidi ncheta ma echiche ndị na-ekweyi' gbasara nka ụmụ nwanyị

Ọ na-ekwupụta ozugbo ihe isi ike nke ijikwa isiokwu sara mbara dị otú ahụ, mana mgbe mkpirikpi banyere ụmụ nwanyị ndị na-ese foto site n'afọ ruo afọ ole ọ bụla gasịrị, o debere aha ya maka ndepụta ụmụnwaanyị a
Greater China bụ mpaghara ala na -ezighi ezi nke na -ekerịta mmekọrịta azụmahịa na ọdịnala na Han Chinese , yana na enweghị mmasị
Echiche nke 'Greater China' na -ezo aka na mpaghara nke gụnyere Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau na Taiwan na East Asia
Ụfọdụ ndị nyocha nwekwara ike ịgụnye obodo ndị China ndị ọzọ gburugburu ụwa dịka Singapore
Enwere ike ijikọ okwu a ka ọ bụrụ 'njikọ n'etiti mpaghara mpaghara China'
na-ejikarị ọkpụokwu a egbochi mkpalite uche ndi mmadụ gbanyere ọnọdụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke Taiwan
E jila ọkpụokwu a kwuo okwu ọtụtụ oge gara aga, mana nghọta na ebumnobi ndi ji ya kwuo a bụghị otu
Ọkpụokwu a si n'asụsụ Bekee pụtakwara ọzọ n'agbata afọ 1980 ruo 1989 iji gosi mmekọrịta n'okwu akụnaụba nakwa ịdịnotu nke ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nwere ike inweta mpaghara ya dị iche iche
Ọ bụghị otu kwụụrụ onwe ya dịka EU, ASEAN, maọbụ AU
Ọkpụokwu a bụ aha e ji chịkọta òtù ahịa dị iche iche a hụrụ dịka ndị nwere njikọta n'okwụ akụnụba
N'ihi ya, ọ pụtaghị nkwụrụonwe
Ọ bụghị mgbe ọ bụla ka ọkpụokwu a na-agụnye Taiwan
Ọmụmaatụ, Cisco na-eji 'Greater China na Taiwan' egosipụta ahịa

akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ monday (GM) bụ mmalite nke na-eme ka ndụ dị ala na nke na-adịgide adịgide dị mfe
Tọrọ ntọala na 2012 na Hong Kong, GM na-ezube ịlụso mgbanwe ihu igwe ọgụ na ijide n'aka na nchekwa nri

Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2014, nsonaazụ nyocha nke ụlọ ọrụ nke nyocha ahịa Ipsos gosipụtara na nde mmadụ 16 Hong Kong, maọbụ 23% nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi n'obodo ahụ, nabatara ' akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ monday' - mmụba nke 18% site na 2012, na karịrị 1,000 ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na Hong Kong na-enye menu ha

Green Party nke South Africa (GPSA) bụ obere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mpaghara Western Cape
Ọ bụ onye otu Federation of Green Party of Africa
[Ihe ndekọ achọrọ]
E hiwere Ecology Party na Nọvemba 1989, mana ọ gbasasịrị ka ọ nwetasịrị naanị ndị otu 1 800

Ian Brownlie malitere Green Party (GRP) na Julaị 1992, mana ọ gbasasịrị mgbe ọ na-emerighị oche na ndị omeiwu Western Cape Provincial n'oge ntuli aka Provincial na National nke afọ 1994 n'okpuru nduzi nke Nathan Grant
Judy Sole guzobere Gọọmentị site na People Green Party (GPGP) na 1999, nke o mechara kpọwa The Green Party of South Africa
Òtù a na-asọ mpi na ntuli aka dị ka Green Party nke South Africa kemgbe ntuli aka ime obodo nke afọ 2000
N'ihi enweghị ego, Green Party nke South Africa sonyere na ntuli aka mpaghara nke afọ 2004 mana e guzobere ya na mbido Febụwarị 2019 iji sọọ mpi na ntuliaka mpaghara
