Oorobab ma ọ bụ Khoemana, nkè á makwaara dị kà Korana, mà ọ bụ Griqua, bụ asụsụ Khoe na-anwụ anwụ nkè South Africa

'Khoemana' (site na khoe 'onye' + mana 'asụsụ') bụ nkè á maara nkè ọma dị kà Korana /kɒˈrɑːnə/ (nke a na-akpọkwa Korana / kɒˈrāːnə/) mà ọ bụ Griqua (nke a makwaara dị ka Gri [xri], Xri, Xiri, Xirikwa)
Áhà 'Korana' na-egosipụta endonym bụ IPA ma ọ bụ IPA, na-ezo aka n'etiti ndị India
Mgbe ụfọdụ, á makwaara yá dị kà Cape Khoe ma ọ bụ Cape Hottentot, ọ bụ ezie ná á na-ewere nkè ikpeazụ dị kà mkparị

Á na-emekarị aha dị iche iche dị kà asụsụ dị iche iche (nke á na-akpọ South Khoekhoe mgbè á na-ejikọta ya), mànà há anaghị adaba ná ọdịiche ọ bụla dị n'asụsụ, ndị na-ekwu okwu nwere ike iji 'Korana' ná 'Griqua' n'ụzọ na-agbanwe agbanwe
Á na-ejikwa áhà abụọ ahụ mee ihe n'ụzọ sara mbara, dịka ọmụmaatụ màkà ndị Griqua
E nwere (ma ọ bụ dị) ọtụtụ olumba nkè Khoemana, mana a maghị nkọwa yá
Khoemana nwèrè njikọ chiri ányá ná Khoekhoe, usoro ụda ahụ yiri nkè la ahụ
Ndị Khoekhoe affricates na-achọsi ike bụ naanị ndị na-achọ isi [th, kh] na Khoemana
Otú ọ dị, Khoemana nwere á ejective velar affricate, //kxʼʔ//, nke a na-adịghị ahụ na Khoekhoe, ná usoro kwekọrọ ekwekọ nkè ịpị, /z͡xʼ zʼ z' z'z' iz' z

Beach (1938) kọrọ ná ndị Khoekhoe nke oge ahụ nwere velar lateral ejective affricate, [k͡??], nghọta nkịtị mà ọ bụ allophone nkè //kxʼ// n'asụsụ nwere ịpị aka, a pụkwara ịtụ ányá ná nkè á bụ eziokwu màkà Khoemana
Ná mgbakwunye, ìhè dị kà ọkara nkè okwu niile ná Khoemana malitere site na ịpị, ma e jiri yá tụnyere otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ ná Khoekhoe
Na Korana, [oe] na [oa] nwere ike ịkpọpụta dị ka [anyị] na [wa]
E nwere ụda anọ ná Khoemana
A na-eche na ọ na-adịghịzi ruo mgbe á chọtara ndị ọkà okwu anọ meworo agadi gburugburu Bloemfontein ná Kimberley
Matthias Brenzinger kọrọ ná 2012 ná otú ónyé nwere ike ikwu ókwú kà dị, mànà ná ọ jụrụ ikwu asụsụ ahụ
Ọdịiche ahụ nwèrè ike ịbụ n'ihi na asụsụ ahụ nwèrè ọtụtụ olumba ma na-aga site na ọtụtụ áhà, ná ndị ọkà mmụta anaghị ezo aka mgbè niile ná otu ndị mmadụ
E depụtara Khoemana dị ka 'nkè nọ n'ihe ize ndụ' ná UNESCO's Language Atlas
Mfu nkè asụsụ á nọ n'ihe ize ndụ ga-enwe mmetụta dị ukwuu ná ìhè nketa ná ọdịbendị nkè ndị na-asụ Khoemana
Robust Khoemana (tupu asụsụ na-adịbeghị anya) edere yá ná akwụkwọ ndekọ 1879 nkè Lucy Lloyd, nkè nwere akụkọ ise dị mkpirikpi; e mere ụfọdụ ọrụ ọzọ ná Ponelis (1975)
Kà ọ na-erule afọ 2009, ọrụ EuroBABEL na-achọ ndị ọkà okwu fọdụrụnụ
Ndị mmadụ ná asụsụ há malitere ịdọta uche ndị ọkà mmụta ná 1660s, na-adaba ná mbọ ndị Dutch na-agba ná Cape of Good Hope ná esemokwu agha ndị si ná yá pụta
N'oge ahụ, á na-asụ Khoemana n'ọtụtụ ebe n'akụkụ osimiri nkè South Africa
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nkè nkwụsịtụ n'oge ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị ná 1930s, ná n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ site ná 1948 ruo 1994, asụsụ ahụ fọrọ nke ntà kà ọ pụọ n'anya
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ bụghị naanị ná ndị na-asụ Khoemana dị ụkọ kamakwa ha gbasara, n'ihi ịkwaga n'ike n'oge oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Nke a emeela kà asụsụ ahụ bụrụ ìhè na-adịghị ike

Grizelda Boniwe Cjiekella bụ MEC (Member of the Executive Council) maka agụmakwụkwọ na Northern Cape Province, South Africa, ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi ala nke mpaghara ahụ site na 20 Febụwarị na afọ 2012 ruo 2 Eprel 2013
A mụrụ Cjiekella n'ezinụlọ ndị Xhosa ma too na Pabalello Township na Upington
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Paballelo Senior, laghachi ebe ahụ mgbe e mesịrị dị ka onye nkuzi
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Cjiekella debanyere aha na Mahadum nke Western Cape
Ọmụmụ ihe ya kwụsịrị site na itinye aka na mgba nnwere onwe

O mechara gụchaa ihe ọmụmụ ndị a na Mahadum nke Free State Nnyocha na Nchịkwa, Iwu na Nlekọta, Atụmatụ Atụmatụ, Iwu Ikike na Kọmitii na usoro ụlọ na Gọọmentị Obodo (MFMA) Integrated Performance Management Act
Ọtụtụ ndị chetara na ọ na-etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, site n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ bụ onye otu SRC
N'afọ 1986, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ANC Youth Congress na Upington, ọrụ ọ rụrụ ruo n'afọ 1988
N'otu oge na ruo n'afọ 1990 ọ bụ onye otu Civic Organisation; ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke ANC Women's Congress na Upington (1988-1989)

Ọnọdụ ya n'ime usoro African National Congress siri ike n'ịghọ osote onye isi oche nke ngalaba ANC (1990-1994), osote onye osote onyeisiala mpaghara ANC (1995-1996), onye isi oche mpaghara ANC (1996-1997), odeakwụkwọ mpaghara nke ụmụ nwanyị nke ANC (1997-2003), na osote onye oche nke mpaghara nke Njikọ ụmụ nwanyị nke mpaghara ANC (2003-2008)
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ANC Women's League Provincial ugbu a ma bụrụkwa onye otu PEC na PWC nke ANC
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ANC Women's League NEC site n'ịbụ onye isi oche mpaghara
E zigara Cjiekella na Northern Cape Provincial Legislature dị ka onye otu Provincial legislature (MPL) na Disemba 2003
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi oche nke Northern Cape Provincial Legislature
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2009 mgbe a họpụtara ya MEC maka agụmakwụkwọ na mpaghara ahụ

Mgbe onye isi ala Northern Cape Hazel Jenkins dara, na-arịa ọrịa strok, na afọ 2012, ndị isi oche nke mpaghara ahụ zutere na 20 Febụwarị, na-ekpebi otu olu ịhọpụta Grizelda Cjiekella dị ka onye isi ala na-anọchiteanya oge ezumike nká
Oge ya dị ka onye isi ala kwụsịrị na 2 Eprel 2013 mgbe Hazel Jenkins si n'ọkwa onye isi ala nke Northern Cape pụta ma Sylvia Lucas, Minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, ga-anọchi ya
Grizelda Cjiekella nwụrụ na mberede mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ n'obodo Kimberley na 28 Ọgọst, na afọ 2015
Aha nna Grobbelaar nke ndị Afrikaans, sitere na German Grobler
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na

Ntọrọ di, nke a maara dịka Pakaruah shaadi ma ọ bụ Jabaria shaadi, bụ ihe na-eme n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Bihar, na steeti ọwụwa anyanwụ Uttar Pradesh, nke a ma ama na Munger na Dumka (nke dị na Jharkhand ugbu a) ebe ezinụlọ nwanyị a na-atọrọ ndị bachelors ruru eru ma mesịa lụọ n'ike, iji nweta ndị ikom nwere agụmakwụkwọ ka mma na / ma ọ bụ ndị ikom bara ọgaranya
N'iburu n'uche ọdịnala maka sacrament alụmdi na nwunye, ọtụtụ alụmdi na nwunye dị otú ahụ anaghị akagbu
Tụkwasị na nke ahụ, nwoke ahụ na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ nwere ike ịta ahụhụ ebubo mpụ adịgboroja n'okpuru iwu ụgwọ ụlọ nke mba India, ma mechaa lụọ ogologo agha iwu
Omume ahụ malitere ịpụta ìhè na ngwụsị narị afọ nke iri abụọ, ebe ego ịgba ụgwọ ụlọ ghọrọ ihe mgbochi ma ndị otu a haziri ahazi bịara n'ihu iji mee ntọ ahụ
N'afọ 2009, a kọrọ banyere ntọ 1224 maka alụmdi na nwunye na Bihar, nke e mere n'aha ezinụlọ nke ndị nwunye
Omume ahụ, nke bụ ọdịda nke omenala ịgba ụgwọ, pụtara ìhè n'afọ 1980s
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ nwetara nkwado ọha na eze n'etiti ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị elu dị ka Bhumihars, ọkachasị na steeti dị ka Bihar na Uttar Pradesh, ebe a na-achọ ụgwọ dị elu
Ịchọ ụgwọ ọlụlụ bụ iwu na-akwadoghị na India ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri ise (50), ebe ọ bụ na ngafe nke Iwu Mmachibido Dowry nke afọ 1961
N'omume ahụ, a na-elekwasị anya na ndị nwere ike ịlụ nwanyị ọhụrụ, na-esitekarị n'ezinụlọ ndị nwere ego
Ụmụ okorobịa ndị kpochapụrụ ule IAS ha, nwere nzere ahụike ma ọ bụ injinia ma ọ bụ nweta ọrụ gọọmentị, bụ ndị ezinụlọ ndị na-enweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ nnukwu ụgwọ
A na-atọrọ 'ụmụnwoke' ndị a, jide ha n'agha ma na-akụkarị ha ihe tupu a lụọ ha n'ike, mgbe mgbe ha ejiri eriri kee ha n'úkwù ha wee ghara ịgbapụ

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ bụrụ na nwoke ahụ na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ na-anwa ịpụ onwe ya n'alụmdi na nwunye ahụ, ọ na-eche ogologo agha iwu na ọbụna ebubo mpụ n'okpuru iwu Indian Dowry, nke ezubere ichebe ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'alụmdi na nwunye ahụ, dịka n'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ, ezinụlọ nwanyị a na-alụ ọhụrụ nwere ego siri ike
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ndị omempụ a haziri ahazi aghọwo akụkụ nke omume ahụ, ebe ha na-eme ntọ maka ego ma na-ekwe nkwa na onye na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ 'na-agbaso' mgbe ọ lụsịrị di na nwunye' maka ego ọzọ
N'ihi ya, ọtụtụ alụmdi na nwunye dị otú ahụ anaghị akọ akụkọ ma na-aga n'ihu n'ihi egwu ime ihe ike site n'aka ndị omempụ obodo

N'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1993, magazin India Today kọrọ banyere ntọ ndị dị otú ahụ site n'aka 'òtù mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya', otu n'ime ha guzobere n'afọ 1982 na mba Bihar, iji tọọrọ ndị na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ na-achọ nnukwu ụgwọ ma lụọ ha n'ike

N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, ọ bụrụ na nwoke na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ na-arịọ maka nnukwu ụgwọ ma ọ bụ na-apụ n'alụmdi na nwunye n'ihi nsogbu ụgwọ, ezinụlọ nwa agbọghọ ahụ na-eme ihe ndị dị otú ahụ, na-eme ka a tọọrọ nwoke ahụ na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ site na ndị omempụ
N'ike mmụọ nsọ site na ahụmịhe ndụ nke ezigbo enyi, onye nduzi Sushil Rajpal emeela ihe nkiri banyere okwu ahụ
Aha ya bụ Antardwand, o meriri n'afọ 2007 National Film Award for Best Film on Social Issues, ma wepụta ya n'afọ 2010
Ntọrọ di na nwunye bụkwa isiokwu nke usoro TV, Sab Ki Jodi Wohi Banata Bhagyavidhataa (2009) na Colours TV
A na-ahụkwa omume ahụ na ihe nkiri ndị India na-atọ ọchị, Jabariya Jodi na Atrangi Re
Grootslang ma ọ bụ Grote Slang (na Afrikaans na Dutch bu 'nnukwu agwọ') bụ ekere eke a ma ama nke a na-ekwu na ọ bi n'ọgba miri emi di na Richtersveld, nke South Africa
Grootslang bụ nnukwu agwọ bi n'ọgba a maara dị ka 'Wonder Hole' ma ọ bụ 'Bottomless Pit'
A na-eche na ọgba ahụ jikọtara ya na oké osimiri 64 kilomita (40 mi)
Dị ka akụkọ ifo obodo si kọọ, ọgba ahụ jupụtara na olaocha
Mbe ụfọdụ a na-akọwa ọgba ahụ dị ka ọ nke jikọtara ga na Osimiri Oroma site na ọkpọkọ nke a na eji nwayọọ gbanye ọlaọcha n'ime nke ọhụrụ
A na-ekwukwa na nnukwu ọdọ mmiri dị n'okpuru Catatract Eze George na Aughrabies Falls bụ ebe obibi ndị Grootslang na ebe esi ewepụta ọlaọcha
N'ebe a, a na-ekwu na a agwọ ukwuu ahụ na agba onwe ya gburugburu na ebe ọlaedo na nkume dị oké ọnụ dị
The Glamour of Prospecting, onye ọchụ nta ọlaedo na South Africa bụ F
Cornell kọwara 'Groot Slang' dị ka nnukwu agwọ a sịrị na ọ bi n'ime nnukwu nkume n'etiti Osimiri Orange, ma atotakwa ehi nʼakụkụ osimiri ahụ
A na-ahutakwa nkwere na ekere eke a dị ka ihe ammara nke ọma n'etiti ndị Khoekhoe (nke Cornell kọwara dị na 'Richtersfeld Hottentots') ma ndị ọcha bi n'ebe ahụ, ndị na atụ nnukwu agwọ ahụ oké egwu
N'ọdịdị, a na-ekwu na agwọ ahụ dị mita iri anọ ruo iri ise n'ogologo, ma obosara ya dị ka ụzọ dị ụkwụ atọ
Dị ka otu akụkọ a kọrọ n'etiti ndị Bushmen si kwuo, Grootslang di okenye karịa ụwa ma ọ ga-echebe akụ ya ruo mgbe ebighi ebi
Ụdị ọkụkọ ifo aọzọ kọrọ a Grootslang bụ mmụọ nke e nyere ọrụ ichebe ọgba ya n'aka ndị na-achọ akụ, nakwa na ọnụnọ ya nwere mmeri 'mmetụta ihe ọjọ

Mgbe ọ na-achọ akụ na Richtersveld nke South Africa na afo 1917, onye ọchụnta ego England bụ Peter Grayson furu efu mgbe ọdụm wakporo ma merụọ ndị otu ya ahụ, nke kpalitere asịrị na ndị Grootslang egbugol ya
Dị ka akụkọ ifo si kọọ, ọ bụ sọ naanị otu onye banyere na Wonder Hole ma laghachi
Nke a bụ onye na-achọ aku nke jiri eriri gbadaa n'ime ọgba ahụ ruo mgbe ọ ruru n'akụkụ ahụ aja
N'ebe ahụ, ọ hụrụ ọwa mmiri na-eduba n'ime ma na'isi ísì sulfur siri ike, mana ọ tọgbọrọ ọkụ eletrik ya mgbe ụsụ fere bịa n'ebe ọ nọ nke mere ka a dochie ya azụ
Ọ gbadaghị n'ime ọgba ahụ ọzọ
N'akwụkwọ Where Men Still Dream, onye nta akụkọ mba South Africa na onye edemede Lawrence G
Green na-eche na akụkọ ifo nke Grootslang sitere na ịhụ eke, nke nwere ike iru mita iri abụọ na ise n'ogologo
Nkọwa ndị ọzọ nke akụkọ ifo ahụ, dị ka nha ya karịrị ezigbo eke na ọlaọcha dị n'ime oghere anya nke e kere eke ahụ, bụ nke Green na-ajụ dị ka akụkọ akọbigara ókè

Ntọala bụ usoro ịdọ aka ná ntị n'ozuzu nke a na-eji ụmụaka eme ihe, nke a machibidoro iwu ịhapụ ebe obibi ha, ewezuga ihe omume achọrọ, dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ (ọ gwụla ma a kwụsịrị ma ọ bụ chụpụrụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ), nlekọta ahụike dị mkpa, ịga ebe nke ofufe, ma ọ bụ ileta nne na nna na-adịghị elekọta ya N'ime oge a, a na-ewepụ ihe nkwado ọ bụla dị mma, a na-ewepụkarị ihe ùgwù ndị ọzọ, dị ka mana ọnweghị oke na iji ịntanetị, igwu egwuregwu vidiyo, ma ọ bụ ikiri telivishọn Ntaramahụhụ ahụ nwere ike ịgụnye ịmekwu ọrụ ọrụ ma ọ bụ ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
A na-eji ntọala eme ihe ndị ọzọ dika ịdọ aka ná ntị anụ ahụ, dịka, ịkụ aka, maka njikwa omume n'ụlọ
Dị ka nyocha nke afọ 2000 banyere nsonaazụ ụmụaka si kwuo, 'E mepụtala ntọala dị ka ụzọ ịdọ aka ná ntị dị irè karịa ịkụ aka na ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma
' Ntọala nwere ike imebi ma ọ bụrụ na ụdị na oge mgbochi dị oke njọ maka omume a chọrọ idozi, ma ọ bụ ma ọ bụrụ na mgbochi ahụ siri ike maka nne ma ọ bụ nna ịmanye n'ihi nguzogide

E jiri okwu a mee ihe na mbido n' ihe ụgbọelu mgbe a na-egbochi onye na-anya ụgbọelu ịkwọ ụgbọelu n'ihi omume rụrụ arụ, ọrịa, nsogbu teknụzụ na ụgbọelu ahụ, ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ, onye na-anya ụgbọelu 'ala' - ya bụ, n'ụzọ nkịtị na-ejedebe n'ala
Groupe L'Avenir bụ otu mgbasa ozi nke Democratic Republic of the Congo
Pius Mwabilu Mbayu tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1994, onye na-anọgide taa dị ka onye isi ya
Otu a nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, ma nwee ụlọ ọrụ ibu na DRC na South Africa

Ọ na-arụ ụlọ ahịa SNMVT Monoprix na Géant, n'okpuru ikike sitere na Groupe Casino

Ihe nrite Gruber maka ikike ụmụnwanyị, nke e guzobere n'afọ 2003, bụ otu n'ime ihe nrite mba ụwa ise ruru US $ 500,000 nke òtù The Peter and Patricia Gruber Foundation nyere, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-abaghị uru nke mba America

E nyere Peter na Patricia Gruber Foundation Women's Rights Prize nye onye ma ọ bụ otu nke nyere onyinye dị ukwuu, mgbe mgbe n'ihe ize ndụ onwe onye ma ọ bụ ọkachamara, iji kwalite ikike nke ụmụnwanyị na ụmụagbọghọ na mpaghara ọ bụla na ịkwalite mmata ọha na eze banyere mkpa ọ dị maka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị iji nweta ụwa ziri ezi
Ndị otu ndị ọkachamara na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụnwanyị na mba ụwa họpụtara ndị natara ya site na nhọpụta ndị a na-enweta site na gburugburu ụwa
Ntọala ahụ kwanyeere ma gbaa ume agụmakwụkwọ kacha mma, ikpe ziri ezi na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ihe ndị sayensị rụzuru nke na-eme ka ọnọdụ mmadụ ka mma
N'afọ 2011, a kwụsịrị Nrite maka ikike ụmụnwanyị
Guéhiébly bụ ọgbakọ ruo Maachị 2012, mgbe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime obodo 1126 ndị e wepụrụ na mba niile
GuarantCo bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye ego na akụrụngwa ma na-akwado mmepe nke ahịa ego na mba ndị nwere obere ego na Asia na Africa
Ewebatara GuarantCo na 2005 na Port Louis, Mauritius iji kwado ọrụ akụrụngwa yana nyere aka mmepe nke ahịa ego mpaghara na mba ndị ka na-emepe emepe gafee Eshia na Africa
GuarantCo bụ akụkụ nke Group Development Infrastructure (PIDG)
E mepere ụlọ ọrụ mbụ nke GuarantCo, nke mechara bụrụ isi ụlọ ọrụ ya, na 2005 na Ebene, Mauritius
Na 2015, e mepere ụlọ ọrụ na Nairobi iji kwado ụlọ ọrụ Africa
Na Mee 2016, Cardano Development, site na enyemaka ya GuarantCo Management Company, malitere ijikwa ọrụ nke GuarantCo
Ndị gọọmentị United Kingdom, Switzerland, Australia na Sweden na-akwado GuarantCo
Ọzọkwa, a na-akwado ya site na PIDG Trust, Netherlands, site na FMO, na PIDG Trust, France site na ụlọ ọrụ na-echere, yana Global Affairs Canada site na ụlọ ọrụ akwụghachi
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ na mba 22
GuarantCo nwere oru otutu obodo abuo na Africa na Asia
Dị ka nke 2019, ụlọ ọrụ emechaala azụmahịa 57 na mba 22 wee mee ka $ 58 ijeri itinye ego

Guaranty Trust Holding Company PLC nke a makwaara dị ka GTCO PLC bụ otu ọrụ ego nke mba dị iche iche, nke na-enye ụlọ akụ na-ere ahịa na itinye ego, njikwa ezumike nká, njikwa akụ na ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ, nke nwere isi na Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria
E kere GTCO Plc na Julaị 2021 na-esote nhazi ụlọ ọrụ nke Guaranty Trust Bank PLC n'ime ụlọ ọrụ Holding Company
Nhazi nke GTCO Plc pụtara na ọ ga-enye ọrụ ndị ọzọ karịa ụlọ akụ; na azụmaahịa ịkwụ ụgwọ dị n'elu uche maka otu ahụ
N'okpuru usoro ochie ya, ọ pụghị ịrụ ọrụ azụmaahịa na-abụghị ịgbazinye ego n'ihi na iwu 2010 nke Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) nyere ụlọ akụ iwu ka ha kwụsị ịrụ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ha na-abụghị ụlọ akụ
Ha ga-ahapụ ọrụ ịgbazinye ego na-abụghị isi ma ọ bụ gbanwee dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ego
Azụmaahịa ọhụrụ ya gụnyere ịkwụ ụgwọ, njikwa ezumike nká, njikwa akụ, na azụmaahịa ụlọ akụ ya dị ugbu a
Ụlọ akụ ụlọ akụ GTCO na Naijiria, Guaranty Trust Bank Limited bụ ụlọ akụ Naijiria kacha baa uru site na ọnụ ahịa ahịa ya na nso nso a na naira ijeri narị puku asatọ na iri anọ, kobo iri abụọ na isii

Guaranty Trust Holding Plc mbụ malitere dị ka Guaranty trust Banks ma ihe karịrị ndị Naijiria iri atọ na ise nọ n'afọ iri atọ na ise tọrọ ntọala ya n'afọ 1988, nke Tayo Aderinokun na Fola Adeola duziri, kamakwa gụnyere Femi Pedro, Gbolade Osibodu, Femi Akingbe, Akin Opeodu na ndị ọzọ
E guzobere Guaranty Trust Bank Plc na 1990 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka obere ụgwọ (LLC) nke Central Bank of Nigeria na-achịkwa iji nye ndị Naijiria ọrụ azụmahịa na ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ akụ ahụ malitere ọrụ dị ka ụlọ akụ azụmahịa na 1991
Ụlọ akụ ahụ meghere isi ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya na Febụwarị 11, 1991, na The Plaza, Adeyemo Alakija, Victoria Island, Lagos
N'afọ 1992, ụlọ akụ ahụ meghere alaka abụọ na Lagos (Ikeja na Broad Street), yana alaka mbụ ya na Kano, na alaka Port-Harcourt na 1993
Na Septemba 1996, Guaranty Trust Bank plc ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa n'ihu ọha ma nata onyinye onye isi ala site na Naịjirịa Stock Exchange
Ụlọ akụ ahụ natara ikike ụlọ akụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na Febụwarị 2002 ma mesịa bụrụ ụlọ akụ Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) họpụtara ya dị ka ụlọ akụ na 2003
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka na Gambia na Sierra Leone
Guaranty Trust Bank mere òkè nke abụọ ya n'afọ 2004 wee nweta ihe karịrị ijeri iri na otu site n'aka ndị Naịjirịa na-etinye ego iji gbasaa ọrụ ya
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2007, GTBank ghọrọ ụlọ akụ Subsaharan mbụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa mbụ edepụtara na London Stock Exchange na Deutsche Börse
IPO ahụ nwetara US dollar narị nde asaa na iri ise
N'otu afọ ahụ, ha nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'itinye mbipụta Eurobond nke mbụ nke Naịjirịa na ahịa isi obodo mba ụwa
GTBank US dollar narị nde ise Eurobond
Eurobond bụ nke mbụ Benchmark Eurobond nke ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria na mmemme Eurobond abụọ nke GTBaisek n'ime afọ 5 gara aga
A na-atụle ụgwọ ogologo oge nke Guaranty Trust Bank plc BB- site na Standard & Poor's na AA- site na Fitch Ratings, nke bụ ọkwa kachasị elu maka ụlọ akụ Naijiria
Ha webatara ụlọ akụ n'ịntanetị na ụlọ akụ SMS na Naijiria na naira a na-akpọ MasterCard yana kaadị Platinum na World Signia na GTB-on-wheels, alaka mkpanaka
Na 12 Maachị 2008, GTBank nyere ikike ụlọ akụ maka United Kingdom site na Financial Services Authority
Guaranty Trust Bank Limited bụ onye mmekọ nke Eko Atlantic City, agwaetiti ọhụrụ (820 hectare) n'oké osimiri Atlantic, n'akụkụ Victoria Island Lagos
Ọ ga-abụ ebe obibi nke Financial District ọhụrụ
Ihe owuwu nke Eko Atlantic City malitere na 2009 ma na-atụ anya na a ga-arụcha ya na 2016
Iji cheta ncheta afọ iri abụọ nke ụlọ akụ ahụ, Ngalaba Naịjirịa na-ahụ maka ozi wepụtara stampụ stampụ GTBank Anniversary
Nke a bụ oge mbụ na Naịjirịa na a na-asọpụrụ otu ụlọ ọrụ n'ụzọ dị otú a
N'afọ 2013, ụlọ akụ ahụ nwetara pasenti iri asaa nke òkè na Fina Bank Group maka ịkwụ ụgwọ ego nke US dollar narị nde
A gbanwere alaka ụlọ akụ Fina Bank na ndị enyemaka ya ka ọ bụrụ GT Bank n'oge na-adịghị anya
N'afọ 2013, ụlọ akụ ahụ wepụtara US dollar narị nde anọ Euro bond na ọnụego coupon nke pasenti isii; nke ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria nwetara na ahịa mba ụwa

E nyere Eurobond n'okpuru US dollar nde abụo Global Medium Term Note Programme, nke edebanyere aha n'okpuru Iwu na United States of America na Iwu 144A na United Kingdom ma ree ndị na-etinye ego n'ofe Afrịka, America, Eshia na Europe
Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ puku iri
N'ọnwa Mee 2021, ụlọ akụ GT kwupụtara mgbanwe na usoro ụlọ ọrụ ya, na-aga na ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ma na-agbanye ụlọ akụ ya na azụmaahịa ndị ọzọ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka
Ndị na-etinye ego na ya kwadoro mgbanwe ahụ na Disemba 4, 2020 mgbe ụlọ ikpe nyere ikike ka ndị na-etinye aka na ya nwee nzukọ
Innoson na GTB etinyela aka n'ọgụ ụlọ ikpe ruo ogologo oge maka nkwekọrịta ego
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2019, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nyere iwu ka ụlọ akụ GT kwụọ Innoson motors ego nke ijeri asatọ na asatọ n'ihi ọmụrụ nwa

N'otu akụkọ pụrụ iche, Peoples Gazette, site na ndekọ ụlọ akụ, kpughere otu GTCO, site na enyemaka ya Investment One, si nye ego nke nde narị abụọ na akaụntụ mkpọsa nke osote onye isi ala Yemi Osinbajo, na-emebi iwu ego mkpọsa gọọmentị etiti

Agha Guerrilla na steeti Baltic bụ ọgụ ọgụ nke ndị otu Latvia, Lithuania na Estonia gbara, akpọrọ Brothers Forest (nakwa 'Ụmụnna nke Osisi' na 'Ndị Friars ọhịa'; ] Estonia metsavennad, Latvia mežabrāļi, Lithuanian žaliukai), megide Soviet Union n'oge Soviet mbuso agha na-arụ nke atọ Baltic steeti ma n'oge na mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ndị otu ndị na-emegide Soviet Central na Eastern Europe na-emegide ọchịchị Soviet na ọchịchị Kọmunist lụsoro ọgụ na Bulgaria, Poland, Romania, na n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Ukraine

Agha Guerrilla bụ ụdị agha na-adịghị mma nke obere ìgwè ndị na-alụ ọgụ, dị ka ndị ọrụ nchekwa, ndị nkịtị na-eji ngwá agha, ma ọ bụ ndị na-adịghị mma, na-eji usoro agha gụnyere mgbagha, imebi ihe, mwakpo, obere agha, usoro ịkụ na-agba ọsọ, na njem, iji mee ihe
buso ndi agha omenaala buru ibu na nke na-adighi obere agha
Gugu Gumede (a mụrụ na Disemba 10, 1991) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke amụrụ na Province of Natal
A maara ya nke ọma maka igosipụta àgwà nke onye amụma nwanyị, Mamlambo, na soapie Uzalo
A mụrụ Gumede na mpaghara Natal
Nna ya bụ Simon Hulumeni Gumede nwụrụ anwụ na nne ya bụ Zanele kaMagwaza-Msibi nwụrụ anwụ
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na American Academy of Dramatic Arts na Los Angeles
N'afọ 2013, Gumede si na United States lọta wee rụọ ọrụ dịka Mandisa na Generations, otu n'ime ihe ngosi kachasị mma na South Africa
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Gumede ka ọ gosipụta àgwà Mamlambo na ihe ngosi telivishọn a na-elekarị na South Africa, Uzalo
N'afọ 2018, o gosipụtara 11th Crown Gospel Music Awards n'akụkụ Somizi Mhlongo, Rebecca Malope, Clement Maosa na ndị ọzọ a ma ama
Gumede bụ Onye Kraịst a mụrụ ọzọ
Gugu mụrụ nwa ya nwanyị na Machị 24, 2022

Guinness Nigeria, nke Diageo Plc nke United Kingdom, ka e debanyere aha na afọ 1962 site na iwu ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta mmanya na Ikeja, obi Lagos
Ebe a na-emepụta mmanya bụ ọrụ Guinness mbụ na-abụghị Ireland na Great Britain
E meghere ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-aṅụ mmanya ka oge na-aga ụlọ ọrụ na-awu mmanya Benin City na afọ 1973 na Ogba na afọ 1963
United Africa Company (UAC) rere ngwaahịa Guinness na Naịjirịa n'afọ 1940 na afọ 1950 ma n'oge na-adịghị anya, mba ahụ ghọrọ ahịa mbupụ dị mkpa maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 1961, atụmatụ malitere n'etiti Arthur Guinness Son na Co na UAC iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta mmanya na Ikeja, Lagos
Ọ bụ Taylor Woodrow wuru ụlọ ọrụ mbụ Arthur Guinness na mpụga British Isles
Ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ahụ nwere ikike kwa afọ iji mepụta karama nde 75 ma ọ bụ barrels biya 150,000
Mpaghara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere karama karama 15 na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ nke Godwin na Hopwood mepụtara
Guinness Nigeria na-emepụta ụdị biya ndị a
Ngwaahịa RTD (dị njikere ịṅụ mmanya) gụnyere
Guinness Nigeria Plc's Water of Life initiative ugbu a na-enye ihe karịrị ndị Naijiria 500,000 mmiri ọṅụṅụ gbasaa n'ọtụtụ ime obodo, site na Northern ruo Southern Nigeria
Ọ na-akwado agụmakwụkwọ ma na-enye Guinness Eye Hospitals na obodo atọ na Naịjirịa

Guirane N'Daw (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1984) bụ onye Senegal bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-echebe etiti
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Sochaux, Nantes, Saint-Étienne, na Lens na France, maka Zaragoza na Spain, maka Birmingham City na Ipswich Town na England, na maka Asteras Tripolis na Gris
BuN'Daw malitere ọrụ ya na Sochaux
Ọ pụtara n'ihe karịrị egwuregwu 120, nke gụnyere 2007 Coupe de France Final ka Sochaux meriri Olympique Marseille na penalties, wee gbaa goolu ise maka klọb ahụ tupu ọ kwaga Nantes na 2008
Mgbe e wepụrụ Nantes na Ligue 2 na ngwụcha oge mbụ ya na klọb ahụ, N'Daw sonyeere Saint-Étienne na mgbazinye maka oge Ligue 1 nke 2009
Nkwekọrịta ahụ gụnyere nkwekọrịta nke a ga-eme ka ọ bụrụ nke na-adịgide adịgide ma ọ bụrụ na Saint-Étienne nọgidere na-enwe ọnọdụ ụgbọ elu kachasị elu
Mgbe mkpọsa gara nke ọma gasịrị, e mere mgbazinye ahụ ka ọ bụrụ nke na-adịgide adịgide maka ego € 4m
Na 24 Jenụwarị 2011 N'Daw sonyeere klọb Real Zaragoza nke Spain na mgbazinye ruo na ngwụcha oge

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2011, N'Daw sonyeere otu egwuregwu English Championship (nke abụọ) nke Birmingham City na mgbazinye ruo Jenụwarị n'afọ 2012, yana nhọrọ ịgbatị nkwekọrịta ahụ ruo na ngwụcha oge
O mere nke mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ na mmeri 3X1 na Braga na mpaghara nke Europa League
Mgbe ọtụtụ egwuregwu Europa League gasịrị, N'Daw mechara mee egwuregwu mbụ ya na Football League dị ka onye na-anọchi anya ọkara nke abụọ na mmeri 2 Xia1 na Hull City na Disemba
O guzobere onwe ya n'akụkụ Keith Fahey n'etiti etiti Birmingham, obere oge tupu ọ pụọ maka 2012 Africa Cup of Nations, a gbatịkwuru ego ya ruo na ngwụcha oge ahụ
Mgbe e wepụrụ Senegal n'oge na asọmpi ahụ, ọdịdị N'Daw na ogo ahụike dara
Ọ merụrụ ahụ ugboro ugboro n'ọkpụkpụ ụkwụ, gụnyere otu nke ọ nwetara mgbe nkeji 67 gachara West Ham United na mbido Eprel, ebe o mepụtara arụmọrụ siri ike na-echebe nchekwa ya

Ọ laghachiri maka ọkara ikpeazụ nke egwuregwu na Blackpool n'akụkụ Jordon Mutch, na-alọghachikwa site na mmerụ ahụ, mana ọ bụ 'ihe na-emebi emebi na enweghị nkọ iji mee ka ọ dịkwuo mma', na njikọta ahụ nyere bọọlụ ahụ oke
N'akụkụ ụlọ, ọ bịara maka Jonathan Spector merụrụ ahụ, ma nyere ndị otu ya aka ịmegharị site na goolu abụọ n'azụ iji mee ka egwuregwu ahụ ma merie egwuregwu ahụ na ngụkọta
N'ime oge ahụ, ọ pụtara ugboro iri abụọ na itoolu, nke iri na itoolu n'ime ha nọ na league, n'enweghị akara
N'Daw sonyeere otu egwuregwu bọọlụ bọọlụ nke English Championship Ipswich Town n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012 maka ịgbazinye ego maka oge 2012 na afọ 13
Mgbe nkwekọrịta Saint-Étienne gwụsịrị, N'Daw bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na Greek Superleague club Asteras Tripolis na 4 Septemba 2013
N'oge ọkọchị 2014, N'Daw sonyeere Ligue 1 FC Metz na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
Ọ hapụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, n'ihi na ọ pụtaghị n'afọ 2015 na mgbe onye nkuzi Alain Casanova rutere, ọ hapụrụ Ligue 2 Lens
N'Daw gbara bọọlụ mbụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Senegal n'afọ 2004
O nwetara 41 caps maka mba ya na-agba goolu 4
Ọ nọchitere anya ndị otu mba na 2006 Africa Cup of Nations, ebe ndị otu ya nwetara ọnọdụ nke anọ maka oge nke atọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
A kpọrọ aha ya n'ime ndị otu mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ maka 2012 Africa Cup of Nations, ma gbaa bọọlụ abụọ n'ime mmeri atọ ha meriri n'egwuregwu dịka Senegal erughị eru maka ọkwa ikpeazụ nke asọmpi ahụ

N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ redio Senegalese, N'Daw kwetara na ọ na-echepụta afọ na-ekwu na ọ belatara afọ ya iji ghọọ ọkachamara nakwa na ọ bụ ihe a na-emekarị n'etiti ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ Senegale
Na 31 Jenụwarị 2019, N'Daw sonyeere klọb ndị France AS Algrange
Ihe ndị e ji ajị anụ mee

Égwu ahiri nwere áhú nwere ólú di ntạ ebe ahiri ne me úzụ, ha ne me ya ka ó dí ishií, na nọr

Gọọmentị Gujarat guzobere Gujarat Pollution Control Board (GPCB) n'ubochi irí na isé n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1974 iji chebe gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi, gbochie ma chịkwaa mmetọ mmiri na Steeti Gujarat, nke na-ewere ọnọdụ dị mkpa na mmepe na mmepụta ihe nke mba ahụ
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, e nyela Board ahụ Central Acts na Iwu ndị dị mkpa màkà njikwa mmetọ dịka a gwara ya site n'oge ruo n'ogè
GPCB nwèrè isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Gandhinagar, Gujarat na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara iri abụo na asaá na Ahmedabad, Bharuch, Bhavnagar, Godhra, Jamnagar, Mehsana, Rajkot, Surat, Vadodara na Vapi
Gujarati (/ˌɡʊdʒəˈrɑːti/; Gujarati script ? ? ? ?, Gujarātī, pronounced ) bụ asụsụ Indo-Aryan nke a mụrụ na steeti India nke Gujarat ma bụrụ nke ndị Gujarati na-asụkarị
Gujarati bụ akụkụ nke nnukwu ezinụlọ asụsụ Indo-European
Gujarati sitere na Old Gujarati (ihe dị ka )
Na India, ọ bụ asụsụ gọọmentị na steeti Gujarat, yana asụsụ gọọmentụ na mpaghara Dadra na Nagar Haveli na Daman na Diu
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2011, Gujarati bụ asụsụ nke isii a na-asụkarị na India site n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụrụ ya, nke nde mmadụ 555 na-asuru ya nke ruru ihe dị ka 45% nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị India
Ọ bụ asụsụ nke iri abụọ na isii a na-asụkarị n'ụwa site na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụrụ ya n'afọ 2007
Asụsụ Gujarati dị ihe karịrị 1,000 afọ ma ihe karịrị nde mmadụ 55 na-asụ ya n'ụwa niile
Na mpụga Gujarat, ndị njem Gujarati na-asụ Gujarati n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke South Asia, ọkachasị na Mumbai na Pakistan (karịsịa na Karachi)
Ndị ọbịa Gujarati na-asụkwa Gujarati n'ọtụtụ mba na mpụga South Asia
Na North America, Gujarati bụ otu n'ime asụsụ India na-eto ngwa ngwa na nke a na-asụkarị na United States na Canada
Na Europe, Gujaratis bụ obodo nke abụọ kachasị na mpaghara ndị na-ekwu okwu South South Asia, na Gujarati bụ asụsụ nke anọ a na-asụkarị na isi obodo UK London
A na-asụkwa Gujarati na Ndịda Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Africa, ọkachasị na Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Zambia, na South Africa
N'ebe ọzọ, a na-asụ Gujarati ntakịrị na Hong Kong, Indonesia, Singapore, Australia, na mba ndị dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Ụwa dịka Bahrain na United Arab Emirates
Gulnara Shahinian bụ onye nnọchi anya mba Armenia na onye edemede nke na-amụ banyere ịzụ ahịa mmadụ
Ọ bụ onye otu Group of Experts on Action Against Trafficking in Human Beings na onye bụbu United Nations Special Rapporteur on Contemporary Forms of Slavery site na 2006 ruo 2014
Ọ gụrụ iwu mba ụwa na Saint Petersburg Institute of International Relations, nakwa English na Russian Linguistics na Yerevan State University
Gulshan Khan bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa nke bi na Johannesburg

A maara ya n'ihe banyere ọrụ foto ya nke lekwasịrị anya na njirimara ikpe ziri ezi na mmepe nke ikike mmadụ, ọrụ Khan na-etinye aka na isiokwu dị iche iche gburugburu nnọchiteanya mgbasa ozi nke njirimara [nkọwa dị mkpa] na South Africa nke na-agwa ya omume anya ya
Gulshan Khan bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa nke bi na Johannesburg

A maara ya n'ihe banyere ọrụ foto ya nke lekwasịrị anya na njirimara ikpe ziri ezi na mmepe nke ikike mmadụ, ọrụ Khan na-etinye aka na isiokwu dị iche iche gburugburu nnọchiteanya mgbasa ozi nke njirimara [nkọwa dị mkpa] na South Africa nke na-agwa ya omume anya ya
A zụlitere ya na Ladysmith, Kwazulu Natal, otu n'ime ụmụnne abụọ, o si n'ezinụlọ gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na ọrụ obodo
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mmemme Market Photo Workshop Photojournalism and Documentary Photography (PDP) nke izizi o bipụtara na Agence France Presse n'afọ 2016, ebe o mechara rụọ ọrụ otu ọnwa

[citation needed] Nwaanyị Africa izizi nke Agence France Press kenyere n'afọ 2017, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ maka ihe banyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike ógè ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ maka akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche iche nke mba ụwa

[cittion needed] Ahụ mbụ ya nke ọrụ ogologo oge The Things We Carry Us (Udo) na-enyocha obodo ndị Alakụba nke South Africa na-emegbu egbu na-emepe nke oge na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkwenye na-emebi na-eme nkwenye nke South Africa

A kpọrọ Khan ka ọ kwuo maka ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iji dekọọ ọnọdụ mmadụ, na mkpa foto dị ikwu maka ihe gbasara ùgwù, njirimara na nke, ikpe ziri ezi na ikike mmadụ na South Africa na n'ụwa niile n'afọ 2020 National Geographic Storytellers Summit 2020
Khan bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese foto isii ahọpụtara n'ihe banyere World Press Photo 6x6 Talent Programme Africa Edition

Onye otu na World Press Photo Festival nké afọ 2019, Khan gosipụtara ọrụ ma sonye na okwu banyere Mmetụta nke akụkọ ahụ na onye ọ bụla nke kwuru maka mmetụta nke ihe oyiyi nwere ike inwe na ndụ ndị na-adịghị ike na mgbasa ozi yana nsogbu nke ụkpụrụ omume, ikikere na ibu ọrụ nke ndị na-ese foto, ndị nchịkọta, ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ anya
Ihe ndị sitere na ọrụ ya The Things We Carry With Us (afọ 2017) nakwa Life in Plastic (afọ 2018) ka Iziko South African National Gallery nwetara dị ka akụkụ nke ebe nchekwa mba South Africa

[citation needed] A gụnyere ọrụ ya na mbipụta mbụ nke usoro 'Four to Follow' nke World Press Photo guzobere n'afọ 2017, site na African Photojournalism Database na kwá foto otu narị nọ n'isi n'afọ 2018 site na ndị editọ nke Time

A na-ebipụta ọrụ foto akụkọ Khan n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa, n'etiti ndị ọzọ The New York Times, [citation needed] The Washington Post, [cittion needed] New Frame, [citations needed] The Guardian, Al Jazeera, [citement needed] The Wall Street Journal
[citation necessary]
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na NGO dị iche iche gụnyere United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA), Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC) na African Women's Development Fund
Khan bụ akụkụ nke ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ndị na-ese foto South Africa nke oge a na-edekọ ihe nketa nke ala na-esote ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ bụ onye National Geographic Explorer, onye na-enye onyinye kwa ụbọchị n'Africa, onye otu Women Photograph na Native
Gumani Tania Mukwevho bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye otu National Assembly of South Africa site n'August ruo Nọvemba, na afọ 2021
Mukwevho bụ onye otu African National Congress
Mukwevho bụ onye otu African National Congress
E debere ya na nke iri na isii na ndepụta nke ndị ANC si Limpopo maka National Assembly na afọ 2019, mana a họpụtaghị ya n'ihi ọkwa dị ala ya na ndepụta ahụ

N'ọnwa Eprel, na afọ 2021, Mukwevho bụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri atọ na ise nke National Executive Committee nke African National Congress họpụtara ka ha rụọ ọrụ na African National Congress Youth League National Youth Task Team iji gbalịa ime ka ndị ntorobịa ahụ dịghachi ndụ
ANC gbasara otu ndị ntorobịa ahụ n'afọ 2018 mgbe ọ na-ahọrọghị onye ndu ọhụrụ n'etiti esemokwu dị n'etiti
Mgbe ọnwụ nke Limpopo ANC MP Joyce Maluleke na Julai, na afọ 2021, ANC họọrọ Mukwevho ka ọ nọrọ n'oche ya na National Assembly ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ onye na-esote na ndepụta ndị ANC
A ṅụrụ ya iyi na 25 Ọgọst
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ Ọha na Nchịkwa, Nlekọta Ọrụ na Nnyocha na Kọmitii Porfolio na Ụmụ nwanyị, Ndị Ntorobịa na Ndị Nwere Nkwarụ
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2021, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ụlọ omebe iwu mba ahụ dịka ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi obodo nke ANC maka Obodo Ukwu Makhado
Esemokwu na nkewa nke ANC mere ka a họpụta onye isi obodo Samuel Munyai ọzọ
Gumuz (nke a na-akpọkwa Gumaz) bụ ụyọkọ asụsụ a na asụ n'ókè nke Etiopia na Sudan
E kewaala ya n'ime ezinụlọ Nilo-Sahara
Ọtụtụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ Etiopia bi na mpaghara Kamashi na mpaghara Metekel nke mpaghara Benishangul-Gumuz, ọ bụ ezie na a kọrọ na otu ìgwè mmadụ otu puku bi na mpụga obodo Welkite (Unseth 1989)
Ndị na-asụ Sudanese bi n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Er Roseires, gburugburu Famaka na Fazoglo na Blue Nile, na agbasa n'ebe ugwu n'akụkụ ókèala

(2019) na-eche na ụdị ndị a na-asụ n'akụkụ osimiri ahụ bụ asụsụ dị iche, Kadallu
Ihe ndekọ mbụ nke asụsụ a bụ ndepụta okwu sitere na mpaghara Ugwu Guba nke Juan Maria Schuver chịkọtara na Febụwarị afọ 1883

Guosa bụ asụsụ e wuru na mbụ nke Alex Igbineweka mepụtara nafọ 1965
E mere ya ka ọ bụrụ ngwakọta nke asụsụ ụmụ amaala nke Naijiria na ije ozi dị ka asụsụ na-asụ n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka

Ọ bụ ezie na Guosa na-enweta okwu ya site na ụmụ amaala asụsụ 118 nke West Africa, ọ na-enwetakwa ọtụtụ okwu ya site n'asụsụ Hausa, Yoruba, na Igbo, ma ọ bụ were ya kpọmkwem ma ọ bụ mee ya site na njikọta okwu sitere na asụsụ ndị a
Bekee na-enyekwa ọtụtụ n'ime okwu teknụzụ ndị ọzọ, ma ọ bụ kpọmkwem ma ọ bụ site na otu n'ime asụsụ Afrịka a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu
Tụkwasị na nke a, e mepụtara ọtụtụ okwu a priori site na akara ụda, dịka meeh 'ụmụ atụrụ', yanmu-yanmu 'ụmụ ahụhụ', na wuam 'eri'
Akụkụ dị iche iche nke okwu na-esikarị n'asụsụ ụfọdụ
Ọtụtụ aha doro anya site na Hausa, ebe ngwaa na abstracts sitere na Igbo ma ọ bụ Yoruba
Tụkwasị na nke a, a na-ejikarị okwu sitere na asụsụ atọ ahụ iji mepụta okwu yiri atọ ndi ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, okwu Guosa méni 'ihe' sitere na Hausa menini, Igbo gini, na Yoruba kini, ihe niile pụtara 'ihe'
A maghị kpọmkwem uru phonological ma ọ bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke phonemes dị iche iche di na Guosa
Otú ọ dị, ọ nwere nnukwu ndepụta nke ụdaume, ebe Guosa na-anakwere ọtụtụ ụdaume ndị gosipụtara naanị n'ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke asụsụ ya
Palatal
Ọ bụ ezie na Guosa nwere usoro ụdaume asaa yiri nke Yoruba, ụdaume /ɛ/ na /ɔ/ yiri ka a jikọtara ha na ibe ha mechiri emechi, na-enye Guosa usoro ụdaume ise
Udaume nwere ike ịdị ogologo ma ọ bụ dị mkpụmkpụ, mana ọrụ nke ogologo udaume yiri ka ọ dị mfe, Otú ọ dị, ebe ọ bụ na obere ụzọ abụọ dị mgbe a na-eburu ụda n'uche
E nwere ụdaume imi edere na ụdaume na-esote ụdaume, ọ bụ ezie na nke a anaghị egosi ụdaume imi mgbe niile
Ọrụ nke ndị a dịkwa mfe na ọtụtụ n'ime ụdaume imi dị mkpụmkpụ
Enweghị okwu abụọ dị iche na ma imi imi nke ụdaume na ogologo ụdaume
A maghị ma ọ bụrụ na e nwere diphthongs na Guosa; enwere ike ịkpọ ụdaume niile dị ka mkpụrụedemede dị iche iche, ma ọ bụ ọtụtụ ụdaume nwere ike ịmepụta diphthong

Otú ọ dị, ụdaume nke Yoruba na-egosi na ụdaume Guosa anaghị emepụta diphthongs, ebe ọ bụ na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ okwu niile nwere ụdaume ndị dị n'akụkụ sitere na Yoruba, ebe a na-akpọ ụdaume niile iche iche
E nwere ụda atọ ndi dị mkpa na Guosa elu, etiti, na ala; e nwekwara ụda abụọ ala na ala
A na-ahapụ etiti na-enweghị akara ma yie ka ọ bụ ụda ndabara, a na-ede elu na ụda dị elu, ala na ili
Na ụdaume dị mkpirikpi, a na-eji caron na-ede ala ala na elu na-ada na gburugburu
Site na ụdaume ogologo, a na-ekewa ụda olu n'ofe ụdaume abụọ ahụ
Site na ụdaume ogologo, a na-ede ụda olu dị ka akara abụọ dị iche iche
Elision na-ewere ọnọdụ mgbe abụọ n'ime otu ụdaume ahụ ga-adị n'akụkụ, ma ọ bụ na ụfọdụ mkpụrụedemede
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, mgbe a na-etinye akara ọnụọgụ é n'ihu okwu na-amalite na ụdaume é ómóntàkélé → émóntàakélé 'ụmụntakịrị'
Enwere ike ide nke a na apostrophe mgbe ụdaume abụọ ahụ bụ otu ji inang → ji'nang ' Iri abụọ na anọ'
Enwereike ide kwa ya dị ka apostrophe mgbe elision gafere okwu abụọ na-abụghị ụmụ irighiri ihe sòngí ìsóngà → sòngí 'sóngà 'na-abụ abụ'
Otu mkpụrụ okwu na Guosa bụ n'ozuzu nke ụdị (C)(A)V(C), ọ bụ ezie na okwu ndị ọzọ pụrụ iche nwere ike ịnwe usoro (C)ManticC)V(CC)

Gurasa bụ achịcha dị n'ebe ugwu nke Naịjirịa karịsịa steeti Kano
yiri achịcha ma e wezụga na ntụ ọka ahụ dị mfe, a pụrụ iri achịcha dị na ugwu dị ka nri, nri ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ nri ehihie
A na-eme ya site na ntụ ọka (ọka wit dum ma ọ bụ otu nke omenala), ihe iko achịcha, ntụ ntụ na àkwá
A na-eme ya na Tanderu nke bụ oven hausa e ji ụrọ mee
Gurasa nwere ike ịbụ ụdị mpaghara ma ọ bụ nke pụrụ iche
Ụdị omenala bụ ụdị mpaghara ebe a na-eme ụdị pụrụ iche site na ịgbakwunye ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ na ihe ịchọ mma
Ụdị pụrụ iche dị oke ọnụ karịa ụdị mpaghara
Gurasa chọtara ụzọ ya gaa Naịjirịa mgbe ụfọdụ ndị njem mba Arab biri na steeti Kano, ha na-eme achịcha obodo n'onwe ha na gọmentị mpaghara dala nke steeti Kano
N'ikpeazụ, ọ ghọrọ nri maka ndị eze na ndị ọgaranya, tupu ọ gbasaa n'akụkụ ugwu ndị ọzọ nke Naịjirịa
Ọ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama nke na achịcha obodo bụ otu n'ime nri ndị na-enweghị ihe ùgwù dị ọnụ ala
Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-ewepụta gurasa ma na-ekesa ya dị ka isi iyi ha na steeti Kano, dị ka ndị obodo si steeti ndị ọzọ dị ka Niger na-agbadata naanị iji mụta azụmahịa ahụ
E nwere otu obodo na Gado nke gọmentị ime obodo a mara dị ka obodo Gurasa ebe ọ bụ na ọrụ ha bụ mmepụta na nkesa nke Gurasa
Enwere ike iri Gurasa naanị ya dị ka nri dị nro, na ofe dị ka miyan taushe, ofe akwụkwọ nri wdg
Ụfọdụ na-aṅụkwa achịcha obodo na tii, achịcha a na-akpọ kuli-kuli ma ọ bụ suya
Guri Tambs-Lyche (20 Septemba 1917 na 13 Machị 2008) bụ onye Norwegian na-eme ihe maka ịdị n'otu mba ụwa na ikike ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ ya na Trondheim dị ka nwa nwanyị nke Ralph Tambs-Lyche (1890 ruo afọ 1991) na Else Alvilde Rasmussen (1896 ruo afọ 1966)
Nna ya bụ onye mgbakọ na mwepụ na onye mmekọ Mot Dag, site na nwata Guri Tambs-Lyche nwere mmetụta site na okwu nna ya na Student Society na Trondheim
Nne ya bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ n'ọrụ ịdị ọcha nne
Nna ya mechara bụrụ prọfesọ
Gurmehar Kaur (amụrụ na 24 Septemba 1996) bụ nwa akwụkwọ India na-eme ihe na onye edemede
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Lady Shri Ram College, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Somerville College, Mahadum Oxford
Kaur bụkwa onye nnọchi anya Postcards for Peace, otu ọrụ ebere nke UK nke na-enyere aka iwepụ ụdị ịkpa ókè ọ bụla

Gurmehar Kaur bịara n'ìhè dị ka ọ bụ akụkụ nke 'Save DU campaign' na-esote esemokwu nke ọnwa February 2017 na Ramjas College n'etiti ndị otu Students Federation of India (SFI) na Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) mgbe a kpọrọ ụmụ akwụkwọ JNU Umar Khalid na Shehla Rashid Shora maka nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe
Na mbido, ọ nọ na akụkọ n'ihi vidiyo ọ wepụtara
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017, magazin Time jiri ahịrịokwu ahụ bụ 'onye agha nnwere onwe ikwu okwu' kwupụta echiche ha banyere Kaur ma tinye ya na ndepụta '10 Next Generation Leaders' maka afọ 2017
Mbido mbụ ya, akwụkwọ ncheta, nke akpọrọ Small Acts of Freedom nke Penguin Random House bipụtara n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2018, edepụtara maka Sahitya Akademi YUVA Puraskar n'afọ 2020
A mụrụ Gurmehar Kaur na Rajvinder Kaur na Captain Mandeep Singh na Jalandhar
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Harvest International School, Ludhiana
Nna ya, Mandeep Singh, bụ otu n'ime ndị agha India asaa nwụrụ n'ihi okwukwe ha na 1 15 am IST mgbe ndị na-eyi ọha egwu wakporo ogige Rashtriya Rifle na Jammu na Kashmir na 6 August 1999
Kaur nwere akara ugo mmụta na edemede site na Lady Shri Ram College for Women
Ọ gara MSc ya na Modern South Asian Studies site na Somerville College, Mahadum Oxford
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2016, Voice of Ram (Ram Subramanian) bulite vidiyo na Facebook, nke gosipụtara Gurmehar Kaur
Voice of Ram bulitekwara vidiyo ahụ na YouTube
Gurmehar Kaur malitere mkpọsa #ProfileForPeace n'ọnwa Eprel 2016, na-ajụ ajụjụ banyere ịdị mkpa nke India na Pakistan na vidiyo ahụ, ma na-akwado 'udo' n'etiti India na Pakistan
Ọ kpọrọ onwe ya 'onye agha maka udo' na-alụ ọgụ megide agha
Vidio ahụ gbasara n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2017, mgbe Gurmehar ji ozi mgbasa ozi ọha na eze megide ABVP na Mahadum Delhi, otu ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Sangh Parivar
Ọ dọtara ọtụtụ esemokwu na ịkwa emo, ọkachasị nkwupụta 'Pakistan egbughị nna m, agha gburu ya
N'afọ 2017, Minista nke Union State maka Home Affairs nke India Kiren Rijiju kwuru na vidiyo ya na 'Ụfọdụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nọ n'azụ nkwupụta ya (Spoiling the minds of the students)
Onye bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu cricket bụ Virender Sehwag biputere onyinyo na-ekwu, 'Enweghị m narị afọ atọ, bat m mere'
Javed Akhtar kwukwara okwu banyere okwu a ka ọ na-emegide ndị niile na-emegidogide Gurmehar
Nne Gurmehar gosipụtara nkwado maka nwa ya nwanyị na-eme ka o doo anya na 'A ga-ahụ ozi ya na vidiyo ahụ n'ụzọ ka ukwuu
Ihe ọ chọrọ n'ezie ikwu bụ na agha na-eweta mbibi mgbe niile
Achọghị m ka ọ lelee ndị Pakistan ma ọ bụ mba ọ bụla ọzọ nwere ịkpọasị
Ọnọdụ na-eme ka ndị mmadụ gbuo ibe ha n'oge agha

Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke mkpọsa Save DU megide ABVP n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2017 nke ọ megidere ime ihe ike nke malitere na Ramjas College Campus mgbe a kagburu nkuzi Umar Khalid na Shehla Rashid Shora n'ihi mkpesa ABVP
Ọ natara egwu ọnwụ na ndina n'ike maka ịmalite mkpọsa a ma mesịa hapụ mkpọsa ahụ
Michael Guy Attridge, onye a maara dị ka Gus Attridge bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Aspen Pharmacare, nke ya na Stephen Saad hiwere na 1997
N'afọ 2013, Attridge nwere 4% nke onwe ya na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruru ihe karịrị nde $ 320
VGus Nall (1919) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe n'etiti narị afọ nke irí abụọ na Chicago, Indiana, Ohio, na Michigan

A mụrụ ya na Illinois, ọrụ Nallī a kacha márá amara bụ ihe osise ya 'Lincoln na-agwa ndị nweere onwé ha okwu na Steps of the Capital at Richmond' (1963), nke steeti Illinois nyere iwu iji sọpụrụ 100th anniversary of the Emancipation Proclamation
Gus Nall bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe nkè amụrụ na Chicago, Illinois na 1919
Ọ lụrụ Thelma Nall mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu
Nall bụ ónyé omenkà ama ama n'oge 1950s na 60s, nkè a maara màkà nnọchiteanya nkè ógè a nke ndị Africa America
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Art Institute nké Chicago nakwa na Paris
N'oge ndụ ya, e gosipụtara ya na Art Gallery Magazine (1968, 'The Afro-American Issueʹ) yana Carol Myers' Black Power in the Arts
Ọrụ Nallī nwèrè ihe oyiyi mmadụ toro ogologo nke Cubist na Expressionist style nkè eserese, na nka Africa
Ihe osise ya na-egosipụtakarị ihe nnọchianya nkè ndị Africa America
Archibald Motley na Eldzier Cortor, ndị bụ ndị na-ese ihe na Chicago, nwèrè mmetụta n'ebe ọ nọ
Ọrụ Nallī nyèrè ya ohere ịghọ ihe nlereanya nye ndị na-ese ihe ibe ya yana ndị nwéré mmasị na ndụ ya dị ka onye na-ese egwu
Nall nwèrè mmetụta na-akpali akpali na ndụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé édémédé Clarence Major ónyé na-ele ya ányá
Ihe osise ya 'Lincoln na-agwa ndị nweere onwe ha okwu na Steps of the Capital at Richmond' (1963) dị na ngosi na-adịgide adịgide na DuSable Museum of African American History
'Untitled' (1950) by Gus Nall
'Offering Fruit' by Gus Nall
'Lincoln Speaks to Freedmen on the Steps of the Capital at Richmond' by Gus Nall
Gusau bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria
Gusau bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Zamfara (Zamfara State), nwéré madu ha sị rùrù, 383,712 (Local Government Area; 2006; census) na 450,290 (Local Government Area; 2011; projection)

Asụsụ Gusii (nke a makwaara dị ka Ekegusii) bụ asụsụ Bantu a na-asụ na mpaghara Kisii na Nyamira dị na Nyanza Kenya, nke isi ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Kisii Town, (n'etiti Ọwara Kavirondo nke Ọdọ Victoria na ókè ya na Tanzania)
Ndị mmadụ nde 22 na-asụ ya (dịka nke afọ 2009), ọkachasị n'etiti ndị Abagusii

A na-asụkwa olumba Bunchari nke Ekegusii n'etiti Kuria dị ka asụsụ Kuria na n'etiti ndị Suba (Tanzania) na ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ dị ka Suna-Girango na Simbete yana obere ndị ọzọ gbawara agbawa sitere na Abagusii na Kuria na Migori County na Homa Bay County dị ka Egesuba
Gusii nwere ụdaume asaa
Ogologo ụdaume dị iche, ya bụ, okwu 'bór' na-efu na 'bóór' na'ikwu na-adị iche site na ogologo ụdaume naanị
Gustav Imroth (29 Juun 1862 – 10 Ọktoba 1946) bụ obere Randlord onye rụrụ ọrụ na mmepe ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta diamond na South Africa

Imroth, Gustave (Esquire)jpg A mụrụ ya na Friedberg, Germany na 1862 n'ime ezinụlọ ụlọ akụ ndị Juu, buru ụzọ gaa London na 1880, ebe ọ bụ onye Britain, wee gaa Kimberley, South Africa na 1884 ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ diamond maka Dunkelsbuhler na Company n'akụkụ ụmụnne ya
Louis Oppenheimer na Fredrich Hirschhorn
Gustav Imroth mechara nọchite anya Barnato Brothers na mmekọrịta ha na ndị otu diamond (nke mechara De Beers), ya na Solomon Joel na Ernest Oppenheimer (bụkwa nwa nwanne nna) na-arụkọ ọrụ
O nyere aka chọta Johannesburg Consolidated Investment Company Limited ('Johnnies') ma bụrụ onye isi njikwa ya site na 1911 ruo 1920, mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na London
Ọ lụrụ nwa nwanne nne ya bụ Florence Hirschhorne (1871-1974) na London na 1893; ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ Leslie (1896-1918), Freda (1899-1960) na Alice (1903-1992)
Lieutenant Leslie Imroth nke 11th Hampshire Regiment nwụrụ na 1918 nke ọnya merụrụ n'oge Agha Ukwu ahụ

Gustav Landauer (7 Eprel 1870 2 Mee 1919) bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-akụzi ihe gbasara anarchism na Germany na ngwụcha nke iri na itenanị na mmalite nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ Ọ bụ onye na-akwado anarchism nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye na-eme udo
N'afọ 1919, ọ bụ Kọmishọna nke Enlightenment na Public Instruction nke Bavarian Soviet Republic nke dị mkpirikpi n'oge German Revolution nke 1918- 1910 E gburu ya mgbe a kwaturu mba a
A makwaara Landauer maka ọmụmụ ya banyere metaphysics na okpukpe, na nsụgharị ya nke ọrụ William Shakespeare n'asụsụ German
Landauer bụ nwa nke abụọ nke nne na nna ndị Juu Rosa née Neuberger na Herman Landauer
Ọ kwadoro anarchism site na 1890s

N'afọ ndị ahụ, ọ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi karịsịa banyere ụzọ Max Stirner na Friedrich Nietzsche si eme ihe n'otu n'otu, kamakwa 'na-adọ aka ná ntị megide apotheosis nke onye a na-ejighị n'aka, nke nwere ike iduga n'ileghara ịdị n'otu anya'
Ya na Martin Buber bụ ezigbo enyi, na-emetụta nkà ihe ọmụma nke mkparịta ụka nke Martin Buber
Landauer kwenyere na a pụghị inweta mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya naanị site na njikwa nke steeti ma ọ bụ ngwá ọrụ akụ na ụba, mana ọ chọrọ mgbanwe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na mmadụ

O chere na ezi ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nwere ike ibilite naanị na njikọ nke mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, o dekwara, 'Obodo anyị na-achọsi ike ma chọọ, anyị ga-ahụ naanị ma ọ bụrụ na anyị kewapụ onwe anyị na ịdị adị nke onwe anyị; ya mere anyị ga-emesị chọta, n'ime etiti ma ọ bụ ihe anyị zoro ezo, obodo kachasị ochie na nke zuru ụwa ọnụ agbụrụ mmadụ na cosmos'
Otu n'ime ụmụ ụmụ Landauer, ya na nwunye ya na onye edemede Hedwig Lachmann, bụ Mike Nichols, onye nduzi telivishọn America, ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta ihe

Gusu (Gussum, Baw) bụ kwa ra asụsụ East Kainji nke Naijiria nke sitere na ụyọkọ Shammo
A na-asụ kwa ya na Toro LGA, Bauchi State na Bassa LGA, Plateau State
Guy A
Sims bụ ónyé édémédé America amaara màkà usoro Brotherman nke akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị
Ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na nwanne ya nwoke, ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri Dawud Anyabwile
N'afọ 2015, ọ gbanwere akwụkwọ Walter Dean Myers bụ Monster ka ọ bụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Anyabwile sere
N'afọ 2017, ụmụnne ahụ na Mahadum Emory rụkọtara ọrụ iji mepụta Big City Map Project nké mepụtara ụwa nkè eziokwu (VR) màkà ederede nke usoro Brotherman
A na-echekwa Brotherman Comics na ihe ncheta ndị metụtara ya na National Museum of African American History & Culture
A mụrụ Sims na Philadelphia n'aka Edward Sims Jr, prọfesọ na-ahụ màkà mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibè ya na Deanna Jones-Sims, onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze
Ọ bi na Blacksburg, Virginia, ya na nwunye ya na ụmụ atọ
Guy Bomanyama-Zandu (amụrụ na 22 Nọvemba 1972) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri si DRC
A mụrụ Guy Bomanyama-Zandu na Kinshasa na 22 Nọvemba 1972
Na ngwụsị afọ 1980, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Brussels, nweta nwa amaala Belgium
O bu ụzọ mụọ elektrọnik, wee mee ihe nkiri na Institut de radioélectricité et de cinématographie (INRACI) na Brussels, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2000
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Papa Mobutu (2000) na INRACI
A họpụtara ya maka Namur Francophone Film Festival
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri ya niile gosipụtara na Afrika Film Festival à Louvain en Belgique
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ INRACI Bomanyama-Zandu malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, Ateliers de Production des Films du Congo (APFC), nke a na-akpọzi Zandu Films, nke dị na Kinshasa na Brussels
N'afọ 2001, o mere ihe nkiri na Gbadolite, bụbu ebe siri ike nke Mobutu Sese Seko na mpaghara DRC, nke Jean-Pierre Bemba mechara chịkwaa
A manyere ya ịhapụ ihe nkiri a n'aka ndị ọrụ nchekwa Bemba

N'afọ 2003 Bomanyama-Zandu mere Congo je te pleure, ihe nkiri nkeji iri ise na anọ n'etiti Zandu Movies Brussels na Zandu Movies sprl, nke ọ tọrọ ntọala n'afọ ahụ na Kinshasa, ọ bụkwa ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe mbụ nke Mịnịstrị nke Omenala Congo nabatara
Emere ihe nkiri a site na mmekorita nke Radio na Television nke mba Congo ma ndị Mịnịstrị nke Omenala Congo kwadoro ya
Bomanyama-Zandu kere Mayasi, Taximan a Kinshasa na 2004, na usoro ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na-ahụ maka nchebe na nkwalite ihe nketa ihe nkiri Congo
Guy Rochester Crowder (1940-2011) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese foto nke ọrụ ya pụtara n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gụnyere Los Angeles Sentinel
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ mbụ na-ese foto maka Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors na onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1940 na Beaumont, Texas, Crowder na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Los Angeles n'afọ 1945
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Compton, California
wee sonye na Marine Corps Reserve ebe o jere ozi site n'afọ 1957- rụọ afọ 1963
Crowder gụrụ akwụkwọ na Los Angeles Harbor College na Los Angeles Trade Technical College
Crowder malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya na-ese ihe omume obodo, ebe ọ na-enweghị ike ịchọta ọrụ na otu n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị a ma ama na Los Angeles n'ihi agbụrụ ya
O wuru azụmahịa na-aga nke ọma, ma mepụta aha na njikọ ya na ndị obodo a ma ama na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gụnyere Mervin Dymally, Jesse Unruh, na Kenneth Hahn
N'afọ 1974, ọ nwetara ọkwa na Los Angeles Board of Supervisors dị ka onye na-ese foto, si otú a mee ka ọ bụrụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-arụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị a
N'etiti isiokwu nke foto ya kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ bụ Sammy Davis, Jr, Michael Jackson, Ray Charles, Magic Johnson, Thurgood Marshall, Coretta Scott King, na Wynton Marsalis
Onye nchịkọta akụkọ Jet bụ Aldore Collier kwuru banyere Crowder, ọrụ ya na-egosi n'ụzọ doro anya ọdịiche, olileanya, iru uju na ọṅụ nke bụ obodo ndị isi ojii nke Los Angeles
N'mmeme olili ozu Crowder, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ Los Angeles Sentinel bụ Danny Bakewell kwuru na 'a ga-echeta Guy Crowder dị ka otu n'ime ndị Ojiị foto kachasị nwee nkà na ihe dị egwu n'oge anyị
Ọ bụghị naanị na a ga-atụfu ya maka ọrụ ya, kamakwa maka ịbụ onye pụrụ iche na ihe nketa ọ hapụrụ n'obodo a
Crowder lụrụ nwunye ya Patricia ruo afọ 51, ma nwee otu nwa, Reginald Crowder
Crowder nwụrụ site na oyi bara ya n'ahụ na nsogbu ndị sitere na ọrịa strok n'ọnwa Ọctoba 30
afọ
30, 2011 na Riverside, California
Ihe ncheta foto ya, nke gụnyere ihe karịrị 400,000 foto, bụ nke Tom na Ethel Bradley Center na-echekwa na Ọbá Akwụkwọ Mahadum, Special Collections and Archives na Mahadum California State, Northridge
Guy Carel Mbenza Mbenza Kamboleke (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2000) bụ onye Congo na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara Wydad AC bọọlụ site na Royal Antwerp, na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Congo
N'ụbọchị 17 Febụwarị 2021, Mbenza sonyeere Stade Lausanne Ouchy nke Swiss Challenge League ruo na njedebe nke oge ahụ
Mbenza mere egwuregwu izizi ya na mba ụwa na mmeri 2–0 nke Senegal, dochie Césaire Gandzé mgbe nkeji iri asatọ na asaa gasịrị

Guy Tillim (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa nke a maara màkà ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na mpaghara nsogbụ nke Sub-Saharan Africa
Onye so n'òtù ndị ọcha pere mpe na mba ahụ, a mụrụ Tillim na Johannesburg n'afọ 1962
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town n'afọ 1983, ọ nọrọkwa ógè na Market Photo Workshop na Johannesburg
E gosipụtara foto ya na ọrụ ya na mba ụwa ma bụrụ ihe ndabere nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ Tillim bipụtara

Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ African Success akọwaala ya dị ka otu n'ime 'ndị na-ese foto kachasị mma' na South Africa, ebe ebe ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Daily Maverick zoro aka na ya dị ka 'onye na-ese ihe kachasị mma nke SA' ógè David Goldblatt gasịrị
Tillim bịdọrọ itinye aka na foto dị ka onye nta akụkọ foto n'afọ 1986

Ruo n'afọ 1990, ya na ndị otu Afrapix rụkọtara ọrụ, otu ndị na-ese foto na South Africa na-enye usoro pụrụ iche nke foto na mgbasa ozi ụwa n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ a ma ama na foto South Africa, gụnyere David Goldblatt, Steve Hilton-Barber, na Omar Badsha
N'ọtụtụ oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya màkà ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi obodo na nke mba ọzọ, gụnyere Reuters (afọ 1986 ruo afọ 1988) na Agence France Press (afọ 1993 ruo afọ 1994)
Ọrụ ya n'oge a lekwasịrị anya nke ukwuu na ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide onwé ya n'afọ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa
Ndị na-ese foto n'oge ahụ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na ndị otu Afrapix rụkọkwara ọrụ, na-ese ihe nkiri nke ọgba aghara, agha, na ịda ogbenye na ụmụ amaala ojii nkè South Africa

Mgbé ndị otu Afrapix gbásárá n'afọ 1991 ma dozie ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 1994, ọrụ Tillim gbanwere iji dekọọ mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide nke agha South Africa fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 50 na ụmụ amaala ojii ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya kachasị Mkpà nwere isiokwu a, dị ka Johannesburg (May, 2005) na Joʹburg Downtown, nke gụnyere foto nke ihe nkiri na ndị bi n'obodo ahụ

N'ime nke ikpeazụ, onye na-ahụ màkà ihe ngosi nka na Johannesburg bụ Okwui Enwezor kwuru na, dị ka usoro, Joʹburg na-anọchite anya omume nke foto ihe ngosi nke post-apartheid nke na-ejikọta South Africa nke oge a na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ya
N'ọrụ ndị ọzọ, dị ka Things as They Seem (2004), ọ na-elekwasị anya na ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke obodo ahụ, na-ekwu n'ajụjụ ọnụ na a na-ewere foto ndị a n'ebe m maara, ebe m rụrụ ọrụ ma kpuchie ihe omume akụkọ
O kwuru na ọ na-achọ ógè niile ịlaghachi ma gbalịa ịchọta ya, gbalịa ịkọwa ya n'ụzọ ụfọdụ
Ọrụ ndị a na ndị ọzọ pụtara ìhè na mkparịta ụka zuru ụwa ọnụ banyéré ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
N'ime afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, ọrụ Tillim agbanweela site na isiokwu nke ọrụ ya site na 80s ruo mbido afọ 2000s
N'afọ 2014, o sonyere n'ihe ngosi jikọrọ aka na Museum für Moderne Kunst nke akpọrọ The Divine Comedy Heaven, Hell, Purgatory nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Africa nke oge a laghachiri
N'adịghị ka ọrụ mbụ ya, ọ na-enyocha uri Dante Alighieri site na nka

Guyland The Perilous World Where Boys Become Men bụ akwụkwọ nke Michael Kimmel, bipụtara na 2008
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-ekwu maka ọdịbendị ụmụ okorobịa na - na site na uto gaa na okenye
Kimmel gbara ụmụ nwoke narị anọ gbara ajụjụ ọnụ dị n'agbata afọ iri na isii na ịrị abụọ na isii wee chọpụta ihe na-eme ka ụmụ okorobịa na'oge na - na
Kimmel na-ekwu na, n'afọ 1960, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 70% nke ndị ikom America hapụrụ ụlọ mgbe ha dị afọ iri atọ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ ha, chọta onye mmekọ wee malite ọrụ
Site n'iji ya tụnyere, taa ihe na-erughị otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ndị ikom na'ime ha ruru ihe ndị a tupu ha eruo afọ iri atọ
Kimmel dere na ụmụ okorobịa anaghị achọ itolite n'ihi na ha 'na-ahụ ndụ ndị toro eto dị ka ọnwụ dị otú ahụ'

Iji zere ibu ọrụ nke ịbụ okenye, ụmụ okorobịa na-alaghachi azụ n'ime ụwa homosocial nke Kimmel kpọrọ 'Guyland', ohere ọha na eze na ogbo nke ndụ ebe 'ụmụ okorobịa na-ezukọ ka ha bụrụ ụmụ okorobịa na ibe ha, n'enweghị nsogbu site na ọchịchọ nke ndị nne na nna, ndị enyi nwanyị, ọrụ, ụmụaka, na nsogbu ndị ọzọ nke ndụ okenye
Ụmụ okorobịa ndị ọcha, ọkachasị, ndị na-enwe mmetụta nke 'ikike mebiri emebi', na'ikwere na ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ka nta ewepụla ọrụ na ọkwá ndị isi ọcha

Gvoko (nke a makwaara dị ka Gevoko, Ghboko, Gavoko, Kuvoko, Ngossi, Ngoshi, Ngoshe-Ndhang, Ngweshe-Ndaghan, Ngoshe Sama, Nggweshe) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Borno Steeti, Naịjirịa nke dị na ote aka mpaghara Ugwu, Cameroon
Gwadar (Balochi/Urdu گوادر) bụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nwere isi obodo South Balochistan, dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ ụsọ oké osimiri Balochistan, Pakistan
Obodo a dị n’ikpere mmiri nke Oke Osimiri Arab chere ihu Oman
Gwadar bụ obodo 100th kasị ukwuu na Pakistan, dịka ngụkọ 2017 siri dị
Ọ bụ ihe onwunwe mba ofesi nke Oman site na 1783 ruo 1958

Ọ dị ihe dịka 120 km (75 mi) ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Turbat, ebe nwanne nwanyị ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Chabahar na Iran Sistan na Baluchestan Province dị ihe dịka 170 km (110 mi) n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Gwadar
Ndị Gwandara bụ otu n'ime agbụrụ dị na Naịjirịa
Ha dị n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Abuja, Nassarawa, Kano, Niger na Kaduna
Agbụrụ Gwandara sitere na Steeti Kano
Ha bụ ụmụ Barbushe bụ ndị a na-ewere dị ka ndị mbụ biri na Kano tupu Bagaudas
N'afọ 1476, ha si Kano kwapụ n'okpuru nduzi nke Prince Karshi (Gwandara) iji gbanahụ mkpagbu okpukpe nke ịghọ ndị Alakụba
Prince Gwandara bụ nwanne nwoke nke Eze na-achị achị nke nabatara ma webata Alakụba n'ụlọ ikpe nke Kano ma kpebisie ike iwepụ omume ndị ọgọ mmụọ niile

Otú ọ dị, nwanne ya nwoke kpebisiri ike ịgbaso okpukpe ndị nna nna ha nke bụ animism, nkwenkwe okpukpe nke na-asọpụrụ ụmụ anụmanụ dị ka ndị nwere ike ime mmụọ, n'ịbụ ndị chere egwu nke ma ọ bụ ntọghata ma ọ bụ ịbụ ohu ihu, ndị na-eso ụzọ ya kwagara n'ebe ndịda Gwagwa
Mkpagbu ọzọ sitere n'aka Eze na-achị achị mere ka ha gaa Jukun na narị afọ nke iri na asaa na nke iri na asatọ ebe ha mechara gbasaa n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke Naịjirịa
Ndị Gwandara nke Karshi bụ agbụrụ Gwandara a ma ama na nke a ma ama karịa na Naịjirịa
Karshi bụ obodo Gwandara mbụ a ma ama site na Federal Republic of Nigeria
Ọ bụ obodo mbụ nwere klas mbụ Gwandara Emir, Alhaji Sani Mohammed-Bako

Otu n'ime ndị Gwandara a ma ama bụ Sardaunan nke Gwandara Umaru Tanko Al-Makura, onye bụbu onye omeiwu nke Nasarawa South na onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Nassarawa Steeti onye akpọrọ Sardaunan Gwandara na Machị 27, 2021
Ndị ọzọ a ma ama si Gwandara bụ Muhammad Danladi Yakubu, onye bụbu osote gọvanọ nke Steeti Plateau wdg
Ndị Gwandara na-arụkarị ọrụ ugbo, ịchụ nta, ịcha, ịkpụ ihe na ịkpa ákwà mana site na mbata nke agụmakwụkwọ ọdịda anyanwụ, ọtụtụ ndị ahapụla ọrụ ha maka ọrụ ọdịda anyanwụ
Ndị Gwandara na-asụ asụsụ Gwandara
Asụsụ nke dị nso na asụsụ Hausa mana enweghị ngwakọta asụsụ Arab na nso a
Usoro alụmdi na nwunye nke ndị Gwandara agbanwebeghị n'agbanyeghị ọdịiche mmekọrịta ha na-enwe n'ihi mbata nke ndị si n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Naịjirịa
Ememe agbamakwụkwọ na-ewe ụbọchị asaa (7)
N'ụbọchị mbụ, a na-achọ aka na ụkwụ nwanyị ahụ mma na ihe ndị e ji ihe ntecha na-acha odo odo mee nke a maara dị ka 'Lalli'
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ, a kpọgara ya ịhụ ndị ezinụlọ ya dị ka ụzọ isi sị ezinụlọ ya ka ukwu sị ya 'laa na udo'
N'ụbọchị nke atọ, a kpọgara ya n'obí eze ebe a na-enye ya na di ya onyinye
N'oge a, ọ gbanwere uwe ọhụrụ ya ugboro iri iji gosipụta ịma mma ya
N'ụbọchị nke anọ, ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'obodo ahụ na-aga n'ebe nwoke ahụ na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ na-aga ịhazi kichin nwanyị ahụ na-agba akwụkwọ ma na-ehicha ụlọ ahụ
N'ụbọchị nke ise, ọ na-eri nri naanị n'ụlọ ya ma ọ dịghị nwoke si n'ụlọ di ya na-agwa okwu
N'ụbọchị nke isii, a hapụrụ di na nwunye ahụ ka ha mezuo alụmdi na nwunye ahụ ma wepụta ụbọchị nke asaa maka ime ihe na mmechi nke emume ahụ
Gwandum bụ obodo dị na Gombe Steeti, Naịjirịa
O nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta
Filiya, Kuka, na Gundale bụ ụfọdụ obodo, obodo na ebe dị nso na Ghandum

Enwere ihu igwe obere mmiri ozuzo na Gwandu N'ihi nkụ, osisi anaghị eto ebe a, ihu igwe adịghịkwa ekpo ọkụ n'afọ niile Aja na-achịkwa odida obodo, yana ahịhịa na ahịhịa mgbe ụfọdụ Gwandum na-enweta nkezi okpomọkụ 38°F kwa afọ yana 485 mm nke mmiri ozuzo kwa afọ Na nkezi iru mmiri nke 31% yana UV-index nke 8, ọ na-akpọ nkụ maka ụbọchị 273 kwa afọ
Na Gwandum, okpomọkụ kachasị elu kwa ọnwa na Jenụwarị bụ 34 °, na nke kacha nta bụ ọ dịkarịa ala 17 °
Ya mere ọnwa a ga-enwe ụbọchị 31 maka Gwandum
Na Gwandum, okpomọkụ na Febụwarị na-eru ogo 39 na ala nke ọ dịkarịa ala 20 °
A ga-enwe naanị otu ụbọchị mmiri ozuzo na Febụwarị, nke ruru 1 mm, Gwandum ga-enwekwa ụbọchị 27 na-enweghị mmiri ozuzo ọ bụla
Na Gwandum, okpomọkụ na Machị na-eru ogo 41° na ala nke ọ dịkarịa ala 23°
A ga-enwe naanị otu ụbọchị mmiri ozuzo na Machị, nke ruru 1 mm, Gwandum ga-ahụkwa ụbọchị 30 na-enweghị mmiri ozuzo ọ bụla

N'ọnwa Eprel, Gwandum ga-enweta naanị ụbọchị 2 nke mmiri ozuzo nke ruru 4 mm, ụbọchị 28 fọdụrụ ga-akpọnwụ
Na Gwandum, okpomọkụ kachasị elu kwa ụbọchị na Mee bụ 43 °, na nke kacha nta bụ ọ dịkarịa ala 30 °
A ga-enwe ụbọchị 25 na May maka Gwandum, a ga-enwekwa ụbọchị 6 na ngụkọta nke 15 mm nke mmiri ozuzo
Gwandum na-enwe okpomọkụ dị elu nke 40 ° na June na okpomọkụ kachasị elu nke ọ dịkarịa ala 30 °
Na June, Gwandum ga-enwe ụbọchị 18 nke ihu igwe kpọrọ nkụ na ụbọchị 12 nke mmiri ozuzo ruru 45 mm

Na Gundum, okpomọkụ kachasị kwa ụbọchị na Julaị bụ 37°, ma nke kacha nta bụ opekata mpe 28° A ga-enwe ụbọchị ọkọchị iri na otu na Julaị maka Gundum, a ga-enwekwa ụbọchị iri abụọ na mkpokọta mmiri ozuzo 155 mm

Na Septemba, Gwandum na-enwe okpomọkụ dị elu nke 37 ° na nkezi ala nke ọ dịkarịa ala 27 °
A ga-enwe ụbọchị 17 na Septemba maka Gwandum, a ga-enwekwa ụbọchị 13 na ngụkọta nke mm 71 nke mmiri ozuzo
Na Gwandum, okpomọkụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba na-eru ogo 39 na ala nke ọ dịkarịa ala 27 °
A ga-enwe ụbọchị 27 na-adịghị mma n'ọnwa Ọktoba maka Gwandum, a ga-enwekwa ụbọchị 4 na ngụkọta nke 16 mm nke mmiri ozuzo
Na Gwandum, okpomọkụ kachasị elu na Nọvemba bụ 37 °, na okpomọkụ kacha nta bụ ọ dịkarịa ala 23 °

Samson Gwede Mantashe, onye a ma ama dị ka Gwede Mantashe, (amụrụ 21 June 1955) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye otu azụmaahịa South Africa, onye dịka nke 18 Disemba 2017, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche mba nke National Congress of African National Congress
Ọ bụkwabu onye isi oche South Africa Communist Party na odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke ANC
Na 26th nke February 2018, n'oge ngbanwe nke ụlọ ọrụ site n'aka onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa, a họpụtara Mantashe Minista nke Mineral Resources
N'ọnwa Mee 2019, ọ ghọrọ onye minista na-ahụ maka ihe ndị na-emepụta ihe na ike, mgbe ejikọtara Pọtụfoliyo mbụ ya na pọtụfoliyo ike

Gweedore (/ ɡwiːˈdɔːr/ gwee-DOR; nke amara aha ya n'asụsụ Irish, Gaoth Dobhair [ˌɡiː ˈd̪ˠoːɾʲ]) bụ mpaghara na-asụ Irish na parish dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri Atlantic nke County Donegal na ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ireland

Gweedore gbatịrị ihe dị ka kilomita 26 (16 mi) site na Glasserchoo[lower-alpha 1] n'ebe ugwu ruo Crolly na ndịda yana ihe dị ka kilomita 14 (9 mi) site na Dunlewey n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ ruo Magheraclogher na ọdịda anyanwụ, ma bụrụ otu n'ime Europe kachasị
Ime obodo ndị mmadụ juru na ya
Ọ bụ parish na-asụ Irish kasị ukwuu na Ireland nke nwere ihe dị ka 4,065, ma bụrụkwa ụlọ ụlọ ihe nkiri mpaghara ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke ọrụ redio asụsụ Irish RTÉ Raidió na Gaeltachta, yana mpụga mpụga
campus nke National University of Ireland, Galway
Gweedore gụnyere obodo nta Bunbeg, Derrybeg, Dunlewey, Crolly na Brinlack, wee nọdụ na ndò County Donegal kacha elu, Errigal
Gwen Dickey (amụrụ n'ubochí mbụ n'ọnwa Disemba, n'afọ 1953) bụ onye amụrụ n'Amerịka na-agụ egwu Britain nke a maara nke ọma dị ka nwanyị n'ihu nke otu R&B Rose Royce, ebe ọ rụrụ n'aha Rose Norwalt
Egwu ya ndị a ma ama gụnyere 'Car Wash' na 'Wishing on a Star'
N'afọ 1976, olu ya na Hot 100 nọmba otu 'Car Wash' mere ka Dickey na ndị otu ahụ bụrụ ndị ama ama na mba ụwa
Ọ hapụrụ otu egwu ahụ n'afọ 1980
O mechara hapụ United States gaa United Kingdom, ebe ọ ka bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama
A mụrụ ya na Biloxi, Mississippi, Dickey bidoro ịrụ ọrụ ọkachamara na klọb obodo
O mechara bídó iso otu egwu ụlọ egwu nke obodo a maara dị ka The Jewels
N'oge nkwụsị njem na Miami, Joe Harris nke The Undisputed Truth hụrụ Dickey, ógè ọ nụrụ ka ya na The Jewels na-eme ihe nkiri
Harris, onye nọ na-achọ nwanyị na-agụ egwu iji dochie Brenda Evans, mere ka Dickey gaa Los Angeles iji nyochaa onye na-emepụta egwu ha na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ Norman Whitfield
Mgbe ọ nyochachara maka Whitfield, Whitfield tinyere ya na otu ọhụrụ ya bụ Rose Royce
Whitfield nyekwara Dickey aha ọgbọ Rose Norwalt
N'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1976, Rose Royce wepụtara egwu izizi ha 'Car Wash', nke Dickey rụrụ
Otu egwu a ruru ọkwa nke mbụ na chaatị Billboard Hot 100, ma ree ihe karịrị otu nde na United States
E wepụtara abọm izizi nke Rose Royce bụ Car Wash na Septemba 13, 1976
O rere ihe karịrị nde abụọ n'ụwa niile ma merie Grammy Award maka Best Score Soundtrack Album na 1977
Egwu ikpeazụ nke abọm ahụ bụ 'I'm Going Down', nke gosikwara ụda olu sitere na Dickey, ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ 70 na US Hot 100 wee ruo nọmba iri na chaatị egwu R&B
N'afọ 2001, ọ bụ onye isi njem egwu a kpọrọ 'What A Feeling' nke na-egwuri egwu na nnukwu ụlọ ihe nkiri n'England niile
Dickey meghere n'ihe banyere James Brown na One Grand Prix Ball na Monte Carlo ma soro Meatloaf na Antwerp, Belgium maka Night of the Proms na ihe ngosi rere ere maka abalị atọ n'otu afọ ahụ
N'afọ 2004, Dickey rụrụ na Glastonbury Music Festival na England
Dickey rụrụ ọzọ na James Brown na Monte Carlo maka Formula otu n'afọ 2005
O mere ihe ngosi ọzọ maka Formula ótù Drivers Annual Charity Ball na 2006
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na United Kingdom na Europe na 2007 na 2008
N'afọ 2010, Dickey na ndị otu Rose Royce pụtara na ihe omume nke Unsung
N'afọ 2010, Dickey nwetara mmerụ ahụ azụ n'ụlọ ya dị na London, na-ahapụ ya ịdabere na oche nkwagharị
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2018, ọ ka na-eme egwu ógè ọ nọ ọdụ n'elu ikpo okwu
Gwendoline 'Gwen' Malegwale Ramokgopa bụ onye bụbu MEC maka ahụike na Gauteng, South Africa
Ọ nọchiri Qedani Mahlangu ma Nomathemba Mokgethi nọchiri ya
Ọ bụ onye isi obodo nke City of Tshwane Metropolitan Municipality site n'afọ 2006 ruo afọ 2010 ma tupu nke ahụ jere ozi dị ka MEC maka ahụike na Gauteng site n'afọ 1998 rụọ afọ 2006
Mgbe ọ gachara dịka onye isi obodo Tshwane, ọ bụ osote minista ahụike na Gọọmentị South Africa site n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2010 ruo n'ọnwa Mee 2014
Ramokgopa bụ chancellor nke Tshwane University of Technology
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke kọmitii na-ahụ maka ndị isi nke Pretoria City Council n'afọ 1995
A mụrụ ya na Atteridgeville ma mechaa nzere MBChB ya na MEDUNSA n'ebe ugwu Pretoria
Gwendoline Noreen Chomba Konie (9 Ọktoba 1938 14 Machị 2009) bụ onye na-ede uri, onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Zambia
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Zambia na Scandinavia, United Nations na Germany
O guzobere otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke ya na afọ 2000 wee guzo dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala Zambia na afọ 2001
Mgbe ọ nwụru anwu, e nyere ya olili ozu steeti
A mụrụ Konie na 1938 na Lusaka na Northern Rhodesia n'oge ahụ ma bụrụ Zambia ugbu a
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cardiff dị na Cardiff, Wales na Mahadim America dị na Washington DC, United States
Ọ natara nzere doctorate na sociology na Mahadum Warwick
N'afọ 1962, Sir Evelyn Dennison Hone, Gọvanọ-Jenal nke Northern Rhodesia, họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Kansụl Iwu nke mba ya
Ọ gakwuuru Kenneth Kaunda tupu ọ nabata
Ọ zụrụ maka Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ wee bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Zambia na onye nnọchianya zuru oke na Sweden, Denmark, Norway na Finland site na 1974 ruo 1977
Site na 1977 ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya mba ahụ na United Nations
N'afọ 1979 ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide nke Ngalaba Njem nke Zambia
Mgbe Kenneth Kaunda tụfuru ọchịchị, Onye isi ala Frederick Chiluba nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ ruo n'afọ 1997
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Zambia na Germany
N'afọ 2001, ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Zambia n'afọ 2001
Ọ nọchitere anya Social Democratic Party nke o guzobere n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2000 iji lekwasị anya n'okwu ndị dị mkpa nye ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
A tụbara otu nde vootu maka mmadụ iri na otu na ntuli aka ahụ
Abụọ n'ime ndị na-azọ ọkwa bụ ụmụ nwanyị
Konie nwetara ihe karịrị 10,000 vootu ma họpụta Levy Mwanawasa
Konie bụkwa onye na-ede uri
E tinyere uri ya 'In the Fist of your Hatred' na The Penguin Book of Modern African Poetry na 2007
Abụ ahụ bụ arụmụka megide mpako nwoke
Ọ nwụrụ na MKP Trust Hospital na Lusaka na afó 2009 ma nata olili ozu steeti
Onye isi ala Rupiah Banda kwuru na ọ bụ ụbọchị Zambia ga-eru uju ọnwụ ya na Kenneth Kaunda kwuru na ọ na-etinyere ya aka na ịmepụta Zambia mgbe nnwere onwe site na Britain
Àtụ 2001 presidential candidates, Zambia
Gwendolyn (Gwen) Ann Magee (ubochí irí atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1943 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Eprel, 2011) bụ onye Africa-America na-ese ihe
Magee na-amụta ịkpa ákwà n'etiti ndụ ya, ọ ghọrọ ónyé a ma ámá n'ụwa nke nka fiber n'oge na-adịghị ányá na akụkọ ya na-egosi ahụmịhe ndị Africa na America

Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Mississippi Museum of Art, Museum of Mississippi History, Michigan State University Museum, na Renwick Gallery nke Smithsonian Museum of American Art, ma gosipụta ya na mbà ụwa
A mụrụ Magee Gwendolyn (Gwen) Ann Jones na 1943 na High Point, North Carolina
Dị ka nwatakịrị, nne nkuchi ya, ónyé nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ áhà ya bụ Annie Lee Jones, kpughere ya nka, ọrụ aka na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie
Nne na nna ya debanyere aha na mpịakọta iri abụọ na anọ The Metropolitan Seminars in Art nke John Canaday na mpịaka iri itoolu Art Treasures of the World, nke Harry N
Abrams bipụtara, a dọtakwara Magee na mpịaghachi ndị na-egosi Van Gogh na Gauguin n'ihi ojiji dị egwu nkè ndị na-ese ihe
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1959 na William Penn High School na High Point, ọ banyere na Women's College nke Mahadum North Carolina (UNC) na Greensboro dị nso
UNC nọ n'afọ nke anọ nke nke nkewa, Magee bụkwa otu n'ime ndị Africa America ise nọ na klas ya
N'oge ọ nọ na UNC, Greensboro bụ ebe ọrụ ikike ọbọdọ, Magee wee rụọ ọrụ na ngagharị iwe megide ịkpa ókè n'ime ọbọdọ, ahụmịhe nke ga-emesị metụta ọrụ nka ya
Magee nwụrụ na Jackson na 2011 mgbè ọ lụchara ọgụ ogologo ógè
Ọ dị afọ iri isii na asaa
N'ịchọ ime akwa màkà ụmụ ya nwanyị ka ha gaa kọleji, Magee debanyere aha na klas akwa akwa n'afọ 1989

Mgbè ọ gụsịrị klas na Joy's Craft Shop na Jackson na Anne's Quilt Shop na Clinton, Magee mụtara banyere Jackson Quilters na Mississippi Quilt Association, ebe ọ bụ naanị ónyé Africa America so n'òtù ahụ n'oge ahụ

N'ileghachi anya azụ n'oge ahụ, Magee kọrọ, sị 'Mgbè m nwesịrị mmasị n'ezie n'ịkwado, amalitere m ịchọ ozi gbasara ndị ọzọ na-akwa akwa akwa akwa akwa, na na mbido, naanị ihe m nwere ike ịchọta gosipụtara anyị site na 'nkà ọdịnala' ma ọ bụ 'onye na-ese ihe n'èzí', ma wepụta ụdị echiche niile kwụsịrị ikwu na anyị enweghị ike ịhazi ihe na ịmekọrịta ihe dị mgbagwoju anya na 'nke ọma'
Nke a bụ otu ihe mere m ji kpebisie ike na ọ dịghị onye ga-enwe ike ikwu na ọrụ m dị njọ
' Ọ gara nke ọma n'ọrụ ya ngwa ngwa ma gbanwee site na usoro ọdịnala gaa na atụmatụ na-enweghị atụ na akụkọ na-akọ akụkọ na ọdịbendị ndị Afrịka na America

Magee sikwa n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ụlọ okike, agụmakwụkwọ na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, itinye aka na mmegharị ikike obodo, ọrụ na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze na azụmaahịa, na ahụmịhe ya dị ka nwunye, nne, na nne nne nne
Gwendolyn Clarine Knight (May 26, 1913 na February 18, 2005) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkè amụrụ nà Bridgetown, Barbados, na West Indies
Knight sere ihe osise n'oge ndụ ya niile mànà ọ malitere igosi ọrụ ya ruo n'afọ ndị 1970
E mèrè ihe ngosi mbụ ya mgbè ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 90, 'Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ dị n'eluigwe The Art of Gwen Knight,' na Tacoma Art Museum na 2003

Ndị nkuzi ya na nka gụnyere onye na-ese ihe Augusta Savage (onye nwetara nkwado màkà ya site na Works Progress Administration) na Jacob Lawrence, ónyé ọ lụrụ na 1941 ma nọgide na-alụ ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ na 2000
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ọ natara ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere National Honor Award, na nzere doctorate abụọ, site na Mahadum Minnesota na Mahadim Seattle
A mụrụ Knight na 1913 na Barbados, West Indies
Mgbè ọ dị afọ asaa, nne ya nyèrè ya ezigbo ndị enyi ya ndị ya na ha kwagara na United States
Ya na ezinụlọ nkuchi ya biri na St
Louis, Missouri
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Harlem (New York City), ébé ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Wadleigh High School na 1930
Site na 1931 ruo 1933 ọ gàrà Mahadum Howard, na-amụ nka mara mma
Oké Ndakpọ Akụ̀ na Ụba kpatara nsogbu ego, na-eme ka Knight kwụsị tupu ọ nata akara ugo mmụta ya
Knight mechara laghachi na New York City, ebe ụlọ ọrụ Works Projects Administration were ya n'ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-enyere ónyé na-ese ihe, Charles Alston aka
Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ nka na Harlem Community Art Center, ebe Augusta Savage duziri ya
Site na Savage, ọ zutere ma ọ bụ kpughere ọrụ Langston Hughes, Ralph Ellison, Romare Bearden, Claude McKay na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe, ndị na-ede uri, na ndị edemede nkè Harlem Renaissance
Knight nọchiri di ya, Lawrence, wee nwụọ na Seattle na Febụwarị 18, 2005, mgbè ọ dị afọ 91
Knight amaliteghị igosi ọrụ ya n'ihu ọha ruo n'afọ ndị 1970

Knight nwèrè ọtụtụ nnukwu ihe ngosi onwé ya Seattle Art Museum (1976), Virginia Lacy Jones Gallery, Mahadum Atlanta (1988), Francine Seders Gallery na Seattle (1994), Never Late for Heaven The Art of Gwen Knight, na Tacoma Art Museum (2003) na DC Moore Gallery, New York na 2003
E tinyere ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu, gụnyere ihe ngosi nke 1967, Portrayal of the Negroes in American Painting na Forum Gallery
N'afọ 1993, Knight natara Women's Caucus for Art Lifetime Achievement Award
A na-asọpụrụ ya na Caucus Centennial Medallion, site na Black Caucus
N'afọ 1984 ọ natara Centennial Award of Merit site na Mahadum Arizona State, na 1994, ọ natara Pioneer Award, Twelfth Annual Artists' Salute to Black History Month
Gwer East bụ mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo nke dị na Benue Steeti, Nigeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Aliade
O nwere mpaghara nke 2,294 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 163,647 dika ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006 sị dị
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 971
Gọọmentị Obodo nwere mpaghara atọ; Yonov, Njiriv na Ngyohov
O nwere ngalaba iri na asaa nke Council
Ọ na-ekerịta ókèala ya na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo asaa ndị ọzọ
'Gwer West' bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na steeti Benue, Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Naka

o nwere ngalaba kansụl iri na ise na ndị ikwu; Sengev, Tsambe/Mbesev, Merkyen, Nyamshi, Gaambe-Ushin, Mbachohon, Mbapa, Tijime, Avihijime, Gbange/Tongov, Toughatee/Injaha, Sengev/Yengev, Saghev/Ukusu, Ikyagev, Mbabuande
Chief Daniel Ayua Abomtse bụ onye ọchịchị kacha ugbu a
Onye isi oche ugbu a bụ Hon (Mrs) Grace Igbabon
Onwere ebe ndi ozo di nkpa na ochichi ime obodo ma ewezuga isi ulo oru, ndia gunyere Orawe, Bunaka, Agagbe, Nagi, Aondoana, Kula, Jimba, Anguhar, Atukpu na Ajigba
Ikyande bụ ahịa ọzọ na-ewu ewu na Gwer West Local Government Area
Asụsụ Gwune, nke a makwaara dị ka Agwagwune, bụ asụsụ ndi Upper Cross River nke di na Naijiria nke ndị Akunakuna na-asụ
Ọ bụ ụyọkọ asụsụ aha ya sitere na ụdị dị iche iche; ndị ọzọ bụ Abayongo, Abini, Dim (Adim), Orum, Erei, Etono
GY, Gy, ma ọ bụ gy, nwere ike ịpụta
Jackline Acheampong (onye amụrụ n'abalị iri na isii nke ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1998) nke a maara dịka Gyakie bụ onye Ghana na-agụ egwu afrobeat / afro

N'afọ 2019, Gyakie wepụtara egwu mbụ ya akpọrọ; 'Love is Pretty' nke meghere ụzọ maka ọgụgụ egwu ọzọ, 'Never Like This' N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020, egwu 'Forever' sitere na EP ise ya, nke akpọrọ 'Seed' bụ nkwupụta ya maka ịbụ onye ama ama na ikuku na ndepụta ndị Ghana, Kenya na Nigeria
Nna Gyakie bụ Nana Acheampong
A zụlitere Gyakie na Kumasi na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ gụsịrị TI
Ahmadiyya Senior High School, Kumasi ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST) nke ọ gụrụ na azụmahịa mba ụwa
A mụrụ Gyakie n'ime ezinụlọ ndị n'akụ egwu na mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, ọ malitere isonyere nna ya na studio
Asa na onye egwu Ghana bụ Omar Sterling nke R2Bees metụtakwara mkpali mmụọ ya
Gyakie wepụtara egwu mbụ ya; 'Love is Pretty' n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2019 ma buru ụzọ wepụta, 'Never Like This' O wepụtara nchịkọta EP ise, nke akpọrọ Seed n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020
Egwu 'Forever' na Seed EP nwere Mpụta ihe na Ghana, Kenya na Nigeria
Ọ nọ n'elu chaatị egwu dịka Billboard's Top Triller Global na Shazams Top 200 chaatị
Gyakie wepụtara remix nke 'Forever' ya na onye na-agụ egwu Naịjirịa bụ Omah Lay na Machị 2021
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, a họpụtara ya dịka nwanyị mpụtara nke afọ na 2021 3Music Women's Brunch maka 3Music Awards 2021
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ mba ụwa na nkwekọrịta Sony Music entertainme, RCA Records UK na Sony Music Africa
N'ọnwa Machị 2022, a họpụtara Gyakie dị ka nwanyị nke afọ maka 3Music Awards 2022 n'oge 3Music Women's brunch
