Gyamfi Kyeremeh (amụrụ na 9 Machị 1995) bụ onye Belgium na-agba bọọlụ, onye na-agbachitere Oldham Athletic AFC
na League One
Kyeremeh mere mpụta mbụ ọkachamara ya na 30 August 2014 na egwuregwu Belgian Pro League maka Waasland-Beveren megide Lierse SK
N'afọ 2015, ọ sonyeere otu egwuregwu nke Eintracht Braunschweig nke Germany na Regionalliga Nord
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2017, Kyeremeh bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na nhọrọ nke atọ na Oldham Athletic AFC
na-esote oge ikpe
Gyasi A
Zardes (amuru Septemba 2, 1991) bu onye ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama ama maka Colorado Rapids nke Major League Soccer na otu mba United States
A mụrụ ya na Hawthorne, California, Zardes so na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ntorobịa LA Galaxy tupu ọ gbaa bọọlụ kọleji maka Cal State Bakersfield
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị oge atọ na Roadrunners, Zardes bịanyere aka na LA Galaxy dị ka onye egwuregwu homegrown
N'oge mbụ ya, o guzobere onwe ya ozugbo dị ka onye na-anọkarị na ndị otu Bruce Arena, na oge ọzọ ọ gbara goolu iri na isii ka o nyere Galaxy aka imeri MLS Cup 2014
Ọrụ ya maka Galaxy na 2014 nyeere aka inweta Zardes nke mbụ ya maka United States megide Chile na Jenụwarị 2015

Frederick Christopher Kwabena Gyearbuor Asante (4 Nọvemba 1941 - 2 Ọgọst 2000) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri nke a na-echeta nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Channel 4 ọnọdụ ọchị Desmond's, nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke nwa akwụkwọ Gambian tozuru etozu Matthew
A mụrụ ya na Accra, Asante kwagara United Kingdom n'afọ1967 mụọ gbasara ka e si eme ihe nkiri na Mountview Academy of Theatre Arts
E mechara guzobe 'Gyearbuor Asante Prize for Acting' na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi TV nke Britain n'oge 1970s na '80s, ebe a kpọrọ ya Christopher Asante
Ihe ndekọ ya gụnyere ihe omume nke Space 1999, Mind Your Language, Hazell na The Professionals yana arụmọrụ TV nke Ubu Roi n'afọ 1976
O mekwara onye ozi na ihe nkiri afọ 1983 Local Hero

O si n'ọtụtụ ndị isi nke obodo ya bụ Kwahu Tafo mana o wepụrụ onwe ya ka ọ ghara ime omenala ahụ iji kwado ịchụso ọrụ ime ihe nkiri; enyi ya, onye na-emepụta telivishọn bụ Humphrey Barclay weghaara Asante
Ọ laghachiri ebe a mụrụ ya na Ghana n'afọ 1995 ebe e mere ya onye nnọchi anya ọdịbendị
Ọ nwụrụ n'isi obodo Accra nakwa olili ozu ya na bụ n'obodo nna nna ya nke Tafo Kwahu na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana
Gyem bụ kwa asụsụ ndi Kainji nke Bauchi Steeti, Naịjirịa
Gylan Kain (mgbe ụfọdụ naanị KAIN, Kain ma ọ bụ Kain the Poet) bụ onye America na-ede abụ na onye na-ede egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye guzobere, n'afọ 1968, nke Original Last Poets (ya na Abiodun Oyewole na David Nelson, ya na Felipe Luciano gbakwunyere n'oge na-adịghị anya)
Kain n'onwe ya kere ihe ike, nnyefe ụda nke okwu ọnụ aka uri arụmọrụ dị ka a maara ya taa
Ọ na-ejikarị aka ma ọ bụ na-akwado ndị egwu dị ka onye saxophonists na bass guitarists
Ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama gụnyere Dr
Dre na The Prodigy gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'enweghị nkwenye
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Otu n'ime ihe omume ya gosipụtara na klọb Voodoo People nke The Prodigy
Dre gosipụtara akụkụ nke Kain na-abụ abụ ya, 'The Shalimar' na egwu Dre nke akpọrọ 'Intro' site na abọm akpọrọ 'The Chronic'

Mgbe e mechara ihe iwu kwadoro nke ọma iji nweta ụgwọ maka ọrụ nke The Prodigy gosipụtara, ndị na-ekwuchitere The Prodigy kwuru na e meela mgbalị iji nweta ikike n'aka Kain maka iji ọrụ ya mana mbọ ndị ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'ihi na Kain, onye ji nzuzo kpọrọ ihe, enweghị ike ịchọta n'oge
Dre akwụbeghị Kain ụgwọ maka ọrụ e gosipụtara n'enweghị nkwenye dị mkpa]
Nke a emeela ka ụfọdụ ndị na-akwado [onye?] katọọ Dr
Dre dị ka onye ihu abụọ maka iji ọrụ nke onye na-ese ihe ojii nwere mmetụta mgbe o wusịrị aha dị ka ike na-enye ike na obodo ndị isi ojii America dị ka onye guzobere NWA
[nkọwa dị mkpa]
Kain emeela mmekorita multimedia na onye na-eti egwu Z'EV ma pụta na Dutch jazz / hip-hop / fusion otu Electric Barbarian, na-apụta na abọm egwu ha nke afọ 2004 él
Ọ bụkwa isiokwu nke ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
Nwa ya nwanyị, Amber Kain, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Nwa ya nwoke bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Khalil Kain, onye a maara nke ọma maka ịpụta dịka 'Raheem' n'afọ 1992 crime thriller Juice featuring 2Pac
Gylbert Coker (Gylbert Gavin Coker; b
1944) bụ onye Africa-American na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, ónyé na-ese ihe, na ónyé nlekọta nke rụrụ ọrụ iji guzobe ndị Black na-ese egwu na nka na Canon nke nka America
Coker bụ Ónyé mbụ so na Where We At, otu ndị Black women artists guzobere na 1971 bụ ndị mepụtara ihe ngosi mbụ nke Black women's art
Mgbè ọ nwetasịrị BFA na Pratt Institute, Coker gụsịrị nzèrè masta na Mahadum New York na Hunter College na PhD na Mahaduma Florida State
N'afọ 1977, Coker nwetara fellowship na Metropolitan Museum of Art; o mechara rụọ ọrụ na Guggenheim, Museum of Modern Art, na Zora Neale Hurston Museum
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkà mmụta Africa-America mbụ na-ede akwụkwọ mgbè niile màkà Art in America and Arts

Coker's reviews of exhibitions by African-American artists, which have included Bob Thompson, Ed Love, and Bill Traylor, her essays about African-American art, and public talks (including Henry Ossawa Tanner) brought these artists into the canon of American art history
Her 1978 exhibition on Bob Thompson was the first retrospective on the artist
Gyong, nke a makwaara dị ka Kagoma, bụ asụsụ di na Plateau nke Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ ndị Gwong na-asụ ya, ndị ala nna ha dị na Jema'a Local Government Area na mpaghara ndịda nke Kaduna State, Nigeria
Hédi Khayachi (1882 na Tunis - 1948 na Marsa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Tunisia
Ọ bụ onye mbụ na-ese ihe ndị Alakụba na Tunisia na onye na-ese foto nke ụlọ ikpe Husseinite
Nna ya sitere n'usoro ndị oké ozu jikọtara ya na onye amụma Muhammad, nke biri na Tripolitania tupu ha eguzobe onwe ha na Tunis n'oge Al-Husayn I ibn Ali at-Turki
Alaka Khayachi nke ezinụlọ ahụ biri na Monastir, Tunisia n'etiti ngwụcha senchiri nke ịrị na asatọ na mmalite narị afọ nke ịrị na asatọ dị ka ndị na-ewetara ndị ọrụ gọọmentị
Nne ya bụ onye Mamluk; nna ya guzobere azụmahịa nke aka ya na Tunis
N'inwe mmasị n'ise ihe, Khayachi na-agakarị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'efu na Montparnasse ma nweta agụmakwụkwọ nka na Rom, ebe a kụziiri ya ihe osise ma gaa na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke Europe
N'afọ 1908, o mepụtara ihe osise nke Husseinite Beys wee rụọ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ ezinụlọ na ndị isi, nke mere ka a kọwaa ya dị ka onye isi na-ese ihe osise na Tunisia
Ya mere, ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya bụ ihe osise, mana Khayachi na-ese ihe osise na ihe nkiri nke ndụ ọdịnala na omenala n'ụlọ ndị nọ n'etiti, yana ụlọ ndị ọzọ dị ala
N'ihe osise ya, ọ na-asọpụrụ ụmụ nwanyị n'ụdị dị iche iche ma nwee ike imekọrịta ìhè na onyinyo
Khayachi pụtara n'etiti ndị bu ụzọ na ihe osise Tunisia Pierre Boucherle, Yahia Turki, Moses Lévy, Jules Lellouche, Ali Bellagha, Ammar Farhat, Maurice Bismouth, Hatem El Mekki na Edgard Naccache
O mepụtara ihe ngosi iri abụọ na Tunisia na Europe ma nọchite anya Tunisia n'ọtụtụ ihe omume nka mba ụwa
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na isii, na-ahapụ ihe osise ndị a na-arụchabeghị nke nwa ya nwoke, Noureddine Khayachi, onye bụkwa onye na-ese ihe, nke dechara ma bịanye aka na ya
A na-asọpụrụ Hédi Khayachi n'afọ 1983, 1997 na 2000 site na mbipụta nke stampụ post site na La Poste Tunisienne

Maïmouna Hélène Diarra, nke a na-akpọkwa Helena Diarra (1955 -June 10, 2021) bụ onye Mali na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara maka ịrụ ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị meworo okenye site na nwata
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke International Fund for the Development of Active Retirement (FIDRA)
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Professional Association of Decentralized Financial Systems of Côte d'Ivoire (Apsfd-CI)
A mụrụ Diarra n'afọ 1955 na Segou, Mali mana ọ ghọrọ nwa mgbe ọ dị obere ma bụrụ nwa mgbe ọ bụ nwanne nna ya na nne nne ya zụlitere ya
N'afọ 1975, a nabatara ya na National Pedagogical Institute for a Diploma of Fundamental Studies (DEF) na ọrụ nkuzi
Mgbe ọ gbanwere egwuregwu, n'etiti afọ 1975 na 1977 ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị nke Bamako Reds
N'afọ 1981, ọ nwetara diplọma na ihe nkiri na National Arts Institute (INA)
N'afọ 2000, e gosipụtara ya dịka 'Aminate' na ihe nkiri Michael Haneke, Code Unknown
Ndị ọzọ gụnyere Aïssa Maïga, Juliette Binoche, Thierry Neuvic, Josef Bierbichler na ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2004, e gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri asụsụ Bambara nke Ousmane Sembène, Moolaadé, na-arụ ọrụ 'Hadjatou'
Ndị ọzọ gụnyere Fatoumata Coulibaly na Salimata Traoré
N'afọ 2006, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Abderrahmane Sissako, Bamako, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Saramba'
Ndị ọzọ gosipụtara gụnyere Aïssa Maïga na Tiécoura Traoré
Hélder Wander Sousa de Azevedo e Costa (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Angola na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara òtù Leeds United bọọlụ
Na mbụ ọ na-anọchite anya Portugal na ọkwa ndị ntorobịa na ndị okenye, n'afọ 2021 ọ họọrọ ịnọchite anya ndị otu mba Angola
N'ịbụ onye e guzobere na Benfica, nke ya na ya pụtara otu Taça da Liga, Costa nọrọ ọtụtụ oge n'ọrụ ya na mba ọzọ, gụnyere na Deportivo de La Coruña na La Liga na Monaco na Ligue 1
Ọ nọrọkwa ọtụtụ afọ na England na Wolverhampton Wanderers na Leeds United, na-emeri EFL Championship na ha abụọ
Costa nọchitere anya Portugal site n'okpuru afọ iri na isii ruo n'akụkụ ndị okenye, onye o nyere goolu na naanị mpụta ya n'afọ 2018
N'afọ 2021, o nyere goolu na nke mbụ ya maka Angola
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, Costa mere egwuregwu izizi ya na Benfica B na 2012-13 Segunda Liga megide Braga B ebe ọ gbara nkeji iri asaa na abụọ dị ka winger
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ ọkachamara mbụ ya bịara na 23 Ọgọstụ 2013, na mmeri 3-0 n'ụlọ Portimonense, otu n'ime asatọ n'oge ahụ gụnyere na 23 Nọvemba na mmeri 4–3 megide Oliveirense nke a chụpụkwara ya

Na 25 Jenụwarị 2014, Costa malitere na Benfica na 2013-14 Taça da Liga nke atọ megide Gil Vicente, na-egwu nkeji iri na atọ ikpeazụ nke mmeri 1–0 na Estádio da Luz dị ka onye nnọchi anya Miralem Sulejmani
O tinyeghị aka ọzọ na asọmpi ahụ, nke Benfica gara n'ihu merie
N'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2014, o nyere goolu na Segunda Liga na Benfica B megide Olhanense na mmeri 5-1 n'ụlọ
Costa sitere na ụlọ akwụkwọ Benfica n'otu ọgbọ dị ka ndị mba Portugal n'ọdịnihu bụ Ivan Cavaleiro na Bernardo Silva
Na 19 Jenụwarị 2015, a gbazinyere Costa na Deportivo de La Coruña nke La Liga ruo na njedebe nke oge ahụ
Ọ pụtara ugboro isii maka ndị Galicians, ha niile site na oche ndị nnọchi anya
Na 10 Julaị 2015, Costa sonyeere Ligue 1 klọb Monaco na mgbazinye ego otu afọ
A bịanyere aka na ya na ndị otu Benfica Cavaleiro na Silva
O nyere goolu mbụ ya na egwuregwu Ligue 1 na 8 Nọvemba, na-emeghe mmeri 3-1 na Bordeaux
O nyekwara aka maka ihe mgbaru ọsọ mbụ nke Kylian Mbappé maka Monaco na mmeri 3–1 megide Troyes na 26 Febụwarị 2016
Costa gbara bọọlụ ugboro iri abụọ na asatọ ma nye goolu ise n'asọmpi niile maka Monaco n'oge 2015-16, na-eche asọmpi ihu site n'aka ndị dị ka Silva, Thomas Lemar na Mbappé

N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2016, Costa kwagara na mgbazinye ego ruo oge na EFL Championship club Wolverhampton Wanderers, onye o mere nke mbụ ya n'ụbọchị nke isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya na 2–2 na Rotherham United O nyere goolu mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ na mmeri 2–1 EFL Cup megide Cambridge United na 23 August, na goolu mbụ ya na 17 Septemba na mmeri 2–0 megide Newcastle United na St James' Park E tokwara Costa maka arụmọrụ ya megide Premier League n'akụkụ Liverpool na FA Cup, na Wolves kpatara mmeri 2–1 na Anfield; Costa nyere aka na ihe mgbaru ọsọ Wolves abụọ
Na 30 Jenụwarị 2017, Wolves zụtara Costa ozugbo maka ego mbufe nde £ 13, n'oge ahụ bụ ego mbufe kachasị elu nke klọb ahụ kwụrụ
Mgbe akwụsịrị ya ụgwọ, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na ọkara na klọb ahụ

Mgbe o nyere goolu iri na abụọ na enyemaka asatọ n'asọmpi niile n'oge mbụ ya, na ngwụcha afọ nke oge onyinye, o meriri 2016-17 Wolves Player of the Season Award, na-enwetakwa Player' Player' Player of the Year Award ma merie Goal of the Season maka goolu o nyere megide Cardiff City

Na 22 Nọvemba 2017, Costa nyere goolu mbụ ya nke oge 2017–18 na mmeri 4–1 megide Leeds United O nwetara ihe nrite nke onye mmeri n'oge 2017–18 EFL Championship, na-enye ihe mgbaru ọsọ ise na enyemaka isii na league n'ime oge ahụ

Costa pụtara na Premier League nke mbụ ya na 11 Ọgọstụ 2018 na egwuregwu mmeghe nke Wolves nke oge egwuregwu ahụ na 2–2 megide Everton Na 29 Disemba, na mmeri 3–1 megide Tottenham Hotspur na Wembley Stadium, o nyere goolu mbụ ya na Premier League
Na ngụkọta n'oge 2018–19, Costa mere egwuregwu iri atọ maka Wolves na asọmpi niile ka o nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka iru ebe nke asaa, zuru oke maka iru eru na 2019–20 UEFA Europa League
Na 3 Julaị 2019, Costa sonyeere klọb Championship Leeds United na mgbazinye ego maka oge 2019-20
Dị ka akụkụ nke nkwekọrịta ahụ, Costa ga-esonyere Leeds ozugbo na Julaị 2020 na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ maka ihe dị ka nde £ 15
E nyere ya uwe nrite iri na asaa, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye egwuregwu mbụ kemgbe afọ 2014 na-eyi ya, mgbe e wepụsịrị uwe ahụ na ezumike nká
O mere nke mbụ ya na 4 Ọgọstụ na Leeds' Championship opening day 3–1 mmeri megide Bristol City, na mmalite mbụ ya ụbọchị itoolu ka e mesịrị na EFL Cup megide Salford City, na-enye aka abụọ

Costa nyere goolu mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'egwuregwu EFL Cup megide Stoke City, nke mere ka ha nwee penariti mgbe ha gbachara 2–2 n'oge nkịtị, ya na ntaramahụhụ ya na mmeri 4-5
Na 30 Nọvemba, na mmeri 4-0 megide Middlesbrough, o nyere goolu mbụ ya
Na 7 Julaị 2020, Costa sonyeere Leeds ozugbo na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ
Ka ụbọchị ole na ole gachara, Leeds nwetara nkwalite na Premier League dị ka ndị mmeri EFL

Costa mere Premier League mbụ ya maka Leeds na egwuregwu mbụ nke oge ahụ megide ndị mmeri Liverpool na 12 Septemba 2020, na-enyere Mateusz Klich aka na mmeri 4–3 n'ụlọ ma nye aka otu izu mgbe e mesịrị na mmeri mbụ nke Leeds n'ụlọ nke oge ahụ, mmeri 4–3 megide Fulham
Na 31 Ọgọstụ 2021, Costa sonyeere La Liga n'akụkụ Valencia na mgbazinye ego maka oge 2021-22
A mụrụ ya na Angola, Costa malitere ọrụ mba ụwa ya na-anọchite anya Portugal
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Portugal na 2013 UEFA European Under-19 Football Championship, ọ bụ ezie na o nwetaghị akara na ọsọ ndị otu ahụ na ọkara ikpeazụ, a kpọrọ ya aha na Team of the Tournament
Costa nọchikwara anya Portugal na 2014 Toulon Tournament
Costa natara oku mbụ ya na ndị isi otu Portugal tupu asọmpi UEFA Nations League n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2018
O mere egwuregwu izizi ya na mba ụwa na enyi na enyi megide Scotland na Hampden Park na 14 Ọktoba, na mmeri 3–1 nke o nyere goolu mmeghe
Portugal meriri na 2018–19 UEFA Nations League, mana akpọghị Costa maka asọmpi anọ ikpeazụ
N'ụbọchị 16 nke ọnwa Maachị 2021, a kpọbatara Costa n'òtù Angola squad maka egwuregwu nke 2021 Africa Cup of Nations qualification buso Gambia and Gabon
O tozuru oke n'ihi na ọ bụ naanị Portugal gbara bọọlụ enyi
Ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya n'afọ 2022 FIFA World Cup qualifier n'ụlọ nke Egypt n'ụbọchị 12 Nọvemba n'otu afọ ahụ, na-enye goolu nke mmepe bụ 2–2 home draw
Site n'ime nke a, ọ bụrụ onye nke atọ n'akụkọ mere eme (ndị sote ya n'azụ Alfredo Di Stéfano and José Altafini) nyere ọkpụ goolu na mpụta nke mbụ ya na mba abụọ dị iche iche

O nwekwara ike igwu egwu dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu

Herman James 'Jim' Shea Jr
(December 10, 1939 , May 9, 1970) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America si steeti Massachusetts

Onye bi na Newton maka ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Tufts ma, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Mahadum Virginia School of Law, chọtara ọrụ dị ka injinia obodo, onye na-ere ụlọ, na onye nkuzi mahadum
Onye na-aga n'ihu na Democratic Party, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Newton Board of Aldermen nakwa na Massachusetts House of Representatives
Site na nhọpụta ya n'ụlọ n'afọ 1968, onye omeiwu ọhụrụ Shea tinyere aka na mmegide megide Agha Vietnam ma kwado usoro gburugburu ebe obibi nke oge a
Iwu ọ kwadoro, nke mechara bu aha ya, wepụrụ ndị bi na Massachusetts ka a ghara ịkpọbata ha n'ọrụ gọọmentị etiti na esemokwu mba ọzọ a na-ekwughị
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gafere ndị omeiwu ma Gọvanọ Francis Sargent bịanyere aka na ya n'iwu, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu jụrụ ịnụ ihe ịma aka steeti ahụ na iwu agha na Massachusetts v
Laird
N'ịbụ onye na-eche na ọ na-arụbiga ọrụ ókè n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ banyere na ndị omeiwu, a na-arịọ Shea ugboro ugboro ka ọ kwuo okwu ma na-ese n'elu mmiri dị ka onye na-achọ ọkwa dị elu
N'ịda n'ihe nwunye ya kọwara dị ka 'mmetụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị', o ji égbè gbuo onwe ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 30
A mụrụ Shea n'afọ Disemba 10, 1939 na Boston, Massachusetts, nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke atọ nke Eileen (née Curtin; 1911 ruo afọ 2002) na Herman James Shea Sr
Nna ya bụ onye injinia obodo na onye otu ngalaba na Massachusetts Institute of Technology

Horace Leonard Gold bụ onye amuru n' ọnwa Epril na ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na isii , na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri na anọ,, ya anwụọ na onwa Febrụwarị, n' ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu, na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri itoolu na isii, bụ onye odee nke science fiction nke mba Amerịka ma bụrụ kwa ọka odee
Amuru ya na mba Kanada Gold gara mba nke United States mgbe ọgbara afọ abụọ
Amara ya nke ọma maka iwe bata iihe azụ chara nke ọma ya na ụzọ ọhụrụ na science fiction
Mgbe ọ bụ onye ọ dee nke Galaxy Science Fiction, ma ọ dere nwa Mak DC Comics
Gold bụ onye Juu, a na-ekwukwa na ọ ga-ede akwụkwọ na mbụ n'okpuru aha nzuzo n'ihi na ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na-atụ egwu na ndị na'agụ akwụkwọ nwere ike imegide ndị Juu
E debara aha ya na ndị agha US n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, na-eje ozi na Pacific theater of Operations
Alụmdi na nwunye ya na Evelyn Stein kwụsịrị na ịgba alụkwaghịm na 1957, alụmdi na nwunye nke abụọ ya bụ Muriel 'Nicky' (Nicholson) Conley
Ọ nwụrụ na 1996
Nwanne ya nwoke Floyd C
Gold, na-ede akwụkwọ n'okpuru aha mkpịsị aka Floyd C
Gale, bụ onye isi na-enyocha akwụkwọ maka Galaxy site na 1955-1963
Nwa ya nwoke E
Gold bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye edemede, onye na-eti egwu na otu n'ime ndị na-egwu egwuregwu n'ịntanetị
Mgbe ọ ghọsịrị onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Galaxy Gold dere na dị ka 'nwatakịrị nwoke mara mma' ọ 'chọtara akụkọ sayensị na 1927, mgbe ọ dị afọ 13'
During the 1930s, Gold unsuccessfully wrote stories for pulp magazines
The day he was fired from his regular job because his boss believed that a writer should not work as a busboy, Gold learned that he had made his first sale
Beginning with 'Inflexure' (as Clyde Crane Campbell) in Astounding Science Fiction (October 1934), Gold later worked for Standard Magazines, Fawcett Comics and Timely Comics
He used the Campbell pen-name for his first half-dozen or so stories in 1934/35
When he resumed his writing career in 1938 he took the billing Horace L
Gold, but soon shortened it to the now more familiar H
Gold
N'afọ 1939-41 ọ bụ osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ na magazin atọ nke akụkọ sayensị - Captain Future, Thrilling Wonder Stories na Startling Stories
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke afọ 1939, None But Lucifer in Unknown (September 1939) bụ njikọ aka ya na L
Sprague de Camp

N'oge mmalite afọ 1940, Gold sonyeere Kendell Foster Crossen na edemede akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na DC Comics na-ede maka Batman, Superman, Superboy, Boy Commandos na Wonder Woman site na 'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ njedebe nke 1942' ruo mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ya
E debara aha ya na 1944, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye Canada, ụkwụ dị larịị, oke afọ ma nwee nwa a mụrụ ọhụrụ
Ọ laghachiri na ezumike ọmịiko (ma eleghị anya na Mee 1946) ka ọ nọrọ n'akụkụ àkwà nna ya Henry na Fall River, Massachusetts
E nyere ya onye nduzi nke Armed Forces Radio mgbe agha gasịrị, nke ọ jụrụ
Mgbe o jere ozi, ọ laghachiri New York City, ebe o dere maka akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na mmemme redio
Gold na-ahụkarị echiche akụkọ na mpempe akwụkwọ akụkọ
Gold bụ ma eleghị anya onye a maara nke ọma dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ magazin na-eduga n'oge akụkọ sayensị sayensị nke America mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị
N'afọ 1949, ọ malitere n'ụzọ ahụ, wee malite Galaxy Science Fiction n'afọ 1950, nke n'oge na-adịghị anya, magazin fantasy ibe ya, Beyond Fantasy Fiction (1953-155) sochiri
Gold's Galaxy 'mere mmetụta dị egwu n'ụwa nke akụkọ sayensị', onye nọchiri Frederik Pohl kwuru na 1965, na 'amamihe na mkpa'; 'Ọ na-esiri ike ikwubiga okwu ókè na mmetụta ahụ'
Ụfọdụ ndị edemede hụrụ Gold dị ka 'ụdị onye na-edu ohu' mana, Pohl kwuru, 'dị ka otu n'ime ndị ohu a na-eti ihe ugboro ugboro
nsonaazụ ya bara uru'
Site na Galaxy Gold mepụtara ụdị akụkọ sayensị dị iche iche site n'ilekwasị anya na teknụzụ, ngwaike na njem pulp
Kama nke ahụ, o webatara isiokwu ndị na-adabere na sociology, psychology na satire
Ọ kwụrụ ụgwọ karịa ka ọ na-adịkarị n'oge ahụ ma nwee uru na ọtụtụ ndị edemede nwere nkà ahapụla John W
Campbell n'ihi ịnụ ọkụ n'obi ya maka Dianetics
Gold dezigharịrị ọtụtụ anthologies (1952 Xi62) metụtara magazin ahụ
Ọ tara ahụhụ site na mmụba agoraphobia (nke sitere na nsogbu agha), wee laa ezumike nká na Galaxy na 1961 n'ihi nsogbu ahụike ya
Gold biri ndụ ya fọdụrụ na nzuzo, ọ bụ ezie na o bipụtara akụkọ mkpirikpi na nchịkọta akụkọ ndị ọbịa site na mmalite afọ 1980

Nchịkọta ya The Old Die Rich (Crown, 1955) gụnyere 'And Three to Get Ready', 'At the Post', 'The Biography Project' (dị ka Dudley Dell), 'Don't Take It to Heart', 'Hero', 'Love in the Dark' (nke a makwaara dị ka 'Love Ethereal'), 'Man of Parts', 'The Man with English', 'No Charge for Alterations', 'The Old Die Rich', 'Problem in Murder' na 'Trouble with Water'
Ọ bụ ezie na Anthony Boucher toro Gold dị ka 'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị onye edemede sf
nwere ike ịmepụta ihe ndabere dị ala na nke dị ala,' ọ chọpụtara na akụkọ ndị ahụ 'erughị ụkpụrụ nke nka' nke Gold setịpụrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Egwu Agoraphobia
H, or h, is the eighth letter in the ISO basic Latin alphabet
Its name in English is aitch (pronounced /ˈeɪtʃ/, plural aitches), or regionally haitch /ˈheɪtʃ/

Olaolu Akorede Olabode Folarin (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1, n'afọ 1989) nke a makwaara dị ka HG2 Filmworks bụ onye nduzi vidio egwu nke Naijiria na America, onye na-eme ihe nkiri azụmahịa, onye na-emepụta ihe osise, onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-ese ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na Ọktoba 1, 1989, na Lagos, Nigeria mana o si na Kwara Steeti
Olabode malitere njem mmepụta ya dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe osise ma mesịa họrọ n'ime mmepụta vidio egwu n'ụjụ na 2010
N'afọ 2011, ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ HG2 Film Works nke lekwasịrị anya na vidiyo egwu, ihe ngosi okike, na ịme ihe nkiri
Ọ duziri vidiyo egwu maka ndị na-ese ihe dịka D'banj, Kiss Daniel, Dammy Krane, Reminisce, 9ice, na Skales
A họpụtara ọrụ vidio egwu ya maka onyinye na 2015 Nigeria Entertainment Awards, na Soundcity MVP Awards Festival
HIGA bụ nzukọ nke ndị na-eto eto na-asụ asụsụ pere mpe, ebumnuche ya bụ ịmaliteghachi asụsụ pere mpe na ịkparịta ụka n'etiti obodo dị iche iche
N'ụzọ dị otu a, ndị mmadụ si n'obodo dị iche iche na-asụ asụsụ ga-enwe ike ịzụ ma n'usoro ntughari asụsụ na n'ihe gbasara ịgbasa asụsụ, yana ịkọrọ ha eziokwu ma mụta banyere nke ndị ọzọ so na ya
HIGA bụ Mgbakọ nke Ndị na-eto eto na-asụ asụsụ Minoritized na ebumnuche ịmepụta netwọkụ nke ndị na-eto eto na-eto eto si n'akụkụ ụwa niile, mgbe ụbọchị ise gasịrị na mba Basque

HIGA na-achịkọta ihe karịrị 75 ndị na-eto eto na-eto eto na mmemme ndị a haziri bụ ndị a ogbako maka imegharị asụsụ na ime ihe ike, ịmepụta ọrụ netwọk na ntughari asụsụ, ihe omume ụlọ otu, mmemme omenala, wdg
Ọ bụkwa mahadum nke Basque Country Summer School, nke na-enyekwa ihe mmụta mmụta na mmemme ahụ
HIRLAM, High Resolution Limited Area Model, bụ usoro amụma amụma ihu ígwé (NWP) nkè mmemmé HIRL AM nkè mba ụwa mepụtara
Ihe omume HIRLAM bụ mmekorita n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ ihu ígwé ndị a na Europe
Na mgbakwunye, Météo-France (France) bụ ónyé mmekọ nyocha nà mmekọrịta mba ụwa HIRLAM
Ebumnuche nké mmemmé HIRLAM bụ ịzụlite ma debe usoro amụma ihu igwe dị mkpirikpi màkà iji ụlọ ọrụ ndị sonyere rụọ ọrụ
Njikọ ahụ, nke malitere n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 1985, gụnyere usoro ọrụ afọ atọ n'etiti afọ 1985 na 2005, na mmemme afọ ise HIRLAM-A (2006X2010) na HIRL AM-B (2011X2015)

Njikọ ahụ mèrè ka ọ gaa nkè ọma na mmalite nke ụdị Nkọwa Ọnọdụ Ọnọdụ Ọnwụ (NWP), usoro amụma HIRLAM, nke ejirila na ọrụ ndị otu HIRL AM màkà amụma ihu igwe nke ruo ụbọchị atọ na mkpebi grid nke ato ruo kilomita irí na isii

Kemgbe afọ 2006, mmekorita HIRLAM gbanwere anya ya na mmepe nke usoro amụma ihu ígwé nke meso-scale (convection-permitting) (HARMONIE Archived at the Wayback Machine) site na mmekorita chiri anya na ALADIN consortium (nke Meteo France duziri) na ECMWF (European Center for Medium-range Weather Forecasting)
Usoro amụma HARMONIE bụ usoro amụma ihu ígwé na-arụ ọrụ na ọrụ ihu igwe HIRLAM na mkpebi grid nkè 25 km
Site na mmekorita ya na ndị otu ALADIN, usoro ihe omume HIRLAM mepụtara usoro amụma Pan-European Grand Limited Area Ensemble Prediction System (GLAMEPS)
Site na mkpebi nke ihe dị ka 8 km grid size GLAMEPS anọwo na-arụ ọrụ kemgbe afọ 2013, iji gboo mkpa nke amụma ụbọchị 2 na ọrụ ndị otu HIRLAM na ALADIN
Usoro ihe omume HIRLAM na-achịkwa site na kansụl HIRL AM, nké nwéré ndị nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị sonyere
Ọ bụ ndị otu njikwa na-achịkwa mmemme ahụ nké nwéré
Kọmitii ndụmọdụ sayensị na teknụzụ na-enye ndị otu njikwa ndụmọdụ

N'ala ukwu Afrịka nile, ha bi wo na ala ana-kpo Sudan, n'ebe ana-kpo Chad nke nnuku
