Na ihu igwe, haar ma ọ bụ sea fret bụ alụlụ oyi nkè oké osimiri
Ọ na-emekarị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọwụwa anyanwụ nké Great Britain n'etiti ọnwa Eprel na Septemba, mgbè ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ na-agafe Oké Osimiri North oyi
A makwaara ókwú ahụ dị ka harr, hare, harl, har na hoar
A na-emepụta Haar n'elu oké osimiri ma ifufe na-ebugharị ya n'ala
Nké a na-emekarị mgbè ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ na-ekpuchi n'elu Oké Osimiri North nké dị jụụ na-eme ka mmiri dị n'ime ikuku na-agbakọta, na-emepụta haar
Ifufe mmiri na ifufe ọwụwa anyanwụ na-eweta haar n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọwụwa Anyanwụ Scotland na North-East England ébé ọ nwere ike ịga n'ihu ruo ọtụtụ kilomita n'ime ala

Nke a nwèrè ike ịbụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'oge ọkọchị UK mgbè okpomọkụ nke ala na-emepụta ikuku oké osimiri, na-eweta haar site n'oké osimiri ma n'ihi ya nwéré ike belata okpomọkụ dị ukwuu ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị dị naanị kilomita ole na ole n'ime ala
A na-eji okwu ahụ bụ haar mee ihe n'akụkụ ala ụfọdụ dị n'akụkụ Oké Osimiri North, karịsịa n'ébé ọwụwa anyanwụ Scotland na n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa Anyanwụ England
Ụdị dị íchè íchè nkè ókwú ahụ na Scots na Northern English gụnyere har, hare, harl, harr na hoar
Mmalite ya nwèrè njikọ na Middle Dutch haren, na-ezo aka n'ikuku oyi, nké dị nkọ
Na Yorkshire na Northumberland a na-akpọkarị ya fret mmiri
Haarhoff bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama naza aha nna gụnyere
Usoro Haber, nke a na-akpọkwa usoro Haber-Bosch, bụ usoro nhazi nitrogen artificial na bụ isi usoro mmepụta ihe maka mmepụta nke amonia taa
Akpọrọ ya aha ndị mepụtara ya, ndị German chemists Fritz Haber na Carl Bosch, bụ ndị mepụtara ya n'afọ iri mbụ nke narị afọ nke 20
Usoro a na-atụgharị nitrogen ikuku (N2) ka ọ bụrụ amonia (NH3) site na mmeghachi omume na hydrogen (H2) site na iji metal catalyst n'okpuru nnukwu okpomọkụ na nrụgide
Habib Dembélé (amụrụ na 19 Eprel 1962) bụ onye Mali na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye edemede na onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Mali nke afọ 2002 na 2018
Dembélé gara Malian Institut National des Arts de Bamako (INA) mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Etudes Fondamentales (DEF)
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri ma na ihuenyo
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Gouakoulou, ụlọ ọrụ Guimba National na Mandenka International Theatre
Ọ natara Mali's Best Actor Award n'afọ 1984
Ọ bụkwa osote onye nduzi na ihe nkiri Cheick Oumar nke 1997 La genèse
Dembélé jikọtara ma rụọ ọrụ na Sophocles' Antigone na ihe odide ya gụnyere ihe nkiri dịka A vous la nuit, na akwụkwọ akụkọ Sacré Kaba
Dembélé esorowo onye nduzi ihe nkiri a ma ama Peter Brook rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu, n'etiti ha Tragédie d'Hamlet, Tierno Bokar, na Sizwe Banzi is Dead
N'afọ 2002 na 2018 Dembélé bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Mali
Habib Gorgi (1892–1965) bụ onye na-ese ihe na narị afọ nke ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke nka ọgbara ọhụrụ ndị Ijipt
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ọzụzụ Ndị Nkụzi wee nweta akwụkwọ mmụta na England na 1920 iji mụọ usoro nkuzi nkuzi nke nka na agba mmiri
Onye ọsụ ụzọ mbụ nke mmụta nka, na onye dere akwụkwọ Arabik izizi gbasara isiokwu a na 1936
Ọ kuziri ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji Fine na Applied Arts ka ha kwado ha ka ha bụrụ ndị nkuzi nka wee nweta Asambodo Nkuzi mba ha
O guzobere Art Advocates Society na 1928 maka onye na-ese ihe na-enyocha njirimara ndị Ijipt site na nka, na agba mmiri karịsịa
Ọgọ nwoke gara n'ihu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọkpụrụ akpụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ osise textile Ramses Wissa Wassef gara n'ihu na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọkpụkpụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ eserese Textile
Ọ nọchitere anya Ijipt na nzukọ gbasara nkuzi nka na Paris site na 1936, nnwale agụmakwụkwọ ya ghọrọ ihe mkpali nye ndị isi edemede mba ụwa, gụnyere Wilhelm Viola, n'akwụkwọ ya The Art of the Child
N'oge agụmakwụkwọ ya na England, ọ bụ ọkachamara na ihe osise mmiri

Habib Georghe nwere mmasị na aesthetics nke nka ndị Ijipt, ma nakweere nke a site na oku ya maka eserese ala ndị Ijipt, na site na ịmepụta Folk Art School, ebe ọ kwalitere ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe n'onwe ha, gụnyere Sayeda Massak, Samira Hosny, Yehya Bu Seri', Bodour Girgis, ndị niile nwere nkà na ihe ọkpụkpụ gburugburu ebe obibi, n'oge site na 1938 ruo 1951
O wuru ụlọ akwụkwọ Folk Art School na ụkpụrụ nke ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ nke Switzerland bụ Carl Jung banyere nchịkọta amaghị ihe

Gorgi kwuru na ọgụgụ isi nke ndị Ijipt nke wetara ọdịnala nka nke Fero, Coptic na nke Alakụba ka dị na ndị Ijipt nke oge a, ebe ha na-emekọrịta ihe na otu gburugburu ebe obibi, ọha mmadụ, ihu igwe na ihe nketa
Ọ bụrụ na e nyere nwatakịrị, nke na-ahụghị usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọdịda anyanwụ, ohere maka igosipụta onwe ya site na ụrọ, ma ọ bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ, ma ọ bụ ákwà, ọgụgụ isi ahụ ga-apụta
Nnwale ya rụrụ ọrụ, a nabatara ya ma nwee mmasị ma n'Ijipt ma na mba ofesi
Ọ bụ onye na-ese mmiri nke ọma, onye sere ala ndị Ijipt n'èzí
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ebe obibi ndị mọnk nke Ndị Kraịst na-eguzo n'ime obi ọzara n'ụdị dị ọcha nke na-egosipụta ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe omimi ha na ịdị njọ
N'afọ 1971, Ramses Wissa Wassef mere ma wuo ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie maka nnwale nkuzi na nkà ihe ọmụma nke Habib Gorgi
Ihe ngosi nka dị na Ramses Wissa Wassef Art Centre na Giza, Egypt, gosipụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ ihe atụ terracotta nke ụmụaka na ndị na-eto eto
Agụmakwụkwọ - Ọ gụrụ mgbakọ na mwepụ na Teachers College
Otú ọ dị, ọ gbanwere uche ya na nka (ịdọrọ) na 1915
Ọrụ - Onye nkuzi, onye isi na onye nyocha nka na Teachers College
Ngosipụta naanị ya Unesco, London
Ihe ngosi ngosi ngosi ngosi nke Habib Goergy, ụmụ akwụkwọ ya na nwa ya nwoke, Center of Art na Zamalek, Cairo, 2001
Ihe ngosi mba - Ihe ngosi nke Art Welfare Society, Cairo Salon, haziri na 1930s
Ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke oge a nke Ijipt na Cairo
Habib Gorgi Museum nke Ramses Wissa Wassef Art Centre, Giza, Egypt
Modern Art Museum na Egypt [njikọ nwụrụ anwụ na-adịgide adịgide]
Habib Digbo G'nampa Maïga (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1996) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke Ivorian nke na-agba dịka onye na-eme egwuregwu n'etiti FC Metz na otu bọọlụ mba Ivory Coast
N'ịbụ onye si n'òtù nke abụọ, Maïga mere nke mbụ ya maka Ligue 1 na 4 Machị 2017 megide Bastia
Ọ gbara egwuregwu ahụ dum n'egwuregwu 0 0 na-anọghị n'ebe ọzọ
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka 'Les verts' na 14 Ọktoba 2017 mgbe ọ bịara dị ka onye na-anọchi anya FC Metz ma merie mmeri 3 Xia1 na nkeji nke 95
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2018, ọ sonyeere klọb Russia FC Arsenal Tula na mgbazinye ruo na ngwụcha oge 2017 na afọ 1918
Na 10 June 2018, Maïga laghachiri France sonyeere Ligue 2 club FC Metz maka mgbazinye otu afọ na ibu ọrụ ịzụta
N'oge afọ 2018 na 19, Maïga na Metz meriri Ligue 2 nke France ma bulie ha na Ligue 1
Na June 2019 e gosipụtara, na Metz emeela nhọrọ ịzụta onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ na-adịgide adịgide maka € 1 nde
A kpọrọ Maïga ka ọ bụrụ onye isi Ivory Coast maka asọmpi iko mba ụwa megide Morocco na Nọvemba 2017
O mere nke mbụ ya na 6 Septemba 2019 na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Benin, dị ka onye mbido
Habiba Dembélé Sahouet bụ onye nta akụkọ obodo Ivorian na onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn
Ọ bụ onye na-egosi akụkọ TV 13 heures na 20 heures ugbu a na La Première (RTI) isi ọwa, nke dị na Abidjan
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2008, ọkụ gbara n'ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ mgbe ọ na-ese ihe nkiri maka awa iri abụọ, na-amanye ya ịhapụ ihe ngosi ya ma gbapụ n'ụlọ ahụ
Ọkụ ahụ bibiri ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mana ndị ọrụ mgbanyụ ọkụ na-achịkwa ya
Habiba Msika, nke a na-akpọkwa Messika (حبيبة مسيكة), (a mụrụ n'afọ 1903 Testour - Febụwarị 21, 1930 Tunis), bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-agba egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Tunisia
A mụrụ ya Marguerite Msika, ọ bụ nwa nwanne nwanyị nke onye na-agụ egwu Leila Sfez
Ọ rịgooro ngwa ngwa n'ọkwa nke a ma ama n'okpuru aha Habiba ('onye a hụrụ n'anya')
Ihe nlereanya nke onye nweere onwe ya, na onye nwe ọdịnihu ya, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nke ndị Tunisia na-efe ofufe, Msika bụ ihe omume mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'oge ya
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara ndị Juu nke Tunis n'ezinụlọ dara ogbenye
Nne na nna ya, Daida na Maïha, rụrụ ọrụ na ahịa waya

Ọ mụtara ịgụ na ide n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Israelte Alliance, nke ọ hapụrụ mgbe afọ asaa gasịrị, site n'enyemaka nke nwanne nne ya, nkuzi abụ, nkuzi egwu na Arabic oge ochie na onye na-ede egwu a ma ama bụ Khemaïs Tarnane na onye na'egwuregwu Egypt bụ Hassan Bannan
Ọ lụrụ nwa nwanne nne ya Victor Chetboun mana mmekọrịta ha dị mkpirikpi
E mere emume izizi ya n'obí eze La Marsa, ebe ọ zutere onye ọ hụrụ n'anya Minista de la Plume
N'afọ 1920, ọrụ ya malitere; ọ ghọrọ ihe nnọchianya mmekọahụ ma malite ihe omume nke 'ndị agha nke abalị', aha njirimara maka ndị na-akwado ya, ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ nke Tunisia
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka ya na onye ọ hụrụ n'anya gara Paris, ebe site na ya ọ zutere Pablo Picasso na Coco Chanel
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 1925, ọ gụrụ Romeo na Romeo na Juliet na ụlọ ihe nkiri Ben Kamla
N'ụtụtụ nke ọnwa Febụwarị 20, afọ 1930, onye bụbu onye ọ hụrụ n'anya Eliyahu Mimouni banyere n'ụlọ ya n'okporo ámá Alfred Durand-Claye na Tunis, wee gbaa ya ọkụ
Ọ gbara ọkụ nke ukwuu, ọ nwụrụ n'echi ya, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Mimouni sochiri ya
E liri Msika n'ebe ili ozu nke Borgel na Tunis
Habiba Zehi Ben Romdhane bụ minista ahụike nke Tunisia
Ọ malitere ọrụ na gọọmentị Tunisia nke malitere na Jenụwarị 28, 2011, mgbe ngagharị iwe wepụrụ ọchịchị aka ike ogologo oge

Habiba Zehi Ben Romdhane nwetara akara ugo mmụta ahụike ọha na eze site na Faculty of Medicine na Mahadum Tunis (1978) wee zụọ ọzọ na ahụike ọha mmadụ na Mahadim Laval (1979), Mahadum Chicago (1981) na Mahadam Tokyo (1988)

Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke ọgwụ mgbochi na Faculty of Medicine na Mahadum Tunis na onye isi nke Laboratory for Research on the epidemiology and prevention of heartovascular diseases and arụwo ọrụ na World Health Organization
N'afọ puku abụọ na otu, ọ natara onyinye nke Maghreb societies of Medical Sciences
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Tunisian League of Epidemiology, na ndị ọzọ mba na mba ụwa na-ahụ maka ahụike
Habiba Zehi Ben Romdhane jikọtara aka guzobe Tunisian Association of Democratic Women na Tunisian Association for Development Research, na isi Tunisian nke Amnesty International
A mụrụ Habiba Zehi Ben Romdhane na 1950 na El Ksar na Gafsa Governorate nke Tunisia
Di ya, Mahmoud Ben Romdhane, bụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ettajdid Movement
Habibah Ruth Garba bụ Air Commodore na ndị agha elu na Naijiria
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ e buliri n'ọkwa Air Commodore na ndị agha elu na Naijiria
O ritere onyinye Karis n'afọ 2013 na onyinye Female Achievers nke nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị nọ na njikwa, azụmahịa na ọrụ ọha (a n'akpọ WIMBIZ na mkpọchi okwu bekee) emere n'afọ 2018 na Naijiria
Habibah Ruth Garba bụ Air Commodore na otu ndi agha elu na Naijiria
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ e buliri n'ọkwa Air Commodore na ndi agha elu Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke 2013 Karis Award
Nke a bụ onyinye kwa afọ nke ụlọ ụka a na akpọ Household of God dị na Naijiria
Ihe nrite ahụ bụ akụkụ nke mmemme GRACE kwa afọ nke ụka malitere n'afọ 1990
O yikwara onyinye Female Achievers na nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị dị na njikwa, azụmahịa na ọrụ ọha (WIMBIZ) e mere n'afọ 2018
E guzobere nzukọ ahụ iji mejuputa mmemme ndị na-akpalite, na-enye ike ma na-akwalite nnọchiteanya nke ụmụ nwanyị na ngalaba ọha na eze na nke onwe
Na gburugburu ebe obibi, okwu ebe obibi na-achịkọta ọtụtụ ihe onwunwe, anụ ahụ na biotic ihe dị na mpaghara, dị ka ịkwado ndụ na mmepụta nke otu ụdị
Enwere ike ịhụ ebe obibi ụdị dị ka ngosipụta anụ ahụ nke niche ya dị ndụ
Ya mere 'ebe obibi' bụ okwu a kapịrị ọnụ nke ụdị dị iche iche, nke dị iche na echiche dị ka gburugburu ebe obibi ma ọ bụ ihe ọkụkụ, nke okwu ahụ bụ 'ụdị ebe obibi' dabara nke ọma

Ndị Habsburg Monarchy (German Habsburnonarchie, onye na-akpọ [HaːSbunchie)) ] (￼gee ntị)), bụ mkpokọta nke alaeze ukwu, alaeze, duchies, ógbè na ọchịchị ndị ọzọ nke Ụlọ Habsburg na-achị, karịsịa alaka ụlọ ọrụ nke Austria
Habtemariam bụ aha nke nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Haby Wande Guereve (amụrụ na 6 Febụwarị 2000), nke a makwaara dị ka Wande Guerave, bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti na AS Monaco FF nakwa ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Mali
Guereve bụ onye a zụrụ Paris Saint-Germain
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka FC Rouen na Bergerac Périgord FC na France na Monaco na Monaco
Guereve gbara Mali n'ọkwa dị elu n'oge asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2022
Hachimiya Ahamada (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri French nke si Comoros, nke a maara maka ihe nkiri ya gbasara ndị Comoros
A mụrụ Hachimiya Ahamada na Dunkirk na 1976 nye nne na nna ndị Comoros
O mere ihe ngosi dị mkpirikpi dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na ụlọ ọrụ vidio Dunkirk, ma mesịa mụọ ntụziaka ihe nkiri na INSAS na Brussels
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2004
E sere ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi The Ylang Ylang Residence (2008) na Comoros Islands, na n'asụsụ Comorian
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'ihe karịrị mmemme mba ịrị ato na ise, nke gụnyere International Critics Week na 2008 Cannes Film Festival
Ọ meriri ihe nrite na 2009 Quintessenve International Film Festival nke Ouidah, 2009 Francophone Festival nke Vaulx-en-Velin, na 2009 African, Asian na Latin American Film Festival nke Milan
Ahamada na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri, Maïssane ma ọ bụ Canticle of the Stars
Ọ na-anọchite ányá ọganihu sayensị dị ịrịba ama na ónyé bu ya ụzọ, HadCM3
HadGEM1 na-enyekwa ihe ndabere màkà mmepe nké ụdị, ọkachasị na-agụnye mkpebi ka mmá na nhazi zuru oke nke usoro ụwa
Ụdị nké ugbu a bụ HadGEM3
E eji ya ugbu agba egwuregwu bọọlụ, ọ bụkwa ama egwuregwu nnọ n'ụlọ nke Jigawa Golden Stars FC
Ama egwuregwu a na abatacha puku mmadụ iri na ise
Hadiza Aliyu amaara dị ka Hadiza Gabon bụ onye amụrụ na abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Jun ma bụrụ Omee na onye mmepụta ihe nkiri nke Naịjirịa
Ọ na-emeihe nkiri ma na Awusa ma na nke English

Hadiza na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ MTN Naịjirịa na ụlọ ọrụ Indomie noodles, a kpọrọ Hadiza aha nwanyị kachasị mma na 2013 Best of Nollywood Awards, ọ meriela akara ngosi abụọ nke Kannywood / MTN n'afọ 2014
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye guzobere HAG Foundation
Amụrụ ya na Libreville, Republic of Gabon, Hadiza Aliyu bụ nwa nwanyị Malam Aliyu onye bụ onye okenye steeti
N’akụkụ nna ya, Hadiza bụ onye agbụrụ Gabon, n’akụkụ nne ya, ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Fulani sitere na Steeti Adamawa, Nigeria
Hadiza Aliyu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na obodo amụrụ ya ebe ọ dere nyocha A-Level ya na ebumnuche ịbụ onye ọka iwu ma mesịa họrọ Iwu dị ka usoro mmụta kachasị amasị ya
Ọ malitere afọ mahadum dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, mana ọ kwụsịrị ịga akwụkwọ n'ihi nsogbu ụfọdụ na-esochi ọmụmụ ya
Emechiri agụmakwụkwọ ya mgbe ahụ ma nke ahụ nyere ya ohere ịga mmemme diplọma n'asụsụ French ma mesịa bụrụ onye nkuzi asụsụ French na ụlọ akwụkwọ nzuzo
Hadiza Aliyu sonyeere Kannywood n’oge na-adịghị anya ọ si Gabon bata Adamawa State, Nigeria
O si Adamawa ba na Kaduna kwalite inwe mmasi sonye na ulo oru ihe nkiri nke kannywood na nwanne nna ya
O nwere ohere izute Ali Nuhu wee chọọ enyemaka ya iji bido ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Hadiza bidoro pụta na 2009, ebe a tụbara ya na Artabu, ọ banyere n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke kannywood dịka otu n'ime ụmụnwaanyị ndị na-eduga site na enyemaka na ntuziaka nke Ali Nuhu na Aminu Shariff
Hadiza kpebiri isonyere Nollywood na 2017, na-agbaso nzọụkwụ Ali Nuhu, Sani Musa Danja, Yakubu Muhammed, Maryam Booth na Rahama Sadau
E gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri Nollywood mbụ ya tinyere Mike Ezuruonye, Mike Angel na Emmanuella n’ime ihe nkiri akpọrọ Lagos Real Fake Life
Ndepụta ihe nkiri nke Hadiza Aliyu
Hadiza Aliyu natara ọtụtụ onyinye na nkwanye ugwu gụnyere 2013 Best of Nollywood Awards na 2nd Kannywood / MTN Awards na 2014

N’ịkwanyere ya ugwu dị egwu dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Hadiza nwetara ihe nrite nkwanye ùgwù na 2013 site n’aka onye bụbu Gọvanọ Kano Steeti, Dr Rabiu Musa KwankwasoEnyekwara ya ihe nrite site na African Hollywood Awards dị ka Nwanyị Kachasị Mma
Ndepụta nturu ugo nke Hadiza Aliyu nwetara
Ndepụta nkwanye ugwu nke Hadiza Aliyu natara

N’ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2018, ụlọ nrụpụta NASCON Allied Plc kpolitere Hadiza Aliyu, onye enyemaka nke otu Dangote Group dịka onye nnọchi anya Dangote Classic Seasoning n’oge ọrụ mmalite nke ngwaahịa a na Kano
Na 2016, Hadiza guzobere otu ọrụ ebere nke akpọrọ HAG Foundation Nke Ebumnuche ya bụ iji meziwanye ndụ ndị mmadụ site n'inye enyemaka na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ na ahụike yana nchekwa nri
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mbụ n'akụkọ gbasara Kannywood nyere ụdị enyemaka ahụ

N’ọnwa Machị 2016, ọ gara n’ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ n’obodo Kano Steeti ebe o nyere onyinye nri, akwa na ihe ndị ọzọ a na-ahụ anya nke ndị bi n’ogige ahụ bụ ndị gbasara site na ogbugbu ndị mmadụ na mgbago ugwu Naịjirịa
Hadiza Isma El-Rufai (amụrụ na 21 June 1960) bụ onye edemede Naịjịria (onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ), na nwunye gọvanọ nke Kaduna Steeti ugbu a, Mallam Nasir El-Ru fai
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Yasmin El-rufai Foundation (YELF), otu akwụkwọ na-enweghị uru
A mụrụ El-Rufai Hadiza Isma na Kano, Nigeria, nke Mohammed Musa Isma na Amina Iya Isma
Nna ya bụ onyé ọrụ gọọmentị
Ọ nwere BSc na MSc na Architecture (1983) na MBA (1992) site na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, yana Masters na Creative Writing (2012) site na Machị Bath Spa, United Kingdom
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Ngalaba Architecture na Kaduna Polytechnic, afọ olẹ na ole ọzọ na National Electric Power Authority, tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ n'onwe ya
Ọ na-asụkwa asụsụ French nke ọma
N'afọ 1985, ọ lụrụ Mallam Nasir El-Rufai onye ọ zutere n'afọ 1976 na School of Basic Studies, Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria
O mechara bụrụ Minista nke FCT na Naịjịria, na Gọvanọ nke Kaduna Steeti

N'afọ 2017, El-Rufai bipụtara An Abundance of Scorpions (Ouida Books), akwụkwọ akụkọ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ọrụ afọ ofufo onye edemede ahụ mere n'ụlọ ụmụ mgbei na Abuja, na ọchịchọ ya ide banyere nwa mgbei
E gosipụtara ya na mbipụta 2017 nke Aké Arts and Book Festival
Helon Habila akọwaala ọrụ ahụ dị ka 'akụkọ na-agbawa obi nke ọnwụ na akụkọ na-akpali nke ike na mkpebi siri ike nke nwanyị'
Ya na di ya, El-Rufai guzobere Yasmin El-Ru fai Foundation (YELF) n'afọ 2013 iji sọpụrụ nwa ya nwanyị nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na London n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2011

E bidoro akwụkwọ na-enweghị uru zuru oke na 2017 na ebumnuche nke ịzụlite ihe okike n'ime ụmụaka, 'karịsịa nwatakịrị nwanyị, n'agbata afọ asatọ na 19' na ụmụ nwanyị na-eto eto / ndị okenye, na-enye ha 'ihe onwunwe na ndị nkuzi na akwụkwọ ha chọrọ iji bulie agụ na ide ha'
Dị ka nwanyị mbụ nke Kaduna Steeti, o jikwa ọfịs ahụ mee ihe maka ebumnuche ọrụ ebere iji baara ndị na-enweghị ihe ùgwù uru, na-enye ndị ọrịa sickle cell ọgwụ na Kaduna

N'ọnwa Eprel 2020, El-Rufai, zaghachiri na twitter maka nkwupụta banyere nwa ya nwoke na-eji asụsụ na iyi egwu nke ime ihe ike mmekọahụ megide onye nkatọ n'oge arụmụka na netwọk mmekọrịta na 'Sow the wind, reap the whirlwind
Ihe niile ziri ezi n'ịhụnanya na agha

' Okwu ndị ahụ kpatara ọtụtụ mmeghachi omume na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta, gụnyere na Brittle Paper, magazin akwụkwọ, ebe esemokwu nchịkọta akụkọ n'etiti ndị editọ banyere otu esi ewepụta akụkọ ahụ dugara na ọpụpụ nke osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ
El-Rufai mechara rịọ mgbaghara maka nkwupụta ya, na-ekwu na ọ ghọtahie esemokwu mbụ ahụ ma 'ọ gaghị anabata mmetọ mmekọahụ n'ụdị ma ọ bụ ụdị ọ bụla'
O mechara yie egwu ịgba ndị otu ahụ bọrọ ya ebubo na ọ kwadoro okwu mmetọ nwa ya nwoke
Hadiza Lantana Oboh (1959-191998) bụ onye Naịjiria na-anya ụgbọelu
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na naanị nwanyị na-anya ụgbọelu maka Nigeria Airways
E gburu ya na 8 Febụwarị n'ụlọ ya, n'ihe a na-enyo enyo na ọ bụ ndị ọrụ ụlọ ya
Oboh anọwo na-efe ụgbọ elu maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu ọzọ ruo afọ ole na ole tupu ọ kwaga ịrụ ọrụ na Nigeria Airways
Ọ maliteré na Nigeria Airways dị ka onye isi ụgbọ elu na Boeing 737-200
Hadiza Lantana Oboh dị afọ iri atọ na itoolu mgbe e gburu ya
Ndị uwe ojii hụrụ ozu ya rere ure n'ime tankị septịc n'ụlọ ya mgbe ha jidere onye na-elekọta ubi ya maka ịnwa ire ihe ndị nke ya
E boro ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ụlọ Oboh ebubo igbu ọchụ ma hapụ ha na mgbapụta
Ha furu efu, ma mesịa gosipụta na ha nyere adreesị ụgha
Hadiza Sabuwa Balarabe bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria,ọ bụ osote gọvanọ Kaduna State, Naijiria
Ịbụ nwanyị mbụ osote gọvanọ steeti ahụ
A họpụtara ya na ihe nhọpụta izugbe Naịjirịa nke 2019 n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'okpuru otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nọ na-achị Naịjirịa bu APC

N'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Ọktoba 2019 dịka onye isi ochichi, o nyere ndị ụlọ nzukọ Kaduna steeti mmefu ego nke mmeghari ọhụrụ nke afọ 2020 nke steeti Kaduna wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na ugwu Naijiria mere ya

A mụrụ Balarabe n'ezinaụlọ Alhaji Abubakar Balarabe dị na ọchịchị ime obodo Sanga dị na Kaduna steeti, Ọ gara Koleji ụmụ nwanyị dị na Soba maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, wee banye na mahadum mara mma nke Maiduguri ka ọ muo ọgwụ wee gụchaa na MBBS n'afọ 1986
Hadiza Zakari (amụrụ na 10 Septemba 1987) bụ onye ọrụ nchekwa Naijiria na onye na-ebu ibu alọ
Hadj Abderrahmane (Arabic; October 12, 1941 - October 5, 1981) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri si Télemly, Algiers

A maara ya nke ọma maka ngosipụta ya nke Inspector Tahar ya na onye enyemaka ya dị mkpirikpi Yahia Ben Mabrouk, na usoro ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Adventures of Inspector Tahir na ngwụcha afọ 1960 na afọ 1970
Abderrahmane malitere dịka onye na-ahụ maka teknụzụ na onye na-ese foto
Tupu ọ malite njem nke Inspector Tahar, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri na Allel El Mouhib, onye bụ onye nkuzi ihe nkiri ya
Abderrahmane mere onye mọnk na egwuregwu Montserrat nke Emmanuel Robles
Ọ bụ ụkọchukwu parish na Fusils de la mère Carare
Ndụ mmekọrịta ya, oge ọ bụ nwata, ọdịdị ya, na mmetụta miri emi ya nwere njikọ na ihe nkiri ahụ mana a na-ele arụmọrụ ahụ anya dịka ihe na-atọ ọchị n'ozuzu

N'afọ 1967, ọ pụtara dịka Inspector Taher na ihe nkiri L'Inspecteur mène l'enquête, nke Moussa Haddad duziri nke mere ka ọtụtụ ihe ọzọ pụta, gụnyere Les Vacances de l'inspecteur Tahar (1973) na L'inspector marque le but (1977)
Ọ na-akwadebe ịgba Le cadavre du domaine mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 5, afọ 1981 na Paris
Hadj Menouar (1913 na November 4, 1971) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu
A mụrụ ya na Casbah nke Algiers, o si n'ezinụlọ dị ala nke Ain Assila (Bordj Menaïel)
Hadj Menouar, onye ezigbo aha ya bụ Menouar Kerar, ga-arụ ọrụ n'oge iji kwado ezinụlọ ya
N'ịbụ onye a napụrụ ntụziaka, ọ pụghị ịgụ ma ọ bụ dee, mana o nwere obi ncheta dị egwu
N'ichekwa ọtụtụ narị Qasidas ọbụna ndị dị ogologo, ọ ghọrọ ezigbo akwụkwọ nkà ihe ọmụma ngwa ngwa
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị na egwu mgbe ọ dị obere ma Mohamed K'hioudji, nwanne nna Hadj M'rizek gbara ya ume
Ọ mụtara ihe niile ọ nụrụ site n'aka ndị nna ukwu nke oge ya dịka Mustapha Driouech, Kouider Ben Smail, EI-Ounnas Khmissa, Said Laaouar, Cheikh Saidi na ndị ọzọ
Àgwà abụọ dị oke mkpa maka ndị na-agụ egwú ịga nke ọma; ncheta na-adịghị ada na olu dị ike
Dị ka a jụrụ ya ịhụ ndị na-agụ egwú ka ha na-egosi onwe ha n'ihu ọha na-agụ ihe odide ha
Ìgwè okwu adịghị, ọ bụ olu a ga-anụ ma nye ọha na eze
Ọ bụ Hadj Menouar na-achịkwa àgwà ndị a niile
Onye na-agụ egwú na-esonyere n'oge ahụ site na ngwá egwú dị ka daf, bendir na tar
Ngwá egwu ndị dị ka violin, mandolin, na qanun ebe Cheikh Ben Kouider mechara webata na mdih
Menouar chekwara omenala ochie nke iji tar soro onwe ya
Ọ bụ onye nwe ngwa a na-enweghị mgbagha ruo n'ókè nke Ahmed Lakchal kpọrọ ya 'Onyeisi nke Tar' bụ onye gosipụtara ya na redio
Karịsịa na-eche banyere Med'h na ogologo ọkachamara na-anọpụ iche okpukpe nke genre ya ama ogologo ụbọchị kwa ụbọchị
Ọ duru ọtụtụ ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ ememe ọha na eze, na-anata nnabata nke ọma site n'aka ndị hụrụ ụda olu ya n'anya
Mahieddine Bachtarzi ga-etinye ya na akụkụ egwu nke njem nkiri ya ma mee ka a mara ya n'akụkụ niile nke ókèala ahụ
Odekọla ndekọ iri na abuo na 50s na akara Pathé-Marconi nwere akara akpọrọ Khemous alik oue serre aliya, yana egwu El-Anka dere
N'ịbụ onye ụjọ na-atụ, na-amụ anya ma na-emesapụ aka ma na-enyere aka, ọ dị njikere ịza ụdị ajụjụ niile nke ndị ntorobịa malitere n'egwú jụrụ ya
Ejiri ya n'ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na RTA mbụ, na-ejighị ikike nkà ya mee ihe
O nwere ọdịiche nke ịkpọ tar mgbe ọ na-abụ abụ
Ọ kpọrọ ngwa ndị ọzọ, mana o nwebeghị ihe ngosi ya
El Hadj Menouar sonyeere El Hadj M'Hamed El Anka na Hadj M'rizek, ihe ngosi a haziri iji baara ezinụlọ Cheikh Khelifa Belkacem uru, bụ́ onye ka nwụrụ na November 4, 1951
Gala ahụ weere ọnọdụ na March 20, 1952 na Ibn Khaldun club (ex-pierre Bordes), Othmane Boujuetaïa nyere ihe ntụrụndụ ahụ
Ọ ga-abụ abụ abụọ na mgbede ahụ Ya Tbib aref daya na A lalla el batoul
Ọ hụrụ n'anya ime ihe ngosi n'oge ọnwa Ramadhan na kọfị ma nwee mmasị na Café Djamaâ Fares (nke bụbu Djamaâ Lihoud) na nke Touadjine na mpaghara Tijditt na Mostaganem
Ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba 7, 1971, na El Madania (Algiers)
Hadj Smaine Mohamed Seghir (29 Ọktoba 1932 - 6 Septemba 2021) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-eme egwuregwu nke amụrụ n'afọ 1932 na Constantine, Algeria, France
Maazị Hadj Smaine tinyere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 70 nke ndụ ya na ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri na telivishọn
Nzọụkwụ mbụ ya n'ihe nkiri ndị ọkachamara bụ na Paris Opera ebe ọ nyeere onye edemede egwuregwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Jean Vilar aka
Ya na ndị na-ede egwuregwu na ndị na'ihe nkiri Henri Corderaux, Rene Fontanel, André Croq, Phillipe Dauchet, na Pierre Vial rụkọkwara ọrụ ogologo oge
N'oge njem ihe nkiri na South nke mba France, ọ ga-ezute nnukwu ihe nkiri ọzọ Allel Mouhib, ha abụọ ga-aghọ ndị enyi na ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ
Ha ga-ahụ, ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị Circa afọ 1962-63, Algeria National Theatre yana National School of Dramatic Arts tinyere onye nwụrụ anwụ Mahieddine Bechtarzi na Mustapha Kateb
Ọ bụ onye kwere ekwe siri ike na nnwere onwe nke ndị Algeria, ya mere o sonyere na nzuzo n'ọgụ megide ndị French Colonial n'afọ ndi 1950

N'oge ọdachi nke Agha Algiers (La Bataille dī Alger) n'etiti afọ 50, ndị Parachutists nke General Massu ga-ejide ya (Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye - onye mmekọ nke Algeria Revolutionary Larbi Benmhidi na Autonomous Zone Autonome nke Algiers ga-ata ahụhụ otu afọ ka e mesịrị na Casbah) ma ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ tụfuo ndụ ya n'okpuru mmekpa ahụ na Casino de la Corniche tupu ọ ghọgbu ọnwụ ma gbapụ site n'enyere ya site n'onyere ya site na enyemaka nke onye nkuzi ihe nkiri ya nke onye Algeria nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ (na French Cordereaux)

Na mbido afọ 60, Maazị Hadj Smaine ga-eji nkwanye ùgwù jụ ọkwa dị iche iche nke Minista na onye nnọchi anya n'oge ọchịchị nke ndị isi ala Benbella na Boumedienne iji tinye oge na ume ya n'ịhazi na ịzụ ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu nke ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri na ndị nduzi, yana ndị na-ede egwuregwu na ndị na-akọ akụkọ & ga-abụ akụkụ nke ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, ụlọ ihe nkiri, na telivishọn a ama ama, nke gụnyere Gilo PNNNN'Ocececece, The Imaghers of Al Al Al Ally Les Les Les Les Pl Pl Pl Plugriaz Les Les Les L'Odesdesdesdes, Les Les Les Rom Rom Rom Rom, Les Les Pl
Njikọ ikpeazụ ya ga-abụ na nwa ya nwoke n'ime afọ iri ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya
Mgbe a gwara ya ka ọ sonye na mmepụta ndị ahụ dịka onye isi mmepụta maka ihe nkiri atọ ahụ, ọ nabatara ma jụ kpamkpam ka a kwụọ ya ụgwọ maka onyinye ya na-ekwu na ọ na-eme ya maka ihe kwesịrị ekwesị
Maazị Hadj Smaine na nwa ya nwoke (Film Director & Actor Anouar H
Smaine) rụsiri ọrụ ike ruo ọtụtụ afọ na edemede ọzọ maka ihe nkiri a ga-agba na obodo ya nke Constantine iji nyere aka mee ka Cinema Algeria dịghachi ndụ

Ọ kpọbatara ezigbo enyi ya; onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Abdelhamid Habbati ma chekwaa ebe ndị na-adọrọ mmasị gburugburu obodo ahụ mara mma na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Arab & Ottoman Quarters (Souika) oge ochie - Ọrụ nrọ ha iji sọpụrụ obodo Constantine oge ochie na ndị ya yiri ka ọ dị nso na a ga-enweta - n'ụzọ dị mwute, n'ihi ihe isi ike nchịkwa dị egwu, emeghị ihe nkiri ahụ
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Maazị Habbati (onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọrụ ahụ) ga-agafe Maazị Hadj Smaine sochiri n'ọnwa Septemba 5, afọ 2021 na Los Angeles, CA
N'oge ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya, Maazị Hadj Smaine gbara nwunye ya na ụmụ ya gburugburu
E liri ya na Los Angeles, California
Hafsat Abdulwaheed Ahmed (amuru May 5, 1952) bu onye Naijiria, odee, odee, na onye na-akwado ikike umu nwanyi
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ odee akwụkwọ akụkọ Hausa si Northern Nigeria dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ebipụtara
Hafsat sitere na Kofar Mata quarters nke Kano City nke Kano State Nigeria
A mụrụ Hafsat Abdulwaheed na Mee 5, 1952
Ọ bụ onye odee Naijiria na-edekarị n'asụsụ Hausa
Ọ bụ onye na-ede uri, na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
O si na Kofar Mata quarters nke Kano City, Northern Nigeria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Shahuci Primary and secondary school na Provincial Girls School ugbu a nke a na-akpọ Shekara Girls Secondary School, ha abụọ na Kano steeti
Ọ malitere ide ihe n'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya
Ọ lụrụ Muhammed Ahmed Abdulwaheed na Jenụarị 25, 1966 Na mbido 1970s ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ odee akwụkwọ akụkọ Hausa nwetara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya
N'afọ 2000, ọ nwara ịzọ ọkwa gọvanọ na Northern Nigeria State of Zamfara
O deela akwụkwọ karịrị iri atọ, naanị ise n'ime ha ka ebipụtara
O nwere ọtụtụ ụmụ na nke okenye n'ime ha bụ Kadaria Amed, onye akụkọ
Hafsat Abdulwaheed bidoro ide ihe mgbe ọ nọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ebe ọ na-ede akụkọ ọdịnala wee nweta ihe nrite
O nweburu ihe nrite n'aka British Council mgbe ọ nọ na praịmarị anọ ma ọ bụ ise

N'afọ 1970 ọ banyere n'otu akụkọ ya bụ So Aljannar Duniya ('Ịhụnanya bụ Paradaịs n'ụwa'), nke o dere mgbe ọ dị na praịmarị ise, na asọmpi agụmagụ nke Northern Nigerian Publishing Company (NNPC) haziri
Akwụkwọ a sitere n'ahụmahụ nke nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye bụ onye lụrụ onye Libya n'oge ahụ na ọdịiche omenala malitere ịkpata esemokwu n'alụmdi na nwunye ahụ
Ọ tụlere ma dezie ya tupu e nyefee ya
Akwụkwọ ahụ, bụ akwụkwọ a kacha mara amara, bịara nke abụọ na asọmpi ahụ

So Aljannar Duniya bụ ndị ndị nyocha kpọbatara dị ka ihe mmalite maka ụdị edemede Hausa ọgbara ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Littattafan Soyayya ma ọ bụ “akwụkwọ ịhụnanya”, ma ọ bụ nke a na-akpọ “ Literature Market Kano”
Cara Giaimo na-ehota Abdallah Uba Adamu na Graham Furniss na-ekwu, sị, 'ọ bụ akwụkwọ a na-eme ka ụwa nwee ìhè n'ezie na ide akụkọ ịhụnanya [Hausa]
Hafsat Abdulwaheed edeela akwụkwọ karịrị iri atọ, akụkọ ifo na ndị na-abụghị akụkọ ifo

N'ime ndị a, na mgbakwunye na So Aljannar Duniya, Yardubu Mai Tambotsai (Yardubu the Possessed' - fiction), Nasiha ga Ma'aura (Admonition for the Married Couple - non-fiction), Namijin Maza Tauraron Annabawa (na-abụghị akụkọ ifo na ndụ onye amụma Muhammad), yana akwụkwọ uri, nke mbụ ya na Bekee, Ancient Dance, ka ebipụtara
Abdulwaheed bụbu onye otu na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụnwaanyị na Naịjirịa a na-akpọ Baobab

Mgbe mba ahụ laghachiri n'ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na 1999 ka ọchịchị ndị agha na-achị ogologo oge, otu ahụ chọpụtara na ọ dịghị ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ nke North-Western State Zamfara, ebe Hafsat na di ya bi ruo ọtụtụ afọ
N’otu oge, ọ sịrị, “ndị isi otu ahụ gara leta gọvanọ wee gosi iwe ha nwere maka ihe a mere
Esoghị m ha n’ihi na e nyereghị m ịgbachi nkịtị mgbe m chere na ihe adịghị mma

“Mgbe ha lọtara, ha gwara m na Gọvanọ kwuru na o nweghị nwaanyị Zamfara gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ga-eje ozi n’obere ọchịchị ya, echere m na nke ahụ bụ mkparị, n’ihi na n’ụlọ m naanị ụmụ m nwaanyị gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ukwuu
'M wee sị, 'Ọfọn, ọ bụghị naanị na anyị ga-achọ maka ọkwa onye ọrụ, anyị ga-ewepụ oche ya'
M wee kpebie na m ga-azọ oche gọvanọ na ntuli aka ọzọ”
Otú ọ dị, nrọ ya agaghị adị, n'ihi na e ji oké mkpọtụ mara mkpebi ya
'Ị maara na North ọ bụ ihe ọhụrụ na nwanyị ịsị na ya chọrọ ime ihe ọ bụla maka ọdịmma ọha, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ na-ewere ọnọdụ onye isi,' ka ọ na-ekwu

Ka ndị ọkammụta Alakụba katọrọ nhọpụta ya chọrọ ịzọ ọkwa ya, pati ọ chọrọ ịzọ ọkwa ya gọnarịrị ya, n’ikpeazụkwa, nna ya meriri ya n’iwepụ echiche ahụ, n’agbanyeghị na o bipụtala akwụkwọ mmado na ngwa mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ

Hafsat Olaronke Abiola (onye amuru n'afọ 1974, na Legọs ) bu onye oruuru mmadu nke obodo Naijiria, oke ruru mmadu na onye ochichi onye kwuo uche ya, onye guzobere Kudirat Initiative for Democracy (KIND), nke n’enye aka iwusi obodo elu ma kwalite ochichi onye kwuo uche ya na Naijiria
Hafsat Olaronke Abiola bụ nke asatọ nwa Moshood Abiola onye họputara ka ọ buru onye isiala mana etinye ya na mkpọrọ site akaike Gen
Sani Abacha maka ịgba mgba okpuru mgbe ọ kwuchara na ya bụ onye isi ala
Okenye Abiola mechara nwụọ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na 1998
Egburu nne Hafsat, Alhaja Kudirat Abiola n'oge ngagharị iwe maka ịhapụ di ya na 1996
Abiola gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Phillips Academy, Andover, n'afọ 1992 na Harvard College n' 1996
Ọ natara ihe nsọpụrụ doctorate na Haverford College
Abiola bụ onye guzobere China-Afrịka Bridge na China Africa Forum, nke na-akwalite mmekọrịta ọdịnala bara uru n'etiti China na Afrịka, na-elekwasị anya na onyinye ụmụ nwanyị na akụ na ụba
N’afọ 2000, Abiola asọpụrụ dịka Global Leader of Tomorrow na World Economic Forum dị na Davos, Switzerland
N'afọ 2003, a hoputara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Ashoka iji gosipụta ọkwa ya dị ka onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ
Na 2006 a hoputara ya dika onye nchoputa nke nzuko na World Future Council
N'afọ 2006 ọ bulitere ego site na ịhazi mmemme nke The Vagina Monologues na Naijiria
Kemgbe Mee 2008, o bukwa onye ndụmọdụ na World Future Council n'etiti ndi mmadu iri anọ na itoolụ amaara ama
Abiola bụ onye otu ndụmọdụ na Fetzer Institute yana Nuclear Age Peace Foundation
Na 2015 a hoputara ya ịbụ otu n’ime ụmụnwaanyị iri abụọ na otu ndị zukọtara maka ọgbakọ na Mahadum Harvard University Kennedy School of Government nke Hunt Alternatives kwadoro
Otu a gụnyere Judy Thongori si Kenya, Fauzia Nasreen si Pakistan na Olufunke Baruwa, Esther Ibanga na Ayisha Osori sikwa Naịjirịa
Hafsat Abdullahi Ganduje (bụ nke e ji 'Gwaggo' wee mara) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye otu All Progressives Congress (APC), bụrụkwa onye gụrụ akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Hafsat Ganduje na Kano State
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Malam Madori, Shekara Boarding Primary School, na kọleji nkụzi ụmụ nwaanyị

Ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na mmụta na Mahadum Bayero na 1981, wee nweta nzere Master of Education na Psychology na 1992 na Master of Business Administration na 2004, na Dọkịta nke Philosophy na Administration and Planning na 2015
Ganduje bidoro ọrụ ya dịka onye nkuzi, mechaa bụrụ onye isi ụlọakwụkwọ kọleji
Ọ kụziri na fakọltị nke mmụta na mahadum Bayero
Mahadum Mariam Abacha Amerịka nke Niger kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Ọkammụta na 2019
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa nke Naijiria
N'afọ 2019, otu Nigeria Association for Administration and Planning nyere ya nnukwu onyinye
Ganduje lụrụ Gọvanọ Kano steeti bụ Abdullahi Umar Ganduje
N'agbanyeghị na enweghị ụlọ ọrụ nke nwanyị mbụ, ọ na-agba mbọ n'aha ya wee mepụta mkpọsa ike ụmụ nwanyị gụnyere nkesa ihe mmụta, igwe e ji akwa ákwà , na onyinye obere azụmaahịa
Daily Trust kwuru na a na-anụ kepu kepu Ganduje na ọ ga-emetụta Gọvanọ gbasara nhọpụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, inye ọrụ nkwekọrịta na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara gọọmentị
A na-ekwukwa na ọ nọ n'azụ ọtụtụ nhọpụta na nhazi ọkwa ụlọ ọrụ kemgbe 2015
N'akwụkwọ akụkọ Legitng bipụtara, Gọvanọ Ganduje kagburu ebubo na-ekwu na nwunye ya so na-ahụ maka ọrụ gọọmentị ya
Dị ka di ya, e boola Ganduje ebubo nrụrụ aka, ọkachasị akụkọ EFCC chere na nwa ya nwoke bụ Abdulazeez Ganduje kwuru gbasara itinye aka Hafsat na ịna aka azụ na igwu wayo ala

Dị ka akụkọ Premium Times si kwuo, Abdulazeez nwetara iri aka azụ n'aka onye na-emepụta ezigbo ụlọ maka inye ego ala; Abdulazeez kwuru na ya bufere nne ya ego aka azụ mana e mechara resị ndị nrụpụta ụlọ ọzọ ala ahụ

Mgbe onye nrụpụta mbụ rịọrọ ka e nyeghachi ya ego ahụ, Abdulazeez gara na ekọnọmiki na fayinashal krayịm kọmishọn ka ọ kọọ akụkọ ahụ tupu ya ewere ya na EFCC gbapụ na mba ofesi ma mesịa kpọọ Hafsat maka ajụjụ ọnụ na Septemba 2021
Hafsat leghaara akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù ahụ tupu e jide ya n'isi October n'Abuja ma kpọga ya n'isi ụlọ ọrụ EFCC
Hafsat Ahmad Idris ama kwa ya dị ka Hafsat Idris (amụrụ ya na 14 Jụlai afọ 1987), bụ onye Naijiria n'eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ Kannywood
O sonyere na ihe nkiri mbu ya Barauniya (2016)
O meriri ihe nrite ndi nwanyi nke afọ 2019
Hafsat bụ nwaafọ Kano Steeti, na mgbago ugwu naijiria
Amuru ya ma zulite na Shagamu, Ogun Steeti
Ọ pụtara na nke izizi na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Kannywood na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Barauniya, o gosipụtara n'akụkụ Ali Nuhu, na Jamila Nagudu ,
N’afọ 2018, Hafsat hibere ụlọ ọrụ na- emepụta ihe nkiri a maara dịka Ramlat Investment, o mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na 2019 gụnyere Kawaye nke ndị nkiri dịka Ali Nuhu, Sani Musa Danja na onwe ya
Hafsat egosila ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere ihe ndị a
Hafsat Mohammed Baba (a mụrụ ya na Julaị 17, 1957), ọ bụ Commissioner of Human Services and Social Development na Kaduna State
A họpụtara ya dịka Commissioner Human Services na Social Development na Julaị 2019 ka ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka Commissioner of Women Affairs and Social Development site n'afọ 2017 ruo Eprel 2019
Pọtụfoliyo ọhụrụ a pụtara gbasaara Ministri na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụnwanyị na mmepe ọha ka ọ gụnyere ọrụ mmadụ, mmepe ntorobịa na nka na omenala nke dịbu na ministri ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ Hafsat M
Baba na 17 Julaị 1957 na Hadejia (ugbu a na Jigawa State) nke Katsina
Ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Sokoto ebe ọ gawara Queen of Apostles College (ugbu a Queen Amina College), ka nna ya bụ onye ọrụ ahụike bufere ya Kaduna na mmalite 70s
Hafsat gara Kaduna Polytechnic maka agụmakwụkwọ mahadum, na-enweta diploma na Higher National Diploma na Catering and Hotel Management
Ọ gbakwụnyere Postgraduate Diplomas (PgD) na International Relations ( Kaduna Polytechnic ) na Peace & Conflict Resolution na National Open University of Nigeria (NOUN)
Malite ọrụ na Kaduna Ministry of Health dị ka akụkụ nke afọ ọrụ ya, Hafsat malitere ọrụ nke State dị ka Officer 1 na New General Hospital (Ugbu a Barau Dikko Hospital), Kaduna
Ọ gara n'ihu rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ gọọmentị, Kaduna; National Teachers' Institute na Albarka ụgbọ elu si ebe, na 2002 ọ kwagara na-elekọta mmadụ/advocacy mpaghara

Ahụmahụ ya na mpaghara mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndị na-abụghị ndị gọọmenti hụrụ ka ọ na-eje ozi n'ọkwá dị iche iche na-amalite dị ka Onye Nchịkọba Ọchịchị, Ndị Isi Nkwekọrịta Ndị Nwunye na Ndị Ntorobịa, Kaduna; na dịka onye nhazi ọrụ, Jam'iyyar Matan Arewa, Kaduna; ma n'etiti 2002 na 2006

Site na 2006, na National Council for Women Society, Kaduna, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye nhazi nyocha ruo 2010, na dịka onye enyemaka odeakwụkwọ ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka Commissioner for Women Affairs nke Gọvanọ Nasir Ahmad El-Rufa'i
Hafsat hibela Global Initiative for Women and Children (GIWAC) na Kaduna na 2004 wee chịkọtakwa ya kemgbe ahụ

Hafsat bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na APP/ANPP dara ada dị ka onye nnọchiteanya na-anọchite anya Unguwan Sarki Ward site na 1999 ruo 2002, ma rịgoro ka ọ bụrụ Treasurer nke Kọmitii Mgbasa Ozi President, North West Zone ebe ọ na-achọ ịghọ onye nnọchiteanya nke Federal
Ụlọ ndị nnọchiteanya maka Kaduna North na 2007
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche ANPP Kaduna steeti n'afọ 2012
Mgbe ọ jesịrị ozi dị ka onye so na kọmitii nka nka nke ACN, ọ bụ onye ndu ụmụ nwanyị mba n'etiti 2011-2013, yana onye otu Kọmitii Mgbakọ ACN

Na njikọta nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iji guzobe APC, Hafsat jere ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke APC National Peace and Reconciliatory Committee, North East na onye òtù APC kọmitii na omume nke Gọvanọ Primaries na Adamawa
Steeti; niile na 2014
Hajiya chọsiri ike ịnọchite anya Kaduna North na ụlọ omebe iwu Federal ọzọ na 2015
Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Hafsat bụ onye ntọala na onye isi oche (North) nke Women in Politics Forum
Hafsat na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọrụ enyemaka mmadụ, etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ ọzụzụ, nnọkọ na ogbako

Ọzụzụ gbasara okwu dị iche iche metụtara oke ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị, ikike mmadụ, nha anya nwoke na nwanyị, ahụike na HIV / AIDS, ikike ụmụaka, onye ndu, mgbasa ozi ọha, ọzụzụ nkwado n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọzụzụ ndị a bụ nke obodo na mba ụwa, gụnyere ndị UNFPA, USAID, OXFAM, IRI, DFID, NURHI ( Bill na Melinda Gates Foundation ), British Council, NIPSS wdg haziri
Otutu ozu enyerela Hafsat onyinye n'ọtụtụ oge
Ọ bụ onye nnata nke Ambassador of Peace Icon nke Middle Belt Youth Organizations Award
Enyere ya onyinye nturu ugo o nyere maka ịga nke ọma mmemme ENR na Kaduna na 2012 yana mmemme nchọta NURHI na Kaduna na 2015
Hafsat bụ onye nnata ihe nrite maka onye ndu pụrụiche site n'aka VORi yana kwa nke Women Advancement Forum MDG na South Africa na 2013
Ọ natara onyinye n'aka NCWS na Initiative for Social Sector Strategy (ISSS) na 2006
Hafsat jigidere ịbụ onye otu n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ

Ndị a gụnyere Global Initiative for Women and Children (GIWAC), Women Interfaith Council (WIC), Child Protection Network (CPN), Women Democratic Network (WDN) Washington DC, Women for Equity and Fairness in Nigeria, Women in Politics Forum (WIPF) ), Advocacy Core Group (ACG NURHI), Child Spacing Advocacy Team (C-SAT), na Movement for Better Future

Hafsat arụela ọtụtụ ọrụ gụnyere atụmatụ NURHI's Family Planning/ Child Spacing Projects; Mmemme ịba azụ nke Society for Health Family (SFH); Òtù Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu (EU)'s Water and Sanitation Project; Kaduna State Action Committee on HIV/AIDS (KADSACA's) Fund I na II; Na-ahazi ụlọ ọrụ Embassy Japan Micro credit maka mpaghara esemokwu metụtara na Plateau na Kaduna Steeti; maka Center for Integrated Health Programme (CiHP), Nkwado mmụta maka ụmụ mgbei na ụmụaka na inweta ikike maka ụmụnwanyị bi na HIV / AIDS
Ọ bụkwa onye ga-erite uru na ọrụ enyemaka ụlọ akụ mba ụwa nke HIV/AIDS na nkwado nke Kaduna State Action Committee on HIV/AIDS
Ọrụ ndị a na-enwe mmetụta kpọmkwem na ọha mmadụ na ndị a bụ isi ọrụ nke Ministry of Women Affairs and Social Development
Hafsat nwere obi ụtọ n'alụmdi na nwunye ya, ma mụọkwa ụmụ ise
Hagbard Jonassen (24 Mee 1903 1 Machị 1977) bụ onye 'Danish botanist, quaternary geologist, agha resistant na nuclear disarmament'
O nwere mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide na nkọwa nke eserese pollen, gụnyere iji ntinye pollen nke oge a na polsters moss iji nyere aka na nkọwa na ịtụle mmepụta pollen na ụdị ahịhịa dị iche iche
Ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum Copenhagen wee nweta MSc
(cand
mag) n'afọ 1931
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-enyere Knud Jessen aka, onye bụ prọfesọ nke botany na Mahadum Copenhagen na onye nduzi nke Copenhagen Botanical Garden na otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke nyocha pollen na quaternary geology
O nyeere Jessen aka n'ọrụ ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Irish
Ndepụta akwụkwọ Jonassenis dị mkpirikpi
Ka o sina dị, edemede doctoral ya site n'afọ1950 nwere mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide n'ọhịa ya n'ụzọ abụọ

Jonassen bụ onye mbụ na-eji pollen anakọtara site na polsters moss iji nyochaa mmiri ozuzo pollen nke oge a ma, site na iji ya tụnyere ụdị ihe ndị dị na ahịhịa ndị gbara ya gburugburu, ọ nwere ike ịkọwa ahịhịhịa gara aga site na fossil pollen spectra n'ụzọ ziri ezi karịa tupu

N'ihi ya, o kwubiri na 1) ihe ọkụkụ a kụrụ akụ dị ka ọka (ma e wezụga rye), beet, clover na lucerne nwere mmepụta pollen dị ala na mgbaàmà pollen sitere n'ebe ndị dị otú ahụ ga-enwe oke nchọpụta dị elu karịa ụdị ala na-amị mkpụrụ
N'otu aka ahụ, mgbaàmà pollen sitere na ala na-enweghị osisi dị ka ala ahịhịa na ala ahịhi nwere ike jupụta kpamkpam na mmepụta pollen site na osisi ikuku na-eme ka ọ dị
2) Mgbasa ntụ n'ime ọhịa dị oke ala n'ihi ọsọ ifufe a machibidoro iwu, nke Henrik Tauber mechara kwado
Ọrụ Jonassenī na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Holocene nke ala okpomọkụ na Jutland gosipụtara na oké ọhịa bu ala okpomanya ụzọ
O kwuru na mgbanwe ihu igwe emeela ka a hapụ ọrụ ugbo na mgbasawanye ala

Nnyocha ndị ọzọ e mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na Denmark na Norway egosila na mgbasawanye ala dị n'ime ala bụ metachronous, ya bụ, na-eme n'ọtụtụ ebe dị iche iche n'oge dị iche iche, na-atụ aro mmetụta dị ukwuu nke ụmụ mmadụ na obere mkpa maka mgbanwe ihu igwe
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-eto eto na onye agha, ọ bụ onye guzobere alaka Danish nke War Resisters' International n'afọ 1926
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche ya 1936-1942 na ọzọ site na 1964
O sokwa guzobe otu ọrụ ebere na-abụghị nke gọọmentị bụ Mellemfolkeligt Samvirke n'afọ 1944
N'afọ ndị 1960, Jonassen tinyere onwe ya n'ọgụ a ma ama megide ngwá agha nuklia
Haifa Rahim, bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye nduzi nke usoro telivishọn a ma ama Wlad Lahlal na maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Gates of the Sun
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Rahim maka ihe nkiri Les portes du soleil Algérie pour toujours (Gates of the Sun) nke Jean-Marc Minéo duziri
O mekwara ihe nkiri Algeria ruo mgbe ebighị ebi n'afọ 2014
N'afọ 2019, ọ pụtara na usoro telivishọn Wlad Lahlal nke Nasir al-Din al-Suhaili duziri
Hailliote Sumney nke a makwaara dị ka Hallie Sumney bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ghana amụrụ na Canada, onye na-emetụta akara azụmahịa, onye ama ama n'ihe ngosi tv na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka
Ọ gbaala ndị a ma ama ajụjụ ọnụ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri Boris Kodjoe, Michael Blackson, Becca, Stonebwoy na ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke akara akpụkpọ ụkwụ Jesu Segun nke dị na London ma tinyere Stonebwoy, bụ onye nnọchi anya nwoke
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nhazi maka 4Syte TV's BET Awards red carpet
A mụrụ Sumney na Canada nye Dr
Kodjoe Sumney na Dr
Akosuah Sumney mana ọ kwagara United States mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara ịbụ nọọsụ na Summit career college, California ma gụọkwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum California, Riverside na California
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ya dị ka onye nọọsụ na Riverside Hospital na United States iji Chisom omume ihe nkiri na Africa
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na usoro TV, Heels and Sneakers nke Yvonne Nelson mepụtara

O gosipụtala na Lagos Fake Life, ihe nkiri nke Mike Ezuruonye mepụtara, gosipụtara dị ka otu n'ime akparamagwa na Mike Ezu's 'To kill a ghost' gụnyere usoro TV eweputara bụ Eden ma rụọkwa ọrụ na ọrụ ndị e gosipụtara na netwọk mgbasa ozi na-ewu ewu gụnyere Netflix, Amazon Prime na IROKOtv
Ọ malitekwara na telivishọn na 4Syte TV dị ka onye ngosi

Haines Index (nkè a makwaara dị ka Lower Atmosphere Severity Index) bụ ndepụta ihu igwe nke onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe Donald Haines mepụtara n'afọ 1988 nké na-atụle ikike màkà ikuku kpọrọ nkụ, nke na-adịghị akwụsi ike iji nye ákà na mmepe nkè nnukwu ma ọ bụ ọkụ ọhịa
A na-enweta ndepụta ahụ site na nkwụsi ike (ọdịiche okpomọkụ n'etiti ọkwa dị íchè íchè nke ikuku) na mmiri dị n'ime (mgbaji ntụpọ) nke ikuku dị ala
Enwèrè ike inweta data ndị a na radiosonde ma ọ bụ mepụta ya site na ụdị amụma ihu igwe
A na-agbakọ ndepụta ahụ n'elu ọnụọgụ atọ nkè nrụgide ikuku ịdị elu dị ala (950-850 millibars (mb)), ịdị elu dị n'etiti (850-700 mb), na ịdị elu dị elu (700-500 mb)

A Haines Index Nké isií pụtara ikike dị elu màkà ọkụ dị ugbu a ịghọ nnukwu ma ọ bụ gosipụta omume ọkụ na-adịghị mma, isé pụtara ikike dị n'etiti, anọ pụtara ikike dị ala, na ihe ọ bụla na-erughị anọ pụtara ikike pere mpe
Haitham Ahmed Zaki (Arabic) (4 Eprel 1984 - 7 Nọvemba 2019), nke a makwaara dịka Haitham Zaki (Arab هيثم زكي), bụ onye Egypt nwoke na-eme ihe nkiri nke na-arụkarị ọrụ na ihe nkiri Egypt
Ọ bụ nwa nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Ahmed Zaki na Hala Fouad
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 7 ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2019 n'ụlọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 35 n'ihi nkwụsị ọbara na mberede
Ọ gbasoro nzọụkwụ nne na nna ya wee sonye na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ 22
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2006 maka ihe nkiri Halim
A kpọchiri ya ka ọ jupụta n'ihe nkiri ahụ ma mee ka ọ bụrụ nwoke na-eduzi ihe nkiri Halim n'aha nna ya Ahmed Zaki, onye mechara nwụọ n'afọ 2005 n'oge a na-agba ihe nkiri ahụ
O nwetakwara ihe nrite Best Egyptian Male Actor maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 2011 Dawaran Shobra
Na 7 Nọvemba 2019, ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Sheikh Zayed City mgbe ọ dị afọ 35 n'ihi ọdịda ọbara na mberede, a chọtara nnukwu mmiri n'akụkụ ozu ya
Àtụ MedalTableTopHajarat Yusuf (amụrụ na 10 Septemba 1982) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ lara ezumike nká nke bụ ọkachamara na mita 400
O ritere ọla nchara na 4 × 400 mita relay na 2002 Commonwealth Games, ma sọkwara mpi n'otu n'otu na 2002 n'erughị nke ikpeazụ
Na 2002 African Championships ọ mechara nke isii na mita 400 wee merie ọlaọcha na 4 × 400 mita relay
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 5195 sekọnd, nke o nwetara na Juunị 2002 na Lagos
Hajia Jumai Bello (amụrụ 1941)bụ onye isi mgbasa ozi Naijiria
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ redio Bauchi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka nwanyị mbụ onye isi nchịkwa Bauchi Radio Corporation
Ọ bụ aka na-achịbu nke Bauchi steeti bụ Mohammed Abubakar kwadoro ya
Tupu nhọpụta ya dị ka MD (onye isi nchịkwa) nke isi ọrụa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi akụkọ na akụkọ gbasara mba ihe ndị dị ugbu a
N'afọ 1982, ọ gụchara na mahadum Bayero dị na Kano ebe ọ gụrụ mass Communication

Hakeem Kae-Kazim /hɑːˈkiːm *keɪ ˈkæzɪm/ (amụrụ na 1 Ọktoba 1962) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri British-Nigerian nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Starz telivishọn Black Sails na ngosipụta ya nke Georges Rutaganda na ihe nkiri afọ 2004 Hotel Rwanda
A mụrụ Kae-Kazim na Lagos, Nigeria, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ mbụ ya tupu ezinụlọ ya alaghachi na London, England
Mmasị ya na ime ihe nkiri malitere site na egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ na The National Youth Theatre, nke bụ mgbe ọ chọpụtara na ọ nwere 'ịhụnanya maka ihe nkiri, maka ime ihe nkiri'
O nwetara ọzụzụ na Bristol Old Vic Theatre School, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1987 ma nye ya ohere na The Royal Shakespeare Company, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na ọzụzụ oge ochie ya
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ ọrụ ya dị ka Georges Rutaganda na ihe nkiri a ma ama na Oscar họpụtara Hotel Rwanda, nke mere ka a mara ya na mba ụwa
N'ịgbaso ihe ịga nke ọma nke Hotel Rwanda, Kae-Kazim laghachiri Los Angeles, nke wetara ọtụtụ ohere ọhụrụ ya
Ọ gara n'ihu ịpụta na Slipstream n'akụkụ Sean Astin na tupu ọ pụta na Pirates of the Caribbean At World's End dịka Captain Jocard
O sochiri ya na ọrụ na blockbuster, X-Men Origins Wolverine

Kae-Kazim pụtara na ihe ngosi telivishọn dị iche iche gụnyere Lost, Law & Order Special Victims Unit na Criminal Minds Ọ pụtakwara dịka Colonel Iké Dubaku na oge 7 nke usoro telivishọn Fox 24 na ihe nkiri telivishọn 24 Mgbapụta
Kae-Kazim gara n'ihu na-ewulite ndị na-eso ụzọ na ọrụ na , ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya kachasị ogologo bụ na Michael Bay mepụtara usoro Starz, Black Sails

N'ikwu okwu banyere àgwà ya, Maazị Scott, Kae-Kazim kwuru na ọ dabere na pirate nke oge ahụ, Black Caesar O mere Samson na otu n'ime 2016 miniseries remake Roots N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, a họpụtara Kae-Kazim na ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke Cesil Colby nakwa CW reboot series Dynasty
A na-akpọ ya 'Man with a Beautiful Voice', Kae-Kazim arụwokwa ọrụ olu dị ukwuu site na telivishọn na redio na egwuregwu vidio

E gosipụtara olu ya na ọtụtụ egwuregwu vidio a ma ama gụnyere Final Fantasy XIV, Halo 3 ODST, Halo Reach, Guild Wars, Pirates of the Caribbean At World's End, The Golden Compass na The Saboteur Kae-Kazim ekwuola banyere olu n'elu ọrụ dị ka 'ọtụtụ ntụrụndụ', na ihe na-atọ ya ụtọ ime
Kae-Kazim bụ onye nnọchi anya zuru ụwa ọnụ maka Africa 20, otu nzukọ ọha na eze na-enye ikpo okwu maka ndị isi Afrịka na-apụta ma guzosie ike iji kwalite mgbanwe nke Africa

N'ikwu okwu banyere ọrụ ya dịka onye nnọchi anya, Kae-Kazim kwuru, sị “A na-asọpụrụ m n'ezie na m ga-akpakọrịta na Africa 20 - ikpo okwu ọsụ ụzọ maka ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ndị isi Africa iji kpalie ma mepụta akụrụngwa siri ike - iji mepụta ọdịnihu dị mma maka kọntinent anyị

Hakeem Khaaliq (nke a na-akpọkwa Hakeem Abdul-Khaaliq) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta telivishọn, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, Onye na-ese foto, onye na'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, onye na-ese eserese, na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị mmadụ
Tupu ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri na telivishọn ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta egwu, onye na-ebipụta egwu, onye nlekọta egwu na onye redio
N'afọ 1995, Khaaliq guzobere Radio Bums ma n'afọ 2010 ya na onye mmekọ ogologo oge Queen Muhammad Ali guzobere magazin Nation19 / APDTA

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 30, afọ 2022 Sundance Film Festival nke MPAC's Hollywood Bureau na ISF gosipụtara na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Hakeem Khaaliq, Iman Zawahry, Sami Khan, Muna Deria, Queen Muhammad Ali, na Tarek Albaba
Sireen Sawaf duziri mkparịta ụka ahụ na okwu mmeghe nke Sue Obeidi, onye nduzi nke MPAC's Hollywood Bureau
A mụrụ Khaaliq ma zụlite ya na South Central, Los Angeles, CA
Nna ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ọrụ gosipụtara na ihe nkiri The Spook Who Sat By The Door Khaaliq bụkwa nwa nwanne nwanyị nke onye na-ese foto a ma ama bụ Addison N
Scurlock
Khaaliq kwuru na enyi ezinụlọ ogologo oge Howard Bingham na onye nkuzi ya Jamel Shabazz bụ ndị kacha nwee mmetụta na foto

Na mbido ọrụ ya, Khaaliq malitere iduzi ma mepụta ihe nkiri (ihe nkiri mbụ ọ duziri bụ Snoop Dogg na Sean Puffy Combs), mana mmasị ya maka mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ime ihe mere ka ọ duzie ma mepụta fim na ihe ngosi na-elekwasị anya na nsogbu ụwa
Hakim Noury bu onye Morocco
Ọ bu onye nduzi telivishọn nke ihe nkiri
Hala Elkoussy (amụrụ na 1974) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Elkoussy na Cairo n'afọ 1974
Ọ natara onyinye Abraaj Capital Art Prize na Dubai n'afọ 2010
E wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya a kpọrọ Cactus Flower, n'afọ 2017
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Tate Museum, London, na Art Jameel, Saudi Arabia
Hala Ahmed Fouad (26 Maachị 1958 - 10 Mee 1993) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn nke na-arụkarị ọrụ na ihe nkiri Egypt
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba nke Commerce na 1979
Nna ya bụ Ahmed Fouad bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Ahmed Zaki n'afọ 1984
Nwa mbụ ya nwoke bụ Haitham Ahmed Zaki bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke nwụrụ na 7 Nọvemba 2019
Ka oge na-aga, ọ lụrụ Ezzeddine Barakat ma mụọ nwa nwoke ọzọ, Rami
Hala nwụrụ na 10 Mee 1993, mgbe ọ dịkwa afọ irí atọ na ise mgbe ọ lụchara ọgụ ọrịa kansa ara
Media related to Hala Fouad at Wikimedia Commons
Hala Helmy el-Said (Arabic; amụrụ na 19 Mee afọ 1957) bụ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Atụmatụ na Mmepe Akụ na ụba nke Ijipt ugbu a
A mụrụ Hala na Cairo n'afọ 1957
Ọ bụ onye mbụ a họpụtara dị ka dean nke Ngalaba nke akụnụba na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na afo 2011 ruo afọ 2016 na Mahadum Cairo
O nwetakwara ọkwa osote onye isi oche nke Mahadum Cairo maka Nnyocha Sayensị na Mmekọrịta Mgbakwunye site na ọnwa Septemba afọ 2013 ruo afọ 2016
Hala nwere ogo ndị a
Àtụ Madbouly Cabinet
Hala Lotfy (amụrụ n'afọ 1973) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri n'Ijipt
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Cairo Film Institute n'afọ 1999

A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ Al Khorug lel Nahar (Coming Forth By Day, 2012) nke gosiputara Donia Maher na nke ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite na mmemme ihe nkiri, gụnyere FIPRESCI Prize na Abu Dhabi Film Festival
Ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ a ma ama gụnyere ihe ngosi Feeling Cold (2005) na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi maka usoro Al Jazeera Arabs of Latin America (2006)
Hala Misrati ( Arabic ) bụ onye edemede nke obodo Libya, onye na-ahụ maka telivishọn na onye nta akụkọ
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a mara ama n'ụwa ndị Arab n'oge agha obodo Libya, n'oge a na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere gọọmentị Gaddafi
A mụrụ Hala Misrati na Tripoli; ọ nwetara BA na iwu na Mahadum Al Fateh na afọ 2003

O bipụtara nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi n'afọ 2007 nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Ọnwa nwere ihu ọzọ', nke nyocha sitere na Middle-East-Onlinecom toro ya 'ịkwụwa aka ọtọ mmadụ', ma kọwaa ya dị ka onye 'na-ewe iwe dị ka nwatakịrị banyere ụgha nke ndị ọzọ
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na telivishọn n'afọ 2008

N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2009, ihe ngosi mkparịta ụka telivishọn satellite nke al-Libiyya nke nwere onwe ya bụ Ain Qurb ('Up Close') kwụsịrị na mberede mgbe e ji nke sitere na ọwa al-Jamahiriya nke steeti dochie mgbaàmà ya

Dị ka WikiLeaks United States diplomatic cables leak si kwuo, onye na-eme ihe ngosi ahụ bụ Hala Misrati, bụ onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ n'ụdị hardball na-agba ndị isi Kọmitii Mgbanwe Mustafa Zaidi ajụjụ ọnụ, ndị ọrụ nchekwa steeti gbara ajụjụ ọnụ bụ ndị batara na studio ahụ mgbe ebipụchara ya

N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel, a gbara Misrati ajụjụ ọnụ n'akwụkwọ akụkọ Oea, ebe ọ na-eleda nkwụsị nke mmemme ya anya, na-ekwu na ndị gbara ya ajụjụ abụghị ndị ọrụ nchekwa, na ajụjụ ha adịghị njọ
O boro echiche dị iche iche n'etiti onye ọbịa ya bụ Mustafa Zaidi na ndị otu Kọmitii Mgbanwe ndị ọzọ maka nsogbu ahụ, ma katọọ mgbochi ndị ọchịchị na-emeghachi omume na-etinye ndị nta akụkọ na Libya
Ọnọdụ Misrati na-akwado Gaddafi mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama na TV n'oge agha obodo Libya
A na-ele vidio vidio nke mmejọ ya na iguzosi ike n'ihe nye Gaddafi n'ọtụtụ ebe na YouTube
N'otu ihe atụ a ma ama, Hala Misrati kwuru na ndị Alakụba enweghị ike ịnakwere nzọụkwụ UN iji 'ịnabata' mkpebi ahụ na-enye ikike ka NATO wakpoo Libya n'ihi na Islam machibidoro ịnabata ụmụaka

Na mgbasa ozi ikpeazụ ya - otu ụbọchị tupu ndị nnupụisi Libya weghara TV Steeti Libya - Misrati ji égbè ma kwe kpebia'Unu [ndị nnupụisi Libya] agaghị ewere ọwa, Tripoli, ma ọ bụ Libya! Aga m echebe ndị ọrụ ibe m na [Libyan State TV]
anyị dị njikere ịghọ ndị nwụrụ n'ihi okwukwe ha' na-agbakwụnye 'iji ngwá agha a ana m egbu ma ọ bụ nwụọ taa!'
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2011, ndị nnupụisi ahụ dakporo isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Libya State TV ma jide Misrati
E jidere ya mgbe ọ na-akwọ ụgbọala na Tripoli, ma kpọga ya n'ụlọ ọfịs maka ajụjụ ọnụ
Ìgwè ndị nnupụisi bu ngwá agha gbalịrị ịwakpo ụlọ ọrụ ebe ọ nọ, otu onye ọrụ nnupụisi wee chụsasị ha site n'ịgba égbè ya n'elu ụlọ
N'echi ya, Misrati pụtara na vidiyo na-arụrịta ụka na ndị jidere ya, ọbụlagodi mgbe ha gosiri ya égbè ha

Ọ pụtakwara na-ekpuchi (mgbe ọ na-eyikarị ihe mkpuchi mgbe ọ pụtara na TV) na 19 Febụwarị 2012 na obere vidiyo ọzọ, na-agọnahụ akụkọ mgbasa ozi banyere igbu ya, na-ekwu 'M ka dị ndụ, m ka nọkwa n'etiti ndị nnupụisi
E gbughị m, e meghị m ihe ọjọọ,'
Na Febụwarị 2012, a tọhapụrụ Hala Misrati na Tripoli, ebe a tụrụ ya n'ulo nga
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na redio ndị na-eguzogide Libya, o kwupụtara na ndị agha na-achịkwa mba ahụ, ọ bụghị National Transitional Council nakwa na ndị na-akwado Gaddafi ka na-alụ ọgụ
N'ikpeazụ, o kpughere na ndị agha gọọmentị Gaddafi nwere ndị agha iri abụọ na atọ n'oge agha ahụ, ebe ndị nnupụisi nwere ihe karịrị otu narị
Hala Sedki George Younan ( amụrụ na June 15, 1961 na Cairo) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na onye nduzi Nour Al Demirdash na Rehlet Al Melion ma rụọ ọrụ na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri ịrị atọ
Ọ nwetakwala ihe nrite Best Actress Award site na Cairo International Festival
Hala arụwokwa ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro TV na-aga nke ọma dịka Awrak Misrya, Arabisk, Zaman Al Aolama na Evebei El Eshk
Ọ mesikwara nnukwu ihe nkiri nke a na-akpọ 'Young Alexander', nke bụ banyere akụkọ Alexander the Great

Halco Mining bụ ụlọ ọrụ aluminum nke dị na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania (USA)
A haziri ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'okpuru iwu nke steeti Delaware na United States
Halco bụ onye nwe pasenti iri ise na otu nke ngwaahịa nke Compagnie des Bauxites de Guinée, isi aluminum mine na smelter na Guinea, nke a maara dị ka CBG
Ụlọ ọrụ Harvey Aluminium Company guzobere njikọ ahụ na 1962 iji gwuo ego bauxite na mpaghara Boké
Halco/CBG nwere ikike nke mine bauxite na mpaghara 10,000 square kilomita nke ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Guinea n'okpuru mgbazinye afọ iri asaa na ise ruo n'afọ 2038

Hale Aspacio Woodruff (ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1900 rụo ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Septemba, 1980) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke a maara màkà ihe osise ya, ihe osise, na ihe osise
A mụrụ Woodruff na Cairo, Illinois, na úbọchị irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1900
Ọ tolitere n'ezinụlọ ndị isi ojii na Nashville, Tennessee, ébé ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị na-akpa ókè
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Herron School of Art and Design na Indianapolis, Chicago Institute of Art, na Harvard Fogg Art Museum

Woodruff ritere ihe nríte site na Harmon Foundation na 1926, nké méré ka o nwee ike iji 'afọ anọ dị mkpa na-amụ na Paris site na 1927 Xia31' Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Académie Scandinave Maison Watteau [sv] na Académie Moderne Ọ mụtakwara ihe n'ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbè ochie nke ọbọdọ ahụ, ka ọ na-amata ndị ọzọ si mba ọzọ, gụnyere Henry Ossawa Tanner, ónyé ísì African-American na-ese ihe
Woodruff zutere ndị isi nke French avant-garde wee malite ịnakọta nka Africa, nke bụ ísí iyi nke mkpali maka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe n'oge a, gụnyere Pablo Picasso
Ọ laghachiri na US na 1931 wee lụọ Theresa Ada Baker n'afọ ahụ
Ha nwèrè otu nwá nwoke, Roy
Woodruff laghachiri na US n'ihi nsogbu ego sitere na Great Depression
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkụzi nka iji kwado onwé ya
O mechara bụrụ ónyé nduzi nka na Mahadum Atlanta, kọleji ojii nke akụkọ ihe méré eme
Ọ kụziri klas na Laboratory High School nke mahadum ahụ, yana maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na Morehouse na Spelman, kọleji metụtara ụmụ nwanyị ojii
O guzobere asọmpi kwa afọ, Atlanta University Annual Exhibition of Paintings, Sculpture, and Prints by Negro Artists, nke gosipụtara ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe Africa-America
E mèrè nke a site na 1942 ruo 1970
N'afọ 1942, ọbụlagodi na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na-aga n'ihu, Woodruff malitere Atlanta University Art Annuals, ihe ngosi na asọmpi nke e mèrè rụo n'afọ 1970
Ihe ngosi nka mba iri abụọ na itoolu a bụ ébé dị mkpà màkà ndị na-ese ihe ojii
N'afọ 1946, Woodruff sonyeere ngalaba na Mahadum New York dị na Manhattan
Ọ kụziri ihe n'ebe ahụ ihe karịrị afọ irí abụọ tupu ọ laa ezumike nká na 1968
Malkia Roberts so n'ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ New York ya
Woodruff nwụrụ na New York City na úbọchị isii n'ọnwa Septemba, 1980
N'afọ 2012, High Museum of Art dị na Atlanta, Georgia haziri ihe ngosi nke murals Woodruff mepụtara maka Talladega College

Ihe ngosi nke isii n'ime mgbidi ndị e weghachiri gárá United States gụnyere African American Museum (Dallas), Birmingham Museum of Art, Chicago Cultural Center, National Museum of African American History and Culture, Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art
Halil İbrahim Dinçdağ (amụrụ na 1976) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu na Turkey nke a kwụsịtụrụ n'ihi ụdị mmekọahụ ya
Dinçdağ bụ onye ọka ikpe bọọlụ na Trabzon ruo afọ iri na atọ na 2009 mgbe a gwara ya na a gaghị emezigharị ikike onye ọka ikpe ya
Ụbọchị abụọ mgbe o rịọrọ arịrịọ megide mkpebi a, isiokwu ndị na-azọrọ na ọ bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya pụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ
A chụpụrụ ya n'ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ọrụ redio dị n'ógbè ahụ, ọ gakwara Istanbul iji zere ndị nta akụkọ ịbanye na ndụ onwe ya
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2015, a dara ndị Turkish Football Federation (TFF) nha dị puku iri abụọ na atọ mgbe Dinçdağ meriri ikpe ịkpa ókè megide ha

Halliru Akilu (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1947) bụ onye ọchịagha Naijiria bụ onye bụ onye isi nke National Intelligence na onye isi nke Military Intelligence n'oge dị iche iche n'afọ ndị afọ 1990
A mụrụ Akilu ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Kano Steeti
E nyere Akilu ọrụ n'afọ 1967 mgbe ọ gachara Nigerian Defence Academy
N'afọ 1969, ọ lụrụ agha n'oge Agha Obodo Naijiria dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ma merụọ ahụ
O mechara bụrụ, ọchịagha nke 146 Infantry Battalion nke kwụsịrị ọgba aghara okpukpe Maitatsine

O mechara gaa Junior Staff College, Warminister na afọ (1973), Pakistan Command and Staff College (1979), King's College London (1983), na National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies na Kuru (1989)
Akilu mechara sonye na Directorate of Military Intelligence
Dị ka onye lieutenant colonel, o sonyere n'ọkwa echiche nke nnupụisi ọchịchị ndị agha nke afọ 1983 nke chụpụrụ mba Naịjirịa nke abụọ ma tinye Major-General Muhammadu Buhari n'ike
Ọ nọchiri General Aliyu Gusau dị ka onye nduzi nke ndị agha nzuzo; ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na nnupụisi ọchịchị ndị agha nke afọ 1985, nke kwaturu Muhammadu Buhari

Mgbe nnupụisi ahụ gasịrị, General Babangida (onye isi ndị agha n'oge ahụ) jiri mmekọrịta ya na Akilu na ndị ọzọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na NDA's Regular Course 3 (Babangida bụ onye nkuzi NDA na mmalite afọ 70)
E debere Akilu n'ụzọ dị mma na DMI dị ka onye na-egbochi onye nnọchi anya Mohammed Lawal Rafindadi, General Muhammadu Buhariz na-akwado na usoro nchekwa mba
Ọrụ Akilu na Directorate of Military Intelligence jere ozi dị ka onye na-emegide nzuzo na National Security Organisation

Akilu rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa dị ka (Director of Military Intelligence) na nnupụisi ọchịchị ndị agha nke afọ 1985 nke chụpụrụ onye isi agha nke steeti General Muhammadu Buhari ma mee ka General Ibrahim Babangidaa bụrụ onye ọchịchị
Akilu na Babangida nwere mmekọrịta chiri anya na nwunye Akilu na Maryam Babangida bụ ụmụ nwanne nne
Akilu bụ onye otu Armed Forces Ruling Council site na afọ 1989 ruo afọ 1993
Akilu rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ General Aliyu Gusau n'ịhazigharị ndị ọrụ nchekwa na ndị ọrụ nzuzo, iji mee ka ike maka ọchịchị ndị agha sikwuo ike

E kewara National Security Organisation n'ime òtù atọ State Security Services (SSS), National Intelligence Agency (NIA); na Defence Intelligence Agency (DIA) ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ site na Ọgọst, na afọ 1985 ruo Julai, na afọ 1986 na Jenụwarị, na afọ 1990 ruo Septemba, na afọ 1990
E kwenyere na Akilu keere òkè na-ese okwu na ogbugbu Dele Giwa
E boro ya ebubo na ya na nwunye Dele Giwa kwurịtara okwu ma nata adreesị ụlọ ya

Giwa mechara nata ngwugwu site n'aka ndị ikom abụọ nke e dere 'Site n'ọfịs nke C-in-C' ma dee akara 'ihe nzuzo na nzuzo' na-emeghe ngwugwu ahụ, mgbawa mere ma gbuo Dele Giwa, e mere nyocha banyere ogbugbu ahụ mana ogbugbu a ka na-edozibeghị
E wegara ikpe ahụ n'Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa na Colonel Halilu Akilu vs
Onye isi Gani Fawehinmi

N'afọ 1993, nsonaazụ ọ bụ ezie na National Electoral Commission ekwuputala ya n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro, o gosipụtara na Moshood Abiola na Babagana Kingibe nke Social Democratic Party (SDP) meriri Bashir Tofa na Slyvester Ugoh nke National Republican Convention (NRC) site na ihe karịrị nde vootu 23 na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke Juun 12
Onye isi ndị agha nke steeti General Babangida mechara kagbuo ntuli aka ahụ
Mkpochapụ ahụ dugara na ngagharị iwe zuru ebe niile na ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ebe siri ike nke Abiola nke South West
A na-ekwu na Abiola kpọrọ Akilu, na-arịọ ya ka ọ gbanwee mkpochapụ ahụ
Babangida mechara kweta na a kagburu ntuli aka ahụ n'ihi egwu nchekwa mba, nke ọ na-ekwughị
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ na afọ 1993, Babangida gbara arụkwaghịm site n'ịtọlite Gọọmentị Mba nke Ernest Shonekan duziri
Mgbe ndị agha wepụrụ ọchịchị n'afọ 1993 gasịrị, General Sani Abacha lara ezumike nká
N'afọ 2003, na Oputa Panel akụkọ ahụ kwubiri, sị 'General Halilu Akilu na Colonel A
Togun bụ ndị na-aza ajụjụ maka ọnwụ mberede nke Dele Giwa site na bọmbụ akwụkwọ ozi
Anyị na-atụ aro ka e meghee ikpe a ọzọ maka nyocha ọzọ maka ọdịmma ọha na eze
Halima Yusuf Atete nke a makwaara dị ka Halima Atete (amụrụ na 26 Nọvemba 1988) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Maiduguri, Borno steeti
A maara Halima Atete nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri kannywood maka ọrụ ọ na-arụ mgbe niile dị ka onye na-eme ihe ọjọọ na onye na-ekwo ekworo

Ọ sonyeere kannywood n'afọ 2012, o mere nke mbụ ya na Asalina (My Origin) ihe nkiri ọ mepụtara, mgbe ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka Kona Gari, Asalina, Dakin Amarya, ọ meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọhụrụ kachasị mma na City People Entertainment Awards n'afọ 2013, ụlọ ọrụ akụkọ dị na London bụ African Voice họpụtara ya maka ọrụ ntụrụndụ ya
A mụrụ Halima Atete na Maiduguri, Borno steeti
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Maigari, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke gọọmentị Yerwa
Halima nwetara National Diploma na Sharia na iwu obodo
Halima Atete sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri kannywood na 2012, ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 160, ọ mepụtakwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka Asalina (My Origin), na Uwar Gulma (Mother of Gossip)

Halima Mohamed Yusuf, onye a mara nke ọma dị ka Halima Godane ('onye na-ehube') (1935-1994) bụ onye Somalia na-ede uri na onye na-eme ihe ike
A mụrụ ya na Kismayo, Godane lụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu na Bulqaas nke Ali Seleebaan
Ọ kwagara Mogadishu na ngwụcha afọ 1940, sonye na Somali Youth League; na mbido afọ 1950, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu kọmitii ụmụ nwanyị nke pati ahụ
N'oge mba, ọ ga-agụghachi uri buraanbur, na-eme ka ìgwè mmadụ na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ na nzukọ ndị a na-eme mgbe niile
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1954, ọ malitere ikwughachi ihe ga-abụ ọrụ ya a ma ama, ode to the flag of Somalia
N'afọ 1958, ọ so na ndị kwadoro Haaji Mahammad Husseen na ọchịchọ ya ịmepụta Greater Somalia League; n'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya na kansụl obodo Mogadishu
N'afọ 1967, ọ gbanwere ọzọ, gaa na Workers' Socialist Party, na afọ 1974, ọ natara onyinye na ụgwọ ezumike nká kwa ọnwa site na Mogadishu nke Mohamed Siad Barre nyere ikike
Godane nọgidere na-eguzosi ike na okwukwe ya na ọchịchọ ịhụ Somalia dị n'otu ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Halima Kanni (amụrụ na 14 Machị 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia maka pati Ennahda
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya akụkụ nke Tunis na 2011
A mụrụ Kanni na Grombalia na 1964
E nyere ya nzere bachelọ sayensị n'afọ 1983
Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ ọgwụ na Tunis na-emecha ọzụzụ na France
O nwere nzere doctorate na mpaghara ọrịa mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa site na Hôpital Charles-Nicolle [fr]
Ọ nọchitere anya otu ndị Alakụba Ennahda na ntuli aka na Tunisia maka mpaghara nke abụọ nke Tunis
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu na 23 Ọktoba 2011
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kọmitii ndị ọchịchị mpaghara na mpaghara na kọmiti akụrụngwa na gburugburu ebe obibi
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na abụọ , ya na ndị mgbasa ozi kpatara esemokwu mgbe ọ boro ha ebubo na ha enweghị ịhụ mba n'anya na ịnọ n'okpuru mmetụta mba ọzọ
N'ihe banyere nke a, o kwuru onye nnọchi anya France
Ndị nta akụkọ hapụrụ ụlọ ahụ iji mee mkpesa na onye isi ndị omeiwu nke Ennahda, Sahbi Atig, kewapụrụ òtù ya na ebubo Kanni
Halima Tayo Alao is a Nigerian architect and former Minister of Environment and Housing during President Umaru Yar'Adua's administration
A mụrụ Halima Tayo Alao n'ọnwa December n'ọnwa 1956

O nwere nzere Masters n' ihe gbasara isepụta ka esi aru ụlọ di iche iche na mahadum nke dị na Zaria n'afọ 1981 N'afọ 1982 o sonyere ndi oru oyibo nke Kwara State ọ mechara bụrụ onye isi nke akpọrọ Permanent Secretary n'uụlọ Ministry of Works and Transport, Ilorin, Kwara State
O nwere nzere Masters na Public Administration n' afọ, 2003 na Mahadum nke ilorin University of Ilorin Site n'afọ 2005 rue July 2006 s ọ rụrụ dika Minista na-ahu maka ahụ ike

Halima Tayo Alao rụkwara ọru dika Minista na-ahu maka gburugburu nakwa ụlọ na afo 2007 bu nke onye isi ala Umaru Yaraduan afọ 2008 ewepụrụ ya na cabinetiN Nwepụ a bu maka nghọtaghe di n'etiti ya na minista nke otu patiAPC bu Chuka Oduonye ọzọ nochitere anya ya bu John Odey, onye nke ahọpụtara na ọnwa December nafo 2008

Halimat Ismaila (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 1984 na Ilorin,dị na Kwara steeti) bụ nwaafọ Naịjiria na-eme egwuregwu ị gba ọsọ, bụ onye ritere ọla nchara n'ọsọ mita 4x100 na 2008 Summer Olympics
Ismaila nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na 2008 Summer Olympics na Beijing na- asọ mpi ọsọ mita 100
Na nke mbụ ya na-ekpo ọkụ, o nwetara ọkwa nke anọ na oge nke 1172 nke na-ezughi iji banya agba nke abụọ
Ya na Ene Franca Idoko, Gloria Kemasuode, Agnes Osazuwa na Oludamola Osayomi sokwa banye n'ọsọ mita 4x100
Na ikpo oku mbụ ha (na-enweghị Ismaila) ha nwetere ọkwa nke anọ n'azụ Beljọm, Briten na Brazil
Oge ha nke sekọnsụ 4343 bụ oge kachasị mma na-erughị eru na oge nke isii n'ozuzu nke mba iri na isii sonyere
Site na nkea a, ha ruru agba nke ikpeazụ nke ha jiri Ismaila dochie Osazuwa
Ha gbara ọsọ ruo oge nke sekọnsụ 4304 , ọkwa nke atọ na ọla nchara ma agụchaa Rọshịa na Beljọm

N’afọ 2016, ndị otu Rọshịa ka a chụpụrụ ma napụ ha ihe nrite ọla edo ha n’ihi ịda iwu ọgwụ ike nke otu n’ime ndị ọgba ọsọ Rọshịa bụ Yuliya Chermoshanskaya, were si otú ahụ kwalite Naịjirịa n’ọnọdụ ọla ọcha
Àtụ Infobox football biography

Halimatu Ibrahim Ayinde (amụrụ n'ụbọchị 16 Mee n'afọ 1995) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Naịjirịa nke na-agba bọọlụ n'ọkwa ọgbakọ Eskilstuna United na mba ụwa maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
Ọ gbaburu egwu maka Western New York Flash na United States, yana Delta Queens na Nigeria
Ndị otu American Western New York Flash bịanyere aka na Halimatu Ayinde na 15 June 2015 site n'aka ndị otu ụlọ Naijiria Delta Queens
O mere mpụta mbụ ya na mmalite na mfu 1–0 megide Houston Dash ; edochiri ya na nkeji iri asaa na itoolu
Mgbe ya na ndị otu ahụ nọrọ otu oge, n'oge nke ọ mere ngosi itoolu, gụnyere ise na mmalite, a tọhapụrụ ya na 12 May 2016
O kwetara na ọ naghị arụ ọrụ nke ọma na oge mbụ ya na Flash, mana ọ chere na ọ ka mma na 2016 preseason, na-emeri otu ìgwè nke Mahadum Vermont kwadoro
N'oge nke a metụtara nhọpụta ya maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa, ebe Ayinde ahọrọghị maka asọmpi ha na Senegal
O mechara sonye na FC Minsk nke Belarusian Premier League ka emechara n'afọ ahụ, na-eme mpụta mbụ ya na mmeri 3–0 meriri Bobruichanka Bobruisk na 2 Septemba
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu Minsk atọ nwetara akara n'egwuregwu ahụ, ma gawa n'ihu pụta maka otu ahụ n'egwuregwu UEFA Women's Champions League ha
Ụdị ya gara n'ihu na egwuregwu ole na ole mbụ ya, na-ebute naanị goolu n'egwuregwu pụọ na Nadezhda SDJuShOR-7 Mogilev na egwuregwu atọ ya maka Minsk
Ọ so na ndị otu mba Naijiria na asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ 2015 na ndị otu mmeri na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka nke afọ 2014
Halita bụ usoro ihe nkiri Naịjirịa edobere na Úgwú Naijiria
O nwere Chisom Gabriella na onye ndu dị ka Halita ama ama yana gosiputara kwa Ummi Ahmed, Boma Ilamina-Eremie na Eddy Madaki
Ọ malitere na Africa Magic ezinụlọ, DStv owa 154 na GOtv channel 2 na Febụwarị 4, 2019
Halita bụ akụkọ banyere otu nwa agbọghọ dị afọ 19 bụ onye a manyere ịhapụ obodo ahụ iji ziga ego n'ụlọ mgbe nne ya Rebecca, dara ọrịa
E kwere ya nkwa ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ mana site na akara aka, ọ na-ejedebe n'ụlọ Zamani na uba ya na-atụgharị

Na nyocha mgbasa ozi nke ihe omume mbụ na Legọs, Channel Director nke Afrịka Magic kọwara Halita dị ka akụkọ gbasara ezinụlọ, akụ na ụba na ama ama Ọ na-egosi na Showmax a wee depụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ihe ngosi 2020 kacha agbasa
