Hallie Kate Eisenberg (amuru ya na abalị abụọ na onwa nke asatọ, na afọ 1992) bụ onye amara dị ka “Pepsi Girl” n'usoro mgbasa ozi Pepsi, dị ka Marie Alweather na Paulie, yana ọrụ ya dị ka Erika Tansy na Otu esi rie Eghe
Ikpuru
A mụrụ Eisenberg na New Brunswick, New Jersey, ada Amy na Barry Eisenberg, bụ ndị nwere ụlọ ọgwụ ma mesịa ghọọ ọkachamara na mahadum
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ omee Jesse Eisenberg, Academy Award -nominated kpakpando nke Social Network, na Kerry
Akpọrọ Hallie aha aha ya bụ Hallie O'Fallon na ihe nkiri ahụ niile m chọrọ maka ekeresimesi, nke Thora Birch gosipụtara
Eisenberg gara Mahadum America, na Washington, DC
A zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ ndị Juu
N'ọgwụgwụ 1990 na mmalite 2000s, ọ bụ 'Nwanyị Pepsi' na usoro mgbasa ozi Pepsi
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri ụmụaka Paulie, na-egwu onye na-eto eto nke aha parrot
Mgbe ọ pụtachara na fim ole na ole emere maka telivishọn, o nwere akụkụ nkwado na 1999 The Insider na Bicentennial Man
N'afọ 2000, Eisenberg jikọtara ya na Minnie Driver na ihe nkiri ahụ mara mma, nke natara nleba anya na-adịghị mma
O nwekwara kpakpando dị ka Helen Keller na ihe ngosi telivishọn nke The Miracle Worker
Na afọ 2004, ọ gbara megide Jeff Daniels na Patricia Heaton na ihe ngosi na ìgwè onyonyo nke Goodbye Girl
N'afọ 2006, Eisenberg pụtara na Otu esi rie Fried Worms, mmegharị ihe nkiri New Line nke akwụkwọ Thomas Rockwell nke otu aha ahụ
N'afọ 2007, ọ rụkọrọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri PJ nke onwe ya n'akụkụ John Heard, Vincent Pastore na Robert Picardo
Eisenberg mere Broadway mpụta mbụ na ihe nkiri Roundabout nke egwuregwu Clare Boothe Luce bụ ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2010, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ihe nkiri ya ịga mahadum
Halutie Hor (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1999) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ si Nmanduonu na Upper West Region
O sonyere na afọ 2018 Commonwealth Games na 100 mita na 4x100 mita relay
Na 100 mita Hor ruru eru maka nke ikpeazụ ebe ọ mechara nke asatọ na oge nke 1154 sekọnd, 044 sekọnd n'azụ onye nrite ọla edo Michelle-Lee Ahye si Trinidad na Tobago
Na 4x100 mita relay ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Ghana nke ruru eru maka nke ikpeazụ ebe ha mechara nke ise n'ime oge nke 4364 sekọnd
Hamidou bụ ụdị Francophonic-orthography nke aha islam Hamad, nke a na-ejikarị n'Africa nke nwere ike na-ezo aka na ya
Hamadou Djibo Issaka (amụrụ ya na 3 Julaị 1977) bụ onye Nijeria na-eme ihe egwuregwu

Onye na-egwu egwuregwu mmiri na asọmpi, Djibo Issaka zụrụ dị ka onye na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri maka Summer Olympics nke afọ 2012 na London iji were ebe mmepe nke Kọmitii Olympic International nyere ndị otu Naijiria

Djibou Issaka, onye na-elekọta ubi na onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ọdọ mmiri, bụ onye Niger họọrọ ka ọ zụọ dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ naanị ọnwa atọ tupu 2012 Summer Olympics, na-enweta ọzụzụ mbụ ya na asọmpi ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri na Egypt, wee nọrọ ọnwa abụọ na International Rowing Development Centre na Tunisia

A họpụtara ya maka kaadị na-enweghị isi site na IOC Tripartite Commission, na-agbakwunye ya na ọdọ mmiri zuru ezu nke ndị na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri ruru eru, na mmemme nke na-achọ ịzụlite egwuregwu na-abụghị ndị asọmpi ọdịnala
Ọ zụrụ n'obodo Belgium nke Hazewinkel, tupu mmeghe egwuregwu ahụ

Na 28 Julaị, Djibo Issaka nwetara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi zuru oke maka mpụta mbụ ya n'egwuregwu Olympic na 2000 mita otu scullls okpomọkụ, bụ nke ọ gwụchara na oge nke 8 2556, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu nkeji n'azụ onye asọmpi ya kacha nso na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 1 nkeji iri anọ sekọnd n'azụ
onye meriri, Mahe Drysdale

Ndị nta akụkọ Britain nyere Djibo Issaka mmasị na-esochi ọdịdị mbụ ya, jiri ya tụnyere onye na-egwu mmiri Equiguinean Eric 'the Eel' Moussambani si Sydney 2000, ma nye Djibo Issaka aha nickname nke 'Issaka the Otter', 'Hamadou The Keel,' na 'Sculling Sloth
Ka ìgwè mmadụ na ndị nta akụkọ na-eto ya, onye na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri Olympic Gold Medal nke Britain bụ Steve Redgrave katọrọ ntinye Djibo Issaka
N'agbanyeghị nkwupụta ndị a, IOC kọwara na Djibo Issaka ewepụghị ọnọdụ onye ọ bụla ọzọ ruru eru, mana ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị Olympians gbakwunyere na ebe ndị ọzọ e mepụtara mgbe ha ruru eru
N'ozuzu, Djibo Issaka gbara ọsọ na agba nke anọ nke asọmpi ahụ, na-agwụ na ọnọdụ ikpeazụ na asọmpi ọ bụla ahụ
Hamchétou Maïga-Ba (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1978 na Bamako) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na nso nso a na Minnesota Lynx nke WNBA
Ọ bụkwa onye otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Mali
Maïga bụ onye egwuregwu All-American n'afọ ikpeazụ ya na Mahadum Old Dominion, yana onye otu All-Colonial Athletic Association ugboro atọ
N'afọ nke okenye, ọ duziri otu ahụ n'ịgba goolu (137 ppg)
Ebe e si nweta yaÀtụ NBA player statistics legend
N'ịbụ onye e ji 10th n'ozuzu họrọ na 2002 WNBA Draft, Maïga amaliteghị oge zuru ezu maka ndị otu WNBA ruo n'afọ 2007
Malite egwuregwu 34 niile maka Houston, Maïga nwetara akara 91 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla, yana 4 rebounds, 23 assists na 17 steals n'egwú ọ bụla
Ọ bụ # 25
N'oge egwuregwu WNBA nke afọ 2008 na Brno na-egwuri egwu na Czech Republic
N'oge ezumike nke afọ 2009, ọ na-egwuri egwu na France na Tarbes GB
Maïga bụ onyeisi ndị otu Mali nke meriri FIBA Africa Championship maka umunwaayi na afọ 2007
Site na mmeri nke asọmpi ahụ, Mali ruru eru maka afọ 2008 Summer Olympics
Maïga bụ MVP
nke asọmpi ahụ
Hamdi Benani (Arabic; 1 Jenụwarị 1943 - 21 Septemba 2020) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu na onye na-agụ egwú
A mụrụ Benani na Annaba na 1943
Nwanne nna ya, M'hamed El Kourd, gbara ya ume ịmalite ịbụ abụ n'ihi ogo olu ya na ikike ịkọwa ya
O nwetara ihe nrite mbụ ya mgbe ọ na-abụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
O nwetara aha ọjọọ na 1963 site na egwu Ya Bahi El Djamel, nke mere ka ọ chụsoo ọrụ n'ịbụ abụ na violin
O wetara ndụ ọhụrụ na ụdị egwu Malouf na egwu Mahbounati na Adala Ya Adala, nke mere ka ọ nwee nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma n'ihu ọha
Nke a nyeere ya aka ka ndị isi nke ndị na-agụ egwú Malouf, dị ka Hassen El Annabi, Mohamed Tahar Fergani, na Abdelmoumène Bentobal hụ ya
A na-akpọ Benani 'l'ange blanc' (The White Angel) n'ihi na a na-ahụ ya mgbe niile na uwe ọcha na violin ọcha ya
O nyere aka melite ụdị Malouf site na iji isiokwu ndị nna nna na ngwá egwu nke oge a na isiokwu ọhụrụ n'ihe odide
Ọrụ ikpeazụ Benani bụ imekọ ihe ọnụ ya na ndị otu Folktronica bụ Speed Caravan na idekọ abọm nke atọ ha Nuba Nova' na 2020
Hamdi Benani nwụrụ site na nsogbụ ọrịa COVID-19 na Annaba na 21 Septemba 2020 n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na Algeria mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na asaap
Hamdy Ahmed Mohamed Khalifa (Arabic; 9 Nọvemba 1933, Sohag, Egypt - 8 Jenụwarị 2016) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dịka Mahjoub Abdel Dayem na ihe nkiri Cairo 30 (1966)
Ahmed bụ onye nnọchi anya ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara Bulaq n'oge a na-amanye ndị bi na mpaghara ahụ ịkwaga n'ụlọ ọha na eze na mpaghara az-Zawiya al-Hamra na mpụga Cairo
Ọ bụ onye otu Labour Party nke Egypt, mana ọ hapụrụ ya n'afọ 1984
Ahmed bụkwa onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Elosboa
Hamid Bénani (amụrụ na 5 Nọvemba 1940), bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Moroccan, onye edemede na onye na-ese ihe nkiri
Otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe a na-asọpụrụ na Morocco, Bénani emeela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri a ma ama gụnyere Wechma, La prière des absents na L'enfant Cheïkh
Ọ bụkwa onye mmepụta na odee
A mụrụ ya na 5 Nọvemba 1940 na Meknes, Morocco
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ okpukpe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ koran
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ Poeymirau na Moulay Ismaïl
N'afọ 1958, Bénani natara ọzụzụ gbasara ihe nkiri na ogbako okike na edemede nke ụlọọrụ gọọmenti maka ndị ntorobịa na egwuregwu haziri
Mgbe ahụ na 1964, ọ gara Faculty of Letters nke Rabat iji nweta ikikere na nkà ihe ọmụma
N'afọ 1965, ọ malitere ọmụmụ ihe nkiri na Institut des hautes études cinématographiques (IDHEC) ebe e nyere ya onyinye na 1967 n'okpuru ngalaba 'Direction, production and management'
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ gara nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe nkiri nke ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma Jacques Derrida, Roland Barthes na Paul Ricoeur duziri na Sorbonne na EPHE2
N'afọ 1968, Bénani sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Morocco
O mechara bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba mmekọrịta mba ọzọ
N'afọ 1969, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Société Nationale de Radiodiffusion et de Télévision (RTM)
N'afọ 1970, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe a na-akpọ Sigma 3 na mmekorita ya na Ahmed Bouanani, Mohamed Abderrahman Tazi na Mohamed Sekkat
N'afọ ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Wechma
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na Moroccan Federation of film clubs (FMCC) ma merie ọtụtụ ihe nrite na otuto na mmemme ihe nkiri, ebe a na-ewere ihe nkiri ahụ dịka ihe nkiri ntọala nke ihe nkiri Moroccan

Ọ bụ ezie na ihe nkiri ahụ nwetara nnukwu iwu ewu n'etiti ndị nkatọ, Bénani chere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ iji duzie ihe nkiri nke abụọ ya, La prière des absents (Ekpere nke Absent), nke akpọrọ 'The Secrets of the Milky Way'
N'afọ 2011, o duziri ihe nkiri L'enfant Cheïkh
Ewezuga ntụziaka, o bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ 'Le dernier chant des insoumises' (Abụ ikpeazụ nke ndị nnupụisi) n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ Editions du Sirocco Akwụkwọ ahụ meriri Grand Atlas prize na 2019
Hamidou Djibo (amụrụ ya na Machị 8, 1985 na Niger) bụ onye Nijeria na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ na-egwuri egwu ugbu a na AS GNN na Niger Premier League
Djibo bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị otu n'oge asọmpi World Cup
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na ES Sétif si Algeria na RC Kadiogo si Burkina Faso n'oge gara aga
O meriri asọmpi mba n'afọ 2011 na klọb ya AS GNN
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger
Hamilton Dhlamini (a mụrụ na 15 Disemba 1969), mgbe ụfọdụ dịka Hamilton Dlamini, bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye na-eme fim
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri na telivishọn Isithembiso, Faith like Potatoes na The King's Messenger
A mụrụ ya na 15 Disemba 1969 na obodo dị n'ebe ndịda Johannesburg, nke a na-akpọ Sebokeng, Vaal Triangle, n'ezinaụlọ South Africa dara ogbenye
Ọ lụrụ onye na-ahụ maka nri na-edozi ahụ, Martha, ebe ha mụtara ụmụ atọ
O zutere Martha na mbụ n'ụgbọelu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na mbido afọ 1984 site na ihe nkiri
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye ọchụnta ego Korea na SABC 1 sitcom Mzee Wa Two Six
Na mbido afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro dị mkpirikpi na SABC1, nke William Shakespeare mere King Lear
Ọzọkwa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi na SABC 2 sitcom Stokvel na ọrụ 'Mojo Khumalo'
N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na usoro Ten Bush nke Mncedisi Shabangu duziri
Maka ọrụ ya, o mechara merie Naledi Theatre Award maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2009, ya na William Kentridge na Handspring Puppet Company rụkọtara ọrụ na Woyzeck na Highveld
N'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Regardt van den Berghńs Faith like Potatoes
N'oge a, ọ meriri South African Film and Television Awards (Safta) maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2007, ọ meriri Golden Horn Award maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Banzi Motaung' na usoro telivishọn a ma ama Isithembiso
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ meriri Golden Horn Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV soap opera 'Isithembiso'
O guzobekwara ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, 'Ndlondlo Productions'

Hamoud Boualem bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ na-atọ ụtọ na Algeria, na-emepụta mmanya na-atọ ọchị na Algeria ma na-ebupụ ya na France, United Kingdom, na Canada, karịsịa maka oriri nke ndị Algeria na-akwaga
Tọrọ ntọala na 1878 site na ụlọ nke ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya na mpaghara Belcourt nke Algiers, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ kacha ochie nke obodo
), na ụdị sirop dị iche iche
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ha dị na 201 rue Hassiba Ben Bouali, Algiers
Youssef Hammoud, onye na-emepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ na-atọ ụtọ site n'ọrụ, biri na mpaghara Belcourt ma mepụta lemonade, nna nna nke ihe nnọchianya ahụ bụ La Blanche
'La Royale', nke e ji ihe lemon ahọpụtara aka mee, meriri ihe nrite ọla edo, nke a na-akpọ Hors concours, na Paris World Fair
O mechara nweta ọtụtụ nrite ọla edo na ọlaọcha

Ihe ọṅụṅụ a, nke a maara taa dị ka SELECTO bụ akụkụ nke ihe nketa njirimara Algeria↵1920↵Boualem Hammoud, nwa nwa Youssef, debanyere aha ụghalaahia ma gbanwee aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na «Hamoud & Sons» ka ọ bụrụ «Hamoud Boualem & Cie»
Ọ bụ mgbe ahụ ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwagara Hassiba Ben Bouali Street, ugbu a isi ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Taa akara Slim nwere ntụaka ise (lemon, oroma, apụl green, painiapulu na ilu)
Ezinụlọ Hamoud na Hafiz na-ejikọ aka↵Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbanwere ọnọdụ wee ghọọ LLC
Ọkpụkpọ PET nke na-emecha oke iko nwere ike ịlọghachi
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-emeghewanye ahịa mbupụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-emeghe ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ya na Boufarik (wilaya nke Blida) iji mụbaa ikike mmepụta ya ma si otú a, gboo mkpa na-arịwanye elu
Can, nke e wepụtara n'afọ 2017, na-eweta ume ọhụrụ na ume ọhụrụ na akara a karịrị afọ narị
N'afọ 2020, a malitere PET na 33cl na 1L ikike
New Hampshire bu otu state no n'ime ala nke ana-kpo United States of Amerika
wwwconnecteddevelopmentorg
Hamzat B
Lawal bụ onye na-emegide nrụrụ aka
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Follow The Money, atụmatụ ịza ajụjụ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke gụnyere ndị nyocha data, ndị nta akụkọ, ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe, na ụmụ akwụkwọ

Hamzat bụkwa Chief Executive of Connected Development (CODE), otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke na-enye obodo ndị a na-emebi emebi n'Africa ike ịnweta ozi gbasara otu esi etinye gọọmentị ha n'ọrụ maka mmejuputa ọrụ ọha na eze
Hamzat Lawal si Kogi Steeti
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị Model Asokoro na Abuja, ma jee ozi dị ka onye ndú Boys Scout
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na Government Secondary School Karu na Nasarawa State, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi nke Boys Scout nakwa dị ka onye isi ọrụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Seta International College, Nasarawa State
Hamzat Lawal bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Abuja na nzere bachelọ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ ozi
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka ọkachamara na teknụzụ ozi na International Centre for Energy, Environment and Development (ICEED) n'oge mmasị ya maka mgbanwe ihu igwe toro

Mgbe onye isi ya chọpụtara ebe ọ na-amasị ya, o nyere ya ebe nrụọrụ weebụ United Nations Framework on Climate change iji mee nchọpụta, mgbe ọ gachara akwụkwọ na usoro iwu, ọ zụlitere mmasị na mpaghara ahụ
O mechara debanye aha n'ọtụtụ usoro mgbanwe ihu igwe ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ọrụ
N'afọ 2012, Hamzat nwere mwute n'ihi nsị nke mere na Zamfara steeti afọ abụọ tupu mgbe ahụ

Mgbe ọ ghọtara na ọ dịghị onye na-ekwu maka ọdachi ahụ na ndị metụtara ya mgbe ọ gbusịrị ihe karịrị mmadụ 400, ọ malitere njem awa iri na anọ (14) gaa obodo ahụ, Bagega, ebe ihe ahụ mere, iji mụtakwuo banyere ihe kpatara nsogbu ahụ
Nke a kpaliri ya ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ na obodo ma malite otu ndị isi a maara dị ka Follow The Money, na-eji data iji mee ka gọọmentị nwee ajụjụ, ma na-achọ ka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị mee ihe
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2021, Hamzat Lawal pụtara dị ka onye ikpeazụ maka $ 120,000 Gothenburg Sustainability Award
Hamzat Lawal malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Abuja
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ bụ ọrụ ya ịkwado ezi ọchịchị n'etiti ụmụ akwụkwọ na n'ime obodo ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ọ na-ekwu okwu mgbe niile megide nrụrụ aka, mmegbu nke ikike mmadụ na ịnapụ ndị na-eto eto na ụmụ amaala n'ozuzu
N'afọ 2013, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Nchebe nke Steeti jide ya mgbe e boro ya ebubo na ọ na-akpali ndị ntorobịa imegide gọọmentị nke oge ahụ

Ọ bụ onye na-eme mkpokọta nke Not Too Young To Run movement, otu ndị ntorobịa Naijiria nke nkwado ya maka ikike ndị na-eto eto nwere ịgba ọsọ maka ụlọ ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mere ka e mee ka iwu mbelata afọ gafee mba ahụ na-akwalite itinye ndị ntorobịa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị isi nke African Youth Initiative on Climate Change
#SaveBagega bụ mkpọsa na-efe efe nke malitere na Twitter mgbe Hamzat jiri akara ahụmamma mee ihe na mbụ mgbe ọ zipụrụ banyere ihe mere na Bagega, Zamfara Steeti
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2012, ndị Doctors Without Borders kọrọ na ọ dịkarịa ala ụmụaka 4,000 na-ata ahụhụ site na nsị anwụrụ ọkụ n'ihi nchọpụta ọlaedo na Zamfara Steeti na Naịjirịa

Ka e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, Human Rights Watch gakwuru kpọọ gọọmentị Naijiria nke kwere nkwa ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ US $ 5 nde iji kpochaa ebe ndị e ji anwụrụ mee n'oge ọrụ ndị na-egwupụta ọlaedo n'ihi ọkwa dị elu nke anwụrụ na nkume
N'oge Human Right's Watch sonyere na #SaveBagega, a kọrọ na ihe karịrị ụmụaka 400 nwụrụ anwụ na ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụaka enweghị ike ịgwọ
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, mkpọsa ahụ eruola ihe dị ka otu nde mmadụ, ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ewerela akụkọ ahụ
Na ngwụcha ọnwa ahụ, gọọmentị etiti wepụtara nde $ 53
Hana El Zahed (amụrụ na 5 Jenụwarị 1994) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ El Zahed n'afọ 1994
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Al Meshakhsaty na 2003
N'afọ 2009, ọ pụtara dị ka nwa nwa nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Mohamed Sobhi na usoro TV Yawmeyat Wanees we Ahfadoh
El Zahed mechara kwụsị ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya
Ọ kọwara mmalite nke ọrụ nka ya dị ka nke a na-emeghị atụmatụ ya, mana ọ bịara site na ndabara
El Zahed maliteghachiri ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na ihe nkiri Jimmy's Plan nke afọ 2014
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, e gosiri ya na usoro TV nke Tamer Hosny Farq Tawqit N'afọ 2015, El Zahed nwere ọrụ na usoro TV Alf Leila wa Leila, Mawlana El-aasheq, na El Boyoot Asrar
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ pụtara na Al Mizan Na Mee 2017, El Zahed pụtara na usoro TV Fel La La Land, nke Mustafa Saqr dere ma bụrụ nke Ahmed el-Gendy duziri
Usoro ahụ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị Egypt kacha ele anya na YouTube
O nwekwara ọrụ na egwuregwu Ahlan Ramadan N'afọ 2018, El Zahed pụtara na ihe nkiri Sons of Adam
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2019, El Zahed gosipụtara dika Gamila na ihe nkiri Love Story
Ọ pụtara na usoro TV El wad sayed el shahat na Mee, n'akụkụ onye ọlụlụ ya Ahmed Fahmy
El Zahed lụrụ Fahmy na 11 Septemba 2019 n'ememe dị egwu, na Mohamed Hamaki na-agụ egwu ya
N'oge ezumike ezumike ya, a kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na-arịa nje afọ na Singapore
N'afọ 2020, El Zahed pụtara na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị The Washing Machine n'akụkụ Mahmoud Hemida
Ọ bụ Essam Abdel Hamid duziri ya ma mee n'ọdịnihu
A katọrọ ihe nkiri ahụ maka ime n'etiti ọrịa COVID-19
N'ọnwa Julaị 2020, ndị ikom nọ n'ụgbọala wakporo ya mgbe ọ na-akwọ ụgbọala n'èzí Cairo
Hana Shiha (amụrụ na 25 Disemba 1979) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Academy of Arts na Egypt, na-eme ihe nkiri na iduzi
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na usoro egwu 'el bar el Gharbi' n'afọ 2002 mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Hana Shiha na 25 Disemba 1979 na Beirut, Lebanon n'ime ezinụlọ ndị na-ese ihe na Lebanọn nke ụmụnne nwanyị anọ 'Hala Shiha', 'Maya Shiha' na 'Rasha Shiha'

Nna Hana, Ahmed Shiha, onye bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ewu ewu n'ụwa niile, na nne Lebanọn Nadia Zeitoun hụrụ nka n'anya ma hụ talent na-eto eto n'ebe ahụ ụmụ agbọghọ, gbara ụmụ ya nwanyị anọ ume ka ha bụrụ ndị na-emepụta ihe, na-enweta piano, nkuzi ballet dị ka ụmụaka
Hana hụrụ ịgụ akwụkwọ n'anya, were ya n'aka nne ya, ọ gụchara akwụkwọ French, British na Egyptian, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii

N'oge ọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ịgụ ihe na-eme ka nka ndị ọzọ ghara ịdị mma ma ghọọ ụdị ebe mgbaba ka ụmụ klas ya na-achọ ntụrụndụ n'anyanwụ, Hana nke nwere akpụkpọ anụ na-acha ọcha laghachiri iji gụọ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ ma nwetakwuo ihe ọmụma

Na-agbaso mmasị ya maka akụkọ na ime ihe nkiri, site na itinye aha na ụlọakwụkwọ nke nka, na-enweta nzere bachelọ site na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu nke nka, na-elekwasị anya na ime ihe nkiri na nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ banyere na ihuenyo ọlaọcha mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ, na-arụ ọrụ na 'EL BAR EL GHARBI' n'afọ 2002

Ọdịdị ahụ dugara na ihe nkiri na telivishọn ndị ọzọ, nke gụnyere ihe nkiri na Egypt nke Khaled el hagar so Laila Eloui, Hanan Turk na Ashraf abdelbaki 'HOB EL BANAT'aka 'GIRL'S LOVE' (2003), N'oge na usoro Enam Mohamed Ali 'MUBARA ZAolloWGEYA' (2004), nke onye isi na-arụ ọrụ na Sameh Abdel Aziz ihe nkiri mbụ 'DARS KHOSOUSY' Aka 'PRIVATE LESSON' (2005) na onye mmeri Atemytia'

Ọchịchị ọzọ nke Shiha mere ka ọ pụta ìhè karịa, Mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri dị ka nwa agbọghọ nna ya hụrụ n'anya na Yehya e fakharani na usoro wuru ewu 'YETRABA FE EZZO' (2007), ọ meriri obi nke ndị Egypt
2009, Shiha kwadoro ihe ngosi na-atọ ọchị na TV ( 100,7) nke gbakwunyere uru ọhụrụ nye onye na-eme egwuregwu dị ka onye na-atọ ụtọ

N'ịbụ onye a tụrụ mkpọrọ N'ọrụ onye hụrụ n'anya, na-achọsi ọrụ ike, Shiha chọrọ ịgbanwe obi ụtọ nke Egypt a ma ama, nwa agbọghọ nọ n'akụkụ ya, kpebiri ime mgbanwe n'ọrụ ya iji nweta ọrụ ọhụrụ na usoro 'SHAREA ABDEL AZIZ' (2011), nke bụ ihe ịga nke ọma nke usoro 'TAREF TALET' aka 'THIRD PARTY' (2012) nke Mohamed Bakir duziri sochiri

Ọ gbalịrị ime ka onyinyo ya dị ụtọ site n'ịrata Eyad Nassar na usoro ihe nkiri Mohamed Yassin 'MOGA HARRA' aka 'THE HEAT WAVE' (2013), na-arụ ọrụ obi ike nke gbanwere onyinyo niile nke nwa agbọghọ ahụ na-eme ihe nkiri, site na nwa agbọghọ aka ya dị ọcha gaa na nwanyị mara mma nke gosipụtara na o nwere ihe dị egwu dị ka onye na-eme nkiri, Mana ọganihu ya na usoro Khaled Marei 'EL SABAA WASSAYA' aka 'THE SEVEN COMMANMENDS' nke mere nke ọma
O keputara ihe ngosi ịhụnanya ọhụrụ a kpọrọ 'Em-Em'
'Em-Em & Arnous' ghọrọ ihe ngosi akụkọ ịhụnanya ọhụrụ nke Ijipt

N'afọ 2014, Hana Shiha gosipụtara ihe nkiri 'BEFORE THE SPRING' nke Ahmed Atef duziri, na-eme ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ịntanetị nke na-alụ ọgụ maka ikike ntuli aka na nnwere onwe ikwu okwu tupu mgbanwe ọchịchị Ijipt nke afọ 2011
2015 Hana gosipụtara n'akụkụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri iri na asatọ na Egyptian Epic Series mbụ 'EL ADH EL KALAM EL MUBAH' na-egwu 'THE VOW' nke gosiri Segag' nwa agbọghọ ahụ gburu ma kwatuo ezinụlọ ya

A họpụtara ya maka ihe okike ya na ịrụ ọrụ ya n'ezie, Mohamed khan onye nduzi ihe nkiri a ma ama n'ụwa niile họọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ya 'ABL ZAHMET EL SEIF' aka 'BEFORE THE SUMMER CROWD'
'Before THE SUMMER CROWD' bụ ọganihu n'ụdị ịkọ akụkọ nke ihe nkiri Khan
Ịbụ nwanyị na-eduga na ihe nkiri Mohamed khan bụ oge mgbanwe na nkume ọhụrụ na ọrụ Hana Shiha na-agbasa
Hanan Ibrahim MBE (Somali , Arabic ) bụ onye Somalia na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Barnet Muslim Women's Network, n'etiti òtù ndị ọzọ
Ibrahim tolitere na Somalia
Ọ bụ nne nke ụmụ atọ na onye Alakụba
Mgbe agha obodo tiwapụrụ na mba ya, ọ kwagara United Kingdom na 1998
N'ọrụ ọkachamara, Ibrahim rụrụ ọrụ na Women Interfaith Network, Sisters against Violent Extremism, African SANG na Women's Federation for World Peace
Mgbe ọ nọ na London, o guzobere Somali Family Support Group (SFSG), otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-enye ndị Somali na UK na ndị ọzọ Horn African
SFSG na-akwalite mkparịta ụka na nghọta n'etiti okpukpe, ma na-akwado ka ụmụ nwanyị sonye n'okwu dị iche iche
Ọ na-enyekwa ọrụ mmekọrịta dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ ezinụlọ, ihe mmata ahụike, enyemaka nyocha ọrụ na ogbako inweta nkà
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka Onye isi oche maka Barnet Muslim Women's Network
N'afọ 2008, ọ ghọrọ onye otu SAVE UK Advisory Board, otu Women Without Borders
Ibrahim sokwa n'òtù na akụkụ dị iche iche ndị ọzọ
Ndị nke ikpeazụ gụnyere National Muslim Women Advisory Group na National Community Forum, otu ndụmọdụ maka Ngalaba nke Obodo
Dabere na ihe ọmụma ya na ahụmịhe ya na iwu, na 2011 ka gọọmentị etiti nke Somalia họpụtara Ibrahim na Kọmitii nke Ndị Ọkachamara (CoE) nke e nyere ọrụ ịkwadebe iwu ọhụrụ nke mba ahụ
Maka onyinye ya na ọha mmadụ, e nyere Ibrahim na 2004 onyinye Queen's Award for Voluntary Service
Ọ natara onyinye Ambassador For Peace Award na 2009
N'afọ 2010, ọ meriri London Borough of Barnet Civic Award na Community Engagement Award site na HAYA - Somali Organization na London
N'afọ ahụ, e mere ya onye otu Order of the British Empire (MBE) maka ọrụ obodo ya na SFSG
Hanan Tarik (Amharic ሃናን Tari; mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya aha nna, Tariq ma ọ bụ Tarq; amụrụ na 30 June 1994) bụ onye Etiopia na-eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu onye mara mma
Hanan bụụrụ onye a ma ama na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke afọ 2015 bụ Wolafen nke a na-egosi na Thursday ọ bụla na EBS TV, ebe ọ na-egosi Roza ruo 2017
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ malitere na ihe nkiri Astaraki n'otu afọ ahụ
Hanan duziri ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Etiopia n'oge nke afọ 2017, na-eme ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri ịhụnanya
Hanan nwetara onyinye dị iche iche nke gụnyere Gumma Awards, na-aghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama na Etiopia
A mụrụ Hanan Tarik na 30 June 1994 na Addis Ababa nye nna Sudanese-Lebanese na nne Ethiopian
Ndụ ụlọ akwụkwọ Hanan malitere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị wee gaa Asai High School ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2014
O meriri asọmpi ihe ngosi na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma mee obere ọrụ na ihuenyo na-egosi onwe ya dị ka onye Arab
Ọrụ a mere ka onye nduzi Ermias Tadesse hụ ya ma mesịa tinye ya na fim mbụ ya
E wepụtara ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ Astaraki na 2015, Hanan na-ewere akụkụ nke Muna
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke afọ 2015 Wolafen, bụ nke mbụ ya na mmemme telivishọn
Mgbe mbụ ọ pụtara, omume Hanan dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri / ihe nlereanya bilitere n'ọkwa
Usoro ihe omume ahụ gosipụtara na EBS TV na 17 Septemba 2015, ebe ọ nwere ọrụ Roza

Mgbe a matara ya na usoro a, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri dị iche iche; Yewededu Semon (2015), Yeink Kal (2015), na-arụ ọrụ dịka Sara, Lene Kalesh (2016), dị ka ọrụ Haymanot na onye na-emegide Abraham Belayneh, Des Sil (2017) na Arif Aychekulem (2018)
N'ịbụ onye nne nne ya zụlitere, ọ na-eto ya maka imetụta ịhụnanya ya maka ihe nkiri

Ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri nke Etiopia, rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nlereanya na onye na-emetụta ụdị ndị a ma ama dị ka MAC, DIAGEO na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche nke gụnyere SAS Pharmacies, Royal Foam na ndị ọzọ, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya a na-akwụ ụgwọ kachasị elu na Etiopia
Iwu ewu Hanan n'etiti ndị na-ege ya ntị anọgidewo na-arị elu kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
Nke a na-eme ka ọ dịkwuo ukwuu site na itinye aka na ntụrụndụ ya na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta nke gụnyere Instagram, TikTok na Facebook ebe ọ na-enwe ndị na-eso ụzọ siri ike
Na mgbakwunye na ndụ ọrụ ya, Hanan na-ejikwa iwu ewu na mmetụta ya iji kwado ihe dị iche iche metụtara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta pro bono na Studio Samuel ugbu a iji kwalite ike ụmụ nwanyị na Ethiopia
Hanan lụrụ enyi ya nwoke ya na ya yiri ogologo oge, Melake Brehan n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2017
Agbamakwụkwọ Hanan na Melake mere na 20 Mee 2017, ọtụtụ ndị ama ama bịara
O nwere nwa nwoke, Christian (amụrụ na Disemba 2017) na Sweden na nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Lillian
A chọpụtara na ọ nọrọ na Etiopia mgbe ọ dị ime mana o kpebiri ịga Sweden, ebe o nwere ndị ikwu ka ọ mụọ nwa n'ihi nyocha ahụike na-emegiderịta onwe ya ọ natara mgbe ọ nọ na Etiopia
Taa, ọ bi na Etiopia mgbe ezinụlọ ya si Sweden lọta
Hanane Aït El Haj (Arabic ; amụrụ na 2 Nọvemba 1994) bụ onye Morocco ọkachamara na agba bọọlụ nke na agba ọsọ dị ka onye na aga n'ihu maka AS FAR na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Aït El Haj gbara ọsọ maka Morocco na ọkwa dị elu n'oge 2018 Afrika nwanyi iko nke ntozu oke (agba nke mbụ)
Hanane el-Fadili (Arabic) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 2, ọnwa Mee, afọ 1974 na Casablanca, Morocco
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na parody, na-elekwasị anya na ndị ama ama na ndị na-ese okwu
Ọ na-ekwu maka okwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị metụtara echiche ọha na eze Moroccan
O sitere n'ezinụlọ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri; nna ya bụ onye na-emeeme ihe nkiri Aziz el-Fadili nakwa nwanne ya nwoke bụ onye na'emepụta ihe nkiri Adil el-Fadzi
O meela ọtụtụ mmepụta gụnyere mmemme dịka Hanane Show na Super Hada, nke ndị Moroccan na-ege ntị nabatara nke ọma
O mepụtara Hanane Net, nke bụ usoro vidiyo dị mkpirikpi nke nwanne ya nwoke Adil mepụtara n'afọ 2017
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya otu UNICEF na Morocco n'afọ 2010
Haneen Sami Bashir Ibrahim (Arabic; amụrụ na 29 June 2000) bụ onye Sudan na-egwu mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi mita 50 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2016 Summer Olympics, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke 84 na oge nke 3625 sekọnd
Ọ gakwaghị na ọkara ikpeazụ
Ibrahim nwere ihe ndekọ mba na mita 50 nke ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitere anya Sudan na 2019 World Aquatics Championships nke e mere na Gwangju, South Korea
O sonyere na asọmpi mita 50 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 100 nke ụmụ nwanyị
N'ihe omume abụọ ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu ịsọ mpi na ọkara ikpeazụ
N'afọ 2021, o sonyere na asọmpi mita 50 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2020 Summer Olympics nke emere na Tokyo, Japan
Aha nna Hanekom sitere Afrikaans
Ndị ama ama naza aha gụnyere
Hanitriniaina Rivosoa Rakotondrabé (amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1967) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Madagascar lara ezumike nká nke bụ ọkachamara na mita 100
O ruru ọkara ikpeazụ na mita 60 na World Indoor Championships na 1997 na 1999
O mekwara asọmpi na World Championships na afọ 1995, 1997 na afọ 1999 yana 2000 Summer Olympics n'enweghị ọganihu site na okpomọkụ
Rakotondrabé meriri 100m na Antananarivo Francophone Games na 3 Septemba, na afọ 1997
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 1132 sekọnd, nke o nwetara na Mee, na afọ 1996 na Dijon
Nke a bụ ihe ndekọ Malagasy ugbu a, nke ya na Lalao Ravaonirina jikọrọ aka
Ọ na-ejikwa ihe ndekọ mba nke 4361 sekọnd na 4 x 100 mita relay, nke e nwetara na 2000 Summer Olympics
O meriri 100 mita na 1998 na 2003 Indian Ocean Island Games

Hank Willis Thomas (amụrụ n'afọ 1976 na Plainfield, New Jersey; bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn, NY) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe na-arụkọ ọrụ na isiokwu ndị metụtara njirimara, akụkọ ihe mere eme, na ọdịbendị a ma ama
A mụrụ Hank Willis Thomas n'afọ 1976 na Plainfield, New Jersey nyere Hank Thomas, onye egwu jazz, na Deborah Willis, onye na-ese ihe, onye na'ese foto, onye nlekọta na onye nkuzi
Thomas nwere BFA
na Photography na Africana ọmụmụ site na Mahadum New York (1998) na MA/MFА
na Photograph na Visual Criticism site na California College of the Arts (2004)
N'afọ 2017, ọ natara nzere doctorate nke nsọpụrụ site na Maryland Institute College of Art na Institute for Doctoral Studies in the Visual Arts

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na United States na mba ofesi gụnyere International Center of Photography, New York; Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, Spain; Musée du quai Branly, Paris; Hong Kong Arts Centre, Hong Kong, na Witte de With Center for Contemporary Art, Netherlands
A na-etinye ọrụ Thomas n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta ọha na eze gụnyere Museum of Modern Art, New York; Solomon R
Guggenheim Museum, New York Whitney Museum of American Art, Nework; Brooklyn Museum, Nework, High Museum of Art, Atlanta, na National Gallery of Art, Washington DC
Ọrụ mmekorita ya gụnyere Question Bridge Black Males, In Search Of The Truth (The Truth Booth), na For Freedoms, nke enyere afọ 2017 ICP Infinity Award for New Media and Online Platform
N'afọ 2012, Question Bridge Black Males pụtara na Sundance Film Festival ma họrọ ya maka New Media Grant site na Tribeca Film Institute
Thomas bụkwa onye natara Guggenheim Fellowship (2018), AGO Photography Prize (2017), Soros Equality Fellowsship (2017), ọ bụkwa onye otu New York City Public Design Commission
Thomas na-anọchite anya Jack Shainman Gallery, New York; Ben Brown Fine Arts, London na Hong Kong; Goodman Gallery, South Africa; na Marauni Mercier, Belgium
Thomas bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn, NY
E gosipụtara ọrụ mmekorita Hank Willis Thomas na Sundance Film Festival ma tinye ya n'ihu ọha na Oakland International Airport, The Oakland Museum of California na Mahadum California, San Francisco
Thomas na-enyocha nnọchiteanya nke ahụ nwoke Afrịka-Amerịka na omenala anya na usoro B(r)anded ya
N'ide akwụkwọ na The Guardian, onye nkatọ Arwa Mahdawi kwuru, sị 'Thomasʹ na-arụ ọrụ 'enweghị akara' mgbasa ozi iwepụ ọnọdụ azụmahịa, ma hapụ onyinyo ahụ kpughere ka ọ kwuo maka onwe ya'

Ihe osise abụọ ya nke afọ 2013, And I Can't Run and Blow the Man Down, gosipụtara iwepụ ikpe na-ezighị ezi n'oge gara aga n'ahụ nwoke ojii site na ibipụta foto nke mmechuihu ma ọ bụ ogbugbu nke ndị isi ojii na vinyl na-egosipụta ihe (nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe maka akara okporo ámá), na-eme ka ha ghara ịhụ anya ma e wezụga n'okpuru foto flash
Hannah Afriyie (amụrụ na 21 Disemba 1951) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu track and field nke Ghana lara ezumike nká
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo abụọ na 100 na 200 mita sprints na 1978 All-Africa Games nke emere na Algiers
Afriyie ruru nkeji iri na ise nke 100 mita na 200 mita na 1972 Summer Olympics
N'egwuregwu West Africa nke 1977 na Lagos, ọ meriri ọlaọcha na mita 100
Hannah Alper (amụrụ n'afọ 2002/2003) bụ onye na-eme ihe ike na ndị Juu na Canada, onye na-ede blọgụ, na onye nta akụkọ nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike tupu ya eruo afọ iri na ụma
A mụrụ Hannah Alper na 2002 2003 na Candace na Eric Alper

N'afọ 2013, nne ya rụrụ ọrụ 'inyere ụmụaka nọ n'obodo ha aka site na mmemme mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ogige oge okpomọkụ na ọgwụgwọ egwu' nna ya rụkwara ọrụ maka eOne Music Canada mgbe ọ na-eguzobe ọrụ ebere iji zụta ihe enyemaka ntị maka ụmụaka nọ na mkpa
N'afọ 2020, ezinụlọ ahụ bi na mpaghara Toronto nke Richmond Hill, Ontario

N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2012, Alper malitere blọọgụ ya ebe ọ kwuru banyere ihe ndị dị mkpa nye ya ọdịmma anụmanụ, mbibi ebe obibi, na gburugburu ebe obibi; n'ime afọ ahụ, blọọgụ ahụ nwetara nkiri peeji dị pụkụ otu nari
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2020, ọ gbasaa nkwado ya na mgbochi mmegbu na 'ịkwalite obiọma', ihe ọ kọwara dị ka 'gbanwee obodo anyị na ụwa site na obiọma'

N'otu oge ahụ, blọọgụ ya nwere 'nnukwu ndị na-eso ụzọ', nwere mmadụ pụkụ ịrị anọ ndị na-akwado ya na Twitter, o nwekwara mmadụ dị pụkụ ịrị atọ ndị na-akwado ya Instagram, ma mee ka George Stroumboulopoulos gbaa ya ajụjụ ọnụ

Alper enyewo okwu na-akpali akpali maka ME na WE, jere ozi dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike maka Free the Children, kwuru na ihe omume Toronto nke World Wildlife Fund maka Earth Hour, ma nweta CA $ 975 (na pennies) site n'aka ụmụ akwụkwọ maka Free the Child
Okwu TEDx ya nke afọ 2014, 'Olee otu esi achọta ọkụ gị', ka a kiriri ihe karịrị ugboro pụkụ abụọ na narị anọ n'ihe na-erughị otu izu
N'ịbụ onye Lilly Singh họpụtara na 2017, Alper bụ naanị onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma n'ime mmadụ iri na itoolu nke Bloomberg Businessweek na-ekiri na 2018
Ka ọ na-erule n'etiti afọ 2020, o nyela 'ihe karịrị okwu 400', a họpụtakwara ya dịka onye isi oche nke B'nai B'rith Youth Organization's Lake Ontario Region chapter
Dị ka onye nta akụkọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, Alper edeela maka The Huffington Post ma gbaa Malala Yousafzai, Craig Kielburger, Spencer West, Jian Ghomeshi na Severn Cullis-Suzuki ajụjụ ọnụ
N'afọ 2013, Alper bụ onye na-ede blọgụ maka Juno Awards

E wepụtara ya na 1 Nọvemba 2017, akwụkwọ mbụ Alper bụ Small Acts, Big Change bụ nchịkọta ajụjụ ọnụ ya na 19 n'ime ihe nlereanya ya (gụnyere Singh, Yousafzai, na Lily Collins), na-enwe olileanya inye ndị ntorobịa ike ime ihe ma mee mgbanwe ndị ha chọrọ ịhụ n'ụwa

2020 hụrụ Alper na-apụta na ihe omume ụgbọelu nke CitizenKids Earth Comes First, usoro TV nke sitere na usoro Kids Can Press nke akwụkwọ CitizenKid; ya, Cooper Price, Charlene Rourcha, na usoro ihe nkiri si na kpakpando Sophia Mathur set 'megharị' taa

Hannah J
Forster (amụrụ ya na ngwụcha afọ 1950s) bụ onye Gambia na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
Forster gara St
Joseph's Preparatory School na St
Joseph-s High School

Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ n'ọfịs ruo obere oge, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ọ́bá Akwụkwọ Mba Gambian O wee gụchaa na mahadum Ghana na nzere mmụta sayensị ọba akwụkwọ wee gụchaa na mahadum Loughborough dị na Great Britain wee nweta nzere bachelọ na ọba akwụkwọ na sayensị ozi Na Sant'Anna School of Advanced Studies, o nwetara nzere masta na ikike mmadụ na njikwa esemokwu
Site n'afọ 1990 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na African Center for Democracy and Human Rights Studies [de] (ACDHRS)
Mgbe Zoe Tembo nwụsịrị na mberede, a họpụtara ya dịka onye nduzi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Machị 12, 2001
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ kachasị ogologo oge n'oge nhọpụta
Ruo mgbe o weghaara ọkwa a, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Gambia Library and Information Service, nke na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ mba Gambia

Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya na ACDHRS, ọ na-etinye aka na ọtụtụ òtù ndị ọzọ Site n'afọ 2006 ọ bụ onye isi oche nke African Democracy Forum ma bụrụ onye so na kọmitii nduzi nke World Movement for Democracy na onye otu Council for a Community of Democracies and Solidarity for African Women's Rights (SOAWR)
Site na 1992 ruo 2009 ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ maka Human Rights Information and Documentation Systems (HURIDOCS)
Site n'afọ 2004 ruo 2010 ọ kụzikwaara ọmụmụ na Center for Human Rights nke Mahadum Pretoria
N'afọ 2007, ọ natara onyinye International Women of Courage Award site na US State Department, nke onye nnọchi anya America na Gambia, Joseph D
Stafford nyere ya
Forster lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ
Chief Hannah Idowu Dideolu Awolowo (a mụrụ dịka Adelana; 25 November 1915 – 19 September 2015), onye e ji HID mara, bụ nwaafọ Naijira ji ego achụ nta ego, nakwa onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ nwere obi umeala n'obere obodo Ikenne nke Ogun Steeti na Naijiria, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Methodist High School na Legọs
Ọ lụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ Obafemi Awolowo site n'ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1937 ruo ọnwụ ya n'afọ 1987
Ọ bụ onye ama ama dịka 'ọla nke uru ya enweghị atụ'
Ọ bụkwa nwaanyị ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maara ihe
Ọ rụrụ oke ọrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Westen Naijiria
Ọ nọchitere anya di ya na njikọ aka e mere n'etiti NCNC na AG, nke a kpọrọ United Progressive Grand Alliance (UPGA), mgbe a na-ekpe ya ikpe ma mgbe ọ nọ na nga
Atụmatụ ndị ahụ bụ na ọ ga-azọ ntuli aka ahụ, ma ọ bụrụ na o merie, ọ ga-agbada ka di ya chịa na ntuli aka mmechi
Iji mezuo ebumnuche ya nke ị bụ onye isi ala na Rịpọbliik nke abụọ, ọ gara ebe niile di ya gara na-eme mgbasa ozi
Ọ chikọtakwara otu ụmụ nwanyị nke otu ahụ ma na-anọ mgbe niile na kọmitii ọgbakọ niile
Nwanyị ọchụnta ego nwere ihe ịga nke ọma, ọ bụ onye mbụ na-ekesa ngwa ahịa ndị Nigerian Tobacco Company (NTC) n'afọ 1957
Ọ bu ya bu onye mbubata ngwongwo akwa leesi na akwa ndị ọzọ na Naijiria
Na mgbakwunye na ọtụtụ itu aha ndị ọzọ, o jidere ọkwa Yeye Oodua nke Yorubaland
Ọnwụrụ́ n'ụbọchị nke iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2015, ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na iteghete ka ọnwa abụọ fọdụrụ ka o ruo otu narị afọ
E liri ya n’akụkụ di ya na Ikenne n'ụbọchị nke iri na ise n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015
Osote Onyeisiala Naịjirịa, Yemi Osinbajo, lụrụ nwa nwa ya, bụ Dolapo Soyode
Hannah Amuchechi Rueben (amụrụ 14 Febụwari afọ1994) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'agba mgba a na kpọ freestyle
N’egwuregwu Olimpik 2016, ọ gbara aka na Women’s freestyle n'arọ -69
N’afọ 2020, o ritere nrite ọla edo n’ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị n’arọ 65 nke 2020 African Wrestling Championships
Hannatu Jibrin Salihu bụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka Agụmakwụkwọ na Steeti Niger
Hannatu Salihu
N'afọ 2020, a kpọrọ ya òkù na Singapore ebe o kwuru okwu gbasara okike uche mmadu na ihe ọhụrụ na agụmakwụkwọ na Naijiria

Dịka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ na Steeti Niger, o wepụtara atụmatụ ka gọọmentị steeti kwadochara ego dị nde naira iri asatọ na isii iji kewapụ iche, inye nri na ibughachi ụmụ akwụkwọ Almajirai, ka gọọmentị steeti ndị ọzọ weghachichara ha na steeti ha dị iche iche
Ọ kwupụtakwara ụbọchị a ga eji laghachi ụlọ akwụkwọ ka ogologo oge gara maka mkpọchi mba niile nke ọrịa COVID -19
Hannelie Coetzee bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ede foto na Johannesburg
Ọrụ ya na-agụnye foto akụkọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nka anya, na ọrụ nka mmekorita
Hannelie Coetzee gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Estcourt n'afọ 1989
Coetzee nwetara nzere BTech na foto site na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Vaal (afọ 1990 rụọ afọ 1994) na Advanced Diploma na Fine Arts na Mahadụ Witwatersrand site na Ngalaba Fine Arts Wits (1996-1997)
Coetzee arụwo ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ, na-ahụ màkà ihe banyere foto mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Non Governmental Organizations (NGOs) yana ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ iji weghara itinye ego na ọrụ mmepe ha
Ọ na-anọchite anya Aurora Photos na New York
N'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2002, Coetzee bịdọrọ ihe ngosi nke izizi ya, Bossie Series na Bell-Roberts Photographic Gallery na Cape Town

ArtsLink kwuru na 'Ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike ịkọwa usoro a dị ka foto ọdịnala, Hannelie Coetzee etinyela ntụgharị nke ya n'iheỌ na-emepụta ihe na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ, nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ velvet nke na-ama foto nkịtị aka

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2009, Coetzee ritere ihe nrite PPC Young Concrete Sculptor merit award n'ihe banyere mpempe akwụkwọ ya 'Webcam Two Faces,' ihe osise onwe onye nke kamera na-ese onyinyo nke a sụgharịrị na ngwakọta nke simenti na nkume
Ndị ọkàikpe hụrụ ya 'n'ụzọ pụrụ iche'
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Coetzee anọwo na-arụ ọrụ na nkume a tụfuru atụfu / nke a rụpụtara
Ọ bịdọrọ site na ise foto nkume wee gaa n'ịchịkọta nkume, na-eme nkume mosaics, ma mechaa mepụta ihe a tụrụ atụ na nkume
Ịchịkọta, ịhazi na idepụta nkume n'ebe na-adịghị mma aghọwo isiokwu n'ọrụ ya n'ime afọ iri gara aga
Tinyere ọrụ dị iche iche dị na mbà South Africa, dị ka Infecting the City na mmemme Site Specific Land Arts, Coetzee emeela ụfọdụ ọrụ na Johannesburg iji jikọta ya na mgbọrọgwụ ya n'obodo ahụ
A kpughere nnukwu ọrụ e nyere ọrụ nke e ji isi ihe na-egwupụta ihe, 'The Change Agent', n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2012 na Maboneng Precinct n'ihu ụlọ ọhụrụ, The Main Change
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2012, Coetzee mepụtara ihe nwa oge akpọrọ 'Buigkrag' na Nirox Sculpture Park na Gauteng na-ekwu n'ihe banyere mmekọrịta anyị na ike
Ọ bụzi akụkụ nke nchịkọta Nirox na-adịgide adịgide
Coetzee na Usha Seejarim na-arụkọ ọrụ na Such Initiative, ụlọ ọrụ nkewa irí abụọ n'otu nke e guzobere n'afọ 2009 na otu ụlọ ọrụ nka ọha na eze na-ahụ banyere gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọhụụ nke atụmatụ dị otú ahụ bụ 'ịgbanwe echiche site na nka ọha na eze na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi'
Ihe osise ọha na eze nke e mepụtara site na atụmatụ dị otú ahụ bụ usoro ntinye aka nke gụnyere ndị ọkachamara yana ndị obodo
Ihe onwunwe na usoro ndị ahụ na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi ma na-adabere na obodo
Ọ na-eduzi njem ije ije ebe ya onwe ya na-eme njem n'ihu ọha ya na Fordsburg, Braamfontein, na Maboneng na ìgwè mmadụ iri anọ maọbu iri ise
Hans Anton Aschenborn (1 Febụwarị 1888 - 10 Eprel 1931) bụ onye a ma ama na-ese anụmanụ nke anụ ọhịa Afrịka
Ọ bụ nna Dieter Aschenborn na nna nna Hans Ulrich Aschenborn, ha abụọ bụ ndị na-ese ihe
Hans Anton rụrụ ọrụ na Germany na ndịda Africa
A na-egosipụta ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ nkà ihe ọmụma nka German Thieme-Becker ma ọ bụ Saur

Akwụkwọ edemede Master of Arts nke Karin Skawran dere banyere ọrụ eserese nke Hans Anton Aschenborn ka e bipụtara n'akwụkwọ akụkọ nka na ọdịbendị South Africa, Lantern na 1965) Na 1963 Mahadum Pretoria bipụtara akwụkwọ banyere Aschenborn dị ka onye na-ese ihe akpọrọ, Hans Anton Aschenborn Mens en Kunstenaar N'afọ 1970, ụlọ ngosi nka Pretoria (South Africa) sochiri ya ma mee edemede gbasara ọrụ ya
Akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ gbasara Aschenborn gosipụtara ihe osise ya na linocuts
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe osise ya nke akwụkwọ na dị ka onye edemede na onye na-ede uri
A ka na-egosi ọtụtụ ọrụ ya
E nwere ike ịchọta ya na Ịntanetị
A na-asọpụrụ ya dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ n'ihe ngosi nke anụ ọhịa Afrịka
N'afọ 1916, o dere okwu nke abụ ahụ, 'Heia Safari', nke ka na-ewu ewu
A sụgharịrị ụfọdụ n'ime akwụkwọ German ya n'asụsụ Afrikaans, na-enye ya ọrụ na akwụkwọ Afrikaans
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'akwụkwọ ya banyere gemsbok (nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Bekee) ma na-ele ha anya nke ọma, Aschenborn chọpụtara ụdị dị iche iche a gụrụ aha ya, Genus Aschenborni
N'ebe ndịda Afrịka, a na-asọpụrụ ya ugboro ugboro site na nraranye
Na Windhoek (Namibia) enwere Aschenborn Street, na Cape Town (South Africa) Hans Aschenborn Road
A mụrụ ya na Kiel, Germany
N'afọ 1909, ọ kwagara Namibia, ebe ọ zụtara ugbo aha ya bụ, 'Quickborn' n'afọ 1912
N'afọ 1913 ọ lụrụ Emma Bredow
Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara South Africa na 1920, tupu ọ laghachi Germany na 1921
Ọ nwụrụ na Kiel n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1931
Nwa ya nwoke, Dieter Aschenborn (15 Nọvemba 1915 - 11 Septemba 2002), na nwa nwa ya, Uli Aschenborn (6 Septemba 1947), bụkwa ndị a ma ama na-ese ihe anụmanụ na ndịda Afrịka
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ nka nke ndị Aschenborn atọ ahụ na gallery, ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, na ụlọ ọha na eze nke Namibia
E mekwara ihe ngosi nke ọrụ nke ọgbọ atọ ahụ na Namibia n'afọ 1965
Hanshin Tigers(阪神タイガース) bụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Japan
Hanshin Tigers bụ otu egwuregwu baseball kacha ewu ewu na Japan ma nwee nnukwu ndị na-eso ya
Onye aha ya bụ Akifu Okada bụ onye njikwa na ama ama karịa ndị egwuregwu
Hany Adel (Arabic; a mụrụ na Septemba 8, 1976) bụ onye Egypt na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, onye na-agụ egwú, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

A mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Septemba 8, 1976 ma bụrụ onye guzobere otu asụsụ Arabic Wust El-Balad Ọ rụkwara ọrụ nkwado dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị Ijipt nke oge a na-ekwu maka nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-ese okwu na-eche ndị Arab ihu
Adel lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Lebanọn bụ Diamand Bou Abboud
Hani Ramzi (Arabic; a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na otu n'ime ndị na-eme egwuregwu ọchị a ma ama n'Egypt
Hani Ramzy onye a mụrụ na Alexandria, tolitere na Beni Mazar, Minya Governorate
Ka oge na-aga, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Faculty of Commerce, Mahadum Cairo, wee sonye na Institute of Performing Arts

Mbido mbụ ya bụ na otu mma agha n'egwuregwu Ana ayza millionaire onye edemede egwuregwu Yusri El-Ebyari na mgbe ahụ ya na Mohamed Sobhi sonyere na egwuregwu Takharif na Weghat Nazar, sonyekwara n'ọtụtụ ọrụ wee mee ihe nkiri n'usoro ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Hany Adel Ramzy n'obodo Minya, nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu
Ramzy lụrụ nwanyị si Asyut, Mona Mohab ma ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Shady na Jesse
Haoua Yao (amụrụ na 2 Julaị 1979), nke a maara na Burkina Faso dị ka Farota, bụ onye bọọlụ bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-edebe goolu

A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Burkina Faso, Equatorial Guinea mere ya ka ọ bụrụ nwa amaala ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ maka otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ha, ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị otu maka mbipụta atọ nke nke mba Iko umunwanyi Afrika (2006, 2008 na 2010) na 2011 Iko mba ụwa nke FIFA
Yao agbaala bọọlụ maka Princess, Gazelles na Sirènes du Kadiogo na Burkina Faso
Obi ụtọ Okafor bụ onye Naijiria na-agba ịnyịnya ígwè

O riteré ihe nrite ọla edo mgbe ọ na-anọchite anya Naijiria na ihe omume ịgba ịnyịnya ígwè nke ụmụ nwanyị n'akụkụ Rosemary Marcus, Glory Odiase, na Gripa Tombrapa na 2015 All-Africa Games na Congo Brazzaville
Harira (Arabic) bụ ofe ọdịnala nke mpaghara Ndịda Afrika nke a kwadebere na obodo Morocco na Algeria
Harira Algeria dị iche na harira Moroccan n'ihi na harira Algeria enweghị lentil
Ọ na-ewu ewu dị ka ihe mbido mana a na-eri ya n'onwe ya dị ka ihe oriri dị mfe
E nwere ọtụtụ ọdịiche ma a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe n'oge Ramadan, ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike ime ya n'afọ niile
Ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke nri Maghrebi, ebe a na-etinye mmiri lemon na àkwá iji mee ka ụtọ ofe dị mma
Dị ka ndị Alakụba, ndị na-enwekarị ofe maka nri Iftar, ndị Juu na-eji ya emebi ọnụ ha n'oge Yom Kippur
Ihe ndị a na-esonụ mejupụtara isi nri Harira, ọ pụkwara ịdịgasị iche dabere na mpaghara
A na-ejikarị sinamọn, ginger, turmeric ma ọ bụ ihe ọzọ na-acha dị ka saffron, na ahịhịa ọhụrụ dị ka cilantro na parsley emepụta anụ ahụ, nke a na-etinye ezigbo ya
A pụkwara itinye mmiri lemon n'oge a na-enye ya
Soup ahụ na-atọ ụtọ nke ọma ma ọ bụrụ na a hapụrụ ya ka ọ zuru ike n'otu abalị

A na-ejikarị àkwá siri ike e siri esi nke e ji nnu na cumin, mkpụrụ osisi na mkpụrụ osisi ndị ọzọ a kpọrọ nkụ dịka fig, ihe na-atọ ụtọ mmanụ aṅụ ọdịnala na achịcha ndị ọzọ pụrụ iche a na-eme n'ụlọ ma ọ bụ crepes

Harissa (Arabic harīsa, site na Maghrebi Arabic) bụ ihe na-ekpo ọkụ na-ekwo ekwo, nke a mụrụ na Maghreb
Ihe ndị bụ isi na-eme ya bụ ose na-acha ọbara ọbara, ose Baklouti, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na ahịhịa dị ka galik paste, mkpụrụ caraway, mkpụrụ coriander, cumin na mmanụ oliv iji buru ụdị mmanụ na-agbaze
A na-emekwa Rose harissa, nke e ji okooko osisi rose mee
Dị ka a na-emepụta harissa site na ịkụ chilis, okwu ahụ sitere na ngwaa Arabic, 'harasa' (Arabic) nke pụtara 'ịkụ' ma ọ bụ 'ịkpochapụ'
Dị ka ọ dị na nri ndị Europe, a na-ebubata ose chili na nri Maghrebian site na mgbanwe Columbian, ikekwe n'oge ndị Spain bi na Tunisia n'etiti afọ 1535 na 1574
Na Algeria, a na-agbakwunye harissa na ofe, stews, na couscous
A pụkwara iji Harissa paste mee ihe dị ka ihe na-agbanye anụ ma ọ bụ eggplants
Onye ọzọ dị mkpa na-emepụta ihe bụ mpaghara Annaba nke Algeria, nke bụkwa onye na-azụ ahịa dị mkpa
Dị ka onye edemede akwụkwọ nri Martha Rose Shulman si kwuo, harissa e mepụtara n'oge gara aga na-atọ ụtọ dị iche na nke a na-enye na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ndị Tunisia na ndị mba ọzọ
Ntụziaka maka harissa dịgasị iche dabere na ezinụlọ na mpaghara
Mgbanwe nwere ike ịgụnye mgbakwunye nke yabasị na-agba ụka ma ọ bụ mmiri oroma
A na-ere harissa a kwadebere n'ime ite, ite, karama na tubes
A na-akọwa Harissa mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka 'ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke Tunisia', ọbụnakwa 'ihe na'isi ụtọ nke Tunisia ', ma ọ bụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala dị ka 'akara nke nri azụ na anụ nke Tunisia'
Na Tunisia, a na-eji harissa eme ihe dị ka ihe na anụ (anụ ọkụkọ, anụ ehi, ewu, ma ọ bụ nwa atụrụ) ma ọ bụ nri azụ̀ na akwụkwọ nri, yana dị ka ihe oriri maka couscous
A na-ejikwa ya maka lablabi, ofe chickpea, na fricasse
Tunisia bụ nnukwu onye na-ebupụ harissa a kwadebere
N'afọ 2006, mmepụta nke harissa na Tunisia bụ tọn 22,000, na-etinye ihe dị ka tọn 40,000 nke ose
A na-ejikarị chilis a na-akụ gburugburu Nabeul na Gabès eme harissa nke Tunisia, nke dịtụ nro, na-enweta 4,000 o5,000 na Scoville scale
Nri Moroccan ejirila harissa, na-eji ya dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ maka tagines, ma ọ bụ mgbe ụfọdụ na-agwakọta ya na efere
N'Izrel, harissa bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị maka sabich na shawarma
Filfel chuma (Hibru), nke a na-akpọkwa pilpelshuma, nke pụtara 'pepper garlic', bụ ụdị chili nke nri ndị Juu nke Libya nke yiri harissa
Ọ sitere na nri ndị Libya, [ọnọdụ na achọ] ebe a maara ya dị ka maseer (Arabic ma ọ bụ مسّير حار mseyer)
A makwaara ya site na aha ndị ọzọ dịka filfil mukhalal (فلفل__wol____wol____wol__) na filfil makbos (فلفڵ مكبوس)
A na-eme ya site na ose na-atọ ụtọ na nke na-ekpo ọkụ na galik a pịrị apị
A na-agbakwunye ihe ndị ọzọ, dị ka mkpụrụ osisi, cumin, mmiri , oroma na nnu mgbe ụfọdụ
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na dị ka ihe dị na nri dịka salad, anụ, azụ, mkpọ ọka, na osikapa, na nri àkwá dịka shakshouka
Harold C
Anderson bụ onye America na-ahụ maka ego na onye na-eme ngagharị iwe n'ọzara
Onye a ma ama na Potomac Appalachian Trail Club (PATC) na mpaghara Washington DC
site na mmalite ya, ọ bụkwa onye guzobere The Wilderness Society
N'ihi njikọ ya na PATC, Anderson maara Benton MacKaye nke ọma, onye na-elekọta ọhịa bụ onye mbụ tụụrụ aro Appalachian Trail

Anderson nwere nchegbu karịsịa maka atụmatụ iwu ihe ndị dị na mbara igwe n'akụkụ Appalachian crest, ihe ya na MacKaye kerịtara, onye na-eso onye isi oche PATC Myron Avery n'oge ahụ na-agba isi na isiokwu ahụ

N’August 1934, Anderson degara MacKaye akwụkwọ banyere ọchịchọ ya ịmalite ọha mmadụ mbụ nke mba ahụ raara onwe ya nye maka nchebe nke ọzara “Gị na Bob Marshall anọwo na-ekwusa na ndị hụrụ oge ochie n’anya kwesịrị ịnakọta ọnụ ma kwuo echiche ha n’ịdị n’otu
Nke ahụ bụ ihe m ga-achọ ịmalite'
Harold Rubin (ubochí irí àtó n'ọnwa Mee 1932 rụọ úbọchị mbú n'ọnwa Eprel 2020) bụ ónyé Israel na-ese ihe na onye na-egwu jazz n'efu
A mụrụ Rubin na Johannesburg, South Africa n'ubochí irí àtó n'ọnwa Mee 1932
Ọ gara Jeppe High School for Boys ma nata ntụziaka onwé ónyé na nka mara mma
A zụrụ ya na clarinet oge ochie mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ zụlitere mmasị na jazz wee malite igwu egwu na Skyline Night Club mgbe ọ dị iri na asatọ
E debara aha ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-amụ ihe owuwu na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ọkachamara ya mgbè ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ na London
Mgbalị okike Rubin na obodo South Africa n'ime afọ 1950 na 1960 megidere apartheid-oge Afrikaner nguzobe site n'ịgbanarị ụkpụrụ mmekọrịta agbụrụ nke mba ahụ
Rubin haziri otu jazz nke ya na 1950s, banye n'ime obodo ojii, wee soro ndị egwu ojii na-egwu egwu
E gosipụtara ihe osise a na-ahụ anya nke Rubin na 1956
Otu n'ime ihe ndị Rubin nyere na nka nka South Africa n'ime mmụọ a bụ Sharpeville nke 1961, usoro eserese ewepụtara maka obi ọjọọ nke ndị ọchịchị oge Apartheid n'oge ọchịchị
Sharpeville massacre n'afọ 1960
Ọrụ Rubin kachasị arụmụka na ihe nkiri nka South Africa nke afọ 1960 bụ My Jesus, nsụgharị na-akpali akpali nke obe nke Jizọs Kraịst pụtara dị ka ónyé ojii gba ọtọ nwere isi anụ ọhịa
Ọrụ ahụ nwere ihe odide 'M na-agbaghara gị O Onyenwe anyị, n'ihi na ị maghị ihe ị na-eme' a na-agbagha agbagha 'Nna gbaghara ha, n'ezie ha amaghị ihe ha na-eme'
E gosipụtara onyinyo ahụ na-ese ókwú n'akụkụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-emegide nguzobe na gallery Johannesburg na 1962
Ihe ngosi ahụ kpatara iwe nke na gọọmentị zigara ndị uwe ojii ka ha mechie ihe ngosi ahụ ma zigara ihe osise ya màkà nyocha nke ụlọ ọrụ nyocha ya
Rubin ghọrọ ónyé South Africa nke abụọ e boro ebubo nkwulu
Rubin bụ onye kwupụtara na ya ekweghị na Chineke
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, mgbè ọ gbara afọ 87
Harouna, nke a na-akpọkwa Haruna, bụ aha nna ṅdị Alakụba nke Afrịka na aha nwoke
Ọ sitere na ụdị ebubo ebubo nke aha Arabic Harun
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere
Doula Gabde Harouna, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Harouna Doula bụ onye njikwa bọọlụ obodo Naijiria na onye egwuregwu mbụ

Ọ bụ onye njikwa nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger site n'afọ 2009 ruo n'afọ 2012, na-eduga Niger na nzere mbụ ya na African Nations Cup na 2012, nzere mbụ ha na African Nations Championship na 2011, na mmeri nke UEMOA Tournament na 2010
E wedara ya n'ọkwa mgbe egwuregwu mbụ ọ dara n'egwuregwu Ikpeazụ nke akpọrọ 2012 Nations Cup finals n'asụsụ bekee
Ọ dị afọ iri anọ na isii na Jenụwarị 2012, Harouna Doula bụ onye mba Niger, na-egwuri egwu na fullback
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ nwetara nzere 'professorat' na mmụta mmega ahụ na egwuregwu site na Niger's National Institute of Youth, Sports, and Culture (INJS / C)
O nwere 'A License' maka ọzụzụ egwuregwu bọọlụ ọkachamara site na Mahadum Leipzig, 'C License' site na Confederation of African Football, na diplọma nkuzi maka CAF, UEFA, na FIFA
A họpụtara ya dịka onye njikwa nke ndị otu mba Niger na 2009, Harouna Doula nọchiri onye bụbu onye nkuzi U-17 Niger Frederic Costa, onye a họpụtara na Disemba 2008
N'okpuru Harouna Doula Niger gbara ọsọ na-adịghị mma, na-ejedebe na enweghị ike iru eru maka 2010 African Cup of Nations na Angola
N'agbanyeghi na ha kụrụ afọ n'ala maka ACON2010, Niger kwadoro ma merie asọmpi UEMOA na Nọvemba 2010, ma soro nzere mbụ ha maka asọmpi mba Afrịka na Febụwarị 2011
Niger gara n'ihu na mpụta mbụ ha na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ, na-ejedebe na mmeri nke ndị ọbịa,
Na 10 Ọktoba 2010, Niger meriri Egypt 1-0 n'ụlọ na 2012 African Cup of Nations qualification
Mgbe ha meriri n'ụlọ - mana ha furu efu - na South Africa na Sierra Leone, na 8 Ọktoba 2011 Niger ruru eru maka iko mba Afrịka nke mbụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme ya
Maka akụkụ ya na ọsọ Niger na-enweghị atụ, CAF nyere Harouna Doula 'Best African Manager 2011' na Disemba 2012
N'ịga n'ihu ACON 2012
ndị nta akụkọ na ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kwuru banyere ụdị njikwa ya dị jụụ, nke na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ
N'otu ajụjụ ọnụ o kwuru na 'ebumnobi bụ ịnọgide na-adị umeala n'obi mgbe niile
kamakwa karịa onwe anyị, na-eju anya, dịka anyị nwere ike ime n'oge nzere'

N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba, ụbọchị abụọ tupu Niger agbaa egwuregwu enyi na enyi ikpeazụ (megide Botswana na Niamey) FENIFOOT kwupụtara na ọ kpọbatara ndị ọkachamara abụọ iji nyere Harouna Doula aka na iko mba Afrịka
Bako Adamou ga-abụ osote onye na-enye ọzụzụ na onye njikwa French Rolland Courbis ka a kpọrọ 'Onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ' na ndị otu ahụ
Colonel Djibrilla Hima, onye isi oche nke FENIFOOT, kwusiri ike na nzukọ ndị nta akụkọ na 'Ọ bụghị ajụjụ nke onye njikwa otu mba na-ahapụ otu mba
O mere ka anyị ruo eru maka CAN (ACON), ọ ga-akpọrọ anyị gaa n'ikpeazụ nke iko mba Afrịka
Na ụbọchị nke isii nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, Harouna Doula, ya na onye isi otu Lawali Idrissa, kwupụtara nhọrọ nke ndị egwuregwu iri abụọ na isii ga-aga ogige tupu asọmpi na Douala, Cameroon

Ụbọchị abụọ mgbe Gabon 2-0 gasịrị na egwuregwu mbụ nke Niger na 23 Jenụwarị, ewepụrụ Harouna Doula dị ka onye njikwa Colonel Djibrilla Hima na 25 Jenụwarị kwupụtara na a ga-eweda Harouna Doula n'ọkwa 'Onye nkuzi nke abụọ' ruo na njedebe nke 2012 African Cup of Nations, Rolland Courbis na-anọchi ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa
FENIFOOT boro Harouna Doula ụta maka mgbanwe nkeji ikpeazụ na mbido nke akụkụ ahụ furu efu Gabon
O doro anya n'oge ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na Harouna Doula ga-alọghachi mgbe asọmpi ahụ gasịrị
N'agbanyeghị mgbanwe ndị ahụ, Harouna Doula kwusiri ndị nta akụkọ ike na Libreville tupu egwuregwu Tunisia ha na enweghị asọmpi n'etiti ya na Courbis

N'ịga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enye ọzụzụ ma na-apụta na bench na ndị otu ahụ, Harouna Doula kwuru na 27 Jenụwarị na 'Anyị na-etinyekọta isi ọnụ, anyị na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ maka ọdịmma nke ndị otu ahụ
Harouna Lago (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1946) bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ na Nijeria
Lago sonyere na Summer Olympics nke afọ 1972 na Niger
Ọ meriri naanị egwuregwu ya na onye meriri nrite ọla edo Boris Kuznetsov nke Soviet Union
N'okpuru ebe a bụ ihe ndekọ nke Harouna Lago, onye na-akụ ọkpọ na Naijiria nke tiri ọkpọ na 1972 Munich Olympics
Harqma bụ ofe ma ọ bụ ofe e ji nwa atụrụ mee
Ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na mpaghara Maghreb nke nọ na Ugwu Afrịka
A na-eri Harqma mgbe ememe Ramadan, dị ka nri iji mebie ibu ọnụ (sawm) mgbe anyanwụ dara
A na-eji trotters nke nwa atụrụ eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ihe eji eme ya
A tụwo aro na harqma sitere na Middle Ages
Kpọpụta njehie has group attribute which does not appear in prior text
Harriet Anena bụ onye odee na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Uganda, onye edemede ya gụnyere abụ, akụkọ ihe mere emena akụkọ ifo
Ọ bụ onye odee nke nchịkọta uri, A Nation In Labour, nke e bipụtara na 2015, nke ritekwara 2018 Wole Soyinka Prize for Literature in Africa
The Economist kọwara ọrụ uri ya dị ka 'mkpalite ịhụnanya na agha na-ejide'
A mụrụ Anena nye nne na nna Acholi wee zụlite ya na Gulu District nke Uganda
O tolitere n'oge agha afọ iri abụọ nke ndị nnupụisi nke Lord Resistance Army na-edu, ihe omume nke mụtara ma metụta edemede mbụ ya
Anena gara Gulu Public Primary School, Sacred Heart Secondary, na Gulu Central High School
Ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Mass Communication na Mahadum Makerere na 2010 wee gụchaa ma nweta nzere Master of Arts n'ikike mmadụ site n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na 2018
Ọ na-agbaso mmemme ide ihe MFA na Mahadum Columbia na New York
Anena rụrụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Daily Monitor dị ka onye nta akụkọ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, na osote onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ site na 2009 ruo Septemba 2014
Ọ sonyeere African Center for Media Excellence na 2014 wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-azụ ndị nta akụkọ, onye nyocha mgbasa ozi, onye nhazi mmemme na onye na-emepụta ihe na ịntanetị ruo 2019
N'August 2019, Anena sonyeere Columbia Journal dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ n'ịntanetị ya
Ebipụtala akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na Daily Monitor, New Vision, The Observer, Columbia Journal, Atlantic na Popula
Ọ kụzikwara ụmụ akwụkwọ na-amụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Specialized Writing na mahadum islam dị na Uganda
Anena dere abụ mbụ ya, 'Ọnọdụ nke nwa Acholi', na 2003
Ọ meriri asọmpi ide ihe nke ndi otu Acholi Religious Leaders Peace Initiative haziri, nke nyere ya aka nweta ego maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level
Ọ gara ogbako ihe nrite Caine nke 2013 emere na Uganda, akụkọ ya bụ 'Watchdog Games' ka e bipụtara na antọlọjị A Memory This Size and Other History The Caine Prize for African Writing, 2013
N'afọ 2013, e depụtara ya aha maka 'Ghana Poetry Prize' maka uri ya 'We Arise'
A Nation In Labour, nke e bipụtara na 2015, bụ akwụkwọ mbụ ya, bu nchịkọta uri 'ndị na-ahụ maka ọha na eze'

The New Vision dere na 'Anena na ya usoro nke uri ya ga-eme ka ị guru na-aga n'ihu' Dị ka Tomiwa Ilori si kọwa ya, ' A Nation in Labour bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere akụkụ anọ nke na-eji asụsụ dị elu na-ekwu maka egwu
Nchịkọta uri nke Anena na-adọ ọha mmadụ aka ná ntị banyere usoro uru ya gbagọrọ agbagọ site n'iji nlezianya eme ihe nke nzaghachi njakịrị nke na-ada ụda
Akụkụ nke ọ bụla n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na-eme ka ụmụ mmadụ na-adaba n'ụkpụrụ mmiri'
Na Nọvemba 2018, A Nation In Labour ka e depụtara aha ya maka Biennial Wole Soyinka Prize for Literature in Africa, ya na mkpokọta nke Tanure Ojaide na Servio Gbadamosi
Na 9 Disemba 2018, na emume nturu ugo emere na Lagos, Nigeria, Anena na Ojaide ka akpọputara dika ndị mmeri jikọrọ aka
Ọ bụ Toyin Falola, Olu Obafemi na Margaret Busby (oche oche) kpere ikpe nke ihe nrite a
Ọ bụ onye Nobel Laureate, Prọfesọ Wole Soyinka nyere onyinye a
Ọrụ ya pụtara na 2019's New Daughters of Africa Anthology International of Writing site na Women of African Descent, nke Margaret Busby deziri
Na Disemba 2018, a kpọrọ Harriet Anena onye mmeri nke 2018 Wole Soyinka Prize for Literature in Africa maka akwụkwọ ya A Nation in Labour, nke e bipụtara na 2015
Ya na Prọfesọ Tanure Ojaide jikọrọ aka nweta ihe nrite ahụ
Anena nwetara ihe nrite ya na emume emere na Lagos, Nigeria, nke Wole Soyinka, onye mbụ nwetara ihe nrite Nobel n'akwụkwọ n'Afrịka, bụ onye a kpọrọ ihe nrite ahụ na-aha ya
Wole Soyinka Prize for Literature bụ 'ihe nrite ederede pan-African a na-enye kwa afọ maka ọrụ agụmagụ kacha mma nke onye Africa mepụtara'
Edepụtara akụkọ mkpirikpi Anena 'Dancing with Ma' maka 2018 Commonwealth Short Story Prize
Na 2017 na 2018, akụkọ ifo ya dị mkpirikpi, 'The Satan's Inside My Jimmy' na 'Waiting', bụ ndị arọputakwara maka ihe nrite Africa Short Story Day
Harriet Bulkeley, FBA (amụrụ ya na 17 Nọvemba 1972) bụ onye Britain na-ahụ maka ọdịdị ala na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke Geography na Mahadum Durham
Bulkeley bụkwa onye nhazi na ọrụ Naturvation
Site n'ọrụ ya na Mahadum Durham, Harriet na-etinye aka na ọrụ ReInvent-EU, nke na-ezube ịkwalite decarbonisation na mpaghara anọ dị mkpa plastik, ígwè, akwụkwọ na anụ na mmiri ara ehi

Nnyocha ya na-enyocha ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na usoro ndị gbara ọchịchị gburugburu ebe obibi gburugburu, yana njikwa ihe mkpofu obodo na United Kingdom na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọkachasị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo ahu, nke mgbanwe ihu igwe
N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Fellow nke British Academy (FBA), ụlọ akwụkwọ mba United Kingdom maka ụmụ mmadụ na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Bulkeley gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Kambridge, ó gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1995 na nzere na Geography, tupu ọ gụchaa PhD na Geography ya na Philosophy na 1998

Bulkeley ebipụtala ihe karịrị akwụkwọ na isiokwu tutu iri Na ise, gụnyere 'Low Carbon Communities na Social Justice' (2012), nke Sarah Fuller, onye nchọpụta nsọpụrụ, sokwa na Ngalaba Geography nke Mahadum Durham, dere
Bulkeley bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Environment na Planning C Government na Policy
Site na Mahadum Durham na Durham Energy Institute, Harriet etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ nyocha, gụnyere
Harriet Irene Dunlop Prenter (1865 ma ọ bụ 1856 16 Julaị 1939) bụ onye ndú n'òtù na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Canada
N'afọ 1921, ọ so n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị mbụ gbara ọsọ dị ka ndị na-azọ ọkwa na ntuli aka gọọmentị etiti nke Canada
Ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị siri ike
Harriet Irene Dunlop bụ nwa nwanyị nke Archibald Dunlop
Ọ bụ onye okpukpe Presbyterian
Ọ lụrụ Hector Henry Weir Prenter n'ụbọchị 8 Septemba 1892 na York, Ontario
Amụrụ di ya na Ireland n'ụbọchị 2 Febụwarị 1860, ọ kwagara Canada n'ihe dị ka afọ 1890
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ (1914), Harriet Dunlop Prenter weere ọnọdụ dị mma megide ndị ụkọchukwu ụka na-akwado ọzụzụ agha n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
O dere, 'N'ikpeazụ, militarism abụghị usoro ọ bụ mmụọ, ma ọ bụrụ na anyị ekwe ka ihe a ugbu a, anyị na-agọnahụ ụkpụrụ nke ndị ikom anyị na-anwụ na Europe
' Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF) sitere na Women's Peace Party (WPP) na Jane Addams na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka udo haziri n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1915
Prenter odeakwụkwọ nke ngalaba Canada nke WILPF
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1916, Prenter gwara isi ụlọ ọrụ WILPF dị njikere ịbanye na Rose Henderson iri ise
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị megidere pacifism
Woman's Century zaghachiri na ngwụcha oge okpomọkụ afọ 1917 na akụkọ nke Prenter na Laura Hughes, kọwara dị ka 'ndị suffragists a ma ama', dọtara njikọ dị n'etiti suffrage na pacifism na Ontario
Dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ, Jessie Campbell MacIver, si kwuo, 'National Union na Ontario Equal Franchise Association ekwuputala onwe ha ugboro ugboro dị ka ndị na-ajụ kpamkpam ajụjụ ọ bụla nke udo
Akwụkwọ ọ bụla na-ahụ maka udo nke a natara site na Hague na ebe ndị ọzọ ka ndị otu a zigara na nkata akwụkwọ mkpofu
Prenter was an outspoken supporter of women's suffrage
She was president of the Political Equality League in TorontoÀtụ Sfn
In late 1918 Prenter and Lucy MacGregor of the Women's Social Democratic League formed a Women's Labor League (WLL) in Toronto
The WLL was a working-class organization
Prenter mocked the 'silken dames
so occupied with 'committees' and 'uplifting' that they allow the social revolution to walk right past them'Àtụ Sfn
Prenter wrote regularly for Canadian Forward, which reported on labour and socialist topics and published feminist and pacifist material for about 30,000 readers
Her articles also appeared in the White Ribbon Bulletin and Woman's Century
She may have encouraged Gertrude Richardson to contribute to Canadian Forward from June 1917 onwardÀtụ Sfn
She made it clear that she would not 'endlessly discuss cooking, children, church and clothes'
The column would be concerned with topics such as the money value of the work a woman does in the home, and whether she should be paid a wageÀtụ Sfn
Harriet Arline Forte Kennedy (November 22, 1931 na February 12, 1994) bụ ónyé nchịkwa ebe ngosi nka America, ónyé na-ese ihe, na ónyé na-agụ egwu

A mụrụ ya na Cambridge, Massachusetts, Kennedy gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ tupu ọ gaa Massachusetts College of Art, Institute of Art Administration na Mahadum Harvard, na Mahaduma Northeastern, ébé ọ nwetara nzèrè bachelọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston site na 1960 ruo 1965, wee malite ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Boston na 1965
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Boston tupu ọ bụrụ osote ónyé nduzi nke Museum of Afro-American Artists
Kennedy bụkwa ónyé coloratura soprano nke na-abụ abụ n'ebe niile na mpaghara Boston
Kennedy nwụrụ na Medford, Massachusetts n'afọ 1994
O nwèrè ụmụ atọ, gụnyere nwa nwanyị nkuchi

Harriet Green OBE (amụrụ ya na abalị iri na abuo na onwa nke iri na abuo na afo 1961) bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Britain, onye bụ onye isi oche na onye isi oche nke IBM Asia Pacific, ma buru ụzọ duru ngalaba azụmaahịa IBM atọ ịntanetị nke ihe, ntinye aka ndị ahịa na azụmaahịa agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Thomas Cook Group site na Julaị 2012 ruo Nọvemba 2014
Harriet Green mụrụ na 12 Disemba 1961 na Cheltenham, England nye Dermot Green na Nerys Allen
Ọ tolitere na Shipton, Gloucestershire, n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cheltenham, na Cotswolds
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Westwood's Grammar School na Northleach
Ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme ochie na King's College London, wee gụchaa nzere bachelọ na 1983
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara Business Psychology na London School of Economics, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1985
Green rụrụ ọrụ mmalite ya na ụlọ ọrụ akụrụngwa eletrọnịkị, na-arụ ọrụ na Europe, United States na Eshia
Ọ bụ onye isi njikwa nke Macro Group, wee họpụta ya onye isi oche nke mpaghara Asia/Pacific nke Arrow Electronics site na afo 2002 ruo na afọ 2006
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Premier Farnell, azụmahịa nkesa ngwá electronic zuru ụwa ọnụ, site na 2006 ruo 2012
Ọ ghọrọ CEO nke Thomas Cook Group na abalị iri atọ na ọnwa asaá na afọ 2012, nọchiri Manny Fontenla-Novoa onye bụ onye isi ala site na 2003
O nwetara ọnọdụ a site na oyi na-atụ onye isi oche Frank Meysman
N'oge ya dị ka CEO, Green nyere aka itolite ahịa Thomas Cook Group nke sitere na £ 148m ruo ihe karịrị £ 2bn wee nyere aka ịbawanye ọnụ ahịa ụlọ ọrụ 829pc
Na Onwa Nọvemba na afọ 2014, a mara ọkwa na Green na-ahapụ ozugbo, na Peter Fankhauser, COO ga-eweghara dị ka CEO
N'ịgbasa ọkwa ọpụpụ Green, ọnụ ahịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbadara karịa £350m

N'agbanyeghị ọnwụ nke Christianne na Robert Shepherd mere na 2006 tupu a họpụta ya, Green kwupụtara na June 2015 na ọ na-enye otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke £ 57m Thomas Cook bonus, £ 19m, na ọrụ ebere nke nne na nna ụmụ abụọ họpụtara
onye nwuru mgbe o na ezumike

Ndị na-ahụ maka nyocha katọrọ otu a nke ukwuu na nyocha 2015 - nke kpebiri na egburu di na nwunye ahụ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị site na nsi carbon monoxide na Corfu na 2006 - maka ọgwụgwọ ya na ezinụlọ, nke gụnyere oge nke Green

N'ọnwa Ọktoba na afo 2019, ndị omeiwu na-ege ntị na mkpesa ndị omeiwu enweghị ntinye na-adịghị mma na oge ya dị ka CEO wee kwuo na mgbake Thomas Cook nwere ike ịga n'ihu ma ọ bụrụ na ekwere ya ka ọ mechaa mgbanwe ọ malitere
IBM họpụtara Green ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba azụmahịa 'IBM Watson Internet of Things' na onwa Disemba 2015
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dabeere na Armonk, NY
Dị ka onye isi njikwa nke Njikọ Ndị Ahịa Watson, Watson 'Internet of Things and Education' na IBM, Green bụ onye na-ahụ maka ịkwọ ụgbọala na-eduga ọganihu ọhụrụ, dị ka IBM si kwuo
Green mezuru afọ itoolu ya na-abụghị onye isi nchịkwa nke BAE Systems
Edepụtara ya afọ atọ n'usoro kemgbe 2017 na 'Heroes Women Role List List - Champions of Women in Business'
Na 2016, Green meriri nturu ugo Women in Technology Institute, ma webata ya na Women in Technology Hall of Fame
Na 2017, Ụlọ ọrụ ngwa ngwa aha ya bụ Green otu n'ime 100 Ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta ihe na azụmahịa maka ọrụ ya na-eme ka azụmahịa mara ike na ikike nke IBM Watson
Na February 2019, a họpụtara Green ka ọ bụrụ onye otu bọọdụ na Singapore Economic Development Board (EDB) wee mezue oge ya na Jenụwarị 2021
Na Septemba 2019, edepụtara ya #30 na ndepụta mba ụwa kachasị ike nke Fortune
Na 2019, LinkedIn ghọtara ya dị ka onye na-emetụta LinkedIn, na 2020 ekwuputara ya dị ka LinkedIn Top Voice
Kemgbe 2015, Green nọ ọdụ na Kings Business School Advisory Board, na 2020 ka akpọrọ onye isi oche nke Mission Beyond
Ọ bi na Summertown, Oxford
Ọ lụrụ Graham Clarkson na afọ 2004 na Oxfordshire, ha mutakwara ụmụ abụọ toro eto
Green nwetara OBE na nkwanye ugwu ụbọchị ọmụmụ 2010
Ọ bụ onye na-efe hatha yoga ma na-agụ ọtụtụ akwụkwọ kwa izu, na-ekwu na itinye akwụkwọ n'akwụkwọ na-enye ụzọ mgbapụ na ntụrụndụ pụọ na azụmahịa
Green ekwuola na mbụ na ọ na-ehi ụra naanị ihe dị ka awa anọ kwa ụbọchị
