Hausa (/ˈhaʊsə/; Harshen / Halshen Hausa; Ajami هَرْشَن هَوْسَ) bụ asụsụ Chadic nke ndị Hausa na Chad na-asụ, n'ime ọkara ùgwù ma karịsịa n'ime ọkara ndịda nke Naịjirịa, Ghana, Cameroon, Benin na ọkara ndịda nke Niger, na ndị ka nta na Sudan na Ivory Coast
Hausa so n'asụsụ ọdịda Chadic nke ngalaba otu asụsụ Chadic, nke n'aka nke ya bụ akụkụ nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Afroasiatic
Hausa na-egosiputa otu ihe dị ukwuu n'ebe ọ bụla a na-asụ ya
Otú ọ dị, ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ achọpụtala mpaghara asụsụ nwere ụyọkọ njirimara nke ọ bụla
Asụsụ ndị Hausa nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ gụnyere Dauranci na Daura, Kananci na Kano, Bausanci na Bauchi, Gudduranci na Katagum Misau na akụkụ nke Borno, na Hadejanci na Hadejiya

Hauwa Ali (nwụrụ na afọ 1995) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ Naijiria a ma ama maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na-enyocha ndụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị Alakụba ma na-ewelite ajụjụ gbasara ụkpụrụ ndị Alakụba na nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị
Akwụkwọ ọgụgụ ya a kacha mara amara, bụ Destiny, nwetara ihe nrite Delta maka akụkọ ifo
Amuru ya na Gusau na ugwu hausa Naijiria
Ọ kuziri ihe na Mahadum Maiduguri , e bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na ngwụcha 1980
N’afọ 1995 ọ nwụrụ site n’ọrịa ara ure
Edere akụkọ ifo ya site na echiche nke otu nwa agbọghọ na-alụbeghị di ma gosipụta agụmakwụkwọ dịka 'ọnụ ụzọ maka ọdịnihu'
Onye bụ isi n’etiti akwụkwọ ọgụgụ mbụ ya bụ Destiny (Enugu, 1988) bụ Farida dị afọ iri na isii
Otu onye nkatọ na-eme njikọ n'etiti nsogbu Farida na Islam, na-atụ aro na ọ na-egosi 'nnabata ido onwe ya n'okpuru akara aka'
Onye ọzọ na-arụ ụka megide nke a ma na-ekwusi ike na 'ọ chọghị ịda mbà' na ntinye aka ya n'ekpere, na-ahụ okwukwe ya dịka ike dị mma
Destiny e kwuru na ọ bụ nke a 'ọdịnala nke Islam MMALITEGHACHI, mgbe ijikwa ka iju ajuju ahụ n'ihi ya isiike ngwa'
A kọwawo Ali dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-ede akwụkwọ na 1990s ugwu hausa nke naijiria 'na-enye olu maka ikike okike ha' n'ime 'mgbidi nke okpukpe na ọdịbendị'
Destiny meriri ihe nrite Delta maka akụkọ ifo
Hauwa Allahbura bụ nwanyi na-eme ihe nkiri na Nollywood ma bụrụkwa onye na emepụta ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Cut24 Productions ma bụrụkwa onye mepụtara ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri gụnyere Gidi Blues (2016) The Eve (2018), and Code Wilo (2019)
Ọ bụ onye mepụtara otu Pull Up Naija, a group that is sensitizing the Nigerian youth on the modus operandi of participating actively in the election process
Hauwa Ibrahim (a mụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria bụọkàiwu maka oke mmadụ,onye nke ritere European Parliament's Sakharov Prize n'afọ 2005
A mụrụ Ibrahim na Gombe n'afọ 1968
Ọ gara ọzụzụ ị bụ onye ọka iwu ma e were ya dị ka nwanyị Alakụba mbụ na Naijiria iji nweta ọdịiche a
Ibrahim ama maka ọrụ ịgbachitere ndị mmadụ na-anaghị ego ikpe n'okpuru iwuSharịya nke islam ndị dị ire ná mpaghara ugwu nke Naijiria
Ọ gbachitere Amina Lawal, Safiya Hussaini na Hafsatu Abubákar
N’afọ 2005 e nyere ya Sakharov Prize maka ọrụ a

Hauwa a bụrụla Prọfesọ na-eleta Mahadum Saint Louis University of Law na Stonehill College, World Fellow na Mahadum Yale, Radcliffe fellow, ya na onye otu na Human Rights Programme na Islamic Legal Studies Program na Mahadum Harvard
Hauwa bụzi onye nkuzi na onye nyocha na Mahadum Harvard

Mgbe ọ bụ Radcliffe fellow, Ibrahim bidoro usoro ị dọ aka na ntị iji banye na usoro ntọala e dere ede nke iwu Sharịya ma nyochaa etu ha siri metụta ọrụ ọkaiwu, nke, n'aka nke ya, metụtakwara ikike ụmụ mmadụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na West Afrịka
Nchọpụta ya mepụtara akwụkwọ Practicing Shariah Law Seven Strategies for Achieving Justice in Shariah Courts, nke e bipụtara n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013
Hauwa Ojeifo (amụrụ n'afọ 1992) bụ onye Naijiria n'ebu agha megide idakpo mmadụ na-ike na ihụkwa maka ahụike nke akọ na uche
A maara ya dị ka nwanyị Naijiria mbụ natara onyinye Queen's Young Leader Award maka ọrụ ya
Ojeifo gara Mahadum nke Reading di na England ebe ọ nwetara nzere Master of Science na Investment Banking na Islamic Finance
N'oge ntorobịa na mmalite afọ ndụ agbọghọ ya, ọ lụsoro ịda mbà n'obi ọgụ
Na Febụwarị 2016, Ojeifo nwara igbu onwe ya
N'afọ 2014, e metọrọ ya n'ụzọ mmekọahụ
A chọpụtakwara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa uche na post traumatic stress disorder na obere psychosis
Iji gbanwee ahụmahụ ya siri ike ka ọ bụrụ ihe dị mma, o guzobere ntọala She Writes Woman na Eprel 2016
Site na ntọala ya, ọ na-enye nkwado maka ndị mmetọ mmekọahụ na ndị mmadụ nọ na West Africa chọrọ nlekọta ahụike uche

N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, n'oge Naịjirịa na-achọ ime iwu mbụ ya maka ahụike akọ na uche, a maara Ojeifo ka onye gbachitere ikike nke ndị nwere ọrịa akọ na uche, na nkwarụ psychosocial n'ihu ndị omeiwu Naịjirị, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ mere ihe dị otú a
Ewezuga ịnata onyinye Queen's Young Leader Award maka ọrụ ya na 2018, Ojeifo enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye ndị ọzọ gụnyere ndị a

Hawa Abdulrahman Ghasia (amụrụ na ọnwa 10 Jenụwarị na afọ 1966) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania nke so n'òtù Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) na-achị achị na onye omeiwu nke oge atọ maka mpaghara Mtwara Rural kemgbe na afọ 2005
Ọ bụ onye bụbu Minista nke Steeti na Ọfịs Praịm Minista maka Nchịkwa Ógbè na Gọọmentị Obodo
A mụrụ Ghasia na 10 Jenụwarị 1966
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ndanda Secondary School n'afọ 1989
O nwetara diplọma dị elu site na Institute of Development Management - Mzumbe na 1995
O nwetara nzere masta ya na Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo nke Sokoine n'afọ 2003
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ogologo oge dị ka onye na-eme atụmatụ akụ na ụba na-arụ ọrụ maka kansụl obodo Mtwara na kansụl mpaghara Maasai n'etiti afọ 1992 na afọ 2005

A họpụtara Ghasia dị ka onye CCM na-azọ ọkwa maka Mtwara Rural District na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2005, na-enweta votu 529 ma merie mmadụ anọ ndị ọzọ na-azọrọ ọkwa maka nhọpụta ahụ, gụnyere Juma Chinavati na votu 372 na onye na-achị Abdillahi Namkulala na votu 135
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, n'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya dị ka Minista nke Steeti n'ọfịs onye isi ala maka ọrụ ọha na eze na njikwa ma jee ozi n'ọrụ a ruo n'afọ 2012
N'agbata na afọ 2012 na afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista n'ọfịs Praịm Minista maka nchịkwa mpaghara na Gọọmentị Obodo

Na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2015, Ghasia nọ n'ọsọ dị nso, merie Suleiman Fadhili nke CHADEMA site na ogugu votu 24,258 na ogugu 22,615 A mara nhọpụta ya aka n'ụlọ ikpe na ndị na-arịọ arịrịọ na-ebo ebubo mmebi iwu na aghụghọ na ịtụ vootu na ịtụ voolu
E wepụrụ ikpe ahụ n'ihi na etinyela akwụkwọ ahụ otu ụbọchị n'azụ oge
Ọ nataghị ọfịs minista na ọchịchị onye isi ala ọhụrụ bụ John Magufuli
Kama nke ahụ, Ghasia bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Mmefu ego nke ndị omeiwu
Àtụ Current CCM MPs
Hawaii bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Hawawshi (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asụ Hawwaoshi; Egyptian Arabic حواوشي; IPA ) bụ nri ọdịnala ndị Ijipt
Ọ bụ pita e ji anụ e gburu egbu tinye ma tinye ya yabasị, ose, parsley, na mgbe ụfọdụ chilies
Ụdị dị iche iche nke ndị hawawshi bụ 'baladi' (ụkpụrụ) na Alexandrian
N'ọtụtụ n'ime Ijipt, a na-eme ya site na itinye anụ na achịcha ndị Ijipt dị larịị wee sie ya n'ọkụ
N'Aleksandria, a na-etinye ihe ndị ahụ n'etiti okpukpu abụọ dị gburugburu, wee sie ha n'ọkụ
Hawshi ndị Aleksandria na-enwekarị ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na ihe na-atọ ụtọ dị iche iche
Hawawshi agbasala na mba ndị ọzọ dị na Middle East na North Africa na ụfọdụ ọdịiche
Na Levant, a na-eme ya site na iji achịcha saj ma tinye ose ọkụ na-ekpo ọkụ
Na Algeria, a maara ya dị ka 'muhajib' ma na-eri ya na ofe ma ọ bụ salad yogọt
A na-emekarị Hawawshi n'ụlọ ndị Ijipt ma na-eji ya na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ụfọdụ, na-abụkarị ihe a na-ewepụta
Ọnụahịa na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị site na £ E10 ruo 30, dabere na nha na oke anụ eji eme ihe
Ọ bụ onye Ijipt na-egbu anụ aha ya bụ Ahmed al-Hawawsh chepụtara Hawawshi n'afọ 1971
Site n'ụlọ ahịa ya na mpaghara Souk Al-Tawfik na Cairo, hawawshi gbasara na Cairo wee gaa n'ebe ndị ọzọ nke Ijipt
Kemgbe ọnwụ al-Hawawsh, hawawshi aghọwo ihe a ma ama karịsịa na Sharqia Governorate na Nile Delta, ebe a na-akọ na a na-ahụ hawawshi kachasị mma
Hawo Tako (nwụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye ama ama na Somalia
Hawo Tako bụ nke Abaskuul, ezinaụlọ Jidwaaq Absame nke bi na mpaghara Middle Juba nke Somalia yana ndagwurugwu Fafan na mpaghara Somalia nke Ethiopia
Onye otu SYL, Tako sonyere na ọgba aghara 1948 na Mogadishu nke sochiri nleta nke Four-Power Commission, ebe e gburu ya
Mgbukpọ nke Mogadishu nke 1948 gbụrụ ọtụtụ mmadụ ịrị na anọ, gụnyere Hawo Tako onye nwara ichebe ndị ya
Hawona Sullivan Janzen bụ ónyé édémédé America, ónyé na-ede uri, na ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí nke bi na Minnesota
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha ọdịdị nke ịhụnanya, mfu, iru uju, na olileanya
A mụrụ Sullivan Janzen na Shreveport, Louisiana
A gụrụ uri Sullivan Janzen na National Public Radio
Ọ na-abụ abụ jazz improvisational na Sonoglyph Collective
Ọ bụ ónyé ndụmọdụ màkà Forecast Public Art na Hennepin Theatre Trust, yana ónyé nhazi gallery màkà Urban Research and Outreach Engagement Center na Mahadum Minnesota
Ọ bụ ónyé nhazi màkà usoro ọgụgụ uri nke Literary Witnesses
N'afọ 2017, o sonyere na Poetry of Resistance and Change, ébé e gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ụzọ buru ibu n'akụkụ ụlọ ọha

Ọrụ ahụ, nke Monica Sheets Larson haziri n'okpuru áhà Sister Black Press, gosipụtara ntinye nke ọtụtụ narị kaadị e bírí ebi na nnukwu akụkụ na-egosi uri sitere na Junauda Petrus, Michael Kleber-Diggs, Maitreyi Ray, Marion Gomez, na Ben Weaver

E gosipụtara uri ahụ n'èzí ụlọ ọrụ Soap Factory màkà izu atọ na 2017, e mekwara ihe omume ọha na eze nke malitere site na ịgba ịnyịnya ígwè nke ónyé na-ese ihe na-eduzi, gosipụtara ọgụgụ abụ, ma bipụta ya na ndụ site na iji ígwè obibi akwụkwọ ịnyịnya ígwè
Hayat El Ghazi (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ onye Morocco na-atụpu hama
O meriri ọla nchara na afọ 2002 na 2004 African Championships
N'afọ 2003, ọ tụbara ihe ndekọ mba nke 6043 mita
N'afọ 2007, a mara El Ghazi ikpe maka ọgwụ ọjọọ norandrosterone
E nyere ihe nlele ahụ na 10 Ọgọstụ na afọ 2006 na 2006 African Championships na Bambous, Mauritius, ebe o meriri nrite ọlaọcha na mbụ
A kwụsịtụrụ ya site na Septemba, na afọ 2006 ruo Septemba, na afọ 2008, yana mwepụ nke nsonaazụ niile ọ rụzuru kemgbe ụbọchị a nwalere ya
Hayat Lambarki (Arabic; amụrụ na 18 Mee na afọ 1988 na Safi) bụ onye Morocco na-eme egwuregwu na-agba ọsọ na 400 mita
O sonyere na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics ebe ọ ruru na ọkara ikpeazụ
Ihe kacha mma ya n'ihe omume ahụ bụ 5527 nwetara na afọ 2013 na Mersin
Hayato Fujita (藤田 勇人 Fujita Hayato, born September 20, 1986) is a Japanese professional wrestler, better known by his ring name, Fujita 'Jr' Hayato (フジタ'Jr'ハヤト)
Despite his small stature and physique for a professional wrestler, he is known for his toughness and hard shoot-style strikes
Hayatou bụ aha nke nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia

Hayatullah Khan Durrani, PP (Pashto حيا ت الله خان دراني; born 22 April 1962) is a Pakistani caver, mountaineer, environmentalist, organizer, and a rescuer He is also a part-time sports anchor actor on Pakistani television He played a significant role in the promotion of mountaineering, rock climbing, caving, canoeing, and, kayaking as adventure sports in Pakistan He is a naturalist and early advocate of preservation of Juniper forests Juniperus macropoda wilderness in Ziarat and adjacent areas in Balochistan He is the founder and President of the Pakistan Cave Research & Caving Federation (PCRCF) and the Director of the Asian Canoe Confederation (ACC)
Hayet Omri (amụrụ na Disemba 13, 1981, na Regueb) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-emepụta ihe na Tunisia
Onye bụbu onye otu Ennahda, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ndị mmadụ na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Tunisia nke afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ maka Gọọmenti Sidi Bouzid
Haywood 'Bill' Rivers (ubochí asatọ n'ọnwa Méeay 1922 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Disemba, 2001) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese foto
A mụrụ Haywood Rivers na Morven, North Carolina na Mee 8, 1922
Ọ gàrà klas nke Art Students League nkè New York, site na 1946 ruo 1949; wee gaa n'ihu na ọzụzụ ya na Ecole du Louvre na Paris, site na 1949 ruo 1952
Site na ego sitere na Rosenwald Foundation, Rivers meghere Galerie Huit, ebe ngosi màkà ndị America na-ese ihe na Paris, nke ya na ndị mmekọ ya Al Held na Jules Olitski, duziri rụo afọ ise
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-egosi ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyere Edward Clark (ónyé na-ese ihe), Herbert Gentry, na Paul Keene

Ọrụ mbụ Rivers gosipụtara na ọ maara ndị France nke ógè a na ọchịchọ ha màkà ime ka ihe dị mfe, planarity, na non-illusionism; Otú ọ dị, mgbè ọ laghachiri na United States, ọ nabatara ụzọ na-abụghị nke na-enweghị isi na eserese ma nwee mmetụta siri ike site na ụdị ndị na-ese ihe Africa America, Jacob Lawrence na Horace Pippin
Ihe ụfọdụ nọgidere na-eguzosi ike n'ọrụ Rivers, dị ka itinye ihe na-acha uhie uhie n'elu ákwà, ngosipụta dị egwu nke agba, na isiokwu sitere na ntorobịa ya na North Carolina
E gosipụtara Rivers n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwé ónyé n'ebe nka dị íchè íchè gụnyere Baltimore Museum of Art na 1948, Artist House na New York na 1973, na Anne Weber Gallery na Georgetown, Maine na 1983

E gosipụtakwara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu, n'etiti ha 'Ndị Black American Artists nke ógè a na Hudson River Museum na Yonkers, New York; Ndị Afro-American Artists' New York na Boston Museum of Fine Arts; 'Ndị Black Artists Ọgbọ Abụọ' na Newark Museum, 'Black Artist / South' na Huntsville Museum of Art na Huntsvila, Alabama, 'Ndị Artists Invite Artists' na The New York Museum, New York
Rivers natara ònyìnyé na nsọpụrụ iji kwado nkà ya Gretchen H
Hutzler Award, 1948, Baltimore Museum Annual Prize, 1948; Julius Rosenwald Fellowship, 194; na John Hay Whitney Fellowsship, 1952
Ihe osise ya so na nnukwu nchịkọta ọha na eze abụọ, Baltimore Museum of Art na Centre Pompidou
Hazel Crane (1951 – 10 Nọvemba 2003) bụ onye ama ama na-elekọta mmadụ, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye na-echeta ncheta ọnwụ ọnwụ nwụrụ na South Africa
Egburu ya na 10 Nọvemba 2003 n'akụkụ ụlọ ya dị na plush Northern Johannesburg mpaghara Abbotsford, otu mpaghara ebe egburu onye na-egwupụta akụ na ụba Brett Kebble n'afọ 2005
Amụrụ dị ka Hazel Elizabeth Magee na Belfast, Northern Ireland, ọ kwagara Rhodesia mgbe ọ bụ nwata na emechaa gaa South Afrika na ndụ okenye
Na South Afrika, o tinyere aka na kọmitii na ọrụ enyemaka dị iche iche, dị ka nkwado mmụta nke ụmụ akwụkwọ dara ogbenye
Crane lụrụbu Anthony Crane, n'agbanyeghị na e gburu ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụo na ịse na ọgụ na Rhodesia Bush War
Di na nwunye ahụ enweelarị otu nwa, na n'oge di ya nwụrụ, Crane dị ime nwa ha nke abụọ
O mechara nwee alụm di na nwunye ọgba aghara ya na onye ebubo onye isi mafia Israel Shai Avissar
N'oge e gburu ya n'afọ 1999, di na nwunye ahụ kewara
Ọ bụ ezigbo enyi Winnie Mandela, bụ onye gara olili ozu ya ma bụrụ onye akaebe kachasị na agbamakwụkwọ ya na Avissar
Crane sooro Mandela n'oge a na-anụ okwu n'ihu Truth and Reconciliation Commission

A gbagburu Crane n'ime ụgbọ ala ya na Nọvemba 2003, ka ọ na-aga na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Johannesburg ka ọ gaa ikpe ikpe nke onye isi mafia nke Israel bụ Lior Saat, boro ebubo na o gburu di Crane chụpụrụ na nso Sunninghill, Gauteng na njedebe afọ 1999
Crane na otu nwanyị ibe ya na-eme njem, onye agbagburu n'aka, mana ndị uwe ojii kpebiri na ihe ahụ merenụ bụ 'mwakpo kpọmkwem' na ndụ Crane, onye agbagburu n'isi, ụkwụ, obi na ogwe aka O mechara pụta

na a tụrụ anya na Crane ga-agba akaebe na ikpe igbu ọchụ megide Saat, na otu onye dị nso na Crane kwuru na ọ maara nke ukwuu, na-enwe ike ịchọpụta na itinye ọnụ ọgụgụ dị iche iche na ikpe igbu ọchụ Saat
Ọ bụ onye akaebe steeti nke atọ na ikpe igbu ọchụ nke Saat ebubo na otu n'ime ndị kọntaktị Saat, John van Loggerenberg, makwaara dị ka 'Johnna' gburu
A boro Van Loggerenberg ebubo na ọ bụ onye mmekọ nke Mafia Sicilian, ebubo ọ na-agọnahụ ma ọ bụ kweta

Ndị uweojii boro ebubo na ọ bụ ya kpatara ogbugbu Giulio Bascelli na Carlo Binne; A gbara Giulio Bascelli n'isi n'ime ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala gbahapụrụ obere oge ka Avassi nwụsịrị n'afọ 2000, ebe a gbagburu Carlo Binne na Gecko Lounge, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Johannesburg, n'April 2008
Mafia Sicillian nọ n'azụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ebumnuche dị elu metụtara ndị ọka iwu, ndị akaebe na ndị ọka ikpe
Ọ dịghị mgbe a mara van Loggerenberg ikpe maka igbu ọchụ ọ bụla n'ihi na enweghi ihe akaebe jikọtara ya na mpụ ndị a
Tupu ọnwụ ya, Crane na onye odeakụkọ Britain bụ David Kray na-arụkọ ọrụ n'ihe ndekọ ya
Akwụkwọ ahụ kọwara ndụ nzuzo nke Crane nke mpụ
O nwetara akụ na ụba ya site n'ịkwaba ola diamond na emeralds, na-eme azụmahịa ego ahịa ojii, inwe nkwonkwo mgbapụ na ire ihe na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ siri ike
Ọ kọkwara ka o si banye mgbanaka nzuzo na South Africa na nzukọ ya na onye isi mpụ n'okpuru ala 'Johnna' iji kparịta maka nchekwa ya na ụzọ ụgbọ mmiri ya
Tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ mpụ, ọ zụrụ azụ dị ka onye nọọsụ edebanyere aha steeti na Rhodesia
ọgụgụ ndị ọzọ
Hazel Gertrude Jenkins bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye bụbu onye isi ala nke mpaghara Northern Cape
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ala site na Mee, na afọ 2009 ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị n'ụzọ iwu n'ọnwa Eprel, na afọ 2013, mgbe ọ dara ọrịa strok
E meriri mmeghachi omume iji kweta na ọ ga-agbadata dịka onye isi ala (n'ihe gbasara ahụike) na ntuli aka nke ndị omeiwu na 30 Eprel, na afọ 2013 ka Jenkins wee nọgide na-abụ onye isi ala
N'ihi ya, a ṅụrụ Sylvia Lucas iyi na 30 Eprel ọ bụghị dị ka onye nọchiri Jenkins kama dị ka onye isi ala
Jenkins mechara gbaa arụkwaghịm, ka ọ na-erule 22 Mee 2013, na-emeghe ụzọ maka Lucas ka a ṅụọ iyi dị ka onye nọchiri ya na 23 Mee, na afo 2013
N'ịbụ onye dị afọ iri anọ na itoolu n'oge ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye isi ala, Jenkins bụ onye isi obodo nke Pixley ka Seme (nke bụbu Bo Karoo) District Municipality, na De Aar na Karoo
N'oge gara aga ọ bụ onye nkuzi
A mụrụ ya na 6 Juun, na afọ 1960 na Ceres na Western Cape, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Worcester, na-abanye na Esselen Park High School
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma nkuzi na Bellville Training College, na ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Rocklands High School na Mitchell's Plain, Cape Town
Jenkins bụ onye ndụmọdụ ndị ntorobịa na Chọọchị Anglican
N'afọ 1995, a họpụtara Jenkins dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na De Aar's Emthanjeni Local Municipality, na-aga n'ihu na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi obodo maka Bo-Karoo District Municipality
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke South African Local Government Association

N'afọ 2009, mgbe mmeri siri ike nke African National Congress na-achị na ntuli aka n'ozuzu, a mara ọkwa Jenkins dị ka onye nnọchiteanya nke pati ahụ maka onye isi ala nke Northern Cape, na-anọchi Dipuo Peters
Nkwupụta ahụ dọtara nkatọ site n'aka alaka ANC nke mpaghara ahụ, Otú ọ dị, nke were iwe na onye isi oche ya bụ John Block
Jenkins kwuru n'oge ahụ, sị 'Anyị ga-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndị agha jikọrọ aka

N'adịghị ka ihe ụfọdụ nwere ike ikwu banyere onye isi ala ịbụ nwa bebi na eriri, anyị ga-arụ ọrụ dị ka otu' Block kwere nkwa nkwado ya, na-agbakwụnye na 'M ka bụ onye isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Province ma soro PEC (Provincial Executive Council) nyere aka ma na eduzie Jenkins na ndị ọzọ nọ na Executive Council'
Ọchịchị ya malitere na 6 Mee, na afọ 2009
Jenkins dara, na-arịa ọrịa strok, mgbe ọ na-enye ya na afọ 2012 State of the Province Address na Kimberley na 17 Febụwarị, na afọ 2012, a nabatara ya na ngalaba nlekọta siri ike na Kimberly Hospital

Ndị isi oche nke mpaghara ahụ zutere na 20 Febụwarị, jiri otu olu kpebie ịhọpụta MEC maka agụmakwụkwọ, Ms Grizelda Cjiekella, dị ka onye na-anọchite anya onye isi ala maka oge ezumike ezumike ezughi oke
Onye isi ala Jenkins, mgbe ọ nọrọ ogologo oge n'ụlọ ọgwụ, mere ihe ijuanya mbụ pụtara n'ihu ọha na nzukọ ntuli aka nke Northern Cape ANC na Upington na 7 Juun, na afọ 2012
'Ọ dị ka onye nwere ahụike,' ka mgbasa ozi kọrọ, 'na-abụ abụ ma na-agba egwu na Onye isi ala Jacob Zuma na ndị ọzọ so n'òtù ndị isi
n'Apriel 2, na afọ 2013, Hazel Jenkins si n'ọkwa onye isi ala nke Northern Cape pụta ma Sylvia Lucas, Minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, ga-anọchi ya
Otú ọ dị, a na-emegide mmegharị ahụ iji kweta na Jenkins na-agbadata n'ihi usoro
Otu ntuli aka na ndị omeiwu Northern Cape na 30 Eprel na afọ 2013, nke ndị otu mmegide COPE na Democratic Alliance sonyere na ya, enwetaghị nkwado abụọ n'ụzọ atọ achọrọ maka mmegharị ahụ
N'ihi ya, Jenkins nọgidere na-abụ onye isi ala ma ṅụọ Lucas iyi n'otu ụbọchị ahụ dị ka onye nọchiri Grizelda Cjiekella dị ka onye isi ala nke mpaghara ahụ
Jenkins gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye isi ala site na 22 Mee, na afọ 2013, na-emeghe ụzọ Lucas ga-aṅụ iyi dị ka onye nọchiri ya

Hazel Natasha Nali (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ, onye na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-edebe goolu maka Fatih Vatan Spor na Turkish Women's Super League na Zambia
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka ndị otu mba dị elu na afọ 2014 African Women's Championship na afo 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations, na afọ 2020 COSAFA Women's Championships, na 2020 Summer Olympics
Na klọb, Nali agbaala bọọlụ na Zambia maka Chibolya Queens na Lusaka, maka Nchanga Queens na Chingola, maka Indeni Roses na Ndola, na maka Green Buffaloes na Lusaka
Na Machị na afọ 2020, ọ meriri FAZ Women Super division na Green Buffaloes
N'ọnwa Nọvemba na afọ 2020, Nali sonyeere klọb Israel Hapoel Be'er Sheva bụ ndị na-asọmpi na Ligat Nashim na nkwekọrịta otu afọ
Ọ malitere egwuregwu ọ bụla mbụ nke oge ahụ, na egwuregwu nke isii ha, debere akwụkwọ mbụ ya dị ọcha iji nyere klọb ahụ aka inweta mmeri mbụ ha n'oge ahụ, na-eti Hapoel Ra'anana 2o0
Na Machị na afọ 2022, ọ kwagara Turkey wee sonye na klọb Fatih Vatan Spor nke dị na Istanbul iji gbaa bọọlụ na ọkara nke abụọ nke oge Super League nke ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2021-22
Nali gbara bọọlụ maka ndị otu Zambia na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa na 2014 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
Ọ gbara egwuregwu atọ niile maka Zambia, Italy meriri ya na Venezuela n'ụzọ 0 na 4 tupu ya emeri Costa Rica n'ụzọ 1
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2014, a kpọrọ Nali aha maka ndị isi Zambia maka asọmpi 2014 African Women's Championship
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, a kpọrọ Nali maka afo 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations
N'ọnwa Nọvemba na afọ 2020, a kpọrọ Nali maka asọmpi COSAFA Women's Championship nke afọ 2020
N'ọnwa Julaị na afọ 2021, a kpọrọ Nali maka ndị otu Zambia maka na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics
Hazel Rodney Blackman (1921-2014) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ejiji, ónyé na-ese ihe, na onye na-ise ihe
A maara ya nke ọma màkà iwebata akwa Africa n'ime ejiji America na 1960s na 1970s
A mụrụ Hazel Blackman Hazel Hyscinth Rodney na Kingston, Jamaica na 1921, nwa George na Alphasenia Rodney
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ iri na otu, gụnyere ụmụnne nwoke Winston, Neville, Karl na ụmụnne nwanyị Ivy, Joyce, Winifred na Marcia
Ọ tolitere na Slipe Pen Road, n'ọbọdọ Cross Roads Neighborhood
N'ógbè ahụ, ọ na-ezute Marcus Garvey na ndị otu Universal Negro Improvement Association, nke isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Edelweiss Park dị nso
Nna nna ya, George Rodney, nwèrè ngwaahịa na Garveyás Black Star Line, njikọ nke ga-apụta n'ọrụ ya mgbe e mesịrị
Blackman kọwara nne ya dị ka nnukwu nsị
Blackman malitere itinye ihe ngosi ejiji n'oge ọ dị na 1952, mgbè o nyèrè ihe ngosi nke ihe osise burlap nke akpọrọ 'Aventures in Cotton'
N'afọ 1967, ọ rịọrọ màkà ndụmọdụ, o kwuru, ndị na-emepụta ejiji ndị ojii kwesịrị ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ma mgbe ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ banye n'ime ejiji, ọbụlagodi na ọ na-ebibi eriri
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'afọ 2005, Blackman kwùrù, na-eme ka akwa dị ike dị ka ịgba egwú, ma gosipụta na akwa akwa bụ nke ikpeazụ n'ime ihe omume m
O mere ọtụtụ akụkọ, gụnyere ndị gosipụtara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Jamaica, dị ka uwe ya The Black Star Liner, nke na-egosi ụgbọ mmírí sitere na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ mmírí Marcus Garvey
Akpụkpọ ahụ ya, nke na-egosi Garvey na eze ukwu Etiopia Haile Selassie, dị na nchịkọta nke Liberty Hall Ihe nketa nke Marcus Garvey, ébé ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na Kingston
Otu n'ime akwa Blackman gosipụtara na mkpuchi nke Patchwork Poetry & Prose na Papers & Pictures Anthology (1999) nke Dale Benjamin Drakeford
A na-egosipụta ọtụtụ n'ime uri mbụ Blackman na anthology
Blackman dekwara akụkọ ndụ onwé ónyé a na-ebipụtaghị ebipụta nke akpọrọ My Romance with Paint and Fabrics
Blackman laghachiri Jamaica mgbe ọ biri ọtụtụ iri afọ na Bronx, New York, mgbè ahụ na Tampa, Florida
Ọ nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ 93 ma lie ya na Dovecot Memorial Park na Kingston, Jamaica
Hdi (Hedi, Xədi, Tur) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nke Cameroon na Nigeria
Na Cameroon, a na-asụ Hdi naanị n'otu obodo n'ókè Naịjirịa akpọroTourou (arrondissement of Mokolo, ngalaba Mayo-Tsanaga, Far North Region) site na otu puku ndị na-ekwu okwu
A na-asụkarị ya na Naijiria
Asụsụ Hdi na Mabas nwere njikọ chiri anya, mana ha bụ asụsụ kwụrụ onwe ya

Kemgbe mmalite ya na United Nations, na ụbọchị 20 Septemba n'afọ 2014, site n'aka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke UN Ban Ki-moon na onye nnọchi anya UN Women Global Goodwill Ambassador Emma Watson, ọtụtụ nde ụmụnwoke si gburugburu ụwa gụnyere ndị isi ala, ndị isi oche, na ndị na-egbuke egbuke zuru ụwa niile agbaala mbọ maka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị

Na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ HeForShe, map geo-locating na-edekọ mmekọrịta zuru ụwa ọnụ nke mmegharị ahụ site na ịgụta ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwoke na ụmụnwanyị gburugburu ụwa bụ ndị kwere nkwa maka atụmatụ HeForShe, na-edebanye aha ihe karịrị nde 21 n'ịntanetị n'ụwa niile
HeForShe, nke a na-akpọkarị He for She, bụ otu njikọ aka maka ọganihu nke ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị, nke United Nations malitere

Dabere n'echiche na enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị bụ okwu na-emetụta mmadụ niile, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, HeForShe bụ mgbalị zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-achọ itinye ụmụnwoke na ụmụnwoke n'inweta nha nhata site n'ime ihe megide echiche na omume nwoke na nwanyị na-adịghị mma
Akara ya na-anọchite anya njikọ nke ụmụnwanyị na ụmụnwoke na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji nweta nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị, site na ijikọta akụkụ nke akara nwanyị na nwoke

Kemgbe mmalite ya na United Nations, n'ụbọchị 20 Septemba 2014, site n'aka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke UN Ban Ki-moon na onye nnọchi anya UN Women Global Goodwill Ambassador Emma Watson, ọtụtụ nde ụmụnwoke si gburugburu ụwa gụnyere ndị isi ala, ndị isi oche, na ndị na-egbuke egbuke zuru ụwa niile agbaala mbọ maka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị

Na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ HeForShe, map geo-locating na-edekọ mmekọrịta zuru ụwa ọnụ nke mmegharị ahụ site na ịgụta ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụnwoke na ụmụnwanyị gburugburu ụwa bụ ndị kwere nkwa maka atụmatụ HeForShe, na-edebanye aha ihe karịrị nde 21 n'ịntanetị n'ụwa niile

Mgbe ọ na-amalite mmegharị ahụ na Septemba 2014, onye nnọchi anya Global Goodwill Emma Watson kwuru okwu na isi ụlọ ọrụ United Nations na New York City, na-elekwasị anya na mkpali onwe onye na ọkachamara maka ịmepụta HeForShe
Okwu ahụ gara n'ihu ma ugbu a nwere nde mmadụ 38 na YouTube

HeForShe na-ezo aka na ọmụmụ ihe na-egosi na afọ 257 ọzọ ga-adị mkpa iji mechie ọdịiche nwoke na nwanyị, nakwa na 95% nke ndị isi oche ụwa na ndị isi ala bụ ụmụnwoke iji gosipụta mkpa ọ dị maka mmekọ nwoke

Ha na-arụ ụka na nkwa nke ụmụ nwoke nwere ike na ihe ùgwù nwere ike ịbụ nnukwu egwuregwu na-agbanwe maka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị, ma nwee olileanya na akụkọ ụmụ mmadụ yana ngwọta a pụrụ ịgbatị, nke a nwapụtara ga-enye ụzọ iji nwee ọganihu ma nyere aka ịmepụta mmegharị ụmụnwoke siri ike maka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị
Emere ihe omume pụrụ iche iji malite HeForShe movement na 20 Septemba nke afọ 2014 na isi ụlọ ọrụ United Nations dị na New York City

Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya UN Women Goodwill Ambassador Emma Watson kwadoro ya, onye okwu ya banyere oku ya itinye ụmụnwoke na ụmụnwoke n'ịkwalite ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na-ekesa n'ọtụtụ ebe site na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze
Vidio nke mmalite ahụ nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri na otu n'ịntanetị ma enwere nde 11 #HeForShe tweets site n'aka ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ 750,000 dị iche iche n'ime izu abụọ
Twitter kpọrọ aha mmeghe ahụ dị ka oge catalytic nke afọ 2014 ma tee hashtag na mgbidi ya na HQ ya
N'ihe omume ahụ, UN Women kpọrọ oku ka ha kpọkọta ụmụnwoke 100,000 mbụ na mmegharị ahụ, ihe mgbaru ọsọ ruru nke ọma n'ime naanị ụbọchị atọ

Onye bụbu onye isi ala United States bụ Barack Obama, onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Matt Damon, onye na-agụ egwu bụ Harry Styles, na onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke UN bụ António Guterres so n'ime ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke a ma ama gosipụtara na saịtị ahụ

As of July 2020[update] na-erule Julaị [update], ihe karịrị mmadụ 220 000 emeela ihe n'ịntanetị na India, 200 000 na Rwanda, 170 000 na Democratic Republic of Congo, 150 000 na US na 130 000 na Mexico
Onye isi nchịkwa UN Women's Executive Director Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka malitere HeForShe ma bụrụ onye isi ndụmọdụ ya bụ Elizabeth Nyamayaro duziri ya ruo n'afọ 2019
Kemgbe ahụ, Edward Wageni, onye bụbu onye nduzi nke Save The Children International Kenya na-edu HeForShe

N'ụbọchị nke 23 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2015, UN Women malitere atụmatụ HeForShe IMPACT 10x10x10 iji nwetakwuo ume n'ịkwalite ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na ike ụmụnwanyị n'afọ 2015 World Economic Forum na Davos
Atụmatụ HeForShe Champions bụ usoro ihe omume pụrụ iche nke na-etinye ndị isi ụwa iri, ndị isi ụwa iri na ndị isi mahadum iri iji dozie ụfọdụ n'ime nsogbu nwoke na nwanyị kachasị mkpa taa
Onye mmeri ọ bụla emeela nkwa atọ a kapịrị ọnụ, nke a na-atụle ma na-agbanwe agbanwe iji nweta nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị
Nkwa na-enweghị mgbagha nke HeForShe Champions na-enye ndu dị mkpa iji ruo ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na ọha mmadụ
Ndị isi ụwa na-eje ozi dị ka ndị mmeri ntọala gụnyere onye bụbu HE
President Ernest Bai Koroma nke Sierra Leone; HE
Prime Minister Stefan Löfvén nke Sweden; Paul Polman, onye bụbu CEO nke Unilever; Rick Goings, onye bụbu onye isi oche na CEO nke Tupperware Brands Corporation

N'afọ 2016, a malitere atụmatụ Thematic Champions iji tinye ndị isi ụwa ọnụ, bụ ndị na-eme ka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị bụrụ ihe dị mkpa site na mmejuputa otu nkwa obi ike, na-agbanwe egwuregwu iji kwalite ma nweta nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị
Ka ọ na-erule Julaị 2020, ndị Thematic Champions gụnyere Justin Trudeau, PM si Canada; Jean-Laurent Bonnafé, CEO nke BNP Paribas; Bruce Cleaver, CEO si De Beers Group

Dị ka akụkụ nke atụmatụ ndị a, HeForShe anọwo na-enwe nzukọ kwa afọ kemgbe afọ 2015, ebe HeForShe Champions zuru ụwa ọnụ site na atụmatụ abụọ ahụ na ndị ọzọ a ma ama na-egosi ngwọta ha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na ụwa

E mepụtara HeForShe Proven Solution on How to Achieve Parity in Global Leadership dị ka ọtụtụ òtù HeForShe Champions gụnyere Price Waterhouse Coppers, World Bank, McKinsey & Company bụ ndị niile mụbara nnọchi anya ụmụnwanyị na ndị otu ndu ha zuru ụwa ọnụ, na-edepụta okporo ụzọ maka òtù ndị ọzọ
Ngwọta ndị a na-edozi ọtụtụ nsogbu, gụnyere imechi ọdịiche ịkwụ ụgwọ nwoke na nwanyị, ịkwụsị ime ihe ike metụtara nwoke na nwanyị na mmekọahụ, na inweta nha n'etiti ọha mmadụ

The HeForShe Male Allies Guide for Gender Equality – Tips for Understanding and Managing Your Emotions, e wuru na mmemme nke Gọọmentị Finland, onye HeForShe IMPACT Champion, malitere iji debanye aha ndị agha iji gbochie ime ihe ike megide ụmụnwanyị

Iji mee ka a mara banyere ihe ịma aka nhata nwoke na nwanyị dịka ibu uche, ime ihe ike na ịkpa ókè gbasara nwoke na nwanyị, na itinye ụmụnwoke na mkparịta ụka ahụ, HeForShe na-eme mkpọsa mgbe niile na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze n'akụkụ mgbasa ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ndị a gụnyere Ihe Anyị Na-ekerịta Dị Ike Karịa Ihe Na-ekewa Anyị, #MorePowerfulTogether, #YearOfMaleAllyship na #HeForSheAtHome

N'ịbụ nke amalitere n'ọnwa Septemba 2018, mkpọsa #MorePowerfulTogether kpọrọ akara ngosi gburugburu ụwa, ọkachasị The Empire State Building na New York City, Burj Khalifa na Dubai, na CN Tower na Toronto, ka ha gbanyụọ ọkara ọkụ ha iji gosipụta ike furu efu mgbe ụmụnwanyị na-anọghị n'okpuru ọha mmadụ, akụ na ụba na obodo

Dị ka mmeghachi omume maka ọrịa COVID-19, ka enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị, ọkachasị nke ụmụnwanyị nọ n'ụlọ, bịara pụta ìhè ma a bịa n'ọrụ ụlọ, ihicha na ilekọta ụmụaka, ndị ọrịa ma ọ bụ ndị agadi, HeForShe malitere mkpọsa #HeForSheAtHome iji kpalie ụmụ nwoke iji nyere aka dozie ibu n'ụlọ ha
N'ịkọ akụkọ banyere ndị nlereanya nwoke dị mma na-ekerịta ọrụ n'ụlọ site n'akụkụ ụwa niile, #HeForSheAtHome na-achọ ịkpali ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ime òkè ha ziri ezi na ibelata ibu uche ụmụnwanyị
A pụrụ ịhụ ihe ịga nke ọma nke HeForShe site na ọtụtụ omume Civil Society na mmetụta n'ụwa niile
E guzobere HeForShe Taverns na South Africa niile iji malite mkparịta ụka ya na ụmụnwoke banyere iso ụmụ nwanyị na-emekọ ihe n'emeghị ihe n'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ebe ọ bụ na ha bụkarị ụmụ nwoke

Ụmụ akwụkwọ na-etinye aka nke ukwuu, dịka a haziri njem #GetFree na mahadum niile iji mee ka echiche ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na North America, na ihe karịrị otu narị klọb ụmụ akwụkwọ HeForShe na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ụwa niile
Civil Society nwere ike itinye aka site na ntanetị HeForShe Action Kit

HeForShe anọwo na-esonyere ọtụtụ òtù iji kwalite ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na egwuregwu, gụnyere Valencia Club de Fútbol (CF), otu n'ime ndị isi egwuregwu bọọlụ Europe na Fenerbahçe Sports Club, otu n'ime klọb egwuregwu kachasị ewu ewu na Turkey
Ndị HeForShe Champions na-etinyekwa aka site n'ịkwalite mmata banyere ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị site na ihe omume egwuregwu ha dịka Danone Nations Cup na BNP Paribas Tennis Open
N'ọnwa Septemba 23, 2021, HeForShe kwupụtara mmalite nke HeForShe Alliance, na-egosi oge ọhụrụ nke nkwa ime ihe na-agbaso nzọụkwụ nke Generation Equality Forum
Ndị otu ọhụrụ
Site na Business Bruce Cleaver, CEO, De Beers Group, Yannick Bolloré, Chairman of Vivendi's Supervisory Board and CEO and Chairman of Havas Group, John A
Zecca, Global Chief Legal & Regulatory Officer, Nasdaq, Bob Sternfels, Global Managing Partner, McKinsey & Company, Bob Moritz, Global Chairman, PwC International Limited na Nick Read, CEO, Vodafone

Site na Non-profit Robert Mardini, Director-General, International Committee of the Red Cross, David Miliband, CEO & President, International Rescue Committee, David Haggerty, President, International Tennis Federation, Kate Robertson & David Jones, Founders, One Young World
Site na Academia Dr
Wayne A
Frederick, President, Howard University na Ilian Mihov, Dean, INSEAD
Okwu gbasara ime ihe ike na enweghị nhata megide ụmụnwanyị, ọkachasị n'ọnọdụ mwakpo, nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe ike na-ekwu na a na-agbanwe ọrụ ahụ site na onye omekome gaa na onye a na-emegbu
Okwu Watson na-elekwasị anya n'ụzọ ụmụ nwoke nwere ike isi rụọ ọrụ n'ịkwalite ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akụ na ụba, na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke nwoke na nwanyị
A katọrọ okwu Watson maka ilekwasị anya naanị na ụmụnwanyị ma na-eleghara ịkpa oke mmekọahụ megide ụmụ nwoke anya ma mee ka enweghị nhata ọ na-agbalị ikpochapụ

Mmesi ike nke Watson na ịdabere na ụmụnwanyị na nkwado ụmụ nwoke na-eduga na nkatọ na HeForShe na-enye ụmụnwoke ọrụ na-eduga na mkpọsa ahụ, na-ewusi ike ma na-eme ka enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị dịgide

Ọ bụ ezie na HeForShe anọchitere anya nsogbu LGBTQ + n'akụkụ mgbasa ozi nwanne nwanyị United Nations Free & Equal, ụfọdụ ekwuputala nchegbu na aha mmegharị ahụ na-ahapụ ndị na-abụghị ndị abụọ, transgender, na ndị na-ahụ maka nwoke na nwanyị, na mmesi ike nke ọnụọgụ abụọ nwoke na nwanyị
Ndị feminists ndị ọzọ katọrọ Watson maka ịbụ onye nwere ihe ùgwù, ọgaranya, na onye ọcha, mana ọ na-ekwu okwu n'aha ụmụ nwanyị na-adabaghị na ụdị ahụ
Nkatọ ndị ọzọ nke ndị feminists sochiri mgbe Watson kwusịrị okwu ya

Otu nkatọ, nke e bipụtara na The New York Times, bụ n'ihi aha mkpọsa ahụ, HeForShe, na Watson na-arịọ ụmụ nwoke ka ha kwe nkwa ime ihe megide ụdị ime ihe ike na ịkpa ókè niile ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ na-eche ihu, mana n'akọwaghị nsogbu na-emetụta ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwoke

A katọkwara aha mkpọsa ahụ n'ihi ihe ọ pụtara na ụmụ nwoke ekwesịghị iche banyere feminism n'ihi na ọ nwere ike imezi ihe maka ha, kama, ha kwesịrị iche banyere feminism n'ihi na ọ ga-eme ka ihe ka ụmụ nwanyị ka mma, nakwa na a na-ese ụmụ nwoke dị ka ndị nzọpụta ụmụ nwanyị
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Elle, Watson zara nkatọ nke ndị inyom ndị ọzọ, na-ekwu na 'Ọ na-esiri ike ịnụ nkatọ site n'aka ndị ị na-ewere dị ka ndị ọgbọ gị na ndị ị kwenyere na ha nọ n'otu akụkụ

Ọ zaghachiri site n'ikwu na okwu ahụ bụ 'feminism' ejikọtala ya na 'ịkpọ mmadụ asị' karịa ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị ma kwuo n'ihu na enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị na-emetụta ma ụmụ nwoke ma ụmụ nwanyị n'ihi echiche nwoke na nwanyị nakwa na ọ bụ ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ
Watson na-ekwusi ike na mgbasa ozi HeforShe ga-ewusi ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị ike site na itinye ma ụmụ nwanyị ma ụmụ nwoke gburugburu ụwa n'ịkwado ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị
Ahụike, dị ka Òtù Ahụ Ike Ụwa si kwuo, bụ 'ọnọdụ nke ọdịmma anụ ahụ, nke uche na nke ọha mmadụ, ọ bụghị nanị na enweghi ọrịa na adịghị ike'
A na-eji nkọwa dị iche iche mee ihe maka ebumnuche dị iche iche ka oge na-aga

Enwere ike ịkwalite ahụike site n'ịgba ume mmemme ahụike, dị ka mmega ahụ mgbe niile na ihi ụra zuru oke, na site n'ibelata ma ọ bụ zere omume ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ adịghị mma, dị ka ise siga ma ọ bụ oke nrụgide

Ụfọdụ ihe na-emetụta ahụ ike bụ n'ihi nhọrọ ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, dị ka ma ọ ga-etinye aka n'omume dị ize ndụ, ebe ndị ọzọ bụ n'ihi ihe nhazi, dị ka ma a na-ahazi ọha mmadụ n'ụzọ na-eme ka ọ dịkwuo mfe ma ọ bụ na-esiri ndị mmadụ ike ịnweta
ọrụ nlekọta ahụike dị mkpa
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ihe ndị ọzọ karịrị ma nhọrọ nke onye ọ bụla na nke otu, dị ka ọrịa mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa

Nlekọta ahụike ma ọ bụ nlekọta ahụike bụ nkwalite ahụike site na mgbochi, nyocha, ọgwụgwọ, nkwalite, ma ọ bụ ọgwụgwọ ọrịa, ọrịa, mmerụ ahụ, na nkwarụ anụ ahụ na nke uche ndị ọzọ na ndị mmadụ Ndị ọkachamara ahụike na ngalaba ahụike jikọrọ aka na-enye nlekọta ahụike Ọgwụ, dentistry, ụlọ ọgwụ, midwifery, nọọsụ, optometry, audiology, akparamaagwa, ọgwụgwọ ọrụ, ọgwụgwọ anụ ahụ, ọzụzụ egwuregwu, na ọrụ ahụike ndị ọzọ bụ akụkụ nke nlekọta ahụike Ọ na-agụnye ọrụ a rụrụ n'inye nlekọta mbụ, nlekọta nke abụọ, na nlekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, yana ahụike ọha
Ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ Eco Health ) bụ ngalaba na amalite nke ọmụmụ na-eme nyocha ka mgbanwe na gburugburu ụwa si emetụta ahụike mmadụ
Ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi na-enyocha mgbanwe na gburugburu ebe obibi ndụ, anụ ahụ, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nke akụ na ụba ma jikọta mgbanwe ndị a na ahụike mmadụ
Ihe atụ nke mgbanwe ndị a na mmetụta ha bara ụba

Ihe atụ ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere mmụba n'ọnụọgụ ụkwara ume ọkụ n'ihi mmetọ ikuku, mmetọ PCB nke game fish na nnukwu ọdọ mmiri nke United States, na nkewa ebe obibi na ebute mbawanye n'ọnụọgụ ọrịa Lyme na-a

Usoro gburugburu ebe obibi metụtara ahụike, ma ọ bụ ahụike gburugburu, pụtara dị ka ngalaba nyocha na itinye n'ọrụ na afo ndị 1990, nke bụ isi site na nyocha zuru ụwa ọnụ nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Nchọpụta Development Development na Ottawa (IDRC), Canada (Lebel, 2003) kwadoro

Otú ọ dị, nke a bụ mwuli nke metụtara ahụike na gburugburu ebe obibi nke nwere ike Ichehachi azụ, na obodo ndị dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ, na Hippocrates, na ọtụtụ oge mbụ na obodo ndị dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ

Usoro a pụtara nke ọma n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ na iri na iteghete, mana ọ dabara n'enweghị ihu ọma na narị afọ nke iri abụọ, mgbe e chere na ọkachamara nka na nka zuru oke iji mesoo ahụike na ọrịa
N'oge a dị mkpirikpi, e kenyere nleba anya mmetụta ahụike mmadụ na-adịghị mma nke mgbanwe gburugburu ebe obibi (ma gburugburu ebe obibi na nke e wuru) na ngalaba ọgwụ na ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi
Otu ọgwụ, dị ka ndị ọkà mmụta na ndị ọkachamara dị ka Calvin Schwabe kwadoro, bụ nke a na-elekarị anya dị ka ọrụ dị n'akụkụ

Ụzọ ejikọtara ọnụ na ahụike na gburugburu ebe obibi maliteghachiri na afo ndị 1990, ma gụnye otu ahụike, ọgwụ nchekwa ahụike, nkwụsi ike nke gburugburu ebe obibi, iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe nke gburugburu ebe obibi, obodo banyere ahụike, na ọtụtụ ụzọ ndị ọzọ

Mmegharị ọhụrụ a nwere ike ịdọrọ na ọdịnala nke sitere na Hippocrates, Rudolf Virchow na Louis Pasteur, bụ ndị na-aghọtaghị ókè dị n'etiti ọgwụ mmadụ na anụmanụ, na mgbanwe gburugburu ebe obibi na nke ọha mmadụ; nye William Osler, onye bụ onye so na ngalaba ahụike McGill na nke Montreal Veterinary College ; Calvin Schwabe, onye akwụkwọ 1984, Ọgwụ anụmanụ na ahụike mmadụ, bụ ihe a ma ama na ngalaba a; na James Steele, onye tọrọ ntọala ngalaba ahụike ọha na eze mbụ na United States
Ụzọ ahụike Eco dị ka a na-eme ugbu a bụ ntinye aka, usoro dabeere na usoro iji ghọta na ịkwalite ahụike na ọdịmma n'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ihe dị iche iche na ụzọ ndị a si na ntinye aka na mbụ bụ ntọala siri ike na echiche mgbagwoju anya na sayensị post-nkịtị (Waltner-Toews, 2004; Waltner-Toews et al, 2008 )

Ọ bụ ezie na òtù dị iche iche na-akwalite ụzọ ntinye aka dị ka one Health, onye isi ntunye ego na onye na-akwalite ahụike Eco karịsịa, n'ụwa nile, bụ International Development Research Center na Ottawa ( https //webarchiveorg/web/20100126030738 ) /http //wwwidrcca/ecohealth/ )

Mgbe afọ iri nke ogbako mba ụwa na North America na Australia n'okpuru nche anwụ na-akawanye njọ nke ' ahụ ike gburugburu ebe obibi ', nke mbụ 'ecosystem approach to human health' (Eco Health) forum e mere na Montreal na 2003, sochiri ogbako na forums na Wisconsin
, US, na Mérida, Mexico, ha niile nwere nkwado siri ike sitere na IDRC
Kemgbe ahụ International Association for Ecology and Health, na akwụkwọ akụkọ Eco Health eguzobewo ogige ahụ dị ka ọrụ mmụta na mmepe ziri ezi
Ọmụmụ ahụike gburugburu a dị iche na ọdịnala, ọmụmụ ọzụzụ otu
Ọmụmụ ọrịa na-efe efe nke ọdịnala nwere ike igosi ọnụọgụ ịba na-abawanye na mpaghara, mana ọ bụghị ịkọwa etu ma ọ bụ ihe kpatara ọnụọgụ ahụ ji na-abawanye
Nnyocha ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi nwere ike ịkwado ịgbasa ọgwụ pesticide n'ụdị ụfọdụ n'akụkụ ụfọdụ iji belata mgbasa
Nyocha gbasara akụ na ụba nwere ike gbakọọ ọnụ ahịa na ịdị irè kwa dollar ejiri mee ihe na mmemme dị otú ahụ
Ọmụmụ ahụike Eco na-eji ụzọ dị iche
Ọ na-achịkọta ọtụtụ ọzụzụ ọkachamara yana ndị otu obodo ọ metụtara tupu ọmụmụ ihe amalite
Site na ọmụmụ ihe tupu ọmụmụ ihe, otu ahụ na-ekerịta ihe ọmụma ma nakwere asụsụ nkịtị
Nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe ndị a na-ebutekarị ụzọ okike na nke ọhụrụ ma nwee ike ibute n'ihe ngwọta 'na-ewuli elu n'obodo'
Ndị na-ahụ maka ahụike Eco na-akpọ ya transdisciplinary synergy wee kewapụ ya na ọmụmụ ihe mmụta multidiscipline

Ọmụmụ ahụike gburugburu kpọkwara nsonye nke ndị otu niile sokwunyerenu ihe nke gụnyerekwara ndị na-eme mkpebi ma kwenye na okwu nha anya (n'etiti okike, klaasị mmekọrịta ọha na eze, afọ na ọbụna ụdị) dị mkpa iji ghọta nke ọma nsogbu a ga-amụ
Jean Lebel (2003) kpọpụtara transdisciplinary, nsonye na nha anya dịka ihe Mgbafọ ukwu atọ nke Eco Health (Lebel, 2003)
IDRC na-ekwu ugbu a maka ụkpụrụ isii, kama usoro atọ, ya bụ transdisciplinary, nsonye, okike na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, echiche usoro, nkwusosike na nyocha-na-eme ihe (Charron, 2011)
Otu ihe atụ bara uru nke gburugburu ebe obibi ahụike bụ njikwa ịba na Mexico
Usoro ọzụzụ dị iche iche nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịkwụsị iji DDT dị oké ike na ahụ ma na-ebelatakwa ọrịa ịba
Ọmụmụ ihe a na-ekpughe ma ọdịdị nke mmekọrịta dị mgbagwoju anya nke nsogbu ahụ na ókè nke ngwọta na-aga nke ọma ga-agafe na usoro nyocha
Ngwọta ahụ gụnyere echiche okike n'akụkụ nke ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ, ma mepụta ọnọdụ mmeri maka ndị nchọpụta, azụmahịa na nke kachasị mkpa, maka obodo

Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ n'ime mmetụta dị egwu nke mgbanwe gburugburu ebe obibi na ọtụtụ n'ime nyocha a na-elekwasị anya na mba ndị na-emepe emepe, gburugburu ebe obibi nke gburugburu ebe obibi na obodo mepere emepe nke ụwa mepere emepe bụkwa isi ihe ahụike mmadụ lekwasaraanya
Oke ibu, ọrịa shuga, ụkwara ume ọkụ, na ọrịa obi na-emetụta kpọmkwem ka ụmụ mmadụ si emekọrịta ihe na gburugburu ebe obibi obodo mepere emepe nke ha bi na ya
Nhazi na atụmatụ ime obodo na-agbado ukwu iji ụgbọ ala, nhọrọ nri dị, ọkwa mmetọ ikuku na nchekwa na njem nke agbataobi ndị mmadụ bi

Enwere ike ịchọta ihe atụ ndị ọzọ nke usoro ahụike ebe obibi site na-nchikọta ọha na eze na gburugburu Management Practice and Social Mechanisms for Building Resilience, nke Fikrit Berkes na Carl Folke deziri (1998, Cambridge University Press, ) na Panarchy Ịghọta mgbanwe na Human na Natural Systems, nke Lance H
Gunderson na CS Holling deziri (2002, Island Press, )
Mmetụta ahụike (ma ọ bụ uru mmetụta ahụike ) bụ mgbanwe na ahụike sitere na mkpughe nke ihe isi mmalite
Mmetụta ahụike bụ ihe dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ ebe, dị ka ịdị ọcha, ọmụmụ ihe gbasara mmetọ, nchekwa ọrụ na ahụike, ([nutrition]) na sayensị ahụike n'ozuzu
Ụfọdụ n'ime isi ihe na-ebute mmetụta ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi bụ mmetọ ikuku, mmetọ mmiri, mmetọ ala, mmetọ mkpọtụ na oke ọkụ
Mmetụta ahụike nke nọn stochastic ma ọ bụ deterministic nwere oke nke dabere na dose ma ekwenyere na ọ nwere ọkwa ọnụ ụzọ nke enweghị mmetụta ọ bụla

Mmetụta ahụike nke stochastic na-eme na mpụta ohere, na-emekarị na-enweghị ọkwa nkwụsị nke dose, nke ihe gbasara nke puru omume ya na dose ahụ na nke ike ya na-adabere na dose ahụ, dị ka ọrịa cancer na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa
Mgbe ụfọdụ, enweghị ndakwunyere mkpughe na ụfọdụ mmetụta na-emebi ihe na ahụike mmadụ
Ihe atụ nke mmetụta dị otú ahụ gụnyere ìhè anyanwụ na mgbatị ahụ
Heather Bansley (amuru ya na Septemba 13, 1987, na London, Ontario ) bu onye egwuregwu volleyball osimiri nke Canada, na-egwu egwu dika onye agbachitere aka ekpe
Akpọrọ ya aha FIVB Best Defensive Player of the World Tour na 2015, 2016 na 2018
Bansley gbara CIS Volleyball maka Toronto Varsity Blues maka oge ise site na 2005 ruo 2010 ebe ọ bụ onye so na ndị mmeri 2009-10 OUA
Bansley na onye ọlụlụ mbụ Sarah Pavan so na ndị otu Canada maka asọmpi Olimpik Summer 2016
Mgbe ha tozuchara maka asọmpi ụmụnwaanyị, ha abụọ gbara asọmpi na Pool E wee merie asọmpi atọ niile site na akara 2–0
Maka egwuregwu agba nke iri na isii, ejikọtara ha na ndị otu Canada Broder na Valjas nke ha meriri n'usoro nke (21–16, 21–11)
Ha meriri Laura Ludwig nke Germany na Kira Walkenhorst n'usoro kwụ ọtọ (14–21, 14–21) na nkeji iri na ise
Bansley na onye ya na ya na-emekọ ihe ugbu a Brandie Wilkerson gbakọrọ aka ọnụ na ngwụcha ngwụcha Swatch World Tour na Toronto (Septemba 13–18, 2016), ebe ha gwụchara 9th
Na 2018, ha nwere afọ nkwụsịtụ ma mechie oge nke 1 na njem nleta ụwa FIVB

Akpọrọ Bansley na Wilkerson aha dịka akụkụ nke otu egwuregwu Olympic nke Canada maka asọmpi Summer Summer 2020 na Tokyo, otu n'ime ntinye mba abụọ na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị yana otu Bansley onye bụbu onye mmekọ Pavan na Melissa Humana-Paredes
Bansley na Wilkerson gbalịsiri ike n'oge egwuregwu ọdọ mmiri, na-edekọ mfu abụọ na otu mmeri, mana ha abanyela na ọkwa ịkụ aka n'ihi ịbụ otu n'ime ndị otu abụọ 'Lucky Loser' kachasị elu
Na agba nke 16 ha bụ mkpụrụ nke iri na isii, mana na-atụghị anya ya kpasuru ndị otu egwuregwu America nke Claes / Sponcil nke atọ site na imeri setịpụ abụọ na otu
Na nkeji iri na ise, ha chere ndị otu Latvia Kravčenoka / Graudiņa ihu, ma kpochapụ ya mgbe ha nwụsịrị usoro abụọ na otu
