Heather T
Hart (amụrụ na Mee 3, 1975) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nke na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche gụnyere mmekọrịta na ntinye aka, eserese, collage, na eserese
Ọ bụ ónyé guzobere Black Lunch Table Project, nke gụnyere atụmatụ Wikipedia nke lekwasịrị ányá n'ịkwado ọdịiche nwoke na nwanyị na nnọchite ányá dị iche iche na nka na Wikipedia
A mụrụ Hart na Seattle, Washington, nke Susan Hart na Harry H
Hart III, ónyé ọkwá nkà
Nne na nna ya zutere dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ nka na Oakland, California
Ọ tolitere na North Seattle
N'afọ 1998, Hart nwetara BFA site na Cornish College of the Arts na Seattle, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Painting na Video
Ọ gàrà Center for African American Studies na Mahadum Princeton na New Jersey
N'afọ 2008, Hart nwetara MFA site na Mason Gross School of the Arts na Mahadum Rutgers na New Jersey, ébé ọ lekwasịrị ányà na nka interdisciplinary
Hart mụtara ịkwa nkà n'aka nna ya mgbè ọ dị obérè
Hart na-eji ụdị ụlọ agwakọta na akụkọ ezinụlọ na akụkọ ọnụ, ọtụtụ akụkọ, na ntinye aka dị ka ihe dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ ọrụ okike ya
'Rooftop Oracles' nke Hart bụ usoro elu ụlọ dị ndụ, nke yiri ka a tụpụrụ ha n'eluigwe ma ọ bụ si n'ala pụta, na-enye ndị na-ekiri ahụmịhe mmekọrịta ka ha na-arịgo n'elu na n'okpuru ihe owuwu ahụ
O mepụtara ihe dị iche iche na usoro ahụ, ma mezuo ọhụụ ya na mmekorita nke ezinụlọ na ndị enyi, n'ụdị mgbalị elu ụlọ nke na-agụnye ọtụtụ ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ dị ka ọbọdọ
N'afọ 2010, Hart mepụtara ntinye, 'The Northern Oracle We Will Tear the Roof Off the Mother,' na Franconia Sculpture Park na Minnesota
Site na Mee ruo Nọvemba 2017, a na-etinye 'Outlooks Heather Hart' na Storm King Art Center na Mountainville, New York
Hart bụ ónyé guzobere Black Lunch Table Project, ọrụ nchekwa ihe, nkè e nyere 2016 Emerging Fields Grant site na Creative Capital
The Black Lunch Table Project bụ ọrụ na-aga n'ihu nke Hart na onye guzobere na ónyé mmekọ Jina Valentine mepụtara

Ọrụ ahụ, nke malitere na 2005, mgbè Hart na Valentine bụ ndị na-ese ihe na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture, na-enye usoro ebe ndị sonyere nwere ike ịbịakọta iji tụlee nsogbu ndị dị ugbu a nke agbụrụ, nchekwa, na ndị na-anọchite anya ndị na-eme ihe nkírí na akụkọ ihe mere eme, na-ewere ụdị nhazi Wikipedia
N'afọ 2012, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa ara, nke ọ gbakere n'ụzọ gàrà nke ọma, n'oge ngosi nke mbụ ya na Brooklyn Museum
Hart bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Brooklyn

E gosipụtara ọrụ Hart n'ụwa niile gụnyere Olympic Sculpture Park, Real Art Ways, 92YTribeca, Jersey City Museum, NYU Galleries, 2B Gallery na Budapest, Rush Arts Gallery, Portland Art Center, Soil Art Gallery, Studio Museum na Harlem, Islip Art Museum, Museum of Art and Craft na Japan, na Art in General
Ọ rụkọtara ọrụ na Pablo Helguera na Raphael Ortiz
E tinyewo ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi nke Kara Walker, Fred Wilson, Deborah Willis na Hank Willis Thomas haziri
Usoro oge
Heather Hunter (a mụrụ 1 Ọktoba, 1969) bụ Amerikạ akpali agụụ mmekọahụ omee
Enye ama odụk okenye ịse ụlọ ọrụ na 1988 na afọ na 19 ma pụtara ihe karịrị 40 nkiri
Heather Maxine Reisman OC (amuru Ọgọst 28, 1948) bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Canada na onye enyemaka
Reisman bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke ụlọ ahịa azụmaahịa Canada Indigo Books and Music
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye gara aga oche nke Kobo, a họpụtara ya onye isi nke Order of Canada na 2019
A mụrụ Reisman na 1948 na ezinụlọ ndị Juu na Montreal, Quebec wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum McGill ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Social Work
Ebu ụzọ were Reisman n'ọrụ na-elekọta mmadụ dị ka onye ọrụ ikpe
Mgbe alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya kwụsịrị na ịgba alụkwaghịm, ọ gbanwere ọrụ wee sonye na ụlọ ọrụ nwanne ya nwoke Howard
Na 1979, o mebere Paradigm Consulting wee jee ozi dị ka onye isi njikwa nke ndụmọdụ mgbanwe atụmatụ a ruo 1995
Na 1995, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ 'onye na-etinye ego n'ihu' maka Borders Group, nke na-eme atụmatụ ịbanye n'ahịa Canada
Mgbe Borders enweghị ike ịnweta nkwado nchịkwa gọọmenti etiti dị mkpa na Canada, Reisman tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọ Indigo Books and Music
O welitere $25m site na otu ndị na-etinye ego dabere na akwụkwọ echiche izizi maka Indigo
Na 2001, Indigo Books and Music nwetara onye isi ya, Isi nke, iji mepụta nnukwu ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na Canada, na-enweta ọkwa nchịkwa doro anya na ụlọ ọrụ na-ere akwụkwọ
Reisman mebere Kobo Inc
na 2009 na afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, rere Indigo kasịnụ na Kobo nye ụlọ ọrụ Japan Rakuten maka $315 nde
Kemgbe 1998, Reisman ahọrọla karịa 262 'Heather's Picks' maka Indigo, nke bụ akwụkwọ ndị ọ kwadoro kpọmkwem wee bịa na nkwaghachi ego

Ọ bụ ezie na Indigo na-ebuwanye ibu onyinye na ụlọ ahịa ya, Reisman kwuru nke a na N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2018 banyere ngwaahịa isi ụlọ ọrụ 'Akwụkwọ bụ, bụ, na mgbe niile ga-abụ obi na mkpụrụ obi nke azụmahịa anyị'
Ọ malitere ịgbasa Indigo na US na 2018, malite na ụlọ ahịa mbụ na Short Hills na New Jersey
N'afọ 2009, o mebere Kobo ka o sonye n'ahịa agụ e-agụ na-agbawa agbawa
N'afọ 2012, erere Kobo nye Rakuten, ma bụrụkwa onye ndu n'ọhịa
Reisman ejekwara ozi dị ka onye gọvanọ nke Toronto Stock Exchange na nke Mahadum McGill
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere Williams Sonoma na J
Crew
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Onex na ụlọ ọgwụ Mt
Sinai

N'August 2006, n'ihi mmeghachi omume dị iche iche nke ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Canada abụọ na 2006 Lebanon War, Reisman wepụrụ nkwado ya ogologo oge maka Liberal Party nke Canada wee họrọ ịkwado Conservative Party nke Canada n'okpuru Stephen Harper
O nwetara otuto na nkatọ n'October 2001, mgbe o kwupụtachara na Indigo agaghị ere Mein Kampf nke Hitler n'ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ ya
Na Julaị 5, 2010, Reisman wepụtara akwụkwọ mkpesa n'ịntanetị iji zọpụta nwanyị Iran, Sakineh Ashtiani, na ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ site na ịtụ nkume
Ebumnuche ya nwetara nkwado gburugburu ụwa
Etughị Sakineh nkume ahụ
Reisman bụ onye otu kọmitii nhazi nke otu Bilderberg, wee sonye na ọgbakọ ya niile n'etiti 2002 na 2017
Na 2006, Reisman tọrọ ntọala Indigo Love of Reading Foundation, onye ebumnuche ya bụ ime ka ọba akwụkwọ dị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na-enweghị ikike
Kemgbe mmalite ya, otu a enyela ọtụtụ nde akwụkwọ nye ihe karịrị ọba akwụkwọ praịmarị 3,000 nke Canada
Na 2005, ya na di ya Gerald Schwartz tọrọ ntọala HESEG Foundation, nke na-enye scholarships na 'ndị agha naanị', ndị jere ozi oge ha na ndị agha Israel na ndị na-enweghị ezi ezinụlọ na Israel
Ụlọ ọgwụ Mount Sinai kwupụtara na Disemba 2013 na a ga-eji ihe mgbanwe $15 nde onyinye sitere na Reisman na Schwartz mee 'ịhazigharị ọgwụ mberede' n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Gerald Schwartz na Heather Reisman Foundation nyere $ 53 nde na Mahadum St
Francis Xavier na Antigonish, Nova Scotia na njedebe 2018 iji mepụta scholarships, bursaries na ịba ụba nke ụmụ akwụkwọ azụmahịa
Na Machị 2019, Mahadum Toronto kwupụtara na Schwartz na Reisman na-enye mahadum $100 nde iji wuo ebe nrụpụta ihe ọhụrụ 750,000-square, site na Gerald Schwartz & Heather Reisman Foundation
Dị ka Reisman si kwuo, a ga-eji Schwartz Reisman Innovation Center mee ihe iji meziwanye nkà na ụzụ, karịsịa ọgụgụ isi Artificial, na otú ọha na eze nwere ike isi jikọta ya

Otu n'ime ụlọ elu abụọ ahụ ga-edebe Schwartz Reisman Institute for Technology and Society na Vector Institute for Artificial Intelligence ebe nke ọzọ ga-agụnye ụlọ nyocha maka nyocha na nkà mmụta ọgwụ na-emegharị ahụ, mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na ọgwụ ziri ezi
Na Mee 2015, ewebatara Reisman n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ Azụmahịa nke Canada
Reisman bụ nnata nke doctorate nsọpụrụ sitere na Mahadum Ryerson (2006), Mahadum Wilfrid Laurier (2009), Mahadum Mount Allison (2010), Mahadum St
Francis Xavier (2013), na Mahadum Manitoba (2016) na McGill (2017)
Akpọrọ ya aha Retail Council of Canada's Distinguished Retailer of the Year (2011), wee nata ihe nrite International Distinguished Entrepreneur (2003) site na Mahadum Manitoba, Asper Business School
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Order of Canada
N'afọ 2009, Financial Times depụtara Reisman dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 50 kachasị na-azụ ahịa n'ụwa
Agụnyekwa Reisman na 100 kachasi ike nke ndị inyom kacha elu
Nna ya, Mark, bụ onye nrụpụta ụlọ; nne ya, Rose, nwere ụlọ ahịa akwa; na nwanne ya nwoke, Howard, hiwere ụlọ ọrụ kọmputa Time Systems
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne Simon Reisman
Reisman lụrụ di na nwunye na mbụ ná ndụ ya ma ọ gbara di mbụ ya alụkwaghịm
Na 1982, ọ lụrụ Gerald Schwartz, onye nchoputa na CEO nke Onex Corporation
Reisman nwere ụmụ anọ na ụmụ ụmụ itoolu
Abụọ n'ime ụmụaka ahụ sitere na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya na abụọ bụ ụmụ nwanyị site na alụmdi na nwunye ya na Schwartz
Di na nwunye ahụ bụ ndị otu ụlọ nzukọ Reform, Holy Blossom Temple na Toronto
Heba Y
Amin (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-eme nnyocha, na onye nkuzi
A mụrụ Amin, o tokwara too na Cairo
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cairo American College na Maadi
Amin kwagara na United States na 1998 wee mụọ Mathematics na Studio Art na-enweta diplọma BA na Macalester College
O debara aha ya na mmemme post-graduate na Minneapolis College of Art and Design na 2005
Ọ natara MFA na nhazi mmekọrịta site na College of Design na Mahadum Minnesota na 2009
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, e nyere ya onyinye DAAD (German Academic Exchange) maka ọrụ ya 'Alternative Memorials' na Mahadum nke Applied Sciences, Berlin
Ọ bụ DCRL Fellow na Mahadum Leuphana na Lüneburg (2017), onye otu doctoral na BGSMSC na Freie Universität na Berlin site na 2016 ruo ugbu a, na onye otu Field of Vision ugbu a na NYC
A na-etinye ọrụ Amin na nyocha sara mbara ma na-ajụ ajụjụ banyere njikọta nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, teknụzụ, na ime obodo

Ọ bụ onye nlekọta nke Visual Art maka Mizna (Minneapolis, USA), onye nlekọta maka mmemme obibi DEFAULT na Ramdom Association (IT) (Italy) na onye guzobere Black Athena Collective yana onye na-ese ihe Dawit L
Petros
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nọ n'azụ ọrụ nnupụisi na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn 'Homeland' nke nwetara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi ụwa
Ndị na-emepụta usoro telivishọn Homeland were ya n'ọrụ iji tinye ihe odide Arabic 'ezi', ihe odide na-agbanwe agbanwe nke Amin na-ese n'elu ihe ngosi ahụ
Edere ya n'asụsụ Arabic, ihe odide ahụ katọrọ ihe ngosi Homeland n'onwe ya, na ahịrịokwu dịka 'Homeland bụ ihe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ'
Amin akatọwo Homeland maka ịbụ ihe na-ezighị ezi na ajọ mbunobi ya n'ihe ngosi ya nke ndị si mba dị iche iche na Middle East
Amin sere akwụkwọ ụmụaka Extraordinary Women in the Muslim World; akwụkwọ ahụ nwetara Moonbeam Children's Book Award

Amin esonyewo na ihe ngosi otu na Dak'Art Biennale 2016, Marakkech Biennale Parallel Projects 2016, Museum of Modern Art na Warsaw, Kunstverein na Hamburg, Camera Austria, Berlin Berlinale 9th Forum Expanded Exhibition, IV Moscow International Biennale for Young Art, WRO 15th Media Art Biennale Poland, National Gallery of Mongolia, na Art Museum of Gotland Sweden
Ọ natara onyinye DAAD (Deutscher Akademischer Austausch Dienst) na onyinye Rhizome commission ma depụta ya maka onyinye artraker
Amin kụziri na Mahadum Minnesota, Mahadum America dị na Cairo, na Mahadim nke Applied Sciences dị na Berlin
O nyela nkuzi na ogbako dị iche iche n'ụwa niile
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya nke akpọrọ The Earth Is an Imperfect Ellipsoid (2016) na Mizna's Summer'16 Issue, ebe a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ na edemede Lana Barkawi 'Criticality and Dissent'
Amin bi na Berlin ugbu a ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Bard College Berlin

Hector bụ ụyọkọ égbè eluigwe cumulonimbus nké na-eme mgbè niile ihe fọrọ nkè nta ka ọ bụrụ n'ehihie ọ bụla na Tiwi Islands na Northern Territory nke Australia, site na ihe dịka n'ọnwa Septemba ruo Machị kwa afọ

A maara Hector, ma ọ bụ mgbé ụfọdụ 'Hector the Convector', dị kà otu n'ime nnukwu égbè eluigwe kachasị n'ụwa; kpọmkwem, obere usoro convective mesoscale (MCS) ma ọ bụ nnukwu égbè mmírí nké nwéré ọtụtụ mkpụrụ ndụ
Ọ na-eru ihe dị ka kilomita iri abụo (ukwu puku iri isii na isii )
Ndị na-anya ụgbọelu na-akpọ ya n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọnọdụ nke égbè eluigwe ahụ mèrè ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi màkà ndị na-anya mmírí na ndị ọkwọ ụgbọ mmiri na mpaghara ahụ
Ihe a na-eme na mesoscale, Hector na-esite na mgbagwoju ányà nkè ọtụtụ ókèala ikuku nkè oké osimiri gafee agwaetiti Tiwi ma márá ya màkà ịdị n'otu na ike ya

Ọnụ ọgụgụ ọkụ ọkụ na ọsọ ọsọ bụ akụkụ dị ịrịba ama nkè égbè eluigwe a ma n'oge afọ 1990s National Geographic bipụtara nyocha zuru oke nke oké ifufe ahụ na foto nke osisi mebiri emebi na nkọwa nke ọsọ ọsọ na ntinye áká na ihe omume tornadic

[citation needed] Ọdịdị nke ihe omume ahụ sitere na ọnọdụ ikuku na-eme ugboro ugboro n'ihi oké osimiri na n'ihi ọdịdị ala, na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ebe obibi dị n'okpuru ya bụ microclimate pụrụ iche (nke bụ a na-ahụkarị na agwaetiti ndị dị mkpa na-egosipụta ọnọdụ dị mkpa)

Kemgbe ngwụcha afọ 1980s, mgbagwoju ányà nke égbè eluigwe abụwo isiokwu nke ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihu igwe, ọtụtụ na-elekwasị ányà na Hector n'onwe ya, kamakwa na-eji ịdị n'otu nkè mkpụrụ ndụ oké ifufe iji mụọ akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke égbè mmiri, àmụ̀mà, ókè ikuku, na mmetụta mmírí na ala na ikuku
Hedi Turki (15 Mee 1922 - 31 Machị 2019) bụ onye Tunisia na-ese ihe nke sitere na Turkey
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-ebute ụzọ n'ihe osise na Tunisia ma bụrụ onye nwere mmetụta na School of Tunis
Nwanne ya nwoke nke obere bụ Zoubeir Turki, onye nwụrụ na 2009
A mụrụ Turki na 1922 na Tunis n'ezinụlọ sitere na Turkey
Nna nna ya, Hacı Hamid Semerci, si Turkey kwaga Tunisia n'afọ 1870 dị ka onye isi ndị agha Ottoman
Turki gara agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya site na 1928 ruo 1936, wee gaa Sadiki College, tupu ọ gaa Lycée Carnot n'etiti 1936 na 1940
Ọ hapụrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya mgbe nna ya, Mustapha, nwụsịrị na 1939, iji kwado ezinụlọ ya ebe ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụnne asaa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọọrụ dị iche iche dị ka onye na-amụ ịkwa ákwà, onye odeakwụkwọ, na onye ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ
Ọ lụrụ Jamila Skhiri na 1948 mgbe nne ya nwụsịrị na 1945
Ọ malitere ịmụta ụkpụrụ nke ihe osise, nke o kụziere onwe ya, wee sonye na ụlọ akwụkwọ Tunis
N'afọ 1951, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ọnwa abụọ na Paris na Academie de la Grande Chaumiere Mgbe ahụ ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ afọ abụọ (1956-1657) na Academy of Fine Arts na Rom
N'afọ 1959, ọ gara njem ọnwa atọ na United States, ebe ọ chọpụtara nka na Mahadum Columbia
Site na 1963 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1985, ọ kụziri nka na Ecole des Beaux-Arts na Tunis
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme njem na ịmụ ihe na ịrụ ọrụ n'oge ọrụ ya, ọkachasị na England (1971), Nigeria (1977) na United States (1979)
Turki nyere aka na ntọala nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Tunis, nguzobe nke National Union of plastic and graphic arts of Tunisia, na General Union of Arab Plastic Artists
Ọrụ ya gbanwere ka oge na-aga, ọrụ mba na mbụ, na-abụkarị ihe atụ dị ka ọtụtụ ndị otu ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Tunis, Abstract Expressionism nwere mmetụta, dịka njem ya na United States kpaliri ya
Ndị America abụọ na-ese ihe nwere mmetụta na Turki Jackson Pollock (1912-1956) na Mark Rothko (1913-1970)
Ka o sina dị, ụdị ọdịdị nke Turki nwere mmetụta miri emi nke Tunisia na akụkụ okpukpe, nke na-eme ka ọ dị iche na ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ nke oge ya
Hedi Turki nwụrụ na Maachị 31, 2019, mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri itoolu na isii
Marianne Adelaide Hedwig Dohm (née Schlesinger, mgbe e mesịrị Schleh; 20 Septemba 1831 - 1 June 1919) bụ onye Germany na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị na onye edemede
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eche echiche ụmụnwanyị mbụ hụrụ ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị n'ihi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ọ bụghị mkpebi nke ihe ndị dị ndụ
A mụrụ ya n'isi obodo Prussian bụ Berlin n'aka ndị nne na nna bụ ndị Juu, e mekwara nna ya baptizim
Nwa nke atọ nke (Henriette) Wilhelmine Jülich, née Beru na onye na-emepụta ụtaba Gustav Adolph Gotthold Schlesinger (nke mbụ bụ Elchanan Cohen Schlesinger)
Nna ya ghọrọ onye Protestant n'afọ 1817; n'afọ 1851 ọ nakweere aha nna Schleh
Nne na nna Hedwig alụghị di ruo n'afọ 1838, ebe ezinụlọ nna ya nwere nchegbu siri ike banyere njikọ alụmdi na nwunye a
Mgbe ụmụnne ya nwere ike ịga Gymnasium, Hedwig hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, iji nyere aka n'ọrụ ụlọ
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, ọ malitere mmụta na seminarị nkuzi
N'afọ 1853 ọ ghọrọ nwunye onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ernst Dohm (Elias Levy; 18191883), onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin satirical Kladderadatsch, onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ ise
Site n'aka nwa ya nwanyị Gertrude Hedwig, ọ ghọrọ nne nne Katharina 'Katia' Pringsheim (1883[]), nwunye Thomas Mann, na onye na-agụ egwú Klaus Pringsheim Sr
Site n'aka nwa nwanyị ọzọ, Marie Pauline Adelheid, ọ ghọrọ nne nne Hedda Korsch, onye na-eme ihe ike na onye nkuzi nke lụrụ Karl Korsch
Hedwig na di ya sonyeere ndị ụbụrụ na-aghọ nkọ na Berlin, isi obodo Germany n'ọdịnihu
N'afọ 1867 o bipụtara ọmụmụ ihe mbụ ya, na mmepe akụkọ ihe mere eme nke akwụkwọ mba Spain, dabere na ihe ọmụma ọ kụziiri onwe ya n'onwe ya
Site na mbido afọ 1870 gaa n'ihu, o bipụtara akwụkwọ edemede ụmụnwanyị na-achọ ịha nhata iwu, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụ na ụba, yana ikike ụmụnwanyị
edemede ndị a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama ma na-enwetakwa mmegide site n'aka ndị na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị na-eme ihe n'ụzọ dị mma bụ ndị lekwasịrị anya na ohere agụmakwụkwọ ka mma maka ụmụagbọghọ
Na ngwụcha afọ 1870, Hedwig dere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke a na-eme na Berlin Schauspielhaus na nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma
Mgbe di ya nwụsịrị n'afọ 1883, ọ malitere ide akwụkwọ akụkọ, ruo mgbe site na ngwụcha afọ 1880 ọ bipụtara ọtụtụ edemede ọzọ gbasara mmegharị ụmụnwanyị
Hedwig Dohm guzobekwara òtù Reform na-akwado mgbanwe agụmakwụkwọ zuru oke na ọmụmụ mahadum ụmụnwanyị
Ọ sonyeere otu Women's Welfare (Frauenwohl) nke Minna Cauer guzobere yana Helene Stöcker's League for the Protection of Mothers (Bund für Mutterschutz)
Ụdị ejiji ya na-akwa ndị nwoke emo na-ekwu na ha nwere ike, yana enweghị nkwanye ùgwù ọ na-ekwu maka usoro mmekọrịta ndị nna ochie mepụtara ihe ọhụrụ n'oge ya

Hedwig Dohm bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkà mmụta Germany ole na ole kwuru okwu n'ihu ọha megide ịhụ mba n'anya na mbido Agha Ụwa Mbụ, na-ebipụta isiokwu ndị na-ahụ maka udo na akwụkwọ akụkọ aka ekpe Die Aktion nke Franz Pfemfert dezigharịrị
Ọ dịrị ndụ iji hụ mmejuputa ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Weimar Republic mgbe German Revolution nke 1918-19 gasịrị
Hedwig Dohm nwụrụ na Berlin mgbe ọ dị afọ 87
E liri ya na Alter St-Matthäus-Kirchhof na mpaghara Schöneberg

Hedy Epstein (née Wachenheimer; August 15, 1924 ̊ May 26, 2016) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị Juu na America a mụrụ na Germany na onye survivor Holocaust nke a maara maka nkwado ya maka ihe ndị Palestine site na International Solidarity Movement
A mụrụ ya na Freiburg na ezinụlọ ndị Juu, Kinder transport napụtara ya na Nazi Germany na 1939
Ọ gara na United States na 1948, lụọ Arnold Epstein (?-1977), ma biri na St
Louis, Missouri, ruo ọtụtụ afọ
A mụrụ Hedy Wachenheimer na-ezinụlọ ndị Juu na Freiburg, na 1939 gbapụrụ mkpagbu ndị Nazi site na Kindertransport gaa England
E gburu mmadụ niile ma e wezụga mmadụ abụọ na-ezinụlọ ya n'oge ịta ahụhụ Auschwitz n'oge Oké Mgbukpọ ahụ

N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ngwá agha ma sonye n'otu ìgwè ndị Juu gbara ọsọ ndụ na Germany na-atụ anya i wegara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'ala nna ha 'ntọala nke agụmakwụkwọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị m nke ka na-eme ka m nọrọ n'ọnọdụ dị mma taa', ka o kwuru
Ihe dị ka afọ 60 ka e mesịrị, a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ banyere ahụmịhe a maka ihe nkiri Into the Arms of Strangers Stories of the Kindertransport
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, Epstein sooro ndị agha jikọrọ aka na Germany rụọ ọrụ, gụnyere ịrụ ọrụ na ikpe ndị dọkịta na Nuremberg
N'afọ 1948, gara New York City, wee kwaga Minneapolis, wee gaa St
Louis, Missouri
N'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere ime ihe maka ụlọ dị ọnụ ala, òtù na-akwado nhọrọ, na òtù na-emegide agha

N'afọ 1982, na nzaghachi maka akụkọ akụkọ banyere ogbugbu ndị agha Lebanese Phalangist mere n'oge Agha Lebanọn nke afọ 1982, Epstein mepụtara echiche dị iche na esemokwu Arab ísrael; ọ malitere i gosipụta mmegide megide iwu agha nke Israel
N'afọ 2001, o guzobere otu St
Louis nke Women in Black, otu na-emegide agha nke lekwasịrị anya na ọrụ Israel
N'afọ 2003, ọ gara West Bank iji soro International Solidarity Movement rụọ ọrụ
Ọ laghachiri otu ugboro n'afọ, na-ekwu na ndị nche na Ben Gurion International Airport achọtala ya na oghere ọ bụla n'afọ 2004
Epstein kwuru banyere ọnọdụ dị na mpaghara ndị ahụ, na banyere ndụ ya na ahụmịhe ya, maka ndị na-ege ntị na United States

Tupu okwu na Mahadum Stanford na Ọktoba 20, 2004, ndị na-eme njem na-a kwalite ngosi ya 'jupụtara onyinyo ndị Juu na Nazi Germany na onyinyo nke ndị Palestine na ebe nyocha Israel', dị ka akụkọ akụkọ dị na The Stanford Daily si kwuo

Mgbe mmeghachi omume 'na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ' sitere n'aka ndị otu ndị Juu nọ na Stanford, ndị na-ahazi ihe omume kwuru na ọ dịghị 'iji ya tụnyere' nke ndị na-ese foto ahụ bu n'obi, ma ọ bụ a ga-anụ ya na okwu Epstein
Epstein kwughachiri echiche ndị a, zere ntụnyere n'etiti ndị Nazi na ndị Israel, ma wepụ obere oge na-atụle akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na Nazi Germany, dere The Daily
Otú ọ dị, n'okwu ahụ dum, ndị na-ege ntị, ọtụtụ ndị jikọtara ya na òtù ndị Juu na-abụghị ụlọ akwụkwọ, jiri mkpu iwe kwụsị okwu ya, na ndị nche ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzọ ji nwayọọ nwayọọ banye
Mmeghachi omume na okwu ahụ kewara nke ukwuu

Adina Danzig, onye isi oche nke nzukọ Hillel nke Stanford kpọrọ nkuzi ahụ 'iji akụkọ ihe mere eme eme eme eme ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi' ma nwee olileanya na 'ihe omume a na nkwụsịtụ ndị mmadụ ole na ole nwere bụ ihe na-ezighi ezi'
Mgbe ọ na-ekweta nkwupụta Epstein n'ozuzu ya banyere izere iji ya tụnyere, Danzig kwuru na 'nkwupụta ahụ emeghị ka mmebi ahụ wepụ' nakwa na '[Epstein] kwuru ọtụtụ ihe na-eme ka [Israel] kwekọọ'

Nathan Mintz, osote onye isi oche nke Stanford Israel Alliance, katọrọ 'okwu Epstein nke iji tụnyere ọkwa mbụ nke Holocaust na ọnọdụ dị ugbu a na Gaza na West Bank' dị ka 'ịghọ aghụghọ nke ndị Juu' na-anọchite anya 'naanị otu akụkụ nke ihe ka ukwuu nke mmegide ndị Juu na kọleji taa'

Ọ gbakwụnyere na ndị ọrụ ibe Epstein na ISM nwere 'mmekọrịta kpọmkwem na òtù ndị na-eyi ọha egwu' nakwa na 'ọnọdụ dị ugbu a na ụlọ akwụkwọ abụghị nke mkparịta ụka dị mma banyere esemokwu ahụ nwere ike ime n'ụzọ ziri ezi'

N'ụzọ dị iche, onye na-akwado Epstein katọrọ ihe ndị a dị ka 'nkwupụta ụgha na ebubo ụgha', na-ezo aka na ndị na-eme ihe na-abụghị ụlọ akwụkwọ bụ ndị, 'na ebumnuche nke imebi ihe omume ahụ', nyere akwụkwọ mpịakọta 'na-eme mmụọ ọjọọ' Epstein ma 'na-eti mkpu ma na-akpaghasị' ya
'N'otu oge, o dere na otu nwoke wụliri elu na mberede mgbe Epstein na-ekwu okwu ma kwughachi ihe yiri ka ọ bụ nkwupụta a kwadebere na-agwa ya na a na-echere ikpe megide ya
' Ọ jụrụ ihe mere Mintz 'na-ekwughị ihe ọ bụla n'ime ihe ndị jọgburu onwe ya' nke ụdị a ma 'nyefe edemede ya tupu ọ hụ ihe omume ahụ n'ezie'

N'ịzaghachi esemokwu banyere akụkọ mbụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na-agụ akwụkwọ Jennifer Graham nke Stanford Daily kwetara na 'ọtụtụ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi' e nyere nkwupụta nke ndị na-akatọ Epstein
Ọ rịọkwara mgbaghara maka mkpebi 'na-ezighi ezi' na 'na-eduhie eduhie' nke Mintz na-akatọ okwu Epstein tupu ya emee
'E nwere nkwupụta, na enweghị m ike ikwenye ma ọ bụ gọnahụ, na kọlụm Mintz na-akọwa ihe dị n'okwu Epstein', ka o dere
Dị ka 'mzaghachi na-ewuli elu' na ngosi Epstein, ndị otu ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Juu kpọrọ prọfesọ Harvard Ruth Wisse ka ọ kwuo okwu na Stanford

'Mgbe ndị na-ege ya ntị riri achịcha Challah ma ṅụọ champagne maka Kiddush', ka akwụkwọ akụkọ Stanford Daily dere, Wisse tinyere naanị ụta maka nhụjuanya ndị Palestine na ụwa ndị Arab na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị Palestine, ma kwuo na ebe ọ bụ na mmegide megide ndị Juu bụ naanị ihe ụwa ndị Arab nwere, etiti ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Arab ghọrọ mmegide ndị Juu

Nwa akwụkwọ Stanford Ahmed Ashraf zaghachiri site na nkwupụta na-emegide 'ndị na-akwado ndị Israel (sic) iwe maka nkwado Epstein maka ndị Palestine' na omume 'nnukwu nkwanye ùgwù' nke ndị Arab na ndị Alakụba na-abịa na okwu Wisse, 'ọbụlagodi na mmiri ọkụ nke ịkpọasị dara na ha'

Otu akwụkwọ ntanetị nke Jerusalem Center for Public Affairs hotara okwu Epstein banyere otu isiokwu ahụ na Mahadum California, Santa Cruz n'etiti 'ọrụ ndị na-agbasa n'ụdị okwu ịkpọasị dị iche iche na-eme ka ndị Israel na ndị Juu bụrụ ndị mmụọ ọjọọ' [nke] 'iji Israel tụnyere steeti Nazi na ndị agha Israel na ndị Nazi'
N'afọ 2008, onye nduzi mpaghara Missouri maka Anti-Defamation League kwuru, 'Nye onye dị ka Hedy, onye si n'obodo ndị Juu pụta n'oge siri ike, ịkatọ Israel
nke ọma, ọ siri ike
Ụfọdụ ndị na-ele ya anya dị ka onye na-adịghị eguzosi ike n'ihe
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2008, Epstein mere atụmatụ ịbanye n'ụgbọ mmiri Free Gaza Movement na-anwa imebi mgbochi ụgbọ mmiri Israel na Gaza, mana ọ ghaghị ịkagbu n'ihi ahụike na-adịghị mma
N'afọ 2010, ọ banyere n'otu n'ime ụgbọ mmiri ndị bu n'obi ibubata enyemaka na Gaza, mana o kpebiri na Saịprọs ka ọ ghara isonye na njem ahụ
A kọrọ na o mekwara atụmatụ isonye na ụgbọ mmiri nke afọ 2011 mana o meghị
Ọ nọ n'ụgbọ 'The Audacity of Hope' dị njikere isonyere ndị agha mmiri
Otú ọ dị, ndị na-eche nche n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke Gris jidere ha wee laghachi azụ
Epstein kwadoro Black Lives Matter movement, e jidekwara ya maka ị ghara ị gbasa na August 18, 2014, n'oge ngagharị iwe St
Louis megide ogbugbu Michael Brown na omume ndị uwe ojii sochirinụ
Epstein nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na St
Louis na Mee 26, 2016, mgbe ọ dị afọ 91, na ọrịa cancer
Nwa nwoke Howard Epstein, na ụmụ ụmụ nwanyị Courtney na Kelly hapụrụ Hedy

Heidi (/ˈhaɪdi /; German ) bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka nke onye edemede Switzerland Johanna Spyri bipụtara n'etiti 1880 na 1881, e bu ụzọ buga ya akụkụ abụọ dị ka Haidi Her Years of Wandering and Learning (German) na Sheidis Lehr- und wanderjahre)
Ọ bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ banyere ihe ndị mere na ndụ nwa agbọghọ dị afọ ise n'aka nna ya ochie nọ na Swiss Alps
E dere ya dị ka akwụkwọ 'maka ụmụaka na ndị hụrụ ụmụ n'anya' (dịka e hotara site na ndepụta okwu)
Heidi bụ otu n'ime akwụkwọ ndị a kacha ere nke edere na so na akwụkwọ ndị Switzerland kacha mara amara
N'obodo Dörfli ('obere obodo' na Switzerland German), ụmụnne abụọ bi
Onye nke okenye mefuru akụ na ụba ezinụlọ ya n'ịṅụ mmanya na ịgba chaa chaa, ebe nke nta gbapụrụ ịga jee ozi n'Òtù Ndị Agha Ịtali na Naples
Mgbe ya na nwa nwoke, bụ Tobias lọghachiri, ndị obodo ahụ na-achụpụ ya ma mepụta asịrị banyere ndụ ya na Naples
A bịara mara nwoke ahụ dị ka The Alm-Uncle, ebe ọ na-ebi na nzuzo na ugwu Alm
Ụmụ agbọghọ ime obodo abụọ, Dete na Adelheid, mere enyi Tobias
Mgbe ha tolitere, Dete na-arụ ọrụ n'ime obodo Maienfeld￼￼, na Grisons, dị ka onye odibo họtel
Adelheid na Tobias lụrụ di ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka ọkwá nkà
Ha nwere nwa nwanyị, aha ya bụ Adelheid mana a na-akpọkarị Heidi
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe Tobias nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ọrụ ma Adelheid nwụọ site na nkụda mmụọ
Alm-Uncle na-ejide nke a megide Chineke
Heidi bụ nne nne ya na Dete na Maienfeld zụlitere na mbụ
N’oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nne nne ya nwụsịrị, a na-enye Dete ezigbo ọrụ dị ka odibo na nnukwu obodo, wee kpọrọ Heidi dị afọ 5 gaa n’ụlọ nna nna ya, n’elu ugwu si Dörfli
Ya na ndị obodo ahụ na-ese okwu ma na-akpasu Chineke iwe kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ ma na-ebi na nzuzo na Alm, nke mere ka a kpọọ ya 'The Alm-Uncle'
Ọ na-ewe iwe n'ọbịbịa Heidi nkenke, mana ọgụgụ isi pụtara ìhè nke nwa agbọghọ ahụ na ọ joyụ ma ọ naghị emetụta ya n'oge na-adịghị anya ga-enweta ezi ịhụnanya, ma ọ bụrụ na edobere ya
Heidi ji ịnụ ọkụ n'obi mee ndị agbata obi ọhụrụ ya, Peter the goatheroz na-eto eto, nne ya Brigitte, na Nne nna mbụ kpuru ìsì
Ka oge ọ bụla na-agafe, ndị bi n'elu ugwu ahụ, ọkachasị Peter na nne ya ochie, nwere mmasị karịa Heidi, ma ha
Otú ọ dị, nna ochie ahụ jụrụ ikwe ka Heidi gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ, ma soro onye ụkọchukwu na nkụzi obodo nwee esemokwu, ndị gbalịrị ịgba ya ume ime otú a, n'ihi nke mere e ji bụrụkwa ihe maghị

Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, Dete laghachiri ịkpọ Heidi gaa Frankfurt ka ọ bụrụ enyi nwanyị e goro ego nye otu nwa agbọghọ bara ọgaranya aha ya bụ Klara Sesemann, onye na-enweghị ike ịga ije ma were ya dị ka onye na-adịghị mma
Ọ masịrị Klara mma site n'ịdị mfe enyi Heidi na nkọwa ya banyere ndụ na Alm, ọ na-atọkwa ya ụtọ n'ihe ọjọọ niile na-atọ ọchị nke amamihe Heidi na enweghị ahụmịhe na ndụ obodo wetara

Otú ọ dị, onye na-elekọta ụlọ nke Sesemanns, Fräulein Rottenmeier, na-ele ọgba aghara ezinụlọ anya dị ka omume ọjọọ na-adịghị mma, ma na-etinye Heidi nwere onwe ya n'okpuru ọtụtụ njide, machibido ya ikwu banyere Alps ma ọ bụ ịkwa ákwá maka ụlọ
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Heidi na-agụsi Alm ike nke ukwuu, ma na-eto eto nke ukwuu na-acha uhie uhie ma dị gịrịgịrị

Otu ihe ntụgharị ya bụ ịmụta ịgụ na ide site na iji nchịkọta akụkọ nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ, nke nne nne Klara bụ Frau Sesemann kpaliri, onye gosipụtara ntụkwasị obi na ịhụnanya ya, ma na-agba ya ume ikwere na Chineke na ikpe ekpere
E mesịa Frau Sesemann nyere Heidi akwụkwọ ahụahụ
jiri ịnụ ọkụ n'obi tụọ aro ka Klara leta Heidi, na-enwe obi ike na gburugburu ugwu na ezigbo mkpakọrịta ga-abara ya uru
Klara na-eme njem ahụ n'oge ọzọ wee soro Heidi na-anọkọ n'oge okpomọkụ mara mma, na-esiwanye ike na mmiri ara ewu na ikuku ugwu ọhụrụ

Ma Pita, bụ́ onye na-ekwo ekworo maka ọbụbụenyi Heidi na Klara, na-akwanye oche nkwagharị ya nke na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla gbadaa n'ugwu ahụ ka o bibie ya, n'agbanyeghị na n'oge na-adịghị anya obi amamikpe na-ama ya ikpe maka ihe o mere wee kwupụta ya
Na-enweghị oche nkwagharị ya, Klara enweghị nhọrọ ọ bụla ma ọ bụghị ịmụta ịga ije; ọ na-agbalị ime otú ahụ ma jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ na-eme nke ọma
Ọ naghị esi ike nke ukwuu, na-adaberekarị na Heidi ma ọ bụ nna nna ka ọ guzoro ọtọ ma ghara ịdaba, mana ọ na-egosi njedebe oge ya dị ka onye owu na-ama na onye na-adịghị mma
Ọ tụrụ nne nne ya na nna ya n'anya ma nwee ọṅụ ịhụ Klara ka ọ na-ejegharị ọzọ
Ezinụlọ Sesemann kwere nkwa inye Heidi nlekọta na-adịgide adịgide, ma ọ bụrụ na oge abịa mgbe nna nna ya enweghịzi ike ime ya
Bekee A sụgharịrị nsụgharị iri na atọ n'etiti 1882 na 1959, site n'aka ndị ntụgharị Britain, Helen B
Dole, HA
Melcon, Helene S
White, Marian Edwardes, Elisabeth P
Stork, Mabel Abbott, Philip Schuyler Allen, Shirley Watkins, M
Rosenbaum, Eileen Hall, na Joy Law
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2010, naanị nsụgharị Brooks, Edwardes na Hall ka dị
E meela ihe nkiri iri abụọ na ise ma ọ bụ telivishọn nke akụkọ mbụ ahụ
Nanị ihe nkiri telivishọn na-eme emepụta nke ndị Japan iji ruo n'asụsụ Bekee bụ fim a kpọrọ ogologo oge site na ịhazi usoro kachasị mkpa, wepụtara na vidiyo na United States na 1985
Ọ bụ ezie na akwụkwọ mbụ ahụ kọwara Heidi dị ka onye nwere ntutu isi ojii, nke siri ike, a na-egosikarị ya dịka ọbara
Ụdị akụkọ ahụ gụnyere
Egwú Heidi nke Francois Toerien, egwu Mynie Grové na okwu ndị ọzọ Esther von Waltsleben gosipụtara na South Africa na Klein Karoo National Arts Festival n'afọ 2016

N'ịbụ nke Toerien duziri na nduzi egwu site n'aka Dawid Boverhoff, mmepụta ahụ gosipụtara Tobie Cronjé (Rottenmeier), David Minnaar (Sesemann), Albert Maritz (Nna Ukwu), Ilse Klink (Nwanne nwanyị Dete) Karli Heine (Heidi), Lynelle Kenned (Klara), Dean Balie (Peter), Jill Middlekop na Marlo Minnair
Ọ bụ Hansie Visagie mepụtara ụmụ bebi maka mmepụta ahụ

A na-eme ihe nkiri egwu nke Heidi of the Mountain (egwú na okwu Claude Watt, akwụkwọ Claude na Margaret Watt) na Sidney, BC, Canada site n'aka Ugwu Dream Productions, gosipụtara ya na 2007 na Charlie White Theatre, ma mee ọzọ ọtụtụ ugboro kemgbe ahụ
E weputara egwuregwu kọmputa Heidi abụọ maka ngwaọrụ mkpanaka, nke kachasị ọhụrụ bụ Heidi Mountain Adventures
Heidiland, nke akpọrọ aha akwụkwọ Sheidi, bụ ebe njem nleta dị mkpa na Switzerland, ọkachasị ndị Japan na Korea
Maienfeld bụ etiti nke a na-akpọ Heidiland; otu n'ime obodo nta, nke a na-akpọbu Oberrofels, ka akpọrọ 'Heididorf' aha
Heidiland dị n'ógbè a na-akpọ Bündner Herrschaft; A katọrọ ya dịka 'ihe ọchị, ihe eji eme ụmụaka' na 'Ihe atụ doro anya nke hyperreality'
N'agbata afọ 1933 na 1955, ụlọ ọrụ France Flammarion bipụtara mbipụta ọhụrụ nke Heidi tinyere usoro ihe omume mbụ

N'agbanyeghị na e bipụtara ha niile n'okpuru aha Johanna Spyri, akwụkwọ ndị a edeghị ma ọ bụ kwado ya site na onye nsụgharị French ya, Charles Tritten si ọrụ ya ọzọ mee ihe na 1930s na 1940s, ọtụtụ afọ mgbe o nwụsịrị, ebe nke ikpeazụ ka Nathalie Gala kwuru
Usoro a nwere ngụkọta nke akwụkwọ 7, 2 sụgharịrị site na ọrụ Spyris na 5 mbụ
Naanị abụọ n'ime ha ka e bipụtara na Bekee
E nwere ụfọdụ nnukwu ọdịiche dị n'etiti Heidi mbụ na Tritten
Ndị a gụnyere;
N'afọ 1990, ndị na-ede ihe nkiri Weaver Webb na Fred & Mark Brogger, na onye nduzi Christopher Leitch, mepụtara Courage Mountain, nke Charlie Sheen na Juliette Caton gosipụtara dị ka Heidi

A na-akpọ ya ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka akụkọ Spyri, ọ bụ anachronistic n'ihi na o gosipụtara Heidi dịka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, n'agbanyeghị eziokwu nke a kpọrọ akwụkwọ mbụ (ebe Hadi gbara naanị afọ ise) e bipụtara na 1881
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, onye ọkà mmụta Switzerland aha ya bụ Peter Otto Büttner, kpughere akwụkwọ nke odeakwụkwọ German de Hermann Adam von Kamp dere na 1830
Onye na-ede akụkọ ndụ Spyri de Regine Schindler kwuru na ọ gafere omume kpamkpam ka Spyri maara banyere isiokwu ahụ mgbe o tolitere n'ezinụlọ nwere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
A katọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ, ọbụlagodi n'oge ya, maka ọnọdụ okpukpe ọ na-agbaso omenala, ma mesịa bụrụ ihe ngosi ojii na ọcha nke ndị isi awọ
Na Japan, kemgbe nsụgharị Japanese mbụ ya na 1906, akwụkwọ ahụ enweela mmetụta n'ozuzu nke Switzerland maka ndịJapanese, ọkachasị ndị njem nleta ya, ọtụtụ mmadụ gara ogige Heidi

Heidi Holland (6 Ọktoba afo 1947 - 11 Ọgọst afo 2012), makwaara dị ka Heidi Hull (n'oge alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya), bụ onye odeakụkọ South Africa na onye ode akwụkwọ nke tinyeworo aka na ụlọ ọrụ nta akụkọ ihe karịrị afọ iri ato

Ọ deziri Illustrated Life Rhodesia, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede nweere onwe ya na akwụkwọ ndị dị ka Sunday Times, The Telegraph, International Herald Tribune, The New York Times na The Guardian, ma rụọkwa ọrụ nyocha maka akwụkwọ akụkọ telivishọn Britain
Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ dị iche iche, dị ka nri abalị na Mugabe, akụkọ banyere nzukọ ya na Robert Mugabe, onyeisi oche nke Zimbabwe
Na mbụ ọ wepụtara The Agba nke igbu ọchụ, nyocha dị oke egwu nke ikpe igbu ọchụ nke van Schoor na afo 2002 na South Africa
O wepụtakwara akwụkwọ gbadoro ụkwụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, The Struggle A History of the African National Congress
Achọtara ya n'ozu n'ihi ihe ọ pụtara na ọ gbuola onwe ya n'ụlọ ya dị nso na Johannesburg
A mụrụ Heidi Holland na Johannesburg na afo 1947, ada nke nna Britain na nne Switzerland
Mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Southern Rhodesia, bụ ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Lord Malvern na Salisbury, tupu ọ ghọọ onye nta akụkọ, na-arụ ọrụ maka Illustrated Life Rhodesia
Holland laghachiri South Africa na afo 1982
Di mbụ ya bụ Tony Hull, onye ya na ya nwere nwa nwoke, Jona, onye nta akụkọ na-agbagharị agbagharị nke dabeere na London mgbasa ozi center nke Al Jazeera International
O nwekwara nwa nwoke a na-akpọ Nick, ya na di ya nke abụọ, George Patrikios, bụ́ dọkịta na-awa ahụ́
Na 11 Ọgọst afo 2012 a hụrụ ya ka ọ kwụ n'elu osisi n'ụlọ ya na Johannesburg
Di ya nke abụọ nwụnahụrụ ya
Na mbụ na ọrụ ya, Holland deziri Illustrated Life Rhodesia
Mgbe e mesịrị, yana freelancing maka ọtụtụ aha mba ụwa, ọ bụ onye edemede maka The Star, akwụkwọ akụkọ mgbasa ozi South Africa nke dabeere na Johannesburg

Aha nri abalị na Mugabe gbasara nhụta dị n'etiti Holland na Robert Mugabe na afo 1975 mgbe otu enyi ya kpọtara ya n'ụlọ ya maka nri abalị nzuzo ka ọ na-achọ ịpụ na mba ahụ ịlụso gọọmentị obere ndị ọcha nke Rhodesia ọgụ n'oge agha Bush
N'agbanyeghị Holland dị ịrịba ama dị ka onye nta akụkọ ọcha nwetara ajụjụ ọnụ nke awa abuo na okara na Mugabe dị ka onye isi ala Zimbabwe na Disemba afo 2007
O were ọnwa iri na asatọ iji nweta ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ
N'akwụkwọ Holland na-enyocha mgbanwe nke nwoke ọ zutere na afo 1975 na ọnọdụ ya ugbu a

Ọ na-elekwa anya mmekọrịta ya na ndị dị ka nwunye mbụ ya, Sally, Lord Soames, Gọvanọ Britain ikpeazụ; Denis Norman, onye ọrụ ugbo na-acha ọcha bụ onye jigidere ọtụtụ Pọtụfoliyo na ọchịchị mbụ ya yana Ian Smith, onye isi ala nke Rhodesia ikpeazụ
Ọ na-ajụkwa Onye isi ala ajụjụ gbasara esemokwu dị ka Gukurahundi na mgbanwe ala na Zimbabwe
Ọtụtụ akụkụ akwụkwọ a apụtala n'akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa ma Penguin South Africa bipụtara ya
Na afo 2006, Holland weputara nyocha ezi mpụ dabeere na South Africa banyere ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ime ihe ike na Agba nke igbu ọchụ Otu egwu ezinụlọ na-ekpughe nhụjuanya mba
N'akwụkwọ ahụ ọ na-enyocha esemokwu ezinụlọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndị ọcha South Africa Van Schoor ezinụlọ
Ọ na-elekwasị anya na onyeisi ndị bishọp Louis van Schoor, onye bụbu onye nchekwa nchekwa East London bụ onye ebubo na ọ gbagburu ihe karịrị otu narị ndị isi ojii n'oge ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Mgbe ahụ, e nwere nwa ya nwanyị Sabrina Van Schoor, bụ onye mere enyi na obodo ndị na-acha agba mgbe ọ bụ nwata (na-anabataghị ndị mụrụ ya) ma mesịa mụọ nwa nwere agba, Tatum
N'afọ 2001, o nyere onye na-akụ ọkpọ iwu ka o gbuo nne ya, Beverley, n'ihi na ọ bụ onye ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Holland nwetara ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka akwụkwọ a, gụnyere ihe nrite Pulitzer
Na afo 2001, Penguin bipụtara Africa Magic Echiche Omenala Na-agwọ Kọntinent
Akwụkwọ a bụ nyocha nke nkà ihe ọmụma okike nke Sub Saharan Africa na-eleba anya na ụzọ ndị na-agwọ ọrịa si jiri usoro nkwenye ọdịnala mee ihe dị ka ihe gbasara ahụike na alụmdi na nwunye
Na afo 1994, Penguin bipụtara Amụrụ na Soweto N'ime Obi South Africa
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ nkọwa nke ndụ ndị bi na Soweto kwuru
E gosikwara ya
Struggle A History of the African National Congress bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ George Braziller wepụtara na Eprel 1990
Holland na-enyocha mkpesa udo na ime ihe ike nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ na-elebakwara anya na njikọ ndị Kọmunist nwere na pati ahụ yana mgbọrọgwụ nke echiche ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Akwụkwọ a nwetara nyocha mara mma, na New York Times na-ehota ya dị ka akụkọ 'nkenke' na 'ihe ọmụma' nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Na May afo 2009, Holland na onye ndu otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kacha ukwuu na South Africa, Democratic Alliance nwere esemokwu
Holland katọrọ okwu Helen Zille kwuru gbasara onye isi ala, Jacob Zuma, n'akwụkwọ akụkọ 'Ahụhụ nye ụmụ amaala ọcha' nke The Star bipụtara na 21 Mee afo 2009
Holland kwuru na nkatọ Zille nwere ike ịkatọ Zuma, maka ebubo na ọ na-etinye nwunye ya n'ihe ize ndụ site n'ịkwado nwanyị bu nje HIV ugboro ugboro, emetụtala ndị ọcha South Africa nke ọma
Na 27 Mee afo 2009, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ bipụtara azịza Zille
Zille boro Holland ebubo 'echiche gbagọrọ agbagọ' gbasara okwu agbụrụ
Heidi Roizen (amụrụ 1958) bụ onye isi Silicon Valley, onye isi ego na onye ọchụnta ego
A maara ya maka ikwu okwu megide mmekpa ahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na nkà na ụzụ, ebe onwe ya nwetara mmekpa ahụ n'oge gara aga
A mụrụ Roizen na 1958 na Stanford, California
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stanford na 1980 na nzere bachelọ na bekee wee nweta MBA ya na Stanford University Graduate School of Business afọ atọ ka e mesịrị
Site na 1983 ruo 1996, Roizen kwadoro, ya na nwanne ya nwoke bụ Peter Roizen, T / Maker Company, nke mere software maka kọmputa CP / M na MS-DOS, na mgbe e mesịrị maka Apple Macintosh
Site na 1987 ruo 1994, Roizen rụkwara ọrụ na bọọdụ ndị isi nke Associationlọ Ọrụ Nbipụta Ngwanrọ wee bụrụ onye isi ya site na 1988 ruo 1990
Site na 1996 ruo 1997, Roizen bụ osote onye isi oche nke Mmekọrịta Mmepụta zuru ụwa ọnụ maka Apple Inc
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na bọọdụ Great Plains Software site na 1997 ruo mgbe Microsoft nwetara ya na 2001
Roizen jere ozi dị ka Gọvanọ Ọha nke Pacific Exchange yana na kọmitii onye isi nke National Venture Capital Association (NVCA)

Roizen banyere ụwa isi obodo na 1999, nke mbụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke SOFTBANK Venture Capital (nke ghọrọ Mobius Venture Capital), site na 1999 ruo 2007, na 2012, ọ sonyeere onye na-etinye ego zuru ụwa ọnụ Draper Fisher Jurvetson dị ka onye mmekọ
Ọ malitekwara ọrụ ọchụnta ego nke ya, SkinnySongs, Na Septemba 2008, Forum for Women Entrepreneurs and Executives nyere Heidi Roizen onyinye mmeri ha nwetara kwa afọ

Na June 2009, a họpụtara Roizen ka ọ bụrụ Board of Directors of TiVo (NASDAQ TIVO), na Septemba, 2012, a họpụtara ya na bọọdụ DMGT (LSE DMGT), ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ nke dabeere na London
nwere Daily Mail na Mail Online
N'oge a họpụtara ya, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nwanyị mbụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke afọ 116
Na 2010, a kpọrọ Roizen aha onye nkuzi na onye nkuzi azụmaahịa na Mahadum Stanford, ebe ọ na-akụzi nkuzi 'Spirit of Entrepreneurship' na ngalaba MS&E (Engineering)
Heinrich Stephen Samuel Willemse (amụrụ na 18 Septemba 1957, Ladismith, Cape Province) bụ onye South Africa agụmakwụkwọ, onye nkatọ akwụkwọ, onye na-eme ihe ike na onye edemede
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka prọfesọ na Ngalaba Afrikaans na Mahadum Pretoria, South Africa
Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Africa Tydskrif vir Letterkunde (Journal for Literature)

Dị ka onye nkuzi na-eto eto, Willemse keere òkè dị ukwuu na mmegide nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, yana ndị edemede Afrikaans ndị ọzọ - gụnyere André Brink, Breyten Breytenbach na Etienne van Heerden - gara nzukọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Victoria Falls Writers Pob na'fo 1989, ebe ndị ụbụrụ Afrikaans dị iche iche zutere ndị edemede South Africa a machibidoro iwu na ndị otu African National Congress
Willemse tolitere na Cape Province na South Africa ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Esselen Park High na 1975
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụsịrị nzere bachelọ ya na Mahadum nke Western Cape (UWC) na Bellville, South Africa, n'afọ 1978
Mgbe ọ na-emecha akara ugo mmụta ya na asụsụ na akwụkwọ Afrikaans n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1979, Willemse rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ iwu na ụlọ ọgwụ enyemaka iwu nke UWC
Willemse gara n'ihu mezue nzere masta ya (na 1984) na DLitt (na 1996) na Ngalaba Afrikaans na Dutch na Mahadum nke Western Cape

Kemgbe ọ nwetara nzere masta ya, Willemse akụziwo na mahadum dị iche iche nke South Africa na mba ụwa, gụnyere El Colegio de México (Mexico), Mahadum Namibia (Namibia) na Mahadum Stellenbosch (South Africa)
N'afọ 2004 na 2005 ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ Fulbright na ọkà mmụta na Grinnell College (Iowa, US)
N'afọ 1985, ọ bụ onye na-asọpụrụ na edemede na Mahadum Iowa na United States
N'afọ 2002 ọ gụsịrị nzere MBL ya na Mahadum South Africa (UNISA)
Site na 2000 ruo 2009 Willemse jere ozi dị ka onye isi nke Ngalaba Afrikaans na Mahadum Pretoria, South Africa

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ kwụsịrị n'ọkwa a n'oge na-adịbeghị anya (nke Willie Burger, onye bụbu onye isi nke Ngalaba Afrikaans na Mahadum Johannesburg, nọchiri), Willemse ka bụ prọfesọ nke akwụkwọ Afrikaans na ọmụmụ mgbasa ozi, na-akụzi ma ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ndị gụsịrị
Willemse bụbu onye isi oche nke ISOLA (The International Society for the Oral Literatures of Africa)
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Tydskrif vir Letterkunde (Journal for Literature) akwụkwọ akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Africa site na 2003 ruo 2019
E wezụga ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ na-ejekwa ozi ugbu a na bọọdụ ndị nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi mba South Africa bụ Naspers
Willemse ebipụtala ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmakwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba South Africa
Ọ bụ onye na-enye onyinye mgbe niile na LitNet, akwụkwọ e-zine Afrikaans, ọ dekwara ma dezie ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
Heinrich 'Heiner' Egersdörfer (1853 Nuremberg, Germany - 29 Eprel 1915 St
Pancras, London), bụ onye Germany na-ese ihe, onye na-ese onyinyo na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O bi na South Africa

N'ịbụ onye sitere n'ezinụlọ nwere nka (ụmụnne ya nwoke Andreas Egersdörfer (1866-1914) na Konrad Egersdöfer (1868-) bụ ndị na-ese ihe ma ha abụọ nwụrụ na Agha Ụwa Mbụ), a zụrụ ya dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ na Germany ma rụọ ọrụ maka Leipziger Illustrierten Zeitung
O sonyere na Agha Franco-Prussian nke afọ 1870, wee rụọ ọrụ na England, tupu ọ kwaga South Africa na 1879
N'afọ 1884, ya na ndị mmekọ ya guzobere The South African Illustrated News na Cape Town
Ihe osise ya na ihe na-abụkarị n'ụzọ dị mfe, bụ ihe ndekọ ndụ bara uru na Cape Colony ma jiri ya mee ihe na mbipụta mpaghara
The South African Illustrated News bịara nnọọ na njedebe n'afọ 1885 wee gaa Australia, iji laghachi afọ iri ka e mesịrị
Ọnọdụ akụ na ụba ka mma n'oge ọ na-anọghị ya, ọ gara Kimberley, Witwatersrand na Rhodesia
Ọ malitere ise ihe ọmụmụ anụ ọhịa, nke chọtara ahịa dị njikere na ọrụ ya pụtara na The Cape Argus, The Owl na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ
O gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe omume na ihe nkiri sitere na Agha Anglo-Boer, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bipụtara na The South African Review Book of 50 Famous Cartoons - A Unique Souvenir of the Anglo-Boor War 1899-1900
N'agbata afọ 1899 na 1901 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ obodo maka The Graphic, ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya na-apụta kwa izu ruo 1908
N'afọ 1902 na 1903, o gosipụtara na South African Society of Artists (SASA)
Enwere ike ịchọta ihe osise mbụ nke Egersdörfer n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi nka South Africa na n'ụlọ ngosi nka Africana
Nanị foto ya a maara pụtara na mgbakwunye The Cape Argus Weekly Edition na 'Famous South African Artists' na 26 Disemba afọ 1906
Site na ọnwụ nke nwunye ya, Mary Jane Creaney na 1901(?1903), na nke nwa ya nwoke Heinrich (1896-1910), na nsogbu ego, ọ laghachiri Europe na London ebe ọ nwụrụ na 1915
Nwa mbụ ya nwoke, Friedrich, amụrụ na Melbourne, Australia na 13 June afọ 1894, nwụrụ na 6 November 1970

Heirs Holdings bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye ego nke ezinụlọ nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos Steeti, Naịjirịa nwere mmasị itinye ego na ngalaba dị iche iche n'Afrịka
Tony O
Elumelu, CON guzobere Heirs Holdings n'afọ 2010 mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2010 site na United Bank for Africa (UBA) Plc, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa otu
N'afọ 2011, Heirs Holdings tinyere ego mbụ ya site n'inweta òkè na Transcorp, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-edepụta na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2012, Heirs Holdings tinyere ego ọzọ na ụlọ na ngalaba ego
Afriland Properties Plc, ụlọ ọrụ njikwa ihe onwunwe, itinye ego, na mmepe; United Capital Plc, otu ọrụ ego na itinye ego; na Africa Prudential Registrar Plc, onye na-enye ọrụ ndebanye aha

N'afọ 2013, Heirs Holdings tinyere US $ 25bn, dị ka otu nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye ego na President Barack Obama Power Africa Initiative na ebumnuche ịgbakwunye puku iri atọ MW nke ikike mmepụta ọkụ eletrik ọhụrụ, iji mụbaa ohere ọkụ eletrik site na ọ dịkarịa ala nde njikọ ọhụrụ nde iri isii na Sub-Saharan Afrịka
N'afọ 2020, Heirs Holdings nwetara OML17 n'aka Shell, Total na Eni n'ihe a kpọrọ nnukwu azụmahịa mmanụ na gas n'Afrịka maka afọ 2020
A na-ahazi itinye ego nke ndị nketa n'ime isii Ọrụ ego, Ike, Mmanụ na Gas, Real Estate, Hospitality na Healthcare
Ndị nketa Holdings nwere mmasị na itinye ego na ọrụ ego na-ebelata ụlọ akụ, mkpuchi, itinye ego na ụlọ akụ, njikwa akụ na ndebanye aha ahịa
Ntinye ego na mmepe ihe onwunwe na ọrụ njikwa ụlọ ọrụ
Ntinye ego na ngalaba Power, Oil & Gas
Ntinye ego ndị a bụ akụkụ nke Heirs Holdings na-etinye aka na atụmatụ USAIDs Power Africa
Ntinye ego na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike, ngwá ọrụ, na ọrụ
Ka ọ na-erule Ọgọọst 1, 2021
Heitsi-eibib, nke a makwaara dịka Haiseb maọbụ Haitse-aibeb, bụ onye dike akụkọ ifo na akụkọ ọdịbendị na-emeghị eme nke ndị Khoikhoi maọbụ Khoekhoe, ndị malitere na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka
A na-egosipụta ya mgbe ụfọdụ dịka onye aghụghọ, ya na Gaunab na Tsuińgoab, bụ onye dị mkpa n'akụkọ ọdịnala ndị Khoekhoe
N'ihe ngosi ya, Heitsi-eibib na-apụta mgbe ụfọdụ dịka onye toro eto maọbụ nwatakịrị
N'otu akụkọ ọdịnala, nwatakịrị Heitsi-eibib ghọrọ okenye ma soro nne ya nwee mmekọahụ, wee ghọọ nwa ọhụrụ na mberede na njedebe
Ọbụna dị ka onye toro eto, ọ bụ onye a ma ama na-agbanwe ọdịdị, ka akụkọ ọdịbendị ya na-agbanwe site n'otu akụkọ gaa na nke ọzọ
Ọ bụ ezie na Heitsi-eibib bụ onye akụkọ ifo, o nwere ọtụtụ ili dị adị n'ụdị cairns dị na South Africa na Namibia
Ga-Gorib bụ nnukwu ajọ anụ ọhịa a na-akpọ Gaunab, chi nke ụwa n'okpuru n'akụkọ ifo Khoekhoe
Ga-Gorib na-ama ndị mmadụ aka ịtụ ya nkume n'egedege ihu ya mgbe ọ nọdụrụ n'akụkụ nnukwu oghere miri emi nʼala
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụrụ na onye ọ bụla anabata ihe ịma aka ya, naanị ọnwụ ụfọdụ na-echere ya ebe ọ bụ na nkume ahụ ga-awụli elu ma gbuo onye tụbara ya
A na-ekwu na Heitsi-eibib chọpụtara ọnwụ ndị a wee kpebie imeri Ga-Gorib site na igbu ya
Ya mere, Heitsi-eibib gara ebe Ga-Goribá, ebe onye nke ikpeazụ ahụ mara Heithi-oibib aka ozugbo ịtụ nkume n'egedege ihu ya
Heitsi-eibib jụrụ ibili na mkpasu iwe ma kpagharịa uche Ga-Gorib nke ukwuu iji kụọ ya n'azụ ntị ya
O juru Ga-Gorib anya nke na ọ sọrọ galagala wee daa n'ime oghere miri emi
Na nsụgharị akụkọ nke ọzọ, Ga-Gorib chụpụrụ Heitsi-eibib mgbe ọ jụrụ ihe ịma aka ahụ, ha lụkwara ọgụ mgbe ha abụọ dara n'ime olulu
Dị nnọọ ka nsụgharị mbụ, Ga-Gorib nwụrụ, ebe Heitsi-eibib nọgidere na-adị ndụ
Helalia Johannes (Helalia Lukeiko Johannes, nke a na-akpọkwa Hilaria Johannes; amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye Namibia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke bụ ọkachamara na marathon
O nwere ihe ndekọ Namibia na 10 km, 20 km, ọkara marathon na ihe omume marathon
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na itoolu, ọ ghọrọ onye nwetara ọla nchara na World Championships na marathon

Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na 2008 Beijing Olympics, na afọ 2012 London Olympics na afọ 2018 Commonwealth Games ma merie ihe nrite na World Championships, Military World Games, All-Africa Games na afọ 2018 Commonwealth Olympics
A mụrụ ya n'obodo Oshali na mpaghara Oshana
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro ise nke Two Oceans Half Marathon ma nwee ndekọ ugbu a nke 01 10 29
Johannes mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa na afọ 2005 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, ebe ọ mechara nke 80 na ọsọ ogologo ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bịara nke ise na ọkara marathon nke 2007 Summer Universiade ma mechaa otu ihe ahụ na 2007 All-Africa Games
Ọ gbakwara ọsọ na Dublin Marathon n'afọ ahụ, na-abịa n'ọnọdụ nke anọ
Johannes gbara oge iru eru (2 37 00) nke 2 33 06 awa na Seoul International Marathon na Machị 2008, na-eme ka ọ ruo eru maka 2008 Summer Olympics
N'ọsọ marathon nke Olympic, ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri anọ na ọkwa
Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya ọzọ n'ọkwa ụwa na afọ 2009 World Championships in Athletics, mana ọ mechara nke 56 n'ime oge dị nwayọ nke 2 50 19 awa
Ọ laghachiri na Dublin Marathon, na-agwụcha dị ka onye nke abụọ
N'afọ sochirinụ, o nwere otu n'ime ihe ngosi mba ụwa kachasị mma, na-abịa nke iri na isii na afọ 2010 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke afọ 2011 nke Dublin Marathon na ihe ndekọ nke onwe ya kachasị mma na nke mba Namibia nke 2 30 37 awa
N'afọ ahụ, o ritere ọla nchara abụọ maka Namibia, nke mbụ na marathon na afọ 2011 Military World Games na mgbe ahụ na ọkara marathon na 2011
Ọ kụrụ ihe karịrị nkeji atọ site na nke kachasị mma ya n'oge ahụ na afọ 2012 Vienna Marathon, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke atọ n'azụ Olga Glok
Na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics, Johannes kụrụ ihe karịrị otu nkeji na nke kachasị mma, na-agwụ na nke iri na abụọ na nke kachasị kachasị mma nke 2 26 09 na ndekọ Namibia
Njem marathon nke atọ na nke ikpeazụ ya nke afọ 2012 bịara na Dublin, mana ọ dịtụ nwayọ ma bịa nke isii n'ime awa 2 35 01
Ọ banyere na 2013 Tokyo Marathon ma mechaa n'okpuru awa abụọ na ọkara, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke isii
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Namibia na marathon na 2013 World Championships in Athletics, mana o nweghị ike ịkwụsị
Na mbido afọ 2014 ọ gbara ọsọ 2 28 27 awa maka ọnọdụ nke atọ na Seoul International Marathon Na 2014 Commonwealth Games, ọ na-eduga marathon, tupu mmerụ ahụ mere ka ọ kwụsị
Ọ mechiri na nke ise
Helalia meriri nrite ọla edo nke abụọ nke Namibia na Commonwealth Games 2018 mgbe ọ meriri na marathon ụmụ nwanyị

Johannes mechara marathon 422 kilomita n'ime oge nke awa 2 32 nkeji 40 sekọnd iji mechie nke ọma n'ihu onye nke abụọ Lisa Weightman nke Australia (2 33 23) ebe onye ọzọ Australia, Jess Trengrove meriri ọla nchara na 2 34 09
Johannes bụ nwanyị Namibia mbụ meriri nrite ọla edo Commonwealth
Di ya, Japhet Uutoni, nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo maka Namibia na ịkụ ọkpọ na 2006 Commonwealth Games
N'afọ 2019, Joannes mebiri ihe ndekọ Namibia atọ
O meriri ihe ndekọ marathon nke Namibia iji merie Nagoya Marathon na oge nke 2 22 25
Mgbe ahụ, ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ nke ọkara marathon nke Namibia n'ọnwa Eprel na Two Oceans Half Marathon na Cape Town, na-agba ọsọ oge mmeri nke 1 10 30
Ọ gara n'ihu mebie ihe ndekọ kilomita 10 na Port Elizabeth na oge nke 3150
N'ọnwa Septemba, o nwetara ihe ngosi kachasị mma n'ọrụ ya site n'inweta ihe nrite na Athletics World Championships, maka ọnọdụ nke atọ ya na marathon

N'ọnwa Disemba na afọ 2020, ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ marathon nke mba ya site n'ịbụ onye nke atọ na Valencia Marathon n'oge nke 2 19 52; site na ihe a, Namibia ghọrọ mba Afrịka nke atọ mebiri ihe mgbochi 2 20 na marathon ụmụ nwanyị mgbe Kenya na Ethiopia gasịrị
Ihe nlereanya HeldīHou bụ ihe nlereanya màkà mgbasa nké ikuku Hadley nké ga-adị na enweghị ọgba aghara ikuku
Ọ bụ Isaac Held na Arthur Hou mepụtara ihe nlereanya ahụ n'afọ 1980
Isi ihe nlereanya ahụ bụ na ikuku na-esi n'elu na equator na-echekwa ike ya ka ọ na-aga n'ihu
Nke a nke ifufe, n'aka nke ya, na-ekpebi nkesa nke okpomọkụ, nké na-ekpebe oke latitudinal nke mgbasa site na ịchọ nchekwa ike
Nke a dị iche na echiche mbụ nke George Hadley banyéré mgbasa ozi, nke o kwùrù na ọ rùrù n'ebe ndị ọzọ
Mgbasa ozi Hadley nwèrè mmetụta na-eme ka ọ dị jụụ na nso na equator na mmetụta na-ekpo ọkụ na latitudes dị elu n'ime mkpụrụ ndụ Hadley
Enwèrè ike ịgbanwe njem ike a ka ọ bụrụ njem buru ibu, iji chọpụta ike nkè mgbasa ahụ, site na ịhazi ya site na nkwụsi ike kwesịrị ekwesị
A mụọla mmetụta nkè mmiri na oge na ihe nlereanya ahụ
Ikuku nké ụwa na-emebi echiche ndị dị n'okpuru ihe nlereanya ahụ anaghị echekwa ike oghere na ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ anaghị emechi
N'ihi nkea, ihe nlereanya HeldīHou bụ ihe nlereanya echiche nké na-adịghị eme amụma ziri ezi nkè ọnụ ọgụgụ nkè mmetụta nkè mgbasa Hadley na mgbanwe na parameters ikuku
Helen Sophia Chenevix (13 Nọvemba 1886 ruo 4 Machị 1963) bụ onye Irish suffragist na onye otu ọrụ
N'afọ 1911, ya na Louie Bennett rụkọrọ ọrụ iji guzobe Irish Women's Suffrage Federation
Ha abụọ mechara guzobe Irish Women Workers' Union
A họpụtakwara Chenevix na ụlọ ọrụ Dublin Corporation, ma rụọ ọrụ ugboro abụọ dị ka onye na-anọchite anya Lord Mayor nke Dublin n'afọ 1942 na 1950
N'afọ 1951, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Irish Trades Union Congress, site n'afọ 1955 ruo n'afọ 1957 ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Women Workers' Union
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na International League for Peace and Freedom na Irish Pacifist Movement
A mụrụ Helen Sophia Chenevix n'ụbọchị 13 Nọvemba afọ 1886 na Blackrock, Co
Dublin, ọ bụkwa nwa nwanyị nke Henry Chenevixe, Bishọp na Chọọchị nke Ireland na ikekwe nwa nke onye Irish chemist Richard CheneviX
Nne ya bụ Charlotte Sophia, nke a mụrụ Ormsby
Chenevix gara Alexandra College na Milltown na Dublin, ebe onye otu suffragist na onye mmekọ Louie Bennett nwetara agụmakwụkwọ ya afọ iri abụọ gara aga
Chevenix mechara gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Trinity College ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị inyom mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere BA na 1909
Chenevix malitere inwe mmasị ma mikpuo onwe ya n'ime òtù suffragette ma bụrụ onye isi otu na Irish Women's Suffrage Federation
Chenevix duziri ọtụtụ ngagharị na arụmụka banyere ikike ụmụnwanyị, na mmekorita mgbe niile ya na onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Bennett, onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Site na 1911, socialism na femism nọ na-eto eto, ọtụtụ ndị na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị nwere echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke socialist
Nke a dugara na nkwado a ma ama nke òtù ndị suffragette n'oge 1910s na ịrị elu na nkwado maka Chenevix na Irish Women's Suffrage Federation
Chenevix bụ naanị nwa nne na nna ya, Henry na Sophia
Ha bụ ezinụlọ South Dublin nwere ahụ iru ala nke na-enweghị nsogbu ego dịka nna ya bụ Bishọp nke Chọọchị Ireland
Ya na ndị mụrụ ya ka bi n'ụlọ ezinụlọ na Dublin mgbe ya na Bennett guzobere Irish Women's Suffrage Federation
Chenevix na Bennett bụ ndị enyi mgbe niile, na-eduga na ịkọ nkọ na ha abụọ nwere mmekọrịta ịhụnanya
A na-eche ugbu a na ha bụ di na nwunye
A na-ekwu na di na nwunye ahụ bụ akụkụ nke netwọk nwere mmetụta nke ụmụnwanyị na-edina nwoke bi na Dublin
Bennett kwagara n'ụlọ dị n'akụkụ Chenevix, ha bikwa n'otu oge na Chenevixe na-elekọta Bennett tupu ya anwụọ n'ọrịa na 1956
Na Pax et Libertas, Chenevix dere na Bennett bụ 'nwaanyị a kacha hụ n'anya na Dublin' na 'Udo na Nnwere Onwe bụ echiche ejima ebe a'
Chenevix nwụrụ na 4 Machị n'afọ 1963
Chenevix bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụnwanyị
N'afọ 1911, o guzobere Irish Women's Suffrage Federation, nke kwadoro ntọala nke Dublin's Irish Women'S Reform League na Belfast's Women's suffrage Society
Chenevix kwenyere na a ga-ebuli afọ ịhapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ruo afọ iri na isii ma mee mkpọsa maka ịgbanwe nke a na 1920s
Ọ ghọtara ọgụ ezinụlọ ndị dara ogbenye nwere ma chọọ ụgwọ ego maka ha
Helen guzobere Irish Women's Workers Union n'afọ 1916 ma ka ọ na-erule 1918 a nabatara ya dị ka otu ọrụ, nke nwere ihe karịrị ndị otu 5,000
Ebumnuche ha bụ ịkwado ụmụnwanyị na-arụ ọrụ n'ọnọdụ ọrụ dị njọ
Ha na ndị were ha n'ọrụ kwurịtara maka ụgwọ ọrụ ka mma na oge ọrụ
N'afọ 1945, Chenevix, Bennett na ndị ọzọ so na Irish Women's Worker's Union malitere ọgbaghara maka ọnọdụ ọrụ dị njọ ndị ọrụ ga-atachi obi mgbe ha na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ịsa ákwà
Ọgbaghara a gara nke ọma were ọnwa 3 n'ozuzu ya ma nye mba ahụ dum ezumike izu abụọ a kwụrụ ụgwọ kwa afọ na njedebe
A na-eto Chenevix na Bennett nke ukwuu maka ịbụ 'ụmụ nwanyị siri ike, dị ike' maka ijikwa na ịnọgide na-eme ngagharị iwe ahụ
N'afọ 1949, Chenevix jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Irish Trade Union Congress na n'afọ 1951 a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi ala
A họpụtakwara Chenevix na ụlọ ọrụ Dublin Corporation, ma rụọ ọrụ ugboro abụọ dị ka onye na-anọchite anya Lord Mayor nke Dublin (na 1942 na 1950)
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Women's International League for Peace and Freedom na Irish Pacifist Movement
Mgbe Bennett lara ezumike nká na 1955, Chenevix nwetara ọkwa ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Irish Women's Worker's Union
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na Irish Women Workers Union na 1957, Chenevix lekwasịrị anya n'ịrụ ọrụ maka udo na nkwụsị nuklia
Ihe omume a na-agaghị echefu echefu na ndụ Chenevix bụ ntinye ya na nzukọ nke Irish Trade Union Congress na Irish Congress of Trade Unions
Arụmụka kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ bilitere n'etiti ndị nnọchiteanya na-atụ aro na echiche nke udo ụwa bụ echiche 'communist'
Ka Chenevix, 'onye na-adịghị ike, onye dị nro, onye nwere ntutu isi awọ', na-eru nso n'ebe a na-anọ ekwu okwu, nzukọ ahụ nọ n'ọgba aghara
Ka ọ na-ekwu okwu n'ụzọ dị jụụ na nke doro anya maka mkpa udo, ọgba aghara ahụ malitere ịnwụ
Ozugbo ọ gwụchara, ọnụ ụlọ ahụ malitere n'oké ifufe nke ịkụ aka
Mkpebi ya, nke a na-elebu anya dị ka 'ndị Kọmunist', mechara bụrụ nke a nabatara ma jiri otu olu gafee
Chenvix rụrụ ọrụ n'akwụsịghị akwụsị n'oge ndụ ya niile iji lụọ ọgụ maka ikike ụmụnwanyị, iji melite ọnọdụ ọrụ maka ụmụnwanyị Irish na ikike ibi n'ụwa udo na-enweghị agha ma ọ bụ ọgba aghara
Ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Industrial Accidents Commission naanị ụbọchị atọ tupu ọnwụ ya
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa ụbụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1963 n'ụlọ ọgwụ Walkinstown, e lie ya n'ebe ili ozu Deansgrange n'ụbọchị iri na asaa n'ọnwarị n'otu afọ ahụ
E mere emume olili ozu ya na Monkstown Parish Church ma bụrụ nke Reverend RWM Wynne duziri
N'etiti ndị gara olili ozu ahụ bụ ndị otu Dáil na Senate, ndị nnọchiteanya nke òtù Trade Union na ọtụtụ ndị enyi Chenevix
E debere bench na ogige St Stephens Green iji sọpụrụ Chenevix na Bennett maka ọrụ siri ike ha na-alụ ọgụ maka ikike ụmụnwanyị
bench ahụ na-agụ, 'Ọ bụkwa nke enyi ya na onye ọrụ ibe ya Helen Chenevix, 1888 - 1963 onye nwere otu echiche dị elu,'
A kọwara ụmụnwanyị abụọ ahụ dị ka 'Abụọ n'ime ụmụnwanyị Irish kachasị mma nke narị afọ a' mgbe ọnwụ Chenevix gasịrị
Ihe ncheta dị na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Irish Times kwuru na Chenevix 'ga-efu ọ bụghị naanị maka ọrụ ọ rụrụ, kamakwa maka àgwà ọma o nwere
Ndị enyi ya ga-enwe mmetụta miri emi na nke a na-apụghị idozi edozi nke mfu'
Ingenious Ireland haziri njem ije ije na International Women's Day 2015 iji mee emume ndụ Chenevix, Bennett, Helena Molony na Kathleen Clarke na iji sọpụrụ ọrụ ha maka ebe ịsa ákwà
A kpọrọ njem ahụ 'Obstreporous Lassies' ma lekwasị anya n'ọrụ Irish Women Workers' Union

Helen U

Esuene (amụrụ na 23 Nọvemba afọ 1949 ) bụ onye bụbu onye ọrụ obodo Naịjirịa nke a họpụtara ịbụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ahụike, ma mesịa bụrụ Mịnịsta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na ụlọ na kabinet nke Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo n’agbata afọ 2005 na 2007
Helen Esuene gụrụ akwụkwọ na nzuzo odeakwụkwọ na Nchịkwa ụlọ ọrụ na Federal Training Centre nọ na Kaduna wee malite ọrụ obodo ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ nzuzo
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị anya na Mahadum Leicester wee nweta Msc na Finance
Obere oge ka ọ lụsịrị onye bụbu gọvanọ ndị agha nke steeti ochie bụ Cross River, Chief Udokaha Esuene, onye nwụrụ afọ 1996
Ha mụrụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na ụmụ nwoke atọ
Ọ malitere azụmaahịa, bido na njikwa akụ na ụba mmadụ maka Mobil Producing
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ malitere ihe ghọrọ Villa Marina Hotel na Eket, mepere n'afọ 2000
A họpụtara Esuene dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Ahụike na Jụlai afọ 2005
A họpụtara ya dika Mịnịsta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na Jenụwarị afọ 2006
Mgbe imeghari kabinet na Jenụwarị afọ 2007, Esuene nyere Pọtụfoliyo gbasaa dịka Mịnịsta Gburugburu na Ebe Obibi
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ na Mee afọ 2009 na njedebe nke ọchịchị Obasanjo
Helen Essuene bụ onye ndoro-ndoro nke ọma maka oche Senatorial nke Akwa Ibom South na nhoputa ndi Eprel afọ 2011, na-agba ọsọ na People's Democratic Party (PDP platform)
Helen Eugenia Parker (1909-c1940) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
A mụrụ Parker na onye ọrụ ngo Walter Eugene Parker na Willie Parker na Pine Bluff, Arkansas na 17 Nọvemba afọ 1909
Ezinụlọ asaa mechara kwaga Little Rock, Arkansas
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1926 na Wiley High School-College na Marshall, Texas (nke a maara dị ka Wiley College taa), ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ kachasị elu
O yikarịrị ka ọ gara Mahadum Howard na Washington, DC
Parker laghachiri na Little Rock n'oge na-adịghị anya
N'ebe ahụ, ọ kụziri mgbakọ na mwepụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ọha na eze, jere ozi dị ka onye na-elekọta ọbá akwụkwọ na ọbá akwụkwọ a na-ekewapụ, ma na-agakwuru Southern Tenant Farmers Union
N'ihe dị ka afọ 1930, Parker kwagara Detroit, Michigan
N'ebe ahụ, ọ bụ onye nkuzi maka Shop Drafting Training Program, akụkụ nke National Youth Administration of Works Progress Administration
Tinyere onye na-ese ihe maka ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ abụọ mbụ edebanyere aha na Detroit, Alfonso R
Feliciano (1883 ruo 1940) onye Puerto Rican gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Universidad de Barcelona, na Donald Frank White
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu maka Ụlọ Ọgwụ Trinity dị na Detroit, ụlọ ọgwụ ojii nke mechiri na 1962
Parker bụ onye otu Peter Pan Nursery
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na njikọ ndị ọkachamara, gụnyere Alpha Kappa Alpha sorority, National Technical Association, na Detroit Youth Assembly
Parker nwụrụ mgbe afọ 1940 gasịrị
Helen Idahosa (amụrụ na afor (1972-08-22 ) ) bụ nwanyị Naijiria na- ebuli arọ, onye gbara n'ụdị +75 n'arọ, na-anọchite anya Naijiria na asọmpi mba ụwa
O sonye na asọmpi olimpik nke afọ 2000 na mmemme +75 n'arọ
Ọ gbara asọmpi n'asọmpi ụwa, kacha nso nso a na asọmpi ịdị arọ ụwa nke 2001
Helen Lieros (mkpụrụ Ụbọchị atọ nke ọnwa Ọgọst n' afọ 1940 - ụbọchí irí na anọ nke ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2021) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri Zimbabwe
A mụrụ ya na Gweru, Zimbabwe maka nne na nna bụ ndị Gris
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ecole des Beaux-Arts na Center Contemporaine de la Gravure (ugbu a Centre d'édition contemporaine
) na Geneva, Switzerland
Ọ nọkwara ọtụtụ oge na Istituto statale d'arte di Firenze [ ya ] na Florence, Italy
Mgbe ọ na-agagharị na Europe, Lieros laghachiri na Zimbabwe (mgbe ahụ Rhodesia ) na 1964 wee nweta ọkwa dịka onye nkuzi na Chaplin High School, ebe ọ gụbụrú akwụkwọ
Ọ kwagara Harare (mgbe ahụ Salisbury ) n' afọ 1967, ebe o biri ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Julaị n' afọ 2021
Lieros bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà akachasị mara amara na Zimbabwe ma nwee ọrụ ruru mgbà afọ iri isii
O guzobere Gallery Delta na Harare ya na di ya Derek Huggins n' afọ1975
Oghere nọọrọ onwe ya etinyela aka na nhazi, nhazi, ngosi na nkwalite ihe ngosi ruru ihe dịka narị narị ise
E wezụga itinye ego n'ọrụ nke ya, Lieros na di ya raara onwe ha nye ihe ka ukwuu n'ọrụ ha nkuzi na ịkụzi ọgbọ ndị na-ese ihe Zimbabwe
Ndị a gụnyere Berry Bickle, Greg Shaw, Lovemore Kambudzi, Cosmas Shiridzinonwa, Gina Maxim, Misheck Masamvu, Admire Kamudzengerere, Richard Mudariki, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Na mbido afọ 2021, National Arts Council nke Zimbabwe kwanyere Lieros ugwu ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi onyinye onyinye mba
Ebemsibia
Helen Nonhlanhla Makhuba MP bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị South Africa na onye otu Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP)
Ọ bi na Soweto ma họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu n'afọ 2009
Ọ bi na Soweto ma họpụta ya na 2009 ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka Inkatha Freedom Party

Na Juun 26, na afọ 2009, o kwupụtara nkwado IFP maka mmefu ego nke Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Dị n'Ime mana dọrọ ya na Kọmitii Na-ahụ maka Nchịkwa Onwe ya aka na ntị megide ileghara ma ọ bụ ihe ha mere tupu ha ma ọ bụ ọrụ ha n'afọ ndị na-abịa
N afọ 2010 FIFA World Cup, ka o gosipụtara, ga-etinye nrụgide pụrụ iche na Ngalaba ahụ

Mgbe mmeri ndị mmegide meriri na Johannesburg na ntuli aka ime obodo South Africa nke afọ 2016, IFP sonyeere gọọmentị ọhụrụ jikọtara aka n'obodo ahụ, nke Democratic Alliance (DA) duziri, a họpụtakwara Makhuba dịka onye otu kọmitii njem n'okpuru onye isi obodo Herman Mashaba
A họpụtaghị ya n'afọ 2014
Helen Miller (amụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America nke jere ozi dị ka onye otu Iowa House of Representatives site n'afọ 2003 ruo 2019
A mụrụ Miller na Newark, New Jersey, ma gaa South Side High School (nke bụzi Malcolm X Shabazz High School)
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Howard dị na Washington, DC
na Bachelor of Arts na nchịkwa azụmaahịa ma malite ya dị ka onye otu Delta Sigma Theta sorority
O mechara nweta Master of Science na sayensị ọbá akwụkwọ site na Mahadum Our Lady of the Lake na San Antonio, Texas
Ọ nwetara Juris Doctor ya na Georgetown University Law Center
N'ụlọ ndị nnọchi anya Iowa, Miller jere ozi n'ọtụtụ kọmitii, gụnyere Economic Growth, Natural Resources, na Transportation kọmitii
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye otu kọmitii ọrụ ugbo
Ahụmahụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya gụnyere ije ozi dị ka onye na-enyere onye ndu ndị ka nta aka na Iowa House (2005[[2006) na onye na-enye aka na onye ndu ndị kachasị
Àtụ Iowa House of RepresentativesÀtụ Iowa Women's Hall of Fame
Helen Nakimuli (amụrụ na 2 Julaị 1985) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu Uganda, onye na-egwu volleyball, onye otu nke iri na otu nke Uganda maka Kalangala District
Ọ bụ onye otu National Unity Platform (NUP)
A mụrụ Nakimuli n'obodo Lukuba, Kyamuswa sub-county na Kalangala n'aka onye ụkọchukwu Ọtọdọks, Rev
Nna Christopher Walusimbi na Maria Nalwanga Walusimbi bụbu onye kansụl mpaghara Kalangala maka Kyamuswa na Bubeke
Nakimuli malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Bukasa, Hormisdallen Primary School na Bweyogerere na Wakiso, Our Lady of Good Counsel na Gayaza maka ọkwa ya, St
Augustine secondary school na Wakiso maka ọkwa ya dị elu tupu ọ banye na Mahadum Makerere
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Nakimuli malitere na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị St
Augustine dị ka onye isi nwanyị
O meriri Aidah Nabayiga ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Kalangala
Nakimuli bụ onye na-egwu volleyball kemgbe afọ 1998
Ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị gara egwuregwu ndị omeiwu nke East Africa na Arusha, Tanzania
Ọ bụ onye otu COBAP Volleyball Club
O nyere aka na windo nke Kalangala iji nweta ndị ọka iwu mgbe ndị ọzọ chọrọ iwere ihe onwunwe di ha nwụrụ anwụ
Nakimuli nyere enyemaka nke gụnyere nri, ncha na ihe ndị ọzọ nye ndị agadi nọ na mpaghara Kalangala
Nakimuli nyere ndị ụlọ ha gbara ọkụ enyemaka
Nakimuli rịọrọ minista steeti maka microfinance, Haruna Kyeyune Kasolo ka ọ tinye mpaghara agwaetiti Buvuma na Namayingo na ndepụta nke ego Emyooga

Popu Ọtọdọks na Onyeisi Ndị Bishọp nke Alexandria na Africa niile, Obi ụtọ Chineke ya Theodore nke Abụọ nyere Nakimuli ihe nrite ụka iji kwado ọrụ nlereanya ya na Chọọchị Ọtọdọk, Uganda na ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ
