Helen Olaye (amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ nke onwa ọgọstụ n'afọ 1946) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba ọsọ
Ọ sọ mpi na egwuregwu women's 200 metres na 1972 Summer Olympics
Helen Aiyeohusa Ovbiagele (a mụrụ n’afọ 1944) bu onye ode akwukwo na Naijiria
A mụrụ ya n'obodo Benin, ma mgbe ọ gachara CMS Girls 'School, n'obodo Benin, na St
Peter's College,dị na Kaduna, ọ gụrụ asụsụ bekee na Frenchị na Mahadum Lagos ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Institut Français du Royaume-Uni na Lọndọn
E jikọtara ọrụ ya na ụdị akụkọ ịhụnanya, nke e bipụtara na usoro Pacesetter Novels nke Macmillan a ma ama, mana ndị dike ya ka e kwuru na ha ka dị ochie ma nwekwuo onwe karịa nkịtị maka ụdị ahụ
Ọ bụ onye ndezi akwụkwọ (Woman Editor) nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Vanguard
Helen Olajumoke Oyeyemi (a mụrụ n'abalị iri n'ọnwa nke iri na abụọ (Disemba) n'afọ 1984) bụ onye ojii,nke Briten bụ onye ode akwụkwọ na-ede akwụkwọ nkpirikpi
Kemgbe afọ 2014 ụlọ ya dị na Prague
A mụrụ Helen Oyeyemi n'afọ 1984 na Naijiria mana o toro na Lewisham,na Saụt Lọndọn ma nna ya bụ onye nnọchi anya onye nkuzi ma nne na-arụ ọrụ na London Underground
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cambridge
Ọ bi na Prague ugbu a
Oyeyemi dere akwụkwọ mbụ ya, The Icarus Girl, mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ A-level ya na Kadịnal Vaughan Memorial School

Ka ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ sayensị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Corpus Christi College, Cambridge, Oyeyemi hụrụ egwuregwu abụọ ya, Juniper's Whitening na Victimese, nke ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya mere iji too ya, na nke Methuen mechara bipụta
N'afọ 2007, Bloomsbury bipụtara akwụkwọ nke abụọ nke Oyeyemi, The Opposite House, nke sitere n’akụkọ ọdịnala ndị Kuba
Akwụkwọ nke atọ ya, White Is for Witching, nke akọwapụtara na o nwere 'mgbọrọgwụ na Henry James na Edgar Allan Poe ', nke Picador bipụtara n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2009

Akwụkwọ nke anọ, Mr Fox ('ntụgharị uche nke gbasara odide ihe nke jupụtara navignettes nke n'akowa otu asụsụ si atọhapụ ma ọ bụ amachi', Anita Sethi bụ onye dere nke a), bụ Picador bipụtara n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2011, na nke ise, Boy, Snow, Bird, in 2014
Oyeyemi bipụtara nchịkọta akụkọ What Is Not Yours Is Not Yours, n'afọ 2016 mana ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ, akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ Gingerbread, ka e bipụtara n'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2019
Otu n’ime ọtụtụ ihe e dere n’edemede Oyeyemi bụ agbụrụ na ị cha ọcha, ọkachasị na 'Boy, Snow, Bird'
Oyeyemi na-ekwu na ọ metụtara ya site n'akwụkwọ ọ gụrụ na nwata ebe a kọwara ndị isi ojii n'ụzọ nleda anya
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ White Is for Witching ruruogo nke ikpeazụ nke Shirley Jackson Award nke afọ 2009 ma wee nweta akara ugo mmụta Somerset Maugham Award nke afọ 2010
N’afọ 2009 ka a mara Oyeyemi dịka otu n’ime ụmụ nwanyị nọ na ndepụta nke “25 under 25” nke Venus Zine
N'afọ 2013, e tinyere ya na ndepụta Granta Best of Young British Novelists
Boy, Snow, Bird ruru agba nke ikpeazụ na Los Angeles Times Book Prize n'afọ 2014
Boy, Snow, Bird nwetara PEN Open Book Award maka ọrụ akwụkwọ pụrụ iche nke onye edemede nke abụghị onye ọcha e bipụtara n'afọ 2016
Oyeyemi bụ onye ọka ikpe na Booktrust Independent Foreign Fiction Prize for 2015, wee rụọ ọrụ ka onye ọka ikpe maka 2015 Scotiabank Giller Nrite
A họpụtakwara Oyeyemi ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị Royal Society of Literature n'afọ 2013
Helen Paul bụ oye na akpa ochi, na-agụ egwú ma na-eme ihe nkiri si na Nigeria
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ọchị, nke a maara dị ka Tatafo, nke oji ụda olu nwatakịrị eme
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ guru akwụkwọ weta akara doctorate na Theater Arts na University of Lagos
Paul rụrụ ọrụ ma jee ozi dị ka onye nwe onwe ya na onye na ekwuputa okwu n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na Nigeria
Ndị a gụnyere Lagos Television (LTV 8), Continental Broadcasting Service (CBS), na MNet (ebe ọ na-akwuputa okwu na ihe ngoso ana akpọ JARA ugbu a na Africa Magic)
Paul malitere ịme ịhe egwurịegwu dika onye nzuzu na ịhe egwurịegwu redio a nakpọ Wetin Dey na Radio Continental 1023FM, Lagos
A maara ya na ịhe egwurịegwu ahụ dị ka 'Tatafo' ebe oji ịhe egwurịegwu na ekwu okwu gbasara ịhe na eme na obodo
O bukwa onye na aguputa ịhe emume na ịhe oyoyo TV Continental na Naija FM 1027

Na ọnwa Julaị 2012 Paul wepụtara albom egwu izizi ya bụ Welcome Party, nke nwere abụ Afro-Pop dịka 'Boju Boju', 'Vernacular', 'Gbedu', 'God Forbid', na egwu Afro RnB akpọrọ 'Children of the world', na 'Use Calculator', nke bụ abụ mmụta banyere nje HIV-AIDs
O mechara wepụta egwu ndị ozo gụnyere 'Take it Back'
Na afọ 2018, o weputara ihe nkiri otu egwu ya akpọrọ 'Never Knew', bu egwu nbulịte obi gbasara oge ọpere npe ma ka osi bido
Paul bidoro ebe ana ere akwa agbamakwụkwọ na Lagos na 2012, a na-akpọ Massive Fabrics and Bridals
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ mepere ụlọ ahịa atọ na mpaghara dị iche iche nke Lagos
Na 2014, o meghere ulo akwukwo ana akuzị maka ịme ịhe nkiri ana akpọ Helen Paul Theater na Film Academy

Ụlo akwukwọ a nwere ụlọ ịgba egwu, ụlọ ihe etemeete, ebe a na etiye egwu na igwe okwu, ebe a na-amụ maka ịme ịhe egwurịegwu, ebe a na-ese foto, ebe a na-edebe akwụkwọ na intanetị, na ụlọ obibi maka ụmụ akwụkwọ
Paul lụrụ Femi Bamisile ma nwee ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Helen Prest-Ajayi, nke bụbu Prest-Davies, ( née Prest, a mụrụ 17 Septemba 1959) bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjirịa, onye edemede ma bụbu onye meriri okpueze na asọmpi nwanyị mara mma
Helen toro na England
Ọ gara International School Ibadan ma nweta asambodo A-Levels na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
Mgbe e nyechara ya okpueze Miss Nigeria mgbe ọ dị afọ 19 na 1979, ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na asọmpi Miss World ma kwalite agụmakwụkwọ ya na King's College London, nweta LLM
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka onye na-ede akụkọ na 1990s
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi nke Media Business Company
Ọ bụ nwa nwa nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria bụ Arthur Prest na ada nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ Chief Michael Godwin Prest
Ọ mụrụ ụmụ nwanyị atọ
Ọ lụrụ di ya mbu, onye ọchụnta ego; Jimmy Davies, mgbe alụm di na nwunye ahụ mechara, o ya lụọ Dr Tosin Ajayi
Helen Evans Ramsaran (amụrụ na Mee 11, 1943) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha ụwa mbụ nke ememe ógè ochie, ihe omimi fossil fossil, ike omimi, na ihe owuwu sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Africa
Ọrụ Ramsaran sitere na njem ọ gàrà Africa n'afọ 1981, ọ bụ ezie na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya adịghị ndụ, enwere mmetụta zoro ezo nke ọnụnọ mmadụ
Ọrụ ya na-adịbeghị ányá na-enyocha mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na usoro na ihe onwunwe na-akwado ndụ, ọkachasị usoro okike mmírí na ụdị osisi na anụmanụ
A mụrụ Helen Ramsaran na Bryan, Texas na 1943
O nwetara nzèrè bachelọ nke sayensị na nka nka (1965) na Masters of Fine Art na ihe ọkpụkpụ (1968) na Mahadum steeti Ohio, ébé ọ gụrụ ọla nchara n'okpuru David Black na ịgbado ọkụ na John Freeman
Site na 1968-69, Ramsaran kụziri na Mahadum Florida A&M ma mesịa na Mahadụ Bowie State na Maryland site na 1970 ruo 1973
Ọ gụrụ foto na New School for Social Research na New York (1973 Xi na 1974), na eserese anatomical na Art Students League na New York site na 1975-1976
Ramsaran lara ezumike nká dị ka osote prọfesọ nké nka na John Jay College nke City of University of New York na 2008
Ramsaran kwagara New York City na 1973
N'oge na-adịghị ányá mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị (1978), o mepụtara usoro ihe osise ọla nchara a na-akpọ Visual Tales
Nke a bụ naanị usoro ya nke na-akọ akụkọ ndụ onwe ónyé na nkwupụta ya ma na-ewere ụdị akụkọ anya
Ihe oyiyi na ụdị dị ka calligraphic, si otú a na-eweta nsogbu ụfọdụ dị nro ma na-esiri ike
N'ịrụ ọrụ a na Johnson Atelier Technical Institute of Sculpture na Princeton, New Jersey, Ramsaran nwèrè ike imeziwanye usoro nke ịkpụpụta ihe ndị dị nro
Usoro Ramsaran na-adịbeghị ányá, nke e ji ụrọ ọcha a tụrụ atụ gbuo, abụghị ihe mgbagwoju ányà dị ka ọrụ ndị mbụ mana ha ka na-ekwurịta otu mgbagwoju ike na nrụgide anụ ahụ
Ebumnuche nke iberibe ndị a bụ ịnọchite anya ọnwụ nke coral reef na usoro ndị ọzọ na-akwado ndụ n'ihi mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe
Helen Mercedes Sauls-August bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye isi oche nke Eastern Cape Provincial Legislature ugbu a
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na Mee 2019
Ọ rụburu ọrụ dị ka MEC nke mpaghara maka Human Settlement na MEC maka Ahụike
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke African National Congress
Sauls-August bụkwa onye kansụl nke Nelson Mandela Metropolitan Municipality
Àtụ Members of the Eastern Cape Provincial LegislatureÀtụ S-start
Àtụ S-off
Àtụ Succession box
Àtụ S-end

Mmakgabo Mmapula Mmangankato Helen Sebidi (ubochí isé n'ọnwa Machị 1943) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa nke amụrụ na Marapyane (Skilpadfontein) nso Hamanskraal, Pretoria ónyé bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg

A nọchitere anya ọrụ Sebidi na nchịkọta onwé na nke ọha na eze, gụnyere na National Museum of Women in the Arts, Washington na New York na Smithsonian National Museum of African Art, New York, na World Bank
A nabatara ọrụ ya na mbà ụwa na mpaghara
N'afọ 1989, ọ meriri ihe nrite Standard Bank Young Artist, na-aghọ nwanyị ojii mbụ meriri ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2004, Ónyé isi ala Thabo Mbeki nyèrè ya Order of Ikhamanga na Silver nke bụ nsọpụrụ kachasị elu e nyèrè ndị a na-ewere dị ka 'akụ̀ dị oké ọnụ ahịa mba'
N'afọ 2011, e nyèrè ya ònyìnyé Arts and Culture Trust (ACT) Lifetime Achievement Award for Visual Art, ebe n'afọ 2015 ọ natara Mbokodo Award
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2018, a kwanyeere Sebidi ugwu site n'otu n'ime ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Norval Foundation na Cape Town

Ọrụ ya na-anọchite anya ụdị ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ógè a n'Afrịka, ébé ọ na-egosipụta ahụmịhe ya nke itolite ma biri n'ime ime ọbọdọ South Africa, na mgbè e mesịrị ahụmịhe ọ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe ojii, na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ihe osise Sebidi na-egosipụtakarị ihe ndị Afrịka na-enweghị atụ na agba na-egbuke egbuke na palette bàrà ọgaranya
A na-ejikọkarị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị na-eme ihe n'eziokwu na ndị na-egosipụta ihe, ya na ihe osise ya doro anya nke ndụ na ime ọbọdọ na ọbọdọ ukwu South Africa na ihe ndị a tụrụ atụ
A mụrụ Mmakgabo Mmapula Helen Sebidi na Marapyane, na mpụga Hammanskraal, South Africa
Ọ mụtara ọrụ aka nke murals, ịkpa akwa na ịkwa akwa, embroidery na beadwork, na ịchọ mma calabash site n'aka nné nnè ya
Aha Sebidi, 'Mmakgabo', nke pụtara 'ónyé na-edebe ire ọkụ', na-ezo aka n'omume ọrụ nne nne ya na nkwenye na ọrụ ọrụ ákà n'ịmepụta ọbọdọ
Sebidi gara klas na Dorkay House mgbè ọ zutere Jonathan Koenakeefe Mohl na mberede
Ọ mụụrụ ya ise ihe, na-aga n'ihu site na osisi gaa na ọdịdị ala gaa na ụlọ ọbọdọ
Sebidi laghachiri n'ọbọdọ ya mgbè nné nnè ya dara ọrịa n'etiti afọ ndị 1970
O mèrè ihe osise banyéré agbụrụ ya na agbụrụ Mohl site na ọnwụ nne nne ya na mbido afọ 1980
Nne nne ya hapụrụ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na nzuzo ma nye Sebidi akụkọ ihe méré eme
O jikọtara ya na ọtụtụ òtù nka na ndị na-ese ihe Bill Ainslie na David Koloane
Otu isiokwu a na-ahụkarị n'ọrụ nka Sebidi bụ nloghachi nke ụkpụrụ omume, ọkachasị ndị metụtara Africa tupu ọchịchị

Helen Steven (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 19 Ọktoba 1942 n'ụbọchị 12 Eprel 2016) bụ onye Quaker na-eme udo na Scotland na otu n'ime ndị guzobere Scottish Center for Nonviolence E ji onyinye Gandhi International Peace Award kwado mmegide ya megide ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nuklia dị na Scotland n'afọ 2004
Steven gụrụ akwụkwọ na Laurel Bank School na Mahadum Glasgow, ma rụọ ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye nkuzi akụkọ ihe mere eme
O wepụtara onwe ya na Peace Corps na Vietnam na mbido afọ 1970, ma chọta mkpebi ya na pacifism na ahụmịhe ya na Vietnam
Ya na onye mmekọ ya Ellen Moxley, o guzobere Peace House dị nso na Dunblane n'afọ 1985, na-enye ọzụzụ na udo, ikpe ziri ezi na ime ihe ike na-abụghị ime ihe ike
Ihe karịrị puku mmadụ iri gara ọmụmụ ihe ahụ n'ime afọ iri na abụọ
N'oge ahụ, Steven na Moxley họọrọ ibi n'okpuru ọnụego ụtụ isi, yabụ na ha agaghị enye aka n'inye ego maka ngwá agha nuklia nke Britain
Steven mechara nyere aka guzobe Scottish Centre for Nonviolence n'afọ 1999
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechiri n'afọ 2007, mana n'oge ahụ Steven nwere ike ịmepụta usoro na-abụghị ime ihe ike maka nzere masta nke Mahadum Open kwadoro
Helen Amelia Thomas (Amụrụ n'ọnwa August 4, 1920 n'ọnwa July 20, 2013) bụ onye nta akụkọ America na onye edemede, na onye na-eje ozi ogologo oge na White House press corps
Ọ kpuchiri White House n'oge ọchịchị nke ndị isi ala US iri site na mmalite nke ọchịchị Kennedy ruo n'afọ nke abụọ nke ọchịchị Obama
Thomas rụrụ ọrụ na United Press na onye nọchiri United Press International (UPI) ruo afọ 57, nke mbụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ, ma mesịa dị ka onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ White House
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ maka Hearst Newspapers site n'afọ 2000 ruo afọ 2010, na-ede banyere ihe omume mba na White House
Thomas bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi nke National Press Club, nwanyị mbụ so na onye isi oche nke White House Correspondents' Association na nwanyị mbụ so n'òtù Gridiron Club
O dere akwụkwọ isii; nke ikpeazụ ya (ya na onye edemede Craig Crawford) bụ Listen Up, Mr
President Everything You Always Wanted Your President to Know and Do (2009)
DJA mụrụ ya na Winchester, Kentucky, Thomas bụ nwa nke asaa n'ime ụmụ itoolu nke George na Mary (Rowady) Thomas, ndị si Tripoli, Lebanon (nke bụ akụkụ nke Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman n'oge ahụ)
Thomas kwuru na aha nna ya, 'Antonious', bụ 'Thomas' mgbe ọ banyere na US na Ellis Island, nakwa na ndị mụrụ ya enweghị ike ịgụ ma ọ bụ dee
A zụlitere Thomas na Detroit, Michigan, ebe ezinụlọ ya kwagara mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, na ebe nna ya na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa nri
Banyere ahụmịhe ya na-etolite, Thomas kwuru, sị
N'oge onye isi ala George W
Bush nke mbụ, Thomas meghachiri omume na nkwupụta odeakwụkwọ mgbasa ozi Ari Fleischer banyere mbupu ngwá agha nye ndị na-eyi ọha egwu site n'ịjụ 'Ebee ka ndị Israel na-enweta ngwá agha ha?'
Helen Ukaonu (amụrụ ya n'ọnwa 17 Mee 1991, Abuja ) bu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nwanyị Naijiria
Mgbe oge anọ gachara na Sunnanå SK, emezigharịghị nkwekọrịta Ukaona na Disemba 2014
Helen Ukpabio bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi African Evangelical franchise Liberty Foundation Gospel Ministries nke di na Calabar, Cross River State, Nigeria
A na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ na-akpata mkpagbu zuru ebe niile, ịta ahụhụ na ọnwụ ike nke ụmụaka ndị eboro ebubo amoosu
A mụrụ Ukpabio na obodo Mbent, Imo State, Nigeria, ma o luru Dr
Elijah Ukpabio
O muru ụmụ atọ
N'oge ọ bụ nwata ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St
George's Catholic School dị na Falomo, ụlọ akwụkwọ Jinadu Anglican dị na Obalende na ụlọ akwụkwọ Methodist Girls' School na Ikot Ekpene, Akwa Ibom State, ha niile di na ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria
N'afọ 1992, Ukpabio guzobere Liberty Foundation Gospel Ministries ,nwee ebumnobi igbasa nkowa akwukwo nso n'uzo nke ya nye ndi obodo West Africa
Ukpabio na ndi otu ya kwenyere na ekwensu nwere ike igosipụta onwe ya n'ime ahụ ụmụaka site n'iji mmụọ ọjọọ mee ka ha bụrụ ndị otu ya n'ụdị 'amoosu ndi nwanyima ọ bụ amksu ndi nwoke

Na-ichoputa nkwenye ụgha, okachasi ndị metụtara mmụọ ma ọ bụ mmụọ ọjọọ ma ọ bụ amoosu, Nzuko Helen Ukpabio etoola nke ukwuu na Nigeria na West Africa kemgbe ntọala yaUgbuq enwere nnukwu ụka Liberty Gospel na Cameroon, Ghana na South Africa nakwa Nigeria
Ụkpabio ebipụtala echiche ya n'akwụkwọ dị iche iche
Ọmụmaatụ bụ 'Ikpughe Ihe omimi nke Amoosu', nke o kwuru na
Tupu maobu na afo abuo , nwatakịrị ahụ na-eti mkpu n'abalị, na-ebe ákwá,nwekwa iba mberede na-akawanye njọ na ahụ ike, na-etinye àgwà nke egwu, o nwekwara Ike anaghiberi nri ofuma
Ọ na-emepụtakwa, site na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri ya, Liberty Films, otu ngalaba nke Liberty Foundation Gospel Ministries ọtụtụ ihe nkiri iji gbasaa echiche na ụmụaka nwere ike ịnwe mmụọ ọjọọ
Nke kacha ewu ewu n'ime ihe ndị a bụ njedebe nke ndị ajọ omume nke gosiri na ụmụaka na-eme ihe nkiri na-eri anụ mmadụ na-egbu ndị mụrụ ha
Ihe omume ya abụghị naanị Naijiria
Ukpabio kwuputara na ya ga-ekwusa ozi ọma na Limbe, Cameroon, iji kwalite mmemme ọ kpọrọ 'Nnwere Onwe Site n'ọchịchịrị Ezinụlọ siri ike', Ọktoba 18–22, 2017
Ọ na-akpalite ogbaghara megide ndị amoosu a nke n abukari ụmụaka , umuwanyi na ndi okenye
Ndị Cameroon kwesịrị iguzogide Ukpabio
Ha kwesịrị ịjụ 'ozi ọma' ya nke ịkpọasị na nkewa n'ezinụlọ na obodo

N'afọ 2007 otu akwụkwọ akụkọ Observer kwuru na Ukpabio na ndị ụkọchukwu ozioma ndị ọzọ na-agba ume ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụaka na-ebo ebubo amoosu na ndị nne na nna na ndị obodo na emegide ma na-akparị ha n'ihi ya

N'afọ 2008, akwụkwọ akụkọ TV Dispatches Saving Africa's Witch Children nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi UK Channel 4 kwuru na echiche nke ọ na-ekwupụta ebutela nnukwu mmụba na ụmụaka ndị ezinaụlọ ha na-emegide ma na agbahapụ na West Africa, okachasi na steeti Akwa Ibom, Nigeria
The Telegraph Tọzdee 14 Eprel 2011
A kọwo ebubo ahụ na ịgbachitere ya megide ha na New York Times
Ogbako 2009 na Naijiria nke na-akatọ nzukọ ya bụ ndị otu ya mebiri nke ukwuu
Na 2014, Ukpabio wetara ikpe nkwutọ megide British Humanist Association (BHA) na Witchcraft and Human Rights Information Network (WHRIN) na-achọ ugwo mmezi nke £ 500,000,000
Ukpabio na-ekwu na ndị BHA kwutoro ya site n'ikwu na ọ kwuru na omume ụfọdụ ụmụaka na-enwe bụ ihe nke ekwensu mgbe ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ 'ndị mmụọ amoosu' nwere
BHA kọwara ikpe a dị ka njem nlegharị anya nkwutọ
Ka o zigachara ndị mmadụ ka ha kpasasịa ọgbakọ onye mmadụ Leo Igwe duziri n'afọ 2009, ọ gbara akwụkwọ maka $13m megide gọọmentị maka inye ndị uwe ojii ka ha chekwa ndị otu Igwe
E wepuru uche na qkukwo ahi ogbarq Ukpabio jikwara nkwuto megide otu ndị ọzọ nke omume ya, ọkachasị otu na-abụghị gọọmentị Stepping Stones Nigeria
Ndị Home Office egbochila ya ịbanye Great Britain site n'ịkagbu visa ya mgbe oku sitere n'aka ndị mgbasa ozi na 2014 ka amachibio ya na Britain n'ihi ihe nchebe ụmụaka
Helen Yawson (née Obadagbonyi, amụrụ na 3 Julaị 1967) bụ onye na ede egwu ozioma nakwazi onye na akposa ozioma bi na ghana
A mụrụ Helen Yawson na London n'afọ 1967
Mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, ọ gara biri na Lagos, Nigeria wee laghachi London mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
Ikike ya ịbụ abụ pụtara ìhè site Mgbe odi na Nwata onwere obi ike nakwazi ntukwasa onwe obi na akuku ọrua
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ laghachiri London n'afọ 1986, ọ sonyeere ozi Ndị Kraịst nke Matthew Ashimolowo na-eto eto ebe ọ Nakwere ihe ịma aka nke akporo to get serious with God
N'afọ 1988, Helen sonyeere Kingsway Foursquare Church Band; mgbe ahụ n'afọ 1989, ọ sonyeere ndị na ekwe egwu na ụlọ uka wee buru Onye Ndu ha na ikwe egwu
N'ime afọ asaa sochirinụ, ụdị ya dị ike ma na-efe efe mere ka ndị otu ahụ na-eto eto na-eto eto na ụdị ofufe n'ọtụtụ nleta na Nigeria na Canada, yana UK niile
N'inwe mmetụta na ọ na-aza oku maka ọrụ okpukpe, Yawson kwagara Accra, Ghana n'afọ 2002 ebe Matthew Ashimolowo họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Reverend Minister n'otu afọ ahụ
Helen jere ozi kemgbe ọ bịarutere Ghana dị ka Onye isi nke ngalaba egwu na okike ma ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi KICC Winning Women Ministries
Helen Yawson lụrụ Andrew Yawson, di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ

onodu Helen nakwa mbo o na agba na otu ahu na ekwe egwu nakwa nke na agba egwu nke ana akpo Kingsway international Christian center (kicc)biara Mgbe ha kwesiri I bia but Mgbe ụlọ uka ahu ji ike na ebube na etolite dika ogbako kasi di elu na UK gbaa gburu gburunke onye nduzi ya nakwa onye nkuzi ya bu Matthew ashimolowoimirikiti nari mmadu ndị na amaghi Christ makwara ya

Na afo 1997 onyinye a enyere Helen dotirikwara nke mere ka oburu onye nhazi egwu na kicc,s North London satellite church na onye na eduzi otu mmadu asato na aku egwu nakwa ndịna agba egwuna enye Kwara aka na nhazi nari mmadu ndị Siri ike na ikwe ukwe

Helen Yawson bụ agbamume nye ọtụtụ ndị ka o meriri ihere na obi ike onwe onye na-adịghị mma iji bụrụ ihe dị oké ọnụ ahịa ọ bụ taa, na ọnụnọ ọkwa a na-apụghị ịgbagha agbagha na ikike zoro ezo imetụ ndụ aka
Ndị nduzi ya bụ Helen Baylor, Shirley Caesar na Babbie Mason
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ya na ndị ozioma ukwu, ndị dị ka Andraé Crouch, Alvin Slaughter, Ron Kenoly, Jessy Dixon, Mary Mary na Daniel Winans
O doro anya na ụlọ ekpere ozi Helen Yawson bụ ihe pụrụ iche, nke a na-eji obi nwanyị kpebisiri ike idu mba dị iche iche iche n'ezi ofufe na-enweghị nchịkwa nye Chineke nke na-achọsi ya ike

Ọchịchọ ya bụ ịnọgide na-ejikọta akaoru efu ahu chineke nyere ha na egosikwa ihunanya diegwu na ebe chineke no na ekwusa ozioma chineke nye ndị ana azoputaghi na agba Kwa ndị kweere ume ka ha na ebi Ndu mmeri nakwa nke otuto juputara na ya
obu ihe na agu ya agu ihu Onye obula ma nwoke ma nwanyi iguzosi ike na ịbụ Onye na efe chineke na eziokwu
Otta Helene Maree (née Zille /ˈzɪlə/; Amụrụ na 9 Machị 1951), nke a maara dị ka Helen Zille, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke Federal Council nke Democratic Alliance kemgbe ụbọchị 20 Ọktoba 2019
Site n'afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2019, ọ bụ onye isi ala nke mpaghara Western Cape maka afọ ise abụọ, yana onye otu Western Cape Provincial Parliament
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ala nke Democratic Alliance site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2015 na dị ka onye obodo Cape Town site n'afọ 2006 ruo afọ 2009

Zille is a former journalist and anti-apartheid activist and was one of the journalists who exposed the cover-up around the death of Black Consciousness leader Steve Biko while working for the Rand Daily Mail in the late 1970s
She also worked with the Black Sash and other pro-democracy groups during the 1980s

In the political arena, Zille has served in all three tiers of government, as the Western Cape's education MEC (1999 ruo afọ 2001), as a Member of Parliament (2004 ruo afọ 2006), as Mayor of Cape Town (2006 ruo afọ 2009), and as Premier of the Western Cape (2009 ruo afọ 2019)
Ọ lụrụ Prọfesọ Johann Maree na 1982, ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Ọ bụ onye otu Rondebosch United Church na Cape Town
Helena Cobban onye (amụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ onye edemede na onye nchọpụta na mmekọrịta mba ụwa, nwere mmasị pụrụ iche na Middle East, usoro mba ụwa, na ikpe ziri ezi
Ọ bụ onye isi na-abụghị onye bi na Washington DC-based Center for International Policy
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, Just World Books na onye isi isi oche nke obere ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na-enweghị uru, Just World Educational
Ebe ọ na-enye aka n'ọrụ ya niile n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ma dee akwụkwọ asaa, ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ edemede ya n'afọ 2019

A mụrụ ya na Abingdon, England n'afọ 1952 nye James Cobban na Lorna Mary Cobban, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Queen Anne's School, Caversham na St Hugh's College, Oxford, ebe ọ natara BA (Hons) na Philosophy na Economics na 1973
E nyere ya MA site na Oxford n'afọ 1981
N'afọ 1982, ọ kwagara na United States iji nweta mkpakọrịta nyocha na Harvard University Center for International Affairs, ebe o dere akwụkwọ mbụ ya, The Palestinian Liberation Organisation
E bipụtara ya n'asụsụ Bekee n'afọ 1984, a sụgharịrị ya n'asụ Arabic na ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ, ma ka na-ebipụta ya
Kemgbe ahụ, o bipụtara akwụkwọ isii ọzọ atọ ndị ọzọ gbasara ajụjụ gbasara agha na udo nke Middle East, na atọ gbasara okwu mba ụwa ndị ọzọ
Akwụkwọ ya nke asaa, Re-engage! E bipụtara American and the World After Bush na 2008
Rep
Lee H

Hamilton, onye isi oche nke Iraq Study Group, kọwara ya dị ka, 'Onye na-akpali akpali, nke na-akpata echiche, na nke dị mfe site n'aka onye nta akụkọ a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke ukwuu banyere otu anyị niile, dị ka ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, nwere ike isi mee ihe iji nyere mba anyị na ụwa anyị aka
' O nyekwara isiakwụkwọ na ihe dị ka akwụkwọ ndị ọkà mmụta 20 nke ndị ọzọ dezigharịrị
Site n'afọ 1991 ruo afọ 1993, ọ bụ onye isi nke ọrụ Middle East na Search for Common Ground, na Washington, DC

Site n' afọ 1990 ruo afọ 2007, Cobban nyere kọlụm oge niile na nsogbu ụwa na The Christian Science Monitor, ma site n'afọ 1993 ruo afọ 2006 o nyere kọlụlụm dị iche na asụsụ Arabic nke mba ụwa Al-Hayat
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2003, ọ malitere ibipụta 'Just World News', blọọgụ gbasara nsogbu ụwa nke nwetara ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na mba ụwa ma depụta ya na Le Monde diplomatique na ebe ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Boston Review, ebe o bipụtara edemede banyere nsogbu ndị Palestine na Israel, Iraq, na ajụjụ ikpe ziri ezi mgbe esemokwu gasịrị
Na ngwụcha afọ 2000 ọ nyere aka na nyocha akụkọ kwa izu banyere mmepe Middle East na Inter Press Service ma nye onyinye oge na ForeignPolicycom na The Christian Science Monitor
Na Machị afọ 2010, o guzobere 'Just World Books'
N'ime afọ asatọ sochirinụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bipụtara aha iri atọ na asatọ mbụ na Middle East na nsogbu mba ndị ọzọ
Na mbido afọ 2018, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ banyere n'ịnye utu aha ọhụrụ ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-edebe utu aha ndị dị ugbu a na mbipụta ma na-ere ikike enyemaka maka ha
Cobban wee nwekwuo oge na-agba ọsọ Just World Educational, nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2019, ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ edemede ya
Ọ bụ onye otu Charlottesville Friends Meeting na Charlottesille, Virginia
Cobban bụbu onye otu International Institute for Strategic Studies, ma nọrọ na Middle East Advisory Committee of Human Rights Watch
N'afọ 2007 ọ bụ 'Enyi na Washington' na Kọmitii Ndị Enyi na Iwu Mba
Ọ lụrụ William B
Quandt, onye bụ Edward R
Stettinius, Jr, Prọfesọ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Virginia

Site na akụkọ ya na ọrụ nyocha ya, Cobban enyela aka dị ịrịba ama na ọmụmụ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Palestine, ime udo nke Israel-Palestine, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Lebanọn, ime udo Israel-Syria, agha US na Iraq, na ọmụmụ sara mbara nke Middle East

Maka akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 1984 The Palestinian Liberation Organisation People, Power, and Politics ọ gbara ọtụtụ ndị guzobere na ndị isi nke PLO ajụjụ ọnụ ma jiri ọtụtụ ihe mbụ anakọtara n'oge ọrụ akụkọ ya na Beirut na ngwụcha afọ 1970
N'akwụkwọ ahụ, o kwubiri na etiti nke mmegharị mba Palestine na-agbanwe n'ebe ndị Palestine bi n'ime ala nna ha nọ, nchọpụta nke gosipụtara na ọ bụ eziokwu mgbe Intifada Mbụ malitere na 1987
A katọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ nke ukwuu na nyocha nke Daniel Pipes dere maka Washington Post
N'agbata afọ 1984 na afọ 2000, Cobban bipụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu na isiakwụkwọ akwụkwọ gbasara ọganihu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Palestine

Kemgbe afọ 2001 o bipụtara ọtụtụ edemede ogologo banyere isiokwu ahụ na Boston Review, gụnyere edemede abụọ gbasara Hamas nke sitere na mkparịta ụka mbụ ya na ndị isi Hamas, gụnyere Khaled Meshaal na Ismail Haniyeh
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2009, ọ gbara Meshaal ajụjụ ọnụ ọzọ, ebe o kwuru, 'Agwara m na m na-anabata steeti Palestine ma ọ bụrụ na Israel na-alaghachi na akara tupu afọ 1967
Nke ahụ anaghị akagbu eziokwu akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Israel bi na 1948, mana Hamas na akụkụ ndị ọzọ niile anabatala ngwọta a nke steeti Palestine na akara 1967

O dere ọtụtụ isiokwu, isi akwụkwọ, na blọọgụ banyere nsogbu dị n'ọhịa a, na-arụ ụka karịsịa na United States na ndị ọzọ na-akwado mmekọrịta udo kwesịrị ilekwasị anya ngwa ngwa iji nweta nkwekọrịta udo ikpeazụ kama igbu oge na isi obodo ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achụ nkwekọrịta nwa oge
Nke a gụnyere ịma aka ịdabere na usoro nkwekọrịta tupu nkwekọrịta ntụkwasị obi dị ka Dennis Ross na ndị ọzọ kwadoro
Cobban enyerela aka iduzi, ma ọ bụ sonye na, ọtụtụ mmemme nkwurịta okwu Track II n'etiti ndị Israel na ndị Palestine ma mepụta nyocha ụfọdụ gbasara uru na ọnyà nke mgbalị ndị dị otú ahụ
N'afọ 2009 na 2010 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Council for the National Interest

N'akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 1985, ọ nyochara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Lebanọn dị ka nsonaazụ mmekọrịta dị mgbagwoju anya n'etiti ndị mmadụ dị iche iche nke mba ahụ, nke ọ kewara dabere na nyocha nke Fuad Khuri 'òtù' na 'ndị pere mpe'
Akwụkwọ ahụ, nke wuru na akụkọ dị ukwuu n'ala, chọpụtara ma nyochaa ịrị elu nke obodo Shiite nke mba ahụ na-anọghị n'obodo
O mere ọtụtụ njem akụkọ laghachi na Lebanọn mgbe afọ 1999 gasịrị, ma bipụta akụkọ abụọ a ma ama banyere ịrị elu nke Hezbollah
Akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 1991 nyochara njikọ nke mmekọrịta Siria na Israel na nchegbu zuru oke nke Agha Nzuzo
Zbigniew Brzezinski kọwara ya dị ka 'nnukwu nghọta na nke dị jụụ nke nsogbu dị mgbagwoju anya n'ezie'
N'akwụkwọ edemede nke afọ 1997, ọ malitere ile anya na nkwekọrịta udo na-amị mkpụrụ nke na-eme n'ụzọ a kemgbe Nzukọ Madrid nke afọ 1991
Ọ gbasaa ọrụ ahụ n'akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 2000, nke Raymond Hinnebusch kọwara dị ka 'A ga-agụ maka onye ọ bụla nwere mmasị na Middle East ma ọ bụ usoro nke mkparịta ụka udo n'ozuzu'

Akwụkwọ Cobban dere n'afọ 2006 bụ Amnesty after Atrocity? Healing Nations after Genocide and War Crimes nyochara nsonaazụ ya dịka ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya si dị iche iche nke South Africa, Rwanda, na Mozambique mere na mbido ruo n'etiti afọ ndị 1990, ka ha na-anwa ịnagide ihe nketa dị egwu nke arụrụala mere n'oge mbụ nke agha obodo na ime ihe ike
Nke a bụ otu n'ime mgbalị mbụ iji nabata usoro bara uru maka ihe ịma aka nke ikpe ziri ezi, isiokwu nke ọtụtụ ndị nchọpụta mbụ bịakwutere n'ụzọ siri ike

FtOtu n'ime nchọpụta ya a ma ama bụ na nkezi ego nke ịnwale onye na-eme ihe na ICTR bụ $ 423 nde, ebe nkezi ego maka nhazi onye ọ bụla a na-ebo ebubo na Kọmitii Eziokwu na Mmekọrịta nke South Africa bụ $ 4,290 na ego nke ịhapụ na ịlaghachi n'ime ọha mmadụ onye ọ bụla bụbu onye agha obodo site na agha obodo na South Africa na Mozambique ọtụtụ n'ime ha mere ihe ike dị n'okpuru $ 1,100

N'oge na mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ n'akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ gbara ajụjụ ọnụ na nyocha akwụkwọ na mba atọ ọ mụrụ; na International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda, International Criminal Tribune for former Yugoslavia; na Northern Uganda
O bipụtara ihe odide na edemede na-atụgharị uche site na ọtụtụ n'ime njem ndị a na blọọgụ 'Just World News' ya na blọọlụ Transitional Justice Forum nke e mepụtara n'ụzọ pụrụ iche
Helena Douglas (エレナ・ダグラス Erena Dagurasu?) bụ onye ọkpụkpọ na Dead or Alive usoro egwuregwu ọgụ nke Team Ninja na Koei Tecmo
E webatara ya na 1999's Dead or Alive 2 dị ka onye na-agụ egwu French opera na-achọ ịbọ ọbọ maka ogbugbu nne ya
N'ihi njikọ ọbara ya na Fame Douglas, onye isi mbụ nke nzukọ yiri ka ọ na-emegide asọmpi ọgụ Dead or Alive, ọ ghọwo onye dị mkpa na franchise, gụnyere ije ozi dị ka onye isi nke Dead or Alibe 4
Helena Douglas bụ nwa nwanyị amuma nke Fame Douglas na onye isi ya, onye soprano French aha ya bụ Maria
O yiri ka ọ dị anya site na nna ya, ogbugbu ya emetụtaghị Helena mgbe ọ nwụsịrị ma ọ bụ dị ndụ, kama ọ gbasoro nzọụkwụ nne ya site n'ịghọ onye na-agụ egwu opera nke ọma n'onwe ya

Otú ọ dị, a na-elekwasị ya anya n'onwe ya n'otu n'ime ihe ngosi ya, mana Maria hụrụ égbè onye na-egbu egbu na sekọnd ikpeazụ wee kpachara anya were égbè na-egbu ọchụ e bu n'obi maka nwa ya nwanyị, na-ahapụ Helena naanị ya ma na-achọ ịbọ ọbọ

Ọ malitere na Dead or Alive 2 (1999), ebe, mgbe ọ na-achọ onye gburu ya, ọ chọpụtara na ọnwụ ndị mụrụ ya na mgbalị igbu onwe ya nwere njikọ na Dead or Live (DOA) World Combat Championship, wee banye na asọmpi ahụ iji chọpụta eziokwu

Ọ bụ ezie na akọwaghị ya na usoro ahụ, Helena yiri ka ọ mụtara ma ọ bụ mara ozi gbasara Dead or Alive Tournament Executive Committee (DOATEC), karịsịa mgbe ọ zutere onye na-asọmpi amnesiac aha ya bụ Ein
Helena na-ekwu na Ayane bụ onye gburu nne ya, ebubo Ayane na-ekwenyeghị ma ọ bụ na-agọnahụ, nke na-akpata ọgụ n'etiti ha
Helena laghachiri maka Dead or Alive 3 (2001), onye iro Victor Donovan jidere ya ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ
Ọ bụ ezie na Helena na-ekwusi ike na ya na DOATEC enweghị njikọ, Donovan kwupụtara na nnwere onwe ya na mkpughe nke eziokwu n'azụ nna DOATECXI bụ onye isi nke nzukọ ahụ tupu ọnwụ ya na mmeri nke atọ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Donovan nyere Christie ka ọ na-ele ya anya, na-enye iwu igbu ya ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa
Otú ọ dị, mgbe Helena zutere ya, Christie kwetara na ọ bụ onye ogbu mmadụ e zigara iji kwụsị ya, mana mgbalị ahụ adaghị
Helena weghaara dịka onye isi oche ọhụrụ nke DOATEC na 2005's Dead or Alive 4, nke ọ bụ onye isi na ya
Ọ were onye ogbugbu Bayman n'ọrụ iji wepụ Donovan, ọrụ ọ jụrụ
Mgbe DOATEC Tritower na-abịa n'okpuru mwakpo nke Mugen Tenshin ninja clan, Helena zutere La Mariposa, onye kwetara na ọ ghọgburu ezinụlọ ahụ ka ha wakpo iji kwụsị Donovan
O mechara chọpụta na ya na Kokoro nwere njikọ ọbara, ebe nne ya Miyako bụ otu n'ime ndị isi nwanyị Fame Douglas
Kasumi mechara bịakwute Helena onye gwara ya ka ọ kwụsị agha dị n'etiti DOATEC na Mugen Tenshin
Helena jụrụ, na-ekwu na ha agaghị akwụsị ihe ọ bụla ruo mgbe e bibiri DOATEC, ọ dịkwa njikere ime ihe ọ bụla iji kwụsị Donovan na Alpha-152
Helena nwara iji égbè gbuo Kasumi mana Hayabusa zọpụtara ya
Helena mụtara eziokwu banyere Christieńs na-etinye aka na ọnwụ Maria ma ha zutere n'agha ọzọ, nke a na-amaghị ihe si na ya pụta, ma e wezụga eziokwu ahụ bụ na ha abụọ lanarịrị
Helena họọrọ ịga na DOATEC site na ime ka usoro mbibi onwe onye nke ụlọ ahụ rụọ ọrụ
Ozugbo e mere ka mbibi onwe onye rụọ ọrụ, ọ na-atụgharị uche n'oge ọ bụ nwata na ọnwụ nke Maria na onye ọzọ n'ime ndị nna ya hụrụ n'anya n'oge gara aga, Anna
Ka Ayane, Hayate, na Ryu Hayabusa na-agbawa isi ụlọ ọrụ DOATEC, Helena họọrọ ịhapụ ndụ ya n'ọkụ nke mkpọmkpọ ebe tupu Zack abịa na helikọpta iji napụta ya
Na Dead or Alive 5 (2012), Helena mechara were Zack n'ọrụ mgbe ọ na-akpọsa ya onye mmeri nke asọmpi nke anọ

Site n'enyemaka Zack, ọ ghọrọ onye ndú nke DOATEC ọhụrụ a gbanwere ma kwupụta mweghachi nke asọmpi Dead or Alive, wee kpọọ Hayate na Ayane ka ha nyere Kasumi aka n'ọrụ nke ikpeazụ nke ibibi ndị agha nke ndị ọjọọ nke onwe ya, ọ bụ ezie na Helena amaghị na Kasumi ọ hụrụ bụ n'ezie clone, ruo mgbe ezigbo Kasumi sonyeere ọgụ ahụ n'agha ikpeazụ

Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate gosipụtara odibo na-eguzosi ike n'ihe nke Helena bụ Marie Rose, onye Helena zigara ya ka ọ lelee onye na-eto eto na-alụ ọgụ nke a kpọpụtara na Dead or Aliva 5 Last Round aha ya bụ Honoka na Dead or Live 6, na-aghọta na MIST ga-atọrọ ya mgbe ọ hụrụ ike dị egwu n'ime Honoka n'ụbọchị mgbe a chụpụrụ onye agha ahụ a na asọmpi nke ise nke Asia

Ka Hayate zutere Rig n'oge na-adịghị anya n'abalị mgbe asọmpi nke ise gwụchara n'otu oge ahụ Helena setịpụrụ onwe ya mbibi DiG ebe MIST na-ezo, mana ọ bụghị n'ụzọ ọzọ o yiri ka ọ dị, Helena ghọtara ihe dị mwute mere Rig, ọ maghị ọbụna ihe merenụ mgbe e bibiri ya ma malite ibi na ụlọ Bass Armstrong na New York

Ọ bụ ezie na Lisa jisiri ike lanarị mgbawa ahụ na ebe mbụ ọ zoro na DiG, Helena gbalịrị ịjụ Lisa ka ọ ghara itinye onwe ya n'ihe ize ndụ iji kwụsị egwu Donovan, mana ọ ghọtara na nke ikpeazụ nwere isi ihe na-adịghị egbu oge iji hapụ onye ara dị ka Donovan ka ọ pụọ na mpụ ya

Mgbe Kokoro chọpụtara njikọ ya na nna ha nwụrụ anwụ bụ Fame, Helena sooro nwanne ya nwanyị nwee esemokwu banyere ezinụlọ ha na-abụghị nwunye ha, ruo mgbe Zack jisiri ike mee ka ọnọdụ ahụ dị jụụ, nke mere ka Helena belata

Ka Marie, Bayman na ndị ninja mechara chọta ebe nzuzo nke abụọ n'otu oge ahụ mgbe Honoka na Ayaneis ajọ nna Raidou dị ka onye cyber nukenin na-anwụghị anwụ, Helena na-eche onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na-eto eto nke duziri ọrụ mbilite n'ọnwụ n'azụ mweghachi Raidouis, NiCO, onye mekwara ka nne Helena Maria dịghachi n'èzí

Mgbe ọ ghọtara ihe atụmatụ NiCO bụ, Helena adịghị anabata iweghachi ndị mụrụ ha furu efu na ndụ, na-ekwu na mmadụ kwesịrị ịga n'ihu ma na-aṅụ iyi na NiCO ga-amụta otu ụbọchị ka ọ ga-aga n'ihu site na ihe mgbu ya dị ka Helena nwere
Helena nwere ike igwu egwu na egwuregwu spinoff Dead or Alive Xtreme Beach Volleyball (2003), Dead or Alibe Xtreme 2 (2006) na Dead or Aliva Paradise (2010), ka na-achụ Christie
Ọ laghachiri dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu itoolu na mbipụta 2016 Dead or Alive Xtreme 3 mgbe a họpụtara ya na ndepụta na ntuli aka ndị Japan
E depụtara Helena dị ka onye guzo 5'7' n'ịdị elu na 108 pound, nwere ogologo ntutu na-acha ọbara ọbara na anya na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, ebe nha ya bụ 35-22-34
Onyinye tupu ọ tụọ maka Dead or Alive 5 Last Round nke Amazoncom nyere gụnyere ejiji 'Showstopper' maka onye ahụ

Otu n'ime uwe Helena na Last Round bụ uwe nke onye na-ese ihe nkiri Tamiki Wakaki mepụtara, ebe ndị ọzọ gụnyere uwe Reina si Deception IV The Nightmare Princess, Vita Clotilde si Nihon Falcom's The Legend of Heroes Trails of Cold Steel, Prọfesọ Tierra si Square Enix's School Girl Strikers, na Aquarius si na manga na anime Fairy Tale, yana uwe ninja na uwe Garrison Regiment site na Attack on Titan

Dị ka IGN si kwuo, 'dị ka otu n'ime ihe odide kachasị mma na' Dead or Alive 3, 'Helena nwere nnukwu ụgbọala nke usoro pụrụ iche dị iche iche na nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ mwakpo kachasị ike na egwuregwu ahụ

' Ebe nrụọrụ ahụ gbakwunyere na 'mmegharị ya na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye agha kachasị mma' na usoro ahụ, na Dead or Alive Ultimate, Helena bụ 'nnukwu ngwakọta nke ụkwụ na ike aka' ma bụrụ 'ọ bụghị onye kachasị mfe iji zụta, mana mgbe ị na-achịkwa usoro ya, ị ga-achịkwa'
Hardcore Gaming 101 kwuru, 'A naghị ahụkarị ụdị nka ọgụ ya, Pi Gua Quan, n'egwuregwu ọgụ, [ma] na-adabere na mmegharị gburugburu ogologo oge iji nweta ume
' Helena bụ onye a na-apụghị imeghe na Dead or Alive 4, nke o nwere ọtụtụ 'ezi 'launcher' mwakpo' nke nwere ike iduga na combos juggle, dị ka GameSpy si kwuo
Helena bụ onye isi na ihe nkiri live-action nke afọ 2006 DOA Dead or Alive, nke Sarah Carter mere

Ọrụ Helena dị ka onye na-elekọta asọmpi ahụ ka dị, mana a na-eleghara akụkọ ihe mere eme ya anya ma nye ya àgwà dị mma nke dị iche na ọnọdụ ya dịpụrụ adịpụ n'egwuregwu; ọ na-apụta n'otu ihe nkiri na-eyi akpụkpọ ụkwụ, na usoro mkparịta ụka nwere ya na-ekwu maka ịchọ ileta Paris
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, onye na-ahazi asọmpi Donovan (Eric Roberts), onye nwetara ikike nke DOATEC mgbe ọnwụ nna Helena, na-emeso Helena dị ka ihe iwe dị mkpa
Ọ na-enwetakwa mmasị ịhụnanya na-abụghị nke Canon na onye na-enyere Donovan aka, Weatherby
Helena enwetala ọtụtụ ndị nkatọ na ndị mmadụ nabatara ya nke ọma
Hilary Goldstein nke IGN nwere obi ụtọ na 2004, 'Anyị hụrụ Helena n'anya n'ihi na ọ bụ onye na-agba ọsọ
Na mgbakwunye, ọgbọ egwuregwu ụlọ ya, Opera House na-ere ọkụ, so n'ime ndị kachasị jụụ na DOA Ultimate
Helena bụkwa naanị nwa agbọghọ [n'usoro] nke mara mma n'ebe ọ nọ
Ndị ọzọ na-egwuri egwu na ụmụ nwanyị ụlọ akwụkwọ Eshia na-ahụ ụmụ nwoke n'anya, mana Helena nwere klas (na obi, n'ezie) na-aga maka ya
enweghị uwe akwụna na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye kacha mma
' Ebe nrụọrụ ahụ gara n'ihu kọwaa Helena dị ka 'mara mma' na 'onye mara mma French vixen'
Official Dreamcast Magazine kwuru na Helena gosipụtara na stereotype nke 'nwa ọkụ opera abụba' bụ 'nke na-ezighị ezi'
GameFront gụnyere ya n'etiti ụmụ agbọghọ egwuregwu vidio kachasị elu n'oge niile na 2007
N'afọ 2014, saịtị Brazil GameHall's 'Portal PlayGame' họọrọ Helena dị ka nwanyị nke iri na otu kachasị mma na vidiyo, na-ewere ya dị ka 'onye kachasị mma' n'ozuzu ya na usoro ahụ

A họpụtara Helena dị ka onye nke iri kachasị ewu ewu na usoro DOA na ntuli aka ndị na-akwado ya nke Koei Tecmo mere na 2014, mana ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri họpụtara iji ruo eru maka Dead or Alive 3 Xtreme, ọ mechara nke ikpeazụ (nke itoolu) na pasent ole na ole nke votu
Ludwig Kietzmann nke Joystiq jụrụ 'omume nke Helena Douglas, onye a na-eche na ọ bụ onye isi oche French nke na-eyi uwe maka cabaret sultry ma na-eti ndị ọrụ ya ihe n'ụzọ nkịtị'
AJ Glasser nke Kotaku kwupụtara Maria dị ka 'nne kachasị mma' n'egwuregwu ọgụ, 'n'ihi na ọ dịghị ihe na-ekwu 'Mama hụrụ gị n'anya' dị ka iburu mgbọ onye na-agba égbè n'obi'
Otú ọ dị, saịtị ahụ gụnyere Fame Douglas n'etiti ndị nna kachasị njọ na egwuregwu vidio
'Ihe a ma ama kụrụ onye na-agụ egwu opera a ma ama n'ụwa ma lụọ ya; mana ọ hapụrụ nwa ya nwanyị ụlọ ọrụ ya, DOATEC, mgbe e gbusịrị ya
Ekele, Papa!' A kpọrọ Helena otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ asaa kachasị mma na egwuregwu vidio site na magazin Spanish Marca Player na 2009
Àtụ Dead or Alive series
Helena Dudley (August 31, 1858 - September 29, 1932) bụ onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke America, onye nhazi ọrụ, na onye na-ahụ maka udo

Dị ka onye nduzi nke Denison House na Boston site na 1893 ruo 1912, ọ bụ onye ndú nwere mmetụta na mbido obibi, ma nyere ọtụtụ puku ndị ogbenye na ndị na-arụ ọrụ aka n'oge mmemme enyemaka gọọmentị na-adịghị
N'ịbụ onye ọnọdụ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa sweatshops dị n'ógbè ahụ wụrụ akpata oyi n'ahụ, nke ọ mụtara site n'aka ndị agbata obi ya, ọ malitere ịbawanye na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ndị ọrụ
O nyere aka hazie Women's Trade Union League na 1903, ma kwado ọgbaghara Bread and Roses na 1912
Mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji kwalite Njikọ Mba, ma ruo ọtụtụ afọ ọ bụ onye isi nke Njikọ Ụmụ nwanyị nke Mba Nile maka Udo na Nnwere Onwe
A mụrụ Dudley na Florence, Nebraska, naanị nwa Judson H
na Caroline Bates Dudley
Nna ya bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ biri na Denver, Colorado, ma baa ọgaranya na igwupụta ọlaọcha na ala
N'oge Helena bụ nwata, ọnọdụ ego nna ya gbanwere nke ukwuu ma ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara site n'otu ebe gaa n'ebe ọzọ na Western United States
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na isii, ọ banyere na Massachusetts Institute of Technology, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ otu afọ tupu ọ gaa Bryn Mawr College
Dị ka onye isi na-amụ banyere ihe ndị dị ndụ, o nyere aka kwụọ ụgwọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ site n'ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka ụlọ nyocha, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1889 na klas mbụ nke Bryn Mawr
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kụziri ihe ọmụmụ ndụ na Pratt Institute na Packer Institute, ha abụọ dị na Brooklyn
Na Mee 1890, ọ sonyeere College Settlements Association (CSA), otu ụmụ nwanyị gụrụ akwụkwọ na kọleji na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ obibi na Boston, New York, na Philadelphia
N'afọ 1892 ọ hapụrụ ọrụ nkuzi ya iji bụrụ 'onye isi ọrụ' mbụ n'ụlọ CSA dị na Philadelphia
Mgbe Emily Greene Balch gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye isi Denison House na 1893, Dudley kwagara Boston iji dochie ya
Dudley jere ozi dị ka onye isi ọrụ, ma ọ bụ onye nduzi na-ebi, na Denison House site na 1893 ruo 1912
Mgbe ọ bịarutere n'oge egwu nke 1893, ọ malitere ozugbo ịrụ ọrụ ịhazi ụlọ ahụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka nke nwere ike ikesa ihe ndị dị mkpa dị ka mmiri ara ehi na coal
N'ọnwa Disemba, ọ malitere ụlọ ịkwa akwa, nke were ụmụ nwanyị 324 n'ọrụ n'oge oyi
Ụlọ ọrụ Wells Memorial Institute nyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'efu, Dudley wee nweta ego maka ihe na mmefu ndị ọzọ
Maka ụgwọ ọrụ dị larịị nke cents 75 kwa ụbọchị, ụmụ nwanyị ahụ na-emepụta uwe ime, uwe ụlọ ọgwụ, ákwà ndina, na ihe ndị yiri ya maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka Red Cross na Boston City Hospital
N'ihe ndekọ ya banyere ọrụ ahụ, Dudley kpachapụrụ anya ịhụ na ụmụ nwanyị ahụ anaghị asọmpi na azụmaahịa mpaghara; dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị nọọsụ na-emekarị uwe ụlọ ọgwụ n'oge ezumike ha n'ọrụ

N'okpuru nduzi ya, Denison House ghọrọ ebe dị mkpa dị n'ógbè, na-enye klas na nọọsụ, akwụkwọ Bekee, ọrụ aka, isi nri, na ọkwa nkà, yana egwuregwu na ogige oge okpomọkụ maka ụmụaka, na klọb maka ndị okenye
O nwere ọbá akwụkwọ, ụlọ mmega ahụ, na ụlọ ọgwụ

Mgbe e mesịrị, Dudley sooro Robert Archey Woods na ndị ọzọ bi na South End House - ụlọ obibi mbụ nke Boston, nke dị naanị blocks ole na ole - mee ihe ngosi nka, mee nyocha ụlọ, na mkpọsa maka ụlọ ịsa ahụ ọha na eze na ụlọ mmega ahụ
Ya na Woods na ndị isi ndị ọzọ dị ka Jane Addams na Mary Simkhovitch, o nyere aka hazie National Federation of Settlements na 1908
Ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ bi n'ebe ahụ bụ ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ọkwá dị elu ruo n'ọkwa dị elu, dịka Dudley kwetara, ha nwere ma ọ dịkarịa ala ihe ha ga-amụta n'aka obodo dịka ha ga-enye ya
N'okwu o kwuru na Wesleyan Hall n'afọ 1895, Dudley kwuru na ụmụ nwanyị kọleji amụtala, site n'ọrụ ha n'ụlọ obibi, 'nke ọnọdụ ndị na-emetụta ndị na-enweta ụgwọ ọrụ
Anyị achọtawo ụmụ nwanyị na-eme uwe elu maka 37 na ọkara cents na iri na abụọ
ọ bụkwa n'ihi ihe ọmụma a ka anyị nwere mmasị na òtù ọrụ
Ka oge na-aga, Dudley kwenyere na ebe obibi, nke bara uru dị ka ọ dị na obodo, enweghị ike inye ndị ọrụ ihe kachasị mkpa ụgwọ ọrụ
O doro anya na Mary Kenney O'Sullivan na di ya, ndị ọrụ abụọ, ndị bi na Denison House na 1890s, nwere mmetụta n'ebe ọ nọ
Onye ọrụ ibe ya ọzọ, Vida Scudder, nyere aka hazie Federal Labor Union (FLU), otu 'ndị ọkachamara' jikọtara ya na American Federation of Labor
Dudley sonyeere otu ahụ ma jee ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ya na Boston Central Labor Union ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Site na FLU, ya na ndị ọzọ bi na Denison House haziri ndị ọrụ uwe Boston na 1894
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ òtù ndị na-enwe nzukọ mgbe niile na Denison House n'oge Dudley nọ n'ọkwa
N'afọ 1903, ụmụ nwanyị atọ ahụ - Dudley, O'Sullivan, na Scudder - nyere aka hazie Women's Trade Union League
O'Sullivan ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nke nzukọ ahụ, Dudley jere ozi ruo oge ụfọdụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke alaka Boston ya
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ụmụ nwanyị atọ ahụ tara ahụhụ maka nkwado nke 1912 Lawrence textile strike
Scudder kwuru okwu nye ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe nke a kpọsara n'ọtụtụ ebe, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ tụfuru ọnọdụ nkuzi ya na Wellesley
A kpọtụrụ Dudley na O'Sullivan aha na Boston Globe mgbe ha kwụrụ ụgwọ mgbapụta nke $ 500 onye ọ bụla maka Joseph Ettor na Arturo Giovannitti, ndị isi ọgbaghara e jidere na ebubo ụgha
O'Sullivan mechara kwụsị ọrụ ya na WTUL, a manyere Dudley na Scudder ịhapụ Denison House
Helena Dudley ghọrọ enyi Cornelia Lyman Warren
Warren zụrụ ebe maka Denison House mbụ
Mgbe Dudley lara ezumike nká na 1912, Warren wuru ya ụlọ na ala ezinụlọ ya, Cedar Hill
Dudley biri na Cedar Hill ruo mgbe Warren nwụrụ na 1921
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, Dudley lekwasịrị anya na mbọ afọ ofufo ya maka udo ụwa
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ nke alaka Massachusetts nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom ma nọgide na-etinye aka na nzukọ ahụ ruo ndụ ya niile
Mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji kwalite Njikọ Mba, na-eme ọtụtụ njem na Europe
N'afọ 1920, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Socialist
Onye Episcopalian na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, Dudley bụkwa onye otu Companionship of the Holy Cross, ma wepụta onwe ya na Adelynrood, ebe ezumike nke ọha mmadụ na Byfield, Massachusetts
N'ime afọ iri ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya, ya na ezigbo enyi ya Scudder biri na Wellesley, Massachusetts
N'afọ 1932, ya na Scudder gara nnọkọ nke asaa nke Women's International League na Grenoble, France
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, mgbe ọ na-eleta ndị enyi ya na Geneva, Switzerland, Dudley dara ọrịa ma nwụọ mgbe ọ dị afọ 74
A na-echeta Dudley n'ihe gbasara Denison House na Boston Women's Heritage Trail
Sumak Helena Sirén Gualinga (amụrụ na Febụwarị 27, 2002) bụ onye Ecuador na-agba mbọ maka ọdịmma gburugburu ebe obibi na ikike mmadụ site na obodo Kichwa Sarayaku na Pastaza, Ecuador
A mụrụ Helena Gualinga na Febụwarị 27, 2002, n'obodo Kichwa Sarayaku nke dị na Pastaza, Ecuador
Nne ya, Noemí Gualinga bụ onye Ecuador bụbu onye isi oche nke Kichwa Women's Association
Nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye bụ onye na-eme ihe ike Nina Gualinga
Nwanne nne ya Patricia Gualinga na nne nne ya Cristina Gualinga bụ ndị na-agbachitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị ụmụ amaala na Amazon na ihe ndị metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi
Nna ya bụ Anders Sirén, prọfesọ Finnish na-asụ Swedish nke biology na ngalaba nke geography na geology na Mahadum Turku
A mụrụ Gualinga na mpaghara Sarayaku na Pastaza, Ecuador
Ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'afọ iri na ụma ya na-ebi na Pargas ma mesịa na Turku, Finland ebe nna ya si
Ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Cathedral School nke Åbo
Site na nwata, Gualinga ahụla mkpagbu nke ezinụlọ ya maka iguzo megide ọdịmma nke nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na mmetụta ha na gburugburu ebe obibi na ala ụmụ amaala
Ọtụtụ ndị isi obodo ya anwụọla n'ọgụ kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ megide gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ
O kwuru maka Yle na ọ na-ahụ ịzụlite ya n'amaghị ama n'ọnọdụ dị otú ahụ dị ka ohere
Gualinga aghọwo ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị obodo Sarayaku
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ikpughe esemokwu dị n'etiti obodo ya na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ site n'ibu ozi na-enye ike n'etiti ndị ntorobịa nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'Ecuador
Ọ na-ekwupụtakwa ozi a n'ụzọ siri ike nye ndị mba ụwa na-enwe olileanya iru ndị na-eme iwu

Ya na ezinụlọ ya na-akọwa ọtụtụ ụzọ ha, dị ka ndị otu obodo dị na Amazon, enweela mgbanwe ihu igwe, gụnyere oke ọkụ ọhịa, ọzara, mbibi na ọrịa na-agbasa site na idei mmiri, na snow na-agbaze ngwa ngwa n'elu ugwu
Mmetụta ndị a, ka ọ na-ekwu, abụwo ihe a na-ahụ anya n'oge ndụ nke ndị okenye obodo
Gualinga kọwara na ndị okenye ahụ amarala mgbanwe ihu igwe n'agbanyeghị enweghị nzụlite sayensị ha

Gualinga ji ihe ịrịba ama nke na-agụ 'sangre indígena, ni una sola gota más' (ọbara ụmụ amaala, ọ bụghị otu onye ọzọ) n'èzí isi ụlọ ọrụ UN na New York City na ngosipụta ya na ọtụtụ narị ndị ọzọ na-eto eto na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi n'oge 2019 UN Climate Action Summit
Helena Gualinga sonyere n'ọgbakọ COP25 na Madrid, Spain
O kwuru banyere nchegbu ya banyere gọọmentị Ecuador na-enye ikike igwupụta mmanụ n'ala ụmụ amaala
O kwuru, sị 'Gọọmentị mba anyị ka na-enye mpaghara anyị na ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-ahụ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe
Nke a bụ mpụ
' Ọ katọrọ gọọmentị Ecuador maka ịsị na ọ nwere mmasị ichebe Amazon n'oge nnọkọ ahụ kama ịga arịrịọ ụmụ nwanyị Amazon na-achọ ka gọọmentị wetaara n'oge ngagharị iwe Ecuador nke 2019
O gosikwara mmechuihu ya maka enweghị mmasị ndị isi ụwa na-atụle isiokwu ndị ụmụ amaala wetara na nnọkọ ahụ
Gualinga guzobere Polluters Out na Isabella Fallahi na Ayisha Siddiqa nke ebumnuche ya bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala
E guzobere òtù ahụ dị ka nzaghachi maka ọdịda nke COP25
Arịrịọ nke òtù ahụ bụ 'Mkpa ka Patricia Espinosa, onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC), jụ ego sitere n'aka ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala maka COP26!'
Helena Gualinga bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri 'Helena Sarayaku Manta' (Helena nke Sarayaku), nke na-edekọ ndụ ya na ọrụ ya metụtara ịkụzi ụzọ ndụ Sarayaku
Eriberto Gualinga duziri ihe nkiri ahụ ma gosipụta ya na Maachị 18, 2022 na Environmental Film Festival na Nation's Capital

N'Eprel 4, 2022 egosipụtara Helena Gualinga na nwanne ya nwanyị Nina Gualinga na magazin Revista Hogar Foto ha dị n'ihu mbipụta nke 691 nke magazin ahụ ma dị ka mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta Helena si kwuo, ọ bụ oge mbụ ụmụ nwanyị ụmụ amaala nọ n'ihu magazin ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, e sere Helena Gualinga na magazin n'otu isiokwu gbasara ihe osise ihu ọdịnala Kichwa Sarayaku nke Atenea Morales de la Cruz dere
Helena Heuser (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 13 n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1996) bụ onye Denmark na-eme ihe nlereanya na onye na-ahụ maka ịma mma nke e chiri Miss World Denmark 2016
Ọ nọchitere anya Denmark na asọmupi Miss World 2016 na Disemba 18, n'afọ 2016, na Washington, DC, ma nọchitere anya mba ya na asọmupi Miss Universe 2018 na Bangkok, Thailand na Disemba 17, n'afọ 2018
A maara Heuser na asọmupi mba ụwa abụọ ahụ dị ka “Face Of The Pageant”
Ọ bụ ụmụ nwanyị nke abụọ na Denmark ịga n'ihu na utu aha abụọ dị ka Miss Universe Denmark na Miss World Denmark
E chiri Helena Heuser okpueze Miss World Denmark 2016 na ngwụcha nke emere na Septemba 17, n'afọ 2016

Helena Heuser nọchitere anya Denmark na mbipụta nke iri isii na isii nke Miss World 2016 nke weere ọnọdụ na Disemba 18, n'afọ 2016, na Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center na obodo Washington, DC O tinyere na Top 20 na Miss Sport
E chiri Helena Heuser okpueze dị ka Miss Universe Denmark 2018 na ngwụcha emere na Septemba 9, n'afọ 2018
Heuser nọchitere anya Denmark na mbipụta nke iri ise na asaa nke Miss Universe 2018 nke weere ọnọdụ na Disemba 17, n'afọ 2018
Helena Ann Kennedy, Baroness Kennedy nke The Shaws, QC, FRSA, HonFRSE (amụrụ 12 Mee 1950), bụ onye ọka iwu Scotland, onye mgbasa ozi, na onye otu Labour nke House of Lords
Ọ bụ onye isi na Mahadum Mansfield, Oxford site na 2011 ruo 2018
A mụrụ Kennedy na 12 Mee 1950 na Glasgow, Scotland, otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị anọ nke Mary Veronica (née Jones) na Joshua Patrick
Ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị na-akwado Labour na ndị Roman Katọlik na-asọpụrụ Chineke
Nna ya, onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na Daily Record, bụ onye ọrụ otu ndị ọrụ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Holyrood na Glasgow, ebe a họpụtara ya isi Girl
Ọ gụrụ iwu na Council of Legal Education na London
Na 1972, a kpọrọ Kennedy n'ụlọ mmanya dị na Grey's Inn
N'ime ọtụtụ ikpe ya, Kennedy rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nta maka onye na-egbu ụmụaka Myra Hindley n'oge ikpe 1974 ya maka ịkpara nkata ịgbapụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Holloway
Kennedy na-enupụrụ ndị otu ya ụta na House of Lords ugboro ugboro karịa ndị ọrụ ọ bụla ọzọ, na-enwe ọnụ ọgụgụ 333% ekwenyeghị na ya
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Charter 88 (1992-1997) ma nwee mmekọrịta chiri anya na ọrụ ebere agụmakwụkwọ

Na 2020, ya na onye omebe iwu Conservative Iain Duncan Smith na onye na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya bụ Luke de Pulford rụkọrọ ọrụ iji mepụta otu nrụgide zuru ụwa ọnụ Inter-Parliamentary Alliance na China
Na Machị 2021, China tinyere mmachi na ya
Kennedy ghọrọ Chancellor mbụ nke Mahadum Oxford Brookes, na-eje ozi site na 1994 ruo 2001
Kennedy ka a họpụtara onye isi na Mahadum Mansfield, Oxford na Julaị 2010 wee jee ozi site na Septemba 2011
Ọ lara ezumike nká na 2018 wee bụrụ Chancellor nke Sheffield Hallam University na 26 Julaị 2018
Site na 1978 ruo 1984 o biri na omee Iain Mitchell, na ọnụ ha mụrụ nwa nwoke
Na 1986, Kennedy lụrụ Iain Louis Hutchison, dọkịta na- awa ahụ, onye ya na ya nwere nwa nwanyị na nwa nwoke
Kennedy na-aga mgbe niile ma na-ekwupụta na okpukpe Roman Katọlik ya 'nọgidere na onye m bụ', n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-eleghara ụkpụrụ ọdịnala ya anya
Ọ nwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite agụmakwụkwọ, gụnyere

Helena Moreno (a mụrụ na 28 Febụwarị 1989 [dubious ), nke a makwaara dịka Helena Morena, bụ onye Angola na-eme ihe nkiri nke pụtara n'ọtụtụ usoro ihe nkiri telenovela nke Angola
Ewezuga ntụrụndụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi asụsụ Portuguese
A mụrụ Helena Moreno n'abalị 28 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1989 na Luanda, Angola
Ezinụlọ ya dara ogbenye, ụlọ ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata bụ ụlọ na-enweghị windo n'obodo dị mkpirikpi
N'agbanyeghị nke a, o kwuru na oge nwata ya nwere obi ụtọ
Oge mbụ ọ pụtara na telivishọn bụ n'afọ 2002, mgbe ọ na-agagharị na akụkụ na telenovela Angolan Revira Volta
Ọ pụtara ọzọ na telenovela, mana n'oge a na-aga n'ihu dịka Weza Henriques Pereira na Sweet Pitanga
Nke a dugara n'ọrụ redio dịka onye na-egosi ihe ngosi Bombástico
Ọrụ ọzọ sochiri, mgbe a họpụtara ya dịka Marisa Lemos na Windeck n'afọ 2012
A na-asọpụrụ ya n'oge emume ụmụ nwanyị Angola n'afọ 2014, ya na Maria do Rosário Amadeu na Nadir Taty maka ịrụ ọrụ iji melite ọdịbendị Angola na nka
N'èzí ntụrụndụ, Moreno arụwokwa ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi n'asụsụ Portuguese n'ụlọ akwụkwọ America na ọkwa praịmarị na nke sekọndrị
Moreno kwupụtara n'afọ 2016 na ya na enyi ya nwoke Milton Miguel dị ime, na n'oge ịsa nwa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na ọ na-atụ anya nwa nwoke
O kwuru na aha nwa ahụ, Helton, bụ ngwakọta nke Helena na Milton
Helena Maria Lucy Swanwick CH (née Sickert; N'ụbọchị 30 Jenụwarị 1864 ruo n'afọ 16 Nọvemba 1939) bụ onye Britain na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-ahụ n'udo
Aha Swanwick na foto ya, tinyere ndị ọzọ 58 na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, dị n'elu ihe oyiyi nke Millicent Fawcett na Parliament Square, London, nke emere n'ọnwa Eprel 2018
Helene Johnson (7 Julaị, 1906 - 7 Julaị, 1995) bụ onye Afrịka na Amerịka na-ede abụ n'oge Harlem Renaissance
Ọ bụkwa nwa nwanne nna onye edemede Dorothy West
Ọrụ edemede Johnson malitere mgbe o ritere ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi akụkọ mkpirikpi nke Boston Chronicle kwadoro
O nwetakwara nkwanye ùgwù na asọmpi abụ nke Opportunity haziri, akwụkwọ akụkọ nke National Urban League nke bụ ihe ngosi na-eduga maka talent nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na Amerịka
O ruru ogo nke ewu ewu ya n'afọ 1927 mgbe e bipụtara uri ya 'Bottled' na mbipụta May nke Vanity Fair
N'afọ 1935, abụ ikpeazụ Johnson bipụtara pụtara na Challenge A Literary Quarterly
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ede abụ kwa ụbọchị maka ndụ ya niile
Johnson, onye aha ya bụ Helen, nọrọ afọ mbụ ya n'ụlọ nna nna ya na Boston
Afọ ndị ọzọ ọ na-etolite na Brookline, Massachusetts
Ya na Dorothy West kwagara Harlem n'afọ nke mgbe 1920, ebe ha ghọrọ enyi ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Zora Neale Hurston
Johnson gara Mahadum Columbia, mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1933, Johnson lụrụ William Warner Hubbell III
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere otu nwa, Abigail, tupu ha agbaa alụkwaghịm
Johnson nwụrụ na Manhattan mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asatọ
Helene Stähelin (N'ụbọchị 18 Julaị 1891 Wintersingen 30 Disemba 1970 Basel) bụ onye Switzerland na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ, onye nkuzi, na onye na-ahụ maka udo
N'agbata afọ 1948 ruo afọ 1967, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ngalaba Switzerland nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom na onye nnọchi anya ya na Swiss Peace Council
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ iri na abụọ nke onye ụkọchukwu Gustav Stähelin (1858 ruo afọ 1934) na nwunye ya Luise, nke a mụrụ Lieb
N'afọ 1894, ezinụlọ ahụ si Wintersingen kwaga Allschwil
Helene Stähelin gara Töchterschule Basel na Mahadum Basel na Göttingen
N'afọ 1922, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi nke mgbakọ na mwepụ na sayensị okike na Töchterinstitut(de) na Ftan
N'afọ 1924, ọ nwetara nzere Drphil

ya na Mahadum Basel maka edemede ya bụ Die characteristischen Zahlen analytischer Kurven auf dem Kegel zweiter Ordnung und ihrer Studyschen Bildkurven, nke Hans Mohrmann na Otto Spiess [de] nyere ndụmọdụ
N'afọ 1926, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Swiss Mathematical Society
N'etiti 1934 na 1956, Helene Stähelin rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Protestant na Zug
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ laghachiri Basel, ebe o nyere aka ọtụtụ afọ na Otto Spiess' idezi akwụkwọ ozi ezinụlọ Bernoulli
Helix Ihi ụra bụ ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo, nke dabeere na US, nke e-azụmahịa, na-arụ ọrụ na pọtụfoliyo ndị mmadụ dị ka ndị nke ụdị ngwaahịa ụlọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere isi na New York City
A na-emepụta matarasị na sofa niile na US, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ebugharị ngwaahịa na United States na Canada
Helix Ihu ụra bụ nke Jerry Lin, Kristian von Rickenbach, na Adam Tishman guzobere na 2015
Ndị guzobere ya zutere na mmemme MBA nke Mahadum Pennsylvania Wharton School
Ha jikọtara aka n'ihi mgbanwe nke ịkwaga n'obodo ọhụrụ na ọgụ nke ịzụta matarasị ọhụrụ
Ha chọpụtara na ụlọ ọrụ matarasị ahụ mebiri emebi, ha chọkwara idozi ya
N'August 4, 2015, a malitere ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Ihe ụra
Tupu mmalite afọ okuku n'oge ochie nakwa ike ịbelata ọnụ ụzọ Kraịst ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara ego site n'aka ndị mmụọ ozi na-etinye ego
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbasaa ọrụ nnyefe ya iji ruo ndị ahịa na Canada na Jenụwarị 2016
Helix Ihi ụra kwupụtara na ọ ga-enweta ego Series A n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2016
Ndị na-etinye ego gụnyere Double J Capital, Great Oaks VC, Simon Venture Group, WIT, Jonathan Klein, na Jess Itzler
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere akara Birch site na Helix na Mee 2019
A malitere akara Allform na Mee 2020
Akara Hellix Ihi ụra na-enye ndị ahịa ajụjụ iji mụta banyere ịdị elu na ịdị arọ ha, otu ha si hie ụra, na otu mattresses ha si sie ike ma jiri data ahụ mee ka ndị ọrụ kwekọọ na mattresses zuru oke

Hellen Adoa (amụrụ na 25 Jenụwarị 1977), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị na Serere District na 10th Ugandan Parliament (2016 ruo 2021)
Site na uboch 14 Disemba na afo 2019, ọ na-eje ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ịkụ azụ, na Kọmitii Ugandan
A mụrụ ya na Serere District, na mpaghara Teso, na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ nke Uganda, na 25 Jenụwarị 1977
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Kelim
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ngora Girls Secondary School, maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Uganda Certificate of Education, na 1992
N'afọ 1995, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ A-Level na Ngora High uloakwukwo, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education
O nwere diplọma abụọ; otu bụ Diploma na Business Studies, nke Victoria Business Institute, Tororo nyere, nke ọzọ bụ Diploma na Education Management, site na Mahadum Uganda Martyrs
Degree mbụ ya, Bachelor of Democracy and Development Studies na ogo nke abụọ ya, Master of Local Governance and Human Rights, bụ nke Mahadum Uganda Martyrs nyere

Ruo oge afọ iri na ise, site na mbido na afọ 2001 ruo na ngwụcha na afọ 2015, Hellen Adoa jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche nke ụmụaka na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ nke ya
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi na Halcyon High School
Ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ntuli aka nke Uganda site na ịsọ mpi maka oche ndị omeiwu nke Serere District Women Constituency na afo 2016
A họpụtara ya, ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị omeiwu ugbu a maka mpaghara Serere
Ọ debanyere aha na pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2019, a kpọrọ aha ya na kọmitii nke Uganda dị ka minista nke steeti maka ịkụ azụ; ọkwá onye isi ala nke Uganda Yoweri Kaguta Museveni họpụtara ya
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ịkụ azụ na 13 Jenụwarị 2020

Hellen Asamo nke a makwaara dị ka Asamo Hellen Grace (amụrụ na 24 Eprel na afo 1964) bụ onye nkuzi Ugandan na onye nnọchi anya ndị nwere nkwarụ maka mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ nke jere ozi na nke itoolu na nke iri nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
O meriri na ntuli aka nke afo 2021 maka ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị nwere nkwarụ na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ
Hellen nwere njikọ na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
N'afọ 1977, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Primary Leaving Examination (PLE) ya na Soroti Primary School ma mesịa sonye na Nkoma Secondary School iji chụsoo Uganda Certificate of Education ma gụchaa n'afọ 1981
N'afọ 1990, e nyere ya asambodo nkuzi nke Grade III site na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo
N'afọ 1996, ọ nwetara diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ site na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo ọzọ
O nwere nzere bachelọ na agụmakwụkwọ (na afo 2006) na Mahadum Kyambogo
N'afọ 1992 ruo na afo 1997, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Nakatunya Primary School
N'afọ 1997, ọ sonyeere Moroto KDA Primary School dị ka onye nkuzi ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka osote onye isi nkuzi n'etiti afọ 1998 na afo 2000
Ọ sonyeere NUDIPU (National Union of Disabled Persons of Uganda) n'etiti afọ 2002 na afo 2003 wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa Ag
N'afọ 1990 ruo na afo 1992, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Soroti Primary School
Site na afo 2000 ruo na afo 2003, ọ sonyeere Moroto Army School ma were ya n'ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi nkuzi
Site na afo 2003 ruo na afo 2011, ọ bụ osote onye isi nchịkwa / onye isi mmemme na NUDIPU
Site na afo 2013 ruo taa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onyeisi oche Equal Opportunities Committee na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda site na afo 2011 ruo na afo 2021 na nke itoolu na nke iri nke ndị omeiwu Uganda
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọzọ dị ka osote onyeisi oche na Kọmitii na-ahụ maka Ohere Ịha nhata, yana dịka onye otu Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ Gender na Mmepe Ọha na Ntinye aha
O weputara mkpebi nke NRM Parliamentary Caucus ka onye isi ala Museveni bụrụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ na-enweghị mmegide maka pati ahụ na ntuli aka na afo 2021

Hellen kwuru na isi ihe mere ya ji kwado Museveni dị ka naanị onye na-azọ ọkwa bụ iji mee ka ihe ọ rụzuru na udo na nkwụsi ike site n'ịkwalite mba ahụ gaa na ọganihu, mmepụta ihe, na nkwụghachi nke akụ na ụba
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association nke 10th Parliament of Uganda
A mụrụ ya na Soroti District Hellen lụrụ di
O nwere mmasị pụrụ iche n'ịkwado, inyere ndị nọ ná mkpa aka, inye ndụmọdụ na ịga ọrụ obodo
Ihe ndị na-eme n'okpuru ebe a bụ ihe omume ntụrụndụ ya
Hellen Auma Wandera bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Busia District nke a họpụtara na ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
A mụrụ Hellen Auma Wandera na Busia District na Dickson Wandera na Betty Afuro
Ọ gara Busia Parents Primary School maka PLE, mgbe ahụ gaa Great Obrem Memorial na Tororo District maka UCE ya na St
Peters Naalya (Spena International) maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya (UACE) tupu ọ banye na Mahadum Kyambogo maka Bachelor of Arts And Social Science
Ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement (NRM)
O meriri Nina Nekesa, Fiona Nakku, Nabwire Sharon Veron Namumayi, Esther Busingye Wafula, Grace Nyakecho, Teddy Auma na Lilian Taaka na 2020 NRM Parliamentary Primaries
Ọ nọchiri Jane Nabulindo Kwoba dị ka nwanyị omebe iwu maka Busia District na ntuli aka nke Uganda na afo puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu 2021
Hellen Ng'andwe Chanda (amụrụ na 19 na onwa nke isii, na afọ 1998) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere ndị otu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Zambia
O sonyere Zambia na afo 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations, na-egwu otu egwuregwu
Hellen Kimaiyo Kipkoskei (amụrụ na Septemba 8, 1968 na Moiben) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ lara ezumike nká si Kenya
O meriri ọtụtụ asọmpi kọntinent
O sonyere na 1984 Summer Olympics mgbe ọ na-erubeghị afọ 16 na 1992 Summer Olympics
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri Kenya ọtụtụ ugboro
Na mgbakwunye, ọ bụ onye na-agba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ
O meriri Peachtree Road Race ugboro atọ n'usoro (1996ī 1998) na Dam tot Damloop ugboro anọ n'usoro
Kimaiyo meriri Zevenheuvelenloop na 1995
O meriri na 1994
O nwere ihe ndekọ Afrịka maka mita 1500 na 3000

Hellen Onsando Obiri (amụrụ na 13 Disemba 1989) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ n'etiti na ogologo oge
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ụwa ugboro abụọ mgbe ọ meriri mita 5000 na 2017 na ọzọ na 2019, mgbe o setịpụrụ ndekọ mmeri ọhụrụ
Obiri nwetara ọla nchara maka 1500 mita na 2013
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha nke Olympic 5000m ugboro abụọ site na 2016 Rio na 2020 Tokyo Olympics, ebe ọ nọkwa na nke anọ n'elu 10,000 mita
O meriri n'ọsọ mita 3000 na 2012 World Indoor Championships, were ọlaọcha na 2014, wee bụrụ nke anọ na 2018
O nwere ihe ndekọ mba Kenya maka mile, mita 3000 ma n'èzí ma n'ime ụlọ, na ihe omume mita 5000
Na ọnwa Machị na afọ 2019, Obiri meriri asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na IAAF World Cross Country Championship
Ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke ise na ọkara marathon na ndepụta oge niile nke ụwa
A kpọtụrụ ya aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị Afrịka 100 kachasị nwee mmetụta site na magazin New African na 2017
Obiri nwetara ahụmịhe mba ụwa mbụ ya na afọ 2011 Military World Games na Rio de Janeiro, ebe ọ meriri ọla nchara maka mita 800 wee bụrụ nke anọ na mita 1500
N'afọ 2012, o nwetara aha mbụ ya n'ụwa niile na asọmpi World Indoor Championships nke e mere na Istanbul, na-eme 8 3716 karịa mita 3000
Mgbe o nwetasịrị ọla nchara maka ihe omume 1500m na afọ 2013 World Championships na Moscow, Obiri nwetara ọlaọcha na 3000m na World Indoor Championships na Sopot otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị
Ọ gwụchara n'azụ naanị ọtụtụ onye na-edekọ ihe ndekọ ụwa Genzebe Dibaba
N'afọ 2014, ọ gbakwunyere 1500m site na African Championships

Na afọ 2016 Rio Olympics, Obiri sonyere na mita 5000 wee nweta ọlaọcha n'oge 14 2977, n'azụ onye obodo ya Vivian Cheruiyot na ndekọ Olympic nke 14 2617 ma n'ihu Almaz Ayana nke Ethiopia nke gbara ọsọ 14 3359
Obiri nọchitere anya Kenya na afọ 2017 World Championships na London wee merie ọla edo maka ihe omume 5000m n'ihu Almaz Ayana na Sifan Hassan
Na Machị 2019, Obiri meriri asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na IAAF World Cross Country Championship
Ihe omume ahụ mere na Aarhus, Denmark
O meriri n'ọsọ 102 kilomita n'oge 36 14
Mgbe o weputara oge kachasị mma n'afọ na mita 5000 na afọ 2017 na 2018, Obiri meriri ihe omume ahụ na Doha World Championships n'ọnwa Ọktoba, na-etinye ihe ndekọ mmeri nke 14 2672 na usoro ahụ
Margaret Chelimo Kipkemboi na Konstanze Klosterhalfen mechara nke abụọ na nke atọ, n'otu n'otu
Obiri nọchitere anya Kenya na afọ 2020 Tokyo Olympics na ihe omume 5000m na 10,000m nke ụmụ nwanyị
O meriri nrite ọlaọcha na nke mbụ n'oge nke 14 3836, na-esote naanị Hassan onye gbara ọsọ 14 3679; Gudaf Tsegay nwetara ọla nchara na 14 3887
Obiri nọ n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na mita 10,000 ikpeazụ n'azụ Hassan, Kalkidan Gezahegne na Letesenbet Gidey
Helmy Halim, nke a na-akpọkwa Hilmi Halim (1916 - 1971) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama dịka Omar Sharif, Ahmed Ramzy, Faten Hamama na Abdel Halim Hafez arụkọwo ọrụ
N'afọ 1955, ọ chọpụtara Ahmed Ramzy ma mee ya ka ọ bụrụ Ramzy na Ayyamna al-Holwa
Helmy Rafla (May 15, 1909 - April 22, 1978) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta ihe

Heloísa Jorge (a mụrụ na 1 Julaị 1984) bụ onye Angola na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na obodo Chitato, na Lunda Norte Province, Jorge bụ nwa nwanyị nke nna Brazil na nne Angola, o nwekwara nwanne nwoke
Ọ kọwara onwe ya dịka nwatakịrị na-eme ihere nke nwere nsogbu ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Brazil iji gbanahụ Agha Obodo Angola, buru ụzọ biri na Montes Claros
Jorge malitere ịgụ ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ wee bụrụ akụkụ nke otu
Mgbe ọ gara ule ịbanye na mahadum Brazil mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, o kpebiri ịmụ nka
Jorge kwagara Salvador, Bahia ịga Mahadum Federal nke Bahia
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri ya, Jorge malitere ịmụta banyere mmegharị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma melite ùgwù onwe ya
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya maka Braskem Award maka arụmọrụ ya na egwuregwu O Dia 14, nke Ângelo Flávio duziri
N'afọ 2007, Jorge dere egwuregwu Uma Mulher Vestida de Sol, iji sọpụrụ Ariano Suassuna
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere nka n'afọ 2008
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara Jorge ọzọ maka Braskem Award maka arụmọrụ ya na A Farsa da Boa Preguiça, nke Harildo Deda duziri
Ọ laghachiri Angola n'afọ 2009 na otu ihe nkiri ya, na-eme egwuregwu Amêsa nke José Mena Abrantes
N'afọ 2012, a họpụtara Jorge dịka Fabiana na usoro TV Gabriela A kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke Angola bụ Jikulumessu, nke kwalitere ike ojii, n'afọ 2014
N'otu afọ ahụ, Jorge kwadoro mmemme Globo International Connections
N'afọ 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ohu Luanda na ihe ngosi Liberdade, Liberdade Jorge gosipụtara nne na-anwụ anwụ Gilda Cunha Matheus n'afọ 2019 soap opera A Dona do Pedaço
Heloise Brainerd (30 Eprel 1881 - 16 Febụwarị 1969) bụ onye America na-eme ihe ike na onye na-akwado ụmụnwanyị Latin America itinye aka na udo
Brainerd rụrụ ọrụ na Pan American Union site n'afọ 1909 ruo afọ 1935 na ngalaba US nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
Ọ natara ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa, gụnyere Medal of Public Instruction site na Venezuela na Order of Merit site na Ecuador
A mụrụ Heloise Brainerd n'ụbọchị 30 Eprel n'afọ 1881 na Wallingford, Vermont
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Smith College n'afọ 1904, ọ kwagara Mexico City wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ iwu ma mụta Spanish
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 1909, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Pan American Union dị ka odeakwụkwọ onwe onye nke osote onye nduzi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ya ruo n'isi nke Ngalaba Mmụta n'afọ 1929, mgbe e guzobere Ngalaba nke Imekọ Ihe Omume, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi ya
Ngalaba ọhụrụ ahụ bụ ọrụ ịkwalite imekọ ihe ọnụ na agụmakwụkwọ mba ụwa
N'ụbọchị 22 Juun n'afọ 1935, Brainerd lara ezumike nká na Pan American Union ma bụrụ onye Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF) were ozugbo dị ka oche maka ngalaba US
Ọ bụ onye otu WILPF ogologo oge ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya mbụ na-asụ Spanish nke US nwere
Ntinye Brainerd n'ọrụ gbanwere mkparịta ụka maka WILPF na Amerịka
Kama ịkwalite US-dominance, usoro Brainerd bụ otu n'ime nkwanye ùgwù na ịgba ume maka ebumnuche mba ụwa

Ọ gbalịghị izochi eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọrụ mbụ ya na Pan-American Union nwere ike ịkpata nkụda mmụọ na ajụjụ nke ebumnuche nke ndị na-achị ala, mana o kwuru okwu ahụ ma mesie ụmụ nwanyị nọ na ngalaba ndị ọzọ nke WILPF obi ike na ezi obi ya

Mgbalị ya na Mexico n'ụzọ ka ukwuu enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, dị ka a ga-asị na e nwere ọganihu mbụ n'etiti afọ 1930 ọ doro anya na maka ụmụnwanyị Mexico ọgụ maka ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị abụghị otu ihe ahụ dị ka ebumnuche nke onye mba ụwa
Ndị mba ụwa agafeela n'ọnọdụ nke ịkwado mmadụ nhata na ụmụnwanyị Mexico chọrọ ka a mara ikike ha dị ka ụmụ nwanyị

Brainerd nwere ihe ịga nke ọma ka mma na Central America, mgbe n'afọ 1947 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kọmitii nhazi nke oku WILPF maka Primer Congreso Interamericano de Mujeres nke emere na Guatemala City, Guatemala
Isiokwu nnọkọ ahụ gụnyere ebumnuche ndị na-eme udo, yana okwu ụmụnwanyị na-elekwasị anya na mba ụwa
Na ngwụcha nnọkọ ahụ, a nabatara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụnwanyị kachasị elu na nnọkọ ahụ

Mgbe nzukọ ahụ gasịrị, Brainerd, Carmen Sánchez de Bustamante Calvo de Lozada, na Annalee Stewart rụrụ ọrụ iji gbalịa ịhazi nzukọ ọzọ, mana ha kọrọ obere ọganihu na mkpa ọ dị ịhazigharị, yana mmechi nke nzukọ nke ndị Guatemala na-akwado ihe omume ahụ
N'afọ 1954, Brainerd ghọrọ osote onye isi oche nke ngalaba US nke WILPF
Venezuela chọrọ ya mma, na-anata Medal of Public Instruction na Ecuador, nke sọpụrụ ya na Order of Merit
E mepụtara ọtụtụ agụmakwụkwọ na-ebu aha ya iji kwalite ọmụmụ Latin America
Jane Addams Peace Association nke New York, mepụtara agụmakwụkwọ na-ebu aha ya
Brainerd nwụrụ n'ụbọchị 16 Febụwarị 1969 na Freeport, Illinois

Helsinki, bụ isi oche Finland
Na afọr 2021, Helsinki bụ obodo nke mmadụ 658,457 bi na ya
Hemiboreal pụtara ọkara n'etiti mpaghara okpomọkụ na mpaghara subarctic (mà ọ bụ boreal)
A na-ejikarị ókwú ahụ eme ihe nà ọnọdụ ihu igwe nà gburugburu ebe obibi
Oké ọhịa hemiboreal nwèrè ụfọdụ njirimara nkè oké ọhịa boreal n'ebe ugwu, yana otu njirimara na oké ọhịa dị N'ébé ndịda

Osisi Coniferous na-ebute ụzọ na mpaghara hemiboreal, mànà ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ụdị deciduous, dị ka aspens, oaks, maples, ash trees, birches, beeches, hazels, na hornbeams, gbanyekwara mkpọrọgwụ ébé a
Ókwú a na-egosi mgbé ụfọdụ ụdị ihu igwe nke mpaghara nke oké ọhịa hemiboreal kpọmkwem, ihu igwe a họpụtara Dfb, Dwb na Dsb na atụmatụ nhazi ihu igwe Köppen
Mgbé ụfọdụ, a na-etinye ya n'ébé niile nwéré ogologo ógè oyi na ógè okpomọkụ (ma ọ bụghị okpomọkụ) nke gụnyere ébé ndị na-adịghị arid(BS) na arid(BW) dabere na mmiri ozuzo kwà afọ
A pụkwara itinye ya n'ọrụ na mpaghara ụfọdụ nwere ihu igwe subpolar oceanic (Cfc), ọkachasị ndị nwéré njirimara ihu igwe nke kọntinent
Ihe atụ nke ébé nwéré ihu igwe hemiboreal ma ọ bụ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi gụnyere

Hend Sabry (Arabic, a mụrụ na 20 Nọvemba 1979) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na-arụ ọrụ na Egypt
Sabry gosipụtara dịka Ola' na ihe nkiri telivishọn Ijipt Ayza Atgawez dịka onye na-achọ ịlụ di, onye na-agafe ọtụtụ ndị ga-achọ ịghọ enyi nwanyị
N'afọ 2010, UN World Food Programme họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya megide agụụ

Ọ nọ n'ihu magazin ndị mmadụ Tunivisions n'ọnwa June afọ 2011

Sabry kwere onye na-eme ihe nkiri Siria bụ Bassel Khaiat nkwa ọlụlụ ihe karịrị afọ abụọ
Sabry lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Ijipt bụ Ahmad el Sherif ma nwee mba abụọ nke obodo ya bụ Tunisia na obodo ya bụ Egypt

Henriette 'Henni' Forchhammer, onye a makwaara dị ka Margarete Forchham Mer (1863), bụ onye nkuzi Danish, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-eme udo

Hennric David Yeboah (1957 - 1 Machị 2019) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana nke Republic of Ghana Ọ bụ onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Afigya Sekyere East nke Ashanti Region nke Ghana na 4th, 5th, na 6th Parliament nke 4th Republic of Ghana
Ọ bụ onye otu New Patriotic Party
A mụrụ Yeboah na 11 Machị 1957
O sitere na Agona, obodo dị na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Malcolm X College na Chicago, Illinois
Ọ natara diplọma na 1986 site na kọleji ahụ
Yeboah bụ onye ọchụnta ego ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Daphelia Enterprise Limited na okporo ụzọ Spintex na Accra, Ghana
Yeboah bụ onye otu New Patriotic Party
O bu ụzọ banye n'ụlọ omebe iwu n'afọ 2004 ma bụrụ onye otu ndị omebe iwu maka Afigya Sekyere East Constituency na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ na-agba ọsọ maka oge abụọ ọzọ na Nzukọ nke ise na nke isii nke Republic nke anọ
t N'afọ 2015, o meriri New Patriotic Party primaries na Mavis Nkansah Boadu
A họpụtara Yeboah dị ka onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Afigya Sekyere East nke Ashanti Region nke Ghana na nke mbụ ya na ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 2004
Ọ meriri na tiketi nke New Patriotic Party
Mpaghara ya bụ akụkụ nke oche ndị omeiwu 36 n'ime oche 39 nke New Patriotic Party meriri na ntuli aka ahụ maka Ashanti Region
New Patriotic Party meriri ngụkọta nke oche 128 n'ime oche 230
A họpụtara ya na vootu 32,143 n'ime vootu 41,220 zuru oke nke ruru 78% nke vootu zuru oke
A họpụtara ya karịa Edward Kusi Ayarkwah nke National Democratic Congress, Adamu Alhassan nke Convention People's Party na Alhaji Amidu Adam nke Democratic People's party
Ndị a nwetara 205%, 1% na 060% n'otu n'otu nke ngụkọta vootu ziri ezi
N'afọ 2008, ọ meriri ntuli aka n'ozuzu na tiketi nke New Patriotic Party maka otu mpaghara
Mpaghara ya so n'oche ndị omeiwu 34 n'ime oche 39 nke New Patriotic Party meriri na ntuli aka ahụ maka Ashanti Region
New Patriotic Party meriri ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke oche 109 n'ime oche 230

A họpụtara ya na vootu 33,080 n'ime vootu 43,505 zuru oke nke ruru 7604% nke vootu zuru okeA họpụtara ya maka Edward Ayarkwah nke National Democratic Congress, Osman Isshak nke People's National Convention,Amidu Alhaji Adam nke Democratic People's Party na obeng Nyantakyi Clementnke Mgbakọ Ndị mmadụ Ndị a nwetara 2161%, 059%, 029% na 147% n'otu n'otu nke ngụkọta vootu

nọ lụkuwara nwanyi ma muta umụ ise
