Henri Blaffart (22 June 1965 21 March 2008) bụ onye Belgium na-echekwa ihe na gburugburu ebe obibi
Henri Blaffart gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Agronomic Science nke Gembloux na Belgium n'afọ 1990 na nzere na agronomy, na-ekwusi ike na ọhịa na mmiri
Blaffart malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọrụ nchekwa dị iche iche n'ụwa niile mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, gụnyere Ethiopia, Cambodia, Samoa na Papua New Guinea tupu ọ kwaga New Caledonia
Blaffart malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọrụ Conservation International, ọrụ Mont Panié Special Botanical Reserve na New Caledonia, na 2002
Ọ sonyeere Conservation International na 2006 dị ka onye isi ọrụ Mont Panié
Blaffart sooro obodo Kanak rụọ ọrụ na njikwa gburugburu ebe obibi nke Mont Panié, nke dị na North Province nke New Caledonia

Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ New Caledonia iji chebe Mont Panié Reserve, gụnyere gọọmentị North Province, Dayu Biik Association, nke gụnyere agbụrụ Kanak mpaghara, Caledonian Institute of Agronomy na ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, ọha na eze na òtù gọọmentịndị ọzọ
Henri Blaffart buuru ma nwụọ na mberede mgbe ọ na-anwa ịgafe Osimiri Tiendanite na North Province na 21 Machị 2008
Ọ dị afọ iri anọ na abụọ ma nne ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, ndị bi na Belgium, hapụrụ ya
Henri Duparc (amụrụ na Disemba 23, 1941, na Forécariah; nwụrụ na Eprel 18, 2006, na Paris) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na odee si Ivory Coast
O mepụtara ma dee ihe nkiri 2004 Caramel
1968 Concerto for an Exile (aha mbụ Concerto pour un exil)
Henri Sagna (amụrụ n'afọ 1973 na Dakar) bụ onye Senegal na-ese ihe
Henri Sagna bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Senegal
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na École nationale des arts du Sénégal na Dakar na 2005, ọ natara ihe nrite mbụ na National Salon des artistes plasticiens sénégalais nke isii
A maara Sagna dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-emegharị ihe
A na-emepụta ihe osise ya site na ijikọta ihe ndị anakọtara n'ụzọ dịgasị iche iche
Onye na-ese ihe na-edu usoro ọmụmụ ihe na ụlọ ọrụ na France na Senegal, nke nwere dị ka isiokwu ha bụ echiche nke mgbake na imegharị ihe
Ọrụ Sagna dabeere na nkwanye ùgwù na ihe ọmụma banyere gburugburu ebe obibi, yana ịkwalite mmata banyere okwu ndị dị mkpa n'etiti ọha na eze na ndị bi n'obodo
Akụkụ dị ukwuu nke ọrụ plastik ya lekwasịrị anya na ụdị anwụnta na-ebute ịba
Ihe osise ya na-anọchite anya usoro na-adọrọ mmasị nke ịkwalite mmata na Europe, ọkachasị na France, banyere ịba na mmebi nke ọ na-akpata n'Africa
Ebumnuche nke onye na-ese ihe na Senegal bụ ịkụziri ọgbọ ọhụrụ ịzụlite nkà ha na ịga n'ihu na-elekọta gburugburu ebe obibi

N'etiti ndị omenkà iri nke oge a nke Senegal na Dapper Museum na Paris n'afọ 2006, nke na-elekwasị anya na ihe okike nke ọgbọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na Senegal, Sagna guzobere ngosipụta zuru oke nke Mosquitoes na ihe ngosi ụmụ ahụhụ
A na-eji nnukwu ụkwụ mee ụmụ ahụhụ ndị ahụ site na waya ígwè galvanized, karama soda na celluloid maka nku
Henrietta Kosoko bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood
Ọ batara n'ọkwa n'afọ 1995 mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Nollywood dịka Onome na Omolade
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Jide Kosoko
E liri ya n'ụbọchị nke iri n'ọnwa June n'afọ 2016
Henriette Ekwe Ebongo (December 25, 1949) bụ ónyé nta akụkọ Cameroon, ónyé na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
E nyere ya onyinye International Women of Courage Award n'afọ 2011
Ebongo na-akwado nnwere onwé mgbasa ozi, nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị, ikike mmadụ, na ezi ọchịchị
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọgụ megide ọchịchị aka ike na 1980s, na mkpọsa ugbu a megide nrụrụ aka gọọmentị, ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị na mmebi ikike mmadụ
N'oge a, a tàrà ya ahụhụ, mekpọọ ya ọnụ, ma kpọga ya n'ụlọ ikpe ndị agha
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Babela kwa izu ma bụrụkwa ónyé guzobere alaka Cameroon nke Transparency International, òtù na-emegide nrụrụ aka na-abụghị nke gọọmentị
Hester Henriette Grové (née Venter) (Septemba 26, na afo 1922 - Disemba 15, na afo 2009) bụ onye odee South Africa sitere na Afrika
Ọ lụrụ onye nkatọ edemede AP Grové
A maara ya nke ọma maka obere akụkọ ya na egwuregwu ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ode akwụkwọ ole na ole nwetagoro ihe nrite Hertzog n'ọtụtụ edemede
Radiodramas bụ Die Glasdeur na Die Goeie Jaar
FEF Malherbe
Henrik Bernard Oldenland aka Heinrich Bernhard Oldenland (c1663 - c
1697) bụ ónyé dọkịta South Africa a mụrụ na Germany, ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihe ọkụkụ, onye na'ese ihe na ónyé na-enyocha ala, a na-egosikwa ya site na mkpirisi nke onye edemede Oldenl
mgbè ọ na-ezo aka na aha botanical
A mụrụ Henrik na Lübeck, nwa Hans Oldenland na Anna Margaretha Nagel
Ọ debanyere áhà na Mahadum Leiden n'ọnwa Mee 1686, ma mụọ ọgwụ na botany ruo afọ atọ, na-abịa n'okpuru mmetụta nke Paul Hermann onye kpaliri mmasị na botany
Ọ bịarutere na Cape Colony n'afọ 1688 n'ọrụ nkè Dutch East India Company, wee sonye na njem Isaq Schrijver site n'ubochí ànó n'ọnwa Jenụwarị ruo ụbọchị irí n'ọnwa Eprel, 1689

Ụzọ ha si na Cape Town gafee obodo Caledon, Swellendam, Riversdale, n'elu Attaquasberg n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ruo nso Uniondale, gaa Willowmore, ma mesịa ruo ihe dị ka kilomita irí àtó n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Aberdeen
Nke a bụ njem Cape mbụ ịbanye n'ime ime, na-ekpughe ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke osisi ọhụrụ na nke na-adọrọ mmasị
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị a, dị ka Aloe humilis, chọtara ụzọ ha laghachi na Company Garden na Cape Town
N'afọ 1690, Heeren XVII tụrụ aro ka Simon van der Stel jiri Oldenland na-anakọta ma na-akụ ahịhịa ọgwụ n'ihi na ọ bụ ezigbo ónyé na-amụ banyere ihe ọkụkụ nke gụrụ ọgwụ na nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma
N'otu akwụkwọ ozi ahụ, ha tụrụ aro ka a họpụta Jan Hartog n'otu ikike ahụ
N'ihi ya, e nyere Oldenland ọkwa ónyé na-elekọta ubi na ónyé na-enyocha ala maka Gọọmentị n'afọ 1693, Hartog ga-abụkwa onye na-enyere ya aka
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ nwere ego a na-enye ya ugbu a, Oldenland nwere ike ịlụ Margaretha Hendrina van Otteren, nwunye di ya nke ónyé bụbu ónyé na-edebe akwụkwọ, Johann Heinrich Blum
Site na nkwado nkè Simon van der Stel, Oldenland na Hartog tinyere nnukwu ọrụ na Company Garden, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị màkà ndị ọbịa si mba ọzọ
Oldenland rụkwara ọrụ na nchịkọta nkè ihe ndị a na-ebipụta na ndị a na'elu, gụnyere ndepụta nkè nkọwa Latin
Ọnwụ mberede ya na Cape Town n'afọ 1697 kwụsịrị ọrụ botanical ya niile
Nwunye ya di ya lụrụ Hendrik Donker ọzọ n'afọ 1700

Mgbè ọ nwụsịrị, ọtụtụ ndị ọbịa na Cape hụrụ ma nwee mmasị na nchịkọta Oldenland, onye mbụ kwuru ya bụ Peter Kolbe onye nọrọ na Cape n'etiti afọ 1705 na 1713 wee bipụta akụkọ banyere oge a n'afọ 1719 na Nuremberg nke akpọrọ Caput Bonae Spei Hodiernum
N'akwụkwọ ahụ, o depụtara osisi ndị dị n'ala na ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ na-eto n'ebe ahụ, na-ekweta na isi mmalite ya dị ka Hartog na Herbarium vivum nke Oldenland nwụrụ anwụ

A Herbarium vivum bụ nchịkọta nke osisi ndị bara uru, dị ka ndị nwere, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ezigbo osisi, mkpụrụ osisi a na-eri eri, tubers na corms, nke a na-ejikarị ihe osise na eserese chọọ mma, ma ọ bụ ihe osise nke akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ okooko osisi

François Valentijn, onye ozi Dutch na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, gara Cape ugboro anọ n'etiti n'afọ 1685 na 1714, wee dee banyere ịhụ mpịakọta irí na àtó ma ọ bụ irí na ànó nwere ọtụtụ ihe edeturu na Latin na osisi ọ bụla
O dekwara na ụdị ndị ahụ mara mma n'ụzọ pụrụ iche, kpọrọ nkụ nke ọma ma jiri nkà kwado ya
Donker mechara tụfuo mpịakọta ndị ahụ na Holland ka ha batara n'aka Johannes Burman, prọfesọ nke botany na Mahadum Amsterdam nke jiri nchịkọta màkà Thesaurus zeylanicus ya
Mgbè ọ nwụrụ, ha gafere nwa ya nwoke, Nicolaas Laurens Burman, ónyé nọchiri ya dị ka prọfesọ nke botany
Nicolaas gara Carl Linnaeus, na-eburu nnukwu nchịkọta nke osisi Cape, gụnyere mpịakọta Oldenland
Linnaeus na-ezo aka n'ọrụ Oldenland n'ihe odide ya, na-ekwu na Oldenland bụ onye nke abụọ a zụrụ azụ na-anakọta na Cape, nke mbụ bụ Paul Hermann, ónyé nduzi Oldenland
A na-akpọ ụdị Oldenlandia L
na Rubiaceae aha iji sọpụrụ ya

Henry Edmund Olufemi Adefope (amụrụ n'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Machị afọ 1926 ruo abalị iri na otu nke ọnwa Machị nke afọ 2012) bụ onye isi ndị agha Naijiria nke jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ na dịka onye otu Kọmitii Olympic mba ụwa site n'afọ 1985 ruo 2006 na onye otu nsọpụrụ nke Kọmitii Olimpik mba ụwa kemgbe 2007
A mụrụ Henry Adefope n'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Machị afọ 1926 na Kaduna, Naịjirịa nye Alice Adefope
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na CMS Grammar School, Lagos na Mahadum Glasgow,ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mmụta gburugburu ọgwụ na ahụike na 1952
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka dọkịta site n'afọ 1953 ruo 1963 o wee banye n'otu ndị agha Naịjirịa n'afọ 1963
Ọ rịgooro ruo n'ọkwa Major General ma jee ozi dị ka onye ntuziaka nke ozi gbasara ọgwụ

Site n'afọ 1975 ruo 1978 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ọrụ ma site n'afọ 1978 ruo 1979 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Minista nke Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ, ọfịs abụọ nke ụlọ ọrụ n'okpuru nchịkwa ndị agha nke General Olusegun Obasanjo

Adefope jere ozi n'ọkwá dịgasị iche iche na nchịkwa egwuregwu, gụnyere okwu dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Olympic nke Naịjirịa site n'afọ 1967 ruo 1976 na dịka osote onye isi oche ya nke egwuregwu mba nke Commonwealth site n'afọ 1974 ruo 1982
N'afọ 1985, a họpụtara ya na IOC
Mgbe ọ nọ na IOC, ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii nke họọrọ obodo ndị na-akwado maka egwuregwu afọ 2000 na 2004 Summer Olympik
E nyochara ya, mana ewepụrụ ya n'ihe gbasara ihe 2002 Winter Olympic bid
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu IOC na 2006
Adefope bụ nna, nna nna na nna nna nna
Ụmụ ya gụnyere Femi Adefope, Dotun Okojie, Folake Nedd, Ronke Eso, Seyi Adefope
Henry Adefope nwụrụ n'abalị iri na otu nke ọnwa Machị afọ 2012 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na ise
ụbọchị anọ tupu ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya nke afọ iri asatọ na isii
Joseph Nanyen Garba
Ishaya Audu
Philip Henry Askeli (March 24, 1886 na March 13, 1962) bụ onye FINnish American draftsman, onye na esokwunye na ihe Ana eme na onye na enye ndụmọdụ
A mụrụ Askeli n'àgwàetiti Hailuoto na North Ostrobothnia, Finland; ndị mụrụ ya bụ John (Juho) Askeli Jr
(1861 Xi1934) na Kaisa Stiina (née Kallsten; 1848 Xi1923) si Hailuoto
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị wee kwaga United States na afọ 1900
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Lockwood School of Art na Kalamazoo, Michigan site na 1908 ruo 1909, New York College of Art and Design site na 1915 ruo 1916, na Chicago Academy of Art na 1918
Site na 1916 ruo 1917 ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Duluth News Tribune
Askeli sonyeere òtù ndị ọrụ mgbe ọ dị obere

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ maka Toveri site na 1912 ruo 1915, dị ka ode na njikota akụkọ ukwu nke Finnish Socialist Federation of America site na 1917 ruo 1922, na dị ka onye odeakụkọ maka Työmies site na 1924 ruo 1927 (ọ bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ruo 1925)
Site na 1922 ruo 1923, Askeli rụrụ ọrụ na Petrozavodsk, Karelia ma site na 1927 ruo 1929 ọ bụ onye isi ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ nke Co-operative Trading Association na Brooklyn
N'afọ 1920, Askeli so na Communist Party nke United States, nke a chụpụrụ ya na ndị mmegide ya na 1928
O mechara bụrụ onye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke Finnish American League for Democracy
Mgbe ọrụChara oru ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Askeli rụrụ ọrụ dị ka physiotherapist na Boston, Rhode Island, na Hyannis, o nwekwara ụlọ ọgwụ na West Yarmouth, Massachusetts
Ọ natara nzere doctorate ya na ọgwụ sitere n'okike na Mahadum Taylor dị na Chattanooga na 1939
O dekwara akwụkwọ ndị metụtara ubi ahụ
Askeli nwụrụ na Hyannis, Massachusetts mgbe ọ dị afọ 76

Henry Wilmer 'Mike' Bannarn (úbọchị irí na asaá n'ọnwa Julaị, 1910 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, 1965) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na America, nke a maara nke ọma màkà ọrụ ya n'oge Harlem Renaissance
A maara ya màkà ọrụ ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ na dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ihe osise dị iche iche, Conté crayon, pastel, na eserese n'efu
A mụrụ ya na Wetumka, Hughes County, Oklahoma, n'ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Julaị, 1910
Mgbè ọ ka bụ nwatakịrị, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Minneapolis, Minnesota, ebe ọ chọpụtara nkà ya maka nka
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Minneapolis School of Arts (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Minneapolis College of Art and Design)

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na-aga n'ihu màkà Federal Art Project ma kụzie nka na Harlem Community Art Center na New York City, ebe ọ bụ onye a ma ama n'oge a, enyi na ónyé mmekọ nke ónyé ọzọ ama ama ama ama na-ese egwu Africa America, Charles Alston, onye ya na ya na-arụ ọrụ Alston-Bannarn Harlem Art Workshop na Harlem / NYC, NY
A na-ejikọta ya na 'Harlem Renaissance' nke afọ 1930, a na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-enye aka na mmegharị ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara ya nke ọma màkà ọrụ ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọ bụkwa onye maara nke ọma dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe osise dị iche iche, Conté crayon, pastel, free-form sketch, wdg
N'afọ 1941, ọ laghachiri Minnesota wee banye n'otu ihe ọkpụkpụ na asọmpi ihe ọkpụchụ nke Minnesota State Fair, ebe enyere ya ihe nrite mbụ

Ónyé omenkà a na-asọpụrụ nke ukwuu enwetala ihe nrite ihe osise na ngosi ahụ afọ iri gara aga, na-anọchite anya otu n'ime ihe ndị mbụ ónyé omenkà Africa-America rụzuru na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke steeti ahụ
Ọ nwụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, 1965, na Brooklyn, New York

Minnesota State Fair 1928 (Award), Minneapolis Institute of Art 1932 (ihe nrite), Harmon Foundation 1933, PAFA 1934/36, American Negro Exhibition 1940, Minnesota Artists Association Annual 1940 (Award, Minnesota State Fair 1941 (Award)), Atlanta University 1943 (Award)
Hanley Gallery St
Paul, Minnesota 1945, Newton Gallery, 1945
Henry Antoun Barakat (11 June 1914, Cairo - 27 May 1997, Cairo) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt a ma ama
A mụrụ ya na Shubra nye nna Melkite Greek Catholic nke sitere na Syro-Lebanese, na nne Syro-Libanese
Nna ya, Dr
Antoun Barakat, bụ dọkịta ma nata aha Beik site n'aka Eze maka ọrụ ọ rụrụ, Ọ duziri ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama na Cinema Egypt
Mmeri abụọ na nhọpụta atọ
Emume ihe nkiri mba ụwa nke Berlin
Emume ihe nkiri Cannes
Emume ihe nkiri Jakarta
Valencia Festival nke Cinema Mediterenian
Ihe nrite nkwalite nke Egypt State na Arts na Letters nke Supreme Council of Culture, 1995

Henry Cele (Zulu pronunciation ) (20 June 1941 – 2 December 2007) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa ama ama maka ngosipụta ya nke nnukwu Zulu Warrior King Shaka kaSenzangakhona na ihe nkiri telivishọn South Africa Shaka Zulu (1986) yana na ihe nkiri telivishọn Shaka Zulu The Last Great Warrior afọ iri na ise ka e mesịrị
A mụrụ Henry Cele na 20 June 1941 na KwaMashu, Durban, South Africa
Dịka onye otu ezinụlọ Cele, a na-akpọ ya aha ezinụlọ ya Ndosi (Bavela KwaMthetwa), maọbụ Magaye
Cele, onye a na-akpọ 'Black Cat' maka ike ya dịka onye nche, gbara Aces United na South African Soccer League (SASL) ochie n'afọ 1960
Ọ gbakwara otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Lamontville Golden Arrows fc na Lamontville Township ma zụọ otu klọb bọọlụ ọkachamara na South Africa ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Na Satọdee, ọ gbara bọọlụ na Durity Football Club na Commercial Football League na Durban
Dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Cele bụ onye ama ama na mba ụwa, na-eme ihe nkiri na obodo ya bụ South Africa na United States
A họpụtara ya maka ọrụ Shaka na miniseries mgbe ọ rụchara otu ọrụ ahụ na mmepụta ihe nkiri South Africa nke Shaka Zulu
E mere ka Cele pụta ìhè na African American Jet Magazine (3 Nọvemba 1986 mbipụta, peeji nke 57) banyere ọrụ ya na Shaka Zulu–The Mini Series
Ọ pụtara na nnukwu ọrụ na ihe nkiri South Africa na mmemme telivishọn yana ihe nkiri mba ụwa
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, Cele si n'ụlọ ya dị na Glenmore, n'ebe ndịda Durban, kwaga n'obodo ya dị na obodo KwaMashu
Cele nwụrụ n'abalị 2 ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007 na St Augustine's Hospital na Durban
E liri ya na Stellawood Cemetery na Durban eThekwini Metropolitan Municipality, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa

Henry Clifford De Meillon (afọ 1800 London ̊ rụọ úbọchị irí atọ n'otu n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1859 Port Elizabeth) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa a mụrụ n'England nke amaara màkà ihe osise mmírí ya nke Cape Town na 1800s
Nné na nnà ya bụ Henry De Meillon (ebe na afọ ọmụmụ na ọnwụ amaghị) na Anna Sophia Watts (ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1776 rụọ úbọchị irí nà isé n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1863 London)
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ dịghị ihe a maara banyere ndụ izizi De Meillon, ma e wezụga na ezinụlọ ya si n'obodo Meillon
A chọpụtabeghị nké a

Ọbịbịa ya na Simonstown na Cape n'ọnwa Eprel ma ọ bụ Mee afọ 1823 bụ n'ihi ọrịa ịba ọ butere na Mozambique mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nke abụọ n'okpuru Captain Owen n'ụgbọ HMS Leven, ya na brig Barracouta, 'njem màkà nyocha maka ụsọ oké osimiri ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Africa'

Mgbe njem ahụ laghachiri na 1826, na ihe dị ka chaatị ọhụrụ narị atọ, na-akọwapụta ihe dị ka kilomita puku iri atọ (puku iri anọ na asatọ) nke ụsọ oké osimiri, ihe karịrị ọkara ndị ọrụ mbụ ahụ anwụọla n'ọrịa okpomọkụ

Otu n'ime ihe ndị mbụ zoro aka na ya bụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1824 mgbè South African Commercial Advertiser kwuru ya dị ka 'onye na-ese ihe osise' nke e nyere ọrụ ise foto nke Pedu na Teysho, ndị isi Bechuana abụọ na-eleta Cape Town
E tinyere ihe osise ndị a dị ka ihe osise n'akwụkwọ onye njem George Thompson (afọ 1796 rụọ afọ 1889) 'Travels and Adventures in Southern Africa' nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1827
De Meillon kụziiri ụmụ Cloete na Groot Constantia site n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1825 ruo Ọgọst 1825
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nkuzi Bekee na Swellendam
Ọ lụrụ di ugboro abụọ nke mbụ na Miss Grobbelaar / Grobler, alụmdi na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ nwoke abụọ, na nke abụọ na Barbara Enslin, na-emepụta nnukwu ezinụlọ nke abụọ

Ọ hapụrụ mpaghara Cape Town n'afọ 1832 ma rụọ ọrụ nwa oge dị ka odeakwụkwọ na Fort Beaufort, a na-edekwa ya n'afọ 1842 dị ka akụkụ nke Commissariat na Grahamstown, ma na-arụ ọrụ na Port Elizabeth n'afọ 1851
A na-eche na ọ nwụrụ na Port Elizabeth n'oge ọrịa kịtịkpa nke afọ 1859, nke mere na ọkụ gbara ihe onwunwe ya
Henry Lafeet Hooks (Ọnwa Desemba 23, afọ 1921 - rụọ ọnwa Nọvemba 26, afọ 2021) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto

A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ese foto na Inland Empire (IE) iji bipụta foto ya na San Bernardino Sun, na onye mbụ nwere foto nke ndị Amerịka nke agba bipụtara na San Bernardine Sun-Telegram
Henry Munyaradzi (a mụrụ n'afọ 1931) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A na-akpọkarị mmegharị ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ọ bụ onye otu ya dị ka 'Shona sculpture' (lee Shona art and Art of Zimbabwe), ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị otu ya a ma ama abụghị ndi agbụrụ Shona
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mbụ na Tengenenge Sculpture Community, kilomita otu narị na iri ise n'ebe ugwu nke Harare dị nso na Guruve, nke ọ sonyeere na 1967
N'obodo ahụ, na n'ikpeazụ n'ime ụwa sara mbara nke ndị hụrụ nka Zimbabwe n'anya, a maara ya dịka 'Henry'
Henry Munyaradzi nwụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1998 ma e lie ya n'obodo Mukaera Christian dị na mpụga Guruve

Munyaradzi bụ nwa mhondoro, otu n'ime ndị isi ime mmụọ ọdịnala nke obodo ya na Chipuriro (ala Sipolilo Tribal Trust) ihe dị ka kilomita iri atọ site na Guruve, Mashonaland n'ebe ugwu nke ihe bụ, na 1931, Southern Rhodesia
O sonyere dị ka nwata na emume ọdịnala dịka bira, ụdị ngagharị olili ozu, nakwa ịchụ nta
Onye na-ekwu okwu Shona, Munyaradzi agabeghị ụlọ akwụkwọ, nke mere ka asụsụ Bekee siere ya ike n'oge ndụ ya niile
Ọ bụ nwanne nna ya, Edward Chiwawa, onye bụ ọkwá nkà obodo zụlitere Henry; agụmakwụkwọ ya bara uru na nke mbụ
Otu onye nkwusa Ndị Kraịst na-ejegharị ejegharị, Mukaera, onye ọ sonyeere Chọọchị Apostolic ya wee mụta ịgụ Bible na Shona
N'ikpeazụ, ọ ghọrọ onye na-akpụ ọla n'obodo, ma rụkwaa ọrụ dị ka ọkwá nkà na onye na-akụ ụtaba
Central Zimbabwe nwere 'Great Dyke' - isi iyi nke nkume agwọ nke ọtụtụ ụdị nke gụnyere ụdị siri ike nke a na-akpọ springstone

Omenala mbụ nke ndị Shona biri n'elu ugwu dị elu n'ihe dị ka 900 AD na 'Great Zimbabwe', nke malitere n'ihe dị ka 1250–1450 AD, bụ obodo nwere mgbidi nkume na-egosi ihe akaebe na nkà mmụta ihe ochie ya nke nkume nwere nkà na-arụ ọrụ
A na-eji granite dị n'ógbè ahụ rụọ mgbidi ahụ ma ọ nweghị ihe eji eme ihe n'ihe owuwu ha
Mgbe e gwupụtara ya, a hụrụ nnụnụ isii na efere soapstone na ogige ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ihe ncheta ahụ, ya mere ụdị nka na soapstone bụ akụkụ nke ọdịbendị mbụ ahụ
Otú ọ dị, ịkpụ nkume dị ka nka enweghị usoro ọmụmụ kpọmkwem ruo taa ma ọ bụ naanị n'afọ 1954 ka mmegharị nke oge a malitere
Nke a bụ mgbe Frank McEwen ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ na Rhodes National Gallery ọhụrụ a ga-ewu na Harare na site na 1955 ruo 1973 bụ onye isi ntọala ya (ọ mepere na 1957)

Ebumnuche nke Gallery bụ iweta nka na-abụghị nke Afrịka na Harare mana mgbe McEwen mepụtara Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Workshop iji gbaa ọrụ ọhụrụ ume na eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ, obodo nke ndị na-ese ihe chọpụtaghachiri nkà ndị na-adịghị ahụ maka ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume na 'ọgbọ mbụ nke ndị na-ese ihe ọkpụkpụ Shona ọhụrụ
Ndị a gụnyere Joram Mariga na nwa nwanne ya John Takawira, na Thomas Mukarobgwa bụ ndị sonyeere ndị ọrụ gallery na 1957

Mmegharị nka a na-eto eto na-egbu oge ịzụlite mana Tom Blomefield nyere ya nnukwu ume na 1966 site n'aka Tom Blomefield, onye ọcha amụrụ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo na South-Africa nke ụtaba nke ugbo ya dị na Tengenenge dị nso na Guruve nwere ọtụtụ nkume agwọ kwesịrị ekwesị maka ịkpụ
Onye na-akpụ ihe na nkume n'onwe ya, ọ chọrọ ime ka ojiji nke ala ya dị iche iche ma nabata ndị na-akpụ ihe ọhụrụ na ya iji mepụta obodo nke ndị na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ

Nke a bụ n'otu akụkụ n'ihi na n'oge ahụ, e nwere mmachibido iwu mba ụwa megide gọọmentị ọcha nke Rhodesia nke Ian Smith, onye kwupụtara Nkwupụta Unilateral nke nnwere onwe na 1965, ụtaba enweghịzi ike ịmepụta ego zuru oke
N'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị, Tengenenge pụtara “Malite nke Mmalite” - n’ọnọdụ a nke ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ dị ịrịba ama nke dịgidere ruo taa

Munyaradzi alụọla nwanyị ma na-achọ ọrụ mgbe Blomefield kpọbatara ya na Tengenenge Sculpture Community na 10 Septemba 1967, onye dị ka profaịlụ ya nke Henry tụrụ aro ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ naanị ya kama ịbụ onye ndị ọzọ na-akpụ ihe dị ka Leman Moses bụ ndị sonyere obodo ahụ
N'iburu ihe ọmụma ya banyere ọrụ osisi na ịkpụ ígwè, ọ mụtara ngwa ngwa nkà nke onye na-akpụ ihe na nkume, na-anọgide na-akụziri onwe ya maka ọrụ ya niile
Henry McFadden zụtara ọrụ mbụ ya 'The Insect God' ma mesịa gosipụta ya na Musée Rodin ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Henry hapụrụ Community iji rụọ ọrụ n'onwe ya n'afọ 1975
Ọ kụzikwaara ndị ọzọ na-akpụ ihe, dịka nwa nwanne nna ya Edward Chiwawa
Munyaradzi gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Rhodes National Gallery na 1968
N'oge ahụ, a ghaghị ibuga ọrụ ahụ na kilomita otu narị na iri ise gaa Salisbury, ebe Jenny Senior, onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi maka ụlọ ahịa na onye nyekwara aka hazie ihe ngosi nka kwa afọ
Dị ka Blomefield si kwuo, mgbe a jụrụ Henry otú o si mee ọdịdị zuru oke na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya, ọ zara 'Ana m agbaso ọdịdị nkume ahụ
Ọ bụrụ na nkume ahụ guzo n'ebe ahụ, enwere m ike ịhụ isi ihe dị iche iche dị mkpa ma m na-eme ya site n'ebumnobi m; enwere mmekọrịta dị n'otu n'etiti onwe m na nkume ahụ

1969 bụ nnọọ afọ dị mkpa maka mmegharị ihe ọkpụkpụ ọhụrụ, n'ihi na ọ bụ oge McEwen weere ụfọdụ ọrụ, ọkachasị site na Tengenenge, gaa na Museum of Modern Art na New York na ebe ndị ọzọ na US, iji nweta otuto dị egwu
Ọ bụkwa afọ ahụ nwunye ya Mary (née McFadden) guzobere Vukutu, ugbo ọkpụkpụ dị nso na Inyanga, ebe ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe mechara rụọ ọrụ

Ndepụta nke aha ndị na-akpụ ihe ndị ga-abụ ndị a maara nke ọma na mba ụwa toro nke gụnyere Bernard Matemera, Sylvester Mubayi, Henry Mukarobgwa, Thomas Mukarobgwa, Joseph Ndandarika na Bernard Takawira
Ndị niile a kpọtụrụ aha ruo ugbu a, gụnyere Munyaradzi, nyere aka n'ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Arte de Vukutu nke e gosipụtara na 1971 na Musée National d'Art Moderne na 1972 na Musée Rodin
McEwen haziri ndị a, onye biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Paris tupu nhọpụta ya na Harare
Munyaradzi na nwunye ya nwere ụmụ nwanyị asaa na ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Otu nwa nwoke, Mekias (Mike), onye gara Mahadum Manchester wee bụrụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu
Ọ na-agbaso nzọụkwụ nna ya dị ka onye na-akpụ ihe
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Henry nwetara nkwanye ùgwù n'ụwa niile, na ihe ngosi asatọ nke otu onye na ebe ndị dị ka Los Angeles, Berlin na Heidelberg
N'ịgbaso otu n'ime ndị a, ihe ngosi nke 1984 na Commonwealth Institute na London, ọ zụtara ugbo na Ruwa, Zimbabwe ebe ọ biri ma rụọ ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
E gosipụtara otu n'ime ọrụ Henry, nke a na-akpọ Wing Woman, na stampụ Zimbabwe nke e nyere iji cheta ụbọchị Commonwealth na 14 Maachị 1983
Ọ mepụtara uru 9c n'ime usoro nke Joseph Ndandarika, John Takawira na Nicholas Mukomberanwa rụchara
Mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ nwere aha 'Henry Mudzengerere'! Ọzọ, nke a na-akpọ Spirit Python bụ uru 30c na nke e nyere na 14 Eprel 1988 iji mee ememe ncheta afọ iri atọ nke mmeghe nke National Gallery
Munyaradzi nwetara isiokwu ya site na ụwa okike, na-ejikọta ya na ihe osise Ndị Kraịst ma gosipụta ya n'ụzọ na-enweghị atụ, nke onwe ya
Celia Winter-Irving, n'akwụkwọ ya na Stone Sculpture (lee ọgụgụ ọzọ) dere 'Dị ka Paul Klee, Henry na-ewere akara maka ije mana ọ na-achịkwa ya mgbe nzọụkwụ mbụ gasịrị
Jonathan Zilberg tụlere mgbanwe nke ụdị ya na njikọ ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ Europe

Ihe ọkpụkpụ Munyaradzi dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe, Chapungu Sculpture Park, Museum fur Völkerkunde, Frankfurt, Indianapolis Museum of Art, McEwen collection nke British Museum, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ihe ka ọtụtụ na-agụnye ihu mmadụ ma ọ bụ anụmanụ nke a na-akpụ anya dị ka okirikiri dị mfe ma na-egbutu anya na imi na akara kwụ ọtọ n'ụdị T

Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi ya, dị ka Saviour and Child (1989), agagharịala n'ụwa niile; dịka ọmụmaatụ na Yorkshire Sculpture Park na 1990, ebe ọrụ ndị a na-egosipụta gụnyere ihe atụ sitere n'aka ndị niile na-ese ihe nyere aka na ngosi Musée Rodin nke 1971
Nchịkọta “Chapungu Culture and Legend – A Culture in Stone” nke e gosipụtara na Kew Gardens n'afọ 2000 na-egosipụta ihe ọkpụkpụ Henry a kpọrọ Mhondoro – Great Lion Spirit (Springstone, 1986) na p
48-59 and The Spirit Medium and the Interpreter (Springstone, 1995) on p
A na-ahụ ihe oyiyi nke ọrụ Munyaradzi n'ụzọ dị mfe na World Wide Web, dịka ọmụmaatụ site na nchịkọta Richard Handelsman ebe Ekpere maka mmiri ozuzo (203 cm elu) bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị

Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ mbụ nke Munyaradzi bịanyere aka na aha 'Enri', dịka ọmụmaatụ maka ihe ngosi Arte de Vukutu, mana ọtụtụ n'ime ha nwere aha 'HENRY' nke e dere na mkpụrụedemede ukwu na ọtụtụ ndị enyela ọnụ ahịa dị elu n'ahịa mba ụwa
N'ihi nke ahụ, a maara na adịgboroja dị adị
O ji ọtụtụ ụdị serpentine (eg springstone, green na red serpentine) na obere nkume verdite dị oké ọnụ ahịa maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
Dị ka Olivier Sultan kwuru

'A maara ya dị ka 'Henry', onye a maara nke ọma na Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe dị ka onye dibịa anwansi, onye amamihe nke maara otú e si achọta ihe dị mkpa ma, ya mere, nwee ike ịsụgharị isi nke onye ọ bụla ma ọ bụ mmụọ n'ime nkume
Site na nlezianya na ịdị nro, ọ na-ahọrọ nkume nke ọ na-eche na o nwere mmụọ nke anụmanụ, mmadụ, ọnwa ma ọ bụ ọbụna ifufe
Mgbe ahụ, ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike iji tọhapụ mmụọ ahụ, na-eme ka ọ ghara ịnwụ n'ihu stele na anya hypnotic
Henry Ndubueze Okoroji (amuru n'ụbọchi nke iri na abụọ nke n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1984 na Ngor Okpala ) bu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria na-agbara Casertana FC bọọlu ugbu a
Ka emechara iko mbaụwa nke afọ 1994, e butere ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu Naịjirịa n'asọmpi kacha elu nke Europe
Onye ndụmọdụ Okoroji, Prince Ikpe Ekong bụ otu n'ime ha ka ọ bịanyere aka na ụlọ ịgba egwu Italian AC Reggiana n'oge ahụ Carlo Ancelotti na-azụ ya
Ikpe Ekong kwadoro klọb ya ka ha nweta aka ha na onye na-agbachitere nkà dị oke egwu Henry Okoroji
Ọ bịarutere n'afọ 2003 ka Prince na-apụla mgbe ọ lụsịrị ọgụ megide Serie A niile n'ụlọ ikpe wee merie
Henry na-egwu ọtụtụ ọrụ ịgba bọọlụ ya na ọkwa nke atọ na nke anọ nke egwuregwu bọọlụ Italian
N'ihi iwu siri ike maka ndị na-abụghị ndị egwuregwu EU ndị egwuregwu Africa enweela ihe isi ike na Italy
N'afọ 2007 Otú ọ dị, ACF Fiorentina hụrụ nkà Henry nke debanyere onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ na nkwekọrịta otu afọ
Agbazigara Henry gaa obodo Bulgaria, ma obere oge mgbe ọ bịarutere, a kpọghachiri ya na Ịtali
Ya mere, ọ naghị egwu egwuregwu ọ bụla n'oge ahụ na ọkwa mbụ
Mgbe e mesịrị, a gbazigara ya na Chieti Calcio tupu ọ laghachi azụ na FC Pro Vasto

Henry Ray Clark (1936 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ nà itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị, 2006) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'akụkọ ọdịnala a mụrụ na Bartlett, Texas, wee kwaga Houston, ébé ọ ghọrọ ónyé omekome aha ya bụ 'The Magnificent Pretty Boy'
Mgbè a màrà ya ikpe màkà ịzụ ahịa ọgwụ ọjọọ, a màrà ya ụta màkà mwakpo, nke atọ ya na Texas Three Strikes Law, nke màrà ya ikpe afọ irí abụọ na isé n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Huntsville State

Mgbè ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, ọ mepụtara ụdị eserese nke na-agụnye nhazi zuru ezu na ọrụ akara, William Steen chọpụtakwara ya na ihe ngosi nka ụlọ mkpọrọ, ónyé rere ọrụ Clark nye ndị na-azụ ahịa mbà na mbà ụwa
Clark nwụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị, 2006, onye ohi na ogbugbu n'ụlọ ya
A mụrụ ya na 1936 na obéré ọbọdọ Bartlett, Texas, ezinụlọ Clark kwagara Houston
Henry na-eto eto hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbè ọ gụsịrị klas nke isii iji 'gbago n'okporo ámá'
Dị ka Henry si kwuo, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, nwanne nnà ya zụrụ ya n'ụzọ ịgba chaa chaa n'okporo ámá
Henry Ray Clark bụ onye na-adọrọ mmasị na ọdịdị na àgwà

Ọ màrà mmá, nwere anya na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, a bịara màrà ya n'okporo ámá Houston dị ka 'Pretty Boy' na 'The Magnificent Pretty Boy', ma ọ bụ site na aha nke ya ma ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị maara ya
Ndụ Clark nke ịzụ ahịa ọgwụ ọjọọ, ịgba akwụna, na ihe ndị ọzọ na-eme ka ọ na-eche mgbè niile na ọ dị nso na akara ikpeazụ ọzọ nke ga-eme ka o nwee ndụ

N'afọ 1977, mgbè a màrà ya ikpe na-ere ọgwụ ọjọọ, a màrà ya ụta maka mwakpo (ọ gbagburu nwoke nwara ịgba ọsọ na ịgba chaa chaa nke Clark) ma maa ya ikpe n'okpuru Iwu 'Three Strikes' nke Texas ruo afọ iri abụo na isé n'ụlọ mkpọrọ steeti Huntsville
N'ebe ahụ, a kọwaara Clark na mmemme nka ụlọ mkpọrọ wee malite ise ihe
Clark chọpụtara na eserese ahụ nyere ya ntọhapụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
N'iji mkpịsị akwụkwọ ballpoint na envelopu manila a napụtara, o mepụtara ihe oyiyi nke ụwa ndị dị anya dịpụrụ adịpụ nke ndị dị ike bi

Na Julaị ụbọchị irí na atọ, 2006, ndị mwakpo ụlọ abụọ gbara Clark, onye dị afọ irí isii na itoolu, égbè n'ogwe aka na afọ; ọ nọgidere na-arịa ọrịa na nkwado ndụ na Ben Taub Hospital ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Julaị ụbọchị irí abụọ na itoolu
Henry Andries Shembeni bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na itoolu dịka onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
Henry Taylor (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese onyinyo nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Los Angeles, California
A maara ya nke ọma màkà ihe osise acrylic ya, ihe osise mgbasa ozi agwakọta, na ntinye

A mụrụ Henry Taylor dị ka nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụnne nwoke na ụmụnne nwanyị asatọ, nke méré ka a kpọọ ya 'Henry nke Asatọ', na Ventura, California, nná nke gọọmentị US were n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na azụmahịa ma depụta ya dị ka onye-ese ihe n'akwụkwọ ọmụmụ Henry
A zụlitere ya na Oxnard, California, Henry gara nkuzi nka na Oxnart College n'okpuru James Jarvaise, ónyé ghọrọ onye nduzi na-aga n'ihu
Nwanne ya nwoke, Randy, bụ ónyé guzobere Ventura County nke Black Panthers
Mgbe afọ irí nke ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ahụ màkà ọrịa uche na Camarillo State Mental Hospital, Taylor lara ezumike nká na 1997
Ọ gara California Institute for the Arts, ebe ọ nwetara nzèrè Bachelor nke Fine Art n'afọ 1995

Ihe kachasị ukwuu Taylor mepụtara n'ọrụ ya bụ n'ihe osise a maara ya ka ọ na-ese ihe, na ihe dị iche iche, gụnyere ngwugwu sịga efu, igbe ncha, igbe ọka, akpa, igbe, karama, oche, na ákwà a gbatịrị agbatị

Ihe ndị ọ na-ekwu gụnyere ezinụlọ, ndị enyi, ndị ọrịa (mgbè ha na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ), ndị enyi, onye ọ na-amaghị, ndị na-ere nri, ndị ama ama, ndị na'enweghị ebe obibi, onwé ya, ndị akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndị ọdịbendị, ndị dike egwuregwu, ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu site na foto ma ọ bụ ọrụ nka ndị ọzọ

Mgbe ụfọdụ, Taylor na-ada oge na oghere, dịka na Cicely na Miles Visit the Obamas (2017) n'ọrụ a, Cicely Tyson na Miles Davis painted Mgbè foto a ma ama nke di na nwunye ahụ site na 1968 hụrụ n'ihu White House, na-ezo aka na nleta ha na-eche n'echiche na Obamas

A kọwaala ụdị ihe osise Taylor n'ụzọ dịgasị iche iche dị ka ihe na-akpali akpali, nke na-akpụ akpali, ngwa ngwa na nke na-enweghị isi, jupụtara na ọmịiko, mmesapụ aka, na ịhụnanya, yana ihe ányá yiri egwu blues, ka ọ na-ejigide mmetụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
A na-eto ọrụ ya maka ịnọgide na-enwe nguzozi na-agaghị ekwe omume n'etiti ihe osise nke ọma na nke dị mgbagwoju anya nke ụwa nka na-egosi na ọ na-eme n'onwe ya

A na-ejikọta ọrụ Taylor n'ime usoro ọmụmụ dị iche iche nke America, gụnyere omenala eserese nkè Alice Neel, na ọrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe na Harlem Renaissance dịka Jacob Lawrence na Romare Bearden, ma jiri ya tụnyere ónyé ọgbọ ya Kerry James Marshall

Otu n'ime ọrụ Taylor na-adịbeghị anya, The Times Ain't A Changing, Fast Enough! na-ejide ihe omume nke ịgba égbè nke Philando Castile, ónyé a gbagburu ma gbuo n'ụgbọala nke ya na enyi ya nwanyị na nwa afọ anọ

Taylor gosipụtara ọrụ nke na-abanye n'omume ochie nke Master's Golf Tournament site na iji Black naanị caddies na ihe ngosi akpọrọ 'Disappeared, but A Tiger Showed Up, Later' na Hauser & Wirth, Southampton

Ihe ngosi dị mkpa nke Taylor gụnyere ihe ngosi n'etiti ọrụ na MoMA PS1, yana ihe ngosi onwé ónyé na Studio Museum na Harlem, Artpace, na Santa Monica Museum of Art, yana ihe ngosi otu na Whitney Museum of American Art, Corcoran Gallery of Art, Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles, Hammer Museum, Carnegie Museum of Art
Ndị na-anọchite anya Taylor bụ Blum & Poe Gallery na Los Angeles na Feur Mesler gallery na New York
E nyere ya Robert De Niro, Sr
Prize màkà ihe ọ rụzuru na Painting
Ọ bụ Hauser & Wirth (site na 2020) na Blum & Poe na-anọchite anya Taylor
Anọ m na-ese ónyé ọ bụla, ma ọ bụ m na-anwa
Ana m agbalị ijide ógè m na ónyé nwere ike ịbụ enyi m, onye agbata obi, ónyé ama ama, ma ọ bụ ónyé na-enweghị ebe obibi
'Ọ na-ewe obi ike ime ọtụtụ ihe
Ma, n'ụzọ ụfọdụ, ọ naghị ewe obi ike n'ezie, n'ihi na enwere onwe gị ime ya

Ị ga-awụli elu n'oge niile
ḷba ọchananya nke oyibo kpọrọ Hepataịtis B bụ nje ọrịa n'efe nke n'emetụta umeji
Onwere ike ịkpata nsogbu ndị ga-anote aka n'ime ahụ
Mgbe ụfọdụ ndị nwere ya anaghị ama na ha nwere ya
Ndịọzọ n'egosi na ha nwere ya site n'ịgbọ agbọ, ahụ ịgbanwe ka okwesịrị, ike ọgwụgwụ, mamịrị n'eji oji na afọ igbu mgbu
Mgbe ụfọdụ nsogbu a n'anọgide ruo ọtụtụ izu mana ọ naghị egbu mmadụ ọsọ osọ
Ọ na-erụ abalị 30 ruo 180 tupu ogosichaa nkeọma
Ndị bu ya pụta ụwa, bụ pasent 90 n'enwe ọdị nke a akpọrọ Hepataịtis B, ebe pasent iri nke ndị enweghị ya mgbe ha dị afọ ise anaghị enweta ya
Mana ndị oji anaghị ama mgbe oji nweta ha; mana ha nwere ike inwe orịa umeji na ọnya n'ime umeji nwere ike ijide onye ahụ
Nke a n'ebute ọnwụ pasent 15 ruo 25 ndị nwere ọrịa a
Mgbe mmadụ na onye nwere ọrịa nọkọtara maọbụ mekọọ, onwere ike ibute ya
Ndị nwetara ya mgbe ha n'amụ nwa maọbụ mgbe ha bụ ụmụntakịrị bụ n'ihina ha nọ ebe ha ga-enweta ya ngwa ngwa
Mana ndị nọ ebe ọdịchaghị nnukwu nwere ike inweta ya site na mminye ọbara maọbụ mmekọahụ nwoke na nwanyị
Ndị n'arụ n'ụlọahụike , ebe ana amịnye ọbara, ebe ana amịpụ ọbara , ndị bi ebe onye nwere ya nọ, ime njem ebe ndị nwere ya nọ n'ebe amara maka ya
Ndị n'ede ihe n'ahụ ha na ndị mepere ahụ ha emepe bụ ndị nwere ya n'afọ 1980, mana obelatala n'ihi ọgwụ mgbochi
Mana anaghị ebuta ọrịa mgbe mmadụ jidere onyeọzọ aka, iji efere onye nwere ya ji eme ihe rie nri, isusu ọnụ, ịmakụ mmadụ, ịkwa ụkwara, ịma uzere, maọbụ inye nwa ara
Ekweresịrị ile ahụ ihe dịka abalị 30 ruo 60 mgbe mmadụ nwetara ya
Ọbụ ọbara k'eji eme nnyocha ahụ maka nje ahu n'ihe ga-eguzogide ya
Enwere udị ịba ocha na anya 5 A, B, CH, D E
Kemgbe afọ 1982, ọbụ ọgwụ mgbochi emere maka ya k'eji agwọ ya
Ótú mba ụwa akpọrọ Wọld Helt Ọganaịzeshọn kwurụ n'ọga aka mma ka agbaa ọgwụ mgbochi ụbọchị amụrụ onye ahụ maọbụrụ n'ọga-ekwe omume
Enwere ike ịgbakwa abụọ maọbụ atọ ka onwe ike rụọ ọrụ ka okwesịrị

Itinyere mmadụ umeji ọhụrụ maka umeji mebiri emebi

Heptabarb (INN; Eudan, Medapan, Medomin, Noctyn), nke a makwaara dị ka heptabarbitone (BAN) ma ọ bụ heptabarbital, bụ ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị ọrụ nke ezinụlọ barbiturate
A na-eji ya na Europe maka ọgwụgwọ nke mbibi ebighị dị ka ndị mmadụ n'ihe ehighị ụra nke ọma site na 1950s gaa n'ihu, mana kemgbe ahụ ka a kwụsịrị ya

Na iji ya eme ihe na ozuzu, ahịhịa bụ otu ahịhịhịa a na-ekesa na ọtụtụ ebe, ewezuga akwụkwọ nri na ahịhụ ndị ọzọ a na-eri maka macronutrients, nwere ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ ma ọ bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke a na-eji eme nri na-atọ ísì ụtọ, maka ebumnuche ọgwụ, ma ọ bụ maka ihe na- ísì ụtọ
Ojiji e ji esi nri na-eme ka a mata ọdịiche dị n'etiti ahịhịa na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ

Ahịhịa na-ezo aka na ozuzu na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ma ọ bụ akụkụ okooko osisi (ma ọ bụ ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ kpọrọ nkụ), ebe a na-akpakarị ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ ma mepụta ya site na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke osisi ahụ, gụnyere mkpụrụ, ụgbụgbọ, mgbọrọgwụ na mkpụrụ osisi
Ahịhịa nwere ọtụtụ ojiji gụnyere nri, ọgwụ, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na na onọdụ ụfọdụ, ihe ime mmụọ

Ojiji a na-eji okwu ahụ bụ 'ahịhịa' eme ihe dị iche na etiti ahịhịa nri na ahịhịhịa ọgwụ; na ọgwụ ma ọ bụ nke ime mmụọ, enwere ike iwere akụkụ ọ bụla nke osisi ahụ dị ka 'ahịhi', gụnyere akwụkwọ, mgbọrọgwụ, okooko osisi, mkpụrụ, ụgbụgbọ mgbọrọgwụ dị na ime (na cambium), resin na pericarp
A na-akpọ okwu 'ahịhịa' /hɜːrb/ na Commonwealth English, mana /ɜːrrb/ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na etiti ndị na-asụ Bekee na North America na ndị si mpaghara ndị ọzọ ebe h-dropping na-eme
Na botany, aha 'ahịhịa' na-ezo aka na 'osisi nke na-adịghị emepụta ogwe osisi', na adjective 'ahịha' pụtara 'dị ka ahịhịa', na-ezo ka akụkụ nke osisi ndị na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ma dị nro
Herbert J
Lance (June 12, 1925 na November 7, 2006) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu jazz, blues na gospel, onye na-ede egwu, ónyé na'emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé nwe ụlọ ndekọ na DJ redio
Tinyere idekọ ọtụtụ egwu n'onwe ya na ngwụcha afọ 1940, o so dee egwu Ruth Brown, 'Mama, He Treats Your Daughter Mean'
A mụrụ Herb Lance na Georgetown, South Carolina, ma bírí ébé ahụ ruo mgbe ọ debanyere aha na US Army na 1944
N'afọ 1948, o mere ndekọ mbụ ya nke Ray Abrams Sextet kwadoro, maka Bob Shad's 'Sittin' In With' record label
Ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya bịara na mbipụta ya nke egwu Bernice Petkere 'Close Your Eyes', nké ruru #4 na chaatị Billboard R&B (nke a na-akpọ chaatị Race Records n'oge ahụ) na 1949
Abụọ ọzọ e wepụtara n'otu afọ ahụ mekwara ka R&B chart 'N'ihi na' (#8) na 'That Lucky Old Sun' (#6)
Lance rụrụ ọrụ gbụrụ-gbúrụ mba ahụ na 1950, gụnyere ebe obibi na Baltimore na ndị otu Cootie Williams, na usoro otu abalị na Ohio na Roy Brown

Ihe ndekọ ndị e mechara dee na 'Sittin' In With' enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, na Septemba 1950 ọ malitere idekọ maka Columbia Records, tupu ọ bụrụ isi otu izu na Apollo Theater na New York City n'ọnwa na-esote
Otu mbipụta ya maka Columbia emeghị ka chaatị ahụ pụta, na 1951 a kwagara ya na akara OKeh, tupu ya abịanye aka na Mercury Records na Chicago

Olayinka Herbert Samuel Heelas Badmus Macaulay (14 Nọvemba 1864 - 7 Mee 1946) bụ onye Naijiria, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye nyocha, injinia, onye na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye nta akụkọ, na onye na-eti egwu ma ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria na-ewere ya dị ka onye guzobere mba Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Herbert Macaulay na Broad Street, Lagos, na 14 Nọvemba 1864 n'ezinụlọ Thomas Babington Macaulay na Abigail Crowther
Nne na nna ya bụ ụmụ nke ndị e jidere site na Nigeria nke oge a, ndị British West Africa Squadron kpọghachiri na Sierra Leone, ma mesịa laghachi na Nigeria ugbu a
Thomas Babington Macaulay bụ otu n'ime ụmụ Ojo Oriare ebe Abigail Crowther bụ nwa Bishop Samuel Ajayi Crowther, onye sitere n'agbụrụ Eze Abiodun
Thomas Babington Macaulay bụ onye guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mbụ na Naịjirịa, CMS Grammar School, Lagos
Macaulay banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na 1869 nakwa site na 1869 ruo 1877, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St Paul's Breadfruit School, Lagos na CMS Faji School, Lagos
Site na 1877 ruo Ọktoba 1880, ọ gara CMS Grammar School, Lagos maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ mgbe nna ya nwụrụ n'afọ 1878
N'afọ 1880, ọ sonyeere ụgbọ mmiri na-azụ ahịa nke nwanne nne ya wee malite njem ahia na njem ozi ala ọzọ gafee Osimiri Niger na-eleta Bonny, Lokoja, Gbebe na Brass
Mgbe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Ndị Kraịst, ọ nwetara ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka ndị ụkọchukwu na onye na-edepụta ihe na Ngalaba Ọrụ Ọha, Lagos
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, site na nkwado nke ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị, Macaulay hapụrụ Lagos naabalị 1 ọnwa Julaị 1890 ịga n'ihu ọzụzụ ya na England
Site na afọ 1891 ruo 1894 ọ gụrụ injinia obodo na Plymouth, England, ma bụrụkwa nwa akwụkwọ nke GD
Bellamy, onye nyocha obodo na injinia mmiri na Plymouth
Na 1893, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Royal Institute of British Architects, London
Macaulay bụkwa onye na-eti egwu nke natara asambodo na egwu site na Trinity College, London na asambodo na ịkụ violin na Music International College, London
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Lagos na Septemba 1893, ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ na ọrụ ndị ọchịchị dị ka onye nyocha nke Crown Lands
Ọ hapụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nyocha ala na Septemba 1898 n'ihi enweghị mmasị na-arịwanye elu maka ọchịchị Britain nke Lagos Colony na ọnọdụ Yorubaland na Niger Coast Protectorate dịka ndị nchebe Britain

Ndị edemede ndị ọzọ dịka Patrick Dele-Cole achọpụtala mmegbu nke ebubo ọfịs (nke ndị isi ya na Britain mere) na ịchụso esemokwu uru onwe onye nke kpuchiri Macaulay arụkwaghịm dịka onye nyocha nke Crown GrantsKristin Mann, na-ezo aka na ozi gọọmentị British Colonial, na-ekwu na Macaulay mere omume n'eziokwu, site n'iji 'ọnọdụ ya dị ka Surveyor of Crown Lands iji nyere ndị enyi aka inweta onyinye okpueze ma kpagbuo ndị iro site n'inye ndị ọzọ ala ha'
Ọ gara n'ihu dee na Macaulay 'nwetara onyinye okpueze n'aha ụgha wee ree ha na uru'
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 1898, ọ nwetara ikikere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha
Dị ka onye nyocha, atụmatụ ya na ọnụ ahịa ya nke gụnyere ụlọ E
Alex Taylor na Victoria Street, ebe obibi Henry Carr na Tinubu, ụlọ Akinola Maja na Doherty Villa na Campos Square
Macaulay lụrụ Caroline Pratt, nwa nwanyị nke onye isi ndị uwe ojii nke Afrịka na Disemba 1898
Alụmdi na nwunye ha bịara na njedebe n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1899 mgbe Caroline nwụrụ n'oge ọ na-amụ nwa ma Macaulay ekwuputala nkwa na ọ gaghị alụ nwaanyị ọzọ
Ọ bụ ezie na Macaulay alụghị nwanyị ọzọ na Chọọchị, o nwere mmekọrịta gụnyere Ms
da Souza onye laghachiri Lagos, ụlọ nna nna ya, site na Brazil wee biri ruo afọ 90, onye mụụrụ ya ọtụtụ ụmụ, yana mkpakọrịta nke na-amụtaghị nwa (Stella Davies Coker, nwa J
Davies na Sarah Forbes Bonetta, ya na Macaulay biri site na 1909 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1916
Ha nwere nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Sarah Abigail Idowu Macaulay Adadevoh
A kpọrọ Sarah Abigail aha nne nne ya Sarah Forbes Bonetta na nne nne nna ya Abigail Crowther)
A kọrọ na Macaulay bụ onye Naijiria mbụ nwere ụgbọala
Ọ bụ ezie na Macaulay sitere n'ezinụlọ ndị Anglịkan na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, Macaulay nabatara ọdịnala okpukpe ndị Afrịka, nwee nkwenkwe ụgha, ma tinye aka n'omume anwansi
Akwụkwọ nke onwe ya nwere ihe odide sitere n'aka ndị na-akọ ọdịnihu na ndị na-agba afa na ntụziaka gbasara ihe mgbochi, ịgba afa, àjà, na omume anwansi ndị ọzọ
Macaulay bụkwa onye otu Association of Babalawos (Ifa priests) nke Lagos
Macaulay bụ nnukwu onye na-elekọta mmadụ na Victorian Lagos

Ọ haziri egwu na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri (Ọ so na ndị Naijiria mbụ wetara ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa site n'ịkpọ ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ka ha bịa Lagos iji gosipụta ihe nkiri) na ebe obibi ya (aha ya bụ 'Kirsten Hall' n'aha enyi ya onye Germany Consul Arthur Kirsten) na 8, Balbina Street na Yaba
A na-akpọ Macaulay 'Wizard of Kirsten Hall' n'ihi ikike o nwere inweta ozi nzuzo
Macaulay na-arụ ọrụ na netwọk nke ndị ozi ọ kwụrụ ụgwọ dị ukwuu
Ọtụtụ oge, nkeji site na nzukọ gọọmentị ndị ọchịchị ga-apụta na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị Macaulay na-akpakọrịta
E nwere ike ịchọta akụkụ niile nke faịlụ gọọmentị na telegrams na Macaulay Papers na ngalaba Africana nke Ọbá akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ibadan
Tupu mmalite narị afọ iri abụọ, Macaulay jikọtara ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-elekọta mmadụ na Lagos, rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha onwe ya ma nwee echiche dị nro banyere colonialism
Otú ọ dị, ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị nke afọ 1800, ọ malitere ịhapụ ọrụ ọkachamara ya na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
O sonyeere Anti-Slavery and Aborigines' Protection Society
Macaulay bụ onye mmeri na-enweghị atụ nke ndị mmadụ

Nwa nwa Ajayi Crowther, bishọp Afrịka mbụ nke Niger Territory, a mụrụ ya na Lagos nke kewara na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ime otu ndị a haziri n'usoro dị mma - ndị ọchịchị Britain bi na mpaghara Marina, ndị Saros na ụmụ ohu ndị ọzọ bi n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, na ndị Brazil bi n'azụ ndị ọcha na Portuguese Town
N'azụ mmadụ atọ ahụ, e bi ezigbo ndị Lagosian, ọtụtụ ndị Yoruba, ndị agbata obi ha nwere ihe ùgwù na-adịghị amasị ma na-eleghara ha anya
Ọ bụ ruo mgbe ọgbọ Macaulay ka ndị Saros na ndị Brazil malitere iche echiche ime ihe jikọrọ ha na ndị mmadụ
Macaulay bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-akwado mba Naịjirịa na ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya bụ onye mmegide siri ike nke ọtụtụ iwu ndị ọchịchị

Dịka mmeghachi omume na nkwupụta nke ndị Britain na ha na-achị na 'ezi ọdịmma nke ndị obodo n'obi,' o dere, sị 'Ọdị nke 'ezigbo ọdịmma nke ndị obodo n'obi' hà nhata na ogologo, obosara na omimi nke akpa onye ọcha
N'afọ 1908, ọ kpughere nrụrụ aka ndị Europe na njikwa ego ụgbọ okporo ígwè na 1919 ọ rụrụ ụka nke ọma maka ndị isi nke gọọmentị colonial weghaara ala ha n'ihu Privy Council na London
N'ihi ya, a manyere gọọmentị ndị ọchịchị ịkwụ ndị isi ụgwọ
N'afọ 1909, ọ pụtara n'ihu ọha megide mmachibido iwu nke mmụọ ịbanye na Naịjirịa nke o chere na ọ ga-emesị mee ka ego gọọmentị belata ma mesịa mụbaa ụtụ isi
Macaulay chọpụtakwara onwe ya na mmegide megide ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị na isi okwu atọ a ma ama na ndụ Lagos n'oge 1900–1930
Ihe iseokwu ndị ahụ gụnyere ọnụego mmiri a tụrụ aro, nhọrọ nke Oba nke Lagos na Imamate nke ụlọ alakụba Lagos Central
Macaulay megidere ụtụ isi nke ndị ọchịchị iji kwado mmiri na Lagos n'ihi ụtụ isi n'enweghị nnọchi anya
Ọ bụ nnukwu onye na-akwado ụlọ Docemo na Lagos
N'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi na Lagos anọghị n'okpuru ọchịchị na-apụtaghị ìhè, a napụrụ Oba nke Lagos n'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ndị ibe ya na mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke mba ahụ ọtụtụ ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala ya
Macaulay kwadoro Ụlọ Docemo na mmegide ya na ọnụego mmiri na nnweta nke ala Lagos
Ọ kwalitekwara Kọmitii Ilu nke Oba nke Lagos na ndị isi ọdịnala na Lagos megide ụfọdụ n'ime iwu ndị ọchịchị
Ikpe Oluwa Land mere ka profaịlụ Macaulay dị na Lagos dịkwuo mma
Amodu Tijani Oluwa, onye isi ọdịnala, agbaghawo nnweta mmanye n'akwụghị ụgwọ nke ala ezinụlọ ya na Apapa
O meriri arịrịọ ya na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu ma were ikpe ahụ gaa na Privy Court Council na London
Macaulay bụ odeakwụkwọ nzuzo nke Oluwa na njem ahụ na London
Kọmitii Ilu na Oba kwadoro ikpe Oluwa bụ ndị nwere mmasị na nchedo ala ezinụlọ ha na Lagos
Na London, Macaulay gosipụtara onwe ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ nzuzo nke Oluwa na dịka onye nnọchi anya Oba na ikike o kwuru okwu nke ndị ọchịchị na-achị obodo chere na ọ na-emegide ọdịmma ha
N'afọ 1920, ndị Britain chụpụrụ Eleko, Eshungbayi n'ihi na ọ jụrụ ịjụ ebubo megide ndị ọchịchị ọchịchị Macaulay mere na London
Iji gaa n'ihu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, Macaulay guzobere Nigerian Daily News, ikpo okwu ọ na-eji ede echiche dịka Justitia Fiat The Moral Obligation of the British Government to the House of Docemo
O dekwara ótù ihe akpọrọ Henry Carr Must Go

Site na 1923 ruo 1938, ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama n'ọtụtụ okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị mkpa na Lagos gụnyere ntuli aka n'ime ntuli aka nke afọ ise n'ime Kansụl omebe iwu, ntuli aka nke afọ atọ na Kansụl obodo Lagos, na onye isi nke Ụlọ Docemo
N'ihe omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, ọ dabere na Lagos Daily News, Lagos Market Women Association nke onye otu ya, Alimotu Pelewura, Ụlọ Docemo na ọtụtụ ndị Lagosians na-agụghị akwụkwọ
Echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya kewara ọtụtụ ndị isi Lagos ka ọ na-eji Daily News na-akparị ndị na-emegide ya na ndị enyi ya na ndị enyi ya dị ka Henry Carr
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Juun afọ 1923, ọ tọrọ ntọala Nigerian National Democratic Party (NNDP), otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mbụ nke Naijiria

Ndị otu ahụ nwetara mmeri n'oche niile na ntuli aka nke 1923, 1928 na 1933Ọ bụ ezie na, ọrụ bụ isi nke otu ahụ bụ itinye ndị na-azọ ọkwa na kansụl omebe iwu, ọ nwere ebumnuche sara mbara nke ịkwalite ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naịjirịa, na-eme ka ndị Naịjirịa na-ekere òkè dị elu na mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, akụ na ụba na agụmakwụkwọ nke Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị otu ahụ chọrọ ịbụ ndị mba n'echiche, ike nkwado Macaulay sitere n'ụlọ Docemo ya mere nchegbu ya na-agbachitere ụlọ ahụ na ọchịchọ ya ịchịkwa otu ahụ mere ka uto nke otu ahụ belata
N'afọ 1931, mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Macaulay na ndị Britain malitere ịka mma ruo n'ókè nke na gọvanọ ahụ na Macaulay nwere nzukọ
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 1938, ndị otu Nigerian Youth Movement lụrụ ọgụ ma merie ntuli aka maka Lagos Town Council, na-akwụsị ọchịchị Macaulay na National Democratic Party ya
A machibidoro Macaulay ịzọ ọkwa ọchịchị n'ihi nsogbu iwu - gọọmentị na-achị achị na Lagos mara ya ikpe ugboro abụọ; nke mbụ maka aghụghọ, na nke abụọ maka ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru

Dị ka onye iro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya bụ Henry Rawlingson Carr onye ọbá akwụkwọ ya na akwụkwọ ya dị na Mahadum nke Ibadan Library, nchịkọta onwe Macaulay nke a na-akpọ The Macaulay Papers dị na Ngalaba Afrịka nke Mahadum nke Ibadan Library
Akwụkwọ Macaulay gụnyere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akwụkwọ akụkọ, na akwụkwọ gọọmentị
Ha gụnyekwara akwụkwọ onwe onye, akwụkwọ ozi, akwụkwọ akụkọ, na foto
E gosipụtara Macaulay na akwụkwọ ego 1 Naira kemgbe 1979 ruo 1991, mgbe e ji mkpụrụ ego dochie akwụkwọ ahụ, na-egosipụtakwa Macaulay
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria, Imoh Umoren mere ihe nkiri nke akpọrọ The Herbert Macaulay Affair nke kpuchiri ihe dịka afọ iri atọ nke ndụ ya ma wepụta ya n'afọ 2019
Nsi pụta
Herbert Singleton (1945-2007) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese onyinyo nke bi na New Orleans, Louisiana
Ọrụ ya dekọrọ ihe mgbu nke ndụ na mpaghara Algiers nke New Orleans
A mụrụ Herbert Singleton diọkpara n'ime ụmụ asatọ n'ubochí irí atọ na otu Mee, 1945 nye Elizabeth na Herbert Singleton Sr
Singleton chetara na otu ụbọchị mgbè ọ dị afọ iri, nna ya hapụrụ ụlọ ahụ ịzụta ngwugwu sịga ma ghara ịlaghachi
Nne ya kwadoro ezinụlọ ahụ na ego ọ na-enweta naanị ya na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ ruo na klas nke asaa, ọ bụ ezie na akụkọ ndị ọzọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ klas nke isii
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ígwè na dị ka onye na-ese akwa
E jidere ya dị ka onye na-eto eto màkà mpụ ọgwụ ọjọọ dị iche iche ma nọrọ afọ iri na atọ na Louisiana State Penitentiary n'etiti afọ 1967 na 1986
Mgbè a tọhapụrụ ya, ọ malitere ime obéré ihe ọkpụkpụ agwọ màkà Voodoo Museum na New Orleans na 1970

N'ịbụ ónyé nwéré nkụda mmụọ màkà adịghị ike nke ụrọ a na-agbaghị ọkụ, Singleton gbanwere ihe ọ na-eji eme ihe na osisi wee malite ịkpụ aka ogologo axis n'ime osisi ndị na-aga ije, nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe dị ka ngwá agha
Ndị ahịa ya bụ ndị na-ere ahịa, ndị na-azụ ọgwụ ọjọọ, na ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala ịnyịnya na ụgbọ ịnyịnya na French Quarter
N'ezie, otu ónyé ọkwọ ụgbọ ala gburu ónyé ohi n'oge a na-eji otu n'ime osisi Singleton, ya mere ha ghọrọ ndị a maara dị ka 'Killer Sticks'
E sere ọrụ ya mgbè e mesịrị n'ọnụ ụzọ na osisi ndị ọzọ siri ike a hụrụ n'akụkụ Osimiri Mississippi
A na-eme atụmatụ na Singleton rụchara ihe karịrị ọrụ narị abụọ, ọ bụ ezie na enweghị ike ịgụta ihe ndị mbụ ya n'ụzọ ziri ezi
Ọ biri ndụ ya niile na Algiers, mpaghara New Orleans n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Osimiri Mississippi
Ọ nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ irí isii na abụọ
Singleton egosila ọrụ na ihe ngosi ndị a
Ebe ngosi nka ndị na-esonụ nwere ọrụ Singleton na nchịkọta ha na-adịgide adịgide
Herbert Onyewumbu Wigwe CON (bụ onye a mụrụ n'ubochi nke iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1966 na Legọs) nne na nna bụ ndị Ikwerre sitere na Omueke Isiokpo
Herbert bụ onye na-echekwa ego na onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Access Holdings Plc ugbu a, nke a na-ere dị ka Access Corporation

Herbert bụ onye isi nchịkwa/onye isi oche nke Access Bank plc, otu n'ime ụlọ akụ ise kachasị elu na Naịjirịa, mgbe ọ nọchiri onye mmekọ azụmahịa ya, Aigboje Aig-Imoukhuede na ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2014 rue n'ọnwa Eprel nke afọ 2022

Wigwe nwere nzere na ndekọ ego na Mahadum Naịjirịa, nzere mastas na Banking na Finance na College Mahadụm of North Wales (nke bụzi Bangor), nzere mastas na Financial Economics na Mahadim London, ọ bụkwa Alumnus nke Harvard Business Skulu Executive Management Program
Wigwe malitere ọrụ ya na Coopers & Lybrand, Legosị dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nchịkwa, mgbe o mesịrị ruo ogo dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Mgbe ọ nọrọ na Capital Bank, ọ sonyeere GTBank ebe ọ nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ iri na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ akụ, na-arịgo ịghọ onye isi nchịkwa na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ụlọ akụ
N'afọ 2002, Wigwe na onye mmekọ azụmahịa ya, Aigboje Aig-Imoukhuede zụrụ ihe bụ obere ụlọ akụ azụmahịa n'oge ahụ
Access Bank n'oge ahụ bụ ụlọ akụ nke iri isii na ise kachasị n'ime ụlọ akụ iri asato na iteghite dị na mba Naịjirịa
N'ime afọ iri atọ gara aga, ụlọ ọrụ Access Corporation agbanweela site na ụlọ akụ Naịjirịa a na-amaghị ama gaa na ụlọ ọrụ ego Afrịka dị elu n'ụwa

Taa, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ otu n'ime ndị kasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa n'ihe gbasara ihe onwunwe, mbịnye ego, nkwụnye ego na netwọk alaka; ihe a rụzuru site na usoro siri ike nke ogologo oge iji nye ndị ahịa ngwọta na-enye ọrụ ndị na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọrụ ọhụrụ site na Banking, Payments, Lending, na Insurance na Pension Assets

Access Bank bụ ugbu a otu n'ime ụlọ akụ ise kachasị elu na Naịjirịa ma nọrọ n'etiti ụlọ akụ narị ise kachasị elu n'ụwa dịka akụkọ 2015 nke magazin The Banker si kwuo ma na-achọ ịbụ ụlọ akụ kachasị elu n'Africa
Ọ na-ejere ihe karịrị mmadụ isi isii nde ise ozi ugbu a, site na alaka narị atọ na iri ise na ihe karịrị ATM otu puku na narị ise na nnukwu ebe gafee Naịjirịa, Sub-Saharan Africa na UK

Dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi ụlọ akụ ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa, o nyere aka mepụta ụfọdụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ nke Afrịka na iwu ụlọ, nkwukọrịta, ọkụ eletriki na mmanụ ọkụ site na ihe nlereanya pụrụ iche, nke na-gụnye nghọta na inye nkwado ego na nka
Ọrụ ya na ọrụ ego gafere ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na ise gụnyere ihe karịrị afọ zomi dị ka osote onye isi nchịkwa

Wigwe jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke Access Bank Ghana Limited, Access Investment & Securities Limited, Central Securities and Clearing System (CSCS) ma bụrụkwa Onye isi oche ugbu a nke Access Bank (UK) Limited
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ Nigerian Mortgage Refinance Company na onye otu ndụmọdụ maka ndị enyi Africa
Ọ bụ onye otu Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN ̆ FCA), onye otu Institute nke Credit Administration, na onye otu nsọpụrụ nke Chartered Institute of Bankers of Nigeria
Kemgbe onwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2014, ọ bụ onye isi oche na onye isi nchịkwa nke Access Bank
O nweela okwu mkparịta ụka n'ụwa niile gụnyere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na Silicon Valley na Financial Times Summit na Mozambique
N'afọ 2016, Wigwe guzobere 'The HOW Foundation', otu na-enweghị uru
N'okpuru Wigwe, Access Bank enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye
N'afọ 2016, ọ meriri Ụlọ akụ kachasị Mma nke afọ ahụ na Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ kachasị mma nke afọ ahụ n'ihe nrite BusinessDay Ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akụ na Legos

O nwetakwara ihe nrite atọ dị elu nke ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akụ n'Afrika kwa afọ maka 'Ịdịgide Azụmahịa Pụrụ Ịche' n'afọ 2016, ihe nrite nke Karlsruhe Sustainable Finance na Germany, nke mbụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ego Afrịka
Access Bank Plc kwughachiri arụmọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2017 Karlsruhe Sustainable Finance Awards na Germany site n'inweta 'Outstanding Business Sustainability Achievement Award'
A kpọrọ Wigwe n'onwe ya Onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ kacha mma n'afọ 2016 iche site na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Sun na Vanguard, abụọ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa

Na-iji kwanyere ya ugwu ma kele ya na 'ọrụ nlereanya ya na ọha mmadụ na onyinye maka mmepe ndị ntorobịa', Boys' Brigade (BB), wepụtara Herbert Wigwe, dị ka onye nlekọta steeti maka Kansụl steeti Legos n'afọ 2016
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2022, Onye isi ala Naịjirịa bụ Muhammadu Buhari nyere ya nsọpụrụ mba Naijiria nke bụ Commander of the Order of the Niger (CON)
Wigwe sonyere n'ịmepụta usoro ndị isi nke a maara dị ka Nzukọ Nweta
Ihe omume a na-eme mgbe ọbụla afọ abụọ gasịrị bụ nzaghachi Access Bankī maka oku zuru ụwa ọnụ maka itinye aka n'ụlọ ọrụ maka ndozi ọtụtụ ihe ịma aka chere ndị mmadụ n'ihu
Kemgbe emeghere ya n'afọ 2013, Nzukọ Access anọgidewo na-etinye ndị isi ụwa site n'ịkpali arụmụka banyere nsogbu nke egwu na ohere dị n'ụwa
Na mbipụta 2013 nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Ọchịchị na-adịgide adịgide' , Wigwe gwara George W
Bush, Nicolas Sarkozy na John Kufuor okwu, na-ekwughachi mkpa idu ndú dị na ihe ịga nke ọma mba na ụlọ ọrụ
Na mbipụta nke afọ 2015, Wigwe kwadoro ndị isi ụwa dịka Steve Wozniak, N

Narayana Murthy na José María Figueres, Muhammad Yunus na Ted Souder (Onye isi, Ụlọ ọrụ (Nkọwa) na Google maka mkparịta ụka banyere isiokwu ahụ bụ 'Ịbụ Isi n'ime Uwa na-Agbanwe Agbanwe – Ihe dị mkpa na-irụpụta ihe ohụrụ'
Wigwe, Access Bank na UNICEF nwere njikọ aka iji nye nkwado maka ụmụaka, ụmụ mgbenye na ndị mba ụwa gbara ọsọ ndụ bata n'akụkụ ugwu nke Naịjirịa
Iji mee ka a mara maka ebumnuche a, ụlọ akụ ahụ na-ahazi asọmpi Access Bank / UNICEF Charity Shield Polo kwa afọ

N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Nigerian Business Coalition against AIDS (NiBUCCA), atụmatụ nke onwe iji nyere aka kpochapụ HIV / AIDS na Naịjirịa ma kwado ndị bi na ọnọdụ ahụ
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2015, akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria The Punch kọwara ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria'
Ọ lụrụ Chizoba Wigwe (née Nuba) ma nwee ụmụ anọ Chizi, Tochi, Hannah na David
Ọ si Ikwerre Local Government Area nke Rivers State, mana ọ na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Legos
O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị atọ na otu nwanne nwoke Joyce, Peggy, Stella na Emeka yana ụmụ nwanne nwanyị abụọ Aleruchi na Zara gụnyere ụmụ nwanne nwanyị anọ Ruchi, Oj, Chinweike na Obumneke
Heritage Bank Plc, nke a na-akpọkarị Heritage Bank, bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ọrụ ego

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akụ azụmahịa nke Central Bank of Nigeria nyere ikikere, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke mba ahụ, nwere ikikere ọrụ mba, nke na-enye ụlọ akụ mkpọsa, ụlọ akụ ụlọ ọrụ, ụlọ akụ ịntanetị / ịntanetị, ụlọ akụ itinye ego na ọrụ njikwa akụ; isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na 292B Ajose Adeogun Street, Victoria Island, Lagos, Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
N'afọ 2012, onye isi na-etinye ego, IEI Plc, site na IEI Investments Limited, nwetara ikike Societe Generale Bank of Nigeria site na Central Bank of Nigeria
N'ịbụ onye mezuru ihe niile achọrọ, ụlọ akụ ahụ weghachiri pasenti otu narị nke ego ego nke Societe Generale dị ugbu a nye ndị nwe ha
Heritage Bank Plc bụ nnukwu onye na-enye ọrụ ego na Naịjirịa
N'ịbụ nke nwere ikikere ugbu a dị ka National Bank, ọ na-enye ọrụ ụlọ akụ na ego na mba ahụ, gụnyere South, West, Southeast na North
As of December 2015[update] afọ , e mere atụmatụ na ngụkọta ọnụ ahịa akụ nke ụlọ akụ ahụ dị US dollar nde 17 (NGN 4834 ijeri)
Akụrụngwa ndị nwere òkè ya ruru ma ọ dịkarịa ala US dollar nde iri asatọ na asatọ (NGN 25 ijeri), nke kacha nta ego nke Central Bank of Nigeria chọrọ, maka ụlọ akụ mba
Ụlọ akụ ahụ malitere na ngwụcha afọ 1970, mgbe Dr
Olusola Saraki guzobere ya dị ka Societe Generale Bank (Nigeria)
Na Jenụwarị afọ 2006, Central Bank mechiri Societe Generale n'ihi enweghị ike izute ihe ọhụrụ kachasị mkpa nke US $ 155 nde (NGN 25 ijeri) maka National Bank
Societe Generale nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgba mmechi ahụ aka n'ụlọ ikpe
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2012, Central Bank wepụtara ikike ụlọ akụ nke Societe Generale, mana dị ka ụlọ akụ mpaghara
N'ịbụ ndị nwetara ikikere ụlọ akụ, ndị nwe ụlọ ọhụrụ ahụ gbanwere aha ụlọ akụ ahụ dị ka Heritage Banking Company Limited ma meghee maka azụmahịa n'okpuru aha ọhụrụ ahụ na 4 Maachị 2013

N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014, Heritage Banking Company Ltd nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgbaso ihe achọrọ nke Asset Management Corporation of Nigeria (AMCON) na Central Bank of Nigeria iji nweta pasenti otu narị òkè na Enterprise Bank Ltd
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2015, AMCON wegara ikike nke Enterprise Bank Ltd na Heritage Bank Plc
As of September 2013[update], the bank's stock is publicly owned by the following corporate entities and individuals

N'ịbụ nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos, Nigeria, Heritage Bank Plc nwere alaka otu narị na iri abụọ na asaa na ụlọ akụ narị abụọ na abụọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya nwere ihe karịrị ATM narị atọ na iri ise na steeti niile nke gọọmentị etiti na Federal Capital Territory
Jani Ibrahim FNSE, FAEng, OON, mni, onye na-abụghị onye isi nchịkwa, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche na-anọchite anya ndị isi asaa
Onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nchịkwa, bụ Ifiesimama Sekibo
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014, Heritage Bank nwetara pasenti otu narị òkè na Enterprise Bank Limited, onye na-enye ọrụ ego nke mba nwere ihe karịrị alaka otu narị na iri isii na ijeri US $ 16 na akụ
Heritage kwụrụ AMCON US $ 340 nde (NGN 561 ijeri), na ego, maka nnweta ahụ

Heritage Investment Services Limited, aka itinye ego nke Heritage Banking Company Limited, bụ onye mmeri n'ime ụlọ ọrụ iri abụo na anọ nke Naijiria na nke mba ụwa na-asọ mpi maka nnweta nke Enterprise Bank
Heritage Place bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị okpukpu iri na anọ na Alfred Rewane Road, Ikoyi, Lagos na ụlọ mbụ LEED kwadoro na obodo Naịjirịa
Ụlọ ahụ nwere okpukpu iri na anọ nke ihe dịka 15,736sqm nke ohere ọfịs na 350 ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala
E wuchara ya na 15th nke Febụwarị, na afo 2016 ma ugbu a ọ nwere ọkwa ịgbazite nke 91%

Ihe ndị na-adịgide adịgide na-agụnye mbelata 30-40% na iji ike eme ihe, nnata okpukpu abụọ, uko ụlọ kwụ ọtọ, ala dị elu, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ ahịa kọfị, plaza yana nha ala dị nro site na 450sqm ruo 2,000sqm

Herman 'Kofi' Bailey (nke a makwaara dị ka Kofi X) (1931 na 1981) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'Afrịka
A maara ya nke ọma màkà ihe osise ya na-egosi ahụmahụ ndị Afrịka na America
A mụrụ ya na Chicago, Illinois, Bailey tolitere na Los Angeles, California
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Alabama State College wee gaa Mahadum Howard ébé ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Alain Locke, Sterling Brown na James A
Porter
Ọ nwetara MFA ya na Mahadum nke Southern California Na Alabama, ọ natara ọrụ màkà nnukwu ihe osise na mgbidi dị ka nwa akwụkwọ
A kọwara ya dị ka 'onye ojii bohemian' n'oge ahụ, a na-ahụkarị ya ka ọ na-eyi beret, na-ekwu jive, na-ebu karama 'n'otu akpa' ma na-ekwu màkà egwu na nka
Mgbe ọ bi na Atlanta, oghere studio ya dị na ụlọ nke abụọ nke Institute of the Black World
Ọ bírì na Paschal's Motor Lodge Hotel, ebe ọ bụrụ na ọ nweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ ọ ga-eso otu n'ime ụmụnne Paschal na-ere ahịa ihe osise
Bailey kwuru okwu mkparị, nke bụ n'ihi iji ọgwụ ọjọọ na mmanya na-aba n'anya eme ihe
A kọwara Bailey dị ka onye na-aṅụ ọgwụ ma na-achaa, na-emefu ego ya na 'pint zuru ezu nke Scotch' ma ọ bụ vodka
Herman 'Kofi' Bailey nwụrụ na 1981 na Atlanta, Georgia
A kọwaala ọrụ ya na ihe osise ya dị ka '
N'ịgwakọta ma geometric na ihe oyiyi, ọ na-ejikarị nnukwu ọdịdị gbaa ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a sụgharịrị nke ọma gburugburu nke na-eje ozi dị ka ebe a na-elekwasị anya màkà ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndị o dere
' Ụdị geometric na-emekarị n'azụ, dị ka a ga-asị na ọ na-apụta na ya
Bailey na-ejikarị charcoal ma ọ bụ conté dị ka ihe na-eme ihe, na-anwale mmanụ na ihe osise acrylic
Mgbè ụfọdụ, ọ na-eji ihe atọ ma ọ bụ anọ eme ihe n'ihe osise na agba na-arụkarị ọrụ nke abụọ n'ọrụ ya, na-ahọrọ ịdabere na ụda ụwa
N'afọ 1967, Bailey bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Spelman College nke méré ihe ngosi banyéré ọrụ Bailey nke e mepụtara mgbè ọ bi na Ghana n'afọ 1962
James Early kwuru na ọrụ Kofi bụ nnukwu mmetụta, na-akọwa ihe osise Bailey dị ka 'n'etiti nnukwu, ngosipụta nka na-enye ume nke e mepụtara na crucible nke ikpe ziri ezi na nhazi nke Atlanta na 1960s'

Onye na-ese ihe na ónyé na-akọ akụkọ ihe méré eme Floyd Coleman kọwara Bailey dị ka onye na-emebi iwu 'Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gbasoghị iwu, ọ na-etinye aka na ọgụ nke ndị Africa America ma setịpụ ụkpụrụ n'ọrụ ya nke ọtụtụ n'ime anyị gbalịrị iṅomi
' Carmen Riddle kọwara Bailey dị ka 'ónyé nwére ọgụgụ isi, onye nwéré ọgụgụ isi dị ọcha na nka ya'
(Herman) Bolhaar (Epe, 1955) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, na Netherlands kemgbe 1 Febụwarị 2018
Bolhaar nọchiri Corinne Dettmeijer, onye lara ezumike nká dị ka National Rapporteur on Human trafficking na 15 Nọvemba 2017

Bolhaar bụ Chief Public Prosecutor na Amsterdam, Ọ ghọrọ Director of Public Prosecutions site na 2008 ruo 2011, O mechara bụrụ onye isi nke Ash Center for Democratic Governance and Innovation site na 1 June 2011 ruo 1 June 2017 nke bụ akụkụ nke Kennedy School of Government na Mahadum Harvard na Cambridge, Massachusetts
Dị ka onye isi na-ahụ maka ikpe ọha na eze, Bolhaar tinyere aka n'ibu agha megide ịzụ ahịa mmadụ

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Human Trafficking Task Force nke ndị uwe ojii, ndị ọrụ na-ahụ maka ikpe ọha na eze, obodo, Royal Marechaussee, Social Affairs and Employment Inspectorate, Immigration and Naturalization Service na-arụkọ ọrụ na Chamber of commerce, Ụlọ ọrụ na -abụghị nke gọọmenti nwe na ndị otu nooro onwe ha dịka ụlọ nkwari akụ na ụlọ ọrụ nri
Ihe akaebe dị ugbu a na-egosi n'ụzọ siri ike na ndị a na-azụ ahịa n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mmekọahụ na ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ yikarịrị ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
na Europe na ụmụ nwanyị a na-azụ n'ahịa chọpụtara na-emegbu ụmụ nwanyị ahụ dị egwu, dị ka ime ihe ike anụ ahụ ma ọ bụ mmekọahụ, nke metụtara ahụike anụ ahụ na nke uche ha
Herman Kojo Chinery-Hesse (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye ọchụnta ego teknụzụ Ghana na onye guzobere SOFTtribe ụlọ ọrụ ngwanrọ kacha ochie na nke kacha ukwuu na Ghana
a maara ya nke ọma dị ka Bill Gates nke Africa
Chinery-Hesse mekwara ndepụta nke 15 Black STEM Innovators
na March 2019 ewebata ya dị ka onye isi oche maka azụmahịa na teknụzụ maka africa
A mụrụ Herman Chinery-Hesse na Dublin na 1963 na Lebrecht James Nii Tettey Chinery- Hesse na Mary Chinery-hesse, née Blay
Nna nna ya bụ Robert Samuel Blay, onye ọka iwu na onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Ghana na Republic Mbụ
Blay bụ osote onye isi oche mbụ nke United Gold Coast Convention (UGCC), nke ọ bụ onye ntọala ntọala na ọkà okwu nke ọgbakọ ndị mejupụtara 1969

Chinery-Hesse gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mfantsipim School na Cape Coast, Westlake High School na Austin, Texas, na Mahadum Texas State, site na ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na teknụzụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
N'afọ 1991, Herman guzobere theSOFTtribe, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ngwanrọ na-eduga n'Africa
N'ime afọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ asụla ụzọ ọtụtụ ngwaahịa na-akụda ala na mpaghara ndị a
Ebumnuche ya bụ 'African Echoes' bụ ịmepụta akwụkwọ ndị Afrịka maka oriri zuru ụwa ọnụ, nke mere na nke mbụ ndị Afrịka nwere ike ịgwa ndị na-ege ntị n'ụwa niile akụkọ nke ha
ọ bụ onye na-abanye maka ụlọ ahịa azụmahịa nke Ghana

Ya na ụlọ ọrụ ya enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye na otuto, gụnyere onyinye GUBA na UK maka ihe ịga nke ọma pụrụ iche, Ghana Millennium Excellence Award maka IT, Ghana Club 100 Award maka ụlọ ọrụ kachasị ọhụrụ, 'SMS' App of the Year Award, Mobile World Lifetime Achievement Award na Best Entrepreneur in Information and Communication Technology
O nwetakwara ihe nrite Award alnumus a ma ama sitere na mahadum texas na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye mbụ na ugbu a bụ onye Africa nwetara ihe nrite ahụ
Chinery-Hesse abụwo ọkà okwu n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ a ma ama gụnyere Mahadum Oxford, Harvard Business School, Wharton School nke Mahadum Pennsylvania, Chatham House na Tech4Africa
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ nkwado na teknụzụ na ihe ọhụrụ nye ọtụtụ ndị isi ala Ghana na ọrụ mba ụwa ha

A kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị Black Innovators 20 a ma ama na teknụzụ, otu n'etiti ndị Top 20 Tech Influencers nke Africa, n'etiti Top 100 Most Influential Africans of our Time, na otu n' cikin Top 100 Global Thinkers site na Foreign Policy Magazine

Herman Wald (Kolozsvár, ụbọchị asaa n'ọnwa Julaị, n'afọ 1906 - Johannesburg, ụbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Julaị, n'afọ 1970) bụ onye na-akpụ ihe site na Austria-Hungary nke sitere na ndị Juu nke rụrụ ọrụ na South Africa
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ ndị Juu na Kolozsvár, Cluj-Napoca nke oge a
Nna ya bụ Jakab Wald rabbi, nne ya bụ nwa nwanyị rabbi Mózes Glasner
Ihe ịga nke ọma izizi ya bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ e ji osisi mee màkà Tivadar Herzl
O gosiri ya nna ya, onye mechara ghara igbochi ọrụ nka ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Hungarian nke Fine Arts na Budapest, ma mesịa mụta na Wien na Berlin
N'ihi echiche ndị fascist na mba ndị na-asụ German, ọ kwagara Paris ma mesịa gaa London, ebe ọ kụziri ọmụmụ ihe ọkpụkpụ
Nwanne ya nwoke, Márk kpọrọ ya na Union of South Africa
Ọ gara ebe ahụ wee biri na Johannesburg
O hiwere ebe a ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-ese ihe
Ọ lụrụ Vera Rosenbaum n'afọ 1942, ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ (Michael, Pamela, Louis)
Ọ jere ozi na ndị agha n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ gara njem ọkara afọ na Israel, Rome, Paris na New York na 1952
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya a maara nke ọma bụ ndị na-esonụ
Amụrụ Fernau na Breslau (nke a na-akpọ Wrocław ugbu a), na mpaghara Prussian nke Silesia
Site n'afọ 1905 ọ biri dị ka onye edemede na onye nta akụkọ na Paris - ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka udo na onye Francophile
Mgbe agha tiwapụrụ n'afọ 1914 o kwenyesiri ike na Germany bụ ikpe mara maka ịkpali agha ahụ
Otú ọ dị, na Mee nke afọ sochirinụ, a chụgara ya Switzerland
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 1916, ọ gara biri na Basel, ebe ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme udo na Germany
N'akwụkwọ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, ọ megidere agha ahụ ma kpọọ oku ka a kwụsị ọchịchị ndị eze Germany
Ndị ọchịchị Germany boro ya ebubo na ọ na-ede akwụkwọ J'Accuse, na-akatọ omume nke Alaeze Ukwu Germany, nke n'ezie onye agha ibe ya bụ Richard Grelling dere
Hermann Niebuhr bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nké bị nà De Rust
Ọ na-eji mmanụ n'elu ákwà n'ụdị ihe osise oge ochie iji dekọọ mbibi ọbọdọ na ime ọbọdọ
A mụrụ Niebuhr na Johannesburg n'afọ 1972
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rhodes, Grahamstown ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Fine Arts (nke nwéré ọdịiche na History of Art) n'afọ 1993
Ọ nọrọ afọ isii na mpaghara kpọrọ nkụ nke South Africa nkè a maara dị ka Karoo
Na-arụ ọrụ site na obere ọbọdọ De Rust, Niebuhr kewapụrụ onwé ya ma mepụta usoro ya

Mgbè ọ laghachiri n'ọbọdọ ya bụ Johannesburg n'afọ 2002, ọ malitere ịnagide ihe ịma aka nke ibi ndụ na ime nka n'otu n'ime obodo ndị kachasị ukwuu na nke kachasị mgbagwoju anya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'Africa
Na Night Ride Home (2005), Niebuhr kọrọ akụkọ màkà otu nwa okorobịa si n'ógbè ndị dị n'ebe ugwu na-akwọ ụgbọala na-agafe ọkụ na-adịghị mma n'ụzọ ọ na-aga ebe nchekwa
Ihe ngosi Niebuhr Night Shift (afọ 2008) mere ka ọ banye n'etiti ọbọdọ ahụ

N'iji naanị igwefoto, ọ banyere n'ógbè ndị dị ka Hillbrow nke gbanwere n'ụzọ dị egwu site na akụ na ụba Art Deco n'etiti na ngwụcha narị afọ nke irí abụọ gaa na ịda ogbenye na mpụ na mmalite nke irí abụọ na otu
Niebuhr sere foto n'ụlọ ochie ndị mara mma wee see ha na mmanụ, na-ewere echiche nke ndị nche nche (nke dịtụ ihe atụ) na-echebe ụlọ na ndị bi na ha
Ihe osise ndị a ziri ezi na nke ziri ezi, ndị na-enweghị ndị mmadụ ma na-emetụta akụkọ ihe mere eme, na-emepụta mmetụta nke mwute gburugburu ọdịda obodo ahụ

Niebuhr banyere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nkè Johannesburg dị ka ọbọdọ na-egwupụta ọlaedo màkà m, ihe ngosi na-enweghị isi gosipụtara na AshantiGold Gold of Africa Museum, nke ụlọ ọrụ na-egwe ihe n'Africa kachasị ukwuu kwadoro

Maka usoro ihe osise monochromatic a, Niebuhr nwetara foto nke ebe a na-egwupụta ihe na-agba gburugburu Johannesburg nke uzuzu ọlaedo na ebe a na'egwupụta ọla nke buru ibu dị ka pyramids nke mmadụ mere ma na-achịkwa ọdịdị ala nke mpaghara ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ na Johannesburg

White Painting, ihe ngosi nké onwe ya na Casa Labia nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na Muizenberg, Cape Town, nyere ákwà gburugburu dị ka oghere n'ime Johannesburg, dị ka a ga-asị na ndị Capetonians nwere ike ịhụ ọbọdọ nwanne ha nwanyị dị anya naanị site na njedebe ogologo nkè onyokomita
Ihe osise ndị a, kwa, na-abụkarị oji na ọcha
N'afọ 2012 wetara Niebuhr ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Everard Read Gallery Johannesburg
N'ime City Chromatic Niebuhr nwere ikike n'ihe gbasara ya, Johannesburg cityscape, nyere ya ohere ịnwale usoro ọhụrụ nke eserese

N'ime nke a, ọrụ monochromatic ya n'oge gara aga nwetara ihe ọhụrụ nke agba na-ekpo ọkụ yana akụkụ nke ihe osise na-agbapụta ma na-agbasa na-anọchite anya ma mgbawa nke ihe ọhụrụ nké Johannesburg yana ọganihu na ọgba aghara ya
Ihe ngosi Niebuhr nkè afọ 2013, 'Stillness,' dekọrọ njem ya na ịnyịnya ígwè site na Ugwu Swartberg na Die Hel na South Africa na Himalayas na India
Ebe ọ bụ na 'ịgba ịnyịnya ígwè bụ ịnyịnya ọhụrụ,' dịka ọ gwara ónyé na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ, ọ na-esetịpụ ọsọ zuru oke maka onye na-ese ihe
A na-akpọ usoro ahụ 'Stillness' n'ihi oghere dị n'ime nkè na-emeghe n'ime ónyé na-ekiri ya mgbè ọ na-ekwu maka ọdịdị ala mepere emepe
Niebuhr na-eke oge ya ugbu a n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ ya na Fordsburg, Johannesburg, na De Rust na Klein Karoo

Hertzoggie /hɜːrtsɒxi/, nke a makwaara n'asụsụ Afrikaans dị ka Hertzogkoekie ma ọ bụ n'asụsụ Bekee dị ka Hertzoo Cookie, bụ achịcha ma ọ bụ kuki jupụtara na jam na akị bekee nke a na-ejikarị eme achịcha
kuki bụ nri amara nke oma na South Afriika ebe a na-eri ya na iko tii Bekee
N'obodo Cape-Malay, a na-erikarị nri a n'oge Eid
A na-esikarị ya n'ụlọ dị ka akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ na-eme nri na mba ahụ ma na-ere ya na nri ndị ọzọ amara nke Ọma na South Afrika dị ka Koeksisters
A na-akpọ tartlet aha onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Afrika nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ (20) , Praịm Minista (1924-1939) na Boer War General J
Hertzog
A na-eche na Hertzogkoekies bụ ọkacha mmasị ya
A maara ndị na-akwado Hertzog ka ha na-eme achịcha, na-enye ma na-ere ha iji gosipụta nkwado ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ha

Otu akụkọ banyere mmalite nke nri na-atọ ụtọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ ndị obodo Cape-Malay chepụtara ya iji gosipụta nkwado ha maka Hertzog mgbe o kwere nkwa inye ụmụ nwanyị votu na ikike nhata maka ndị na-acha ọbara ọbara na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri abụọ niile (1920s)

Mgbe ha mezuru nkwa mbụ ha kwere inye ụmụ nwanyị vootu na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri atọ (1930) , mana ọ bụghị nke abụọ, obodo ahụ malitere iji icing na-acha nchara nchara na pink na-akpọ 'twee gevreetjie' (Afrikaans maka 'onye ihu abụọ'), na-egosi enweghị afọ ojuju ha n'ebe ọ nọ
Ihe ọzọ nwere ike isi iyi nke mmalite nri bụ omume Afrikaans na-eso Agha Anglo-Boer nke Abụọ iji kpọọ aha nri n'aha ndị dike mba
A na-akwadebe Hertzogkoekies site na isi achịcha nwere elu mepere emepe nke jupụtara na apricot jam
A na-eji akị bekee meringue a kpọnwụrụ akpọnwụ ma ọ bụ nke a kpọnwa mee n'elu ya ma sie ya
Hertzogkoekie kpaliri ndị na-akwado onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Hertzog na onye ya na ya dị ugbu a bụ Jan Smuts ka ha mee ụdị nke ha a na-akpọ 'Jan Smuts cookies'

Nri a ghọkwara ihe a ma ama n'afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri abụọ (1920) na otu puku, narị itoolu na iri abụọ (1930) kuki Jan Smuts nwere bọta na shuga na-ekpe ọkụ kama nke meringue nke Hertzogkoekie

Hervé Lybohy (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 24 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1983) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agbara Championnat National 3 club Thonon Evian bọọlụ
A mụrụ ya na Ivory Coast, ọ na-agbara ndị otu mba Niger bọọlụ
Na Mee 2018, a mara ọkwa na Lybohy ga-esonyere Nîmes, nke a kwalitere ọhụrụ na Ligue 1, site na Ligue 2 n'akụkụ Paris FC na nnyefe n'efu maka oge 2018–19
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ
Na Julaị 2019, mgbe otu oge gasịrị na Ligue 1, Lybohy sonyeere Nancy na Ligue 2
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020, Lybohy kwagara Championnat National n'akụkụ Orléans
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na nhọrọ nke abụọ
A mụrụ Lybohy na Ivory Coast ma ọ bụ onye Nigerien
O mere nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu mba Niger n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2019
Herve Yamguen (a mụrụ n'afọ 1971 na Douala ) bụ onye mba Cameroon na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe
Autodidact, ọ kpoputara onwe ya na eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ ma chọpụta agụụ maka edemede nke na-enyere ya aka iche banyere ndụ ya kwa ụbọchị
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na egwuregwu
O tolitere na Douala ebe ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'otu n'ime mpaghara kachasị ewu ewu n'obodo ahụ, New Bell
Ọ bụ gburugburu ebe obibi a nke na-eme ka echiche Hervé nke ọrụ plastik ya na-atụgharị ihu, ahụ na ebe ọ nọ n'ụwa
A mụrụ Herve Yamguen n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ọdịnala gbanyesiri mkpọrọgwụ ike, onye jụrụburu ịnakwere nhọrọ ya ịghọ onye na-ese ihe
Site na nwata, ụzọ ndị na-ese ihe si akọwa eziokwu n'ọrụ ha dọtara ya
Ọ ghọtara na ime nka na-eduzi mmadụ n'amaghị ama ma na-eme ka mmadụ na-eche banyere mmadụ
Ọ malitere eserese mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa ma nabata ọrụ nke onye na-ese ihe na ngwụsị afọ 1980, mgbe ọ jụrụ ịbanye na ebe obibi ndị mọnk
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ezinụlọ ya gbara ya ume ka ọ gaa n'ihu n'ụzọ ya nke onye na-ese ihe
N'ịkụziri onwe ya, ọ mụtara site n'ịgụ banyere akụkọ nka, nke mere ka ọ zụlite ọhụụ ya pụrụ iche nke nka
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ natara otu afọ ọzụzụ (2000-2001) na École des Arts Décoratifs (ESAD) na Strasbourg, France
O meela ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe na mmepụta ebe obibi na Cameroon na mba ofesi
A makwaara Hervé Yamguen maka edemede ya (ọtụtụ mbipụta) banyere nka ọhụụ (ịdepụta, eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ)
O meela njem ole na ole n'ime foto, arụmọrụ, ntinye ma na-eme atụmatụ ihe nkiri maka ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ mgbe niile
Isiokwu ndị dị na ọrụ ya bụ agụụ mmekọahụ, ajụjụ banyere mmadụ-osisi-anụmanụ na nnụnụ

Site na isiokwu ndị a, ọ na-akọ akụkọ banyere ụmụ mmadụ ma na-akpọ mmadụ ka ọ na-ele ndụ anya n'ụzọ ijuanya; obere nkọwa nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị nke na-anọchite anya ịma mma nke ụwa ma na-eme ka ndụ dịkwuo ụtọ

Yamguen sitere n'ike mkpali mmuo site na ọrụ (nkà na ụzụ, ike nke ọrụ, ụdị) nke ọtụtụ ndị edemede na ndị na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na ihe ijuanya, echiche na echiche Matisse, Picasso, Henri Michaud, na ndị na-ede uri
Onye a na-ese ihe na-achọ ịkpọ ọha na eze ka ha tụgharịa uche na omume mmadụ ya iji dị mma
Dị ka ya si kwuo, nnabata nke ọrụ ya abụghị ịnụ ọkụ n'obi ma ọ bụ ọ dị oke egwu ma ọ bụ enweghị ike iru

Hervé Yamguen bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Cercle Kapsiki Dị ka onye otu okirikiri ahụ, o sonyere na Scénographies Urbaines, (Urban Scenographies) na Jenụwarị 2003, ọrụ a mụrụ site na nzukọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na Cameroon

Ebumnuche ahụ nwere ebe obibi nke ndị na-ese ihe si n'akụkụ ụwa niile dị na mpaghara a ma ama nke New Bellin Douala ọrụ ahụ bu n'obi iduga ndị na-ese ihe iji gosipụta onwe ha ma soro ndị bi na mpaghara Douala ndị aha ha abụghị nke kachasị mma
A ghaghị imebi echiche ndị ahụ iji mepụta okwu ọhụrụ
A ghaghị ịmegharị nkwurịta okwu ahụ

Ọ bụ n'oge ọmụmụ ihe na mpaghara New Bell ka ndị Kapsiki gburugburu (Hervé Youmbi, Hervé Yamguen, Blaise Bang, Salifou Lindou, Jules Wokam) na mkpokọta Skurk (J-C Lanquetin, François Duconseille) kpọrọ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe si Cameroon, France, Democratic Republic of the Congo na Lebanon, ka ha soro mpaghara ahụ kerịta nkọwa gbasara ndụ ha
O kpughere na 2003 ọrụ na Mam gallery n'ime usoro nke ọrụ Pièce Unique, nke French Cultural center nke Douala malitere
O bipụtakwara ogologo uri Le temps de la saison verte (Oge nke akwụkwọ ndụ), na 1998
Akwụkwọ ọhụrụ bụ nke French Cultural center nke Douala bipụtara

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, a kpọbatara ya dị ka onye ama ama n'obodo nna ya (Bandja-Balassie na Nkam dị n'elu), ọ na-ejikọghachi ụkpụrụ nke emume na omenala, ebe ọ na-anọgide na-inwe ọnọdụ ya nke onye na-ese ihe n'oge a
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mba dị iche iche gburugburu ụwa
Na mba France na Germany ugboro ugboro na nso nso a na Côte d'Ivoire na Senegal (2015 na 2016)
N'akụkụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye okike, Yamguen arụola ọrụ ndị ọzọ na ụwa nka
Ọ kụziri nka na ọkwa sekọndrị (na 2005 na 2006 na Douala)
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nka nke mbipụta atọ (2011, 2012 na 2013) nke Marché des Arts Plastiques de Bali (otu mpaghara dị na Douala)
