Herzekiah Andrew Shanu (1858 - Julaị 1905) bụ onye na-ese foto n'Afrịka nke a ma ama maka itinye aka na mkpọsa megide mmegbu obi ọjọọ na Congo Free State
Ọ bụ nwoke Yoruba, onye si na Lagos nke dị na Naịjirịa ugbu a
Na mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Church Missionary Society Grammar School, ma emesịa ọ gụọ na Training Institute for Teachers, na njedebe nke ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye nkụzi
Ruo afọ ole na ole, ọ kụziri na Lagos Primary School
Otú ọ dị, na 1884, ọ banyere ọrụ ọchịchị nke Congo Free State dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ, na-arịgo n'ọkwa nke onye isi mpaghara na onye nsụgharị French-English n'ọfịs gọvanọ ukwu na Boma
N'ịbụ onye guzobere onwe ya na Boma, mgbe ahụ bụ isi obodo, o mepere ụlọ ahịa na ụlọ ọrụ foto
Na 1894, ọ gara Antwerp ịga Exposition Internationale d'Anvers
E bipụtara ụfọdụ foto ya na Le Congo illustré
N'afọ 1900, o gosipụtara iguzosi ike n'ihe ya nye Congo Free State site n'ịkwado ndị ọchịchị n'oge nnupụisi nke Force Publique
Herzekiah Andrew Shanu gụrụ akwụkwọ na Church Missionary Society Grammar School, ma mesịa na Training Institute for Teachers, na njedebe nke ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye nkụzi
Ruo afọ ole na ole, ọ kụziri na Lagos Primary School
Otú ọ dị, na 1884, ọ banyere ọrụ ọchịchị nke Congo Free State dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ
N'afọ 1903, Shanu nyere Roger Casement ozi gbasara mmetọ nke ndị ọrụ West Africa na Congo, onye nke ya kpọgara ya E
Morel
Morel na Shanu zikọritara ozi ruo ọtụtụ afọ; Shanu na-ebufe, tinyere ihe ndị ọzọ, ederede ikpe nke ikpe megide ndị ọrụ Congo Free State dị ala nke gosipụtara na ọ na-ekpughe ihe
Ka ọ na-agbalị inweta ozi site n'aka onye isi ndị uwe ojii nke Boma, a chọpụtara Shanu ma n'ihi ya, ndị ọrụ steeti gbara ya nsogbu
Mgbe achọpụtara na Shanu nyere Congo Reform Association ihe akaebe nke arụrụala na Congo, e nyere ndị ọrụ gọọmentị iwu ka ha kwụsị ahịa ya
Ọ dara ogbenye ma gbuo onwe ya na July 1905
Hesham Issawi bụ onye edemede na onye nduzi Egypt American
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri nke gunyere AmericanEast na Cairo Exit
A mụrụ Hesham n'Ijipt, mana ọ kwagara United States na 1990
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri, Columbia College Chicago ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na 1996
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ n'ihe nkiri tupu ọ duzie obere isiokwu ole na ole nke ya

O dere ma duzie ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke afọ 2004, The Interrogation, nke meriri ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri dị nkenke kachasị mma na New York Film Festival na egwu kachasị mma na California Film Festival
N'afọ 2005, o so dee ma duzie ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, T for Terrorist, merie ihe nkiri dị nkenke kacha mma na Boston na San Francisco Film Festivals
Hesham bi n'etiti Cairo na Los Angeles kemgbe afọ 2010
N'ikwere na ihe nkiri nnwere onwe, o kpebiri ime Cairo Exit n'ala nna ya
E sere ihe nkiri ahụ na Cairo na-enweghị ikike n'ihi na nyocha jụrụ edemede ahụ
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na Dubai International Film Festival, Tribeca Film Festival na ọtụtụ mmemme ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2015, ọ mechara ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ya, Price, nke e gosipụtara na Cairo International Film Festival ma wepụta ya na Egyptian Theater mgbe e mesịrị
Dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ

Hester Pinney (3 Julaị 1658 na Broadwindsor, Dorset - 19 Febụwarị 1740), bụ onye ọchụnta ego Bekee na nwanne ya nwanyị Rachel Pinney
Ha na-eme ihe dị ka ụmụnne ya nwanyị Sarah Pinney na Jane Hoare
Hester na-ahazi ndị ọrụ ala, ma mesịa na-ebubata shuga site na Nevis ebe nwanne ya nwoke Azariah Pinney na-enweta ọgaranya, na-enwe ndị ohu ma na-azụ ahịa shuga
Pinney bụ nwa nke asatọ n'ime ụmụ iri nke onye ụkọchukwu Presbyterian na onye nkwusa John Pinney (1620/21-1705) na Jane French (1614-1693)
Mgbe a chụpụrụ nna ya na chọọchị ya, ezinụlọ ahụ kpebiri ịzụ ahịa na lace
Ụmụnne ya nwanyị Jane Hoare na Sarah Pinney amalitelarị ịzụ ahịa mgbe Hester kwagara London ma soro nwanne ya nwanyị Rachel na-azụ ahịa na 1682
Ha nwere ụlọ ahịa lace na Royal Exchange
Ha rere eriri ndị sitere na Devon na yarn si Antwerp, ha na-ahazikwa ibubata yarn bụ́ ndị na-agakwuru ndị na-arụ ọrụ
A maara Hester Pinney karịsịa maka nkà azụmahịa ya na ikike ya maka mkparịta ụka gara nke ọma
O jisiri ike nye ndị ọrụ aka azụ iji kwe ka nwanne ya nwoke nke sonyere na Nnupụisi Monmouth gbanahụ pubertition
A kpọgara ya na mba ọzọ ma mechie na Nevis na £ 15 n'aha ya
N'ebe ahụ, ọ na-ere lace na shuga
Ọ na-ebubata shuga site na West Indies, malite ụlọ akwụkwọ na-eme lace ma gbazinye ego maka mmasị dị ka onye na-echekwa ego
Enyemaka ya na azụmaahịa ezinụlọ mere ka ezinụlọ ahụ dum baa ọgaranya
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị na 1705, ọ malitekwara ịkọ nkọ, azụmahịa ya ghọkwara nke onwe ya
A maara na ọ bụ onye dị mkpa n'ụwa azụmahịa nke London

Ọ bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe maka nwanyị na-alụbeghị di nke oge ya imezu ọnọdụ dị otú ahụ Pinney alụghị di, nke gaara etinye ya n'okpuru nlekọta iwu nke di ya, mana ya na onye ọka iwu, George Booth, nwere mmekọrịta dị ogologo oge mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ya Ha enweghị ụmụ Booth mara maka nrụrụ aka ya mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na kọstọm A tọhapụrụ ya dị ka onye omeiwu ka achọpụtara na ọ gbagoro ụzọ ya n'ọrụ ahụ
Mgbe George Booth nwụrụ n'afọ 1726 ọ bi n'otu ụlọ ahụ afọ atọ
Ọ bụ naanị ya na-eme ya
Ọ hapụrụ ihe onwunwe ya na West Ham na Houndsditch na ụlọ Monken Hadley kilomita iri na abụọ na mpụga London
Hester nwụrụ na 19 Febụwarị 1740 na Holborn ma lie ya na St Mary the Virgin, Monken Hadley
Sje hapụrụ nnukwu ihe nketa nye nwanne ya nwanyị Rachel, nwa nwanne ya nwoke Azariah, na John Frederick Pinney onye bụ nnukwu nwa nwanne Nevis onye bara ọgaranya n'ihi ubi Pinney n'ebe ahụ
Ụfọdụ akwụkwọ ozi ya na akwụkwọ ndekọ ego Pinney bụ nke ọbá akwụkwọ mahadum Bristol ji
Hestrie Cloete OIS (née Storbeck; amuru na 26 ọnwa ọgọstụ, na afọ 1978) bu bụrụ onye Ọkachamara mba South Afirika na high jumper
Ihe nrite oritere bu ịturu ugo mba uwa na mmeri ya na iburu silver medals abuo lota na egwuregwu a na akpọ Olympic Games
Onye nkuzi ya ogologo oge bụ Martin Marx chọpụtara Cloete mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ma zụọ ya na Lichtenburg High School na mbido ọrụ ya
A chọpụtara na ọ nwere ọchịchọ siri ike n'oge na-adịghị anya, nke nyere ndị nkuzi ndị ọzọ nsogbu ịzụ ya
Hestrie Cloete etinyela nnukwu ihe dị mkpa mgbe niile n'ịnọgide na-enwe uche siri ike, ma kọwaa na ọ na-ahụ ọtụtụ n'ime ike ahụ n'okwukwe ya
N'afọ 2003, onye isi ala South Africa bụ Thabo Mbeki nyere ya Order of Ikhamanga in Silver (OIS) maka ịdị mma na egwuregwu ya
Cloete nwere omume pụrụ iche, ebe a maara ya ka ọ na-ese siga n'ụbọchị, o kwukwara na ọ hụrụ nri ngwa ngwa n'anya
N'ime mgbalị ilekwasị anya tupu ịwụli elu ọ bụla, Cloete na-atụgharị mkpịsị aka mkpịsị ụkwụ ya gburugburu ibe ya, na-agbadata n'akụkụ ya n'elu ahụ ya ma na-ahụ nzọụkwụ ọ bụla nke mgbalị ya
Cloete lara ezumike nká mgbe 2004 Summer Olympics gasịrị iji lekwasị anya n'ezinụlọ ya
E nyere Cloete ọtụtụ ihe mba ụwa rụzuru
O nwetara ihe kachasị mma ya nke 206 m na 31 Ọgọstụ 2003, mgbe ọ meriri nrite ọla edo n'okpuru World Championships na Paris (ihe ndekọ Afrịka, dị ka nke Mee 2011){| Àtụ AchievementTable

Cloete tolitere n'okpuru aha mbụ ya Storbeck na obere obodo ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke Coligny na nne ya Martie na nna ya Willem
Ọ gbara di mbụ ya alụkwaghịm na 2004 wee lụọ onye na-agụ egwu Afrikaans bụ Jurie Els na 30 Septemba 2005, ọ mụrụ nwa nwanyị bụ Chrizette na 5 Ọktoba 2006 wee kwaga New Zealand na mbido 2008
A mụrụ nwa nwoke Hestrie na Jurie bụ Jason John Els na New Zealand na 23 Julaị 2008

Di na nwunye ahụ bi na Bayview, Auckland na North Island na Hestrie bụ onye njikwa ihe onwunwe ebe Jurie ka na-achụso ọrụ egwu ya ma nwee obere azụmaahịa Retro Records nke na-ere ihe ndekọ Pop na Rock vinyl

Heterochromia bụ mgbanwe na agba
A na-ejikarị okwu ahụ akọwa ọdịiche agba nke iris, mana enwere ike itinye ya na mgbanwe agba nke ntutu ma ọ bụ akpụkpọ ahụ
A na-ekpebi Heterochromia site na mmepụta, nnyefe, na ntinye nke melanin (pigmenti)
Enwere ike ketara ya, ma ọ bụ kpatara ya site na mosaicism mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa, chimerism, ọrịa, ma ọ bụ mmerụ ahụ
Ọ na-apụta n'ime mmadụ na ụfọdụ anụ ụlọ
Agba nke anụ na-enye nwa ara, gụnyere mmadụ, iris na-agbanwe agbanwe
Otú ọ dị, enwere naanị ihe abụọ na-acha odo odo, eumelanin na pheomelanin

Ọnụ ọgụgụ zuru oke nke ihe ndị a na-acha uhie uhie, oke dị n'etiti ha, ọdịiche dị na nkesa nke ihe na-acha odo odo na ọkwa nke stroma nke iris na mmetụta nke mgbasa nke ìhè niile na-ekere òkè n'ịkọwa ụcha anya
Hester Henrietta (Hetta) Crouse Empson (afọ 1915 rụọ afọ 1996) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe

A kọwara ya dị ka 'onye na-ese ihe, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye na-eme njem na onye na-elekọta mmadụ' na akụkọ ọnwụ ya na Times Ya na di ya William Empson sonyere na otu London bohemian nke gụnyekwara George Orwell, Louis MacNeice, Jill Neville, Fay Weldon, Lewis Wolpert na Kathleen Raine
A mụrụ Crouse na Kroonstad, South Africa n'ubochí iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1915
Ọ gara Mahadum Bloemfontein ma gụọ nka na Germany
Ọ laghachiri South Africa ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Crouse laghachiri Europe ya na onye ọlụlụ ya n'oge ahụ bụ Rene Graetz [de]
Ógè ọ gara mbà France na Switzerland, ọ gara n'ihu, n'onwe ya gaa England
Di na nwunye ahụ lụrụ ma kwaga China n'afọ 1947
Ha nọrọ ebe ahụ ruo afọ 1952, ógè ha laghachiri England
William Empson kwagara Sheffield iji kụziere Bekee na Mahadum Sheffield ebe Hetta Empson bi na London
N'afọ 1956, ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke nke atọ ya na onye ọ hụrụ n'anya, onye na-ede uri bụ Peter Duval Smith
N'afọ 1979, e mere William Empson onye isi ma Hetta ghọrọ Lady Empson
Ọ nwụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1996
Hettie Morse Chute (1888-1962) bụ onye American-Canadian botanist nà prọfesọ nkè botany nà Mahadum Rutgers
Heyns bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama naza ahaa gụnyere
Hið íslenska kvenfélag bụ nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị Iceland, nke e hiwere na Reykjavík na 1894
Ebumnuche nke otu a bụ ịrụ ọrụ maka imeziwanye ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ma gwa ụmụ nwanyị ikike ndị dị ugbu a ma gbaa ha ume iji ha mee ihe

Otu ụmụ nwanyị gụrụ akwụkwọ na ndị bara ọgaranya tọrọ ntọala ọha mmadụ ahụ mgbe eze jụrụ arịrịọ ịguzobe mahadum na Iceland, otu n'ime ebumnuche ya bụ imeziwanye ohere agụmakwụkwọ na ọdịbendị maka ụmụ nwanyị

Ọ bụghị nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na Iceland - nke ahụ bụ nzukọ ọrụ ebere Thorvaldsensfélagið na 1875 - mana ọ bụ nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ raara onwe ya nye maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Iceland na ihe dịka mmalite nke mmegharị ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Kvenréttindafélag Íslands iji webata ntuli aka ụmụ nwanyị
Crawford Wilkerson, nke a makwaara dị ka Hi-C (ónyé amụrụ Crawford Wilberson) bụ onye America na-eti egwu rap si Compton, California
A maara ya màkà mmekọrịta ya na DJ Quik, AMG na 2nd II None
Hi-C bụkwa ónyé otu Tree Top Piru
Hi Impact Planet (nke a makwaara dị ka ogige ntụrụndụ Hi Impact) bụ ihe ntụrụndaka, ogige ntorobịa na ebe ezumike na mpụga Lagos mana ọ dị na Ogun Steeti n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ Lagos Tibetadan
Ọ meghere maka ọha na eze na Disemba, n'afọ 2015

Ihe na-adọrọ mmasị n'ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ gụnyere ime ụlọ na n'èzí yana ihe mmiri na ihe ndị kpọrọ nkụ dị ka ịwụli elu gburugburu ụgbọ ala, ụgbọ mmiri; ụgbọ mmiri; Convoy; Kite flyer iri otu na abụọ; Haunted House; King of the Jungle; Jungle; Vertical Swing and Spring ride, Big Buck Panorama, Aliens Armageddon; Transformers Deluxe; Packman Smash; Combat Pump It up Fiesta, a surfing simulated freestyler, hoopla, Mexican fiesta, Samba balloon, dream machine, watermania, Rio animing gorons, animing, liper, animing gorins 777 Njem ụlọ ọrụ, ụlọ ikpe ncheta, egwuregwu anya-ọgụ, njem oge opupu ihe ubi dị mita 40, ụgbọ mmiri, ihe nkiri Mexico, ụgbọ elu Hi-Impact nke nwere oche 10
Ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ nwere ebe dị ihe dị ka 46 acres

Ihe owuwu ndị ọzọ dị n'ogige ahụ gụnyere ụlọ ọgwụ, ọrụ ụlọ akụ, họtel mara mma, ụlọ ikpe nri, na ụlọ nzukọ nwere ọtụtụ ebumnuche nke ihe dị ka 7000 ikike na ihe ndị dị ọcha, ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri 5-D, ihe nkiri imax
Tony Cottrell, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Hi-Tek (amụrụ na Mee 5, 1976), bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Cincinnati, Ohio
A maara ya nke ọma màkà ọrụ ya na Talib Kweli
Nna ya bụ ónyé na-agụ egwu Willie Cottrell nke Willie Cottrall Band, ónyé Hi-Tek gosipụtara na abọm nke abụọ ya, Hi-Teknology 2
Hi-Tek malitere ọrụ ya na otu hip hop Mood ma nwee mpaghara mpaghara na 'Hustle on the Side'
E mere abụ ahụ màkà album Mood's Doom, nké gosipụtara n'etiti ndị ọzọ Brooklyn MC Talib Kweli
Hi-Tek gara n'ihu mepụta ọtụtụ Talib Kweli na Mos Def's Black Star (1998)
N'afọ 2000, Tek na Kweli (n'okpuru aha Reflection Eternal) wepụtara Train of Thought (2000) na Rawkus Records, na raps nke Kweli na beat nke Hi-Tek
Ọ nwere ọganihu dị mma na redio na egwú 'The Blast' na 'Move Somethin
Reflection Eternal wepụtara abọm na-esote nke akpọrọ Revolutions Per Minute na Mee 18, 2010
High Television (nke a makwaara dị ka HiTV) bụ ọrụ telivishọn satellite dijitalụ nke Entertainment Highway na Naịjirịa, nke a malitere na 2007
O jiri teknụzụ Hypercable Digital Terrestrial mee ihe wee malite teknụzụ Satellite Direct to Home (DTH) na August 1, 2007
HiTV mechara gbasaa ihe ya naanị na satellite na ọnụahịa nke ₦3,500 ($2773) kwa ọnwa
Ọ bụ ikpo okwu telivishọn mbụ n'Africa iji tinye Hypercable, usoro decoder TV na-akwụ ụgwọ kwa nlele
A kwụsịrị ọrụ HiTV na Nọvemba 2011 n'ihi nsogbu ego

Hibiscus bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko n'ezinụlọ mallow, Malvaceae
Ụdị ahụ buru ibu, na-agụnye ọtụtụ narị ụdị ndị na-etoputa na mpaghara okpomọkụ, mpaghara okpomanya na mpaghara okirikiri n'ụwa niile
A maara ụdị ndị otu ahụ maka nnukwu okooko osisi ha na-egbuke egbuke ma a na-akpọkarị ụdị ndị ahụ 'hibiscus', ma ọ bụ nke a na-amaghị nke ọma dị ka rose mallow
Aha ndị ọzọ e ji mara ya gụnyere hibiscus siri ike, rose nke sharon, na hibiscus nke okpomọkụ
Ụdị ahụ gụnyere ma osisi na-eto eto na nke na-eto n'afọ, yana obere osisi nwere ụdị dị iche iche
Aha a sitere na aha Grik ἰβίσκος (ibískos) nke Pedanius Dioscorides nyere Althaea officinalis (c
A na-akụ ọtụtụ ụdị dị iche iche dị ka osisi ịchọ mma, ọkachasị Hibiscus syriacus na Hibiscus rosa-sinensis
A maara tii e ji okooko osisi hibiscus mee n'ọtụtụ aha gburugburu ụwa ma na-aṅu ya ma mgbe ọ dị ọkụ ma mgbe ọ na-ajụ oyi
A maara ihe ọṅụṅụ ahụ maka ụcha ọbara ọbara ya, ụtọ ọ na-atọ, na vitamin C
Akwụkwọ ya na-agbanwe agbanwe, ovate na lanceolate, na-enwekarị ezé ma ọ bụ lobed margin (dentate)
Okooko osisi ndị ahụ buru ibu, ọ pụtara ìhè, dị ka opi, o nwere mbara fulawa ise ma ọ bụ karịa, o nwere agba sitere na ọcha ruo ọbara ọbara, acha anụnụ anụnụ, piich, edo edo ma ọ bụ purple
O na-enwe sentimita anọ wee ruo sentimita iri na asatọ n'obosara
Agba okooko osisi n'ụdị ụfọdụ, dị ka H
mutabilis na H
tiliaceus, na-agbanwe na afọ
Mkpụrụ osisi ahụ bụ capsule kpọrọ nkụ nke nwere lobes ise, nke nwere ọtụtụ mkpụrụ na lobes ọ bụla, nke a na-ahapụ mgbe capsule dehisces (na-emeghe) mgbe ọ tozuru
Ọ na-acha uhie uhie na ọcha
Ọ bụ ihe atụ nke okooko osisi zuru oke

N'ógbè ndị dị jụụ, ma eleghị anya ụdị ihe ịchọ mma a na-ahụkarị bụ Hibiscus syriacus, hibiscus ndị a na-ahụkarị n'ụbị, nke a makwaara n'ebe ụfọdụ dị ka 'rose nke Althea' ma ọ bụ 'rose nke Sharon' (ma a gaghị ejikọta ya na Hypericum calycinum na-enweghị njikọ, nke a na-akpọkwa 'rose nke Sharon')
N'ebe okpomọkụ na mpaghara okpomọkụ, hibiscus nke China (H
rosa-sinensis), ya na ọtụtụ ngwakọta ya, bụ hibiscus kachasị ewu ewu
A maara ọtụtụ narị ụdị, nke gụnyere
A na-akụ ọtụtụ ụdị maka okooko osisi ha mara mma ma ọ bụ jiri ya mee ihe dị ka obere osisi, a na-ejikwa ya adọta urukurubụba, aṅụ, na hummingbirds
Hibiscus bụ osisi siri ike, nke na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche ma n'ọnọdụ okpomọkụ ọ nwere ike iweputa ima mma nke ogige ọ bụla

N'ịbụ ihe na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche, ọ na-eme ka onwe ya ọ bụrụ ihe e nwere ike izụlite ogige mbara ụlọ n'ime obodo ndị jupụtara na ya ma nwee ike ịzụlite ya n'ụzọ dị mfe n'ime ite dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ ma ọ bụ ọbụna n'ime arịa kwụ ọtọ
Ọ bụ osisi na-adịgide adịgide ma na-agbasa okooko osisi n'afọ niile
Dị ka ọ na-abịa n'ụdị dịgasị iche iche, ọ bụ osisi nke nwere ike ịgbakwunye ume na ubi ọ bụla
Nanị ọrịa nke ndị na-elekọta ubi kwesịrị ịkpachara anya bụ ihe a kpọrọ mealybugs
Ọ dị mfe ịhụ ọrịa Mealybug n'ihi na a na-ahụ ha n'ụzọ doro anya dị ka ọrịa cottony na-acha ọcha na buds, akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ọbụna ogwe osisi
Iji chebe osisi ahụ, ị ga-ewepụ akụkụ ahụ butere ọrịa, jiri mmiri fesa ya, ma tinye ọgwụ ahụhụ kwesịrị ekwesị
Otu ụdị Hibiscus, nke a maara dị ka kenaf (Hibiscus cannabinus), a na-eji ya eme akwụkwọ[Tinye edensibịa]

A na-eji mkpo dị n'ime nke hibiscus oké osimiri (Hibiscus tiliaceus), nke a na-akpọkwa 'hau', eme na Polynesia maka ime eriri, na osisi maka ime ụgbọ mmiri na-ese n'elu mmiri[Tinye edensibịa] A na-eme eriri dị n'ụgbọ mmiri ozi ala ọzọ Messenger of Peace site na eriri sitere na osisi hibiscus
E ji ọtụtụ aha mara tii e ji calyces nke Hibiscus sabdariffa mee n'ọtụtụ mba gburugburu ụwa ma na-aṅụ ya mgbe ọ dị ọkụ ma ọ bụ mgbe ọ na-ajụ oyi
A maara ihe ọṅụṅụ ahụ nke ọma maka ụcha ọbara ọbara ya, ilu na ụtọ pụrụ iche
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ na-edozi ahụ nke ukwuu n'ihi vitamin C ya
A maara ya dị ka bissap na West Africa, 'Gul e Khatmi' na Urdu & Persian, agua de jamaica na Mexico na Central America (okooko osisi bụ flor de jamaica) na Orhul na India
Ụfọdụ na-ezo aka na ya dị ka roselle, aha a na-ahụkarị maka okooko osisi hibiscus

Na Jamaica, Trinidad na ọtụtụ agwaetiti ndị ọzọ dị na Caribbean, a maara ihe ọṅụṅụ ahụ dị ka sorrel (Hibiscus sabdariffa; ka a ghara ịgbagwoju ya anya na Rumex acetosa, ụdị na-ekerịta aha a na-akpọ sorrel)
Na Ghana, a maara ihe ọṅụṅụ ahụ dị ka soobolo n'otu n'ime asụsụ obodo

Na Cambodia, enwere ike ịkwadebe ihe ọṅụṅụ oyi site na itinye petals na mmiri ọkụ ruo mgbe a na-esi na petals gbapụta agba, wee tinye mmiri lime (nke na-agbanwe ihe ọṅụṅụ ahụ site na nchara ma ọ bụ ọbara ọbara gaa na ọbara ọbara), ihe na-atọ ụtọ (shụga/mmanụ aṅụ) na n'ikpeazụ mmiri oyi/kpụrụkpụrụ mmiri
N'Ijipt na Sudan, a maara tii hibiscus dị ka karkadé (كركیه), a na-aṅụ ya dị ka ihe ọṅụṅụ na-ekpo ọkụ na nke oyi
Hibiscus (nke a makwaara na Sri Lanka dị ka okooko osisi akpụkpọ ụkwụ, සපත්තු මල, වද මල n'asụsụ Sinhalese) bụ ihe nwere ihe nketa bara ọgaranya nke ndị Lankans na-enye ume ọhụrụ
Mkpụrụ osisi ọhụrụ, ice tii na syrups e ji okooko osisi Hibiscus mee bụ ihe oriri a ma ama n'etiti ndị Sri Lanka
A na-eri hibiscus a mịrị amị, ọ na-abụkarịkwa nri dị ụtọ na Mexico
A pụkwara ime ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka ihe ịchọ mma, ọ na-abụkarị maka nri ndị e ji esi nri
A na-eji roselle (Hibiscus sabdariffa) eme ihe dị ka akwụkwọ nri
A na-ahụ ụdị Hibiscus suratensis Linn nke ya na Hibiscus aculeatus G
Don na Visayas na Philippines dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ maka ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akwụkwọ nri na menus niile dị n'ógbè ahụ
A maara dị ka labog na mpaghara Visayan (ma ọ bụ labuag / sapinit na Tagalog), ụdị ahụ bụ ihe eji esi nri ofe ọkụkọ
A na-eji ụdị Hibiscus dị ka osisi nri site na igurube nke ụfọdụ ụdị lepidopteran, gụnyere Chionodes hibiscella, Hypercompe hambletoni, nutmeg moth, na turnip moth
A na-akọwa Hibiscus rosa-sinensis dị ka nke nwere ọtụtụ ọgwụ na Ayurveda India
A na-azọrọ na tii na-esi ísì ụtọ sitere na Hibiscus sabdariffa nwere ike belata ọbara mgbali elu
Ọ bụ ezie na a ghọtachaghị usoro ahụ nke ọma, ọmụmụ anụmanụ gara aga egosila ma mmetụta mgbochi nke H
sabdariffa na ụda uru ahụ na mmetụta mgbochi ọmụmụ nke Hibiscus rosa-sinensis, n'otu n'otu
E gosipụtara na ihe a na-ewepụta na H
sabdariffa na-akpali mkpụmkpụ nke ụfụfụ na akpa nwa; ihe a na'ewepụta na-egosi mmetụta mgbochi afọ ime n'ụdị ọrụ estrogen na òké
A hụbeghị nchọpụta ndị a n'ime ụmụ mmadụ
A na-eche na Hibiscus rosa-sinensis nwere mmetụta emmenagogue nke nwere ike ịkpali ịhụ nsọ na, n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ụfọdụ, na-akpata ite ime
N'ihi mmetụta ọjọọ edere na ọmụmụ anụmanụ na ihe ndị a kọrọ na ha nwere ọgwụ, anaghị atụ aro H
sabdariffa na H
rosa-sinensis maka iji ya mee ihe n'oge ime ime
A na-ekwu na H
sabdariffa na diclofenac, chloroquine na acetaminophen na-emekọrịta ihe site n'ịgbanwe pharmacokinetics
N'ime ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo nwere ahụike, a chọpụtara na ihe H
sabdariffa na-ewepụta na-ebelata nsị nke diclofenac mgbe a na-enye ya
Tụkwasị na nke a, a chọpụtara na nchịkwa nke Karkade (H
sabdariffa), ihe ọṅụṅụ Sudanese a na-ahụkarị, na-ebelata chloroquine bioavailability
Otú ọ dị, ọ dịghị mgbanwe dị ịrịba ama a hụrụ na pharmacokinetics nke acetaminophen mgbe a na-enye ya na ihe ọṅụṅụ Zobo (H
sabdariffa)
A chọrọ nyocha ndị ọzọ iji gosipụta mkpa ahụike dị
Hibiscus na-acha ọbara ọbara bụ okooko osisi nke chi nwanyị Hindu Kali, ọ na-apụta ugboro ugboro n'ihe ngosi ya na nka nke Bengal, India, mgbe mgbe na chi nwanyị na okooko osisi na-agwakọta n'ụdị
A na-eji hibiscus eme ihe dị ka onyinye nye Kali na chi Ganesha na ofufe Hindu
Na Philippines, ụmụaka na-eji gumamela (aha obodo maka hibiscus) eme ihe dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ntụrụndụ na-eme ka efere
A na-egbutu okooko osisi na akwụkwọ ruo mgbe mmiri na-arapara n'ahụ pụtara
A na-etinyezi ogwe papaya dị n'ime nke a ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka ahịhịa maka ịfụ ụfụfụ
Tinyere ncha, mmiri hibiscus na-emepụta ọtụtụ efere
A na-akpọkwa ya 'Tarukanga' na Waray, ọkachasị na mpaghara Eastern Samar
Ụmụ agbọghọ Tahiti na Hawaiian na-eyi okooko osisi hibiscus
Ọ bụrụ na a na-eyi okooko osisi ahụ n'azụ ntị aka ekpe, nwanyị ahụ lụrụ di ma ọ bụ nwee enyi nwoke
Ọ bụrụ na a na-eyi okooko osisi ahụ n'aka nri, ọ bụ naanị ya ma ọ bụ n'ihu ọha maka mmekọrịta[Tinye edensibịa] Hibiscus na-acha odo odo bụ okooko osisi steeti Hawaii
Onye edemede Naijiria bụ Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie kpọrọ akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya Purple Hibiscus n'aha okooko osisi ahụ
Akpụkpọ ahụ nke hibiscus nwere eriri bast siri ike nke enwere ike inweta site na ịhapụ akpụkpọ ahụ e wepụrụ n'oké osimiri ka ihe ndị dị ndụ ree
Hibiscus bụ ihe nnọchianya mba nke Haiti, na okooko osisi mba nke mba dị iche iche nke gụnyere Solomon Islands na Niue
Hibiscus syriacus bụ okooko osisi mba nke South Korea, na Hibiscus rosa-sinensis bụ okooko mmiri mba nke Malaysia
Hibiscus brackenridgei bụ okooko osisi steeti nke Hawaii
Hichem Rostom (a mụrụ na 26 Mee 1947) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 70 na ihe ngosi telivishọn kemgbe afọ 1987
Ọ pụtara na Golden Horseshoes, nke e gosipụtara na ngalaba Un Certain Regard na mmemme afọ 1989
Ọ nyekwara ntụziaka na Carthage Theatre Festival maka nnọkọ abụọ

Hichem Yacoubi (a mụrụ n'April 4, 1964 na Tunis, Tunisia) bụ onye France na-eme ihe nkiri nke a mụrụ na Tunisia nke nwere ọrụ na ihe nkiri A Prophet (na French Un prophète) (2009) nke Jacques Audiard duziri
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri (gụnyere ihe ọmụmụ na Actor's Studio) na ịgba egwu
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri gụnyere ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke ya na Daniel Kupferstein duziri ma soro dee ihe nkiri ahụ
Ọrụ Yacoubi kachasị ọhụrụ bụ dịka onye Arab a tụrụ mkpọrọ aha ya bụ Reyeb onye bụ onye akaebe nke mpụ
Ọ bụ onye akaebe na-emegide onwe ya, dị njikere ịgba akaebe megide otu ndị omempụ Corsican nke onye mkpọrọ ibe ya, César Luciani (Niels Arestrup) na-edu
Luciani, n'enweghị ohere ọ bụla maka ebumnuche ya, debanyere aha onye isi ihe nkiri, Malik El Djebani, iji gbuo Reyeb
Ọ bụ ezie na e gburu onye ahụ na mbido, ọ na-apụta n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ahụ dịka ngosipụta nke akọ na uche Malik
Yacoubi na Daniel Kupferstein duziri Bon Anniversaire (Happy Birthday), ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke afọ 2007
O zigara obere ihe ngosi n'afọ 2008 na 18° Festival del Cinema Africano, d'Asia e America Latina, nke gosipụtara ihe nkiri na Ịtali site n'aka ndị Afrịka, Eshia, na Latin America
Àtụ Infobox film
Hidden Figures bụ ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ nke America na 2016 nke Theodore Melfi duziri ma bụrụkwa onye melphi na Allison Schroeder dere
Ọ dabeere na akwụkwọ 2016 nke Margot Lee Shetterly dere banyere ụmụ nwanyị atọ American mathematicians Katherine Goble Johnson (Taraji P
Henson), Dorothy Vaughan (Octavia Spencer), na Mary Jackson (Janelle Monáe), bụ ndị rụrụ ọrụ na NASA n'oge space Race
Ndị ọzọ na-agụnye Kevin Costner, Kirsten Dunst, Jim Parsons, Mahershala Ali, Aldis Hodge, na Glen Powell
Isi foto malitere na March 2016 na Atlanta, Georgia wee kechie ya na May 2016
Ebe ndị ọzọ na-ese foto gụnyere ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ na Georgia, gụnyere East Point, Canton, Monroe, Columbus, na MadisonIsi foto malitere na Machị 2016 na Atlanta, Georgia ma mechie ya na Mee 2016
Ebe ndị ọzọ a na-ese ihe nkiri gụnyere me
National Board of Review họọrọ ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka otu n'ime fim iri kachasị elu nke 2016 ma nata onyinye na nhọpụta dị iche iche, gụnyere ntuli aka atọ na 89th Academy Awards, tinyere Best Picture
Ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite Screen Actors Guild Award maka arụmọrụ dị ịrịba ama site na ndị a ga-eme n'ihe nkiri

Katherine Johnson na-arụ ọrụ na Langley Research Center dị na Hampton, Virginia, n'afọ 1961, ya na ndị otu ibe ya Mary Jackson na Dorothy Vaughan, dịka 'kọmputa' ala, na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ enweghị ihe a gwara ha bụ
Ha niile bụ ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America; a na-ekewapụ ha site n'agbụrụ na okike
Onye nlekọta White Vivian Mitchell nyere Katherine aka inyere Al Harrison's Space Task Group, n'ihi nkà ya na geometry nyocha
Ọ na-aghọ nwanyị ojii mbụ na otu; Onye isi injinia Paul Stafford na-achụpụkarị ya
E kenyere Mary na ndị otu okpomọkụ capsule space, ebe ọ chọpụtara ozugbo ntụpọ imewe
N'ịbụ onye ndú otu ya bụ Karl Zielinski, onye Polish-Jewist nke Holocaust lanarịrị gbara ume ka ọ bụrụ injinia NASA
Mitchell gwara ya na, n'agbanyeghị nzere mgbakọ na mwepụ nke sayensị anụ ahụ ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ọzọ
Mary tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa maka ikike ịga ụlọ ọrụ sekọndrị Hampton nke ndị ọcha niile, n'agbanyeghị mmegide di ya
N'ịkpọku ikpe ya n'ụlọikpe, ọ meriri onye ọka iwu obodo site na ịrịọ arịrịokwu banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọma, ikwe ka o gaa klas abalị
Katherine zutere African-American National Guard Lt
Col
Jim Johnson, onye na-ekwupụta obi abụọ banyere ikike mgbakọ nke ụmụ nwanyị
O mechara rịọ mgbaghara ma malite iso Katherine na ụmụ ya nwanyị atọ nọrọ
Ndị na-eme njem n'ime mbara igwe Mercury 7 gara Langley, onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị ndụ John Glenn gbakwara mbọ ikele ụmụ nwanyị West Area

Katherine na-amasị Harrison site n'idozi usoro mgbakọ nke ọma dị mgbagwoju anya sitere na akwụkwọ ndị edepụtara, ka Soviet Union si malite Yuri Gagarin mee ihe ịga nke ọma iji zipụ ndị America nọ mu mbara igwe
Harrison na-agwa Katherine okwu banyere 'ịgbapụ' ya, n'amaghị ete a manyere ya ịga ije ọkara kilomita (800 mita) iji jiri ụlọ ịsa ahụ kacha nso e kenyere ndị mmadụ
O ji iwe kọwaa ịkpa ókè ọ na-eche ihu n'ọrụ, nke mere ka Harrison kụtuo akara 'Ụlọ Ịsa ahụ Na-acha Ọcha' ma wepụ ikewapụta ụlọ mposi
Ọ na-enye ohere ka a tinye Katherine n'ime nzukọ dị elu iji gbakọọ ebe capsule ahụ batara
Stafford mere ka Katherine wepụ aha ya na akụkọ, na-ekwusi ike na 'kọmputa' enweghị ike ide ha, a makwaara ọrụ ya naanị maka Stafford

N'ịbụ onye Mitchell gwara na ọ nweghị atụmatụ ịnye 'onye nlekọta oge niile maka otu ndị nwere àgwà,' Dorothy mụtara ka NASA etinyela kọmputa eletrọniki IBM 7090 nke yiri egwu iji dochie anya kọmpụta mmadụ
Mgbe onye na-elekọta ọ́bá akwụkwọ baara ya mba maka ileta ngalaba ndị ọcha, Dorothy weere otu puku banyere Fortran ma kụziere onwe ha ihe omume nke West Area
Ọ gara n'ụlọ kọmputa, malite igwe ahụ nke ọma, a kwalite ya ka ọ na-elekọta Ngalaba Nhazi; o kwetara ime otú e si ebufee iri atọ ndị ọrụ ibe ya
Mitchell mechara kpọọ ya 'Mrs
Vaughan'
N'ime ndokwa ikpeazụ maka mmalite John Glenn, ngalaba ahụ anaghịzi achọ kọmputa mmadụ; e zigara Katherine na West Area ma lụọ Jim
N'ụbọchị a malitere ya, enwere ọdịiche na ngụkọta IBM 7090, ma gwa Katherine ka ọ lelee akara mbata nke capsule
Ọ na-ebute nsonaazụ n'ime ụlọ nchịkwa, Harrison hapụrụ ya ka ọ banye
Mgbe a na-agbapụ ya nke ọma ma jiri ọgba gburugburu, ịdọ aka ná ntị na-egosi ihe mgbochi okpomọkụ capsule nwere ike ịda
Mission Control kpebiri ịdakwasị Glenn mgbe atọ orbit kama asaa, Katherine kwadoro aro Harrison ka ọ hapụ retro-rocket agbakwunyere iji nyere aka mee ka ihe mgbochi okpomọkụ dị n'ọnọdụ
Enyi na enyi 7 nwere ihe ịga nke ọma

Ọ bụ ezie na kọmputa eletrọniki mechara dochie ndị mgbakọ na mwepụ, ederede epilogue kpughere Mary nwetara nzere injinia ya wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ African-American engineer nke NASA; Dorothy gara n'ihu dị ka onye nlekọta Africa America nke NASA; Stafford nabatara Katherine, dịka otu odeakwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, gaa n'ihu gbakọọ ụzọ maka ọrụ Apollo 11 na Space Shuttle
N'afọ 2015, e nyere ya ihe nrite nke nnwere onwe onye
N'afọ 2016, NASA raara ụlọ ọrụ nyocha nke Langley nye Katherine Johnson Computational Building iji sọpụrụ ya
N'afọ 2015, onye na-emepụta Donna Gigliotti nwetara akwụkwọ Margot Lee Shetterly nke a kpọrọ Hidden Figures, banyere otu ụmụ nwanyị Black ndị ọkà mgbakọ na mwepụ nyeere NASA aka imeri Space Race
Allison Schroeder dere edemede ahụ, nke Gigliotti mepụtara site na Levantine Films
Schroeder tolitere na Cape Canaveral ma nne le nna ya ochie rụrụ ọrụ na NASA, ebe ọ rụkwara akwụkwọ dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma
Levantine Films mepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na Peter Chernin's Chernin Entertainment
Fox 2000 Pictures nwetara ikike ihe nkiri ahụ, Theodore Melfi bịanyere aka na iduzi
Mgbe ọ batara n'ụgbọ ahụ, Melfi dezigharịrị edemede Schroeder, ma lekwasị anya karịsịa na ịhazi ndụ ụlọ nke ndị isi atọ ahụ na ọrụ ha na NASA
Mgbe a mara ọkwa mmepe nke ihe nkiri ahụ, ndị na-eme egwuregwu e weere ka ha ga-eduzi ọrụ gụnyere Oprah Winfrey, Viola Davis, Octavia Spencer, na Taraji P
Henson
Chernin na Jenno Topping mepụtara, tinyere Gigliotti na Melfi
Fox tụbara Henson ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke mgbakọ na mwepụ Katherine Goble Johnson
A họpụtara Spencer ka ọ bụrụ Dorothy Vaughan, otu n'ime ndị isi mgbakọ na mwepụ atọ dị na NASA
A tụbara Kevin Costner na ihe nkiri ahụ ka ọ bụrụ onye isi akụkọ ifo nke mmemme mbara igwe
Onye na-agụ egwu Janelle Monáe bịanyere aka n'ịkpọ onye nke atọ, Mary Jackson
A tụbara Kirsten Dunst, Glen Powell, na Mahershala Ali n'ihe nkiri ahụ Powell ga-eme onye astronaut John Glenn, na Ali dị ka mmasị ịhụnanya Johnson
Isi foto malitere na Machị 2016 na campus nke Morehouse College dị n'Atlanta, Georgia
E mekwara ihe nkiri na Lockheed Martin Aeronautics na Dobbins Air Reserve Base
A tụbara Jim Parsons na ihe nkiri ahụ ka ọ bụrụ onye isi injinia nke Space Task Group na NASA, Paul Stafford
Pharrell Williams (onye Virginia Beach, nso Langley Research Center) batara dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ
O dekwara egwu mbụ ma rụọ ọrụ na ngalaba egwú na ụda nke ihe nkiri ahụ, ya na Hans Zimmer na Benjamin Wallfisch
A kpọbatara prọfesọ mgbakọ na mwepụ nke Morehouse College Rudy L
Horne ka ọ bụrụ onye nyocha ya n'oge a kara akara

Otú ọ dị, n'eziokwu, e buliri Dorothy Vaughan ka onye nlekọta nke West Computing ogologo oge tupu mgbe ahụ, na 1949, bụrụ onye isi ojii mbụ na National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics (NACA) yana otu n'ime ndị inyom ole na ole
N'afọ 1958, mgbe NACA ghọrọ NASA, e wepụrụ ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere ọfịs West Computing
Vaughan na ọtụtụ n'ime kọmputa ndị bụbu West wegara ngalaba nyocha ọhụrụ (ACD), otu agbụrụ na okike

Ọ bụ Mary Jackson, ọ bụghị Katherine Johnson, onye nwere nsogbu ịchọta ụlọ ịsa ahụ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ n'ihe mere ka 1953 mgbe o nọ ọrụ nwa oge na East Area, mpaghara Langley nke ya maaraghị ma ebe ndị isi ojii ole na ole rụrụ

Katherine Johnson, n'akụkụ ya, amaghị na mbụ na ụlọ ịsa ahụ dị na Langley kewara ekewa (na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ ma nke ọdịda anyanwụ) wee jiri ebe a ga-esi mee ihe 'naanị ndị ọcha' ruo ọtụtụ afọ tupu onye ọzọ emee mkpesa
Ọ leghaara mkpesa ahụ anya, e wepụkwara okwu ahụ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na WHRO-TV, Johnson gọnahụrụ mmetụta nke ịkpa ókè
'Enweghị m mmetụta nke ịkpa ókè na NASA, n'ihi na onye ọ bụla nọ ebe ahụ mere nyocha
Ị nwere ọrụ ma rụọ ya, ọ dịkwa gị mkpa ime ihe ị ga-eme
na igwu egwu n'oge nri ehihie
Enweghị m mmetụta nke ịkpa ókè ọ bụla
Amaara m na ọ nọ ebe ahụ, mana echeghị ya'
Mary Jackson agaghị enweta iwu ụlọ ikpe ka ọ gaa klas abalị na kọleji ndị ọcha naanị
Ọ rịọrọ obodo Hampton maka ihe pụrụ iche, e nyekwara ya ikike
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bịara daa ma mebie, ụgwọ zoro ezo nke na-agba ọsọ usoro ụlọ ọrụ abụọ dị n'otu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ injinia ya wee nweta nkwalite ka ọ bụrụ onye enjiniya n'afọ 1958

Katherine Johnson rụrụ ọrụ kachasị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Langley, ọ bụghị n'ebe ndị dị anya site n'ịrụ ụlọ 1244 malite n'etiti afọ 1953, ma nọrọkwa na 1244 ọbụna mgbe ha sonyere Space Task Group, ruo ugbu a mmalite 1960s na ụgbọ elu akụkọ ihe mere eme John Glenn
Katherine Johnson so Eunice Smith, onye nwere afọ itoolu na West Area computer veteran n'oge ahụ ka Johnson sonyeere NACA
Smith bụ onye agbata obi ya na enyi site n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị ọ bụla
Ụmụ Goble atọ ahụ bụ ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma mgbe Katherine lụrụ Jim Johnson
E kenyere Katherine Johnson na Ngalaba Nnyocha Flight n'afọ 1953, nke ghọrọ ihe a ga-adịgide adịpụ
Mgbe e guzobere Space Task Group na 1958, ndị injinia sitere n'aka Flight Research Division bụ isi nke otu ahụ, a gụnyekwara Johnson
O so dee akụkọ nyocha nke NASA bipụtara na 1960, oge mbụ nwanyị nọ n'ụlọ ọrụ Flight Research Division nwetara otuto dị ka onye dere akwụkwọ nchọpụta
Johnson nwetara ohere ịnweta nzukọ ndị nchịkọta akụkọ site na 1958 naanị site n'ịnọgidesi ike, ọ bụghị maka otu nnọkọ dị oke egwu
Ọ bụ Robert Gilruth duziri Space Task Group, ọ bụghị onye akụkọ ifo Al Harrison, nke e kere iji mee ka usoro nchịkwa dị mgbagwoju anya
Harrison na-ahapụkwa ya ka ọ banye Mission Control iji hụ mwepụta ahụ

Ọ dịghị ihe ọ bụla mere na ndụ n'ezie, onye edemede Theodore Melfi kwuru na ya ahụghị nsogbu ịgbakwunye ebe ndị a nọ, na-asị, 'Ọ dị mkpa ka e nwee mmadụ ọcha mee nke ziri ezi, enwere ike ịbụ ndị isi ojii ga-eme nke ọma, otukwa nwoke chọrọ ime
Ya mere, onye na-eche banyere ndị mepụtara ihe ziri ezi ma ọ bụrụhaala n'ihe ruru eru?'

Dexter Thomas nke Vice News katọrọ mgbakwunye Melfi dị ka ịmepụta onye nzọpụta ọcha 'N'okwu a, ọ pụtara na mmadụ ọcha ekwesịghị iche echiche banyere ohere ahụ nwere ike ịbụ ndị ọzọ n'afọ 1960, ha gaara abụ otu n'ime ihe ọjọọ
Megan Garber nke Atlantic kwuru na 'akụkọ' ihe nkiri ahụ gụnyere ihe gbasara onye nzọpụta ọcha'
Melfi kwuru na ọ hụrụ 'ebubo nke 'onye nzọpụta ọcha' dị njọ', sị
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Vivian Mitchell na Paul Stafford bụ ihe mejupụtara ọtụtụ ndị otu, ma gosipụta echiche na àgwà ọha na eze nke oge ahụ
Karl Zielinski dabeere na onye nkuzi Mary Jackson, Kazimierz 'Kaz' Czarnecki
John Glenn, onye ji ihe dị ka afọ iri karịa ka egosiri n'oge mmalite, rịọrọ Johnson kpọmkwem ka ọ nyochaa ngụkọta IBM, ọ bụ ezie na o nwere ọtụtụ ụbọchị tupu ụbọchị mmalite iji mezue usoro ahụ
Onye edemede Margot Lee Shetterly ekwenyewo na enwere ọdịiche dị n'etiti akwụkwọ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ, mana ọ chọpụtara na nke ahụ bụ ihe a na-aghọta
A kwụsịghị ụgbọ elu John Glenn n'oge dị ka e kwuru na ndepụta okwu mmechi nke ihe nkiri ahụ
A haziri ọrụ MA-6 maka njem atọ ma daa n'oge a tụrụ anya ya
Ngwongwo mgbasa ozi e bipụtara tupu a malite ya na-ekwu na 'The Mercury Operations Director nwere ike ịhọrọ otu, abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ orbit mission'

E mekwara ndokwa maka ụgbọ elu Scott Carpenter na Mee ma gbaa ọsọ ugboro atọ, Wally Schirra mere atụmatụ ịgba gburugburu isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba chọrọ mgbanwe dị ukwuu na usoro nkwado ndụ nke Mercury capsule iji nye ya ohere ife njem awa itoolu

Okwu ahụ bụ 'ga ma ọ dịkarịa ala ugboro asaa' nke nọ na transcript ọrụ a na-ezo aka n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na onye Atlas booster etinyela capsule Glenn n'ime orbit ga-akwụsi ike maka oghere isii, mana o nwere ikike ịnọ ogologo oge
Mercury Control Center dị na Cape Canaveral na Florida, ọ bụghị Langley Research Centre na Virginia
Ihe osise ndị e gosipụtara n'ihu ụlọ ahụ na-egosi ọrụ isii, nke emeghị ruo mgbe Wally Schirra mere MA-8 ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1962
Katherine Johnson's Technical Note D-233, nke ya na TH

Mgbe a tọhapụrụ Hidden Figures na Disemba 25, 2016, ụfọdụ ọrụ ebere, ụlọ ọrụ na azụmaahịa onwe ha na-ele ihe nkiri ahụ anya dị ka ihe dị mkpa maka imeziwanye mmata ndị ntorobịa na agụmakwụkwọ na ọrụ n'ọhịa sayensị, teknụzụ, injinia, na mgbakọ na mwepụ (STEM), haziri ngosipụta n'efu nke ihe omume ahụ iji gbasaa ozi nke isiokwu ihe mere na fim ahụ
Mgbalị jikọrọ aka n'etiti Western New York STEM Hub, AT&T na Girl Scouts nke USA nyere ohere ka ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ 200 nke Buffalo Public School, Girl scouts na ndị nkuzi hụ ihe nkiri ahụ
Onye isi akụkọ WBFO bụ Eileen Buckley kwuru na emere ihe omume ahụ iji nyere aka gbaa ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị ume ịtụle ọrụ STEM
Nnyocha na-egosi na ka ọ na'afọ 2020, a ga-enwe ọrụ STEM nde 24 na ya

Naia Butler-Craig, onye na-achọ ịnya ụgbọ mbara igwe, dere banyere ihe nkiri ahụ, sị 'Enweghị m ike iche n'echiche ihe nke ahụ ga-adị ka Naya dị afọ iri na isii, nke na'ahụ anya, na nke nwere mmasị na mbara ala na ya na ụmụ nwanyị ojii nwere ihe jikọrọ ya n'

Also, the film's principal actors (Henson, Spencer, Monáe and Parsons), director (Melfi), producer/musical creator (Williams), and other non-profit outside groups have offered free screenings to Hidden Figures at several cinema locations around the world
Some of the screenings were open to all-comers, while others were arranged to benefit girls, women and the underprivileged
The campaign began as individual activism by Spencer, and made a total of more than 1,500 seats for Hidden Figures available, free of charge, to poor individuals and families
The result was seven more screenings for people who otherwise might not have been able to afford to see the film - in Atlanta (sponsored by Monáe), in Washington, DC

(sponsored by Henson), in Chicago (also Henson), in Houston (by Parsons), in Hazelwood, Missouri (by Melfi and actress/co-producer Kimberly Quinn), and in Norfolk and Virginia Beach, Virginia (both sponsored by Williams)

Na Febụwarị 2017, AMC Theatres na 21st Century Fox kwupụtara na ngosipụta n'efu nke Hidden Figures ga-ewere ọnọdụ na ememe nke Black History Month na obodo 14 ahọpụtara na US (gụnyere Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles na Miami)
Nkwupụta ahụ kọwara ihe ngosi ọrụ ebere nke Febụwarị dị ka ime ka a mara eziokwu nke ihe nkiri ahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Black na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ na NASA n'oge Space Race
21st Century Fox na AMC Theatres kpọkwara ụlọ akwụkwọ, otu obodo na òtù ndị na'enweghị uru ka ha tinye akwụkwọ maka ihe nyocha pụrụ iche ndị ọzọ a ga-enwe n'obodo ha

'Ka anyị na-eme emume Black History Month ma na'ihu na Women's History month na March, akụkọ a nke ike na nnọgidesi ike dị mkpa karịa mgbe ọ bụla, 'ka Liba Rubenstein, 21st Century Fox'tti Senior Vice President of Social Impact, kwuru, sị, anyị nọ na 21CF sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke mmegharị ahụ iji weta ihe nkiri a na ndị na na ya na ha agaghị enwe ike ịhụ ya - ndị ọkà mmụta nwere ike ịgụnye ndị ọhụrụ na onye na - anyị chọrọ ịkwado ma gbasaa mmegide ahụ

Ndị ọrụ ebere na-enweghị uru na mpụga otu na mgbalị ndị ọzọ dị n'ógbè site n'aka ndị mmadụ nʼotu n n 'nyele nyocha n-efu nke 'Ihe Ndị A Na-ezobe' site na iji usoro mgbasa ozi igwe mmadụ na Intanet, nke na'enye ndị ọrụ ohere ịnakọta ego maka ihe nkiri n 'efu
Ọtụtụ mkpọsa GoFundMe n'efu apụtala kemgbe a tọhapụrụ ihe nkiri ahụ n'ozuzu ya, niile site nʼaka ndị mmadụ chọrọ ịnakọta ego iji kwụọ ụmụ akwụkwọ ụgwọ iji hụ ihe ngosi ahụ

N'afọ 2019, ụlọ ọrụ Walt Disney jikọtara aka na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ọchịchị US na mmemme mgbanwe nke atọ kwa afọ 'Hidden No More', nke ihe nkiri ahụ kpaliri ma wetara ụmụ nwanyị 50 si gburugburu ụwa na United States bụ ndị mere nke ọma na ọrụ STEM dị ka injinia ụgbọ elu, ngwọta data na nzuzo data, na agụmakwụkwọ metụtara ST EM
Usoro mgbanwe ahụ malitere na 2017 mgbe ndị nnọchi anya US gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na obodo ha
Nkwado maka nyocha ahụ dị mma nke na mba 48 kpebiri na nke ọ bụla ga-ahọpụta otu nwanyị na STEM iji nọchite anya mba ha na mmemme mgbanwe IVLP izu atọ na United States

N'ịgbaso asọmpi Lego Ideas nke afọ 2017, onye na-emepụta ihe eji egwuri egwu na Denmark bụ The Lego Group kwupụtara atụmatụ imepụta ihe oyiyi ụmụ nwanyị nke NASA nke ụmụ agbọghọ ise, ndị injinia na ndị na'ime mbara igwe, dịka ọ dabere na ezigbo ụmụnwaanyị rụrụ ọrụ maka NASA

Obere ihe ndị e mere atụmatụ itinye na setịpụrụ bụ Katherine Johnson, onye sayensị kọmputa Margaret Hamilton; onye na-eme njem n'ime mbara igwe, ọkà n'ihe ọmụmụ physics na onye nkuzi Sally Ride; ọkà mmụta mbara ala Nancy Grace Roman; na muntu na'eme ihe n 'na-ememe nʼime ụwa na dọkịta Mae Jemison' (onye bụkwa onye Africa America)
Ihe a gwụchara anaghị agụnye Johnson
A tọhapụrụ Women of NASA set na Nọvemba 1, 2017
Chart nke Miracles nke 1961, 'Mighty Good Lovin, nke onye na-agụ egwú Smokey Robinson dere, na ihe nkiri ahụ n'oge egwu ụlọ, a nụkwara ya na mmechi mmezu
A tọhapụrụ Hidden Figures na Digital HD na Machị 28, 2017, na Blu-ray, 4K Ultra HD, na DVD na Eprel 11, 2017
3 na bychaatị ahịa vidio ụlọ
Ihe omuma zoro ezo nwetara nde $ 1696 na United States na Canada, na nde dollar 663 na mpaghara ndị ọzọ, maka ngụkọta zuru ụwa ọnụ nke nde dọla 236, megide mmepụta mmefu ego nke $ 25 nde
N'ime ụlọ, Hidden Figures bụ onye kachasị mma na 89th Academy Awards
Deadline Hollywood gbakọrọ uru nke ihe nkiri ahụ ka ọ bụrụ $ 9555 nde, mgbe a na-agbakọta ego niile na ego a ga-enweta maka ihe ngosi ahụ, na'ime iri abụọ kachasị baa uru na 2016
N'oge a tọhapụrụ ya na ụlọ ihe nkiri 25 site na Disemba 25, 2016, ruo Jenụwarị 5, 2017, ihe ngosi ahụ nwetara nde $ 3
Na North America, Hidden Figures nwere mgbasawanye ya n'akụkụ mmeghe nke Underworld Blood Wars na mgbasa nke Lion na A Monster Calls
A na-atụ anya na ọ ga-enweta ihe dị ka nde $ 20 site na ụlọ ihe nkiri 2,471 na ngwụsị izu mbụ ya, na studio na'atụle nde dollar 1517 nke mbụ
O mere $ 12 nde site na previews abalị Thursday na $ 76 nde n'ụbọchị mbụ ya
Na mbido, ihe ngosi mere ka ihe nkiri ahụ nweta nde $ 218 na ngwụsị izu mbụ ya, na-emecha nke abụọ n'azụ Rogue One A Star Wars Story ($ 22 nde)
Otú ọ dị n'ụbọchị na-esote, ọnụ ọgụgụ ikpeazụ kpughere na ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ngụkọta ngwụsị izu nke $ 228 nde, na'emeri Rogue One's $ 219 nde
Na ngwụsị izu nke abụọ ya, ihe nkiri ahụ nwetara nde $ 205 (maka ngụkọta ụbọchị anọ nke MLK Weekend nke nde $275), ọzọ na-ebute ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ nzọ
Na nchịkọta nyocha Rotten Tomatoes, ihe nkiri ahụ nwere nkwado nke 93% dabere na nyocha 314, na nkezi nke 764/10

Nkwekọrịta dị oke egwu nke ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ahụ na-agụ, 'N'ụzọ na'obi, nke na na - obi ụtọ, ndị mmadụ zoro ezo na 'ihe ndị a na ya na ndị dị mkpa na' Na Metacritic, ihe nkiri ahụ nwere akara nkezi nke 74 n'ime 100, dabere na ndị nkatọ 47, na-egosi 'n'ozuzu nyocha dị mma'
Ndị na-ege ntị nke CinemaScore nyochara nyere ihe nkiri ahụ akara nke 'A +' na ọkwa A + ruo F, otu n'ime ihe na'erughị ihe ngosi 90 na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọrụ ahụ iji nweta akara dị otú ahụ

Simon Thompson nke IGN nyere ihe nkiri ahụ akara nke itoolu n'ime iri, na-ede, 'Ihe ndị zoro ezo jupụtara na ihe echefuru echefu, ma ọ bụ nke a na'amaghị ama, ihe efu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke US n'ụzọ dị mma, nke na na ya, dị ụtọ, ya na nke zuru oke
Nke kachasị mma, ị na-apụta na ihe nkiri ahụ maara onye Katherine Johnson na Dorothy Vaughn na Mary Jackson bụ, ụmụ gị nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke

Clayton Davis nke Awards Circuit nyere ihe nkiri ahụ kpakpando atọ na ọkara, na-ekwu na 'E rere ya dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ dị egwu maka oge Krismas, Ihe osise zoro ezo bụ ihe ngosi kwesịrị ntụkwasị obi na nke mara mma nke mba anyị na esemokwu agbụrụ nke kewara ma na'ihu na ịta ahụhụ n'ihe owuwu nke ịdị adị anyị
N'ịbụ ndị na-etinye aka site na mmalite ruo na njedebe, Ihe oyiyi zoro ezo nwere ike ijide onye na'amaghị ama na ihe nkiri na ya ma mee ka ha daa maka akụkọ ya a na - agbagha agbawa
A gaghị ahapụ ihe nkiri ahụ
Nnyocha ndị ọzọ katọrọ ihe nkiri ahụ maka ihe ịchọ mma ya na ọdịnala, ụdị dị mma
Tim Grierson, na-ede maka Screen International, kwuru na 'Ihe ndị zoro ezo fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe siri ike na ngosipụta ya nke ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị na ịrọ agbụrụ
Mmiri nke afọ ojuju onwe onye na-eme ihe nkiri na - na 'ebe Jesse Hassenger na The AV

Club na na Eric Kohn nke IndieWire na-ekwu na ihe nkiri ahụ 'na-eme ka akụkọ ihe mere eme dị mfe; dị ka ụtụ isi maka ndị isi ya, ọ naghị agbanye n'ime ihe kpatara ọgụ ha' ma n'otu aka ahụ, Paul Byrnes kwubiri na 'Mgbe ihe ngosi na ọ na'efu na ya na a na - na na, anyị nwere ikike ịjụ ebe akụkọ ahụ gara, ọbụlagodi na o nyere oge dị mma

N'etiti ọtụtụ ihe ọ rụzuru, a na-eto Octavia Spencer karịsịa maka ngosipụta ya nke Dorothy Vaughan ma họpụta ya maka onyinye Academy maka onye na'eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma, Golden Globe Award maka Onye na na onye n'ime ihe ngosi kachasị elu na Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Female Actor in a Supporting Role
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ meriri Screen Actors Guild Award maka arụmọrụ dị ịrịba ama site na ndị na'ime ihe osise
N'ozuzu, ihe nkiri ahụ nwetara nhọpụta atọ maka 89th Academy Awards na 2017, na-emerighị ọ bụla
Ihe onyonyo zoro ezo na-akọ akụkọ ụmụ nwanyị anọ ndị America America bụ ndị ọkachamara mgbakọ na mwepụ na ọrụ ha rụrụ na NASA site na 1940 ruo 1960

N'ide akwụkwọ maka School Library Journal, Megan Kilgallen kwuru na 'Ihe osise zuru oke nke Freemaná na-adọrọ mmasị ma jupụta na nkọwa zuru ezu, na'ime ihe osisa, usoro mgbakọ na mwepụ, yana ihe ndị dị na mbara igwe n'ozuzu
