Kọmịshọn dị elu nke Naijiria dị na Accra bụ isi ọrụ nnọchiteanya nke Naijeria na Ghana
Ọ dị na 20/21 Onyasia Crescent Roman Ridge na Accra
Onye Kọmishọna Ukwu gara aga bụ onye bụbu Senator nke na-anochi anya Lagos Central Musiliu Olatunde Obanikoro, nke Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua họpụtara na Mee 2008
Onye Kọmishọna Ukwu n'afọ 2012 bụ Hon
Ademola Oluseyi Onafowokan
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2007, ụlọ ọrụ dị elu nke Naịjirịa na Ghana malitere emume ncheta nnwere onwe nke iri anọ na asaa nke Naịjaria na Accra
Minista onye nnọchi anya Simon Ejike Eze kelere Ghana maka ịsọpụrụ ndị Naijiria site n'ịkpọ aha nnukwu okporo ụzọ aha onye bụbu onye isi ala Naijiria, Olusegun Obasanjo
O kwukwara na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ agaghị ala azụ inyefe ndị Naijiria na-eme mpụ na ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa Ghana oge ọ bụla

Mgbe Musiliu Obanikoro nyere onye isi ala John Agyekum Kufuor asambodo ya na Mee 2008, onye isi ala ahụ kwurịtara ogologo akụkọ ihe mere eme nke imekọ ihe ọnụ n'etiti mba abụọ dị n'ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka, ma kwuo na nka Naijiria ga-aba uru ugbu a na Ghana achọpụtala mmanụ

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2009, ụlọ ọrụ kọmịshọn dị elu nke Naijiria na Accra na-arụkọ ọrụ na Vintage Vision, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka azụmahịa nke Naijeria, nke dị na Accra, na-eme atụmatụ ịmalite ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa Ghana-Nigeria na ịmalite nkwekọrịta azụmahịa na itinye ego ogologo oge n'etiti mba abụọ ahụ

N'ikwu okwu n'ihe ngosi akwụkwọ na Nọvemba 2009 Adedapo Oyekanuri, Minista na Kọmitii Ukwu Naịjirịa, kwuru na imekọ ihe ọnụ n'etiti mba abụọ ahụ ekwesịghị ịbụ naanị na azụmahịa, mmekọrịta mba na mba na idebe udo kamakwa nkwado ọdịbendị site n'ịgụ ihe
Mmekọrịta enweela nsogbu mgbe ụfọdụ
N'afọ 1969, Ghana chụpụrụ ndị mba ọzọ bụkarị ndị Naijiria
N'afọ ndị 1980 Naịjirịa chụpụrụ ndị mba ọzọ bụ ndị Ghana

N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2006, onye isi kọmishọna ahụ batara iji mee ka ụmụ akwụkwọ dị jụụ na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah, Kumasi, mgbe a mara otu nwa akwụkwọ mma ma gbuo ụmụ akwụkwọ Naijiria abụọ ọzọ site n'aka onye ohi ji égbè
Kọmishọna dị elu nke Naịjirịa ekwuola na mgbasa ozi na Accra na-enye aka na esemokwu site n'ịgbasa akụkọ mpụ metụtara ndị Naịjirị
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2009, Obanikoro kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ dị elu amalitela mkpọsa iji gosipụta akụkụ dị mma nke Naịjirịa na nnukwu ikike
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ gwara ndị nta akụkọ na ndị Naijiria ruru narị atọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na Ghana maka mpụ ndị dị ka ịtọrọ mmadụ, ire ọgwụ ọjọọ na ịpụnara mmadụ ihe
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2020, ndị ikom ji égbè wakporo ala ebe ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa kọmịshọn aru ụlọ ma kwatuo akụkụ nke ụlọ ahụ a na-ekwu na Accra
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Lagos Steeti bụ ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu na Lagos Steeti
O nwere ọtụtụ nkewa, gụnyere Igbosere, Lagos Island, Ikeja, Epe, Ajah, Badagry na mpaghara Ikorodu
Hijuk bụ obere asụsụ Bantu nke Cameroon
Guthrie hapụrụ ya na nchịsa n'ime asụsụ Bafia (A50), mana dị ka Ethnologue 16 si kwuo, ọ nwere naanị 45% yiri Bafia, na 84% ya na Basaa

Hikmat Abu Zayd (Arabic; a na-akpọ Hekmat Abu Zeid na Egyptian Arabic; na afọ 1922 ma ọ bụ na afọ 1923 30 Julaị, na afọ 2011) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na agụmakwụkwọ nke Ijipt[N] Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ minista na Egypt n'afọ 1962
Oge ọ nọrọ dị ka minista na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya setịpụrụ ihe nlereanya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ ihe a na-ahụkarị maka ụmụ nwanyị iduzi ozi ahụ
Onye na-akwado Nasserism, Abu Zayd enweela mmetụta dị ukwuu na iwu na iwu Ijipt na mpaghara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mkpuchi
A mụrụ ya n'obodo Shaykh Daud, nke dị nso n'obodo al-Qusiyya na Asyut Governorate, Abu Zayd tolitere n'ezinụlọ na-ahụ mba n'anya
Ọrụ nna ya na Egyptian State Railways pụtara na e kenyere ya ọtụtụ ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ma na-agagharị mgbe niile
Ọ bụ ezie na nne ya amaghị akwụkwọ, a gbara Abu Zayd ume ịgụ akwụkwọ ma nye ya ohere ịbanye n'ọbá akwụkwọ nna ya
Abu Zayd nwetara agụmakwụkwọ dị elu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Helwan Girls School, ọ nwetara nzere na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum Cairo (nke a na-akpọ Fuad I University n'oge ahụ) n'afọ 1940

Ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ agụmakwụkwọ ya site n'inweta asambodo nkuzi na afọ 1941, Master of Arts na agụmakwụkwọ na afọ 1950 site na Mahadum St Andrews, na n'ikpeazụ nzere doctorate na nkà mmụta akparamagwa na Mahadim London na afọ 1957
Ọ kụziri na Women's College nke Mahadum Ain Shams site na afọ 1955 ruo na afọ 1964, tupu e bulie ya n'ọkwa prọfesọ na Mahadum Cairo na afọ 1965
N'afọ 1962, Abu Zayd nọ na kọmitii nkwadebe maka National Congress of Popular Forces
N'oge ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii ahụ, o gosipụtara enweghị nkwenye ya na Onye isi ala Gamal Abdel Nasser n'akụkụ ụfọdụ na Charter of National Action
N'ịbụ onye nwere mmasị, Nasser kpebiri ịhọpụta ya dị ka onye ozi
Na 29 Septemba na afọ 1962, a họpụtara Abu Zayd ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọchịchị mbụ nke Ali Sabri
Ọ nọgidere n'ọrụ ya mgbe a gbanwere kansụl ahụ na Machị , na afọ 1964, ma jee ozi ruo na afọ 1965
Abu Zayd bụ akụkụ nke ndị isi nwanyị ọhụrụ nke nwere otu nzụlite dị ala nke Nasser na ndị ọrụ ibe ya bụ Free Officers
A họpụtara ya site n'aka Nasser n'ihe gbasara mmemme ọhụrụ ya, nke na-ekwusi ike n'ịbawanye ohere agụmakwụkwọ na ọrụ maka ndị mmadụ niile, n'agbanyeghị okike ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ mmadụ
Afọ 1950 na ọkachasị afọ 1960 bụ oge nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị na-abawanye na Egypt
Ịlụ karịa otu nwanyị na-ebelata, ụmụ nwanyị na-enwekwu ọkwa dị mkpa na gọọmentị, ụlọ ọrụ na agụmakwụkwọ
A họpụtara ụmụ nwanyị abụọ mbụ na mba ahụ, Rawya Ateya na Amina Shukri, n'afọ 1957
Karimah al-Sa'id ghọrọ osote minista agụmakwụkwọ n'afọ ndị afọ 1960
Gọọmentị gosipụtara nhọpụta dị elu dị otú ahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole ruru eru, ebe ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Ijipt nọgidere na-arapara n'ọkwá dị ala nke ọha mmadụ
Abu Zayd natara Lenin Peace Prize na Disemba 1970
Hilana Sedarous ( Arabic ) (amụrụ na Tanta, Egypt, 1904) bụ dibịa Coptic nke Ijipt
Ọ bụ nwanyị izizi ghọrọ dọkịta n'Ijipt
Ógè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị yá, Hilana Sedarous debara aha na 'Madraset Al Saneyah' (ụlọ akwụkwọ ịbanye ụmụ nwanyị na Cairo)
O mechara gaa mahadum ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi, ebe mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị (na 1922), ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ ma e zigara ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị Ijipt ise ndị ọzọ na London ịmụ mgbakọ na mwepụ
Ewere ya na Zainab Kamel, dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị Ijipt mbụ e zigara ịmụ akwụkwọ na England
O debara aha na London School of Medicine, ebe ọ ghọrọ dibịa a kwadoro ma gụchaa doctorate ya na 1930
Sedarous laghachiri ná Ijipt wee bụrụ nwanyị dọkịta nke izizi n'Ijipt
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kitchener Hospital (Shoubra General Hospital), Cairo, na-eme usoro ịwa ahụ ya na Coptic Hospital
O meghekwara ụlọ ọgwụ onwe ya
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na obstetrics na gynaecology
Sedarous lara ezumike nká ógè ono n'afọ iri asaa ya
Mgbe ọ larachara ezumike nká, ọ raara onwe ya nye ịsụgharị akụkọ na akwụkwọ maka ụmụaka
A maara Dr
Sedarous nke ọma maka enweghị ọdịmma onwe ya na mmesapụ aka ya, ọ nwekwara mmasị dị nro maka ụmụ mgbei na ụlọ ụmụ mgbei
O nyere ọtụtụ n'ime nnukwu akụ na ụba ya n'oge ndụ ya niile maka ụdị ọrụ ebere niile
Sedarous nwụrụ n'ihi ihe ndị sitere n'okike na 1998
Hilary Denise Arko-Dadzie bụ ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara IT na onye na-ahụ maka azụmaahịa na Ghana
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara dị ka onye isi ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ nke African Regional Intellectual Property Organisation (ARIPO) nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Harare, Zimbabwe
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara n'ọrụ kọmitii onye isi ise nke ARIPO
Arko-Dadzie gara ụlọakwụkwọ Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na Sayensị Kọmputa
O nwetara MBA na General Management na Mahadum East London dị na UK, yana asambodo IT na Project Management site na Cisco nakwa Mahadum George Washington
Arko-Dadzie bụ nwanyị mbụ ghọrọ onye isi ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ nke African Regional Intellectual Property Organisation na nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na kọmitii onye isi ise nke ARIPO
Tupu nhọpụta ya, ya na Airtel rụkọrọ ọrụ, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi TowerCo maka Airtel Ghana nke a na-akpọ Airtel Tigo ugbu a nakwa onye isi na Airtel Sierra Leone
Mgbe ọ sonyeere Airtel Ghana na 2009 dị ka onye njikwa oru ngo, ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ọrụ atụmatụ dị ka iwebata Airtel 375G na Ghana, Portability Mobile Number na imepụta na mmalite nke Airtel Premier
Hilda Adefarasin (1925-2023) bu onye ihe gbasara umunwanyi na anuoku n'obi n'ala Nigerian o buukwara onye isi otu National Council of Women's Societies (NCWS)
Iji lekwado anya na oru NCWS, O hapuru oru nleta ndioria ya na afo 1969
O buru onye nche ego ha na afo 1971 tupu emee ya onye isi na afo 1987
Amuru Adefarasin na Lagos, n'ime ezinulo Wilfred na Ethel Petgrave na afo 1925 Papa ya ruru oru na Nigerian Railway di na Lagos; nna ya na nne ya bu ndi akuru mba Caribbean
Adefarasin guru akwukwo na CMS Girls Secondary, School and Achimota Ghana
Na afo 1945, oghonwa umuaka na ulogwu Massey Street tupu o gawa obodo England na 1948 maka ozuzu nke ejiri deba aha ya na otu ndi Noosu na afo 1951l

Hilda Adefarasin so na ndi malitere otu ndi Noosu na Naijiria burukwa odeakwukwo ha na afo 1960, ma wurukwa onye nnochianya ndi Noosu na otu umunwanyi nke ana akpo National Council of Women's Societies
na afo 1971 emere ya onye nchego ha ruo na afo 1980
Na afo 1984, Adefarasin nochiri okwa Justice Nzeako dika onyeisi nde NCWS
Nhoputa ya kpadoro ukwu na ime umunwanyi guru akwukwo ndi isi NCWS
Adefarasin huru otua dika ogbako umunwanyi nwere aka oru di iche iche na ahu maka ikwanyere umunwanyi ugwu ruru ha na ala Naijria na ibulite obodo elu
Na oge ya na NCWS O kwalitere mmuta igba ogwu mgbochi na kwa operational theatres ndi umuagbogho nwere oria vestino vaginal fistula
O bu otuonye n'ime umunwanyi abuo ndi onye isiala Babangida hoputara ka ha nonye otu Political Bureau na afo 1986
Di ya bu Justice Tunji Adefarasin
Umu ya bu pastors Paul and Wale Adefarasin
Hilda Effiong Bassey nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Hilda Baci (amụrụ na 20 Septemba, 1996) bụ osinri onye Naijiria, onye na-ejikwa ụlọ nri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, ọ turu ugo na asọmpi 'Jollof Faceoff'
Hilda sitere na mpaghara Nsit Ubium, steeti Akwa Ibom, Nigeria
A mụrụ ya na 20 Septemba, 1996
O ritere nzere na sociology site na Mahadum Madonna, Okija Ọ bụ onye njikwa nke 'Dine on A Budget' na Pop Central TV, Dstv Channel 189
Na Machị 2023, Hilda kwupụtara na ọ ga-anwa asọmpi maka oge isi nri kachasị ogologo
Ọ bụ Lata Tondon ji ọkwa ahụ n'oge gara aga, onye siri nri were awa 87, nkeji 45 na 2019
N'abalị 11 n'ọnwa Mee, afọ 2023, ọ malitere asọmpi ya akpọrọ 'Cook-a-thon'
O rutere ma gafere onye ji ọkwa ahụ n'oge gara aga n'abalị 15 nke ọnwa Mee, afọ 2023

Na Mọnde Mee 15, 2023, ka ọ kụrụ elekere 7 45 kpọmkwem nke ụtụtụ, Hilda weghara ọkwa ahụ dịka onye siri nri ogologo oge kachasị, dịka o sielarị nri awa 87 na nkeji 50 - nkeji 5 karịa onye ji ọkwa ahụ n'oge gara aga na 2019
Iji setịpụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke oge isi nri kachasị ogologo, Hilda setịpụrụ na mbụ isi nri maka awa 96, mana o mechara gbatịa ya ruo awa 100
nri kachasị ogologo, Hna mbụ ilda setịpụrụ isi nri maka awa 96, manamhe mgbaru ọsọ ya ruo 100 awa
Ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria ama ama nke ukwuu gara leta Hilda gụnyere, Gọvanọ nke Lagos State, Babajide Sanwo-Olu; Onye isi ụkọchukwu nke Harvester International, Bolaji Idowu; Onye na-agụ egwu, Tiwa Savage
Onye osote onye isi ala nke Naịjirịa, Prọfesọ Yemi Osinbajo kpọkwara Hilda n'ekwentị ma gbakwaa ya ume
Hilda nwetara nnukwu nkwado site n'aka ndị Naijiria bụ ndị gbakọtara ma nọnyere ya n'ebe ọ nọ na-esi nri ahụ
Ebe ndị ọzọ na-agbasa aha ya na Social Media

Hilda Dokubo (onye a makwaara dika Hilda Dokubo Mrakpor ) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa na onye ntorobịa na-akwado, ya bụbu onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche n'okwu ndị ntorobịa nye Peter Odili, onye bụbu gọvanọ nke Rivers steeti

A mụrụ Hilda Dokubo dị ka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ isii na Buguma, bụ obodo dị na Asari-Toru, Riva Steeti ebe ọ gara n’ihu gụchaa akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke abụọ na St Mary Steeti Skuulu nke dịnna okporo ụzọ Aggrey ma gụọ akwụkwọssekọndrị ya na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Gọọmentị Akwụkwọ Sekọndrị
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Port Harcourt ebe ọ jiri nzere degre Bachelo pụta

A mụrụ Hilda Dokubo dị ka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ isii na Buguma, bụ obodo dị na Asari-Toru, Riva Steeti ebe ọ gara n’ihu gụchaa akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke abụọ na St Mary Steeti Skuulu nke dịnna okporo ụzọ Aggrey ma gụọ akwụkwọssekọndrị ya na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Gọọmentị Akwụkwọ Sekọndrị
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Port Harcourt ebe ọ jiri nzere degre Bachelo pụta na Ụlọ ihe nkiri Arts
Dokubo mere nyocha mbụ ya n'oge ntorobịa ya na fim nke afọ otu pukunna narị itenanị na ịrị na itenanị nke akpọrọ Ajọ Passion
Ọ bụ onye e gosipụtara kemgbe ma mepụta ọtụtụ fim ndị Naịjirịa
Ọ tinyere aka na nkwado na n'ime ihe nkiri na afọ puku abụọ na iri na ịse nke akpọrọ Stigma, Dokubo meriri dịka onye omeebe kachasị mma na ntinye aka nke ịrị na otuna Africa Movie Academy Awards
Àtụ Inc-film
Hilda Kibet (amụrụ na 27 na ọnwa Machị na afọ 1981 na Keiyo District) bụ onye Dutch na-agba ọsọ nke a mụrụ na Kenya
Ọ bụ nwanne Sylvia Kibet na nwa nwanne Lornah Kiplagat
O nwetara nwa amaala Dutch n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2007
Onye mmekọ Kibet ogologo oge bụ onye na-agba ọsọ marathon Dutch Hugo van den Broek
Ha kewara oge ha n'etiti Iten, Kenya na Castricum, na Netherlands
Nwanne nne ya, onye ji naanị afọ isii karịa ya, bụ onye na-agba ọsọ Lornah Kiplagat
O meriri ọtụtụ asọmpi ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ na 2007, gụnyere Egmond Half Marathon, New York City Half Marathon
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ meriri New York Mini 10K, na-anọchi nwanne nne ya Lornah Kiplagat, wee mee egwuregwu Olympic mbụ ya na 2008 Beijing Olympics, ebe ọ bụ nke iri na ise na mita 10,000
O meriri n'asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 2008 European Cross Country Championships na ngwụcha afọ ahụ
Ọ gbara ọsọ na World 10K Bangalore na onwa Mee na afọ 2009 ma ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkacha mmasị tupu agbụrụ, ọ mechara nke anọ n'ozuzu
Ọ laghachiri n'afọ sochirinụ, mana ọ bụ naanị nke isii
Ọ meghere na afọ 2010 site na ọsọ kachasị mma nke 1 08 39 na RAK Half Marathon
Kibet bụ naanị onye na-agba ọsọ ahọpụtara ịnọchite anya Netherlands na afo 2010 IAAF World Cross Country Championships ma ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke iri na asọmpi ndị okenye
Ka oge na-aga, ọ gbara ọsọ na 10,000m na afọ 2010 European Athletics Championships, mana ọ tụfuru ihe nrite site na ịmecha nke anọ n'azụ Jéssica Augusto
Ọ meriri Dam tot Damloop na onwa Septemba na afọ 2010, na-agba ọsọ ọsọ 10 kilomita nke oge ahụ (51 30), ma na-eti nwanne nne ya Lornah Kiplagat
Na Frankfurt Marathon n'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ gbara oge kachasị mma nke 2 26 23, nke zuru ezu maka nke isii na ọsọ ọsọ
Ọsọ mbụ ya nke afọ 2011 bụ RAK Half Marathon ọzọ, mana ọ dị nkeji nwayọ karịa afọ gara aga wee bịa nke isii
O nwere arụmọrụ ka mma na Rotterdam Marathon n'ọnwa Eprel, ebe ọ bịara nke abụọ na ọsọ kachasị mma nke 2 24 27 awa n'azụ Philes Ongori
Ọ bụ onye Dutch mbụ na-agba ọsọ na Montferland Run na Disemba, na-etinye nke atọ n'ozuzu
Kibet nwara mmeri nke atọ na Egmond Half Marathon, mana ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke atọ
O kwuru na o meriri na Göteborgsvarvet na Mee site na 1 09 27 awa, wee bịa nke atọ na New York Mini 10K otu ọnwa ka e mesịrị
A họpụtara ya ka ọ gbaa ọsọ marathon na 2012 London Olympics ma o jisiri ọnọdụ nke 24 na oge ya nke 2 28 52 awa
Oge kachasị mma ya bịara na Turin Marathon, ebe ọ gbara ọsọ 2 25 46 dị ka onye nke abụọ n'azụ Sharon Cherop, onye mebiri ihe ndekọ ahụ
O setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma maka ọkara marathon na ọsọ nke 67 59 nkeji maka nke anọ na Roma-Ostia Half Marathon na Febụwarị 2013
Ọ bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu kachasị ọsọ na Rotterdam Marathon na njedebe nke atọ ya na 2 26 42 awa
'Mkpúrù èdè íke'Hilda Semola Tloubatla (amụrụ n'afọ 1942) bụ onye na-agụ mbaqanga na South Africa, na onye na-abụ abụ nke otu a ma ama Mahotella Queens
A mụrụ Tloubatla na Payneville, Springs na South Africa tupu ọ kwaga kwaThema township n'afọ̀ 1951 n'ihi (ihe bụ) 'Group Areas Act' nke gọọmentị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na mba ahụ
Tloubatla malitere ọrụ egwu ya site na idekọ na South African Broadcasting Corporation na ngwụcha afọ 1950 na mmalite afọ 1960
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ ruo mgbe ọ sonyeere ndị otu egwu Gallo Record Company n'afọ 1964 ka Tloubatla nwetara aha mba mbụ
A nabatara ya ozugbo n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị ọhụrụ, bu Mahotella Queens, dị ka onye na-agụ egwú, ya na ndị otu ibe ya Nobesuthu Mbadu, Mildred Mangxola, Juliet Mazamisa na Ethel Mngomezulu

E jikọtara ndị ụmụ nwanyị ise ahụ tinyere ndị otu mbaqanga, Makgona Tsohle n'akụ egwu na o olu siri ike, 'na-eru uju' nke Simon Mahlathini Nkabinde, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ndị otu a na-akpọ Mahlathine na Mahotella Queens nwetere ọ̀mụma
N'afọ 1971, ọtụtụ Mahotella Queens mbụ (gụnyere Tloubatla) hapụrụ iji chụsoo ụzọ ọzọ na azụmaahịa egwu, dị ka isonyere otu ndị ọzọ, ya mere e guzobere usoro ọhụrụ nke Queens
Tloubatla ghọrọ onye otu Izintombi Zesi Manje Manje, mana ọ na-alaghachi n'òtù ọhụrụ nke Mahotella Queens na ọkara oge niile

N'afọ 1983, ndị Queens ise mbụ (Tloubatla, Mbadu, Mangxola, Mazamisa na Mngomezulu) sonyeere Mahlathini na ndị n'agụ egwu Makgona Tsohle site na onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara Makgonatsohle na onye mmepụta Queens bụ Marks Mankwane
Egwu Nlaghachi ha,bu Amaqhawe Omgqashiyo, bụ egwu dara ụda a ma ama na South Africa
N'ihi ihe ịga nke ọma nke albọm na njem Paul Simon's Graceland nke afọ 1986 (nke ya na Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Stimela na ndị ọzọ rụkọtara ọrụ), a chọrọ egwu South Africa
Ụmụ nwanyị atọ mbụ, Tloubatla, Mbadu na Mangxola, sonyeere ndị otu ha ọzọ
Ha na-ewu ewu n'ụwa niile
Ọbụna mgbe ọnwụ nke Mahlathini na ọtụtụ ndị otu Makgona Tsohle Band gasịrị, ndị ụmụ nwanyị atọ (ndị niile bụ nne nne ma bụrụ ndị karịrị afọ iri asaa) nọgidere na-eduzi ruo mgbe Mbadu nwụrụ na 2021
Ụnụ
Hilde Holger bụ onye na-agba egwú na Austria
Ọ kwagara Britain iji gbanahụ ndị Nazi

Hildegard Breiner si Vorarlberg, Austria, ebe ya na di ya nwụrụ anwụ duziri mkpọsa mgbochi nuklia megide Zwentendorf Nuclear Power Plant na 1970sN'afọ 1978, pasent 85 nke ndị ntuli aka na Vorarlberg tụbara votu ha megide Zwentendorf, na-atụnye ọnụ ọgụgụ nke referendum mba
N'ọkara nke abụọ nke 1980, Hildegard Breiner rụrụ nnukwu ọrụ na mmegide ụlọ ọrụ nrụpụta nuklia Wackersdorf nke a ga-ewu na Wackersdorf na agbataobi Bavaria, Germany
N'afọ 2004, Hildegard Breiner nwetara ihe nrite mmeri nke ndụ n'ọdịnihu n'efu
Hildegard Goss-Mayr (Amụrụ na 22 Jenụwarị 1930, Vienna) bụ onye Austria na-eme ihe ike na-enweghị ihe ike na onye ọkà mmụta okpukpe Ndị Kraịst
Nwa nwanyị nke Kaspar Mayr, onye guzobere alaka Austria nke International Fellowship of Reconciliation, ọ gụrụ nkà ihe ọmụma na Vienna na New Haven
N'afọ 1958, ọ lụrụ Jean Goss (1912X1991), onye France na-ahụ maka udo; di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ abụọ, Myriam na Etienne
Ya na di ya nọ na Rom n'oge Council Vatican nke Abụọ na-agba mbọ ka Chọọchị Roman Katọlik mara nkwenye nke akọ na uche
N'afọ 1960s/70s, ha biri ma rụọ ọrụ ruo oge ụfọdụ na South America, na-azụ ndị otu na-eme ihe ike na-adịghị arụ ọrụ ma na-enyere aka n'ịmepụta SERPAJ, onye nhazi mbụ ya bụ Adolfo Pérez Esquivel
Ha zụrụ ìgwè ndị ọzọ na-adịghị eme ihe ike n'ọtụtụ mba, na Europe, Eshia, Middle East na Africa
Ha sonyere na nkwadebe nke People Power Revolution na Philippines n'afọ 1986

Jean Goss na Hildegard Goss-Mayr kerịtara ọtụtụ Peace Prizes, gụnyere Bruno Kreisky Award na Austria n'afọ 1979, Pax Christi USA Pope Paul VI Teacher of Peace Award n'afọ 1986, na Pfeffer Peace Prize n'afọ 1990
N'afọ 1991, Goss-Mayr enwetakwala ihe nrite Niwano Peace Prize, na Japan, na, n'afọ 2009, Pacem in Terris Peace and Freedom Award, site na Diocese nke Davenport, Iowa
Ọ bụ ugbu a onye isi oche nsọpụrụ nke International Fellowship of Reconciliation
A họpụtara ya maka Nobel Peace Prize n'afọ 1979, na 1987 ruo afọ 2005 n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị 1000 maka Nobel Peace Prix 2005 site na PeaceWomen Across the Globe
Hillia Kobblah (amụrụ na 7 na onwa asaa, na afọ 1991) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba n'etiti maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2014 African Women's Championship na 2015 African Games ebe ọ gbara Cameroon
Na klọb, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Faith Ladies na Ghana
Hillsong Church, commonly known as Hillsong, is a global charismatic Christian megachurch based in Australia
Hillsong Music is Christian music produced by Hillsong Church in Sydney, Australia as well as offshoot churches, Hillsong London, and Hillsong Kiev
Hillsong albums are released and distributed by Hillsong Music
The main groups are Hillsong Worship, Hillsong United, Hillsong Young & Free, and Hillsong Kids
Hillsong United (stylized as Hillsong UNITED or UNITED) is a worship collective that originated as a part of Hillsong Church

Formed in 1998 as part of Hillsong's youth ministry, the band consists of several rotating worship leaders from the church, including Joel Houston, Taya Smith-Gaukrodger, Matt Crocker, Jonathon Douglass, Brooke Fraser, Jad Gillies and Benjamin Hastings

Due to several songs written by the youth ministry, Hillsong Worship leader Darlene Zschech recommended that they record an album, which resulted in their debut extended play, One, which was released alongside the Hillsong Worship album Touching Heaven Changing Earth
Since then, the group has released fourteen live albums, as well as five studio albums (Sixteen albums in total)
The band composes songs and performs in church services as well as concerts in worldwide tours
Hillsong Worship (formerly Hillsong Live) is a praise and worship collective from Sydney, Australia and Orange County, California
They started making music in 1983 at Hillsong Church
Fifteen of their songs have appeared on the Billboard magazine charts in the US, with 'What a Beautiful Name' (2016) representing their greatest success, reaching platinum in the US
The band has some notable members, including Darlene Zschech, Marty Sampson, Brooke Fraser, Reuben Morgan, and Joel Houston

Hilongos (IPA [hɪ'lɔŋos]), officially the Municipality of Hilongos (Cebuano Lungsod sa Hilongos; Waray Bungto han Hilongos; Tagalog Bayan ng Hilongos), is a 2nd class municipality in the province of Leyte, Philippines
According to the 2020 census, it has a population of 64,514 people
Hilyard Robinson (1899 Julaị 2, 1986) bụ onye ama ama n'Afrịka na Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na injinia
A mụrụ Hilyard Robinson na Washington, DC, ebe nne ya bụ onye na-akwa akwa na nna nna ya nwere azụmahịa na-egbuke akpụkpọ ụkwụ
Robins gụsịrị akwụkwọ na M Street High School wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Pennsylvania Museum na School of Industrial Arts
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, Robinson jere ozi dị ka onye ọrụ artillery nke US Army ebe ọ nọrọ oge na Paris na Armistice ma hụ ụdị ụlọ ndị dị n'ebe ahụ

Mgbe ọ laghachiri na United States, Robinson gafere na Mahadum Pennsylvania tupu ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadume Columbia na 1924 na nzere na ihe owuwu ma na-arụ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na nkuzi na Mahadụ Howard
N'afọ 1931 mgbe ọ lụsịrị Helena Rooks ma mechaa nzere masta na Columbia, Robinsons gara Europe ịmụ ihe na Germany, ebe ụdị Bauhaus metụtara Robinson, yana Scandinavia, France na ebe ndị ọzọ
Robinson kụziri ihe owuwu na Mahadum Howard site na 1920s ruo 1960s, ọ rụkwara ọtụtụ ụlọ ụlọ akwụkwọ

Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Dị n'Ime Obodo nke United States nyere Robinson iwu ka o wuo Langston Terrace Dwellings nke ọ nwetara ihe a ma ama, Robinson rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ụlọ na gọọmentị Liberia
Robinson nwụrụ na 1986 na Howard University Medical Center
Robinson na ndị Amerịka ndị ọzọ na-ewu ụlọ dịka Ralph A
Vaughn na Paul Williams rụkọrọ ọrụ
The Himalayan Alpine Dynamics Research Initiative (HIMADRI) na-agụnye usoro ébé ndị a na-etinye n'ọrụ ma na-enyocha iji hụ ngafe nkè ụdị osisi n'ihi mgbanwe ihu igwe
'E guzobere n'afọ 2013, mmemme ahụ elekọtawo oghere na nlekota Himalaya India
E bu ụzọ kwurịta échichè nkè nyochaa obodo osisi alpine n'afọ 1996 n'ogè ọmụmụ ihe na Kathmandu
Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị malitere ịme nnwale na ébé obibi alpine iji chọpụta ihe ezigbo usoro nnwale nwèrè ike ịbụ
N'afọ 2001, a malitere GLORIA-Europe
Ọrụ mbụ a, nke nwéré saịtị iri na asatọ na mba iri na atọ dị íchè íchè na Europe, bụ ụzọ iji nwalee echiche ahụ tupu ọ gaa ụwa niile
Kemgbe ógè opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2004, GLORIA anọwo na-agbasawanye na mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke ụwa
Otú ọ dị, Indian Himalaya nọgidere na-abụ oghere nkè a na-ejupụta site na netwọk HIMADRI

Himarsha Venkatsamy (a mụrụ na 15 Febụwarị 1984, na Durban) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme egwuregwu, nkea maara maka mmeri nke Kingfisher Calendar Hunt n'afọ 2010, na-emeri Anjali Lavania na Nidhi Sunil na agba ikpeazụ
Ọ pụtara n'ụzọ pụrụ iche na 2010 Bollywood romantic comedy I Hate Luv Storys, mana ọganihu mbụ ya bịara mgbe a kpọgara ya ka ọ rụọ Jhumpa na ihe nkiri egwu Roar Tigers of the Sundarbans
A mụrụ Himarsha n'aka nne na nna South Africa sitere na South India na Durban, South Africa
Ọ bụ onye nlereanya kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, mgbe ọ malitere ịgba egwú na ụlọ akwụkwọ nka na egwu ya na Durban
Ọ lụrụ enyi ya nwoke Kenya ogologo oge, Abdulkadir Arsenalist
Himarsha sonyere na Kingfisher Calendar Girl Hunt nke afọ 2009 ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Terushka
Ọ meriri asọmpi a na-egosi na telivishọn na NDTV Good Times
Ọ gụrụ maka physiotherapist na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, tupu ọ gaa India ka ọ bụrụ ihe nlereanya oge niile
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke Lakme Fashion Week afọ 2009
Ambasha (Amharic); ma ọ bụ Himbasha (Tigrinya ሕምባሻ) bụ achịcha ememe Eritrea nke na-atọtụ ụtọ
Ọ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na nri ndị Etiopia ma na-ejikarị ya eme ihe n'oge pụrụ iche
A na-akwado ya n'ọtụtụ ụdị dabere na mpaghara na mba ebe isi abụọ bụ ụdị dị iche iche nke ndị Etiopia, na ihe dị iche iche Eritrea na-atọ ụtọ na mkpụrụ vaịn
A na-enye ntụ ọka ahụ ihe ịchọ mma tupu a na-eme ya
Nhazi ahụ dịgasị iche iche na nkọwa, mana n'ozuzu, a na-enye ya ọdịdị nke gbárá gburugburu were ntukpo iji mepụta ọtụtụ spokes (lee foto)
Ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị na ntụziaka ahụ gụnyere oroma, ginger, ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ cardamom, ọ bụ ezie na ụdị dị iche iche bụkwa ihe a na-ejikarị eme ihe
Asụsụ Mina, nke a makwaara site na aha Hina na Besleri, bụ asụsụ Chadic nke mmadụ puku iri na-asụ na mgbago ugwu Cameroon
Ndị na-asụ Mina na-asụgharịkarị asụsụ abụọ, ya na Fulfulde (Fula) bụ asụsụ nke abụọ
French na-esokarị Fulfulde dị ka asụsụ nke atọ n'ime ndị ọka okwu
A na-asụ Besleri n'ọtụtụ obodo Hina (Mayo-Tsanaga ngalaba, ogbe mgbago ugwu dị anya), na Gamdugun na Jinjin na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mpaghara ahụ, n'otu n'otu
Hind Meddeb bụ onye France-Tunisia n'aru ọrụ nta akụkọ na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
N'ịbụ onye bi na Paris, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Europe, North Africa na Middle East
N'ime ihe nkiri ya na edemede ya, o gosipụtara ngagharị iwe ọha na eze nke ndị na-eto eto na ọdịbendị ha na Morocco, Tunisia na Egypt
N'ịdepụta ọnọdụ mmekọrịta ha na ngosipụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ha n'ihe gbasara mgbanwe ndị Arab, ọ lekwasịrị anya na egwu rap ma ọ bụ ụdị ndị ọzọ na-emegide omenala na ngagharị iwe na mba ndị a
A mụrụ Meddeb na Châtenay-Malabry, Paris, France
Nna ya bụ onye Tunisia na-ede uri na odee Abdelwahab Meddeb, nne ya bụ onye ọkà mmụta asụsụ Amina Maya Khelladi nke Moroccan-Algeria

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Paris Institute of Political Studies (Sciences Po) ma nwee nzere Master of Philosophy na Paris West University Nanterre La Défense Ọzọkwa, ọ gụrụ asụsụ German na akwụkwọ na Mahadum Sorbonne Nouvelle ma mee nnyocha na Mahadume Free nke Berlin
Meddeb rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ maka France 24 TV network site na 2006 ruo 2008 tupu ọ banye France Info
Site na 2010 ruo 2011 ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ maka ihe ngosi Ça balance à Paris na Paris Première ma jee ozi dị ka onye nta akụkọ ọdịbendị maka magazin Tracks
Na 13 June 2013, e jidere ya na Tunis, mana a tọhapụrụ ya n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
E boro ya ebubo na ọ na-enye nsogbu na ndị uwe ojii mkparị mgbe ọ gbachitere onye na-eti egwu Tunisian Weld El 15, onye dekọrọ abụ na-eji ndị uwe ojii Tunisian tụnyere nkịta

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Meddeb esorola duzie De Casa au Paradis, ihe nkiri banyere otu ndị Morocco na-eyi ogbunigwe bọmbụ, ma duzie Electro Chaabi, nke na-ekpuchi mpụta nke ụdị egwu eletrọniki ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Mahraganat na Cairo
Ọ duziri Tunisia Clash, ihe nkiri banyere ndị na-eto eto na-eti egwu ndi na-alụ ọgụ maka nnwere onwe ikwu okwu na Tunisia, na Paris Stalingrad, ihe ngosi banyere ndị na'achọ ebe mgbaba na France
N'afọ 2005, o ritere ihe nrite Daniel Pearl maka ọdịbendị dị iche iche maka akụkọ gbasara ndị Alakụba na-eto eto na France
N'ọnwa Mee na June 2019, ọ hụrụ mgbanwe Sudan na Khartoum, nke ga-abụ ihe nkiri ya ọzọ ga-elekwasị anya
Na ahụmịhe a, o nyere aka na akwụkwọ French nke 2021 Soudan 2019, année zéro nke na-enye nkọwa, nkọwa na foto banyere izu ndị dugara na ogbugbu Khartoum
Hinde Boujemaa bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ bu ọkara Tunisia, ọkara Belgium
Boujemaa nwetara akara ugo mmụta na ahịa, rụọ ọrụ na ihe ntecha na mmetụta pụrụ iche, ma zụlite ụmụaka tupu ọ malite ọrụ ya nke ime ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2006, ọ gụrụ edemede n'ụlọ akwụkwọ French, na 2009 o dere ihe nkiri, Under Paradise, nke meriri onyinye Sud Ecriture na Carthage Film Festival
O kwuru na ihe kpatara 'mgbanwe nke onwe ya' bụ Tunisian Revolution, na-enye ya mkpali ịchụso ime ihe nkiri maka onwe ya
Ihe ngosi ndekọ Boujemaa bụ 'It Was Better Tomorrow' na-agbaso ndụ nke otu nwa agbọghọ nọ na Tunis na-anwa ilekọta ụmụ ya mgbe mgbanwe Tunisian gasịrị

Hindia Haji Mohamed, (ihe dị ka 1988 wee ruo na Disemba 3, 2015), onye nta akụkọ redio na TV nke Somalia na onye na-emepụta Radio Mogadishu na Somali National Television na Mogadishu, Somalia, bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị nta akụkọ nwụrụ n'oge Agha Obodo Somalia
Ya na di ya Liban Ali Nur so n'ime ndị nta akụkọ e gburu egbu mere ka ha bụrụ otu n'ime di na nwunye ole na ole e gburu n'ụwa niile
Mohamed bụ nne nwere ụmụ ise
Ọ lụrụ Liban Ali Nur, onye bụkwa onye nta akụkọ na Somalia
N'afọ 2012, e gburu di Mohamed site na bọmbụ n'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị na Mogadishu tinyere mmadu iri na ano ọzọ ma merụọ ihe dị ka mmadụ iri abuo ọzọ ahụ
Mohamed na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Mba Nile nke Somalia ma na-agu international Relations na Diplomacy
Ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asaa n'oge e gburu ya ma lie ya na Mogadishu
Hindia bụ nwaanyị na-ede akụkọ mgbasa ozi maka Redio Mogadishu na onye na-mmepụta ihe n'onyonyo ndi Somali National Television
Mohamed nwụrụ na bọmbụ ụgbọ ala na ubochi nke ato n'afo 2015
Mohamed nọ n'ụzọ na- alaghachi azu ka o so Somali International University (SIU)
A kụrụ bọmbụ ahụ n'okpuru oche ya ma mee ka njikwa dịpụrụ adịpụ rụọ ọrụ mgbe ọ gbawara
A kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ mana ọ nwụrụ obere oge ka e butere ya
A gbagburu bọmbụ ahụ n'èzí ụlọ ọrụ nnọchi anya Turkey na Mogadishu
Otu ahụ kwuru na ọ bụ ya kpatara mwakpo ahụ bụ Al-Shabaab
A mara mmadụ abụọ n'ime otu a ikpe maka igbu Mohamed
Abdirisack Mohamed Barrow na Hassan Nur Ali Farah bụ ndị e gburu site na mgbagbu
A mara umu nwoke anọ ndị ọzọ ikpe
Moalim Mohamed Abukar na Mohamed Sheikh Yussuf natara ntaramahụhụ ibi ndu ha na mkporo Maka mwakpo ahụ ma ndị ọzọ abụọ natara ntarhụ mkpọrọ afọ iri ruo iri na ise
Umu nwoke a so n'òtù Al-Shabaab
Somalia bụ mba ji njo maka ndị nta akụkọ
Mohamed bụ onye nta akụkọ nke iri atọ na asatọ e gburu n'ebe ahụ kemgbe afọ 2010
Ndị nta akụkọ na Somalia na-enweta mwakpo ugboro ugboro, ntọrọ na igosi nkari
Somalia nwekwara mgbochi mgbasa ozi siri ike, yana nnukwu ụgwọ maka mmebi iwu
A manyere ụfọdụ ndị nta akụkọ na Somalia ịgbapụ na mba ahụ
E nwere obere ihe onwunwe e wepụtara iji hụ na nchekwa nke ndị nta akụkọ dị nchebe, nke na-eme ka ha bụrụ ndị a na-elekwasị anya n'oge agha obodo
Irina Bokova, onye isi nchịkwa nke United Nations Educational, Scientific, and Cultural Organization, kwuru, sị, 'Ana m akatọ ogbugbu Hindiya Haji Mohamed
Mgbasa ozi dị iche iche na nke onwe ha dị mkpa maka nnwere onwe ikwu okwu ma ghara ịrụ ọrụ na-enweghị ọrụ nke ndị nta akụkọ
Ọ dị mkpa maka ndị Somalia n'ozuzu ha na a na-ekpe ndị na-eme mpụ a ikpe

Omar Frank Osman, odeakwụkwọ nke NUSOJ, kwuru, sị, 'Anyị niile na-eri uju ogbugbu e gburu Hindiyo Haji Mohamed nke bụ ihe ncheta ọzọ nke ihe ize ndụ ndị nta akụkọ Somalia na-aga n'ihu na-eche ihu mgbe niile
Nke a bụ igbu ọchụ, nke a kpachapụrụ anya mee iji kpochapụ Hindiyo
Ndị kpachapụrụ anya na-achọ imerụ ndị ọha na eze na-amaghị ihe ha, gụnyere ndị nta akụkọ, kwesịrị ka a katọọ ha ma jide ha iji zaa maka omume ha
Ibrahim bụ onye na-akwado gburugburu ebe obibi na-arụ ọrụ n'aha ndị ya, Mbororo na Chad
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'isi obodo Chad bụ N'Djamena wee soro ndị Mbororo nọ n'afọ ndụ ya, ndị bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na-akwagharị, na-azụ anụ na ịzụ ehi
N’oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, ọ matara maka ụzọ e si akpaso ya ike dị ka nwa amaala nakwa otu esi ewepụ ndị ogbo ya Mbororo na ohere mmụta ọ nwetara

Ya mere na 1999, o hiwere Association of Indigenous Peul Women and Peoples of Chad (AFPAT), otu nke obodo na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite ikike ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị na obodo Mbororo na-akpali akpali na nduzi na ịkwado gburugburu ebe obibi
Nzukọ a nwetara akwụkwọ ikike ọrụ ya na 2005 wee soro na mkparịta ụka mba ụwa gbasara ihu igwe, mmepe na-adigide, ụdị ndụ dị iche iche, na nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi
HipTV bụ ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn cable nke Naijiria nke Ayo Animashaun nwere
Ọwa ahụ bụ naanị naanị ụlọọrụ televishọn nwere ikike mgbasa ozi nke The Headies
N'ịbụ nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Ikeja, Lagos State, atụmatụ HipTV na-elekwasị anya na ntụrụndụ sitere na vidiyo egwu ọhụrụ, akụkọ ntụrụndụ na ụdị ndụ
A malitere HipTV na July 2007 site n'aka Ayo Animashaun dị ka ikpo okwu mgbasa ozi maka Hip Hop World Magazine mana kemgbe ahụ, ọ bilitere ịghọ ọwa egwu na ntụrụndụ
Na Nọvemba 5, 2013, a malitere HipTV na DSTV nke Multichoice dị ka ụlọọrụ na-egosi awa ịrị abụọ na anọ nke nwere ndị na-ege ntị sitere na mba ịrị anọ n'Africa
Egwú hip hop ma ọ bụ egwu hip-hop, nke a makwaara dị ka egwu rap, bụ ụdị egwu a ma ama nke malitere na New York City na 1970s
Ọ na-agụnye egwu rhythmic (nke a na-ewukarị gburugburu ụda drum) nke na-esokarị rapping, okwu rhythmic na rhythmic nke a na-abụ abụ
Ọ mepụtara dị ka akụkụ nke ọdịbendị hip hop, ọdịbendị dị iche iche akọwapụtara site na isi ihe anọ MCing / raping, DJing / scratching na turntables, break dance, na ederede ederede
Ihe ndị ọzọ na-agụnye sampling beats ma ọ bụ bass lines site na ndekọ (ma ọ bụ synthesized beats na ụda), na rhythmic beatboxing
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe na-ezo aka naanị na rap, 'hip hop' na-egosi omume nke ọdịbendị niile

A na-eji okwu hip hop music eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ n'otu ihe na okwu rap music, ọ bụ ezie na rapping abụghị akụkụ achọrọ nke egwu hip hop; ụdị ahụ nwekwara ike itinye ihe ndị ọzọ nke omenala hip hop, gụnyere DJing, turntablism, scratching, beatboxing, na egwu egwu

Hip hop dị ka ma ụdị egwu na omenala e hiwere n'ime 1970s mgbe nnọkọ mgbochi bịara na-ewu ewu na New York City, karịsịa n'etiti ndị ntorobịa America America bi na Bronx N'ebe a na-eme ememme mgbochi, ndị DJ na-eji mgbanwogharị abụọ na igwekota DJ na-egwu nkwụsi ike nke egwu ndị a ma ama iji nwee ike ịkpọ oge ezumike site na mbipụta abụọ nke otu ndekọ ahụ, na-atụgharị site n'otu gaa na nke ọzọ na ịgbatị 'nkwụsị' ahụ Hip hop n'oge mmalite evolushọn mere dị ka teknụzụ nlele na igwe drum ghọrọ ebe niile yana ọnụ ala Usoro ntụgharị ntụgharị dị ka ncha na ịkụ ọkpọ emepụtara yana oge nkwụsịtụ Rapping tolitere dị ka ụdị ụda olu nke onye na-ese ihe na-ekwu okwu ma ọ bụ na-abụ abụ n'ụzọ na-ada ụda na-eji ngwa egwu ma ọ bụ iti aka arụkọ ọrụ
Edeghị egwu hip hop maka igwu egwu na redio ma ọ bụ telivishọn ruo 1979, n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi ịda ogbenye n'oge ọmụmụ ụdị ahụ na enweghị nnabata n'èzí mpaghara ghetto
Old school hip hop bụ nke mbụ na-ewu ewu nke ụdị ahụ, nke a na-ahụ site na mmetụta disko ya na okwu ndị na-elekwasị anya na nnọkọ
Afọ 1980 gosipụtara ụdị dị iche iche nke hip hop ka ụdị ahụ mepụtara ụdị dị mgbagwoju anya ma gbasaa gburugburu ụwa
New school hip hop bụ ụdị nke abụọ, nke ụda electro ya mara, ma duga n'oge hip hop ọlaedo, oge ọhụrụ n'etiti etiti afọ 1980 na etiti afọ 1990 nke mepụtara oge album nke hip hop
Ụdị rap nke gangsta, nke lekwasịrị anya n'ụdị ndụ ime ihe ike na ọnọdụ dara ogbenye nke ndị ntorobịa Africa America nọ n'ime obodo, nwetara ewu ewu n'oge a
G-funk na-achịkwa hip hop West Coast na mbido-etiti afọ 1990, ebe hip hop East Coast na-achịkwu jazz rap, hip hop ọzọ, na rap siri ike
Hip hop gara n'ihu na-agbasa n'oge a na ụdị mpaghara ndị ọzọ na-apụta, dị ka Southern rap na Atlanta hip hop
Hip hop ghọrọ ụdị kachasị ere n'etiti afọ 1990 na ụdị egwu kachasị ere site na 1999

Hiratsuka Raichō (平塚__hau____hau____hau__ , transliterated__hau____wol____hau____wol__ , translittated__ , translitarazed__ , trans literated; a mụrụ Hiratsuka Haru, 平塚 明; February 10, 1886 - May 24, 1971) bụ onye edemede, onye nta akụkọ, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye anarchist na onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ụmụnwanyị Japan

A mụrụ ya na Tokyo n'afọ 1886, nwa nwanyị nke abụọ nke onye ọrụ gọọmentị dị elu, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum ụmụ nwanyị nke Japan (日本女子大學) n'afọ 1903, Hiratsuka bịara nwee mmetụta nke nkà ihe ọmụma Europe nke oge a, yana Zen Buddha, nke ọ ga-aghọ onye na-arụ ọrụ
Ihe nwere mmetụta pụrụ iche n'ebe ọ nọ bụ onye edemede ụmụnwanyị Sweden na-ede akwụkwọ Ellen Key, nke ọ sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Japanese, na onye dike nke Henrik Ibsen's A Doll's House (1879)
N'afọ 1908, ya na Morita Sōhei, onye nkuzi ya bụ onye edemede lụrụ di na onye na-eso ụzọ onye edemede Natsume Soseki, nwara igbu onwe ha ugboro abụọ, n'ugwu Nasushiobara, Tochigi
A chọtara ha abụọ dị ndụ n'ugwu ahụ, mana mgbalị igbu onwe ha nke otu di na nwunye gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ọma mere ka ọha na eze katọọ ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, Hiratsuka banyere Narumi Women's English School ebe, n'afọ 1911, o guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ụmụ nwanyị na Japan, Seitō (青, n'ụzọ nkịtị Bluestocking)
O bidoro mbipụta mbụ ya na okwu ndị a, 'Na mbido, nwanyị bụ anyanwụ' (「元始、__hau____hau____hau__) na-ezo aka na chi nwanyị Shinto Amaterasu, na nnwere onwe ime mmụọ nke ụmụ nwanyị tụfuru

N'ịnakwere aha mkpịsị aka Raichō ('Thunderbird'), ọ malitere ịkpọ oku maka mgbanwe ime mmụọ nke ụmụnwanyị, n'ime afọ ole na ole mbụ ya, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ tụgharịrị uche site na akwụkwọ gaa na nsogbu ụmụnwanyị, gụnyere mkparịta ụka ihu na ihu banyere mmekọahụ ụmụnwanyị, ịdị ọcha na ite ime
Ndị nyere aka gụnyere onye na-ede uri a ma ama na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụnwanyị bụ Yosano Akiko, n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị Japan gosipụtara echiche nke onye na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị nke oge a, n'ihi nzaghachi nke mgbasa ozi Japan, ọtụtụ n'ime ha ejighị echiche ha kpọrọ ihe, na-eche na Raichō na ndị enyi ya na-anwa izuru oge a ma ama n'akụkọ ihe mere eme

Edemede ya n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1913 'Nye ụmụnwanyị nke ụwa' (「世世婦人 十) jụrụ ọrụ ụmụnwanyị na-arụ dị ka ryōsai kenbo (良妻賢母, Ezigbo nwunye na nne maara ihe) 'Ana m eche otú ụmụnwanyị ole, maka nchekwa ego na ndụ ha, si banye n'alụmdi na nwunye na-enweghị ịhụnanya iji bụrụ odibo na akwụna nke otu nwoke

' Enweghị nkwekọrịta a mere ka Seitō ghara imegide ọha mmadụ kamakwa steeti, na-enye aka na nyocha nke magazin ụmụnwanyị nke 'na-emetụta usoro ọha na eze' ma ọ bụ webata 'echiche ọdịda anyanwụ banyere ụmụnwanyị' nke na-ekwekọghị na Japan
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ mechiri n'afọ 1915, mana ọ bụghị tupu o guzobe onye guzobere ya dị ka onye na-eduga ìhè n'ihe omume ụmụnwanyị nke Japan
Ka ọ dịgodị, n'afọ 1914, Hiratsuka malitere ibi n'ihu ọha na onye ọ hụrụ n'anya nke nta, onye na-ese ihe Okumura Hiroshi, onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ abụọ na-abụghị di ma mesịa lụọ di n'afọ 1941
Site n'afọ 1918 ruo afọ 1919, Akiko Yosano malitere ikwu na ọ dị mkpa nnwere onwe ego ụmụnwanyị n'ihe gbasara mmepe ngwa ngwa nke akụrụngwa na Japan mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ biri

Ebe ọ bụ na arụmụka Key banyere ịbụ nne site na ntụgharị nke ọrụ ya, ọ na-azọrọ na nnwere onwe zuru oke bụ atụmanya na-agaghị ekwe omume na ọnọdụ ahụ n'oge ahụ, ma gbakwunye nchebe ịmụ nwa na enyemaka ego nke gọọmentị dị mkpa iji guzobe mba ụmụnwanyị, ịdị adị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ọnọdụ siri ike nke ndị ọrụ ụmụnwanyị, megide arụmụka Yosano
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Yamakawa Kikue na Yamada Waka sonyere na arụmụka a, ọ ghọkwara nnukwu òtù mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke a maara dị ka esemokwu nchedo nne (母性保護surf, Bosei-hogo ronso)

N'afọ 1920, mgbe nyocha banyere ọnọdụ ụmụnwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ akwa akwa na Nagoya nke mere ka mkpebi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dịkwuo mkpa, Hiratsuka guzobere New Women's Association (新婦人 師, Shin-fujin kyokai) ya na onye na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụnwanyị Ichikawa Fusae

Ọ bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu site na mgbalị nke otu a ka Akụkụ nke 5 nke Iwu Nchebe Ndị Uwe Ojii, nke e wepụtara n'afọ 1900, gbochiri ụmụnwanyị isonye n'òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma mee ma ọ bụ gaa nzukọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ka a tụgharịrị n'afọ 1922
Otú ọ dị, ikike ụmụ nwanyị nwere ịtụ vootu nọgidere na-agafe na Japan
Mgbasa mgbasa ozi ọzọ na-ese okwu gbalịrị igbochi ndị ikom na-arịa ọrịa venereal ịlụ di
Mgbasa ozi a na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma ka bụ ihe esemokwu gbara ọrụ Hiratsuka gburugburu n'ihi na ọ hụrụ ka ọ na-ejikọta onwe ya na eugenics movement, na-ekwusi ike na mgbasa nke VD
na-enwe mmetụta na-adịghị mma na 'agbụrụ' ndị Japan

Hiratsuka ga-esonye n'òtù na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ n'afọ ndị 1930, na-ekwubi na nke a ga-abụ nhọrọ kachasị mma iji tinye ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke ndị mmadụ na ebumnuche bụ isi nke mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Otú ọ dị, n'ime afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, Hiratsuka wepụrụ onwe ya n'anya ọha na eze, jiri ụgwọ na onye ọ hụrụ n'anya nwere nsogbu ahụike, ọ bụ ezie na ọ ga-anọgide na-ede ma na-ekwu okwu
N'afọ ndị agha gachara, ọ pụtara ọzọ dị ka onye ọha na eze site na usoro udo

N'afọ 1950, ụbọchị Agha Korea malitere, ya na onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe ike Nogami Yaeko na mmadụ atọ ndị ọzọ so na Japan Women's Movement (婦人運動家) gara United States iji nye US Secretary of State Dean Acheson arịrịọ ka e mepụta usoro nke Japan nwere ike ịnọgide na-anọpụ iche na pacifist

Hiratsuka gara n'ihu na-akwado ikike ụmụnwanyị n'oge agha gachara, na-eguzobe New Japan Women's Association (新日本婦零会) na 1963 ya na Nogami na onye omenkà a ma ama Iwasaki Chihiro, ma na-aga n'ihu ide ma na-akụzi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1971
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kpuchiri ọtụtụ iri afọ, a na-echeta Hiratsuka maka nlekọta ya nke otu Seitō

Dị ka onye na-eduga ìhè nke òtù ụmụnwanyị na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ na Japan, ọ bụ onye nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu nke ndị na-efe ya sitere na onye edemede nwanyị Korea Na Hye-sok (나혜석; 羅́錫) onye bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Tokyo n'oge ọganihu Seitō ruo onye anarchist na onye nkatọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya Itō Noe onye otu ya na nzukọ Seitō kpatara esemokwu ụfọdụ
Òtù ya mgbe agha gasịrị, New Japan Women's Organization, ka na-arụsi ọrụ ike ruo taa
Hisham Mackie (amụrụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Sierra Leone
Ọ bụ onye kachasị ebupụ diamond site na Sierra Leone, na-enweta 51% nke mbupụ diamond niile nke Sierra Leone Mackie na-agba ọsọ HM Diamond, ụlọ ọrụ nke na-ebupụ diamond niile na 2005
A mụrụ Hisham Mackie na Freetown, Sierra Leone na abalị isii na onwa nke anọ, na afọ 1969 n'ezinụlọ Sierra Leone-Lebanese nke nọ na azụmahịa diamond kemgbe 1952
Nna ya, ọgbọ nke abụọ Sierra Leonean-Lebanese, so na ndị mbụ na-ere diamond nke gọọmentị Sierra Leone nyere ikike n'oge mmalite afọ iri isii
Mackie gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ Bo a ma ama na Bo ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1986
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bo School, ọ gara England ebe ọ gara Mahadum London na 1987
Mackie sonyeere azụmahịa diamond na 2002 dị ka onye nwe ikike mbupụ
Ákụkọ́ mbụ bu ọmúmú ihe mèrè na ùwà madu na mbu
Ndi ọmúmú ndi ne dé màkà akíkó mbu bu ndi ákíkó irò
Na ngá ọ bu ihe jírí ákíkó Í lé ógè dárá ní, na ọ di mgbe ọ chọrí hü mà ọ dị nnòmi nọr na ímé ya na ihe gbakotárá na ihe wéfùtàrà na ihe méréní
Ndí ákíkó irò na lụta ụka màkà agwà akíkó mbu na ihe ọ dị mkpà màkà
Ihe ndi á dí kà Í kȯwá màkà ọmúmú ya Í zí ihe gị dị mmá na ógè nke gị bya
Ákíkó mbu di ímérímé na oménàlà iche iche, mà ha enwéghị ihe kwádoro ya si ọ bu eziókwu, bụ ihe há sị bu óbị oménàlà ndi áhù, mà ha bughị ihe ezibote ndi mádu gi si mèrè; ọ bu ihe bu irò
Ihe mere mgbe mádu à búghí uzọr è détù ihe ákíkó mbu bu ihe ha na akpọ oge mbu ákíkó mbu (prehistory)

Ihe ndekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke China mbụ amara ama ama sitere na mmalite dị ka 1250 BC, site na usoro ndị eze Shang (ihe dị ka 1600–1046 BC), n'oge ọchịchị eze Wu Ding, onye akpọrọ aha dị ka eze iri abụọ na otu nke Shang site n'otu aka ahụ
Ederede akụkọ ihe mere eme oge ochie dị ka Akwụkwọ nke Documents (isi mmalite, narị afọ nke 11 BC), Bamboo Annals (c
296 BC) na Records of the Grand Historian (c
91 BC) kwuru ma kọwaa usoro eze Xia (c
-1600 BC) tupu Shang, mana ọ nweghị ederede amataghị site na oge ahụ, na ihe odide Shang egosighi ịdị adị nke Xia
Shang chịrị na ndagwurugwu Yellow River, nke a na-ewerekarị dị ka ebe mmalite nke mmepeanya ndị China
Agbanyeghị, mmepeanya Neolithic sitere na ebe ọdịnala dị iche iche n'akụkụ Osimiri Yellow na Osimiri Yangtze
Ndị a Yellow River na Yangtze mmepeanya bilitere puku afọ tupu Shang
N'ime ọtụtụ puku afọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na-aga n'ihu, China so na mmepeanya kacha ochie n'ụwa, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka otu n'ime mmalite mmepeanya
Ndị eze Zhou (1046–256 BC) nọchiri Shang, ma webata echiche nke Iwu Eluigwe iji kwado ọchịchị ha
Gọọmenti etiti Zhou malitere ịda mba n'ihi nrụgide mpụga na nke ime na narị afọ nke asatọ BC, obodo ahụ mechara kewaa n'obere steeti n'oge opupu ihe ubi na oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ
Steeti ndị a nwere onwe ha wee lụso ibe ha ọgụ n'oge steeti Warring na-esote
Ọtụtụ omenala, akwụkwọ na nkà ihe ọmụma ndị China malitere n'oge nsogbu ahụ
Homo erectus bi na China ugbu a ihe karịrị otu nde afọ gara aga
Nnyocha e mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na-egosi na ngwá ọrụ nkume ndị a chọtara na saịtị Xiaochangliang bụ magnetostratigraphically ụbọchị 136 nde afọ gara aga

Ebe ihe ochie nke Xihoudu dị na Shanxi Province nwere ihe akaebe nke Homo erectus ji ọkụ mee ihe, nke dị na 127 nde afọ gara aga, na fossils Homo erectus na China gụnyere nwoke Yuanmou, nwoke Lantian na onye Peking
Achọpụtara ezé fossilized Homo sapiens nke dị na 125,000–80,000 BC na Fuyan Cave na Dao County na Hunan
Achọtala ihe akaebe nke teknụzụ Middle Palaeolithic Levallois n'ime mkpokọta lithic nke saịtị Guanyindong dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ China, nke edere ihe dị ka 170,000–80,000 afọ gara aga
Bronze artifacts have been found at the Majiayao culture site (between 3100 and 2700 BC)
The Bronze Age is also represented at the Lower Xiajiadian culture (2200–1600 BC) site in northeast China
Sanxingdui located in what is now Sichuan province is believed to be the site of a major ancient city, of a previously unknown Bronze Age culture (between 2000 and 1200 BC)
The site was first discovered in 1929 and then re-discovered in 1986
Chinese archaeologists have identified the Sanxingdui culture to be part of the ancient kingdom of Shu, linking the artifacts found at the site to its early legendary kings
Ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke China n'oge ikpeazụ maara echiche nke otu usoro eze ga-anọchi nke ọzọ, ma ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na China n'oge mbụ siri ike karị
N'ihi ya, dị ka ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta nke China na-atụ aro, ndị Xia na ndị Shang nwere ike na-ezo aka n'òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị n'otu oge, dị ka Zhou mbụ dị n'otu oge ahụ na Shang

Nchọpụta sitere na oge Shang mbụ sitere na ihe gwupụtara na Erligang, nke dị nso ugbu a Zhengzhou, na Shangcheng
Nchọpụta sitere na oge Shang ma ọ bụ Yin (殷) mechara, ka ahụrụ n'ọba ụba na Anyang, na Henan nke oge a, nke ikpeazụ nke isi obodo itoolu nke Shang (c

1300–1046 BC) na Anyang gunyere ihe odide izizi nke ndi China choputara ugbu a ihe odide nke igba afa na Chinese oge ochie na-ede n'ọkpụkpụ ma ọ bụ shei nke anụmanụ - ' ọkpụkpụ okwu ', malitere na gburugburu 1250 BC
Ndị eze Zhou (otu puku na iri ana n'isi BC ruo ihe dịka nari abuo iriise nisi BC) bụ usoro eze kacha dịrị ogologo oge na akụkọ ntolite China
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị narị afọ nke abụọ BC, usoro ndị eze Zhou malitere ịpụta na ndagwurugwu Osimiri ocha, na-agafe ókèala Shang
Ọ dị ka ndị Zhou malitere ịchịisi ha n'okpuru ọchịchị ọkara feudal
Ndị Zhou bi na ọdịda anyanwụ nke Shang, ndị Shang họpụtara onye ndu Zhou Onye Nchebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ
Onye na-achị Zhou, Eze Wu, site n'enyemaka nke nwanne ya nwoke, Duke nke Zhou, dị ka onye ọchịchị, jisiri ike merie Shang na Agha Muye
Isi ihe ndị mere na obere oge mbụ gụnyere njikọ Qin nke ndi China na ndị Han nọchiri ha, nkewa nke mbụ nke njikọ Jin sochiri, na mfu nke ugwu China
Oge obere oge etiti ka e ji njikota Sui akara yana mgbakwunye Tang, nke abụọ nke abụọ na njikọta nke egwu
Oge obere oge ikpeazụ gụnyere usoro ndị eze Yuan, Ming na Qing

Ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na-ezokarị aka n'oge sitere na usoro Qin ruo na njedebe nke usoro ndị eze Qing dị ka Imperial China Ọ bụ ezie na ọchịchị dị n'otu nke Emperor Qin Mbụ dị naanị afọ 12, o jisiri dị ukwuu nke ihe bụ isi nke ala nna Han China na ime ka ha dịrị n'otu n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị omebe iwu nke dị na Xianyang (nke dị nso na Xianyang)
